articles.title: Uvuko 1
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade!

Namhlanje siza kuhlolisisa ubudlelwane kwaye sabelane "Uvuko"

Masivule iBhayibhile kuYohane isahluko 11, indinyana 21-25, size siqalise ukufunda;

Wathi uMarta kuYesu, Nkosi, ukuba ubulapha, umnakwethu ange engafanga. Nangoku ndiyazi ukuba, ongathi ukucele, uThixo wokunika ,” watsho uMarta, “ukuba uya kubuya avuke eluvukweni.” UYesu wathi kuye: “Ndim uvuko, ndim ubomi, lowo ukholwayo kum, nokuba ubethe wafa, wodla ubomi.

UYesu wathi: “Ndim uvuko, ndim ubomi! Lowo ukholwayo kum, nokuba ubethe wafa, wodla ubomi” Amen

(1) Umprofeti uEliya wathandaza kuThixo, waza umntwana waphila

Emva koko, umfazi ongunkosikazi wendlu, unyana wakhe wagula kangangokuba waphelelwa ngumphefumlo (okuthetha ukuthi, ufile).
(Umphefumlo womntwana usesemzimbeni wakhe, kwaye uyaphila)

... UEliya wawa phezu komntwana izihlandlo zazithathu, wadanduluka kuYehova, esithi, Yehova Thixo wam, mawubuyele umphefumlo walo mntwana enyameni yakhe umzimba wakhe uyaphila. 1 Kumkani 17:17, 21-22

(2) Umprofeti uElisha wavuselela unyana womfazi waseShunem

Wathi ke akukhula umntwana, ngamhla uthile waya kuyise nakubavuni, wathi kuyise, Intloko yam, intloko yam, uyise kumfana, wathi, Mse kunina Wamthabatha, wamnikela kunina;
...UElisha wangena endlwini, wayibona inkwenkwe leyo ifile, ilele esingqengqelweni sakhe.

....Waye wehla ke, wahamba wanyuka waya egumbini, wenyuka walala phezu komntwana, wathimla kasixhenxe, wawavula amehlo. 2 Kumkani 4:18-20,32,35

(3) Xa umntu ofileyo wachukumisa amathambo kaElisha, umntu ofileyo wayevuswa

Wafa ke uElisha, wangcwatywa. NgoMhla Wonyaka Omtsha, iqela lamaMowabhi lahlasela ilizwe ngequbuliso labona iqela labantu ababefile ubomi waphakama. 2 Kumkani 13:20-21

(4)USirayeli →→ Uvuko lwamathambo

umprofeti uyaprofeta → Sirayeli → Intsapho yonke yasindiswa

Wathi ke kum, Nyana womntu, aya kubuya avuke na la mathambo?
Wathi kum, Profeta kula mathambo, uthi,
Liveni ilizwi likaYehova, nina mathambo omileyo.
Itsho iNkosi uYehova kula mathambo ukuthi:
Ndiya kwenza umoya ungene kuni;
Uya kuphila.
Ndiya kuninika imisipha, ndininike inyama, ndinaleke ngolusu, ndifake umoya kuni, niphile; nazi ukuba ndinguYehova.

Wathi uYehova kum, Nyana womntu, La mathambo yintsapho yonke yakwaSirayeli . .. Imbekiselo kuHezekile 37:3-6,11

Ke, bazalwana, andithandi ukuba ningayazi le mfihlelo, hleze nizicingele ukuba niziingqondi; lide lizaliseke inani leentlanga , Ngoko ke onke amaSirayeli aya kusindiswa . Njengoko kubhaliwe kwathiwa:

“Umsindisi uya kuphuma eZiyon, asuse sonke isono sendlu kaYakobi, athi: “Nguwo lo umnqophiso wam nabo, xa ndithe ndasisusa isono sabo.”

Ndeva ke ezizweni zonke zakwaSirayeli Itywina Inani li-144,000. ISityhilelo 7:4

(Qaphela: Kwiveki enye, isiqingatha seveki! AmaSirayeli atywinwa nguThixo → angena kwiwaka leminyaka → eyayiyinzaliseko yeziprofeto zesiprofeto. Emva kweNtlokoma kaQian → yonke intsapho yakwaSirayeli yasindiswa)

umzi ongcwele iYerusalem →→ umtshakazi, umfazi wexhwane

Esinye sezithunywa zezulu ezisixhenxe ezineengqayi ezisixhenxe zegolide ezizele zizibetho ezisixhenxe zokugqibela seza kum sathi: “Yiza apha, yaye ndiza kukubonisa umtshakazi, umfazi wayo iMvana.
Amagama ezizwe ezilishumi elinambini zakwaSirayeli
“Ndaqhutywa nguMoya oyiNgcwele, zaza izithunywa zandisa entabeni ephakamileyo, zaza zandibonisa umzi ongcwele, iYerusalem, osihlayo uphuma emazulwini, uvela kuThixo, kuwo umzi lalinjengelitye elinqabileyo kakhulu, linjengeyaspisi, libonakala ngathi ngumkhenkce, bekukho udonga olude, lunamasango alishumi elinamabini, namasango lawo izithunywa zezulu ezilishumi elinazibini;
Amagama abapostile abalishumi elinababini bayo ixhwane

Kukho amasango amathathu kwicala lasempumalanga, amasango amathathu ngasentla, amasango amathathu ngasezantsi, amasango amathathu nangecala lasentshonalanga. Udonga lwesixeko lunamatye eziseko alishumi elinambini, yaye phezu kweziseko lawo ngamagama abapostile abalishumi elinababini bayo iMvana. ISityhilelo 21:9-14

( Phawula: Izizwe ezilishumi elinesibini zakwaSirayeli + abapostile abalishumi elinesibini beMvana;
IBandla lakwaSirayeli + iBandla leeNtlanga

Ibandla linye! )

Amen. Ke, uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?)

(5) Ngomthandazo: Ukuvuswa kukaTabhitha noDorkas

Kwakukho mfundikazi othile eYopa, ogama linguTabhita, ngesiGrike oko kukuthi, inqamakazi; Ngelo xesha, wagula waza wafa.

...UPetros wabayalela ukuba baphume bonke, waguqa ngamadolo wathandaza . IZenzo 9:36-37,40

(6) UYesu wavusa abantwana bakaYayiro

Ekubuyeni kukaYesu, wahlangatyezwa zizihlwele, kuba zonke zazimlindile. Kweza indoda egama linguYayiro, umphathi wendlu yesikhungu, yawa ezinyaweni zikaYesu, imbongoza ukuba eze endlwini yakhe; Kuthe ke xa uYesu wayesimka, waxinwa yindimbane.

.... Akufika uYesu endlwini yakhe, bekungekho namnye ubevunyelwe ukuba angene naye, kwakuphela nguPetros, noYohane, noYakobi, nabazali bentombi yakhe. Balila bonke abantu, bebetha izifuba ngenxa yentombi leyo. Wathi uYesu: “Musani ukulila! wabuya , wavuka kwangoko waza uYesu wathi kuye makamnike into etyiwayo.

(7) UYesu wathi: “Ndim uvuko, ndim ubomi;

1 Ukufa kukaLazaro

Kwaye kukho ke indoda eyayisifa, egama linguLazaro, ehlala eBhetani, idolophana yakuloMariya, noMarta udade wabo. .. Emva kokuba uYesu ewathethile la mazwi, wathi ke kubo, “Umhlobo wethu uLazaro ulele, yaye ndiza kumvusa. Abafundi bakhe bathi kuye, “Nkosi, ukuba ulele, uya kuphila Ke bona babeba ulele njengesiqhelo. Waza uYesu wathi kubo ngokungafihilisiyo, ULazaro ufile. Yohane 11:1, 11-14

2 UYesu wathi: “Ndim uvuko, ndim ubomi, lowo ukholwayo kum, nokuba ubethe wafa, wodla ubomi.

Akufika uYesu, wafika uLazaro eneentsuku ezine esengcwabeni.
...Wathi uMarta kuYesu, Nkosi, ukuba ubulapha, umnakwethu ange engafanga. Nangoku ndiyazi ukuba, ongathi ukucele kuThixo, oko wokunika uThixo uya kubuya avuke. Wathi uMarta, Ndiyazi ukuba uya kubuya avuke eluvukweni lwaseMobhayi.

” Wathi uYesu kuye, Ndim uvuko, ndim ubomi. Lowo ukholwayo kum, nokuba ubethe wafa, wobuya adle ubomi;

3 UYesu wamvusa uLazaro ekufeni

Wabuya wagcuma uYesu, weza engcwabeni apho; Wathi uYesu, Lisuseni ilitye;
Athi kuye uMarta, udade wofileyo, Nkosi, uselenuka ngoku, kuba useleneentsuku efile uYesu athi kuye, Anditshongo na kuwe ukuthi, Ukuba uyakholwa, wombona uThixo? ?" Balisusa ke ilitye.

UYesu wawaphakamisela ezulwini amehlo akhe, wathi, Bawo, ndiyabulela kuwe kuba undivile; ndiyazi nam ukuba uhleli undiva; wena undithumile. Yiza, akuba etshilo, wadanduluka ngezwi elikhulu, wathi, Lazaro, phuma phandle, izandla neenyawo zijikelwe ngeqhiya Wathi kubo, Mkhululeni, nimyeke ahambe

Qaphela : Ezi ngxelo zibaliwe ngasentla yindlela kaThixo yokuvusa abafileyo ngemithandazo yabantu, izikhungo nokuphilisa! Kwaye wonke umntu makabone ngamehlo akhe iNkosi uYesu evusa uLazaro.

Kunjengokuba iNkosi uYesu yathi: “Ndim uvuko, ndim ubomi. Lowo ukholwayo kum, nokuba ubethe wafa, wodla ubomi, Amen.

INkosi uYesu yathi: “Lowo udla ubomi ekholwa kum, akasayi kufa naphakade. Ithetha ntoni le nto? ). uyakholwa na koko?”—Yohane 11:26

Ukuqhubeka, jonga ukwabelana ngetrafikhi "Uvuko" 2

articles.title: Uvuko 2
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade!

Namhlanje siqhubeka sifunda ubudlelwane kwaye sabelane "Uvuko"

Isifundo 2; UYesu Krestu wavuka kwabafileyo waza wasiphinda

Savula iBhayibhile kweyoku-1 kaPetros Isahluko 1:3-5, saza safunda kunye: Makabongwe uThixo, uYise weNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, ngokwenceba yakhe enkulu, owamvusa kwabafileyo ngoYesu Kristu nizalwe ngokutsha, nisingise kwithemba eliphilileyo, elifeni elingenakonakala, elingenakudyobheka, elingenakonakala, eligcinelwe nina emazulwini. Nina nigcinwe ngamandla kaThixo ngokholo niya kuba nako ukufumana usindiso olulungiselelwe ukutyhilwa ngemihla yokugqibela.

1. UYesu Kristu wavuka kwabafileyo waza wasenza ngokutsha

buza: Bonke abadla ubomi bekholwa kum, abasayi kufa naphakade; Ngaba uyakukholelwa oku kuYohane 11:26
Wayethetha ukuthini uYesu xa wayethetha oku?

Kuba nesibhalo sithi, Abantu bamiselwe ukuba bafe kube kanye, emva koko kubekho ukugwetywa. Hebhere 9:27

impendulo :Ukuzalwa ngokutsha Yambatha ubomi bukaKristu, umntu omtsha ozelwe ngokutsha akasayi kufa. Amen!

umelwe kukuba uzalwe ngokutsha

Njengoko iNkosi uYesu yathi: Nimele nizalwe ngokutsha, musani ukumangaliswa. Imbekiselo kuYohane 3:7

UYesu Kristu wavuka kwabafileyo!

Ukuzalwa kwakhona → → Thina:

1 Uzelwe ngamanzi nanguMoya - Yohane 3:5
2 Wazalelwa inyaniso yeendaba ezilungileyo - 1 Korinte 4:15 kunye noYakobi 1:18

3 Uzelwe nguThixo—Yohane 1:12-13

buza : Wazalelwa nguAdam?
Ngaba wazalwa nguYesu Kristu?
Yintoni umahluko?

impendulo :Ingcaciso eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

(1) UAdam wenziwa ngothuli — Genesis 2:7

UAdam waba ngumntu ophilayo onomoya (umoya: okanye inyama)— 1 Korinte 15:45

→→Abantwana awabazalayo nabo badalwa, inyama nomhlaba.

(2)UAdam wokugqibela nguYesu

→→NguLizwi wenziwa inyama—Yohane 1:14;
Ekuqalekeni ube ekho uLizwi, waye uLizwi ekuye uThixo, waye uLizwi enguThixo - Yohane 1:1-2
→uThixo waba yinyama;
Umoya kaThixo—Yohane 4:24
→Umoya waba yinyama nowomoya;

Ngoko ke, uYesu wazalwa nguYise - bona amaHebhere 1:5.

UYesu Krestu wavuka kwabafileyo → uyasivelisa kwakhona!

Sizalwa ngokutsha ( Umntu omtsha ) yenziwe kwakhona ngeLizwi, elenziwe nguThixo, elenziwe nguMoya oyiNgcwele, lizelwe ngelizwi lokwenyani likaYesu Krestu ngokukholwa kwivangeli, lizelwe nguBawo waseZulwini, umzimba womoya) amalungu omzimba wakhe (eminye imisongo yamandulo yongezelela ngokuthi: Amathambo akhe nenyama yakhe). Thelekisa eyabase-Efese 5:30

(3) UAdam wasaphula isivumelwano kuMyezo wase-Eden - bhekisa kwiGenesis Izahluko 2 nesesi-3
UAdam wophula umthetho waza wona → wathengiswa esonweni.
Njengenzala ka-Adam, nathi sathengiswa esonweni xa sasisenyameni—jonga amaRoma 7:14
Umvuzo wesono kukufa—Bona kwabaseRoma 6:23
Kanye njengokuba isono sangena ngamntu mnye ehlabathini, kwaza kwangena ukufa ngaso isono, ngokunjalo ukufa kwabafikela bonke abantu ngenxa yokuba bonke bonayo. Roma 51:12
KuAdam bonke baya kufa; bona eyoku-1 kwabaseKorinte 15:22
→Ke ngoko, kumiselwe ukuba wonke umntu afe kube kanye ---Khangela kumaHebhere 9:27
→Umseki uAdam wayeluthuli yaye uya kubuyela kwaseluthulini - bhekisela kwiGenesis 3:19

→Umzimba wethu omdala wavela kuAdam, ukwaluthuli yaye uya kubuyela eluthulini.

(4) UYesu wayengenasono yaye wayengoni

akukho sono
Niyazi ke ukuba uYehova wabonakalaliswa, ukuze asuse isono somntu; akukho sono kuye. eyoku-1 kaYohane 3:5

akukho lwaphulo-mthetho

Akazange enze sono, yaye kwakungekho nkohliso emlonyeni wakhe. 1 Petros 2:22
Ngokuba akanakuvelana nobuthathaka bethu; Wahendwa kuzo zonke iindawo njengathi, kodwa engenasono. Hebhere 4:15

2 UYesu Kristu wavuswa kwabafileyo

→→Abantwana abazelwe ngokutsha abanasono yaye aboni

Masivule iBhayibhile kweyoku-1 kaYohane 3:9, siyityhile size siyifunde kunye:

Bonke abazelwe nguThixo aboni, ngokuba ilizwi likaThixo lihleli kuye;

buza :UYesu wavuswa kwabafileyo→Ngaba abantu abatsha abahlaziyiweyo basenazo izono?

impendulo : akanatyala

buza : Ngaba amaKristu azelwe ngokutsha angona?

impendulo :ukuzalwa ngokutsha( Umntu omtsha ) akayi kwenza lwaphulo-mthetho

buza :Ngoba?

impendulo :Ingcaciso eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

(1) Nabani na ozelwe nguThixo →→ (umtsha)

1 Musa ukona — 1 Yohane 3:9
2 Anisayi kona— 1 Yohane 5:18

3 Kananjalo akanakona— 1 Yohane 3:9

(Bazalwa ngokutsha, kutheni ningoni? UThixo uya kuthetha ngebhayibhile! Awudingi ukuthetha okanye ukuthandabuza, kuba uya kuzenza iimpazamo ngokukhawuleza nje ukuba uthethe. Logama nje ukholelwa kwintsingiselo yokomoya Amazwi kaThixo, ezi ndinyana zeBhayibhile zilandelayo ziya kuphendula:)

4 Ngokuba ilizwi likaThixo lihleli kuye, akanakona
5 Kuba uzelwe nguThixo.”— 1 Yohane 3:9
Wonke umntu omtsha ozelwe nguThixo uhlala kuKrestu kwaye uhleli noKrestu ezintliziyweni zenu kwezasezulwini iindawo. Abha! Isandla sokunene sikaThixo uYise. Amen!
6 Lowo uhleli kuye akoni uYohane - Yoshuwa 3:6
7 Ukuba ke uMoya uhleli kuni, aningabo abenyama, ningokaMoya.”— Roma 8:9
8 Ngokuba wena (indoda endala) ufile, Umntu omtsha ) ubomi bukaKrestu bufihliwe kunye noKrestu kuThixo- Kolose 3:3
9 Wasivusa nathi (abantu abatsha) waza wasihlalisa ndawonye kwezasemazulwini iindawo noKristu Yesu - Efese 2:6
10 Kuhlwayelwa umzimba, emhlabeni ), okuvuswayo ngumzimba womoya ( ngokomoya ). Ukuba kukho umzimba ongowenyama, kufuneka kukwakho nomzimba ongowomoya. 1 Korinte 15:44
11 Usisidalwa esitsha—jonga eyesi-2 kwabaseKorinte 5:17

12 Bazalwa nguThixo ( Umntu omtsha ) ayinakubonwa - bhekisa kweyesi-2 kwabaseKorinte 4:16-18

Isaziso: Umpostile uPawulos wathi kweyesi-2 kwabaseKorinte 4:18 →Kuba asizixhaleli thina khangela "Ndiza kubona( indoda endala) kodwa indawo yokunyamekela" khangela "Kulahlekile ( Umntu omtsha ); Le ndoda endala ngokuthe ngcembe iya isiba mbi ngakumbi ngenxa yenkohliso (isono) yeminqweno yokuzingca - Efese 4:22 → Umzimba wangaphandle wendoda endala utshatyalaliswa imihla ngemihla - bhekisela kweyesi- 2 kwabaseKorinte 4:16 . Kuba amehlo ayabona ( indoda endala ), yinyama eyazalwa nguAdam yaye iye yathengiswa esonweni Ukuba wenza isono ngenxa yokuhendwa yiminqweno neminqweno yenyama, ngokuthe ngcembe uya kuba mbi aze atshatyalaliswe ekuqaleni uya kubuyela eluthulini emva kweminyaka elikhulu .

Umbuzo: Uphi umntu wethu omtsha owenziwe ngokutsha?

Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

Kwaye ongabonakaliyo ( Umntu omtsha ) ilaphu loboya! Njengoko kuchaziwe ngaphambili: UYesu Kristu wavuswa kwabafileyo waza wazalwa ngokutsha ( Umntu omtsha ) kukuhlala kuKristu, ukuba nifihlwe noKristu kuThixo, nibe noKristu kwezasezulwini iindawo, nihlale ngasekunene kukaThixo uYise, nasezintliziyweni zenu → njengoko uPawulos watshoyo kwabaseRoma 7:22! Ngenxa yokuba ngokwentsingiselo yam yangaphakathi (umbhalo wokuqala ngumntu) → umntu ongabonakaliyo ohlala ezintliziyweni zenu ngumntu omtsha owenziwe ngokutsha wavuswa kunye noKristu kwaye ungumzimba womoya amehlo ahamba ze Umzimba womoya unxulunyaniswa nobomi UKrestu bubomi, yidlani ukutya kokomoya kobomi, selani amanzi aphilileyo omthombo wobomi, manihlaziywe imihla ngemihla kuKristu nikhule nibe yindoda, ezele bubunzaliseko bukaKrestu ngaloo mini yiza xa efika kwakhona, ozelwe ngokutsha Umntu omtsha uya kutyhilwa kwaye atyhilwe → uvuko oluhle ngakumbi! Amen. Kanye njengokuba inyosi ivelisa "inyosi engukumkanikazi" kwindlu yayo, le "nyosi yendlovukazi" inkulu kwaye ilungile kunezinye iinyosi. Umntu wethu omtsha ukwanguye noKristu. Uya kuvuswa aze abonakale ngaphambi kwewaka leminyaka, yaye uya kulawula noKristu iminyaka eliwaka, uya kulawula noYesu Kristu kwizulu elitsha nomhlaba omtsha ngonaphakade. Amen.

Naliphi na ikholwa elibonayo, elivayo neliqondayo ilizwi lenyaniso liya kukhetha ukuzimanya nathi "IBandla leNkosi uYesu Kristu" Ibandla elinobukho boMoya oyiNgcwele nokushumayela iindaba ezilungileyo eziyinyaniso. Ngenxa yokuba baziintombi ezilumkileyo ezinezibane ezandleni zabo kwaye zilungiselele ioli ezityeni eziziintombi eziziingqondi ziyayiqonda imfundiso eyinyani yevangeli, zixhase imfundiso eyiyo, kwaye ziqonde umntu omtsha owenziwe ngokutsha zingcwele, azinasono . , banyulu, banyulu! Njengabantu abali-144,000 abalandela iMvana. Amen!

Kukho amabandla amaninzi afundisa iBhayibhile, kanye njengebandla laseLawodike amanye awanabo ubukho boMoya oyiNgcwele kwaye awazishumayeli imfundiso eyiyo yeendaba ezilungileyo veki nganye, yaye abanako ukuqonda oko bakuvayo! Ngoko ke, iNkosi uYesu yawakhalimela loo mabandla afana neLawodike → Wathi: “Ndisisityebi, ndisisityebi, andiswele nto; ndiyakubongoza ukuba uthenge kum igolide evuthiswe emlilweni, ukuze ube nobutyebi; ISityhilelo 3:17-18

Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Isilumkiso: Lowo uneendlebe zokuva makeve.

Abantu abakhokelwa nguMoya oyiNgcwele baya kuyiqonda ngokukhawuleza xa beyiva, kodwa abanye abantu abayiqondi nokuba bayayiva. Kukwakho abantu ababa neenkani, beyichasa indlela eyinyaniso, bayitshabalalisa indlela yenyaniso, baze batshutshise abantwana bakaThixo, ekugqibeleni baya kumngcatsha uYesu nabantwana bakaThixo.
Ngoko ke, ukuba kukho nabani na ongaqondiyo, ufanele athandaze ngokuthobekileyo kuThixo aze afune, yaye uya kufumana; Amen
Kodwa awumele uyichase indlela yokwenyaniso uze ufumane intliziyo ethanda inyaniso. Kungenjalo, uThixo uya kumnika intliziyo egwenxa, amenze akholwe bubuxoki. Imbekiselo kweyesi-2 kwabaseTesalonika 2:11
Abantu abanjalo abanakuze bakuqonde ukuzalwa ngokutsha kunye nosindiso lukaKristu. Ngaba uyakholelwa okanye awukholelwa?

(2) Nabani na owenza ulwaphulo-mthetho →→ (Ngumntu omdala)

buza : Ezinye iicawe zifundisa ukuba...ukuzalwa ngokutsha abantu basenokona?

impendulo : Ungathethi nentanda-bulumko yabantu;

1 ...Lowo wonayo akambonanga - 1 Yohane 3:6

Phawula: Nabani na ohlala kuye (ebhekisa kwabo bakuKristu, umntu omtsha ozelwe ngokutsha ekuvukeni kukaYesu Kristu kwabafileyo) akoni; kaThixo kwiNtetho yeBhayibhile! Wathi uYesu, Amazwi endiwathethayo kuni mna angumoya, abubomi; niyabona na?

2 Bonke abonayo abamazanga yena - 1 Yohane 3:6

Phawula: Bubo ke obu ubomi obungunaphakade, ukuba mabakwazi, wena ukuphela koThixo oyinyaniso, naye uYesu Kristu omthumileyo. Kukho impazamo kwezinye iiBhayibhile ze-elektroniki: “Ukwazi Wena, Okuphela KoThixo Oyinyaniso” inegama elongezelelweyo elithi “enye”, kodwa akukho typo kwiBhayibhile ebhaliweyo.
Ngoko ke, nceda uzibuze, ngaba uyayazi iNkosi uYesu Kristu? Ngaba uyaluqonda usindiso lukaKristu? Abo befundisi bakufundisa njani ukuba wonke umntu ovusiweyo? Umntu omtsha ), ngaba useza kuba netyala? Ithini iBhayibhile ngabashumayeli abafundisa ngolu hlobo → Nabani na ohlala kuye? Ngaba ngumntu omtsha , ningoni;

Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

3 Musa ukuhendwa

Phawula: Bantwanana bam, musani ukuhendwa ngabanye, ukuba kukuhendwa bubuxoki neemfundiso; Umntu omtsha Hayi enyameni yenu endala, emzimbeni wenu omdala onesono, kodwa umntu omtsha ngaphakathi kwenu, ohlala kuKristu, emazulwini, kungekhona emhlabeni, kuthi. Umntu omtsha Ayibonakali ngeliso lenyama" umntu womoya “ngokuhlaziyeka koMoya oyiNgcwele, mayenziwe bahlaziyeke imihla ngemihla, nibe yindoda ngokwenza ubulungisa. Oku kuthetha ukuba lowo wenza ubulungisa ulilungisa, njengokuba neNkosi ilungisa. Amen

Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

Bonke abahlala kuye aboni; Bafana bam abancinci, musani ukuhendwa. Lowo ubenzayo ubulungisa lilungisa, kanye njengokuba uYehova elilungisa. eyoku- 1 kaYohane 3:6-7

3 Ihlabathi liphela lisemandleni ongendawo

Abo bonayo bangabakaMtyholi

Lowo wonayo ungokaMtyholi; ngokuba uMtyholi wone kwasekuqalekeni. UNyana kaThixo wabonakalaliswa ukuba ayichithe imisebenzi kaMtyholi. eyoku- 1 kaYohane 3:8

(Abantu ehlabathini lonke, abaphantsi komthetho, abo baphula umthetho nezoni, aboni! Bonke balele phantsi kwesandla songendawo. Uyakholwa?)

Siyazi ukuba bonke abazelwe nguThixo abasayi kuze bone; bonke abazelwe nguThixo baya kuzigcina; Siyazi ukuba singabakaThixo, nokuba ihlabathi liphela lilele kongendawo. Siyazi ke ukuba uNyana kaThixo ufikile, wasinika ubulumko, ukuze simazi oyinyaniso; sikuye oyinyaniso, uNyana wakhe uYesu Kristu. Nguye lo uThixo oyinyaniso, nobomi obungunaphakade. eyoku- 1 kaYohane 5:18-20

Kuya kwabelwana ngayo kwintetho yesithathu: "Uvuko" 3

articles.title: Uvuko 3
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade kwintsapho kaThixo!

Namhlanje siqhubeka sihlola ezothutho kwaye sabelane "Uvuko"

Isifundo 3: Uvuko kunye nokuzalwa ngokutsha koMntu Omtsha kunye neNdoda endala

Masivule iBhayibhile kweyesi-2 kwabaseKorinte 5:17-20, siyityhile kwaye siyifunde kunye:
Ukuba ubani ukuKristu, usisidalwa esitsha; Zonke ziphuma kuThixo, owasixolelanisa naye ngokwakhe ngoKristu, wasinika ulungiselelo loxolelaniso. Kaloku uThixo waye ekuKristu, elixolelanisa naye ngokwakhe ihlabathi, engazibaleli kubo iziphoso zabo, esinika lo myalezo woxolelaniso. Sizizigidimi ke ngoko ngenxa kaKristu, ngokungathi uThixo uniyala ngathi; Siyanikhunga ngenxa kaKristu, manixolelaniswe naye uThixo;

1. Sizizithunywa zevangeli

→ → Musa ukuzibeka ( indoda endala ) izikreqo ziphezu kwabo ( Umntu omtsha ) yaye usiphathise umyalezo woxolelaniso.

(1) Indoda endala kunye nomntu omtsha

Umbuzo: Indlela yokwahlula indoda endala kumntu omtsha?

Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

1 Umntu omdala ngowomnqophiso omdala;
2 Umntu omdala ngoka-Adam;
3 Umntu omdala uAdam wazalwa;
4 Umntu omdala ngowasemhlabeni;
5 Umntu omdala ungumoni;
6 Umntu omdala uyona;
7 Umntu omdala uphantsi komthetho;
8 Umntu omdala uthobela umthetho wesono;
9 Umntu omdala uxhalela izinto zasenyameni;
10 Umntu omdala uya esiba mandundu;
11 Umntu omdala akanakubudla ilifa ubukumkani bamazulu;
12 Umntu omdala wafa kunye noKristu;

(2) UMoya oyiNgcwele ulwa nenyama

Umbuzo: Uhlala phi uMoya oyiNgcwele?

Impendulo: UMoya oyiNgcwele uhlala ezintliziyweni zethu!

ukuze abakhulule ngokubathenga abaphantsi komthetho, ukuze sikuzuze ukwenziwa oonyana. Ngokuba ke ningoonyana, uThixo wamkhupha uMoya woNyana wakhe, weza ezintliziyweni zenu, edanduluka esithi, Abha, Bawo

Ukuba ke uhleli kuni uMoya kaThixo, aningabo abenyama, ningaboMoya. Ukuba umntu akanaye uMoya kaKristu, akangokaKristu lowo. Roma 8:9

buza : Akutshongo na ukuthi umzimba wethu yitempile yoMoya oyiNgcwele? — 1 Korinte 6:19
→→Ingaba iyatsho apha ukuba awungowenyama? — Roma 8:9

impendulo : Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

1 Inyama yethu ithengiswe esonweni;

Siyazi ke ukuba umthetho ungowoMoya; ke mna ndingowenyama; kuthengiswe ngaye isono. Roma 7:14

2 Inyama iyakuthanda ukuthobela umthetho wesono

Ndiyambulela uThixo kuba sinako ukusinda ngayo iNkosi yethu uYesu Krestu. Ngokwale mbono ndithobela umthetho kaThixo ngentliziyo, kodwa inyama yam ithobela umthetho wesono. Roma 7:25

3 Umntu wethu omdala wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni kunye noKrestu →→Umzimba wesono uyatshatyalaliswa, kwaye wahlulwe kulo mzimba unokufa.

Kuba siyazi ukuba ubuntu bethu obudala babethelelwa emnqamlezweni kunye naye, ukuze umzimba wesono uphuthiswe, size singabi sasikhonza isono;

4 UMoya Oyingcwele uhlala kubo abazelwe ngokutsha ( Umntu omtsha ) kwi

buza : Sizalwa phi ngokutsha (abantu abatsha)?

impendulo : Ezintliziyweni zethu! Amen

Kuba ngokomntu ongaphakathi (isicatshulwa sokuqala) ndikholiswa ngumthetho kaThixo - KwabaseRoma 7:22

Phawula: UPawulos wathi! Ngokwentsingiselo kum (umbhalo wokuqala ngumntu) → oku kusentliziyweni yam ( abantu ) ngovuko lukaYesu Kristu kwabafileyo ( umntu womoya Umzimba ongowoMoya, umntu ongowoMoya, uhleli kuthi, lo ungenakubonwa; umntu womoya ) ngoyena wokwenyani; Isithunzi ! Ngoko ke, uMoya oyiNgcwele uhlala kubantu abahlaziyiweyo basemoyeni! Oku kuzalwa ngokutsha ( Umntu omtsha ) Umzimba womoya yitempile yoMoya oyiNgcwele, kuba lo mzimba wazalwa nguYesu Kristu, yaye singamalungu akhe! Amen
Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

(3) Inkanuko yenyama ikhuphisana noMoya oyiNgcwele

→→Indoda endala kunye nendoda entsha bayalwa

Ngelo xesha, abo bazalwa ngokwenyama ( indoda endala wabatshutshisa abo bazelwe ngokoMoya; Umntu omtsha ), kwaye oku kunjalo ngoku. Galati 4:29
Ndithi ke, Hambani ngokoMoya, naningasayi kuthi ke niyizalise inkanuko yenyama. Kuba inyama ikhanuka ngokuchasene noMoya, uMoya ke ukhanuka ngokuchasene nenyama; ezo zinto zombini ziphambene, ukuze ningazenzi izinto enisukuba nizithanda. Galati 5:16-17

Abo besimo esonakeleyo banyamekela izinto zasenyameni; Ukunyamekela izinto zesimo esonakeleyo kusa ekufeni; Kuba ukunyameka kwenyama kububutshaba kuThixo; kuba umthetho kaThixo kungawululameli, kuba kungenako ukwenjenjalo; Roma 8:5-8

(4) Nokuba kungaphakathi emzimbeni okanye ngaphandle komzimba

Ndazi umntu ekuKristu, owathi, kwiminyaka elishumi elinamine edluleyo, wasiwa nakwelesithathu izulu (nokuba ubesemzimbeni na, andazi, nokuba ubengaphandle komzimba), andazi; nguThixo yedwa owaziyo. ... Wathi ke, waxwilwa wasiwa eParadisi, weva amazwi afihlakeleyo, angenakuthetha bani. 2 Korinte 12:2, 4

buza : Umntu omtsha kaPawulos Okanye umntu wakhe omdala.
→→Ukudlwengulwa ukuya ezulwini lesithathu?

impendulo : Ngumntu omtsha ozelwe ngokutsha!

buza : utsho njani?

impendulo : Ngokusuka kwiileta ezibhalwe nguPawulos

Inyama negazi azinako ukubudla ilifa ubukumkani bukaThixo

Ndithi ke kuni, bazalwana, inyama negazi azinako ukubudla ilifa ubukumkani bukaThixo, nokonakala, nokungenakonakala. 1 Korinte 15:50

Phawula: UAdam wazalwa yinyama negazi Ungumntu onokufa kwaye akanakubudla ilifa ubukumkani bukaThixo; Ngoko ke, yayingekuko ukuba umntu omdala kaPawulos, umzimba okanye umphefumlo, waxwilelwa kwelesithathu izulu, kodwa kaPawulos umntu omtsha owenziwe ngokutsha ( umntu womoya ) Umzimba womoya waphakanyiselwa kwelesithathu izulu.

Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

Ukuxoxa ngeencwadi ezabhalwa ngabapostile malunga novuko nokuzalwa kwakhona:

[ uPetros ] Nizelwe ngokutsha, kungengambewu enokonakala, kodwa ngelizwi likaThixo eliphilileyo nelihlala lihleli... 1 Petros 1:23, ngoPetros... Kwaye abanye abafundi bakubona ukuvuswa kukaYesu, bethetha kwiZenzo zeZenzo. Abapostile bathi: “Umphefumlo wakhe awushiywanga eHadesi, nomzimba wakhe awuboni kubola.
[ UYohane ] Embonweni weSityhilelo, sibone abantu abali-144 000 belandela iMvana, babeziintombi ezinyulu yaye bengenasiphako!
Aba ngabo abangazalwanga ngagazi, kungengankanuko, nangakuthanda kwandoda; bazelwe nguThixo. UYesu wathi: “Oko kuzelwe yinyama kuyinyama, oko kuzelwe nguMoya kungumoya.”— Yohane 3:6; 1:13 .
[ uYakobi ] Wayengakholelwa kuYesu ngaphambilana - Yohane 7:5 wayekholelwa ukuba uYesu wayenguNyana kaThixo kuphela emva kokubona ukuvuswa kukaYesu ngamehlo akhe kuYakobi 1:18 : “Wasizala ngaye ilizwi lenyaniso ngokokuthanda kwakhe.

[ uPawulosi ] Isityhilelo awasifumanayo sasisikhulu kuneso sabanye abapostile— 2 Korinte 12:7 .

Wathi ngokwakhe: “Ndiyamazi lo ukuKristu (nokuba ubesemzimbeni na, nokuba ubengekho na emzimbeni, andazi; nguThixo owaziyo).
Ngenxa yokuba uPawulos wazibonela ngokwakhe ukuzalwa nguThixo ( Umntu omtsha ) waxwilwa eparadesi!
Ngoko ke iincwadi zokomoya awayezibhala zazityebile kwaye zinzulu ngakumbi.

Kwindoda endala kunye nomntu omtsha:

( Umntu omtsha Ukuba ubani ukuKristu, usisidalwa esitsha; izinto ezindala zidlule; 2 Korinte 5:17
( indoda endala ) Ndibethelelwe emnqamlezweni noKristu, ayisendim ke odla ubomi... Galati 2:20; uhlala kuwe, awungowenyama ( indoda endala .... KwabaseRoma 8:9 → Siyazi ke ukuba, xa sithe sahlala [kumntu omdala], sahlukanisiwe neNkosi. 2 Korinte 5:6
( uMoya oyiNgcwele Kuba inyama ikhanuka ngokuchasene noMoya, uMoya ke ukhanuka ngokuchasene nenyama; ezo zinto zombini ziphambene, ukuze ningazenzi izinto enisukuba nizithanda. Galati 5:17
( Uvuswe kunye noKristu njengomzimba womoya )
Uhlwayelwa umzimba wenyama, kuvuka umzimba womoya. Ukuba kukho umzimba ongowenyama, kufuneka kukwakho nomzimba ongowomoya. Eyoku-1 kwabaseKorinte
15:44
( Yambathani umntu omtsha, nambathe uKristu )
Ngoko ke nina nonke ningoonyana bakaThixo ngako ukukholwa, nikuKristu Yesu; Nina nonke, nabhaptizelwayo kuKristu, namambatha uKristu. Galati 3:26-27
( Umphefumlo nomzimba ziyagcinwa )
Wanga ke uThixo woxolo anganingcwalisa niphelelisekile; uthi, ugqibelele owenu umoya nomphefumlo nomzimba, ugcinwe ngokungenakusoleka ekufikeni kweNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu. Uthembekile onibizayo, oya kukwenza oko. 1 Tesalonika 5:23-24
( Ukuzalwa kwakhona, umzimba omtsha womntu ubonakala )

Xa athe wabonakalaliswa uKristu, obubomi bethu, nani niya kubonakala, ninaye ebuqaqawulini. Kolose 3:4

Umpostile uPawulos wazibonela ngokwakhe ( Uvuko kunye nokuzalwa ngokutsha kunye noKristu ) waphakanyiselwa kwiparadesi yesithathu yezulu! Usandul’ ukubhala iileta ezininzi zokomoya ezixabisekileyo, eziye zibe yingenelo kakhulu kuthi abathi kamva bakholelwe kuthi, sinokuluqonda ulwalamano olukhoyo phakathi komntu omtsha owenziwe ngokutsha nomntu omdala, umntu obonakalayo nomntu womoya ongabonakaliyo, umzimba wemvelo. nomzimba ongowoMoya, nabo bangamalungisa, nabangenatyala, nabo bonayo, nabangenasono.

Sivuswe kunye noKrestu njengabantu abatsha ( umntu womoya ) unomoya, umphefumlo kunye nomzimba! Umphefumlo nomzimba kufuneka zikhuselwe. Amen

Ngoko nakuthi maKristu babe abantu ababini , umntu omdala nomntu omtsha, umntu ozelwe nguAdam nomntu ozelwe nguYesu, uAdam wokugqibela, umntu wenyama ozelwe yinyama nomntu womoya ozelwe nguMoya oyiNgcwele;

→→Ngenxa yokuba iziphumo zobomi ziphuma entliziyweni, iNkosi uYesu yathi: “Makwenzeke kuni ngokokholo lwenu!

Abashumayeli abaninzi ebandleni namhlanje abaqondi ukuba kukho abantu ababini emva kovuko nokuzalwa ngokutsha. Mnye kuphela umntu oshumayela ilizwi →Indoda endala kunye nomntu omtsha, wendalo nowomoya, unetyala kwaye umsulwa, unesono kwaye akanasono Intshumayelo exubeneyo yokufundisa , xa umntu omdala wona, hlambulula izono zakhe imihla ngemihla; Liphathe njengesiqhelo igazi likaKristu . Xa ujonga iindinyana zeBhayibhile uze uzithelekise, usoloko uvakalelwa kukuba oko bakutshoyo kuphosakele, kodwa akuyazi into ephosakeleyo ngoko bayithethayo? Ngokuba bathi " Indlela ka-ewe kunye no-hayi ", ilungile kwaye ingalunganga, awukwazi ukubona umahluko ngaphandle kokhokelo loMoya oyiNgcwele.

Khangela "Ilizwi likaEwe noHayi" kunye "Ukuhamba KuMoya oyiNgcwele" malunga nendlela yokujongana nesono sendoda endala.

2 Yiba ngumthunywa weendaba ezilungileyo zikaKristu

→→Hayi indoda endala izikreqo ze Umntu omtsha Emzimbeni wakho!

Lowo ke nguThixo ekuKristu, elixolelanisa naye ngokwakhe ihlabathi, engabahluli; indoda endala ) izikreqo ziphezu kwabo ( Umntu omtsha ) yaye usiphathise umyalezo woxolelaniso. 2 Korinte 5:19
Ke, bazalwana, kubonakala ngathi asinatyala kwinyama; Kuba uKristu ulihlawule ityala lesono ) ukuhlala ngokwenyama. Roma 8:12
Wathi, Andisayi kuba sazikhumbula izono zabo, nezikreqo zabo.

Ekubeni ke zixolelwe ezi zono, akusekho mbingelelo wesono. Hebhere 10:17-18

3. Umntu omtsha ovusiweyo uya kuvela

(1) Umntu omtsha ubonakala esebuqaqawulini

Kuba nafayo, baye ubomi benu bufihlakele ndawonye noKristu kuye uThixo. Xa athe wabonakalaliswa uKristu, obubomi bethu, nani niya kubonakala, ninaye ebuqaqawulini. Kolose 3:3-4

(2) Umzimba womntu omtsha ubonakala ufana nomzimba wakhe ozukileyo

Yena uya kuwenza kumila kumbi umzimba wethu othobekileyo, ube njengomzimba wozuko lwakhe, ngokwamandla alowo unako ukuzithobela phantsi kwakhe zonke izinto.
Filipi 3:21

(3) Uya kubona imo yakhe yokwenyani, kwaye umzimba womntu omtsha uya kubonakala njengaye

Bazalwana abathandekayo, singabantwana bakaThixo ngoku. Ke into esiya kuba yiyo kwixesha elizayo. eyoku-1 kaYohane 3:2

Namhlanje sabelana ngo "Uvuko" apha Siye sabelana ngalo ngaphambili (uvuko, ukuzalwa kwakhona).

Ushicilelo lweVangeli ukusuka
ibandla leNkosi uYesu Krestu
Aba ngabantu abangcwele abahlala bodwa, ababalelwa phakathi kwezizwe.
Njenge-144 000 leentombi ezinyulu ezilandela uKristu iMvana.
Amen!
→→Ndimbona esencotsheni nasendulini;
Aba ngabantu abahlala bodwa, ababalelwa ezizweni zonke.
INumeri 23:9
Ngabasebenzi beNkosi uYesu Krestu: UMzalwana uWang*Yun, uDade uLiu, uDade uZheng, uMzalwana uCen... kunye nabanye abasebenzi abawuxhasa ngenzondelelo umsebenzi wevangeli ngokunikela ngemali nokusebenza nzima, kunye nabanye abangcwele abasebenza nathi. abo bakholwayo kwezi ndaba zilungileyo, Amagama abo abhaliwe encwadini yobomi. Amen! Imbekiselo kwabaseFilipi 4:3

articles.title: Ukuzalwa kukaYesu Kristu
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
UYesu Kristu uyazalwa

---Igolide, intlaka yokuqhumisa, imore---

UMATEYU 2:9-11 Zithe zakuweva amazwi okumkani, zahamba. Inkwenkwezi leyo zayibonayo empumalanga, yahamba phambi kwazo, yaza yafika kuloo ndawo abekuyo umntwana, yema phezu kwayo. Zathi ke, zakuyibona inkwenkwezi, zavuya kunene, zabona umntwana noMariya unina, zawa phantsi, zaqubuda kumntwana lowo, zaza zamnika izipho zegolide, nentlaka yokuqhumisa, nemore.

Nye: igolide

Umbuzo: Imela ntoni igolide?

Impendulo: Igolide ngumfuziselo wozuko, isidima, nokumkani!

ummeli wegolide ukuzithemba →ndikufowunele" ukuzithemba “Nakuba nicikidwa nje, nixabiseke ngaphezu kwegolide etshabalalayo, nangona icikidwa ngomlilo, ukuze namkele indumiso nozuko nembeko ekutyhilekeni kukaYesu Kristu.”— 1 Petros 1:17 .

“Wenjenje uThixo ukulithanda kwakhe ihlabathi, ude wancama uNyana wakhe okuphela kwamzeleyo, ukuze bonke ileta Owakhe akayi kutshabalala, koko ube nobomi obungunaphakade. Yohane 3:16

Mbini: imastic

Umbuzo: Imela ntoni intlaka yokuqhumisa?

impendulo:" imastic "Lithetha ivumba elimnandi, elifuzisela ithemba lovuko! Limele umzimba kaKristu!"

(1) Hayi, ukuba inkulu imfihlelo yobuthixo, ekungekho bani unokukhanyela! NguThixo ebonakala esenyameni ( umzimba kaKristu ), wagwetyelwa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele, wabonwa zizithunywa zezulu, wavakaliswa phakathi kweentlanga, kwakholwa kulo ihlabathi, wenyuswa waba sebuqaqawulini - bhekisa ku-1 kuTimoti isahluko 3:16.

(2)Enkosi Thixo! Uhlala usikhokela sikuKristu, usenza sazisa ngazo zonke iindawo ivumba elimnandi lokumazi uKristu. Kaloku thina sinalo ivumba elimnandi likaKristu phambi koThixo, kwabasindiswayo nakwabatshabalalayo. Kolu didi (ixhego), ulivumba lokufa ukufa (kufa noKristu kolo didi (indoda endala); wazalwa ngokutsha umntu omtsha laba livumba elimnandi kuye. hlala noKristu ). Ngubani onokumelana nale nto? Imbekiselo kweyesi-2 kwabaseKorinte 2:14-16

(3) Imfihlo yentlaka yokuqhumisa inokwenziwa ibhalsam "→ Ke "intlaka yokuqhumisa" ifanekisela umzimba kaKristu ovusiweyo njengo" Ivumba elimnandi sithe ke sangcwaliswa kuThixo, nothe ngokutsha, amalungu omzimba wakhe. Ndiyanivuselela ngoko, bazalwana, ngeemfefe zikaThixo; umnikelo womzimba , idini eliphilileyo, elingcwele, elikholekileyo kuThixo:inkonzo yenu ke leyo yasemoyeni. Imbekiselo kumaRoma 12:1

Ntathu: Imore

Umbuzo: Imela ntoni imore?

impendulo: Imore Imele ukubandezeleka, ukuphiliswa, intlawulelo nothando.

(1) Ndisigqala isithandwa sam njengengxowa yemore ( uthando ), ndihlala ndisezandleni zam. Bhekisela kwiNgoma yazo iiNgoma 1:13

(2) Asikukuba siyamthanda uThixo, koko ikukuba uThixo uyasithanda waza wathumela uNyana wakhe ukuba abe sisicamagushelo sezono zethu njengaye . Imbekiselo kweyoku-1 kaYohane 4:10

articles.title: Ukuzinikela 1
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade!

Namhlanje sifunda ubudlelane kwaye sabelane ngesishumi!

Masityhile kwiLevitikus 27:30 kwiTestamente eNdala kwaye sifunde kunye:
“Yonke into esemhlabeni,
Nokuba yimbewu esemhlabeni, nokuba yeyesiqhamo somthi;
Oweshumi yeyeNkosi;
Ingcwele kuYehova.

------Inye-yeshumi-----

1. Ukuzahlulela kuka-Abram

UMelkitsedeki, ukumkani waseSalem (oko kukuthi ngentetho evakalayo, ukumkani woxolo), wamkhawulela, enesonka newayini, engumbingeleli wOsenyangweni.
Wamthamsanqelisa uAbram, wathi: “Ngamana uYehova wamazulu nomhlaba, uThixo Osenyangweni, wamsikelela uAbram! Makabongwe uThixo Osenyangweni ngokuzinikela iintshaba zakho esandleni sakho.

“Ngoko ke uAbram wamnika uMelkisedeki isishumi kuyo yonke ingeniso yakhe.”— Genesis 14:18-20

2. Ukuzinikezela kukaYakobi

UYakobi wenza isibhambathiso esithi: “Ukuba uThixo uthe waba nam, wandigcina endleleni, wandinika ukudla, nempahla yokunxiba, ukuze ndibuyele endlwini kabawo ndinoxolo, ndiya kumenza uYehova uThixo wam. uThixo.

Amatye lawo, endiwamise aba ziintsika, aya kuba yitempile kaThixo; neento zonke othe wandinika, ndokunika isishumi sazo. ”— Genesis 28:20-22

3. Ukuzinikela kwamaSirayeli

Kuba abaLevi ndibanika isishumi songeniselo loonyana bakaSirayeli, ukuba sibe lilifa, sibe ngumrhumo kuYehova. Ndathi ke kubo, Makungabikho lifa phakathi koonyana bakaSirayeli. ’”
UYehova wamwisela umthetho uMoses, wathi, Thetha kubaLevi, uthi kubo, Esishumini enisithabatha koonyana bakaSirayeli, endininika sona njengelifa lenu, nothabatha esinye isishumi sibe lilifa lenu INKOSI— Numeri 18:24-26
Eminikelweni yonke eniyinikiweyo, yokutyeba kuzo, ekungcwalisweni kuyo, nosondeza umrhumo kuYehova. — Numeri 18:29

4 Nikelani amahlwempu isahlulo seshumi;

“Iminyaka emithathu ngumnyaka wesishumi, nithabathe isahlulo seshumi somhlaba wonke.
Uyinike abaLevi, abasemzini, iinkedama nabahlolokazi, ukuze badle emasangweni akho. Duteronomi 26:12

5. Isahlulo seshumi sesikaYehova

“Yonke into esemhlabeni,
Nokuba yimbewu esemhlabeni, nokuba yeyesiqhamo somthi;
Oweshumi yeyeNkosi;
Ingcwele kuYehova.

——Levitikus 27:30

6 Intlahlela yeyeNkosi;

Kufuneka usebenzise ipropathi yakho
Iintlahlela zongeniselo lwakho lonke zizukise uYehova.
Baya kwandula ke oovimba bakho bazaliseke ngokugqithileyo;

Izikhongozelo zakho zewayini ziphuphuma iwayini entsha. — IMizekeliso 3:9-10

7. Zama ukufaka enye yeshumi kwi "Tianku"

Ndicikideni, nizise isishumi esipheleleyo sesishumi senu kuvimba, ukuze kubekho ukudla endlwini yam; utsho uYehova wemikhosi.
Ngaba iya kukuvulela iifestile zezulu kwaye ithululele iintsikelelo kuwe, nokuba akukho ndawo yokuzifumana? —-- Malaki 3:10

articles.title: Ukuzinikela 2
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade!

Namhlanje siyaqhubeka sifunda ubudlelane kwaye sabelane ngokuzinikela kobuKristu!

Masityhile kuMateyu 13:22-23 kwiTestamente eNtsha yeBhayibhile size sifunde kunye: Lowo ke uhlwayelwe emithaneni enameva, ngulo ulivayo ilizwi, athi ke amaxhala eli hlabathi, nobuqhetseba bemali, buliminxe ilizwi. ukuba awunako ukuthwala isiqhamo. Lowo ke uhlwayelwe kuwo umhlaba omhle, ngulo ulivayo ilizwi aliqonde, libe ke lixakatha isiqhamo: omnye kalikhulu, omnye amashumi amathandathu, nomnye amashumi amathathu. "

1. Ukunikezelwa kooGqirha baseMpuma

... Izazi ezithile zeza eYerusalem, zivela empumalanga, zisithi, Uphi na lo uzelweyo, ukumkani wamaYuda? Siyibonile inkwenkwezi yakhe empumalanga, size kumnqula.

...Zathi ke, zakuyibona inkwenkwezi, zavuya kunene, zaza zangena endlwini, zambona umntwana enoMariya unina; , intlaka yokuqhumisa, nemore. Mateyu 2:1-11

【Ukholo.Ithemba.Uthando】

igolide :Imele isidima nokuzithemba!
imastic : Imela ivumba elimnandi nethemba lovuko!

Imore :Imele impiliso, intlupheko, intlawulelo nothando!

2. Ukunikezelwa kweentlobo ezimbini zabantu

(1)uKayin noAbheli

UKayin → Ngamhla uthile uKayin wathabatha eziqhameni zomhlaba, wazisa umnikelo kuYehova;
UAbheli → UAbheli naye wanikela amazibulo omhlambi wakhe weegusha namanqatha awo. UYehova wambona uAbheli nomnikelo wakhe;

Wacaphuka kunene uKayin, batshintsha ubuso bakhe. Genesis 4:3-5

buza : Kwakutheni ukuze umthandele uAbheli nomnikelo wakhe?

impendulo : Ngokholo uAbheli, owasondeza amazibulo omhlambi wakhe, namanqatha awo, wasondeza kuye uThixo umbingelelo ogqithileyo kunokaKayin, wangqinelwa ukuba ugwetyelwe, ukuba uThixo wanikela ubungqina. Nangona wafayo, wayesathetha ngenxa yolu kholo. Imbekiselo kumaHebhere 11:4 ;

Oko uKayin akunikelayo kwakungenalukholo, uthando, nokumoyika uThixo, uYehova, yaye akazange anikele ngentlahlela yemveliso elungileyo, nangona iBhayibhile ingazange icacise oko wayesele emkhalimele, wathi umnikelo wakhe awulunganga kwaye awamkelekanga.

→ Wathi uYehova kuKayin: "Uqumbeleni na? Kutheni na ukuba buguquke ubuso bakho? Ukuba wenza okulungileyo, akuyi kwamkeleka na? Ukuba wenza ububi, isono sibuthumile emnyango, siya kukunqwenela. uya kuloyisa.”— Genesis 4:6-7 .

(2) Abahanahanisi banikela izishumi

(UYesu) wathi, Yeha, nina babhali, baFarisi, bahanahanisindini!

Ngokwahlukileyo koko, izinto ezibaluleke ngakumbi emthethweni, ezizezi, okusesikweni, inceba nokuthembeka, azisamkeleki. Le yeyona nto ibalulekileyo ekufuneka uyenzile; Mateyu 23:23

UmFarisi wema waza wazithandazela esithi: ‘Thixo, ndiyabulela kuwe kuba ndingenjengabanye abantu, abaphangi, abangemalungisa, abakrexezi, ndingenjengaye nalo mbuthi werhafu. Ndizila ukutya kabini ngeveki kwaye ndinikela isishumi sayo yonke into endiyifumanayo. —Funda uLuka 18:11-12

(3) UThixo akakuthandi oko kunikelwa ngokomthetho

Awulithandi amadini anyukayo nesono;
Ndathi ngelo xesha, Thixo, ndifikile,
Ukwenza intando yakho;
Izenzo zam zibhaliwe ezincwadini.

Ithi: “Umbingelelo, nesipho, nedini elinyukayo, nedini lesono, ongakuthandanga ngalo (oku kungokomthetho)”;

buza : Kutheni ungakuthandi okunikelwa ngokomthetho?

impendulo : Umnikelo onikelwa ngokomthetho ngumyalelo wokuba kuphunyezwe ummiselo, kunokuba ube ngumnikelo wokuqhutywa yintliziyo, minyaka le;

La madini ke ayesisikhumbuzo sesono minyaka le; Hebhere 10:3-4

(4) Nikela "isinye kwishumi"

“Yonke into esemhlabeni,
Nokuba yimbewu esemhlabeni, nokuba yeyesiqhamo somthi;
Oweshumi yeyeNkosi;
Ingcwele kuYehova.

——Levitikus 27:30

→→uAbraham wanikela isishumi

Wamthamsanqelisa uAbram, wathi: “UNdikhoyo wezulu nomhlaba, uThixo oPhezukonke, makamsikelele uAbram! Genesis 14:19-20

→→uYakobi wanika isishumi esinye

Amatye lawo, endiwamise aba ziintsika, aya kuba yitempile kaThixo; neento zonke othe wandinika, ndokunika isishumi sazo. ” Genesis 28:22

→→AbaFarisi banikela isishumi esinye

Ndizila ukutya kabini ngeveki kwaye ndinikela isishumi sayo yonke into endiyifumanayo. Luka 18:12

Phawula: Ngenxa yokuba uAbraham noYakobi babesazi ezintliziyweni zabo ukuba yonke into abayifumanayo bayinikwe nguThixo, ngoko babekulungele ukunikela ishumi ekhulwini;

AbaFarisi, kwelinye icala, babephantsi komthetho kwaye benikela ngokwemimiselo yomthetho Bafumana yonke imali yabo ngobulumko babo ngokuthandabuza banikela isahlulo seshumi "sako konke endikufumeneyo", kanye njengokuhlawula irhafu ngokunyanzeliswa.

Ngoko ke, ukuziphatha kunye nengqondo yokunika "ishumi" ihluke ngokupheleleyo.

Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

3. Ukuzinikela komhlolokazi olihlwempu

UYesu waphakamisa amehlo akhe, wabona umntu osisityebi ephosa umnikelo wakhe emkhumbini wokulondoloza imali, ephosa umhlolokazi othile olihlwempu, ephosa iimalana ezimbini, wathi, Inene ndithi kuni, Lo mhlolokazi ulihlwempu uphose ngaphezu kwabo bonke abanye unezinto ezininzi kunabo.” , waza wawubeka emnikelweni, kodwa umhlolokazi lowo wanikela ngako konke awayenako ukuphila ngenxa yokuswela kwakhe (ukholo ekuthandeni uThixo).” ( Luka 21:1-4 )

ubuhlwempu :Ubuhlwempu bemali yezinto eziphathekayo
ngumhlolokazi :Isithukuthezi ngaphandle kwenkxaso

umfazi : Kuthetha ukuba umfazi ubuthathaka.

4. Nikelani imali kwabangcwele

Ngokuphathelele ukupha abangcwele, njengokuba ndawamiselayo amabandla kaThixo akwelaseGalati, yenzani ngokunjalo nani. Ngosuku lokuqala evekini umntu ngamnye makabeke imali ngokwengeniso yakhe, ukuze angaqokeleli ndakufika. 1 Korinte 16:1-2
Ke ukwenza okulungileyo nokupha, musani ukukulibala; kuba imibingelelo enjalo iyamkholisa uThixo. Hebhere 13:16

5. Yiba nomdla wokunikela

buza : AmaKristu anikela njani?

impendulo : Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

(1) ngokuzithandela

Ndithi ke kuni, mawethu, ngenxa yobubele obungasifanelanga bukaThixo abenzele amabandla aseMakedoniya, nakuba babejamelene nezilingo ezinkulu, babonakalisa ububele obungasifanelanga. Ndinokungqina ukuba banikela ngesisa nangokuvumayo ngokwamandla abo nangaphaya kwamandla abo, eyesi- 2 kwabaseKorinte 8:1-3 .

(2) Hayi ngenxa yokuthandabuza

Ngoko ke, ndicinga ukuba ndifanele ndibacele abo bazalwana ukuba beze kuni kuqala baze balungiselele iminikelo eyayithenjiswe ngaphambili, ukuze kubonakale ukuba oko ninikela ngako ngokuzithandela kungekhona ngokunyanzelwa. 2 Korinte 9:5

(3) Yiba nenxaxheba kwiingenelo zokomoya

Kaloku ke ndisinga eYerusalem, ndisiya kulungiselela abangcwele. Kuba abaseMakedoni nabaseAkaya babethanda ukubuthela iminikelo yamahlwempu abo bangcwele baseYerusalem.
Nangona oku ikukuvuma kwabo oko, eneneni kugqalwa njengetyala elityalwayo (ityala lokushumayela iindaba ezilungileyo nokubonelela ngeentsilelo zabangcwele namahlwempu); Baxhase ngempilo yabo. Roma 15:25-27

Thatha inxaxheba kwiinzuzo zokomoya:

buza : Yintoni ingenelo yokomoya?

impendulo : Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

1: Abantu mabakholwe yivangeli baze basindiswe— Roma 1:16-17
2: Qonda ubunyani beendaba ezilungileyo—1 Korinte 4:15, Yakobi 1:18
3: Ukuze uqonde ukuzalwa ngokutsha—Yohane 3:5-7
4: Kholelwa ekufeni, ukungcwatywa, nokuvuka kunye noKristu— Roma 6:6-8
5: Qonda ukuba umntu omdala uqalisa ukufa, yaye umntu omtsha ubonakalisa ubomi bukaYesu— 2 Korinte 4:10-12
6: Indlela yokukholelwa nokusebenza kunye noYesu—Yohane 6:28-29
7: Indlela yokuzukiswa noYesu—Roma 6:17
8: Indlela yokufumana umvuzo— 1 Korinte 9:24
9: Yamkelani isithsaba sozuko— 1 Petros 5:4
10: Uvuko olulunge ngakumbi— Hebhere 11:35
11: Ukulawula noKristu iminyaka eliwaka— ISityhilelo 20:6
12: Ukulawula noYesu ngonaphakade kanaphakade— ISityhilelo 22:3-5

Phawula: Ke ngoko, ukuba ninikela ngenzondelelo kumsebenzi ongcwele wendlu kaThixo, izicaka ezishumayela iindaba ezilungileyo, kunye namawethu amahlwempu phakathi kwamakholwa, nisebenza kunye noThixo bakhonzi bakaKristu, uThixo uya kuyikhumbula. Balungiseleli beNkosi uYesu Kristu, baya kunikhokelela ekubeni nitye nisele ukutya kokomoya okuninika ubomi, ukuze ubomi benu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi, nibe novuko olulunge ngakumbi kwixesha elizayo. Amen!

Nalandela uYesu, nakholwa ziivangeli eziyinyaniso, naxhasa abakhonzi abashumayela iindaba ezilungileyo eziyinyaniso! Bafumana uzuko, umvuzo, nesithsaba esifanayo kunye noYesu Kristu → → Oko kukuthi, uyafana nabo: yamkela uzuko, umvuzo nesithsaba kunye, uvuko olulunge ngakumbi, uvuko lwangaphambi kwewaka leminyaka, nolawulo lukaKristu lweminyaka eliwaka. , Amazulu amatsha nomhlaba omtsha kunye noYesu Kristu olawula ngonaphakade kanaphakade. Amen!

Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

(Kanye njengokuba isizwe sakwaLevi sahlawula isishumi ngo-Abraham)

→→Kusenokuthiwa uLevi, owamkela isishumi, naye wafumana isishumi ngoAbraham. Kungenxa yokuba xa uMelkitsedeki wadibana noAbraham, uLevi wayesele esemzimbeni (umbhalo wokuqala, esinqeni) sikakhokho wakhe.

Hebhere 7:9-10

【AmaKristu kufuneka alumke:】

Ukuba abanye abantu bayalandela→ baze bakholwe→abo bashumayeli bashumayela imfundiso yobuxoki baze babhideke iindaba ezilungileyo eziyinyaniso, baze bangayiqondi iBhayibhile, usindiso lukaKristu, nokuzalwa ngokutsha, ngoko awukazalwa ngokutsha, uyakholwa okanye awukholwa. Ngokuphathelele umnqweno wabo wokufumana uzuko, imivuzo, izithsaba, kunye nezicwangciso zabo ezikhohlisayo zokuvuswa kwabafileyo ngaphambi kwewaka leminyaka, masingakukhankanyi nokuyikhankanya Ngaba ucinga ukuba kulungile? Lowo uneendlebe zokuva makeve, aphaphame.

4 Ziqwebeleni ubutyebi ezulwini

“Musani ukuziqwebela ubutyebi emhlabeni, apho konakalisa inundu nomhlwa, nalapho amasela agqobhozayo ebe. Mateyu 6:19-20

5. Intlahlela izukisa iNkosi

Kufuneka usebenzise ipropathi yakho
Iintlahlela zongeniselo lwakho lonke zizukise uYehova.
Baya kwandula ke oovimba bakho bazaliseke ngokugqithileyo;

Izikhongozelo zakho zewayini ziphuphuma iwayini entsha. — IMizekeliso 3:9-10

(Iintlahlela bubutyebi bokuqala obufunyenweyo, njengomvuzo wokuqala, ingeniso yeshishini lokuqala okanye isivuno somhlaba, kunye neyona mibingelelo ilungileyo yenzelwe ukuzukisa uYehova. Okufana nokunikela ukuxhasa umsebenzi wevangeli wendlu kaThixo. , nishumayela Balungiseleli beendaba ezilungileyo, bangcwele bamahlwempu, ukuba nibe nako ukudla koovimba basezulwini; eninzi.)

6 Wonke umntu onako uya kunikwa;

Kuba wonke umntu ogcinelwe emazulwini, yena uya kunikwa, abe nako ngokugqithiseleyo; kodwa osukuba engenako, uya kuhluthwa kwanoko anako. Mateyu 25:29
(Qaphela: Ukuba akubugcini ubutyebi bakho ezulwini, ziya kukulunywa zizinambuzane emhlabeni, amasela agqobhoze ebe. Xa ixesha lifika, imali yakho iya kuphaphatheka, ungabi nanto ezulwini nasemhlabeni. .)

7 Lowo uhlwayela ngokuvimba wovuna kwangokuvimba;

→→Yinyani le. Elowo makanike njengoko agqibe ngako entliziyweni, kungabi lukhuni, kungabi kunyanzelwa; Unako ke uThixo ukuphuphumisela kuni ubabalo lonke, ukuze nihlale ninokwanela kuko konke, nibe nako ukuphuphuma umsebenzi wonke olungileyo; Njengoko kubhaliwe kwathiwa:
Wayenika amahlwempu imali;
Ubulungisa bakhe bumi ngonaphakade.

Lowo unika umhlwayeli imbewu, nesonka sokudliwa, woyandisa imbewu ekuhlwayeleni kwenu, nesiqhamo sobulungisa benu, ukuze nityebe ezintweni zonke, ukuze nibe nokuphuphuma, nibulela kuThixo ngathi. 2 Korinte 9:6-11

6. Ukuzinikela ngokupheleleyo

(1) Igosa lomntu osisityebi

Umgwebi wabuza: “Nkosi, Mfundisi ulungileyo, ndenze ntoni na ukuze ndibudle ilifa ubomi obungunaphakade? Akukho ulungileyo ngaphandle koThixo; Uze ungakrexezi; uze ungangqini ubuxoki; Zonke ezo zinto ndazigcina kwasebuncinaneni bam; uYehova wakuva oko, wathi, Kusekho nto-nye uyisweleyo: zonke izinto onazo thengisa ngazo, uphe amahlwempu, woba nobutyebi ke emazulwini; uya kuza andilandele.

Wathi akukuva oko, waba buhlungu kakhulu, kuba ube esisityebi kunene.

( Amagosa azizityebi akathandi ukugcina ubutyebi bawo ezulwini )

UYesu embona wathi, Hayi, ukuba ngenkankulu ukuthi abo banobutyebi bangene ebukumkanini bukaThixo!

Ziqwebele ubutyebi obungenakuphela ezulwini.

——Luka 12:33

“Musani ukuziqwebela ubutyebi emhlabeni, apho konakalisa inundu nomhlwa, nalapho amasela agqobhozayo ebe. Ngenxa yakho apho bukhoyo ubutyebi bakho, yoba lapho nentliziyo yakho.”— Mateyu 6:19-21

(2) Landela uYesu

Omnye oshiywe ngasemva— Luka 18:28, 5:11
2 Ukuzincama—Mateyu 16:24
3 Landela uYesu—Marko 8:34
4 Ukuthwala iindlela ezinqumlayo— Marko 8:34
5 Ubuthiye ubomi— Yohane 12:25
6 Ulahlekelwe bubomi bakho— Marko 8:35
7 Fumana ubomi bukaKristu— Mateyu 16:25
8 Yamkelani uzuko — Roma 8:17

.......

(3) Yenza idini eliphilayo

Ndiyanivuselela ngoko, bazalwana, ngeemfefe zikaThixo, ukuba niyinikele imizimba yenu ibe lidini eliphilileyo, elingcwele, elikholekileyo kuThixo:inkonzo yenu ke leyo yasengqondweni. Musani ke ukuthatha isimilo sabantu beli phakade, kodwa iingqondo zenu maziguquke zihlaziyeke, nize nikucikide into okuyiyo ukuthanda kukaThixo okulungileyo, okukholekileyo, okuzalisekileyo. Roma 12:1-2

7. Baleka ngqo kwicala lokukora

Bazalwana, mna andizibaleli ekuthini ndise ndamkele; ke ndenza nto-nye: ndithi, ndizilibala izinto ezisemva, ndisolulela kweziphambili, ndiphuthume ngokoxunele umvuzo wobizo lwaphezulu lukaThixo kuKristu Yesu.

Filipi 3:13-14

8. Kukho 100, 60, kunye 30 amaxesha

Lowo ke wawuhlwayelwa emithaneni enameva, ngulowo walivayo ilizwi, kodwa kamva amaxhala eli hlabathi, nobuqhetseba bemali, lwaliminxe ilizwi, kangangokuba lingavelisi siqhamo.

Lowo ke uhlwayelwe kuwo umhlaba omhle, ngulo ulivayo ilizwi aliqonde, libe ke lixakatha isiqhamo: omnye kalikhulu, omnye amashumi amathandathu, nomnye amashumi amathathu. ” Mateyu 13:22-23

[Kholelwa ukuba uya kufumana ngokuphindwe kalikhulu kobu bomi nakubomi obungunaphakade kubomi obulandelayo]

Akukho namnye ongenakuphila ngokuphindwe kalikhulu kweli hlabathi kwaye akanakuphila ngonaphakade kwihlabathi elizayo. "

Luka 18:30

Ushicilelo lweVangeli ukusuka

ibandla leNkosi uYesu Krestu

Aba ngabantu abangcwele abahlala bodwa, ababalelwa phakathi kwezizwe.
Njenge-144,000 yeentombi ezinyulu ezilandela iNkosi iMvana.

Amen!

→→Ndimbona esencotsheni nasendulini;
Aba ngabantu abahlala bodwa, ababalelwa ezizweni zonke.
INumeri 23:9

articles.title: Umzekeliso weentombi Ezilishumi
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade!

Namhlanje sijonge ukwabelana ngobudlelwane: Umzekeliso weentombi ezilishumi

Masivule iBhayibhile yethu kuMateyu 25:1-13 size sifunde kunye: “Ngoko ubukumkani bamazulu buya kufanekiswa neentombi ezilishumi ezathabathayo izibane zazo, zaphuma zaya kumkhawulela umyeni, ezintlanu ziziziyatha Eziziingqondi zathabatha izibane zazo, azaphatha oyile ezityeni zazo;

Umbuzo: Zimela ntoni iintombi ezinyulu?

impendulo:" intombi enyulu "Kuthetha ubunyulu, ubungcwele, ukucoceka, ukungabi nasiphako, ukungabi nasiphako, ukungabi nasono! Kubonisa ukuzalwa ngokutsha, ubomi obutsha! Hayi madoda!

1 Ukuzalwa ngamanzi nanguMoya—Khangela kuYohane 1:5-7
2 Wazalelwa kwinyaniso yevangeli--jonga ku-1 kwabaseKorinte 4:15, Yakobi 1:18

3 Uzelwe nguThixo—jonga kuYohane 1:12-13

[Ndinizele kuKristu Yesu ngazo iindaba ezilungileyo] → Nina ningabafundi bakaKristu, ninokuba nabafundisi abangamawaka alishumi, kodwa nibe nooyihlo abambalwa, kuba ndinizele ngazo iindaba ezilungileyo kuKristu Yesu. 1 Korinte 4:15

【" intombi enyulu “Nangenxa yebandla.njengeentombi ezinyulu eziziswe kuKristu]→ ... kuba ndanendisa ndodeni-nye, ukuze ningcwaliselwe uKristu, njengeentombi ezinyulu. 2 Korinte 11:2

Umbuzo: "Isibane" simele ntoni?

Impendulo: "Isibane" simele ukholo nokuzithemba!

Ibandla apho "uMoya oyiNgcwele" ukhoyo! Reference ISityhilelo 1:20,4:5
Ukukhanya okukhutshwa “sisibane” sebandla → kusikhokelela kwindlela esa kubomi obungunaphakade.
Lisisibane seenyawo zam ilizwi lakho, Likukukhanya emendweni wam. ( INdumiso 119:105 )

→→“Ngelo xesha (oko kukuthi, ekupheleni kwehlabathi), ubukumkani bamazulu buya kufanekiswa neentombi ezilishumi ezathabathayo izibane (oko kukuthi, ukholo lweentombi ezilishumi) zaphuma zaya kuhlangabeza (uYesu) umyeni; Mateyu 25:1

[Izidenge ezihlanu ziphethe izibane]

1Nabani na oyivayo imfundiso yobukumkani bamazulu, engaziqondi;

“Ukholo, ukholo” lwabantu abahlanu abaziziyatha → lufana “nomzekeliso woMhlwayeli”: Lowo ulivayo ilizwi lobukumkani bamazulu aze angaliqondi, uyeza ongendawo, akuthabathe okuhlwayelwe entliziyweni yakhe. Yiyo le nto ihlwayelwa endleleni esecaleni kwayo. Mateyu 13:19

2 Kuba wayengenangcambu entliziyweni yakhe ... wawa.

Lowo ke uhlwayelwa ezindaweni ezilulwalwa, ngulowo ulivayo ilizwi, alamkele kwaoko ngovuyo; Mateyu 13:20-21
buza:" I-oyile "Ingaba ithetha ntoni?"
impendulo:" I-oyile “Kubhekiselwa kwioli yokuthambisa. Ilizwi likaThixo limele ukuzalwa ngokutsha nokwamkela uMoya oyiNgcwele othenjisiweyo njengetywina! Amen

“UMoya weNkosi uphezu kwam, ethe ngenxa yokuba indithambisele ukushumayela iindaba ezilungileyo kumahlwempu; :18

【 iintombi ezintlanu ezilumkileyo 】

1 Xa abantu besiva isigidimi, basiqonde

"Ukholo. Ukholo" lweentombi Ezihlanu Ezilumkileyo: IBandla Elinobukho Bomoya Oyingcwele → Oko kuhlwayelwe emhlabeni olungileyo ngulo ulivayo ilizwi aliqonde, aze ke athwale isiqhamo, ngamanye amaxesha kalikhulu, ngamanye amaxesha amashumi amathandathu; kwaye ngamanye amaxesha amashumi amathathu. ” Mateyu 13:23

(Type 1 people) Nabani na ozivayo iimfundiso zobukumkani bamazulu kodwa angaqondi... Mateyu 13:19

(Uhlobo 2 abantu)→→... Abantu bayasiva isigidimi baze basiqonde ...Mateyu 13:23

buza:
Ithini imfundiso yobukumkani bamazulu?
Kuthetha ukuthini ukuva intshumayelo kwaye uyiqonde?

Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

Ukuva ilizwi lenyaniso → yinyaniso yobukumkani bamazulu

Kwaye ekubeni nilivile ilizwi lenyaniso, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwenu, kwaye nakholwa kuKristu ...

1 (Ukholo) UYesu unguMesiya othunywe nguThixo—Isaya 9:6
2 (Ukholo) UYesu wayeyintombi enyulu eyakhawulwa yaza yazalwa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele - Mateyu 1:18
3 (Ukholo) UYesu nguLizwi wenziwa inyama - Yohane 1:14
4 (Ukholo) UYesu nguNyana kaThixo - Luka 1:35
5 (Ukholo) uYesu unguMsindisi kunye noKristu - Luka 2:11, Mateyu 16:16
6 (Ukholo) UYesu wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni waza wafela izono zethu,
Wangcwatywa - 1 Korinte 15:3-4, 1 Petros 2:24
7 (Ukholo) UYesu wavuswa kwabafileyo ngosuku lwesithathu - 1 Korinte 15:4
8 (Ukholo) Uvuko lukaYesu luyasivelisa kwakhona— 1 Petros 1:3
9 (Ukholo) Sizalwa ngamanzi nangoMoya—Yohane 1:5-7
10 (Ukholo) Sizalwa yinyaniso yeendaba ezilungileyo - 1 Korinte 4:15, Yakobi 1:18
11 (Ukholo) Sizalwa nguThixo - Yohane 1:12-13
12 (Ukholo) Iindaba ezilungileyo zingamandla kaThixo osindiso kubo bonke abakholwayo - KwabaseRoma 1: 16-17
13 (Ukholo) Nabani na ozelwe nguThixo soze one — 1 Yohane 3:9, 5:18
14 (Ukholo) Igazi likaYesu lihlambulula izono zabantu (kanye) - 1 Yohane 1:7, Hebhere 1:3
15 (Ukholo) idini likaKristu (lakanye) lenza abo bangcwaliswayo bafezeke ngonaphakade - Hebhere 10:14
16 (Kholwani) ukuba uMoya kaThixo uhleli kuni, nani ke (umntu omtsha) aningowasenyameni (umntu omdala) — Roma 8:9
17 (Ileta) Inyama ‘yendoda endala’ ngokuthe ngcembe iya isiba mandundu ngenxa yenkohliso yenkanuko.— Efese 4:22
18 (Ileta) “Umntu omtsha” uphila kuKristu kwaye wenziwa mtsha imihla ngemihla ngokuhlaziywa koMoya oyiNgcwele - 2 Korinte 4:16
19 (Ukholo) Xa uYesu Kristu ebuyile kwaye ebonakala, owenziwe ngokutsha (umntu omtsha) uya kubonakala kwaye abonakale kunye noKristu ebuqaqawulini - Kolose 3: 3-4

20 Natywinwa kuye, natywinwa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele wedinga, ekusekweni kwenu, nakholwayo nakuye uKristu, nakuva ilizwi lenyaniso, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwenu — Efese 1:13

【 Abantu bayasiva isigidimi baze basiqonde 】

Itsho iNkosi uYesu ukuthi, Wonke umntu olivayo ilizwi lobukumkani bamazulu, uyaliva, aliqonde! Kamva, lixakatha isiqhamo, omnye kalikhulu, omnye amashumi amathandathu, nomnye amashumi amathathu.


Matthew 25:5 Xa ulibele umyeni...(Isixelela ukuba sikulinde ngomonde ukuza kweNkosi uYesu umyeni.)

UMATEWU 25:6-10 Ufikile ke umyeni...zathi ke eziziziyatha kweziziingqondi, Sipheni ioli, ngokuba izibane zethu zicima.

(Icawa" isibane ”→→Akukho “oyile” yokuthambisa, akukho bukho boMoya oyiNgcwele, akukho lizwi likaThixo, akukho kuphinda kuvele ubomi obutsha, akukho kukhanya “ukukhanya kukaKristu”, ke isibane siya kucinywa)

’ Indoda esisilumko yaphendula yathi: ‘Ndiyoyika ukuba ayanele nje kum nawe.

Q: Iphi indawo ethengisa "oyile"?
impendulo:" I-oyile "Ibhekisa kwintambiso yamafutha! Ioyile yokuthambisa nguMoya oyiNgcwele! Indawo apho kuthengiswa khona ioli libandla apho abakhonzi bakaThixo bashumayela iindaba ezilungileyo, bathethe inyaniso, kwaye ibandla apho uMoya oyiNgcwele uphakathi kwenu, ukuze nikwazi. live ilizwi lenyaniso kwaye ufumane "ioli yokuthambisa" ethenjisiweyo yoMoya oyiNgcwele.

’ Xa besiya kuthenga, wafika umyeni. Zangena naye ke ezo bezilungile, zahlala etafileni, lwavalwa ke ucango.

【Phawula:】

Umntu osisidenge wayefuna ukuthengisa ioli "ngelo xesha", kodwa ngaba wathenga "ioli"? Awuzange uyithenge, akunjalo? Ngokuba uYesu, umyeni, ufikile, ibandla leNkosi liya kuxwilwa, umtshakazi uya kuxwilwa, kwaye amaKristu aya kuxwilwa! Ngelo xesha, kwakungekho bakhonzi bakaThixo ababeshumayela iindaba ezilungileyo okanye abathetha inyaniso, yaye umnyango wosindiso wavalwa. Abantu abaziziyatha (okanye iicawa) abangayilungisanga ioli, uMoya oyiNgcwele, nokuzalwa ngokutsha abangobantwana abazelwe nguThixo ngoko, uMyeni iNkosi uYesu uxelela abantu abaziziyatha, “Andinazi.

(Kukwakho nabo bayichasayo ngabom indlela yokwenyaniso kaThixo, abayibhidayo indlela eyinyaniso yeNkosi, abaprofeti bobuxoki, nabashumayeli bobuxoki. Njengokuba iNkosi uYesu yathi → abaninzi baya kuthi kum ngaloo mini: ‘Nkosi, Nkosi, . Asinguye na oprofeta egameni lakho, ukhupha iidemon egameni lakho, wenza imiqondiso emininzi egameni lakho? Ndaza ndathi kubo ngokucacileyo, Andizanga ndinazi; : 22-23

Ngoko ke, kufuneka silumke kwaye samkele ukukhanya okuyinyani ngeli lixa igospile ikhanya! Njengeentombi ezinyulu ezintlanu, zaziphethe izibane neoli ezandleni zazo, zilindele ukufika komyeni.

Masithandaze kunye: U-Abba Othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Krestu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Sikhokele thina bantwana ukuba singene kuyo yonke inyaniso, siyive inyaniso yobukumkani bamazulu, siyiqonde inyaniso yeendaba ezilungileyo, samkele itywina loMoya oyiNgcwele othenjisiweyo, sizalwe ngokutsha, sisindiswe, kwaye sibe ngabantwana bakaThixo! Amen. Kanye njengeentombi eziziingqondi ezintlanu eziphethe izibane ezandleni zazo kwaye zilungisa ioli, zilinda ngomonde ukuba zilindele umyeni. Amen!

Ngegama leNkosi uYesu Kristu! Amen

Aba ngabantu abangcwele abahlala bodwa, ababalelwa phakathi kwezizwe.
Njenge-144,000 yeentombi ezinyulu ezilandela iNkosi iMvana.

Amen!

Imbekiselo kwabaseFilipi 4:3

articles.title: “Yambathani isikrweqe soMoya” 7
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade!

Namhlanje siqhubeka sihlolisisa ubudlelane kunye nesabelo: AmaKristu afanele anxibe isikrweqe sokomoya esisinikwa nguThixo yonke imihla.

Isifundo 7: Thembela kuMoya oyiNgcwele Thandaza kwaye ucele nangaliphi na ixesha

Masivule iBhayibhile yethu kwabase-Efese 6:18 size sifunde kunye: Ngazo zonke iintlobo zezikhungo nezikhungo nithandaze nikuye uMoya;

1 Phila ngoMoya oyiNgcwele kwaye wenze ngoMoya oyiNgcwele

Ukuba sidla ubomi ngokoMoya, masihambe nokuhamba kwangokoMoya. Galati 5:25

(1) Phila ngoMoya Oyingcwele

Umbuzo: Buyintoni ubomi ngoMoya oyiNgcwele?

Impendulo: Ukuzalwa ngokutsha - kukuphila ngoMoya oyiNgcwele! Amen

1 Uzelwe ngamanzi nanguMoya - Yohane 3:5-7
2 Wazalelwa kwinyaniso yeendaba ezilungileyo - 1 Korinte 4:15, Yakobi 1:18

3 Uzelwe nguThixo - Yohane 1:12-13

(2) Hamba ngoMoya Oyingcwele

Umbuzo: Uhamba njani ngoMoya oyiNgcwele?

Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

1 Izinto ezindala zigqithile, ke zisuke zaba ntsha zonke izinto.

Ukuba ubani ukuKristu, usisidalwa esitsha; 2 Korinte 5:17

2 Umntu omtsha, othe wazalwa ngokutsha, asingowenyama yendoda endala

Ukuba uMoya kaThixo uhleli ezintliziyweni zenu, nina (umntu omtsha) anisengowenyama (umntu omdala), kodwa ningaboMoya. Ukuba umntu akanaye uMoya kaKristu, akangokaKristu lowo. Roma 8:9

3 Ukulwa phakathi koMoya oyiNgcwele kunye nenkanuko yenyama

Ndithi ke, Hambani ngokoMoya, naningasayi kuthi ke niyizalise inkanuko yenyama. Kuba inyama ikhanuka ngokuchasene noMoya, uMoya ke ukhanuka ngokuchasene nenyama; ezo zinto zombini ziphambene, ukuze ningazenzi izinto enisukuba nizithanda. Ukuba ke nikhokelwa nguMoya, aningaphantsi komthetho. Iyabonakala ke yona imisebenzi yenyama: ukukrexeza, ukungcola, uburheletya, unqulo-zithixo, ubugqwirha, intiyo, iinkani, amakhwele, imisindo, amayelenqe, amayelenqe, ukunxila, iindywala, njl. Sendinixelele kade, nangoku, ndithi kuni, Abazenzayo izinto ezinjalo abayi kubudla ilifa ubukumkani bukaThixo. Galati 5:16-21

4 Zitshitshiseni iinkohlakalo ngoMoya oyiNgcwele

Ke, bazalwana, kubonakala ngathi asinatyala kwinyama ukuba siphile ngokwenyama; Ukuba niphila ngokweso simo, niya kufa; kodwa ukuba niyazibulala ngoMoya, zife iintlondi zomzimba, nophila. KwabaseRoma 8:12-13 nakwabaseKolose 3:5-8

5 Yambathani umntu omtsha, nimhlube umntu omdala

Musani ukuxokisana, kuba nizihlubile nje umntu omdala, nezenzo zakhe, nambatha lowo umtsha. Umntu omtsha uyahlaziywa ngolwazi abe ngumfanekiselo woMdali wakhe. KwabaseKolose 3:9-10 nabase-Efese 4:22-24

6 Inyama yomntu omdala iya isiba mandundu, kodwa umntu omtsha wenziwa mtsha imihla ngemihla kuKristu.

Ngoko ke, asityhafi. Nangona umzimba wangaphandle (umntu omdala) uya kutshatyalaliswa, umntu wangaphakathi (umntu omtsha) wenziwa mtsha umhla nezolo. Iimbandezelo zethu ezikhaphukhaphu nezomzuzwana ziya kusisebenzela ubunzima banaphakade bozuko olungenakuthelekiswa nanto. 2 Korinte 4:16-17

7 Khulani niye kuKristu, iNtloko

ukuba abangcwele bawuxhobele umsebenzi wolungiselelo, bawakhe umzimba kaKristu, side sonke sifike kubunye bokholo, nasekumazini uNyana kaThixo, ebudodeni obupheleleyo, emlinganisweni wobukhulu boMoya. Ukuzala kukaKristu,… luthando kuphela luthetha inyaniso, lukhulela ezintweni zonke kuye oyiNtloko, uKristu, ekuthe ngaye umzimba uphela umanyaniswa, uhlanganiselwe ndawonye, ukuze onke amalungu asebenze icebo, axhasane ngokomKristu. umsebenzi welungu ngalinye, ukhulisa umzimba, uwakhe eluthandweni. Efese 4:12-13,15-16

8 Uvuko oluhle ngakumbi

Umfazi wabavusa abakhe abafileyo. Abanye banyamezela intuthumbo eqatha baza bala ukukhululwa (umbhalo wantlandlolo wawuyintlawulelo) ukuze bafumane uvuko olulunge ngakumbi. Hebhere 11:35

2. Thandaza kwaye ucele nangaliphi na ixesha

(1) Thandaza rhoqo yaye ungatyhafi

UYesu wenza umzekeliso ukuze afundise abantu ukuthandaza rhoqo bangatyhafi. Luka 18:1

Nantoni na eniyicela emthandazweni, kholwani nje, kwaye niya kuyamkela. ” Mateyu 21:22

(2) Xelela uThixo into oyifunayo ngomthandazo nesikhungo

Musani ukuxhalela nantoni na, kodwa ezintweni zonke zaziseni iingcelo zenu kuThixo ngomthandazo nesikhungo nombulelo. Lwaye uxolo lukaThixo, olugqithisele kuko konke ukuqonda, luya kuzigcina iintliziyo zenu neengqiqo zenu kuKristu Yesu. Filipi 4:6-7

(3) Thandaza ngoMoya oyiNgcwele

Ke, bazalwana baziintanda, zakheni elukholweni olulolona lungcwele, nithandaza nikuMoya oyiNgcwele;

Hlalani nihleli eluthandweni lukaThixo, niyilinde inceba yeNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, kuse ebomini obungunaphakade. Yude 1:20-21

(4) Thandaza ngomoya nangengqiqo

Wathi uPawulos, Kuthekani na ngalo? Ndifuna ukuthandaza ngomoya nangengqiqo kwakhona ndifuna ukucula ngomoya nangengqiqo. 1 Korinte 14:15

(5) UMoya oyiNgcwele uyasithandazela encwina;

#UMoya oyiNgcwele uthethelela abangcwele ngokokuthanda kukaThixo#

Ngaphezu koko, uMoya oyiNgcwele uyasixhasa ekusweleni kwethu amandla, asikwazi ukuthandaza, kodwa uMoya ngokwakhe uyasithandazela ngokuncwina okungathethekiyo. Lowo uziphengululayo iintliziyo uyazazi iingcamango zoMoya, kuba uMoya uthethelela abangcwele ngokukaThixo. Roma 8:26-27

(6) Lumka, linda kwaye uthandaze

Isiphelo sezinto zonke sisondele. Yibani nobungcathu, phaphameni, nithandaze; eyoku-1 kaPetros 4:7

(7) Imithandazo yamalungisa iluncedo gqitha ekuphiliseni.

Ukuba ubani uyabandezeleka, makathandazele; Ukuba ubani uyagula, makabize amadoda amakhulu ebandla, amthambise ngeoli, egameni leNkosi, amthandazele. Umthandazo wokholo uya kumsindisa lowo ugulayo, iNkosi imvuse; (Funda amaHebhere 10:17) Ngoko ke zivumeni izono omnye komnye, nithandazelane, ukuze niphiliswe. Umthandazo welungisa uba mkhulu; Yakobi 5:13-16

(8) Thandaza kwaye ubeke izandla phezu kwemilwelwe ukuba iphiliswe

Ngelo xesha uyise kaPubliyo wayelele phantsi ebanjwe yicesina nokuxaxaza igazi. UPawulos wangena, wamthandazela, wabeka izandla phezu kwakhe, wamphilisa. IZenzo 28:8
UYesu wayengenakuyenza imimangaliso apho, kodwa wabeka izandla phezu kwemilwelwe embalwa waza wabaphilisa. Marko 6:5

Musa ukukungxamela ukubeka izandla kwabanye; musa ukuba nenxaxheba kwizono zabanye, kodwa zigcine unyulu. eyoku-1 kuTimoti 5:22

3. Yiba lijoni elilungileyo likaKristu

Yiva ubunzima kunye nam, njengomphumi-mkhosi olungileyo kaKristu Yesu. eyesi-2 kuTimoti 2:3

Ndabona, nantso iMvana imi phezu kweNtaba yeZiyon, kumi nayo ikhulu elinamanci mane anesine lamawaka, benalo igama loYise libhaliwe emabunzini abo. …Aba abangcoliswanga kubafazi; Bayilandela iMvana apho isukuba isiya khona. Bathengwa phakathi kwabantu njengeentlahlela kuThixo nakuyo iMvana. ISityhilelo 14:1, 4

4. Ukusebenza kunye noKristu

Kuba singabasebenzi kunye noThixo; nina niyintsimi kaThixo, nesakhiwo sakhe. 1 Korinte 3:9

5. Kukho amaxesha angama-100, angama-60, nama-30

Enye yawa kumhlaba omhle, yavelisa isiqhamo, enye ikhulu, enye amashumi amathandathu, enye amashumi amathathu. Mateyu 13:8

6. Yamkela uzuko, umvuzo, nesithsaba

Ukuba ke bangabantwana, baziindlalifa, iindlalifa zikaThixo, iindlalifa ke kunye noKristu. Ukuba siva ubunzima kunye naye, sozukiswa nokuzukiswa kunye naye. Roma 8:17
ndiphuthume ngokoxunele umvuzo wobizo lwaphezulu lukaThixo kuKristu Yesu. Filipi 3:14

Ithe ke iNkosi, Ndiyeza kamsinya; ISityhilelo 3:11

7 Ukulawula noKristu

Banoyolo yaye bangcwele abo banesabelo kuvuko lokuqala! ukufa kwesibini akunagunya kubo. Baya kusuka babe ngababingeleli bakaThixo nabakaKristu, babe ngookumkani kunye noKristu iminyaka eliwaka. ISityhilelo 20:6

8 Ubukumkani ngonaphakade kanaphakade

Akuyi kubakho busuku khona; akusayi kubakho mfuneko yazibane, nokukhanya kwelanga, ngokuba iNkosi uYehova iya kubakhanyisela. Baya kulawula ngonaphakade kanaphakade. ISityhilelo 22:5

Ngoko ke, amaKristu amele anxibe isikrweqe esipheleleyo esisinikwa nguThixo yonke imihla ukuze akwazi ukuchasa amaqhinga kaMtyholi, axhathise utshaba ngemihla yembandezelo, aze afeze yonke into aze eme ngokuqinileyo. Ngoko yimani niqinile,

1Bhinqa inyaniso esinqeni sakho,
2 Xhobani isigcina-sifuba sobulungisa;
3 niyibeke ezinyaweni zenu ulungiselelo lokuhamba, iindaba ezilungileyo zoxolo.
4 Ke ngoko, qubulani ikhaka lokholo, enothi ngalo nicime zonke iintolo ezinomlilo zongendawo;
5 Yambathani isigcina-ntloko sosindiso, nithabathe ikrele loMoya, elililizwi likaThixo;
6 ngako konke ukukhunga, nokukhunga, nithandaza amaxesha onke nikuye uMoya;

7 Lindani ke, nithandaze ningayeki ngenxa yabo bonke abangcwele.

Umbhalo weVangeli osuka ku:

ibandla leNkosi uYesu Krestu

Aba ngabantu abangcwele abahlala bodwa, ababalelwa phakathi kwezizwe.
Njenge-144,000 yeentombi ezinyulu ezilandela iNkosi iMvana.

Amen!

→→Ndimbona esencotsheni nasendulini;
Aba ngabantu abahlala bodwa, ababalelwa ezizweni zonke.
INumeri 23:9
Ngabasebenzi eNkosini uYesu Krestu: UMzalwana uWang*Yun, uDade uLiu, uDade uZheng, uMzalwana uCen... kunye nabanye abasebenzi abawuxhasa ngenzondelelo umsebenzi wevangeli ngokunikela ngemali nangokusebenza nzima, kunye nabanye abangcwele abasebenza nathi abakholwayo. ezi ndaba zilungileyo, amagama abo abhalwe encwadini yobomi. Amen! Imbekiselo kwabaseFilipi 4:3

articles.title: “Yambathani isikrweqe soMoya” 6
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade!

Namhlanje siqhubeka sihlolisisa ubudlelane kunye nesabelo: AmaKristu afanele anxibe isikrweqe sokomoya esisinikwa nguThixo yonke imihla.

Isifundo 6: Xhobani isigcina-ntloko sosindiso nibambe ikrele loMoya oyiNgcwele

Masivule iBhayibhile yethu kwabase-Efese 6:17 size sifunde kunye: “Yambathani isigcina-ntloko sosindiso, nithabathe ikrele loMoya, elililizwi likaThixo;

1 Yambathani isigcina-ntloko sosindiso

(1) Usindiso

INkosi iluyile usindiso lwakhe, ibonakalisile ubulungisa bayo emehlweni eentlanga;
Vumani kuYehova, nilibonge igama lakhe; Shumayela usindiso lwakhe yonke imihla! INdumiso 96:2

Lowo uzisa iindaba ezilungileyo, uxolo, iindaba ezilungileyo, nosindiso, uthi kwiZiyon, Uyalawula uThixo wakho! Hayi indlela ezintle ngayo iinyawo zale ndoda inyuka intaba! Isaya 52:7

Umbuzo: Abantu balwazi njani usindiso lukaThixo?

Impendulo: Uxolelo lwezono - ngoko uyalwazi usindiso!

Qaphela: Ukuba "isazela" sakho sonqulo sihlala siziva sinetyala, isazela somoni asiyi kuhlanjululwa kwaye sixolelwe! Ubungayi kulwazi usindiso lukaThixo - Bona amaHebhere 10: 2.
Sifanele sikukholelwe oko uThixo akuthethayo eBhayibhileni ngokwamazwi akhe. Amen! Kunjengokuba iNkosi uYesu yathi: “Izimvu zam ziyaliva ilizwi lam, kwaye ndiyazazi, zona ziyandilandela.”— Yohane 10:27
Ukuze abantu bakhe balwazi usindiso ngoxolelo lwezono zabo...

Yonke inyama iya kulubona usindiso lukaThixo! Luka 1:77,3:6

Umbuzo: Zixolelwa njani izono zethu?

Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

(2) Usindiso ngoYesu Kristu

Umbuzo: Yintoni usindiso kuKristu?

Impendulo: Kholwa kuYesu! Kholwa yivangeli!

(INkosi uYesu) yathi: “Lizalisekile ixesha, yaye ubukumkani bukaThixo busondele. Guqukani nikholwe kuzo iindaba ezilungileyo!

(Wathi uPawulos) Andinazintloni ngazo iindaba ezilungileyo zikaKristu; kuba zingamandla kaThixo okusindisa bonke abakholwayo, umYuda kuqala, kwanomGrike. Kuba ubulungisa bukaThixo bubonakalaliswa ngazo ezi ndaba zilungileyo; Njengoko kubhaliwe kwathiwa: “Lowo ulilungisa uya kudla ubomi obuphuma elukholweni.”—KwabaseRoma 1:16-17

Ngoko uyakholwa kuYesu nakwivangeli! Le vangeli lusindiso lukaYesu Krestu Ukuba uyakholwa kule vangeli, izono zakho zinokuxolelwa, zisindiswe, zizalwe ngokutsha, kwaye zibe nobomi obungunaphakade! Amen.

Umbuzo: Ukholelwa njani kule vangeli?

Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

[1] Kholelwa ukuba uYesu wayeyintombi enyulu eyakhawulwa yaza yazalwa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele - Mateyu 1:18, 21
[2] Ukukholelwa ukuba uYesu unguNyana kaThixo— Luka 1:30-35
[3] Kholelwa ukuba uYesu weza esenyameni - 1 Yohane 4:2, Yohane 1:14
[4] Ukukholelwa kuYesu yindlela yantlandlolo yobomi kunye nokukhanya kobomi - Yohane 1:1-4, 8:12, 1 Yohane 1:1-2
[5] Kholelwa eNkosini uThixo owasibeka isono sethu sonke kuYesu – Isaya 53:6

[6] Kholwa eluthandweni lukaYesu! Wafa emnqamlezweni ngenxa yezono zethu, wangcwatywa, waza wavuka kwakhona ngomhla wesithathu. 1 Korinte 15:3-4

(Qaphela: UKristu wafela izono zethu!

1 ukuze sikhululeke sonke esonweni - KwabaseRoma 6:7;

2 Bakhululwe kumthetho nasekuqalekisweni kwawo - Roma 7:6, Galati 3:13;
3 Wakhululwa emandleni kaSathana - IZenzo 26:18
4 Sihlangulwe Ehlabathini—Yohane 17:14
Wangcwatywa!
5 Sikhululeni kubuntu obudala, nakwizenzo zabo – Kolose 3:9;
6 Ngokuzichaza kwabaseGalati 2:20
Wavuswa ngomhla wesithathu!

7 Uvuko lukaKristu luye lwasivelisa ngokutsha lwaza lwasithethelela! Amen. Eyoku-1 kaPetros 1:3 namaRoma 4:25

[7] Ukwenziwa oonyana bakaThixo—Galati 4:5
[8] Yambathani ubuntu obutsha, nambathe uKristu.”— Galati 3:26-27
[9] UMoya oyiNgcwele ungqinelana nomoya wethu ukuba singabantwana bakaThixo - Roma 8:16
[10] Siguqulele (umntu omtsha) ebukumkanini boNyana oyintanda kaThixo - Kolose 2:13
[11] Ubomi bethu obuhlaziyiweyo bufihlwe noKristu kuye uThixo - Kolose 3:3
[12] Xa athe wabonakala uKristu, siya kubonakala nathi, sinaye ebuqaqawulini.”— Kolose 3:4

Olu lusindiso lukaYesu Krestu Wonke umntu okholwayo kuYesu ungumntwana kaThixo. Amen.

2 Bamba ikrele loMoya oyiNgcwele

(1) Yamkela uMoya oyiNgcwele othenjisiweyo

Umbuzo: Ungamfumana njani uMoya oyiNgcwele othenjisiweyo?

Impendulo: Yiva ivangeli, indlela eyiyo, kwaye ukholwe kuYesu!

Natywinwa kuye, natywinwa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele wedinga, ekusekweni kwenu, nakholwayo nakuye, nakuva ilizwi lenyaniso, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwenu. Efese 1:13
Umzekelo, uSimon Petros washumayela endlwini “yeeNtlanga” uKorneli Aba bantu beeNtlanga baliva ilizwi lenyaniso, ivangeli yosindiso lwabo, bakholwa kuYesu Kristu, waza uMoya oyiNgcwele wabawela bonke abo bamphulaphulayo. Incwadi yeZenzo 10:34-48

(2) UMoya oyiNgcwele uyangqina ngeentliziyo zethu ukuba singabantwana bakaThixo

Kuba bonke abakhokelwa nguMoya kaThixo, bangoonyana bakaThixo. Animamkelanga moya wobukhoboka, ukuba nihlale ninoyikeka; bantwana, iindlalifa, iindlalifa zikaThixo, iindlalifa ke kunye noKristu. Ukuba siva ubunzima kunye naye, sozukiswa nokuzukiswa kunye naye.
Roma 8:14-17

(3) Ubuncwane bubekwe kwisitya sodongwe

Obu butyebi sibuphethe ngezitya zodongwe, ukubonisa ukuba la mandla makhulu, aphuma kuThixo, angaphumi kuthi. 2 Korinte 4:7

Umbuzo: Buyintoni obu butyebi?

Impendulo: NguMoya oyiNgcwele wenyaniso! Amen

“Ukuba niyandithanda, noyigcina imithetho yam. Mna ndiya kucela kuBawo, aze aninike omnye uMthetheleli (okanye uMthetheleli; lo ungezantsi), ukuze abe nani ngonaphakade, oyinyaniso. Aninako ukumamkela uMoya oyiNgcwele; ngokuba ningamboni, ningamazi nokumazi, nina niyamazi yena, ngokuba uhleli nani, kanjalo ungaphakathi kwenu;

3. LiLizwi likaThixo

Umbuzo: Liyintoni iLizwi likaThixo?

Impendulo: Ivangeli elishunyayelwa kuni lilizwi likaThixo!

(1) Ekuqaleni kwakukho iTao

Ekuqaleni kwakukho iTao, kwaye iTao yayikunye noThixo, kwaye iTao yayinguThixo. Lo Lizwi wayekunye noThixo kwasekuqalekeni. Yohane 1:1-2

(2) ULizwi waba yinyama

ULizwi ke waba ngumntu, waza wahlala phakathi kwethu, ezele lubabalo nayinyaniso. Sabubukela ubungangamsha bakhe awabunikwa nguYise, njengoko ekukuphela koNyana wakhe; Yohane 1:14

(3) Kholwani kwivangeli nize nizalwe ngokutsha.

Makabongwe uThixo, uYise weNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Ngokwenceba yakhe enkulu ubuye wasizala ukuba sibe nethemba eliphilileyo ngokuvuka kukaYesu Kristu kwabafileyo... Nizelwe ngokutsha, kungengambewu enokonakala, kungokwasembewini engenakonakala, ngalo ilizwi likaThixo eliphilileyo, elihleliyo. …Lilizwi leNkosi kuphela elihlala ngonaphakade.

Zizo ke ezo iindaba ezilungileyo ezashunyayelwayo kuni; 1 Petros 1:3, 23, 25

Mawethu!

Khumbula ukuqokelela.
