articles.title: “Yambathani isikrweqe soMoya” 5
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade!

Namhlanje siqhubeka sihlolisisa ubudlelane kunye nesabelo: AmaKristu afanele anxibe isikrweqe sokomoya esisinikwa nguThixo yonke imihla.

Isifundo 5: Sebenzisa ukholo njengekhaka

Masivule iBhayibhile yethu kwabase-Efese 6:16 size siyifunde kunye: Ngapha koko, nithabathe ikhaka lokholo, olunako ukuzicima zonke iintolo ezinomlilo zongendawo;

(Qaphela: Inguqulelo yephepha ithi "vine"; i-electronic version ithi "shield")

1. Ukholo

Umbuzo: Yintoni ukholo?
Impendulo: “Ukholo” luthetha ukholo, ukunyaniseka, inyaniso, noamen “ukulunga” kuthetha isimilo, ubungcwele, ubulungisa, uthando, uvuyo, uxolo, ukuzeka kade umsindo, ububele, ukulunga, intembeko, ubulali, nokuzeyisa;

2. Ukuzithemba

(1) ileta

Umbuzo: Yintoni ileta?

Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

Ukholo ke kukukholosa ngezinto ezithenjiweyo; kukweyiseka bubukho bezinto ezingabonwayo. Abantu bamandulo babenobungqina obumangalisayo kule leta.
Ngokholo siyaqonda ukuba indalo le yonke yadalwa ngelizwi likaThixo. ( Hebhere 11:1-3 )

Ngokomzekelo, umlimi utyala ingqolowa entsimini, ulindele ukuba ukhozo lwengqolowa luwele emhlabeni luze lutyalwe, luya kuvelisa iinkozo ezininzi kwixesha elizayo. Ke oku kukukholosa ngezinto ezithenjiweyo;

(2) Isekelwe elukholweni naselukholweni

Kuba ubulungisa bukaThixo bubonakalaliswa ngazo ezi ndaba zilungileyo; Njengoko kubhaliwe kwathiwa: "Ilungisa liya kudla ubomi ngokholo." (KwabaseRoma 1:17)

(3) Ukholo nesithembiso

Kholwa kuYesu kwaye ufumane ubomi obungunaphakade:
“Kuba wenjenje uThixo ukulithanda kwakhe ihlabathi, ude wancama uNyana wakhe okuphela kwamzeleyo, ukuze bonke abakholwayo kuye bangatshabalali, koko babe nobomi obungunaphakade.
Ukusuka elukholweni ukuya elukholweni.
Ngokusekelwe elukholweni: Kholwa kuYesu kwaye usindiswe kwaye ube nobomi obungunaphakade! Amen.
Ukuya kwinqanaba lokukholelwa: Landela uYesu kwaye uhambe naye ukushumayela iindaba ezilungileyo, kwaye ufumane uzuko, umvuzo, isithsaba, kunye novuko olungcono. Amen!

Ukuba ke bangabantwana, baziindlalifa, iindlalifa zikaThixo, iindlalifa ke kunye noKristu. Ukuba siva ubunzima kunye naye, sozukiswa nokuzukiswa kunye naye. ( Roma 8:17 )

3. Ukuthabatha ukholo njengekhaka

Ke ngoko, qubula ingweletshetshe yokholo, enothi ngayo nizicime zonke iintolo ezinomlilo zongendawo;

Umbuzo: Lusetyenziswa njani ukholo njengekhaka?

Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

(1)Ukholo

1 Kholwani ukuba uYesu wakhawulwa yintombi enyulu waza wazalwa nguMoya oyiNgcwele - Mateyu 1:18,21
2 Kholelwa ukuba uYesu unguLizwi wenziwa inyama—Yohane 1:14
3 Ukukholelwa ukuba uYesu unguNyana kaThixo— Luka 1:31-35
4 Kholwa kuYesu njengoMsindisi, uKristu, noMesiya - Luka 2:11, Yohane 1:41
5 Ukholo kuYehova lubeka isono sethu sonke phezu koYesu—Isaya 53:8
6 Kholelwa ukuba uYesu wafa emnqamlezweni ngenxa yezono zethu, wangcwatywa, waza wavuka kwakhona ngomhla wesithathu - 1 Korinte 15:3-4
7 Ukukholelwa ukuba uYesu wavuka kwabafileyo waza wasivelisa ngokutsha— 1 Petros 1:3
8 Ukukholelwa kuvuko lukaYesu kuyasithethelela— Roma 4:25
9 Ngokokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehleli kuthi, ubuntu bethu obutsha ayiseyiyomntu omdala nenyama – KwabaseRoma 8:9
10 UMoya oyiNgcwele ungqinelana nomoya wethu ukuba singabantwana bakaThixo. - Roma 8:16
11 Yambathani ubuntu obutsha, nambathe uKristu - Gal 3:26-27
12 Kholelwa ukuba uMoya oyiNgcwele usinika izipho ezahlukahlukeneyo, igunya namandla (njengokushumayela iindaba ezilungileyo, ukuphilisa abagulayo, ukukhupha iidemon, ukwenza imimangaliso, ukuthetha ngeelwimi, njalo njalo)— 1 Korinte 12:7-11 .
13 Thina babandezelekileyo ngenxa yokholo lweNkosi uYesu, siya kuzukiswa kunye nayo - Roma 8: 17
14 Uvuko ngomzimba ongcono — Hebhere 11:35

15 Niyakulawula kunye noKristu iminyaka eliwaka nangonaphakade. Amen—Izityhilelo 20:6,22:5

(2) Ukholo lusebenza njengekhaka lokucima zonke iintolo ezinomlilo zongendawo

1 Qondani inkohliso yongendawo— Efese 4:14
2 banokuwaxhathisa amaqhinga kaMtyholi - Efese 6:11
3 Zichase zonke izilingo— Mateyu 18:6-9
(Umzekelo: izithethe zeli hlabathi, izithixo, imidlalo yekhompyutha, iinethiwekhi eziphathwayo, ubukrelekrele bokwenziwa... landela inkanuko yenyama nentliziyo - Efese 2:1-8)
4. Ukuchasa utshaba ngemini yembandezelo - Efese 6:13
(Njengoko kubhaliwe eBhayibhileni: USathana wambetha uYobhi waza wamenza amathumba ukusuka ezinyaweni ukuya entlokweni yakhe— Yobhi 2:7 ; umthunywa kaSathana wamfaka iliva enyameni kaPawulos— 2 Korinte 12:7 .
5 Ndithi kuni, Lilumkeleni igwele labaFarisi (abagwetyelwayo ngokomthetho) nabaSadusi (bangakholwayo eluvukweni lwabafileyo) oku akubhekiseli kuso uyaqonda? ” Mateyu 16:11
6 mchaseni lowo, nizimasekile elukholweni, nisazi ukuba kwaezo ntlungu ziyenzeka kubo abazalwana benu abasehlabathini; Ke kaloku uThixo walo lonke ubabalo, owasibizelayo eluzukweni lwakhe olungunaphakade, sikuKristu, wanga angathi ngokwakhe, nakuba nive ubunzima umzuzwana, anilungise nigqibelele, anomeleze, anizimase. 1 Petros 5:9-10

7 Ngoko mthobeleni uThixo. Mchaseni ke uMtyholi, wonibaleka. Sondelani kuye uThixo, wosondela kuni… Yakobi 4:7-8

(3)Abo boyisayo ngoYesu

(Ingcono kunosathana, ingcono kunehlabathi, ingcono kunokufa!)

Ngokuba bonke abazelwe nguThixo bayaleyisa ihlabathi; Ngubani na lowo uleyisayo ihlabathi? Asinguye na okholwayo ukuba uYesu unguye uNyana kaThixo? eyoku- 1 kaYohane 5:4-5

1 Lowo unendlebe, makayive into ayithethayo uMoya kuwo amabandla. Lowo weyisayo ndiya kumnika ukuba adle kuwo umthi wobomi eParadisi kaThixo. ’” ISityhilelo 2:7
2 Lowo weyisayo akayi koyiswa kukufa kwesibini. ’”
ISityhilelo 2:11
3 Lowo weyisayo ndiya kumnika imana efihlakeleyo, kuye ilitye elimhlophe, elibhalwe igama elitsha, elingayi kulazi bani, ingenguye lowo ulamkelayo. ’” ISityhilelo 2:17
4 Lowo weyisayo, ayigcineyo imithetho yam, ade ase ekupheleni, ndiya kumnika igunya phezu kweentlanga; ISityhilelo 2:26, 28
5 Lowo weyisayo uya kuthiwe wambu ezimhlophe; andisayi kulicima igama lakhe encwadini yobomi; ISityhilelo 3:5
6 Lowo weyisayo ndiya kumenza intsika etempileni yoThixo wam, angabi saphuma kuyo naphakade. Ndiya kulibhala kuye igama loThixo wam, negama lomzi woThixo wam, eyiYerusalem Entsha, ehla emazulwini, ivela kuThixo wam, negama lam elitsha. ISityhilelo 3:12

7 Lowo weyisayo, ndiya kumvumela ukuba ahlale nam etroneni yam, njengokuba nam ndeyisayo, ndaza ndahlala phantsi noBawo etroneni yakhe. ISityhilelo 3:21

ibandla leNkosi uYesu Krestu

abazalwana noodade

articles.title: “Yambathani isikrweqe soMoya” 4
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade!

Namhlanje siyaqhubeka sihlolisisa ubudlelane kunye nesabelo sokuba amaKristu afanele anxibe isikrweqe somoya esisinikwa nguThixo yonke imihla

Isifundo 4: Ukushumayela iVangeli yoXolo

Masivule iiBhayibhile zethu kweyabase-Efese 6:15 size siyifunde kunye: “Ninxibe ezinyaweni zenu ukulungisela ukuhamba ngeendaba ezilungileyo zoxolo.”

1. IVangeli

Umbuzo: Yintoni ivangeli?

Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

(1) UYesu wathi

Wathi ke uYesu kubo, Ngawo la amazwi endawathethayo kuni ndinani, okokuba zimelwe kukuzaliseka zonke izinto ezibhaliweyo ngam emthethweni kaMoses, nasebaprofetini, nasezindumisweni banokuqonda iZibhalo, baze bathi kubo: “Kubhaliwe kwathiwa, uKristu ufanele eve ubunzima, abuye avuke kwabafileyo ngomhla wesithathu, nokuba kuvakaliswe egameni lakhe inguquko noxolelo lwezono zonke izizwe (iVangeli kaLuka. 24:44-47 )

2 Wathi uPetros

Makabongwe uThixo, uYise weNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Ngokwenceba yakhe enkulu, usinike ukuzalwa ngokutsha ukuze sibe nethemba eliphilileyo ngokuvuka kukaYesu Kristu kwabafileyo, singene kwilifa elingenakonakala, elingenakudyobheka, nelingambatshiyo, eligcinelwe nina emazulwini. …Nizelwe ngokutsha, kungengokwasembewini enokonakala, kungokwasembewini engenakonakala, ngelizwi likaThixo eliphilileyo, elihlala lihleli. ... ke lona ilizwi leNkosi lihleli ngonaphakade. Zizo ke ezo iindaba ezilungileyo ezashunyayelwayo kuni; (Funda eyoku-1 kaPetros 1:3-4, 23, 25.)

3. Wathi uYohane

Ekuqaleni kwakukho iTao, kwaye iTao yayikunye noThixo, kwaye iTao yayinguThixo. Lo Lizwi wayekunye noThixo kwasekuqalekeni. ( Yohane 1:1-2 )

Ngokusingisele kwilizwi lantlandlolo lobomi kwasekuqalekeni, oku koko sikuvileyo, sakubonayo, sakubona ngamehlo ethu, saza sakuchukumisa ngezandla zethu. (Obu bomi ke bubonakalisiwe, sabubona, sathi ngoku siyangqina, ukuba sininika ubomi obungunaphakade, obo bebukuye uYise, babonakaliswa kuthi.

4 Wathi uPawulos

Nokusindiswa ngazo ezi ndaba zilungileyo, ukuba anithe nafumana nakholwa, koko nikubambezelayo oko ndikushumayezayo. Kuba oko ndaninikelayo nam kuni: okokuqala, okokuba uKristu wazifela izono zethu ngokwezibhalo, nokokuba wangcwatywa, nokokuba wavuswa ngomhla wesithathu, ngokutsho kweZibhalo ( 1 Korinte 15:2-4 )

2. IVangeli yoXolo

(1)Uphumle

Yizani kum nonke nina nibulalekayo, nisindwayo ngumthwalo, ndoninika ukuphumla. Thabathani idyokhwe yam niyithwale, nifunde kum; ngokuba ndinobulali, ndithobekile ngentliziyo, noyifumanela ukuphumla imiphefumlo yenu. ( Mateyu 11:28-29 )

(2) uphiliswe

Waxhonywa emthini waza wazithwala izono zethu ukuze, safa kwisono, siphile ebulungiseni. Naphiliswa ngemivumbo yakhe. (Funda eyoku-1 kaPetros 2:24.)

(3) Fumana ubomi obungunaphakade

“Kuba wenjenje uThixo ukulithanda kwakhe ihlabathi, ude wancama uNyana wakhe okuphela kwamzeleyo, ukuze bonke abakholwayo kuye bangatshabalali, koko babe nobomi obungunaphakade.

(4) ukuzukiswa

Ukuba ke bangabantwana, baziindlalifa, iindlalifa zikaThixo, iindlalifa ke kunye noKristu. Ukuba siva ubunzima kunye naye, sozukiswa nokuzukiswa kunye naye.

( Roma 8:17 )

3. Nxibani ezinyaweni zenu iindaba ezilungileyo zoxolo njengezihlangu zokunilungiselela ukuhamba

(1)Ivangeli ingamandla kaThixo

Kuba andinazintloni ngazo iindaba ezilungileyo zikaKristu, kuba zingamandla kaThixo okusindisa bonke abakholwayo, umYuda kuqala, kwanomGrike. Kuba ubulungisa bukaThixo bubonakalaliswa ngazo ezi ndaba zilungileyo; Njengoko kubhaliwe kwathiwa: "Ilungisa liya kudla ubomi ngokholo." (KwabaseRoma 1:16-17)

(2) UYesu washumayela ivangeli yobukumkani bamazulu

Waye uYesu eyihamba imizi ngemizi, nemizana ngemizana, efundisa ezindlwini zabo zesikhungu, eshumayela iindaba ezilungileyo zobukumkani, ephilisa izifo zonke nezikhuhlane zonke. Wathi akuzibona izihlwele, wasikwa yimfesane zizo, ngokuba zibe ziindwalutho, zinjengezimvu ezingenamalusi. ( Mateyu 9:35-36 Union Version )

(3) UYesu wathumela abasebenzi ukuba baye kuvuna isivuno

Ngoko wathi kubafundi bakhe: “Ukuvuna okunene kuninzi, kodwa bona abasebenzi bambalwa.

Anitsho na ukuthi, ‘Kusele iinyanga ezine ukuze kuvunwe’? Ndithi kuni, Waphakamiseni amehlo enu, niwakhangele amasimi; Umvuni wamkela umvuzo wakhe, abuthele ubomi obungunaphakade, ukuze umhlwayeli avuye kunye nomvuni. Njengoko intetho isithi: ‘Omnye uyahlwayela, omnye uya kuvuna’, yaye oku kuyinyaniso ngokucacileyo. Mna ndanithuma ukuvuna oko ningabulalekanga kuko nina; ( Yohane 4:35-38 )

Umbhalo weVangeli ovela:

ibandla leNkosi uYesu Krestu

abazalwana noodade

articles.title: Ukunxiba isikrweqe soMoya 3
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade!

Namhlanje siqhubeka sihlolisisa ubudlelane kunye nokwabelana amaKristu kufuneka anxibe isikrweqe somoya esisinikwa nguThixo yonke imihla:

Isifundo 3: Sebenzisa ubulungisa njengesigcina-sifuba sokugquma amabele akho

Masivule iBhayibhile yethu kwabase-Efese 6:14 size siyifunde kunye: “Yimani ngoko, nibhinqe umbhinqo wenyaniso esinqeni senu, ninxibe isigcina-sifuba sobulungisa esinqeni senu;


1. Ubulungisa

Umbuzo: Yintoni ubulungisa?
Impendulo: "iGong" ithetha ubulungisa, ubulungisa kunye nemfezeko;

Ukutolikwa kweBhayibhile! “Ubulungisa” bubhekisela kubulungisa bukaThixo!

2. Ubulungisa bomntu

Umbuzo: Ngaba abantu “banobulungisa”?

Impendulo: Hayi.

【Akukho mntu ulilungisa】

Njengoko kubhaliwe kwathiwa:
Akukho lungisa, akukho nalinye.
akukho ukuqonda;
Akukho umfunisisayo uThixo;
Bonke bayaphambuka endleleni ethe tye;
ningabi namsebenzi kunye.
Akukho wenza okulungileyo, akukho namnye.

( Roma 3:10-12 )

【Yonke into eyenziwa ngabantu imbi】

Lingcwaba elivulekileyo umqala wabo;
Basebenzisa ulwimi lwabo ekulahlekiseni;
Umoya werhamba usemlonyeni wakhe;
Umlomo wakhe wawuzele ziziqalekiso nobukrakra.
Ukubulala kunye nokopha,
Iinyawo zabo ziyaphaphazela,
Kuya kubakho inkohlakalo kunye nenkohlakalo endleleni.
Indlela yoxolo abayazanga;
Akukho koyika Thixo emehlweni abo.

( Roma 3:13-18 )

【Wagwetyelwa ngokholo】

(1)

Umbuzo: UNowa wayeyindoda elilungisa!

Impendulo: UNowa (ekholelwa) kwiNkosi, wenza konke uThixo awayemyalele kona, ngoko ke uThixo wambiza uNowa njengendoda elilungisa.

UNowa yena wababalwa nguYehova.
Inzala kaNowa ibhalwe apha ngezantsi. UNowa wayeyindoda elilungisa nefezekileyo kwisizukulwana sakhe. UNowa wahamba noThixo. …Yiloo nto eyenziwa nguNowa. Wakwenza konke uThixo abemwisele umthetho ngako.

( Genesis 6:8-9, 22 )

(2)

Umbuzo: UAbraham wayeyindoda elilungisa!
Impendulo: UAbraham (wakholwa) kuYehova, uThixo wamgwebela!
Wamkhuphela phandle, wathi, Khangela phezulu ezulwini, uzibale iinkwenkwezi; ubulungisa bakhe.

( Genesis 15:5-6 )

(3)

Umbuzo: Ngaba uYobhi wayeyindoda elilungisa?

Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

"Umsebenzi"

1 Ukunyaniseka okupheleleyo:

Kwakukho indoda egama linguYobhi ezweni lakwaUtse; ( Yobhi 1:1 )

2 Oyena mkhulu kwabasempumalanga:

Impahla yakhe yaba ngamawaka asixhenxe empahla emfutshane, namawaka amathathu eenkamela, namakhulu amahlanu ezibini zeenkomo, namakhulu amahlanu eemazi zamaesile, nabakhonzi nabakhonzazana abaninzi. Le ndoda ngoyena mkhulu phakathi kwabantu baseMpuma. ( Yobhi 1:3 )

3 UYobhi uzibiza ngokuba ulilungisa

Ndambatha ubulungisa;
Nxiba ubulungisa njengesambatho sakho nesithsaba.
Ndim amehlo eemfama;
Iinyawo eziqhwalelayo.
Ndinguyise wamahlwempu;
Ndifumana ityala lomntu endingazange ndadibana naye.
…Uzuko lwam luyakhula kum;
Isaphetha sam somelela esandleni sam. …Ndikhetha iindlela zabo, kwaye ndihlala kwindawo yokuqala….

( Yobhi 29:14-16, 20, 25 )

UYobhi wakha wathi: “Ndililungisa, kodwa uThixo ukususile ubulungisa bam;

Phawula: (Inguquko kaYobhi) Yobhi 38 ukuya ku-42, uYehova wayiphendula ingxoxo kaYobhi Emva kokuba uYobhi ephulaphule amazwi kaYehova.

Wathi uYehova kuYobhi, Ngubani na obambene noSomandla? Abo baphikisana noThixo banokuziphendula ezi zinto! …(uYobhi) Ndimbi! Ndikuphendule ndithini? Kwanyanzeleka ndivale umlomo ngezandla. Ndatsho kwakanye andizange ndiphendule; ( Yobhi 40:1-2, 4-5 )

Ndicela undimamele, ndifuna ukuthetha ndiyakucela, ndicela undibonise. Ndakhe ndeva ngawe ngaphambili,
Yabona ngoku ngawam amehlo. Ke ngoko ndiyazithiya (okanye ukuguqulelwa: amazwi am) kwaye ndiguquke ndiseluthulini naseluthuthwini. ( Yobhi 42:4-6 )

Kamva, uYehova wamenzela inceba uYobhi, waza uYehova wamsikelela ngakumbi kunangaphambili.

Ke ngoko, ubulungisa bukaYobhi yayibubulungisa bomntu (ukuzenza ilungisa), kwaye wayengoyena mkhulu phakathi kwabantu baseMpuma. Yathi, Ndaphuma ndaya esangweni lesixeko, ndaza ndamisa isihlalo esitratweni Zathi cwaka iinkokheli, zancamathela ulwimi ekhuhlangubeni lazo. Ondivayo ngeendlebe zakhe uthi, Ndinoyolo;

…uzuko lwam luyakhula emzimbeni wam; Xa abantu bendiva, baphakamisa amehlo abo, balindele isikhokelo sam.

Ndazinyulela iindlela zabo, ndaza ndahlala kwindawo yokuqala… ( Yobhi 29:7-11, 20-21, 25 )

---Yaye yathini iNkosi uYesu? ---

“Yeha nina xa bonke abantu bethetha izinto ezilungileyo ngani!…” (Luka 6:26).

UYobhi wathi wayelilungisa yaye “ulilungisa,” kodwa yena nentsapho yakhe behlelwa yintlekele Kamva, uYobhi waguquka phambi koYehova! Ndandikhe ndakuva ngawe, kodwa ngoku ndikubona ngawam amehlo. Ngoko ke ndiyazithiya (okanye ukuguqulelwa: amazwi am), kwaye ndiguquke ndiseluthulini naseluthuthwini! Ekugqibeleni uThixo wamsikelela uYobhi ngeentsikelelo ezingakumbi kunangaphambili.

3. Ubulungisa bukaThixo

Umbuzo: Buyintoni ubulungisa bukaThixo?

Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

【Ubulungisa bukaThixo】

Oku kuquka: uthando, ububele, ubungcwele, inceba, inceba, ukuzeka kade umsindo, ukungakhethi buso, ububele, uvuyo, uxolo, ukuzeka kade umsindo, ububele, ukulunga, intembeko, ubulali, ukuthobeka kwentliziyo, okuthe tye, ubulungisa, ukukhanya; ubulungisa Indlela iyinyaniso, bubomi, nokukhanya, nokuphilisa, nosindiso. Wafela aboni, wangcwatywa, wavuswa kwabafileyo ngosuku lwesithathu, waza wanyukela ezulwini! Vumela abantu bakholelwe le vangeli kwaye basindiswe, bavuswe, bazalwe ngokutsha, babe nobomi, kwaye babe nobomi obungunaphakade. Amen!

Bantwanana bam, ndinibhalela ezi zinto, ukuze ningoni. Ukuba kukho othe wona, sinoMthetheleli kuye uYise, uYesu Kristu ilungisa. ( 1 Yohane 2:1 )

4. Ubulungisa

Umbuzo: Ngubani olilungisa?

Impendulo: UThixo ulilungisa! Amen.

Uya kuligweba elimiweyo ngobulungisa, Agwebe phakathi kwezizwe ngokuthe tye. ( INdumiso 9:8 )
bubulungisa nobulungisa isiseko setrone yakho; ( INdumiso 89:14 )
Ngokuba lilungisa uYehova, uthanda ubulungisa; ( INdumiso 11:7 )
UYehova uyile usindiso lwakhe, yaye ubonakalisile ubulungisa bakhe emehlweni eentlanga ( INdumiso 98:2 )
ngokuba esiza kugweba ihlabathi. Uya kuligweba elimiweyo ngobulungisa, Nezizwe ngobulungisa. ( INdumiso 98:9 )
NguNdikhoyo obonelela abacinezelweyo ubulungisa; ( INdumiso 103:6 )
UYehova unobabalo, ulilungisa; ( INdumiso 116:5 )
Ulilungisa wena, Yehova, nezigwebo zakho zithe tye. ( INdumiso 119:137 )
Ulilungisa uYehova ngeendlela zakhe zonke, unenceba ngeendlela zakhe zonke. ( INdumiso 145:17 )
Ke yena uYehova wemikhosi uphakamile ngenxa yobulungisa bakhe; ( Isaya 5:16 )
Ekubeni uThixo elungile, uya kubabuyekeza ngobubi abanibandezelayo (2 Tesalonika 1:6).

Ndakhangela, ndabona izulu livulekile. Kwakukho ihashe elimhlophe, nomkhweli walo wayebizwa ngokuba nguThembekile, nguNyaniso, ogwebayo esenza imfazwe ngobulungisa. ( ISityhilelo 19:11 )

5 Sebenzisa ubulungisa njengesigcina-sifuba sokuvala amabele akho

Umbuzo: Ungayikhusela njani intliziyo yakho ngobulungisa?

Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

Kuthetha ukukhulula umntu omdala, ukwambatha ubuntu obutsha, ukwambatha uKristu! Zixhobise yonke imihla ngobulungisa beNkosi uYesu Kristu, uze ushumayele ngothando lukaYesu: UThixo uluthando, ububele, ubungcwele, inceba, inceba, uzeka kade umsindo, ungakhethi bubi, nothando, uvuyo, uxolo, ukuzeka kade umsindo, ububele. , ukulunga, intembeko, ubulali, ukuthobeka, ukuzeyisa, ingqibelelo, ubulungisa, ukukhanya, indlela, inyaniso, ubomi, ukukhanya kwabantu, ukuphilisa, nosindiso. Wafela aboni, wangcwatywa, wavuswa kwabafileyo ngomhla wesithathu, wenyukela ezulwini ukuze sigwetyelwe! Hlala ngasekunene kukaSomandla. Vumela abantu bakholelwe le vangeli kwaye basindiswe, bavuswe, bazalwe ngokutsha, babe nobomi, kwaye babe nobomi obungunaphakade. Amen!

6. Gcina iTao, gcina inyaniso, kwaye ukhusele intliziyo

Umbuzo: Ungayibamba njani indlela yokwenyaniso nokukhusela intliziyo yakho?

Impendulo: Thembela kuMoya oyiNgcwele kwaye ubambelele ngokuqinileyo kwinyaniso kunye neendlela ezilungileyo! Oku kukukhusela intliziyo, kanye njengesipili.

1 Gcina intliziyo yakho

Uze uyigcine intliziyo yakho ngaphezu kwako konke okunye.
Kuba imiphumo yobomi iphuma entliziyweni.

( IMizekeliso 4:23 kunye )

2 Kholosa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele ukuba ugcine indlela elungileyo

Amazwi aphilileyo owawevayo kum, wagcine elukholweni nothando olukuKristu Yesu. Ihambo entle uyiphathiswe nguMoya oyiNgcwele ohleli kuthi.

( 2 Timoti 1:13-14 )

3 Nabani na olivayo ilizwi kodwa angaliqondi

Lowo ulivayo ilizwi lobukumkani bamazulu, akaliqondi, uyafika ongendawo, akuthabathe okuhlwayelwe entliziyweni yakhe; ( Mateyu 13:19 )

Ngoko, uyayiqonda?


7 Hamba noThixo

UYehova ukubonisile, mntundini, okulungileyo.
Ufuna ntoni kuwe?
Ngalo lonke ixesha usenza okusesikweni, uthanda inceba;
Hamba noThixo wakho ngokuthozamileyo.

( Mika 6:8 )

8. Abantu abali-144 000 balandela uYesu

Ndabona, nantso iMvana imi phezu kweNtaba yeZiyon, kumi nayo ikhulu elinamanci mane anesine lamawaka, benalo igama loYise libhaliwe emabunzini abo. … Aba bantu abadyojwanga ngabafazi; Bayilandela iMvana apho isukuba isiya khona. Bathengwa phakathi kwabantu njengeentlahlela kuThixo nakuyo iMvana. ( ISityhilelo 14:1, 4 )

Umbhalo weVangeli ovela:

ibandla leNkosi uYesu Krestu

Mawethu!

Khumbula ukuqokelela.

articles.title: “Yambathani isikrweqe soMoya” 2
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade!

Namhlanje siyaqhubeka sihlola ukwabelana ngezithuthi

Isifundo 2: Xhobani isikrweqe somoya yonke imihla

Masivule iBhayibhile yethu kwabase-Efese 6:13-14 size sizifunde kunye:

Ngoko ke, qubulani sonke isikrweqe sikaThixo, ukuze nibe nako ukuchasa utshaba ngemini yembandezelo, nithi nikufezile konke, nime nimi. Ngoko yima ngokuqinileyo, uyibhinqe inyaniso...

1:Bhinqa inyani esinqeni

Umbuzo: Yintoni inyaniso?

Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

(1) UMoya Oyingcwele uyinyaniso

UMoya oyiNgcwele uyinyaniso:

Lo nguYesu Kristu oweza ngamanzi negazi, kungekhona ngamanzi odwa, kodwa ngamanzi negazi, engqina ngoMoya oyiNgcwele; ( 1 Yohane 5:6-7 )

Umoya weNyaniso:

“Ukuba niyandithanda, noyigcina imithetho yam. Mna ndiya kucela kuBawo, aze aninike omnye uMthetheleli (okanye uMthetheleli; lo ungezantsi), ukuze abe nani ngonaphakade, oyinyaniso. ngokuba aninako ukumamkela; ngokuba ayimboni, ingamazi, nina niyamazi, ngokuba uhleli nani, kanjalo uya kuba kuni (Yohane 14:15-17).

(2) UYesu uyinyaniso

Yintoni inyaniso?
UPilato wambuza wathi: “Ungukumkani na wena?” Waphendula uYesu wathi: “Nawe uthi ndingukumkani. Mna ndizalelwe oku; Ngelizwi lam uPilato wathi, Yintoni na yona inyaniso?

( Yohane 18:37-38 )

UYesu yinyaniso:

UYesu wathi: “Ndim indlela, ndim inyaniso, ndim ubomi, akukho namnye uzayo kuBawo, engezi ngam;

(3) UThixo uyinyaniso

ILizwi linguThixo:

Ekuqaleni kwakukho iTao, kwaye iTao yayikunye noThixo, kwaye iTao yayinguThixo. Lo Lizwi wayekunye noThixo kwasekuqalekeni. ( Yohane 1:1-2 )

ILizwi likaThixo liyinyaniso:

Abangabo abehlabathi, njengokuba nam ndingenguye owehlabathi. Bangcwalise ngayo inyaniso; Njengokuba wandithuma ehlabathini, nam ndibathume bona ehlabathini. Ngenxa yabo ke ndiyazingcwalisa mna, ukuze nabo babe ngabangcwalisiweyo yinyaniso.

( Yohane 17:16-19 )

Phawula: Ekuqaleni kwakukho iTao, iTao yayikunye noThixo, yaye iTao yayinguThixo! UThixo uliLizwi, iLizwi lobomi (bona 1 Yohane 1:1-2). Ilizwi lakho liyinyaniso, ngoko ke, uThixo uyinyaniso. Amen!

2:Ungasibhinqisa njani inyani esinqeni?

Umbuzo: Indlela yokubhinqa esinqeni sakho ngenyaniso?

Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

Qaphela: Ukusebenzisa inyaniso njengebhanti lokubhinqa esinqeni sakho, oko kukuthi, indlela kaThixo, inyaniso kaThixo, amazwi kaThixo, kunye nempefumlelo yoMoya oyiNgcwele, zinegunya kwaye zinamandla kubantwana bakaThixo kunye namaKristu! Amen.

(1) Ukuzalwa ngokutsha
1 Uzelwe ngamanzi nanguMoya - Yohane 3:5-7
2 Uzelwe elukholweni lweendaba ezilungileyo - 1 Korinte 4:15, Yakobi 1:18

3 Uzelwe nguThixo - Yohane 1:12-13

Yambathani ubuntu obutsha nimambathe uKristu

Yambatha umntu omtsha:

Yambatha umntu omtsha, odalwe ngokomfanekiselo kaThixo, ebulungiseni nasebungcweleni benyaniso. ( Efese 4:24 )

Yambathani umntu omtsha. Umntu omtsha uyahlaziywa ngolwazi abe ngumfanekiselo woMdali wakhe. ( Kolose 3:10 )

Yambathani uKristu:

Ngoko ke nina nonke ningoonyana bakaThixo ngako ukukholwa, nikuKristu Yesu; Nina nonke, nabhaptizelwayo kuKristu, namambatha uKristu. ( Galati 3:26-27 )

Yambathani iNkosi uYesu Krestu rhoqo, ningalungiseleli inyama ukuzenza iinkanuko zayo. ( Roma 13:14 )

(3) Hlalani kuKristu

Umntu omtsha uhlala kuKristu:

Ngoku akukho kugwetywa kwabakuKristu Yesu. (KwabaseRoma 8:1)

Bonke abahlala kuye aboni; (Funda eyoku-1 kaYohane 3:6.)

(4) Ukuzithemba-ayisendim lo uphilayo ngoku

Ndibethelelwe emnqamlezweni noKristu; ayisendim ke odla ubomi, nguKristu ke oselesidla ubomi kum. ( Galati 2:20 )

(5) Indoda entsha ithelela uKristu ize ikhule ibe ngumntu omkhulu

ukuba abangcwele bawuxhobele umsebenzi wolungiselelo, bawakhe umzimba kaKristu, side sonke sifike kubunye bokholo, nasekumazini uNyana kaThixo, ebudodeni obupheleleyo, emlinganisweni wobukhulu boMoya. Ukuzala kukaKristu,… luthando kuphela luthetha inyaniso, lukhulela ezintweni zonke kuye oyiNtloko, uKristu, ekuthe ngaye umzimba uphela umanyaniswa, uhlanganiselwe ndawonye, ukuze onke amalungu asebenze icebo, axhasane ngokomKristu. umsebenzi welungu ngalinye, ukhulisa umzimba, uwakhe eluthandweni. ( Efese 4:12-13, 15-16 .

(6) “Inyama” yendoda endala iya isiba mandundu ngokuthe ngcembe

Ukuba nithe naluva ilizwi lakhe, nalwamkela uqeqesho lwakhe, nayifunda inyaniso yakhe, manizilahle kuni izinto ezidala, enibonakalisa ngazo iinkanuko zokulukuhla )

(7) Umntu omtsha “umntu wokomoya” wenziwa mtsha imihla ngemihla kuKristu

Ngoko ke, asityhafi. Nangona umzimba wangaphandle uya kutshatyalaliswa, kodwa yena wangaphakathi uyahlaziyeka imihla ngemihla. Iimbandezelo zethu ezikhaphukhaphu nezomzuzwana ziya kusisebenzela ubunzima banaphakade bozuko olungenakuthelekiswa nanto. Ke kaloku, asikukhathalele oko kubonwayo, sinyamekela izinto ezingabonwayo; (Funda eyesi-2 kwabaseKorinte 4:16-18.)

ukuze ukholo lwenu lungabi sebulumkweni babantu, lube semandleni kaThixo. (1 Korinte 2:5)

Phawula:

UPawulos ngowelizwi likaThixo neendaba ezilungileyo! Enyameni, wafumana iimbandezelo namatyathanga emhlabeni xa wayesentolongweni eFilipi, wabona ijoni elinxibe isikrweqe esipheleleyo Wayephefumlelwe nguMoya oyiNgcwele. Ngoko wabhala incwadi eya kumakholwa ase-Efese aneentsikelelo zokomoya.

Zilumkeleni ngokwenu, nize ningenzi ngokwezidenge; Lisebenziseni ixesha eli, kuba le mihla ayindawo. Musani ukuba sisidenge, kodwa yiqondeni into okuyiyo ukuthanda kweNkosi. Thelekisa eyabase-Efese 5:15-17

Eyesithathu: AmaKristu njengamajoni kaKristu

Nxiba oko uThixo akuphe yonke imihla

-Isikrweqe soMoya:

Ingakumbi xa amaKristu ejamelene nezilingo, iimbandezelo neembandezelo ngokoqobo; xa izithunywa zikaSathana ezisehlabathini zihlasela imizimba yamaKristu, amaKristu amele avuke ntsasa nganye, anxibe isikrweqe somoya esipheleleyo esisinikwe nguThixo, aze asebenzise inyaniso njengebhanti lawo. Bhinqa isinqe sakho, ulungele umsebenzi wemini.

(Kunjengokuba uPawulos watshoyo) Ndinelizwi elinye lokugqibela: Yomelelani eNkosini nasekomeleleni kwayo. Xhobani sonke isikrweqe sikaThixo, ukuze nibe nako ukumisa nibuchase ubuqhinga boMtyholi. Ngokuba umzamo wethu asingowokuzamana negazi nenyama; ngowokuzamana nazo izilawuli, nawo amagunya, nazo iziphatha-hlabathi zobumnyama balo eli phakade, nayo imimoya ekhohlakeleyo kwezasezulwini iindawo. Ngoko ke, qubulani sonke isikrweqe sikaThixo, ukuze nibe nako ukuchasa utshaba ngemini yembandezelo, nithi nikufezile konke, nime nimi. Yimani ngoko, nibhinqile umbhinqo wenyaniso… (Efese 6:10-14)

Umbhalo weVangeli ovela:

ibandla leNkosi uYesu Krestu

Mawethu!

Khumbula ukuqokelela

articles.title: uthando
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
---Ukwahlula njani phakathi kothando nokukrexeza---

Namhlanje siza kuhlolisisa ukwabelana ngobudlelwane: uthando kunye nokukrexeza

Masivule iBhayibhile kwiGenesis iSahluko 2, iivesi 23-25, size sifunde kunye:
Wathi uAdam, Lithambo lasemathanjeni am, yinyama yasenyameni yam.

Ngako oko indoda yomshiya uyise nonina, inamathele emfazini wayo, baze abo babini babe nyama-nye. Esi sibini sasihamba ze ngelo xesha kwaye singenazintloni.

1. Uthando

Umbuzo: Yintoni uthando?

Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

(1) Uthando phakathi kuka-Adam noEva

--Isibini sasihamba ze kwaye singenazintloni--

1 Wathi uAdam kuEva, Eli lithambo lasemathanjeni am, yinyama yasenyameni yam;
"Abafazi" zezona zipho zihle kakhulu ezinikwe nguThixo kumadoda, ziyinyani, ububele kunye nobuhle! Kukuncoma, iqabane, intuthuzelo, kunye nomncedi!
2 Indoda iya kubashiya abazali bayo;
3Zibandakanye nomfazi wakho,
4 Aba babini baba banye.

5 Babehamba ze indoda leyo, bengenazintloni.

[Qaphela] uAdam noEva babekuMyezo wase-Edeni, iintliziyo zabo zazinyulu, zingcwele, zinothando lokwenyani, inyaniso, ukulunga nobuhle! Ngoko ke, indoda nomfazi bahamba ze kwaye abanazintloni Olu luthando olungekangeni ebantwini.

(2)Uthando lukaIsake noRebheka

UIsake wamngenisa uRebheka ententeni kaSara unina, wamzeka ukuba abe ngumkakhe, wamthanda. UIsake wathuthuzeleka ngoku kuba unina engekho. Genesis 24:67

[Qaphela] uIsake ufuzisela uKristu, kwaye uRebheka ufuzisela ibandla! UIsake watshata noRebheka yaye wamthanda! Oko kukuthi, uKristu utshata ibandla yaye uyalithanda ibandla.

(3)Uthando lweNgoma yazo iiNgoma

【Indoda ethandekayo nesibini】

“Intanda” ifanekisela uKristu,
"Isibini Esigqwesileyo":
Eyoku-1 ifuzisela intombi enyulu—2 Korinte 11:2, ISityhilelo 14:4;
Isi-2 sifuzisela ibandla-Efese 5:32;

I-3 ifuzisela umtshakazi kaKristu - ISityhilelo 19: 7.

Ndingumfiyo waseSharon, ndiyinyibiba yasentlanjeni.
Intanda yam iphakathi kweentokazi, Njengenyibiba phakathi kwemithana enameva.
Intanda yam iphakathi kwabantu, Njengomthi wama-apile phakathi kwemithi.
Ndahlala phantsi komthunzi wakhe ndinovuyo, ndasiva isiqhamo sawo;

Ivakala kamnandi. Indingenisa endlwini yesidlo, ibeke ibhanile phezu kwam. INgoma yazo iiNgoma 2:1-4

Khawundibeke entliziyweni yakho njengomsesane wokutywina, undithwale ngengalo yakho njengesigxivizo.

Kuba uthando lunjengokufa, ikhwele liyingcwangu; Uthando alunakucinywa ngamanzi amaninzi, alunakurhaxwa zizikhukula. Ukuba nabani na utshintshisa bonke ubutyebi bentsapho yakhe ngothando, uya kuba yinto engento. INgoma yazo iiNgoma 8:6-7

2. Ukukrexeza

Umbuzo: Yintoni ukukrexeza nokukrexeza?

Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

(1) Ngokomoya oyingcwele ozelwe ngokutsha wokholo:

1 Abahlobo behlabathi—khangela kuYakobi 4:4
2 Ibandla elimanyene nookumkani bomhlaba—Khangela kwiSityhilelo 17:2

3. Abo basekelwe kumthetho-- bhekisa kumaRoma 7:1-3, Gal 3:10

(2) Ngokwemithetho yemimiselo yenyama:

1 Uze ungakrexezi — Eksodus 20:14
2 Othe wamala umfazi wakhe, wazeka omnye, uyakrexeza; ” Luka 16:18

3 Nabani na okhangela umntu oyinkazana, ukuba amkhanuke, uselemkrexezile entliziyweni yakhe.”— Mateyu 5:27-28 .

3. Indlela yokwahlula phakathi kothando nokukrexeza

Umbuzo: AmaKristu alubona njani uthando?

Impendulo: Umtshato olungelelaniswe nguThixo luthando!

1 Umntu ufuna ukushiya abazali bakhe,
2 Dibana nomfazi wakho,
3 Abo babini baba banye,
4 Lumanyano lukaThixo,
5 Makungabikho bani ukwahlulwayo—Funda uMateyu 19:4-6
6 Baye bobabini behamba ze,

7 Akanazintloni—Khangela kwiGenesis 2:24

Umbuzo: AmaKristu alubona njani ukrexezo?

Impendulo: Nayiphi na inkanuko "ngaphandle" umtshato olungelelanisiweyo kaThixo uyakrexeza.

(Umzekelo:) Genesis 6:2 Xa oonyana bakaThixo bazibona iintombi zabantu ukuba zintle, bazithabatha zaba ngabafazi abazikhethele bona.

(Qaphela:) Ebona ubuhle bentombi yomntu (inkanuko yenyama, inkanuko yamehlo), ukhetha ngokuthanda kwakhe (neqhayiya lobu bomi) aze ayithabathe abe ngumfazi wakhe (engaphumi kuBawo “ uThixo”) → Ayingomtshato oququzelelwa nguThixo . Imbekiselo kuYakobi 2:16
IGenesis 3-4 (hayi) UThixo usebenzisana nabafazi abangabantu ukuze babe nabantwana → “amadoda amakhulu, amagorha nabantu abadumileyo” → “amagorha, izithixo, abanekratshi, abanekratshi” abathanda ukuba “ookumkani” yaye abantu banqule okanye babanqule. .
Wabona uYehova ukuba ububi babantu bandile ehlabathini, zonke iingcinga zengcinga zabo zibububi bodwa imihla yonke, Genesis 6:5

4. Ukuziphatha kunye neempawu (zothando, ukukrexeza)

Umbuzo: Ziziphi izenzo uthando? Ngaba ezo zenzo ziyakrexeza?

Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

(1) Indoda nomfazi

1 Umtshato wentsebenziswano kaThixo

Indoda iya kubashiya abazali bayo, inamathele emfazini wayo, baze abo babini babe nyama-nye! Umtshato odityaniswe nguThixo awunakwahlulwa ngumntu. Ngokomzekelo, umyeni ukhumbula umfazi wakhe okanye umfazi ukhumbula umyeni wakhe, bobabini bahamba ze kwaye "bamanyene" ngaphandle kweentloni → olu luthando. Nceda ubhekisele kweyoku- 1 kwabaseKorinte 7:3-4 .
Umzekelo: uAdam noEva jonga kwiGenesis 2:18-24
Umzekelo: UAbraham noSarah-jonga iGenesis 12:1-5

Umzekelo: uIsake noRebheka-jonga iGenesis 24:67

2 Umtshato osikelelweyo nguThixo

Umzekelo: UNowa nosapho lwakhe - jonga iGenesis 6:18
Umzekelo: UYakobi wayethandwa nguThixo, yaye abafazi bakhe ababini neempelesi zakhe zazala izizwe ezilishumi elinesibini zakwaSirayeli Lo yayingumtshato owawusikelelwe nguThixo!

Umzekelo: URute noBhohazi – Isalathisi uLuka: 4:13

3 Asingomtshato olawulwa nguThixo

Ngokomzekelo, ukuba uAbraham uthabatha ishweshwe aze alale noHagare, uAbraham uya kuziva ‘eneentloni’ entliziyweni yakhe ngenxa yokuba akamfanelanga uSara umfazi wakhe! Ngoko ke, ngumtshato ongamkholisiyo uThixo. Ekugqibeleni, inkoliso yenzala kaHagare “owazala” uIshmayeli yaphambuka kwiindlela zikaThixo yaza yamshiya uThixo.

4 UThixo akajongi ukuziphatha komntu

Umzekelo: uTamashe noJudah

Ukuziphatha kukaTamare, umolokazana, noyisezala kwakugqalwa njengesono “sokuhenyuza” ngokwemithetho yenyama, kodwa uThixo akazange acinge ngokuziphatha kukaTamare kuphela UThixo nokholo lwakhe ekuzaleleni indlu kaYuda unyana uThixo wamvakalisa elilungisa udweliswe kumnombo kaYesu. Jonga kwiGenesis 38: 24-26, uMateyu 1: 3 kunye neDuteronomi 22 "Ummiselo wobunyulu"

Umzekelo: uLahabhi noSalmon- Mateyu 1:5

Umzekelo: UDavide noBhatshebha

UDavide ‘wakrexeza waza waboleka ikrele ukuze abulale.’ Emva kokuba uDavide ohlwaywe nguThixo, wazala uSolomon. Kwaye ngenxa yokuba uDavide wayemthanda uThixo ngentliziyo epheleleyo kwaye elandela ukuthanda kukaThixo kuyo yonke into (ekhokelela amaSirayeli ukuba athembele kuThixo), wabizwa ngokuba yindoda yentliziyo kaThixo. Bona iZenzo 13:22 neyesi-2 kaSamuweli 11-12 .

(2) Amadoda nabafazi abangatshatanga

"Amakhwenkwe namantombazana" abhekisela kumadoda nabasetyhini abangatshatanga Abafana namantombazana bathandana kwaye bafuna ukuqala intsapho. Ukuba uneengcinga ezinqwenelekayo nomnye umntu entliziyweni yakho, uyakrexeza.

Njengoko iNkosi uYesu yathi: Ke mna ndithi kuni, Wonke umntu okhangela umntu oyinkazana, ukuba amkhanuke, uselemkrexezile entliziyweni yakhe. Mateyu 5:28

(3) Uqhawulo-mtshato nemiba yomtshato

Ndithi kuni, Othe wamala umfazi wakhe, kungengaluhenyuzo, uyakrexeza; nothe wazeka umfazi owaliweyo, uyakrexeza. ” Mateyu 19:9

[Njengembono kaPawulos]

1 Kwabangazekanga nabangendanga, nakubahlolokazi

Ukuba awukwazi ukuzibamba, ungatshata. Endaweni yokuvutha ngumnqweno, kuya kuba ngcono ukutshata. 1 Korinte 7:9

2 Ukuba indoda yakho ithe yafa, unokutshata kwakhona

Ke kaloku, ukuba indoda idla ubomi, umfazi ubotshiwe ngumthetho; 1 Korinte 7:39

(4) Imicimbi yangaphandle komtshato
"I-Hongxing iphuma eludongeni" ichaza ibhinqa elityatyambile ngokupheleleyo kwaye iminqweno yakhe yesini isebenze ngexesha le-estrus Ibhekisela kumfazi othandana kunye nendoda. Nokuba indoda inobudlelwane obungaphandle komtshato okanye ibhinqa lithandana ngaphandle komtshato, ukuziphatha kwabo kukukrexeza.
(5)Ukuziphatha kakubi
Uhenyuzo nokuhenyuza phakathi kwamadoda nabafazi zizenzo zokukrexeza.
Ngoko ke uThixo wabanikela kwiinkanuko eziziintloni. Abafazi babo bawujikile umsebenzi wabo wasemvelweni, waba ngumsebenzi onxamnye nemvelo; kwaza kwakwanjalo ke nakumadoda abo, akuncamayo ukusebenza kwawo kwasemvelweni, atshiseka ekukhanukelaneni, amadoda esenza izinto eziziintloni kumadoda, efanelwe yiloo nto. ukuziphindezela. Imbekiselo kumaRoma 1:26-27
(6)Ukuphulula amalungu esini

“Ulonwabo lwesono”: Amanye amadoda okanye abafazi bafumana ukwaneliseka ngokwasemzimbeni kunye nolonwabo kwisono ngokuphulula amalungu esini kunye nokuphulula amalungu esini, bazive bezisola, beziva bengento yanto emphefumlweni wabo.

(7)Amaphupha asebusuku (amaphupha amanzi)

"Ukucinga yonke imihla, ukuphupha ubusuku bonke": Umzimba womntu ukhupha amahomoni e-androgen kwaye akhuphe "amadlozi". akazi; kunjalo nakubafazi." Ukuba uphupha ulala nendoda xa ukhulelwe, uyakrexeza.

Levitikus 15:16-24, 22:4; “Indoda ephuma ebusuku” ichazwa njengengahlambulukanga, kukwanjalo nakubafazi.

5 Bonke abazelwe nguThixo abasayi kuze bone;

Umbuzo: Umntu unokukuphepha njani ukukrexeza?

Impendulo: Lowo kufuneka "azalwe ngokutsha" kwaye azalwe nguThixo akasayi kukrexeza.

Umbuzo: Kutheni?

Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

1 Umntu omtsha owenziwe ngokutsha akayiyo eyenyama – bhekisa kumaRoma 8:9
2 Hlalani kuKristu Yesu—Khangela kumaRoma 8:1
3 Sifihlwe noKristu kuThixo—Funda kwabaseKolose 3:3

4 Lowo uzelwe nguThixo unomzimba womoya, ongathabathekiyo nangokwenkanuko yenyama. Bona eyoku- 1 kwabaseKorinte 15:44 noMateyu 22:30 .

【Phawula】

Nabani na ozelwe nguThixo waza wavuswa unomzimba womoya - bhekisa ku-1 kwabaseKorinte 15:44; inkanuko nenkanuko yenyama, kwaye akatshati okanye atshati, kufana nesithunywa sezulu! Umntu ozelwe ngokutsha akayi kona, engayi kukrexeza.

Umzekelo, imiyalelo yemimiselo yenyama:

1 Uze ungabulali

UYesu wathi: “Abantu beli hlabathi bayatshata, bayendiswa; yaye ekubeni bevusiwe, NjengoNyana kaThixo Luka 20:34-36 .

[Phawula:] Abantu abatsha abazalwa ngokutsha baze bavuswe abanakufa kwakhona, njengeengelosi. Ngelo xesha, ngaba kufuneka uthobele umyalelo othi “Uze ungabulali”? ukufa okanye isiqalekiso. Khangela kwiSityhilelo 21:4, 22:3 !

2 Uze ungakrexezi

Umzekelo: Abantu abathanda ukutshaya nabangakuthandiyo ukutshaya abantu abathanda ukutshaya bathengisa inyama yabo esonweni (bona kwabaseRoma 7:14). Intliziyo yabo ilandela Inyama ithanda ukutshaya;

Qaphela: Ngenxa yokuba umntu owenziwe ngokutsha ungumzimba womoya kwaye akasenayo iminqweno emibi kunye neminqweno yenyama, abatshati, abatshati, njengezithunywa zezulu, ngoko ke, nabani na ozelwe ngokutsha, akayi kona, akayi kukrexeza.

Kuba apho kungekho mthetho, akukho sigqitho (bona kwabaseRoma 4:15)

Umntu ozelwe ngokutsha sele ekhululekile kuwo umthetho, kwaye akukho mfuneko yokuba uyigcine imiyalelo (ungakrexezi) kunye nemimiselo yenyama. Ngaba uyakuqonda oku?

3 Uze ungebi

Qaphelani: Abo ke wababizayo ngenxa engaphambili, wabuye wabagwebela; Roma 8:30 . Kule meko, ngaba kusekho ubusela ebukumkanini bukaThixo Ngaba kusafuneka uhlale ngokuthi "Uze ungebi"?

4 Uze ungangqini ubuxoki

Qaphela: Umntu omtsha owenziwe ngokutsha unaye uYise, ilizwi likaKristu entliziyweni yakhe, kwaye uMoya oyiNgcwele uyazihlaziya ukuze enze izinto ezikholisa uYise? Kungokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uyakwazi ukuqonda zonke izinto, ILizwi likaThixo lingaphakathi kwethu, kwaye siyakwazi ukucalula neengcinga neengcinga zentliziyo yethu. Ke ngaba usafuna ukuthobela le migaqo akukho mfuneko, akunjalo?

5 Musa ukubawa

Qaphela: Nina nizelwe nguThixo nonke ningabantwana bakaBawo oseZulwini kwaye nililifa likaBawo oseZulwini. Lowo, gxebe, ungamconganga owakhe uNyana, wesuka wamnikela ngenxa yethu sonke, angathini na ukuba angasibabali ngazo zonke ezo zinto, ndawonye naye? Roma 8:32 . Ngale ndlela, ukuba ninelifa likaYihlo osemazulwini, ningabe nisanqwenela izinto zabanye abantu?

Bazalwane noodade, khumbulani ukuqokelela

ibandla leNkosi uYesu Krestu

articles.title: “Wazi Ekuphela KoThixo Wakho Oyinyaniso”
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade!

Namhlanje sihlolisisa ubudlelwane kwaye sabelane "Ukwazi uThixo Oyinyaniso"

Masivule iBhayibhile kuYohane 17:3, siyityhile size sifunde kunye:

Bubo ke obu ubomi obungunaphakade, ukuba mabakwazi, wena ukuphela koThixo oyinyaniso, naye uYesu Kristu omthumileyo.

1. Mazi uThixo wakho oyinyaniso

Umbuzo: Ngubani igama loThixo oyinyaniso?

Impendulo: NguYehova igama lakhe!

Ngoko okuphela koThixo oyinyaniso, igama Lakhe nguYehova! Amen.

Kanye njengokuba uMoses wathi: Ungubani igama lakho?

Wathi uThixo kuMoses: “Ndinguye.” Kwakhona uThixo wathi kuMoses: “Wòtsho koonyana bakaSirayeli ukuthi, UYehova, uThixo wooyihlo, uThixo ka-Abraham, uThixo kaIsake. , uThixo kaYakobi undithumile kuni, uYehova ligama lam kude kuse ephakadeni, sisikhumbuzo sam eso kwizizukulwana ngezizukulwana

Umbuzo: Wazi okuphela koThixo wakho oyinyaniso, ekubeni ikuphela koThixo oyinyaniso!
Kutheni abantu ehlabathini benqula izithixo ezininzi, oothixo bobuxoki nemimoya? NjengoSakyamuni Buddha, uGuanyin Bodhisattva, uMuhammad, uMazu, uWong Tai Sin, uthixo womnyango ekhaya, uthixo wobutyebi, uthixo oyingcambu yentlalo elalini, uBodhisattva, njl., yaye kukho oothixo abaninzi abangaziwayo?

Impendulo: Kuba ihlabathi alinalwazi yaye alimazi uThixo oyinyaniso.

Njengoko uPawulos watshoyo kwincwadi yeZenzo zabapostile: “Ndithe ke, ndihambahamba, ndazibona izinto enizinqulayo, ndaza ndabona nesibingelelo ekubhalwe kuso umbhalo othi, ‘Ungaziwayo uThixo. Yazi. Dala indalo kunye nazo zonke izinto ezikuyo UThixo, oyiNkosi yezulu nomhlaba, akahlali zitempileni zenziwe ngazandla zabantu, akakhonzwa zizandla zabantu, ngokungathi ebeswele nantoni na; ukuze adale zonke iintlanga zoluntu, ukuba zime elimiweyo liphela; kananjalo wawamisela ngenxa engaphambili amaxesha azo, nemida yeendawo eziya kuhlala kuzo, ukuba ziwufune; UThixo usenokuqondwa, kodwa akakho kude kuye ngamnye wethu; . Mabangacingeli abo bazelweyo ukuba ubuthixo bukaThixo bufana negolide nesilivere nelitye, into eqingqwe ngobungcibi nangengcinga yomntu; UThixo akalali, kungoku uyala ukuba bonke abantu ezindaweni zonke baguquke; kuba umise umhla, aza kuligweba ngawo elimiweyo ngobulungisa, ngendoda ayimisileyo, abanike ithemba bonke abantu ngokumvusa. abafileyo.” IZenzo 17:23-31 .

2 Akukho Thixo ngaphandle koYehova

Umbuzo: Ngaba ukho omnye uthixo ngaphandle koThixo oyinyaniso?

Impendulo: NdinguYehova, akukho thixo wumbi ngaphandle kwam; Nakuba ungandazi, ndiya kukubhinqisa esinqeni sakho (oko kukuthi, ndikubhinqe inyaniso esinqeni sakho, ukuze uyazi inyaniso, ukuze umazi uThixo oyinyaniso).

Ukusuka apho liphuma ilanga liye kutsho ekutshoneni kwalo, mayazi wonke umntu ukuba akukho wumbi ngaphandle kwam. ndinguYehova, akukho wumbi ngaphandle kwam. Isaya 45:5-6

【Okholwayo ku Yehova wosindiswa】

Niya kuzixela, niziveze iingcinga zenu, nibavumele bacebisane phakathi kwabo. Ngubani owayixelayo kwamandulo? Ngubani owayixela kwamandulo? Andinguye na uYehova? Akukho Thixo ingendim; bhekani kum, nonke nina ziphelo zehlabathi, yaye niya kusindiswa; ngokuba ndinguThixo, akukho wumbi. Isaya 45:21-22

3 Okuphela koThixo oyinyaniso unabantu abathathu

(1) Yise, Nyana, Moya oyiNgcwele

Weza uYesu kubo, wathi kubo, Linikwe mna lonke igunya ezulwini nasemhlabeni. Hambani ngoko niye kuzenza abafundi zonke iintlanga, nibabhaptizela egameni loYise, loNyana, loMoya oyiNgcwele. nibabhaptize egameni loYise neloNyana neloMoya oyiNgcwele) nibafundise ukuba bazigcine zonke izinto endiniwisele umthetho ngazo, mna ndinani yonke imihla, kude kube sekuphelisweni kwephakade eli -20

(2) Amagama oYise, oNyana, noMoya oyiNgcwele

Umbuzo: Egameni loYise, loNyana, noMoya oyiNgcwele! Ngaba ligama likaThixo? Okanye isihloko?

Impendulo: "Bawo, Nyana" sisihloko, asilogama! Umzekelo, uyihlo yile nto umbiza ngayo "uBawo" ayilogama likayihlo nguLi XX, Zhang XX, njl Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Umbuzo: Ngoobani igama likaYise, loNyana, neloMoya oyiNgcwele?

Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

1 Igama likaYise: UYehova uYise— Eksodus 3:15
2 Igama loNyana: UYehova uNyana! ULizwi waba yinyama, wabizwa ngokuba nguYesu! Jonga kuMateyu 12:21, uLuka 1:30-31

3 Igama loMoya Oyingcwele: okwabizwa ngokuba nguMthuthuzeli okanye uMthanjiswa—Yohane 14:16, 1 Yohane 2:27

(3) Okuphela koThixo oyinyaniso unabantu abathathu

Umbuzo: Bawo, Nyana, Moya oyiNgcwele! Bangaphi oothixo abanje?

Impendulo: Mnye kuphela uThixo, okuphela koThixo oyinyaniso!

SinoThixo omnye, uYise, eziphuma kuye zonke izinto, esiphuma kuye; 1 Korinte 8:6

Umbuzo: Ngoobani aba bantu bathathu?

Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

1 UMoya oyiNgcwele mnye
Kukho izabelo ngezabelo zezibabalo, kodwa ke ikwanguloo Moya mnye. 1 Korinte 12:4
2 Kodwa inye iNkosi, iNkosi uYesu Kristu!
Kukho iintlobo ngeentlobo zobulungiseleli, kodwa iNkosi inye. 1 Korinte 12:5
3 UThixo mnye

Kukho nezabelo ngezabelo zeentsebenzo, kodwa ke ikwanguloo Thixo mnye uzisebenzayo izinto zonke kubo bonke. 1 Korinte 12:6

Umbuzo: UMoya oyiNgcwele mnye, iNkosi inye, kwaye uThixo mnye! Asingoothixo abathathu aba? Okanye uthixo?

Impendulo: “UThixo” nguThixo, ukuphela koThixo oyinyaniso!

UThixo omnye oyinyaniso unabantu abathathu: uMoya oyiNgcwele omnye, iNkosi enye, noThixo omnye! Amen.

Mnye umzimba, mnye noMoya, njengokuba nabizelwa thembeni linye. Inye iNkosi, lunye ukholo, lunye ubhaptizo; Efese 4:4-6

Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Kulungile, masabelane ngobudlelwane apha namhlanje!

Masithandaze kunye kuThixo: Enkosi Abba Bawo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, kwaye sibulele uMoya oyiNgcwele ngokusivula amehlo ethu omoya ukuze sibone nokuva inyaniso yasemoyeni! Bubo ke obu ubomi obungunaphakade, ukuba mabakwazi, wena ukuphela koThixo oyinyaniso, naye uYesu Kristu omthumileyo. Amen

Ngegama leNkosi uYesu! Amen

IVangeli enikezelwe kumama wam othandekayo.

Mawethu! Khumbula ukuyiqokelela.

Umbhalo weVangeli ovela:

ibandla leNkosi uYesu Krestu

articles.title: “Hambani Ngokomoya” 2
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade!

Namhlanje siyaqhubeka nokuhlola, ukugcwala, kunye nokwabelana!

Isifundo 2: Indlela AmaKristu Asiphatha Ngayo Isono

Masivule iBhayibhile kumaGalati 5:25 kwaye siyifunde kunye: Ukuba siphila ngoMoya, simele sihambe ngaye uMoya.

Buyela kwakhona kumaRoma 8: 13 .

Umbuzo: Yintoni esimele siyenze ngezigqitho zenyama akuyomfuneko ukuba sizikhathaze ngazo?

Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

1 engazibaleli kubo izigqitho zabo (umntu omtsha), koko bephathiswe thina udaba loxolelaniso. — 2 Korinte 5:19
2 Ukuba sidla ubomi ngokoMoya, masihambe nokuhamba kwangokoMoya
3 Zibulaleni izenzo zomzimba ngoMoya oyiNgcwele—Funda kwabaseRoma 8:13
4 Bhubhisani amalungu enu asemhlabeni - funda kwabaseKolose 3:5
5 Thina, sabethelelwa emnqamlezweni noKristu, ayisendim ke odla ubomi;
6 Zibaleleni nina (maxhego) ukuba nifile esonweni—Bona amaRoma 6:11
7 Lowo ubuthiyileyo ubomi bakhe kweli hlabathi, kufuneka abulondolozele ubomi obungunaphakade. Isalathiso malunga ne-12:25

8 Indlela Yokuziphatha Yamakholwa Atsha—Funda kwabase-Efese 4:25-32 .

[ITestamente eNdala] Ke ngoko, kwiTestamente eNdala, kwakukho imithetho nemimiselo, kodwa akukho bani ugwetyelwe ngomthetho phambi koThixo, ngoko ke, uPawulos wathi ukuba uthembela kule mimiselo ukulawula inyama, inkanuko iye akukho mphumo nakancinci--Khangela kwabaseKolose 2:20-23

Umbuzo: Kutheni kungasebenzi?

Impendulo: Kuba wonke umntu osebenza ngomthetho uphantsi kwesiqalekiso... Akukho namnye ugwetyelwayo ngomthetho phambi koThixo.

[iTestamente eNtsha] nani nifile kuwo umthetho ngawo umzimba kaKristu...nikhululwe ke ngoku kuwo umthetho - bhekisa kumaRoma 7:4,6! Ngoku uzelwe ngokutsha ngamaKristu anobukho boMoya oyiNgcwele Ukuba siphila ngoMoya oyiNgcwele, kufuneka sihambe ngoMoya oyiNgcwele - bona kumaGalati 5:25. Oko kukuthi, sifanele sithembele kuMoya oyiNgcwele ukuba abulale zonke izenzo ezingendawo zeminqweno yenyama, athiye ubomi besono (umntu omdala), kwaye alondoloze (umntu omtsha) ebomini obungunaphakade! (Umntu omtsha) NgoMoya oyiNgcwele velisa: uthando, uvuyo, uxolo, ukuzeka kade umsindo, ububele, ukulunga, intembeko, ubulali, ukuzeyisa! Galati 5:22-23 . Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

9 Beka ubutyebi ngesitya sodongwe

Obu butyebi sibuphethe ngezitya zodongwe, ukubonisa ukuba la mandla makhulu, aphuma kuThixo, angaphumi kuthi. 2 Korinte 4:7

Umbuzo: Yintoni baby?

Impendulo: "Ubutyebi" nguMoya oyiNgcwele wenyaniso - bhekisa kuYohane 15:26-27

Umbuzo: Yintoni isitya sodongwe?

Impendulo: "Isitya sodongwe" kuthetha ukuba uThixo ufuna ukukusebenzisa njengesitya esixabisekileyo - bhekisa kweyesi-2 kuTimoti 2:20-21 .

Umbuzo: Kutheni ngamanye amaxesha sisilela ukubonisa amandla kaMoya oyiNgcwele?

Ezinje: ukuphilisa izifo, ukukhupha iidemon, ukwenza imimangaliso, ukuthetha ngeelwimi ... njalo njalo!

Impendulo: La mandla makhulu avela kuThixo, hayi kuthi.

Ngokomzekelo: Xa amaKristu eqala ukukholelwa kuYesu, ayeza kubona imibono namaphupha amaninzi, yaye kwakuza kwenzeka izinto ezininzi ezimangalisayo eziwangqongileyo. Kodwa ngoku ngokuthe ngcembe ibonakala kancinane kancinane okanye ide ithi shwaka Isizathu sikukuba emva kokuba sikholelwe kuYesu, iintliziyo zethu zalandela inyama, zanyamekela izinto zenyama, yaye lalizaliswe ngameva, yaye asizange sikwazi ukubonakalisa amandla oMoya oyiNgcwele.

10 Ukufa kuyasebenza kuthi ukutyhila ubomi bukaYesu

Sihlala sikuthwele kunye nathi ukufa kukaYesu ukuze ubomi bukaYesu bubonakale kuthi. ...Ngoko ke kusebenza ukufa kuthi, ke kuni kusebenza ubomi. 2 Korinte 4:10, 12

Umbuzo: Yintoni ukuqalisa ukufa?

Impendulo: Ukufa kukaYesu kuyasebenza kuthi! Ukuba simanywe naye ngemfano yokufa kwakhe, siya kumanyaniswa naye ngemfano yokuvuka kwakhe – Bona kwabaseRoma 6:5 ukumanyana naye ngokufana nokufa kuthetha ukuba ukufa kusebenza kuthi kwaye sihlala sithwele umoya kaYesu kunye nathi. Thabatha umnqamlezo wakho kwaye ube yindlela yeNkosi. 35 Ukuba unobomi bukaYesu, ungatyhila ubomi bukaYesu. Ubomi boMoya oyiNgcwele bungqina ubomi bukaYesu!

“Ngaphambi kwaloo mini” wonk’ ubani umele afe kube kanye, yaye wonk’ ubani osehlabathini uya kufumana “ukuzalwa, ukwaluphala, ukugula nokufa” ngokwasemzimbeni, kwanokufa ngenxa yezinye izinto; umzimba wenyama "ukuzalwa, ukwaluphala". Ukugula. Ukufa ", singasathethi ke ngokungcungcuthekiswa "sisifo" kunye nokubulawa ziintlungu zomzimba, ukufela esibhedlele, okanye ukufela ebhedini esibhedlele; Kufuneka sithandaze kwiNkosi uYesu ukuba ibangele ukufa kwaKhe kusebenze ebuntwini bethu obudala. Mhlawumbi xa sele ukhulile, owona mnqweno ulungileyo kukufa ngokwasemzimbeni ebuthongweni bakho okanye ukufa ngokwemvelo nangoxolo ebuthongweni bakho.

11 Umntu omdala ngokuthe ngcembe uba mbi, yaye umntu omtsha ngokuthe ngcembe uyakhula

Ngoko ke, asityhafi. Nangona umzimba wangaphandle uya kutshatyalaliswa, kodwa yena wangaphakathi uyahlaziyeka imihla ngemihla. 2 Korinte 4:16

Phawula:

(Indoda endala) “Umzimba wangaphandle” ngumzimba obonakalayo ovela ngaphandle nangona utshatyalaliswa, ngokuthe ngcembe inyama yale ndoda endala iba mbi ngenxa yenkohliso yenkanuko – bhekisela kumaEfese 4:22 .

(Umntu Omtsha) Oko kuvuswa kunye noKristu ngumzimba womoya - bhekisa ku-1 kwabaseKorinte 15:44 ubomi bakho bufihlwe noKristu kuThixo - bhekisa kumaKolose 3: 3 ngokoko kum (isicatshulwa sokuqala: "umntu " ") - Imbekiselo kwabaseRoma 7:22 .

→→Ongabonakaliyo (umntu omtsha) ozelwe nguThixo, odityaniswe noKristu, ngokuthe ngcembe ukhulela ebudodeni, ezalisekisa inkamo yobukhulu bukaKristu - bhekisela kumaEfese 4:12-13

Ngoko ke, asityhafi. Nangona umzimba wangaphandle (inyama yomntu omdala) utshatyalaliswa, umzimba wangaphakathi (umntu ozelwe ngokutsha) uhlaziywa imihla ngemihla kwaye "ukhula ube yindoda." Iimbandezelo zethu zokwexeshana nezincinane (ukuzihluba iintlungu zendoda endala) ziya kusiphumelelisa (umntu omtsha) ubunzima obungenakulinganiswa naphakade bozuko. Kuvela ukuba asikukhathaleli oko sikubonayo (umntu omdala), kodwa sikhathalele into esingayiboniyo (umntu omtsha); yabona (umntu omtsha) ungunaphakade. Bhekisela kweyesi- 2 kwabaseKorinte 4:16-18 .

12 UKristu uyavela, abonakale umntu omtsha, angene ebomini obungunaphakade

Xa athe wabonakalaliswa uKristu, obubomi bethu, nani niya kubonakala, ninaye ebuqaqawulini. Kolose 3:4

1 Bazalwana abaziintanda, ngoku singabantwana bakaThixo. Akukabonakali ke into esiya kuba yiyo kwixesha elizayo; ke siyazi ukuba, yakubonakala iNkosi, sofana nayo; eyoku-1 kaYohane 3:2
2 Ke bona abalele ukufa bekuKristu, uThixo wobazisa kunye noYesu; kuba (1 Tesalonika 4:13-14)
3 Kwabo badla ubomi, basahleliyo, ngephanyazo nje, ngephanyazo, inyama enokonakala iyaguqulwa ibe kumzimba womoya ongenakonakala.
4 Umzimba othobekileyo wenziwa kumila kumbi ukuze ufane nowakhe umzimba wozuko—Funda kwabaseFilipi 3:21 .
5 Uya kuxwilelwa emafini kunye nabo ukuya kuyikhawulela iNkosi esibhakabhakeni – thelekisa eyoku-1 kwabaseTesalonika 4:17
6 Xa athe wabonakalaliswa uKristu, siya kubonakala naye ebuqaqawulini, kwabaseKolose 3:4
7 Wanga ke uThixo woxolo anganingcwalisa niphelelisekile; uthi, ugqibelele owenu umoya nomphefumlo nomzimba, ugcinwe ngokungenakusoleka ekufikeni kweNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu. Uthembekile onibizayo, oya kukwenza oko. Imbekiselo kweyoku-1 kwabaseTesalonika 5:23-24

IVangeli enikezelwe kumama wam othandekayo

Umbhalo weVangeli ovela:
ibandla leNkosi uYesu Krestu
Aba ngabantu abangcwele abahlala bodwa, ababalelwa phakathi kwezizwe.
Njenge-144,000 yeentombi ezinyulu ezilandela iNkosi iMvana.
Amen!
→→Ndimbona esencotsheni nasendulini;
Aba ngabantu abahlala bodwa, ababalelwa ezizweni zonke.
INumeri 23:9
Ngabasebenzi beNkosi uYesu Krestu: UMzalwana uWang*Yun, uDade uLiu, uDade uZheng, uMzalwana uCen... kunye nabanye abasebenzi abawuxhasa ngenzondelelo umsebenzi wevangeli ngokunikela ngemali nokusebenza nzima, kunye nabanye abangcwele abasebenza nathi. abo bakholwayo kwezi ndaba zilungileyo, Amagama abo abhaliwe encwadini yobomi. Amen!
Imbekiselo kwabaseFilipi 4:3

articles.title: “Hambani Ngokomoya” 1
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade!

Namhlanje siza kuhlolisisa ukwabelana ngezithuthi kunye

Isifundo 1: Indlela AmaKristu Asiphatha Ngayo Isono

Makhe sityhile kwabaseRoma 6:11 eBhayibhileni yethu size siyifunde kunye: Ngokunjalo nani zibaleleni ekubeni ningabafileyo kwisono, kodwa niphilele uThixo ngoKristu Yesu.

1. Kutheni abantu besifa?

Umbuzo: Kutheni abantu besifa?
Impendulo: Abantu bafa ngenxa "yesono".

Kuba umvuzo wesono kukufa; ke sona isipho sikaThixo bubomi obungunaphakade, kuKristu Yesu iNkosi yethu. Roma 6:23

Umbuzo: Sivela phi “isono” sethu?
Impendulo: Iphuma kukhokho wokuqala uAdam.

Kanye njengokuba isono sangena ngamntu mnye ehlabathini, kwaza kwangena ukufa ngaso isono, ngokunjalo ukufa kwabafikela bonke abantu ngenxa yokuba bonke bonayo. Roma 5:12

2. Inkcazo yegama elithi "ulwaphulo-mthetho"

(1) isono

Umbuzo: Yintoni isono?
Impendulo: Ukwaphula umthetho kusisono.

Othe wona waphula umthetho, usisono; eyoku-1 kaYohane 3:4

(2) Izono ezisingisa ekufeni, nezono (hayi) ezisingisa ekufeni

Ukuba umntu uthe wambona umzalwana wakhe esenza isono esingasingisi kufeni, makamthandazele, yaye uThixo womnika ubomi; Yonke intswela-bulungisa sisono, yaye kukho izono ezingasingisi kufeni. eyoku- 1 kaYohane 5:16-17

Umbuzo: Siyintoni isono esikhokelela ekufeni?

Impendulo: UThixo wenza umnqophiso nomntu!

thanda:

1 Isono sika-Adam sokwaphulwa kwesivumelwano kuMyezo wase-Eden—Khangela kwiGenesis 2:17.
2 UThixo wenza umnqophiso namaSirayeli (ukuba nabani na uthe wawaphula umnqophiso, woba sisono)— funda iEksodus 20:1-17 .

3 Isono sokungakholelwa kwiTestamente eNtsha --Khangela kuLuka 22:19-20 nakuYohane 3:16-18.

Umbuzo: Siyintoni isono “esingasiyo” ekufeni?

Impendulo: Zizikreqo zenyama!

Umbuzo: Kutheni le nto ukunxaxha kwenyama (kungekhona) kukhokelela ekufeni?

Impendulo: Kuba sele ufile - bhekisa kwabaseKolose 3:3;

Inyama yethu endala yabethelelwa emnqamlezweni kunye noKrestu kunye neminqweno neenkanuko zayo - bhekisa kuGal 5:24 umzimba wesono watshatyalaliswa ukuze singabi saba ngamakhoboka esono - bhekisa kumaRoma 6:6;

Ukuba uMoya kaThixo uhleli kuwe, aningowenyama – bona kwabaseRoma 8:9;

Ayisendim ke odla ubomi, nguKristu ke oselesidla ubomi kum.

UThixo kunye nathi【iTestamente eNtsha】

Wathi, Andisayi kuba sazikhumbula izono zabo, nezikreqo zabo. Ekubeni ke zixolelwe ezi zono, akusekho mbingelelo wesono. (Hebhere 10:17-18) Ngaba uyakuqonda oku?

3. Baleka ekufeni

Umbuzo: Umntu usinda njani ekufeni?

Impendulo: Kuba umvuzo wesono kukufa - jonga kwabaseRoma 6:23

Ukuba ke nifuna ukukhululwa ekufeni, yibani ngabakhululekileyo kuso isono; ukuba nifuna ukukhululwa esonweni, manikhululeke kuwo umthetho.

Yifa! Aphi amandla akho okoyisa?
Yifa! Luphi ulwamvila lwakho?

Ulwamvila lokufa sisono, amandla esono ngumthetho. 1 Korinte 15:55-56

4. Baleka kumandla omthetho

Umbuzo: Ubaleka njani kumandla omthetho?

Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

1 Ndikhululekile kuwo umthetho

Ngokunjalo, bazalwana bam, nani nafa kuwo umthetho ngawo umzimba kaKristu, ukuze nibe ngabanye, kulowo ke wavuswa kwabafileyo, ukuze sixakathe isiqhamo kuThixo thina. ... Ke ekubeni safayo nje kuwo umthetho owawusibophelela, ngoku sikhululekile kuwo umthetho, ukuze siyikhonze iNkosi ngokobutsha bomoya (umoya: okanye ukuguqulelwa njengoMoya oyiNgcwele) kungekhona ngokwendlela yakudala. yomsitho. Roma 7:4, 6

2 Ukukhululeka kwisiqalekiso soMthetho

UKristu wasikhulula esiqalekisweni somthetho, ngokuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Uqalekisiwe wonke umntu oxhonywe emthini

3 Ukukhululwa kumthetho wesono nokufa

Ngoku akukho kugwetywa kwabakuKristu Yesu. Kaloku ngokumanywa kwam noKrestu Yesu, uMoya umniki-bomi undikhulule ekulawulweni sisono nakukufa. Roma 8:1-2

5. Ukuzalwa ngokutsha

Umbuzo: Yintoni oyikholelwayo ekuzalweni ngokutsha?

Impendulo: (Kholwa) ivangeli iyazalwa ngokutsha!

Umbuzo: Yintoni ivangeli?

Impendulo: Endikunikeleyo nam kukuba: Okokuqala, kukuba uKristu wazifela izono zethu ngokweZibhalo, wangcwatywa, waza wavuswa ngomhla wesithathu, ngokutsho kweyoku-1 kwabaseKorinte 15:3. 4

Umbuzo: Ukuvuswa kukaYesu kwasizala njani?

Impendulo: Makabongwe uThixo, uYise weNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Ngokwenceba yakhe enkulu, usinike ukuzalwa ngokutsha ukuze sibe nethemba eliphilileyo ngokuvuka kukaYesu Kristu kwabafileyo, singene kwilifa elingenakonakala, elingenakudyobheka, nelingambatshiyo, eligcinelwe nina emazulwini. Nina ke nigcinwe ngamandla kaThixo ngokholo, niya kulufumana usindiso olulungiselwe ukutyhilwa ngexesha lokugqibela. 1 Petros 1:3-5

Umbuzo: Sizalwa njani ngokutsha?

Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

1 Uzelwe ngamanzi nanguMoya—Funda uYohane 3:5-8
2 Uzalwe kwinyaniso yevangeli-jonga ku-1 kwabaseKorinte 4:15;

3 Uzelwe nguThixo—bhekisela kuYohane 1:12-13;

6. Yahlukana nexhego nokuziphatha kwalo

Umbuzo: Indlela yokulahla umntu omdala kunye nokuziphatha kwakhe?

Impendulo: Kuba, xa similiselwe kuye ngemfano yokufa kwakhe, somiliselwa nasekufeni ngemfano yakhe, sisazi ukuba umntu wethu omdala wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni kunye naye, ukuze umzimba wesono uphuthiswe; ukuze singabi sasebenza isono Mkhonzi;

Qaphela: Safa, sangcwatywa, savuswa kwabafileyo kunye noKristu! Imbekiselo kwabaseKolose 3:9

7 Umntu omtsha (asingowakhe) umntu omdala

Umbuzo: Yintoni indoda endala?

Impendulo: Yonke inyama ephuma kwiingcambu zenyama ka-Adam yeyendoda endala.

Umbuzo: Yintoni umntu omtsha?

Impendulo: Onke amalungu azelwe kuAdam wokugqibela (uYesu) angabantu abatsha!

1 Uzelwe ngamanzi nanguMoya—Funda uYohane 3:5-8
2 Uzalwe kwinyaniso yevangeli-jonga ku-1 kwabaseKorinte 4:15;

3 Uzelwe nguThixo—bhekisela kuYohane 1:12-13;

Umbuzo: Kutheni le nto umntu omtsha (engenguye owe) kwindoda endala?

Impendulo: Ukuba uMoya kaThixo (oko kukuthi uMoya oyiNgcwele, uMoya kaYesu, uMoya kaYise waseZulwini) uhleli kuwe, awusengowasenyameni (indoda endala ka-Adam), kodwa (umntu omtsha) ongokaMoya oyiNgcwele (oko kukuthi, okaMoya oyiNgcwele, kodwa okaKristu ngokaThixo uYise). Ukuba umntu akanaye uMoya kaKristu, akangokaKristu lowo. Jonga kwabaseRoma 8:9?

8 UMoya oyiNgcwele nenyama

1 umzimba

Umbuzo: Ngokabani umzimba?

Impendulo: Inyama yeyomntu omdala kwaye ithengiswe esonweni.

Siyazi ke ukuba umthetho ungowoMoya; ke mna ndingowenyama; kuthengiswe ngaye isono. Roma 7:14

2 Umoya Oyingcwele

Umbuzo: Uvela phi uMoya oyiNgcwele?
Impendulo: Evela kuThixo uBawo!

Kodwa xa kufika uMthetheleli, endiya kumthuma kuBawo, uMoya wenyaniso, ophuma kuBawo, wongqina ngam. Yohane 15:26

3 Ukulwa phakathi koMoya oyiNgcwele kunye nenkanuko yenyama

Kuba inyama ikhanuka ngokuchasene noMoya, uMoya ke ukhanuka ngokuchasene nenyama; ezo zinto zombini ziphambene, ukuze ningazenzi izinto enisukuba nizithanda. Galati 5:17

Umbuzo: Ziziphi iinkanuko zenyama yendoda endala?
Impendulo: Iyabonakala ke yona imisebenzi yenyama: ukukrexeza, ukungcola, uburheletya, ukubusa izithixo, ukukhafula, intiyo, iinkani, amakhwele, imisindo, amayelenqe, izahlukano, amayelenqe, nomona, ukunxila, iindywala, njl. Sendinixelele kade, nangoku, ndithi kuni, Abazenzayo izinto ezinjalo abayi kubudla ilifa ubukumkani bukaThixo. Galati 5:19-21

4 Umntu omtsha uyayoliswa ngumthetho kaThixo;

Ngenxa yokuba ngokwentsingiselo yangaphakathi (imibhalo yantlandlolo ngumntu) (oko kukuthi, umntu omtsha), (umntu omtsha), ndiyawuthanda umthetho kaThixo; unomthetho entliziyweni yam, undithimbe, ndihambelane nomthetho wesono emalungwini am. Ndilusizi kakhulu! Ngubani na oya kundihlangula kulo mzimba wokufa? Ndiyambulela uThixo kuba sinako ukusinda ngayo iNkosi yethu uYesu Krestu. Ngale ndlela, ndithobela umthetho kaThixo ngentliziyo yam (umntu omtsha), kodwa inyama yam (indoda endala) ithobela umthetho wesono. Roma 7:22-25

Umbuzo: Uyintoni umthetho kaThixo?

Impendulo: "Umthetho kaThixo" ngumthetho kaMoya oyiNgcwele, umthetho wokukhululwa, kunye nesiqhamo soMoya oyiNgcwele - bhekisa kwabaseRoma 8: 2 - bhekisa kuGal 6: 2; yothando - bhekisa kumaRoma 13:10, uMateyu 22:37-40 kunye neyoku-1 kaYohane 4:16;

Nabani na ozelwe nguThixo akoni – bhekisa ku-1 kaYohane 3:9 “umthetho kaThixo” ngumthetho wothando. Ngale ndlela, ukungoni → ngumthetho kaThixo Nabani na ozelwe nguThixo akasayi kwaphula umthetho nesono. Uyaqonda?

(Ukuba kukho ubukho boMoya oyiNgcwele, amakholwa azelwe ngokutsha aya kuqonda ngoko nangoko akuba evile, kuba kamsinya nje akuba etyhiliwe amazwi kaThixo, aya kukhupha ukukhanya aze enze izidenge ziqonde. Kungenjalo, abanye abantu abayi kuqonda kwanokuba baqonda ukuba abo baphila ngokuvisisana nemithetho kaThixo baya kuqonda. imilebe yomile Ngaba oku kuyinyaniso nakwabanye “abafundisi okanye abavangeli basemazweni” Intliziyo yabo ityebile, iindlebe zabo zinzima, amehlo abo ababoni, neendlebe zabo azifuni ukuva. isono,” iba lukhuni intliziyo yabo, baqaqadeke, baqaqadeke.

Umbuzo: Uyintoni umthetho wesono?

Impendulo: Lowo waphula umthetho kwaye enze izinto ezingalunganga → Lowo waphula umthetho kwaye enze isono ngumthetho wesono. Imbekiselo kuYohane 13:4

Umbuzo: Uyintoni umthetho wokufa?

Impendulo: Ingcaciso eneenkcukacha ngezantsi - kwabaseRoma 8:2

#. .Mhla uthe wadla kuwo uya kufa ngokuqinisekileyo.”— Genesis 2:17
# .. Kuba umvuzo wesono kukufa - Roma 6:23
# ..Ukuba anikholwa ukuba uYesu unguye uKristu, niya kufela ezonweni zenu - Yohane 8:24
# ..Ukuba anithanga niguquke, niya kutshabalala kwangokunjalo nonke!— Luka 13:5

Ngoko ke, ukuba awuguquki → ungakholelwa ukuba uYesu unguKristu, musani ukukholelwa kwiindaba ezilungileyo, kwaye ningakholelwa "kwiTestamente Entsha" nonke niya kutshabalala → lo "ngumthetho wokufa". Uyaqonda?

4 Izono Zenyama Yomntu Omdala

Umbuzo: Inyama yendoda endala yayithobela umthetho wesono, ngaba kufuneka ivume izono zayo?

Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

[UYohane wathi:] Ukuba sithi (umntu omdala) asinasono, siyazikhohlisa, inyaniso ayikho kuthi. Ukuba sithi sizivume izono zethu, uThixo uthembekile, ulilungisa, yaye uya kusixolela izono zethu, asihlambulule kuko konke ukungalungisi. Ukuba sithi asonanga, simgqala uThixo njengexoki, yaye ilizwi lakhe alikho kuthi. eyoku- 1 kaYohane 1:8-10

[UPawulos wathi: ] Kuba siyazi ukuba umntu wethu omdala wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni kunye naye, ukuze umzimba wesono uphuthiswe, ukuze thina (umntu omtsha) singabi sakhonza isono. KwabaseRoma 6:6 , kubonakala ngathi thina (umntu omtsha) asinatyala kuyo inyama; Roma 8:12

[UYohane wathi] Bonke abazelwe nguThixo aboni, ngokuba ilizwi likaThixo lihleli kuye; eyoku-1 kaYohane 3:9

【Phawula:】

Abantu abaninzi ngempazamo bacinga ukuba ezi ziqendwana zibini kweyoku-1 kaYohane 1:8-10 nesesi-3:9 ziyaphikisana.

“Owangaphambili” ngowabo bangazalwanga ngokutsha nabangazange bakholelwe kuYesu, ngoxa “owokugqibela” ngowabo bakholelwa kuYesu baza bazalwa ngokutsha (abantu abatsha); omnye” ngowabo bakholwayo kuYesu Izizwe ezilishumi elinesibini zakwaSirayeli zazihlala ku-1:1.

Yaye uPawulos wayewazi kakuhle umthetho waza wathi, “Oko kwaba yinzuzo ekuqaleni, kwaba yilahleko ngenxa kaKristu; funda kwabaseFilipi 3:5-7; nguThixo ukuya kwizulu lesithathu, “iparadesi kaThixo.”—Funda eyesi-2 kwabaseKorinte 12:1-4 .

kwaza kuphela iincwadi ezibhalwe nguPawulos, ezithi: 1 Ukuba uMoya kaThixo uhleli kuni, anikho enyameni. 2 UMoya oyiNgcwele ukhanuka ngokuchasene nenyama. 4 Inyama negazi azinako ukubuthwala ubukumkani bukaThixo, 5 NeNkosi uYesu yathi nenyama ayincedi lutho.

Ngokuba umntu owenziwe ngokutsha uyawuthobela umthetho kaThixo, angoni, ekubeni inyama (umntu omdala) ithengiswe esonweni, uthobela umthetho wesono. Ukuba uMoya kaThixo uhleli kuni, aningabo abenyama – bhekisa kumaRoma 8:9 oko kukuthi, (umntu omtsha) asingowasenyameni (umntu omdala), kwaye (umntu omtsha) wenza singabi natyala enyameni (oko kukuthi, ityala lesono), ukuthobela Inyama iyaphila - bona kwabaseRoma 8:12.

Ngaloo ndlela ke, umntu omtsha owenziwe ngokutsha “akasazivumi” izono zenyama yomntu omdala. abaphula umthetho baze benze izono banetyala "lesono" uya kucela igazi elinqabileyo leNkosi "izihlandlo ezininzi" ukuba licinywe kwaye lihlambulule izono zakho. Umnqophiso ongcwalisayo ‘njengowesiqhelo’ yaye udelela uMoya Oyingcwele wobabalo.”— Hebhere 10:29, 14; Ngoko ke, amaKristu akafanele abe zizidenge, yaye akafanele awenze buhlungu uMoya Oyingcwele kaThixo ngokukhethekileyo afanele alumke, alumke yaye aqonde imibandela ephathelele ‘umnqophiso wobomi nokufa.

Umbuzo: Ndiyakholwa ukuba ixhego lam labethelelwa emnqamlezweni kunye noKristu umzimba wesono ayisendim lo uphilayo ngoku enyameni ndisenako ukuhamba, ukusebenza, ukutya , nisele, nilale, nitshate nibe nomntwana! Kuthekani ngenyama entsha? 7:14) , ukuphila enyameni kusathanda ukuthobela umthetho wesono nokwaphula umthetho nokwenza izono. Kule meko, yintoni esifanele siyenze ngezikreqo zenyama yethu endala yabantu Ngaba asifanele sizibethe ngoyaba?

Impendulo: Ndiza kuyicacisa ngokubanzi kwintetho yesibini...

Umbhalo weVangeli:
Basebenzi bakaYesu Krestu UMzalwana uWang*Yun, uDade uLiu, uDade uZheng, uMzalwana uCen... kunye nabanye abasebenzi bayaxhasa, bancede, kwaye basebenze kunye kumsebenzi wevangeli kaKristu! Kwaye abo bakholwayo le vangeli, bashumayela kwaye babelane ngokholo, amagama abo abhalwe encwadini yobomi! Amen Reference Filipi 4:1-3

Bazalwane noodade Khumbulani ukuqokelela

articles.title: Yambathani isikrweqe somoya 1
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo, mawethu!

Masikhangele, sinxulumane, kwaye sabelane kunye namhlanje! Kwabase-Efese beBhayibhile:

Intshayelelo yesibhalo!

iintsikelelo zokomoya

1: Fumana ubuntwana

Makabongwe uThixo, uYise weNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Wasisikelela ngeentsikelelo zonke zoMoya kwezasezulwini iindawo, sikuKristu; senziwe oonyana ngoYesu Kristu, ngokokuthanda kwakhe ( Efese 1:3-5 )

2: Ubabalo lukaThixo

Sinentlawulelo ngegazi lalo Nyana oyintanda, uxolelo lwezono zethu, ngokobutyebi bobabalo lwakhe. Sibabalwe nguThixo ngokugqithileyo, kubo bonke ubulumko nokuqonda; Izinto zasezulwini ngokwecebo lakhe, yonke into emhlabeni imanyene kuKristu. 17Kuye nathi sanelifa, samiselwa ngenxa engaphambili ngokwengqibo yalowo uzifezayo zonke izinto ngokwecebo lokuthanda kwakhe, ukuze ngathi thina baqalayo kuKristu, samkele uzuko lwakhe uya kunconywa. ( Efese 1:7-12 )

Eyesithathu: Ukutywinwa nguMoya oyiNgcwele othenjisiweyo

Natywinwa kuye, natywinwa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele wedinga, ekusekweni kwenu, nakholwayo nakuye, nakuva ilizwi lenyaniso, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwenu. Lo Moya oyiNgcwele usisibambiso (isicatshulwa sokuqala: ilifa) selifa lethu bade abantu bakaThixo (isicatshulwa sokuqala: ilifa) bakhululwe ukuze kudunyiswe uzuko lwakhe. ( Efese 1:13-14 )

Okwesine: Yifa noKristu, uvuse noKristu, ube sezulwini kunye naye


Nani nifile nje ziziphoso nazizono zenu, wanenza naphila. enahamba kuzo ngokwenkqubo yeli hlabathi, nimlulamela umphathi wegunya lesibhakabhaka, lomoya lo usebenzayo ngoku kubo abangevayo; Thina sonke sasiphakathi kwabo, siqhuba iinkanuko zenyama, silandela iinkanuko zenyama nezentliziyo; Noko ke, uThixo osisityebi ngenceba nosithanda ngothando olukhulu, usidlisa ubomi kunye noKristu, nangona sasifile ziziphoso. Nisindiswe ngokubabalwa. Wasivusa kananjalo, wasihlalisa kunye nathi kwezasemazulwini iindawo, sikuKristu Yesu (Kwabase-Efese 2:1-6).

Eyesihlanu: Xhobani isikrweqe esisinikwe nguThixo

Ndinawo amazwi okugqibela: Yomelelani eNkosini nasemandleni ayo. Xhobani sonke isikrweqe sikaThixo, ukuze nibe nako ukumisa nibuchase ubuqhinga boMtyholi. Ngokuba umzamo wethu asingowokuzamana negazi nenyama; ngowokuzamana nazo izilawuli, nawo amagunya, nazo iziphatha-hlabathi zobumnyama balo eli phakade, nayo imimoya ekhohlakeleyo kwezasezulwini iindawo. Ngoko ke, qubulani sonke isikrweqe sikaThixo, ukuze nibe nako ukuchasa utshaba ngemini yembandezelo, nithi nikufezile konke, nime nimi. Ngoko ke yimani niqinile, nibhinqe inyaniso esinqeni senu, ninxibe isigcina-sifuba sobulungisa esinqeni, ninxibe ezinyaweni zenu iimbadada zeendaba ezilungileyo zoxolo. Ke ngoko, qubulani ukholo lwekhaka, enothi ngalo nicime zonke iintolo ezinomlilo zongendawo; ngako konke ukukhunga, nokukhunga, nithandaza ngamaxesha onke nikuye uMoya; ndivakalise iimfihlelo zeendaba ezilungileyo ezi, mna ndisisigidimi esisezintanjeni ngenxa yemfihlelo yezi ndaba zilungileyo; ( Efese 6:10-20 )

Isithandathu: Mdumiseni uThixo ngeengoma zomoya

Thethani omnye komnye ngeendumiso, neengoma, nezango ezizezomoya, nivuma, nibulela kuYehova ngentliziyo yenu, nangomlomo wenu. Hlalani nibulela kuye uThixo uYise ngezinto zonke, egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu. Sifanele sizithobe omnye komnye ngenxa yokuhlonela uKristu.
( Efese 5:19-21 )

Isixhenxe: Khanyisa amehlo entliziyo yakho

Thandazani eNkosini yethu uYesu Kristu UThixo, uYise wozuko, uninike uMoya wobulumko nokusityhilela ekumazini yena, akhanyiselwe amehlo entliziyo yenu, ukuze nilazi ithemba lobizo lwakhe, nethemba lobizo lwakhe ngosindiso. Bangcwele obunjani bona ubutyebi bozuko lwelifa, nokuba kungakanani na ukuncamisa kwamandla akhe kuthi bakholwayo, ngokokomelela okukhulu awakwenzayo ngoKristu, ekumvuseni kwabafileyo, nokumhlalisa kwezasezulwini iindawo? ubeka isandla sakhe sasekunene, (Efese 1:17-20)

Imibhalo-ngqangi yeVangeli

Mawethu!

Khumbula ukuqokelela

ibandla leNkosi uYesu Krestu
