articles.title: Umzekeliso woMkhiwane
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade!
Namhlanje sijonge ukwabelana ngobudlelwane: Umzekeliso woMkhiwane

Waza wenza umzekeliso: Ubani wayenomkhiwane, utyelwe esidiliyeni sakhe, weza emthini, efuna isiqhamo, akafumana nto. Wathi ke kumgcini-myezo, Uyabona, ndiza kulo mkhiwane Umthi kule minyaka mithathu idlulileyo ndikhangela iziqhamo, kodwa andizifumani, kuba ziwuhlutha ilize umhlaba!” Wathi umgcini-myezo, “Nkosi, wugcine kulo nyaka ndide ndiwugrumbe. Ukuba uthe wavelisa isiqhamo kamva, woba nguwo lowo, okanye ndobuya ndiwugawule.

Luka 13:6-9

Amanqaku eSikweko:

Ngoko wasebenzisa umzekeliso ukuze athi: “Umntu wayenomkhiwane (“umkhiwane” ufuzisela amaSirayeli) utyalwe esidiliyeni (uBawo Osezulwini ungumlimi - bhekisela kuYohane 15:1) Yena (ebhekisela kuBawo Osezulwini). weza Wafuna isiqhamo phambi komthi, akasifumana.

Waza wathi kumgcini-myezo (uYesu), Uyabona, kwiminyaka emithathu edluleyo, uYesu, owayethunywe nguThixo, wazalwa, washumayela iindaba ezilungileyo zobukumkani bamazulu kumaSirayeli, wenza ukuba abantu bakholwe ukuba uYesu unguye. UNyana kaThixo noKrestu unguMesiya noMsindisi! Wafa ngenxa yaboni Uvuswa waza wanyukela ezulwini → "Abo bakholwayo kuYesu" → bazalwa ngokutsha, basindisiwe, banobomi obungunaphakade, kwaye bathwala iziqhamo zokuqala zokomoya) beza kulo mkhiwane ukukhangela isiqhamo, kodwa abakwazanga ukusifumana (ngenxa yokuba . UYesu wavuswa kwabafileyo) Njengentlahlela, kwaye amaSirayeli awakholelwa kuYesu, awazalwa ngokutsha → abanako ukuthwala isiqhamo somoya). Yigawuleni, yini na ukuba nilidle ilifa ilizwe!

‘Igosa lomyezo (oko kukuthi, uNyana woMntu uYesu) lithe, ‘Nkosi, wugcine kulo nyaka, ndide ndimbe umhlaba ondijikelezileyo (efanekisela ubukumkani bakwaSirayeli → “ngaphandle”) (ebhekisela ekusasazeni umhlaba.” ivangeli kwiiNtlanga) kwaye ungeze ubulongwe (Ufuzisela ukwanda kwenani losindiso lweentlanga kunye nokukhula okuphuphumayo kobomi bomzimba kaKristu) → Ukusuka kwingcambu kaYese (umbhalo wokuqala yindunduma) uya isebe eliphuma ezingcanjini zalo liya kuthwala isiqhamo.

Isaya 11:1

(AmaSirayeli “abona” iiNtlanga zikholelwa kuYesu: ukuzalwa ngokutsha, usindiso, ukubuya kukaYesu Kristu ekupheleni kosuku, ukukhululwa kwemizimba yeeNtlanga, nentlahlela; ekugqibeleni amaSirayeli angena “kwiMileniyam” Emva kwewaka leminyaka, onke amaSirayeli enene akholwa ukuba uYesu unguKrestu noMsindisi, ngoko ke usapho lonke lukaSirayeli lwasindiswa – bhekisa kumaRoma 11:25-26 nakwisiTyhilelo isahluko 20.

Ukuba uvelisa isiqhamo kwixesha elizayo, makube njalo, kungenjalo, wugawule kwakhona. ’”

Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

2023.11.05

articles.title: Ubhaptizo
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade!

Namhlanje sijonga ukwabelana ngetrafikhi: "Ubhaptizo" Umzekelo woBomi obutsha bobuKristu

Masivule iBhayibhile yethu kumaRoma Isahluko 6, iivesi 3-4, size sizifunde kunye:

Anazi na ukuba thina, sabhaptizelwayo kuKristu Yesu, sabhaptizelwa ekufeni kwakhe? Ngoko ke sangcwatywa naye ngokubhaptizelwa ekufeni, ukuze sihambe sinobomi obutsha, njengokuba uKristu wavuswayo kwabafileyo ngalo uzuko loYise.

Umbuzo: Ungamlandela njani uYesu?

impendulo: kuYesu ngokubhaptizwa !

1 Bhaptizelwa kuYesu—KwabaseRoma 6:3
2 Umntu wethu omdala wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni kunye naye - Roma 6:6
3 Yifa kunye naye— Roma 6:6
4 Wangcwatywa kunye naye—Roma 6:4
5 Kuba abo bafileyo bakhululwe esonweni.”— Roma 6:7
6 Nakuba nimanywe naye ekufeni kwakhe okufana nokwakhe, nimanywe naye nasekuvukeni kwakhe okufana nokwakhe.”— KwabaseRoma 6:5
7 Ukuvuswa kunye noKristu— Roma 6:8
8 ukuze ngamnye wethu ahambe kubomi obutsha.”— Roma 6:4

Umbuzo: Zeziphi iimpawu “zokholo nokuziphatha” komKristu ozelwe ngokutsha?

Impendulo: Intshukumo nganye inesitayile esitsha

1. Ubhaptizo

Umbuzo: Yintoni "injongo" yobhaptizo?
Impendulo: Yiza kuYesu! Mdibanise naye ngendlela.

(1) Ukuvuma ukubhaptizelwa ekufeni kukaYesu

Anazi na ukuba thina, sabhaptizelwayo kuKristu Yesu, sabhaptizelwa ekufeni kwakhe? Ngoko ke sangcwatywa naye ngokubhaptizelwa ekufeni... KwabaseRoma 6:3-4

(2) Manyaniswe naye ngokufa

Umbuzo: Kwakunjani ukuma “kokufa” kukaYesu?
Impendulo: UYesu wafa emthini ngenxa yezono zethu.

Umbuzo: Ukumanyaniswa njani naye ngokufana nokufa kwakhe?

Impendulo: “Ngokubhaptizelwa” ekufeni kukaYesu nokungcwatywa kunye naye;

“Ukubhaptizwa” kuthetha ukubethelelwa, ukufa, ukungcwatywa, nokuvuswa kunye noKristu! Amen. Imbekiselo kumaRoma 6:6-7

(3) Manyaniswe naye ngokufana nokuvuka kwakhe

Umbuzo: Injani imilo yovuko lukaYesu?
Impendulo: Uvuko lukaYesu ngumzimba womoya-1 Korinte 15:42
Ukuba ùthe wajonga izandla neenyawo zam, uya kuqonda ukuba ndim kanye. ndichukumise, ubone; Umphefumlo awunamathambo kwaye awunanyama. ” Luka 24:39

Umbuzo: Singamanyana njani naye ngokufana novuko lwaKhe?

Impendulo: Yidla isidlo seNkosi!

Kuba inyama kaYesu → ayizange ibone konakala okanye ukufa- bona iZenzo 2:31

Xa sisitya “isonka” somzimba wakhe, sinomzimba kaYesu ngaphakathi kwethu. Amen! Oku kukumanyaniswa naye kuhlobo lovuko Nanini na xa sisidla esi sonka kwaye siyisela le ndebe, siya kuhlala simanyene ade abuye. Imbekiselo kweyoku-1 kwabaseKorinte 11:26

2. (Inkolelo) Indoda endala ifile yaye ikhululwe esonweni

Umbuzo: Amakholwa asaba njani esonweni?
Impendulo: UYesu wafela izono zethu, wasikhulula kuzo. Ekubeni simanywe naye ngemfano yokufa, umntu wethu omdala wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni kunye naye, ukuze umzimba wesono uphuthiswe, ukuze singabi saba ngamakhoboka esono; kuba owafayo ukhululwe esonweni. Bhekisela kumaRoma 6: 6-7 kunye namaKol 3: 3 kuba senifile...!

3. (Ukholo) Nabani na ozelwe nguThixo soze one

Umbuzo: Kutheni umntu ozelwe nguThixo engoni?

Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

(1) UYesu wasebenzisa igazi lakhe ukuze ahlambe izono zabantu (kwakanye). Imbekiselo kumaHebhere 1:3 nakwi-9:12
(2) Igazi likaKristu elingenasiphako lihlambulula iintliziyo zenu (umbhalo wokuqala “isazela” ubhekisela kumaHebhere 9:14 .
(3) Emva kokuba isazela sicocekile, asibi saziva sinetyala— Hebhere 10:2

Umbuzo: Kutheni ndisoloko ndiziva ndinetyala?

Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

1 Kuba ninawo umthetho, niphantsi komthetho, niwugqithile umthetho; Reference kwabaseRoma 4:15, 3:20, ISityhilelo 12:10
2 Igazi likaYesu lahlambulula kuphela izono zabantu (kanye) Wena (awukholelwa) ukuba igazi lakhe elixabisekileyo (kanye) laba sisicamagushelo sezono ngonaphakade; ." "Iyasebenza" → hlamba izono (izihlandlo ezininzi), acime izono, aze aphathe igazi lakhe njengesiqhelo. Imbekiselo kumaHebhere 10:26-29
3 Abo baziva benetyala abazalwa ngokutsha! Oko kukuthi, abazange bazalwe ngokutsha njenge (umntu omtsha), abazange baziqonde iindaba ezilungileyo, kwaye abaluqondi usindiso lukaKristu; iinkanuko zika-Adam;
4 Anikholwanga ukuba umntu omdala wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni noKristu, ukuze umzimba wesono uphuthiswe... Kuba owafayo ukhululwe, wakhululwa kuso isono - KwabaseRoma 6:6-7, ngokuba nafa. .. Kolose 3:3
5 Zigqaleni ngokwenu ningabafileyo besono; yibani nobuntu obutsha, ukuze niphilele uThixo ngoKristu Yesu. Roma 6:11
Ngokomzekelo: UYesu wathi kubo: “Ukuba beniziimfama, ngeningenasono; kodwa ngoku nithi, Siyabona, isono senu sihleli.”— Yohane 9:41
6 Bonke abasenzayo isono bayaphula umthetho, bengakhululwanga kuwo umthetho, bengokholo ngaye uYesu, baphantsi komthetho, balele kongendawo; bangoonyana bakaMtyholi. Imbekiselo kuYohane 1:10

4. Iintombi ezinyulu

(1) 144 000 abantu

La madoda ayengadyojwanga ngabafazi; Bayilandela iMvana apho isukuba isiya khona. Bathengwa phakathi kwabantu njengeentlahlela kuThixo nakuyo iMvana. Akukho buxoki bunokufunyanwa emilonyeni yabo; ISityhilelo 14:4-5

Umbuzo: Babevela phi aba bantu bangasentla bali-144 000?

Impendulo: IMvana yathengwa emntwini ngegazi lakhe—1 Korinte 6:20

Umbuzo: Bamela oobani abantu abalapha abali-144 000?

Impendulo: Ifanekisela iiNtlanga ezisindisiweyo nabo bonke abangcwele!

(2) AmaKristu akholelwa kwiindaba ezilungileyo nazelwe ngokutsha aziintombi ezinyulu

Umsindo endinawo ngawe ngumsindo kaThixo. Kuba ndanendisa ndodeni-nye, ukuze ndinimise phambi koKristu niziintombi ezinyulu. 2 Korinte 11:2

5. Ukulahla ixhego uAdam

(1) Amava→Ixhego lihlehliswa ngokuthe ngcembe

Umbuzo: Ndalilahla nini ixhego lam, uAdam?
Impendulo: Ndabethelelwa emnqamlezweni, ndafa, ndangcwatywa noKristu, ndaza ngoko ndakhulula ixhego elingu-Adam, ndaza ndakholelwa (amava) ukuba ukufa kukaYesu kwaqala kum, kwaza ngokuthe ngcembe ndawulahla umntu omdala. Bona eyesi- 2 kwabaseKorinte 4:4:10-11 nabase-Efese 4:22

(2) Amava→Umntu omtsha ngokuthe ngcembe uyakhula

Ukuba ke uMoya kaThixo uhleli kuni, aningabo abenyama, koko ningabeMoya. ...Khangela kumaRoma 8:9 → Ngoko ke, asityhafi. Nangona umzimba wangaphandle (umntu omdala) utshatyalaliswa, umntu wangaphakathi (umntu omtsha) wenziwa mtsha umhla nezolo. Iimbandezelo zethu ezikhaphukhaphu nezomzuzwana ziya kusisebenzela ubunzima banaphakade bozuko olungenakuthelekiswa nanto. 2 Korinte 4:16-17

6. Yidla isidlo seNkosi

Wathi uYesu: “Inene, inene, ndithi kuni, Ukuba anithanga niyidle inyama yoNyana woMntu, nilisele igazi lakhe, aninabo ubomi kuni. Lowo uyidlayo eyam inyama, alisele elam igazi, unobomi obungunaphakade, ekugqibeleni. Lowo uyidlayo eyam inyama, alisele negazi lam, uhleli kum, nam ndihleli kuye

7 Yambathani ubuntu obutsha nimambathe uKristu

Ngoko ke nina nonke ningoonyana bakaThixo ngako ukukholwa, nikuKristu Yesu; Nina nonke, nabhaptizelwayo kuKristu, namambatha uKristu. Galati 3:26-27

8. Njengokushumayela iindaba ezilungileyo nokwenza abantu bakholwe kuYesu

Olona phawu lucacileyo lukaKristu owazalwa ngokutsha kukuba uyathanda ukushumayela ngoYesu kwintsapho yakhe, izalamane, abo afunda nabo, abo asebenza nabo, nabahlobo bakhe, ebaxelela ukuba bakholelwe kwiindaba ezilungileyo baze basindiswe kwaye babe nobomi obungunaphakade.
(Ngokomzekelo) UYesu weza kubo waza wathi kubo: “Linikwe mna lonke igunya ezulwini nasemhlabeni. noMoya oyiNgcwele ( nibabhaptize egameni loYise neloNyana neloMoya oyiNgcwele). 28:18-20

9 Anisayi kunqula izithixo

AmaKrestu azelwe ngokutsha akasanquli izithixo, anqula kuphela iNkosi eyadala izulu nomhlaba, iNkosi uYesu Krestu!
Nani nifile nje ziziphoso nazizono zenu, wanenza naphila. enahamba kuzo ngokwenkqubo yeli hlabathi, nimlulamela umphathi wegunya lesibhakabhaka, lomoya lo usebenzayo ngoku kubo abangevayo; Thina sonke sasiphakathi kwabo, siqhuba iinkanuko zenyama, silandela iinkanuko zenyama nezentliziyo; Noko ke, uThixo osisityebi ngenceba nosithanda ngothando olukhulu, usidlisa ubomi kunye noKristu, nangona sasifile ziziphoso. Nisindiswe ngokubabalwa. Wasivusa kananjalo, wasihlalisa kunye nathi kwezasezulwini iindawo noKristu Yesu. Efese 2:1-6

10. Ukuthanda iindibano, ukufundisisa iBhayibhile, nokudumisa uThixo ngeengoma zokomoya

AmaKristu azelwe ngokutsha ayathandana yaye ayakuthanda ukuhlanganisana njengamalungu ukuze aphulaphule iintshumayelo, afunde aze afundisise iBhayibhile, athandaze kuThixo, aze adumise uThixo wethu ngeengoma zokomoya!
Ukuze umoya wam ukubethe uhadi, ungathi cwaka. Ndiya kubulela kuwe, Yehova, Thixo wam, ngonaphakade; INdumiso 30:12
Ilizwi likaKristu malihlale ngokobutyebi ezintliziyweni zenu, nifundisana, nilulekana ngeendumiso, neengoma, nezango ezizezomoya, nivuma iindumiso zikaThixo ngeentliziyo zenu, nizele lubabalo. Kolose 3:16

11 Asingabo abehlabathi

Njengoko yatshoyo iNkosi uYesu, ndibanikile ilizwi lakho. Ke ihlabathi libathiyile, ngokuba bengengabo abehlabathi, njengokuba nam ndingenguye owehlabathi. Andikuceli ukuba ubasuse ehlabathini, kodwa ndicela ukuba ubagcine kuyo inkohlakalo (okanye iguqulelwe: esonweni). Abangabo abehlabathi, njengokuba nam ndingenguye owehlabathi. Yohane 17:14-16

12. Ukulindela ukubuya kukaKristu ngokholo, ithemba, nothando

Ngoku kukho izinto ezintathu ezihlala zikho: ukholo, ithemba, nothando, eyona inkulu kuzo luthando. — 1 Korinte 13:13

Siyazi ke ukuba yonke indalo iyancwina, iyasebenza kude kube ngoku. Asiyiyo yodwa ke, nathi banayo intlahlela yoMoya, siyancwina ngaphakathi kwethu, silinde ukwenziwa oonyana; inkululeko yomzimba wethu ke leyo. Roma 8:22-23
Uthi lowo ukungqinayo, Ewe, ndiyeza kamsinya! Nkosi Yesu, ndifuna uze!

Ubabalo lweNkosi uYesu malube nabo bonke abangcwele. Amen! ISityhilelo 22:20-21

articles.content:
"Kholelwa kwiVangeli" 12

Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade!

Namhlanje siqhubeka sihlolisisa ubudlelwane kwaye sabelane "Ukukholelwa kwiVangeli"

Masivule iBhayibhile kuMarko 1:15, siyityhile size sifunde kunye:

Wathi, Lizalisekile ixesha, nobukumkani bukaThixo busondele. Guqukani, nikholwe kuzo iindaba ezilungileyo ezi.

Isifundo 12: Ukukholwa kwivangeli kukhulula imizimba yethu

KWABASEROMA 8:23 Asiyiyo ke yodwa; sisuka nathi, banayo intlahlela yomoya, sincwine ngaphakathi, silinde ukwenziwa oonyana; inkululeko yomzimba wethu ke leyo.

Umbuzo: Iza kukhululwa nini imizimba yethu?

Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

(1) Ubomi bethu bufihlwe noKristu kuThixo

Kuba nafayo, baye ubomi benu bufihlakele ndawonye noKristu kuye uThixo. Kolose 3:3

Umbuzo: Ngaba ubomi bethu obuhlaziyiweyo kunye nemizimba yethu ibonakala?

Impendulo: Umntu omtsha owenziwe ngokutsha ufihlwe noKristu kuThixo kwaye akabonakali.
Ke kaloku, asikukhathalele oko kubonwayo, sinyamekela izinto ezingabonwayo; 2 Korinte 4:18

(2) Ubomi bethu bubonakala

Umbuzo: Bubonakala nini ubomi bethu?

Impendulo: Xa uKristu ebonakala, ubomi bethu buya kubonakala.

Xa athe wabonakalaliswa uKristu, obubomi bethu, nani niya kubonakala, ninaye ebuqaqawulini. Kolose 3:4

Umbuzo: Ngaba ubomi bubonakala bunomzimba?

Impendulo: Kukho umzimba!

Umbuzo: Ngaba ngumzimba ka-Adam? Okanye ngumzimba kaKristu?
Impendulo: NguMzimba kaKristu! Ngokuba Wasizala ngevangeli, singamalungu aKhe. Efese 5:30

Qaphela: Okusezintliziyweni zethu nguMoya oyiNgcwele, uMoya kaYesu, noMoya kaBawo oseZulwini! Umphefumlo ngumphefumlo kaYesu Krestu! Umzimba ngumzimba ongafiyo kaYesu; ke ngoko, umntu wethu omtsha asingomzimba womphefumlo womntu omdala, uAdam. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Wanga ke uThixo woxolo anganingcwalisa niphelelisekile; Wanga ke umoya wenu, umphefumlo nomzimba wenu (oko kukuthi, umphefumlo wenu ozelwe ngokutsha nomzimba) ugcinwe ungenakusoleka ekufikeni kweNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Uthembekile onibizayo, oya kukwenza oko. 1 Tesalonika 5:23-24

(3) Abo abalalayo kuYesu, uYesu weza naye

Umbuzo: Baphi abo balele kuYesu Kristu?

Impendulo: Sifihlwe noKristu kuThixo!

Umbuzo: Uphi ngoku uYesu?

Impendulo: UYesu wavuswa wanyukela ezulwini ngoku, uhleli ngasekunene kukaThixo uYise ubomi bethu nobo balele kuYesu busezulwini. Imbekiselo kwabase-Efese 2:6

Umbuzo: Kutheni amanye amabandla (njengamaSabatha) esithi abafileyo balala emangcwabeni de uKristu abuye, baze ke baphume emangcwabeni baze bavuswe?

Impendulo: UYesu uya kuhla evela ezulwini xa ebuya kwakhona, yaye ngokubhekisele kwabo balele kuYesu, ngokuqinisekileyo uya kubuyiswa evela ezulwini;

【Kuba umsebenzi wentlawulelo kaYesu Kristu ugqityiwe】

Ukuba abafileyo basalele engcwabeni, ukholo lwabo luya kuba sengxakini enkulu kuya kufuneka balinde de kube sekupheleni kwewaka leminyaka, umgwebo wokugqibela, xa ukufa neHadesi ziya kunikela abafileyo phakathi kwabo engabhalwanga encwadini yobomi, uya kuphoswa edikeni lomlilo. Ngoko, uyayiqonda? Bhekisela kwiSityhilelo 20:11-15

Ke kaloku asithandi ukuba ningazi, bazalwana, mayela nabalele ukufa, ukuze ningabi buhlungu njengabangenathemba. Ukuba siyakholwa ukuba uYesu wafa, wabuya wavuka, kwanabo balele ukufa bekuYesu, uThixo woza nabo, kunye naye. 1 Tesalonika 4:13-14

Umbuzo: Abo balele kuKristu, ngaba baya kuvuswa benemizimba?

Impendulo: Kukho umzimba, umzimba womoya, umzimba kaKristu! Imbekiselo kweyoku-1 kwabaseKorinte 15:44

Ngokuba iNkosi ngokwayo iya kuhla emazulwini inendanduluko, inelizwi lesiphatha-zithunywa, inexilongo likaThixo, baze abafele kuKristu bavuke kuqala; 1 Tesalonika 4:16

(4) Abo baphilayo nabaseleyo baya kuguqulwa baze bambathe umntu omtsha baze babonakale ngokuqhwanyaza kweliso.

Ke kaloku ndinixelela imfihlelo: Okunene asiyi kulala ukufa sonke; kodwa siya kwenziwa ngakumbi sonke, ngephanyazo, ngephanyazo, lakuhlokoma ixilongo lokugqibela. Kuba liya kukhala ixilongo, abafileyo baya kuvuswa bengenakonakala, senziwe ngakumbi ke thina. Oku konakalayo makwambathe ukungonakali; 1 Korinte 15:51-53

(5) Siya kuyibona imo yakhe yokwenene

Umbuzo: Ingaba injani imo yethu yokwenyani?

Impendulo: Imizimba yethu ngamalungu kaKristu kwaye ibonakala ifana naye!

Bazalwana abathandekayo, singabantwana bakaThixo ngoku. Ke into esiya kuba yiyo kwixesha elizayo. eyoku-1 kaYohane 3:2 neyabaseFilipi 3:20-21

kulungile! "Kholelwa kwiVangeli" kwabelwana ngayo apha.

Masithandaze kunye: Enkosi Abba Bawo waseZulwini, enkosi kuMsindisi uYesu Krestu, kwaye sibulela uMoya oyiNgcwele ngokuba nathi ngamaxesha onke! Yanga iNkosi uYesu ingaqhubeleka nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumlo yethu kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze sibone kwaye sive iinyaniso zasemoyeni kwaye siyiqonde iBhayibhile! Siyaqonda ukuba xa uYesu esiza, siya kuyibona imo yakhe yokwenyani, kwaye nomzimba wethu omtsha uya kuvela, oko kukuthi, umzimba uya kukhululwa. Amen

Ngegama leNkosi uYesu Kristu! Amen

IVangeli enikezelwe kumama wam othandekayo

Mawethu! Khumbula ukuqokelela

Umbhalo weVangeli ovela:

ibandla lika Yesu Krestu

Isifundo 11: Ukukholelwa kwivangeli kusenza ukuba sifumane ubuonyana

Umbuzo: Ungabufumana njani ubuntwana bukaThixo?

Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

(1) Udonga oluphakathi lwesahlulelo lwadilizwa

(2) UKristu wasebenzisa umzimba wakhe ukuze atshabalalise intiyo

(3) Ubutshaba batshatyalaliswa emnqamlezweni

Umbuzo: Zeziphi izikhalazo ezachithwayo, zapheliswa, zatshatyalaliswa?

Impendulo: Yimigaqo ebhalwe emthethweni.

Kuba yena uluxolo lwethu, owabenza babini baba banye, waluchitha ke udonga olwahlulayo, wabuphanzisa emzimbeni wakhe ubutshaba, kwanemithetho ebhaliweyo emthethweni, ukuze abe nokuyenza imida emibini. ngokwakhe Umntu omtsha ngaloo ndlela ufezekisa imvisiswano. Sakuba sibuphelisile ubutshaba emnqamlezweni, siye saxolelaniswa noThixo ngomnqamlezo

(4) Ukubhangisa imithetho namaxwebhu

(5)Isuse

(6) Wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni

Umbuzo: Yintoni awasithambisa ngayo uKristu? Susa ntoni?

Impendulo: Cima imibhalo ekwimimiselo echasene nathi neyingozi kuthi, uyisuse.

Umbuzo: Yayiyintoni “injongo” kaYesu “yokuyicima” imithetho, imimiselo nezibhalo, azithabathe aze azibethelele emnqamlezweni?

Impendulo: Wonke umntu owaphula umthetho usisono; eyoku-1 kaYohane 3:4

Bhekisela kwiSityhilelo 12:10 kuba uSathana uMtyholi uphambi koThixo imini nobusuku emangalela → abazalwana noodade → Ngaba kuchasene nomthetho? Uyakumangalela ngemithetho nemimiselo na, akugwebele ukufa? USathana kufuneka afune imithetho, imimiselo kunye nobumba "njengobungqina" bokungqina ukuba waphule umthetho phambi kwesihlalo sokugweba → ukugwebela ukufa kwaye umthande uThixo wethu, iNkosi uYesu Kristu! Wayicima imimiselo neencwadi zomthetho, izingqino ezazisimangalela ngazo, wasigwebela ukufa, wazisusa ke, ezibethelela emnqamlezweni. Ngale ndlela, uSathana akayi kukwazi ukusebenzisa “ubungqina” ekukumangaleleni, engakwazi nokukugwebela okanye akugwebele ukufa. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Nani nafile ziziphoso nakukungaluki kwenyama yenu, usuke uThixo unidlise ubomi ndawonye noKristu, enixolele zonke iziphoso, esuke wazicima zonke izinto ezisemthethweni, ezicimile izibhalo. ubungqina betyala) ezibhaliweyo ngathi nakuthi, zabubethelela emnqamlezweni. Imbekiselo kwabaseKolose 2:13-14

(7) Ukukhululeka emthethweni nakwisiqalekiso somthetho

Umbuzo: Ungawubaleka njani umthetho nesiqalekiso?

Impendulo: Yifa kuwo umthetho ngomzimba kaKristu

Ngokunjalo, bazalwana bam, nani nafa kuwo umthetho ngawo umzimba kaKristu... Ke, ekubeni safayo nje kuwo umthetho, esikhonkxwe ngawo, ngoku sikhululekile kuwo umthetho... KwabaseRoma 7:4,6

UKristu wasikhulula esiqalekisweni somthetho, ngokuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Uqalekisiwe wonke umntu oxhonywe emthini

(8) Kuzuze oonyana bakaThixo

Umbuzo: Ungabufumana njani ubuntwana?
Impendulo: Ukuze abakhulule ngokubathenga abaphantsi komthetho, ukuze sizuze ukwenziwa oonyana.

Lithe ke lakuzaliseka ixesha, uThixo wamthuma uNyana wakhe, othe wazalwa ngumfazi; Galati 4:4-5

Umbuzo: Kutheni le nto abo baphantsi komthetho kufuneka bakhululwe?

Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

1 Lowo wenza isono waphula umthetho, kanti ukwaphula umthetho kusisono. eyoku-1 kaYohane 3:4
2 Wonke umntu owenza ngokomthetho uphantsi kwesiqalekiso; kuyabonakala;
3 Kuba umthetho umqumbisa;
Ngoko →→
4 Apho kungekho mthetho, akukho sigqitho – Roma 4:15
5 Ngaphandle komthetho, isono asithathwa njengesono - Roma 5:13
6 Kuba, kungekho mthetho, isono sifile.”— Roma 7:8

7 Othe wona kungekho mthetho, uya kutshabalala ngaphandle komthetho; Imbekiselo kumaRoma 2:12

(Umgwebo Omkhulu Wemini Yokugqibela: Abazalwana noodade bafanele baqiqe yaye banikele ingqalelo. Abo bangekho phantsi komthetho, oko kukuthi, abo bakuYesu Kristu, baya kuvuswa balawule noKristu iminyaka eliwaka. ngaphambi kwewaka leminyaka, abo baphantsi komthetho kuya kufuneka balinde de “emva” kweMinyaka Eliwaka baya kunikelwa aba bantu bagwetywe ngokwezenzo zabo phantsi komthetho nangokwezono zabo. articles.title: “Kholelwa kwiVangeli” 10
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Kholelwa kwiVangeli》10

Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade!

Namhlanje siqhubeka sihlolisisa ubudlelwane kunye nokwabelana "Ukukholelwa kwiVangeli"

Masivule iBhayibhile kuMarko 1:15, siyityhile size sifunde kunye:

Wathi, Lizalisekile ixesha, nobukumkani bukaThixo busondele. Guqukani, nikholwe kuzo iindaba ezilungileyo ezi.

Isifundo 10: Ukukholelwa kwivangeli kuyasivelisa ngokutsha

Okuzelwe yinyama kuyinyama; okuzelwe ngumoya kungumoya. Musa ukumangaliswa xa ndisithi, “Kufuneka nizalwe ngokutsha.” Yohane 3:6-7

Umbuzo: Kutheni simele sizalwe ngokutsha?

Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

1 Ngaphandle kokuba umntu azalwe ngokutsha akanakububona ubukumkani bukaThixo - Yohane 3: 3
2 Akunakungena ebukumkanini bukaThixo - Yohane 3:5
3 Inyama negazi azinako ukubudla ilifa ubukumkani bukaThixo— 1 Korinte 15:50

Ngoko ke, iNkosi uYesu yathi: “Musani ukumangaliswa kukuba nimelwe kukuzalwa ngokutsha.”

Ukuba umntu akazalwanga ngokutsha, akanaye uMoya oyiNgcwele ngaphandle kokukhokelwa nguMoya oyiNgcwele, awuyi kuyiqonda iBhayibhile nokuba uyifunda kangaphi na, awuyi kuyiqonda iBhayibhile Wathi uYesu. Ngokomzekelo, abafundi ababelandela uYesu kwasekuqaleni babengayiqondi into eyayithethwa nguYesu xa wavuswayo waza wenyuka waya ezulwini, waza uMoya oyiNgcwele wafika ngePentekoste, bazaliswa nguMoya oyiNgcwele baza bamkela amandla, baza ke baqonda. into eyathethwa yiNkosi uYesu. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Umbuzo: Kutheni inyama negazi zingenako ukubudla ilifa ubukumkani bukaThixo?

Impendulo: Okonakalayo akunakukudla ilifa ukungonakali.

Umbuzo: Yintoni eyonakalayo?

Impendulo: INkosi uYesu yathi! Oko kuzalwa yinyama yinyama. Inyama yethu izalwa ngabazali bethu → sadalwa ngothuli luka-Adam ngenxa yesono, inyama ka-Adam iya kubola ize ibone ukufa, ngoko akanakubudla ilifa ubukumkani bukaThixo.

Umbuzo: Ngaba noYesu wayenawo umzimba wenyama negazi?
Impendulo: UYesu wazalwa nguBawo waseZulwini, wehla evela eYerusalem esezulwini, wakhawulwa yintombi enyulu waza wazalwa nguMoya oyiNgcwele, unguMoya, ungcwele, akanasono, akanakonakala, kwaye akaboni ukufa! Incwadi yeZenzo 2:31
Inyama yethu, eyaphuma eluthulini luka-Adam, ithengiswe esonweni, kwaye umvuzo wesono kukufa ke ngoko, umzimba wethu odalwe yinyama negazi awunakubudla ilifa ubukumkani bukaThixo. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Umbuzo: Singabudla ilifa njani ubukumkani bukaThixo?

Impendulo: Kufuneka azalwe ngokutsha!

Umbuzo: Sizalwa njani ngokutsha?

Impendulo: Kholwa kuYesu! Kholwa yivangeli, uliqonde ilizwi lenyaniso, kwaye wamkele uMoya oyiNgcwele othenjisiweyo njengetywina Siyadanduluka sisithi: “Abha, Bawo!” Yonke into evela kuThixo Lowo uzelweyo akoni, amen! Jonga kuYohane 3:9. Oku kubonisa ukuba uzelwe ngokutsha Ngaba uyakuqonda oku?

Siza kufunda kwaye sabelane nabazalwana noodade ngokubanzi malunga no "Rebirth" kwixesha elizayo, ndiza kubelana ngalo apha namhlanje.

Masithandaze kunye: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Krestu, enkosi uMoya oyiNgcwele ngokusikhokela thina bantwana ukuba sikholwe yivangeli kwaye siqonde indlela yenyaniso, usivumele ukuba samkele uMoya oyiNgcwele othenjisiweyo njengetywina, sibe ngabantwana bakaThixo. , kwaye uqonde ukuzalwa kwakhona! Ngabo bazelwe ngamanzi nangoMoya kuphela abanokubona ubukumkani bukaThixo baze bangene ebukumkanini bukaThixo. Enkosi Bawo waseZulwini ngokusinika ilizwi lenyaniso kwaye usinike uMoya oyiNgcwele othenjisiweyo ukuba asivelise ngokutsha! Amen

KwiNkosi uYesu! Amen

Kholwa yiVangeli》9

Wathi, Lizalisekile ixesha, nobukumkani bukaThixo busondele. Guqukani, nikholwe kuzo iindaba ezilungileyo ezi.

Isifundo 9: Kholwa kwiVangeli kunye noVuko noKrestu

KWABASEROMA 6:8 Ukuba ke safa kunye noKrestu, sodla ubomi kwakunye naye. Amen!

1. Kholelwa ekufeni, ukungcwatywa nokuvuka kunye noKrestu

Umbuzo: Ufa njani noKristu?

Impendulo: Ukufa kunye noKrestu “ngobhaptizo” ekufeni kwakhe.

Anazi na ukuba thina, sabhaptizelwayo kuKristu Yesu, sabhaptizelwa ekufeni kwakhe? Ngoko ke sangcwatywa naye ngokubhaptizelwa ekufeni, ukuze sihambe sinobomi obutsha, njengokuba uKristu wavuswayo kwabafileyo ngalo uzuko loYise. Roma 6:3-4

Umbuzo: Ungahlala njani noKrestu?

Impendulo: “Ukubhaptizwa” kuthetha ukungqina ukufa kunye naye nokungqina ukuhlala noKrestu! Amen

Nangcwatywa naye elubhaptizweni; enathi nikuye, navuswa nokuvuswa naye, ngokukholwa kwenu kukusebenza kukaThixo, owamvusa kubo abafileyo. Nani nifile ziziphoso nakukungaluki kwenu, kodwa uThixo unidlise ubomi ndawonye noKristu, enixolele zonke iziphoso, Kolose 2:12-13;

2. Bemanyene ngokusesikweni noKristu

Kuba xa similiselwe kuye ngemfano yokufa kwakhe, somiliselwa kuye nangemfano yokuvuka kwakhe;

Umbuzo: Kwakunjani ukufa kukaYesu?

Impendulo: UYesu wafa emnqamlezweni, kwaye oku kwakumila kokufa kwakhe!

Umbuzo: Ukumanyaniswa njani naYe ngohlobo lokufa kwakhe?

Impendulo: Sebenzisa indlela yokukholwa eNkosini! Xa ukholelwa kuYesu nakwivangeli, kwaye “ubhaptizelwa” ekufeni kukaKristu, umanyene naye ngemo yokufa, kwaye umntu wakho omdala ubethelelwe emnqamlezweni kunye naye.

Umbuzo: Injani imilo yovuko lukaYesu?

Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

(1) Uvuko ngumzimba womoya

Umzimba ohlwayelwayo ubhekisa kumzimba ka-Adam, umntu omdala, kwaye umzimba ovusiweyo ubhekisa kumzimba kaKristu, umntu omtsha. Ukuba kukho umzimba ongowenyama, kufuneka kukwakho nomzimba ongowomoya. Ngoko, uyayiqonda? Imbekiselo kweyoku-1 kwabaseKorinte 15:44

(2) Inyama kaYesu ayinakonakala

Ekwazi kwangaphambili oku, wathetha ngovuko lukaKristu waza wathi: “Umphefumlo wakhe awushiywanga eHadesi, nomzimba wakhe ungabonanga kubola. ’—IZenzo 2:31

(3) Ukumila kovuko lukaYesu

Ukuba nithe nakhangela izandla zam neenyawo zam, nazi ukuba ndim kanye. ndichukumise, ubone; Umphefumlo awunamathambo kwaye awunanyama. ” Luka 24:39

Umbuzo: Ungamanywa njani naYe ngokufana novuko lwaKhe?

Impendulo: Kuba inyama kaYesu ayizange ibone ukonakala okanye ukufa!

Xa sisitya iSidlo seNkosi, uMthendeleko oNgcwele, sidla umzimba waKhe kwaye sisele igazi leNkosi! Thina sinobomi bukaKristu ngaphakathi kwethu, kwaye obu bomi (obungenanto yakwenza nenyama negazi lika-Adam). Umntu omtsha owenziwe ngokutsha yinyama negazi likaYesu . Ade uKristu afike ekwimo yakhe yokwenyani, imizimba yethu iya kubonakala nayo ibonakale isebuqaqawulini kunye noKristu. Amen! Ngoko, uyayiqonda? Bona eyoku- 1 kaYohane 3:2, Kol 3:4

3. Ubomi bethu bovuko bufihlwe noKristu kuThixo

Ngokuba nafayo (oko kukuthi, umntu omdala wafa), ubomi benu bufihlakele ndawonye noKristu kuye uThixo. Ngoko, uyayiqonda? Imbekiselo kwabaseKolose 3:3

Masithandaze kunye kuThixo: Enkosi Abba Bawo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, kwaye sibulele uMoya oyiNgcwele ngokuba nathi ngamaxesha onke! Sikhokhelele kuyo yonke inyaniso kwaye siqonde ukuba ukuba sikholelwa ekufeni kunye noKristu, siya kukholwa nokuphila kunye noKristu ngokubhaptizelwa ekufeni, simanywe kuye ngemfano yokufa, sidle isidlo seNkosi; umzimba weNkosi nokusela Igazi leNkosi liya kumanyaniswa nayo ngokufana nokuvuka kwayo! Amen

Ngegama leNkosi uYesu Kristu! Amen

"Kholwa yiVangeli" 8

Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade!

Siyaqhubeka sihlolisisa ubudlelwane kwaye sabelane "Ukukholelwa kwiVangeli"

Masivule iBhayibhile kuMarko 1:15, siyityhile size sifunde kunye:

Wathi, Lizalisekile ixesha, nobukumkani bukaThixo busondele. Guqukani, nikholwe kuzo iindaba ezilungileyo ezi.

Isifundo 8: Kholelwa ukuba uvuko lukaYesu lolokugwetyelwa kwethu

(1) UYesu wavuswa ngenxa yokugwetyelwa kwethu

Umbuzo: Ngaba uYesu wavuswa ngenxa yokugwetyelwa kwethu?

Impendulo: UYesu wanikelwa ngenxa yezigqitho zethu waza wavuswa ngenxa yokugwetyelwa kwethu (okanye ukuguqulelwa: UYesu wanikelwa ngenxa yezigqitho zethu waza wavuswa ngenxa yokugwetyelwa kwethu). Roma 4:25

(2) Ubulungisa bukaThixo busekelwe elukholweni, ngoko ukholo

Kuba andinazintloni ngazo iindaba ezilungileyo zikaKristu, kuba zingamandla kaThixo okusindisa bonke abakholwayo, umYuda kuqala, kwanomGrike. Ngokuba ubulungisa bukaThixo bubonakalaliswa ngazo ezi ndaba zilungileyo; Njengoko kubhaliwe kwathiwa: “Lowo ulilungisa uya kudla ubomi obuphuma elukholweni.”—KwabaseRoma 1:16-17

Umbuzo: Yintoni esekwe elukholweni nekhokelela elukholweni?

Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

Ngokholo → Ukusindiswa ngokholo kwivangeli kukuzalwa ngokutsha!

1 Uzelwe ngamanzi nanguMoya - Yohane 3:5-7
2 Uzelwe elukholweni lweendaba ezilungileyo - 1 Korinte 4:15
3 Bazalwa nguThixo — Yohane 1:12-13
Ke olo kholo → ukholo kuMoya oyiNgcwele luyahlaziywa kwaye luzukiswe!

Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Wasisindisa, kungengamisebenzi yobulungisa esayenzayo thina, engokwenceba yakhe, ngokuhlanjululwa kokuzalwa ngokutsha, nangokuhlaziya koMoya oyiNgcwele. kuTito 3:5

(3)Intshayelelo yeYongyi

“Bamiselwe iiveki ezimashumi asixhenxe abantu bakowenu, nesixeko sakowenu esingcwele, ukuba kupheliswe ukunxaxha, kupheliswe isono, kucanyagushelwe ubugwenxa, kuziswe ubulungisa obungunaphakade, ukuba kutywinwe umbono nesiprofeto, kumthambise oyiNgcwele uDaniyeli. 9:24.

Umbuzo: Kuthetha ukuthini ukuyeka isono?

Impendulo: Ukuyeka kuthetha ukuyeka, akusekho bubi!

Ngokufa kumthetho osibophayo ngomzimba kaKristu, ngoku sikhululekile kuwo umthetho... Apho kungekho mthetho, akukho sigqitho. Imbekiselo kumaRoma 4:15 . Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Umbuzo: Kuthetha ukuthini ukuphelisa isono?

Impendulo: Ukucoca kuthetha ukuhlambulula Igazi elingenasiphako likaKristu, ukuba isazela sakho sicocekile, awusayi kuphinda uzive unetyala. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

lobeka phi na ukugqithisela lona igazi likaKristu, owazisondeza ngoMoya ongunaphakade, engenasiphako, kuye uThixo, ukuzihlambulula iintliziyo zenu emisebenzini efileyo, ukuze nikhonze uThixo ophilileyo? ...Ukuba akunjalo, ngaba imibingelelo yayingayi kuyeka kudala? Kungenxa yokuba izazela zabanquli ziye zahlanjululwa yaye abaziva benetyala. Hebhere 9:14, 10:2

Umbuzo: Kuthetha ukuthini ukucamagushela izono?

Impendulo: Intlawulelo ithetha ukutshintshwa, ukukhulula. UThixo wenza uYesu ongenasono ukuba abe sisono ngenxa yethu, kwaye ngokufa kukaYesu, sicamagushela izono zethu. Imbekiselo kweyesi-2 kwabaseKorinte 5:21

Umbuzo: Yintoni ukwaziswa kweYongyi?
Impendulo: "unaphakade" uthetha ngonaphakade, kwaye "ubulungisa" buthetha ukugwetyelwa!

Ukucanyagushelwa kwezono nokubhangiswa kwembewu yesono (ekuqaleni yayiyimbewu ka-Adam); Amen Ngale ndlela, uyaqonda

(4) Sele ehlanjiwe, angcwaliswa, agwetyelwa ngoMoya kaThixo

Umbuzo: Singcwaliswa nini, sigwetyelwe, sigwetyelwe nini?

Impendulo: Ukungcwaliswa kuthetha ukuba ngcwele ngaphandle kwesono;

Ukugwetyelwa kuthetha ukuba bubulungisa bukaThixo; Kanye njengokuba uThixo wadala umntu ngothuli, uThixo wabiza uAdam ngokuthi “umntu” emva kokuba “yindoda”! Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Naye ninjalo ke inxenye yenu; kuloko nahlanjululwayo, nangcwaliswa, nagwetyelwayo egameni leNkosi uYesu Kristu, nangoMoya kaThixo wethu. 1 Korinte 6:11

(5) Masigwetyelwe ngesisa

Kuba bonile bonke, basilela eluzukweni lukaThixo; UThixo wammisela uYesu njengocamagushelo ngegazi likaYesu nangokholo lomntu ukuze abonise ubulungisa bukaThixo; eyaziwa ngokuba ngamalungisa, kwanokuba abagwebele abo bakholwayo kuYesu. Roma 3:23-26

Sithandaza kunye kuThixo: Enkosi Abba Bawo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, kwaye siyambulela uMoya oyiNgcwele ngokusikhokelela kuyo yonke inyaniso kwaye siqonde kwaye sikholelwe ivangeli! Uvuko lukaYesu luyasigwebela ubulungisa bukaThixo, lusekelwe elukholweni, kwaye sisindiswa ngokukholwa kwivangeli! Kangangokuba ukukholwa nokukholwa kuhlaziyo loMoya oyiNgcwele kusizisela uzuko! Amen

Enkosi Nkosi Yesu Krestu ngokusenzela umsebenzi wentlawulelo, esenze ukuba siphelise izono zethu, sisuse izono zethu, sicamagushele izono zethu, singenise ubulungisa obungunaphakade. Ubulungisa bukaThixo bunikelwa kuthi ngesisa, ukuze sihlanjwe, sangcwaliswa, sagwetyelwa ngoMoya kaThixo. Amen

Ngegama leNkosi uYesu Kristu! Amen

Isifundo 7: Ukukholelwa kwigospile kuyasikhulula kumandla kaSathana kubumnyama beHadesi

KwabaseKolose 1:13 Wasihlangula egunyeni lobumnyama, wasifudusela ebukumkanini boNyana wakhe oyintanda;

(1) Zibalekeni amandla obumnyama neHadesi

Umbuzo: Kuthetha ukuthini “ubumnyama”?

Impendulo: Ubumnyama bubhekisa kubumnyama obuphezu kobuso benzonzobila, ilizwe elingenakukhanya nelingenabo ubomi. Imbekiselo kwiGenesis 1:2

Umbuzo: Ithetha ukuthini iHadesi?

Impendulo: IHadesi ikwabhekisa kubumnyama, akukho kukhanya, akukho bomi, nendawo yokufa.

Lwathi ulwandle lwabakhupha abafileyo abakhona, kwathi ukufa neHadesi kwabakhupha abafileyo abakhona, bagwetywa elowo ngokwemisebenzi yakhe. ISityhilelo 20:13

(2) Baleka kumandla kaSathana

Siyazi ukuba singabakaThixo, nokuba ihlabathi liphela lilele kongendawo. eyoku- 1 kaYohane 5:19

ndinithumela kubo ukuze avulwe amehlo abo, babuye ebumnyameni, beze ekukhanyeni, bephuma egunyeni likaSathana, beze kuThixo; ’”—IZenzo 26:18

(3) Asingabo abehlabathi

Mna ndibanike ilizwi lakho. Ke ihlabathi libathiyile, ngokuba bengengabo abehlabathi, njengokuba nam ndingenguye owehlabathi. Andikuceli ukuba ubasuse ehlabathini, kodwa ndicela ukuba ubagcine kuyo inkohlakalo (okanye iguqulelwe: esonweni). Abangabo abehlabathi, njengokuba nam ndingenguye owehlabathi. Yohane 17:14-16

Umbuzo: Kunini apho singasengabo abehlabathi?

Impendulo: Uyakholwa kuYesu! Kholwa yivangeli! Qonda imfundiso eyinyani yeendaba ezilungileyo kwaye wamkele uMoya oyiNgcwele othenjisiweyo njengetywina lakho! Emva kokuba nizelwe ngokutsha, nisindisiwe, nathathwa njengoonyana bakaThixo, anisengabo abehlabathi.

Umbuzo: Ngaba amaxhego ethu ngawasehlabathini?

Impendulo: Umntu wethu omdala wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni kunye noKrestu, kwaye umzimba wesono utshatyalalisiwe “ngobhaptizo” safakwa ekufeni kukaKristu, asisengabo abehlabathi;

Umbuzo: Uthi andingowalo mhlaba? Ngaba ndisaphila kweli hlabathi ngokwasemzimbeni?

Impendulo: "UMoya oyiNgcwele entliziyweni yakho uyakuxelela" ukholo lubaluleke kakhulu, njengoko "uPawulos" watshoyo, ayisendim ophilayo, kodwa uKristu ohleli kum, ngokuba "intliziyo" yakho isezulwini, nawe bangumntu ozelwe ngokutsha. Ngaba icacile? Isalathiso kunye ne-2:20

Umbuzo: Ngaba umntu omtsha owenziwe ngokutsha ngowehlabathi?

Impendulo: Umntu omtsha oye wazalwa emanyene noKrestu, uhlala emanyene noYise, eluthandweni lukaThixo, ezulwini nasezintliziyweni zenu. Umntu omtsha ozelwe nguThixo akangoweli hlabathi.

UThixo uye wasisindisa egunyeni lobumnyama, emandleni okufa, eHadesi, nasemandleni kaSathana, yaye wasifudusela ebukumkanini boNyana wakhe oyintanda, uYesu. Amen!

Sithandaza kuThixo sikunye: Enkosi Abba, Bawo waseZulwini ngokuthumela uNyana wakho okuphela kwamzeleyo uYesu. ULizwi waba yinyama, wafela izono zethu, wangcwatywa, wabuya wavuka ngomhla wesithathu. Ngothando olukhulu lukaYesu Krestu, sazalwa ngokutsha kwabafileyo, ukuze sigwetyelwe kwaye sifumane iwonga loonyana bakaThixo! Ekubeni esikhulule kwimpembelelo kaSathana kubumnyama beHadesi, uThixo uye wabafudusela abantu bethu abatsha abahlaziyiweyo kubukumkani obungunaphakade boNyana Wakhe oyintanda, uYesu. Amen!

Ngegama leNkosi uYesu Kristu! Amen

Mawethu! Khumbula ukuyiqokelela.

Isifundo 6: Igospile isenza sikwazi ukulahla umntu omdala nokuziphatha kwawo

[KwabaseKolose 3:3] Kuba nafa, baye ubomi benu bufihlwe noKristu kuye uThixo. 9 Musani ukuxokisana, kuba nizihlubile nje umntu omdala, nezenzo zakhe.

(1) Lilahle ixhego nokuziphatha kwalo

Umbuzo: Kuthetha ukuthini ukuba ufile?

Impendulo: "Wena" kuthetha ukuba umntu omdala wafa, wafa kunye noKristu, umzimba wesono utshitshisiwe, kwaye akasenguye ikhoboka lesono, ngenxa yokuba owafayo ukhululwe esonweni. Imbekiselo kumaRoma 6:6-7

Umbuzo: Lafa nini ‘indoda yethu endala, engumzimba onesono’?

Impendulo: Xa uYesu wayebethelelwa emnqamlezweni, umntu wakho omdala wesono wayesele efile yaye engasekho.

Umbuzo: Ndandingekazalwa xa iNkosi yabethelelwa emnqamlezweni! Uyabona, ngaba “umzimba wethu wesono” awusekho namhlanje?

Impendulo: Ivangeli likaThixo lishunyayelwa kuni! "Injongo" yeendaba ezilungileyo ikuxelela ukuba umntu omdala ufile, umzimba wesono utshatyalalisiwe, kwaye awusengumkhonzi wesono, ikuxelela ukuba ukholelwe iindaba ezilungileyo kwaye usebenzise indlela yokukholelwa kwisono. Ukumanyana nokusebenzisa (ukholo) ngokufana nokufa, umanyene naye ngokufana nokuvuka kwakhe.

Umbuzo: Silibeke nini ixhego?
Impendulo: Xa ukholelwa kuYesu, ukholelwa kwivangeli, kwaye uyayiqonda inyaniso, uKristu wafela izono zethu, wangcwatywa, waza wavuka kwakhona ngomhla wesithathu! Wavuswa kunye noKrestu ekuzalweni kwakho ngokutsha. Uyakholwa ukuba le vangeli ingamandla kaThixo okukusindisa, kwaye ukulungele “ukubhaptizelwa” kuKristu, umanyene naye ngokufana nokufa kwakhe; . ke,

“Ukubhaptizwa” sisenzo esingqina ukuba uye walahla ixhego nobudala bakho. Ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo? Imbekiselo kumaRoma 6:3-7

Umbuzo: Zithini isimilo zexhego?
Impendulo: Iminqweno emibi kunye neminqweno yexhego.

Iyabonakala ke yona imisebenzi yenyama: ukukrexeza, ukungcola, uburheletya, unqulo-zithixo, ubugqwirha, intiyo, iinkani, amakhwele, imisindo, amayelenqe, amayelenqe, ukunxila, iindywala, njl. Sendinixelele kade, nangoku, ndithi kuni, Abazenzayo izinto ezinjalo abayi kubudla ilifa ubukumkani bukaThixo. Galati 5:19-21

(2) Umntu ozelwe ngokutsha asingowenyama yendoda endala

Umbuzo: Sazi njani ukuba asingobantu benyama endala?

Impendulo: Ukuba ke uMoya kaThixo uhleli kuni, aningabo abenyama, koko ningokaMoya. Ukuba umntu akanaye uMoya kaKristu, akangokaKristu lowo. Roma 8:9

Phawula:

"UMoya kaThixo" nguMoya kaYise, uMoya kaYesu uYesu wacela uMoya oyiNgcwele owathunyelwa nguYise ukuba ahlale ezintliziyweni zenu → nizalwa ngokutsha:

1 Uzelwe ngamanzi nanguMoya - Yohane 3:5-7
2 Uzelwe elukholweni lweendaba ezilungileyo - 1 Korinte 4:15
3 Uzelwe nguThixo - Yohane 1:12-13

Umntu omtsha owenziwe ngokutsha akasenguye owenyama endala, umzimba ofileyo wesono, okanye umzimba otshatyalalisiweyo, umntu omtsha ozelwe nguThixo ngokaMoya oyiNgcwele, ungokaKrestu, ungcwele kwaye akanasono Yehova, ubomi obungunaphakade!

(3) Umntu omtsha ngokuthe ngcembe uyakhula;

Umbuzo: Bakhulela phi abo bahlaziyiweyo?

Impendulo: "Umntu omtsha" uhlala kuKristu Umzimba awukabonakali, kwaye awukwazi ukuwubona ngeso lenyama, kuba "umntu omtsha" owenziwe ngokutsha ngumzimba womoya, umzimba kaKristu ovusiweyo zikaKristu kwaye zikunye noKristu Zifihlwe kuThixo kwaye ngokuthe ngcembe zibhekisela kumaKolose 3:3-4;

Ngokubhekiselele kumzimba onesono obonakalayo wendoda endala, ifumana ukufa kwaye umzimba wayo wangaphandle uya kutshatyalaliswa ngokuthe ngcembe uthuli. Ngoko, uyayiqonda? Imbekiselo kwiGenesis 3:19

Jonga ezi ndima zimbini zilandelayo:

Ngoko ke, asityhafi. Nangona umzimba wangaphandle uyatshabalala, kodwa intliziyo engaphakathi (oko kukuthi, uMoya kaThixo ohleli entliziyweni) uya ehlaziyeka imihla ngemihla. 2 Korinte 4:16

Ukuba nithe naliva ilizwi lakhe, nazamkela imfundiso zakhe, nayifunda inyaniso yakhe, manibuhlube ubuntu benu obudala, obuya busiba mbi ngakumbi ngokulukuhla kwenkanuko.

Efese 4:21-22

Qaphela: Bazalwane kunye noodade! Umntu omtsha uye wakhulula umntu omdala kunye nokuziphatha komntu omdala iya kuyichaza ngokweenkcukacha xa sisabelana "Ukuzalwa kwakhona" kwixesha elizayo Kuya kucaca ngakumbi kwaye kube lula ukuba abantu baqonde.

Masithandaze kunye: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi uMoya oyiNgcwele ngokuhlala ekhanyisela amehlo ethu omoya kwaye evula iingqondo zethu ukuze sibone kwaye sive izicaka ozithumelayo ukuba zishumayele inyaniso yasemoyeni kwaye usenze siqonde IBhayibhile. Siyaqonda ukuba uKristu wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni, wafela izono zethu, wangcwatywa, ngokokuba siwuhlubile umntu omdala, nokuziphatha kwawo, sizelwe ngokutsha ngokuvuka kukaKristu kwabafileyo, uMoya kaThixo uhleli ezintliziyweni zethu sifumana amava Umntu omtsha owenziwe ngokutsha "uhlala kuKristu, wenziwa mtsha, akhule, akhule azele bubume bukaKristu; ukwava nokuhluthwa komzimba wangaphandle womntu omdala, othi ngokuthe ngcembe utshatyalaliswe. umntu wayeluthuli ekuphumeni kwakhe kuAdam, ibe uya kubuyela kwaseluthulini.

Ngegama leNkosi uYesu Kristu! Amen

Wathi, Lizalisekile ixesha, nobukumkani bukaThixo busondele. Guqukani, nikholwe kuzo iindaba ezilungileyo ezi.

Isifundo 5: Igospile iyasikhulula emthethweni nakwisiqalekiso sawo

Umbuzo: Ngaba kulungile ukukhululeka kuwo umthetho? Okanye ngaba kukulungele na ukugcina umthetho?

Impendulo: Inkululeko kumthetho.

Umbuzo: Kutheni?

Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

1 Wonke umntu osebenza ngomthetho uphantsi kwesiqalekiso, kuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Uqalekisiwe wonke umntu ongaqhubekiyo ekwenzeni zonke izinto ezibhaliweyo encwadini yomthetho
2 Kuyabonakala ukuba akukho bani ugwetyelwayo ngomthetho phambi koThixo;
3 Ngoko ke, ngokwasemisebenzini yomthetho, akuyi kugwetyelwa nyama emehlweni kaThixo; Roma 3:20
4 Nina ke, nifuna ukugwetyelwa ngomthetho, nizahlukanisile noKristu, naphalala elubabalweni. Galati 5:4
5 Kuba umthetho lo ungenzelwanga amalungisa, oko kukuthi, abantwana bakaThixo, kodwa abachasene nomthetho, nabangevayo, abangahloneli Thixo, nabangaboni, abangahloneli Thixo, nabangenammiselo, nabangendawo, nababulali, abenzi bombulo. nomhenyuzi, nomphangi, nokuba yinto enye echasene nobulungisa. eyoku-1 kuTimoti 1:9-10

Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

(1) Yahlukana nomthetho ka-Adam wokwaphula umnqophiso

Umbuzo: Ndikhululekile kuwuphi umthetho?

Impendulo: Ukukhululwa kwisono esikhokelela ekufeni kukwaphula umthetho ka-Adam “wokwaphula umnqophiso” uThixo awawuyalela uAdam! ( kodwa uze ungadli kuwo umthi wokwazi okulungileyo nokubi, kuba mhla uthe wadla kuwo uya kufa ngenene.” ) Lo ngumyalelo ( Genesis 2:17 ) IGenesis 2:17

Umbuzo: Kutheni le nto bonke abantu bephantsi kwesiqalekiso somthetho xa “ookhokho bokuqala” besaphula umthetho?

Impendulo: Kunjengokuba isono sangena ehlabathini ngamntu mnye, uAdam, kwaza ukufa kwaphuma esonweni, ngoko ukufa kwafikela wonke umntu ngenxa yokuba wonke umntu wona. Roma 5:12

Umbuzo: Yintoni isono?

Impendulo: Ukwaphula umthetho kusisono → Nabani na owaphula umthetho sisono; eyoku-1 kaYohane 3:4

Phawula:

Bonke bonile, yaye kuAdam bonke baba phantsi kwesiqalekiso somthetho baza bafa.

Yifa! Aphi amandla akho okoyisa?
Yifa! Luphi ulwamvila lwakho?
Ulwamvila lokufa sisono, amandla esono ngumthetho.
Ukuba ke nifuna ukukhululwa ekufeni, makakhululeke esonweni.
Ukuba ufuna ukukhululwa esonweni, kufuneka ukuba ukhululeke emthethweni wesono.
Amen! Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Imbekiselo kweyoku-1 kwabaseKorinte 15:55-56

(2) nikhululwe kuwo umthetho, nasesiqalekisweni somthetho, ngawo umzimba kaKristu

Bazalwana bam, nani nafa kuwo umthetho ngawo umzimba kaKristu... Ke, ekubeni safayo nje kuwo umthetho, esikhonkxwe ngawo, ngoku sikhululekile kuwo umthetho... Bona kwabaseRoma 7:4,6

UKristu wasikhulula esiqalekisweni somthetho, ngokuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Uqalekisiwe wonke umntu oxhonywe emthini

(3) Uhlawulele abo babephantsi komthetho ukuze sibe ngoonyana

Lithe ke lakuzaliseka ixesha, uThixo wamthuma uNyana wakhe, owazalelwa umfazi, ezelwe phantsi komthetho, ukuze abakhulule ngentlawulelo abaphantsi komthetho, ukuze sikuzuze ukwenziwa oonyana. Galati 4:4-5

Ngoko ke iindaba ezimnandi zikaKrestu ziyasikhulula emthethweni nakwisiqalekiso. Izinto eziluncedo zokukhululeka emthethweni:

1 Apho kungekho mthetho, akukho sigqitho. Roma 4:15
2 Apho kungekho mthetho, isono asibalelwa. Roma 5:13
3 kuba, kungekho mthetho, isono sifile. Roma 7:8
4 Lowo ungenawo umthetho kwaye ongawuthobeliyo umthetho uyatshabalala. Roma 2:12
5 Bonke abona benomthetho, baya kugwetywa ngokomthetho; Roma 12:12

Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Sithandaza kunye kuThixo: Enkosi Bawo waseZulwini ngokuthumela uNyana wakho oyintanda, uYesu, owazalwa phantsi komthetho, waza wasikhulula emthethweni nakwisiqalekiso somthetho ngokufa nesiqalekiso somzimba kaKristu ojinga emthini. UKristu wavuka kwabafileyo ukuze asivelise ngokutsha asenze amalungisa! Fumanisa ukwenziwa kwabantwana njengoNyana kaThixo, khululwa, khululeka, usindiswe, uzalwe ngokutsha, ube nobomi obungunaphakade. Amen

Ngegama leNkosi uYesu Kristu! Amen

Isifundo 4: Ukukholelwa kwivangeli kuyasikhulula esonweni


Umbuzo: Yintoni inguquko?
Impendulo: “Inguquko” ithetha intliziyo etyumkileyo, elusizi, netyumkileyo, isazi ukuba umntu usesonweni, usezinkanukweni, nasezinkanukweni, nakuAdam obuthathaka, nasekufeni;

"Utshintsho" luthetha ukulungiswa. IINDUMISO 51:17 Umbingelelo kaThixo ngumoya owaphukileyo, Thixo, akuyidela intliziyo eyaphukileyo netyumkileyo.

Umbuzo: Uyilungisa njani?

Impendulo: Kholelwa kwivangeli "Inguquko" ayithethi ukukucela ukuba uguqule, uphucule, okanye uguqule "izono" zakho ngokwakho. Intsingiselo yokwenyani "inguquko" kukuba ukholwe yigospile Igospile ingamandla kaThixo okusindisa wonke umntu okholwayo kwivangeli → kusikhulula esonweni, emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni somthetho umntu omdala nobuntu obudala Zenzo, babaleke kuSathana, babaleke kwimpembelelo kaSathana eHadesi, bavuke kunye noKristu, bazalwe ngokutsha, basindiswe, bambathe umntu omtsha, bambathe uKristu. Thixo, ufumane ubomi obungunaphakade!

→→Le yinyani "inguquko"! mawahlaziyeke engqondweni yenu, nambathe ubuntu obutsha ngobulungisa bokwenyaniso nobungcwele— funda kwabase-Efese 4:23-24 .

Yayiyindoda endala, ngoku iyindoda entsha;
Kanye esonweni, ngoku nisebungcweleni;
Ekuqaleni ku-Adam, ngoku kuKristu.
Ukukholelwa kwivangeli → inguquko!
Guqula → Ngaphambili wawungunyana ka-Adam wenziwe ngothuli;

Ngoku unyana kaYesu, uAdam wokugqibela. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Umbuzo: Uyikholelwa njani ivangeli?

Impendulo: Kholelwa kwivangeli! Kholwa nje kuYesu!

Siyakholwa ukuba uYesu Krestu, othunywe nguThixo, wenzele thina umsebenzi wentlawulelo (ukusindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo) lo “msebenzi wentlawulelo” yigospile! Amen. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Umbuzo: Sikholelwa njani kumsebenzi wentlawulelo?

Impendulo: UYesu waphendula, “Nguwo lo umsebenzi kaThixo, ukuba nikholwe kulowo amthumileyo.” Yohane 6:29

Umbuzo: Iqondwa njani le ndinyana?
Impendulo: Kholelwa kuYesu owathunyelwa nguThixo ukuba asenzele umsebenzi wokusikhulula!
Ndakholwa: Umsebenzi kaThixo wosindiso uyasebenza kum, kwaye “umvuzo” womsebenzi kaYesu ubalelwa kwabo “bakholwayo”, kwaye uThixo undibalela njengosebenzileyo → Ndiyafana noMsebenzi, umsebenzi kaThixo Amen!

Ngoko uPawulos uthi kwabaseRoma 1:17! Ubulungisa bukaThixo “ngokholo buya kusindiswa ngokholo!” kwaye ngenxa yokholo→inkolelo, uMoya oyiNgcwele usebenza “ngokuhamba noThixo” ukwenza umsebenzi wohlaziyo, ukuze ufumane uzuko, imivuzo, nezithsaba. Utsho uThixo kwabo bakholwayo, ukuba uyayiqonda na imfihlelo yomsebenzi osemzimbeni?

Umbuzo: (Ukholo) singabalelwa njani njengabasebenzi kunye nokuhamba noThixo?

Impendulo: Kholwani kuYesu Kristu owathunyelwa nguThixo ukuba enze umsebenzi wokuhlangula, waza wasikhulula ezonweni zethu.

(1) INkosi yabeka izono zabo bonke abantu kuYesu

Thina sonke saphambuka njengeegusha, elowo wabuyela endleleni yakhe; Isaya 53:6

(2) UKristu wafela “bonke” abantu

Kuba lusifingile nje uthando lukaKristu;

(3) Abafileyo bakhululwe esonweni

Kuba siyazi ukuba umntu wethu omdala wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni kunye naye, ukuze umzimba wesono uphuthiswe, ukuze singabi sasikhonza isono; Roma 6:6-7

[Phawula:] UYehova uThixo wabeka izono zabo bonke abantu kuYesu, waza uYesu wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni ngenxa yabo bonke, ukuze bonke bafe - 2 Korinte 5:14 → Abo bafileyo bakhululwe esonweni - Roma 6:7; ” bafa, yaye bonke bakhululwa esonweni. Amen! Uyibonile kwaye wayiva. Le yivangeli ethunyelwe ngabakhonzi bakaThixo ukuba baxelele ukuba ukhululwe esonweni, "umvuzo" womsebenzi kaYesu uya kubalelwa kuwe lusindiso lukaThixo Amandla asebenza kwabo “bakholwayo” Le yimfihlelo yosindiso lukaThixo. Uyaqonda?

Ngoko ke, ezi ndaba zilungileyo zingamandla kaThixo okusindisa wonke umntu okholwayo ukuba uYesu wasifela emnqamlezweni ngenxa yezono zethu, ukuze sikhululwe esonweni. Uyawuqonda umzekelo wale “mfundiso” yona?

Masithandaze kunye kuThixo kunye: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo waseZulwini! Isono sakho wasibeka phezu koYesu Kristu, owasifela izono zethu, ukuze sikhululwe ezonweni zethu. Amen! Banoyolo abo bayibonayo, bayivayo, baze bayikholelwe le vangeli “Umvuzo” wentlawulelo kaYesu ubuyiselwa emzimbeni wabo bakholwayo.

Ngegama leNkosi uYesu Kristu! Amen

KwabaseRoma 1:16-17 (Wathi uPawulos) Andinazintloni ngazo iindaba ezilungileyo zikaKristu; kuba zingamandla kaThixo okusindisa bonke abakholwayo, umYuda kuqala, kwanomGrike. 1. Igospile ingamandla kaThixo

Umbuzo: Yintoni ivangeli?

Impendulo: (Wathi uPawulos) Endikunikeleyo nam kukuba: Okokuqala nje, uKristu wazifela izono zethu ngokweZibhalo, wangcwatywa, waza wavuswa ngomhla wesithathu, ngokutsho kweZibhalo. 15:3-4

Umbuzo: Yintoni amandla evangeli?

Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

(1) Ukuvuswa kwabafileyo

ethetha ngoNyana wakhe, uYesu Kristu, iNkosi yethu, owazalwa engowembewu kaDavide ngokwenyama; Roma 1:3-4

(2) Kholelwa kuvuko lukaYesu kwabafileyo

Kamva, xa abafundi abalishumi elinamnye behleli etafileni, wabonakala kubo uYesu, wabakhalimela ngenxa yokungakholwa kwabo, nobulukhuni beentliziyo zabo, kuba bengakholwanga ngabo babembonile emveni kokuvuka kwakhe. Waza wathi kubo, Hambani niye kulo lonke ihlabathi, nizishumayele iindaba ezilungileyo kuyo yonke indalo
UTomas wazibuza ngokuvuka kukaYesu:

Baye emveni kweentsuku ezisibhozo bekwasendlini abafundi; wayenabo noTomas, zavalwa ke iingcango. Waza uYesu wema phakathi, wathi, Uxolo malube nawe. kodwa kholwa!” Wathi uTomas kuye: “Nkosi yam, Thixo wam!” UYesu wathi kuye: “Banoyolo abo bangabonanga bakholwa.” 20:26-29

2. Kholwa kule vangeli kwaye uya kusindiswa

(1) Kholwa uze ubhaptizwe uze usindiswe

Lowo ukholiweyo wabhaptizwa, wosindiswa; Imiqondiso ke eya kulandelana nabo bakholiweyo nantsi:egameni lam baya kukhupha iidemon; , yaye baya kuphila. ” Marko 16:16-18

(2) Kholwa kuYesu uze ube nobomi obungunaphakade

“Kuba wenjenje uThixo ukulithanda kwakhe ihlabathi, ude wancama uNyana wakhe okuphela kwamzeleyo, ukuze bonke abakholwayo kuye bangatshabalali, koko babe nobomi obungunaphakade

(3) Nabani na ophilayo aze akholelwe kuYesu soze afe

UYesu wathi kuye: “Ndim uvuko, ndim ubomi; lowo ukholwayo kum, nokuba ubethe wafa, wodla ubomi; bonke abadla ubomi bekholwa kum, abasayi kufa naphakade

(Ngaba uyayiqonda into eyathethwa yiNkosi uYesu? Ukuba awuqondi, mamela ngenyameko)

Ngoko uPawulos wathi! Kuba andinazintloni ngazo iindaba ezilungileyo zikaKristu, kuba zingamandla kaThixo okusindisa bonke abakholwayo, umYuda kuqala, kwanomGrike. Ngokuba ubulungisa bukaThixo bubonakalaliswa ngazo ezi ndaba zilungileyo; njengokuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Olilungisa uya kudla ubomi obuphuma elukholweni.

Masithandaze kunye: Enkosi Nkosi Yesu ngokufela izono zethu, wangcwatywa, wavuka kwakhona ngomhla wesithathu! UYesu wavuswa kuqala kwabafileyo njengentlahlela, ukuze sibone kwaye sive ivangeli "yokuvuka kwabafileyo". kaYesu, iNkosi uYesu nayo iya kusenza sizimanye naye Uvuko, ukuzalwa ngokutsha, usindiso, ubomi obungunaphakade! articles.author: admin
articles.content:
"Kholwa yiVangeli" 2

Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade!

Namhlanje siqhubeka sihlolisisa ubudlelwane kwaye sabelane "Ukukholelwa kwiVangeli"

Isifundo 2: Yintoni iVangeli?

Masivule iBhayibhile kuMarko 1:15, siyityhile size sifunde kunye:

Wathi, Lizalisekile ixesha, nobukumkani bukaThixo busondele. Guqukani, nikholwe kuzo iindaba ezilungileyo ezi.

Umbuzo: Yintoni ivangeli yobukumkani?

Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

1. UYesu washumayela ivangeli yobukumkani bamazulu

(1) UYesu wazaliswa nguMoya oyiNgcwele waza washumayela iindaba ezilungileyo

“UMoya weNkosi uphezu kwam, ethe ngenxa yokuba indithambisele ukushumayela iindaba ezilungileyo kumahlwempu; ubabalo lukaThixo ngeNtlokoma yeNirvana.”— Luka 4:18-19 .

Umbuzo: Iqondwa njani le ndinyana?

Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

UYesu wabhaptizwa kuMlambo iYordan, ezaliswe nguMoya oyiNgcwele, waza emva kokukhokelelwa entlango ukuba ahendwe, waqalisa ukushumayela iindaba ezilungileyo zobukumkani bamazulu!

“UMoya weNkosi (oko kukuthi, uMoya kaThixo, uMoya oyiNgcwele)
Kum (uYesu),
Ngenxa yokuba Yena (oko kukuthi, uBawo waseZulwini) undithambisile;
Ndicele ukuba ndishumayele iindaba ezilungileyo kumahlwempu (okuthetha ukuthi bahamba ze kwaye abananto, abanabomi nobomi obungunaphakade bhekisa kwiSityhilelo 3:17).

Ndithunyelwe ukuzoxela:

Umbuzo: Ziziphi iindaba ezilungileyo ezanikelwa nguYesu?

Impendulo: Abathinjwa baya kukhululwa

1 Ababethinjwe nguMtyholi,
2 abakhonkxiweyo ngamagunya obumnyama neHadesi;

3 Oko kufa kuthabathileyo kuya kukhululwa.

Iimfama zifumana ukubona: oko kukuthi, akukho namnye kwiTestamente eNdala owabona uThixo, kodwa kwiTestamente eNtsha, ngoku bambonile uYesu, uNyana kaThixo, babona ukukhanya, bakholwa kuYesu ukuba babe nobomi obungunaphakade.

Mabakhululwe abo bacinezelweyo: abo bacinezelwe ngamakhoboka "esono", abo baqalekisiweyo nababotshelelwe ngumthetho, bakhululwe, kwaye babhengeze uMthendeleko weNkoliseko kaThixo! Amen

Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

(2) UYesu wakuxela kwangaphambili ukubethelelwa novuko izihlandlo ezithathu

Ke kaloku, enyuka uYesu esiya eYerusalem, wabathabatha abafundi abalishumi elinababini endleleni, wathi kubo, Niyabona, njengoko sinyuka sisiya eYerusalem, uNyana woMntu uya kunikelwa kubabingeleli abakhulu nababhali bamnikele ekufeni, bamnikele ezintlangeni, zidlale ngaye, zimbethelele emnqamlezweni, abuye avuke ngomhla wesithathu

(3) UYesu wavuswa waza wathumela abafundi bakhe ukuba baye kushumayela iindaba ezilungileyo

Wathi ke uYesu kubo, Ngawo la amazwi endawathethayo kuni ndinani, okokuba zimelwe kukuzaliseka zonke izinto ezibhaliweyo ngam emthethweni kaMoses, nasebaprofetini, nasezindumisweni banokuqonda iZibhalo, baze bathi kubo: “Kubhaliwe kwathiwa, uKristu ufanele eve ubunzima, abuye avuke kwabafileyo ngomhla wesithathu, nokuba kuvakaliswe egameni lakhe inguquko noxolelo lwezono zonke izizwe. Luka 24:44-47

Umbuzo: UYesu wabathuma njani abafundi bakhe ukuba baye kushumayela iindaba ezilungileyo?

Impendulo: Ingcaciso eneenkcukacha ngezantsi (malunga ne-28:19-20)

1 Ukukhulula abantu (ukukholelwa kwiindaba ezilungileyo) esonweni - KwabaseRoma 6:7
2 Ukukhululeka kumthetho nesiqalekiso sawo - Roma 7:6, Gal 3:13
3 Yahlukanani nomntu omdala nezenzo zakhe - Kolose 3:9, Efese 4:20-24
4 Ukuhlangulwa kumandla obumnyama nelabafileyo— Kolose 1:13
5 Ukukhululwa kumandla kaSathana— IZenzo 26:18
6 Ngokuzicingela—Galati 2:20
7 UYesu wavuka kwabafileyo waza wasivelisa ngokutsha— 1 Petros 1:3
8 Kholelwa kwivangeli uze wamkele uMoya oyiNgcwele othenjisiweyo njengetywina - Efese 1:13
9 ukuze sikwamkele ukwenziwa oonyana bakaThixo.”— Gal 4:4-7
10 Bhaptizelwa kuKristu kwaye ube nesabelo ekufeni kwakhe, ukungcwatywa nokuvuka kwakhe - Roma 6: 3-8
11 Yambathani ubuntu obutsha nimambathe uKristu
12 Sindiswa. Fumana ubomi obungunaphakade.
Imbekiselo kuYohane 3:16, eyoku-1 kwabaseKorinte 15:51-54, eyoku-1 kaPetros 1:4-5
Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

2 USimon Petros ushumayela iindaba ezilungileyo

Umbuzo: UPetros wayishumayela njani ivangeli?

Impendulo: Utshilo uSimon Petros

Makabongwe uThixo, uYise weNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Ngokwenceba yakhe enkulu, usinike ukuzalwa ngokutsha ukuze sibe nethemba eliphilileyo ngokuvuka kukaYesu Kristu kwabafileyo, singene kwilifa elingenakonakala, elingenakudyobheka, nelingambatshiyo, eligcinelwe nina emazulwini. Nina bagcinwa ngokwamandla kaThixo ngokholo, niya kulufumana usindiso olulungiselwe ukutyhilwa ngexesha lokugqibela.
…Nizelwe ngokutsha, kungengokwasembewini enokonakala, kungokwasembewini engenakonakala, ngelizwi likaThixo eliphilileyo, elihlala lihleli. …Lilizwi leNkosi kuphela elihlala ngonaphakade. “Ezi ke zi iindaba ezilungileyo ezishunyayelwayo kuni.”— 1 Petros 1:3-5, 23, 25

3. UYohane ushumayela iindaba ezilungileyo

Umbuzo: UYohane wazishumayela njani iindaba ezilungileyo?
Impendulo: Wathi uJohn!
Ekuqaleni kwakukho iTao, kwaye iTao yayikunye noThixo, kwaye iTao yayinguThixo. Lo Lizwi wayekunye noThixo kwasekuqalekeni. …ULizwi ke waba ngumntu, waza wahlala phakathi kwethu, ezele lubabalo nayinyaniso. Sabubukela ubungangamsha bakhe awabunikwa nguYise, njengoko ekukuphela koNyana wakhe; … Akukho namnye wakha wambona uThixo; uNyana okuphela kwamzeleyo, lowo usesifubeni sikaYise, nguye omtyhile. Yohane 1:1-2,14,18
Ngokusingisele kwilizwi lantlandlolo lobomi kwasekuqalekeni, oku koko sikuvileyo, sakubonayo, sakubona ngamehlo ethu, saza sakuchukumisa ngezandla zethu. (Obu bomi butyhilekile, nathi sabubona, siyangqina ke, ukuba sinishumayeza ubomi obungunaphakade, obo bebukuye uYise, babonakaliswa kuthi.) 1 Yohane 1:1-2
“Kuba wenjenje uThixo ukulithanda kwakhe ihlabathi, ude wancama uNyana wakhe okuphela kwamzeleyo, ukuze bonke abakholwayo kuye bangatshabalali, koko babe nobomi obungunaphakade

4 UPawulos ushumayela iindaba ezilungileyo

Umbuzo: UPawulos wayishumayela njani ivangeli?
Impendulo: UPawulos washumayela iindaba ezilungileyo kwiiNtlanga
Ke kaloku, bazalwana, ndiyanazisa iindaba ezilungileyo, endazishumayelayo kuni, nazamkelayo nokuzamkela, nimiyo kuzo;
Into endayinikelayo kuni yaba yile: Okokuqala, kukuba uKristu wafela izono zethu ngokutsho kweZibhalo, nokokuba wangcwatywa, nokokuba wavuswa ngomhla wesithathu ngokutsho kweZibhalo.

1 Korinte 15:1-4

Okulandelayo, siya kugxila ekuthabatheni ivangeli eyashunyayelwa ngumpostile uPawulos kuthi ziNtlanga njengomzekelo, kuba iindaba ezilungileyo ezazishunyayelwa nguPawulos zinenkcukacha ngakumbi kwaye zinzulu, zivumela abantu ukuba bayiqonde iBhayibhile.

Namhlanje sithandaza kunye: Enkosi Nkosi Yesu ngokufela izono zethu, ngokungcwatywa, nokuvuka kwakhona ngomhla wesithathu! Amen. Nkosi Yesu! Ukuvuka kwakho kwabafileyo kutyhilile iindaba ezilungileyo. Amen

Ngegama leNkosi uYesu Kristu! Amen

IVangeli enikezelwe kumama wam othandekayo.

Bazalwane noodade Khumbulani ukuyiqokelela.

Umbhalo weVangeli ovela:

ibandla leNkosi uYesu Krestu

articles.title: Kholelwa kwiVangeli 1
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
"Kholelwa kwiVangeli" 1

Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade!

Namhlanje sihlolisisa ubudlelwane kwaye sabelane "Ukukholelwa kwiVangeli"

Masivule iBhayibhile kuMarko 1:15, siyityhile size sifunde kunye:

Wathi, Lizalisekile ixesha, nobukumkani bukaThixo busondele. Guqukani, nikholwe kuzo iindaba ezilungileyo ezi.

Intshayelelo:
Ngokusuka ekwazini uThixo oyinyaniso, simazi uYesu Kristu!

→→Kholwa kuYesu!

Isifundo 1: UYesu siSiqalo seVangeli

Ukuqaleka kwayo ivangeli kaYesu Kristu, uNyana kaThixo. UMarko 1:1

Umbuzo: Kholelwa kwivangeli yintoni okholelwa kuyo?
Impendulo: Ukukholelwa kwivangeli →→ kuku (kukholelwa) kuYesu! Igama likaYesu yivangeli Igama elithi "uYesu" lithetha ukuthi: kuba uya kusindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo

Umbuzo: Kutheni uYesu esisisiqalo sevangeli?

Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

1. UYesu nguThixo ongunaphakade

1UThixo okhoyo, ukho

Wathi uThixo kuMoses, “Ndinguye endinguye”;
Umbuzo: Wayephila nini uYesu?
Impendulo: IMizekeliso 8:22-26
“Ekuqaleni kwendalo yeNkosi,
Ekuqaleni, ngaphambi kokuba kudalwe zonke izinto, ndandikho mna (oko kukuthi, uYesu).
Ukususela kwaphakade, ukususela ekuqaleni,
Phambi kokuba ihlabathi libekho, ndasekwa.
Akukho nzonzobila, akukho mthombo wamanzi amaninzi, endazalelwa kuwo.
Ndazalwa zingekabekwa iintaba, Naphambi kokuba zibekho iinduli.

Engekawenzi uYehova umhlaba namasimi alo, nomhlaba wehlabathi, ndawazala mna. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

2 UYesu nguAlfa no-Omega

“Mna ndinguAlfa no-Omega, uSomandla, lowo wayekho, owayekho, nozayo,” itsho iNkosi uThixo

3 UYesu ungowokuqala nowokugqibela

Mna ndinguAlfa no-Omega, ndingowokuqala nowokugqibela; ” ISityhilelo 22:13

2. Umsebenzi kaYesu Wokudala

Umbuzo: Ngubani owadala ihlabathi?

Impendulo: UYesu wadala ihlabathi.

1 UYesu wadala amahlabathi

UThixo, lowo wayethetha nookhokho bethu kudala ngabo abaprofeti izihlandlo ezininzi, nangeendlela ezininzi, uthethe nathi kule mihla yokugqibela ngoNyana, ammise njengendlalifa yezinto zonke, awadala ngaye izulu lonke. Hebhere 1:1-2

2 Zonke izinto zadalwa nguYesu

Ekuqaleni uThixo wadala izulu nomhlaba - Genesis 1:1

Izinto zonke zenziwa ngaye (uYesu) kwaye ngaphandle kwakhe akubangakho nto idaliweyo. Malunga no-1:3

3 UThixo wamdala umntu ngokomfanekiselo wakhe nangokufana naye

UThixo wathi: “Masidale umntu ngokomfanekiselo wethu (ebhekisela kuYise, kuNyana, nakuMoya oyiNgcwele), ngokufana nathi, babe nobukhosi ezintlanzini zolwandle, ezintakeni zezulu, nasezinkomeni nasemhlabeni, nasehlabathini lonke, zonke izinambuzane ezinambuzelayo emhlabeni.

Wamdala ke uThixo umntu ngokomfanekiselo wakhe; wamdala ngokomfanekiselo kaThixo; Genesis 1:26-27

【Phawula:】

Owangaphambili "uAdam" wadalwa ngokomfanekiselo kunye nokufana noThixo ngokwakhe (uYesu "wayesisithunzi" somfanekiso kaThixo kunye nokufana naye umzimba! —Funda kwabaseKolose 2:17, Hebhere 10:1; Roma 10:4.

Xa “isithunzi” sityhiliwe, → nguAdam wokugqibela onguYesu! UAdam wangaphambili "wayesisithunzi" → uAdam wokugqibela, uYesu → nguAdam wokwenene, ngoko ke uAdam ngunyana kaThixo! Bona uLuka 3:38 . KuAdam bonke bafa ngenxa “yesono” kuKristu bonke baya kuvuswa ngenxa “yokuzalwa ngokutsha”! Bona eyoku-1 kwabaseKorinte 15:22 . Ke, ndiyazibuza ukuba uyayiqonda na?

Abo bakhanyiswa nguMoya oyiNgcwele baya kuqonda xa bebona kwaye besiva, kodwa abanye abantu abayiqondi nokuba imilebe yomile. Abo bangayiqondiyo banokuphulaphula ngokucothayo baze bathandaze ngakumbi kuThixo lowo ufunayo uya kuyifumana, yaye iNkosi iya kumvulela ucango lowo unkqonkqozayo! Kodwa animele niyichase indlela yenyaniso kaThixo, xa abantu bechasa indlela yokwenyaniso, bengalwamkeli uthando lwenyaniso, uThixo uya kubanika intliziyo egwenxa, abenze bakholelwe kubuxoki Ngaba uyakholelwa ukuba awusoze uyiqonde ivangeli okanye ukuzalwa ngokutsha de ufe? Jonga kwi-2:10-12.
(Ngokomzekelo, eyoku- 1 kaYohane 3:9, 5:18 ) Nabani na ozelwe nguThixo “akasayi kona yaye akoni,” abantu abaninzi bathi “umntu ozelwe nguThixo” useza kona.” Siyintoni isizathu? Ngaba uyakuqonda ukuzalwa kwakhona?
Kanye njengoYuda, owalandela uYesu iminyaka emithathu waza wamngcatsha, nabaFarisi ababeyichasile inyaniso, abazange baqonde ukuba uYesu wayenguNyana kaThixo, uKristu, noMsindisi de kwaba sekufeni kwabo.

Ngokomzekelo, "umthi wobomi" ngumfanekiso wokwenene wento yokuqala Kukho "isithunzi" somthi ophantsi komthi wobomi; Yesu! UYesu ungumfanekiso wokwenyani wento yokuqala. Umntu wethu (umntu omdala) uzelwe yinyama ka-Adam kwaye “usithunzi” kwakhona (umntu omtsha) uzelwe ngevangeli likaYesu kwaye ungumzimba kaKristu, oyena ndoqo, kunye nabantwana bakaThixo. Amen! Imbekiselo kweyoku-1 kwabaseKorinte 15:45

3. Umsebenzi kaYesu wokuhlangula

1 Uluntu lwawa kuMyezo wase-Eden

Wathi kuAdam, Ngokuba umphulaphule umkakho, wadla kuwo umthi, endakuwisela umthetho ngawo, ndathi, Ungawudli, uqalekisiwe umhlaba ngenxa yakho;
Kufuneka usebenze ubomi bakho bonke ukufumana ukutya emhlabeni.

Umhlaba uya kukuntshulela imithana enameva neenkunzane, yaye uya kudla umfuno wasendle. Uya kudla ukudla kokubila kobuso bakho, ude ubuyele emhlabeni owazalwa kuwo. Uluthuli, uya kubuyela kwaseluthulini. ” Genesis 3:17-19

2 Emva kokuba isono singene ehlabathini ngenxa ka-Adam, ukufa kwabafikela bonke abantu

Kanye njengokuba isono sangena ngamntu mnye ehlabathini, kwaza kwangena ukufa ngaso isono, ngokunjalo ukufa kwabafikela bonke abantu ngenxa yokuba bonke bonayo. Roma 5:12

3 UThixo wanikela ngoNyana wakhe okuphela kwamzeleyo, uYesu, yaye uya kuba nobomi obungunaphakade.

“Kuba wenjenje uThixo ukulithanda kwakhe ihlabathi, ude wancama uNyana wakhe okuphela kwamzeleyo, ukuze bonke abakholwayo kuye bangatshabalali, koko babe nobomi obungunaphakade .Usindisiwe

4 UYesu luthando lokuqala

1 uthando lokuqala

Nangona kunjalo, kukho into enye endimele ndikusole ngayo: ulushiyile uthando lwakho lokuqala. ISityhilelo 2:4

Umbuzo: Luyintoni uthando lokuqala?
Impendulo: “UThixo” uluthando (Yohane 4:16) uYesu ungumntu noThixo! Ngoko ke, uthando lokuqala nguYesu!

Ekuqaleni, wawunethemba losindiso “ngokukholwa” kuYesu kamva, kwafuneka uthembele kwisimilo sakho “ukukholwa”, uya kumshiya uYesu, kwaye uya kuyishiya imvelaphi yakho uthando. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

2 Umyalelo wokuqala

Umbuzo: Yayithini iodolo yokuqala?

Impendulo: Sifanele sithandane. Nguwo lo umthetho enawuvayo kwasekuqalekeni. eyoku- 1 kaYohane 3:11

3 Mthande uThixo ummelwane njengoko uzithanda ngako.

“Mfundisi, owona myalelo mkhulu emthethweni nguwuphi na?” Wathi uYesu kuye: “Uze uyithande iNkosi uThixo wakho ngentliziyo yakho iphela, nangomphefumlo wakho uphela, nangengqondo yakho iphela . Owesibini ke ufana nawo: Uze umthande ummelwane wakho njengoko uzithanda ngako.

Ngoko ke, “Ukuqaleka kwayo ivangeli kaYesu Kristu, uNyana kaThixo, nguYesu! Amen, niyaqonda na?

Okulandelayo, siya kuqhubeka ukwabelana itekisi yevangeli: "Kholwani kuyo iVangeli" UYesu isiqalo seendaba ezilungileyo, isiqalo sothando, ingqalo yazo zonke izinto! Yesu! Eli gama "yivangeli" → ukusindisa abantu bakho ezonweni zabo! Amen

Masithandaze kunye: Enkosi Abba Bawo wethu waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi kuMoya oyiNgcwele ngokusikhanyisela nokusikhokelela ekubeni sazi ukuba uYesu Krestu yingqalo yevangeli, ingqalo yothando, nengqalo yazo zonke izinto. ! Amen.

Ngegama leNkosi uYesu! Amen

IVangeli enikezelwe kumama wam othandekayo.

Mawethu! Khumbula ukuyiqokelela.

Umbhalo weVangeli ovela:

ibandla leNkosi uYesu Krestu

articles.title: Ukwazi uYesu Kristu 8
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
"Ukwazi uYesu Kristu" 8

Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade!

Namhlanje siyaqhubeka nokufunda, ubudlelane, kwaye sabelane "Ukwazi uYesu Kristu"

Masivule iBhayibhile kuYohane 17:3, siyityhile size sifunde kunye:

Bubo ke obu ubomi obungunaphakade, ukuba mabakwazi, wena ukuphela koThixo oyinyaniso, naye uYesu Kristu omthumileyo. Amen

Isifundo 8: UYesu nguAlfa no-Omega

(1) INkosi nguAlfa no-Omega

INkosi uThixo ithi: “Mna ndinguAlfa no-Omega (uAlfa, u-Omega: owokuqala nowokugqibela unobumba ababini besiGrike), uSomandla, lowo wayekho, ukhoyo nozayo

Umbuzo: Kuthetha ukuthini u-“Alfa no-Omega”?

Impendulo: UAlfa no-Omega → ngoonobumba besiGrike "owokuqala nowokugqibela", nto leyo ethetha owokuqala nowokugqibela.

Umbuzo: Ithini intsingiselo yexesha eladlulayo, elangoku nelingunaphakade?

Impendulo: “Kwixesha elidlulileyo” lithetha uSomandla ngonaphakade, isiqalo, isiqalo, isiqalo, ngaphambi kokuba ihlabathi libekho → INkosi uThixo uYesu wayekho, ukho namhlanje, yaye useza kuhlala ngonaphakade! Amen.

Incwadi yeMizekeliso ithi:

“Ekuqaleni kwendalo yeNkosi,
Ekuqaleni, ngaphambi kokuba kudalwe zonke izinto, ndandikho mna (oko kukuthi, uYesu).
Ukususela kwaphakade, ukususela ekuqaleni,
Phambi kokuba ihlabathi libekho, ndasekwa.
Akukho nzonzobila, akukho mthombo wamanzi amakhulu, mna (ndibhekisa kuYesu) ndizelwe.
Ndazalwa zingekabekwa iintaba, Naphambi kokuba zibekho iinduli.
Engekawenzi uYehova umhlaba namasimi alo, nomhlaba wehlabathi, ndawazala mna.
(UBawo waseZulwini) Uwasekile amazulu, kwaye mna (ndibhekisa kuYesu) ndikhona;
Wenza isangqa ebusweni benzonzobila. Uloqinisa izulu phezulu; uzinzinzisa iimithombo ngaphantsi, umise imida yolwandle; uvingca amanzi ukuba angaweli elizwini lakhe, useke iziseko zehlabathi.
Ngelo xesha mna (uYesu) ndandinaye (uBawo) ingcibi (injineli),
Uyoliswa Ngaye yonke imihla, ehlala evuya ebusweni bakhe, evuya kwindawo ayilungiselele umntu (ebhekisa eluntwini) ukuba ahlale kuyo, kwaye (uYesu) uyakuvuyela ukuhlala phakathi kwabantu.

Ke ngoko, bonyana, ndiveni; Hayi, uyolo lwalowo uzigcinayo iindlela zam! IMizekeliso 8:22-32

(2) UYesu ungowokuqala nowokugqibela

Ndithe ndakumbona, ndawa ezinyaweni zakhe, ndaba njengofileyo. Wasibeka isandla sakhe sokunene phezu kwam, wathi, Musa ukoyika; ndingowokuqala nowokugqibela;

lowo udla ubomi ndandifile, yabona, ndidla ubomi ngonaphakade kanaphakade; ISityhilelo 1:17-18

Umbuzo: Ithetha ukuthini eyokuqala neyokugqibela?

Impendulo: "Okokuqala" kuthetha ukusuka phakade, ukususela ekuqaleni, ekuqaleni, ekuqaleni, ngaphambi kokuba ihlabathi libekho → UYesu wayesele ekho, wasekwa, waza wazalwa! “Isiphelo” sibhekisela kwisiphelo sehlabathi, xa uYesu enguThixo ongunaphakade.

Umbuzo: UYesu wafela bani?

Impendulo: UYesu wafa “kwakanye” ngenxa yezono zethu, wangcwatywa, waza wavuka kwakhona ngomhla wesithathu. 1 Korinte 15:3-4

Umbuzo: UYesu wafela izono zethu waza wangcwatywa.

Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

1 Sikhululeni esonweni

Ukuze singabi saba ngamakhoboka esono - Roma 6:6-7

2 Ukukhululeka kumthetho nesiqalekiso sawo - Roma 7:6, Gal 3:13
3 Nizihlubile nje umntu omdala, nezenzo zakhe.”— Kolose 3:9
4 nithi, sanikhuphula inkanuko, nenkanuko yenyama, Gal 5:24
5 Ayisendim ophilayo ngokuphuma kum, Gal 2:20
6 Ukuphuma ehlabathini—Yohane 17:14-16

7 Uhlangulwe kuSathana— IZenzo 26:18

Umbuzo: UYesu wavuswa kwabafileyo ngosuku lwesithathu.
Impendulo: Sithethelele! Roma 4:25 . Masivuswe, sizalwe ngokutsha, sisindiswe, sithathwe njengoonyana bakaThixo, kwaye sibe nobomi obungunaphakade kunye noKristu! Amen

(UYesu) wasihlangula egunyeni lobumnyama (esibhekisa ekufeni naseHadesi) waza wasifudusela ebukumkanini boNyana wakhe oyintanda;

Ngoko ke, iNkosi uYesu yathi: “Ndandifile, yaye ngoku ndidla ubomi ngonaphakade kanaphakade, yaye ndinezitshixo zokufa nezeHadesi. Uyakuqonda na oku?

(3) UYesu usisiqalo nesiphelo

Sathi kum, La mazwi ayinyaniso, athembekile. INkosi, uThixo womoya wabaprofeti, yasithuma isithunywa sakhe sasemazulwini ukubabonisa abakhonzi bakhe izinto ezimele ukubakho kamsinya yiza kuwe ngokukhawuleza.” Banoyolo abo bazithobelayo iziprofetho zale ncwadi! “NdinguAlfa no-Omega; "

ISityhilelo 22:6-7, 13

Enkosi Bawo wethu waseZulwini, iNkosi uYesu Krestu, noMoya oyiNgcwele ngokuba nathi bantwana ngamaxesha onke, ekhanyisela amehlo entliziyo yethu rhoqo, kwaye esikhokele thina bantwana (iintetho ezisi-8 zizonke) Uviwo, ubudlelane kunye nokwabelana: Yazi uYesu Kristu lowo bathumele Amen

Masithandaze kunye: U-Abba Othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Sikhokelele kuyo yonke inyaniso kwaye siyazi iNkosi uYesu: Yena uKrestu, uNyana kaThixo, uMsindisi, uMesiya, noThixo osinika ubomi obungunaphakade! Amen.

Ithi iNkosi uYehova: “Mna ndinguAlfa no-Omega, mna ndingowokuqala nowokugqibela, mna isiqalo nesiphelo, mna ndinguSomandla, lowo wayekho, wayekho, nozayo. Amen!

Nkosi Yesu, nceda uze ngokukhawuleza! Amen

Ndiyakucela ngegama leNkosi uYesu! Amen

articles.title: Ukwazi uYesu Kristu 7
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
"Ukwazi uYesu Kristu" 7

Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade!

Namhlanje siza kuqhubeka nokufunda, ubudlelane, kwaye sabelane "Ukwazi uYesu Krestu"

Masivule iBhayibhile kuYohane 17:3, siyityhile size sifunde kunye:

Bubo ke obu ubomi obungunaphakade, ukuba mabakwazi, wena ukuphela koThixo oyinyaniso, nokwazi uYesu Kristu omthumileyo. Amen

Isifundo 7: UYesu usisonka sobomi

Kuba isonka sikaThixo ngulowo uhla evela ezulwini aze alinike ubomi ihlabathi. Bathi ke bona, Nkosi, sinike oko kutya ngamaxesha onke. ” Wathi uYesu, “Ndim isonka sobomi. lowo uzayo kum, akasayi kulamba; Yohane 6:33-35

Umbuzo: UYesu usisonka sobomi! Ngoko ngaba "imana" ikwasisonka sobomi?
Impendulo: "Imana" uThixo awawisa entlango kwiTestamente eNdala ngumzekelo wesonka sobomi kunye nomfuziselo kaKristu, kodwa "imana" "sisithunzi" → "isithunzi" sibonakala singuYesu Kristu, kwaye UYesu uyimana yokwenene, kukutya kokwenene kobomi! Ngoko, uyayiqonda?
Ngokomzekelo, kwiTestamente eNdala, “imbiza yegolide enemana, nentonga ka-Aron ehlumayo, namacwecwe amabini omthetho” awayegcinwe kwityeya yomnqophiso zonke zazifuzisela uKristu. Imbekiselo kumaHebhere 9:4
“Imana” isithunzi nomfuziselo, ayisosonka sokwenene sobomi AmaSirayeli afa emva kokuba etye “imana” entlango.

Ngoko ke iNkosi uYesu yathi: “Inene, inene, ndithi kuni, Lowo ukholwayo unobomi obungunaphakade. nithi niyidle, anisayi kufa.

(1)Isonka sobomi ngumzimba kaYesu

Umbuzo: Yintoni isonka sobomi?
Impendulo: Umzimba kaYesu sisonka sobomi, kwaye igazi likaYesu bubomi bethu! Amen

Ndim isonka esiphilileyo, esi sehlayo emazulwini; Isonka endiya kumnika sona mna yinyama yam, endiya kuyinikela ubomi behlabathi. Abambana ngoko amaYuda, esithi, Angathini na lo ukusinika inyama yakhe siyidle? ” Yohane 6:51-52

(2) Ukutya inyama yeNkosi nokusela igazi leNkosi kuya kukhokelela kubomi obungunaphakade

Wathi uYesu: “Inene, inene, ndithi kuni, Ukuba anithanga niyidle inyama yoNyana woMntu, nilisele igazi lakhe, aninabo ubomi kuni. Lowo uyidlayo eyam inyama, alisele elam igazi, unobomi obungunaphakade, ekugqibeleni. Lowo uyidlayo eyam inyama, alisele negazi lam, uhleli kum, nam ndihleli kuye

(3) Abantu abatya isonka sobomi baya kuphila ngonaphakade

Umbuzo: Ukuba umntu uthe wadla isonka sobomi, akasayi kufa!
Abakholwayo badla isidlo seNkosi ebandleni, badla isonka seNkosi sobomi;

Impendulo: Ukuba umntu uyidla inyama yeNkosi, alisele igazi leNkosi, uya kuba nobomi bukaKristu → Obu bomi (1 ozelwe ngamanzi nangoMoya, 2 ozelwe ilizwi lokwenyaniso leendaba ezilungileyo, 3) ozelwe nguThixo), obu “mntu mtsha” ubomi buzelwe nguThixo Ungaze ukubone ukufa! Amen. Qaphela: Siza kuchaza ngokweenkcukacha xa sabelane "Ukuzalwa kwakhona" kwixesha elizayo!

(Ngokomzekelo) UYesu wathi kuMarta: “Ndim uvuko, ndim ubomi; lowo ukholwayo kum, nokuba ubethe wafa, wodla ubomi; odla ubomi ekholwa kum, akasayi kufa naphakade. " ” Yohane 11:25-26

Inyama, eyaphuma “ngothuli” lukakhokho wethu uAdam yaza “yazalwa ngabazali bethu, kwathengiswa ngayo esonweni esitshabalalayo, esikubona ukufa. Bonke abantu bafa kanye.”

Kuphela ngabo baye bavuswa nguThixo, abavuswe kunye noKristu, abayidlayo inyama yeNkosi baze basele igazi leNkosi, abanobomi bukaKristu ubomi obungunaphakade kwaye akasayi kukubona ukufa! UThixo uya kusivusa kwakhona ngomhla wokugqibela, oko kukuthi, inkululeko yemizimba yethu. Amen! “Umntu omtsha” ozelwe nguThixo, ohlala kuKristu, lowo ufihliweyo kunye noKrestu kuye uThixo, ehleli ezintliziyweni zenu, uya kubonakala ngokwenyama kwixesha elizayo, abonakale kunye noKrestu ebuqaqawulini. Amen!

Ngoko, uyayiqonda? Kolose 3:4

Masithandaze kunye: Abha, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi kuMoya oyiNgcwele ngokubakhokelela bonke abantwana bakho kuzo zonke iinyaniso kwaye ukwazi ukubona iinyaniso zasemoyeni, kuba amazwi akho angumoya kwaye abubomi! Nkosi Yesu! Ukuba umntu uthe watya okunene oku kutya, uya kuphila ngonaphakade. Enkosi Bawo waseZulwini ngokusinika oku kutya kokwenyani kobomi ukuze sibe nobomi bukaKristu ngaphakathi kwethu. Amen. Isiphelo sehlabathi siya kuba kukubuya kukaKristu, kwaye ubomi bomntu omtsha nomzimba buya kubonakala, bubonakala kunye noKristu ebuqaqawulini. Amen!

Ngegama leNkosi uYesu Kristu! Amen

Mawethu! Khumbula ukuyiqokelela.
