articles.title: Ukwazi uYesu Kristu 6
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
"Ukwazi uYesu Kristu" 6

Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade!

Namhlanje siza kuqhubeka nokufunda, ubudlelane, kwaye sabelane "Ukwazi uYesu Krestu"

Masivule iBhayibhile kuYohane 17:3 size siyifunde kunye:

Bubo ke obu ubomi obungunaphakade, ukuba mabakwazi, wena ukuphela koThixo oyinyaniso, nokwazi uYesu Kristu omthumileyo. Amen

Isifundo 6: UYesu uyindlela, inyaniso, nobomi

Wathi uTomas kuye, Nkosi, asazi apho uya khona; singathini na ke ukuyazi indlela? Wathi uYesu kuye, Ndim indlela, ndim inyaniso, ndim ubomi; Bawo ngaphandle kwam

Umbuzo: INkosi yindlela! Yindlela enjani le?

Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

1. Indlela yomnqamlezo

“Umnyango” Umnyango Ukuba sifuna ukufumana le ndlela, simele siqale sazi ukuba ngubani “osivulela ucango” ukuze siyibone le ndlela esa kubomi obungunaphakade.

(1) UYesu lucango! sivulele umnyango

Ithe ke iNkosi, Ndim isango, lowo uthe wangena ngam, wosindiswa; Yohane 10:9

(2) Makhe sibone indlela esa kubomi obungunaphakade

Nabani na ofuna ukufumana ubomi obungunaphakade makahambe ngendlela yomnqamlezo kaYesu!
(UYesu) wasibizela ndawonye isihlwele, kwanabafundi bakhe, wathi kubo, Ukuba ubani uthanda ukundilandela, makazincame, awuthwale umnqamlezo wakhe, andilandele.

Kuba othe wathanda ukuwusindisa umphefumlo wakhe, wolahlekelwa nguwo; ke yena othe wawulahla umphefumlo wakhe ngenxa yam, nangenxa yeendaba ezilungileyo ezi, wowusindisa. Marko 8:34-35

(3) Sindiswa uze ufumane ubomi obungunaphakade

Umbuzo: Ndingabusindisa njani ubomi bam?

Impendulo: "Ithi iNkosi" Lahla ubomi bakho kuqala.

Umbuzo: Ungaphulukana njani nobomi bakho?
Impendulo: Thabatha umnqamlezo wakho ulandele uYesu, “kholwa” kwivangeli yeNkosi uYesu, ubhaptizwe kuKristu, ubethelelwe emnqamlezweni noKristu, uwutshabalalise umzimba wakho wesono, uphulukane nobomi bakho “obudala” kuAdam; yaye ukuba uKristu wafa, wangcwatywa, wavuswa, wazalwa ngokutsha, waza wasindiswa, uya kuba nobomi “obutsha” obavuswa kuAdam wokugqibela [uYesu]. Imbekiselo kumaRoma 6:6-8

Ngoko ke, uYesu wathi: "Indlela yam" → le ndlela yindlela yomnqamlezo. Ukuba abantu ehlabathini abakholelwa kuYesu, abayi kuqonda ukuba le yindlela esa kubomi obungunaphakade, indlela yasemoyeni, nendlela yokusindisa ubomi babo. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

2. UYesu uyinyaniso

Umbuzo: Yintoni inyaniso?

Impendulo: "Inyaniso" ingunaphakade.

(1) UThixo uyinyaniso

UYOHANE 1:1 Ekuqalekeni ube ekho uLizwi, waye uLizwi ekuye uThixo, waye uLizwi enguThixo.
Yohane 17:17 Bangcwalise ngayo inyaniso;

Igama elithi "Tao" → Thixo, "iTao" yakho yinyaniso, ke ngoko, uThixo uyinyaniso! Amen. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

(2) UYesu uyinyaniso

Ekuqalekeni ube ekho uLizwi, waye uLizwi ekuye uThixo, waye uLizwi enguThixo; kwaye amazwi awathethayo angumoya, ubomi, nenyaniso. Amen. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

(3) UMoya Oyingcwele uyinyaniso

Lo nguYesu Kristu oweza ngamanzi negazi, kungekhona ngamanzi odwa, kodwa ngamanzi negazi, engqina ngoMoya oyiNgcwele; eyoku- 1 kaYohane 5:6-7

3. UYesu bubomi

Umbuzo: Buyintoni ubomi?
Impendulo: UYesu bubomi!
Kuye (uYesu) ubomi, baye obo bomi bulukhanyiso eluntwini. Yohane 1:4
Obu bungqina bubokuba, uThixo usinike ubomi obungunaphakade; Ukuba umntu unaye uNyana kaThixo (uYesu), unobomi ukuba akanaye uNyana kaThixo, akanabo ubomi. Ngoko, uyayiqonda? eyoku- 1 kaYohane 5:11-12

Umbuzo: Ngaba ubomi bethu benyama ka-Adam bunobomi obungunaphakade?

Impendulo: Ubomi buka-Adam abunabo ubomi obungunaphakade kuba uAdam wona waza wathengiswa esonweni, nathi sathengiswa esonweni Abo baphuma kumzimba wesono, inyama iluthuli yaye baya kubuyela eluthulini, ngoko abanakubudla ilifa ubomi obungunaphakade, yaye konakalayo akunakudla ilifa ukungonakali. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Bona amaRoma 7:14 neGenesis 3:19

Umbuzo: Sibufumana njani ubomi obungunaphakade?

Impendulo: Kholwa kuYesu, kholelwa kwigospile, uqonde indlela eyiyo, kwaye wamkele uMoya oyiNgcwele othenjisiweyo njengetywina! Zalwa ngokutsha, wamkele ubunyana bukaThixo, ambathe umntu omtsha, ambathe uKristu, usindiswe, ube nobomi obungunaphakade! Amen. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Sabelana ngayo apha namhlanje! Imithandazo yendoda elilungisa inamandla kwaye iyasebenza, ukuze bonke abantwana babe nobungqina kubabalo lukaThixo.

Masithandaze kunye: Abha, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Krestu, siyambulela uMoya oyiNgcwele ngokusoloko ekhanyisela amehlo entliziyo yethu ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni kwaye siyiqonde iBhayibhile, ukuze bonke abantwana bazi ukuba uYesu unguNyana kaThixo. INkosi uYesu iyasivulela umnyango masibone ukuba le ndlela yomnqamlezo yindlela yobomi obungunaphakade. Thixo! Usivulele indlela entsha nephilileyo yokudlula emkhusaneni Lo mkhusane ungumzimba wakhe (uYesu), usivumela ukuba singene kwiNgcwele kaNgcwele ngokuzithemba, okukukungena ebukumkanini bezulu kunye nobomi obungunaphakade! Amen

Ngegama leNkosi uYesu Kristu! Amen

IVangeli enikezelwe kumama wam othandekayo.

Mawethu! Khumbula ukuyiqokelela.

articles.author: admin
articles.content:
"Ukwazi uYesu Kristu" 5

Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade!

Namhlanje siyaqhubeka nokufunda, ubudlelane, kwaye sabelane "Ukwazi uYesu Kristu"

Masivule iBhayibhile kuYohane 17:3, siyityhile size sifunde kunye:

Bubo ke obu ubomi obungunaphakade, ukuba mabakwazi, wena ukuphela koThixo oyinyaniso, nokwazi uYesu Kristu omthumileyo. Amen

Isifundo 5: UYesu nguKrestu, uMsindisi, noMesiya

(1) UYesu nguKristu

Umbuzo: Uthetha ukuthini uKristu, uMsindisi, uMesiya?

Impendulo: "uKristu" ngumsindisi → ubhekisa kuYesu,

Igama elithi "uYesu" lithetha
Ukuze asindise abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo. Mateyu 1:21
ngokuba nizalelwe namhlanje emzini kaDavide uMsindisi, uKristu iNkosi. Luka 2:11

Ngoko ke, “uYesu” nguKristu, uMsindisi, noMesiya. Ngoko, uyayiqonda? Imbekiselo kuYohane 1:41

(2) UYesu nguMsindisi

Umbuzo: Kutheni uThixo esisindisa?

Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

1 Kuba bonile bonke, basilela eluzukweni lukaThixo;
2 Kuba umvuzo wesono kukufa; ke sona isipho sikaThixo bubomi obungunaphakade, kuKristu Yesu iNkosi yethu.

Roma 6:23

Umbuzo: Sivela phi “isono” sethu?

Impendulo: Ukusuka kukhokho "uAdam".

Kunjengokuba kanye isono sangena ehlabathini ngamntu mnye (uAdam), kwaza ukufa kwaphuma esonweni, ngoko ukufa kwabafikela bonke abantu ngenxa yokuba bonke abantu bonayo. Roma 5:12

(3) UYesu Kristu othunywe nguThixo uyasisindisa

Umbuzo: UThixo usisindisa njani?

Impendulo: UThixo wathumela uNyana wakhe okuphela kwamzeleyo, uYesu, ukuba asisindise

Uya kuthetha kwaye uchaze ukuqiqa kwakho;
Mabacebisane bodwa.
Ngubani owayixelayo kwamandulo? Ngubani owayixela kwamandulo?
Andinguye na uYehova?
Akukho Thixo ingendim;
Mna ndinguThixo olilungisa, ndingumsindisi;
akukho wumbi ngaphandle kwam.
Bhekani kum, nonke nina ziphelo zehlabathi, yaye niya kusindiswa;
Ngokuba ndinguThixo, akukho wumbi.

Isaya 45:21-22

Umbuzo: Singasindiswa ngubani?

Impendulo: Sindisa ngoYesu Kristu!

Usindiso alukho kuwumbi ngaphandle (kuYesu); kuba akukho gama limbi phantsi kwezulu, linikiweyo phakathi kwabantu, esimele ukusindiswa ngalo. ” IZenzo 4:12

Umbuzo: Kuya kwenzeka ntoni ukuba umntu akakholelwa ukuba uYesu unguye uKristu noMsindisi?

Impendulo: Bamele bafele ezonweni zabo kwaye bonke baya kutshabalala.

Wathi kuwo uYesu, Nina ningabangaphantsi, mna ke ndingowangaphezulu; nina ningabeli hlabathi, ke mna ndingoweli hlabathi. Kungoko ndithi kuni, niya kufela ezonweni zenu; ukuba anikholwa ndim; NguKristu owafela esonweni.”—Yohane 8:23-24.
(Yaphinda yathi iNkosi) Ndithi kuni, Hayi! Ukuba aniguquki (kholwani kwiindaba ezilungileyo), nonke niya kutshabalala ngolo hlobo! ” Luka 13:5

“Kuba wenjenje uThixo ukulithanda kwakhe ihlabathi, ude wancama uNyana wakhe okuphela kwamzeleyo, ukuze bonke abakholwayo kuye bangatshabalali, koko babe nobomi obungunaphakade

Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Yiyo yonke into esabelana ngayo namhlanje!

Masithandaze kunye: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi uMoya oyiNgcwele ngokuvula amehlo entliziyo yethu ukuze sibone nokuva iinyaniso zasemoyeni, nokwazi iNkosi uYesu njengoKristu, uMsindisi, uMesiya, Sikhulule esonweni, esiqalekisweni somthetho, emandleni obumnyama naseHadesi, kuSathana, nasekufeni. Nkosi Yesu!
Nokuba kuthe kwakho iimfazwe, neendyikitya zokufa, neendlala, neenyikima zomhlaba, zintshutshiso, neenkxwaleko ehlabathini, nokuba ndihamba emfuleni wethunzi lokufa, andiyi koyika bubi, ngokuba unathi, kwaye ndinoxolo Krestu! Wena unguThixo wentsikelelo, liwa lam endizimela ngalo, Ngweletshetshe yam, luphondo losindiso lwam, ngxonde yam, ndawo yokusabela kwam. Amen eGameni leNkosi uYesu Krestu! Amen IVangeli enikezelwe kumama wam othandekayo.

Mawethu! Khumbula ukuyiqokelela.

ibandla leNkosi uYesu Krestu

articles.content:
"Ukwazi uYesu Kristu" 4

Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade!

Namhlanje siza kuqhubeka nokufunda, ubudlelane, kwaye sabelane "Ukwazi uYesu Krestu"

Masivule iBhayibhile kuYohane 17:3, siyityhile size sifunde kunye:

Bubo ke obu ubomi obungunaphakade, ukuba mabakwazi, wena ukuphela koThixo oyinyaniso, nokwazi uYesu Kristu omthumileyo. Amen

Isifundo 4: UYesu nguNyana kaThixo ophilileyo

(1) Yatsho ingelosi! Oko nikuthweleyo nguNyana kaThixo

Isithunywa eso sathi kuye: “Musa ukoyika, Mariya, kuba ubabalwe nguThixo. Uya kumitha, uzale unyana, umthiye igama elinguYesu. Yena uya kuba mkhulu, abizwe ngokuba nguNyana weNkosi; INkosi uYehova iya kumenza mkhulu;

Wathi uMariya kuso isithunywa, Anditshatanga. Saphendula isithunywa sathi, UMoya oyiNgcwele uya kuza phezu kwakho, athi namandla Osenyangweni akusibekele; kungoko loo nto ingcwele izalwa nguwe iya kubizwa ngokuba nguNyana kaThixo. (Okanye: Lowo uza kuzalwa uya kubizwa ngokuba ungcwele, kwaye uya kubizwa ngokuba nguNyana kaThixo). Luka 1:30-35

(2) Wathi uPetros! UnguNyana kaThixo ophilileyo

Wathi uYesu, Ke nina nithi ndingubani na?

Waphendula uSimon Petros wathi kuye, Wena unguye uKristu, uNyana kaThixo ophilileyo

(3) Bonke oomoya abangcolileyo bathi, UYesu nguNyana kaThixo

Xa sukuba oomoya abangcolileyo bembona, baqubuda kuye, bakhale, besithi, Wena unguye uNyana kaThixo

Umbuzo: Kutheni oomoya abangcolileyo bemazi uYesu?

Impendulo: "Umoya ongcolileyo" yingelosi eyawa emva komtyholi, uSathana, kwaye ingumoya ongcolileyo ophethe abantu emhlabeni :4

(4) UYesu ngokwakhe wathi wayenguNyana kaThixo

UYesu wathi: “Akubhaliwe na emthethweni wenu ukuthi, Mna ndithe ningoothixo, isibhalo asinakwaphulwa; nithi kuye, Uyanyelisa, oweza ehlabathini, ezenza uNyana kaThixo?

(5) Ukuvuswa kukaYesu kwabafileyo kwatyhila ukuba wayenguNyana kaThixo

Umbuzo: UYesu wababonisa njani abo babekholelwa kuye ukuba unguNyana kaThixo?

Impendulo: UYesu wavuka kwabafileyo waza wenyuka waya ezulwini ukuze abonise ukuba unguNyana kaThixo!

Kuba kumaxesha amandulo akuzange kubekho mntu emhlabeni owayenokoyisa ukufa, uvuko, nokunyukela ezulwini! NguYesu kuphela owafela izono zethu, wangcwatywa, waza wavuka kwakhona ngomhla wesithathu. UYesu Kristu wavuswa kwabafileyo waza wangqineka enguNyana kaThixo enamandla amakhulu! Amen
ethetha ngoNyana wakhe, uYesu Kristu, iNkosi yethu, owazalwa engowembewu kaDavide ngokwenyama; Roma 1:3-4

(6) Bonke abakholwayo kuYesu bangunyana kaThixo

Ngoko ke nina nonke ningoonyana bakaThixo ngako ukukholwa, nikuKristu Yesu; Galati 3:26

(7) Abo bakholwayo kuYesu banobomi obungunaphakade

“Kuba wenjenje uThixo ukulithanda kwakhe ihlabathi, ude wancama uNyana wakhe okuphela kwamzeleyo, ukuze bonke abakholwayo kuye bangatshabalali, koko babe nobomi obungunaphakade akayi kubufumana ubomi obungunaphakade, ingqumbo kaThixo ihleli phezu kwakhe.”—Yohane 3:16:36.

Sabelana ngayo apha namhlanje!

Bazalwana noodade masithandaze kunye: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi uMoya oyiNgcwele ngokusikhokela ukuba simazi uYesu Krestu owamthumayo waba yinyama waza wazalwa emhlabeni inyaniso kwaye uhlala phakathi kwethu. Thixo! Ndiyakholwa, kodwa andinalo ukholo lwaneleyo Intliziyo yam ebuhlungu! Sikholelwa ukuba uYesu unguKrestu kwaye unguNyana kaThixo! Ngokuba wathi, Wonke okholwayo kuYesu unguNyana kaThixo, unobomi obungunaphakade; yaye uya kusivusa nathi ngomhla wokugqibela. Amen! Ndiyakucela ngegama leNkosi uYesu. Amen IVangeli enikezelwe kumama wam othandekayo.

Mawethu! Khumbula ukuyiqokelela.

Masivule iBhayibhile kuYohane 17:3, siyityhile size sifunde kunye:

Bubo ke obu ubomi obungunaphakade, ukuba mabakwazi, wena ukuphela koThixo oyinyaniso, nokwazi uYesu Kristu omthumileyo. Amen

Isifundo 3: UYesu wabonisa indlela yobomi

Umbuzo: Kufuzisela bani ukuzalwa kukaYesu?

Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

(1) Tyhila uBawo Osezulwini

Ukuba benindazi mna, ninge nimazi noBawo; Ukususela ngoku niyamazi kwaye nimbonile. "
Lowo undibonileyo mna umbonile uBawo; mna ndikuye uBawo, kwaye uBawo ukum, anikholwa na?

Yohane 14:7-11

(2) Ukuvakalisa uThixo

Ekuqaleni kwakukho iTao, kwaye iTao yayikunye noThixo, kwaye iTao yayinguThixo. Lo Lizwi wayekunye noThixo kwasekuqalekeni. …ULizwi ke waba ngumntu, waza wahlala phakathi kwethu, ezele lubabalo nayinyaniso. Sabubukela ubungangamsha bakhe awabunikwa nguYise, njengoko ekukuphela koNyana wakhe; Yohane 1:1-2, 14

Akukho namnye wakha wambona uThixo; uNyana okuphela kwamzeleyo, lowo usesifubeni sikaYise, nguye omtyhile. Yohane 1:18

(3) Bonisa ukukhanya kobomi bomntu

Kuye (uYesu) kukho ubomi, baye obo bomi bulukhanyiselo lwabantu. Yohane 1:4

Ngoko uYesu wathi ebantwini kwakhona, “Ndim ukhanyiselo lwehlabathi. Lowo undilandelayo akasayi kuze ahambe ebumnyameni kodwa woba nokhanyiso lobomi

[Phawula:] “Ubumnyama” bubhekisela eHadesi, isihogo, ukuba ulandela uYesu, ukukhanya kokwenyaniso, akusayi kuphinda ungene kubumnyama beHadesi;
Ukuba iliso lakho aliluboni (aluboni ukukhanya kokwenyaniso), umzimba wakho uphela woba sebumnyameni. Ukuba ukukhanya okungaphakathi kuwe kwenziwe mnyama (ngaphandle kokukhanya kukaYesu), hayi indlela obukhulu ngayo ubumnyama! ” Ngaba uMateyu 6:23?
IGenesis 1:3 Wathi uThixo, Makubekho ukukhanya, kwabakho ukukhanya. Oku “kukhanya” kuthetha ukuba uYesu ulukhanyiso, isikhanyiso sobomi bomntu! Ngolu khanyiso lobomi, uThixo wadala izulu nomhlaba, nazo zonke izinto, ngomhla wesine, wadala izikhanyiso neenkwenkwezi esibhakabhakeni, wazimisa ezulwini ngomhla wesithandathu, indoda nenkazana Wasebenza iintsuku ezintandathu, waphumla ngomhla wesixhenxe. Bhekisela kwiGenesis iSahluko 1-2

Ngoko, uYohane wathi! UThixo ukukukhanya, akukho bumnyama kuye nakanye. Nali ke ilizwi esilivileyo kuYehova, salibuyisela kuni; 1 KAYOHANE 1:5 Niyakuqonda na oku?

(4) Bonisa indlela yobomi

Ngokusingisele kwilizwi lantlandlolo lobomi kwasekuqalekeni, oku koko sikuvileyo, sakubonayo, sakubona ngamehlo ethu, saza sakuchukumisa ngezandla zethu. eyoku-1 kaYohane 1:1
“Ekuqaleni” kuthetha “ekuqalekeni kwendalo kaYehova,
Ekuqaleni, ngaphambi kokuba zonke izinto zidalwe.
Ndikhona (ebhekisa kuYesu).
Ukususela kwaphakade, ukususela ekuqaleni,
Phambi kokuba ihlabathi libekho, ndasekwa.
Akukho nzonzobila, akukho mthombo wamanzi amaninzi, endazalelwa kuwo. IMizekeliso 8:22-24

Wathi uYohane! Eli “lizwi lobomi, uYesu” lityhiliwe, nathi silibonile, yaye ngoku siyangqina ukuba sininika ubomi obungunaphakade, obukuye uYise, kwaye wabonakala kuthi. 1 KAYOHANE 1:2 Niyakuqonda na oku?

Sabelana ngayo apha namhlanje!

Masithandaze kunye: Abha, Bawo wethu osemazulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, siyabulela kuMoya oyiNgcwele ngokusikhokelela kuyo yonke inyaniso, ukuze sibone, sive inyaniso yokomoya, simqonde uYesu Kristu omthumileyo;

1 Ukubonisa uBawo wethu osemazulwini,

2 Ukubonisa uThixo,

3 Ukubonakalisa ukukhanya kobomi bomntu,

4 Bonisa indlela yobomi! Amen

Ngegama leNkosi uYesu Kristu! Amen

UThixo unguMoya (okanye ilizwi), ngoko abo bamnqulayo bamele bamnqule ngomoya nangenyaniso. Yohane 4:24

5 Inyama kaYesu ayikuboni ukonakala - IZenzo 2: 31;
6 UYesu akazange akubone ukufa enyameni; Genesis 3:19

Namhlanje sifunda ngokwabelana ngobudlelwane "Ukwazi uYesu Kristu"

Isifundo 1: Ukuzalwa kukaYesu Krestu

Masivule iiBhayibhile zethu kuYohane 17:3 size sifunde kunye: Bubo ke obu ubomi obungunaphakade, ukuba mabakwazi, wena ukuphela koThixo oyinyaniso, naye uYesu Kristu omthumileyo. Amen

1. UMariya wamitha ngoMoya oyiNgcwele

Ukuzalwa kukaYesu Kristu kubhaliwe ngolu hlobo: UMariya unina wayesele eganelwe uYosefu, kodwa bengekatshati, uMariya wamitha ngoMoya oyiNgcwele. Mateyu 1:18
Ngenyanga yesithandathu, ingelosi uGabriyeli yathunyelwa nguThixo kwisixeko saseGalili (esibizwa ngokuba yiNazarete) kwintombi enyulu eyayiganelwe indoda yendlu kaDavide, egama linguYohane. Igama lentombi leyo lalinguMariya;…yathi ingelosi kuye, Musa ukoyika, Mariya! Uya kumitha, uzale unyana, umthiye igama elinguYesu Angel, “Andikatshati, kutheni kusenzeka oku? Saphendula ke isithunywa, sathi, UMoya oyiNgcwele uya kukufikela, athi namandla Osenyangweni akusibekele; kungoko loo nto ingcwele izalwayo iya kubizwa ngokuba nguNyana kaThixo. Luka 1:26-27,30-31,34-35
Ezi ndinyana zimbini zithi! Wafika uMoya oyiNgcwele kuMariya, waza uMariya wamitha ngoMoya oyiNgcwele, wakhawulwa nguMoya oyiNgcwele, wazalwa yintombi enyulu. Amen!

Umbuzo: Uyintoni umahluko phakathi “kokuzalwa” kukaYesu “nokuzalwa” kwethu?

Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

【Intombi enyulu ekhawulwe ngoMoya oyiNgcwele】

Umbuzo: Yintoni i virgin?

Impendulo: Thina bantu sifumana ukuzalwa → "amantombazana" abizwa ngokuba → amantombazana aselula (iintsana) xa ezelwe ukusuka esibelekweni sikanina, abe → iintombi ezinyulu; emva kokuba amantombazana etshate eHuaichun, abe → ngabafazi;

Ngoko ke, "intombi enyulu" ubudala ngaphambi kokuya esikhathini kwaye ngaphambi kokuba intombazana ikhule kwaye ikhulelwe Ubizwa ngokuba "yintombi"! Umzimba "wentombazana" uqala ukukhupha ngenxa yeempawu ze-physiological, kwaye ukuya exesheni kwenzeka emva kokuphuma kwe-ovulation kukufuna ukutshata otshata indoda azale umntwana "ngumfazi". Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Ngoko ke, uYesu wakhawulwa yiNtombi Enyulu uMariya waza wazalwa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele. Kanye njengomfazi ka-Abraham uSara, owayesele emdala kakhulu yaye wayeka ukuba sexesheni naye uThixo wamthembisa ukuba uza kumitha aze azale unyana, uIsake wayengumntwana uThixo awayemthembise ukuba uza kumzala, yaye uIsake wayefanekisela uKristu. Amen

→→Kuthekani ngathi? Lizalwa ngokumanyaniswa komfazi nendoda Liphuma emhlabeni liphuma kwinyama edalwe ngothuli luka-Adam nobungendawo.” Ngaba uyakuqonda ngokucacileyo oku?

2. Mthiye uYesu

Isithunywa sezulu sathi kuye: “Musa ukoyika, Mariya; ngokuba uThixo ukholekile kuwe; uya kumitha, uzale unyana, umthiye igama elinguYesu.”— Luka 1:30-31 .

Igama elithi Yesu lithetha ukusindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo. Amen

Uya kuzala unyana, umthiye igama elinguYesu, kuba eya kubasindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo. ” Mateyu 1:21

3. Amazwi kaThixo amele azaliseke

Zonke ezi zinto zenzeka ukuze kuzaliseke okwathethwayo yiNkosi ngomprofeti, yathi: “Intombi le iya kumitha, izale unyana, bambize ngegama elinguEmanuweli ( lithetha ukuthi “uThixo unathi.”) Mateyu 1 : 22-23

KULUNGILE! Ukwabelana ngayo apha namhlanje.

Masithandaze kunye: U-Abba Othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi uMoya oyiNgcwele ngokukhanyisela amehlo ethu omoya ukuze sibone kwaye sive inyaniso yasemoyeni. Ngokuba lisisibane seenyawo zam ilizwi lakho, Likukukhanya emendweni wam. Amazwi akho, xa evulwa, akhanyisela, enze abalulamileyo baqonde. Masiyiqonde iBhayibhile kwaye siqonde ukuba uYesu Krestu owamthumayo wakhawulwa yiNtombi enyulu uMariya wazalwa nguMoya oyiNgcwele, wabizwa ngokuba nguYesu! Igama likaYesu livangeli, elithetha ukusindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo. Amen

Ngegama likaYesu! Amen

articles.title: Banoyolo abatshutshiswa ngenxa yobulungisa
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Banoyolo abatshutshiswa ngenxa yobulungisa, kuba ubukumkani bamazulu bobabo.
——Mateyu 5:10

Inkcazo ye-Encyclopedia

Ukunyanzelisa: bi po
Ingcaciso: ukubongoza ngokuqinileyo;
Izithethantonye: ingcinezelo, ingcinezelo, ingcinezelo, ingcinezelo.
Izichasi: ukuzola, ukucenga.

Ukutolikwa kweBhayibhile

KuYesu, ivangeli, iLizwi likaThixo, inyaniso, kunye nobomi obunokusindisa abantu!
Ukunyeliswa, ukunyeliswa, ukucinezelwa, ukuchaswa, intshutshiso, intshutshiso, nokubulawa.

Banoyolo abatshutshiswa ngenxa yobulungisa! Kuba ubukumkani bamazulu bobabo. Ninoyolo nina, ukuba abantu bayaningcikiva, banitshutshisa, bathetha zonke izinto ezikhohlakeleyo ngani bexoka, ngenxa yam. Vuyani nigcobe, kuba umvuzo wenu mkhulu emazulwini. Kwangokunjalo babebatshutshisa abaprofeti ababekho phambi kwenu; "
( Mateyu 5:10-11 )

(1) UYesu watshutshiswa

Ke kaloku, enyuka uYesu esiya eYerusalem, wabathabatha abafundi abalishumi elinababini endleleni, wathi kubo, Niyabona, njengoko sinyuka sisiya eYerusalem, uNyana woMntu uya kunikelwa kubabingeleli abakhulu nababhali uya kunikelwa kuzo iintlanga, zibe yintlekisa, zibethwe, zibethelelwe emnqamlezweni, athi ngomhla wesithathu abuye avuke.

(2) Abapostile batshutshiswa

uPetros
Bendisithi, mandinikhumbuze, ndinivuse, ndisekule ntente, ndisazi nje ukuba liyeza ilixa lokuba ndimke kulo mnquba, njengokuba nayo iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu yandazisayo. Kwaye ndiya kwenza konke okusemandleni am ukuba ezi zinto ndizikhumbule emva kokufa kwam. (Funda eyesi-2 kaPetros 1:13-15.)

UYohane
Mna, Yohane, ndingumzalwana wenu, nedlelane nani ngayo embandezelweni, nasebukumkanini, nasekunyamezeleni kukaYesu; ndaye ke ndisesiqithini ekuthiwa yiPatmos, ngenxa yelizwi likaThixo, nangenxa yobungqina bukaYesu Kristu. ( ISityhilelo 1:9 )

uPawulosi
iintshutshiso, iintlungu ezinjengezo zavela kwa-Antiyokwe, eIkoniyo, naseListra. Ukutshutshiswa okunjengoko ndakuthwalayo, yaza iNkosi yandihlangula kuko konke. ( 2 Timoti 3:11 )

(3) Abaprofeti batshutshiswa

Yerusalem! Yerusalem! Nibabulala abaprofeti, nibagibisele ngamatye abo bathunywe kuni; Kufuthi kangakanani na ndithande ukubabuthela ndawonye abantwana bakho, ngohlobo esithi isikhukukazi siwabuthele ndawonye amathole aso phantsi kwamaphiko aso; ( Luka 13:34 )

(4) Uvuko lukaKristu lusenza sibe ngamalungisa

UYesu wanikelwa ngenxa yezigqitho zethu waza wavuswa ngenxa yokugwetyelwa kwethu (okanye ukuguqulelwa: UYesu wanikelwa ngenxa yezigqitho zethu waza wavuswa ngenxa yokugwetyelwa kwethu). ( Roma 4:25 )

(5) Sigwetyelwa ngesisa lubabalo lukaThixo

Ngoku ke, ngobabalo lukaThixo, sigwetyelwe ngesisa ngako ukukhululwa ngentlawulelo kaYesu Kristu. UThixo wammisela uYesu njengocamagushelo ngegazi likaYesu nangokholo lomntu ukuze abonise ubulungisa bukaThixo; eyaziwa ngokuba ngamalungisa, kwanokuba abagwebele abo bakholwayo kuYesu. ( Roma 3:24-26 )

(6) Ukuba siva ubunzima kunye naye, sozukiswa kunye naye

UMoya oyiNgcwele ungqinelana nomoya wethu ukuba singabantwana bakaThixo. Ukuba ke singabantwana, sikwaziindlalifa, iindlalifa zikaThixo, iindlalifa ke kunye noKrestu. Ukuba siva ubunzima kunye naye, sozukiswa nokuzukiswa kunye naye. ( Roma 8:16-17 )

(7) Thabatha umnqamlezo wakho ulandele uYesu

Waza (uYesu) wazibizela kubo izihlwele nabafundi bakhe, wathi kubo, Ukuba ubani uthanda ukundilandela, makazincame ngokwakhe, awuthwale umnqamlezo wakhe, andilandele; wolahlekelwa ngumphefumlo wakhe; kodwa othe wawulahla umphefumlo wakhe ngenxa yam, nangenxa yeendaba ezilungileyo ezi, wowusindisa (Marko 8:34-35).

(8) Shumayela iindaba ezilungileyo zobukumkani bamazulu

Weza uYesu kubo, wathi kubo, Linikwe mna lonke igunya ezulwini nasemhlabeni. Hambani ngoko niye kuzenza abafundi zonke iintlanga, nibabhaptizela egameni loYise, loNyana, loMoya oyiNgcwele. “ nibabhaptize egameni loYise neloNyana neloMoya oyiNgcwele) nibafundise ukuba bazigcine zonke izinto endiniyalele zona, kwaye mna ndinani yonke imihla, kude kube sekuphelisweni kwephakade eli. 18-20)

9 Xhobani sonke isikrweqe sikaThixo

Ndinawo amazwi okugqibela: Yomelelani eNkosini nasemandleni ayo. Xhobani sonke isikrweqe sikaThixo, ukuze nibe nako ukumisa nibuchase ubuqhinga boMtyholi. Ngokuba umzamo wethu asingowokuzamana negazi nenyama; ngowokuzamana nazo izilawuli, nawo amagunya, nazo iziphatha-hlabathi zobumnyama balo eli phakade, nayo imimoya ekhohlakeleyo kwezasezulwini iindawo. Ngoko ke, qubulani sonke isikrweqe sikaThixo, ukuze nibe nako ukuchasa utshaba ngemini yembandezelo, nithi nikufezile konke, nime nimi. Ngoko yimani niqinile,

1 Bhinqa inyaniso esinqeni sakho,
2 Nxiba isigcina-sifuba sobulungisa;
3 Qhubekani nihamba ngeendaba ezimnandi zoxolo.
4 Ke ngoko, qubulani ikhaka lokholo, enothi ngalo nicime zonke iintolo ezinomlilo zongendawo;
5 ninxibe isigcina-ntloko sosindiso;
6 Thabathani ikrele loMoya, elililizwi likaThixo;
7 Kholosa ngaye uMoya oyiNgcwele kwaye uthandaze ngamaxesha onke esikhungweni;
8 Hlalani nilindile, ningatyhafi, nibathandazela bonke abangcwele.
( Efese 6:10-18 )

(10) Ubuncwane butyhilwa ngesitya sodongwe

Sinabo obu butyebi (uMoya wenyaniso) esityeni sodongwe ukubonisa ukuba la mandla makhulu aphuma kuThixo, angaphumi kuthi. Singqongwe ziintshaba macala onke, kodwa asibambi, kodwa asidaniswa, kodwa asishiywanga phantsi; ( 2 Korinte 4:7-9 )

(11) Ukufa kukaYesu kuyasebenza kuthi ukuze ubomi bukaYesu bubonakale kuthi

Kuba thina badla ubomi sisoloko sinikelwa ekufeni ngenxa kaYesu, ukuze ubomi bukaYesu bubonakale emizimbeni yethu enokufa. Ngokwale mbono, ukufa kuyasebenza kuthi, kodwa ubomi buyasebenza kuwe. ( 2 Korinte 4:11-12 )

( 12 ) Nangona umzimba wangaphandle usonakala, kodwa intliziyo engaphakathi iyahlaziyeka imihla ngemihla.

Ngoko ke, asityhafi. umzimba wangaphandle ( indoda endala )Nangona itshatyalalisiwe, intliziyo yam ( Umntu omtsha ozelwe nguThixo entliziyweni ) ihlaziywa imihla ngemihla. Iintlungu zethu zomzuzwana nezikhaphukhaphu ziya kusisebenzela ubunzima banaphakade bozuko olungenakuthelekiswa nanto. Ke kaloku, asikukhathalele oko kubonwayo, sinyamekela izinto ezingabonwayo; ( 2 Korinte 4:17-18 )

articles.title: Hayi, uyolo lwabaxolisi!
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Banoyolo abaxolisi; ngokuba baya kubizwa ngokuba bangoonyana bakaThixo bona.

——Mateyu 5:9

Inkcazo ye-Encyclopedia

Harmony: Pinyin [he mu]
Ingcaciso: (Ifomu) Hambani ngemvisiswano ngaphandle kokuxambulisana.
Izithethantonye: ubuhlobo, inkoliseko, uxolo, ubuhlobo, ubuhlobo, imvisiswano, imvisiswano, njl.
Izichasi: umzabalazo, ingxabano, intiyo, ukungavisisani.
Umthombo: Xuanding, Qing Dynasty, "Iirekhodi ze-Autumn Lamps ngobusuku bemvula. Izazi zeNanguo" "Yiba filial kubazali bakho kwaye uvisisane noodadewabo."

buza: Ngaba abantu abasehlabathini banokwenza uxolo nabanye?
impendulo: Kutheni na ukuba iintlanga zixabane?

Kutheni na ukuba iintlanga zixabane? Yini na ukuba zonke izizwe zicebe into engeyakonto? ( INdumiso 2:1 )

Phawula: Bonke bonile → isono, nomthetho, nenkanuko, nenkanuko yenyama, iyabonakala ke yona imisebenzi yenyama: ukrexezo, ukungcola, uburheletyo, unqulo-zithixo, ubugqwirha, intiyo, iinkani, amakhwele, imisindo, amayelenqe, iimbambaniso; uqhekeko, umona (eminye imisongo yamandulo yongeza igama elithi "ukubulala"), ukunxila, iziyunguma, njl. ...( Galati 5:19-21 )
Ngoko ke, abantu abasehlabathini abanakwenza uxolo phakathi kwabantu. Ngaba uyayiqonda le nto?

1. Umenzi woxolo

buza: Sinokwenza njani uxolo?
impendulo: Umntu omtsha udalwe ngoKristu,
Emva koko kukho imvisiswano!

Ukutolikwa kweBhayibhile

Kuba yena uluxolo lwethu, yena uye wabenza babini baba nto-nye, waluchitha ke udonga olwahlulayo, wabuphanzisa emzimbeni wakhe ubutshaba, nemimiselo ebhaliweyo emthethweni, ukuze adale umntu omtsha ezimbini, ngaloo ndlela kuzuzwa imvisiswano. ( Efese 2:14-15 )

buza: UKristu umdala njani umntu omtsha ngaYe?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

(1) Sikhulule esonweni

Qaphela: UKristu wafa emnqamlezweni ngenxa yezono zethu, wasikhulula esonweni. Bhekisela kumaRoma 6:6-7

(2) Sikhulule kuwo umthetho nakwisiqalekiso somthetho

Qaphela: Emnqamlezweni, uKristu wamanyanisa (izulu, umhlaba, uThixo nomntu) waba banye, waza waludiliza udonga olwahlula phakathi (oko kukuthi, umthetho wamaYuda unemithetho, kodwa abeeNtlanga abanamithetho). umzimba wakho ukutshabalalisa intiyo, imimiselo ebhaliweyo emthethweni. Bona amaRoma 7:6 namaGalati 3:13 .

(3) Masililahle ixhego nokuziphatha kwalo

Qaphela: Kwaye ingcwatyiwe, ukuze siyilahle ihambo yendoda endala.

(4) Uvuko lukaKristu lwadala umntu omtsha ngaYe

Qaphela: Makabongwe uThixo noYise weNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Ngokwenceba yakhe enkulu, uye wasivelisa ngokutsha ukuba sibe nethemba eliphilayo ngokuvuka kukaYesu Kristu kwabafileyo ( 1 Petros 1:3 .

buza: Ngubani owazalwa ngumntu omtsha owadalwa ngovuko lukaKristu?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

1 Uzelwe ngamanzi nanguMoya—Yohane 3:5-7
2 Uzelwe yinyaniso yeendaba ezilungileyo— 1 Korinte 4:15 noYakobi 1:18
3 Bazalwa nguThixo— Yohane 1:12-13

2 Kuba baya kubizwa ngokuba bangoonyana bakaThixo bona

buza: Umntu unokubizwa njani ngokuba nguNyana kaThixo?
impendulo: Kholwani kwivangeli, kholwani kuyo indlela eyiyo, nikholwe kuYesu!

(1) Ukutywinwa nguMoya oyiNgcwele othenjisiweyo

Natywinwa kuye, natywinwa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele wedinga, ekusekweni kwenu, nakholwayo nakuye, nakuva ilizwi lenyaniso, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwenu. ( Efese 1:13 )
Qaphela: Kholwa kwivangeli nakuKrestu, ekubeni ukholwa kuye, utywinwe nguMoya oyiNgcwele othenjisiweyo UThixo →→ uya kubizwa ngokuba ngunyana kaThixo. Amen.

(2) Bonke abakhokelwa nguMoya kaThixo bangunyana kaThixo

Kuba bonke abakhokelwa nguMoya kaThixo, bangoonyana bakaThixo. Animamkelanga moya wobukhoboka, ukuba nihlale ninoyikeka; (Funda incwadi 8:14-16.)

(3) Shumayela iindaba ezilungileyo, wenze abantu bakholwe kuYesu Kristu, wenze uxolo phakathi kwabantu kuKristu

【 UYesu ushumayela ivangeli yobukumkani 】

Waye uYesu eyihamba imizi ngemizi, nemizana ngemizana, efundisa ezindlwini zabo zesikhungu, eshumayela iindaba ezilungileyo zobukumkani, ephilisa izifo zonke nezikhuhlane zonke. ( Mateyu 9:35 )

【 Wathunyelwa ukushumayela ivangeli ngegama likaYesu 】

Wathi akuzibona izihlwele, wasikwa yimfesane zizo, ngokuba zibe ziindwalutho, zinjengezimvu ezingenamalusi. Ngoko wathi kubafundi bakhe: “Ukuvuna okunene kuninzi, kodwa bona abasebenzi bambalwa.

Phawula: UYesu wenza uxolo, kwaye igama likaYesu nguKumkani woXolo! Abo bashumayela uYesu, bakholelwa iindaba ezilungileyo, kwaye bashumayela iindaba ezilungileyo ezikhokelela elusindisweni bangabaxolisi → Banoyolo abanoxolo, kuba baya kubizwa ngokuba bangoonyana bakaThixo. Amen!

Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Ngoko ke nina nonke ningoonyana bakaThixo ngako ukukholwa, nikuKristu Yesu; ( Galati 3:26 )

2022.07.07

articles.title: Hayi, uyolo lwabantliziyo zinyulu!
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Banoyolo abahlambulukileyo intliziyo; ngokuba baya kumbona uThixo bona.
— Mateyu 5:8

Ukutolikwa kwesichazi-magama sesiTshayina

intliziyo ecocekileyo qīngxīn
( 1 ) Uxolo, akukho maxhala, ingqondo enyulu neminqweno embalwa
( 2 ) Susa iingcamango eziphazamisayo, yenza umoya wakho uzole kwaye ube noxolo, ube nentliziyo ecocekileyo, kwaye inyanga imhlophe kwaye ihlambulukile.
( 3 ) kukwathetha ukuba nentliziyo enyulu nokuhlala ungumntu onyulu.

1. Umphumo wobomi uphuma entliziyweni

Ufanele uyigcine intliziyo yakho ngaphezu kwayo nantoni na enye (okanye ukuguqulelwa: kufuneka uyilondoloze intliziyo yakho), kuba iziphumo zobomi bakho ziphuma entliziyweni yakho. ( IMizekeliso 4:23 )

Imonki enye : Yiba nyulu entliziyweni kwaye ube neminqweno embalwa, utye ngokukhawuleza kwaye ucengceleze igama likaBuddha, uxelise iSakyamuni kwaye uhlakulele umzimba - ube nguBuddha ngokukhawuleza, kwaye "uhambe" ukuze ubone uBuddha ophilayo ulungile.
2 Ababingeleli bamaTao: Yinyuka intaba uye kuqhelisela ubuTao kwaye ube ngumntu ongafiyo.
3 unongendi: Ebona ihlabathi elifayo, wacheba iinwele zakhe, waba ngunongendi, watshata waza wabuyela kwiBuddhism.
4 Bekhohliswa (iinyoka), kwaye babecinga ukuba yiyo kanye indlela .
→→Kukho indlela ebonakala ilungile emntwini, kodwa ekugqibeleni iba yindlela yokufa. ( IMizekeliso 14:12 )
→→Lumkani, hleze iintliziyo zenu zilahlekiswe, niphambuke endleleni ethe tye, nikhonze nokunqula thixo bambi. ( Duteronomi 11:16 )

2 Intliziyo yomntu inenkohliso, imbi kakhulu;

1 Intliziyo yabantu imbi kakhulu

Intliziyo yomntu inenkohliso ngaphezu kweento zonke; ( Yeremiya 17:9 )

2 Intliziyo inenkohliso;

Kuba ngaphakathi, oko kukuthi, entliziyweni yomntu, kuphuma izicamango ezingendawo, uhenyuzo, ubusela, ukubulala, ukukrexeza, ukubawa, okungendawo, inkohliso, uburheletya, umona, ukunyelisa, ukukratsha, ukukratsha. Bonke obu bubi buphuma ngaphakathi kwaye bunokungcolisa abantu. ” ( Marko 7:21-23 )

3 Ukulahlekelwa sisazela

Kungoko ndithi, ndithetha ndiseNkosini, maningabi sahamba ngokulambathayo kweentlanga. iingqiqo zabo zenziwe mnyama, zahlukanisiwe kubomi ababuphiwe nguThixo, ngenxa yokungazi kwabo, nobulukhuni beentliziyo zabo, besuka bangene ezinkanukweni, bezenza zonke iintlobo zokungcola. ( Efese 4:17-19 )

buza: Uyintoni umntu onentliziyo esulungekileyo?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

Ukutolikwa kweBhayibhile

IINDUMISO 73:1 UThixo unenceba kwabantliziyo zihlambulukileyo kwaSirayeli.
2 KUTIMOTI 2:22 Zibaleke iinkanuko zobutsha, phuthuma ubulungisa, ukholo, uthando, uxolo nabo bathandaza eNkosini ngokwasentliziyweni ehlambulukileyo.

3. Isazela esicocekileyo

buza: Indlela yokucoca isazela sakho?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

(1) Coca kuqala

Ke bona ubulumko baphezulu ukuqala bunyulu, buze bube boboxolo; buyancendezela, buthozame kakuhle, buzele yinceba, buvelisa iziqhamo ezilungileyo, abunankani, abunaluhanahaniso. ( Yakobi 3:17 )

(2) Igazi elingenasiphako likaKristu lihlambulula iintliziyo zenu

lobeka phi na ukugqithisela lona igazi likaKristu, owazisondeza ngoMoya ongunaphakade, engenasiphako, kuye uThixo, ukuzihlambulula iintliziyo zenu emisebenzini efileyo, ukuze nikhonze uThixo ophilileyo? ( Hebhere 9:14 )

(3) Emva kokuba isazela sakho sicociwe, awusaziva unetyala.

Ukuba akunjalo, ngaba imibingelelo yayingayi kuyeka kudala? Kungenxa yokuba izazela zabanquli ziye zahlanjululwa yaye abaziva benetyala. ( Hebhere 10:2 )

(4) Aphelise izono, aphelise izono, acamagushele izono, aze azise ubulungisa obungunaphakade →→“Ugwetyelwe ngonaphakade” kwaye unobomi obungunaphakade! Uyaqonda?

“Bamiselwe iiveki ezimashumi asixhenxe abantu bakowenu, nesixeko sakowenu esingcwele, ukuba kupheliswe ukreqo, kupheliswe isono, kucanyagushelwe ubugwenxa, kuziswe ubulungisa obungunaphakade, kutywinwe umbono nesiprofeto, kumthambise oyiNgcwele; (Daniyeli 9:24).

4. Thabatha ingqondo kaKristu njengentliziyo yakho

buza: Indlela yokuba nengqondo kaKristu?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

(1) Wafumana itywina loMoya oyiNgcwele othenjisiweyo

Natywinwa kuye, natywinwa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele wedinga, ekusekweni kwenu, nakholwayo nakuye, nakuva ilizwi lenyaniso, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwenu. ( Efese 1:13 )

(2) UMoya kaThixo uhleli ezintliziyweni zenu, aningabo abenyama;

Ukuba ke uhleli kuni uMoya kaThixo, aningabo abenyama, ningaboMoya. Ukuba umntu akanaye uMoya kaKristu, akangokaKristu lowo. Ukuba uKristu ungaphakathi kwenu, umzimba okunene ufile ngenxa yesono, kodwa umphefumlo uphilile ngenxa yobulungisa. ( Roma 8:9-10 )

(3) UMoya oyiNgcwele neentliziyo zethu ziyangqina ukuba singabantwana bakaThixo

Kuba bonke abakhokelwa nguMoya kaThixo, bangoonyana bakaThixo. Animamkelanga moya wobukhoboka, ukuba nihlale ninoloyiko; Isiqendu 14-16)

(4) Ingqondo kaKristu mayibe yintliziyo yakho
Yibani nale ngcinga kuni, wayekuyo noKristu Yesu: yena esebumeni bukaThixo, akathi ukulingana noThixo akanakuba yinto yokubamba, kodwa wazenza into engento, ethabathe ubume bomkhonzi, ezelwe njengomntu wathi ngemo efunyenwe enjengomntu, wazithoba, waba ngolulamileyo, wada wesa ekufeni, ukufa ke kwasemnqamlezweni. ( Filipi 2:5-8 )

(5) Thabatha umnqamlezo wakho ulandele uYesu

Waza wasibizela kuye indimbane nabafundi bakhe, wathi kubo, Ukuba ubani uthanda ukundilandela, makazincame ngokwakhe, awuthwale umnqamlezo wakhe, andilandele; kuba osukuba ethanda ukuwusindisa umphefumlo wakhe; kodwa othe wawulahla umphefumlo wakhe ngenxa yam, nangenxa yeendaba ezilungileyo ezi, wowusindisa (Marko 8:34-35).

(6) Shumayela iindaba ezilungileyo zobukumkani bamazulu

Waye uYesu eyihamba imizi ngemizi, nemizana ngemizana, efundisa ezindlwini zabo zesikhungu, eshumayela iindaba ezilungileyo zobukumkani, ephilisa izifo zonke nezikhuhlane zonke. Wathi akuzibona izihlwele, wasikwa yimfesane zizo, ngokuba zibe ziindwalutho, zinjengezimvu ezingenamalusi. Ngoko wathi kubafundi bakhe: “Ukuvuna okunene kuninzi, kodwa bona abasebenzi bambalwa.

(7) Siva ubunzima kunye naye, kwaye siya kuzukiswa kunye naye

Ukuba ke bangabantwana, baziindlalifa, iindlalifa zikaThixo, iindlalifa ke kunye noKristu. Ukuba siva ubunzima kunye naye, sozukiswa nokuzukiswa kunye naye. ( Roma 8:17 )

5 Baya kumbona uThixo;

(1) USimon Petros wathi: “UnguNyana kaThixo ophilileyo”!

Athi uYesu kuye, Uthi ke wena ndingubani na, uSimon Petros wamphendula, wathi, Wena unguye uKristu, uNyana kaThixo ophilileyo asiyinyama ekutyhilileyo kuwe, kodwa uBawo osemazulwini ukutyhilile (Mateyu 16:15-17).

Phawula: AmaYuda, kuquka “uYudas,” ambona uYesu njengoNyana woMntu, kodwa akazange ambone uYesu njengoNyana kaThixo uYudas iminyaka emithathu engazange ambone uThixo.

(2) UYohane uye wayibona ngamehlo akhe waza wayibamba ngabasaqalayo

Ngokusingisele kwilizwi lantlandlolo lobomi kwasekuqalekeni, oku koko sikuvileyo, sakubonayo, sakubona ngamehlo ethu, saza sakuchukumisa ngezandla zethu. (Obu bomi butyhilekile, nathi sabubona, yaye ngoku siyangqina ukuba sininika ubomi obungunaphakade, obukuye uYise, kwaye babonakaliswa kuthi.) ( 1 Yohane 1:1-2 )

(3) Wabonakala kubazalwana abangamakhulu amahlanu ngexesha elinye

Oko ndaninikelayo nam kuni, yayikukuba, okokuqala, uKristu wazifela izono zethu ngokwezibhalo, nokokuba wangcwatywa, waza wavuswa ngomhla wesithathu, ngokutsho kweZibhalo, wabonakaliswa kuPetros kamva kwaboniswa ngaxesha linye kubazalwana abangaphezu kwamakhulu amahlanu, abasekho nanamhla, inxenye ke yalala ukufa. Kwandula ke kwatyhilwa kuYakobi, kwaza ke kwatyhilwa kubo bonke abapostile, yaye ekugqibeleni, njengalowo wayengekazalwa. ( 1 Korinte 15:3-8 )

(4) Ukubona indalo kaThixo ngomsebenzi wendalo

Oko kwazekayo ngoThixo kutyhilekile ezintliziyweni zabo, ngokuba uThixo ukutyhile kubo. Ukususela ekudalweni kwehlabathi, amandla kaThixo angunaphakade nobuThixo aziwa ngokucacileyo, nangona engabonakali, anokuqondwa ngendalo yakhe, eshiya umntu engenasizathu. ( Roma 1:19-20 )

(5) Ukubona uThixo ngemibono namaphupha

‘Ngemihla yokugqibela, utsho uThixo, ndiya kuthulula uMoya wam phezu kwabantu bonke. oonyana benu neentombi zenu ziya kuprofeta; amadodana enu abone imibono; ( IZenzo 2:17 )

(6) Xa uKristu ebonakala, sibonakalaliswa kunye naye ebuqaqawulini

Xa athe wabonakalaliswa uKristu, obubomi bethu, nani niya kubonakala, ninaye ebuqaqawulini. ( Kolose 3:4 )

(7) Siya kuyibona imo yakhe yokwenene

Bazalwana abathandekayo, singabantwana bakaThixo ngoku. Ke into esiya kuba yiyo kwixesha elizayo. ( 1 Yohane 3:2 )

Ngoko ke, iNkosi uYesu yathi: “Banoyolo abasulungekileyo entliziyweni, kuba baya kumbona uThixo bona.”

Ingoma: INkosi yindlela Inyaniso

Umbhalo weVangeli!

Ivela: Bazalwana noodade beBandla leNkosi uYesu Krestu!

2022.07.06

articles.title: Banoyolo abanenceba!
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Banoyolo abanenceba; ngokuba baya kwenzelwa inceba bona.
——Mateyu 5:7

Inkcazo ye-Encyclopedia

Imfesane: [lian xu], ibhekisa kuthando nemfesane.
Izithethantonye: imfesane, imfesane, isisa, isisa, imfesane.
Isichasi: ukhohlakele.

Ukutolikwa kweBhayibhile

uvelwano : Ibhekisa kububele, uvelwano, ulwazelelelo kunye nenkathalo.

Ndiyakuthanda ukulunga (okanye inguqulelo: uvelwano ) abawathandi amadini; Hoseya 6:6

buza: Ngubani olungileyo?
impendulo: Uthe ke uYesu kuye, Yini na ukuba uthi ndilungile? Akukho ulungileyo, nguThixo yedwa . Marko 10:18

NguYehova Kulungile Ulilungisa, ubafundise indlela ethe tye aboni. INdumiso 25:8

buza: Ngaba ububele novelwano lwehlabathi lubalulekile?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

(1) Umntu wenyama uthengiswe esonweni
Njengoko iSibhalo sisitsho → Siyazi ukuba umthetho ungowomoya, kodwa mna ndingowenyama yaye kuthengiswe ngaye esonweni. Roma 7:14

(2) Abantu benyama bathanda “ ulwaphulo-mthetho "umthetho
Ndiva ke mna, ukuba kukho mthetho wumbi, emalungwini, usilwa nomthetho entliziyweni yam, undithimbela, ukuze ndihambe nomthetho wesono emalungwini am. Roma 7:23

(3) Abantu benyama bazikhathalele izinto zenyama
Kuba abo bangokwenyama banyamekela izinto zasenyameni;

(4) Abo ke banyamekela izinto zesimo esonakeleyo, bafile
Ukunyameka kwenyama kukufa; kuba ukunyameka kwenyama kububutshaba kuThixo; kuba umthetho kaThixo kungawululameli; Abo ke bakwinyama, abanakumkholisa uThixo. Roma 8:5-8

Phawula: Ngaphandle koThixo, akukho bani ulungileyo. Usizi lwabantu behlabathi kukukhathalela inyama nokuba nenceba kwizinto zenyama, ukuqwalasela inyama enokufa neyonakeleyo. Ngoko ke, emehlweni kaThixo, ukuziphatha kwabo akugqalwa njengelungileyo okanye nenceba. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

buza: Ngaba abantu ehlabathini banemfesane, inceba nobubele?
impendulo: Hayi.

buza: Ngoba?
impendulo: Ngokuba bonile bonke, basilela eluzukweni lukaThixo. Umoni ngulowo waphula umnqophiso, enze isono, abizwe ngokuba ngongendawo.
“Imfesane nenceba” yabangendawo nayo ikhohlakele.

buza: Ngoba?
impendulo: Kuba umvuzo wesono kukufa, aboni (abantu abanesono) abakholwanga kuThixo, uYesu, okanye iindaba ezilungileyo! Akukho kuzalwa ngokutsha kwaye akukho ntambo yoMoya oyiNgcwele. ” Kulungile Emehlweni kaThixo, abangendawo, “imfesane yakhe” bonke bayahanahanisa, bahanahanisi, abangendawo abanabulungisa;

"Umntu okhohlakeleyo" inceba "Inokuthi ikwenzele okulungileyo, ikuncede, okanye ikulahlekise, ikulahlekise uThixo kunye nosindiso lukaKristu, kube njalo kwabangendawo." inceba "Kukhohlakala kwakhona. Uyayiqonda le nto?

Ilungisa liyawasindisa imfuyo yalo; inceba Kwakhona ukhohlakele . Bhekisela kwiMizekeliso 12:10

1. UYehova unenceba, uthando, inceba nobabalo

Wathi uYehova phambi kwakhe: “UYehova, uYehova inceba UThixo onobabalo, ozeka kade umsindo, ophuphuma uthando nenyaniso. Eksodus 34:6

(1) Yiba nenceba kwabo bamoyikayo uThixo
Kunjengokusikwa yimfesane koyise kubantwana, Injalo iNkosi uvelwano Abo bamoyikayo! INdumiso 103:13

(2) Uvelwano ngamahlwempu
Bonke ookumkani baya kuqubuda kuye, zonke iintlanga zimkhonze. Ngokuba uya kulihlangula ihlwempu elizibikayo, alihlangule olihlwempu elingenamncedi. uyafuna uvelwano Usindise ubomi bamahlwempu. INdumiso 72:11-13

(3) Yiba nenceba kwabo babuyela kuThixo
Ke abamoyikayo uYehova bathetha bodwa, wabaphulaphula uYehova;
“Baya kuba ngabam ngemini endiyimisileyo,” utsho uYehova wemikhosi, “baya kuba ngabam ncakasana, ndibenzele inceba njengomntu. uvelwano Mkhonze owakho unyana. Malaki 3:16-17

2. UYesu uyayithanda inceba kwaye unenceba kumntu wonke

(1)UYesu uyayithanda inceba
'Ndiyathanda uvelwano , akawuthandi umbingelelo. ’ Ukuba uyayiqonda intsingiselo yeli gama, awuyi kumgqala omsulwa njengonetyala. Mateyu 12:7

(2) UYesu wabenzela inceba abantu bonke
Waye uYesu eyihamba yonke imizi nemizana, efundisa ezindlwini zabo zesikhungu, eshumayela iindaba ezilungileyo zobukumkani, ephilisa izifo zonke nezikhuhlane zonke. Wathi akubona abantu abaninzi inceba ngokuba babandezelekile, beswele, njengezimvu ezingenamalusi. Mateyu 9:35-36

Ngelo xesha kwabuya kwahlanganisana into eninzi yabantu, akwabakho nto yakudliwa; Wababiza ke uYesu abafundi bakhe, wathi, Mna inceba Bonke aba bantu, kuba bebehleli nam iintsuku ezintathu, bengenanto bangayidlayo; Marko 8:1-2

buza: UYesu unenceba kuye wonke umntu Injongo Ingaba yin?
impendulo: Mabazi ukuba uYesu unguNyana kaThixo baze babaguqulele kuThixo .

Ngokomzekelo, uYesu wayezityhutyha izixeko needolophana ngeedolophana, eshumayela iindaba ezilungileyo zoBukumkani bamazulu, ephilisa abagulayo yaye ekhupha iidemon, esenza imiqondiso nezimanga, yaye esondla abantu abangaphezu kwamawaka amahlanu ngezonka ezihlanu neentlanzi ezimbini, ukuze imizimba yabo iphele. wayenokuphiliswa aze aneliseke.

( Injongo ) kukubazisa ukuba uYesu unguNyana kaThixo, uKristu, noMsindisi, nokuba ukukholwa kuYesu kuya kubenza bafumane ubomi obungunaphakade. Kungenjalo, akusayi kuba luncedo ukuba imizimba yabo yenyama iphiliswe kwaye yaneliseke ukuba abakholelwa ukuba uYesu unguye uKristu.

Yiyo loo nto iNkosi uYesu yathi: “Musani ukusebenzela ukutya okutshabalalayo, kodwa sebenzelani ukutya okuhlala kuse ebomini obungunaphakade, aya kunipha kona uNyana woMntu, kuba uThixo uYise umtywine uYohane 6 Isahluko 27

( Phawula: Abantu abasehlabathini ngamanye amaxesha basenokuba nemfesane novelwano, kodwa bengenabo ubulungisa bukaThixo noMoya Oyingcwele, yaye abanakushumayela iindaba ezilungileyo zikaThixo ophilileyo. Uvelwano nosizi lwabo lukhathalela kuphela inyama yomntu eyonakeleyo, kwaye ababukhathaleli ubomi "obungunaphakade" bomntu. Ngoko ke, imfesane novelwano lwabo aluyongenelo yaye aluyi kuba yintsikelelo. ) Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

3 AmaKristu ahamba noThixo ngentliziyo enemfesane

(1) Hayi indlela enzulu ngayo inceba kaThixo kumntu wonke

Nanikhe ningamthobeli uThixo, kodwa ngoku ngenxa yokungathobeli kwabo, nilahlekiswa. uvelwano . Ngoko, (uSirayeli)
Nabo ababangathobeliyo, ngenxa yoko baniphayo uvelwano , ngoku (uSirayeli) naye ugutyungelwe uvelwano . Kuba uThixo ubavalele bonke abantu ekungathobelini ngenjongo yokuba uvelwano Wonke umntu. Roma 11:30-32

(2) Safumana inceba saza saba ngabantu bakaThixo

Ke nina nisisizukulwana esinyuliweyo, isibingeleli esibukumkani, uhlanga olungcwele, abantu bakaThixo abangcwele, ukuze nivakalise isidima salowo wanibizayo ukuba niphume ebumnyameni, ningene ekukhanyeni kwakhe okungummangaliso; Naningengobantu ngaphambili, kodwa ngoku nisisizwana sikaThixo; uvelwano , kodwa ngoku imfamekile uvelwano . 1 Petros 2:9-10

(3) Yiba nenceba uze uhambe noThixo ngentliziyo enemfesane

UYehova ukubonisile, mntundini, okulungileyo. Ufuna ntoni kuwe? Ngalo lonke ixesha usenza ubulungisa, Unemfesane kakhulu , hamba noThixo wakho ngokuthozamileyo. Mika 6:8

Ke ngoko, masisondele ngenkalipho kuyo itrone yobabalo ukuze sizuze uvelwano , Yamkelani ubabalo, ibe lusindiso nanini na . Hebhere 4:16

articles.title: Banoyolo abalambela banxanelwe ubulungisa!
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Banoyolo abalambela banxanelwe ubulungisa; ngokuba baya kuhluthiswa bona.
——Mateyu 5:6

Inkcazo ye-Encyclopedia

unxaniwe[jt ke]
1 Ulambile kwaye unxaniwe
2 Sisikweko esithetha ngolindelo kunye nendlala.
Muyi [mu yl] encoma ububele nobulungisa.

Ukutolikwa kweBhayibhile

1. Ubulungisa bomntu

buza: Ngaba bukho ubulungisa ehlabathini?
impendulo: Hayi.

Kunjengokuba kanye kubhaliwe kwathiwa: “Akukho bani uqondayo, akukho namnye umfunisisayo uThixo; kwabaseRoma 3:10 -12 amaqhina

buza: Kutheni kungekho malungisa?
impendulo: Ngokuba bonile bonke, basilela eluzukweni lukaThixo;

2. Ubulungisa bukaThixo

buza: Buyintoni ubulungisa?
impendulo: UThixo ulilungisa, uYesu Kristu ulilungisa!

Bantwanana bam, ndinibhalela ezi zinto, ukuze ningoni. Ukuba kukho othe wona, sinoMthetheleli kuye uYise, uYesu Kristu ilungisa.
eyoku-1 kaYohane 2:1

3. Lilungisa ( buyisela ) nabangemalungisa, ukuze sibe bubulungisa bukaThixo kuKristu

Ngokuba noKristu wabandezeleka kwaba kanye ngenxa yesono (kukho imisongo yakudala: ukufa), oko kukuthi ubulungisa endaweni yokungalungisi ukusikhokelela kuThixo. Ngokuthetha ngokwasenyameni, Wabulawa ngokuthetha ngokomoya, Wavuswa. 1 Petros 3:18

UThixo umenza ongasaziyo isono; ngenxa Saba sisono ukuze sibe bubulungisa bukaThixo kuye. 2 Korinte 5:21

4 Abo balambela banxanelwe ubulungisa

buza: Banokwaneliswa njani abo balambela baze banxanelwe ubulungisa?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

(1) Yidlani amanzi aphilileyo awanikwa nguYehova

Yathi inkazana, Nkosi, asinanto yakukha amanzi, nequla linzulu; wowafumana phi na ke amanzi aphilileyo? UYakobi ubawo wasishiyela eli qula, wasela kulo, yena noonyana bakhe, nemfuyo yakhe. amanzi." , ngaba ungcono kunaye? Ngaba likhulu kakhulu?” UYesu waphendula wathi: “Othe wasela kula manzi, uya kuphinda anxanwe;

buza: Yintoni amanzi aphilileyo?
impendulo: Imilambo yamanzi aphilileyo iphuma esiswini sikaKrestu, kwaye abanye abakholwayo baya kufumana uMoya oyiNgcwele othenjisiweyo! Amen.

Ke kaloku, ngomhla wokugqibela, ongowona mkhulu womthendeleko, wema uYesu, waliphakamisa izwi lakhe, wathi, Ukuba kukho othi anxaniwe, makeze kum asele, lowo ukholwayo kum, njengoko satshoyo isibhalo, wathi, Ukuba unxaniwe, makeze kum asele. embilinini wakhe kuya kumpompoza amanzi aphilileyo; kuhla imilambo.” Oku wakutsho uYesu, ebhekisa kuMoya oyiNgcwele abaya kumamkela abo bakholwayo kuye. UMoya oyiNgcwele wayengekamkelwa kuba uYesu wayengekazukiswa. Yohane 7:37-39

(2) Nidle isonka seNkosi sobomi

buza: Yintoni isonka sobomi?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

1 UYesu sisonka sobomi

Oobawo bethu batya imana entlango, njengokuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Wabanika isonka siphuma ezulwini, ukuba badle. ’”

Wathi uYesu, Inene, inene, ndithi kuni, AsinguMoses oninike isonka esiphuma ezulwini; nguBawo oninika isonka esiphuma ezulwini, esiyinyaniso. onika ubomi ihlabathi.”

Bathi ke bona, Nkosi, sinike eso sonka ngamaxesha onke.
UYesu wathi: “Ndim isonka sobomi, lowo uzayo kum, akasayi kulamba;
Ke mna ndinixelele, nandibona, naza noko anikholwa. Yohane 6:31-36

2 Nidle nisele eNkosini; Inyama kwaye Igazi

(UYesu wathi) Ndim isonka sobomi. Ooyihlo batya imana entlango, bafa. Siso eso isonka esehla sivela ezulwini, ukuze, ukuba abantu basidla, bangafi. Ndim isonka esiphilileyo, esi sehlayo emazulwini;

Isonka endiya kumnika sona mna yinyama yam, endiya kuyinikela ubomi behlabathi. Abambana ngoko amaYuda, esithi, Angathini na lo ukusinika inyama yakhe siyidle? "

Wathi uYesu: “Inene, inene, ndithi kuni, Ukuba anithanga niyidle inyama yoNyana woMntu, nilisele igazi lakhe, aninabo ubomi kuni. Lowo uyidlayo eyam inyama, alisele elam igazi, unobomi obungunaphakade, ekugqibeleni. imini ndiya kumvusa.
Yohane 6:48-54

(3) Ukugwetyelwa ngokholo

buza: Ulambele, unxanelwe ubulungisa! Umntu unokubufumana njani ubulungisa bukaThixo?
impendulo: Umntu ugwetyelwa ngokholo kuYesu Kristu!

1Celani, nophiwa;
2Funani nofumana;
3Nkqonkqozani, novulelwa; Amen.

(UYesu wathi) Kananjalo ndithi kuni, Celani, nophiwa; kuba wonke umntu ocelayo uyazuza, nalowo ufunayo uyafumana, nalowo unkqonkqozayo uya kuvulelwa.
Nguwuphi na uyise kuni oya kuthi, unyana akucela isonka, amnike ilitye; Ukucela intlanzi, kuthekani na ukuba uthe wamnika inyoka esikhundleni sentlanzi? Ukuba uthe wacela iqanda, womnika unomadudwane? Ukuba ke nina, nikhohlakele nje, niyakwazi ukubapha abantwana benu izipho ezilungileyo, wobeka phi na ke yena uYihlo osemazulwini, ukugqithisela ukubapha uMoya oyiNgcwele abo bamcelayo? ” Luka 11:9-13

buza: Wagwetyelwa ngokholo! Njani( ileta ) ukuzithethelela?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

1( ileta ) Uthethelelo lweVangeli

Kuba andinazintloni ngazo iindaba ezilungileyo zikaKristu, kuba zingamandla kaThixo okusindisa bonke abakholwayo, umYuda kuqala, kwanomGrike. Ngokuba ubulungisa bukaThixo bubonakalaliswa ngazo ezi ndaba zilungileyo; Njengoko kubhaliwe kwathiwa: “Lowo ulilungisa uya kudla ubomi obuphuma elukholweni.”—KwabaseRoma 1:16-17

buza: Yintoni ivangeli?
impendulo: Iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso → (uPawulos) Oko ndanishumayezayo nam kuni, eyokuqala, eyokuba uKristu ngokweZibhalo, wafela izono zethu ,

→Sikhulule esonweni,
→Sikhulule kumthetho nakwisiqalekiso sawo ,
Wangcwatywa,
→Masilahle umntu omdala nezenzo zakhe;
Yaye wavuswa ngomhla wesithathu ngokutsho kweBhayibhile.
→ Uvuko lukaKristu lusenza amalungisa , (Oko kukuthi, ukuvuswa, ukuzalwa ngokutsha, ukusindiswa, nokwamkelwa njengoonyana bakaThixo kunye noKristu. Ubomi obungunaphakade.) Amen!

2 Nigwetyelwa ngesisa lubabalo lukaThixo

Ngoku ke, ngobabalo lukaThixo, sigwetyelwe ngesisa ngako ukukhululwa ngentlawulelo kaYesu Kristu. UThixo wammisela uYesu njengocamagushelo ngegazi likaYesu nangokholo lomntu ukuze abonise ubulungisa bukaThixo; eyaziwa ngokuba ngamalungisa, kwanokuba abagwebele abo bakholwayo kuYesu. Roma 3:24-26

Ukuba uthe wamvuma ngomlomo wakho ukuba uyiNkosi uYesu, wakholwa ngentliziyo yakho ukuba uThixo wamvusa kwabafileyo, wosindiswa. Kuba umntu unokugwetyelwa ngokukholwa ngentliziyo, yaye unokusindiswa ngokuvuma ngomlomo wakhe. Roma 10:9-10

3 Ukugwetyelwa ngoMoya kaThixo (uMoya oyiNgcwele)

Naye ninjalo ke inxenye yenu; kuloko nahlanjululwayo, nangcwaliswa, nagwetyelwayo egameni leNkosi uYesu Kristu, nangoMoya kaThixo wethu. 1 Korinte 6:11

Ngoko ke, iNkosi uYesu yathi: “Banoyolo abo balambela banxanelwe ubulungisa, kuba baya kuhluthiswa.” Amen!

Iculo: Njengexhama Eligquma phezu koMsinga

articles.title: Banoyolo abanobulali;
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Banoyolo abanobulali; ngokuba umhlaba baya kuwudla ilifa bona.
——Mateyu 5:5

Inkcazo ye-Encyclopedia

Nontle: (ifomu) ithambile kwaye ithambile, (kufuphi) ithambile kwaye ithambile.
Okufana nokuthantamisa, ukuthamba, ukuthamba, ukuthamba, ububele, ububele, ububele nolwazelelelo.
Umbongo ka-Ai Qing "I-Bouquet. Vienna":"Ilanga linokukhanya ngeefestile zakho kwaye uthinte amehlo akho ngeminwe ethambileyo ..."

Izichasi: ubukhali, ukhohlakele, ukrwada, urhabaxa, unobundlobongela, ukhohlakele, unekratshi.

Ukutolikwa kweBhayibhile

Musani ukunyelisa, musani ukulwa, kodwa yibani noxolo; Yibani nobulali kubantu bonke . kuTito 3:2

Zithobe kuyo yonke into, thambileyo ninyamezelana, ninyamezelana ngothando, nisebenzise umxokelelwane woxolo, nigcine ubunye boMoya. Efese 4:2-3

buza: Ngubani umntu othobekileyo?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

(1)Ububele bukaKristu

Yithini kubafazi baseZiyon, Yabonani, uKumkani wenu esiza kuni; unobulali , yaye ekhwele iesile, oko kukuthi, ekhwele ithole le-esile. ’”—Mateyu 21:5

(2) INkosi uYesu yathi: “Ndinobulali yaye ndithobekile ngentliziyo”!

Yizani kum nonke nina nibulalekayo, nisindwayo ngumthwalo, ndoninika ukuphumla. Ndithobekile kwaye ndithobekile ngentliziyo , thabathani idyokhwe yam niyithwale, nifunde kum, noyifumanela ukuphumla imiphefumlo yenu. Mateyu 11:28-29

buza: Buvela phi ubulali?
impendulo: Ukusuka phezulu.

buza: Ngubani na lo uvela phezulu?
Impendulo: UYesu, uNyana kaBawo oseZulwini.

(UYesu wathi) Ukuba ndinixelela izinto ezisemhlabeni, naza anakholwa, nothini na ukukholwa, ukuba ndithe ndanixelela izinto ezisemazulwini? Akukho namnye unyukileyo waya emazulwini, nguNyana woMntu yedwa, lowo wehlayo ephuma emazulwini, esesemazulwini. Yohane 3:12-13

buza: Indlela yokwamkela ububele obuvela phezulu?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

(1) Coca kuqala

buza: Indlela yokucoca?
impendulo: Xa isazela sakho sicocekile, awusaziva unetyala. !

Ukuba akunjalo, ngaba imibingelelo yayingayi kuyeka kudala? Ngokuba abo bathandazayo, Sakuba sicocekile isazela, asisaziva sinetyala. . Hebhere 10:2

buza: Ndingazicoca njani ngaphandle kokuziva ndinetyala?
impendulo: ( ileta ) Igazi elingenasiphako likaKristu lihlambulula (isazela) sakho kwimisebenzi yakho efileyo, kwaye intliziyo yakho (isazela) ikholelwa ukuba ngegazi elinqabileyo likaKristu, "ufumene " hlamba Andisaziva ndinetyala Amen!

lobeka phi na ukugqithisela lona igazi likaKristu, owazisondeza ngoMoya ongunaphakade, engenasiphako, kuye uThixo, ukuzihlambulula iintliziyo zenu emisebenzini efileyo, ukuze nikhonze uThixo ophilileyo? Bhekisela kumaHebhere 9:14

(2)Eyokugqibela ke luxolo, ubulali, ubulali

Ke bona ubulumko baphezulu ukuqala bunyulu, buze bube luxolo; Uthambile kwaye uthambile , ezele yinceba, enesiqhamo, engenamkhethe, engenaluhanahaniso. Yakobi 3:17

(3) Sebenzisa uxolo ukuhlwayela iziqhamo zothando

Ke sona isiqhamo sobulungisa esihlwayelwa ngoxolo. Yakobi 3:18

(4) Ubulali sisiqhamo soMoya oyiNgcwele

Isiqhamo soMoya luthando, uvuyo, uxolo, ukuzeka kade umsindo, ububele, ukulunga, intembeko, thambileyo ,ulawulo. Akukho mthetho uchasene nezinto ezinjalo.
Galati 5:22-23

(5) Abalulamileyo baya kulidla ilifa likaBawo oseZulwini

Lo Moya oyiNgcwele usisibambiso selifa lethu kude kube ngabantu bakaThixo (abantu: Umbhalo wokuqala lushishino ) wahlawulelwa ukuba kudunyiswe uzuko lwakhe.
Efese 1:14

Ngoko ke nina nonke ningoonyana bakaThixo ngako ukukholwa, nikuKristu Yesu; ... Ukuba ningabakaKristu, niyinzala ka-Abraham, iindlalifa ngokwedinga.
Galati 3:26, 29

Ngoko ke, iNkosi uYesu yathi: “Banoyolo abanobulali; ngokuba umhlaba baya kuwudla ilifa bona; Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

articles.title: Banoyolo abakhedamileyo!
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Banoyolo abakhedamileyo! ngokuba baya konwatyiswa bona.
— Mateyu 5:4

Inkcazo ye-Encyclopedia

Ukuzila: igama lesiTshayina
Ukubizwa: āi tòng
Ingcaciso: Ilusizi kakhulu, ilusizi kakhulu.
Umthombo: "Incwadi yeLater Han Dynasty · Ji Zun Zhuan":"Umqhubi wenqwelo yokulwa weza kumbona enxibe iimpahla ezicacileyo, ekhangele kuye kunye nokulila nokuzila.

Ukutolikwa kweBhayibhile

zilile : ukulila, ukulila, ukukhala, usizi, usizi → njengasekukoyikeni ukufa, "ukoyika ukulahlekelwa", ukulila, ukulila, usizi kunye nosizi ngenxa yezihlobo ezilahlekileyo.

USara wahlala iminyaka elikhulu elinamanci mabini anesixhenxe, iminyaka yobudala bukaSara leyo. Wafa ke uSara eKiriyati ka-Arbha, eyiHebron, ezweni lakwaKanan. UAbraham wamenzela isijwili, wamlilela. Jonga kwiGenesis Isahluko 23 Indinyana 1-2

buza: Ukuba ubani uzilela “inja,” ngaba oku kuyintsikelelo?
impendulo: Hayi!

buza: Ngaloo ndlela, iNkosi uYesu yathi: " zilile Kuthetha ukuthini ukuthi “Banoyolo abantu”?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

(Banoyolo abo baphosayo, abalilayo, nababuhlungu ngokuthanda kukaThixo, bezondelela iindaba ezilungileyo)

(1) UYesu ulilela iYerusalem

“Yerusalem, Yerusalem, wena ubulala abaprofeti, ubagibisele ngamatye abo bathunywe kuwe, kufuthi kangakanani na ndithande ukubabuthela ndawonye abantwana bakho, njengesikhukukazi siwabuthela ndawonye amantshontsho aso phantsi kwamaphiko aso, kodwa aniyi kuphinda niwabuthe; Ndithi kuni, anisayi kuba sandibona, emveni koku, nide nithi, Makabongwe lowo uzayo egameni leNkosi.

(2) UYesu walila xa wabona ukuba abantu babengakholelwa kumandla kaThixo ovuko.

Akufika uMariya kuYesu, wambona, wawa ezinyaweni zakhe, wathi, Nkosi, ukuba ubulapha, ange engafanga umnakwethu Basuka bancwina entliziyweni, basuka bathi, Nimbeke phi na? UYesu walila . Yohane 11:32-35

(3) UKrestu walila kakhulu kwaye wathandazela izono zethu ngeenyembezi, ebongoza uBawo oseZulwini ukuba asixolele izono zethu ezinkulu.

Xa uKristu wayesenyameni, wayenelizwi elikhulu khala , wathandaza ngeenyembezi kuYehova owayenokumsindisa ekufeni, waza waphendulwa ngenxa yobuthixo bakhe. Bhekisela kumaHebhere 5:7

(4) UPetros wayikhanyela kathathu iNkosi, ekhala ngokukrakra

UPetros wakhumbula amazwi kaYesu athi: “Ngaphambi kokuba umqhagi ukhale, uya kundikhanyela kathathu.” ukhale ngokukrakra . Mateyu 26:75

(5) Abafundi bazilela ukufa kukaYesu emnqamlezweni

Ekuseni ngenj’ ixukuxa ngosuku lokuqala lweveki, uYesu wavuswa waza wabonakala okokuqala kuMariya waseMagadala (lowo uYesu wakhupha kuye iidemon ezisixhenxe).
Waya yena wabikela abo babelandela uYesu; zimbambazeleni nilile . Bakuva ukuba uYesu uyaphila, waza wabonwa nguMariya, kodwa abazange bakholwe. Marko 16:9-11

(6) Ibandla laseKorinte latshutshiswa ngenxa kaPawulos! Ukungabikho, ukulila kunye nomdla

Sithe sakufika eMakedoni, sasingenaluxolo emizimbeni yethu, siphethwe ziimfazwe, kungekho uloyiko ngaphakathi. Ke kaloku uThixo, obathuthuzelayo abathobekileyo, wasithuthuzela ngokufika kukaTito kuphela; zilile , nenzondelelo ngam, yandixelela yonke into yaza yandenza ndavuya ngakumbi. 2 Korinte 7:5-7

(7) Zibuhlungu, zilile, kwaye uguquke ngokwentando kaThixo

intsingiselo yokuzila:

Bonke aba bantu bakholelwa kuThixo nakuYesu Kristu! “Ukuzila” kwabo kusikelelwe. Ngoko ke, iNkosi uYesu yathi: “Banoyolo abo bazilileyo → → Banoyolo abo badakumbileyo, abaguqukayo, abazilileyo, abalilayo ngokokuthanda kukaThixo, baya kuthuthuzeleka na?

articles.title: Izulu elitsha noMhlaba oMtsha
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubazalwana noodade bam abathandekayo kwintsapho kaThixo! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile kwiSityhilelo isahluko 21 indinyana 1 size sifunde kunye: Ndabona izulu elitsha, nomhlaba omtsha; kuba elokuqala izulu nomhlaba udlule, nolwandle lwalungasekho.

Namhlanje sizakufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane kunye 《 izulu elitsha nomhlaba omtsha 》 Thandaza: U-Abha othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! “Umfazi onesidima” eNkosini uYesu Kristu ecaweni Ukuthuma abasebenzi, ngelizwi lenyaniso, elibhaliweyo, elithethiweyo ngezandla zabo, eliziindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso, zozuko, nentlawulelo yemizimba yethu. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen.

Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumlo yethu kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni: Bonke abantwana bakaThixo mabaliqonde izulu elitsha nomhlaba omtsha olungiselelwe thina yiNkosi uYesu! YiYerusalem Entsha yasezulwini, ikhaya elingunaphakade! Amen . Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

1. Izulu elitsha nomhlaba omtsha

ISityhilelo [Isahluko 21:1] Ndaphinda ndabona izulu elitsha nomhlaba omtsha kuba elokuqala izulu nomhlaba udlule, nolwandle alusekho.

buza: Liliphi izulu elitsha nomhlaba omtsha awabonwa nguYohane?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

(1) Izulu nomhlaba wangaphambili udlule

impendulo: " ihlabathi langaphambili “Yiloo nto wayithethayo uThixo kwiGenesis ( Iintsuku ezintandathu zomsebenzi Izulu nomhlaba wadalelwa uAdam nenzala yakhe, ngokuba ( UAdam ) waphula umthetho waza wona waza wawa, kwaye izulu nomhlaba apho umhlaba kunye noluntu lwaluqalekisiwe lidlule kwaye alisekho.

(2)Ulwandle alusekho

buza: Beliya kuba lihlabathi elinjani ukuba bekungasekho ulwandle?
impendulo: " ubukumkani bukaThixo " Lihlabathi lomoya!

Njengoko iNkosi uYesu yathi: "Nimele nizalwe ngokutsha". 1 Uzelwe ngamanzi nanguMoya, 2 Ivangeli yokwenyani iyazalwa, 3 Uzelwe nguThixo →( ileta )iVangeli! Ngabantu abazelwe ngokutsha kuphela abanokungena【 ubukumkani bukaThixo 】Amen! Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

buza: Ebukumkanini bukaThixo, ngoko ( abantu ) kuza kwenzeka ntoni?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

1 Azisule uThixo zonke iinyembezi emehlweni abo ,
2 Akusayi kubakho kufa.
3 Kungabi sabakho nasijwili, nakukhala, nantlungu;
4 Akusayi kunxanwa nakulamba,
5 Akusayi kuphinda kubekho iziqalekiso.

Akusayi kubakho ziqalekiso Isesixekweni itrone kaThixo neyeMvana; abakhonzi bakhe baya kumkhonza;

(3)Yonke into ihlaziywa

Wathi lowo uhleli phezu kwetrone. Uyabona, zonke izinto ndizenza ntsha; ! Wathi ke yena, Bhala; ngokuba la mazwi athembekile, ayinyaniso.

Wathi kum kwakhona: "Kwenziwe!" Mna ndinguAlfa no-Omega; Amanzi omthombo wobomi ndiya kumnika ngesisa lowo unxaniweyo, ukuba asele. uloyiso , uya kuzidla ilifa ezi zinto: ndiya kuba nguThixo wakhe, yena abe ngunyana wam. Imbekiselo ( ISityhilelo 21:5-7 )

2 Isixeko esingcwele sehla sivela kuThixo

(1) Isixeko esingcwele, iYerusalem Entsha, sihla sivela ezulwini kuThixo

ISityhilelo [Isahluko 21:2] Ndaphinda ndabona Isixeko esingcwele, iYerusalem eNtsha, yehla ivela kuThixo ezulwini , elungisiwe, njengomtshakazi ehonjiselwe indoda yakhe.

(2) Umnquba kaThixo usemhlabeni

Ndeva izwi elikhulu liphuma etroneni, lisithi: Yabona, umnquba lo kaThixo usemhlabeni; .

(3) UThixo ufuna ukuhlala nathi

Uya kuhlala nabo, babe ngabantu bakhe. UThixo uya kuba nabo ngokobuqu , abe nguthixo wabo. Imbekiselo ( ISityhilelo 21:3 )

3. IYerusalem Entsha

IsiTyhilelo [Isahluko 21:9-10] Seza kum esinye sezithunywa zezulu ezisixhenxe, ezineengqayi ezisixhenxe zegolide, ezizele zizibetho ezisixhenxe zokugqibela, sathi, Yiza apha, ndikuphe. umtshakazi ,yiyo i Umfazi weMvana , yalatha kuwe. "Ndaqhutywa nguMoya oyiNgcwele, saza isithunywa sandisa entabeni ephakamileyo, ukuba ndishumayele ilizwi likaThixo. Umzi ongcwele iYerusalem wehla uvela ezulwini Ndiyalele.

buza: Ithetha ukuthini iYerusalem Entsha?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

1 UMtshakazi kaKristu!
2 Umfazi weMvana!
3 Ubomi obungunaphakade Ndlu kaThixo!
4 Umnquba kaThixo!
5 IBandla likaYesu Krestu!
6 IYerusalem Entsha!
7 Likhaya labo bonke abangcwele.
Endlwini kaBawo zininzi iindawo zokuhlala; Ukuba bekungenjalo, ngendisele ndikuxelele. Ndiyemka, ndiya kunilungisela indawo; ukuba ke ndimkile ndaya kunilungisela indawo, ndiya kubuya ndize, ndinamkelele kum ngokwam, ukuze apho ndikhona mna, nibe khona nani. Imbekiselo ( Yohane 14:2-3 )

buza: UMtshakazi kaKristu, uMfazi weMvana, iNdlu kaThixo ophilileyo, iBandla likaYesu Krestu, uMnquba kaThixo, iYerusalem eNtsha, iSixeko esiNgcwele ( Ibhotwe loMoya ) Yakhiwa njani?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

( 1 ) UYesu ngokwakhe uyintloko yembombo (Funda eyoku-1 kaPetros 2:6-7.)
( 2 ) Abangcwele bakha umzimba kaKristu — (Efese 4:12)
( 3 ) Singamalungu omzimba wayo — (Efese 5:30)
( 4 ) Sifana namatye aphilileyo (Funda eyoku-1 kaPetros 2:5.)
( 5 ) yakhiwe njengebhotwe lomoya (Funda eyoku-1 kaPetros 2:5.)
( 6 ) Yiba yitempile kaMoya oyiNgcwele ( 1 Korinte 6:19 )
( 7 ) Hlala kwibandla likaThixo ophilayo (Funda eyoku-1 kuTimoti 3:15.)
( 8 ) Abapostile abalishumi elinesibini beMvana basisiseko ( ISityhilelo 21:14 )
( 9 ) Izizwe ezilishumi elinambini zakwaSirayeli ngamasango alishumi elinambini ( ISityhilelo 21:12 )
( 10 ) Kukho iingelosi ezilishumi elinesibini emnyango ( ISityhilelo 21:12 )
( 11 ) Yakhiwe egameni labaprofeti — (Efese 2:20)
( 12 ) amagama abangcwele — (Efese 2:20)
( 13 ) Indlu yesixeko yiNkosi uThixo uSomandla neMvana ( ISityhilelo 21:22 )
( 14 ) Akukho mfuneko yokuba ilanga okanye inyanga zikhanyise esixekweni ( ISityhilelo 21:23 )
( 18 ) Kuba uzuko lukaThixo luyakhanyisa ( ISityhilelo 21:23 )
( 19 ) Kwaye iMvana isisibane somzi ( ISityhilelo 21:23 )
( 20 ) akusekho busuku ( ISityhilelo 21:25 )
( amashumi amabini ananye ) Ezitratweni zomzi ngumlambo wamanzi obomi ( ISityhilelo 22:1 )
( amashumi anambini ) Phumani kwitrone kaThixo neyeMvana ( ISityhilelo 22:1 )
( amashumi amabini anantathu ) ngapha nangapha komlambo ngumthi wobomi ( ISityhilelo 22:2 )
( amashumi amabini anesine ) Umthi wobomi uvelisa iindidi zeziqhamo ezilishumi elinambini ngenyanga. Amen.

Phawula: " UMtshakazi kaKristu, uMfazi weMvana, Indlu kaThixo ophilileyo, iBandla likaYesu Krestu, uMnquba kaThixo, iJerusalem eNtsha, iSixeko esiNgcwele "Yakhiwe ngu Krestu Yesu ngenxa ilitye lembombo , siza phambi koThixo njenga phila iliwa , singamalungu omzimba wayo, elowo esenza umsebenzi wakhe owakhe umzimba kaKristu, onxibelelene nentloko kaKristu, umzimba wonke (oko kukuthi, ibandla) umanyene kwaye ufanelekile ngaye, uzakhe eluthandweni; yakhelwe kwibhotwe lomoya, ibe yitempile yoMoya oyiNgcwele→ →iNdlu kaThixo ophilileyo, iBandla leNkosi uYesu Kristu, uMtshakazi kaKristu, uMfazi weMvana, iYerusalem Entsha. Le yidolophu yethu yanaphakade , ngoko, uyaqonda?

Ngoko ke, iNkosi uYesu yathi: " andifuni ziqwebeleni ubutyebi emhlabeni; Ukulunywa bug ,iyakwazi Umhlwa , kukwakho namasela agrumba imingxuma ukuze abe. ukuba kuphela ziqwebeleni ubutyebi ezulwini, apho kungonakalisi nundu nomhlwa, nalapho amasela angagqobhoziyo ebe. kuba apho bukhona ubutyebi benu, yoba lapho nentliziyo yenu. ”→→Ngemihla yokugqibela wena Hayi ukushumayela iindaba ezilungileyo, wena Okanye ngeke amatye.egolide.zesilivere okanye ubutyebi inkxaso IVangeli umsebenzi ongcwele, inkxaso Abakhonzi nabasebenzi bakaThixo! Ziqwebeleni ubutyebi ezulwini . Xa umzimba wakho ubuyela eluthulini kwaye ubutyebi bakho basemhlabeni bungathatyathwa, ingaba ikhaya lakho lanaphakade liya kutyeba kangakanani kwixesha elizayo? Ungavuswa njani umzimba wakho ngobuhle ngakumbi? Ngaba unyanisile? Imbekiselo ( Mateyu 6:19-21 )

Iculo: Ndiyakholwa! Kodwa andinalo ukholo lwaneleyo Nceda uncede iNkosi

Ndaqhutywa nguMoya oyiNgcwele; saza isithunywa sandisa entabeni ende, sandibonisa umzi ongcwele, iYerusalem, ohla uphuma emazulwini, uvela kuThixo. Ubuqaqawuli bukaThixo bebukho phakathi komzi; Kwakukho udonga olude, lunamasango alishumi elinamabini, emasangweni izithunywa zezulu ezilishumi elinazibini, emasangweni kubhalwe amagama ezizwe ezilishumi elinazibini zakwaSirayeli. Kukho amasango amathathu kwicala lasempumalanga, amasango amathathu ngasentla, amasango amathathu ngasezantsi, nangasentshonalanga amasango amathathu. Udonga lwesixeko lunamatye eziseko alishumi elinambini, yaye phezu kweziseko lawo ngamagama abapostile abalishumi elinababini bayo iMvana. Lowo wayethetha nam wayephethe ingcongolo yegolide njengomlawuli. Phawula: " Ingcongolo yegolide njengomlawuli “Yilinganise ngumKristu iyasetyenziswa igolide , isilivere , igugu melana? Usasebenzisa uhlaza , umququ Kuthekani ngesakhiwo esibonakalayo? , ngoko, uyaqonda? 13 wulinganise umzi lowo, namasango awo, neendonga zaso; Umzi lowo umbombo-ne, ubude bawo nobubanzi bawo bunye. Izulu lawulinganisa ngengcongolo umzi; Ngamawaka amane eemayile ewonke , ubude, nobubanzi, nokuphakama, kwalingana zonke, walulinganisa udonga lomzi ngokwemilinganiselo yabantu, nemilinganiselo yezithunywa zezulu, zaba nayo yonke Ikhulu elinamashumi amane anesine ingqiniba.

Iindonga zeyaspisi Umzi yigolide engcwengekileyo, efana negilasi ebonakalelayo; Iziseko zodonga lwesixeko zazihonjiswe ngamatye anqabileyo ahlukeneyo: isiseko sokuqala yiyaspisi; elesibhozo libe yikrisolite; Amasango alishumi elinambini aziiperile ezilishumi elinambini, isango ngalinye liyiperile. Izitrato zomzi yigolide engcwengekileyo, njengegilasi ecwengileyo; Andibonanga tempile kuwo umzi, kuba iNkosi uThixo uSomandla nayo iMvana yitempile yawo. Isixeko asifuni langa nanyanga ukuze sikhanyiselwe, kuba ubuqaqawuli bukaThixo bukhanyisa phezu kwaso, nayo iMvana isisibane sawo. Iintlanga ziya kuhamba ekukhanyeni kwawo; Amasango esixeko akaze avalwe emini, akukho busuku khona. Abantu baya kumnika uzuko nembeko yeentlanga kweso sixeko. + Akukho mntu uyinqambi + okanye nabani na owenza amasikizi nobuxoki. kuphela igama ebhalwe kwimvana incwadi yobomi Kuphela abo baphezulu kufuneka bangene. . ( ISityhilelo 21:10-27 )

Ingelosi yandibonisa loo nto ezitratweni zesixeko umlambo wamanzi aphilileyo Uqaqambile, ngathi ngumkhenkce, uqukuqela uvela kwitrone kaThixo neyeMvana. ngapha nangapha komlambo ngumthi wobomi , Qhubekani nivelisa iziqhamo ezilishumi elinambini, nixakathe iziqhamo ngenyanga nganye Amagqabi emthini ngawokuphilisa zonke iintlanga. Akusayi kuba sabakho nasinye isiqalekiso; ngokuba ikuwo umzi itrone kaThixo neyeMvana; igama lakhe liya kubhalwa emabunzini abo. Akusekho busuku; Abayi kusebenzisa izibane nalanga, kuba iNkosi uYehova iya kuzikhanyisela . Baya kulawula ngonaphakade kanaphakade . Sathi kum isithunywa, La mazwi ayinyaniso, athembekile; iNkosi, uThixo womoya wabaprofeti, yasithuma isithunywa sakhe sasemazulwini ukubabonisa abakhonzi bakhe izinto ezimele ukubakho kamsinya. Yabona, ndiyeza kamsinya; Banoyolo abo bazigcinayo iziprofeto kule ncwadi! ( ISityhilelo 22:1-7 )

Ushicilelo lweVangeli ukusuka
ibandla leNkosi uYesu Krestu

Ukwabelana ngesicatshulwa, siqhutywa nguMoya kaThixo Abasebenzi bakaYesu Krestu: UMzalwane Wang*yun, uDade uLiu, uDade uZheng, uMzalwana uCen - kunye nabanye abasebenzi, baxhasa kwaye basebenza kunye kumsebenzi wevangeli weBandla likaYesu Krestu.

Bashumayela ivangeli kaYesu Krestu, ivangeli evumela ukuba abantu basindiswe, bazukiswe, kwaye imizimba yabo ikhululwe! Amagama abo abhalwe encwadini yobomi ! Amen.

→Kunjengokuba eyabaseFilipi 4:2-3 isitsho ngoPawulos, kuTimoti, uWodiya, uSintike, uKlemente, nabanye ababesebenza noPawulos: Amagama abo asencwadini yobomi . Amen!
