articles.title: Umgwebo weDoomsday
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubazalwana noodade bam abathandekayo kwintsapho kaThixo! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile kwiSityhilelo isahluko 20 iindinyana 12-13 size sizifunde kunye: Ndababona abafileyo, abancinane nabakhulu, bemi phambi kwetrone. Zavulwa iincwadi, kwavulwa nenye incwadi, eyeyobomi.

Abafileyo bagwetywa ngokwezinto ezibhaliweyo kwezo ncwadi, nangokwezenzo zabo. Lwathi ulwandle lwabakhupha abafileyo abakhona, kwathi ukufa neHadesi kwabakhupha abafileyo abakhona, bagwetywa elowo ngokwemisebenzi yakhe.

Namhlanje sizakufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane kunye "Umgwebo weDoomsday" Thandaza: U-Abha othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen.

Enkosi Nkosi! “Umfazi onesidima” eNkosini uYesu Kristu ecaweni Ukuthuma abasebenzi, ngelizwi lenyaniso, elibhaliweyo, elithethiweyo ngezandla zabo, eliziindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso, zozuko, nentlawulelo yemizimba yethu. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen.

Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumlo yethu kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni: Mabaqonde bonke abantwana bakaThixo ukuba “iincwadi zavulwa,” lwaza ulwandle lwabakhupha abafileyo abalapho; .

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

♦ umgwebo womhla wentshabalalo ♦

1. Itrone enkulu emhlophe

ISityhilelo [Isahluko 20:11] Ndaphinda ndabona Itrone enkulu emhlophe ehleli phezu kwayo Izulu nomhlaba zisalekile ebusweni bakhe, kwaye akusekho ndawo kunokubonwa.

buza: Ngubani ohleli kwitrone enkulu emhlophe?
impendulo: INkosi uYesu Kristu!

Phambi kweNkosi, izulu nomhlaba akanako ukusaba emehlweni kaThixo, yaye akukho ndawo inokubonakala.

2. Iitrone ezininzi

ISityhilelo [Isahluko 20:4] Ndaphinda ndabona iitrone ezininzi , kukho nabantu abahleli phezu kwayo...!

buza: Ngubani ohleli kwiitrone ezininzi?
impendulo: Abangcwele abaye balawula noKristu iminyaka eliwaka!

Isithathu: Lowo uhleli etroneni unegunya lokugweba

buza: Ngubani onegunya lokugweba?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

( 1 ) INkosi uYesu Kristu inegunya lokugweba

UYise akagwebi namnye; uthe umgwebo wonke wawunikela kuNyana; wamnika igunya lokugweba . ( Yohane 5:22, 26-27 )

( 2 ) Iwaka leminyaka ( uvuko lokuqala ) unegunya lokugweba

buza: Ngoobani abaya kuvuswa okokuqala kwiwaka leminyaka?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

1 Imiphefumlo yabo banqunyulwa iintloko ngenxa yokunikela ubungqina ngoYesu nangenxa yeLizwi likaThixo ,
2 kwanabo bangalinquliyo irhamncwa nomfanekiso walo ,
3 kwanemiphefumlo yabo balufumeneyo uphawu lwakhe emabunzini abo nasezandleni zabo , Bonke bavusiwe!

Ndabona iitrone, nabantu behleli phezu kwazo, banikwa igunya lokugweba. Ndabona ukuvuka kwemiphefumlo yababenqunyulwe iintloko ngenxa yobungqina bukaYesu, nangenxa yelizwi likaThixo, nababengalinquli irhamncwa nomfanekiselo walo, nababelwamkela uphawu emabunzini abo, nasezandleni zabo. .babe ngookumkani kunye noKristu iminyaka eliwaka. Olo luvuko lokuqala. ( Abanye abafileyo abakavuswa , ide idlule iminyaka eliwaka. (ISityhilelo 20:4-5)

(3) Abangcwele banegunya lokugweba

Ngaba uyazi Ngaba abangcwele baya kuligweba ihlabathi? Ukuba ke ihlabathi ligwetywa phambi kwenu, anikufanele na ukugwetywa le nto incinane? Imbekiselo ( 1 Korinte 6:2 )

4 UThixo uligweba ngokobulungisa ihlabathi;

【 umise itrone yakhe, ukuba agwebe 】

Ke yena uNdikhoyo uhleli ngonaphakade; Imbekiselo ( INdumiso 9:7 )

【 Ligwebeni ihlabathi ngobulungisa 】

Uya kuligweba elimiweyo ngobulungisa, Agwebe phakathi kwezizwe ngokuthe tye. Imbekiselo ( INdumiso 9:8 )

【 ukugweba ngokugqibeleleyo 】

ndiya kugweba ngengqibelelo ngexesha elimisiweyo. Imbekiselo ( INdumiso 75:2 )

buza: UThixo uzigweba njani zonke iintlanga ngobulungisa, ngokuthe tye, nangogwebo?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

(1) Musani ukugweba ngento eniyibonayo ngamehlo, musani ukugweba ngokweendlebe zenu

UMoya weNkosi uya kuhlala phezu kwakhe, uMoya wobulumko nowokuqonda, umoya wecebo nowobugorha, umoya wokwazi nowokoyika uYehova. Uyoliswa kukoyika uYehova; Musani ukugweba ngento eniyibonayo ngamehlo, musani ukugweba ngokweendlebe zenu ;Imbekiselo ( Isaya Isahluko 11 iindinyana 2-3 )

buza: Umgwebo awusekelwanga kumbono, izenzo okanye ukuva. Kule meko, sisiphi isizinzi esithi uThixo awuphumeze umgwebo wakhe?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

(2) UThixo uya kukhanya inyaniso ityala

KwabaseRoma [Isahluko 2:2] Siyabazi abo bakwenzayo oku: uThixo uya kumgweba ngokwenyaniso .

buza: Yintoni inyaniso?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

1 UMoya oyiNgcwele uyinyaniso; — 1 Yohane 5:7
2 UMoya wenyaniso — Yohane 14:16-17
3 Uzelwe ngamanzi nanguMoya — Yohane 3:5-7

Phawula: Kuphela ngumntu omtsha ozelwe ngokutsha onokungena ebukumkanini bukaThixo,” wazalwa ngokutsha umntu omtsha ” → ngoMoya oyiNgcwele entliziyweni hlaziya -- abo banyamezelayo ekwenzeni okulungileyo, befuna uzuko nembeko, neentsikelelo ezingunaphakade; UThixo uya kukunika ubomi obungunaphakade ! Amen. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?
(Uze ungagwebi) Siyabazi abo benza oko; UThixo uya kukhanya inyaniso mgwebe . Nina nibagwebayo abo bazenzayo izinto ezinjalo, nibe nina, niba ningaba nina ningawusaba umgwebo kaThixo na? …Uya kubavuza bonke ngabanye ngokwemisebenzi yabo. abo bazingisayo ekwenzeni okulungileyo, befuna uzuko nembeko nokungabhubhi, mababuyekeze ngobomi obungunaphakade; 2) 2-3 amacandelo, 6-8 amacandelo)

(3) Ngoku ka IVangeli kaYesu Kristu ityala

KwabaseRoma [Isahluko 2:16] uThixo ngoYesu Kristu Imini yomgwebo kwiimfihlo zabantu , ngoku ka ivangeli yam watsho.

buza: Iyintoni imini yoMgwebo wezinto ezifihlakeleyo?
impendulo: " imfihlo "Ifihliwe, yinto abanye abantu abangaziyo → sizalwa ngokutsha" Umntu omtsha “Ubomi bufihliwe noKristu kuye uThixo; Imini yeemfihlo ” ngumgwebo omkhulu womhla wokugqibela ngokwevangeli yam → ngokutsho kwam ( uPawulosi ) umgwebo wevangeli kaYesu Krestu eyashunyayelwa nguMoya oyiNgcwele. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

buza: Yintoni ivangeli?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

mna( uPawulosi ) endazamkelayo, ndaza ndaninika, kuqala, uKristu, ngokwezibhalo,

wafa ngenxa yezono zethu ( 1 " ileta " ndikhululekile esonweni, ndikhululekile kuwo umthetho nanesiqalekiso somthetho ),

Uye wangcwatywa ( 2 " ileta " Lahlani ixhego nokuziphatha kwalo ); kwaye ngokutsho kweBhayibhile;

Wavuswa ngomhla wesithathu ( 3 " ileta " Sizalwa ngokutsha ngokuvuka kukaKristu kwabafileyo, kusenza sigwetyelwe, sizalwe ngokutsha, sivuswe, sisindiswe, kwaye sibe nobomi obungunaphakade! Amen . ) Imbekiselo ( 1 Korinte 15:3-4 ).

Ngoko ke, iNkosi uYesu yathi: “Kuba wenjenje uThixo ukulithanda kwakhe ihlabathi, ude wancama uNyana wakhe okuphela kwamzeleyo, ukuze bonke abakholwayo kuye bangatshabalali, koko babe nobomi obungunaphakade. Ligwebe ihlabathi eliphantsi kwakhe, ukuze ihlabathi lisindiswe ngaye; uNyana okuphela kwamzeleyo! igama likaYesu 】Nantso ke →→ 1 ukuze nikhululeke kuso isono, nakweso mthetho, nasesiqalekisweni somthetho; 2 Lahla ixhego nokuziphatha kwalo, 3 Ukuze ube nokugwetyelwa, uvuswe, uzalwe ngokutsha, usindiswe, kwaye ube nobomi obungunaphakade! Amen! Abo bakholelwa kuye → wena( ileta ) Ukufa kukaKristu emnqamlezweni - kukukhulule esonweni → wena ( kholwani ) akayi kugwetywa; abantu abangakholwayo , Ulwaphulo-mthetho lugqityiwe . Ngoko, uyayiqonda? Imbekiselo ( Yohane 3:16-18 )

(4) Ngoku ka into eyashunyayelwa nguYesu ityala

UYohane Chapter 12:48 (UYesu wathi) Lowo undigibayo, angawamkeli amazwi am, unaye umgwebi; intshumayelo yam uya kugwetywa ngomhla wokugqibela.

1 indlela yobomi

buza: Oko uYesu wayekushumayela!
→→Yintoni iTao?
impendulo: " indlela "NguThixo lo!" indlela "Ukuba yinyama" uthixo ” yaba yinyama →→ Igama lakhe nguYesu ! Amen.

Amazwi nentshumayelo kaYesu →→ngumoya, ubomi, kunye nokukhanya kobomi bomntu! Abantu mabazuze ubomi, bazuze ubomi obungunaphakade, bazuze isonka sobomi, bazuze nokukhanya kobomi kuKristu! Amen . Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Ekuqalekeni ube ekho uLizwi, waye uLizwi ekuye uThixo. ULizwi nguThixo . ...Kuye kwakukho ubomi, baye obo bomi baba lukhanyiso eluntwini. … ULizwi waba yinyama uhleli phakathi kwethu, ezele lubabalo nayinyaniso. Sabubukela ubungangamsha bakhe awabunikwa nguYise, njengoko ekukuphela koNyana wakhe; Isalathiso ( Yohane 1:1,4,14 )

Waphinda uYesu wathi kwindimbane: Ndim ukhanyiselo lwehlabathi; Lowo undilandelayo akasayi kuze ahambe ebumnyameni; yena uya kuba nalo ukhanyiso lobomi . ’ (Yohane 8:12)

2 Abo bamkela uYesu bangabantwana abazelwe nguThixo

Ke bonke abamamkelayo wabanika igunya lokuba babe ngabantwana bakaThixo, abo ke bakholwayo kwigama lakhe. Banjalo abo abangazalwanga ngagazi, nayinkanuko, nangakuthanda kwandoda; ezelwe nguThixo . Imbekiselo ( Yohane 1:12-13 )

(5) phantsi komthetho, ukuba sigwetywe ngokokwenziwa phantsi komthetho

KwabaseRoma [Isahluko 2:12] Bonke abonileyo bengenamthetho, baya kutshabalala ngokunjalo bengenamthetho; Lowo wonayo ephantsi komthetho, uya kugwetywa ngokomthetho; .

buza: Yintoni ukungabikho komthetho?
impendulo: " akukho mthetho "yiyo i bakhululekile kuwo umthetho →Ngomzimba kaKristu, sifa kuwo umthetho osibophayo, nikhululwe ngoku kuwo umthetho nesiqalekiso sawo (Funda amaRoma 7:4-6.)
→→Ukuba nikhululekile kuwo umthetho, aniyi kugwetywa ngokomthetho . Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

buza: Siyintoni na isono phantsi komthetho?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

1 Andifuni kuboleka ( UKrestu ) umntu okhululekileyo emthethweni — Roma 7:4-6
2 Nabani na ophila ngomthetho --Isahluko 3 esongezelelweyo ivesi 10
3 Ngabo bawugcinayo umthetho, befuna ukugwetyelwa ngumthetho; ;
4 Lowo uwileyo elubabalweni --Yongeza isahluko 5, indinyana 4 .

【 lumkisa 】
Ekubeni aba bantu bengakulungelanga ukukhululeka kuwo umthetho, baphantsi komthetho → ngokusekelwe kuqheliselo lomthetho, abo bagwetyelwa ngumthetho, abo baphula umthetho, nabo baphula umthetho → uya kugwetywa ngokwemisebenzi yakhe phantsi komthetho . Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Kule mihla abaninzi abadala bebandla, abefundisi okanye abashumayeli bakufundisa ukugcina umthetho kwaye abafuni ukuwugqithisa ( UKrestu bakhululwe kuwo umthetho, wabanika ngokwawo uThixo; phantsi komthetho ), kufuneka unike ingxelo ngayo yonke into oyenzileyo → bagwetywa bonke ngokwemisebenzi yabo . Imbekiselo ( Mateyu 12:36-37 )

Bayawazi umthetho, bayawaphula umthetho, benze ubugebenga. Ngaba basafuna ukuhlala etroneni baze bagwebe abanye? Ukugweba aboni? Umgwebo wabaphilileyo nabafileyo? Ukugwetywa kwezizwe ezilishumi elinesibini zakwaSirayeli? Ingelosi yomgwebo? Abo bafundisa ubuxoki mabangaphuphi amaphupha amnandi, bona ngokwabo bayawugcina umthetho, baphule umthetho, benze isono, bawile elubabalweni; Uthi, akunjalo?

(6) Elowo uya kugwetywa ngokwezenzo zakhe phantsi komthetho

buza: Baza kugwetywa ngantoni abafileyo?
impendulo: balandele ukwenza phantsi komthetho lokugwetywa.

buza: Ngaba abantu abafileyo banemizimba yenyama?
impendulo: " umntu ofileyo "Abanayo imizimba yenyama, kwaye ngenxa yokuba bengawazi amagama abanokuwasebenzisa ukuwachaza, banokubizwa kuphela " ufile "

buza: " umntu ofileyo "Isuka phi?"
impendulo: Kuhlangulwe elwandle, engcwabeni, ekufeni naseHadesi, intolongo yomphefumlo . ( 1 Petros 3:19 )

Ndababona abafileyo, abancinane nabakhulu, bemi phambi kwetrone. Zavulwa iincwadi, kwavulwa nenye incwadi, eyeyobomi. Abafileyo bagwetywa ngokwezinto ezibhaliweyo kwezo ncwadi, nangokwezenzo zabo. Lwathi ulwandle lwabakhupha abafileyo abakhona, kwathi ukufa neHadesi kwabakhupha abafileyo abakhona; bagwetywa bonke ngokwemisebenzi yabo . ( ISityhilelo 20:12-13 )

(7) Abangcwele baya kuligweba ihlabathi

Ngaba uyazi Ngaba abangcwele baya kuligweba ihlabathi? ? Ukuba ke ihlabathi ligwetywa phambi kwenu, anikufanele na ukugwetywa le nto incinane? Imbekiselo ( 1 Korinte 6:2 )

(8) Umgwebo wezizwe ezilishumi elinambini zakwaSirayeli iqela

Wathi uYesu, Inene, ndithi kuni, nina nindilandelayo, xa athe wahlala uNyana woMntu phezu kwetrone yobuqaqawuli bakhe, ekubuyiselweni kwakhe, nani niya kuhlala phezu kweetrone ezilishumi elinambini. Isigwebo sezizwe ezilishumi elinesibini zakwaSirayeli . Imbekiselo ( Mateyu 19:28 )

(9) Umgwebo wabafileyo nabaphilayo

Wasithethela ngelithi, masishumayele ebantwini, sibonakalaliswe ukuba umiselwe nguThixo; ukuze agwebe abaphilileyo nabafileyo . Imbekiselo ( IZenzo 10:42 )

(10) Umgwebo weengelosi eziwileyo

Ngaba uyazi Siyazigweba na izithunywa zezulu? ? Kobeka phi na ke kwizinto zobu bomi? Imbekiselo ( 1 Korinte 6:3 )

buza: Ngaba kukho abo bangagwetywayo nabagwetyiweyo?

impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

1 Yiba phakathi kwabafayo, bangcwatywa, bavuka kunye noKrestu — ( Roma 6:3-7 )
2 abo bathe bakhululwa emthethweni ngoKristu — ( Roma 7:6 )
3 Abo bahlala kuKristu (Funda eyoku-1 kaYohane 3:6.)
4 Abo bazelwe ngamanzi nanguMoya — ( Yohane 3:5 )
5 Abazelwe ngeendaba ezilungileyo ezi bakuKristu Yesu ( 1 Korinte 4:15 )
6 Lowo uzelweyo enyanisweni ( Yakobi 1:18 )
7 Abo bazelwe nguThixo (Funda eyoku-1 kaYohane 3:9.)

Phawula: Nabani na ozelwe nguThixo akoni kwaye akayi kona → Abantwana abazelwe nguThixo bahlala kuKristu kwaye banoKristu njengomlamleli bakhululekile esonweni nasemthethweni Akukho mthetho wokugweba okanye ulawula, ngoko banako njani ? Ugwetywe yintoni? Kugwetywe ngantoni? Apho kungekho mthetho, akukho sigqitho. Ngaba unyanisile? Uyaqonda? Imbekiselo ( Roma 4:15 )

→→Abo bonayo ngabamtyholi, yaye indawo abaya kuyo lidike lomlilo nesalfure. . Uyaqonda?

Bonke abazelwe nguThixo aboni; , ngokuba ilizwi likaThixo lihleli kuye; Kulapho kutyhilwa khona ukuba ngoobani na abangabantwana bakaThixo nabangabantwana bakaMtyholi. Nabani na ongakwenziyo ubulungisa akangokaThixo, nalowo ungamthandiyo umzalwana wakhe. ( 1 Yohane 3:9-10 )

Ntlanu: ♥ "Incwadi yoBomi" ♥

buza: Ligama likabani elibhalwe kwincwadi yobomi?

articles.title: Ifayile yetyala ivuliwe
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubazalwana noodade bam abathandekayo kwintsapho kaThixo! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile kwiSityhilelo isahluko 20 indinyana 12 size sifunde kunye: Ndababona abafileyo, abancinane nabakhulu, bemi phambi kwetrone. Zavulwa iincwadi, kwavulwa nenye incwadi, eyeyobomi. Abafileyo bagwetywa ngokwezinto ezibhaliweyo kwezo ncwadi, nangokwezenzo zabo.

Namhlanje sizakufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane kunye "Ifayile yetyala ivuliwe" Thandaza: U-Abha othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Umfazi onesidima【 ecaweni 】Thuma abasebenzi: ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo ezandleni zabo, elithethwa ngabo, eliziindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso, zozuko, nentlawulelo yemizimba yethu. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumlo yethu kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni: Bonke abantwana bakaThixo mabaqonde ukuba “iincwadi zivuliwe” yaye abafileyo baya kugwetywa ngokwezinto ezibhaliweyo kwezo ncwadi nangokwezenzo zabo.

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

Ifayile yetyala iyanda:

→→Nigwetywe ngokwezenzo zabo .

ISityhilelo 20 [Isahluko 12] Ndababona abafileyo, abakhulu kwanabancinane, bemi phambi kwetrone. Ifayile yetyala iyavulwa , kwaza kwavulwa omnye umqulu, oyincwadi yobomi. Abafileyo bagwetywa ngokwezenzo zabo, ngokokubhaliweyo kwezo ncwadi. .

(1) Wonke umntu umiselwe ukufa, yaye emva kokufa kuya kubakho umgwebo

Ngokwe-destiny, wonke umntu umiselwe ukufa kube kanye. Emva kokufa kukho umgwebo . Imbekiselo ( Hebhere 9:27 )

(2) Umgwebo uqala kwindlu kaThixo

Ngokuba ixesha lifikile, Umgwebo uqala ngendlu kaThixo . Ukuba ke luqala ngathi, koba yintoni na isiphelo kwabo bangazikholwayo iindaba ezilungileyo zikaThixo? ( 1 Petros 4:17 )

(3) Bhaptizelwa kuKristu, ufe, ungcwatywe, uze uvuke kwakhona ukuze ukhululeke kumgwebo

buza: Kutheni abo babhaptizelwa ekufeni kukaKristu bengenawo umgwebo?
impendulo: ngokuba" ubhaptiziwe “Abo bafa noKristu bamanyene noKristu ngendlela yokufa kwakhe → Indoda endala iye yagwetywa kunye noKristu , babethelelwa emnqamlezweni kunye, bafa kunye, bangcwatywa kunye, ukuze umzimba wesono utshatyalaliswe → Umgwebo uqala ngendlu kaThixo ;

UKristu wavuka kwabafileyo ukuzalwa ngokutsha kuthi, Ayisendim ophilayo ngoku Kaloku nguKrestu odla ubomi ngenxa yam. Ndizelwe ngokutsha ( Umntu omtsha ) ubomi busezulwini, kuKristu, bufihlwe noKristu kuye uThixo, ngasekunene kukaThixo uYise! Amen. Ukuba uhlala kuKristu, umntu omtsha ozelwe nguThixo akanakuze one, kwaye wonke umntwana ozelwe nguThixo akanakuze one! akukho sono Umntu unokugwetywa njani? Ngaba unyanisile? ngoko ukhuselekile ekugwetyweni ! Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Anazi na ukuba thina, sabhaptizelwayo kuKristu Yesu, sabhaptizelwa ekufeni kwakhe? ke, sangcwatywa naye ngokubhaptizelwa ekufeni , ukuze konke ukushukuma kwethu sibe nobomi obutsha, njengokuba noKristu wavuswayo kwabafileyo ngalo uzuko loYise. Kuba, xa similiselwe kuye ngemfano yokufa kwakhe, somiliselwa nasekufeni ngemfano yakhe, sisazi ukuba umntu wethu omdala wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni kunye naye, ukuze umzimba wesono uphuthiswe; ukuze singabi saba ngamakhoboka esono ;Imbekiselo ( Roma 6:3-6 )

(4) Uvuko lokuqala lwewaka leminyaka Akukho sabelo , abanye abafileyo bagwetywa

Olo luvuko lokuqala. ( Abanye abafileyo abakavuswa , ide idlule iminyaka eliwaka. (ISityhilelo 20:5)

(5) UYehova uya kubagweba abantu bakhe, abaphindezele

IINDUMISO 9:4 Ngokuba undiphindezelele, wandikhusela;
Kuba siyazi ukuba ngubani owathi: Impindezelo yeyam, kuya kubuyekeza mna "; kananjalo: "UYehova uya kubagweba abantu bakhe. “Kuyoyikeka ke ukuwela ezandleni zoThixo ophilileyo! ( Hebhere 10:30-31 )

(6) UYehova wabaphindezelela abantu, Wawamisa amagama abo Shiya igama lakho encwadini yobomi

Ngenxa yesi sizathu, kunjalo Kwanabafileyo bazishumayele iindaba ezilungileyo kubo Kufuneka sibabize Inyama igwetywa ngokomntu , yabo Umoya kodwa uphila ngoThixo . ( 1 Petros 4:6 )

( Phawula: Ukuba liselisebe elihlumayo kwingcambu ka-Adam. Hayi ukusuka" inyoka Imbewu eyazalwayo, umdiza owahlwayelwa nguMtyholi, Bonke banethuba Shiya igama lakho ebhalwe encwadini yobomi , olu luthando, inceba, nobulungisa bukaThixo uBawo; ukuba " inyoka "Inzala ezelwe ngu Oko uMtyholi akuhlwayelayo kuvelisa ukhula Akukho ndlela yakushiya igama lakho kwincwadi yobomi →→abanjengoKayin, uYuda owangcatsha iNkosi, nabantu abafana nabaFarisi abachasa iNkosi uYesu nenyaniso, uYesu watsho! Uyise wabo nguMtyholi, nabantwana bakhe. Aba bantu akuyomfuneko ukuba bawashiye amagama abo okanye bawakhumbule, kuba iDike loMlilo lelabo. Ngoko, uyayiqonda? )

(7) Umgwebo wezizwe ezilishumi elinesibini zakwaSirayeli

Wathi uYesu, Inene, ndithi kuni, nina nindilandelayo, xa athe wahlala uNyana woMntu phezu kwetrone yobuqaqawuli bakhe, ekubuyiselweni kwakhe, nani niya kuhlala phezu kweetrone ezilishumi elinambini. Isigwebo sezizwe ezilishumi elinesibini zakwaSirayeli . Imbekiselo ( Mateyu 19:28 )

(8) Umgwebo wabafileyo nabaphilayo

Ngentliziyo elolo hlobo ke, ukususela ngoku niya kulidla ixesha eliseleyo kweli hlabathi, kungekhona ngokweenkanuko zabantu, kodwa ngokuthanda kukaThixo. Kuba kukade sihlala silandela iinkanuko zeentlanga, eburheletyweni, ezinkanukweni, ezinxileni, ezindywaleni, nasezindywaleni, nasekukhonzeni izithixo, izinto ezilizothe; Kwezi zinto bafumanisa ukuba bayamangalisa ukuba ungahambi nabo endleleni yokungcola, kwaye bayakuhleba. Baya kuba lapho Ukuze kuphenduleke phambi kweNkosi, ogweba abaphilayo nabafileyo . ( 1 Petros 4:2-5 )

(9)Umgwebo weengelosi eziwileyo

Kwaye kukho izithunywa zezulu ezingahlalanga emisebeni yazo, zawashiya amakhaya azo, kodwa iNkosi yawavalela ngamakhamandela ebumnyameni ngonaphakade; Silindele umgwebo wemini enkulu . Imbekiselo ( Yude 1:6 )
Nokuba izithunywa zezulu zonile, uThixo akazange anyamezele waza waziphosa esihogweni waza wabanikela kumhadi wobumnyama. silindele ukuxoxwa kwetyala . ( 2 Petros 2:4 )

(10) Umgwebo wabaprofeti bobuxoki nabo baye banqula irhamncwa nomfanekiso walo

Ngaloo mini,” utsho uYehova wemikhosi, “ndiya kuba njalo Libhangise igama lezithixo ehlabathini , aliyi kuba sakhunjulwa; Akusayi kubakho baprofeti bobuxoki noomoya abangcolileyo . Imbekiselo ( Zekariya 13:2 )

(11) Umgwebo wabo balufumeneyo uphawu lwerhamncwa emabunzini nasezandleni zabo

Neyesithathu ingelosi yabalandela, yathi ngezwi elikhulu. Ukuba nabani na unqula irhamncwa okanye umfanekiselo walo waza wamkela uphawu ebunzi okanye esandleni sakhe , naye lo uya kuyisela iwayini yomsindo kaThixo; uya kuthuthunjiswa emlilweni nesalfure phambi kwezithunywa ezingcwele naphambi kweMvana. Umsi wokuthuthunjelwa kwakhe unyuka ngonaphakade kanaphakade. Abo banqula irhamncwa nomfanekiso walo baze bamkele uphawu lwegama lalo abayi kuphumla imini nobusuku. ( ISityhilelo 14:9-11 )

(12) Ukuba igama lakhe alibhalwanga encwadini yobomi, waphoswa edikeni lomlilo.

Ukuba igama lakhe alibhalwanga encwadini yobomi, yena waphoswa edikeni lomlilo . ( ISityhilelo 20:15 )

Ke amagwala, nabangakholwayo, nabangamasikizi, nababulali, nabahenyuzi, nabakhonzi bezithixo, nawo onke amaxoki, baya kuba sedikeni lomlilo elivutha isulfure. (ISityhilelo 21:8)

Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumlo yethu kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni: UThixo ubanika amagama amatsha bonke abantwana bakhe Ibhalwe kwiNcwadi yoBomi! --- ♥ "Incwadi yoBomi" ♥ ---

Nye," incwadi yobomi 》Igama elirekhodiweyo

IsiTyhilelo [Isahluko 3:5] Lowo weyisayo uya kunxitywa ezimhlophe; incwadi yobomi alithambise igama lakhe, alivume igama lakhe phambi koBawo, naphambi kwezithunywa zikaBawo zonke.

buza: Ligama likabani elibhalwe kwincwadi yobomi?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

(1) Igama likaYesu

Inzala ka-Abraham, inzala kaDavide, Umlibo wokuzalwa kukaYesu Kristu ("inzala", "inzala": umbhalo wokuqala uthi "unyana". Lo myalelo ulandelayo ungezantsi): ...Ukuzalwa kukaYesu Kristu kubhalwe ngolu hlobo: Unina uMariya wayegane uYosefu, kodwa bengekatshati, uMariya. wakhawulwa nguMoya oyiNgcwele. ...Uza kuzala unyana, kwaye kufuneka umnike Ebizwa ngokuba nguYesu , kuba ufuna ukusindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo. ’ ( Mateyu 1:1, 18, 21 )

(2) Amagama abapostile bakaYesu abali-12

(Isixeko Esingcwele iYerusalem) Udonga luneziseko ezilishumi elinambini; Kwisiseko kukho amagama aBapostile abaLishumi elineSibini beMvana . ( ISityhilelo 21:14 )

(3) Amagama ezizwe ezilishumi elinesibini zakwaSirayeli

Ndaqhutywa nguMoya oyiNgcwele; saza isithunywa sandisa entabeni ende, sandibonisa umzi ongcwele, iYerusalem, ohla uphuma emazulwini, uvela kuThixo. Ubuqaqawuli bukaThixo bebukho phakathi komzi; Kwakukho udonga olude, lunamasango alishumi elinamabini, emasangweni izithunywa zezulu ezilishumi elinazibini, emasangweni kubhalwe amagama ezizwe ezilishumi elinazibini zakwaSirayeli. Imbekiselo ( ISityhilelo 21, indinyana 10-12 )

(4) Amagama abaprofeti

Uya kubona uAbraham, uIsake, uYakobi, kunye Bonke abaprofeti basebukumkanini bukaThixo , kodwa uya kukhutshelwa ngaphandle, apho kuya kubakho ukulila nokutshixiza kwamazinyo. Imbekiselo ( Luka 13:28 )

(5) Amagama eengcwele

buza: Ngoobani abangcwele?
impendulo: " abangcwele " Kuthetha ukusebenza kunye noKristu! Abakhonzi nabasebenzi bakaThixo!

KwabaseFilipi [4:3] kunjengokuba umpostile uPawulos wathi, Ndiyaniyala ke, nina dyokhwe yokwenene, ukuba nibasize aba bafazi babini, ngokuba baye bazama nam ezindabeni ezilungileyo, noKlemente, nabanye abasebenzisi bam; Amagama abo asencwadini yobomi .

Oh Nkosi yam, abangcwele Nina bapostile, nani nonke baprofeti, yibani nemihlali ngayo; ngokuba uThixo eniphindezelele kuyo. ( ISityhilelo 18:20 )

(6) Igama lomphefumlo welungisa ligqibelele;

Ke nina nifikile entabeni yeZiyon, umzi kaThixo ophilileyo, iYerusalem yasemazulwini. Kukho amashumi amawaka ezithunywa zezulu, kukho indibano kawonke-wonke yoonyana bamazibulo, abamagama abo asezulwini, kukho uThixo ogweba bonke, kwanemiphefumlo yamalungisa enziwe yagqibelela ( Hebhere 12:22-22 ) 23)

(7) Amalungisa asindiswa egameni losindiso kuphela

Ukuba kunjalo Amalungisa aya kusindiswa kuphela Baya kuma phi na ke abantu abangahloneli Thixo nabangaboniyo? ( 1 Petros 4:18 )

“Wosuka eme uMikayeli, umthetheli wezithunywa zezulu, okhusela abantu bakho; Wonke umntu odweliswe encwadini , uya kusindiswa. Abaninzi kwabo balele eluthulini lomhlaba baya kuvuka. Phakathi kwabo kukho abo banobomi obungunaphakade. ukuthotywa , ithiywe ngonaphakade. Imbekiselo ( Daniyeli 12:1-2 )

2. Igama elitsha

Lowo unendlebe, makayive into ayithethayo uMoya oyiNgcwele kuwo amabandla. Lowo weyisayo ndiya kumnika imana efihlakeleyo, ndimnike ilitye elimhlophe; Kubhalwe igama elitsha etyeni Akukho bani uyaziyo ngaphandle kwalowo uyamkelayo. ( ISityhilelo 2 ivesi 17 )

buza: Yintoni imana efihliweyo?
impendulo: " imana efihliweyo "Kubhekiselwa kwisonka sobomi, kwaye isonka sobomi yiNkosi uYesu." imana efihliweyo ” libhekisela kwiNkosi uKristu.

UYesu wathi: “Ndim isonka sobomi; lowo uzayo kum, akasayi kulamba; lowo ukholwayo kum, akasayi kunxanwa naphakade.

impendulo: " Shiraishi "Imele ubunyulu nokungabi nasiphako," Shiraishi Ulwalwa lomoya ke lona ulwalwa lomoya nguKristu. Shiraishi ” libhekisela kwiNkosi uYesu Kristu.

Bonke basela amanzi afanayo omoya. Babesela eweni lomoya elalibalandela; Imbekiselo ( 1 Korinte 10:4 )

buza: Kuthetha ukuthini xa isithi (igama elitsha) kwilitye elimhlophe?
impendulo: 【 igama elitsha 】Oko kukuthi, ngaphandle kwamagama owawanikwa ngabazali bakho emhlabeni xa babezala → Ezulwini, uBawo waseZulwini ukunika elinye igama igama elitsha ! Igama lasezulwini, igama lomoya, igama likaThixo ! Amen. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

buza: Ndingalifumana njani ilitye elimhlophe endinokuthi ndibhale kulo igama elitsha?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

(1) Uzelwe ngamanzi nanguMoya — Yohane 3:5-7
(2) Wazalwa ngelizwi eliyinyaniso leendaba ezilungileyo — 1 Korinte 4:15
(3) Bazalwa nguThixo — Yohane 1:12-13

1. Uvuko lwangaphambi kweMillennium

ISityhilelo [Isahluko 20:4] Ndabona iitrone, nabantu behleli phezu kwazo, banikwa igunya lokugweba. Ndayibona imiphefumlo yababenqunyulwe iintloko ngenxa yobungqina obungoYesu, nangenxa yelizwi likaThixo, nababengalinquli irhamncwa nomfanekiselo walo, bengalwamkelanga nophawu lwalo emabunzini abo, nasezandleni zabo; Bonke bavuswa baza balawula noKristu iminyaka eliwaka .

buza: Ngoobani abavuswayo ngaphambi kwewaka leminyaka?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

(1) Imiphefumlo yabo banikela ubungqina ngoYesu baza banqunyulwa iintloko ngenxa yelizwi likaThixo

buza: Iyintoni imiphefumlo yabo banqunyulwa iintloko ngenxa yenjongo kaThixo?
impendulo: Bayimiphefumlo yabo babulawa ngenxa yelizwi likaThixo kunye nobungqina babo bevangeli likaYesu Krestu.
→→( njengaye ) Xa ndalivulayo elesihlanu itywina, ndabona phantsi kwesibingelelo imiphefumlo yababebulewe ngenxa yelizwi likaThixo nangenxa yobungqina... Banikwa bonke ngabanye iingubo ezinde ezimhlophe...! Imbekiselo ( ISityhilelo 6:9 )

(2) Akazange alinqule irhamncwa okanye umfanekiso walo

buza: Ngaba bantu bangazange balinqule irhamncwa nomfanekiso werhamncwa?
impendulo: Zange wanqula " inyoka “Iinyoka zamandulo, oodragoni ezinkulu ezibomvu, iidemon, uSathana. Amarhamncwa nemifanekiso yamarhamncwa—ukuba aninquli oothixo bobuxoki, uGuanyin, uBhuda, amaqhawe, amadoda amakhulu nezithixo ezisehlabathini, yonke into esemhlabeni, elwandle, nezithixo. iintaka zezulu, njl.

(3) Akukho mphefumlo ufumene uphawu ebunzi okanye ezandleni.

buza: Andizange ndisokole" yona "Luphi uphawu?"
impendulo: abangalufumananga uphawu lwerhamncwa emabunzini abo nasezandleni zabo .
Kukwabangela ukuba wonke umntu, omkhulu nomncinci, osisityebi nolihlwempu, okhululekileyo okanye ikhoboka, ukuba aphawule esandleni sakhe sokunene okanye ebunzi. …Nabu ke ubulumko: Lowo uliqiqayo, makalibale inani lerhamncwa; ( ISityhilelo 13:16, 18 )

【Phawula:】 1 Imiphefumlo yabo banikela ubungqina ngoYesu baza banqunyulwa iintloko ngenxa yeLizwi likaThixo; 2 Abakhange balinqule irhamncwa nomfanekiso walo; 3 Akukho namnye uthe walufumana uphawu lwerhamncwa ebunzi nasesandleni; Bonke bavusiwe! Amen
→→ Fumana uzuko, umvuzo, novuko olungcono! →→Ewe 100 amaxesha, kukho 60 amaxesha, kukho 30 Amaxesha! Amen. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?
Enye yawa kumhlaba omhle, yavelisa isiqhamo, enye ikhulu, enye amashumi amathandathu, enye amashumi amathathu. Lowo uneendlebe zokuva makeve! "
→→ Abazalwana noodade abaninzi bayibona le ndlela yokwenyaniso yaye Ngokuzolileyo linda, Ngokuzolileyo mamela, Ngokuzolileyo kholwa, cwaka umhlaba ligcine ilizwi ! Ukuba awumameli, uya kulahlekelwa yilahleko . Imbekiselo ( Mateyu 13:8-9 )

(4) Bonke baya kuvuswa

buza: Ngoobani abavusiweyo?
impendulo:

1 Imiphefumlo yabo banikela ubungqina ngoYesu baza banqunyulwa iintloko ngenxa yeLizwi likaThixo , (njengabapostile abangamashumi amabini kunye nabangcwele abangamaKristu abaye balandela uYesu kwaye bangqina iindaba ezilungileyo kwizizukulwana)

2 bengalinqulanga irhamncwa nomfanekiso walo; 3 Hayi, akukho namnye ulufumeneyo uphawu lwerhamncwa ebunzi okanye ezandleni zakhe. .

Bonke bavusiwe! Amen.

(5) Olo luvuko lokuqala

(6)Abafileyo abaseleyo abakavuswa

buza: Ngoobani abafileyo abangekavuswa?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi
" abafileyo abaseleyo "Okavuswa" kuthetha:
1 Abantu abanqula “inyoka,” inamba, umtyholi noSathana ;
2 Abo banqula irhamncwa nomfanekiso walo ;
3 Abo balufumeneyo uphawu lwerhamncwa emabunzini abo nasezandleni zabo .

(7) Banoyolo abo banesabelo kuvuko lokuqala baze balawule noKristu iminyaka eliwaka

buza: Umthathi-nxaxheba kuvuko lokuqala → Yiyiphi intsikelelo ekhoyo?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

1 Ninoyolo, ningcwele, nina banesabelo eluvukweni lokuqala;

4 Baya kuba ngababingeleli bakaThixo nabakaKristu, babe ngookumkani kunye noKristu iminyaka eliwaka. Imbekiselo ( ISityhilelo 20:6 )

2. Ukulawula noKristu Iminyaka Eliwaka

impendulo: Lawula inzala kaSirayeli ye-144,000 kwiwaka leminyaka .

Bawuzalisa umhlaba ngendyebo nokwanda. Balawula noKristu iminyaka eliwaka!
Kuthekani emva kwewaka leminyaka?
Basengookumkani na?
impendulo: Baya kulawula kunye noKristu,
Ngonaphakade ngonaphakade! Amen.

Imbekiselo ( ISityhilelo 22:3-5 )

3 USathana wavalelwa enzonzobileni iminyaka eliwaka

Kwabonakala omnye umbono ezulwini: inamba enkulu ebomvu, ineentloko ezisixhenxe neempondo ezilishumi, kwiintloko zayo ezisixhenxe izizithsaba ezisixhenxe. Umsila wayo warhuqela isahlulo sesithathu seenkwenkwezi esibhakabhakeni waza waziphosa emhlabeni. (ISityhilelo 12:3-4)

Umfazi onesidima【 ecaweni 】Thuma abasebenzi: ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo ezandleni zabo, elithethwa ngabo, eliziindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso, zozuko, nentlawulelo yemizimba yethu. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumlo yethu kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni: Bonke abantwana bakaThixo mabaqonde -- USirayeli onyuliweyo kunye neeNtlanga---ibandla limanyanisa i-144,000 yeentombi ezinyulu ezulwini ezizibonakalisa ukuba zilandele iMvana, iNkosi uYesu Kristu! Amen

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

-

♥ Abantu abayi-144 000 bacula iingoma ezintsha ♥

Isityhilelo [Isahluko 14:1] Ndabona, nantso iMvana imi phezu kweNtaba yeZiyon, kumi nayo ikhulu elinamanci mane anesine lamawaka, benalo igama loYise libhaliwe emabunzini abo. .

Nye, ♡ iNtaba yeZiyon ♡

buza: Iyintoni na iNtaba yeZiyon?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

( 1 ) INtaba yeZiyon → sisixeko sikaKumkani Omkhulu!
Intaba yaseZiyon, ingumzi woKumkani, iphakamileyo, intle yasentla, imivuyo yehlabathi lonke. Imbekiselo ( INdumiso 48:2 )

( 2 ) INtaba yeZiyon → sisixeko sikaThixo ophilayo!
( 3 ) INtaba yeZiyon → yiYerusalem yasezulwini!
Ke nina nifikile entabeni yeZiyon, umzi kaThixo ophilileyo; iYerusalem yasezulwini . Kukho amashumi amawaka ezithunywa zezulu, kukho indibano kawonke-wonke yoonyana bamazibulo, abamagama abo asezulwini, kukho uThixo ogweba bonke, kwanemiphefumlo yamalungisa enziwe yagqibelela ( Hebhere 12:22-22 ) 23)

( Phawula: "emhlabeni" iNtaba yeZiyon ” libhekisela kwiNtaba yeTempile ekwiYerusalem yanamhlanje, kwaSirayeli. yona Izulu" iNtaba yeZiyon "Yiyo. ezulwini ye ♡Intaba yeZiyon♡ Sisixeko sikaThixo ophilayo, isixeko soKumkani omkhulu, nobukumkani bomoya. Ngoko, uyayiqonda? )

2. Abantu abayi-144,000 batywinwa kwaye abantu abayi-144,000 balandela iMvana.

Umbuzo: Ngoobani aba bantu bali-144 000?

Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

【ITestamente eNdala】--Yi "Shadow"

Oonyana abali-12 bakaYakobi nezizwe ezili-12 zakwaSirayeli batywinwa, abali-144 000—abamela intsalela kaSirayeli.
(1) ITestamente eNdala “isithunzi”---iTestamente eNtsha sisibonakalaliso esiyinyaniso!

(2) UAdam kwiTestamente eNdala “usisithunzi”—--uYesu, uAdam wokugqibela kwiTestamente eNtsha, ungumntu wokwenene!

(3) Abantu abali-144 000 bakwaSirayeli emhlabeni abatywiniweyo “bazithunzi” --- abantu abali-144 000 ezulwini abalandela iMvana ngabantu bokwenene abatyhiliweyo.

Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

【ITestamente Entsha】Umzimba wenene utyhiliwe!

(1) Abapostile bakaYesu abali-12—abadala abali-12.

(2) Izizwe ezili-12 zakwaSirayeli—abadala abali-12.

(3)12+12=24 abadala (ibandla limanyene)

Oko kukuthi, abanyuliweyo bakaThixo kunye neeNtlanga ziya kufumana ilifa kunye!

Ndeva isandi siphuma ezulwini, singathi sisandi samanzi amaninzi, nesandi seendudumo ezinkulu; Bavuma ingoma entsha, phambi kwetrone, naphambi kwezidalwa eziphilileyo zone, namadoda amakhulu; ISityhilelo 14:2-3

Ngoko ke, kunye nayo kwakukho abantu abali-144 000 ababeyilandela iMvana, ababethengwe yiNkosi uYesu phakathi kwabantu ngegazi layo—abafanekisela iintlanga ezagwetyelwa ngokholo, nabangcwele, nabanyuliweyo bakaThixo, uSirayeli! Amen!

3. Abantu abali-144 000 balandela uYesu

Umbuzo: abantu abayi-144,000 - bavela phi?
Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

(1) Oko kwathengwa nguYesu ngegazi lakhe

Zilumkeleni nina, nawo wonke umhlambi, athe uMoya oyiNgcwele wanimisa ukuba ngabaveleli bawo, ukuba nilaluse ibandla likaThixo, awazizuzelayo ngelilelakhe igazi. Imbekiselo ( IZenzo 20:28 )

(2) UYesu wayithenga ngexabiso ngobomi bakhe

Anazi na, ukuba umzimba wenu uyitempile yoMoya oyiNgcwele? UMoya oyiNgcwele ophuma kuThixo umi ngaphakathi kwenu; Mzukiseni ke uThixo ngomzimba wenu. Imbekiselo ( 1 Korinte 6:19-20 )

(3) Kuthengwe kwihlabathi lomntu

(4) Uthengwa emhlabeni

(5) Babeziintombi ezinyulu kuqala

(Phawula: “Intombi enyulu” yindoda entsha ezelwe nguThixo! Abo basezulwini abatshati bengatshatiswanga—uYesu waphendula wathi: “Niyaphazama, ngokuba ningayiqondi iBhayibhile, ningawazi namandla omoya. UThixo xa evuswa ekufeni, abatshati bengatshatiswa, kodwa bafana neengelosi ezulwini (bona uMateyu 22: 29-30).

“Intombi enyulu, enyulu, enyulu”—--zonke zibhekisela kwibandla leNkosi uYesu Kristu! Amen . Umzekelo

1 IBandla laseJerusalem
2 Ibandla lakwa-Antiyokwe

4 IBandla lamaGalati
5 IBandla laseFilipi
6 IBandla laseRoma

8 IiBandla eziSixhenxe zeZityhilelo
(Emele imeko yangoku yebandla kwimihla yokugqibela)

INkosi uYesu yahlamba ibandla “ngamanzi ngelizwi” yaza yalenza ngcwele, lingadyobhekanga, lingenasiphako—“intombi enyulu, intombi enyulu, intombi enyulu”—uSirayeli onyuliweyo kunye neeNtlanga—-- umanyano lwebandla Iintombi ezinyulu ezinyulu ezili-144 000 ezulwini! Imo yokwenyani ibonakala ilandela iMvana, iNkosi uYesu Kristu! Amen

Ibandla malingcwaliswe, lihlanjwe ngamanzi ngelizwi, ukuze libe nokubonakalaliswa kuye njengebandla elizukileyo, elingenabala, elingenamibimbi nasinye isiphako, kodwa lingcwele, lingenasiphako. Thelekisa eyabase-Efese 5:26-27

( 6 ) balandela uYesu

( Phawula: I-144,000 yabantu balandela iMvana Bashumayela ivangeli kunye noYesu, bangqinela iLizwi likaThixo, kwaye basebenze kunye noKrestu besenzela imiphefumlo esindisiweyo. .
Njengoko yayitshilo iNkosi uYesu → Yasibizela ke kubo izihlwele nabafundi bakhe, wathi kubo, Ukuba ubani uthanda ukundilandela, makazincame ngokwakhe, awuthwale umnqamlezo wakhe, andilandele; kuba othe wathanda ukusindisa umphefumlo wakhe. (okanye ukuguqulelwa: umphefumlo ; okufanayo ngezantsi) uya kulahlekelwa bubomi bakhe;

( Ke ngoko, ukulandela uYesu nokuba ngumkhonzi wenyaniso yindlela yokuba ufumane uzuko, umvuzo, isithsaba, novuko olulunge ngakumbi, uvuko lweminyaka eliwaka nokulawula noKristu. ; Ukuba ulandela umshumayeli ongalunganga okanye enye icawa, cinga ngeziphumo zakho . )

( 7 ) Azinasiphako yaye ziyintlahlela

buza: Zeziphi iziqhamo zokuqala?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

1 Wazalwa ngelizwi eliyinyaniso leendaba ezilungileyo

Uyisebenzisa ngokwentando yakhe UbuTao bokwenyaniso Usinike ukuze sifane naye kuyo yonke indalo yakhe iziqhamo zokuqala . Imbekiselo ( Yakobi 1:18 )

2 kaKristu

Kodwa ngamnye uvuswa ngokohlobo lwakhe: Intlahlela nguKristu kamva, xa efika, abo ke bangabakaKristu . Imbekiselo ( 1 Korinte 15:23 )

( 8 ) Abantu abayi-144 000 bacula iingoma ezintsha

Ivuma ingoma phambi kwamadoda amakhulu, ibingathi yingoma entsha, kungekho bani wayifundayo ngaphandle kwabo balikhulu elinamashumi amane anesine lamawaka, abathengwe emhlabeni; Kuphela kungokubandezeleka kunye noKristu kunye namava elizwi likaThixo abanokuthi bavume le ngoma intsha ). articles.title: Ikhulu elinamashumi amane anesine lamawaka abantu batywinwa
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubazalwana noodade bam abathandekayo kwintsapho kaThixo! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile kwiSityhilelo 7:4 size sifunde kunye: Ndeva ukuba inani lamatywina, ngokwezizwe zoonyana bakaSirayeli, lalilikhulu elinamanci mane anesine lamawaka.

Namhlanje sizakufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane kunye 《 Abantu abangama-144,000 batywinwa 》 Thandaza: U-Abha othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Umfazi onesidima【 ecaweni 】Thuma abasebenzi: ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo ezandleni zabo, nangelizwi lenyaniso, abalishumayelayo iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwethu, uzuko nentlawulelo yemizimba yethu, eziswa zivela kude ezulwini kuthi ngexesha elililo, ukuze thina Ubomi boMoya bube buphuphuma ngakumbi, Amen. Yanga iNkosi uYesu ingaqhubeka ikhanyisela amehlo emiphefumlo yethu kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni. Mabaqonde bonke abantwana bakaThixo ukuba izizwe ezili-12 zakwaSirayeli zinenani letywina elili-144,000 →→ elimela intsalela kaSirayeli!

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

Kwatywinwa ikhulu elinamanci mane anesine amawaka abantu.

buza: Ngoobani abantu abali-144 000?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

【ITestamente Endala】 Oonyana bakaYakobi abali-12 nenani labantu abatywiniweyo kwizizwe ezili-12 zakwaSirayeli bali-144 000 →→abamela intsalela yakwaSirayeli.

Umbuzo: Yintoni injongo yokuba uSirayeli “atywinwe”?
Impendulo: Ngenxa yokuba amaSirayeli “engekabi” ukukholelwa ukuba uYesu unguNyana kaThixo, asenethemba, elindele uMesiya, elindele ukuba uMsindisi awasindise! Ngoko ke, intsalela kaSirayeli ikhuselwe nguThixo yaye imele ‘itywinwe nguThixo’ ngaphambi kokuba ingene kwiwaka leminyaka.

NamaKristu akholwayo kuYesu! Sele ufumene itywina lika → uMoya oyiNgcwele, itywina likaYesu, itywina likaThixo! (Akusekho mfuneko yokuba utywinwe kwakhona)

→→Musani ukumenza buhlungu uMoya oyiNgcwele kaThixo, enathi kuye natywinwa (oko kukuthi, itywina loMoya oyiNgcwele, itywina likaYesu, itywina likaThixo) kude kube yimini yentlawulelo. Imbekiselo kwabase-Efese 4:30
【ITestamente Entsha】

1 Abapostile bakaYesu abali-12→→bamela abadala abali-12
2 Izizwe ezili-12 zakwaSirayeli →→ zimela abadala abali-12
3 12+12=24 abadala.

Kwangoko ndaqhutywa nguMoya oyiNgcwele, ndabona itrone ihleli emazulwini, kukho ohleli phezu kwetrone. Kwaye kwenze isangqa etroneni apho iitrone ezimashumi mabini anane; phezu kwazo kuhleli amadoda amakhulu amashumi mabini anamane, ethiwe wambu ngeengubo ezimhlophe, enezithsaba zegolide entloko. ISityhilelo 4:2, 4

Izidalwa ezine eziphilayo:

Isidalwa esiphilayo sokuqala sasifana nengonyama → uMateyu (iNkosana)
Isidalwa esiphilayo sesibini sasifana nethole → IVangeli kaMarko (uMkhonzi)
Isidalwa esiphilayo sesithathu sasinobuso obunjengobomntu → Incwadi yeVangeli kaLuka (uNyana woMntu)
Isidalwa esiphilayo sesine sasinjengokhozi luphaphazela → Incwadi yeVangeli kaYohane (uNyana kaThixo)

Kwakukho ulwandle lwegilasi phambi kwetrone, lufana nomkhenkce. Etroneni apho, nasesangqeni setroneni, kukho izinto eziphilileyo ezine, zizele ngamehlo ngaphambili nangasemva. Eyokuqala into ephilileyo ifana nengonyama; eyesibini ifana nethole, eyesithathu inobuso obunjengobomntu, eyesine ifana nokhozi. Zaye zone izinto eziphilileyo ezo, iyileyo naleyo, inamaphiko ngamathandathu, ezele ngamehlo ngaphakathi nangaphandle; Imini nobusuku bathi:
Ngcwele! Ngcwele! Ngcwele!
INkosi uThixo yayikho, ikhoyo,
USomandla oya kuphila ngonaphakade.
ISityhilelo 4:6-8

1. Kwatywinwa i-144,000 kwisizwe ngasinye sakwaSirayeli

(1) Itywina likaThixo Ongunaphakade

buza: Liyintoni itywina likaThixo ophilayo?
impendulo: " shicilela “Luphawu, itywina! Itywina likaThixo ongunaphakade lelokuba abantu bakaThixo batywinwe baphawulwe;

Kwaye ngoka " inyoka “Luphawu lwerhamncwa 666 . Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Emva koko ndabona izithunywa zezulu ezine zimi kwiimbombo zone zomhlaba, zilawula imimoya kumacala omane omhlaba, ukuze ingavuthuzi emhlabeni, naselwandle, naphezu kwemithi. Ndabona esinye isithunywa sezulu, sinyuka siphuma empumalanga, sinetywina likaThixo ophilileyo. Yandula ke yadanduluka ngelizwi elikhulu kwiingelosi ezine ezazinegunya lokonakalisa umhlaba nolwandle: ( ISityhilelo 7:1-2 )

(2) Musa ukubenzakalisa abakhonzi bakaThixo

“Musani ukuwonakalisa umhlaba okanye ulwandle okanye imithi, de sibe sibatywine abakhonzi boThixo wethu emabunzini abo.” ( ISityhilelo 7:3 )

buza: Kuthetha ukuthini ukungabenzakalisi?
impendulo: Sirayeli, abantu bakaThixo abanyuliweyo! Kwimbandezelo enkulu yokugqibela ~ abantu abaseleyo ! Xelela izithunywa zezulu ezinamandla phezu kwemimoya yomine yomhlaba, ukuba zingawenzi amasalela abantu; UThixo ukhetha intsalela ukuba itywinwe →→ Ukungena kwiMillennium .

(3) Isizwe ngasinye sakwaSirayeli sitywinwe

Ndeva ukuba inani lamatywina, ngokwezizwe zoonyana bakaSirayeli, lalilikhulu elinamanci mane anesine lamawaka. Imbekiselo ( ISityhilelo 7:4 )
kwisizwe sakwaYuda i12 000;
3 kwisizwe sakwaGadi ishumi elinesibini lamawaka;
5 abakwaNafetali, babeyi-12 000;
7 Isizwe sakwaSimon ibiyishumi elinesibini lamawaka;
9 uIsakare ishumi elinesibini lamawaka;
11 UYosefu wayenamadoda ayi-12 000;
( Phawula: UManase noEfrayim babengoonyana ababini bakaYosefu. Jonga kwiGenesis iSahluko 49.

2. Intsalela yabantu bakwaSirayeli

buza: Ngoobani abantu abali-144 000 abatywiniweyo?
impendulo: "144000" abantu ithetha amasalela akwaSirayeli .

(1) Shiya abantu abangamawaka asixhenxe ngasemva

buza: Kuthetha ukuthini amawaka asixhenxe abantu?
impendulo : " amawaka asixhenxe abantu ” → “ Sixhengxe ” linani eligqibeleleyo likaThixo Amawaka asixhenxe athe uThixo wawashiya ebhekisa kuwo amasalela akwaSirayeli .

→→ Wathini uThixo ekuphenduleni? Uthe: " Ndizishiyele amawaka asixhenxe abantu , abangazange baguqe ngamadolo kuBhahali. ” Imbekiselo ( Roma 11:4 )

(2) intsalela ishiyekile

Kunjalo ke ngoku, ngokonyulo lobabalo, Kukho intsalela eseleyo . Imbekiselo ( Roma 11:5 )

(3) Iintlobo eziseleyo

Kwaye njengoko uIsaya watshoyo ngaphambili: "Ukuba uYehova wemikhosi ubengasinikanga Iintlobo eziseleyo , kudala sifana neSodom neGomora. (Funda kwabaseRoma 9:29.)

(4) abantu abaseleyo

Okufuneka ubenazo abantu abaseleyo baphume eYerusalem, abasindileyo entabeni yeZiyon. Ubukhwele bukaYehova wemikhosi buya kukwenza oko. Imbekiselo ( Isaya 37:32 )

3. Baleka eYerusalem →→[ uAsafu 】

buza: Loo maSirayeli abalekela kuAsafu?
impendulo: Kufuneka kubekho" abantu abaseleyo “Baphuma eYerusalem → Bejonge eNtabeni yemiNquma ngasempuma, uThixo wabavulela indlela esuka phakathi kwentlambo eya [ uAsafu 】 Abantu abaseleyo bazimela apho .

Ngaloo mini iinyawo zakhe ziya kuma phezu kweNtaba yemiNquma, ekhangele empumalanga phambi kweYerusalem. Intaba iya kucandwa phakathi, ibe yintlambo enkulu ukusuka empumalanga kuye entshonalanga. Isiqingatha sentaba senyuka sasinga emantla, esinye isiqingatha sasezantsi. Niya kusaba ezihlanjeni zeentaba zam; , Kuba intlambo iya kudlulela kwa-Asafu . Niya kusaba njengoko abantu basabileyo kwinyikima enkulu, ngemihla kaUziya ukumkani wakwaYuda. UYehova uThixo wam uya kuza, beza kunye naye bonke abaNgcwele. Imbekiselo ( Zekariya 14:4-5 )

4. UThixo uyayondla ( abantu abaseleyo )Iintsuku ezingama-1260

(1)Iintsuku ezili-1260

Umfazi wasabela entlango, apho uThixo wayemlungisele indawo. Ukutyiswa iintsuku eziliwaka elinamakhulu amabini anamashumi amathandathu . Imbekiselo ( ISityhilelo 12:6 )

(2) Unyaka omnye, iminyaka emibini, isiqingatha sonyaka

Yathi inamba, yakubona ukuba iphoswe emhlabeni, yamtshutshisa umfazi ozele umntwana oyinkwenkwe. Ngoko umfazi wanikwa amaphiko amabini okhozi olukhulu, ukuze aphaphazele aye entlango, aye endaweni yakhe, azifihle enyoka; Wondliwa khona ixesha, iminyaka emibini enesiqingatha . ( ISityhilelo 12:13-14 )

(3) “Amasalela abantu” → njengakwimihla kaNowa

→→ "intsalela yabantu" babaleka besuka eYerusalem 【 uAsafu 】 zimela ! Kunje ITestamente eNdala ( Intsapho kaNowa yabantu abasibhozo )Ngena umkhombe Njengokuphepha intlekele enkulu yesikhukula.

Njengoko kwakunjalo ngemihla kaNowa, koba njalo nangemihla yoNyana woMntu. Ngaloo mihla abantu babesidla, besela, betshata, benikelwa emtshatweni, Mhla uNowa wangena emkhombeni, wafika unogumbe, wabatshabalalisa bonke. Imbekiselo ( Luka 17:26-27 )

(4)" aboni ehlabathini lonke " → thanda" eSodom "iintsuku

1 Ihlabathi latsha latsha, neento zonke eziphezu kwalo;

Ke yona imini yeNkosi iya kufika njengesela. Kuya kuthi ngaloo mini, lidlule izulu ngesandi esikhulu, ize yonke into enako itshiswe ngumlilo. Umhlaba nako konke okuphezu kwawo uya kutshiswa uphele . ( 2 Petros 3:10 )

2 Bulalani bonke aboni

Kufana nemihla kaLote: abantu babesidla, besela, bethenga, bethengisa, belima, besakha. Ngemini awaphuma ngayo uLote eSodom, kwehla umlilo nesulfure uphuma ezulwini, Babulaleni bonke . Imbekiselo ( Luka 17:28-29 )

5. Intsalela yabantu ( Ngena ) Iwaka leminyaka

(1)Iwaka leminyaka_Izulu elitsha noMhlaba oMtsha

Yabonani, ndidala amazulu amatsha nehlabathi elitsha; ndiya kugcoba ngeYerusalem, ndigcobe ngabantu bam;

(2) Ubomi bazo bubude kakhulu

Kubo akuyi kubakho lusana lufe ngeentsuku ezimbalwa, nexhego eliphele lidlule ubomi babo; uqalekisiwe. ... ngenxa yam Injengemithi imihla yabantu; . Imbekiselo ( Isaya 65:22 )

【Millennium】

buza: " iwaka leminyaka "Kutheni bephila ixesha elide kangaka?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

1 Emva kwaloo ntlekele, zonke izinto ezibonakalayo zatshiswa zaza zanyibilika ngomlilo, yaye akuzange kuphinde kubekho zinto zokwenzakalisa abantu. —Funda eyesi-2 kaPetros 3:10-12
2 Iiplanethi ezisemhlabeni ziya kube zingenanto kwaye ziyinkangala → Ngena ekuphumleni . Bhekisela kuIsaya isahluko 24 indinyana 1-3 .
3 “Intsalela yabantu” inobomi obude
Ukuba sibuyela ekuqaleni kwenkulungwane ( UAdam Oonyana bakaEnoshe bathi: “Babeka, uEnoshe, uIro, uMethusela, uLameki, uNowa... njalo njalo! Njengenani leminyaka abayiphilayo.
4 “Intsalela” eyasikelelwa nguYehova
Bawuzalisa umhlaba ngendyebo nokwanda. NjengoYakobi nentsapho yakhe xa babefika eYiputa 70 Abantu ( funda iGenesis Isahluko 46:27 ), baba baninzi ‘kwiLizwe laseGoshen’ eYiputa kwiminyaka engama-430 uMoses wawakhupha amaSirayeli eYiputa, yaye kwakukho abantu abangama-603 550 kuphela ababeneminyaka engamashumi amabini nangaphezulu nabanamandla. yokulwa umfazi, ixhego kunye nababini Bangaphezu kwe-144 000 abantu abasele beneminyaka engaphantsi kweshumi; ulwandle, luzalise ihlabathi lonke. Ngoko, uyayiqonda? Isalathiso ( ISityhilelo 20:8-9 ) noIsaya 65:17-25 .

(3) Abasafundi imfazwe

buza: Kutheni bengafundi ukulwa?

impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

1 USathana waphoswa enzonzobileni waza wavalelwa iminyaka eliwaka ukuze angabi sazilahlekisa iintlanga ezineengcwangu. .
2 Abantu abaseleyo ngabantu abanyulwe nguThixo abaziziyatha, ababuthathaka, abathobekileyo nabangafundanga. Babekholose ngoThixo kuphela baza batyala izidiliya.
3 Abo basebenze nzima ngezandla zabo baya kunandipha ixesha elide.
4 Azisekho iinqwelomoya, iinkanunu, imijukujelwa, imijukujelwa, iirobhothi zobukrelekrele bokwenziwa, njalo njalo okanye izixhobo ezibulalayo zenyukliya.

Uya kugweba phakathi kwezizwe, ohlwaye iintlanga ezininzi. Ziya kuwakhanda amakrele azo abe ngamakhuba nemikhonto yazo ibe ngamarhengqa. Uhlanga aluphakamiseli olunye uhlanga nabo; Akusekho kufunda ngemfazwe . Yizani, ndlu kaYakobi; Sihamba ekukhanyeni kweNkosi. Imbekiselo ( Isaya 2:4-5 )

(4) Bakha izindlu baza badla iziqhamo zomsebenzi wabo

Baya kwakha izindlu, bahlale kuzo; batyale izidiliya, badle iziqhamo zazo. Oko baya kwakha, akuyi kuhlala bani; oko bakutyalayo akuyi kudliwa mntu wumbi; . Ukubulaleka kwabo akuyi kuba kokulambathayo, nobubi abuyi kuba sisiqhamo sabo; ngokuba bayimbewu esikelelweyo nguYehova; Bengekabizi, ndiphendule besathetha, ndive. Kuya kudla utyani nemvana, ingonyama idle utyani njengenkomo; kuyo yonke intaba yam engcwele, akukho nanye kwezi iya kwenzakalisa nabani na okanye yenzakalise nantoni na. Utsho uYehova ukuthi. (Funda uIsaya 65:21-25.)

6 Iminyaka eliwaka idlule

→USathana wasilela ekugqibeleni

Ekupheleni kweminyaka eliwaka, uSathana uya kukhululwa entolongweni aze aphume aye kuzilahlekisa iintlanga ezikwiimbombo zone zomhlaba, uGogi noMagogi, ukuze babuthele imfazwe. Amanani abo maninzi njengentlabathi yolwandle. Benyuka, balizalisa ihlabathi lonke, bayirhawula inqaba yomkhosi wabangcwele, nomzi othandiweyo; kwehla umlilo uphuma ezulwini, wabadla. UMtyholi lowo ubalahlekisayo waphoswa edikeni lomlilo nesulfure , apho likhona irhamncwa nomprofeti wobuxoki. Baya kuthuthunjelwa imini nobusuku, kuse emaphakadeni asemaphakadeni. ( ISityhilelo 20:7-10 )

articles.title: Ukubuya kweSibini kukaYesu (Isifundo 3)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubazalwana noodade bam abathandekayo kwintsapho kaThixo! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile yethu kumaRoma isahluko 8 indinyana 23 size sifunde kunye: Asiyiyo yodwa ke, nathi banayo intlahlela yoMoya, siyancwina ngaphakathi kwethu, silinde ukwenziwa oonyana; inkululeko yomzimba wethu ke leyo. Amen

Namhlanje sizakufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane kunye "Ukuza okwesibini kukaYesu" Hayi. 3 Thetha kwaye wenze umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, Nkosi yethu uYesu Krestu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Umfazi onesidima【 ecaweni 】Thuma abasebenzi: ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo ezandleni zabo, elithethwa ngabo, eliziindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso, zozuko, nentlawulelo yemizimba yethu. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumlo yethu kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni: Bonke abantwana bakaThixo mabaqonde ukuba iNkosi uYesu Krestu yeza nemizimba yethu yakhululwa! Amen .

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

UMkristu: Umzimba ukhululwe!

KwabaseRoma 8:22-23 Siyazi ke ukuba yonke indalo iyancwina, iyasebenza kude kube ngoku. Asiyiyo yodwa ke: Thina banayo intlahlela yoMoya, siyancwina ngaphakathi kwethu, silinde ukwenziwa oonyana. Yintlawulelo yemizimba yethu .

buza: Ukhululwa njani umzimba wamaKristu?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

1. Uvuko lwabafileyo

(1) KuKristu bonke baya kuvuswa

Njengokuba kuye uAdam bafa bonke, ngokunjalo nakuye uKristu baya kudliswa ubomi bonke. Imbekiselo ( 1 Korinte 15:22 )

(2)Abafileyo baya kuvuswa

Umzuzwana nje, ngokuqhwanyaza kweliso, Xa ixilongo likhala okokugqibela . Kuba liya kuvakala ixilongo; Abafileyo baya kuvuswa bengenakufa , nathi kufuneka sitshintshe. Imbekiselo ( 1 Korinte 15:52 )

(3) Abafe kuKristu baya kuvuswa kuqala

Ngoku ke siyakutsho kuni ngokwelizwi leNkosi ukuthi: Thina babudlayo ubomi, baya kuba besekho ekufikeni kweNkosi, asisayi kubaphangela abalele ukufa. Ngokuba iNkosi ngokwayo iya kuhla emazulwini inendanduluko, inelizwi lesiphatha-zithunywa, inexilongo likaThixo; Abafele kuKristu baya kuvuswa kuqala . Imbekiselo ( 1 Tesalonika 4:15-16 )

2 Eyonakeleyo, yambathani ukungonakali

【Yambathani ukungafi】

Oku konakala kufuneka kube (kube: umbhalo wokuqala ngu nxiba Okufanayo ngezantsi) Ukungafi , lo mntu ufayo umele abe ngongenakufa. Imbekiselo ( 1 Korinte 15:53 )

3. Edelekileyo ( Guqula ) ukuba nozuko

(1)Singabemi basezulwini

Kodwa sinjalo abemi basezulwini , kwaye nilindele uMsindisi, iNkosi uYesu Krestu, ukuba eze evela ezulwini. Imbekiselo ( Filipi 3:20 )

(2) thobeka →tshintsha imilo

Uya kusenza Umzimba othobekileyo uyatshintsha ukumila , efana nomzimba Wakhe wozuko. Imbekiselo ( Filipi 3:21 )

4. (Ukufa) kuginywe bubomi bukaKristu

buza: (Ukufa) waginywa ngubani?
impendulo: " fa " Uvuswe nguKrestu kwaye uginywe bubomi boloyiso .

(1)Ukufa kuginywe luloyiso

Xa oku konakalayo kuthe kwambatha ukungonakali, noku kufayo kwambatha ukungafi, kwandula kwabhalwa kwathiwa: Amazwi athi “ukufa kuginywe eloyisweni” aye azaliseka. . Imbekiselo ( 1 Korinte 15:54 )

(2) Lo mntu ufayo uginywe bubomi

Nathi, sancwina, sibulaleka kulo mnquba, asifuni kuyisusa le; ukuze oku kufayo kuginywe bubomi . Imbekiselo ( 2 Korinte 5:4 )

5. Ekhankanya ukuhlangana kweNkosi emafini

【 Ukuxwilwa KwamaKristu Aphilayo 】

Ukususela ngoku siza kwenza njalo Abo ke badla ubomi, basaseleyo, baya kuxwilelwa emafini kunye nabo , ihlangana neNkosi emoyeni. Ngaloo ndlela, siya kuba neNkosi ngonaphakade. ( 1 Tesalonika 4:17 )

6 Ngokuqinisekileyo siya kububona ubume bokwenene beNkosi

【 Xa iNkosi ibonakala, imizimba yethu nayo ibonakala 】
→→Kufuneka sibone imo yakhe yokwenyani!

Bazalwana abathandekayo, singabantwana bakaThixo ngoku, kwaye ayikabonakali into esiya kuba yiyo kwixa elizayo, kodwa siyazi ukuba Ukuba iNkosi ithe yabonakala, sofana nayo, ngokuba siya kumbona njengoko injalo . (1 Yohane 3:2)

7 Siya kuba neNkosi ngonaphakade; Amen

(1) UThixo uya kuba nathi ngokobuqu

Ndeva izwi elikhulu liphuma etroneni, lisithi, Yabona, umnquba lo kaThixo unabantu; yena uThixo uya kuba nabo, abe nguThixo wabo . Imbekiselo ( ISityhilelo 21:3 )

(2) Akusayi kubakho kufa

Azisule uThixo zonke iinyembezi emehlweni abo; ukufa akusayi kubakho , kungabi sabakho nasijwili, nakukhala, nantlungu, ngokuba izinto ezidluleyo zigqithile. ’ ( ISityhilelo 21:4 )

Ukwabelana ngombhalo weVangeli, uqhutywa nguMoya kaThixo Abasebenzi bakaYesu Krestu, uMzalwana uWang*Yun, uDade uLiu, uDade uZheng, uMzalwana uCen, kunye nabanye osebenza nabo, baxhasa kwaye basebenza kunye kumsebenzi wevangeli weBandla likaYesu Krestu. . Bashumayela iindaba ezilungileyo zikaYesu Kristu, ongulo Ivangeli evumela abantu ukuba basindiswe, bazukiswe, kwaye imizimba yabo ikhululwe ! Amen

Namhlanje sizakufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane kunye "Ukuza okwesibini kukaYesu" Hayi. 2 Thetha kwaye wenze umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, Nkosi yethu uYesu Krestu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen . Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

1. IMvana ivula itywina lesixhenxe

Xa iMvana ivula itywina lesixhenxe , isibhakabhaka sathi cwaka kangangemizuzu emibini. Ndabona izithunywa zezulu ezisixhenxe zimi phambi koThixo, zaza zanikwa amaxilongo asixhenxe. Imbekiselo ( ISityhilelo 8:1-2 )

buza: Kwenzeka ntoni malunga nemizuzu emibini yokuthi cwaka esibhakabhakeni?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

(1) Kukho amaxilongo asixhenxe anikwe izithunywa zezulu ezisixhenxe
(2) Bonke abangcwele banxibe ivumba elimnandi likaKristu, beze phambi koThixo
(3) Ingelosi yasithabatha isitya sokuqhumisela, yazalisa ngomlilo ovela esibingelelweni, yawuphalazela emhlabeni .

Kweza esinye isithunywa sezulu, siphethe isiqhumiselo segolide, sema ecaleni lesibingelelo. Sanikwa isiqhumiso esininzi, ukuba asinikele, kunye nemithandazo yabo bonke abangcwele, phezu kwesibingelelo segolide esiphambi kwetrone. Wenyuka umsi weziqhumiso nemithandazo yabangcwele esandleni sesithunywa sezulu, waya kuThixo. . Isithunywa eso sasithabatha isitya sokuqhumisela, sasizalisa ngomlilo ophuma esibingelelweni, sawuphalazela emhlabeni, kwabakho iindudumo, nesandi esikhulu, nemibane, neenyikima zomhlaba. Imbekiselo ( ISityhilelo 8:3-5 )

2 Ingelosi yesixhenxe yavuthela ixilongo

(1)Ixilongo lavakala kakhulu okokugqibela
(2) Ubukumkani beli hlabathi buthe baba bubukumkani beNkosi yethu noKristu wayo
(3) UYesu Kristu uya kulawula njengokumkani ngonaphakade kanaphakade
(4)Abadala abangamashumi amabini anesine banqula uThixo

Neyesixhenxe ingelosi yavuthela ixilongo laso, kwaza ilizwi elikhulu liphuma ezulwini lisithi: Izikumkani zehlabathi ziye zaba zezeNkosi yethu nezikaKristu wayo Yena uya kulawula ngonaphakade kanaphakade. Athi amadoda amakhulu, amashumi mabini anamané, abehleli ezitroneni zawo phambi koThixo, awa ngobuso emhlabeni, aqubuda kuye uThixo, esithi, Nkosi, Thixo Somandla, lowo ukhoyo, ukhoyo, siyabulela kuwe! Ngokuba unamandla amakhulu, waba ngukumkani. Iintlanga zinomsindo, ingqumbo yakho iyeza, nelokuba lifikile ilixa lokugweba kwabafileyo; yizani kwabo baya kulonakalisa ihlabathi. ( ISityhilelo 11:15-18 )

3 Saza esesixhenxe isithunywa sayiphalaza ingqayi emoyeni;

Esesixhenxe isithunywa sayiphalaza ingqayi yaso emoyeni, kwaphuma nelizwi elikhulu etroneni etempileni, lisithi: Yenziwe ! (ISityhilelo 16:17)

buza: Kwenzeka ntoni [yenziwe]!
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

(1) Izinto zikaThixo ezifihlakeleyo ziye zafezwa

Ingelosi endayibonayo ihamba phezu kolwandle naphezu komhlaba, yasiphakamisela ezulwini isandla sayo sokunene, yafunga lowo udala izulu neento zonke ezikulo, nomhlaba nento yonke esemhlabeni, nolwandle neento zonke ezikulo, ohleli ngonaphakade, Ithi: “Akusekho xesha (okanye ukuguqulelwa: akusayi kuba salibaziseka).” Kodwa xa ingelosi yesixhenxe ivuthela ixilongo layo, imfihlelo kaThixo iya kuzaliseka, kanye njengoko uThixo wazishumayelayo iindaba ezilungileyo kubakhonzi bakhe abaprofeti. ( ISityhilelo 10:5-7 )

(2) Ubukumkani beli hlabathi buthe baba bubukumkani beNkosi yethu uKristu

Ingelosi yesixhenxe yavuthela ixilongo layo, kwaza kwabakho ilizwi elikhulu ezulwini lisithi: “Izikumkani zeli hlabathi zithe zaba zezeNkosi yethu nezikaKristu wayo, yaye iya kulawula ngonaphakade kanaphakade.” ( ISityhilelo 11:15; )

(3) UYehova uThixo wethu, uSomandla, uyalawula

Kwaphuma ilizwi etroneni, lisithi, Mdumiseni uThixo wethu, nonke nina bakhonzi bakaThixo, nonke bamoyikayo, abakhulu kwanabancinane nesandi sendudumo enkulu, sisithi: “Haleluya, ngokuba uYehova uThixo wethu, uSomandla, uyalawula.”— ISityhilelo 19:5-6 .

(4) Lifikile ixesha lomtshato weMvana

(5)Umtshakazi uzilungisile

(6) Athiwe wambu ngelinen ecikizekileyo, eqaqambileyo, eqaqambileyo

(7) Ibandla (umtshakazi) liyaxwilwa

Masivuye simzukise. Kuba umtshato weMvana ufikile, yaye umtshakazi uzilungisile, yaye unikiwe ubabalo ukuba ambathe ilinen ecikizekileyo, eqaqambileyo, emhlophe. Masivule iBhayibhile kuMateyu isahluko 24 kunye nevesi 30 size sifunde kunye: Ngelo xesha uya kubonakala ezulwini umqondiso woNyana woMntu, zize zonke izizwe zomhlaba zizimbambazele zisenza isijwili. Baya kumbona ke uNyana woMntu esiza esemafini ezulu, enamandla nobuqaqawuli obukhulu .

Namhlanje sizakufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane kunye "Ukuza okwesibini kukaYesu" Hayi. 1 Thetha kwaye wenze umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, Nkosi yethu uYesu Krestu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Umfazi onesidima [ibandla] uthumela abasebenzi: ngezandla zabo babhala kwaye bathetha ilizwi lenyaniso, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwethu, uzuko lwethu, nentlawulelo yemizimba yethu. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke ikhanyisela amehlo emiphefumlo yethu, ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile, ize isenze sive size sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni: Bonke abantwana mabayiqonde loo mini baze balindele ukubuya kweNkosi uYesu Kristu! Amen.

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

1 INkosi uYesu iza ngelifu

buza: Yeza njani iNkosi uYesu?
Impendulo: Ukuza phezu kwamafu!

(1) Yabonani, uza esemafini;
(2) Onke amehlo afuna ukumbona
(3) Baya kumbona uNyana woMntu esiza esemafini ezulu, enamandla nobuqaqawuli obukhulu.

Khangela, Uza phezu kwamafu ! Onke amehlo aya kumbona, kwanabo bamhlabayo; Lena Yinyaniso. Amen! Imbekiselo ( ISityhilelo 1:7 )

Ngelo xesha umqondiso woNyana woMntu uya kubonakala ezulwini, yaye zonke iintsapho zomhlaba ziya kuzimbambazela. Baya kumbona ke uNyana woMntu, enamandla nobuqaqawuli obukhulu; Ukuza phezu kwamafu esibhakabhakeni . Imbekiselo ( Mateyu 24:30 )

2. Uhambe njani, uya kubuya njani na

(1) UYesu wenyukela ezulwini

buza: UYesu wenyuka njani ezulwini emva kokuvuswa kwakhe?
impendulo: Ilifu lemka naye
(UYesu) wazithetha ezi zinto, baza bajonga. Wanyuswa , Ilifu lemka naye , yaye akasabonwa. Imbekiselo (IZenzo 1:9)

(2) Iingelosi zangqina indlela eze ngayo

buza: Yeza njani iNkosi uYesu?
impendulo: Kanye njengoko wambonayo enyukela ezulwini, uya kubuya eze kwakhona.

Ke kaloku, akubon' ukuba uyemka, baye bekhangele ezulwini, kwabonakala amadoda amabini, eneengubo ezimhlophe, emi kufuphi, athi, Madoda aseGalili, nimeleni na nikhangele ezulwini? Lo Yesu unyusiweyo kuni wasiwa ezulwini , Njengoko wambonayo enyukela ezulwini, uya kwangokunjalo abuye kwangokunjalo . ( IZenzo 1:10-11 )

buza: Iya kuphela nini le ntlekele?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi
1 Umbono weentsuku ezingama-2300 — Daniyeli 8:26
2 Loo mihla iya kunqanyulwa — Mateyu 24:22
3 unyaka omnye, iminyaka emibini, isiqingatha sonyaka —Daniyeli 7:25
4 Kufuneka kubekho iintsuku eziyi-1290 - —Dan. 12:11.

Ngaloo mini, akuyi kubakho ukukhanya, kwaye izibane ezithathu ziya kubuya umva . Loo mini iya kwaziwa kuYehova; Imbekiselo ( Zekariya 14:6-7 )

4 Ngelo xesha uya kubonakala umqondiso woNyana woMntu ezulwini

buza: Intoni Omen Kubonakala ezulwini?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

(1) Umbane uphuma empuma uze ukhanyise ngokuthe ngqo ngasentshona

Umbane uvela empumalanga , ikhanya ngokuthe ngqo ngasentshona. Kuya kuba njalo nasekufikeni koNyana woMntu. Imbekiselo ( Mateyu 24:27 )

(2) Ixilongo lengelosi lakhala kakhulu okokugqibela

Uya kuthumela abathunywa bakhe, Kukhwaza ngexilongo , eqokelela abantu bakhe abanyuliweyo bevela kumacala onke (isikwere: umoya kumbhalo wokuqala), ukusuka kwelinye icala lesibhakabhaka ukuya kwelinye icala lesibhakabhaka. (Funda uMateyu 24:31.)

5. Beza nabo bonke abathunywa

buza: UYesu weza nabani ekufikeni kwakhe?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

(1) Abo balele kuYesu bayahlanganiswa
Ukuba siyakholwa ukuba uYesu wafa, wabuya wavuka, kwanabo balele ukufa bekuYesu, uThixo woza nabo, kunye naye. ( 1 Tesalonika 4:14 )

(2) Ukuza nabo bonke abathunywa
Xa athe wafika uNyana woMntu esebuqaqawulini boYise, enezithunywa zakhe, uya kubavuza bonke ngabanye ngokokwenza kwabo. Imbekiselo ( Mateyu 16:27 )

(3) Ukufika kwamawakawaka abangcwele eziswe yiNkosi
UEnoki, inzala yesixhenxe ka-Adam, waprofeta ngaba bantu, esithi: “Yabonani, iNkosi iyeza namawakawaka abangcwele bayo.

6 Njengoko kwaye kuhle ngemihla kaNowa, koba njalo xa athe wafika uNyana woMntu

Njengoko kwakunjalo ngemihla kaNowa, koba njalo xa uNyana woMntu efika. Ngemihla yangaphambi konogumbe, abantu babesidla, besela, betshata yaye betshata njengesiqhelo kwada kwayimini uNowa awangena ngayo emkhombeni ngokungazi, wafika unogumbe, wabakhukulisa bonke. articles.author: admin
articles.content:

Masivule iBhayibhile yethu kumaRoma isahluko 8 iindinyana 16-17 size sizifunde kunye: UMoya oyiNgcwele ungqinelana nomoya wethu ukuba singabantwana bakaThixo. Ukuba ke singabantwana, sikwaziindlalifa, iindlalifa zikaThixo, iindlalifa ke kunye noKrestu. Ukuba siva ubunzima kunye naye, sozukiswa nokuzukiswa kunye naye.

Namhlanje sizakufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane kunye "Umkhonzi Obandezelekileyo" Thandaza: U-Abha othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Umfazi onesidima【 ecaweni 】Thuma abasebenzi: ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo ezandleni zabo, elithethwa ngabo, eliziindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso, zozuko, nentlawulelo yemizimba yethu. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumlo yethu kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni: Ukuba siva ubunzima kunye noKrestu, siya kuzukiswa kunye naye! Amen !

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

1. Ukubandezeleka kukaYesu Kristu

(1) UYesu wazalwa waza walala emkhumbini

buza: Wayephi ukuzalwa nokubekwa koKumkani ozukileyo weNdalo iphela?
impendulo: Ukulala emkhumbini
Isithunywa eso sathi kubo, Musani ukoyika; ndinishumayeza iindaba ezilungileyo zovuyo olukhulu, oluya kuba kubo bonke abantu; ngokuba nizalelwe namhlanje emzini kaDavide uMsindisi, uKristu iNkosi. Umntwana, kuquka ukuzigquma amalaphu nokulala emkhumbini ngumqondiso.”— Luka 2:10-12 .

(2) Ukuthabatha ubume bekhoboka nokwenziwa ngokufana nomntu

buza: Unjani uMsindisi uYesu?
impendulo: ethabathe ubume bomkhonzi, enziwe wafana nabantu
Yibani nale ngcinga kuni, wayenayo kuye uKristu Yesu: yena esebumeni bukaThixo, akathi ukulingana noThixo makakuthathe njengento ebambekayo; umfanekiso ;

(3) Ukusabela eYiputa emva kwentshutshiso

Zithe zakubon’ ukuba zimkile ke zona, naso isithunywa seNkosi sibonakala kuYosefu ephupheni, sisithi, Vuka, umthabathe umntwana nonina, usabele eYiputa, uhlale khona ndide ndikuxelele; ukuze amtshabalalise.” Wavuka ke uYosefu, wamthabatha umntwana nonina ebusuku, waya eYiputa, bahlala apho wada wafa uHerode. Oku kuzalisekisa oko yakuthethayo iNkosi ngomprofeti, yathi: “Ndambiza uNyana wam ukuba aphume eYiputa” ( Mateyu 2:13-15 )

(4) Wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni ukusindisa uluntu esonweni

1 Isono sabo bonke sibekwe phezu kwakhe

Umbuzo: Isono sethu sibekwe kubani?
Impendulo: Isono sabo bonke abantu sibekwe phezu kukaYesu Kristu.
Thina sonke saphambuka njengeegusha, elowo wabuyela endleleni yakhe; Imbekiselo ( Isaya 53:6 )

2 Wasiwa njengemvana esiwa ekuxhelweni

Wacinezelwa, kodwa akazange awuvule umlomo wakhe xa wayebandezelekile, njengemvana wasiwa ekuxhelweni, nanjengemvu ithule phambi kwabachebi bayo, ngoko akazange awuvule umlomo wakhe. Uthatyathwe ngenxa yengcinezelo + nokugwetywa + kwabo babenaye, + abacinga ukuba wabethwa + waza wanqunyulwa ezweni labaphilayo ngenxa yesono sabantu bam? Imbekiselo ( Isaya 53:7-8 )

3 ekufeni, ukufa ke kwasemnqamlezweni

wathi ngemo efunyenwe enjengomntu, wazithoba, waba ngolulamileyo, wada wesa ekufeni, ukufa ke kwasemnqamlezweni. Ngoko ke, uThixo wamphakamisa kakhulu, wamnika igama elingaphezu kwawo onke amagama, ukuze ngegama likaYesu onke amadolo agobe, ezulwini nasemhlabeni, naphantsi komhlaba, zithi zonke iilwimi zithi: “UYesu Kristu uyiNkosi.” ukuba kuzukiswe uThixo uYise. Imbekiselo ( Filipi 2:8-11 )

2: Abapostile babandezeleka xa beshumayela iindaba ezilungileyo

(1) Umpostile uPawulos wabandezeleka ngoxa wayeshumayela iindaba ezilungileyo

INkosi yathi kuAnaniyas: "Hamba phambili! Yena usisitya esinyuliweyo sam sokunikela ubungqina kwigama lam phambi kweentlanga nookumkani kunye noonyana bakaSirayeli. Nam ndiya kumbonisa (uPawulos) into emele yenziwe ngenxa yegama lam." Ukubandezeleka Kakhulu” ( IZenzo 9:15-16 ).

(2) Bonke abapostile nabafundi batshutshiswa baza babulawa

1 UStefano wafela ukholo —Funda iZenzo 7:54-60
2 UYakobi, umninawa kaYohane, wabulawa —Funda iZenzo 12:1-2
3 UPetros uyabulawa —Funda eyesi-2 kaPetros 1:13-14
4 UPawulos uyabulawa
Ngoku ndiyathululwa ngokomnikelo, nelixa lokunduluka kwam lifikile. Umzamo omhle ndiwuzamile, ugqatso ndilufezile, ukholo ndilugcinile. Okokugqibela ndibekelwe isithsaba sobulungisa, eya kundibuyisela ngaso ngaloo mini iNkosi, leyo igwebayo ngobulungisa, ingabi ndim ndedwa ke, ibe ngabo bonke abakuthandayo ukubonakala kwayo. Imbekiselo ( 2 Timoti 4:6-8 )
5 Abaprofeti babulawa
“Yerusalem, Yerusalem, wena ubulala abaprofeti, ubagibisele ngamatye abo bathunywe kuwe, kufuthi kangakanani na ndithande ukubabuthela ndawonye abantwana bakho, njengesikhukukazi siwabuthela ndawonye amantshontsho aso phantsi kwamaphiko aso, kodwa aniyi kuphinda niwabuthe 23:37)

(1) UYesu wabandezeleka

Okunene yena, wazithwala iintsizi zethu, wathwala umvandedwa wethu; Kanti yena uhlatywe ngenxa yezikreqo zethu, watyunyuzwa ngenxa yezenzo zethu ezigwenxa. Ngesibetho sakhe sinoxolo; Imbekiselo ( Isaya 53:4-5 )

1 Abanabuhle obuhle

articles.content:

Masivule iBhayibhile kwiSityhilelo 6, iindinyana 9-10, size sizifunde kunye: Xa ndalivulayo elesihlanu itywina, ndabona phantsi kwesibingelelo imiphefumlo yababebulewe ngenxa yelizwi likaThixo nangenxa yobungqina, idanduluka ngezwi elikhulu, isithi, Nkosi, ungcwele, uyinyaniso, aniyi kubagweba. ohleli phezu komhlaba, Mntu, koda kube nini ukuphindezelwa kwegazi lethu?

Namhlanje sizakufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane kunye "IMvana Ivula iTywina leSihlanu" Thandaza: U-Abha othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Umfazi onesidima [ibandla] uthumela abasebenzi: ngezandla zabo babhala kwaye bathetha ilizwi lenyaniso, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwethu, uzuko lwethu, nentlawulelo yemizimba yethu. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumlo yethu kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni: Qonda umbono weNkosi uYesu kwisiTyhilelo evula imfihlelo yencwadi etywinwe ngetywina lesihlanu . Amen!

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

IsiTyhilelo [Isahluko 6:9-10] Xa lavulwayo elesihlanu itywina, ndabona phantsi kwesibingelelo imiphefumlo yababebulewe ngenxa yelizwi likaThixo nangenxa yobungqina, idanduluka ngezwi elikhulu, isithi, Nkosi engcwele nenyaniso. , koda kube nini na ukuba ugwebe abo bemiyo phezu komhlaba, uliphindezelele igazi lethu?”

buza: Ngubani na ophindezelayo abangcwele?
Impendulo: UThixo uyabaphindezelela abangcwele .

(1)UAbheli wabulawa

UKayen wayethetha nomntakwabo uAbheli; Wesuka uKayin wambetha uAbheli umninawa wakhe, wambulala. Imbekiselo ( Genesis 4:8 )

(2) Abaprofeti babulawa

Ufanele uyazi. ( Daniyeli 9:24-26 )

1 UStefano wabulawa
Bathe besaxuluba ngamatye, uStefano wabiza iNkosi, wathi, Nkosi Yesu, khawuwamkele umphefumlo wam . Naye uSawule wakuvuyela ukufa kwakhe. Imbekiselo ( IZenzo 7:59-60 )
2 UYakobi wabulawa
Ngelo xesha uKumkani uHerode wenzakalisa abantu abaninzi ebandleni waza wambulala uYakobi umntakwabo Yohane ngekrele. Imbekiselo ( IZenzo 12:1-2 )

Abanye banyamezela intlekisa, ukatswa, nemixokelelwane, nentolongo, nezinye izilingo; baxulutywa ngamatye bafa, basarhwa, bahendwa, babulawa ngekrele; ( Hebhere 11:36-37 )

Isityhilelo [Isahluko 6:11] Banikwa ke elowo kubo iingubo ezinde ezimhlophe; kwathiwa kubo, basaya kuphumla ithutyana, bade bakhonze kunye nabo nabazalwana babo, abaza kubulawa kwanjengabo, ukuze nenani labo baphumle. zinokuzaliseka.

impendulo: “Izambatho ezimhlophe” zizinxibo zelinen ecikizekileyo eziqaqambileyo nezimhlophe, zambatha umntu omtsha zaza zammbatha uKristu! njengombingeleli omkhulu" UYoshuwa Yambatha iingubo ezintsha → uYoshuwa wema phambi komthunywa lowo, enxibe iingubo ezingcolileyo (ebhekisela kwindoda enkulu). "Akukho mfuneko yokuthatha isaphetha" → Kuphuma ikrele elibukhali emlonyeni wakhe ( UMoya oyiNgcwele likrele ), ekwazi ukuzixabela iintlanga.. Engutyeni yakhe nasethangeni lakhe kwakukho igama libhaliwe kwathiwa: “UKumkani wookumkani, uNkosi kankosi.

→ ngumKristu →Kuba umzamo wethu asingowokuzamana negazi nenyama; ngowokuzamana nazo izilawuli, nawo amagunya, nazo iziphatha-hlabathi zobumnyama balo eli phakade, nayo inkohlakalo yomoya kwezasezulwini iindawo → Yambathani isikrweqe somoya esisinikwe nguThixo. ikrele lomoya ) yiyo i ILizwi likaThixo Imithombo emininzi nangaliphi na ixesha umthandazo Thandazela uloyiso phezu/umtyholi.
