articles.title: Amatywina asixhenxe
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubazalwana noodade bam abathandekayo kwintsapho kaThixo! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile kwiSityhilelo 5:5 size sifunde kunye: Omnye wamadoda amakhulu wathi kum, “Musa ukulila, nantsi iNgonyama yesizwe sakwaYuda, iNgcambu kaDavide; (IMvana) Yoyisile , Ukwazi ukuvula umsongo nokuvula amatywina asixhenxe .

Namhlanje sizakufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane kunye "Amatywina asixhenxe" Thandaza: U-Abha othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Umfazi onesidima【 ecaweni 】Thuma abasebenzi: ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo ezandleni zabo, elithethwa ngabo, eliziindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso, zozuko, nentlawulelo yemizimba yethu. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumlo yethu kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni: Qonda imibono kunye neziprofeto zeNcwadi yesiTyhilelo apho iNkosi uYesu yavula amatywina asixhenxe encwadi. Amen!

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

"Amatywina asixhenxe"

IMvana ifanele ukuvula amatywina asixhenxe

1. [Itywina]

buza: Yintoni itywina?
impendulo: " shicilela " libhekisela kumatywina, amatywina, iimpawu, kunye nemibhalo amagosa amandulo, ookumkani kunye nabalawuli babehlala benziwa ngegolide kunye nejeyidi.

INgoma yazo iiNgoma [8:6] Khawundigcine entliziyweni yakho njengoko ushicilelo , yinxibe engalweni njengesitampu...!

2. [Itywina]

buza: Yintoni itywina?
impendulo: " itywina “Ukutolika kweBhayibhile kubhekisela ekusebenziseni igama likaThixo ( shicilela ) ukutywina, ukutywina, ukutywina, ukufihla kunye nokutywina.

(1) Kutywinwe imibono neziprofeto ezingamashumi asixhenxe

“Bamiselwe iiveki ezimashumi asixhenxe abantu bakowenu, nomzi wakowenu ongcwele, ukuba aphelise isono, aphelise isono, acamagushelwe ubugwenxa, atyhileke ubulungisa obungunaphakade; Itywina imibono neziprofeto , umthambise oyiNgcwele. (Daniyeli 9:24)

(2) Umbono weentsuku ezingama-2300 uyatywinwa

Umbono weentsuku ezingama-2,300 uyinyaniso, kodwa Kufuneka uwutywine lo mbono , ngokuba iseza imihla emininzi. ( Daniyeli 8:26 )

(3) Ixesha elinye, isiqingatha sexesha, lifihliwe laza latywinwa kude kube sekupheleni

Ndamva lowo wayemi phezu kwamanzi ambethe ilinen ecikizekileyo, ephakamisela ezulwini isandla sakhe sasekhohlo nesokunene, efunga uYehova ohleli ngonaphakade, esithi, Unyaka omnye, iminyaka emibini, isiqingatha sonyaka , xa amandla abangcwele ethe yachithwa, zonke ezi zinto ziya kuzaliseka. Ndithe ndakukuva oko, andakuqonda, ndathi, Nkosi yam, siyintoni na ukuphela kwezi zinto? Wathi, Daniyeli, hamba; kuba La mazwi afihliwe kwaye atywinwe , kude kubezekupheleni. Imbekiselo ( Daniyeli 12:7-9 )

(4) Kuya kuba ziintsuku eziliwaka elinamakhulu amabini anamashumi alithoba

Kususela kwelo xesha kwasuswayo idini elinyukayo lamaxesha onke, nokumiswa kwalo isikizi eliphanzisayo, ziintsuku eziliwaka, elinamakhulu mabini, anamanci asithoba. (Daniyeli 12:11)

(5) UKumkani uMikayeli uya kusuka eme

“UMikayeli, isiphatha-zingelosi, okhusela abantu bakowenu, uya kusuka eme; kuya kubakho inkathazo enkulu, ekungazanga kubekho injalo kwasekuqalekeni kohlanga, kude kube ngoku incwadi iya kusindiswa ( Daniyeli 12:1 ).

(6) Iintsuku eziliwaka elinamakhulu amathathu anamanci mathathu anesihlanu

Hayi, uyolo lwabalindileyo kude kube yimini eliwaka, elinamakhulu amathathu, anamanci mathathu anesihlanu. (Daniyeli 12:12)

(7) Fihla la mazwi uze uyitywine le ncwadi

Abaninzi kwabo balele eluthulini lomhlaba baya kuvuka. Phakathi kwabo kukho abanobomi obungunaphakade, nabathile abaneentloni nabacekisekayo ngonaphakade... Daniyeli, umele Fihla la mazwi, tywina le ncwadi , kude kubezekupheleni. Abaninzi baya kuba bebaleka besiya ngapha nangapha (okanye baguqulelwe ngokuthi: ukufunda ngokunyanisekileyo), kwaye ulwazi luya kwanda. ( Daniyeli 12:2-4 )

3. Umsongo utywinwe [ngamatywina asixhenxe]

(1) Ngubani ofanele ukuwuvula umsongo aze akhulule amatywina awo asixhenxe?

Ndabona esandleni sokunene salowo uhleli etroneni incwadi esongwayo, ibhalwe ngaphakathi nangaphandle, itywinwe ngamatywina asixhenxe. Ndabona isithunywa sezulu esinamandla, sivakalisa ngezwi elikhulu, sisithi, Ngubani na ofanele ukuyivula incwadi, nokuwanqika amatywina ayo?

(2) Wathi uYohane akubona ukuba akukho bani ufanele ukuyivula incwadi, wakhala kakhulu

Akukho namnye ezulwini, nasemhlabeni, naphantsi komhlaba, onokuyivula incwadi, ayikhangele kuyo. Ngenxa yokuba kwakungekho bani ufanele ukuwuvula okanye ukuwujonga umsongo, zathi waxa iinyembezi. Imbekiselo ( ISityhilelo 5:3-4 )

(3) Abadala baxelela uYohane ukuba ngubani owayenokuvula amatywina asixhenxe

Yathi enye indoda enkulu kum, Musa ukulila; nantso iNgonyama yesizwe sakwaYuda, iNgcambu kaDavide; (IMvana) Yoyisile , Ukwazi ukuvula umsongo nokuvula amatywina asixhenxe . (ISityhilelo 5:5)

(4)Izidalwa ezine eziphilayo

Kwakukho ulwandle lwegilasi phambi kwetrone, lufana nomkhenkce. Etroneni nasesangqeni setrone kukho izinto eziphilileyo ezine, zizele ngamehlo ngaphambili nangasemva. Imbekiselo ( ISityhilelo 4:6 )

buza: Ziyintoni izidalwa eziphilayo ezine?
impendulo: Ingelosi- Iikerubhi .

Ikerubhi nganye ibinobuso obune: obekuqala ibubuso bekerubhi, obesibini ibubuso bomntu, obesithathu ibubuso bengonyama, obesine ibubuso bokhozi. . ( Hezekile 10:14 )

(5) Izidalwa ezine eziphilayo zifuzisela iincwadi ezine zevangeli

buza: Zifuzisela ntoni izidalwa eziphilayo ezine?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

Eyokuqala into ephilileyo yayifana nengonyama;
Ukufuzisela iVangeli kaMateyu →→ uYesu ngukumkani
eyesibini into ephilileyo ifana nethole
Ukufuzisela iVangeli kaMarko →→ uYesu sisicaka
eyesithathu into ephilileyo inobuso obungathi bomntu;
Ukufuzisela iVangeli kaLuka →→ uYesu ngunyana womntu
Eyesine into ephilileyo ifana nokhozi luphaphazela
Ukufuzisela iVangeli kaYohane →→ uYesu nguthixo

(6)Ii-engile ezisixhenxe namehlo asixhenxe

buza: Zithetha ntoni iikona ezisixhenxe namehlo asixhenxe?
impendulo: " Iiengile ezisixhenxe namehlo asixhenxe "yiyo i oomoya abasixhenxe bakaThixo .

Phawula: " oomoya abasixhenxe ” Ke wona amehlo kaYehova asingasinga ehlabathini lonke.
Imbekiselo ( Zekariya 4:10 )

buza: Ziyintoni iziphatho zezibane ezisixhenxe?
impendulo: " Iziphatho zezibane ezisixhenxe “Ngamabandla asixhenxe lawo.

buza: Zithetha ntoni izibane ezisixhenxe?
impendulo: " izibane ezisixhenxe " kananjalo ibhekisele kwi oomoya abasixhenxe bakaThixo

buza: Ithetha ukuthini iZikhwezi eziSixhenxe?
impendulo: " iinkwenkwezi ezisixhenxe “Amabandla asixhenxe umthunywa .

Ndabona itrone, nezinto eziphilileyo zone, neMvana imi phakathi kwamadoda amakhulu, ngathi ixheliwe. Iiengile ezisixhenxe namehlo asixhenxe ,yiyo i oomoya abasixhenxe bakaThixo , Ithunyelwe kulo lonke ihlabathi . Isalathiso (ISityhilelo 5:6 kunye ne-1:20)

ISityhilelo [5:7-8] Oku inyama yegusha Yeza yayithabatha incwadi esandleni sokunene salowo uhleli etroneni. Wathabatha umsongo , zaye izinto eziphilileyo zone, namadoda amakhulu amashumi mabini anamane, awa phambi kweMvana, iyileyo inohadi, nengqayi yegolide izele sisiqhumiso, engumthandazo wabo bonke abangcwele.

buza: Lithetha ukuthini igama elithi "Qin"?
impendulo: Bamdumisa uThixo ngesandi seehadi.

buza: Lithetha ukuthini igama elithi “ivumba elimnandi”?
impendulo: oku ivumba elimnandi Ngumthandazo wabo bonke abangcwele! owamkelekileyo kuThixo umoya idini.
Kubo bonke abangcwele iingoma zokomoya cula iindumiso, ngo Thandaza ngoMoya oyiNgcwele .thandazani!
Xa nisiza eNkosini, nani nifana namatye aphilileyo, akhiweyo abe yindlu yokomoya, ukuze abe ngababingeleli abangcwele. Nikelani imibingelelo yokomoya eyamkelekileyo kuThixo ngoYesu Kristu . Imbekiselo kaPetros ( 1 Incwadi 2:5 )

(7) Izinto eziphilileyo ezine namadoda amakhulu angamashumi amabini anesine avuma ingoma entsha

1 Izinto eziphilileyo zone zivuma ingoma entsha;

buza: Zifuzisela ntoni izidalwa eziphilayo ezine ezicula ingoma entsha?
impendulo: Izidalwa eziphilayo ezine zifuzisela: " IVangeli kaMateyu, iVangeli kaMarko, iVangeli kaLuka, iVangeli kaYohane ”→IMvana kaThixo ithumela abafundi ngenyaniso yeevangeli ezine, kwaye amaKristu ziinyaniso zevangeli ezisindisa bonke abantu kwaye zisasazeke kwihlabathi liphela nakwiziphelo zomhlaba.

[Izidalwa ezine eziphilayo zicula ingoma entsha] efuzisela uThixo inyama yegusha sebenzisa eyakho Igazi Vumani ingoma entsha, ethengwa kuzo zonke izizwe, neelwimi, nabantu, nezizwe; → Emva koko ndabona, naso isihlwele esikhulu, ebekungekho namnye unako ukusibala, siphuma kuzo zonke iintlanga, nezizwe, nezizwe, neelwimi, simi phambi kwetrone naphambi kweMvana, sambethe iingubo ezinde ezimhlophe, siphethe amasebe esundu ezandleni zaso. , bedanduluka ngamandla, bedanduluka, besithi, Usindiso kuye uThixo wethu, ohleli phezu kwetrone, nakuyo iMvana, zonke izithunywa zezulu zimi, zijikeleze itrone, namadoda amakhulu, nakuzo izinto eziphilileyo zone, zawa ngobuso emhlabeni phambi kwetrone, baqubuda UThixo uthi: “Amen! Ukubongwa, nozuko, nobulumko, nombulelo, nembeko, namandla, nokomelela, makube kuye uThixo wethu, kuse emaphakadeni asemaphakadeni. Amen ( ISityhilelo 7:9-12 )

2 Abadala abangamashumi amabini anesine

buza: Ngoobani abadala abangamashumi amabini anesine?
impendulo: Sirayeli 12 Isizwe + inyama yegusha 12 umpostile

ITestamente eNdala: Izizwe ezilishumi elinesibini zakwaSirayeli

bekukho udonga olude, lunamasango alishumi elinamabini, namasango lawo izithunywa zezulu ezilishumi elinazibini; Amagama ezizwe ezilishumi elinambini zakwaSirayeli . ( ISityhilelo 21:12 )

ITestamente eNtsha: Abapostile Abalishumi Elinesibini

Udonga lwaluneziseko ezilishumi elinambini, phezu kweziseko ezo Amagama abapostile abalishumi elinababini bayo ixhwane . ( ISityhilelo 21:14 )

3 Bavuma iingoma ezintsha;

Bavuma ingoma entsha, besithi, Ufanele ukuyithabatha incwadi, nokuwavula amatywina ayo; nababingeleli UThixo, olawula phezu komhlaba.” Ndabona ndaza ndeva amazwi ezithunywa zezulu ezininzi zijikeleze itrone, izidalwa eziphilayo, namadoda amakhulu, amawaka namawaka ngenani, zisithi ngezwi elikhulu: “Iyifanele iMvana leyo wabulawa , ubutyebi, ubulumko, amandla, imbeko, uzuko, indumiso. Ndaza ndeva zonke izinto ezisemazulwini nezisemhlabeni, naphantsi komhlaba, naselwandle, nakwindalo yonke, zisithi, Kulowo uhleli etroneni nakuyo iMvana, makubekho ukubongwa, nembeko, nozuko, namandla, kuse emaphakadeni asemaphakadeni. Zathi izinto eziphilileyo zone, Amen. Imbekiselo ( ISityhilelo 5:9-14 )

Umbono woSuku 2300

Unyaka omnye, iminyaka emibini, isiqingatha sonyaka

1. Umoni omkhulu uloyisa ilizwe

(1) Ukuhlutha ilizwe xa abanye bengalungiselelanga

buza: Kwenzeka njani ukuba umoni omkhulu azuze ubukumkani?
impendulo: Wasebenzisa ubuqhophololo ukuze ahluthe ubukumkani xa abantu bengalungiselelanga
“Kuya kusuka kusuke umntu odelekileyo esikhundleni sakhe njengokumkani, ekungekho bani umnika uzuko lobukumkani, othe wabuzuza ubukumkani ngamazwi alalanisayo, xa bengalungiselelwanga.

(2) Yiba ngumhlobo namanye amazwe

Imikhosi emininzi iya kuba njengoMnayile, itshabalale phambi kwakhe; Emva kokuzimanya naloo nkosana, uya kwenza ngobuqhophololo, kuba uya kunyuka evela kumkhosi omncinane ukuba abe namandla. ( Daniyeli 11:22-23 )

(3) Ukunyoba abantu ngobutyebi

Uya kufika nakwezona ndawo zichumayo zelizwe ngoxa abantu bekhuselekile, bengekalungiselelwa, enze into abangayenzanga ooyise, nooyise booyise, akuchithachithe amaxhoba nako konke okuphangiweyo nobuncwane phakathi kwabantu, akwenzele oku. Yila ukhuseleko lohlaselo, kodwa oku kokwexeshana. ... uya kuyama ngoncedo lwezithixo zasemzini, ukuba azidilize ezona zikhuselo ziyomeleleyo. Abo bavumayo uya kubazukisa, abanike igunya phezu kwezizwe ezininzi, abanike imihlaba njengezicengo. ( Daniyeli 11:24, 39 )

4 Lahlani idini elinyukayo lamaxesha onke, nenze inqambi indawo engcwele, niziphakamise;

Uya kuxhobela impi, ayixabhele ingcwele, inqaba, balisuse idini elinyukayo lamaxesha onke, bamise into enezothe, ephanzisayo. ... “Ukumkani uya kwenza nantoni na afuna ukuyenza, aziphakamise ngaphezu koothixo bonke, athethe amazwi angaqhelekanga nxamnye noThixo woothixo, ade azaliseke umsindo kaYehova, kuba oko akumiselweyo kuya kwenzeka .Akayi kubakhathalela uThixo wooyise, kwanoThixo omnqwenelwayo ngabafazi, kuba uya kuzenza mkhulu kunaye ( Daniyeli 11:31, 36-37 ) .

(5) Abangcwele baya kuwa ngekrele lakhe

Uya kubalahlekisa abenzi bobubi, bawaphule umnqophiso, basebenzise amazwi alumkileyo; Izilumko zabantu ziya kufundisa abaninzi, ukanti ziya kuwa likrele imihla emininzi, zitshiswe ngomlilo, zithinjwe, zithinjwe. Xa bawayo, bafumana uncedo oluncinane, kodwa abantu abaninzi beza kubo bethetha amazwi acengayo. Inxenye ke yezilumko yawa, ukuze kucikidwe abanye, ukuze bahlambuluke, babe mhlophe, kude kube sekupheleni; ( Daniyeli 11:32-35 )

2. Kufuneka kubekho intlekele enkulu

buza: Yiyiphi intlekele?
impendulo: Ukususela ekuqaleni kwehlabathi ukuza kuthi ga ngoku, akuzange kubekho ntlekele enjalo, yaye akuzange kubekho ntlekele enjalo ukususela ngoko. .

Nikubonile ke okwathethwa ngumprofeti uDaniyeli, esithi, isikizi lesiphanziso ' yima emhlabeni ongcwele (Abo bafunda esi sibhalo kufuneka basiqonde). Ngelo xesha, abo bakwelakwaYuda mabasabele ezintabeni; abo baphezu kwezindlu bangehli, baye kuthabatha impahla yabo; Yeha ke, abamithiyo nabanyisayo ngaloo mihla; Thandazani ke, xa nisabayo, kungabikho busika nasabatha. Kuba ngelo xesha kuya kubakho imbandezelo enkulu, kwasekuqalekeni kwehlabathi, kwada kwaba kalokunje, akuzanga kubekho imbandezelo enjalo, engasayi kubuya ibekho. . Imbekiselo ( Mateyu 24:15-2 )

3. Iintsuku ezingamawaka amabini anamakhulu amathathu

buza: Zingaphi iintsuku ezingamawaka amabini anamakhulu amathathu eentsuku?
impendulo: Ngaphezu kweminyaka emi-6, phantse iminyaka eyi-7 .

Ndamva ongcwele ethetha, waza omnye wabuza koyiNgcwele owathethayo wathi: “Ngubani na olisusayo idini elinyukayo lamaxesha onke, nesono sentshabalalo, lowo uyigqushayo ingcwele, nomkhosi wamaSirayeli? thatha ukuze umbono uzaliseke?” Wathi kum, “Kwiintsuku ezingamawaka amabini anamakhulu amathathu, ingcwele iya kuhlanjululwa. Umbono weentsuku ezingama-2,300 uyinyaniso , kodwa uze uwutywine lo mbono ngenxa yokuba ngowemihla emininzi ezayo. ” Imbekiselo ( Daniyeli 8:13-14 kunye ne-8:26 )

4 Loo mihla iya kunqanyulelwa;

buza: Zeziphi iintsuku eziya kunqunyulwa?
impendulo: Iintsuku ezingama-2300 zembandezelo enkulu ziya kunqunyulwa .

Kuba kuya kubakho imbandezelo enkulu, ekungazanga kubekho injalo kwasekuqalekeni kwehlabathi, kwada kwaba kalokunje, ekungasayi kubuye kubekho injalo. Ukuba ayithanga loo mihla inqanyulelwe, akukho mntu uya kusindiswa; ngenxa ke yabanyuliweyo, loo mihla iya kunqanyulelwa . Imbekiselo ( Mateyu 24:21-22 )

Phawula: INkosi uYesu yathi: " Loo mihla iya kunqanyulwa "," ngolwa suku " Ibhekisa koluphi usuku?

→→ ibhekisa kumprofeti uDaniyeli ebona Intlekele umbono, Ingelosi uGabriyeli Iyacacisa 2300 iintsuku Lo mbono uyinyaniso, kodwa uze uwutywine lo mbono, kuba wona ngowemihla emininzi ezayo.

( 2300 iintsuku Imfihlelo ayinakuqondwa ngengqondo yomntu, ulwazi lomntu, okanye intanda-bulumko yomntu uMoya oyiNgcwele ), kungakhathaliseki ukuba unolwazi okanye unolwazi kangakanani na, awusoze ukwazi ukuqonda izinto zasezulwini nezomoya)
Enkosi Bawo waseZulwini ngothando lwakho, ndiyabulela kwiNkosi uYesu Krestu ngofefe lwakho, kwaye ndiyabulela ngempefumlelo yoMoya oyiNgcwele.
Sikhokelele kuyo yonke inyaniso →→ 2300 iintsuku Imihla yembandezelo enkulu iyancipha Zonke zityhilekile kuthi bantwana bakaThixo. Amen.

Ngenxa yokuba iicawa ezininzi kwixesha elidlulileyo " umchazi "Konke Khange ichaze ngokucacileyo Oko kwathethwa ngumprofeti uDaniyeli “ Imfihlakalo "yeentsuku ezingamawaka amabini anamakhulu amathathu" Into ethethwayo kukuba ibangela ukuba ibandla libhideke kakhulu kwaye liphosakele ngokwemfundiso. Akufanele kube njalo " Umlindi weSeventh-day Adventist " Ellen White Sebenzisa eyakho iNeo-Confucianism ukubala ukuba ukusuka ku-456 BC ukuya ku-1844 BC, kwaqala uphando kunye nokuvavanywa kwetyala ezulwini.

Isihlanu, unyaka omnye, iminyaka emibini, isiqingatha sonyaka

(1) Umoni waphula amandla abangcwele

buza: Kuya kuthatha ixesha elingakanani ukuba umntu wesono aphule amandla abangcwele?
impendulo: Unyaka omnye, iminyaka emibini, isiqingatha sonyaka
Ndamva lowo wayemi phezu kwamanzi ambethe ilinen ecikizekileyo, ephakamisela ezulwini isandla sakhe sasekhohlo nesokunene, efunga uYehova ohleli ngonaphakade, esithi, Unyaka omnye, iminyaka emibini, isiqingatha sonyaka , xa amandla abangcwele ethe yachithwa, zonke ezi zinto ziya kuzaliseka. (Daniyeli 12:7)

(2) Abangcwele baya kunikelwa ezandleni zakhe

Uya kuthetha amazwi okuqhayisa kOsenyangweni, abacinezele abangcwele bOsenyangweni, afune ukuwaguqula ke amaxesha nemithetho; Abangcwele baya kunikelwa esandleni sakhe ixesha, nexesha, nesiqingatha sexesha . (Daniyeli 7:25)

(3) Ukutshutshiswa kwabafazi (icawa)

Yathi inamba, yakubona ukuba iphoswe emhlabeni, yamtshutshisa umfazi ozele umntwana oyinkwenkwe. Umfazi wanikwa amaphiko amabini okhozi olukhulu, ukuze aphaphazele aye entlango, endaweni yakhe, ephuma enyoka; Unyaka omnye, emibini enesiqingatha . ( ISityhilelo 12:13-14 )

(4) Iintsuku eziliwaka elinamakhulu amabini anamashumi alithoba

buza: Ungakanani unyaka, iminyaka emibini, nesiqingatha sonyaka?
impendulo: iintsuku eziliwaka elinamakhulu amabini anamashumi alithoba → oko kukuthi ( Iminyaka emi-3 enesiqingatha ).
Ukususela kwixesha lokususwa kwedini elinyukayo lamaxesha onke, nokumiswa kwalo isikizi lesiphanziso, kuya kubakho. iintsuku eziliwaka elinamakhulu amabini anamashumi alithoba . (Daniyeli 12:11)

Phawula: 2300 iintsuku Imbandezelo enkulu yeyokwenene; ngenxa ke yabanyuliweyo, loo mihla iya kunqanyulelwa .

buza: Zeziphi iintsuku zokunciphisa intlekele?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

Imbekiselo ( ISityhilelo 11:2 )

(Daniyeli 12:11)

4 Iwaka elinamakhulu amabini anamashumi amathandathu eentsuku
Isalathiso ( ISityhilelo 11:3 kunye ne-12:6 )

5 Iintsuku eziliwaka elinamakhulu amathathu, anamanci mathathu anesihlanu
(Daniyeli 12:12)

articles.title: Imiqondiso yokubuya kukaYesu (Imfundiso 6)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubazalwana noodade bam abathandekayo kwintsapho kaThixo! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile kuDaniyeli iSahluko 7, iivesi 2-3, size sizifunde kunye: Wathi uDaniyeli, Ndabona umbono ebusuku, ndabona imimoya yomine yasezulwini inyuka, ivuthuza phezu kolwandle. Kwaphuma amarhamncwa amakhulu amane elwandle, ngalinye linemilo eyahlukileyo :

Namhlanje sizakufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane kunye "Imiqondiso Yokubuya KukaYesu" Hayi. 6 Masithandaze: Abha othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Umfazi onesidima【 ecaweni 】Thuma abasebenzi: ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo ezandleni zabo, elithethwa ngabo, eliziindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso, zozuko, nentlawulelo yemizimba yethu. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumlo yethu kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni: Abo baqondayo amarhamncwa kaDaniyeli nakwiSityhilelo umbono .

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

umbono werhamncwa

buza: " irhamncwa "Ingaba ithetha ntoni?"
impendulo: " irhamncwa ” libhekisela kwisibizo esithi “inyoka,” inamba, uSathana, umtyholi, nomchasi-Kristu ( ISityhilelo 20:2 )

buza: " irhamncwa "Ifanekisela ntoni?"
impendulo: " irhamncwa “Ikwafuzisela izikumkani zeli hlabathi, ubukumkani bukaSathana.
1Ihlabathi liphela lilele kongendawo →Funda eyoku-1 kaYohane 5:19
2 Zonke izizwe zehlabathi →Funda uMateyu 4:8
3 Izikumkani Zehlabathi →Ingelosi yesixhenxe yavuthela ixilongo layo, kwaza kwabakho ilizwi elikhulu ezulwini lisithi: “Izikumkani zeli hlabathi zithe zaba zezeNkosi yethu nezikaKristu wayo, yaye iya kulawula ngonaphakade kanaphakade.” 15)

1 Amarhamncwa amakhulu amane enyuka ephuma elwandle

UDaniyeli wathi: “Ndabona umbono ebusuku, ndabona imimoya yomine yasezulwini inyuka ivuthuza elwandle. Kwaphuma amarhamncwa amakhulu amane elwandle, ngalinye linemilo eyahlukileyo;

Eyokuqala ifana nengonyama → uBukhosi baseBhabhiloni

Laye linamaphiko okhozi; ndaza ndalibona, lancothulwa amaphiko erhamncwa, laza irhamncwa lema emhlabeni, lema ngeenyawo ezimbini njengomntu, layizuza intliziyo yerhamncwa. (Daniyeli 7:4)

Irhamncwa lesibini lifana nebhere → amaMedi namaPersi

Kwabakho elinye irhamncwa elifana nebhere, elesibini irhamncwa, lihleli phezu kwalo, lineembambo ezintathu emlonyeni walo. Omnye wayalela irhamncwa, “Suka udle inyama eninzi.”

Irhamncwa lesithathu lifana nengwe → umtyholi ongumGrike

Emveni koko ndabona: nalo elinye irhamncwa, linjengengwe, linamaphiko entaka amane emhlana walo; (Daniyeli 7:6)

Irhamncwa lesine lalisoyikeka → UBukhosi baseRoma

Ndabona embonweni wasebusuku: nalo irhamncwa lesine, eloyikekayo, elomeleleyo, elincamisileyo, elincamisileyo, elimazinyo makhulu esinyithi, liwadla, liwahlafuna okuseleyo, lakunyathela ngeenyawo zalo. Eli rhamncwa lahluke kakhulu kulawo marhamncwa amathathu okuqala lineempondo ezilishumi entloko. Ndazikhangela ezi mpondo, nanko kuphuma phakathi kwazo uphondo oluncinane; Olu phondo lunamehlo afana namehlo omntu, nomlomo othetha izinto ezigwenxa. Imbekiselo ( Daniyeli 7:7-8 )

Wawuchaza ke umlindi umbono werhamncwa lesine.

buza: Isine" irhamncwa "Ibhekisa kubani?"
impendulo: ubukhosi baseRoma

(Phawula: Ngokutsho kweengxelo zembali, ukususela eBhabhiloni → amaMedi namaPersi → uKumkani weedemon zamaGrike → uBukhosi baseRoma.)

buza: Irhamncwa lesine intloko " ishumi jiao "Ingaba ithetha ntoni?"
impendulo: Intloko ine" ishumi jiao “Lirhamncwa lesine ( ubukhosi baseRoma ) uya kuvela phakathi kookumkani abalishumi.

buza: Ngoobani ookumkani abalishumi abaza kuvela kuBukhosi baseRoma?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi
27 BC - 395 AD → uBukhosi baseRoma
395 AD - 476 AD → Western Roman Empire
395 AD - 1453 AD → Eastern Roman Empire
UBukhosi baseRoma bamandulo babuquka: i-Itali, iFransi, iJamani, iSpeyin, iPortugal, iOstriya, iSwitzerland, iGrisi, iTurkey, i-Iraq, iPalestina, iYiputa, i-Israel, neVatican. Kwanamazwe amaninzi azahlula kuBukhosi baseRoma, kuquka iRashiya yanamhlanje, iUnited States, namanye amazwe amaninzi.

buza: ngoko" ishumi jiao " ookumkani abalishumi Ngubani?
impendulo: Abakaliloyisi ilizwe okwangoku
buza: Ngoba?
impendulo: Ngenxa yokuba bengekafiki, kodwa xa befika baya kubonakala yaye baya kubuzuza ubukumkani → kubo “Kumnandi” UBukhosi baseBhabhiloni → amaMedi namaPersi → iGrisi → uBukhosi baseRoma → Iinyawo ezisiqingatha zodongwe nesiqingatha sentsimbi Shumi " iinzwane " Ziimpondo ezilishumi nookumkani abalishumi .
Iimpondo ezilishumi ozibonayo ngookumkani abalishumi. ( ISityhilelo 17:12 )

buza: Enye into" Xiaojiao "Ingaba ithetha ntoni?"
impendulo: " Xiaojiao ” → “ uphondo "Ibhekisela kumarhamncwa kunye neenyoka zamandulo. Olu phondo lunamehlo, njengamehlo abantu → " inyoka “Wabonakala ekwimo yomntu; wayenomlomo othetha izinto ezinkulu → Wada wahlala etempileni kaThixo, ezibiza ngokuba unguThixo → Le ndoda yayiyeyesi- 2 kwabaseTesalonika 2:3-4 . uPawulosi ) wathi " Watyhila umoni omkhulu ", unguKristu wobuxoki. Yiloo nto ingelosi yathi, "Ngoko kuya kuvela ukumkani."

Wathetha lowo umi khona, wathi, Irhamncwa lesine ke ngubukumkani besine, obuya kuza ehlabathini, bube bungafaniyo bona nezikumkani zonke, bulidle ihlabathi lonke, bulinyathele ngeenyawo, buphume kobo bukumkani kuya kusuka kume iimpondo ezilishumi, kwandule ke kume ukumkani owahlukileyo kwabakuqala; kwaye uya kuzama ukuwaguqula amaxesha nemithetho. Abangcwele baya kunikelwa esandleni sakhe ixesha, nexesha, nesiqingatha sexesha . ( Daniyeli 7:23-25 )

2 Umbono weenkunzi zeegusha neebhokhwe

Ingelosi uGabriyeli ichaza lo mbono

(1)Inkunzi yegusha eneempondo ezimbini

buza: Ngubani inkunzi yegusha eneempondo ezimbini?
impendulo: ukumkani wamajelo eendaba namaPersi
Inkunzi yegusha eneempondo ezimbini oyibonileyo ngukumkani wamaMedi namaPersi; (Daniyeli 8:20)

(2) ibhili yebhokhwe

buza: Ngubani ibhokhwe yebhili?
impendulo: ukumkani wamaGrike

buza: Ngubani ukumkani waseGrisi?
impendulo: UAlexander Omkhulu (iingxelo zembali)
Inkunzi yebhokhwe yikumkani yaseGrisi (ngesiGrike: umbhalo wokuqala nguYawan; uphondo olukhulu phakathi kwamehlo yinkosi yokuqala). (Daniyeli 8:21)

(3)2300 Day Vision

1 Wophukile umnwe omkhulu wophondo →Ukumkani wamaGrike “uAlexander Omkhulu” wafa ngowama-333 BC.

2 Ingcambu yophondo olukhulu ihluma iikona ezine → "OoKumkani abane" babhekisa kwizikumkani ezine.
UCassander →walawula eMakedoni
ULysimachus → Wayelawula iThrace neAsia Minor
Seleucus → Walawula iSiriya
UPtolemy → Walawula iYiputa
UKumkani uPtolemy →323-198 BC
UKumkani uSeleucid → 198-166 BC
UKumkani uHasmani → 166-63 BC
Ubukhosi baseRoma → 63 BC ukuya kwi-27 BC-1453 BC

3 Kwakhula ubukumkani obuncinane kwenye yeembombo zone → Ekupheleni kweembombo zone, kwavela ukumkani.
buza: Ngubani olu phondo luncinane lusiya luqina ngakumbi?
impendulo: ubukhosi baseRoma
buza: Kuya kuvela ukumkani oya kuwasusa amadini akho anyukayo, ayonakalisa ingcwele yakho;
impendulo: Umchasi-Kristu.
Ngo-AD 70, uBukhosi obucekisekayo nobutshabalalisayo baseRoma " UTito Jikelele" Wayithimba iYerusalem, watshabalalisa amadini anyukayo, watshabalalisa nengcwele. Ungummeli womchasi-Kristu .

→→Ekupheleni kwezi zikumkani zone, zakuba zizalise izono zabo bawaphula umthetho, kuya kusuka kuvele ukumkani, obonakala enoburhalarhume, ekwazi ukwenza izenzo ezincamisayo... + yaye uya kuzidla entliziyweni yakhe, + yaye ngokuqinisekileyo uya kubatshabalalisa abantu abaninzi; Umbono weentsuku ezingama-2,300 uyinyaniso , kodwa uze uwutywine lo mbono ngenxa yokuba ngowemihla emininzi ezayo. ( Daniyeli 8:23-26 )

3 UKumkani wasezantsi noKumkani wasentla

(1)UKumkani wasezantsi

buza: Ngubani na ke ukumkani wasezantsi?
impendulo: uPtolemaeus I Soter... ukumkani wamazwe amaninzi emva kwezizukulwana ezithandathu. Ngoku ibhekisela eYiputa, i-Iraq, i-Iran, iTurkey, iSiriya, iPalestina kunye namanye amazwe amaninzi aneenkolelo zobuhedeni → bonke bangabameli "berhamncwa", ukumkani wasezantsi.
“Ukumkani wasemzantsi uya komelela, yaye enye yeenjengele zakhe iya komelela ngakumbi kunaye, yaye uya kuba negunya, negunya lakhe liya kuba likhulu.

(2)UKumkani waseNtla

buza: Ngubani na ukumkani wasentla?
impendulo: U-Antiochus I ukuya ku-Epiphanes IV, njl., kamva ubhekisela kuBukhosi baseRoma, uBukhosi baseTurkey Ottoman ... kunye namanye amazwe. Abanye bathi yiRashiya,” Iingxelo zembali ziyoyikeka Andisayi kuphinda ndixoxe ngayo apha. Kukwakho neecawa ezininzi ezisebenzisa ezazo iNeo-Confucian zokuqiqa ukwenza into engekhoyo. ISeventh-day Adventist ithi yiCawa yamaRoma Katolika, kunye neUnited States. Uyakholelwa? Ukuthetha? ubuvuvu buya kukhokelela kubuxoki kwaye bunokusetyenziswa ngokulula nguMtyholi.

(3)Isikizi lesiphanziso

1 unyaka omnye, iminyaka emibini, isiqingatha sonyaka
Ndamva lowo umi phezu kwamanzi ambethe ilinen emhlophe, ephakamisela ezulwini izandla zakhe zasekhohlo nesokunene, efunga lowo udla ubomi ngonaphakade, esithi, Koda kube lixesha, namaxesha amabini, nesiqingatha sexesha; xa amandla abangcwele aya kwaphulwa kwaye yonke into yenzeka. ”

2 iintsuku eziliwaka elinamakhulu amabini anamashumi alithoba
Kususela kwelo xesha kwasuswayo idini elinyukayo lamaxesha onke, nokumiswa kwalo isikizi eliphanzisayo, ziintsuku eziliwaka, elinamakhulu mabini, anamanci asithoba. (Daniyeli 12:11)

buza: Mingaphi iminyaka eliwaka elinamakhulu amathathu anamashumi alithoba eentsuku?
impendulo: iminyaka emithathu enesiqingatha →Isikizi lesiphanziso" umoni “Kuya kutyhilwa ukuba, xa lithe lasuswa idini elinyukayo lamaxesha onke, lamiswa isikizi eliphanzisayo, liya kuba ziintsuku eziliwaka, elinamakhulu amabini, anamanci asithoba, ixesha, namaxesha, nesiqingatha sexesha, oko kukuthi, ixesha eliwaka, namaxesha amisiweyo, nesiqingatha sexesha; iminyaka emithathu enesiqingatha "Yaphula amandla abangcwele kwaye utshutshise amaKristu.

3 Iintsuku eziliwaka elinamakhulu amathathu, anamanci mathathu anesihlanu

buza: Zimela ntoni iintsuku eziliwaka elinamakhulu amathathu anamashumi amathathu anesihlanu?
impendulo : Ifuzisela isiphelo sehlabathi kunye nokuza kukaYesu Kristu .
Hayi, uyolo lwabalindileyo kude kube yimini eliwaka, elinamakhulu amathathu, anamanci mathathu anesihlanu. (Daniyeli 12:12)

【Isityhilelo】

4 Irhamncwa liphuma elwandle

【 ISityhilelo 13:1 】 Ndabona kunyuka, kuphuma elwandle, irhamncwa, lineentloko ezisixhenxe neempondo ezilishumi, ezimpondweni zalo izizithsaba ezilishumi, kwiintloko zalo iligama lonyeliso. .

buza: ulwandle Liliphi irhamncwa eliphuma phakathi?
impendulo: Kuvela umoni omkhulu

【 Iimpawu zeRhamncwa 】

1 iimpondo ezilishumi neentloko ezisixhenxe
2 Iimpondo ezilishumi ezinezithsaba ezilishumi
3 Iintloko ezisixhenxe zinegama lonyeliso
(Ukulahlekisa, ukukhohlisa, ukuxoka, ukwaphula iminqophiso, ukumchasa uThixo, ukutshabalalisa, nokubulala.” uzuko ” → oku isithsaba Unegama lonyeliso )
4 emile okwengwe
5 Iinyawo njengeenyawo zebhere
6 Umlomo njengengonyama; .

[ ISityhilelo 13:3-4 ] Ndabona enye yeentloko ezisixhenxe zerhamncwa ingathi inenxeba lokufa, kodwa inxeba lokufa laphila. Bakhwankqiswa bonke abantu emhlabeni, balilandela irhamncwa, balinqula inamba, kuba igunya lalo lalinike irhamncwa, balinqula irhamncwa, besithi, Ngubani na ofana neli rhamncwa, ingubani na onako ukulwa imfazwe? naye?"

buza: " irhamncwa "Kuthetha ukuthini ukwenzakala okanye ufile?"
impendulo: UYesu Kristu wavuka kwabafileyo → wenzakala” inyoka “Intloko yerhamncwa, abantu abaninzi bakholelwa kwiindaba ezilungileyo kwaye bakholelwa kuYesu Kristu!

buza: Oko" irhamncwa Kuthetha ukuthini ukuphiliswa nangona ufile okanye wenzakele?

articles.author: admin
articles.content:

Masivule iBhayibhile yethu kuMateyu Isahluko 24 kunye nevesi 32 size sifunde kunye: “Nani ke nafunda kuwo umkhiwane: xa amasebe ethamba, ehluma amagqabi, niyazi ukuba ihlobo likufuphi. .

Namhlanje sizakufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane kunye "Imiqondiso Yokubuya KukaYesu" Hayi. 5 Masithandaze: Abha othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Umfazi onesidima【 ecaweni 】Thuma abasebenzi: ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo ezandleni zabo, elithethwa ngabo, eliziindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso, zozuko, nentlawulelo yemizimba yethu. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumlo yethu kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni: Bonke abantwana bakaThixo mabawuqonde umzekeliso womkhiwane ohlumayo nohluma amagqabi.

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

Wathetha omnye umzekeliso kubo, esithi, Wukhangeleni umkhiwane nayo yonke eminye imithi; ukuntshula Xa ulibona, uya kwazi ngokwendalo ukuba ihlobo liyasondela. …Ngoko ke, njengoko nibona ezi zinto zisenzeka ngokuthe ngcembe, yazini ukuba ubukumkani bukaThixo busondele. ( Luka 21:29, 31 )

Umzekeliso woMkhiwane (Uhluma)

1. Intwasahlobo

UThixo wabona ukuba umkhiwane “uSirayeli” wawunamagqabi kuphela yaye wawungenasiqhamo → njengoko uYohane uMbhaptizi wathi, “Nimele nithwale isiqhamo ngokwenguquko... Izembe selibekiwe engcanjini yomthi lowo; Wonke umthi ongavelisi siqhamo sihle uyagawulwa, uphoswe emlilweni . ( Mateyu 3:8, 10 )

UIsaya [Isahluko 11:1] Kumbhalo wantlandlolo kaYese (umbhalo wokuqala uthi Dun) Betfair Amasebe aphuma ezingcanjini zakhe aya kuba nesiqhamo.
【 itestamente endala "UThixo wamisa nabantu bakwaSirayeli" umnqophiso womthetho ", umthi wakwaSirayeli phantsi komthetho" umkhiwane “Amagqabi kuphela akanako ukuthwala isiqhamo. Yigawule nje .
【 ITestamente Entsha "UThixo kunye ( entsha abantu bakwaSirayeli” umnqophiso wobabalo ” → iBetfa esuka kwiJese’s Pier ( YiNkosi uYesu ); Isebe elizelwe yingcambu kaYesu Krestu liya kuthwala isiqhamo . Amen! Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

buza: Kuthetha ukuthini xa umkhiwane (uhluma) uvelisa amagqabi amatsha?
impendulo: ibhekisele ku" ITestamente Entsha "Njengentonga ka-Aron" ukuntshula ” → INumeri Isahluko 17 Indinyana 8 Ngengomso wangena uMoses ententeni yesingqino, owayesazi ukuba uAron wesizwe sakwaLevi. 2. Ihlobo

buza: Ingaba umkhiwane uvelisa isiqhamo ngaliphi ixesha?
impendulo: ihlobo

(1) Isiqhamo soMoya oyiNgcwele

buza: endulini kaYese kuya kuhluma isebe, yaye liya kuthwala isiqhamo sini na?

impendulo: Isiqhamo soMoya oyiNgcwele uthando, uvuyo, uxolo, ukuzeka kade umsindo, ububele, ukulunga, intembeko, ubulali, ukuzeyisa . Akukho mthetho uchasene nezinto ezinjalo. Imbekiselo ( Galati 5:22-23 )

Ngoko wasebenzisa isafobe esithi: “Umntu unomkhiwane (ebhekisela kuwo Sirayeli ) etyalwe esidiliyeni ( Indlu kaThixo )ngaphakathi. Weza emthini efuna isiqhamo, akasifumana. Ngoko wathi kumgcini-myezo, ‘Khangela, mna (ebhekisa ubawo osezulwini ) Kule minyaka mithathu idluleyo, bendisiza kulo mkhiwane ndifuna isiqhamo, kodwa andisifumani. Yigawuleni, yini na ukuba nilidle ilifa ilizwe! 'Umlimi wegadi ( UYesu Wathi, Nkosi, wugcine kulo nyaka, ndide ndimbe umhlaba owujikelezileyo, ndigalele umgquba apho. Ukuba uthe wavelisa isiqhamo, wuyeke; kungenjalo wowugawula kwakhona. ’” (Luka 13:6-9)

Ndithi kuni, Phakamiselani emasimini amehlo enu, nikhangele; Izityalo zivuthiwe (zimhlophe kumbhalo wokuqala) kwaye zilungele ukuvunwa. Waphendula ke wathi, Lo uhlwayela imbewu entle nguNyana woMntu; intsimi ke lihlabathi; imbewu entle ngoonyana bobukumkani; umdiza ngoonyana bongendawo; utshaba ke luhlwayele umdiza. umtyholi; Ixesha lokuvuna kukupheliswa kwephakade eli; . Imbekiselo ( Mateyu 13:37-39 )

(3) Ukuvuna izityalo emhlabeni

Ndabona, nalo ilifu elimhlophe, efini apho kuhleli onjengoNyana woMntu, enesithsaba segolide entloko, ephethe irhengqa elibukhali esandleni sakhe. Namhlanje sizakufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane kunye "Imiqondiso Yokubuya KukaYesu" Hayi. 4 Thetha kwaye wenze umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, Nkosi yethu uYesu Krestu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Umfazi onesidima【 ecaweni 】Thuma abasebenzi: ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo ezandleni zabo, elithethwa ngabo, eliziindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso, zozuko, nentlawulelo yemizimba yethu. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumlo yethu kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni: Ukuze bonke abantwana bakaThixo bayiqonde imiqondiso yaboni nabachasene nomthetho .

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

1. Isikizi lesiphanziso

(1) Isela

buza: Ngubani na isikizi lesiphanziso?
impendulo: " isela ” → “ inyoka “USathana uMtyholi.

INkosi uYesu yathi → Ndim isango, nabani na ongena ngam uya kusindiswa kwaye uya kungena ephuma kwaye afumane idlelo. Xa amasela efika, afuna kuphela yeba, bulala, tshabalalisa Mna ndizele ukuze iigusha (okanye ziguqulelwe ngokuthi: abantu) zibe nobomi, zibe nabo ngokugqithiseleyo. Imbekiselo ( Yohane 10:9-10 )

(2)Impungutye

buza: Itshabalalisa ntoni impungutye?
impendulo: " impungutye ” libhekisela kumtyholi, uSathana, oya kutshabalalisa isidiliya seNkosi.
INgoma yazo iiNgoma 2:15 Sibambeleni iimpungutye, iimpungutye ezincinane ezonakalisa izidiliya; ngokuba iidiliya zethu zityatyambile.

OOKUMKANI II 24:13 Ukumkani waseBhabheli wabuthabatha bonke ubuncwane bendlu kaYehova, nobebhotwe lokumkani, wazitshabalalisa zonke iimpahla zegolide, abezakhele uSolomon ukumkani wakwaSirayeli endlwini kaYehova; njengoko wakuthethayo uYehova;
EyesiBini yeziKronike 36:19 athi amaKaledi ayitshisa indlu kaThixo, azidiliza iindonga zeYerusalem, azitshisa ezingxandeni zesixeko ngomlilo, azitshabalalisa iimpahla ezinqwenelekayo zaloo mzi.

(4) iYerusalem (yesibini) ukwakhiwa kwakhona kwetempile

buza: Kwathabatha iminyaka emingaphi ukuze itempile yaseYerusalem yakhiwe kwakhona emva kokuphanziswa kwayo?
Impendulo: iminyaka engama-70

Daniyeli 9:1-2 Ngomnyaka wokuqala wobukumkani bukaDariyo unyana ka-Ahaswerosi wamaMedi, oko kwaba ngumnyaka wokuqala wobukumkani bakhe, mna, Daniyeli, ndafunda encwadini, kwafika ilizwi likaYehova. kuYeremiya umprofeti, iminyaka yokuphanziswa kweYerusalem; Iminyaka engamashumi asixhenxe kukuphela .

1 Kumyalelo wokuba yakhiwe kwakhona iYerusalem

Ngonyaka wokuqala kaKoreshi ukumkani wasePersi, ukuze azaliseke amazwi awayethethwe ngomlomo kaYeremiya, uYehova wayixhokonxa intliziyo kaKoreshi ukumkani wasePersi waza wabangela ukuba akhuphe umyalelo kulo lonke ilizwe: Utsho uKoreshi ukumkani wasePersi ukuthi, UYehova, uThixo wamazulu, uwise umthetho wokuthi, zonke iintlanga zanikelwa kum, wandiwisela umthetho wokuba ndimakhele indlu eYerusalem kwaYuda abantu bayenyuka baya eYerusalem yakwaYuda. Yakha indlu kaNdikhoyo uThixo kaSirayeli eJerusalem (Nguye yedwa uThixo). Wanga uThixo abe nale ndoda. Imbekiselo ( Ezra 1:1-3 )

2 Indlu leyo yakhiwa ngomnyaka wesithandathu kakumkani uDariyo

Amadoda amakhulu akwaYuda ayakha indlu ngenxa yamazwi okhuthazo awathethwa nguHagayi umprofeti noZekariya unyana kaIdo, yonke into yanempumelelo. Ayakha ngokomthetho woThixo kaSirayeli, nommiselo kaKoreshi, noDariyo, noArtashashta, ookumkani basePersi; Yagqitywa ke le ndlu ngomnyaka wesithandathu kaDariyo ukumkani, ngomhla wesithathu wenyanga yokuqala enguAdare. . Imbekiselo ( Ezra 6:14-15 )

3 Ngomhla wamashumi amabini anesihlanu wenyanga enguEluli ukumkani uAtashashta, lwagqitywa udonga.

Ngomhla wamashumi amabini anesihlanu wenyanga enguEluli, lwagqitywa udonga, yaye kwathabatha iintsuku ezingamashumi amahlanu anesibini ukwakhiwa. Zathi zakukuva oku zonke iintshaba zethu, neentlanga ezisijikelezileyo, zoyika, zabhekabheka, ngenxa yokuba umsebenzi ugqityiwe, ngokuba wawuphume kuThixo wethu. ( Nehemiya 6:15-16 )

2. UYesu waxela kwangaphambili ngokutshatyalaliswa kwetempile (isihlandlo sesibini)

(1) UYesu waprofeta esithi itempile yayiza kutshatyalaliswa

Uthe ke uYesu, esondela eYerusalem, wawubona umzi, wawulilela, esithi, Akwaba ubukwazile namhla oku okucelayo uxolo lwakho; ube nguthango kuwe ngeenxa zonke, akurhawule, akutshabalalise, wena nabantwana bakho phakathi kwakho, kungasali nelitye phezu kwelitye lakho, ngenxa yokuba ungalazi ixesha lokuvelelwa kwakhe.” Isahluko 19 ivesi 41-44)

(2) UYesu waxela kwangaphambili ukuba itempile yayiya kwakhiwa ngeentsuku ezintathu

buza: UYesu wasebenzisa ntoni ukwakha itempile ngeentsuku ezintathu?
Impendulo: Yenza umzimba wakhe ube yitempile
Waphendula uYesu wathi kuye, Yichitheni le tempile; ndiya kubuya ndiwakhe ngeentsuku ezintathu; . Aza athi ke amaYuda, Le tempile yakhiwa iminyaka emashumi mane anesithandathu; woyivusa na ngeentsuku ezintathu na? " Wakutsho ke uYesu ngomzimba wakhe, esetempileni . Ngoko emva kokuba evukile kwabafileyo, abafundi bakhumbula into awayeyithethile baza bakholwa yiBhayibhile noko kwathethwa nguYesu. Imbekiselo ( Yohane 2:19-22 )

(3) Itempile yasemhlabeni yadilizwa ngowama-70 AD

buza: Isikizi lesiphanziso → Ngubani owatshabalalisa itempile okwesibini?
impendulo: Injengele yaseRoma → uTito .

Phawula: UYesu Krestu wavuswa kwabafileyo waza waphinda wazalwa nathi, nto leyo eyathethwa yiNkosi uYesu ( iintsuku ezintathu ) yaza yasekwa kwakhona ebandleni, isenza umzimba wakhe ube yitempile, thina singamalungu omzimba wayo, itempile yoMoya oyiNgcwele, ingeyiyo itempile eyenziweyo ngezandla → Ukususela ngoko, ibandla laseYerusalem lasekwa “UStefano” wabulawelwa ukholo lweNkosi, ibandla laseYerusalem latshutshiswa ngokuqatha ngamaYuda, yaye ivangeli yeNkosi uYesu Kristu yasasazwa kwihlabathi langaphandle→ Kwisithuba esinye okanye ezisixhenxe , uya kwenza umnqophiso oqinileyo nabaninzi” → “ kwa-Antiyokwe "...kunye nokunye okuninzi ( IiNtlanga ) ibandla lasekwa.
Bonke abapostile nabafundi bayaqonda ukuba zonke ziitempile ezakhiwa yiNkosi uYesu Kristu ngeentsuku ezintathu, kungekhona iitempile ezenziwe ngezandla. IYerusalem yamaYuda yitempile eyenziwe ngezandla, "isithunzi", kungekhona umfanekiso wenyaniso, oko kukuthi, iNdawo Engcwele yokwenyaniso, itempile engenakuze itshatyalaliswe → yiYerusalem yasezulwini! Amen

(4) Imbali yeYerusalem emva kowama-70 AD

Iingxelo zembali zibonisa ukuba ngo-AD 70 iTempile yaseYerusalem yathinjwa yaza yadilizwa yinjengele yaseRoma uTitus → Ezalisekisa amazwi kaYehova athi, “Akusekho litye liseleyo phezu kwelitye elingayi kuchithwa; Kuphela ludonga olukwicala lasentshona okusalayo ( Udonga Olulila ), zizizukulwana zamva kuphela ziya kuyazi le nkqubo yembali.

buza: Yeyiphi imbali owayifumanayo emva kokutshatyalaliswa kweTempile yesiBini?
impendulo: Ukuqala kwimbali ye-70 AD→→

2 Ngo-637 AD, ubukhosi bamaSilamsi bavuka kwaye emva kokuhlala ePalestina, (isikizi lentshabalalo) bakha "i-Al-Aqsa Mosque" kwindawo yetempile kunye ne "Aqsa Mosque" kufuphi nayo, ekhoyo namhlanje ngo-2022. AD.

3 NgoMeyi 14, 1948 AD, uSirayeli wabhengezwa njengohlanga;
IsiXeko Esitsha saseYerusalem saphinda safunyanwa ngoFebruwari 24, 1949 ebudeni beMfazwe Yombindi Mpuma yaphinda yafunyanwa kwakhona emva kokuba “iMfazwe Yeentsuku Ezintandathu” yaphela ngoJuni 5, 1967;

4 Ilizwe lakwaSirayeli kunye nePalestine, ngenxa yokuba " iYerusalem "Imiba yobunini idla ngokubandakanya ukusetyenziswa kwezixhobo. Ngo-2021, i-Israel iya kuba yenye yezona zixhobo ezinamandla kakhulu kuMbindi Mpuma ngokubhekiselele kumkhosi wezomkhosi kunye nelizwe, uqoqosho, iteknoloji kunye neemeko zokuphila ezisisiseko.
ngoku( Udonga Olulila ) Indawo evulekileyo yebala kulapho amaSirayeli athandaza khona, aguquka, akhala, aze akhalaze kuThixo sele egxothiwe iminyaka engaphezu kwewaka ngoku abuyele kwilizwe lawo yaye anombulelo. Uya kuba phakathi kolwandle nentaba engcwele yobuqaqawuli Misela Ufana nebhotwe umnquba ; kanti ke kwakufika isiphelo sakhe, akukho bani uya kukwazi ukumnceda. ” Daniyeli 11:45

→→Kutyhilwa aboni abakhulu nabachasene nomthetho Ehleli endlwini kaThixo (2 Tesalonika 2:3-4)

Baya kuwunyathela umzi ongcwele Iinyanga ezingamashumi amane anesibini. Imbekiselo ( ISityhilelo 11:1-2 )

(6) Abantu emhlabeni wonke balandela irhamncwa baze bafumane uphawu lwerhamncwa ezandleni okanye emabunzini abo (666) —Funda iSityhilelo 13:16-18

Phawula: ngaphezulu (6 uphawu ) zihlobene neYerusalem” Indawo engcwele kaThixo "Inxulumene, ukusuka kwi-AD 70 ( Itempile itshatyalalisiwe ) de kwangowama-2022, xa uSirayeli wabuyiselwa kurhulumente ngowe-1948, naseYerusalem emhlabeni namhlanje, amaSirayeli kuphela ( Udonga Olulila )......!

buza: Ngubani umoni omkhulu?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

impendulo: " unyana wentshabalalo "Abo bawexukileyo kwaye bavukela unqulo →" Shiya iTao Oko kukuthi, ngaphandle kwelizwi lenyaniso, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso; ngokuchasene nonqulo “Oko kukuchasa, ukuthintela, kunye nokuchasa iBandla likaYesu Krestu.

2 Nyana bobukreqo, nyana bomsindo;

buza: Yintoni unyana wokungathobeli?
impendulo: " unyana wokungathobeli ” libhekisela kwimimoya engendawo elawula izithethe zeli hlabathi nehamba esibhakabhakeni.
Ngokomzekelo, iyakubhida ngokuphathelele “imithendeleko neeholide zokubhiyozelwa, ukunqula izithixo, nokuba nenxaxheba kumasiko nemisebenzi yeli hlabathi.

buza: Ngubani idemon ene-aura emoyeni?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi
1 Abo balawulayo ,
2 abo banegunya ,
3 Umlawuli weli hlabathi lobumnyama ,
4 noomoya abakhohlakeleyo kwezasezulwini iindawo .

Ndinawo amazwi okugqibela: Yomelelani eNkosini nasemandleni ayo. Xhobani sonke isikrweqe sikaThixo, ukuze nibe nako ukumisa nibuchase ubuqhinga boMtyholi. Ngokuba umzamo wethu asingowokuzamana negazi nenyama; ngowokuzamana nazo izilawuli, nawo amagunya, nazo iziphatha-hlabathi zobumnyama balo eli phakade, nayo imimoya ekhohlakeleyo kwezasezulwini iindawo. buza: Zaziziphi iziprofeto ezathethwa ngumprofeti uDaniyeli?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

(1) Iiveki ezingamashumi asixhenxe

UDaniyeli 9:24 “Bamiselwe iiveki ezimashumi asixhenxe abantu bakowenu nesixeko sakowenu esingcwele, ukuba kupheliswe isikreqo, kupheliswe isono, kucanyagushelwe isono, kungeniswe ubomi obungunaphakade. ubulungisa, ukutywina kwemibono neziprofeto, nokuthanjiswa koyiNgcwele (okanye: okanye ukuguqulelwa) .

buza: Mingaphi iminyaka iiveki ezingamashumi asixhenxe?
impendulo: 70×7=490(iminyaka)

BC 520 Unyaka → Iqalisa ukwakha kwakhona itempile,
B.C. 445-443 Unyaka →Iindonga zeYerusalem zaphinda zakhiwa,

Reference Bible Almanac: Iziprofeto ezathethwa ngumprofeti uDaniyeli zazisusela kwixesha lika-AD unyaka wokuqala ), uYesu Krestu wazalwa, uYesu wabhaptizwa, uYesu washumayela ivangeli yobukumkani bamazulu, uYesu wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni, wafa, wangcwatywa, wavuka ngomhla wesithathu, waza uYesu wanyukela ezulwini! (2)Isixhenxe ezisixhenxe

【Ukwakhiwa kwakhona kweTempile kunye noKumkani othanjisiweyo】

UDaniyeli [Isahluko 9:25] Yazi uze uqonde ukuba ukususela kwixesha lokuphuma komyalelo wokuba ibuye yakhiwe iYerusalem de kube sekupheleni. UKumkani othanjisiweyo Kufuneka kubekho ixesha Zisixhenxe ezisixhenxe, namashumi amathandathu anesibini anesixhenxe . Ngeli xesha leenkathazo isixeko saseYerusalem siya kwakhiwa kwakhona, kuquka izitrato neenqaba zayo.

buza: Mingaphi iminyaka esixhenxe isixhenxe?

1 Sebenza iintsuku ezintandathu, uphumle ngomhla wesixhenxe
2 Iminyaka emithandathu yokulima, nomnyaka wesixhenxe wokuphumla

articles.content:
Uxolo kubazalwana noodade bam abathandekayo kwintsapho kaThixo! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibhile yethu kuMateyu isahluko 24 indinyana 3 size sifunde kunye: Njengoko uYesu wayehleli eNtabeni yemiNquma, abafundi bakhe bathetha bodwa besithi, “Sixelele ukuba zenzeke nini na ezi zinto? Uyintoni na umqondiso wokufika kwakho, nowokupheliswa kwephakade eli? "

Namhlanje sizakufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane kunye "Imiqondiso Yokubuya KukaYesu" Hayi. 1 Thetha kwaye wenze umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, Nkosi yethu uYesu Krestu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Umfazi onesidima【 ecaweni 】Thuma abasebenzi: ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo ezandleni zabo, elithethwa ngabo, eliziindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso, zozuko, nentlawulelo yemizimba yethu. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumlo yethu kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni: Bonke abantwana mabayiqonde imiqondiso yokuza kweNkosi uYesu Krestu kwaye baphaphe kwaye balumke Chitha ixesha lakho eliseleyo emhlabeni! Amen.

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

(7) IBandla laseLawodike

→Ububele, usisityebi ngemali, sele usisityebi, uhlala kakuhle ngenxa yeemeko zoqoqosho, icawa enabantu abaninzi abazizityebi →Kodwa abazi ukuba “” ubomi bomoya “Bangamahlwempu, balusizana, bangamahlwempu, abaziimfama, nabahamba ze. Abazange bambathe umntu omtsha baze bambathe uKristu. Ngokomzekelo, iCawa yamaKatolika yaseVatican namhlanje, kunye neecawa ezininzi ezifumileyo eYurophu naseMelika ziicawa zaseLawodike.

3. Ukusekwa kweCawe

(1)Ilitye lembombo

buza: Yintoni ilitye lembombo?
impendulo: Kumaxesha amandulo, xa kwakusakhiwa nasekwakhiweni kwezindlu, "amatye embombo kunye namatye" ayesetyenziswa njengesiseko sokuqala sokuzinzisa indlu.
Kuba singabasebenzi kunye noThixo; nina niyintsimi kaThixo, nesakhiwo sakhe. Ngokobabalo lukaThixo endababalwa ngalo, ndithi, ngokomsebenzi osisilumko, ndibeke ilitye lesiseko, athi ke abanye bakhe phezu kwalo; Imbekiselo ( 1 Korinte 3:9-10 )

[UYesu Krestu] nguye ilitye lembombo

1 KwabaseKorinte 3:11 Kuba akukho namnye unokubeka litye limbi lesiseko, nxamnye nelo, liselibekiwe kade, linguYesu onguKristu.
nakhelwe phezu kwesiseko sabapostile nabaprofeti, inguYesu Kristu ngokwakhe ilitye lembombo (Efese 2:20).

(2) Ilitye, iliwa lokomoya

Matthew 16:18 Nam ke, ndithi kuwe, UnguPetros wena;

buza: Icawe yakhelwe kweli litye →Lithetha ukuthini ilitye?
impendulo: " iliwa ” ithetha UKrestu

Phawula: " iliwa ” akabhekiseli kumatye asemhlabeni;
Ilitye lomoya elivela ezulwini →“ iliwa lomoya ” → loo nto Ulwalwa nguKristu ! Amen.
Bonke babhaptizelwa kuMoses efini naselwandle; Into ababeyisela yayiphuma kwiliwa lomoya elalibalandela; Elo litye nguKristu . Imbekiselo ( 1 Korinte 10:2-4 )

(3) Abapostile, abaprofeti nabangcwele bakhelwe phezu kolwalwa

buza: AmaKristu akhelwe njani phezu kwesiseko?
impendulo: Kuba samsebenzisa kabini ( usindiso emnqamlezweni kaKristu ) wayephefumlelwe nguMoya oyiNgcwele ( Sela amanzi omoya afanayo → Uzelwe ngamanzi noMoya oyiNgcwele ), yiba nokufikelela kuBawo. Ngoko ke anisengabasemzini nabasemzini; ningabemi kunye nabangcwele, namalungu endlu kaThixo, nakhelwe phezu kwesiseko sabapostile nabaprofeti, inguKristu Yesu ngokwakhe ilitye lembombo; idityaniswe ngokufanelekileyo kwaye ngokuthe ngcembe iba yitempile yeNkosi. nani nakhelwe ndawonye kuye, ukuze nibe yindawo yokuhlala kaThixo ngoMoya oyiNgcwele. Imbekiselo ( Efese 2:18-22 )

4 Ibandla ngumzimba wakhe

(1)Ibandla ngumzimba wakhe
KWABASE-EFESE 1:23 Ibandla lingumzimba wakhe, ukuzala ke oko kozizalisayo izinto zonke kubo bonke.

(2) Uyintloko yebandla
KwabaseKolose 1:15-18 UNyana oyintanda ungumfanekiselo kaThixo ongenakubonwa, owamazibulo kwindalo yonke. Ngokuba zadalelwa kuye zonke izinto, nokuba zisemazulwini, nokuba zisemhlabeni, ezinokubonwa nezingenakubonwa, nokuba ziitrone, nokuba zibubukhosi, nokuba zizilawuli, nokuba ngamagunya, zadalelwa yena. Yena ke ungaphambi kweento zonke, nazo zonke izinto zima zimi kuye. Yena uyintloko yomzimba webandla. Uyingqalo, owaqalayo ukuvuka kwabafileyo, ukuze abe ngomkhulu ezintweni zonke.

5 Thina singamalungu omzimba wayo

(1) Nina ningamalungu omzimba wayo

1 KWABASEKORINTE 12:27 Nina ningumzimba kaKristu, yaye elowo kuni lilungu.

(2)Singamathambo nenyama yomzimba wakhe

KWABASE-EFESE 5:30 Kuba singamalungu omzimba wayo (izinye izibhalo zongeza: amathambo akhe nenyama yakhe).

buza: Sazi njani ukuba singamathambo akhe nenyama yakhe?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

1 UYesu wavuswa kwabafileyo → umzimba womoya (1 Korinte 15:44)
2 Umzimba womoya ubonakala → unenyama namathambo ( Luka 24:38-39 )
3 thina ( khangela ) umzimba obonakalayo → lithambo nenyama ka-Adam
4 thina ( khangela )Umzimba ongekhoyo → lithambo nenyama kaYesu
5 Umzimba ovuswe kunye noKrestu → ngumzimba womoya
6 Uzelwe nguThixo, umzimba womoya → ufihlwe noKristu kuThixo (Kolose 3:3)
7 UKristu uya kubonakala kwakhona → Imizimba yethu yokomoya iya kubonakala kwaye ibonakale kunye noKristu ebuqaqawulini! Amen

6. Umanyano lwebandla kunye nokusekwa komzimba kaKristu

buza: Ungawakha njani umzimba kaKristu?
impendulo: Ukumanyana elukholweni, umanyano lwecawe lumanyano lomzimba kaKristu →→ Sebenzisa iqhina loxolo omnye komnye, nizabalazele ukugcina ubunye bentliziyo obunikelwa nguMoya oyiNgcwele. Mnye umzimba, mnye noMoya, njengokuba nabizelwa thembeni linye. Inye iNkosi, lunye ukholo, lunye ubhaptizo; …Wabanika abanye abapostile, abanye abaprofeti, abanye abashumayeli, abanye abalusi nabafundisi, ukuze abangcwele bawuxhobele umsebenzi wobulungiseleli, ukwakhiwa komzimba kaKristu, side sonke sifikelele kubunye bokholo. UNyana kaThixo, enziwe waba ngumntu ofezekileyo, efikelele kwinzaliseko yokuzala kukaKristu,...esuka ethetha inyaniso eluthandweni, akhule ezintweni zonke kuye lowo uyiNtloko, uKristu, ekuphuma kuye uKristu ukuba aphelele. Umzimba umanyene, umsebenzi wawo wonke ube ngolungelelwano. Ngokusebenzisana ngokusebenza komzimba ngamnye, umzimba uyakhula, wakheke eluthandweni. Imbekiselo ( Efese 4, indinyana 3-6, 11-13, 15-16 )

7. Icawe yintombi kaKrestu

Kwabase-Efese 5:30-32 Ngokuba singamalungu omzimba wayo (izinye izibhalo zongeza: amathambo akhe nenyama yakhe). Ngenxa yoko ke, indoda yomshiya uyise nonina, inamathele kumkayo, baze abo babini babe nyama-nye. Loo mfihlelo inkulu, ke mna ndithetha ndisingisele kuKristu, ndisingisele kulo ibandla.

Phawula: IBandla liganelwe nguYesu Krestu,” umakoti "Ibhekisela kumfazi kaYesu ongatshatanga, oyintombi enyulu. Intombi enyulu iyakhula → " ube yintombazana entle ” Oko kukuthi, uvuko lomzimba omhle ngakumbi → Xa uKristu ebuya ukuza kuthabatha umfazi, ulibandla ! Amen

【 Itywina loMoya oyiNgcwele 】

→→Luphawu lukaYesu Kristu lothando kumtshakazi wakhe ( umsesane wokuthethathethana ): Ndicela undigcine entliziyweni yakho njengetywina ( Itywina loMoya oyiNgcwele ), yinxibe engalweni yakho njengesitampu. Kuba uthando lunjengokufa, ikhwele liyingcwangu; Uthando alunakucinywa ngamanzi amaninzi, alunakurhaxwa zizikhukula. Ukuba nabani na utshintshisa bonke ubutyebi bentsapho yakhe ngothando, uya kuba yinto engento. Imbekiselo ( INgoma yazo iiNgoma 8:6-7 )

8. ISidlo sangokuhlwa soMsitho weMvana

【 uYesu Krestu utshata icawe 】

Ndaza ndeva ngathi sisandi sesihlwele, isandi samanzi amaninzi, nesandi sokududuma okukhulu, sisithi: “Haleluya! kuba, Ixesha lomtshato weMvana lifikile; , Nanikwa ubabalo ukuba nambathiswe ilinen ecikizekileyo, eqaqambileyo, emhlophe. (Ilinen ecikizekileyo bubulungisa babangcwele.) Sathi kum isithunywa, Bhala uthi, Banoyolo abo bamenyelwe kwisidlo somtshato weMvana ” ( ISityhilelo 19:6-9 )

Umbhalo weVangeli osuka ku:

ibandla leNkosi uYesu Krestu

Aba ngabantu abangcwele abahlala bodwa, ababalelwa phakathi kwezizwe.
Njenge-144,000 yeentombi ezinyulu ezilandela iNkosi iMvana.

Amen!

→→Ndimbona esencotsheni nasendulini;
Aba ngabantu abahlala bodwa, ababalelwa ezizweni zonke.
INumeri 23:9
Ngabasebenzi eNkosini uYesu Krestu: UMzalwana uWang*Yun, uDade uLiu, uDade uZheng, uMzalwana uCen... kunye nabanye abasebenzi abawuxhasa ngenzondelelo umsebenzi wevangeli ngokunikela ngemali nangokusebenza nzima, kunye nabanye abangcwele abasebenza nathi abakholwayo. ezi ndaba zilungileyo, amagama abo abhalwe encwadini yobomi. Amen! Imbekiselo kwabaseFilipi 4:3

Iculo: Mhle ekuseni

Wamkele abazalwana noodade abaninzi ukukhangela ngebrawuza yakho - ibandla leNkosi uYesu Krestu -Cofa Khuphela . qokelela .

Qhagamshelana ne-QQ 2029296379 okanye 869026782

KULUNGILE! Namhlanje siyafunda, sinxulumana, kwaye sabelane umamkeli IBandla elikuYesu Kristu! Yiya apha. Ubabalo lweNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, nothando lukaThixo uYise, nokuphefumlelwa koMoya oyiNgcwele, malube nani nonke. Amen

articles.title: Usindiso Lomphefumlo (Isifundo 7)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubazalwana noodade bam abathandekayo kwintsapho kaThixo! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile yethu kweyoku-1 kwabaseKorinte 12, indinyana 10, size sifunde kunye: Wanika umntu omnye amandla okwenza imimangaliso, umprofeti, ukucalula oomoya, ukuthetha ngeelwimi, nokutolika iilwimi.

Namhlanje sizakufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane kunye "Usindiso Lwemiphefumlo" Hayi. 7 Thetha kwaye wenze umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, Nkosi yethu uYesu Krestu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Umfazi onesidima [ibandla] uthumela abasebenzi: ngezandla zabo babhala kwaye bathetha ilizwi lenyaniso, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwethu, uzuko lwethu, nentlawulelo yemizimba yethu. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumlo yethu kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni: Cela iNkosi ukuba inike bonke abantwana bakho zonke izipho zomoya → ukukwazi ukucalula imimoya ! Amen.

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

1. UMoya kaBawo oseZulwini

(1) Bawo wabo bonke oomoya

UBawo wethu osezulwini usoloko esiqeqesha okwexeshana ngokokuthanda kwakhe; ( Hebhere 12:10 )

buza: abantu abangamawaka alishumi ( umoya ) ivela kubani?
impendulo: Ivela kuBawo →Yonke into ezelweyo okanye edaliweyo iphuma kuMoya kaThixo! Amen

buza: Uyintoni umoya ozelweyo?
impendulo: UMoya woNyana kaYise unguMoya ozelweyo
Kuzo zonke iingelosi, yiyiphi angazange athi kuyo uThixo: “UnguNyana wam wena, Mna ndikuzele namhla”? Yiyiphi asalatha kuyo aze athi: “Mna ndiya kuba nguYise, yena abe ngunyana wam”? Imbekiselo ( Hebhere 1:5 )

buza: Wathi kubani na uThixo, Ungunyana wam?
impendulo: UAdam —Funda uLuka 3:38
UAdam wangaphambili wadalwa ngokomfanekiselo nangokufana noThixo → ngoko ke uAdam “ Isithunzi "→Owokugqibela uAdam nguAdam wokuqala" Isithunzi "Umzimba wokwenyani, Ying'er umzimba wokwenyani bonakalisa → oko kukuthi UAdam wokugqibela nguYesu , uYesu nguNyana kaThixo! Amen
Babhaptizwa bonke abantu, waza uYesu wabhaptizwa. Ndithe ndithandaza, lavuleka izulu; uMoya oyiNgcwele kwabakho nezwi eliphuma ezulwini, lisithi: Wena ungunyana wam oyintanda, ndivuyiswa nguwe . (Funda uLuka 3:21-22.)

(2) UMoya kuBawo oseZulwini

buza: Umoya kuBawo oseZulwini →Yintoni uMoya?
impendulo : Umoya kaThixo, uMoya kaYehova, uMoya oyiNgcwele, uMoya wenyaniso! Amen.
Kothi, akufika uMthetheleli, endiya kumthuma kuBawo, uMoya wenyaniso, ophuma kuBawo, wongqina ngam. Imbekiselo ( Yohane 15:26 )

2. Umoya kaYesu

buza: Uyintoni umoya okuYesu?
impendulo: Umoya kaYise, uMoya kaThixo, uMoya Oyingcwele! Amen.
Babhaptizwa bonke abantu, waza uYesu wabhaptizwa. Ndithe ndithandaza, lavuleka izulu; UMoya oyiNgcwele wehla phezu kwakhe , kwabakho nelizwi eliphuma ezulwini, lisithi: Wena ungunyana wam oyintanda, ndivuyiswa nguwe . ( Luka 3:21-22 )

3. Umoya Oyingcwele

buza: Umoya kuBawo oseZulwini →Yintoni uMoya?
impendulo: Moya oyiNgcwele!

buza: Umoya okuYesu →Yintoni uMoya?
impendulo: Kwakhona Moya oyiNgcwele!

buza: Ungumoya kabani uMoya oyiNgcwele?
impendulo: NguMoya kaBawo waseZulwini kunye noMoya woNyana oyintanda uYesu!

【 uMoya oyiNgcwele 】 Ewe UMoya kaYise, uMoya kaThixo, uMoya kaYehova, uMoya woNyana oyintanda uYesu, noMoya kaKristu zonke zivela → “kumoya omnye” kuMoya Oyingcwele!
1 KwabaseKorinte 6:17 Ke onamathele eNkosini Yibani moya mnye neNkosi . Ngaba uYesu wayemanyene noYise? babe! Kunene! UYesu wathi → Mna ndikuBawo yaye uBawo ukum → Mna noBawo sibanye. (UYohane 10:30)
Njengoko kubhaliwe kwathiwa →Mnye umzimba, mnye noMoya, njengokuba nabizelwa thembeni linye. Inye iNkosi, lunye ukholo, lunye ubhaptizo; Imbekiselo ( Efese 4:4-6 ). Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

4. Umoya ka-Adam

Ilizwi leNkosi ngoSirayeli. Utsho uYehova, uManeki wezulu, uMzinzisi weziseko zehlabathi, uMenzi womoya phakathi kwabantu; (Zekariya 12:1)
buza: Ngubani owadala umntu ngaphakathi →( umoya )?
impendulo: Yehova!
buza: UYehova uThixo akangomntu jikelele ( nomsindo ) emathatheni ka-Adam? Ngaloo ndlela, umoya okuye asingoThixo.” ekrwada "? Genesis 2:7
impendulo: vuthela" nomsindo "Waba ngumntu ophilayo onomoya ("umoya" okanye "umoya") igazi ”) → umoya ka-Adam ngu ( igazi ) umntu ophilayo.
(1) Umzimba ka-Adam → wenziwe ngothuli (Funda iGenesis 2:7.)
(2) Umoya ka-Adam → wadalwa kwakhona (Funda uZekariya 12:1.)
(3) Umphefumlo ka-Adam → wendalo (Funda eyoku-1 kwabaseKorinte 15:44.)
Ngoko uAdam" umzimba womphefumlo Zonke zidalwe nguThixo!
Phawula:
1 Ukuba uAdam" umoya "Ibiyi wazalwa umoya, ngoko ngaphakathi kwakhe" umoya ” kwanoMoya weNkosi, uMoya kaYesu, uMoya oyiNgcwele → akayi kuba “ inyoka “Umtyholi uSathana woyisiwe, ( Igazi ) umphefumlo awuyi kuba nabala.
2 Ukuba uAdam umoya ukuba wazalwa umoya, inzala yakhe ikwangumoya kaYehova, umoya kaYesu, uMoya oyiNgcwele uThixo akawuthobi; umoya ) kwinzala ka-Adam → INumeri 11:17 apho ndiya kuza ndithethe nawe, ndithethe nawe. banikeni uMoya ophuma phezu kwenu; , baya kwabelana nawe ngale mbopheleleko ibalulekileyo yokunyamekela abantu, ukuze ungathwali wedwa. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

5. Umoya wabantwana bakaThixo

(1) Umzimba wabantwana bakaThixo

buza: Abo bazelwe ngokwenyama bangoonyana bakaThixo na?
impendulo: bazelwe yinyama Hayi Abantwana bakaThixo (KwabaseRoma 9:8)

Kuphela
1 Bazalwa ngamanzi nanguMoya ,
2 Nizelwe inyaniso yeendaba ezilungileyo,
3 Bazalwa nguThixo → Umzimba womoya ungumntwana kaThixo , bhekisela kweyoku- 1 kwabaseKorinte 15:44

(2) Igazi labantwana bakaThixo

buza: Abantwana abazelwe yinyama → "ngaphakathi" Igazi "Ligazi likabani?"
impendulo: Ngokakhokho ka-Adam" Igazi ", icwecwe" inyoka "Ingcolisiwe Igazi ;

buza: abantwana bakaThixo ( Igazi )gazi likabani?
Impendulo: kaKristu Igazi ! Umsulwa, ungenabala, ungcwele Igazi ! Amen →→Ngegazi elinqabileyo likaKristu, njengelemvana engenasiphako nasiphako. ( 1 Petros 1:19 )

(3) Umoya wabantwana bakaThixo

buza: Umoya ozelwe yinyama →Ngumoya kabani?
impendulo: Umoya ka-Adam ngumntu ophilayo wenyama negazi!

buza: Umoya Wabantwana BakaThixo → Ngumoya Kabani?
Impendulo: UMoya kaBawo waseZulwini, uMoya kaThixo, uMoya kaYesu, noMoya oyiNgcwele! Amen. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?
Ukuba ke uMoya kaThixo uhleli kuni, aningabo abenyama, koko ningabeMoya. Ukuba umntu akanaye uMoya kaKristu, akangokaKristu lowo. Imbekiselo ( Roma 8:9 )

6 Ukufezekisa imiphefumlo yamalungisa

buza: Kuyintoni na ukugqibelelisa umphefumlo welungisa?
impendulo: UYESU khristu( umphefumlo ) emva kokuba umsebenzi wokukhulula ugqityiwe, wathi: " Ugqibile ! "Wathoba intloko yakhe, Wunike uThixo umphefumlo wakho . Imbekiselo ( Yohane 19:30 )

buza: Ngoobani abalungisa imiphefumlo yamalungisa?
impendulo: Xa babephila ngokwasemzimbeni, ngenxa yokuba ( ileta ) Abantu abagwetyelwa nguThixo → Njengoko kubhaliwe kwiTestamente eNdala, baquka: uAbheli, uEnoki, uNowa, uAbraham, uLote, uIsake, uYakobi, uYosefu, uMoses, uGidiyon, uBharaki, uHam unyana, uYifeta, uDavide, uSamuweli, kunye nabaprofeti ... njl. " itestamente endala “Xa babedla ubomi, ngenxa yokuba ( ileta wagwetyelwa nguThixo,” ITestamente Entsha “Ngokufa kukaYesu Kristu ngenxa yezono zethu, ukungcwatywa kwakhe, nokuvuka kwakhe ngomhla wesithathu, umphefumlo ) Umsebenzi wentlawulelo wagqitywa →→ amangcwaba avulwa, yaza imizimba emininzi yabangcwele ababelele yavuswa. Emva kokuba uYesu evusiwe, baphuma engcwabeni baza bangena kwisixeko esingcwele baza babonakala kubantu abaninzi. Imbekiselo ( Mateyu 27:52-53 )

7. Umoya osindisiweyo

buza: Yintoni imimoya esindisiweyo?
impendulo: 1 Umzekelo, ngexesha likaNowa kumaxesha amandulo kwiTestamente eNdala, ngaphandle kwamalungu asibhozo osapho lukaNowa abangena emkhombeni, imizimba yabo yagwetywa yaza yatshatyalaliswa ngonogumbe, kodwa (imiphefumlo) yabo yasinda ngokukholelwa kwivangeli →→( UYesu ) awathi ngayo wahamba waya kushumayela koomoya abasentolongweni, abo bangazange bamthobele uThixo ngoxa uNowa wayelungisa umkhombe yaye uThixo walinda ngomonde. Ngelo xesha, akubangakho baninzi bangena emkhombeni, basindiswa emanzini, isibhozo kuphela...Ngenxa yoko zashunyayelwa iindaba ezilungileyo nabafileyo, ukuze bagwetywe ngokwenyama; Ubomi babo bokomoya buxhomekeke kuThixo . Imbekiselo ( 1 Petros isahluko 3 indinyana 19-20 neyesi-4 indinyana 6 )

2 Kwabakho nemeko yabantu abakrexezayo kwibandla laseKorinte, oko kukuthi, umntu owamkela unina wesibini "uPawulos" wathi →Umntu onjalo ufanele anikelwe kuSathana ukuze onakalise inyama yakhe. ukuze umphefumlo wakhe usindiswe ngemini yeNkosi uYesu . Imbekiselo ( 1 Korinte 5:5 ).

Phawula : Umphefumlo osindisiweyo apha → usindisiwe nje, ngaphandle kozuko, umvuzo okanye isithsaba. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

8. Umoya weNgelosi

buza: Ngaba iingelosi zadalwa nguThixo?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

1 Umyezo wase-Eden eZulwini →UThixo wadala iingelosi
2 Umyezo wase-Eden emhlabeni → UThixo wadala uAdam

Ubuse-Eden, uvathiswe zonke iintlobo zamatye anqabileyo: iirubhi, iirubhi, iidayimani, iibherilo, iibherilo, iiyaspisi, iisafire, iirubhi, iirubhi, iirubhi, igolide , bonke bakhona mhla wadalwa Kulungiswe kakuhle. ( Hezekile 28:13 )

buza: Ngaba iingelosi zinokubonwa ngeliso lomntu?
impendulo: Amehlo omntu angabona kuphela izinto ezisemhlabeni, imizimba yeengelosi →Ewe umzimba womoya , engabonakali emehlweni ethu. Umzimba womoya wengelosi uyavela kwaye unokubonwa kuphela ngamehlo abantu. Kanye njengokuba intombi enyulu uMariya yabona ingelosi uGabriyeli eyayivakalisa esi sibhengezo, baza abalusi babona zonke iingelosi ekuzalweni kukaKrestu → Kanye njengokuba umzimba womoya kaKristu wovuko wabonakala, bonke abafundi bayawubona, uKristu wenyukela ezulwini! Bonke bayibona ingelosi eyayibaphathele iindaba ezilungileyo. Jonga kwiZenzo 1:10-11

buza: Ngoobani iingelosi kuMyezo wase-Eden?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

1 uMikayeli → Imele isiphatha-zingelosi esilwayo ( Daniyeli 12:1 )
2 UGabriyeli →Imele ingelosi ezisa iindaba ezilungileyo (Luka 1:26)
3 Lusifa → Ifanekisela ukudumisa iingelosi ( Isaya 14:11-12 )

(1)Ingelosi ewayo

buza: Ngubani ingelosi ewileyo?
impendulo: ULusifa →uLusifa
“Owu nkwenkwezi, Nyana wesifingo, yini na ukuba uwe ezulwini? Kutheni na, wena mnqobi weentlanga, ugalelwe emhlabeni?

buza: Zingaphi iingelosi ezamlandela "uLusifa" zawa?
impendulo: Isahlulo sesithathu sezithunywa zezulu sawa
Kwabonakala omnye umbono ezulwini: inamba enkulu ebomvu, ineentloko ezisixhenxe neempondo ezilishumi, kwiintloko zayo ezisixhenxe izizithsaba ezisixhenxe. Umsila wayo warhuqela isahlulo sesithathu seenkwenkwezi esibhakabhakeni waza waziphosa emhlabeni. ...Reference (ISityhilelo 12:3-4)

buza: "Khwezi eliqaqambileyo, Nyana woKusa" Emva kokuwa kukaLusifa →Ngubani igama lakhe?
impendulo: Inamba, inamba enkulu ebomvu, inyoka yakudala, ebizwa ngokuba nguMtyholi, okwabizwa ngokuba nguSathana, uBhelezebhubhe, ukumkani weedemon, uBhelezebhule, indoda yesono, umchasi-Kristu. .

Ndabona isithunywa sezulu, sisihla siphuma emazulwini, sinesitshixo senzonzobila, nomxokelelwane omkhulu esandleni saso. Yayibamba inamba, inyoka yakudala, leyo ekwabizwa ngokuba nguSathana, yaza yayibopha iminyaka eliwaka ( ISityhilelo 20:1-2 )

(2)Umoya wengelosi ewileyo

buza: Umoya wengelosi ewileyo →Ngumoya onjani?
impendulo: Umoya kasathana, umoya ongcolileyo, umoya wenkohliso, umoya womchasi-Kristu .
Bangoomoya beedemon, abenza imisebenzi emangalisayo, abaphuma baye kubo bonke ookumkani behlabathi, ukuba babuthelane ndawonye emfazweni ngemini enkulu kaThixo, uSomandla. ( ISityhilelo 16:14 )

(3) Imimoya ewileyo yesinye kwisithathu sezithunywa zezulu

buza: Umoya owileyo wesinye kwisithathu seengelosi →Ngumoya onjani?
impendulo: Kwakhona imimoya yeedemon, imimoya engcolileyo, imimoya engcolileyo .
Ndabona kuphuma oomoya abangcolileyo abathathu, befana namasele, bephuma emlonyeni wenamba, nasemlonyeni werhamncwa, nasemlonyeni womprofeti wobuxoki. ( ISityhilelo 16:13 )

(4) Umchasi-Kristu, umoya womprofeti wobuxoki

buza: Ungawubona njani umoya wabaprofeti bobuxoki?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

Ilizwi elaphuma emlonyeni wabo →

articles.content:
Uxolo kubazalwana noodade bam abathandekayo kwintsapho kaThixo! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile yethu kweyoku-1 kwabaseKorinte 15 nakwindinyana 44 size sifunde kunye: Uhlwayelwa umzimba wenyama, kuvuka umzimba womoya. Ukuba kukho umzimba wenyama, kukwafuneka nokuba nomzimba ongowomoya.

Namhlanje sizakufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane kunye "Usindiso Lwemiphefumlo" Hayi. 6 Thetha kwaye wenze umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, Nkosi yethu uYesu Krestu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Umfazi onesidima [ibandla] uthuma abasebenzi: ngalo ilizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo, elabelane ngalo ngezandla zabo, eliziendaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwethu, ezozuko lwethu, nokukhulula umzimba wethu ngentlawulelo. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumlo yethu kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni: Masikholelwe ivangeli kwaye sizuze umphefumlo nomzimba kaYesu! Amen .

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

Oonyana neentombi ezizelwe nguThixo

---Fumana uMzimba kaKristu---

1 Kholwa, uhlale noKristu

buza: Njani( ileta ) evuswe kunye noKristu?
impendulo: Ukuba simanywe naye ngemfano yokufa kwakhe, siya kumanyaniswa naye ngemfano yokuvuka kwakhe ( Roma 6:5 )

buza: Indlela yokudibanisa naye ngokwasemzimbeni?
impendulo: Umzimba kaKristu ujinga phezu kweenkuni,

( ileta ) Umzimba wam ujinga phezu kweenkuni,
( ileta Umzimba kaKristu ngumzimba wam,
( ileta Xa uKrestu wafayo, umzimba wam wesono wafa.
→→oku Mmanye naye kwimo yokufa ! Amen
( ileta + Ukungcwatywa kukaKrestu ngokwasemzimbeni kukungcwatywa kwam ngokwasemzimbeni.
( ileta ) Uvuko lomzimba kaKristu luvuko lomzimba wam.
→→oku ukumanyana naye kwimo yovuko ! Amen
Ngoko, uyayiqonda?
Ukuba sifa kunye noKrestu, siyakholwa ukuba sodla ubomi kunye naye. Imbekiselo ( Roma 6:8 )

2 UKrestu wavuka kwabafileyo waza wasenza ngokutsha

buza: Sizalwa njani ngokutsha?
impendulo: Kholwa yivangeli → Qonda inyani!

1 Bazalwa ngamanzi nanguMoya ——Funda uYohane 3:5
2 Nizelwe enyanisweni yeendaba ezilungileyo —Funda eyoku-1 kwabaseKorinte 4:15
3 Bazalwa nguThixo —Funda uYohane 1:12-13
Makabongwe uThixo, uYise weNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Ngokwenceba yakhe enkulu, uye wasivelisa ngokutsha ukuba sibe nethemba eliphilayo ngokuvuka kukaYesu Kristu kwabafileyo ( 1 Petros 1:3 .

3. Uvuko ngumzimba womoya

buza: Sivuswe kunye noKristu umzimba wenyama Uvuko?
impendulo: Uvuko lunjalo umzimba womoya ; Hayi uvuko lwasemzimbeni .

Uhlwayelwa umzimba wenyama, kuvuka umzimba womoya. Ukuba kukho umzimba wenyama, kukwafuneka nokuba nomzimba ongowomoya. Imbekiselo ( 1 Korinte 15:44 )

buza: Yintoni umzimba womoya?
Impendulo: Umzimba kaKristu → ngumzimba womoya!

buza: Ngaba umzimba kaKristu wahlukile kuthi?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

1 uKristu ngu ( indlela ) sisuke saba yinyama;
2 uKristu ngu ( uthixo saba yinyama;
3 uKristu ngu ( umoya Thina siyinyama negazi
4 umzimba kaKristu Ukungafi Imizimba yethu ibona ukubola
5 umzimba kaKristu Ukungaboni kufa Imizimba yethu ibona ukufa.

buza: Siphi ngoku sinemizimba yethu evusiweyo ekwimo kaKristu?
Impendulo: Ezintliziyweni zethu! Imiphefumlo yethu kunye nemizimba yethu ifihliwe kunye noKristu kuThixo →UMoya oyiNgcwele uyangqina ngeentliziyo zethu ukuba singabantwana bakaThixo. Amen! Bhekisela kumaRoma 8:16 nakwabaseKolose 3:3

buza: Kutheni singenakuwubona umzimba ozelwe nguThixo?
impendulo: Umzimba wethu ovusiweyo kunye noKristu → Ewe umzimba womoya thina ( indoda endala ) iliso leze andiboni ( Umntu omtsha ) umzimba womoya.

Njengoko umpostile uPawulos wathi → Ke ngoko, asityhafi. ( ebonakalayo ) Nangona umzimba wangaphandle utshatyalalisiwe, umzimba wangaphakathi ( intsha engabonakaliyo ) ihlaziywa imihla ngemihla. Iintlungu zethu zomzuzwana nezikhaphukhaphu ziya kusisebenzela ubunzima banaphakade bozuko olungenakuthelekiswa nanto. Kuyavela ukuba asiyiyo le nto yabonwa nguGu Nian ( Umzimba ), kodwa ukukhathalela oko kungabonwayo ( umzimba womoya kuba oko kubonwayo kokwexeshana ( ); Ekugqibeleni umzimba uya kubuyela eluthulini ), into engabonakaliyo ( umzimba womoya ) unaphakade. Ngoko, uyayiqonda? Imbekiselo ( 2 Korinte 4:16-18 )

buza: kwakutheni ukuze abapostile iliso leze Umzimba kaYesu ovusiweyo obonakalayo?
impendulo: Umzimba ovusiweyo kaYesu unjalo umzimba womoya →Umzimba wokomoya kaYesu awupheleliselwanga sisithuba, ixesha, okanye izinto eziphathekayo unokubonakala kubazalwana abangaphezu kwama-500 ngexesha, okanye unokufihlwa emehlweni abo eze →Amehlo abo avuleka, baza bamqonda. Ngequbuliso uYesu wathi shwaka. Imbekiselo ( Luka 24:3 ) neyoku- 1 kwabaseKorinte 15:5-6

buza: Ubonakala nini umzimba wethu womoya?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

1 Imini yokubuya kukaKrestu!

Kuba nafayo, baye ubomi benu bufihlakele ndawonye noKristu kuye uThixo. Xa athe wabonakalaliswa uKristu, obubomi bethu, nani niya kubonakala, ninaye ebuqaqawulini. Imbekiselo ( Kolose 3:3-4 )

2 Umele uyibone imbonakalo yakhe yokwenene

Niyalubona ke uthando olungaka asenzele lona uYise, olu lokuba sibizwe ngokuba singabantwana bakaThixo. Yiyo loo nto ihlabathi lingasazi ( wazalwa ngokutsha umntu omtsha ) kuba andizange ndimazi ( UYesu ). Bazalwana abathandekayo, singabantwana bakaThixo ngoku. Ke into esiya kuba yiyo kwixesha elizayo.

→→ Phawula: “Ukuba iNkosi ibonakala, siya kuyibona imbonakalo yayo yokwenene, yaye xa sibonakala kunye nayo, siya kuyibona nemizimba yethu yokomoya”! Amen. Ngoko, uyayiqonda? Imbekiselo ( 1 Yohane 3:1-2 )

Isine: Singamalungu omzimba wakhe

Anazi na, ukuba umzimba wenu uyitempile yoMoya oyiNgcwele? Lo Moya oyiNgcwele, uphuma kuThixo, umi ngaphakathi kwenu;

buza: Ingaba imizimba yethu yitempile kaMoya oyiNgcwele?
impendulo: Wazalwa nguThixo ( engabonakaliyo ) → " umzimba womoya “Yitempile yoMoya oyiNgcwele.

buza: Ngoba?
impendulo: Ngenxa yokuba umzimba obonakalayo →uphuma kuAdam, umzimba wangaphandle uya kuwohloka ngokuthe ngcembe, ugule uze ufe →le ntsuba indala yewayini ayinakubamba iwayini entsha ( uMoya oyiNgcwele ), inokuvuza, ngoko ke inyama yethu ayiyotempile yoMoya oyiNgcwele;

【 itempile yomoya oyingcwele 】Ewe Ibhekisa kwizinto ezingabonakaliyo → umzimba womoya , singumzimba kaKristu, singamalungu omzimba wakhe, yitempile yoMoya oyiNgcwele le. Amen. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

→Kuba singamalungu omzimba wakhe (eminye imisongo yamandulo yongezelela: Amathambo akhe nenyama yakhe). Imbekiselo ( Efese 5:30 )

【 idini eliphilileyo KWABASEROMA 12:1 Ndiyanivuselela ngoko, bazalwana bam, ngenxa yenceba kaThixo, ukuba niyinikele imizimba yenu ibe lidini eliphilileyo.

buza: Ngaba idini eliphilayo libhekisa kumzimba wam wenyama?
impendulo : Ukuphila kwedini kuthetha ukuzalwa ngokutsha " umzimba womoya ” → Umzimba kaKristu lidini eliphilayo, kwaye singamalungu omzimba wakhe angamadini aphilayo → Ingcwele kwaye ekholekileyo kuThixo, le yinkonzo yakho yokomoya

Phawula: Ukuba awukuqondi ukuzalwa kwakhona kunye nokuqonda, uya kunikela ngomzimba wakho → Lo mzimba uvela kuAdam, ungcolile kwaye awuhlambulukanga, uphantsi kokubola nokufa, kwaye lidini lokufa.
Ukuba unikela idini eliphilileyo elifunwa nguThixo, unikela idini elifileyo. Kunene! Ngoko ke, kufuneka ukwazi ukuba ngcwele.

5. Yidla isidlo seNkosi kwaye ungqine ukwamkela umzimba weNkosi

Indebe esiyisikelelayo, ayinasabelo na egazini likaKristu? Isonka esisiqhekezayo, asibudlelane na nomzimba kaKristu? ( 1 Korinte 10:16 )

buza: ( ileta ) wavuswa kunye noKrestu, ngaba wayesele enawo umzimba kaKristu? Kutheni usafuna ukuwufumana umzimba wakhe nje?
impendulo: mna( ileta ) ukufumana umzimba womoya kaKristu, kufuneka nathi ingqina Zuza umzimba kaKristu kwaye uya kuba nokuninzi kwixesha elizayo amava Ukubonakaliswa ngokwasemzimbeni →UYesu ubonakala ngeso lenyama” ikeyiki "Esikhundleni somzimba wakhe (isonka sobomi), kwindebe " incindi yomdiliya "Endaweni yakhe Igazi , ubomi , umphefumlo →Yitya iSidlo seNkosi sangokuhlwa Injongo uyasibiza gcina isithembiso , yigcinele ezinye iinjongo Igazi zimiselwe kunye nathi ITestamente Entsha , gcina indlela, sebenzisa ( ukuzithemba ) kugcine ngaphakathi okuzelwe nguThixo ( umzimba womphefumlo )! Ade uKristu abuye kwaye umzimba wokwenyani ubonakala → Kufuneka nizivavanye ukuze nibone ukuba ninokholo na, nizivavanye. Anazi na, ukuba aningabo bangenakucikideka, ninaye uYesu Kristu kuni? Ngoko, uyayiqonda? Imbekiselo ( 2 Korinte 13:5 )

6 Ukuba ke uMoya kaThixo uhleli ezintliziyweni zenu, anisayi kuba ngabenyama.

Ukuba ke uMoya kaThixo uhleli kuni, aningabo abenyama, koko ningabeMoya. Ukuba umntu akanaye uMoya kaKristu, akangokaKristu lowo. ( Roma 8:9 )

buza: UMoya kaThixo uhlala entliziyweni, kutheni ke singengabo abenyama?
impendulo: Xa uMoya kaThixo ehlala ezintliziyweni zenu, niyakuba ngumntu omtsha owenziwe ngokutsha. Umntu omtsha )Ewe engabonakaliyo → yi " umzimba womoya "Nizelwe nguThixo" Umntu omtsha “Umzimba womoya asingowo ( indoda endala ) inyama. umzimba womntu omdala wafa ngenxa yesono, nomphefumlo wakhe wafa ngenxa yesono. umzimba womoya ) ubomi bugwetyelwe ngokholo. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?
Ukuba uKristu ungaphakathi kwenu, umzimba okunene ufile ngenxa yesono, kodwa umphefumlo uphilile ngenxa yobulungisa. Imbekiselo ( Roma 8:10 )

7 Bonke abazelwe nguThixo abasayi kuze bone;

1 John 3:9 Bonke abazelwe nguThixo aboni, ngokuba ilizwi likaThixo lihleli kuye;

buza: Kutheni abo bazelwe nguThixo bengoni?
impendulo: Ngenxa yokuba igama likaThixo (isicatshulwa sokuqala sithetha "imbewu") likhona entliziyweni yakhe, akanakona →
1 Xa iLizwi likaThixo, uMoya kaThixo, noMoya oyiNgcwele kaThixo ekho entliziyweni yakho, uyazalwa ngokutsha ( Umntu omtsha ),
2 Umntu omtsha ngumzimba womoya ( ayingowakhe ) ixhego elo lonayo enyameni;
3 Umphefumlo nomzimba womntu omtsha ufihlwe noKristu kuThixo. Ezulwini! Nizelwe ngokutsha, nizalwa ngokutsha, nivela ezulwini. Amen – bhekisa kumaEfese 2:6
4 Ukufa komzimba wendoda endala ngesono, ekufeni kukaKristu, kucinyiwe kwangcwatywa engcwabeni. Ayisendim ke odla ubomi, nguKristu ke oselesidla ubomi ngenxa yam. Umntu omtsha" Sesiphi isono esinokwenziwa kuKristu? Ngaba unyanisile? Ngoko ke uPawulos wathi → Kwakhona kufuneka unikele imbeko yakho esonweni ( khangela ) yena ufile, usoloko ( khangela ) de umzimba wakhe onesono ubuyele eluthulini, uya kufa aze akuve ukufa kukaYesu. Ngoko, uyayiqonda? Bhekisela kumaRoma 6:11

8 Lowo wenza isono akamazi uYesu

1 KAYOHANE 3:6 Bonke abahleli kuye aboni;

buza: Kutheni abantu abonayo bengamazi uYesu?
impendulo: umoni, umoni →

1 Andizange ndambona, akazange amazi uYesu ,
2 Ukungaluqondi usindiso lwemiphefumlo kuKristu,
3 Anibufumananga ubuntwana bukaThixo ,
4 Abantu abenza isono → abazalwa ngokutsha .
5 Abantu abenza ubugebenga bakwiminyaka yenyoka → ngabantwana benyoka nosathana. .

Siyazi ukuba bonke abazelwe nguThixo abasayi kuze bone; bonke abazelwe nguThixo baya kuzigcina; ( 1 Yohane 5:18 )

Phawula: Wazalwa nguThixo →" umzimba womoya Ifihliwe kuThixo kunye noKristu. UKristu ngoku ungasekunene kukaThixo uYise ezulwini. Ubomi bakho bokuzalwa ngokutsha bukwalapho. Ungendawo usemhlabeni, kwaye ingonyama egqumayo iyabhadula. Inokukwenzakalisa njani? Wanga ke uThixo woxolo anganenza nyulu ngokupheleleyo, athi, ugqibelele owenu umoya nomphefumlo nomzimba, ugcinwe ngokungenakusoleka ekufikeni kweNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, uthembekile onibizayo. Imbekiselo ( 1 Tesalonika 5:23-24 )

Ukwabelana ngemibhalo yeVangeli, ephefumlelwe nguMoya kaThixo Abasebenzi bakaYesu Krestu, uMzalwana uWang*Yun, uDade uLiu, uDade uZheng, uMzalwana uCen, kunye nabanye osebenza nabo baxhasa kwaye basebenza kunye kumsebenzi wevangeli weBandla likaYesu Krestu. Bashumayela ivangeli kaYesu Krestu, ivangeli evumela ukuba abantu basindiswe, bazukiswe, kwaye imizimba yabo ikhululwe! Amen
