Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Umfazi onesidima [ibandla] uthumela abasebenzi: ngezandla zabo babhala kwaye bathetha ilizwi lenyaniso, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwethu, uzuko lwethu, nentlawulelo yemizimba yethu. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumlo yethu kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni: Masikholelwe ivangeli - sizuze uYesu Igazi. Ubomi.Mphefumlo! Amen .

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

---Umzimba womphefumlo womntwana ozelwe nguThixo---

1: Umsebenzi wokudala ugqityiwe

buza: Uya kugqitywa nini umsebenzi wokudala?
impendulo: UThixo wadala izulu nomhlaba ngeentsuku ezintandathu waza waphumla ngomhla wesixhenxe!
→→Yonke into ilungile. Ngosuku lwesixhenxe, umsebenzi kaThixo wokudala wawugqityiwe, ngoko waphumla kuwo wonke umsebenzi wakhe ngomhla wesixhenxe. Imbekiselo ( Genesis 2:1-2 )

2: Umsebenzi wokukhulula ugqityiwe

Hebhere 4:3 Kodwa thina bakholwayo sinokungena koko kuphumla, kanye njengokuba uThixo watshoyo: “Ndifungile ndinomsindo, ndathi, ‘Abayi kungena ekuphumleni kwam!’” Enyanisweni, umsebenzi wendalo uqalisa ngendalo igqitywe ukusukela kweli hlabathi.

buza: Ukungena njani ekuphumleni kukaKristu?
impendulo: ( ileta ) Umsebenzi kaKristu wokuhlangula ugqityiwe

Xa uYesu wayivayo iviniga, wathi: Ugqibile ! "Wathoba intloko yakhe, Wunike uThixo umphefumlo wakho . Imbekiselo ( Yohane 19:30 )

Phawula: UYesu wathi: " Ugqibile Wathoba intloko yakhe. Wunike uThixo umphefumlo wakho . Amen! UThixo wathumela uNyana wakhe okuphela kwamzeleyo, uYesu, ukuba asenzele oku →【 usindiso lwemiphefumlo 】Igqityiwe kwaye kungenwa ekuphumleni! →→ Kanye njengokuba uThixo wawugqiba umsebenzi wakhe wendalo ngeentsuku ezintandathu, uThixo waphumla kuwo wonke umsebenzi wakhe waza waphumla ngomhla wesixhenxe. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

buza: Njani( ileta ) ekuphumleni kukaKristu?
impendulo: ( ileta ) wafa, wangcwatywa, waza wavuswa noKristu → ukuzalwa ngokutsha, uzelwe nguThixo, fumana Umzimba wakhe womphefumlo! wena fumana Umzimba womphefumlo kaKristu ngumntwana ozelwe nguThixo →Ngoku sele ungaphakathi ( UKrestu ), hayi ngaphakathi ( UAdam )ri →→ Oku kungena ekuphumleni kukaKristu . Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Eyesithathu: Fumana igazi elixabisekileyo likaYesu

-------( ubomi, umphefumlo )-------

buza: Ungalifumana njani igazi elixabisekileyo likaYesu?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

(1) UYehova ubususile ubugwenxa babo bonke abantu; ukubuya ) kuYesu

Thina sonke saphambuka njengeegusha, elowo wabuyela endleleni yakhe; Imbekiselo ( Isaya 53:6 )

buza: Sisono sini asizisayo uYehova? ukubuya ) kuYesu?
impendulo: (Isono Sabo Bonke) Inkcazo eneenkcukacha engezantsi

1 Isono (sabeka) kuYesu ,
2 Isono (sibeke) kuYesu ,
3 Isono (sabekwa) kuYesu . Amen

Phawula: UYehova uThixo wenza ukuba bonke abantu babe “isono”, “isono” “nesono” →→( ukubuya ) kuYesu→→Ngokufa kukaYesu, izono zabo bonke abantu→→

1 "yeka" isono,

2 “Sisuse” isono,
3 “Ukucamagushela” izono, Akukho nesuntswana lesono elihlala kuye wonke umntu → bizela intlawulelo ;
4 Intshayelelo (Yongyi) Uya kugwetyelwa ngonaphakade kwaye uya kuba nobomi obungunaphakade! Amen.

Ukuba ushiya ezinye" Inja Niya kona kuwe ngoku Ukwazisa iLizwi likaThixo ( Ugwetyelo ) ikhona entliziyweni yakho, awunakuze wone. Ngoko, uyayiqonda? Funda eyoku- 1 kaYohane 3:9 .
“Bamiselwe iiveki ezimashumi asixhenxe abantu bakowenu, nesixeko sakowenu esingcwele, ukuba kupheliswe ukreqo, kupheliswe isono, kucanyagushelwe ubugwenxa, kuziswe ubulungisa obungunaphakade, kutywinwe umbono nesiprofeto, kumthambise oyiNgcwele; okanye: Inguqulelo) Imbekiselo ( Daniyeli 9:24 ).

(2) UKristu wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni waza wafela izono zethu

buza: UKristu wafela izono zethu →Ngayiphi injongo?
impendulo: " Injongo "ukuphela ( UAdam ) umzimba wesono kukutshatyalaliswa ( thina ) umzimba wesono → uyasikhulula esonweni, emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni somthetho, nakwindoda endala ka-Adam.
→→Kuyabonakala ukuba uthando lukaYesu luyasikhuthaza. Kuba sicinga ukuba umntu" ngenxa “Xa bonke besifa, bonke bayafa (bona eyesi-2 kwabaseKorinte 5:14) Abo bafileyo bakhululwe esonweni (bona amaRoma 6:7) → ileta Wonke umntu ufile, ngoko kufanele ukuba ( ileta ) yaye wonke umntu wayekhululekile esonweni, kuwo wonke umthetho nakwisiqalekiso somthetho, amhluba umntu omdala. Amen

(3) kaKristu ( Igazi ) ukuphuma

Kodwa akufika kuYesu, amfumana efile, akayaphula imilenze yakhe. Lesuka elinye isoldati lamhlaba ngomkhonto ecaleni, kwaoko umntu Igazi kwaye kuphuma amanzi . Imbekiselo ( Yohane 19:33-34 )

(4)Thina ( Igazi ) kunye noKristu ( Igazi ) ziphume kunye

buza: thina Igazi njani naye Igazi Siphume kunye?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

1 UYehova wazisa kuye ubugwenxa babantu bonke; →Ngumphefumlo nomzimba womntu wonke ( ukubuya ) kuYesu Kristu,
2 UYesu wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni →Sithi ababethelelwa emnqamlezweni,
3 UYesu ( Igazi ) ukuphuma →yethu ( Igazi ) iyaphuma,
4 Igazi )yiyo i ubomi, umphefumlo ! UYesu wancama ( ubomi ) →Ngukuthi Ncama Ubomi obuvela kuAdam →" lahlekelwa "ubomi," lahlekelwa “Umphefumlo ka-Adam ongcolileyo nongcolileyo,
5. "Ukulahlekelwa" ubomi kunye nomphefumlo womntu →" Faka i " Fumana ubomi nomphefumlo kaYesu →→ Yiyo loo nto Wasindisa ubomi bam nomphefumlo wam ! Amen. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Kunjengokuba iNkosi uYesu yathi: “Kuba othe wafuna ukuwusindisa umphefumlo wakhe (okanye ukuguqulelwa ngokuthi: umphefumlo; lowo ungezantsi) wolahlekelwa nguwo; 35)

(5) Wangcwatywa

Phawula: UYesu wafa ngokuxhonywa emthini → oko kukuthi, umzimba wethu wesono wafa, yaye umzimba wesono wangcwatywa → oko kukuthi, umzimba wethu wesono wangcwatywa, yaye thina” uthuli “Umzimba ophumayo ekugqibeleni ubuyela eluthulini uze ubuyele engcwabeni.” Funda iGenesis 3:19; Igazi ) akazange angcwatywe, kodwa walahleka, walahlwa, waza waqukuqela phantsi komnqamlezo. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

(6) Wavuswa ngomhla wesithathu

Uvuko lukaKristu → Sithethelele , Uvuko, ukuzalwa ngokutsha, usindiso, ukwenziwa oonyana, uMoya oyiNgcwele owathenjiswayo, nobomi obungunaphakade kunye naye. ! Amen.
UYesu wanikelwa ngenxa yezigqitho zethu waza wavuswa ngenxa yokugwetyelwa kwethu (okanye ukuguqulelwa: UYesu wanikelwa ngenxa yezigqitho zethu waza wavuswa ngenxa yokugwetyelwa kwethu). Imbekiselo ( Roma 4:25 )

Phawula: Sivuswa kunye noKrestu → uzelwe ngokutsha Umntu omtsha " Faka i " Umoya kaKristu · Igazi ·Ubomi · Umphefumlo nomzimba ! Amen. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

4 Kudala ligazi lika-Adam; ngoku ngokaKristu Igazi

ukuba kuphela (xuba) Ukushumayela kunokuhamba kakubi, yaye iicawa ezininzi “ Yiloo nto engalunganga "Ukudibanisa umoya wendoda yethu endala kunye noMoya oyiNgcwele ( xuba ) ngumoya.

ngokuba Umoya okuBawo unguMoya oyiNgcwele, umoya okuYesu unguMoya oyiNgcwele, nomoya okubantwana abazelwe ngokutsha unguMoya oyiNgcwele → Bonke baphuma kumoya omnye (uMoya oyiNgcwele) !

Kanye njengokuba intsimbi nodaka zingenakuxubana, ioli namanzi azinakuxubana. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

(7) Yidla iSidlo seNkosi Sangokuhlwa kwaye unikele ubungqina bokufumana igazi likaYesu

buza: UYesu uwumisela njani umnqophiso omtsha nathi?
impendulo: UYesu wasebenzisa eyakhe ( Igazi ) wenza umnqophiso omtsha kunye nathi
ULUKA 22:20 Kwangokunjalo yayithatha indebe, yathi, Le ndebe; ndisebenzise Igazi umnqophiso omtsha , yeyakho waphuma .

buza: Silamkela njani igazi likaYesu
Impendulo: Kholelwa kwivangeli ! Ukuzalwa ngokutsha, uvuko, nokwamkelwa njengoonyana bakaThixo →→ Yidla iSidlo seNkosi Sangokuhlwa ( Yityani umzimba weNkosi , Sela eNkosini Igazi ) kukungqina nokwamkela Umzimba weNkosi, igazi leNkosi, umphefumlo weNkosi, umphefumlo weNkosi ! articles.content:
Uxolo kubazalwana noodade bam abathandekayo kwintsapho kaThixo! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile yethu kwabase-Efese isahluko 1 indinyana 13 size sifunde kunye: Natywinwa kuye, natywinwa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele wedinga, ekusekweni kwenu, nakholwayo nakuye, nakuva ilizwi lenyaniso, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwenu. Amen

Namhlanje sizakufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane kunye "Usindiso Lwemiphefumlo" Hayi. 4 Thetha kwaye wenze umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, Nkosi yethu uYesu Krestu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Umfazi onesidima [ibandla] uthumela abasebenzi: ngezandla zabo babhala kwaye bathetha ilizwi lenyaniso, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwethu, uzuko lwethu, nentlawulelo yemizimba yethu. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumlo yethu kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni: Masikholelwe kwivangeli-sifumane uMoya kaYesu! Amen.

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

Imizimba yemiphefumlo yabantwana abazelwe nguThixo

1. Ukufumana uMoya kaYesu

buza: kuYesu ( umoya ) →Ngumoya onjani?
impendulo: kuYesu ( umoya )→NguMoya kaBawo waseZulwini, uMoya kaYehova, uMoya kaThixo →Nguye mnye umoya ( uMoya oyiNgcwele )!
Phawula: fumana ( uMoya oyiNgcwele ), oko kukuthi, ukufumana →uMoya kaYesu, uMoya kaBawo waseZulwini, uMoya kaYehova, uMoya kaThixo! Amen. Ngaba uyayiqonda le nto?

buza: Ungawufumana njani uMoya oyiNgcwele othenjiswe nguThixo?
Impendulo: Kholwa kwivangeli!
UMarko 1:15 [uYesu] wathi, “Lizalisekile ixesha, yaye ubukumkani bukaThixo busondele. Kholwa yivangeli ! "

buza: Yintoni ivangeli?
impendulo: njengabapostile ( uPawulosi ) IVangeli kwiiNtlanga
Ke kaloku, bazalwana, ndiyanazisa iindaba ezilungileyo, endazishumayelayo kuni, enazamkelayo nokuzamkela, nimiyo kuzo; uya kusindiswa ngale vangeli . Imbekiselo ( 1 Korinte 15:1-2 )

buza: Kufuneka usindiswe ngokukholwa kweyiphi ivangeli onokuthi ukholelwe kuyo kwaye usindiswe?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi
[ 1 Korinte 15:3 ] Kuba oko ndaninikelayo nokukunikela kuni: Okokuqala nje, uKristu wazifela izono zethu, ngokutsho kwezibhalo;

buza: Yiyiphi ingxaki awayicombululayo uKristu xa wafela izono zethu?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

(1) Sikhulule esonweni

uKristu ngenxa yethu" ulwaphulo-mthetho "Wabethelwa kwaye wafa → uKristu yedwa" ngenxa “Xa bonke besifa, bonke bayafa (bona eyesi-2 kwabaseKorinte 5:14) → Abo bafileyo bakhululwe esonweni (bona amaRoma 6:7)
Qaphela: UKristu ngumntu omnye" ngenxa “Xa bonke besifa, bonke bayafa → Lowo uye wafa ukhululwe esonweni, yaye bonke bayafa, ileta ) yaye wonke umntu wakhululwa esonweni. Amen

(2) bakhululekile kuwo umthetho, nasesiqalekisweni somthetho
Kuba safayo nje kuwo umthetho osibophayo. Ngoku nikhululekile kuwo umthetho , esicela ukuba sikhonze uYehova ngokobutsha bomoya (umphefumlo: okanye uguqulelwe njengoMoya Oyingcwele) kungekhona ngokwesithethe sakudala. Imbekiselo ( Roma 7:6 ) kunye namaGal 3:13

[1 Korinte 15:4] Wangcwatywa

(3) Yothula ixhego nendlela eliziphatha ngayo
Musani ukuxokisana; kuba nizihlubile nje umntu omdala, nezenzo zakhe.
Phawula: Ndabethelelwa emnqamlezweni noKristu, nomzimba wesono watshatyalaliswa → ndakhululwa kumzimba wokufa. Bona amaRoma 7:24-25

【1 KWABASEKORINTE 15:4] waza wavuswa ngomhla wesithathu, ngokutsho kweBhayibhile;

(4) Uvuko lukaKristu → lusenza sigwetyelwe, sivuswe kunye naye, sizalwe ngokutsha, sisindiswe, samkelwe njengoonyana, samkele uMoya oyiNgcwele othenjisiweyo, kwaye sibe nobomi obungunaphakade! Amen.
UYesu wanikelwa ngenxa yezigqitho zethu; Wavuswa ngenxa yokugwetyelwa kwethu ). Imbekiselo ( Roma 4:25 )

(5) nisindile kumandla obumnyama belabafileyo
Wasihlangula egunyeni lobumnyama, wasifudusela ebukumkanini boNyana wakhe oyintanda ( Kolose 1:13 )

(6) Kuphuma (inyoka, inamba) umtyholi uSathana
ndikuthuma kubo, ukuze avuleke amehlo abo, babuye ebumnyameni, beze ebumhlotsheni; Jika emandleni kaSathana uye kuThixo Ngokukholwa kum nifumana uxolelo lwezono, nelifa, ndawonye nabo bonke abangcwalisiweyo; ’” (IZenzo 26:18)

(7) Ngaphandle kwehlabathi

Mna ndibanike ilizwi lakho. Ke ihlabathi libathiyile, ngokuba bengengabo abehlabathi, njengokuba nam ndingenguye owehlabathi. Imbekiselo ( Yohane 17:14 )

(8) Sishukumisele ebukumkanini boNyana wethu oyintanda kwaye ubhale amagama ethu kwincwadi yobomi
Wasihlangula egunyeni lobumnyama, wasifudusela ebukumkanini boNyana wakhe oyintanda ( Kolose 1:13 )

Phawula: UThixo usifudusele ebukumkanini boNyana wakhe oyintanda → amagama abhalwe kwincwadi yobomi athetha ukuba usifudusele ebukumkanini bukaYesu nakubukumkani bukaThixo → obubukumkani bamazulu! Amen

Fumana oko bekuthenjisiwe【 uMoya oyiNgcwele 】 luphawu
Natywinwa kuye, natywinwa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele wedinga, ekusekweni kwenu, nakholwayo nakuye, nakuva ilizwi lenyaniso, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwenu. Imbekiselo ( Efese 1:13 )

buza: Liyintoni ilizwi lenyaniso? Ngaba ivangeli elisisindisayo?
impendulo: UKrestu wafela izono zethu, wangcwatywa, waza wavuka kwakhona ngomhla wesithathu ngokutsho kweBhayibhile!

1 Sikhululeni esonweni
2 Ukukhululeka kuwo umthetho nakwisiqalekiso sawo
3 Lahlani ixhego neentlondi zalo
4 Uvuko lukaKristu → lusenza sigwetyelwe, sivuswe kunye naye, sizalwe ngokutsha, sisindiswe, samkelwe njengoonyana, samkele uMoya oyiNgcwele othenjisiweyo, kwaye sibe nobomi obungunaphakade! Amen
5 nisindile kumandla obumnyama eHadesi
6 Nikhululwe (kwinyoka, inamba) umtyholi uSathana

7 ngaphandle kwehlabathi
8 Amagama ethu makasiwe ebukumkanini boNyana wethu oyintanda, abhalwe encwadini yobomi! Amen
Lilo eli ilizwi lenyaniso, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwenu, enakholwayo kuye, enasamkelayo idinga. uMoya oyiNgcwele 】Yenqaku! Amen.
( Phawula: " ileta "Abantu bale vangeli → Utywinwe ngoMoya oyiNgcwele othenjisiweyo ;" Musa ukukholelwa "Abantu bale vangeli → Awukwazi ukufumana itywina loMoya oyiNgcwele . ) Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Phawula: Uyifumene into ebeyithenjisiwe【 uMoya oyiNgcwele 】yenqaku → oko kukuthi fumana UMoya kaYesu, uMoya kaYise ! Amen.
KwabaseRoma 8:16 UMoya oyiNgcwele ungqina ngomoya wethu ukuba singabantwana bakaThixo, litikiti lethu lokungena ebukumkanini bamazulu, kwaye bubungqina nobungqina bokuba sinelifa likaBawo wethu osezulwini → Lo Moya oyiNgcwele ubungqina belifa lethu (isicatshulwa sokuqala sisibambiso), bade abantu bakaThixo (abantu: umbhalo wokuqala: ilifa) bakhululwe, ukuze uzuko lwakhe lube nokudunyiswa. Imbekiselo ( Efese 1:14 ), ngaba uyakuqonda oku?

KULUNGILE! Namhlanje siyaphonononga, sinxulumana, kwaye sabelane ngendlela yokufumana uMoya oyiNgcwele othenjisiweyo njengetywina →Ukwamkela uMoya oyiNgcwele othenjisiweyo kukwamkela uMoya kaYesu noMoya kaBawo waseZulwini ! Amen

Qhubeka uba nesabelo kwinkupho elandelayo: Usindiso lomphefumlo

1 Ungamzuza njani uYesu Igazi ( ubomi, umphefumlo )

articles.content:
Uxolo kubazalwana noodade bam abathandekayo kwintsapho kaThixo! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile yethu kuMateyu Isahluko 1 kunye nevesi 18 size sifunde kunye: Ukuzalwa kukaYesu Kristu kubhaliwe ngolu hlobo: UMariya unina wayesele eganelwe uYosefu, kodwa bengekatshati, uMariya wamitha ngoMoya oyiNgcwele. .

Namhlanje sizakufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane kunye "Usindiso Lwemiphefumlo" Hayi. 3 Thetha kwaye wenze umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, Nkosi yethu uYesu Krestu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Umfazi onesidima [ibandla] uthumela abasebenzi: ngezandla zabo babhala kwaye bathetha ilizwi lenyaniso, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwethu, uzuko lwethu, nentlawulelo yemizimba yethu. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumlo yethu kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni: ukuqonda. Umphefumlo nomzimba kaYesu Kristu! Amen.

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

UAdam wokugqibela: uMzimba woMphefumlo kaYesu

1. Umoya kaYesu

(1) UMoya kaYesu uyaphila

buza: Wazalwa ngabani uYesu?
impendulo: UYesu wazalwa nguBawo waseZulwini Xa uYesu wayebhaptizwa → → kwabakho ilizwi eliphuma ezulwini lisithi: “Lo nguNyana wam oyintanda, endikholisiweyo nguye.” ( Mateyu 3:17 ) → Zonke iingelosi, uThixo unazo usoloko esithi kuOphi athi: "Ungunyana wam, ndikuzele namhlanje"? Yiyiphi asalatha kuyo aze athi: “Mna ndiya kuba nguYise, yena abe ngunyana wam”? Imbekiselo ( Hebhere 1:5 )

buza: kaYesu umoya Ikrwada? Okanye yenziwe?
impendulo: Ekubeni uYesu wayezelwe nguYise, umoya ) nazo zizelwe nguBawo waseZulwini, kungekhona njengoAdam owadala umntu. umoya ".

(2) UMoya kaBawo oseZulwini

buza: kaYesu umoya →Ngumoya kabani?
impendulo: EkaBawo waseZulwini umoya →Oko kukuthi, uMoya kaThixo, uMoya kaYehova uThixo, noMoya woMdali → Ekuqaleni, uThixo wadala izulu nomhlaba. Umhlaba wawusesenyanyeni, kuselubala, kwakumnyama phezu kobuso senzonzobila; umoya kaThixo Ukubaleka emanzini. ( Genesis 1:1-2 ).

Phawula: umoya kaYesu →NguMoya kaBawo, uMoya kaThixo, uMoya kaYehova, uMdali onguMoya owadala umntu →→ Nangona UThixo unomoya Unamandla aneleyo okudala abantu abaninzi Ngaba akazange adale nje umntu omnye? Kutheni udala umntu omnye kuphela? Nguye ofuna ukuba abantu babe nenzala yobuthixo...Reference (Malaki 2:15)

(3) UMoya kaYise, uMoya woNyana, noMoya oyiNgcwele → ngumoya omnye

buza: Ngubani igama loMoya oyiNgcwele?
impendulo: Ibizwa ngokuba nguMthuthuzeli, okwabizwa ngokuba yintambiso → Ndiya kucela kuBawo, kwaye uya kuninika omnye uMthuthuzeli (okanye inguqulelo: uMthuthuzeli; lo ngezantsi), ukuze abe nani ngonaphakade, uMoya wenyaniso… 14:16-17) kunye neyoku-1 kaYohane 2:27.

buza: uMoya oyiNgcwele Ivela phi?
Impendulo: UMoya oyiNgcwele uphuma kuBawo oseZulwini →Kodwa mna ndiya kunithumela uMthetheleli evela kuBawo, lowo ukhoyo uMoya wenyaniso ophuma kuBawo ; xa athe weza yena, wongqina ngam. Imbekiselo ( Yohane 15:26 )

buza: kuBawo ( umoya ) →Ngumoya onjani?
impendulo: kuBawo ( umoya ) → yi uMoya oyiNgcwele !

buza: kuYesu ( umoya ) →Ngumoya onjani?
impendulo: kuYesu ( umoya ) → Kwakhona uMoya oyiNgcwele
→ Bonke abantu babhaptizwa, yaye uYesu wabhaptizwa. Ndithe ndithandaza, lavuleka izulu; UMoya oyiNgcwele wehla phezu kwakhe , kwaza kwaphuma ilizwi ezulwini, lisithi: “Wena unguNyana wam oyintanda, endikholisiweyo nguye.”

Phawula:

1 Ngokutsho (umoya):
Umoya kuBawo waseZulwini, uMoya kaThixo, uMoya kaYehova → unjalo uMoya oyiNgcwele !
UMoya ohleli kuYesu, uMoya kaKristu, uMoya weNkosi → Kwakhona uMoya oyiNgcwele !
uMoya oyiNgcwele NguMoya kaBawo noMoya kaYesu bonke baphuma komnye, kwaye “. mnye umoya ” → uMoya oyiNgcwele . Imbekiselo ( 1 Korinte 6:17 )

2 Ngokuka (umntu):
Kukho izabelo ngezabelo zezibabalo, kodwa ke ikwanguloo Moya mnye.
Kukho iintlobo ngeentlobo zobulungiseleli, kodwa iNkosi inye.
Kukho nezabelo ngezabelo zeentsebenzo, kodwa ke ikwanguloo Thixo mnye uzisebenzayo izinto zonke kubo bonke. ( 1 Korinte 12:4-6 )

3 Yitsho ngokwe (isihloko)
UYise, Nyana, noMoya oyiNgcwele Jonga kuMateyu Isahluko 28 iVesi 19 kunye noMnqophiso Isahluko 14 Ivesi 16-17.
【1 KWABASEKORINTE 6:17 Ke omanywe neNkosi nguye Yibani moya mnye neNkosi . Ngaba uYesu wayemanyene noYise? babe! Kunene! UYesu wathi →NdikuBawo yaye uBawo ukum → Mna notata sibanye . (UYohane 10:30)
njengoko kubhaliweyo, kunjalo →Mnye umzimba, mnye noMoya, njengokuba nabizelwa thembeni linye. Inye iNkosi, lunye ukholo, lunye ubhaptizo; Imbekiselo ( Efese 4:4-6 ). Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

2. Umphefumlo kaYesu

(1) UYesu Kristu akanasono

buza: Ngaba uYesu wazalelwa phantsi komthetho?
impendulo: Akukho mthetho waphulwayo! Amen

buza: Ngoba?
impendulo: Kuba apho kungekho mthetho, akukho sigqitho, yaye akukho sigqitho somthetho. Imbekiselo ( Roma 4:15 )

Phawula: Nangona uYesu Kristu wazalelwa phantsi komthetho, akakho emthethweni → Waba ngumbingeleli, kungekhona ngokwemimiselo yenyama (umthetho), kodwa ngokwamandla obomi obungenasiphelo (obokuqala, obungenakonakala) (ukukhonza uThixo ). Imbekiselo ( Hebhere 7:16 ). NjengoYesu" iSabatha "Philisa abantu ngokomthetho wenyama. → UYesu waphula "iSabatha" kwi "iMithetho Elishumi" yomthetho, ngoko ke abaFarisi abangamaYuda bazama ngandlela zonke ukubamba uYesu nokutshabalalisa uYesu! Kuba waphula umthetho "Umthetho ayilandelwa" iSabatha ". Imbekiselo ( Mateyu 12:9-14 )

KumaGalati 5:18 Ukuba ke nikhokelwa nguMoya, aningaphantsi komthetho
UYesu wayekhokelwa nguMoya oyiNgcwele →Nangona wazalelwa phantsi komthetho, akazange akhonze uThixo ngokwemithetho yenyama, kodwa ngokwamandla obomi obungenasiphelo, ngoko ke Hayi apha Umthetho umi ngolu hlobo lulandelayo:

1 Apho kungekho mthetho, akukho sigqitho —Funda amaRoma 4:15
2 Ngaphandle komthetho, isono sifile —Funda amaRoma 7:8
3 Ngaphandle komthetho, isono asisosono —Funda amaRoma 5:13

[UYesu] Umthetho, ngaphandle kwemimiselo yenyama, awukho phantsi komthetho; iSabatha Ukunyanga izifo zabantu, ngokomthetho, " Bala ubutyala ”, kodwa akanamthetho → Isono ayisosono . Ukuba akukho mthetho, akusayi kubakho kwaphulwa komthetho, ukuba akukho kwaphulwa komthetho, loluphi ulwaphulo-mthetho oluya kwenziwa? Ngaba unyanisile? Ukuba unomthetho → gweba kwaye ugwebe ngokomthetho. Ngoko, uyayiqonda? Bona amaRoma 2:12 .

1 UYesu akazange one

Kaloku umbingeleli omkhulu akanakuvelana nezilwelwe zethu. Wahendwa kuzo zonke iindawo njengathi; Kuphela nje akazange enze lwaphulo-mthetho . ( Hebhere 4:15 ) neyoku- 1 kaPetros 2:22

2 UYesu akanasono
UThixo uyabakhulula abangenasono Lowo ungazani nasono, waba sisono ngenxa yethu, ukuze thina sibe bubulungisa bukaThixo kuye. ( 2 Korinte 5:21 ) neyoku- 1 kaYohane 3:5 .

(2)UYesu ungcwele

Kuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa: “Yibani ngcwele, kuba ndingcwele . (Funda eyoku-1 kaPetros 1:16.)
Usifanelekele ke, ukuba sibe nombingeleli omkhulu onjalo, ongcwele, ongenabubi, ongenabala, owahlukileyo kubo aboni, ophakamileyo ngaphezu kwezulu. ( Hebhere 7:26 )

(3) kaKristu ( Igazi ) engenasiphako, engangcoliswanga

EyokuQala kaPetros Chapter 1:19] Kungegazi elinqabileyo likaKristu, njengelemvana engenasiphako nasiphako.

Phawula: kaKristu" igazi elixabisekileyo "Ayinasiphako, ayingcoliswanga → ubomi zikhona Igazi phakathi →le ubomi Yiyo loo nto → umphefumlo !
Umphefumlo kaYesu Kristu → Ayinabala, ayidyobhekanga, kwaye ingcwele! Amen.

3. UMzimba kaKristu

(1)ULizwi ke waba yinyama
ULizwi waba yinyama uhleli phakathi kwethu, ezele lubabalo nayinyaniso. Sabubukela ubungangamsha bakhe awabunikwa nguYise, njengoko ekukuphela koNyana wakhe; ( Yohane 1:14 )

(2) UThixo waba yinyama
UYohane 1:1-2 Ekuqalekeni ube ekho uLizwi, waye uLizwi ekuye uThixo. ULizwi nguThixo . Lo Lizwi wayekunye noThixo kwasekuqalekeni.
Phawula: Ekuqaleni kwakukho iTao, yaye iTao yayikunye noThixo → iTao yaba yinyama → uThixo waba yinyama! Amen. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

(3) “Umoya” waba yinyama
Phawula: UThixo "nguMoya" →" uthixo "waba yinyama → yi" umoya "Yiba yinyama!→→ UThixo ungumoya (okanye akanalizwi) , ngoko abo ke bamnqulayo bamelwe kukumnqula ngoMoya nangenyaniso. Imbekiselo (Yohane 4:24) → Ukukhulelwa kwentombi enyulu uMariya kwaphuma “kuMoya Oyingcwele”! Ngoko, uyayiqonda? Jonga kuMateyu Isahluko 1 Indinyana 18

(4) Inyama kaKristu ayinakonakala

buza: Kutheni umzimba kaKristu ( Hayi ) ukubona ukubola?
impendulo: Kuba uKristu esenyameni → 1 ukuzalwa , 2 inyama yobuThixo , 3 Umzimba womoya ! Amen. Ngoko ke umzimba wakhe awunakonakala → UDavide, ekubeni engumprofeti yaye esazi ukuba uThixo wayemfungele ukuba omnye wenzala yakhe wayeya kuhlala etroneni yakhe, wakubona kwangaphambili oku waza wathetha ngovuko lukaKristu, esithi: ‘ Umphefumlo wakhe awushiywanga kwelabafileyo; . ( IZenzo 2:30-31 )

(5) UYesu wavuswa kwabafileyo yaye wayengenakubanjwa kukufa

UThixo wayicacisa intlungu yokufa waza wamvusa, kuba wayengenakubanjwa kukufa. . Imbekiselo ( IZenzo 2:24 )

buza: Kutheni imizimba yethu yenyama ibona ukubola? Ngaba baza kwaluphala, bagule okanye bafe?
impendulo: Ngokuba sonke siyinzala yokhokho wethu uAdam.

Umzimba ka-Adam wawu "" uthuli "Yenziwe →
Kwaye imizimba yethu nayo" uthuli “Idaliwe;
Xa uAdam wayesenyameni, wayesele " Thengisa "unikwe isono,
Imizimba yethu nayo" Thengisa "Nika ulwaphulo-mthetho
ngokuba【 ulwaphulo-mthetho 】Ixabiso lomsebenzi li fa →Ke imizimba yethu yenyama iya kubola, iguge, igule, ife, kwaye ekugqibeleni ibuyele eluthulini.

buza: Imizimba yethu inokukhululeka njani ekuboleni, ekuguleni, elusizi, kwiintlungu nasekufeni?

impendulo: Yatsho iNkosi uYesu →Kufuneka ukuzalwa ngokutsha ! Bona uYohane 3:7 .

1 Bazalwa ngamanzi nanguMoya

( Phawula: Mawethu! 1 Ukufumana uKristu" umoya Oko kukuthi, uMoya oyiNgcwele, 2 Fumana uKristu" Igazi "Ngoku ubomi, umphefumlo , 3 Fumana umzimba kaKristu →Bajongwa njengabantwana abazelwe nguThixo! kungenjalo wena Bangabahanahanisi, bezenza ngabantwana bakaThixo, njengezilwanyana neemfene ezizenza abantu. Kule mihla, abadala abaninzi bebandla, abefundisi, nabashumayeli abaluqondi usindiso lwemiphefumlo ekuKristu, kwaye bonke bazenza abantwana bakaThixo.

Namhlanje sizakufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane kunye "Usindiso Lwemiphefumlo" Hayi. 2 Thetha kwaye wenze umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, Nkosi yethu uYesu Krestu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Umfazi onesidima【 ecaweni 】Thuma abasebenzi: ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo ezandleni zabo, elithethwa ngabo, eliziindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso, zozuko, nentlawulelo yemizimba yethu. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumlo yethu kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni: Qonda umzimba womphefumlo kakhokho uAdam.

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

UAdam, ukhokho woluntu→→umzimba womphefumlo

1. Umoya ka-Adam

(1) Umoya (umoya) ka-Adam wadalwa

buza: Ngaba umoya ka-Adam wadalwa? Usakrwada?
impendulo: ka Adam" umoya "yakhiwe → →【 Ngubani owadala umoya ngaphakathi emntwini 】→→Ngubani owadala umntu? umoya ” → → → Ilizwi likaYehova ngoSirayeli, litwabulule izulu, lakhe iziseko zehlabathi; Ngubani owadala umoya ngaphakathi emntwini Ithi iNkosi: (Zakariya 12:1)

(2) Iingelosi (imimoya) nazo zidaliwe

buza: Ngaba “imimoya” yeengelosi nayo idaliwe?
impendulo: "Inkwenkwezi eqaqambileyo, unyana wokusa", iikherubhi ezigqume ityeya yomnqophiso → iikherubhi "zi" Ingelosi "→ingelosi" umzimba womphefumlo “Zonke zidalwe nguThixo→ kususela kwimini yokudalwa kwakho Ubugqibelele ngeendlela zakho zonke, kwaza kwabonakala ubutshinga phakathi kwakho. ( Hezekile 28:15 )

(3) Inyama negazi lika-Adam (umoya).

buza: ka Adam" umoya "Isuka phi?"
impendulo: "Ngaphakathi kwiNdalo yoMntu" umoya "I-→→ UYehova uThixo uya kwenza" nomsindo “Vuthela emathatheni akhe, abe yinto; umoya ) yendoda ephilayo egama linguAdam! →→UYehova uThixo wambumba umntu ngothuli lwasemhlabeni, waphefumlela emathatheni akhe impefumlo yobomi; waba ngumphefumlo ophilileyo igama lakhe elinguAdam. Imbekiselo ( Genesis 2:7 )

buza: Ngaba “umoya” ka-Adam wemvelo okanye womoya?
impendulo: ka Adam" umoya ” Ngokwemvelo →→ Ngoko kubhaliwe kwathiwa: “Umntu wokuqala, uAdam, waba ngumoya ( Umoya: okanye uguqulelwe njengegazi "Owokugqibela uAdam waba ngumoya odlisa ubomi. Owomoya asinguye owokuqala. Okwemvelo kuza kuqala , kwandule ke kubekho abokomoya. Imbekiselo ( 1 Korinte 15:45-46 )

2. Umphefumlo ka-Adam

(1) Ukwaphulwa kwesivumelwano sika-Adam

---Yitya kuwo umthi wokwazi okulungileyo nokubi---

UYehova uThixo wamwisela umthetho, wathi, Ungadla kuwo nawuphi na umthi womyezo, kodwa ungadli kuwo umthi wokwazi okulungileyo nokubi; kuba mhla uthe wadla kuwo, uya kufa. Genesis Isahluko 2 ivesi 16-17)
buza: UAdam wawophula njani umnqophiso?
impendulo: Wabona ke umfazi (uEva) ukuba isiqhamo somthi silungele ukudliwa, siyathandeka emehlweni, sithandeka emehlweni, kwaye silumkise abantu, wasithabatha isiqhamo, wasidla, wanika indoda yakhe. UAdam). Imbekiselo ( Genesis 3:6 )

(2) UAdam waqalekiswa ngumthetho

buza: Yaba yintoni imiphumo yokophula kuka-Adam umnqophiso?
impendulo: Phantsi kwesiqalekiso soMthetho →" Ngalo lonke ixesha uthe wasidla uya kufa. "
UYehova uThixo → → Wathi kuAdam, Ngokuba umphulaphule umkakho, wadla kuwo umthi endakuwisela umthetho ngawo, ndathi, Ungadli kuwo, uqalekisiwe umhlaba ngenxa yakho; uya kusebenza nzima yonke imihla yobomi bakho, ngokufumana into edliwayo. ukusuka kuyo. Uya kukuntshulela ameva neenkunzane; uya kudla umfuno wasendle; ibhekisele ku ( Genesis 3:17-19 )

(3) Umphefumlo ka-Adam wangcoliswa

buza: Ngaba inzala ka-Adam (imiphefumlo) nayo ingcolile?
impendulo: ka Adam" umphefumlo ” → Yiba Inyoka.Dragon.Umtyholi.Ubumdaka.buSathana. . Sonke thina bantu siyinzala kakhokho wethu uAdam, yaye umoya oqukuqelayo ngaphakathi kuthi Igazi "→ sele ingcolile, ayihlambulukanga okanye ayihlambulukanga," ubomi "Ngoku" umphefumlo "bonke bayachaphazeleka" inyoka "Ukungcola.
Njengoko kubhaliwe →Bazalwana abathandekayo, ekubeni sinawo la madinga. Zihlambululeni kuko konke ukungcola komzimba nomphefumlo , Yoyikani uThixo ningcwaliswe. Imbekiselo ( 2 Korinte 7:1 )

3. Umzimba ka-Adam

(1) Umzimba ka-Adam

…yenziwe ngothuli...

buza: Wavela phi umzimba wokhokho wokuqala uAdam?
impendulo: " uthuli “Wadala → UYehova uThixo wambumba umntu ngothuli lwasemhlabeni, yaye igama lakhe lalinguAdam! → → UYehova uThixo wambumba umntu ngothuli lwasemhlabeni, waphefumlela emathatheni akhe ubomi, waba ngumphefumlo ophilileyo, ongumoya. igama lakhe lalinguAdam; Yaye thina bantu sonke siyinzala ka-Adam, yaye imizimba yethu nayo yeyomhlaba. → Umntu wokuqala wavela emhlabeni yaye engowasemhlabeni;...Imbekiselo ( 1 Korinte 15:47 )

(2) UAdam uye wathengiswa esonweni

buza: UAdam wophula isivumelwano wasithengisa kubani?
impendulo: "Adam" 1 Ngowasemhlabeni, 2 Yenyama negazi, 3 Xa sasisenyameni, sathengiswa ulwaphulo-mthetho ” → Sonke siyinzala yakhe, yaye sithengiswe kuye ngoxa sasisenyameni. ulwaphulo-mthetho ” → Siyazi ke ukuba umthetho ungowomoya, ke mna ndingowenyama; Kuthengiswe esonweni . Imbekiselo ( Roma 7:14 )

buza: Uyintoni na umvuzo wesono?
impendulo: Ewe fa →→Kuba umvuzo wesono kukufa; ke sona isipho sikaThixo bubomi obungunaphakade, kuKristu Yesu iNkosi yethu. ( Roma 6:23 )

buza: Kuvela phi ukufa?
impendulo: fa ukusuka ulwaphulo-mthetho Iza → Kanye njengokuba isono sangena ehlabathini ngamntu mnye, uAdam, kwaza ukufa kwaphuma esonweni, ngokunjalo ukufa kwabafikela bonke abantu ngenxa yokuba bonke bonayo. ( Roma 5:12 )

buza: Ngaba wonke umntu uya kufa?
impendulo: Ngokuba bonile bonke, basilela eluzukweni lukaThixo
→" ulwaphulo-mthetho "Umvuzo kukufa → Bonke abantu bamiselwe ukuba bafe kube kanye, ize ke emva koko ibe ngumgwebo." ( Hebhere 9:27 )

buza: Baya phi abantu emva kokuba befile?
impendulo: abantu" fa "Kuya kubakho umgwebo kamva → Umzimba womntu ungowomhlaba, kwaye umzimba uya kubuyela emhlabeni emva kokufa; ukuba umntu akayenzi" ileta "Intlawulelo kaYesu Krestu, yomntu" umphefumlo "uya → 1 “ukwehlela eHadesi”; 2 Umgwebo weDoomsday → igama Ayikhunjulwa incwadi yobomi Ukuba ithe yavuka, iya kuphoswa edikeni lomlilo → Eli dike lomlilo lelokuqala ukufa kwesibini , “Umphefumlo” utshabalala ngonaphakade . →→Ndababona abafileyo, abancinane nabakhulu, bemi phambi kwetrone. Zavulwa iincwadi, kwavulwa nenye incwadi, eyeyobomi. Abafileyo bagwetywa ngokwezinto ezibhaliweyo kwezo ncwadi, nangokwezenzo zabo. Lwathi ulwandle lwabakhupha abafileyo abakhona, kwathi ukufa neHadesi kwabakhupha abafileyo abakhona, bagwetywa elowo ngokwemisebenzi yakhe. Kwaphoswa ke ukufa nelabafileyo edikeni lomlilo; Ukuba igama lakhe alibhalwanga encwadini yobomi, uya kuphoswa edikeni lomlilo. Imbekiselo ( ISityhilelo 20:12-15 ), ngaba uyayiqonda le nto?

(3) Umzimba ka-Adam uya kubola

buza: Kwenzeka ntoni kumzimba wasemhlabeni?
impendulo: Banjalo bonke abo basemhlabeni, njengoko banjalo lowo ungowasemazulwini; Imbekiselo ( 1 Korinte 15:48 ).

Uluthuli, uya kubuyela kwaseluthulini. ( Genesis 3:19 )

(Phawula: Mawethu! Ukuqonda umzimba womphefumlo ka-Adam kuqala → kukuqonda umzimba wethu womphefumlo Kuphela kwinqaku elilandelayo leNtshumayelo onokuthi uqonde indlela uYesu Kristu awusindisa ngayo umzimba wethu womphefumlo. )

Ukwabelana ngombhalo weVangeli, uqhutywa nguMoya kaThixo Abasebenzi bakaYesu Krestu, uMzalwana uWang*Yun, uDade uLiu, uDade uZheng, uMzalwana uCen, kunye nabanye osebenza nabo baxhasa kwaye basebenza kunye kumsebenzi wevangeli weBandla likaYesu Krestu. articles.title: Usindiso Lomphefumlo (Isifundo 1)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile kumaHebhere isahluko 11 ivesi 4 Ngokholo uAbheli wasondeza kuye uThixo umbingelelo ogqithileyo kunokaKayin, wabufumana ngokunjalo ubungqina bokugwetyelwa kwakhe uThixo, ubungqina ke obo besipho sakhe. Nangona wafayo, wayesathetha ngenxa yolu kholo.

Namhlanje sizakufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane kunye "Usindiso Lwemiphefumlo" Hayi. 1 Thetha kwaye wenze umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, Nkosi yethu uYesu Krestu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Umfazi onesidima【 ecaweni 】Thuma abasebenzi: ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo ezandleni zabo, elithethwa ngabo, eliziindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso, zozuko, nentlawulelo yemizimba yethu. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumlo yethu kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni→ Qonda ukuba umphefumlo uyathetha.

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Ngegama leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

1. Umphefumlo uyathetha

(1) Umphefumlo ka-Abheli uyathetha

Ngokholo uAbheli wasondeza kuye uThixo umbingelelo ogqithileyo kunokaKayin, wabufumana ngokunjalo ubungqina bokugwetyelwa kwakhe uThixo, ubungqina ke obo besipho sakhe. Nangona wafayo, wayesathetha ngenxa yolu kholo. ( Hebhere 11:4 )
buza: UAbheli wafa ngokwenyama kodwa esathetha? Yintoni ethethayo?
impendulo: Umphefumlo uyathetha, ngumphefumlo ka-Abheli othethayo!

(2) Igazi lika-Abheli lakhala kuThixo

buza: Uthetha njani umphefumlo ka-Abheli?
impendulo: Wathi uYehova, Wenze ntoni na (Kayin)? Igazi lomntakwenu (uAbheli) lidanduluka kum ngelizwi eliphuma emhlabeni.

buza: Igazi linelizwi elidandulukayo kuThixo liphuma emhlabeni ngale ndlela, ngaba “igazi” nalo linelizwi lokuthetha?
impendulo: ngokuba" Igazi "Kukho ubomi kuyo, egazini." ubomi ” → Levitikus 17:11 11 Kuba umphefumlo wento ephilileyo usegazini elo, ukuze kucanyagushelwe umphefumlo wenu esibingelelweni; ngokuba Igazi Kukho ubomi kuyo , ukuze icanyagushelwe izono.

3. Ubomi →→[umphefumlo]

------ -Ubomi bomntu bu Igazi phakathi -------

buza: " Igazi "Kukho ubomi kule nto" ubomi "Ngaba ngumphefumlo?"
impendulo: " ubomi ": Okanye iguqulelwe njengomphefumlo, Igazi Ubomi obungaphakathi bu umphefumlo →Kuba, nabani na ofuna ukusindisa ubomi bakhe ( Ubomi: okanye iguqulelwe njengomphefumlo; wolahlekelwa ngumphefumlo wakhe ngenxa yam; Imbekiselo ( Mateyu 16:25 )

buza: " Igazi "Kukho ilizwi elithethayo, ngumphefumlo othethayo?"
impendulo: umntu" Igazi "Kukho ubomi kuyo, ngaphakathi Igazi "kwi ubomi "Ngumntu" umphefumlo ” → “ Igazi "Kukho ilizwi elithethayo, oko kukuthi" umphefumlo "Thetha!"

2 Umphefumlo uyakwazi ukuthetha ngaphandle komzimba

(1)Umphefumlo uthetha ngokuvakalayo

IsiTyhilelo 6:9-10 Xa yalivulayo elesihlanu itywina, ndabona phantsi kwesibingelelo imiphefumlo yababebulewe ngenxa yelizwi likaThixo nangenxa yobungqina; khwaza kakhulu “Owu Nkosi, wena ongcwele noyinyaniso, koda kube nini na ude ugwebe abo bahleli emhlabeni uze uliphindezelele igazi lethu?”

buza: Ngoobani abo babulawa ngenxa yelizwi likaThixo?
impendulo: ngcwele! Babulawa ngokwenyama ngenxa yamaKristu ayigcinayo inyaniso kwaye angqina ngoYesu ". umphefumlo "Yahluliwe emzimbeni," umphefumlo Liphindezeleni igazi likaThixo. Njengokuba iNkosi uYesu yathi: “Ningaboyiki abo babulala umzimba, kodwa bengenako ukuwubulala wona umphefumlo; ’ ( Mateyu 10:28 )

(2) Okungabandakanywayo " umphefumlo Thetha, asiva

buza: " umphefumlo "Ukuthetha → Ngaba iindlebe zomntu ziyakuva?"
impendulo: kuphela" umphefumlo "Ukuthetha, akukho mntu unokukuva! Umzekelo, ukuba uthe cwaka entliziyweni yakho: "Molo" → oku " umphefumlo wobomi "Thetha! Kodwa le" umphefumlo Xa uthetha, ukuba isandi asidluli emlonyeni wenyama, iindlebe zomntu azikwazi ukuva, kuphela " umphefumlo wobomi “Xa izandi ziveliswa ngolwimi nemilebe, iindlebe zomntu ziyaziva;
Omnye umzekelo kukuba abantu abaninzi bakholelwa ukuba " ngaphandle komzimba "ingxoxo, nini" umphefumlo "Ukushiya umzimba," umphefumlo Uyawubona umzimba wakho kodwa umzimba womntu iliso leze andiboni" umphefumlo ", andikwazi ukubamba" umphefumlo ", ayinakusetyenziswa kunye " umphefumlo "Nxibelelana kwaye ungeva" umphefumlo "Ilizwi elithethayo.

Ngenxa yokuba uThixo ungumoya →→Ke ndiyakuva ka-Abheli “ umphefumlo "Amazwi entetho, nababuleweyo ngenxa yelizwi likaThixo." umphefumlo "Ilizwi lentetho. Kodwa iindlebe zethu zenyama azikwazi ukuva intetho yomphefumlo, kwaye umphefumlo awunakubonwa ngeso lenyama, kwaye awukwazi ukuchukumisa ngezandla.

Ngokuphathelele abangakholelwa kuThixo , abakholelwa ukuba abantu banemiphefumlo, kwaye bakholelwa ukuba zonke ezi zingqondweni kunye neminqweno esemzimbeni womntu .

ngokwenene" umphefumlo "Lowo unako ukuhlala yedwa ngaphandle komzimba usenokuthetha! Njengoko kubhaliwe → Thetha izinto zomoya kubantu bomoya; kodwa abantu benyama abayi kuqonda okanye baqonde. Ngale ndlela, ngaba uyayiqonda?

3 Umzimba ngaphandle komphefumlo ufile

EKAYAKOBI 2:26 Njengokuba umzimba, ungekho umphefumlo, ufile, ngokunjalo ukholo, ingekho imisebenzi, lufile nalo.

buza: Bekuya kwenzeka ntoni ukuba umzimba ubungenamphefumlo?
impendulo: Umzimba ufile ngaphandle komphefumlo →Ubomi bomntu "usegazini", " ubomi ” → ngu “ umphefumlo "," Igazi “Igxala ukuya kwilungu ngalinye lomzimba, aze amalungu abe nobomi. Igazi “Apho ingaphumi kumalungu omzimba, kuya kubakho ukuba ndindisholo nokungabi nazingqondo, yaye umzimba uya kufela kuloo ndawo. Ngokomzekelo, abanye abantu bathwaxwa yihemiplegia, oko kukuthi, i-hemiplegia, yaye inxalenye yomzimba isuke ingekho zingqondweni. Ngoko ke, umzimba ngaphandle komphefumlo ufile→→" umphefumlo "Ukushiya umzimba, oko kukuthi" umphefumlo wobomi "Ukushiya umzimba, akukho nto" umzimba ophilayo "yiyo i fa ye. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

(Phawula:" umphefumlo "Xa ishiya umzimba - njengomlomo" nomsindo ", ayisiyiyo le nto ibonakala ngayo emfanekisweni, umfanekiso wongezwa nje ukukwazisa ubudlelwane phakathi komphefumlo nomzimba)

Ukwabelana ngemibhalo yeVangeli, ephefumlelwe nguMoya kaThixo Abasebenzi bakaYesu Krestu, uMzalwana uWang*Yun, uDade uLiu, uDade uZheng, uMzalwana uCen, kunye nabanye osebenza nabo baxhasa kwaye basebenza kunye kumsebenzi wevangeli weBandla likaYesu Krestu. Kanye njengoko kubhaliwe eBhayibhileni: Ndiya kutshabalalisa ubulumko bezilumko kwaye ndikulahle ukuqonda kwezilumko - ziliqela lamaKristu ukusuka ezintabeni kunye nenkcubeko encinci kunye nolwazi oluncinane , ebabizela ukushumayela ivangeli kaYesu Krestu, ivangeli evumela abantu ukuba basindiswe, bazukiswe, kwaye imizimba yabo ikhululwe! Amen

articles.title: Imibuzo ebuzwayo: Ukholo ngaphandle kwemisebenzi lufile
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile yethu kuYakobi isahluko 2, iivesi 19-20, sizifunde kunye: Uyakholwa ukuba mnye kuphela uThixo, kwaye ukholelwa kakuhle koko; Mntundini ungento, uyathanda na ukwazi, ukuba ukholo olu, ingekho imisebenzi, lufile?

Namhlanje sizakufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane kunye “Ukholo ngaphandle kwemisebenzi lufile” Thandaza: U-Abha othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Umfazi onesidima【 ecaweni 】Thuma abasebenzi: ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo ezandleni zabo, elithethwa ngabo, eliziindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso, zozuko, nentlawulelo yemizimba yethu. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumlo yethu kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni→ Qonda ukuba ukukholelwa kuThixo ngaphandle kokukholelwa kuMsindisi uYesu kunye nokholo ngaphandle kokuhlaziywa koMoya oyiNgcwele kufile.

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

1. Ukuzithemba kunye nokuziphatha

(1) AmaYuda akholelwa kuThixo kodwa kungekhona kuYesu, yaye ihambo yawo yokuthobela umthetho ifile

EKAYAKOBI 2:19-20 Wena uyakholwa ukuba mnye uThixo, ukholwe kakuhle nokuba ziidemon; Mntundini ungento, uyathanda na ukwazi, ukuba ukholo olu, ingekho imisebenzi, lufile?

buza: Kutheni le nto indlela yamaYuda yokugcina umthetho ifile?
impendulo: "umYuda" ukuzithemba →Kholwa kuThixo, Kodwa ungakholelwa kuYesu ! UYakobi wathi → Uyakholelwa ukuba mnye kuphela uThixo ukholelwa oko ngokufanelekileyo.

buza: "umYuda" Ukuziphatha "Ingaba yin?"
impendulo: gcina umthetho

buza: Kutheni le nto izenzo zokuthobela umthetho zifile?
impendulo: Ukuba uthe akwawugcina umthetho, woba phantsi kwesiqalekiso somthetho; wonke uSirayeli uwaphule umthetho wakho; Kaloku thina sonile kuThixo. (Daniyeli 9:11)

(2) AmaYuda (akholwayo) kuYesu aze agcine umthetho (ukuziphatha) nawo afile

EkaYakobi Chapter 2 verse 8 kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Uze umthande ummelwane wakho ngoko uzithanda ngako. Kulungile ukuba uyawugcina lo mthetho wasebukhosini.

buza: Kutheni le nto “umsebenzi” wamaYuda akholelwa kuYesu aze agcine umthetho ufile?
impendulo: Kuba yena oya kuwugcina umthetho uphela, akhubeke mthethweni mnye, unetyala lokuwaphula wonke. Kuvela nokuba lowo uthe, Uze ungakrexezi, wathi, Uze ungabulali, nokuba akukrexezi, kodwa ubulala, wophula umthetho. ( Yakobi 2:10-11 )

→UYakobi wathi: “Yibani ngabenzi belizwi, ningabi ngabaphulaphuli kuphela ngokugcina ngenyameko umthetho ogqibeleleyo owenza abantu bakhululeke, ningawulibali emva kokuwuva, kodwa niwenze.

UYakobi wacela ukuba akholelwe kuYesu " kwakhona “Abazalwana abangamaYuda abagcina umthetho ngokuqinisekileyo baya kusikelelwa ukuba benza ubulungisa basemthethweni → Ngaba banokuqhelisela ubulungisa bomthetho? Hayi, yintoni le? iplagi “Ngokuphathelele abantu, abanako kwaphela ukubuzalisekisa ubulungisa bomthetho.

(3) Bakholelwa kuYesu nakwihambo yabo yokugcina umthetho iwa elubabalweni.

buza: Kutheni bengenako ukuphila ngobulungisa bomthetho?
impendulo: Wonke umntu ophila ngomthetho uphantsi kwesiqalekiso, kuba iziBhalo zithi: “Uqalekisiwe wonke umntu ongaqhubekiyo ekwenza konke okubhaliweyo encwadini yomthetho kuba iBhayibhile ithi: “Ilungisa liya kudla ubomi ngokholo.” ( Galati 3:10-11 ) Ngokucacileyo

ngoko ( uPawulosi ) wathi→→Nina nifuna ukugwetyelwa ngumthetho nahlukanisiwe noKristu, ngoko ke nizahlukanisiwe Wawa elubabalweni . Imbekiselo ( Galati 5:4 )

2. Ukholo lobuKristu kunye nokuziphatha

(1) Phila ngoMoya oyiNgcwele kwaye wenze ngoMoya oyiNgcwele

" ukuzithemba →"Kholwa kuYesu," Ukuziphatha “NgoMoya oyiNgcwele

isenzo

KUMAGALATI 5:25 Ukuba sidla ubomi ngokoMoya, masihambe nokuhamba kwangokoMoya.

buza: Buyintoni ubomi ngoMoya oyiNgcwele?
impendulo: Kholwa yigospile Yiqonde indlela eyiyo Kuba ukholiwe kuKrestu, utywinwe nguMoya oyiNgcwele othenjisiweyo →→ Oku kukuphila ngoMoya oyiNgcwele. Amen. Jonga kwabase-Efese 1:13

buza: Kuthetha ukuthini ukuhamba ngoMoya?
impendulo: Njengoko siphila ngoMoya oyiNgcwele, kufuneka sithembele “ uMoya oyiNgcwele "Ukusebenza kuthi →→ yenza umsebenzi ohlaziyiweyo , oku kukuhamba ngoMoya oyiNgcwele. " ukuzithemba "→ Kholwa kuYesu," Ukuziphatha “Hambani ngokoMoya; musani ukuhamba ngomthetho, njengokuba Ukuziphatha kobuKristu →yiyo" uMoya oyiNgcwele "Ukwenza isenzo sokuhlaziya kumKristu → ukwenziwa ngokutsha nguMoya oyiNgcwele → kuya kubakho isipho soMoya oyiNgcwele → Ukuba kukhona enye Isipho sesenzo sokushumayela ivangeli kukushumayela ivangeli likaYesu Krestu ukuze abantu basindiswe, bazukiswe, kwaye imizimba yabo ikhululwe, kukho izenzo zoMoya oyiNgcwele ezinika ukholo; iidemon kukho izenzo zokwenza imimangaliso nokuthetha ngeelwimi Izenzo zesiphiwo nobugosa... njalo njalo. Isalathiso (1 kwabaseKorinte 12:4-11), olu lukholo nokuziphatha kobuKristu. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

3 Ukholo lunokugqibelela ngezenzo

EkaYakobi Isahluko 2 Indinyana 22 Kuya kubonakala ukuba ukholo luhamba kunye nemisebenzi yakhe, luze ukholo lugqibelele ngokwasemisebenzini yakhe.

articles.content:
1. Igama likaYesu

Ukuzalwa kukaYesu Kristu kubhaliwe ngolu hlobo: UMariya unina wayesele eganelwe uYosefu, kodwa bengekatshati, uMariya wamitha ngoMoya oyiNgcwele. ...kuba oko kukhawulweyo phakathi kwakhe kungoMoya oyiNgcwele. Uza kuzala unyana, kufuneka umnike yena Ebizwa ngokuba nguYesu , kuba ufuna ukusindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo. ( Mateyu 1:18, 20-21 )

buza: Lithetha ukuthini igama elithi Yesu?
impendulo: 【 UYesu 】Igama lithetha ukuba ufuna ukusindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo. Amen!

umzekelo" U.K “Igama loMbutho weZizwe eziManyeneyo waseBritani noMntla Ireland lishunqulelwe ngokuthi → iUnited Kingdom;

Russian Federation isifinyezo→ Rhashiya ;

Ufinyezo lwe-United States of America → i-USA . Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

2. Igama likaYesu liyamangalisa

buza: Limangalisa kangakanani igama likaYesu?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

(1)ULizwi ke waba yinyama ( Yohane 1:14 )
(2) UThixo waba yinyama ( Yohane 1:1 )
(3)Umoya waba yinyama ( Yohane 4:24 )

Phawula : Ekuqaleni kwakukho uTao, uTao wayekunye noThixo, uTao enguThixo→→” indlela "Ukuba yinyama" uthixo “Yibani yinyama, uThixo unguMoya, intombi enyulu yakhawulwa ngoMoya Oyingcwele →--” umoya "Yaba yinyama." UYesu 】 Ngaba igama liyamangalisa? emangalisayo! Hayi okanye ewe! →→Kuba sizalelwe umntwana, sinikwe unyana, yaye urhulumente uya kuba segxalabeni lakhe. Igama lakhe kuthiwa nguMmangaliso, nguMcebisi, uThixo oligorha, nguSonini nanini, nguMthetheli woXolo. ( Isaya 9:6 )

Limangalisa kangakanani igama [likaYesu]? Igama lakhe nguMmangaliso,

1 Ingcali yeqhinga: Ihlabathi ladalwa ngaye—Khangela kumaHebhere 1 isahluko 2
2 UThixo uSomandla: Ulibengezelo lobuqaqawuli bukaThixo, umfanekiselo wakhe kanye; Akuba ebahlambulule abantu ezonweni, wahlala phantsi ngasekunene kobuKhulu emazulwini. Bhekisela kumaHebhere 1:3
3 UBawo ongunaphakade: Igama likaYesu liquka" utata Lowo undibonileyo mna umbonile uBawo; utsho njani na ukuthi, Sibonise uBawo? Mna ndikuye uBawo, uBawo ukum, akukholwa na? Anditsho ukuthi, uBawo ohleli kum, wenza okukokwakhe;
4 INkosana yoXolo: UYesu nguKumkani, uKumkani woXolo, uKumkani wendalo iphela, “uKumkani wookumkani, uNkosi kankosi” - bhekisa kwiSityhilelo 19:16 nakuIsaya 9:7
5 Nguye endinguye ——Bona iSahluko 3, indinyana 14
6 Yena nguAlfa no-Omega INkosi uThixo yathi: “Mna ndinguAlfa no-Omega (uAlfa, u-Omega: owokuqala nowokugqibela unobumba ababini bealfabhethi yesiGrike), uSomandla, lowo wayekho, ukhoyo, nozayo. Ingxelo 1:8)
7 Yena ungowokuqala nowokugqibela; Mna ndinguAlfa no-Omega, ndingowokuqala nowokugqibela; ” ( ISityhilelo 22:13 )→→【 UYesu 】Igama liyamangalisa! Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

UYOHANE 11:27 Wathi uMarta, Ewe, Nkosi, mna ndiyakholwa ukuba wena unguye uKristu, uNyana kaThixo, lowo uzayo ehlabathini.

articles.title: Ngubani uYesu?
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
buza: Ngubani uYesu?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

(1) UYesu nguNyana woThixo Osenyangweni

---*Iingelosi ziyangqina: UYesu nguNyana kaThixo*---
Isithunywa eso sathi kuye: “Musa ukoyika, Mariya, ngokuba ubabalwe nguThixo; uya kumitha, uzale unyana, umthiye igama elinguYesu. Yena uya kuba mkhulu, abizwe ngokuba nguNyana; yeNkosi uPhezukonke UThixo uya kumnika itrone kaDavide uyise, yaye uya kulawula phezu kwendlu kaYakobi ngonaphakade, nobukumkani bakhe abuyi kuba nasiphelo.” Wathi uMariya kwingelosi: “Ingenzeka njani na le nto kum, ngenxa yokuba ndingatshatanga? Waphendula ke wathi, UMoya oyiNgcwele uya kuza phezu kwakho, athi namandla Osenyangweni akusibekele; kungoko loo nto ingcwele izalwayo iya kubizwa ngokuba nguNyana kaThixo. uNyana kaThixo) ( Luka 1:30-35 ).

(2)UYesu nguMesiya

UYOHANE 1:41 Weza kuqala kumzalwana wakhe, uSimon, wathi kuye, Simfumene uMesiya (oko kukuthi ngentetho evakalayo, uKristu).
UYohane 4:25 Ithi intokazi leyo, Ndiyazi ukuba uMesiya uyeza, xa athe weza yena, uya kusityela izinto zonke.

(3)UYesu nguKristu

Akufika uYesu emideni yaseKesareya yakwaFilipu, wababuza abafundi bakhe, esithi, Bathi ndingubani na, Nyana woMntu? Athi uYesu, Nithi ndingubani na ke, omnye wakubaprofeti. Wena unguye uKristu, uNyana kaThixo ophilileyo . ( Mateyu 16:13-16 )

Wathi uMarta, “Nkosi, ndiyakholwa ukuba wena unguye uKristu, uNyana kaThixo, lowo uzayo ehlabathini.”

Phawula: uKristu nguye" umthanjiswa "," umsindisi ", lithetha umsindisi! Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda? → 1 Timoti Isahluko 2:4 Ufuna bonke abantu basindiswe kwaye bayazi inyaniso.

(4) UYesu: “Ndiyiloo nto ndiyiyo”!

UThixo wathi kuMoses: “Ndinguye endinguye” waza kwakhona wathi: “Uze uthi koonyana bakaSirayeli, Lowo ukhoyo undithumile kuni.” ( Eksodus 3:14 ) Ngoko ke, uYehova wahlabela mgama wathi: “Uya kuthi ke koonyana bakaSirayeli, bandithume mna;

(5) UYesu wathi: “Ndingowokuqala nowokugqibela.

Ndithe ndakumbona, ndawa ezinyaweni zakhe, ndaba njengofileyo. Wasibeka isandla sakhe sokunene phezu kwam, wathi, Musa ukoyika; mna ndingowokuqala nowokugqibela, odla ubomi. ” nezitshixo zeHadesi ( ISityhilelo 1:17-18 ).

(6) UYesu wathi: “Mna ndinguAlfa no-Omega”

Ithi iNkosi uThixo: “Mna ndinguAlfa no-Omega (uAlfa, u-Omega: owokuqala nowokugqibela unobumba ababini bealfabhethi yesiGrike), uSomandla, lowo wayekho, ukhoyo, nozayo.

(7) UYesu wathi: “Ndim isiqalo yaye ndisisiphelo”

Waza wathi kum, Kwenzekile! Mna ndinguAlfa no-Omega, isiqalo nesiphelo. Mna ndiya kumnika amanzi omthombo wobomi lowo unxaniweyo ngesisa ukuba asele (IsiTyhilelo 21 ivesi 6).
Yabona, ndiyeza kamsinya; umvuzo wam unam, wovuza elowo ngokwemisebenzi yakhe. Mna ndinguAlfa no-Omega; ( ISityhilelo 22:12-13 )

Phawula: Ngokuhlolisisa ezi ngxelo zezibhalo zingasentla, sinokufumanisa oku: Ngubani uYesu? 》→→ UYesu UNyana kaThixo Osenyangweni, uMesiya, uKristu, uKumkani othanjisiweyo, uMkhululi, uMkhululi, mna ndinguye, owokuqala, owokugqibela, uAlfa, u-Omega, isiqalo nesiphelo.

→→Ukususela emaphakadeni, ukususela ekuqaleni ukuya ekupheleni kwehlabathi, bekukho [ UYesu ]! Amen. Njengoko iBhayibhile isitsho: “Ekuqalekeni kwendalo kaYehova, ekuqaleni, ngaphambi kokuba idale zonke izinto, ndandikho.
Kwasephakadeni, kwasentloko, Kwasemaphakadeni, Ndasekwa.
Akukho nzonzobila, akukho mthombo wamanzi amaninzi; Ndiye ndabeleka .
Zingekabekwa iintaba, Zingekaveli iinduli; Ndiye ndabeleka .
Akadalanga uYehova ihlabathi namasimi alo, nomhlaba walo; Ndiye ndabeleka .
Walizinzisa izulu, ndabakho apho, wabuzunguleza ubuso bamanzi anzongonzongo;
Uloqinisa izulu phezulu; uzinzinzisa iimithombo ngaphantsi, umise imida yolwandle; uvingca amanzi ukuba angaweli elizwini lakhe, useke iziseko zehlabathi.
Ngelo xesha, mna ( UYesu ) kuye ( ubawo osezulwini ) apho wayengumakhi onobuchule, emthanda imihla ngemihla, evuya ngamaxesha onke phambi kwakhe, evuya kwindawo ayilungisele abantu ukuba bahlale kuyo, evuya ngaye. phila phakathi kwehlabathi.
Ke ngoko, bonyana, ndiveni; Hayi, uyolo lwalowo uzigcinayo iindlela zam! Amen! Imbekiselo ( IMizekeliso 8:22-32 ), ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

(8) UYesu unguKumkani wookumkani neNkosi yeenkosi

Ndakhangela, ndabona izulu livulekile. Kwakukho ihashe elimhlophe, nomkhweli walo wayebizwa ngokuba nguThembekile, nguNyaniso, ogwebayo esenza imfazwe ngobulungisa. Amehlo akhe enjengelangatye lomlilo, nasentloko izizithsaba ezininzi; negama libhaliwe, elingaziwa bani ngaphandle kwakhe. Wayembethe igazi; igama lakhe lalinguLizwi likaThixo. Imlandela yonke imikhosi esemazulwini, ikhwele amahashe amhlophe, yambethe ilinen ecikizekileyo, emhlophe, ecocekileyo. ... naphezu kwengubo yakhe nasethangeni lakhe kubhalwe igama: Kumkani wookumkani, Nkosi kankosi . ” ( ISityhilelo 19:11-14, indinyana 16 )

articles.title: UYesu wakhawulwa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele waza wazalwa yintombi enyulu
articles.author: admin
articles.content:

(1) Kufuneka uzalwe ngokutsha

1 Bazalwa ngamanzi nanguMoya —Funda uYohane 3 indinyana 5-7
[UMoya Oyingcwele] Yiba nathi ngonaphakade→→ndiya kucela kuBawo, yaye uBawo uya kuninika omnye uMthetheleli (okanye inguqulelo: uMthuthuzeli; lo ungezantsi), ukuze abe nani ngonaphakade, uMoya oyiNgcwele wenyaniso. , Le yinto ihlabathi elingenako ukuyamkela ngenxa yokuba lingamboni, lingamazi nokumazi. Nina ke niyamazi, ngokuba uhleli nani, kanjalo uya kuba kuni. ( Yohane 14:16-17 )

2 Nizelwe enyanisweni yeendaba ezilungileyo —Funda eyoku-1 kwabaseKorinte 4:15 nakuYakobi 1:18

3 Bazalwa nguThixo —Funda uYohane 1:12-13

(2) Yityani nisele umzimba negazi leNkosi

Lowo uyidlayo eyam inyama, alisele elam igazi, unobomi obungunaphakade; ndaye mna ndiya kumvusa ngomhla wokugqibela. Inyama yam ikukudla, inyaniso, negazi lam liluselo. Lowo uyidlayo eyam inyama, alisele elam igazi, uhleli kum, nam ndihleli kuye. ( Yohane 6:54-56 )

(3) Thina singumzimba kaKristu

1 KWABASEKORINTE 12:27 Nina ningumzimba kaKristu, yaye elowo kuni lilungu.
KWABASE-EFESE 5:30 Kuba singamalungu omzimba wayo (izinye izibhalo zongeza: amathambo akhe nenyama yakhe).

Phawula: " uImanuweli "."UThixo unathi"→→kuba sizelwe nguThixo" Umntu omtsha" Ngumzimba nobomi beNkosi, amathambo nenyama yayo, namalungu omzimba kaKristu. Imanuweli uThixo unathi ngamaxesha onke "Ngoko, uyayiqonda?
→→ uMoya oyiNgcwele Hlalani kumzimba kaKristu, lowo ke singamalungu, yaye nangona kukho amalungu amaninzi, kodwa mnye umzimba - bhekisa kweyoku-1 kwabaseKorinte 12:12 → Kuba apho kukho ababini okanye abathathu egameni lam. ecaweni “Xa bahlanganisene ndawonye, ndilapho phakathi kwabo.”— Mateyu 18:20 .

Namhlanje, amakholwa amaninzi angakuqondiyo ukuzalwa ngokutsha akholelwa ukuba xa ndenze isono, uThixo ukude nam; xa ndingenzanga sono, uThixo unam, ngoko bahlala bethandaza kuThixo. Yiza "Yiba nam" → Bayaqonda ukuba "uThixo unathi" kuthetha → ukuba abantu bakunye xa bekunye okanye behlanganisene kunye xa abantu behamba, abasekho, njengokuhamba komyeni kwikhaya lokuzalwa, indoda nomfazi abasekho; abanye abantu bakholelwa ukuba uThixo ungaphezu kwexesha kunye nendawo, ukuba uThixo unebandla xa amazwe asehlabathini ehlanganisana, aze uThixo ahambe emva kokuba icawa ihlanganisene →→Ezi mbono zabantu aziqondwa kakuhle. UImanuweli ” Ubukho bukaThixo.

Kuba uThixo wethu mkhulu kunehlabathi → 1 Yohane 4:4 Nina ningabakaThixo, nibeyisile bona; ngokuba lowo ukuni nguyena mkhulu kunalowo usehlabathini.
Abo bazelwe nguThixo bahlala kuKristu → bangamathambo omzimba wakhe, inyama yakhe, kwaye sisebukumkanini bukaThixo, ngoko ke uThixo unathi ngonaphakade! Amen. articles.author: admin
articles.content:
1: UYesu yinzala yomfazi

buza: Ngaba uYesu wayeyinzala yendoda okanye yomfazi?

Impendulo: UYesu yimbewu yomfazi

(1) UYesu wazalwa yintombi enyulu eyakhawulwa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele

Ukuzalwa kukaYesu Kristu kubhaliwe ngolu hlobo: UMariya unina wayesele eganelwe uYosefu, kodwa bengekatshati, uMariya wamitha ngoMoya oyiNgcwele. ...kuba oko kukhawulweyo phakathi kwakhe kungoMoya oyiNgcwele. ( Mateyu 1:18, 20 )

(2) UYesu wazalwa yintombi enyulu

1 Isiprofeto Sokuzalwa Kwentombi Enyulu →→Ngoko ke iya kuninika umqondiso ngokwayo iNkosi: Intombi le iya kumitha, izale unyana, abizwe ngokuba nguImanuweli (oko kukuthi ngentetho evakalayo, uThixo unathi). ( Isaya 7:14 )

2 Ukuzaliseka kokuzalwa kweNtombi enyulu →→Ucinga ngako oko, kwabonakala kuye isithunywa seNkosi kuye ephupheni, sisithi, Yosefu, nyana kaDavide, musa ukoyika, mthabathele uMariya, abe ngumfazi wakho; kuba oko kukhawulweyo phakathi kwakhe kungoMoya oyiNgcwele; UMoya oyiNgcwele.” Yiza, uza kuzala unyana. Kufuneka umthiye igama. Igama lakhe nguYesu, kuba uya kubasindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo ” (eguqulelwe ngokuthi “Emmanuel”) UThixo unathi.” ( Mateyu 1:20-23 )

(3) UYesu wakhawulwa yintombi enyulu ngoMoya oyiNgcwele

buza: Ngaba uYesu wazalwa nguYise?
impendulo: Ngaba uThixo uBawo unguMoya? Ewe! →→UThixo unguMoya (okanye akanalizwi), ngoko abo bamnqulayo bamele bamnqule ngoMoya nangenyaniso. ( Yohane 4:24 ), ngaba uMoya kaYise unguMoya oyiNgcwele? Ewe! Ngaba Umoya kaYesu unguMoya Oyingcwele? Ewe! Ngaba uMoya kaYise, uMoya woNyana, noMoya oyiNgcwele mnye? Iphuma kumoya mnye na? Ewe. Ke ngoko, yonke into ezelwe nguMoya oyiNgcwele kwaye izelwe nguMoya izelwe nguYise kwaye izelwe nguThixo. Ngoko, uyayiqonda? →Mayela noNyana wakhe uYesu Kristu, iNkosi yethu, owazalwa engowembewu kaDavide ngokwenyama, wabonakalaliswa ukuba unguNyana kaThixo, enamandla, ngomoya wobungcwele, ngokuvuka kwabafileyo. ( Roma 1:3-4 )

2: Sikholelwa ukuba uYesu ukwayimbewu yomfazi

buza: Siyinzala kabani esizalwa ngokwenyama ngabazali bethu?
impendulo: Bayinzala yamadoda→Yonke into ezalwa ngokudibana kwendoda nomfazi yinzala yendoda. Ngokomzekelo, uAdam waphinda walala nomfazi wakhe (uEva), waza wazala unyana waza wamthiya igama elinguSete, elithetha ukuthi: “UThixo undinike omnye unyana esikhundleni sika-Abheli, kuba uKayin wambulala naye Wazala unyana, wathi igama lakhe nguEnoshe. Ngelo xesha abantu banqula igama likaNdikhoyo. ( Genesis 4:25-26 )

buza: Yinzala kabani esikholelwa kuYesu?
impendulo: yinzala yabafazi ! Ngoba? →→Ngaba uYesu uyinzala yomfazi? Ewe! Ngoko sizalwa ngabani xa sikholelwa kuYesu Kristu?

1 bazelwe ngamanzi nangoMoya ,

2 abazelwe yinyaniso yeendaba ezilungileyo ,

3 ozelwe nguThixo

→→Sizalelwe kuYesu Krestu kunye nenyaniso yeendaba ezilungileyo, kuba uYesu eyimbewu yomfazi, sizalelwa kuYesu Kristu iNkosi, yaye thina singamalungu omzimba wayo bubomi bayo → njengoko iNkosi uYesu yathi: “Lowo uyidlayo eyam inyama, alisele elam igazi, unobomi obungunaphakade (oko kukuthi, lowo unabo ubomi bukaYesu unobomi obungunaphakade); ndaye mna ndiya kumvusa ngomhla wokugqibela. ( Yohane 6:54 ) Ngaba uyakuqonda oku?

Ukwabelana ngokubhaliweyo: Uphefumlelwe nguMoya kaThixo uMzalwana uWang, uDade uLiu, uDade uZheng, uMzalwana uCen, abasebenzi bakaYesu Krestu, baxhasa kwaye basebenze kunye kumsebenzi wevangeli weBandla likaYesu Krestu.

articles.title: Inzala yamadoda
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Inzala yamadoda

buza: Siyinzala kabani esizalwa ngokwenyama ngabazali bethu?
impendulo: Inzala yamadoda ,

Bonke abantwana abazalwa ngokumanyaniswa kwendoda nomfazi bayinzala yendoda, njengabantwana abazalwa “kukhokho wokuqala” uAdam nomfazi wakhe uEva → Ngenye imini, indoda “uAdam” yaba neentlobano zesini nomfazi wayo uEva. , wamitha uEva, wazala uKayin (oko kukuthi, ukufumana), wathi, UYehova undinike indoda. UAbheli wayengumalusi; uKayen wayengumlimi. ( Genesis 4:1-2 )
UAdam waphinda walala nomkakhe, wazala unyana, wathi igama lakhe nguSete; oko kukuthi, uThixo undinike omnye unyana esikhundleni sika-Abheli; Wamthiya igama elinguEnoshe. Ngelo xesha abantu banqula igama likaNdikhoyo. ( Genesis 4:25-26 )

buza: "Ukhokho wokuqala woluntu" UAdam "Ivela phi?"
impendulo: Iphuma eluthulini !

(1) UYehova uThixo wadala umntu ngothuli

UYehova uThixo wambumba umntu ngothuli lwasemhlabeni, waphefumlela emathatheni akhe impefumlo yobomi, waba ngumphefumlo ophilileyo; igama lakhe ke nguAdam. ( Genesis 2:7 )

(2) UAdam wayengokwemvelo

IBhayibhile ikwabhala oku: “Owokuqala umntu, uAdam, waba ngumphefumlo odla ubomi, unomoya (umoya: okanye uguqulelwe njengenyama)”; ( 1 Korinte 15:45 )

(3) Ozelwe ngothuli uya kubuyela kwaseluthulini

buza: Kutheni abantu bephelela emhlabeni?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

1 Kuba abantu babewaphula umthetho, bonile, badla kuwo umthi wokwazi okulungileyo nokubi.

UYehova uThixo wambeka umntu emyezweni we-Eden, ukuba awusebenze, awugcine. UYehova uThixo wamyalela wathi: “Ungatya kuwo nawuphi na umthi womyezo, kodwa uze ungadli kuwo umthi wokwazi okulungileyo nokubi, kuba mhla uthe wadla kuwo uya kufa ngokuqinisekileyo.” 2:15) -17 amaqhina)

2 Ukwaphula isivumelwano kunye nokwenza ulwaphulo-mthetho, ukufumana isiqalekiso somthetho

Wathi kuAdam, Ngokuba umphulaphule umkakho, wadla kuwo umthi endakuwisela umthetho ngawo, ndathi, Ungadli kuwo, uqalekisiwe umhlaba ngenxa yakho; uya kusebenza nzima yonke imihla yobomi bakho, udle kuwo. ." kufuneka Uya kukuntshulela ameva neenkunzane; uya kudla umfuno wasendle; ( Genesis 3:17-19 )

(4) Wonke umntu uyafa

Ngokwesiphelo, wonke umntu umiselwe ukuba afe kube kanye, kwaye emva kokufa kuya kubakho umgwebo. ( Hebhere 9:27 )

(5) Kuya kubakho umgwebo emva kokufa

Phawula: Bonke oonyana neentombi zenzala yomntu bonile, basilela eluzukweni lukaThixo, yaye baphantsi kwesiqalekiso somthetho → Bonke abantu bamiselwe ukuba bafe kube kanye, yaye baya kufa, yaye emva kokufa kuya kubakho umgwebo; kwaye baya kohlwaywa ngokwezenzo zabo phantsi komthetho Umgwebo→→intshabalalo yesibini--bhekisela kwiSityhilelo 20:13-15

Ndababona abafileyo, abancinane nabakhulu, bemi phambi kwetrone. Zavulwa iincwadi, kwavulwa nenye incwadi, eyeyobomi. Abafileyo bagwetywa ngokwezinto ezibhaliweyo kwezo ncwadi, nangokwezenzo zabo. Lwathi ulwandle lwabakhupha abafileyo abakhona, kwathi ukufa neHadesi kwabakhupha abafileyo abakhona, bagwetywa elowo ngokwemisebenzi yakhe. Kwaphoswa ke ukufa nelabafileyo edikeni lomlilo; Ukuba igama lakhe alibhalwanga encwadini yobomi, uya kuphoswa edikeni lomlilo. Jonga kwiSityhilelo isahluko sama-20

(6) Wathi uYesu! umelwe kukuba uzalwe ngokutsha

buza: Kutheni simele sizalwe ngokutsha?
impendulo: Ukuba umntu akathanga azalwe ngokutsha, akanakububona ubukumkani bukaThixo, akanakungena ebukumkanini bukaThixo. Ukuba umntu akaphindanga azalwe, uya kufumana umgwebo womhla wokugqibela → ukuphoswa edikeni lomlilo, okukukufa kwesibini (oko kukuthi, ukufa komphefumlo). Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Ngoko ke uYesu waphendula wathi: “Inene, inene, ndithi kuwe, Ngaphandle kokuba umntu azalwe ngokutsha, akanakububona ubukumkani bukaThixo.” UYesu wathi: “Inene, inene, ndithi kuwe, Ngaphandle kokuba umntu azalwe. ngamanzi noMoya Ukuba nizelwe yinyama, aninakungena ebukumkanini bukaThixo.

articles.title: Iimpazamo kwiMfundiso yeCawa yaNamhla (uMfundiso 2)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile kweyoku-1 kuTimoti isahluko 3 indinyana 15 size sifunde kunye: Ukuba ndithe ndalibala, wofunda indlela yokuziphatha endlwini kaThixo. Eli libandla likaThixo ophilileyo, intsika nesiseko senyaniso .

Namhlanje siyaqhubeka nokuvavanya, ubudlelwane kunye nokwabelana " Iimposiso kwiimfundiso zeCawa namhlanje "(Hayi. 2 ) Thetha kwaye uthandaze: “Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu wasezulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhleli enathi”! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Umfazi olungileyo" ecaweni "Thumelani abasebenzi ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo ezandleni zabo, elithetha ngabo, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwethu neendaba ezilungileyo zokungena ebukumkanini bamazulu! Yanga iNkosi uYesu ingaqhubeka ikhanyisela amehlo emiphefumlo yethu kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu. ukuqonda iBhayibhile ukuze sive, Bona inyaniso yokomoya→ Sifundise ukuba sibabona njani abo bangabendlu kaThixo, ibandla likaThixo ophilayo . Amen!

Imithandazo, nezibongozo, nezibongozo, nemibulelo, neentsikelelo, zisegameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

1. Icawa yaseNdlu

buza: Yintoni usapho?
impendulo: Usapho lubhekisa kwiyunithi yobomi bentlalo eyenziwe ngokwesiseko somtshato, ubudlelwane begazi okanye ubudlelwane bokuthatha umntwana ongamzalanga abe ngowabo, kunye neemvakalelo njengeqhina nobudlelwane bobudlelwane.

buza: Yintoni icawa?
impendulo: Icawe ngumzimba kaKristu, kwaye amaKristu ngamalungu kaKristu. Imbekiselo kwabase-Efese

buza: Usapho lumalunga nantoni?
impendulo: Usapho lumalunga nobomi → iimfuno ezisisiseko zobomi emhlabeni, kunye nendlela yokubuqhuba ubomi.

buza: Ingentoni icawe?
impendulo: Icawe imalunga nobomi → Ubomi bokuzalwa kwakhona, basezulwini” Iimpahla “Yambathani ilinen ecikizekileyo, yambathani uKristu,” Ukutya “Sela amanzi okomoya, utye ukutya kokomoya,” phila “Hlalani kuKristu,” KULUNGILE "UMoya oyiNgcwele usebenza kuthi kwaye wenza umsebenzi wakhe wokwakha umzimba kaKristu. Amen

1 KUTIMOTI 3:15 Ukuba ke ndithe ndakubambezela, uze ufunde indlela omelwe kukuziphatha ngayo endlwini kaThixo. Le ndlu libandla likaThixo ophilileyo, intsika nesiseko senyaniso.

buza: Yintoni iBandla likaThixo ophilileyo?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

1 Ibandla leNkosi uYesu Kristu → UPawulos noSilas noTimoti babhalela ibandla likaThixo uBawo wethu neNkosi uYesu Kristu eTesalonika. Imbekiselo (2 Tesalonika Isahluko 1:1)
2 Icawa ekhaya →Ibandla lendlu kaPrisila noAkwila Imbekiselo ( Roma 16:3-5 )
3 Ibandla ekhaya →Imibuliso kubazalwana, nakuNimfas abaseLawodike, nakwibandla elisendlwini yakhe. Imbekiselo ( Kolose 4:15 )
4 Ibandla lakho →NoApiya udade wethu, noArkipo umphumi-mkhosi kunye nathi, kwanebandla elisendlwini yakho. Imbekiselo ( Filemon 1:2 )

buza: IBhayibhile inengxelo yebandla likaThixo ophilayo→→ 1 IBandla leNkosi uYesu Kristu, 2 ecaweni ekhaya, 3 ecaweni ekhaya, 4 Icawe yakho yasekhaya.

Yintoni umahluko phakathi kwala mabandla kunye (nendlu) yeecawe?
Impendulo: IBandla likaThixo Ongunaphakade Ewe Thetha ngobomi →Vumela abantu bazuze ubomi, basindiswe, bazuze ubomi obungunaphakade! ;

kunye ( usapho )Ewe Thetha ngobomi →" icawa yasekhaya ”→Kuthetha ukuthetha ngendlela yobomi, njengokholo nobomi→ Biza abantu ukuba bakholwe kuKristu Indlela yokuphila kuthetha ukutya kakuhle, ukuphila kakuhle, nokwenza kakuhle.

" icawa yasekhaya " Nantso into engalunganga → isiseko Yakhelwe ebomini, Ayikhiwanga ebomini , ngaloo ndlela ekhokelela kwihlabathi " icawa yasekhaya "Ukubhideka kweemfundiso neempazamo → Ukubhideka kweemfundiso kudlala kumaqhinga kaMtyholi noSathana, avelisa amawexuki amaninzi nabaprofeti bobuxoki. OoKristu bobuxoki beza, yaye babekho nakwicawa yokuqala, yaye ngoku bakho naseTshayina → njengaseMpuma. Umbane, uThixo uSomandla, abakhwazayo, bakhale iiNqaku ezinjengokuzalwa ngokutsha, isisa, ngokomoya, iigusha ezilahlekileyo, ivangeli yobabalo, iNqaba yeMarko yaseKorea, njl.

Umbuzo: Zeziphi iimfundiso ezigwenxa zecawe “yosapho”?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

(1) Likhanyele igazi likaKristu ( Kanye ) uhlamba izono zabantu

Bacinga ukuba uKristu uhlambulula kuphela amakholwa ( Ngaphambili ); nikholwe eNkosini ( ); emva ) izono azikakwenziwa, njengezono zanamhlanje, zangomso, emva kwezono zangomso, izono zengqondo, izono zokufunga, njl. Emva kokuba zenziwe, baqala ukuvuma izono zabo, baguquke, bathandazele kaKristu" Igazi "Yiza uhlambe izono, ucime izono, usigubungele. Ukuba wenza izono yonke imihla, zihlambe yonke imihla kwaye uzithambise yonke imihla. Ukususela ekuqaleni konyaka." hlamba “Ekupheleni konyaka.

buza: Ziziphi iziphumo xa uhlambulula izono zakho amaxesha amaninzi?

impendulo: Ukuba uhlamba izono izihlandlo ezininzi, uKristu uya kuphalaza igazi lakhe izihlandlo ezininzi;

1 ( embi ) UKristu wasebenzisa “ Igazi " Kanye Ukungena kwiNdawo eNgcwele kuhlambulula abantu ezonweni zabo
wangena kwaba kanye kweyona ngcwele, kungengagazi leebhokhwe nelamathole, kungegazi elilelakhe, efumene ucamagushelo olungunaphakade. Imbekiselo ( Hebhere 9:12 )

2 ( embi ) yonyana wakhe Igazi Kwakhona hlamba zonke izono zethu
Ukuba sihamba ekukhanyeni, njengokuba uThixo esekukhanyeni, soba sinobudlelane omnye nomnye, lithi negazi likaYesu Kristu, uNyana wakhe, lisihlambulule kuso sonke isono. ( 1 Yohane 1:7 )

3 ( embi ) Idini likaKristu elinye lenza abo bangcwaliswayo bafezeke ngonaphakade
Sangcwaliswa ngale nto, ngokusondezwa komzimba kaYesu Kristu, kwaba kanye. …Kuba ngadini linye ubenza bagqibelele ngokusephakadeni abo bangcwalisiweyo. Imbekiselo ( Hebhere 10:10, 14 )

4 Yintoni enzulu ngakumbi →kangakanani ke, ukuba abantu bamnyathele phantsi uNyana kaThixo, bamenza? umnqophiso ongcwalisayo ye Igazi Yiphathe njengesiqhelo , yaye ehlekisa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele wobabalo, siya kuba qatha kangakanani na isohlwayo amele asifumane, ucinga? Imbekiselo ( Hebhere 10:29 ).

Phawula: “Inkonzo yasekhaya” abadala, abefundisi, nabashumayeli bayaziphepha ezi ndinyana zilumkisayo ziqatha.

(2) Ngokuvuma ukuba likhoboka lesono phantsi komthetho

buza: Kukho oonyana bakaThixo na phantsi komthetho?
impendulo: Hayi!

buza: Ngoba?
impendulo: UKristu wabakhulula abo babephantsi komthetho ukuze bafumane oonyana → Lithe ke lakuzaliseka ixesha, uThixo wamthuma uNyana wakhe, othe wazalwa ngumntu oyinkazana; . Imbekiselo ( Galati 4:4-5 )

Phawula: Ukuba ukulungele ukuba phantsi komthetho, uya kwaphula umthetho, sisono. njengaye ) UYesu waphendula wathi kubo: “Inene, inene, ndithi kuni, Wonke umntu owenza isono ungamakhoboka esono. 34-35)

(3) Uyakhanyela ukuba nabani na ozelwe nguThixo akanakuze one

buza: Ngaba abantwana abazelwe ngokutsha bangona?
impendulo: Bonke abazelwe nguThixo abasayi kuze bone;

buza: Ngoba?
impendulo: Bonke abazelwe nguThixo aboni, ngokuba ilizwi likaThixo lihleli kuye; ( 1 Yohane 3:9 )
Siyazi ukuba bonke abazelwe nguThixo abasayi kuze bone; bonke abazelwe nguThixo baya kuzigcina; ( 1 Yohane 5:18 )

1 Bonke abazelwe nguThixo aboni; →(Kulungile)
2 Bonke abazelwe nguThixo aboni; →(Kulungile)
3 Bonke abahlala kuye aboni; →(Kulungile)

buza: Kutheni abo bazelwe nguThixo bengenasono?
impendulo: Ngokuba ilizwi (imbewu) likaThixo likhona entliziyweni yakhe, akanakona.

buza: Kuthekani ukuba umntu wenza ulwaphulo-mthetho?
impendulo : Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

1 Lowo umonayo akambonanga; — 1 Yohane 3:6
2 Lowo umonayo akamazi; (Engaluqondi usindiso lukaKristu)— 1 Yohane 3:6
3 Wonke umntu owonayo ungokaMtyholi; — 1 Yohane 3:8

buza: Bangabakabani na abantwana abangenasono? Ngabaphi abantwana abanesono?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi
【1】Abantwana abazelwe nguThixo→abasokuze bone!
【2】Abantwana abazalwa ziinyoka→→isono.
Kulapho kutyhilwa khona ukuba ngoobani na abangabantwana bakaThixo nabangabantwana bakaMtyholi. Nabani na ongawenziyo ubulungisa akangokaThixo, nalowo ungamthandiyo umzalwana wakhe. ( 1 Yohane 3:10 )

Phawula: UmKrestu ozelwe nguThixo → abayi kona → Yinyaniso yebhayibhile! KwabaseRoma 8:9 Ukuba ke uMoya kaThixo uhleli kuni, aningabo abenyama, ningaboMoya →→Ngamanye amazwi, kaThixo umoya Ukuba lihlala lihleli ezintliziyweni zenu, niyakuba njalo ayingowakhe inyama →Asiyonxalenye Ixhego lonayo, lawuthabatha umzimba wokufa; yeka uMoya oyiNgcwele . yeka UKrestu . yeka uthixo → "Uzelwe nguThixo" Umntu omtsha “Ubomi bufihlakele noKristu kuye uThixo, ngoko angáthini na ke ukona umntu? —Funda eyabaseKolose 3:3

Lowo usenzayo isono ungokaMtyholi →Ikwayinyani yebhayibhile. Uyaqonda?

Namhlanje abaninzi" icawa yasekhaya “Inkohliso yeyokuba, emva kokuba umntu ekholelwa eNkosini yaye esindisiwe, nangona engumntu olilungisa, ukwangumoni. Bathi amaKristu akaqhubeki esenza isono esingokwesini okanye akasiqhelanga ngokwesini. Abantu abangakholelwayo kuYesu , Kwakhona wathi akaqhubeki nokwenza ulwaphulo-mthetho ngokwesondo kwaye akaqhelanga ukwenza ulwaphulo-mthetho ngokwesondo Ngaba uyakholelwa? ) Uthini umahluko phakathi kwenkolelo yakho neyehlabathi? Ngaba unyanisile? ( uthixo ) uthe umhla otya ngawo kufuneka ube fa ," inyoka Akuqinisekanga ukuba uya kufa; uthixo ) uthi wonke umntu ozelwe nguThixo kufuneka Musa ukona,” inyoka “Kuthiwa akusayi kubakho sono sizingisayo okanye esisiqhelwayo. Ngaba uyawubona umahluko xa umamele kakuhle? Ungumntwana ozelwe nguThixo. Ngubani okholwayo uphulaphule? Nabani na ozelwe nguThixo soze one – le yinyaniso esebhayibhileni ! awukwazi inyaniso zihlobene" ububuxoki "Hayi, ungakholelwa nantoni na" inguqulelo entsha yeBhayibhile 》, aba bantu bayitshintsha nje intsingiselo yantlandlolo yeBhayibhile kwiindawo ezininzi ( Umfanekiso ongezantsi ), abantwana bakaThixo bakholelwa kuphela kumazwi okuqala eBhayibhile. Uyaqonda? →→ Bathi amaKristu angamalungisa naboni ngaxeshanye bangumntu omtsha kunye nomntu omdala ngaxeshanye bangabakaThixo noMtyholi ngaxeshanye →→ Akukho mahluko phakathi kobumnyama kunye ukukhanya, umntu omdala kunye nomntu omtsha, nomoni kunye nelungisa Akukho mahluko phakathi kwabantu, abenyama kunye nokomoya, ubudemon kunye nobuthixo. abahlukananga → → Beka nje " isiqingatha ghost isiqingatha uthixo "Abantu baphuma, belungile kwaye bengalunganga, nokuba ufuna ukuba olu hlobo lwenkolelo lufe → → oku kungenxa yokuba abayiqondi" ukuzalwa ngokutsha “Kushunyayelwa ngabashumayeli abagwenxa→→ Indlela ka-ewe kunye no-hayi . Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

(4) Shumayela inyaniso yokulungileyo nokubi

【IsiBhalo】
KWABASEKORINTE II 1:18 Ethembekile nje uThixo, ndithi, Akukho ewe nohayi, ngelizwi esinishumayeza lona.

buza: Yintoni →→ ewe kunye nohayi?
impendulo: Ewe kwaye hayi
Ingcaciso yeBhayibhile: ibhekisa kokulungileyo nokubi, njengoko bekutshiwo ngaphambili Ewe ", emva koko wathi " Hayi "Ngaphambi kokuba uthi" kunene ", emva koko wathi " engalunganga "Ngaphambi kokuba uthi" isiqinisekiso, ukuqondwa "; emva koko wathi" Nangona kunjalo, khanyela ", ukuthetha okanye ukushumayela → okulungileyo nokubi, ukungahambelani. Abazalwana noodade banokubhekisa ku" Indlela ka-ewe kunye no-hayi "inqaku.

(5) Chala xa sele usindisiwe, uhlala usindisiwe

Abazalwana noodade banokubhekisela “kwiBandla LeNkosi uYesu Kristu” ukuze bafumane eli nqaku.

(6) Ukugcina uMnqophiso oMtsha kukukholwa nokugcina iLizwi;

Bakufundisa ukugcina umnqophiso omtsha ( kwakhona ) gcina umthetho weTestamente eNdala → aba bantu bakrexeza → bhekisa kumaRoma 7:1-6

(7) Aboni abababalweyo

"Aboni" bakhanyiselwa ngobabalo lukaYesu Krestu kwaye bakholelwa kwivangeli Xa beyiqonda inyaniso, batywinwa nguMoya oyiNgcwele othenjisiweyo → → bangamalungisa. Hayi umoni. Awunakuhlala ungumoni nangona ufumene ubabalo. Ibinzana elithi “umoni onenceba” alikho eBhayibhileni, yaye andazi ukuba laqanjwa ngubani.

(8) Ugwetyelwe umoni

“Boni” → ngoku bagwetyelwa ngokukhululekileyo ngobabalo lukaThixo ngentlawulelo kaYesu Krestu. Imbekiselo ( Roma 3:24 ). "Aboni" bagwetyelwa ngokukhululekileyo ngobabalo lukaThixo nentlawulelo kaKristu Yesu → Ngoku abantwana bakaThixo babizwa ngokuba ngamalungisa asinako ukubiza abantwana bakaThixo ngokuthi "aboni abagwetyelwe", nto leyo engangqinelaniyo nengavisisaniyo. Uyaqonda?

"Iicawa zezindlu" nazo zineemfundiso ezininzi ezididayo nezitenxileyo, endingayi kungena kuzo apha.

2. Inkonzo kaThathu-Self

buza: Yintoni iThree-Self Church?
impendulo: Ibandla elizilawulayo, elizixhasayo, elizazisayo, nelizimeleyo. yiba ne" isibane "Hayi" I-oyile “Ahluliwe kuKristu, ungumhlobo wookumkani bomhlaba. Bona ISityhilelo 17:1-6
Akukho mahluko kwiimfundiso ezininzi phakathi kwamabandla asekhaya kunye namabandla kaThathu-Self Baphantse bafana.

3. UbuKatolika

Igama elipheleleyo lobuKatolika yi "Roman Catholic Church", ekwaziwa njengeCawa yamaRoma Katolika, okanye "iCawa yamaKatolika" ngokufutshane. "UPopu" umele igunya elingcwele emhlabeni kwaye ukhuphisana ngegunya elingcwele kunye noKristu, uKumkani weeKumkani kunye neNkosi yeeNkosi Zininzi kakhulu iingxabano kubuKatolika, ngoko asiyi kuxoxa ngazo apha.

Isine: Ihlelo le-Charismatic, ihlelo lokuLingling, khala kwaye uzalwe ngokutsha

" Charismatic “Umoya” wokuchas’ umthetho uyashukuma, ubeka izandla ukuze uthandazele ukuphiliswa, wenza imimangaliso, uthetha ngeelwimi, uprofeta, uzaliswa yimimoya engendawo aze awe phantsi, aqengqeleke, akhwaze yaye ahleke kabuhlungu.
" Ihlelo le-Lingling “Phuthumani ukuzaliswa nguMoya oyiNgcwele, nicule iingoma zoMoya, nidanise ngokomoya, nithethe ngeelwimi.
" Lila uze uzalwe kwakhona “Emva kokuvuma izono nokuguquka, amakholwa kufuneka alile ngokukrakra kangangeentsuku ezintathu nobusuku obuthathu ukuze azalwe ngokutsha.

Eyesihlanu: Umbane waseMpuma

"Umbane waseMpuma" owaziwa ngokuba nguThixo uSomandla
Owasetyhini uKristu “wobuxoki” wadalwa.

Isithandathu: Ukukhangela iigusha ezilahlekileyo, iVangeli yobabalo, uMark Tower

" Iigusha Ezilahlekileyo "Imelwe nguYao Guorong
" ivangeli yobabalo "UJoseph Ping, uLin Huihui kunye noXiao Bing ngabameli.
" Iigusha Ezilahlekileyo "kwaye" ivangeli yobabalo "Yonke into idlulisiwe → Indlela ka-ewe kunye no-hayi , azingqinelani.
" Marco House "Yaziswa eKorea, umzimba wenyama uyalinywa ukuba ube yiTao.

Silibona njani ibandla likaThixo ophilayo? Sebenzisa iBhayibhile" Wei Zi "Yilinganise nje kwaye uyazi.
umzekelo:

1 " Umlindi weSeventh-day Adventist “Xa ulapho, ucinga ukuba yonke into abayithethayo ilungile;
2 " icawa yasekhaya “Xa umamele intshumayelo apho, uya kuziva ukuba le nto bayithethayo ngobomi iyavakala;
3 " Inkonzo yeSandwich ” Usenokucinga ukuba le nto bathetha ngayo iyafana “necawe yasekhaya”.
4 " IVangeli yobabalo okanye iigusha ezilahlekileyo “Xa ubaphulaphula, uya kubhideka ngamazwi abo → Aniyi kukwazi ukuchaza ukuba zeziphi ezibubuxoki neziyinyaniso. Ukungangqinelani, okulungileyo nokubi .

Sifumene bona" imfundiso "Kuphela xa yahlukile kumazwi aphefumlelweyo yiBhayibhile apho sinokuthi → → Oko bakushumayelayo akusiyo ivangeli, kodwa imfundiso yabo, imigaqo yobomi, isikolo samabanga aphantsi kunye nobuxoki obungenamsebenzi. .

Kunjengokuba uYohane walumkisayo: “Bazalwana abaziintanda, musani ukukholwa ngoomoya bonke, bacikideni oomoya ukuba ngabakaThixo na; ngokuba baninzi abaprofeti ababuxoki, abaphume bangena ehlabathini. Bhekisela kuYohane 1 Isahluko 4 Indinyana 1 → Abazalwana noodade kufuneka bayazi indlela yokwahlula into " umoya wenyaniso →→Shumayela inyaniso yeBhayibhile, eyivangeli evumela abantu ukuba basindiswe, bazukiswe, baze bakhululwe; Umoya wemposiso “Iyaphambuka eBhayibhileni, ayiwalandeli amazwi aphefumlelweyo kaKristu, ibhidekisa indlela yeNkosi eyinyani, kwaye ishumayela iimfundiso zaYo, ubuxoki obungento yanto neemfundiso zehlabathi. Uyakuqonda oku?

Umbhalo weVangeli osuka ku:
ibandla leNkosi uYesu Krestu

Aba ngabantu abangcwele abahlala bodwa, ababalelwa kuzo zonke izizwe.
Njenge-144,000 yeentombi ezinyulu ezilandela iNkosi iMvana.

Amen!

→→Ndimbona esencotsheni nasendulini;
Aba ngabantu abahlala bodwa, ababalelwa kuzo zonke izizwe.
INumeri 23:9
Ngabasebenzi eNkosini uYesu Krestu: UMzalwana uWang*Yun, uDade uLiu, uDade uZheng, uMzalwana uCen... kunye nabanye abasebenzi abawuxhasa ngenzondelelo umsebenzi wevangeli ngokunikela ngemali nangokusebenza nzima, kunye nabanye abangcwele abasebenza nathi abakholwayo. ezi ndaba zilungileyo, amagama abo abhalwe encwadini yobomi. Amen! Imbekiselo kwabaseFilipi 4:3
