articles.title: Iimpazamo kwiMfundiso yeCawa yaNamhla (uMfundiso 1)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Icawa yama-Adventist

--Ifinyeziwe njengeBandla lamaSabatha amaSabatha

--iimpazamo zemfundiso:

1. Abo bagcina ileta → iSabatha

UMarko 2:27-28 (UYesu) wayesithi ke kubo, Isabatha le yabakho ngenxa yomntu, asingumntu owabakhoyo ngenxa yesabatha, ngoko uNyana woMntu lo uyiNkosi yayo nesabatha.

buza: Yintoni iSabatha?
Impendulo: "Umsebenzi wokudala ugqityiwe"
Sebenza iintsuku ezintandathu kwaye uphumle ngolwesixhenxe! →Yonke into esezulwini nasemhlabeni idaliwe. Ngosuku lwesixhenxe, umsebenzi kaThixo wokudala wawugqityiwe, ngoko waphumla kuwo wonke umsebenzi wakhe ngomhla wesixhenxe. Imbekiselo ( Genesis 2:1-2 )

KUMAHEBHERE 4:9 Ngoko ke kufuneka kubekho enye iSabatha yokuphumla kwabantu bakaThixo.

buza: Yeyiphi enye iSabatha?
Mpendulo:"Ugqityiwe umsebenzi wokukhulula"
( Yohane 19:30 ) Xa uYesu wayingcamla (ekuqaleni wayifumana) iviniga, wathi, “ Yenziwe ! Wathoba intloko yakhe, wawunikela kuThixo umphefumlo wakhe.

Phawula: 【 umphefumlo 】Umsebenzi wokuhlangula ugqityiwe! Amen. Wonke umntu okholwayo kuYesu → ukuKristu: 1 khululwe, 2 lala ngoxolo, 3 Fumana ubomi bukaKristu, 4 Fumana ubomi obungunaphakade! Amen
Kuya kubakho enye iSabatha yokuphumla →→Kuphumla kuYesu Krestu, lolona kuphumla lokwenene! Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Isilumkiso:

( Umlindi weSeventh-day Adventist ) Gcina iSabatha yeLeta → " uMgqibelo ” → ISabatha kumthetho weMithetho Elishumi kaMoses, iincwadi zibiza ukufa, kwaye bagcina iSabatha ebizwa ngokuba “ngamaJesuit Okwenyaniso” kunye “namaSeventh-day Adventist” nawo agcina oonobumba bemini.

buza: Kutheni le nto iSabatha igcinelwa ukufa?
impendulo: Ngenxa yokuba babengenako ukuyigcina “iSabatha” baxulutywa ngamatye bafe ngokomthetho kaMoses. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?
Ngoko ke uPawulos uthi: Gcinani imihla yenu, neenyanga, nemithendeleko, neminyaka; ( Galati 4:10-11 )

buza: Yintoni ukugcinwa kweSabatha yokwenyani?
impendulo: 【 Yiva intshumayelo 】→【 ijelo 】→【 Gcina iTao 】

1 " Yiva intshumayelo “Saliva ilizwi lenyaniso, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwethu.
2 " ijelo “Njengoko nikholelwa kwivangeli, indlela eyiyo, nakuYesu!
3 " Gcina iTao “Yigcine endleleni elungileyo ngoMoya oyiNgcwele
4 Phi ( ileta ) Abantu bakaYesu ngoku →→ Phumla kuYesu Kristu ! Amen→→Mna【 Kholwa, gcina indlela 】yiyo i gcina 【 iSabatha 】→ Gcina iSabatha ubomi bakho bonke, kungekhona ukuba ugcine imihla. iSabatha "Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Kunjengokuba iNkosi uYesu yathi: “Yizani kum nonke nina nibulalekayo, nisindwayo ngumthwalo, ndoninika ukuphumla ngenxa yeentliziyo zenu ( Mateyu 11:28-29 )

Isilumkiso kwabangakholwayo:

Ukuba uYoshuwa wayebaphumzile, uThixo wayengenakuyikhankanya eminye imihla. Ngokwale mbono, kumele kubekho olunye uphumlo lweSabatha oluseleyo kubantu bakaThixo. Kuba lowo ungeneyo ekuphumleni, uphumle kuyo imisebenzi yakhe, njengokuba noThixo waphumlayo kweyakhe. Ngoko ke, simele sizabalazele ukungena koko kuphumla, ukuze kungabikho nabani na oxelisa ukungathobeli aze awe. ( Hebhere 4:8-11 )

2. Abo bagcina unobumba → umthetho

( 2 Korinte 3:6 ) Usenze sakhonza njengabalungiseleli balo mnqophiso mtsha, kungekhona ngombhalo, kodwa ngomoya; abantu bahlala.

buza: Ngawaphi amagama abiza ukufa?
impendulo: Umthetho→→Ukuba uyayigcina imimiselo yomthetho, uya kufa.

buza: Ngoba?
impendulo: ( Ukugcina umthetho kukwenza izinto zomthetho Wonke umntu osemisebenzini yomthetho, uphantsi kwesiqalekiso; ngomthetho kucacile; kuba iBhayibhile ithi: “Lowo ulilungisa uya kudla ubomi ngokholo.” Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Phawula: AmaSeventh-day Adventist →bafundisa ukuba balumke - izinto ezizisa ukufa nomgwebo. amazwi ) umthetho, osisisiphelo nesiqalekiso. Uyaqonda?

3. Icawe yomhla weSixhenxe yakhelwe phezu kwesiseko (sabaprofeti bobuxoki)

( Hebhere 11-2 ) UThixo, owathetha kwangaphambili koobawo bethu ngabaprofeti bakhe izihlandlo ezininzi nangeendlela ezininzi, uthethe nathi ngale mihla yokugqibela ngoNyana wakhe, awammisayo njengendlalifa yezinto zonke kwadalelwa yena amahlabathi.

buza: Ngoobani awathetha nabo uThixo kumaxesha amandulo?
impendulo: Abaprofeti bathetha → " Kumaxesha amandulo “Oko kukuthi, iTestamente Endala, eyathethwa kookhokho izihlandlo ezininzi nangeendlela ezininzi.

buza: Ngubani othetha ngaye uThixo ngemihla yokugqibela?
impendulo: Unyana wakhe wathetha → " isiphelo sehlabathi "Kubhekiselwa kwiTestamente eNtsha, uThixo uthetha nathi ngoNyana wakhe uYesu. Wonke umntu okholwayo kuYesu ungunyana kaThixo, kwaye imihla yokugqibela ithethwa ngoNyana kaThixo UPetros, uYohane, uPawulos Iileta zevangeli ezishunyayelwayo, njalo njalo, kwaye sonke singoonyana bakaThixo, yaye uThixo ukwathetha ngathi → shumayela ivangeli likaYesu Kristu! Amen

buza: “Abaprofeti” bathi isiprofeto Iya kubani? Yeka Sele?
impendulo: UYohane uMbhaptizi
Kuba bonke abaprofeti nomthetho baprofeta, ukuya kutsho kuYohane. Imbekiselo ( Mateyu 11:13 )

Phawula: Abaprofeti nomthetho baprofeta de kuYohane → Abaprofeti baprofeta ngokuzalwa kukaKristu, baprofeta ukuba uKristu wayeya kubasindisa abantu bakhe, alungise indlela yeNkosi aze awenze uthi tye umendo wakhe, abaprofeti baprofeta de kwafika uYohane.

buza: Kule mihla iicawa ezininzi zinamabango okuba → " umprofeti → Kwenzeka ntoni?
impendulo: Ngemihla yokugqibela, uThixo ushumayela ivangeli ngoNyana wakhe Ngokuzibanga “. umprofeti “Isiprofeto, ukuba azizaliseki iziprofeto zabo, masithi, Umgunyathi ) umprofeti.

Phawula: ( Umlindi weSeventh-day Adventist ) isekwe kwi ( Ellen White) yakhelwe phezu kweemfundiso zabaprofeti bobuxoki; Ellen White Ezibanga ukuba ungumprofeti, wakha isiprofeto Ukuza kukaKristu okwesibini ngo-Oktobha 22, 18844 “kuseza kufika”.
KwiTestamente eNdala, uThixo wathetha iziprofeto ngabaprofeti Xa abaprofeti beprofeta, uThixo wathetha ngemilomo yabaprofeti → Iziprofeto ziya kuzaliseka i-100% yexesha.

kodwa (Ellen White ) ngumntu kwiTestamente eNtsha, kwaye iTestamente eNtsha nguThixo othetha ngoNyana ukuba ashumayele iindaba ezilungileyo, ( Ellen White ) ubanga ukuba ungumprofeti, kodwa iziprofeto zakhe azizange zibe yinyaniso (ngokucacileyo). Umgunyathi ) umprofeti.
uphume ngoku" Yao Lianghong “Ezibanga ukuba ungumprofeti, uhlobene neCawa yamaSabatha” Ellen White “Bangabaprofeti ababuxoki bonke; Zineempawu ezifanayo Baya kunithimba ngemfundiso yabo, nangokulukuhla okungento yanto, engabi ngokoKristu, engokwesithethe sabantu, nesabantwana behlabathi.

Ngoko ke, amaKristu afanele ahlale ephaphile yaye eqiqa ngakumbi ngemihla yokugqibela → Eyoku-1 kaYohane Isahluko 4 Bazalwana abaziintanda, musani ukukholwa ngoomoya bonke, bacikideni oomoya ukuba ngabakaThixo na; ngokuba baninzi abaprofeti ababuxoki, abaphume emazulwini, ihlabathi . Phawula: Okuvela kuThixo ngemihla yokugqibela nguMoya kaThixo, uNyana, othetha aze ashumayele iindaba ezilungileyo zobukumkani bamazulu amazwi kaThixo eBhayibhileni ukusuka kwiGenesis ukuya kwisiTyhilelo aphefumlelwe, kwaye akukho mfuneko yokuba abaprofeti bahlale beprofeta. . Into eyinyani ayinakuba bubuxoki, kwaye into ebubuxoki ayinakutyhilwa ngokuyilinganisa "ngengcongolo" yeBhayibhile. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Iculo: Ukushiya Igadi Elahlekileyo

KULUNGILE! Namhlanje siza kufunda, sinxulumane, size sabelane nabazalwana noodadewethu.

Ndijonge phambili ekuqhubekeni kwixesha elizayo---

articles.content:
Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile yethu kweyesi-2 kwabaseKorinte Isahluko 1, indinyana 18, size sifunde kunye: NgoThixo othembekileyo, ndithi, Ilizwi esinishumayeza lona asingoewe nohayi; .

Namhlanje siyafunda, sinxulumana, kwaye sabelane ngendlela yokucalula "Indlela yokulunga nengalunganga" Thandaza: U-Abha othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ndibamba ngazibini kwibandla elithi “Woman of Merit” ngokuthumela abasebenzi ukuba babelane ngelizwi lenyaniso ngamazwi abhalwe ezandleni zabo, eyigospile esinceda ukuba sisindiswe, sizukiswe, size imizimba yethu ikhululwe. Yanga iNkosi uYesu ingaqhubeka ikhanyisela amehlo emiphefumlo yethu kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuba siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni. Fundisa abantwana bakaThixo ukucalula → indlela yokulungileyo nokubi . Amen!

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Ngegama leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

1. Ewe kwaye hayi

【IsiBhalo】
KWABASEKORINTE II 1:18 Ethembekile nje ke uThixo, ukushumayela kwethu kuni akubanga nguewe nohayi. .

buza: Yintoni →→ ewe kunye nohayi?
impendulo: Ewe kwaye hayi
Ingcaciso yeBhayibhile: Ibhekisa kokulungileyo nokungalunganga Kwakhe kwathiwa ngaphambili ". Ewe ", emva koko wathi " Hayi "Ngaphambi kokuba uthi" kunene ", emva koko wathi " engalunganga "Ngaphambi kokuba uthi" isiqinisekiso, ukuqondwa "; emva koko wathi" Nangona kunjalo, khanyela ”, thetha okanye ushumayele → okulungileyo nokungalunganga, okungahambelaniyo .

2. Indlela yokulungileyo nokubi

buza: Yintoni →→indlela ka-ewe kunye nohayi?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

(1) embi UmKrestu Igazi uhlambulula izono zabantu

buza: Igazi leNkosi ( ukuqaphela ) ukuhlambulula abantu ezonweni zabo?
impendulo: " Kanye →→ekaKristu Igazi Kunye kuphela ukuhlanjululwa kwezono, hayi ukuhlanjululwa kwezono izihlandlo ezininzi.

1 UKristu wasebenzisa eyakhe Igazi , kube kanye kuphela
wangena kwaba kanye kweyona ngcwele, kungengagazi leebhokhwe nelamathole, kungegazi elilelakhe, efumene ucamagushelo olungunaphakade. ( Hebhere 9:12 )

2 awunikele umzimba wakhe kube kanye
Sangcwaliswa ngale nto, ngokusondezwa komzimba kaYesu Kristu, kwaba kanye. ( Hebhere 10:10 )

3 Wenze idini lesono;
Kodwa uKrestu yena wenze umnikelo wamnye ongunaphakade ngenxa yezono, waza wahlala phantsi ngasekunene kukaThixo. ( Hebhere 10:12 )

4 OkaYesu Igazi sihlambulule kuso sonke isono
Ukuba sihamba ekukhanyeni, njengokuba uThixo esekukhanyeni, soba sinobudlelane omnye nomnye, lithi negazi likaYesu Kristu, uNyana wakhe, lisihlambulule kuso sonke isono. ( 1 Yohane 1:7 )

5 ukuze abo bangcwalisiweyo bafezeke ngonaphakade
Kuba ngedini lakhe elinye ubenza bagqibelele ngokusephakadeni abo bangcwalisiweyo. ( Hebhere 10:14 )

Phawula: UmKrestu Igazi Kuphela" Kanye "Ekuba ehlambulule umntu ezonweni zakhe → umenza ongcwalisiweyo agqibelele ngonaphakade → abe ngcwele ngonaphakade, angabi nasono, agwetyelwe! Amen. Akazihlambululi izono izihlandlo ezininzi; njengaye Ukuhlamba izono izihlandlo ezininzi, uKristu bekuya kufuneka ukuba wophe izihlandlo ezininzi, uKristu bekuya kufuneka abandezeleke aze abulawe izihlandlo ezininzi →→Ukuba umcela ukuba aphinde ahlambe izono, uphinda ubulale uYesu uNyana kaThixo, iMvana. Igazi Yiphathe njengesiqhelo. Uyeva?

buza: Uchonga njani →" Ewe kwaye hayi "Ukuhlanjululwa kwezono?"
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

Ithi "coca" ngaphambili ithi "phika" kamva.
( Hebhere 1:3 ) Ulubengezelo lozuko lukaThixo, umfanekiselo kanye wobuntu bukaThixo, yaye uthwala zonke izinto ngomyalelo wakhe onamandla. Wahlambulula abantu ezonweni zabo ehleli ngasekunene kobuKhulu enyangweni.

Phawula: Uthe ngaphambili hlamba "; emva koko wathi" embi ” → sebenzisa “ kamva "Amagama okukhanyela" Ngaphambili Oko wakuthethayo → Abashumayeli abaninzi namhlanje bathetha nje bejija imilebe yabo → ( Uthe ngaphambili UYesu usihlambulula kuso sonke isono; kodwa ) Ndiyakholwa eNkosini" emva “Izono zangomso, nezono zangomso, nezono zengcinga, nezono zokuthetha ngemilebe azikakwenziwa. igazi leNkosi ) ukuhlanjwa kwezono, ukucima izono, nokuzigubungela →→Bashumayela le nto →” Indlela ka-ewe kunye no-hayi ". Wathi ngaphambili ( Ewe kamva( Hayi ), sebenzisa la magama alandelayo ukukhanyela into ebithethwa ngaphambili.

(2) embi bakhululekile kuwo umthetho

buza: Indlela yokusinda kumthetho kunye nesiqalekiso sawo?
impendulo: Ngokufa kunye noKristu ngomzimba wakhe, siye safa kuwo umthetho osibophayo, kwaye ngoku sikhululekile kuwo umthetho → → Kodwa ekubeni safayo kuwo umthetho osibophayo, ngoku sikhululekile kuwo umthetho, Simele sikhonze uThixo INkosi ngokobutsha bomoya (umoya: okanye uguqulelwe njengoMoya oyiNgcwele), kungekhona ngokwendlela yakudala yesithethe. ( Roma 7:6 ) kunye namaGalati 3:13 .

buza: Uchonga njani→→" Ewe kwaye hayi "Ukumka emthethweni?"
impendulo: ( Uthe ngaphambili 13 sikhululwe ngoku kuwo umthetho, nesiqalekiso sawo; Kamva ) Xa sibuyela umva siwugcina umthetho, sifana nehagu ehlanjiweyo yaza yabuyela eludakeni kwakusithiwa. phuka ecaleni “Umthetho,” watsho kamva Lumka "Umthetho → uthetha ukuba awukhululekanga emthethweni, kodwa usaphula umthetho phantsi komthetho. Ukwaphula umthetho kusisono. Ukuba uqhubeka ukwaphula umthetho, awukhululekanga kuwo → → Oku ku into abayishumayelayo abashumayeli babo abagwenxa. Indlela ka-ewe kunye no-hayi ".

(3) embi Bonke abazelwe nguThixo abasayi kuze bone;

buza: Ngaba abantwana abazelwe ngokutsha bangona?
impendulo: Bonke abazelwe nguThixo abasayi kuze bone;

buza: Ngoba?
impendulo: Bonke abazelwe nguThixo aboni, ngokuba ilizwi likaThixo lihleli kuye; ( 1 Yohane 3:9 )
Siyazi ukuba bonke abazelwe nguThixo abasayi kuze bone; bonke abazelwe nguThixo baya kuzigcina; ( 1 Yohane 5:18 )

buza: Uchonga njani→→" Ewe kwaye hayi "Ukuzalwa ngokutsha?"
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi
1 Bonke abazelwe nguThixo aboni; →(Kulungile)
2 Bonke abazelwe nguThixo aboni; →(Kulungile)
3 Bonke abahlala kuye aboni (Ngokuqinisekileyo)

buza: Kutheni abo bazelwe nguThixo bengenasono?
impendulo: Ngokuba ilizwi (imbewu) likaThixo likhona entliziyweni yakhe, akanakona.

buza: Kuthekani ukuba umntu wenza ulwaphulo-mthetho?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi
1 Lowo umonayo akambonanga; — 1 Yohane 3:6
2 Lowo umonayo akamazi; ( Ukungaluqondi usindiso lukaKristu — 1 Yohane 3:6
3 Bonke abonayo bangokaMtyholi; — 1 Yohane 3:8

buza: Bangabakabani na abantwana abangenasono? Ngabaphi abantwana abanesono?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi
【1】Abantwana abazelwe nguThixo→abasokuze bone!
【2】Abantwana abazalwa ziinyoka→→isono.
Kulapho kutyhilwa khona ukuba ngoobani na abangabantwana bakaThixo nabangabantwana bakaMtyholi. Nabani na ongawenziyo ubulungisa akangokaThixo, nalowo ungamthandiyo umzalwana wakhe. ( 1 Yohane 3:10 )

Phawula: AmaKristu azelwe nguThixo → akayi kona → Yinyaniso yeBhayibhile Nabani na owenza isono ungokasathana → ikwayinyani yebhayibhile.

Iicawa ezininzi namhlanje ngempazamo zikholelwa ukuba: Emva kokuba umntu ekholiwe eNkosini aze asindiswe, nangona engumntu olilungisa, ukwangumoni. Bathi amaKristu akaqhubeki esenza izono zesini kwaye akaqhelanga kwizono zesini → AmaKristu angamalungisa kwaye angaboni ngexesha elinye; usathana ngaxeshanye → Emva koko benza igama elinye: isiqingatha ghost isiqingatha uthixo “Baye baphuma abantu bathetha Ngequbuliso ilungile kwaye ngamanye amaxesha ayilunganga AmaTao, olu hlobo lwenkolelo kuthiwa lufile okanye alukho→→Oku kungenxa yokuba abaqondi.” ukuzalwa ngokutsha “Kuthethwe ngumshumayeli ogwenxa→→ Indlela ka-ewe kunye no-hayi . Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Isine, embi UMoya oyiNgcwele uhlala enawe

buza: Ngaba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhlala enathi?
impendulo: Ndiya kucela kuBawo, aze aninike omnye uMthetheleli (okanye inguqulelo: uMthuthuzeli; lo ungezantsi); ukuze abe nawe ngonaphakade , onguMoya wenyaniso, elingenakumamkela ihlabathi, ngokuba lingamboni, lingamazi nokumazi. Nina ke niyamazi, ngokuba uhleli nani, kanjalo uya kuba kuni. Imbekiselo ( Yohane 14:16-17 )

buza: Ngalo lonke ixesha ibandla lihlanganisana, lithandazela ukuba uMoya oyiNgcwele afike.
impendulo: Ngaloo ndlela, icawa kuphela " isibane "Hayi" I-oyile ",yiyo i Akukho bukho boMoya oyiNgcwele → Ke ngoko cela uMoya oyiNgcwele ukuba eze ngalo lonke ixesha sihlangana .

buza: Kuthetha ukuthini ukuzaliswa nguMoya oyiNgcwele?
impendulo: NguMoya oyiNgcwele owenza umsebenzi wokuhlaziya ngaphakathi, ebonakalisa iqhinga loMoya oyiNgcwele, ubulumko, ubukrelekrele namandla! Amen. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

UMateyu 5:37 ( INkosi uYesu yathi) Ukuba uthe ewe, yithini ewe; "
ngoko ( uPawulosi Uthe ke yena, Ethembekile nje uThixo, ilizwi esilivakalisayo kuni alinguye uewe nohayi. Kuba uYesu Kristu, uNyana kaThixo, owamvakalisayo phakathi kwenu mna noSilas noTimoti, akabanga naewe nohayi; Izithembiso zikaThixo, nokuba zininzi kangakanani na, zinguewe kuKristu. Ngoko ke zonke izinto ziyinyaniso ngaye (yinene: amen kwisicatshulwa santlandlolo), ukuze uThixo azukiswe ngathi. Imbekiselo ( 2 Korinte 1:18-20 )

buza: Ngaba zikho iicawa ezishumayela okulungileyo nokubi?

impendulo: Seventh-day Adventists, amaKatolika, iSamaj Family, amaJesuit okwenyaniso, iiCharismatics, iiVangeli, iVangeli yeGrace, iigusha ezilahlekileyo, iMark House yaseKorea ... kunye nezinye iicawa ezininzi.

Iintshumayelo zokwabelana ngesicatshulwa, ziqhutywa nguMoya kaThixo Abasebenzi bakaYesu Krestu, uMzalwana uWang, uDade uLiu, uDade uZheng, uMzalwana uCen, kunye nabanye osebenza nabo, baxhasa kwaye basebenza kunye kumsebenzi wevangeli weBandla likaYesu Krestu. Bashumayela ivangeli kaYesu Krestu, ivangeli evumela ukuba abantu basindiswe, bazukiswe, kwaye imizimba yabo ikhululwe! Amen

Iculo: Umntu ozelwe nguThixo soze one

Wamkele abazalwana noodade abaninzi ukuba basebenzise ibhrawuza yakho ukukhangela- IBandla likaYesu Krestu Khuphela.Qokelela Hlanganyeni nathi nisebenze kunye ekushumayeleni ivangeli kaYesu Krestu.

articles.title: FAQ: Uphawu lwerhamncwa
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade, Amen!

Masivule iBhayibhile kwiSityhilelo isahluko 13 indinyana 16 size siyifunde kunye: Ikwabangela ukuba wonk’ ubani, omkhulu nomncinci, osisityebi nolihlwempu, okhululekileyo nakhoboka, ukuba amkele uphawu esandleni sabo sokunene okanye emabunzini abo.

Namhlanje siza kuhlolisisa, sinxulumane, kwaye sabelane kunye "Uphawu lwerhamncwa" Thandaza: "Baba Ongcwele othandekayo, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhleli enathi"! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Umfazi olungileyo" ecaweni "Thuma abasebenzi, ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo ezandleni zabo, elithethiweyo ngabo, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwethu, uzuko, nentlawulelo yemizimba yethu. Amen! Yanga iNkosi uYesu ingaqhubeka ikhanyisela amehlo emiphefumlo yethu kwaye ikhanyisele amehlo emiphefumlo yethu kwaye ikhulule imizimba yethu. vula iingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibhile, inokuva nokubona inyaniso yasemoyeni→ Qonda ukuba yintoni na uphawu lwerhamncwa . Amen!

Imithandazo, nezibongozo, nezibongozo, nemibulelo, neentsikelelo, zisegameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

uphawu lwerhamncwa

1. Izilwanyana ezingenabumoya

(1) Abantu bezilwanyana

IINDUMISO 92:6 Izilo aziqondi, nezinyabi aziqondi;
IINDUMISO 49:20 Umntu ohleli esidima, engavuswanga, ufana nerhamncwa elifileyo.

buza: Yintoni irhamncwa?
impendulo: “Ubumoya bomntu” bufana nobo bemfuyo abakholelwa kuThixo oyinyaniso uMdali usafuna ukukholelwa ukuba abantu bavela kwizilwanyana nemfuyo, yaye bakholelwa kwingcamango “kaDarwin” yendaleko. Abo bavumayo ukuba bavela kwizilwanyana ziinyoka, iidragons, iihagu, izinja, njalo njalo. Olu hlobo lwabantu lubizwa ngokuba ngabantu bezilwanyana.
Kuyabonakala ukuba ingqumbo kaThixo ivela emazulwini, ichase bonke abantu abangahloneli Thixo nabangengomalungisa, abo banxaxhayo nabathintela inyaniso. Oko kwazekayo ngoThixo kutyhilekile ezintliziyweni zabo, ngokuba uThixo ukutyhile kubo. Ukususela ekudalweni kwehlabathi, amandla kaThixo angunaphakade nobuThixo aziwa ngokucacileyo, nangona engabonakali, anokuqondwa ngendalo yakhe, eshiya umntu engenasizathu. Kuba, nangona babemazi uThixo, abazange bamzukise njengoThixo okanye bambulele. Iingcinga zabo zaba yinto engento, yaza intliziyo yabo engenakuqonda yenziwa yamnyama; Bathi ke bezizizilumko, besuka baba ziziyatha, baza uzuko lukaThixo ongafiyo bananisela intsobi yendoda enokonakala, neyeentaka, neyezinto eziphilileyo, nezinambuzane. Imbekiselo ( Roma 1:18-23 )

(2) Izilwanyana ezingenabumoya

Eyesi- 2 kaPetros Isahluko 2 Indinyana 12 Kodwa kubonakala ngathi aba bantu abanamoya yaye bazalwa njengezilwanyana ezithinjwa zize zibulawe. Xa benyelisa izinto abangazaziyo yaye besonakalisa abanye, nabo baya konakala.
Jude 1:10 Ke bona aba bantu banyelisa into abangayaziyo. Babezazi ngendalo izinto ezifanayo namarhamncwa angenamphefumlo, yaye koku bazonakalisa ngokwabo.

2. Ninqule umfanekiselo werhamncwa, nilandele irhamncwa

buza: Uyintoni na umfanekiso werhamncwa?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

(1) Kumaxesha amandulo, amaSirayeli enza amathole egolide

Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Hamba uhle; Bingelela, uthi, Nanko uthixo wakho, Sirayeli, okukhuphileyo ezweni laseYiputa.”— Eksodus 32:7-8 .

(2) Umfanekiso oqingqiweyo wegolide waseBhabhiloni

Uphuphe umfanekiso omkhulu, kumkani, umde kakhulu, ubengezela kakhulu, umi phambi kwakho, ukubonakala kwawo bekusoyikeka kakhulu, intloko yawo ibiyigolide ecikizekileyo, isifuba sawo neengalo zawo ziyisilivere; isisu sayo nesinqe sayo iyigolide ecikizekileyo, imilenze yayo iyintsimbi, iinyawo zayo ngenxalenye iyisinyithi, ngenxalenye ingudongwe ( Daniyeli 2:31-33 ).

(3) Izithixo zobuxoki ezenziwe ngabantu

Bona bananisele ubuxoki inyaniso kaThixo, basihlonela basikhonza indalo endaweni yoMdali. UYehova makabongwe ngonaphakade kanaphakade. Amen! Roma 1:25

(4) Wenze uphile umfanekiso werhamncwa yaye ukwazi ukuthetha

Lanikwa igunya lokuwunika umfanekiselo werhamncwa umoya, ukuba uthethe, nokuba bonke abasukuba bengaqubudi kuwo umfanekiselo werhamncwa, babulawe. ISityhilelo 13:15

buza: Livela phi eli “rhamncwa”?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

1 Kwanyuka irhamncwa liphuma elwandle;

Ndabona kunyuka, kuphuma elwandle, irhamncwa, lineentloko ezisixhenxe neempondo ezilishumi, ezimpondweni zalo izizithsaba ezilishumi, kwiintloko zalo iligama lonyeliso. ISityhilelo 13:1

Qaphela: Irhamncwa elinyuka liphuma elwandle libhekisa ku-→ umntu wesono uyavela → aze aqalise ukufumana uphawu.

2 Kwenyuka elinye irhamncwa liphuma emhlabeni;

Ndabona elinye irhamncwa linyuka liphuma emhlabeni, lineempondo ezimbini zifana nezemvana, lithetha njengenamba. ISityhilelo 13:11

Qaphela: Irhamncwa elinyuka liphuma emhlabeni libhekisela kumprofeti wobuxoki, oza ehlabathini ukuze alahlekise abantu.

buza: Limela ntoni eli “rhamncwa”?
impendulo: “Irhamncwa” libhekisela kubukumkani obumela ihlabathi.

→→La marhamncwa amakhulu ngookumkani abane abaya kuvela ehlabathini. Bhekisela kuDaniyeli Isahluko 7 Indinyana 17
→→Wathi umlindi: “Irhamncwa lesine bubukumkani besine obuya kuza ehlabathini, bube ngokwahlukileyo kuzo zonke ezinye izikumkani, buya kulidla ihlabathi lonke, bulinyathele ngeenyawo :23

buza: Zibhekisela entwenini iimpondo ezilishumi zeli “rhamncwa”?
impendulo: Ookumkani abalishumi baphuma kobu "bukumkani".
→→Iimpondo ezilishumi ozibonayo ngookumkani abalishumi, abakabamkeli ubukumkani, kodwa okwethutyana baya kuba negunya elifanayo nelamarhamncwa, negunya elifana nelo lookumkani. ISityhilelo 17:12
→ Iimpondo ezilishumi ke, kuya kusuka kume kobo bukumkani ookumkani abalishumi; Kamva kwavela omnye ukumkani , ngokungafaniyo nabangaphambili uya kubathoba ookumkani abathathu. Daniyeli 7:24

buza: Lithetha ukuthini “irhamncwa” elineentloko ezisixhenxe?
impendulo: iintaba ezisixhenxe
→→Intliziyo elumkileyo inokucinga apha. Iintloko ezisixhenxe ziintaba ezisixhenxe awayehleli phezu kwazo umfazi lowo, ISityhilelo 17:9 (ukufumana ingcaciso eneenkcukacha, nceda ukhangele “Umbono werhamncwa”)

buza: Unokuthetha njani lo “mfanekiso werhamncwa”?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

1 Abaninzi baya kuyifundisisa ngenyameko, kwande ukwazi;
Daniyeli, lifihle eli lizwi, uyitywine le ncwadi kude kube sekupheleni kwexesha. Abaninzi baya kuba bebaleka besiya ngapha nangapha (okanye baguqulelwe ngokuthi: ukufunda ngokunyanisekileyo), kwaye ulwazi luya kwanda. —Daniyeli 12:4
2 Ubukrelekrele bokwenziwa budala amarhamncwa kunye nemifanekiso eqingqiweyo yesilo
3 Unamehlo omntu —Daniyeli 7:8
4 Ukuba negunya, amandla, namandla okuthetha.
5 Ehlabathini lonke abantu balandela “irhamncwa” baze banqule “umfanekiso werhamncwa” — ISityhilelo 13:15
6 UPhawu Lwerhamncwa “Umntu nomatshini baba yinto enye.”

3. UPhawu lwerhamncwa 666

(1) Uphawu olufunyenwe kwisandla sokunene okanye ebunzi

Kukwabangela ukuba wonk’ ubani, omkhulu nomncinci, osisityebi nolihlwempu, okhululekileyo nolikhoboka, ukuba aphawulwe esandleni sabo sokunene okanye ebunzi. ( ISityhilelo 13:16 )

(2) Bonke abantu behlabathi balilandela irhamncwa, balinqula inamba

...Wamangaliswa umhlaba wonke, walilandela irhamncwa, walinqula inamba, ngenxa yokuba igunya lalo lawanika irhamncwa, balinqula irhamncwa, besithi, Ngubani na ofana neli rhamncwa, ngubani na onako ukulwa nalo? Ingxelo yeSityhilelo Isahluko 13 Ivesi 3-4

buza: Kwakutheni ukuze bonke abantu emhlabeni balandele irhamncwa baze banqule inamba ngelo xesha?
impendulo: Njengoko incwadi kaDaniyeli isitsho “ Uphando olucokisekileyo ”→ubukrelekrele bokwenziwa ( Ukudityaniswa komatshini woluntu ) kuya kubonakala, kwaye abantu emhlabeni wonke baya kuthembela "kwizilwanyana" ngolwazi, njenganamhlanje ngo-2022 AD, abantu baxhomekeke kakhulu "kwii-smartphones". Umzekelo, ukuba abantu bafuna ukufunda "isiNgesi", ngoko ke kufuneka bakhuphele "inkumbulo" eqokelelwe kwi "monster" kwi "imprint" efunyenwe ngumntu ezandleni zabo okanye ebunzi funda "isiNgesi" nzima Olu hlobo lwesakhono solwimi → "Ulwazi luya kukhula." Ngelo xesha, abo bafumene “uphawu lwerhamncwa” baya kuba nolwazi oluninzi baze babe “nobulumko” abo bangazange balufumane uphawu lwerhamncwa baya kusalela ngasemva, kuba akuyi kubakho ntengiselwano yemali yephepha ngelo xesha; ixesha Ukuba awufumani "uphawu lwerhamncwa", awuyi kukwazi ukwenza ishishini , baya kucinga ukuba ungaqhelekanga, bakutshutshise okanye bakubulale. Kanjalo irhamncwa lenza ukuba bonke, abakhulu nabancinane, abazizityebi nabangamahlwempu, abakhululekileyo nabangamakhoboka, ukuba banikwe uphawu esandleni sabo sokunene, nokuba kusebunzi. Ngoko, uyayiqonda? Bhekisela kwiSityhilelo 13:16

(3) Abo bamagama angabhalwanga encwadini yobomi

Yamkela uphawu lwerhamncwa → Bonke abo bemiyo phezu komhlaba baya kulinqula, abamagama angabhalwanga encwadini yobomi yeMvana, eyaxhelwa kwasekusekweni kwehlabathi. Lowo uneendlebe zokuva makeve. ophanga abantu uya kuthinjwa; obulala ngekrele uya kubulawa ngekrele. Lulo olu unyamezelo nokholo lwabangcwele. ( ISityhilelo 13:8-10 )

(4) Inani lophawu lwerhamncwa yi-666

Akukho bani unako ukuthenga nokuthengisa, ingenguye lowo unophawu, nokuba ligama lerhamncwa, nokuba linani legama lerhamncwa. Nabu ubulumko: lowo uqiqayo, makalibale inani lerhamncwa, kuba linani lomntu; ( ISityhilelo 13:17-18 )

buza: Uthetha ukuthini u-666?
impendulo: Inani labantu abamkela uphawu lwerhamncwa.

" 7 " Lithetha ngokupheleleyo yaye limela uThixo!
(1) Uzelwe ngamanzi nanguMoya
(2) Wazalwa ngelizwi eliyinyaniso leendaba ezilungileyo
(3) Bazalwa nguThixo
Umntu omtsha owenziwe ngokutsha otywinwe nguMoya oyiNgcwele " 7 "→ Umele abantwana bakaThixo, ngoko" 7 ” lithetha ngokupheleleyo;

kwaye" 6 "Kuthetha ukungafezeki; ukwamkela uphawu lwerhamncwa." 666 "Kufana nesiqingatha sentsimbi kunye nesiqingatha sodongwe. Abantu bazimisele ukuyifunda. Ubukrelekrele bokwenziwa bubonakala njengokudibanisa komatshini womntu." Isiqingatha-isilwanyana, isiqingatha-somntu ", yiba njenge monster, oku ayisiyiyo le nto uThixo wayidala ngothuli ekuqaleni" UAdam “Kuba oku → Kanye njengoko uye wayibona intsimbi ixubene nodongwe, nohlanga luya kuxutywa neentlobo zonke zabantu, kodwa abayi kuxubana omnye nomnye, kanye njengoko intsimbi ingaxubeki nodongwe.” ( Daniyeli 2:1, 2 ) Ngoko ke, xa uYehova echaza intsimbi exutywe nodongwe, uhlanga luya kuxubana neentlobo ngeentlobo zabantu. 43)

buza: Limela ntoni “irhamncwa”?
impendulo: “Irhamncwa” limela inyoka yakudala, inamba, umtyholi, uSathana nomprofeti wobuxoki.
Ndabona isithunywa sezulu, sisihla siphuma emazulwini, sinesitshixo senzonzobila, nomxokelelwane omkhulu esandleni saso. Yayibamba inamba, inyoka yakudala, leyo ebizwa ngokuba nguMtyholi, uSathana ke, yayibopha iminyaka eliwaka ( ISityhilelo 20:1-2 )
Irhamncwa labanjwa, nomprofeti wobuxoki, lowo wenza imimangaliso phambi kwalo, ukuze alahlekise abo balwamkelayo uphawu lwerhamncwa, nabo baqubuda kuwo umfanekiselo walo, wabanjwa kunye nerhamncwa. Baphoswa behleli bobabini edikeni lomlilo elivutha isulfure (ISityhilelo 19:20).

buza: Ukwaziwa njani ukuba luphawu lwerhamncwa?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi
1 Ukungakholwa kuYesu,
2 bengakholwanga kwiindaba ezilungileyo eziziinyaniso;
3 Abazalwanga nguThixo;
4 Ngaphandle kwetywina loMoya oyiNgcwele,
5 Ngaphandle kophawu lukaYesu,
6 Ngaphandle kwetywina likaThixo,

Abo bamagama angabhalwanga encwadini yobomi kwasekusekweni kwehlabathi → Balilandela irhamncwa, balinqula inamba, umoya" Oko kukuthi, imimoya yeedemon, imimoya emdaka, kunye nemimoya engcolileyo → ngaphakathi ngesandla okanye kwi ebunzi ufumene amanqaku , ukudityaniswa koomatshini bomntu" Isiqingatha-isilwanyana, isiqingatha-somntu “Lulo olu uphawu lwerhamncwa;

(1) Abo bangabakaYesu Kristu → batywinwa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele, batywinwe nguYesu, batywinwe nguThixo ;

(2) Abo bangabenyoka → bafumana uphawu lwenyoka, bafumana uphawu lukaSathana uMtyholi, bamkele uphawu lwerhamncwa → “uphawu lwerhamncwa” nenani lalo ngulo. amakhulu amathandathu, anamanci mathandathu anesithandathu. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

articles.title: FAQ: Itywina loMoya oyiNgcwele
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade, Amen!

Masityhile kwiiBhayibhile zethu, kwabase-Efese 1:13: Emva kokuba nilivile ilizwi lenyaniso, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwenu, nakholwa kuKristu, natywinwa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele wedinga kuye.

Namhlanje siza kuhlolisisa, sinxulumane, kwaye sabelane kunye "Itywina loMoya oyiNgcwele" Thandaza: "Baba Ongcwele othandekayo, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhleli enathi"! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Umfazi olungileyo" ecaweni "Thumelani abasebenzi ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo ezandleni zabo, elithetha ngabo, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwethu neendaba ezilungileyo zokungena ebukumkanini bamazulu! Yanga iNkosi uYesu ingaqhubeka ikhanyisela amehlo emiphefumlo yethu kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu. ukuqonda iBhayibhile ukuze sive, Bona inyaniso yokomoya→ Qonda indlela yokufumana uMoya oyiNgcwele othenjisiweyo njengetywina . Amen!

Imithandazo, nezibongozo, nezibongozo, nemibulelo, neentsikelelo, zisegameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

1: Itywina loMoya oyiNgcwele

buza: Yintoni itywina loMoya oyiNgcwele?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

( 1 ) bazelwe ngamanzi nangoMoya ——Funda uYohane 3:5
( 2 ) abazelwe yinyaniso yeendaba ezilungileyo —Funda eyoku-1 kwabaseKorinte 4:15 nakuYakobi 1:18
( 3 ) ozelwe nguThixo —Funda uYohane 1:12-13

Qaphela: 1 wazalwa ngamanzi nanguMoya, 2 ozelwe yinyaniso yeendaba ezilungileyo, 3 Nizelwe nguThixo → Ukuba uMoya kaThixo uhleli kuni, aniseyiyo inyama, ningokaMoya, ongqina ngomoya wethu ukuba singabantwana bakaThixo. Sinayo ngaphakathi [ uMoya oyiNgcwele 】 Yamkele nje Itywina loMoya oyiNgcwele ! Amen. Ngoko, uyayiqonda? (Funda amaRoma 8:9, 16 .)

2: Iindlela zokutywinwa nguMoya oyiNgcwele

buza: Utywinwe nguMoya oyiNgcwele→ indlela Ingaba yin?
impendulo: Kholwa yivangeli!

[UYesu] wathi, Lizalisekile ixesha, nobukumkani bukaThixo busondele. Kholwa yivangeli ! ” Imbekiselo ( Marko 1:15 )

buza: Yintoni ivangeli?
impendulo: Into endiyidlulisele kuni (mna Pawulos) yayikukuba, okokuqala nje, uKristu wazifela izono zethu ngokutsho kweZibhalo, nokokuba wangcwatywa + waza wavuswa ngomhla wesithathu ngokutsho kweZibhalo. KwabaseKorinte 1 Thomas 15:1-4).

Phawula: Umpostile uPawulos washumayela ivangeli yosindiso kwiiNtlanga→ibandla laseKorinte wathi uPawulosi uyakusindiswa ngokukholwa kulevangeli! Phakathi kwabaPostile abaLishumi elineSibini, uPawulos wanyulwa buqu yiNkosi uYesu ukuba abe ngumpostile waza wathunyelwa ngokukodwa ukuba abe lukhanyiso lweeNtlanga.

buza: Uyikholelwa njani ivangeli?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

Okokuqala, uKristu wafela izono zethu ngokutsho kweBhayibhile

(1) ileta sikhululekile esonweni
Xa uKristu wafela bonke, bonke bafa → kuba lowo uye wafa ukhululwe esonweni - bhekisela kumaRoma 6:7 → Bonke bafa, yaye bonke bakhululwe esonweni → ileta Abantu bakhe abagwetyelwe (oko kukuthi, " ileta “UKristu wafela bonke, yaye bonke bakhululwe esonweni)→ ileta Bonke bakhululwe esonweni → Lowo ungakholwayo, uselegwetyiwe, ngokuba engakholwanga kwigana loNyana okuphela kwamzeleyo uThixo” UYesu 】→ igama likaYesu Kuthetha ukusindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo . Ngoko, uyayiqonda? Jonga kweyesi-2 kwabaseKorinte 5:14 nakuMnqophiso 3:18

(2) ileta Ndikhululekile kuwo umthetho nesiqalekiso sawo

1 Ndikhululekile kuwo umthetho
kuba safayo nje kuwo umthetho owawusibophelela, ngoku sifile bakhululekile kuwo umthetho , esicela ukuba sikhonze uYehova ngokobutsha bomoya (umphefumlo: okanye uguqulelwe njengoMoya Oyingcwele) kungekhona ngokwesithethe sakudala. Imbekiselo ( Roma 7:6 )
2 Uhlangulwe kwisiqalekiso soMthetho omnye
UKrestu wasikhulula ngokuba sisiqalekiso ngenxa yethu Ndikhululekile kwisiqalekiso somthetho ; kuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa: “Uqalekisiwe wonke umntu oxhonywe emthini.” ( Galati 3:13 )

Wangcwatywa!

(3) ileta Likhulule ixhego nokuziphatha kwalo kwakudala
musani ukuxokisana; Sele ikhutshiwe Umntu omdala kunye nezenzo zakhe, isalathiso (Kolose 3: 9)

(4) ileta Sikhululekile “kunyoka” usathana.USathana
ndinithuma kubo, ukuze avulwe amehlo abo, babuye ebumnyameni, beze ebumhlotsheni; babuye egunyeni likaSathana, beze kuThixo; bangcwalisiwe. ’” (IZenzo 26:18)

(5) ileta Nikhululwe kumandla obumnyama naseHadesi
Wasihlangula egunyeni lobumnyama, wasifudusela ebukumkanini boNyana wakhe oyintanda ( Kolose 1:13 )

Yaye ngokutsho kweBhayibhile, wavuswa ngosuku lwesithathu!

(6) ileta UThixo udlulisele amagama ethu ebukumkanini boNyana wakhe oyintanda →Funda kwaKol. 1:13
(7) ileta Uvuko lukaKristu → Ewe Sithethelele ! yiyo i Masizalwe ngokutsha, sivuswe kunye noKrestu, sisindiswe, samkele uMoya oyiNgcwele othenjisiweyo, samkele ubuonyana, sibe nobomi obungunaphakade! Amen . Ngoko, uyayiqonda? Bona amaRoma 4:25 .

3. Ukutywinwa nguMoya oyiNgcwele othenjisiweyo

(1) Itywina loMoya oyiNgcwele

INgoma 8:6 Khawundibeke entliziyweni yakho njengomsesane wokutywina, undithwale njengesigxivizo engalweni yakho.

buza: Ungatywinwa njani nguMoya oyiNgcwele othenjisiweyo?
Impendulo: Kholwa yivangeli kwaye uqonde inyaniso!
Natywinwa kuye, natywinwa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele wedinga, ekusekweni kwenu, nakholwayo nakuye, nakuva ilizwi lenyaniso, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwenu. ( Efese 1:13 )

Phawula: Kuba nivile ilizwi lenyaniso, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwakho → njengabapostile " uPawulosi "Shumayela ivangeli yosindiso kwiiNtlanga, kwaye uve inyaniso yeendaba ezilungileyo → Okokuqala, uKristu wafela izono zethu ngokutsho kweBhayibhile → 1 Ukholo luyakhulula esonweni; 2 Ukholo lukhululwe emthethweni nakwisiqalekiso sawo; 3 Ukholo luyawalahla umntu omdala nokuziphatha kwakhe; 4 Ukholo luyamsinda (inyoka) uSathana; 5 Ukholo lwasinda kumandla obumnyama neHadesi wavuswa kwabafileyo ngomhla wesithathu → 6 Ukholo ludlulisela amagama ethu ebukumkanini boNyana wakhe oyintanda; 7 Kholelwa kuVuko lukaKristu→ Ewe Sithethelele ! yiyo i Masizalwe ngokutsha, sivuswe kunye noKrestu, sisindiswe, samkele uMoya oyiNgcwele othenjisiweyo, samkele ubuonyana, sibe nobomi obungunaphakade! Amen. →Ndaye ndakholelwa kuKristu Oko ndandikholelwa kuye, ndatywinwa nguMoya oyiNgcwele owathenjiswayo! Amen . Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

【 uMoya oyiNgcwele 】Litikiti lethu lokungena ebukumkanini bamazulu, kwaye bubungqina kunye nobungqina bokufumana ilifa likaBawo Osezulwini → Lo Moya Oyingcwele bubungqina (isibambiso kumbhalo wokuqala) welifa lethu de kube ngabantu bakaThixo (abantu:) ilifa kwisicatshulwa santlandlolo) zihlangulwe, ukuze kudunyiswe uzuko lwakhe. Imbekiselo ( Efese 1:14 )

(2)Uphawu lukaYesu

KUMAGALATI 6:17 Elokugqiba ndithi, Makungabikho namnye undixhamlayo, kuba mna ndinako uphawu luka Yesu .

(3) Itywina likaThixo

Isityhilelo 9:4 Wathi kuzo: “Utyani obusemhlabeni, nesityalo esiluhlaza, okanye nawuphi na umthi, ze ningonakalisi, ngaphandle kwamaqhuma asebunzi. Itywina likaThixo .

Phawula: Kuba nakholwa kuKristu, nakuva ilizwi lenyaniso, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwenu→ Watywinwa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele owathenjiswayo →Ukusukela ngoku ukuya phambili" Itywina loMoya oyiNgcwele "Yiyo i uphawu luka Yesu , uphawu lukaThixo → Sonke siphuma kuMoya omnye, iNkosi enye, noThixo omnye ! Amen. Ngoko, uyayiqonda? Imbekiselo ( Efese 4:4-6 )

Ukwabelana ngemibhalo yeVangeli, ephefumlelwe nguMoya kaThixo Abasebenzi bakaYesu Krestu, uMzalwana uWang*Yun, uDade uLiu, uDade uZheng, uMzalwana uCen, kunye nabanye osebenza nabo baxhasa kwaye basebenza kunye kumsebenzi wevangeli weBandla likaYesu Krestu. Bashumayela ivangeli kaYesu Krestu, ivangeli evumela ukuba abantu basindiswe, bazukiswe, kwaye imizimba yabo ikhululwe! Amen, amagama abo abhalwe encwadini yobomi! Amen. →Njengoko eyabaseFilipi 4:2-3 isitsho, uPawulos, uTimoti, uWodiya, uSintike, uKlemente nabanye ababesebenza noPawulos, amagama abo akwincwadi yobomi obungamileyo. Amen!

articles.title: Isimo Sengqondo SamaKristu Xa Ejamelene Neentlekele
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile kwiEksodus isahluko 5 indinyana 3 size sifunde kunye: Bathi ke bona, UThixo wamaHebhere usihlangabeze; masihambe entlango uhambo lweentsuku ezintathu, sibingelele kuYehova uThixo wethu, hleze asiqwele ngendyikitya yokufa nangekrele.

Namhlanje sivavanya, sinxulumana, kwaye sabelane " Isimo Sengqondo SamaKristu Xa Ejamelene Neentlekele 》Umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu oseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele usoloko enathi! Amen. Ndiyabulela "Cathedral Women's Church" ngokuthumela abasebenzi ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhalwe kwaye lithethwe ngezandla zabo, ivangeli leyo eyenza ukuba sisindiswe, sizukiswe, kwaye sihlawulelwe imizimba yethu kweli hlabathi ligoso, linemvukelo, nelinesono, siyayiqonda intando yakho kwaye usifundise indlela yokujongana nazo zonke iintlobo zeentlekele nezibetho. Indlela yokubamba inyaniso ngomonde kunye nokholo kwaye uchithe ixesha lakho lonke emhlabeni . Amen.

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

1. Imfazwe, indlala, ubhubhani, imbalela, izantyalantyala zemvula, isichotho kunye neentlekele zomlilo

buza: Ngubani obangela iimfazwe, iindlala, iindyikitya zokufa nezinye iintlekele?
impendulo: Zonke iintlobo zeentlekele nezibetho ziphuma kuThixo.

buza: Sazi njani ukuba isibetho sivela kuThixo?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

(1) Izibetho kwiYiputa yamandulo

Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Yiya kuFaro, uthethe naye, uthi, Utsho uYehova uThixo wamaHebhere, ukuthi, Bandulule abantu bam, baye kundikhonza; usaya kubanyanzela ukuba bahlale, isandla sakhe uYehova sibe phezu kwemfuyo yentsimi yakho, phezu kwamahashe, namaesile, neenkamela, neenkomo, neegusha. isibetho . ...ukuba ndolula isandla sam ndisisebenzisa isibetho Hlasela wena nabantu bakho, yaye ngewade utshayelwe emhlabeni kwakudala. ( Eksodus 9:1-3, 15 )

(2) Izibetho ajamelana nazo amaSirayeli kwiTestamente Endala

1 ukwaphulwa kwesivumelwano

ndinizisele ikrele, ukuba ndiniphindezele ngenxa yokuwaphula umnqophiso, ndinihlanganisele emizini yenu; Thumelani isibetho phakathi kwenu , akunikele esandleni seentshaba zakho. ( Levitikus 26:25 )

2 Uhenyuzo, ukukhalaza nokuqubisana

Ngela xesha Wabulawa sisibetho , enabantu abangama-24 000. ( Numeri 25:9 )
Ngaphandle kwabafayo ngenxa kaKora; Wabulawa sisibetho , bebonke abantu abali-14 700. ( Numeri 16:49 )

3 Imiphumo yokungathobeli

“Ukuba uthe akwaliphulaphula ilizwi likaYehova uThixo wakho, ukuba uthe akwayigcina ngenyameko yonke imithetho nemimiselo yakhe; ITestamente eNdala ibhekisa kumthetho; njengoko ndikuwisela umthetho ngako namhla, ezi ziqalekiso zilandelayo ziya kukulandela, zibe phezu kwakho: ... Uqalekisiwe ekuphumeni kwakho, uqalekiswe ekungeneni kwakho. … UYehova woyinamathelisa kuwe isibetho , ade akutshabalalise, ungabikho kwelo zwe ubungene kulo ukuba ulihluthe. UYehova wokuhlasela ngesifo sephepha, nangecesina, nangomlilo, nangesifo seengcongconi, ngekrele, nangembalela, nangexoshomba. Zonke ezo zinto ziya kukusukela ude utshabalale. ( Duteronomi 28:15, 19, 21-22 )

(3) Kwenzeka ntoni kuDavide emva kokuba ebale abantu

Ngoko, UYehova uthumela izibetho Kwafa kunye noonyana bakaSirayeli, kususela kusasa kude kube lixesha elimisiweyo, kwafa amashumi asixhenxe amawaka abantu, bethabathela kwaDan besa eBher-shebha. ( 2 Samuweli 24:15 )

2 UThixo uthumela iintlekele

buza: Kutheni uThixo ethumela iintlekele nezibetho?
impendulo: UThixo uthumela izibetho kwabo bachasa uThixo, abathintela abantu ekumazini okuphela koThixo oyinyaniso, nabathintela abantu ekunquleni uThixo oyinyaniso—njengoFaro wamandulo waseYiputa, kukwakho nabaprofeti bobuxoki ababhidanisa indlela yokwenyaniso kaYehova INkosi kunye nabo bangakholelwayo kwindlela eyinyani yevangeli, kwaye benze ulwaphulo-mthetho olubi. abaninzi ngoku ngumKristu Zonke zindindisholo akukho mntu waziyo nemvelaphi yeemfazwe, iindlala, izifo, imbalela, izandyondyo zemvula, isichotho, nomlilo. Baninzi abaprofeti bobuxoki ebandleni abasasaza izibetho begxotha iintlekele egameni likaYehova, negama likaYesu, negama loMoya oyiNgcwele? Ngaba bayifundile iBhayibhile?

(1) UThixo wayohlwaya iTsidon
Ndiya kuyizisa indyikitya yokufa eSidon, ndiphalaze igazi ezitratweni zayo. Baya kuwa ababuleweyo esazulwini sayo, nekrele liyifikele ngeenxa zonke; bazi ukuba ndinguYehova. ( Hezekile 28:23 )
(2) UThixo uyabatshabalalisa abangendawo
Yithi kubo, Itsho iNkosi uYehova ukuthi, Ndihleli nje, abasentlango baya kuwa likrele; emqolombeni uya kufa sisibetho. ( Hezekile 33:27 )
(3) UThixo uyamohlwaya uGogi
Ndiya kumvelela ngendyikitya yokufa nangegazi. Ndiya kumthumela imvula nesichotho, umlilo, nesulfure, phezu komkhosi wakhe, naphezu kwabantu bonke anabo; ( Hezekile 38:22 )

3. Isimo sengqondo samaKristu ngentlekele (isibetho)

2 KWABASETESALONIKA 1:4 Nathi ke emabandleni kaThixo siyaqhayisa ngani, ngenxa yonyamezelo nokholo lwenu, phezu kwazo zonke iintshutshiso neembandezelo enazinyamezelayo.

(1) Yilwa "Miaomiao"

buza: Ngaba "iMiaomiao" ingasithintela isibetho?
impendulo: Awunakulinda kuyo.

buza: Ngoba?
impendulo: Ngoku uyazi" yehlisani isibetho; “Liphuma kuThixo, elivuswe nguThixo, yaye akukho mfuneko yakulinda kulo → Njengoko kubhaliwe kwathiwa— Hezekile 33:27 . → "Kwiinqaba ”→ Yiyo loo nto abakhohlakele Abo bathembele kwi "Miao Miao" njengesikhuselo sokuzikhusela okanye ukuzikhusela, kwaye abo bazimele emiqolombeni, babeza kubandezeleka ngenxa yesibetho baze bafe.

IsiTyhilelo 20:11 Asaba ebusweni bakhe izulu nomhlaba. Izulu okanye umhlaba awunakuwusaba umgwebo kaThixo ), engasabonakaliyo. Ngaba ucinga ukuba iMiaomiao ingakukhusela? Kunene! Abanye abantu basabela kuwo wonke umzimba wabo emva kokuthatha "i-Miao Miao", kwaye abanye abantu bade bafe emva kokuthatha "i-Miao Miao" ukuba uthatha "i-Miao Miao", ukugonywa komzimba wakho kuya kuncipha kwaye uya kuba sengozini ngakumbi kwintsholongwane, kwaye ungafa ngaphambili.

Ngoko ke, xa bejamelene neentlekele okanye izibetho, kuhle ukuba abazalwana noodade bangenzi izigqibo zabo, kuba umzimba wakho YayiyiNkosi uYesu eyayisebenzisa " Igazi “Nathengwa ngexabiso, nibekelwe ekufeni kukaKristu. Awuyi kufa sisibetho sentsholongwane ), thabatha umnqamlezo wakho ulandele uYesu, ufela kunye naye ivangeli kaKristu Lowo ungqinayo. Uyaqonda?

Nisazi nje ukuba izibetho ziphuma kuThixo, zokonakalisa abangendawo, yimini uYehova athumela ngayo izibetho zokuphindezela kwabangendawo. Kuba wena ( ileta ) yeVangeli indlela yokwenyani, kananjalo ( ileta ) ukwamkela uYesu Krestu kwaye uyazi ukuba ungumntwana ozelwe nguThixo, zingathini na ukuza kuwe ezi zibetho zentsholongwane? Ngaba unyanisile?

IVangeli kaLuka [Isahluko 11 ivesi 11-13] Njengoko iNkosi uYesu yathi → Nguwuphi na ke uyise kuni oya kuthi, unyana wakho akucela isonka, amnike ilitye; Ukucela intlanzi, kuthekani na ukuba uthe wamnika inyoka esikhundleni sentlanzi? Ukuba uthe wacela iqanda, womnika unomadudwane? Ukuba ke nina, nikhohlakele nje, niyakwazi ukubapha abantwana benu izipho ezilungileyo (niyakwazi ukubapha abantwana benu izipho ezilungileyo, wobeka phi na ke yena uYihlo osemazulwini, ukugqithisela ukubapha uMoya oyiNgcwele abo bamcelayo? " Kunene?

Ngaphandle kokuba wena ( ileta ) iminyaka emininzi kangaka indlela yobuxoki , uzenza umntwana kaThixo, umhanahanisi, wathi uzokosulelwa yintsholongwane ufe sisibetho, kufuneka ungabi ngumntwana kaThixo. AmaKristu amaninzi “afuna” aze kamva azisole. Njengoko sibaleka kuhambo lwasemoyeni, kufuneka sibe nentliziyo yomanyano kunye nenkonzo Abazalwana noodade kufuneka baxhasane, batsale kwaye bakhuthazane, kuba singamangqina kaYehova kwisizukulwana sokugqibela. Wena, umhle kunabo bonke abafazi, ukuba awukwazi, landela nje umkhondo wezimvu ...Imbekiselo ( INgoma yazo iiNgoma 1:8 )

Iculo: Ndiyakholwa! Kodwa andinalo ukholo lwaneleyo, ngoko ndicela undincede!

(2)Uphawu lwerhamncwa 666

buza: Ngaba "iMiao Miao" luphawu lwerhamncwa?
impendulo: Kukwabangela ukuba wonke umntu, omkhulu nomncinci, osisityebi nolihlwempu, okhululekileyo okanye ikhoboka, ukuba aphawule esandleni sakhe sokunene okanye ebunzi. ( ISityhilelo 13:16 ) → “Bancinane” - bambi banezandla zasekhohlo, abanye banezandla zasekunene yaye abalufumananga uphawu lwalo emabunzini abo.

Ukuba uzikholelwa ngokwenene iindaba ezilungileyo kwaye uyayiqonda imfundiso eyinyani yeendaba ezilungileyo, ekubeni ukholelwa kuYesu Kristu, uya kufumana isithembiso " uMoya oyiNgcwele "Kuba uphawu!" Itywina loMoya oyiNgcwele akanako ukuphinda alamkele uphawu lwerhamncwa; Miaomiao “Asikokwamkela uphawu lwerhamncwa. Uyakuqonda na oku?

buza: Luyintoni uphawu lwerhamncwa?

impendulo: I-Artificial intelligence synthesis (ukudityaniswa komatshini womntu) kuthiwa irhamncwa "Isiqingatha-isilwanyana, isiqingatha-somntu".

I-Q&A "Uphawu lwerhamncwa" ineempendulo ezineenkcukacha.

(3) Apha kulele umonde nokholo lwabangcwele

Isityhilelo 14:12 Lulo ke olu unyamezelo lwabangcwele; abayigcinayo imithetho kaThixo nokholo kuYesu .
buza: Zinyamezele ntoni iingcwele?
impendulo: Xa ujongene nentlekele, imbandezelo, nentshutshiso→ Usakholelwa kuYesu kwaye ugcine ukholo .

Xa ujongene neentlekele kunye nezibetho:

1 Thatha inyathelo lokuqala “ukubonakala” → Aba bantu abakholelwa kuYesu; ileta "Ngu" Miao Miao "othembele kuyo. Akunamsebenzi ukuba ucule "INkosi yindawo yam yokusabela" imihla ngemihla; aba bantu bathatha inyathelo lokuqala "Miao Miao", kwaye kungokwabo ukubamba "iMiao Miao" yokusabela. .
2 Phantsi "Miao Miao" →Ukubhideka kunye "neMiao Miao".
3 Ukunyanzelwa ukuba "Miao Miao" →Ukunyanzelwa, nokubanjwa okanye ukubotshelelwa ukuba yi "Miao Miao".
4. Yiba nomonde kude kube sekupheleni Nokuba uyafa, awuyi kukwazi ukuphila. , ngenxa yokuba uThixo esikholelwa kuye unyanisekile yaye uthembekile, yaye uThixo uyindawo yethu yokusabela! (Hayi iMiaomiao).
Phawula:
Hayi. 1 Umntu onjani:" ngokucacileyo “Musani ukukholwa kuYesu;
Hayi. 2 iintlobo kunye...
Hayi. 3 Imbewu: Nkosi yiba nenceba nika Ukuba unokuzeka kade umsindo nokholo, uyibambe indlela elungileyo, uxhomekeke kuMoya oyiNgcwele, nokuba ayikuko izihlandlo ezilikhulu, uya kusindiswa izihlandlo ezimashumi mathandathu, okanye ka-30, okanye usindiswe;
Hayi. 4 Abantu: Nyamezela kude kube sekupheleni → ngqinela uYesu → Ungqina ngantoni? ingqina Phambi kwentlekele【 UThixo ulihlathi lam 】Unyanisekile kwaye uthembekile, ingqina " usana "Eli gunya likhulu libekwe esityeni sodongwe" ngokucacileyo “Iphuma kuThixo, ingqina Nangona kuwa iwaka ecaleni kwakho, neshumi lamawaka ngasekunene kwakho, oku " isibetho Akukho ntlekele iya kuza kuwe. Naku kulele unyamezelo nokholo lwabangcwele. BangamaNgqina kaYehova, alungiselelwe nguThixo izihlandlo ezili-100.

4 UYehova ulihlathi lam

Akuyi kufikelwa bububi, nandyikitya yokufa, akuyi kusondela nabubi ententeni yakho; Amen !

INdumiso 91:

【Ivesi 1】Ohleli esitheni lOsenyangweni, uhleli emthunzini kaSomandla.
( Lwazi : Uhlalaphi ngoku? Uyakholwa ukuba uhleli kuYesu Kristu? )

[Indinyana 2] Ndiya kuthi ngoYehova: “Uyindawo yam yokusabela negwiba lam, uThixo wam, endikholose ngaye.”
( Phawula: UYehova uyindawo yam yokusabela, lowo ndithembele ngaye → “Isibetho” siyakungqina → Ngaba uThixo uligwiba lakho yaye ukholose ngoThixo? Okanye uthembele kwi "Miaomiao"? )

【Ivesi 3】Uya kukuhlangula emgibeni womthiyeli, nasesibethweni esibuhlungu.
( Qaphela: Uya kukuhlangula kumgibe wombathisi → “kumgibe “wenyoka” uSathana uMtyholi” nakwisibetho esiyityhefu )

[Indinyana 4] Wokugubungela ngeentsiba zakhe, Uzimele phantsi kwamaphiko akhe;
( Qaphela: Wokugubungela ngeentsiba zakhe, Uzimele phantsi kwamaphiko akhe; )

[Indinyana 5] Akuyi koyikiswa lunkwantyo lwasebusuku, nazitolo zibaleka emini;
( Qaphela: Awuyi koyika unkwantyo lwasebusuku → okanye unkwantyo lwenyikima yequbuliso; okanye iintolo eziphaphazela emini → iintolo ezenzakalisayo )

【Ivesi 6】Ningasoyiki isibetho esifika ebusuku, netyhefu ebulala abantu emini enkulu.
( Qaphela: Andisoyiki isibetho esihamba ebumnyameni → Andisoyiki isibetho esihamba ndingazi ebusuku okanye intsholongwane ebulala abantu emini; )

【Isi 7】 Nokuba kungawa iwaka ecaleni kwakho, neshumi lamawaka ngasekunene kwakho, asiyi kusondela kuwe esi sibetho.
( Qaphela: nangona zikhona " abakhohlakele "Amawaka abantu awela ecaleni kwakho," abakhohlakele "Amawaka abantu baya kuwa ngasekunene kwakho," isibetho Kodwa akukho ntlekele iya kufika kuwe. )

【Indinyana yesi-8】 Unokujonga kuphela ngamehlo akho kwaye ubone impindezelo yabangendawo.

( Qaphela: Umi kuKristu kwaye ubukele ngamehlo akho → Ubona impindezelo yabangendawo kwaye utshatyalaliswa ziintlekele. )

【Isi-9*UYehova uyindawo yam yokuhlala;
( Qaphela: UYehova uyindawo yam yokuhlala; Amen )

【Ivesi 10】Akuyi kuzela bubi, abuyi kusondela ububi ententeni yakho;
( Qaphela: Akukho bubi buya kuza kuwe, nentlekele ayiyi kusondela ententeni yakho→ " intente "Yintente yethutyana → ithetha umzimba phezu komhlaba → Akukho sibetho okanye intlekele iya kuza kuwe! Bhekisela kweyesi- 2 kwabaseKorinte 5:1-4 nakweyesi- 2 kaPetros 1:13-14 )

[Indinyana 11] Ngokuba uya kuziwisela umthetho ngawe izithunywa zakhe, Ukuba zikugcine ezindleleni zakho zonke.
( Qaphela: Kuba uya kuyalela iingelosi Zakhe egameni lakho → ziziingelosi ukuba zikukhusele kuzo zonke iindlela zakho → Wonke umntu okholwayo kuYesu uya kuba neengelosi ecaleni kwakhe ukuze zikukhusele. )

[Indinyana 12] Zokuthwala ngezandla, Hleze ubetheke etyeni ngonyawo lwakho.
( Qaphela: Iingelosi ziya kukuphakamisa ngezandla ukuze zikuthintele ukuba ungonzakali )

[Indinyana 13] Wonyathela phezu kwengonyama nerhamba, uyinyhashe ngeenyawo ingonyama entsha, nenyoka;

( Qaphela: U-Kristu woyisile, nawe umoyisile umtyholi, uSathana, wayinyathela ngeenyawo ingonyama entsha nenyoka. )

[Indinyana 14] UThixo uthi: “Ngokuba endithanda ngentliziyo yakhe yonke, ndomhlangula;

(Phawula: Ukuba umthanda uThixo ngentliziyo iphela, uThixo uya kukusindisa aze adlulisele igama lakho kubukumkani boNyana wakhe oyintanda - bhekisela kumaKolose 1:13 )

[Indinyana 15] Ukuba uthe wabiza kum, ndomphendula, ndoba naye embandezelweni yakhe;

( Qaphela: Ukuba ubiza uThixo, uThixo uya kundiphendula ngexesha lobunzima, asenze ababingeleli basebukhosini. )

[Indinyana 16] Ndiya kumanelisa imihla emide, ndimbonise usindiso lwam. "

( Qaphela: Ndiya kumanelisa ngobomi obude → "yonwabela ubomi obude" kuthetha de intente yenyama esemhlabeni idilizwe nguThixo → oko kukuthi, ubuncwane buya kutyhilwa isitya sodongwe! Amen )

Ukwabelana ngemibhalo yeVangeli, ephefumlelwe nguMoya kaThixo Abasebenzi bakaYesu Krestu, uMzalwana uWang*Yun, uDade uLiu, uDade uZheng, uMzalwana uCen, kunye nabanye osebenza nabo baxhasa kwaye basebenza kunye kumsebenzi wevangeli weBandla likaYesu Krestu. Bashumayela ivangeli kaYesu Krestu, ivangeli evumela ukuba abantu basindiswe, bazukiswe, kwaye imizimba yabo ikhululwe! Amen, amagama abo abhalwe encwadini yobomi! Amen. →Njengoko eyabaseFilipi 4:2-3 isitsho, uPawulos, uTimoti, uWodiya, uSintike, uKlemente nabanye ababesebenza noPawulos, amagama abo akwincwadi yobomi obungamileyo. Amen!

Ingoma: UYehova lihlathi lam

Wamkele abazalwana noodade abaninzi ukukhangela ngebrawuza yakho - ibandla leNkosi uYesu Krestu -Cofa Khuphela.Qokelela Hlanganyeni nathi nisebenze kunye ekushumayeleni ivangeli kaYesu Krestu.

articles.title: Imibuzo Neempendulo: Ukuba sithi asonanga
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Masiqhubeke nesifundo sethu seyoku-1 kaYohane 1:10 kwaye sifunde kunye: Ukuba sithi asonanga, simenza uThixo ixoki, kwaye ilizwi lakhe alikho kuthi.


1 Wonke umntu wonile

buza: Ngaba nathi sakha sona?
impendulo: " babe ”→ Kuba bonile bonke, basilela eluzukweni lukaThixo (Roma 3:23)

2. Isono sangena ehlabathini ngomntu omnye

buza: Isono sethu sivela phi?
impendulo: Ukuphuma kumntu omnye (uAdam) → Oku kufana nqwa nesono sangena ngamntu mnye ehlabathini, kwaza ukufa kwaphuma esonweni, ngoko ke ukufa kwabafikela bonke abantu ngenxa yokuba bonke bonayo. ( Roma 5:12 )

3 Ukuba sithi asonanga

buza: Ukuba "thina" sithi asonanga → "thina" kuthetha ngaphambi kokuzalwa kwakhona? Okanye emva kokuzalwa kwakhona?
impendulo: Apha" thina "Ewe Ubhekisela kwinto ayithethileyo ngaphambi kokuba azalwe ngokutsha ; ayithethi ukuba ( ; ileta ) weza kuYesu waza wayiqonda inyaniso yeendaba ezilungileyo, ( ukuzalwa ngokutsha ) watsho ungcwele emva.

Njengoko iNkosi uYesu yathi → Andize kubiza malungisa (abantu abazigwebelayo, abazenza amalungisa abangenasono), kodwa aboni → 1 kuTimoti Isahluko 1:15 “UKristu Yesu weza ehlabathini ukuze asindise. aboni.” Le ngxelo inokuthenjwa kwaye iyancomeka kakhulu. Ndiyintloko yaboni. kubonakala" uSawule "Ngaphambi kokuzalwa ngokutsha, batshutshisa uYesu kunye namaKristu; emva kokukhanyiselwa nguKristu." uPawulosi "Ndazi → Mna phakathi kwaboni" uSawule “Nguye onetyala elikhulu.

buza: Ngaba uYesu, owazalwa nguThixo uYise, wona?
impendulo: Hayi! →Kuba umbingeleli omkhulu wethu akanakuvelana nezilwelwe zethu. Wahendwa kuzo zonke iindawo njengathi, kodwa engenasono. ( Hebhere 4:15 )

buza: Ngaba thina, bazelwe nguThixo, sakha sona?
impendulo: Hayi !
buza: Ngoba?
impendulo: Bonke abazelwe nguThixo aboni, ngokuba ilizwi likaThixo lihleli kuye; ( 1 Yohane 3:9 kunye 5:18 )

Phawula: Ngoko apha" thina "Ibhekisela kwinto eyayithethwa ngaphambi kokuzalwa kwakhona, njengaku" thina "Kwixesha elidlulileyo, andizange ndizive iindaba ezilungileyo, ndandingamazi uYesu, kwaye andizange ( ileta UYesu, engazalwanga ngokutsha ukuze alandele ( Ukukhanya ) abantu kunye " wena ” bayafana → bonke baphantsi komthetho, bangabenzi bomthetho, bangabakhonzi besono.
UYohane ngu ( Bhala ) kwabo bakholwayo kuThixo, kodwa ( Musa ukukholelwa ) Abazalwana bakaYesu abangamaYuda bathi babengenamlamli, uYesu Kristu! bona ( ileta wugcineni umthetho, nicinge ukuba aninanga.
Amazwi kaYohane okukhuthaza ngobubele abhekiswa kuye “ bona "Yithi →" thina Ukuba sithi asonanga, simenza uThixo ixoki, nelizwi lakhe alikho kuthi.
Emva koko eyoku-1 kaYohane isahluko 2 indinyana 1 iqala ngokuthi “uYohane” ukusuka ku-“ thina "Shintsha ithoni ibe" wena ”→Bafana bam abancinane, ndiza kunixelela la mazwi Bhala Kuwe (oko kukuthi dlula Zazinikelwe ke iindaba ezilungileyo, ukuze ningoni. Ukuba kukho othe wona, sinoMthetheleli kuye uYise, uYesu Kristu ilungisa.

buza: UYohane wabaxelela njani ukuba bangoni?
impendulo: UYohane wabaxelela ukuba bamazi uYesu Kristu → kholwa kuYesu →Ukuzalwa ngokutsha, uvuko, usindiso, ubomi obungunaphakade!

Ukuba kukho othe wona, sinoMthetheleli kuye uYise, uYesu Kristu ilungisa → Yena usisicamagushelo sezono zethu, engesezethu zodwa, usiso nesehlabathi liphela. ( 1 Yohane 2:2 )

Phawula: UYohane waxelela abo baphantsi komthetho ukuba bawugcine umthetho, yaye baphule umthetho baze bawutyeshele umthetho kusisono → umntu owenza ulwaphulo-mthetho →SinoMthetheleli kuBawo, uYesu Kristu ilungisa. Yazini ukuba uYesu Kristu wathunyelwa evela kuYise, lowo waba sisicamagushelo sezono zethu, wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni, ukuze thina Ngaphandle kokudibana ( ulwaphulo-mthetho ), Ngaphandle kokudibana ( umthetho )→

1 Apho kungekho mthetho, akukho sigqitho;

2 Ngaphandle komthetho, isono sifile;

3 Ngaphandle komthetho, isono asisosono.

【 uvuko 】→Sithethelele, sivelise ngokutsha, vusa, sindisa, kwaye ube nobomi obungunaphakade! Amen
Siyazi ukuba bonke abazelwe nguThixo aboni; uMoya oyiNgcwele "Uya kusikhusela ( Umntu omtsha singoni, sizelwe nguThixo ( Umntu omtsha Ubomi bufihlwe noKristu kuye uThixo, angáthini na ke ukona? Kunene? Abangendawo abayi kukwazi ukusenzakalisa. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Iculo: Uhlambulula izono
