articles.title: Imibuzo Neempendulo: Ukuba siyazivuma izono zethu
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Masiqhubeke nesifundo sethu seyoku-1 kaYohane 1:9, sityhile kunye sifunde: Ukuba sithi sizivume izono zethu, uthembekile, ulilungisa, uya kusixolela izono zethu, asihlambulule kuko konke ukungalungisi.

1. Cela ityala

buza: Ukuba siyazivuma izono zethu → “thina” ibhekisa phambi kokuzalwa ngokutsha? Okanye emva kokuzalwa kwakhona?
impendulo: Apha" thina ” ithetha phambi kokuzalwa kwakhona babengamazi uYesu, bengamazi ( ileta ) UYesu akazange ayiqonde inyaniso yeendaba ezilungileyo xa wayephantsi komthetho.

buza: kutheni apha" thina "Ngaba kuthetha ngaphambi kokuzalwa kwakhona?"
impendulo: Kuba ngaphambi kokuba sizalwe ngokutsha, asizange simazi uYesu okanye siyiqonde imfundiso yokwenyaniso yeendaba ezilungileyo, Sasiphantsi komthetho, yaye abo babephantsi komthetho yayingabo bawaphulayo umthetho nabawutyeshelayo umthetho siphantsi komthetho Abantu → bavume izono zabo.

2. Ukuvuma izono phantsi komthetho

(1) UAkan uyalivuma ityala → Wathi uYoshuwa kuAkan, Nyana wam, khawuzukise uYehova, uThixo kaSirayeli, usivume isono sakho phambi kwakhe. Ndixelele into oyenzileyo, musa ukundifihlela yona UYoshuwa wathi: “Ngokwenene ndonile kuYehova, uThixo kaSirayeli.

Phawula: UAkan walivuma ityala lakhe → ubungqina betyala lakhe baqinisekiswa, waza waxulutywa ngamatye wafa ngokomthetho → Umntu owaphule umthetho kaMoses, nokuba ngamangqina amabini okanye amathathu, akazange enzelwe inceba waza wafa. ( Hebhere 10:28 )

(2) UKumkani uSawule walivuma ityala lakhe → 1 Samuweli 15:24 24 Wathi uSawule kuSamuweli: "Ndonile, Ndonile;

Qaphela: Ukungathobeli → kuthetha ukwaphulwa kwesivumelwano (“umnqophiso” ngumthetho) → Isono sokungathobeli siyafana nesono sokukhafula siyafana nesono sokunqula oothixo bobuxoki nezithixo. Ngokuba uwucekisile umlomo kaYehova, uYehova ukucekisile ukuba ube ngukumkani. ( 1 Samuweli 15:23 )

(3) UDavide wavuma →Ndithe ndakuthi cwaka, ndingazivumi izono zam, oma amathambo am ngokuba ndigcuma imini yonke. …Ndizixela kuwe izono zam, kwaye andizifihli izenzo zam ezimbi. Ndathi, Ndozivuma izono zam kuYehova; ( INdumiso 32:3, 5 ) (4) UDaniyeli uvuma izono zakhe →Ndathandaza ndivuma isono sam kuYehova uThixo wam, ndisithi: “Owu Yehova, Thixo omkhulu owoyikekayo, obagcinelayo umnqophiso nenceba abamthandayo uYehova, abayigcinayo imithetho yakhe, sonile, senza ubugwenxa senze ububi, sigwilikile, siye saphambuka emiyalelweni nasemithethweni yakho,...wonke uSirayeli uwugqithile umyalelo wakho, ukreqile, akaliphulaphula izwi lakho, akaliphulaphulanga izwi lakho; Wathululwa phezu kwethu uMoses umkhonzi wakho, ngokuba sonile UThixo ( Daniyeli 9:4-5, 11 )

(5) USimon Petros uvuma izono zakhe → Xa uSimon Petros ekubonile oku, wawa emadolweni kaYesu waza wathi, “Nkosi, mka kum, ngokuba ndingumoni!” ( Luka 5:8 )
(6) Cela ityala kwimbali yerhafu →Umqokeleli werhafu wema kude, engenabuganga bokuphakamisela amehlo akhe ezulwini, wabetha isifuba sakhe kuphela, wathi, Thixo, yiba nenceba kum, mna moni. ( Luka 18:13 )
(7) Nifanele nivume izono omnye komnye → Ke ngoko zivumeni izono omnye komnye, nithandazelane, ukuze niphiliswe. Umthandazo welungisa uba mkhulu; ( Yakobi 5:16 )
(8) Ukuba siyazivuma izono zethu , uThixo uthembekile, ulilungisa, uya kusixolela izono zethu, asihlambulule kuko konke ukungalungisi. ( 1 Yohane 1:9 )

3. Ngaphambi kokuba uzalwe kwakhona" thina "" wena Bonke baphantsi komthetho

buza: Kufuneka nivume izono omnye komnye → Ibhekisa kubani le?
impendulo: maJuda! Incwadi kaYakobi ngumbuliso (incwadi) ebhalwe nguYakobi, umninawa kaYesu, kubantu → abantu bezizwe ezilishumi elinesibini ezisasazwe ngokubanzi - bhekisa kuYakobi Isahluko 1:1.

AmaYuda ayenenzondelelo ngomthetho (kuquka noYakobi ngelo xesha)—akuba evile oku, amzukisa uThixo aza athi kuPawulos: “Mzalwana, khangela ukuba angako amawakawaka amaYuda akholiweyo eNkosini, yaye onke anenzondelelo. ngokomthetho.”—IZenzo 21:20.
Nantsi incwadi kaYakobi → " wena “Vumani izono zenu omnye komnye → kubhekisela kwisibakala sokuba amaYuda ayenenzondelelo ngomthetho, yaye ayewuzondelela umthetho. ileta ) UThixo, uDan ( Musa ukukholelwa Yesu, ukuswela ( umlamli ) UYesu Kristu uMsindisi! Ayengakhululekanga emthethweni, ayephantsi komthetho, amaYuda awayesaphula umthetho nawayephula umthetho. Ngoko uYakobi wathi kubo → " wena “Vumani izono zenu omnye komnye, nithandazelane, ukuze niphiliswe; isifo siyanyangeka ) Luqonde usindiso → Kholelwa kuYesu → Ngemivumbo yakhe, uya kuphiliswa → Fumana ukuphiliswa kokwenyani → uzelwe ngokutsha kwaye usindiswe !

buza: Ukuba siyazivuma izono zethu → " thina "Ibhekisa kubani?"
impendulo: " thina ” libhekisela kwinto yokuba ngaphambi kokuba umntu azalwe ngokutsha, wayengamazi uYesu yaye engenaye ( ileta ) UYesu, xa wayengekazalwa ngokutsha → wema phambi kwentsapho yakhe, abazalwana noodade waza wasebenzisa → “thina”! Watsho kanjalo uYohane kubazalwana bakhe abangamaYuda, ngokuba ileta uThixo, kodwa ( Musa ukukholelwa Yesu, ukuswela ( umlamli ) UYesu Kristu uMsindisi! Bacinga ukuba bawugcinile umthetho kwaye abonanga, kwaye akuyomfuneko ukuba bavume → ezifana " uPawulosi "Uthini na ukucela umntu ukuba avume izono zakhe xa egcina umthetho ngokungenakusoleka? Akunakwenzeka ukuba avume izono zakhe, akunjalo! Emva kokuba ekhanyiselwe nguKristu, uPawulos wafikelela ekuzazini kwakhe okwenyani." indoda endala Ngaphambi kokuba uzalwe ngokutsha, uyintloko yaboni.

Ngoko apha" UYohane "Bhalela ku ( Musa ukukholelwa ) Abazalwana bakaYesu abangamaYuda abaphantsi komthetho bathi → “ thina Ukuba sithi sizivume izono zethu, uThixo uthembekile, ulilungisa, uya kusixolela izono zethu, asihlambulule kuko konke ukungalungisi.

Iculo: Ukuba siyazivuma izono zethu

kulungile! Yiloo nto kuphela esithe sabelana ngayo namhlanje. Yanga ubabalo lweNkosi uYesu Krestu, uthando lukaThixo, kunye nempefumlelo yoMoya oyiNgcwele ibe nani ngamaxesha onke! Amen

articles.title: Imibuzo neempendulo: Ukuba sithi asinatyala
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
[ISibhalo] Eyoku-1 kaYohane (Isahluko 1:8) Ukuba sithi asinasono, siyazikhohlisa, yaye inyaniso ayikho kuthi.

Intshayelelo: Ezi ndinyana zintathu kweyoku-1 kaYohane 1:8, 9, ne-10 zezona vesi ziphikisanayo ebandleni namhlanje.

buza: Kutheni le nto iyindinyana ephikisanayo?
impendulo: Eyoku- 1 kaYohane ( Isahluko 1:⁠8 ) Ukuba sithi asinasono, siyazikhohlisa yaye inyaniso ayikho kuthi.
(1 Yohane 5:18) Siyazi ukuba bonke abazelwe nguThixo aboni…! Kukwakho noYohane 3:9 othi “Ningoni” nothi “Ningoni” → Ngokujonga amagama (aphikisanayo) → “ Uthe ngaphambili Ukuba sithi asinasono, siyazikhohlisa, inyaniso ayikho kuthi; Thetha ngayo kamva Siyazi ukuba wonke umntu ozelwe nguThixo akoni; akoni, akanakona; Yithi "akukho lwaphulo-mthetho" kathathu ngokulandelelana ! Ithoni iqinisekisa kakhulu. Ngoko ke, asinakukwazi ukutolika iBhayibhile ngokusekelwe kumazwi kuphela Kufuneka sikuqonde ukuthanda kukaThixo, kuba amazwi kaThixo angumoya nobomi! Hayi amazwi. Thetha izinto ezizezoMoya kubantu boMoya, kodwa abantu benyama abayi kuba nako ukuziqonda.

buza: Kutshiwo apha ukuba "siya" sona, kodwa "thina" asiyi kona.
1 →" thina "Unetyala? Okanye awunatyala?;
2 →" thina "Ngaba uya kwenza ulwaphulo-mthetho? Okanye awuyi kwenza lwaphulo-mthetho?"
impendulo: Siqala ku【 ukuzalwa ngokutsha 】Abantu abatsha bathetha nabantu abadala!

1. UYesu, owazalwa nguThixo uYise, wayengenasono

buza: Wazalwa ngabani uYesu?
impendulo: UBawo ozelwe nguThixo → Ingelosi yaphendula yathi: “UMoya oyiNgcwele uya kukufikela, athi amandla Osenyangweni akusibekele; uNyana kaThixo) (Luka 1:35).

buza: Ngaba uYesu wayenesono?
impendulo: INkosi uYesu ayinasono →Niyazi ke ukuba uYehova wabonakalaliswa, ukuze azithwale azisuse izono zabantu; kuba akukho sono kuye. ( 1 Yohane 3:5 ) neyesi- 2 kwabaseKorinte 5:21 .

2. Thina sizalwe nguThixo (umntu omtsha) sikwangenasono

buza: thina ileta Emva kokufunda ngoYesu nokuqonda inyaniso → Wazalwa kubani?
impendulo:
1 Uzelwe ngamanzi nanguMoya — Yohane 3:5
2 Nizelwe inyaniso yeendaba ezilungileyo — 1 Korinte 4:15
3 Bazalwa nguThixo → Ke bonke abamamkelayo wabanika igunya lokuba babe ngabantwana bakaThixo, abo ke bakholwayo kwigama lakhe; Aba ngabo abangazalwanga ngagazi, kungengankanuko, nangakuthanda kwandoda; bazelwe nguThixo. Imbekiselo ( Yohane 1:12-13 )

buza: Ngaba kukho isono ekuzalweni nguThixo?
impendulo: akanatyala ! Nabani na ozelwe nguThixo akayi kona → Siyazi ukuba bonke abazelwe nguThixo abayi kona; ongendawo akayi kuba nako ukumenzakalisa. ( 1 Yohane 5:18 )

3. Thina sizalwe ngegazi ( indoda endala ) unetyala

buza: Ngaba thina, siphuma kuAdam, sizalwa ngabazali, sinetyala?
impendulo: unetyala .
buza: Ngoba?
impendulo: Oku kufana nesono esivela ( UAdam ) Umntu omnye wangena ehlabathini, kwaza ukufa ngaso isono, kwaza ukufa kwabafikela bonke abantu ngenxa yokuba bonke bonayo. ( Roma 5:12 )

4. “Thina” kunye “nawe” kweyoku-1 kaYohane

1 KAYOHANE 1:8 Ukuba sithi asinasono, siyazikhohlisa, inyaniso ayikho kuthi.

buza: Ngubani lo ubhekisa kubani apha?
impendulo: Hayi" ileta "UYesu, wathi ngabantu abangazange baqonde indlela yokwenyaniso kwaye abazange bazalwe ngokutsha! Ngokomzekelo, xa sishumayela iindaba ezilungileyo kumalungu entsapho, izalamane, abahlobo, abo sifunda nabo kunye nabo sisebenza nabo → siya kusebenzisa " thina “Yiba nobudlelwane obusondeleyo nabo,” utshilo thina "→ Ukuba uthi awunatyala, uyazikhohlisa! Awuyi kusebenzisa amagama okugxeka." wena ".

Kweyoku-1 kaYohane, “uYohane uthetha nabazalwana bakhe abangamaYuda, ileta UThixo → Kodwa ( Musa ukukholelwa "UYesu, uswele" umlamli “Abakholwayo nabangakholwayo abanakubotshwa edyokhweni ngokulinganayo; UYohane "Awunabudlelwane nabo kuba abakwazi." ukukhanya kwenyaniso “Yesu, baziimfama kwaye bahamba ebumnyameni.

Makhe sikhangele ngokweenkcukacha [1 Yohane 1:1-8]:

(1)Indlela yobomi

Indinyana 1: Ngokusingisele kwilizwi lantlandlolo lobomi kwasekuqalekeni, esalivayo, salibona, sabona ngamehlo ethu, salichukumisa ngezandla zethu.
Ivesi 2: (Obu bomi bubonakalisiwe, nathi sabubona, kwaye ngoku siyangqina ukuba sininika ubomi obungunaphakade, obukuye uYise, kwaye babonakala nathi.)
Ivesi 3: Oko ke sikubonileyo, sikuvileyo, siyakuxela kuni, ukuze nani nibe nobudlelane nathi. Bubudlelwane bethu noBawo kunye noNyana wakhe, uYesu Krestu.
Ivesi 4: Ezo zinto sinibhalela ukuze uvuyo lwenu lwanele.

Phawula:
Icandelo 1 → Endleleni yobomi,
Icandelo 2 → Ukudlula ( IVangeli ) ubomi obungunaphakade kuwe,
Ivesi 3 → Ukuze nibe nobudlelane nathi, nibe nobudlelane noYise, noNyana wakhe uYesu Kristu.
Icandelo 4 → Sibeka la magama ( Bhala ) eya kuwe,
(“ thina ” ithetha ileta Abantu bakaYesu;" wena ” ibhekisa kubantu abangakholwanga kuYesu)

(2)UThixo ukukukhanya
Ivesi 5: UThixo ukukukhanya, kwaye akukho bumnyama kuye. Nali ke ilizwi esilivileyo kuYehova, salibuyisela kuni;
Ivesi 6: Ukuba sithi sinobudlelane noThixo kodwa sibe sihamba ebumnyameni, soba siyaxoka, asihambi enyanisweni.
Ivesi 7: Ukuba sihamba ekukhanyeni, njengokuba uThixo esekukhanyeni, soba sinobudlelane omnye nomnye, lithi negazi likaYesu Kristu, uNyana wakhe, lisihlambulule kuso sonke isono.
Ivesi 8: Ukuba sithi asinasono, siyazikhohlisa, inyaniso ayikho kuthi.

Phawula:
Ivesi 5 → UThixo ukukukhanya, " thina "Ibhekisa kwabo bakholwayo kuYesu balandele ukukhanya, bavuzwe" wena “Isigidimi sithetha ukuba ukushumayela iindaba ezilungileyo akukwenzi ( ileta "UYesu, akazange alandele" Ukukhanya "abantu,

Icandelo 6 → " thina "Kuthetha ukukholwa kuYesu nokumlandela" Ukukhanya "abantu," njengaye ” sithetha ngokuqikelelwayo Ukuba sithi ikuThixo ( Ukukhanya ) wanqumlana, kodwa usahamba ebumnyameni ( thina kwaye" Ukukhanya Sinobudlelane ke thina, sihamba ebumnyameni nje; siyaxoka na?
Ngenxa yokuba sinobudlelane nokukhanya, akunakwenzeka ukuba siqhubeke sihamba ebumnyameni ukuba sisahamba ebumnyameni, oko kungqina ukuba asinabudlelane nokukhanya → oko kuthetha ukuba siyaxoka yaye asiyenzi inyaniso; . Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Icandelo 7 → Nathi → ( njengaye Hambani ekukhanyeni, njengokuba uThixo esekukhanyeni, ninobudlelane omnye nomnye, lithi negazi likaYesu Kristu, uNyana wakhe, lisihlambulule kuso sonke isono.

Icandelo 8 → Nathi → ( njengaye ) Ukuthi asinatyala kukuzikhohlisa, yaye inyaniso ayikho ezintliziyweni zethu.
buza: Apha" thina "Ngaba kuthetha ngaphambi kokuzalwa kwakhona? Okanye emva kokuzalwa kwakhona?"
impendulo: Apha" thina ” ithetha Wathi ngaphambi kokuzalwa kwakhona
buza: Ngoba?
impendulo: ngokuba" thina "kwaye" wena Oko kukuthi, → abamazi uYesu! ileta UYesu, ngaphambi kokuba azalwe ngokutsha→ wayengoyena moni uphambili phakathi kwaboni nomoni→【 thina “Animazi uYesu, musani ( ileta UYesu, ngaphambi kokuba azalwe kwakhona → ngeli xesha【 thina 】Ukuba sithi asinatyala, siyazikhohlisa, inyaniso ayikho entliziyweni yethu.

thina ( ileta Yesu, yiqonde inyaniso yevangeli! ( ileta ) Igazi likaYesu Kristu, uNyana kaThixo, liyasihlambulula kuso sonke isono → Sizalwa ngokutsha” Umntu omtsha “Kuphela onokuthi ube nobudlelane noThixo, unxibelelane nokukhanya, uhambe ekukhanyeni, njengokuba uThixo esekukhanyeni. Uyakuqonda oku?

Iculo: Indlela yoMnqamlezo

kulungile! Yiloo nto kuphela esithe sabelana ngayo namhlanje. Yanga ubabalo lweNkosi uYesu Krestu, uthando lukaThixo, kunye nempefumlelo yoMoya oyiNgcwele ibe nani ngamaxesha onke! Amen

articles.title: Trivia: Ukonwaba Esonweni
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
KUMAHEBHERE 11:24-25 Ngokholo uthe akukhula uMoses, akavuma ukubizwa ngokuba ungunyana wentombi kaFaro. Uxolele ukuva ubunzima kunye nabantu bakaThixo kunokuba axhamle iziyolo zesono okwexeshana.


buza: Zeziphi iziyolo zesono?
impendulo: Ehlabathini elinesono, ukunandipha uyolo lwesono kubizwa ngokuba luyolo lwesono.

buza: Indlela yokwahlula ulonwabo lwesono kuvuyo lokunandipha uThixo?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

1 Inyama ithengiswe esonweni

Siyazi ke ukuba umthetho ungowoMoya; ke mna ndingowenyama; kuthengiswe ngaye isono. Imbekiselo (Roma 7:14) → Ngokomzekelo, uMoses eYiputa wayengunyana wabantwana bakaFaro, yaye iYiputa imela ihlabathi, ihlabathi elinesono. Xa uMoses ongumSirayeli wakhula, wayesazi ukuba ungabantu abanyulwe nguThixo, abantu abangcwele abanyuliweyo. Wala ukubizwa ngokuba ungunyana woonyana bakaFaro ukuze axhamle ubutyebi baseYiputa → kuquka lonke ulwazi, ukufunda, ukutya, isiselo kunye neziyolo zaseYiputa. Wayekhetha ukubandezeleka kunye nabantu bakaThixo kunokuba ukonwabela ukonwabela isono okwexeshana Xa ebona ukubandezeleka kwabantu, wabona ukuthotywa kukaKristu → Wala ukuba ngunyana wabantwana bakaFaro waza wasaba eYiputa entlango eneminyaka yobudala. 40 Emva kweminyaka engama-40 esalusa izimvu kwaMidiyan, walibala ukuba ungubani njengonyana nentombi kaFaro waseYiputa, waza walulibala lonke ulwazi, imfundo neetalente zaseYiputa kuphela xa wayeneminyaka engama-80 ubudala awathi uThixo wambiza ukuba akhokele amaSirayeli awaphuma eYiputa. Kunjengokuba iNkosi uYesu yathi: “Ndithi kuni, inene, nabani na ongafaniyo nomntwana akanakungena ebukumkanini bukaThixo kuphela nguThixo owasebenzisa uMoses ukuze abuyele emfanekisweni womntwana umntwana ubuthathaka kwaye akathembeli kulwazi nakwimfundo yehlabathi, ethembele kuphela kubulumko bukaThixo. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?
UMoses ungunyana woonyana bakaFaro, engumfuziselo wenyama ethengiswe esonweni, nenyama etyekele kwizinto zokumkani waseYiputa owonayo, nokudla konke, nokusela, nemidlalo, neziyolo. Ukonwaba ngokwasemzimbeni kolu lonwabo → kubizwa ngokuba kukonwabela ukonwabela isono!
Ngoko ke, uMoses wala ukuba ngunyana wabantwana bakaFaro, kodwa wayekulungele ukubandezeleka esenyameni kunye nabantu → kuba lowo uve ubunzima esenyameni uyekile esonweni. Imbekiselo ( 1 Petros Isahluko 4:1 ), uyayiqonda le nto?

2 Abo bazelwe nguThixo abangobenyama

Ukuba ke uMoya kaThixo uhleli kuni, aningabo abenyama, koko ningabeMoya. Ukuba umntu akanaye uMoya kaKristu, akangokaKristu lowo. Imbekiselo ( Roma 8:9 )
buza: Kutheni izinto ezizelwe nguThixo zingabi yenyama?
impendulo: UMoya kaThixo, uMoya kaYise, uMoya kaKristu, noMoya woNyana kaThixo "ngumoya mnye" kwaye nguMoya oyiNgcwele ukuba uMoya kaThixo, uMoya oyiNgcwele, uhlala ezintliziyweni zenu → oko kukuthi, uMoya Oyingcwele uhlala kuKristu (singamalungu omzimba wakhe), ekubeni ningumzimba kaKristu, aningowomzimba “ka-Adam” ukuba ngowoMoya oyiNgcwele UKristu ungaphakathi kwenu, (umzimba ka-Adam asingowethu) umzimba ufile ngenxa yesono, kodwa umoya (uMoya oyiNgcwele) uphila ngobulungisa. ( Roma 8:10 ) Ngaba uyakuqonda oku?

3. Uyolo lwesono novuyo lokunandipha uThixo

buza: Indlela yokwahlula ulonwabo lwesono kuvuyo lokunandipha uThixo?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

(1) Uyolo esonweni

1 Inyama kuthengiswe ngayo esonweni; —Funda amaRoma 7:14
2 Ukunyameka kwenyama ikukufa; —Funda amaRoma 8:6
3 Ukutya sisisu, nesisu kukudla, kodwa uThixo uya kubhangisa kokubini. —Funda eyoku-1 kwabaseKorinte 6:13

Phawula: Xa sasikwinyama, sasisele sithengiswe esonweni → Ukuba ninyamekela inyama ninyamekele inyama, oko kukuthi, ukufa, kuba umvuzo wesono kukufa. Ukutya sisisu, nesisu senyama kukutya → → Uyicingela inyama, usoloko utya ukutya okunesondlo, sela kakuhle, udlale kakuhle, kwaye wonwabele iziyolo zenyama → → ukonwabela ukonwatyiswa sisono! Ngokomzekelo, xa usebenza nzima ukuze wenze imali, usoloko usitya kakuhle umzimba wakho, uwunxibele kakuhle umzimba wakho, kwaye uthenga ibhotwe ukuze uhlale kulo kakuhle . Kukho nemidlalo, iidrama zezithixo, ezemidlalo, ukudansa, ukhathalelo lwempilo, ubuhle, ukuhamba ... kunye nokunye! Kuthetha ukuba [uhlala] kuAdam, kumzimba ka-Adam, kumzimba ka-Adam [onesono] → ukonwabela uvuyo nolonwabo [umzimba onesono]. Oku kukulandela inyama nokukhathalela izinto zenyama → uvuyo lwesono. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?
Umntu omtsha esizelwe nguThixo asingowasenyameni. Izinto ngomzimba → Lo gama ninokudla nempahla yokunxiba, yanelani . ( 1 Timoti 6:8 )

(2)Nwabele uvuyo lukaThixo

1 iingoma zomoya zokudumisa — Efese 5:19
2. Thandaza rhoqo — Luka 18:1
3 Enkosi rhoqo — Efese 5:20
Hlalani nibulela kuye uThixo uYise ngezinto zonke, egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu.
4. Yiba nomdla wokunikela kubasebenzi ukuze basasaze ivangeli nokuzisa ivangeli yosindiso ebantwini. — 2 Korinte 8:3
5 Beka iminikelo nobutyebi ezulwini — Mateyu 6:20
6 Abasebenzi abafumana itshaneli zefeksi → “Othe wamkela mna, wamkela lowo wandithumayo;
7 Thabatha umnqamlezo wakho, ushumayele iindaba ezilungileyo zobukumkani bamazulu — Marko 8:34-35 . Nangona sibandezeleka kwaye sibandezeleka enyameni ngenxa yelizwi likaThixo, sisenovuyo olukhulu emphefumlweni wethu. Amen. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Iculo: Wena unguKumkani wozuko

kulungile! Yiloo nto kuphela esithe sabelana ngayo namhlanje. Yanga ubabalo lweNkosi uYesu Krestu, uthando lukaThixo, kunye nempefumlelo yoMoya oyiNgcwele ibe nani ngamaxesha onke! Amen

articles.title: Imibuzo kunye neempendulo: Ulwaphulo-mthetho ngabom (uMfundiso 2)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uphendlo lwethutyana, itrafikhi, ukwabelana ngee-FAQs "Ulwaphulo-mthetho ngabom" Hayi. 2 Ethetha, wanga uThixo angasinika intliziyo ezolileyo, ukuze kungakhathaliseki ukuba sibona ntoni okanye siva ntoni, sikuqonde ukuthanda kwakho! Amen

5 Yonke indalo ineminqweno yokuzingca

(1) Savela phi isono sika-Adam?

buza: ka Adam" ulwaphulo-mthetho "Isuka phi?"
impendulo: UAdam noEva

1 Ubuthathaka benyama ( ngokuba ) Umyalelo woMthetho → "Kodwa uze ungadli kuwo umthi wokwazi okulungileyo nokubi, kuba mhla uthe wadla kuwo uya kufa ngokuqinisekileyo."
2 →( inyoka ) walukuhla umfazi uEva,
3 → UEva wahendwa, enyameni" ngokuba "Umthetho ( wazalwa )Iminqweno engendawo ikwayiminqweno yokuzingca;
4 →Xa uAdam noEva bakhawula iminqweno yenyama, " yitya Isiqhamo somthi wokwazi okulungileyo nokubi;
5 →Nje ( wazalwa ) saphuma esonweni, sakuba sikhulile isono;
6 →Mhla uthe wadla kuwo uya kufa ngokuqinisekileyo, kwaye kusisono ukwaphula umthetho - okusesikweni zala fa Yiza.
ngoko" fa "ukusuka" ulwaphulo-mthetho "Yiza;" ulwaphulo-mthetho "Ngenyama ( ngokuba ) ozelwe ngumthetho. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

(2) “Khwezi Eliqaqambileyo, Nyana woKusa” Ulwaphulo-mthetho

buza: kaSathana" ulwaphulo-mthetho "Isuka phi?"
impendulo: (inyoka) USathana wenza izinto ezimbi →

1 ( Hezekile 28:15 ) Wawugqibelele kuzo zonke iindlela zakho ukususela kwimini yokudalwa kwakho, kodwa kwafunyanwa intswela-bulungisa kuwe → Yonke intswela-bulungisa sisono. ( 1 Yohane 5:17 )
2 ( Hezekile 28:16 ) Ngenxa yokuba urhweba kakhulu, uzaliswe lugonyamelo. Ngamanye amazwi, uSathana wakhulelwa akuba ezaliswe yiminqweno yakhe. 】, okukhokelela kulwaphulo-mthetho【 nizale isono Ke ngoko ndiya kunigxotha entabeni kaThixo, ngokuba niyenzé inqambi indawo engcwele. Ke mna, zikerubhi zayisithelisa ityeya yomnqophiso, ndinibhangisile, ningabikho ebuncwaneni obukhazimle njengomlilo.

Phawula: UThixo akazisindisi iingelosi ezonayo zaza zawa, ngoko ke asiyi kufunda okanye ukuyicacisa apha. Bazalwana noodade, ncedani nibhekisele ku ( Hebhere 2:16 ) nakwi ( ISityhilelo 20:7-10 )

6 Ukubakhulula abaphantsi komthetho

(1)Ukukhululwa emthethweni

buza: Kutheni waphula umthetho?
impendulo: Umthetho ngulo ngokuba Inyama ibuthathaka yaye ayinakwenza nto →→Xa sisenyameni, asinakukwenza ubulungisa obufunwa ngumthetho, yaye inyama iya kwenza ( Yoh. ngokuba )Umthetho → Ukuzalwa komnqweno ongendawo yinkanuko, inkanuko, izale isono, xa ithe yakhawulwa, sithi ke isono, sakuba sakhulela, sivelise ukufa → → Ngoko uThixo wamthuma owakhe uNyana, ukuba abe lidini lesono inyama – ebethelelwe emnqamlezweni uThixo, asisindise kuwo umthetho ngokufa. Bhekisela kumaRoma isahluko 8 indinyana 3 nesahluko 7 indinyana 6

(2) Ukukhululwa kwisiqalekiso somthetho

UKristu wasikhulula esiqalekisweni somthetho ngokuba sisiqalekiso ngenxa yethu;

(3) Bakhulule abaphantsi komthetho

→→Masifumane ubuntwana bukaThixo!

Tyhila ku (Galati 4:4-7) nifunde kunye: Ke lithe ke lakuzaliseka ixesha, uThixo wamthuma uNyana wakhe, othe wazalwa ngumntu oyinkazana, othe wazalelwa phantsi komthetho, ukuze abahlawulele abaphantsi komthetho, yamkela ubuntwana. Ekubeni ke ningoonyana, uThixo wamkhupha uMoya woNyana wakhe, weza ezintliziyweni zenu, edanduluka esithi, Abha, Bawo. Ukuba ke ungunyana, uthembela kwindlalifa kaThixo.

buza: Kukho ubuntwana na phantsi komthetho?
impendulo: Abo baphantsi komthetho bangamakhoboka, bangamakhoboka esono → Kuba “bengamakhoboka”, abangoonyana. Njengoko iNkosi uYesu yathi → Ikhoboka alinakuhlala ekhaya ngonaphakade; Imbekiselo ( Yohane 8:35 ), uyayiqonda na?

7. Emva kokuba sifunde inyaniso

buza: Yiyiphi inyaniso esiyifundayo?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

(1) Ufundile → Xa sisenyameni, kungenxa yokuba “ umthetho "kwaye【 wazalwa 】Inkanuko embi esebenza emalungwini ethu, xa ithe yasebenza inkanuko yenyama, izala isono; (Roma 7:5; Yakobi 1:18)
(2) Ufundile → Ekubeni umthetho wawubuthathaka ngenxa yenyama yaye wawungenakwenza nto, uThixo wamthumela owakhe uNyana ekwimfano yenyama enesono ukuba abe lidini lesono, egweba isono esenyameni ( Roma 8:3 ) Ngoko ke, uThixo wathuma owakhe uNyana, ekwimeko efana nenyama enesono, ukuze abe lidini lesono.
(3) Ufundile →Ngaphandle komthetho! Ke, ekubeni safayo nje kuwo umthetho owawusibophelela, ngoku sikhululekile kuwo umthetho, ukuze siyikhonze iNkosi ngokobutsha bomoya (umoya: okanye ukuguqulelwa njengoMoya oyiNgcwele) kungekhona ngokwendlela yakudala yomoya. isithethe. ( Roma 7:6 )
(4) Ufundile →Ubalekile kwisiqalekiso somthetho! UKrestu wasikhulula esiqalekisweni somthetho, ngokuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Uqalekisiwe wonke umntu oxhonywe emthini.
(5) Ufundile → UKrestu wazalwa ephantsi komthetho ukuze ahlawulele abo baphantsi komthetho, ukuze thina sibe ngoonyana ! Imbekiselo ( Galati 4:4-7 )

8 Ukuba uthe wona ngabom, akuyi kuba sabakho dini lesono;

Kuba xa sithi sone ngabom, emveni kokuba samkele ukwazi inyaniso, akusekho dini ngenxa yezono;

buza: Yintoni ulwaphulo-mthetho lwangabom?
impendulo: Kuba emva kokuba sifumene indlela yokwenyani, siyazi ngokucacileyo: 1 Xa sisenyameni, inyama ( ngokuba )Umthetho→ wazalwa Iminqweno emibi, inkanuko embi, xa ikhawulwe, izale isono;

2 Ekubeni umthetho ubuthathaka ngenxa yenyama, awunakwenza nto → ubulungisa bomthetho bunokwenza isono kuphela;

3 UKristu waba lidini lethu lesono, wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni wafa;

4 Sihlangule kuwo umthetho nakwisiqalekiso sawo;

5 ukuba abakhulule ngokubathenga abaphantsi komthetho, nokusenza oonyana; Ukuba awukholelwa 】Yiyo le ndlela le, Fowuna

Ubugebenga obungabom.

buza: Kutheni emva kokufunda indlela yokwenyani, Ukuba awukholelwa enyanisweni Lulwaphulo-mthetho nje lwangabom?
impendulo: Ngokuba phantsi komthetho, ulikhoboka lesono; ngokuba Umthetho wazala isono. Uyavuma kwaye ngokuzithandela phantsi komthetho → ukwaphula umthetho usazi, ukwaphula umthetho, ukwaphula umthetho kusisono → oku kubizwa ngokuba sisono sangabom . Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

buza: Ukuba uthe wona ngabom, aliyi kuphinda libekho idini lesono?
impendulo: Linye kuphela idini lesono! Akukho sicamagushelo sesibini okanye esininzi.

buza: Ngoba?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi
1 NguKristu kuphela Kanye ULizwi waba yinyama, ezelwe phantsi komthetho – Gal 4:4-7
2 NguKristu kuphela Kanye Yenza idini lesono— Hebhere 10:10-14
3 Wafa kwisono, kuphela Kanye — Roma 6:10
4 NguKristu kuphela Kanye Ukuphalazwa kwegazi kuhlambulula izono zomntu— Hebhere 9:12-14

Kuba emveni kokuba sakwamkelayo ukwazi inyaniso, akukho camagushelo lwezono, ingenguye uKristu uMsindisi wethu; Ukuba awukholelwa! Akusekho mbingelelo wesono .
Ukuba uKristu wayecamagushele izono izihlandlo ezininzi, bekuya kufuneka afe izihlandlo ezininzi ;
Ukuba uKristu wazihlamba izono izihlandlo ezininzi, kwakuza kufuneka aliphalaze igazi lakhe izihlandlo ezininzi ;
Ukuba kunjalo, umele ukuba wabandezeleka izihlandlo ezininzi ukususela ekudalweni kwehlabathi – bona amaHebhere 9:25-26 .

Kodwa uKristu, owafayo kwisono, kuphela Kanye , ndinikhulule phantsi komthetho, ndinikhulule kuwo umthetho→ Apho kungekho mthetho, akukho sigqitho . Ukuba ubuyela emva uze ugcine umthetho kwaye ukulungele ukuba likhoboka phantsi komthetho, uya kuba likhoboka lesono → Uya kuba njengenja ejikayo kwaye idle ukutya ekutshicelayo, okanye ihagu ehlanjiwe kwaye emva koko uqengqeleka umva eludakeni. ke, Ukuba aniyikholelwa inyaniso kwaye nimshiyile uMsindisi uYesu Kristu, akusayi kuphinda kubekho idini lezono. → Linda kuphela ngoloyiko lomgwebo kunye nomlilo odlayo oza kudla zonke iintshaba (umgwebo wokugqibela). ( Hebhere 10:27 ) Ngaba uyakuqonda oku?

Ukwabelana ngemibhalo yevangeli, ephefumlelwe nguMoya kaThixo, abasebenzi bakaYesu Krestu: UMzalwana uWang*yun, uDade uLiu, uDade uZheng, uMzalwana uCen - kunye nabanye abasebenzi, baxhasa kwaye basebenza kunye kumsebenzi wevangeli weBandla likaYesu Krestu. Bashumayela ivangeli kaYesu Krestu, ivangeli evumela ukuba abantu basindiswe, bazukiswe, kwaye imizimba yabo ikhululwe! Amen

Iculo: Ndiyakholwa! Kodwa andinalo ukholo lwaneleyo, ngoko ndicela uncedo eNkosini

articles.title: Imibuzo neempendulo: Ulwaphulo-mthetho ngabom (uMfundiso 1)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibhile kumaHebhere isahluko 10, iivesi 26-27, size sifunde kunye: Ukuba sisona ngabom emva kokuba siyazi inyaniso, idini lesono liya kuba lingasekho.

Namhlanje masikhangele, sinxulumane, kwaye sabelane nokuba yintoni na "Ulwaphulo-mthetho ngabom" Hayi. ( 1 ) Uthetha kwaye enze umthandazo: Enkosi, Abha, Bawo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, kwaye enkosi, uMoya oyiNgcwele, ngokuba unathi ngamaxesha onke! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Umfazi onesidima [ibandla] uthuma abasebenzi ababhala ngezandla zabo, bathethe ilizwi lenyaniso, eliziindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwethu. Thandaza ukuba iNkosi uYesu yenze umsebenzi olungileyo ebandleni, iwaqhawule onke amatyathanga nemiqobo yotshaba, ize ikhokelele bonke abantwana ababuyisele ebandleni ukuze baqonde inyaniso yeBhayibhile. UMsindisi uhlala ekhanyisela amehlo eentliziyo zethu kwaye evula iingqondo zethu - sinokuyiqonda iBhayibhile → sikwazi ukuva nokubona inyaniso yokomoya → Qonda ukuba yintoni ulwaphulo-mthetho lwangabom !

Yanga iNkosi ingaphendula imithandazo yethu, izibongozo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo zethu ngegama leNkosi uYesu! Amen

1. Ubugebenga obungabom

buza: Yintoni ulwaphulo-mthetho lwangabom?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

(1) " ngabom "isiCantonese" Isibane esikhethekileyo, isibane esikhethekileyo "Kuthetha ngabom, ngabom, ngabom, ngabom;
(2) " ulwaphulo-mthetho ” kuthetha ukuba ukwaphula umthetho nokwaphula imiyalelo nemimiselo yomthetho kusisono;
(3) " ubugebenga obungabom "Kuthetha "ukukhanya okukhethekileyo" okwenziwa ngabom, ngenjongo, nangokwazi → ngokwazi ukuba ukwaphula umthetho nokwaphula imiyalelo yomthetho kusisono → ukwaphula ngabom imiyalelo nemimiselo yomthetho → kubizwa ngokuba sisono sangabom. , uyaqonda ngokucacileyo ?

2. Inkcazelo “yesono” → ukwaphula umthetho

buza: Yintoni isono?
impendulo: Ukwaphula umthetho kusisono → Nabani na owaphula umthetho usisono; ( 1 Yohane 3:4 )

3. Ungalenzi njani ulwaphulo-mthetho

buza: Indlela yokungenzi ulwaphulo-mthetho?
impendulo: Akukho mthetho!

buza: Ngoba?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi
(1) Apho kungekho mthetho, akukho sigqitho —Funda amaRoma 4:15
(2) Ngaphandle komthetho, isono asithathwa njengesono —Funda amaRoma 5:3
3 Ke, kungekho mthetho, isono sifile; —Funda amaRoma 7:8

" Ubudlelwane phakathi komthetho nesono” : Njengoko uPawulos watshoyo → Singathini? Umthetho usisono na? Akunjalo! Kuphela nje, ukuba ubungekho umthetho, ngendingazi ukuba yintoni isono → (Oko kukuthi, ukuba bekungekho mthetho, ngendingazi ukuba yintoni na isono, kuba umthetho ngowokwenza umthetho. bazise abantu ngesono - bhekisa kumaRoma 3:21). Umthetho uthi, "Uze ungakhanuki" → " Musa ukubawa "Ngumyalelo wokugqibela phakathi kweMithetho eliShumi yoMthetho. → Ndandingazi ukuba yintoni na ukubawa. Noko ke, isono sathatha ithuba lokusebenzisa "umthetho" umyalelo ukuze kusebenze zonke iintlobo zokunyoluka kum. Akazange aye emthethweni, Isono sifile uPawulos wathi → ndandidla ubomi ngaphandle komthetho; 1 Kuba apho kungekho mthetho, akukho sigqitho; 2 Akukho mthetho, kwaye isono asilotyala imithetho "yokwalela ukugawulwa kwemithi." Ukuba unyuka intaba ukuya kugawula imithi, waphula umthetho wehlathi kunye nomthetho, kwaye wenza ulwaphulo-mthetho ngokunyuka intaba ukuya kugawula imithi. Uyaqonda? 3 Ngaphandle komthetho, isono sifile → Apho ukhoyo umthetho, isono siphila; , ubeka " ulwaphulo-mthetho "Ukuba ufuna ukuphila, kufuneka fa ," ulwaphulo-mthetho "Ngomthetho nemithetho nabulawa. Ke, ngaba nithi phakathi kwenu → Kungcono na ukuba nomthetho? Okanye ukungabi namthetho? Reference ( Roma 7: 7-13 )

4. Umzimba ngokuba Umthetho wazala isono

KwabaseRoma (Isahluko 7:5) Kuba oko besikwinyama, iinkanuko ezimbi ezizelwe ngumthetho zazisebenza emalungwini ethu, zithwala isiqhamo esikukufa.

(1) Inyama ngokuba Iminqweno emibi evela emthethweni

buza: Yintoni iminqweno emibi?
impendulo: " ububi oko kukuthi, isono, izenzo ezibi, neengcinga ezingendawo; funa Oko kukuthi, inkanuko, inkanuko, nenkanuko yenyama. iminqweno emibi ” libhekisela kwihambo engendawo, kwiingcinga ezimbi nakwiminqweno yenyama.

buza: inyama ngokuba Ngaba umthetho uvelisa iminqweno emibi?
impendulo: Kuba xa sasisenyameni, oko ngokuba Iminqweno emibi ezelwe ngumthetho iyasebenza kumalungu ethu, iphumela kwisiqhamo sokufa → oko kukuthi, abo benyama. ngokuba →【 umthetho 】→“ wazalwa "Izenzo ezimbi, iingcinga ezimbi, neenkanuko zenyama" iminqweno emibi "Ngoko inkanuko yenyama isebenza emalungwini ethu → inkanuko yenyama isebenza ekukhawuleni ize izale." ulwaphulo-mthetho "Yiza → ukuze uvelise isiqhamo sokufa."

(2) Ukumitha komnqweno wokuzingca kukuzalwa kwesono.

( Yakobi 1:15 ) Xa inkanuko ithe yakhawula, izale isono;

Phawula: Xa sasisenyameni, loo nto ngokuba " umthetho "kwaye【 wazalwa 】Inkanuko embi esebenza emalungwini ethu, xa ithe yasebenza inkanuko yenyama, izala isono;

buza: " fa "Isuka phi?"
impendulo: " fa" →Iphuma “esonweni”-- Roma 5:12

buza: "Isono" sivela phi?
impendulo: "Isono" → enyameni ( ngokuba) umthetho→ wazalwa Iminqweno engendawo, iminqweno emibi yiminqweno yokuzingca kamsinya nje yakuba ikhawulwe→ wazalwa Phuma unetyala.

Ngoko "ubudlelwane phakathi kwenyama, umthetho, isono nokufa": 【Inyama】→ Ngenxa 【Umthetho】→ Zala 【Isono】→ Zala 【Ukufa】 .

Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Ukwabelana ngombhalo weVangeli, uqhutywa nguMoya kaThixo Abasebenzi bakaYesu Krestu, uMzalwana uWang*Yun, uDade uLiu, uDade uZheng, uMzalwana uCen, kunye nabanye osebenza nabo, baxhasa kwaye basebenza kunye kumsebenzi wevangeli weBandla likaYesu Krestu. . Bashumayela ivangeli kaYesu Krestu, ivangeli evumela ukuba abantu basindiswe, bazukiswe, kwaye imizimba yabo ikhululwe! Amen

articles.title: FAQ: Awunako ukubenza bazisole kwakhona
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
【IziBhalo】 KUMAHEBHERE 6:6 Ukuba bathe bakreqa emfundisweni leyo, abayi kuba nako ukubabuyisela enguqukweni. Kaloku abuye ambethelela emnqamlezweni uNyana kaThixo, emhlazisa ekuhleni.


1. Ukuba uyayilahla inyaniso

buza: Yiyiphi imigaqo esifanele siyilahle?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

(1) Ukukhululwa kwimfundiso yesono

UKristu wafela izono zethu (emnqamlezweni)--Funda eyoku-1 kwabaseKorinte 15:3-4
Ukuba umntu ufela bonke, ngoko ke bonke bayafa - bona eyesi-2 kwabaseKorinte 5:14
Abo bafileyo bakhululwe esonweni- bhekisa kumaRoma 6:7

Phawula: Ukhululwe kwimfundiso yesono→uKristu yedwa” ngenxa "Xa bonke besifa, bonke bayafa, kwaye abafileyo bayakhululwa esonweni. → Xa bonke besifa, bonke bakhululwe esonweni. Lowo ukholwayo kuye akagwetywa. Abo bangakholelwayo “kwinkululeko esonweni” , ulwaphulo-mthetho lugqityiwe. Ngoko, uyayiqonda? Bhekisela kuYohane 3:18

(2) Idini elinye likaKristu lenza abo bangcwaliswayo bafezeke ngonaphakade

Ngale ntando singcwaliswa ngokunikelwa komzimba kaYesu Kristu kwaba kanye, baze abo bangcwaliswayo benziwe bagqibelele ngonaphakade, bagwetyelwe ngonaphakade, bangabi nasono ngonaphakade, babe ngcwele ngonaphakade. Imbekiselo ( Hebhere 10:10-14 )

(3) Igazi likaYesu lihlamba zonke izono zethu

Ukuba sihamba ekukhanyeni, njengokuba uThixo esekukhanyeni, soba sinobudlelane omnye nomnye, lithi negazi likaYesu Kristu, uNyana wakhe, lisihlambulule kuso sonke isono. ( 1 Yohane 1:7 )

(4) Ukuqhawula kwimfundiso yomthetho

Ke, ekubeni safayo nje kuwo umthetho owawusibophelela, ngoku sikhululekile kuwo umthetho, ukuze siyikhonze iNkosi ngokobutsha bomoya (umoya: okanye ukuguqulelwa njengoMoya oyiNgcwele) kungekhona ngokwendlela yakudala yomoya. isithethe. Imbekiselo ( Roma 7:6 )

(5) Yilahle imigaqo yexhego nokuziphatha kwalo

Musani ukuxokisana; kuba nizihlubile nje umntu omdala, nezenzo zakhe.

(6) Wasinda kumandla ehlabathi elimnyama likaSathana

Wasihlangula egunyeni lobumnyama, wasifudusela ebukumkanini boNyana wakhe oyintanda ( Kolose 1:13 )

(7) Imfundiso eyenza ukuba sigwetyelwe, sivuswe, sizalwe ngokutsha, sisindiswe, kwaye sibe nobomi obungunaphakade.

Makabongwe uThixo, uYise weNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Ngokwenceba yakhe enkulu, uye wasivelisa ngokutsha ukuba sibe nethemba eliphilayo ngokuvuka kukaYesu Kristu kwabafileyo ( 1 Petros 1:3 .

2. Asinakubenza bazisole kwakhona.

buza: Uthetha ukuthini ngokungakwazi ukubenza baguquke kwakhona?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

( Hebhere 6:4 ) Ngokuphathelele abo bakhanyisiweyo, basingcamla isipho sasemazulwini, baba ngamadlelane kuMoya oyiNgcwele;

buza: Kukuphi ukukhanya okufunyenweyo?
impendulo: Ukukhanyiselwa nguThixo nokukhanyiselwa kweendaba ezilungileyo→ Ekubeni nilivayo ilizwi lenyaniso→UKristu wafela izono zethu, wangcwatywa, wabuya wavuka ngomhla wesithathu→ 1 Ndikhululwe kwimfundiso yesono, 2 Wenze idini kwaba kanye, eyingcwalisa imfundiso yenzaliseko engunaphakade; 3 Igazi lakhe lihlambulula umntu kuso sonke isono; 4 Ndikhululekile kwimfundiso yomthetho. 5 Ukulahla umntu omdala kunye nemigaqo yokuziphatha kwakhe, 6 Nikhululwe kwimigaqo yobumnyama namandla eHadesi. 7 Ukuze ube nokugwetyelwa, uvuswe, uzalwe ngokutsha, usindiswe, wamkele uMoya oyiNgcwele othenjisiweyo, ube nobomi obungunaphakade! →Leyo yivangeli eninokusindiswa ngayo, ningcamle isipho sasezulwini, nibe ngamadlelane kuMoya oyiNgcwele.

( Hebhere 6:5 ) Abo balivayo ilizwi elilungileyo likaThixo yaye bayawazi amandla exesha elizayo.

buza: Yiyiphi indlela elungileyo?
impendulo: " indlela elungileyo ” → Nina balivayo ilizwi lenyaniso, ivangeli yosindiso lwenu → eyindlela elungileyo kwaye nina nithe naliva ilizwi elilungileyo likaThixo kwaye niwaqonda amandla exesha elizayo → uMoya oyiNgcwele ogwebelayo, ovusa kwabafileyo. , uvelisa ngokutsha, usindisa, kwaye wamkela izithembiso, abantu abanobomi obungunaphakade?

( Hebhere 6:6 ) Ukuba bayayishiya imfundiso, abanakubuyela enguqukweni. Kaloku abuye ambethelela emnqamlezweni uNyana kaThixo, emhlazisa ekuhleni.

buza: Ukuba siyayishiya inyaniso → ngowuphi umgaqo esiwushiyayo?
impendulo: Kukuyeka le nto ithethwa ngasentla " ngentsimbi yesixhenxe "Umgaqo→【 inyaniso yosindiso 】UKristu wafa emnqamlezweni ngenxa yezono zethu, wasikhulula esonweni → Ukuba wena " Musa ukukholelwa "Ukukhululeka kwimfundiso yesono, imfundiso yomthetho, kukushiya le mfundiso. Umzekelo, amabandla amaninzi namhlanje afundisa ukuba uYesu wazihlambulula izono ngaphambi kokuba ndikholelwe eNkosini; izono zangomso, izono kusuku olulandela ingomso, kwaye izono zengqondo azihlanjwanga → Le nto "? ilahliwe “Idini elinye likaKristu lenza abo bangcwaliswayo bagqibelele ngonaphakade, yaye igazi lakhe libahlambulula kuso sonke isono→ Le nyaniso . Kukwakho nabo bazisolayo ngemisebenzi yabo efileyo mihla le, bezivuma izono zabo baze baguquke mihla le, bathandazele igazi leNkosi yonke imihla ukuba licinywe izono zabo kwaye lihlanjwe izono zabo njengesiqhelo → aba bantu baneenkani, banemvukelo, kwaye abaguquki, kwaye babe ngumgibe → ilahliwe Imfundiso yosindiso lukaKristu ithi inyaniso; Kanye njengokuba inja iyajika itye into eyigabhayo; Inkolelo yabo kukumka kwinyaniso yosindiso → Asinakubenza bazisole kwakhona. , ngenxa yokuba kwakhona bambethelela emnqamlezweni uNyana kaThixo, emhlazisa ekuhleni. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Iculo: Ndiyakholwa kwiNkosi uYesu Ingoma

KULUNGILE! Yiyo ke loo nto yophando lwethu, ubudlelane, kunye nokwabelana namhlanje. Amen

articles.title: Imibuzo neempendulo: Ukuba anithanga nibe njengabantwana, aninako ukungena ebukumkanini bamazulu
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade, Amen!

Masivule iBhayibhile kuMateyu Isahluko 18 Indinyana 3 size siyifunde kunye. Wathi ke uYesu, Inene, ndithi kuni, Ukuba anithanga niguquke, nibe njengabantwana aba, anisayi kukha ningene ebukumkanini bamazulu.

Namhlanje sikhangela, sinxibelelana kwaye sabelane kunye Ukuba anithanga nibuyele esimeni sabantwana, anisayi kukha ningene ebukumkanini bamazulu. Thandaza: "Baba Ongcwele othandekayo, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhleli enathi"! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Umfazi onesidima “ibandla” lithumela abasebenzi ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo nelithethiweyo ezandleni zabo, eliyivangeli yosindiso lwethu nokungena ebukumkanini bezulu! Yanga iNkosi uYesu ingaqhubeka ikhanyisela amehlo emiphefumlo yethu kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuba siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni. Qondani ukuba uMoya oyiNgcwele usikhokelela njani sonke ukuba sibuyele kumfanekiso wabantwana kwaye asityhilele imfihlelo yokungena kwivangeli yobukumkani bamazulu. . Amen!

Imithandazo, nezibongozo, nezibongozo, nemibulelo, neentsikelelo, zifumaneka egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

UMATEYU 18:1-3 Ngelo xesha beza abafundi kuYesu, bambuza bathi, Ngubani na ke omkhulu kunabanye ebukumkanini bamazulu? ndithi kuni, Ukuba anithanga niguquke, nibe njengabantwana aba, aniyi kukha ningene ebukumkanini bamazulu.

1. Isitayela somntwana

buza: Yintoni isimbo somntwana?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

1 Jonga inkangeleko yomntwana ngokusekelwe ebusweni bakhe : Ububele → Wonke umntu uyayithanda xa eyibona abantwana banoxolo, ububele, ubulali, ubumsulwa, ubuhle, ubumsulwa...njl.
2 Jonga isimbo somntwana ngokusuka entliziyweni : Akukho nkohliso, akukho ntswela-bulungisa, okungendawo, ulunya, ukukrexeza, uburheletya, ukubusa izithixo, ubugqwirha, ukubulala, ukunxila, iziyolo, njl.
3 Jonga isimbo somntwana ekuthembeleni kuso : Hlala ubathemba abazali bakho, uthembele kubazali bakho, ungaze uxhomekeke kuwe.

2. Abantwana abanamithetho

buza: Ingaba ikhona imithetho yabantwana?
impendulo: Akukho mthetho wabantwana.

1 → Kuba umthetho umqumbisa; kwaye apho kungekho mthetho, akukho sigqitho. Imbekiselo ( Roma 4:15 )
2 Apho kungekho mthetho, akukho lukreqo → Ngenxa yokuba kungekho mthetho, ukunxaxha akugqalwa njengelukreqo, kanye njengokuba abazali bebona abantwana babo benxaxha bengenalukreqo.
3 ITestamente Entsha uBawo waseZulwini akayi kuzikhumbula izikreqo zenu → kuba akukho mthetho! UYihlo osemazulwini akayi kuzikhumbula izigqitho zenu, ngaphandle komthetho, akanakunigweba → “Nguwo lo umnqophiso endiya kuwenza nabo emva kwaloo mihla, itsho iNkosi: Ndiya kuyibhala imithetho yam ezintliziyweni zabo, ndize ndiwubeke phakathi kwabo; Waza wathi: “Izono zabo nezono zabo andiyi kuphinda ndizikhumbule.” Ekubeni ezi zono zixolelwe, akusafuneki mbingelelo wezono. Imbekiselo ( Hebhere 10:16-18 )

buza: Bawubeke umthetho ezintliziyweni zabo, abanawo na umthetho?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

1 Intsingiselo yomthetho nguKristu →Funda amaRoma 10:4 .
2 Umyalelo usisithunzi sezinto ezilungileyo; →Ekubeni umthetho usisithunzi sezinto ezilungileyo ezizayo, awungomfanekiso wenene waloo nto--bona amaHebhere 10:1.
3 Umfanekiselo wokwenyaniso nomthetho womthetho nguKristu; →Funda kwaKol. 2:17 . Ngale ndlela, uThixo wenza umnqophiso omtsha kunye nabo, esithi: “Ndiza kuyibhala imithetho yam ezintliziyweni zabo, ndize ndiyibeke ngaphakathi kwabo → oko kukuthi, uThixo uya [ UKrestu 】Ibhalwe ezintliziyweni zethu, njengeNgoma yazo iiNgoma 8:6 Khawundibeke entliziyweni yakho njengomsesane wokutywina, undithwale njengesigxivizo engalweni yakho...! Kwaye uya kuyibeka kubo → uThixo uya kuyenza ubomi bukaKristu 】Yifake ngaphakathi kuthi. Ngale ndlela, ngaba uyawuqonda umnqophiso omtsha uThixo awenze nathi?

3. Abantwana abasazi isono

buza: Kutheni abantwana bengasazi isono?
impendulo : Kaloku abantwana abanamthetho.

buza: Yintoni umsebenzi womthetho?
impendulo: Umsebenzi womthetho ngulo Bagwebe abantu ngesono →Ngoko ke, ngokwasemisebenzini yomthetho, akuyi kugwetyelwa nyama emehlweni kaThixo; Umthetho wenzelwe ukwazisa abantu ngezono zabo . Imbekiselo ( Roma 3:20 )

Ngumthetho wokubazisa abantu ngezono zabo. Ngokuba abantwana bengenawo umthetho, abasazi isono;

1 Kuba apho kungekho mthetho, akukho sigqitho —Funda amaRoma 4:15
2 Ngaphandle komthetho, isono asisosono —Funda amaRoma 5:13
3 Ngaphandle komthetho, isono sifile — Roma 7:8, 9

Amacandelo afana ne " uPawulosi “Esithi → Ndandidla ubomi ngaphandle komthetho; kodwa wakufika umyalelo womthetho, isono sabuya saphila → “Umvuzo wesono kukufa,” ndaza ke ndafa. Uyawufuna na umthetho? → uhlala esonweni, hamba uye kulahla " ulwaphulo-mthetho "Ukuba uphila → uya kufa. Ngaba uyaqonda?"
Ngoko ke, ukuba umntwana akanawo umthetho, akanasono; akanakumgweba umntwana. Hamba uye kubuza kwigqwetha eliqeqeshiweyo ukuba umthetho ungamgweba na umntwana. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

4. Ukuzalwa ngokutsha

buza: Ndingabuyela njani kwifom yomntwana?
Impendulo: Ukuzalwa ngokutsha!

buza: Kutheni uzalwe ngokutsha?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

(1) Ukhokho uAdam wadala umntu
Kungenxa yokuba uYehova uThixo wadala “uAdam” ngothuli, yaye uAdam waba yindoda ekhulileyo engenabani “ wazalwa ". Kwaye thina siyinzala ka-Adam, kwaye umzimba wethu wenyama uphuma kuAdam. yenziwe "Ithi imizimba yethu iluthuli → ayidlulanga" wazalwa "Yimpahla yabantu abadala" uthuli “. (Oku akusekelwanga kwingcamango yomtshato nokuzalwa kuka-Adam noEva, kodwa kwizinto ezidaliweyo ‘eziluthuli’.” Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda? Bhekisela kwiGenesis 2:7 .

(2) Umzimba ka-Adam uye wathengiswa esonweni

1 Isono sangena ngoAdam kuphela ehlabathini
Kanye njengokuba isono sangena ngamntu mnye ehlabathini, kwaza kwangena ukufa ngaso isono, ngokunjalo ukufa kwabafikela bonke abantu ngenxa yokuba bonke bonayo. Imbekiselo ( Roma 5:12 )
2 Inyama yethu kuthengiswe ngayo esonweni;
Siyazi ke ukuba umthetho ungowoMoya; ke mna ndingowenyama; kuthengiswe ngaye isono. Imbekiselo ( Roma 7:14 )
3 Umvuzo wesono kukufa;
Kuba umvuzo wesono kukufa; ke sona isipho sikaThixo bubomi obungunaphakade, kuKristu Yesu iNkosi yethu. Imbekiselo (KwabaseRoma 6:23) → Ngoko ke kuAdam bonke bafa.

buza: Singazalwa njani ngokutsha njengabantwana?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

(1) Uzelwe ngamanzi nanguMoya — Yohane 3:5
(2) Wazalwa ngelizwi eliyinyaniso leendaba ezilungileyo — 1 Korinte 4:15 noYakobi 1:18
(3) Evela kuThixo — Yohane 1:12-13

Phawula: "UAdam" owadalwa ngaphambili wayesemhlabeni → wadalwa njengomntu omkhulu; isiphelo ye" UAdam “UYesu wazalwa ngokomoya yaye engumntwana! Wayengumntwana owaba nguLizwi, uThixo, noMoya →【 Umntwana 】Akukho mthetho, akukho lwazi lwesono, akukho sono →UAdam wokugqibela uYesu akanasono” Andilwazi ulwaphulo-mthetho ” → UThixo umenza angabi nasono ( Awunatyala: umbhalo wokuqala kukungazi kwetyala , waba sisono ngenxa yethu, ukuze thina sibe bubulungisa bukaThixo kuye. Imbekiselo (2 Korinte 5:21)→→Ngoko thina 1 wazalwa ngamanzi nanguMoya, 2 ozelwe yinyaniso yeendaba ezilungileyo, 3 Uzelwe nguThixo →→ nguAdam wokugqibela → → akanamthetho, akanasono, akanasono → → ufana nomntwana!

Inene, inene, ndithi kuni, Ukuba anithanga niguquke, nibe njengabantwana aba, anisayi kukha ningene ebukumkanini bamazulu; Injongo yantlandlolo yokujika ibe yimo yomntwana 【 ukuzalwa ngokutsha 】→→Nabani na ozelwe ngamanzi nanguMoya oyiNgcwele, ozelwe ngelizwi eliyinyani levangeli, okanye ozelwe nguThixo angangena ebukumkanini bamazulu. Imbekiselo ( Mateyu 18:3 ), ngaba uyakuqonda oku?

ngoko" Yatsho iNkosi "Nabani na ozithobayo njengalo mntwana omncinci" Kholwa yivangeli “Nguyena mkhulu ebukumkanini bamazulu. Othe wamkela umntwana onjengalo ngenxa yegama lam. Bantwana abazelwe nguThixo, abakhonzi bakaThixo, bengabasebenzi bakaThixo. Ukundamkela nje . (Funda uMateyu 18:4-5.)

Ukwabelana ngombhalo weVangeli, uqhutywa nguMoya kaThixo Abasebenzi bakaYesu Krestu, uMzalwana uWang*Yun, uDade uLiu, uDade uZheng, uMzalwana uCen, kunye nabanye osebenza nabo, baxhasa kwaye basebenza kunye kumsebenzi wevangeli weBandla likaYesu Krestu. . Bashumayela ivangeli kaYesu Krestu, ivangeli evumela ukuba abantu basindiswe, bazukiswe, kwaye imizimba yabo ikhululwe! Amen

articles.title: Imibuzo Neempendulo: Bonke aba bantu bafa benokholo yaye abazange bazifumane izithembiso
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
KUMAHEBHERE 11:13, 39-40 Aba bonke bafa ngokokholo, bengawafumananga amadinga;

… Aba ngabo bonke abathe bafumana ubungqina obuhle ngokholo, kodwa abakasifumani isithembiso;

1 Abantu bamandulo bafumana ubungqina obumangalisayo kule ncwadi

1 Ukholo luka-Abheli

Ngokholo uAbheli wasondeza kuye uThixo umbingelelo ogqithileyo kunokaKayin, wabufumana ngokunjalo ubungqina bokugwetyelwa kwakhe uThixo, ubungqina ke obo besipho sakhe. Nangona wafayo, wayesathetha ngenxa yolu kholo. ( Hebhere 11:4 )
buza: UAbheli wafa ngokwenyama kodwa esathetha? Yintoni ethethayo?
impendulo: Umphefumlo uyathetha, ngumphefumlo ka-Abheli othethayo!
buza: Umphefumlo ka-Abheli uthetha njani?
impendulo: Wathi uYehova, Wenze ntoni na (Kayin)? Igazi lomntakwenu (uAbheli) lidanduluka kum ngelizwi eliphuma emhlabeni.
buza: Igazi Kwabakho nelizwi elidandulukayo kuThixo, liphuma ehlabathini, lisithi, Igazi "Ngaba kuya kubakho amazwi athethayo?"
impendulo: " Igazi “Oko kukuthi, ubomi, kuba egazini bubomi → Levitikus 17:11 → Ubomi, ngoko bunokucamagushela izono.
buza: " Igazi Kukho ubomi kuyo → Ngaba lo "bomi" ngumphefumlo?
impendulo: abantu" Igazi "Kukho ubomi kuyo," ubomi begazi "Ngumphefumlo womntu →" Igazi "Kukho ilizwi elithethayo, oko kukuthi" umphefumlo "Ukuthetha! Incorporeal" umphefumlo "Nawe ungathetha!"
buza: " umphefumlo "Thetha → Ngaba iindlebe zomntu ziyakuva?"
impendulo: kuphela" umphefumlo "Ukuthetha, akukho mntu unokukuva! Umzekelo, ukuba uthe cwaka entliziyweni yakho: "Molo" → oku " umphefumlo wobomi "Thetha! Kodwa le" umphefumlo Xa uthetha, ukuba isandi asidluli emlonyeni wenyama, iindlebe zomntu azikwazi ukukuva, kuphela " umphefumlo wobomi “Xa izandi ziveliswa ngolwimi nemilebe, iindlebe zomntu ziyaziva;
Omnye umzekelo kukuba abantu abaninzi bakholelwa ukuba " ngaphandle komzimba "ingxoxo, nini" umphefumlo "Ukushiya umzimba," umphefumlo Uyawubona umzimba wakho kodwa umzimba womntu iliso leze andiboni" umphefumlo ", andikwazi ukubamba ngezandla" umphefumlo ", ayinakusetyenziswa kunye " umphefumlo "Nxibelelana kwaye ungeva" umphefumlo “Ilizwi elithethayo UThixo ungumoya →→Ke ndiyakuva ka-Abheli “ umphefumlo “Ilizwi lentetho alivakali kwiindlebe zethu zenyama kwaye alibonakali emehlweni ethu.

Bona abangakholelwayo kubukho bukaThixo, abakholelwa ukuba abantu banemiphefumlo, bakholelwa ukuba zonke ezi zingqondweni kunye neminqweno esemzimbeni womntu. Umoya ofanayo. ngokwenene" umphefumlo "Abo banokuwushiya umzimba baze bahlale bodwa nabo bangathetha! Uyayiqonda le nto? Kulungile! Malunga" umphefumlo "Yiyo yokwabelana. Ndiza kubelana ngayo kwixesha elizayo" usindiso lwemiphefumlo ] Makhe sithethe ngayo ngokweenkcukacha.
(1) Ubomi okanye umphefumlo →Funda uMateyu 16:25 kuba nabani na ofuna ukusindisa ubomi bakhe. Ubomi: okanye umphefumlo othe walahlekelwa bubomi bakhe ngenxa yam, wobufumana;
(2) Umphefumlo uthetha ngokusesikweni →→Bheka kwiSityhilelo 6:9-10 Xa yalivulayo elesihlanu itywina, ndabona phantsi kwesibingelelo abo babebulewe ngenxa yelizwi likaThixo nangenxa yobungqina. Umphefumlo, ukhwaza kakhulu “Owu Nkosi, wena ongcwele noyinyaniso, koda kube nini na ude ugwebe abo bahleli emhlabeni uze uliphindezelele igazi lethu?”

2 Ukholo lukaEnoki

Ngokholo uEnoki wafuduswa ukuze angaboni kufa, yaye akukho bani unako ukumfumana, ngenxa yokuba uThixo wayesele emthabathile; Imbekiselo ( Hebhere 11:5 )

3 Ukholo lukaNowa

Ngokholo uNowa, njengoko wayehlatyelwe nguThixo ngezinto awayengekaziboni, wathi ngoloyiko, walungisa umkhombe ukuze kusindiswe usapho lwakhe. Ngoko wasigweba eso sizukulwana, waza naye ngokwakhe waba yindlalifa yobulungisa obuphuma elukholweni. ( Hebhere 11:7 )

4 Ukholo luka-Abraham, lukaIsake noYakobi

Ngokholo uAbraham wawuthobela umthetho, waphuma waya kuloo ndawo abeza kubizwa ngayo, xa wayephuma, wayengazi apho aya khona. Ngokholo wahlala njengomphambukeli kwilizwe ledinga, njengokwilizwe lasemzini, ehleli ezintenteni, kwanjengoIsake noYakobi, ababengamalungu edinga elo. ( Hebhere 11:8-9 )

2 Aba bantu bafa bonke benokholo, abazamkelanga idinga.

Phawula: NjengoAbraham, uThixo wathembisa ukuba inzala yakhe iya kuba ninzi njengeenkwenkwezi esibhakabhakeni yaye ingenakubalwa njengentlabathi eselunxwemeni lolwandle. isibhakabhaka. →→Ukholo lukaSara, uMoses, uYosefu, uGidiyon, uBharaki, uSamson, uYifeta, uDavide, uSamuweli, nabaprofeti... Abanye banyamezela intlekisa, ukatswa, nemixokelelwane, nentolongo, nezinye izilingo; baxulutywa ngamatye bafa, basarhwa, bahendwa, babulawa ngekrele; ebhadula entlango, ezintabeni, emiqolombeni, nakwimiqolomba engaphantsi komhlaba, ngabantu abangalifanelanga ihlabathi. →→
Aba bantu bayakholelwa kwisithembiso sikaThixo ehlabathini, kodwa basibona sisekude yaye basamkela ngovuyo. Abo bathetha izinto ezinjalo babonisa ukuba banqwenela ukufumana ikhaya ezulwini, banyamezela intlebendwane, ukubethwa, imixokelelwane, iintolongo, iintolongo, nezilingo ngezilingo, nokuxulutywa ngamatye, bafe, besarha, behendwa, bebulawa kunye nabo bonke ububi. Bebhadula ngezintsu zeegusha nezebhokhwe, bebandezelekile , imbandezelo, ukubandezeleka, ukubhadula entlango, ezintabeni, emiqolombeni, nakwimiqolomba engaphantsi komhlaba → Ngenxa yokuba bengengabo abehlabathi yaye bengakufanelekeli ukuba sehlabathini, bafa bengafumani nto ehlabathini → Aba bantu bonke bayasindiswa Kuba lowo ufileyo elukholweni akakazuzanga idinga. Imbekiselo ( Hebhere 11:13-38 )

3. Ukuze bangabi nafezeka ngaphandle kokuba bayamkele kunye nathi

Aba bantu bonke bafumene ubungqina obulungileyo ngokholo, kodwa abakakufumani oko kwakuthenjisiwe; ( Hebhere 11:39-40 )

buza: Yiyiphi eyona nto ibhetele uThixo asilungiselele yona?
impendulo: usindiso lukaYesu Krestu →→ UThixo wathumela uNyana wakhe okuphela kwamzeleyo, uYesu Kristu, owaba yinyama → Wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni waza wafela izono zethu, wangcwatywa, waza wavuka kwakhona ngomhla wesithathu. →→ Masigwetyelwe, sizalwe ngokutsha, sivuswe, sisindiswe, sifumane umzimba kaKristu, sifumane ubomi bukaKristu, sifumane ubuntwana bukaThixo, sifumane uMoya oyiNgcwele othenjisiweyo, sizuze ubomi obungunaphakade! UThixo akasiniki nje oonyana kuphela, kodwa ukwasinika uvuko olusinika uzuko, imivuzo, izithsaba, nomzimba omhle ngakumbi! Amen.
Abantu bamandulo kwiTestamente eNdala bonke bafa benokholo, kodwa abazange bamkele uMoya oyiNgcwele owathenjiswa nguThixo xa bafayo! Ngaphandle koMoya oyiNgcwele, akukho nyana kaThixo. Kuba ngelo xesha uYesu Kristu umsebenzi wokuhlangula 】Ayikagqitywa → KwiTestamente eNdala, nokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele unokuhamba emntwini, uKumkani uSawule ungumzekelo. UMoya oyiNgcwele akahlali kumzimba omdala wesikhumba sewayini wendoda endala; Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Bantu beTestamente eNtsha, abo bakholelwa kuYesu kwisizukulwana sethu ngabona basikelelekileyo→→【 Umsebenzi kaKristu wokuhlangula ugqityiwe 】→→ Nabani na okholwayo kuYesu utya umzimba Wakhe—azuze umzimba Wakhe, asele igazi Lakhe—ufumana igazi lakhe elixabisekileyo, ufumana umphefumlo nobomi bukaKristu, uzuza oonyana bukaThixo, aze azuze ubomi obungunaphakade! Amen

Bonke abantu kwiTestamente eNdala bafumana ubungqina obulungileyo ngokholo, kodwa abazange bakufumane oko kwakuthenjisiwe, ukuze ukuba abakufumananga kunye nathi, bangabi bagqibelele. Ngoko ke, ngokuqinisekileyo uThixo uya kubavumela abo bakwiTestamente eNdala abakholelwa kuThixo ukuba basikelelwe njengathi badle ilifa lobukumkani bamazulu kunye. Amen!

ngoko" uPawulosi “Yithi → Ukuba siyakholwa ukuba uYesu wafa, wabuya wavuka, uThixo uya kubazisa nabo balele ukufa kunye noYesu, athatyathwe kunye nathi emafini, ukuze imiphefumlo yabo nemizimba yabo igcinwe kwaye imizimba yabo iya kukhululwa. umzimba wokwenyani ibonakala , ukuhlangabezana neNkosi emoyeni, kwaye ngale ndlela, siya kuba neNkosi ngonaphakade. Amen ! Ngoko, uyayiqonda? Imbekiselo ( 1 Tesalonika 4:14-17 )

Ukwabelana ngemibhalo yeVangeli, ephefumlelwe nguMoya kaThixo Abasebenzi bakaYesu Krestu, uMzalwana uWang*Yun, uDade uLiu, uDade uZheng, uMzalwana uCen, kunye nabanye osebenza nabo baxhasa kwaye basebenza kunye kumsebenzi wevangeli weBandla likaYesu Krestu. Ukushumayela ivangeli likaYesu Krestu yivangeli eyenza ukuba abantu basindiswe, bazukiswe, kwaye nemizimba yabo ikhululwe. Amen

Iculo: Nkosi! Ndilapha

Abazalwana noodade abangakumbi bamkelekile ukusebenzisa ibhrawuza yabo ukukhangela - IBandla kwiNkosi uYesu Krestu - ukuba bazimanye kunye nokusebenza kunye ukushumayela ivangeli kaYesu Krestu.

KULUNGILE! Yiyo yonke into esabelana ngayo namhlanje.

articles.title: Inkqubela Yomhambi Ngezonqulo (Intetho 8)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubazalwana noodade bam abathandekayo kwintsapho kaThixo! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile kuLuka isahluko 23 iindinyana 42-43 size sizifunde kunye: Athi kuye, Yesu, uze undikhumbule, xa uthe weza usebukumkanini bakho. Wathi uYesu kuye, Inene, ndithi kuwe, Namhlanje uya kuba nam eParadisi.

Namhlanje siyafunda, sinxulumana, kwaye sabelane ngeNkqubela yePilgrim kunye "Ukufa Okugqibeleleyo, Kunye eParadesi" Hayi. 8 Thetha kwaye wenze umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, Nkosi yethu uYesu Krestu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Umfazi onesidima [ibandla] uthumela abasebenzi: ngezandla zabo babhala kwaye bathetha ilizwi lenyaniso, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwethu, uzuko lwethu, nentlawulelo yemizimba yethu. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke ikhanyisela amehlo emiphefumlo yethu kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye siwabone amazwi akho, ayinyaniso yokomoya→ Thabatha umnqamlezo wakho yonke imihla, kwaye nabani na olahlekelwa bubomi bakhe ngenxa yeNkosi kunye neendaba ezilungileyo wokusindisa ubomi bakhe! Gcina ubomi kubomi obungunaphakade → ukufa okugqibeleleyo kwaye uhlale eparadesi kunye neNkosi → fumana uzuko, umvuzo, kunye nesithsaba. Amen !

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

buza: Yintoni iparadesi? Iphi iparadesi?
impendulo: Ikhaya lasezulwini elinovuyo, iTestamente eNdala ifuzisela iKanan, ilizwe elibaleka amasi nobusi; Nyana, kunye nedolophu emangalisayo yasekhaya.

ISibhalo seReferensi:

Wathi uYesu kuye, Inene, ndithi kuwe, Namhlanje uya kuba nam eParadisi

Ndazi umntu ekuKristu, owathi, kwiminyaka elishumi elinamine edluleyo, wasiwa nakwelesithathu izulu (nokuba ubesemzimbeni na, andazi, nokuba ubengaphandle komzimba), andazi; nguThixo yedwa owaziyo. Ndiyamazi lo mntu (enoba ubesemzimbeni na, nokuba ubengekho na emzimbeni, andazi, nguThixo owaziyo.) Waxwilwa wasiwa eParadisi; 2 Korinte 12:2-4

Lowo unendlebe, makayive into ayithethayo uMoya oyiNgcwele kuwo amabandla. Lowo weyisayo ndiya kumnika ukuba adle kuwo umthi wobomi eParadisi kaThixo. ’— ISityhilelo 2:7

【1】Ukushumayela ivangeli yosindiso

Musani ukuboyika ngoko; kuba akukho nto igqunyiweyo, engasayi kutyhilwa; nefihlakeleyo ingayi kwaziwa. Into endiyithethe kuni emfihlekweni, kuthetheni ekuhleni; noko nikuva ezindlebeni zenu, kuthetheni ekuhleni. Livakaliseni niphume endlwini, ningaboyiki abo babulala umzimba, kodwa bengenako ukuwubulala wona umphefumlo;

Phawula: UYesu wasixelela “iimfihlelo ezifihlakeleyo ngonaphakade” washumayela iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso! Amen. Musani ukuboyika abo babulala umzimba kodwa bengenako ukuwubulala umphefumlo → Kodwa uThixo unako ukuzomeleza iintliziyo zenu ngokweendaba ezilungileyo endazivakalisayo, nakuYesu Kristu endabashumayelayo, nangokwemfihlelo ebifihliwe kwasemaphakadeni. Bhekisela kumaRoma 16:25

Amangqina amaninzi afela ukholo

Phawula: Ekubeni ke sinamangqina amaninzi kangaka nje njengelifu, masithi nathi, siwubekile nxamnye wonke umthwalo, naso isono esinokusirhintyela ngokulula, yaye masilubaleke ngomonde ugqatso olubekwe phambi kwethu, sikhangele kuMbangi noMyili wokholo lwethu. .UYesu Wokugqibela (okanye inguqulelo: ekhangele kuYesu ongumbhali nomgqibelelisi wenyaniso). Ngenxa yovuyo olwalubekwe phambi kwakhe, wawunyamezela umnqamlezo, elidelile ihlazo lawo, waza wahlala phantsi ngasekunene kwetrone kaThixo. KumaHebhere Isahluko 12 Iindinyana 1-2 → AbanjengoAbheli, uNowa, uAbraham, uSamson, uDaniyeli... nabanye abaprofeti abaguqukileyo ababethelelwa emnqamlezweni kunye noYesu, uStefano, Abazalwana bakaYakobi, abapostile, amaKristu Ngokholo boyisa izikumkani zeentshaba, benza ubulungisa, bazuza izithembiso, bavingca imilomo yeengonyama, bawacima amandla omlilo, basinda kuhlangothi lwekrele; . Umfazi wabavusa abakhe abafileyo. Abanye banyamezela intuthumbo eqatha baza bala ukukhululwa (umbhalo wantlandlolo wawuyintlawulelo) ukuze bafumane uvuko olulunge ngakumbi. Abanye banyamezela intlekisa, ukatswa, nemixokelelwane, nentolongo, nezinye izilingo; baxulutywa ngamatye bafa, basarhwa, bahendwa, babulawa ngekrele; ebhadula entlango, ezintabeni, emiqolombeni, nakwimiqolomba engaphantsi komhlaba, ngabantu abangalifanelanga ihlabathi. Aba bantu bonke bafumene ubungqina obulungileyo ngokholo, kodwa abakakufumani oko kwakuthenjisiwe; Hebhere 11:33-40

[2] Thabatha umnqamlezo wakho yonke imihla ulandele uYesu

Wandula ke uYesu wathi kwisihlwele: “Ukuba nabani na ufuna ukundilandela, makazincame, awuthwale umnqamlezo wakhe imihla ngemihla, andilandele. Othe walahlekelwa bubomi bakhe, “ngenxa yam, wowusindisa umphefumlo wakhe;

1 Wuthabathe umnqamlezo wakho, uxelise uKristu
KWABASEFILIPI 3:10-11 ukuze ndimazi uKristu, namandla ovuko lwakhe, nokuba ndive ubunzima kunye naye, ndifaniswe naye ukufa kwakhe, ukuze ndizuze ukuvuka kwabafileyo, oko kukuthi, inkululeko yomphefumlo wam. umzimba."

2 Yilwa umlo omhle
Njengoko “uPawulos” watshoyo → ngoku ndigalelwa njengomnikelo othululwayo, yaye ilixa lokunduluka kwam lifikile. Umzamo omhle ndiwuzamile, ugqatso ndilufezile, ukholo ndilugcinile. Okokugqibela ndibekelwe isithsaba sobulungisa, eya kundibuyisela ngaso ngaloo mini iNkosi, leyo igwebayo ngobulungisa, ingabi ndim ndedwa ke, ibe ngabo bonke abakuthandayo ukubonakala kwayo. Bhekisela kweyesi- 2 kuTimoti Isahluko 4 Indinyana 6-8

3 Lifikile ixesha lokunduluka ententeni
Njengoko “uPetros” watshoyo → ndicinge ukuba kuyimfuneko ukunikhumbuza nokunikhuthaza ngoxa ndisekulo mnquba ndisazi ukuba liyeza ilixa lokuba ndimke kulo mnquba, njengoko iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu yandibonisayo. Kwaye ndiya kwenza konke okusemandleni am ukuba ezi zinto ndizikhumbule emva kokufa kwam. 2 Petros 1:13-15

4 Banoyolo abo bafela eNkosini
Ndeva ilizwi liphuma ezulwini lisithi: “Bhala uthi: ‘Banoyolo abafi baseNkosini! ” ISityhilelo 14:13

【3】 Inkqubela phambili yePilgrim iphelile, sikunye eParadesi

(1) AmaKristu ayawabaleka amakhaya

AmaKristu athabatha umnqamlezo wawo aze alandele uYesu, ashumayele iindaba ezilungileyo zobukumkani bamazulu, aze aqhube iNqulo yoMhambi:

isigaba sokuqala " Kholelwa ekufeni “Aboni” abakholelwa kumntu omdala baya kufa;
isigaba sesibini " Bona ukufa Yabona, aboni bayafa; Yabona, abatsha badla ubomi;
Inqanaba lesithathu " Ukuthiya ukufa “Buthiye ubomi bakho, bulondolozele ubomi obungunaphakade.
Inqanaba lesi-4 " Ufuna ukufa “Nibethelelwe emnqamlezweni kunye noKrestu ukuze kutshatyalaliswe umzimba wesono, ningabi samakhoboka esono.
isigaba sesihlanu " Buyela ekufeni “Ngobhaptizo nimanywe naye ngemfano yokufa kwakhe, nimanywe naye nasekuvukeni kwakhe okufana nokwakhe.
Inqanaba lesithandathu " sungula Ukufa” kutyhila ubomi bukaYesu.
Inqanaba lesi-7 " amava ukufa “Ukuba niva ubunzima kunye noKrestu kwinqanaba lovangelo, niya kuzukiswa kunye naye.
Inqanaba lesi-8 " Ukufa ngokupheleleyo “Intente yenyama yadilizwa nguThixo → apho uzuko , ibuyiselo , isithsaba Igcinelwe thina → eParadesi noKristu. Amen!

(2)Ukuba neNkosi eparadesi

UYohane Chapter 17 verse 4 Mna ndikuzukisile emhlabeni, ndiwufezile umsebenzi obundinikile ukuba ndiwenze.
Luke 23:43 Wathi uYesu kuye, Inene, ndithi kuwe, Namhlanje uya kuba nam eParadisi.
Isityhilelo 2:7 Lowo weyisayo ndiya kumnika ukuba adle kuwo umthi wobomi, okwiParadisi kaThixo. "

(3) Umoya, umphefumlo nomzimba ziyalondolozwa

Ke yena uThixo walo lonke ubabalo, owasibizelayo eluzukweni lwakhe olungunaphakade, sikuKristu, wanga angathi ngokwakhe, nakuba nive ubunzima umzuzwana, anilungise nigqibelele, anomeleze, anizimase. Amandla abe kuye ngonaphakade kanaphakade. Amen! 1 Petros 5:10-11

Wanga ke uThixo woxolo anganingcwalisa niphelelisekile; Kwaye ndiyathemba eyakho Umoya, umphefumlo nomzimba ziyagcinwa , ndingenakusoleka ekufikeni kweNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu. Uthembekile onibizayo, oya kukwenza oko. 1 Tesalonika 5:23-24

Ukwabelana ngombhalo weVangeli, uqhutywa nguMoya kaThixo Abasebenzi bakaYesu Krestu, uMzalwana uWang*Yun, uDade uLiu, uDade uZheng, uMzalwana uCen, kunye nabanye osebenza nabo, baxhasa kwaye basebenza kunye kumsebenzi wevangeli weBandla likaYesu Krestu. . Bashumayela ivangeli kaYesu Krestu, ivangeli evumela ukuba abantu basindiswe, bazukiswe, kwaye imizimba yabo ikhululwe! Amen, amagama abo abhalwe encwadini yobomi. Amen! →Njengoko eyabaseFilipi 4:2-3 isitsho, uPawulos, uTimoti, uWodiya, uSintike, uKlemente nabanye ababesebenza noPawulos, amagama abo akwincwadi yobomi obungamileyo. Amen!

Ingoma: Zonke izizwe ziya kuza zimdumise uYehova

Wamkelekile abazalwana noodade abaninzi ukuba basebenzise isikhangeli sakho ukukhangela - Icawe yeNkosi uYesu Krestu - cofa Khuphela.Qokelela Sijoyine nisebenze kunye ekushumayeleni ivangeli kaYesu Krestu.

Qhagamshelana ne-QQ 2029296379

Ubabalo lweNkosi uYesu Kristu, nothando lukaThixo, nokuphefumlelwa kukaMoya oyiNgcwele, maluhlale kuni nonke! Amen

Ixesha: 2021-07-28

articles.title: Inkqubela Yomhambi Ngezonqulo (Intetho 7)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubazalwana noodade bam abathandekayo kwintsapho kaThixo! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile kweyoku-1 kwabaseKorinte 15, indinyana 3-4, size sifunde kunye: Oko ke ndaninikelayo nakuni: okokuqala, uKristu wazifela izono zethu, ngokutsho kwezibhalo, nokokuba wangcwatywa, nokuba wavuswa ngomhla wesithathu, ngokutsho kwezibhalo; hlala naye; 2 Timoti 2:11

Namhlanje siyafunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane ngeNkqubela yePilgrim kunye ngamaxesha athile "Ukufumana ukufa, ubomi buqala kuwe" Hayi. 7 Thetha kwaye wenze umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, Nkosi yethu uYesu Krestu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Umfazi onesidima [ibandla] uthuma abasebenzi: ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo, elithethiweyo esandleni sabo, eliziindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwenu, nozuko lwenu, nentlawulelo yomzimba wakho. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke ikhanyisela amehlo emiphefumlo yethu kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye siwabone amazwi akho, ayinyaniso yokomoya→ Qondani ukuba siwuthwala umnqamlezo wethu namava okufa ukuze ubomi bukaYesu butyhileke kuthi! Amen.

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela ngegama elingcwele leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

1 Ayisendim ke odla ubomi, nguKristu ke oselesidla ubomi ngenxa yam.

Ndibethelelwe emnqamlezweni noKristu; ayisendim ke odla ubomi, nguKristu ke oselesidla ubomi kum. Galati 2:20
Kuba kum mna, ukudla ubomi kunguKristu, ukufa kuyinzuzo. Filipi 1:21 .

buza: Ngoku ayisendim ophilayo → Ngubani ophilayo?
impendulo: Nguye uKristu ohleli kum Ebuqaqawulini bukaThixo uYise. Amen! →Ngoko “uPawulos” wathi kwabaseFilipi 1:21 →Kum mna, ukudla ubomi kunguKristu, ukufa kuyinzuzo. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Zimbini: Siva ubunzima kunye naye, kwaye siya kuzukiswa kunye naye

buza: "Iimbandezelo kunye noKristu" Injongo "Ingaba yin?"
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

(1) Simiselwe ukuva ubunzima

Kufuneka sidlule ebunzimeni obuninzi ukuze singene ebukumkanini bukaThixo. IZenzo 14:22
Ukuze kungabikho namnye uya kugungqiswa ziimbandezelo ezahlukahlukeneyo. Kuba nani ngokwenu niyazi ukuba simiselwe imbandezelo; 1 Tesalonika 3:3

(2) Uvuyo olukhulu phakathi kwazo zonke iintlobo zezilingo

Kugqaleni njengovuyo olukhulu izilingo ngezilingo, nisazi nje ukuba ukucikideka kokholo lwenu lusebenza unyamezelo. Umonde ke mawube nempumelelo, ukuze nina nibe ngabazalisekileyo, abagqibeleleyo, ningaswele nto. Yakobi 1:2-4
Vuyani ninethemba; yibani nomonde embandezelweni; Roma 12:12

(3) Ukubandezeleka komzimba wenyama kunye nokuhlukana nesono

Ekubeni iNkosi ibandezelekile enyameni, nani nifanele nisebenzise olu hlobo lwengqondo njengesixhobo; ngokuba lowo uve ubunzima esenyameni, uyekile ukona. Imbekiselo ( 1 Petros Isahluko 4:1 )

(4) Masizukiswe!

Ukuba ke bangabantwana, baziindlalifa, iindlalifa zikaThixo, iindlalifa ke kunye noKristu. Ukuba siva ubunzima kunye naye, sozukiswa nokuzukiswa kunye naye. Roma 8:17

Qaphela: Ukuba ubandezeleka emhlabeni ngokubulala abantu, ukukroba, ukwenza ububi, kunye nokuba nosizi, ubandezeleka ngenxa ye-infliction yakho "Cantonese" ayikukhathazi ngendlela yeNkosi ezi ntlungu. Ngoko, icacile?
Makungabikho mntu kuni uva ubunzima ngenxa yokuba ebulala, eba, esenza izinto ezimbi, okanye egxuphuleka. (Funda eyoku-1 kaPetros 4:15.)

3 Xhobani sonke isikrweqe sikaThixo

Xhobani sonke isikrweqe sikaThixo, ukuze nibe nako ukumisa nibuchase ubuqhinga boMtyholi. …

1 sebenzisa inyaniso njengebhanti lokubhinqisa esinqeni;
2 sebenzisa ubulungisa Yisebenzise njengekhaka lesifuba ukugquma isifuba sakho,
3 Sebenzisa kwakhona Ukhuseleko Ivangeli kufuneka ibekwe ezinyaweni zakho njengezihlangu zokukulungiselela ukuhamba.
4 Ukongeza, ukubamba ukholo Njengekhaka lokucima zonke iintolo ezinomlilo zongendawo;
5 kwaye unxibe usindiso isigcina-ntloko,
6 bamba uMoya oyiNgcwele Ikrele lakhe lilizwi likaThixo;
7 Ukwayama kuMoya oyiNgcwele, uhlala elungile ngeendlela zonke Thandazela u Hlalani nilindile, ningatyhafi, nibathandazele bonke abangcwele. Funda kwabase-Efese 6:10-18

4. Yiva indlela yeNkosi → Ubomi buya kuqala kuwe

(1) Kholelwa kwivangeli yosindiso
Le nto ndaninikelayo ke nakuni, yile:kuqala, kukuba uKristu wazifela izono zethu, ngokwezibhalo, ekhululwe esonweni, nasesiqalekisweni somthetho, nakwesiqalekiso somthetho, wangcwatywa, ehluthe indoda endala nesiqalekiso. yomthetho Ukuziphatha komntu omdala; kwaye ngokutsho kweBhayibhile, wavuswa ngomhla wesithathu → ukuze sigwetyelwe, sizalwe ngokutsha, sivuswe, sisindiswe, kwaye sibe nobomi obungunaphakade. Amen! 1 Korinte 15:3-4

(2) Kholelwa ukuba ixhego lifile

Kuba nafayo, baye ubomi benu bufihlakele ndawonye noKristu kuye uThixo. Xa athe wabonakalaliswa uKristu, obubomi bethu, nani niya kubonakala, ninaye ebuqaqawulini. Kolose 3:3-4

(3) Yiqondeni indlela yeNkosi

" fa "Yenza ngaphakathi kwethu,
" wazalwa “Kodwa ke kuyasebenza kuni.” ( 2 Korinte 4:10-12 )

Thabatha umnqamlezo wakho yonke imihla ulandele uYesu:
1 thabatha indlela yomnqamlezo →Wonakalisa umzimba wesono,
2 Thatha indlela yokomoya →Thetha ngezinto zomoya,
3 Thatha indlela eya ezulwini →Shumayela ivangeli yobukumkani bamazulu.
isigaba sokuqala " Kholelwa ekufeni “Kholwa kumoni, yifa; kholwa kokutsha, phila,
isigaba sesibini " Bona ukufa Yabona, ixhego liyafa; nanko umntu omtsha ephila;
Inqanaba lesithathu " Ukuthiya ukufa “Buthiye obakho ubomi, ubugcinele ubomi obungunaphakade;
Inqanaba lesi-4 " cinga fa "Ufuna ukumanyana noKristu ngokwasemzimbeni kwaye ubethelelwe ukuze utshabalalise umzimba wesono,
isigaba sesihlanu " Buyela ekufeni ningcwatywe naye ngokubhaptizelwa ekufeni;
Inqanaba lesithandathu " qala ngokufa ". Etyhila ubomi bukaYesu,

articles.title: Inkqubela Yomhambi Ngezonqulo (Intetho 6)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubazalwana noodade bam abathandekayo kwintsapho kaThixo! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile kweyesi-2 kwabaseKorinte 4, indinyana 7 neye-12, size sizifunde kunye: Obu butyebi sibuphethe ngezitya zodongwe, ukuze kubonakale ukuba la mandla makhulu, aphuma kuThixo, angaphumi kuthi. ...Ngaloo ndlela ke ukufa kuthi kusebenza, kodwa kuni kusebenza ubomi.

Namhlanje siyafunda, sinxulumana, kwaye sabelane ngeNkqubela yePilgrim kunye “Ukuqalisa Ukufa Ukuze Kutyhile Ubomi BukaYesu” Hayi. 6 Thetha kwaye wenze umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, Nkosi yethu uYesu Krestu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Umfazi onesidima [ibandla] uthuma abasebenzi: ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo, elithethiweyo esandleni sabo, eliziindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwenu, nozuko lwenu, nentlawulelo yomzimba wakho. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumlo yethu kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone amazwi akho, ayinyaniso yokomoya → Qonda ukuba ukufa kukaYesu kusebenza kuthi ukukhupha ulwaluko lwenkanuko; Amen.

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela ngegama elingcwele leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

1. Beka ubuncwane kwisitya sodongwe

(1)Umntwana

buza: Lithetha ukuthini igama elithi "umntwana"?
impendulo: “Ubutyebi” bubhekisa kuMoya oyiNgcwele wenyaniso, uMoya kaYesu, noMoya kaBawo waseZulwini!
Mna ndiya kucela kuBawo, aze aninike omnye uMthetheleli, ukuze ahlale nani ngonaphakade, uMoya wenyaniso, lowo ihlabathi lingenako ukumamkela, ngokuba lingenako ukumbona. Nina ke niyamazi, ngokuba uhleli nani, kanjalo uya kuba kuni. Funda kuYohane 14:16-17
Ngokuba ke ningoonyana, uThixo wamkhupha uMoya woNyana wakhe, weza ezintliziyweni zenu, edanduluka esithi, Abha, Bawo
Oyigcinayo imithetho kaThixo uhleli kuye uThixo, noThixo uhleli kuye. Siyazi ke ukuba uThixo uhleli kuthi ngenxa kaMoya oyiNgcwele asinike yena. Bhekisela kweyoku- 1 kaYohane 3:24

(2)Ingqayi

buza: Kuthetha ukuthini "udongwe"?
impendulo: Izitya zodongwe zizitya ezenziwe ngodongwe
1 yiba ne" Igolide kunye nesilivere ” → Njengesitya esixabisekileyo, sisikweko somntu ozelwe ngokutsha waza wasindiswa, umntu ozelwe nguThixo.
2 yiba ne" izinto zobumba ezenziwe ngamaplanga ”→Njengesitya esithobekileyo, sisikweko somntu othobekileyo, indoda endala yenyama.
Kwintsapho etyebileyo akukho zitya zegolide nezesilivere kuphela, kodwa kukho nezitya zomthi nezodongwe; Ukuba umntu uthe wazihlambulula entwenini, woba sisitya esibekekileyo, esingcwalisiweyo, esisebenzisekayo eNkosini, silungiselwe wonke umsebenzi olungileyo. Bhekisela kweyesi- 2 kuTimoti 2:20-21;
UThixo uya kuwucikida umsebenzi wokwakha womntu ngamnye ngomlilo ukuba unokuma kusini na.”— 1 Korinte 3:11-15 .
Anazi na, ukuba umzimba wenu uyitempile yoMoya oyiNgcwele? Bhekisela kweyoku- 1 kwabaseKorinte 6:19-20 .

[Qaphela]: Ukukhululwa kwizinto ezingcolileyo → kubhekisela kumntu omdala owahluliweyo enyameni, ngenxa yokuba umntu omdala ozelwe nguThixo asingowasenyameni → bhekisa kumaRoma 8:9; isitya sembeko, singcwalisiwe, sifanele ukusetyenziswa yiNkosi, silungiselwe ukuhamba zonke iintlobo zemisebenzi elungileyo →【 iimpahla zexabiso ] libhekisela kumzimba weNkosi uKristu, [ izinto zodongwe 】Ikwabhekisa kumzimba kaKristu → UThixo uya "kuwugcina" uMoya oyiNgcwele "beka" izinto zodongwe "Umzimba kaKristu → utyhila ubomi bukaYesu! Kanye njengokuba ukufa kukaYesu emnqamlezweni kwamzukisa uThixo uYise, uvuko lukaKristu kwabafileyo luza kusiphinda → NoThixo uya kwenza njalo" usana “nabekwa kuthi, thina bazelwe nguThixo, njengeempahla zembeko” izinto zodongwe “Ngokuba singamalungu omzimba wayo, singamalungu omzimba wayo; usana “Amandla amakhulu aphuma kuThixo, asingaphumi kuthi; usana “Ukutyhila ubomi bukaYesu! Amen. Uyayiqonda le nto?

2. Injongo kaThixo yokuqalisa ukufa kuthi

(1) Umzekeliso wokhozo lwengqolowa

Inene, inene, ndithi kuni, Ukuba ukhozo lwengqolowa oluwe emhlabeni aluthanga lufe, lona luhlala lulukhozo olunye; Lowo uwuthandayo umphefumlo wakhe, wolahlekelwa nguwo; lowo uwuthiyileyo umphefumlo wakhe kweli hlabathi, wowulondolozela ubomi obungunaphakade. Yohane 12:24-25

(2) Sele ufile

Kuba nafayo, baye ubomi benu bufihlakele ndawonye noKristu kuye uThixo. Xa athe wabonakalaliswa uKristu, obubomi bethu, nani niya kubonakala, ninaye ebuqaqawulini. Kolose 3:3-4

(3) Banoyolo abo bafela eNkosini

Hayi, uyolo lwabafela eNkosini! “Ewe,” watsho uMoya oyiNgcwele, “baphumla ekubulalekeni kwabo, saza isiqhamo somsebenzi wabo sabalandela. ” ISityhilelo 14:13 .

Qaphela: Injongo kaThixo ngokudala ukufa kuthi:

1 Ulwaluko lokukhulula inyama: UKristu “uyakulahla” ulwaluko lwasenyameni - bona kwabaseKolose 2:11.
2 Ilungele ukusetyenziswa okuphambili: Ukuba umntu uthe wazihlambulula entwenini, woba sisitya esibekekileyo, esingcwalisiweyo, esisebenzisekayo eNkosini, silungiselwe wonke umsebenzi olungileyo. Bhekisela kweyesi-2 kuTimoti isahluko 2 indinyana 21. Ngaba uyaqonda?

3. Ukuphila ayisendim, ubonisa ubomi bukaYesu

(1) Ukuphila akusendim

Ndibethelelwe emnqamlezweni noKristu; ayisendim ke odla ubomi, nguKristu ke oselesidla ubomi kum. Bhekisela kumaGalati isahluko 2 ivesi 20
Kuba kum mna, ukudla ubomi kunguKristu, ukufa kuyinzuzo. Funda kwabaseFilipi 1:21

(2) UThixo wabeka “ubuncwane” “kwisitya sodongwe”

Sinabo obu “butyebi” boMoya oyiNgcwele bubekwe “kwisitya sodongwe” ukubonisa ukuba la mandla makhulu avela kuThixo, hayi kuthi. Singqongwe ziintshaba macala onke, kodwa asibambi, kodwa asidaniswa, kodwa asishiywanga phantsi; Bhekisela kweyesi- 2 kwabaseKorinte 4:7-9

(3) Ukufa kusebenza kuthi ukuze kutyhile ubomi bukaYesu

Sihlala sikuthwele kunye nathi ukufa kukaYesu ukuze ubomi bukaYesu bubonakale kuthi. Kuba thina badla ubomi sisoloko sinikelwa ekufeni ngenxa kaYesu, ukuze ubomi bukaYesu bubonakale emizimbeni yethu enokufa. Bona eyesi- 2 kwabaseKorinte 4:10-11 .

Phawula: UThixo ubangela ukufa kuthi ukuze ubomi bukaYesu bubonakaliswe kwimizimba yethu efayo → ukubonisa ukuba la mandla makhulu avela kuThixo kungekhona kuthi → ngale ndlela, ukufa kusebenza kuthi → abaphilayo Akusendim → “UYesu otyhiliweyo” → xa ubona uMsindisi, jonga kuYesu, kholwa kuYesu → wazalwa Kodwa iyasebenza kuwe . Amen! Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

UThixo uvuselela ukufa kuthi kwaye abe namava "ilizwi leNkosi" → Wonke umntu ufumana isipho sokholo ngokwahlukileyo, abanye bade okanye bafutshane, abanye abantu banexesha elifutshane kakhulu, kwaye abanye abantu banexesha elide kakhulu, iminyaka emithathu, ishumi iminyaka, okanye amashumi eminyaka . UThixo ubeke “ubuncwane” ‘kwizitya zethu zodongwe’ ukuze abonise ukuba la mandla makhulu avela kuThixo → UMoya Oyingcwele ubonakala kuye wonke umntu ukuze kulungelwe → Bambi wanika abanye abapostile, abanye abaprofeti, yaye abanye Abo bashumayela iindaba ezilungileyo baquka abalusi nabafundisi. → Le ndoda wanikwa amazwi obulumko nguMoya oyiNgcwele, yaza enye indoda yaphiwa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele amazwi okwazi. Omnye uyakwazi ukwenza imimangaliso, omnye umntu angaba ngumprofeti, omnye uyakwazi ukucalula imimoya, omnye umntu uthetha ngeelwimi, aze omnye umntu akwazi ukutolika iilwimi. Zonke ezi zinto zisetyenzwa nguMoya oyiNgcwele kwaye zabelwe wonke umntu ngokokuthanda kwakhe. Bhekisela kweyoku- 1 kwabaseKorinte 12:8-11

Ukwabelana ngombhalo weVangeli, uqhutywa nguMoya kaThixo Abasebenzi bakaYesu Krestu, uMzalwana uWang*Yun, uDade uLiu, uDade uZheng, uMzalwana uCen, kunye nabanye osebenza nabo, baxhasa kwaye basebenza kunye kumsebenzi wevangeli weBandla likaYesu Krestu. . Bashumayela ivangeli kaYesu Krestu, ivangeli evumela ukuba abantu basindiswe, bazukiswe, kwaye imizimba yabo ikhululwe! Amen

Iculo: Ubuncwane obubekwe kwizitya zodongwe

Abazalwana noodade abangakumbi bamkelekile ukusebenzisa ibhrawuza yabo ukukhangela - IBandla kwiNkosi uYesu Krestu - ukuba bazimanye kunye nokusebenza kunye ukushumayela ivangeli kaYesu Krestu.
