articles.title: Inkqubela Yomhambi Ngezonqulo (Intetho 5)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubazalwana noodade bam abathandekayo kwintsapho kaThixo! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile kumaRoma isahluko 6 ivesi 4 Ngoko ke sangcwatywa naye ngokubhaptizelwa ekufeni, ukuze sihambe sinobomi obutsha, njengokuba uKristu wavuswayo kwabafileyo ngalo uzuko loYise.

Namhlanje siyafunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane ngeNkqubela yePilgrim kunye ngamaxesha athile “Ekufeni kukaKristu Ngokubhaptizwa” Hayi. 5 Thetha kwaye wenze umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, Nkosi yethu uYesu Krestu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Umfazi onesidima [ibandla] uthumela abasebenzi: ngezandla zabo babhala kwaye bathetha ilizwi lenyaniso, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwethu, uzuko lwethu, nentlawulelo yemizimba yethu. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumlo yethu kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone amazwi akho, ayinyaniso yokomoya → Ukubhaptizelwa ekufeni kubangela ukuba konke esikwenzayo kufaniswe nobomi obutsha. ! Amen.

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela ngegama elingcwele leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

(1) ekufeni ngokubhaptizwa

Anazi na ukuba thina, sabhaptizelwayo kuKristu Yesu, sabhaptizelwa ekufeni kwakhe? Ngoko ke sangcwatywa naye ngokubhaptizelwa ekufeni, ukuze sihambe sinobomi obutsha, njengokuba uKristu wavuswayo kwabafileyo ngalo uzuko loYise. Ukuba simanywe naye ngemfano yokufa kwakhe, siya kumanyaniswa naye ngokufana nokuvuka kwakhe; bona kwabaseRoma 6:3-5

buza: Yintoni “injongo” yokubhaptizelwa ekufeni kukaKristu →?
impendulo: "Injongo" ngu →

1 Joyina kuye kwimo yokufa → ukutshabalalisa umzimba wesono;
2 Mthelele kuhlobo lovuko → usinike ubomi obutsha kuyo yonke intshukumo! Amen.

Phawula: Wabhaptizelwa “ekufeni” → ekufeni kukaKristu, esifa kunye naye, uKristu wawushiya umhlaba waza waxhonywa emthini “ fa umile ” Kukufa okuzukileyo amaKristu abhaptizwayo, yaye nguThixo osenza sizukiswe uAdam akafi ewela emhlabeni okanye elele phantsi, oko kukuthi, ukufa okulihlazo UKrestu Kubaluleke kakhulu ukuba amakholwa “abhaptizelwe ekufeni kukaKristu” Ngaba uyakuqonda kakuhle oku?

(2) Manyaniswe naye ngokufa

Ukuba simanywe naye ngemfano yokufa kwakhe, siya kumanyaniswa naye ngemfano yokuvuka kwakhe ( Roma 6:5 )
buza: Ukumanyaniswa njani naye ngokufana nokufa kwakhe?
impendulo: "Bhaptizwa"! Ugqiba kwelokuba “ubhaptizwe” → ukubhaptizelwa ekufeni kukaKristu → oko kukuthi ukumanyana naye ngokufana nokufa kwakhe → ukubethelelwa! Nabhaptizelwa, “ekufeni” kukaKristu! UThixo uyakuyeka ubethelelwe emnqamlezweni kunye naye . Ithe ke iNkosi uYesu → Thabathani idyokhwe yam niyithwale, nifunde kum, kuba idyokhwe yam ilula, nomthwalo wam ulula manyaniswe kuye ngentsobi yokufa? Ngaba umthwalo ulula? Ewe, kunjalo! Ngoko, uyayiqonda?
Jonga kwabaseRoma 6:6 : Kuba siyazi ukuba ubuntu bethu obudala babethelelwa emnqamlezweni kunye naye, ukuze umzimba wesono uphuthiswe, size singabi sasikhonza isono;

(3) Manyaniswe naye ngokufana nokuvuka kwakhe

buza: Ukumanyaniswa njani naye ngokufana novuko lwaKhe?
impendulo: Yidla usele isidlo seNkosi! Ngobusuku eyanikelwa ngabo iNkosi uYesu, yathabatha isonka, yaza, yakuba ibulele, yasiqhekeza, yathi, Lo ngumzimba wam, onikelwa ngenxa yenu. Le ndebe ingumnqophiso omtsha osegazini lam. →Lowo uyidlayo eyam inyama, alisele negazi lam, uhleli kum, nam ndihleli kuye (Yohane 6:56) kunye (1 Korinte 11:23-26).

Phawula: Yidla usele okweNkosi Inyama kwaye Igazi →→Ingaba umzimba weNkosi unemilo? Ewe! Xa sisitya isidlo seNkosi sangokuhlwa, ngaba sidla kwaye sisele kunye “ ukumila "Umzimba negazi leNkosi? Ewe! →→ Lowo uyidlayo eyam inyama, alisele negazi lam, unobomi obungunaphakade, ndaye ndiya kumvusa ngomhla wokugqibela ( Yoh uya kuvuswa simanyene naye ngobume bakhe. Ngalo lonke ixesha sisitya isidlo seNkosi sangokuhlwa, esongeza ukholo lwethu ukusuka elukholweni ukuya elukholweni, ukomelela ukuya eluzukweni, nakubomi obutsha indlela, uyayiqonda?

(4) Sinike isimbo esitsha kuyo yonke intshukumo esiyenzayo

Ukuba ubani ukuKristu, usisidalwa esitsha; Bhekisela kweyesi- 2 kwabaseKorinte 5:17
manihlaziyeke iingqondo zenu, nambathe ubuntu obutsha, obudalwe ngokomfanekiso kaThixo, ebulungiseni nasebungcweleni benyaniso. Funda kwabase-Efese 4:23-24

Kwanjengokuba umzimba umnye, unamalungu amaninzi, abe ke emaninzi nje, emzimba mnye, ukwanjalo ke noKrestu. nokuba singamaYuda, nokuba singamaGrike, nokuba singamakhoboka, nokuba singabakhululekileyo; Bhekisela kweyoku- 1 kwabaseKorinte 12:12-13

(6) Yakhani umzimba kaKristu, nimanyane elukholweni, nikhule, nizakhe eluthandweni.

Wabanika abanye abapostile, abanye abaprofeti, abanye abashumayeli, abanye abalusi nabafundisi, ukuze abangcwele bawuxhobele umsebenzi wobulungiseleli, ukwakhiwa komzimba kaKristu, side sonke sifikelele kubunye bokholo nasekumazini uThixo. Unyana wakhe wakhulela ebudodeni obupheleleyo, efikelela kwincam yokuzala kukaKristu, ekuthe ngaye umzimba uphela uhlanganiselwe ndawonye ngokufanelekileyo, ukuze ilungu ngalinye lisebenze ngokwenjongo yalo, yaye ilungu ngalinye lixhasana ngokomsebenzi wo umzimba uphela, ukuze ukhule umzimba, uzeke eluthandweni. Funda kwabase-Efese 4:11-13, 16

3. Manyaniswe Naye ngendlela yovuko

impendulo: UKristu hayi kuphela ngenxa "Siyafa," ngenxa "Singcwatyiwe okwangoku" ngenxa "Siphila! Ubomi bam obutsha buphumle kuKristu! 1. Buxabise obakho ubomi

buza: Kuthetha ukuthini ukuxabisa obakho ubomi?
impendulo: “Uthando” luthetha ukuthanda nokuthanda! "Thatha" lithetha ukuqaqadeka kunye nokutyhafa. "Ukuxabisa" ubomi bomntu kukuthanda, ukuthanda, ukuxabisa, ukunyamekela nokukhusela ubomi bakho!

kwaye indlela eya eluzukweni → Thabatha umnqamlezo wakho uze ulandele uYesu → Lahla ubomi bakho → Manyaniswe naye ngemfano yokufa, kwaye uya kumanyana naye kukufana novuko lwakhe → “uYesu” emva koko wabizela kuye isihlwele nabafundi bakhe waza wathi kubo, Ukuba ubani uthanda ukundilandela, makandilandele; zincame, uwuthwale umnqamlezo wakho, undilandele;

Phawula:

fumana" ubomi obungunaphakade "Indlela → yi" ileta "IVangeli! Amen Le yindlela yokufumana ubomi obungunaphakade → Kholelwa kwivangeli!

Umoya nenyama zisemfazweni

(1)Uthiye umzimba wokufa

Njengoko “uPawulos” watshoyo! Ndingowenyama kwaye ndithengisiwe esonweni ndifuna "entsha" kodwa andiyenzi "indala" kodwa ndizimisele ukwenza "endala". Nizihlubile umntu omdala, owonakaliswayo ngeenkanuko ezilukuhlayo;

Hayi "Ithi kuwe gcina umthetho kwaye uwuphathe ngqwabalala umzimba wakho, kodwa eneneni ayinamphumo ekuthinteleni iinkanuko zenyama. Ngaba uyakuqonda oku? buza: Indlela yokulondoloza ubomi kubomi obungunaphakade?

【1】 Bukela ubomi babantu abatsha

(1) Ukuba nihlala kuKristu, anisayi kugwetywa;

ukuze abangcwele bawuxhobele umsebenzi wolungiselelo, ukwakhiwa komzimba kaKristu; ekuthe ngaye umzimba uphela uhlanganiselwe ndawonye, ukuze onke amalungu ahlanganiselwe ndawonye, abe amalungu onke asebenza ngokubambisana kuse ekusebenzeni komzimba wonke, ukuze umzimba ukhule eluthandweni. buza: UYesu uyindlela→Sihamba njani kule ndlela yokomoya nakwindlela yasezulwini?
impendulo: Sebenzisa indlela yokukholwa eNkosini【 ukuzithemba 】Hamba! Phawula: Umntu omdala odalwe ngothuli “ungumoni” yaye akanako ukuthabatha indlela yasemoyeni okanye indlela eya ezulwini kuphela ‘unokuzuza’ umzimba nobomi bukaKristu – oko kukuthi, wazalwa nguThixo. Inkqubela Yomhambi Ngezonqulo

【1】 Ukukholelwa kwindoda endala kuthetha ukufa "njengomoni"

(1) Kholelwa ekufeni kwexhego

UKristu “wafela” bonke, yaye bonke “bonke” baquka abo bafayo, abaphilayo, nabangekazalwa → oko kukuthi, “bonke” abaphuma kumzimba ka-Adam bafa, yaye abadala. Ewe, abafileyo bakhululwe esonweni. → Uthando lukaKristu luyasinyanzela; kuba sicinga ukuba, ngenxa yokuba omnye wabafela bonke;

(2) Kholelwa kwindoda endala ubethelelwe kunye nayo

Ubuntu bethu obudala babethelelwa emnqamlezweni kunye naye, ukuze umzimba wesono uphuthiswe → Kuba siyazi ukuba ubuntu bethu obudala babethelelwa emnqamlezweni kunye naye, ukuze umzimba wesono uphuthiswe, size singabi sasikhonza isono; kuba owafayo ugwetyelwe, wakhululwa kuso isono. — Roma 6:6-7

Kuba nafayo, baye ubomi benu bufihlakele ndawonye noKristu kuye uThixo. Imbekiselo-KwabaseKolose Isahluko 3 Ivesi 3

buza: Uthetha ukuthini kuba ufile?

impendulo: Ixhego lakho lifile.

buza: Usweleke nini ixhego lethu?
impendulo: UKristu wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni waza wafela izono zethu→ uKristu yedwa" ngenxa “Xa bonke besifa, bonke bayafa → Lowo uye wafa ukhululwe esonweni, yaye bonke bayafa → Bonke bakhululwe esonweni. ileta Umntu wakhe"→ ngu ileta NguKrestu yedwa" ngenxa Bonke abantu bayafa, yaye bonke “bakhululwe esonweni” yaye abagwetywa; abantu abangakholwayo , wayesele egwetyiwe ngenxa yokuba wayengakholelwa kwigama lokuphela koNyana ozelwe nguThixo. " igama likaYesu “Kuthetha ukusindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo. UYesu Kristu wancama ubomi bakhe ukuze akusindise ezonweni zakho, uya kugwetywa. . Ngoko, uyayiqonda? Isalathiso - Yohane 3:18 kunye noMateyu 1:21

[2] Phila ngokukholelwa "kumntu omtsha" → uhlala kuKristu

(1) Kholelwa kumntu omtsha kwaye uphile kwaye uvuswe kunye noKristu

Ukuba sifa kunye noKrestu, siyakholwa ukuba sodla ubomi kunye naye. Imbekiselo ( Roma 6:8 )
Nani nifile ziziphoso nakukungaluki kwenu, kodwa uThixo unidlise ubomi ndawonye noKristu, enixolele zonke iziphoso ( Kolose 2:13 )

Ukuba ke uhleli kuni uMoya kaThixo, aningabo abenyama, ningaboMoya. Ukuba umntu akanaye uMoya kaKristu, akangokaKristu lowo. (Funda kwabaseRoma 8:9.)

Ngokwale mbono ndithobela umthetho kaThixo ngentliziyo, kodwa inyama yam ithobela umthetho wesono. Imbekiselo ( Roma 7:24-25 )

Kaloku ngokumanywa kwam noKrestu Yesu, uMoya umniki-bomi undikhulule ekulawulweni sisono nakukufa. (Funda kwabaseRoma 8:1-2.)

Namhlanje siza kuqhubeka nokufunda, ubudlelwane kunye nokwabelana " Ukushiya iSiqalo seMfundiso kaKrestu "Hayi. 5 Thetha kwaye uthandaze: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Ibandla “lomfazi onesidima” lithumela abasebenzi – ngelizwi lenyaniso abalibhalayo baze balithethe ezandleni zabo, eliziindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso nozuko lwethu. Ukutya kuhanjiswa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni kude kwaye kunikezelwa kuthi ngexesha, ukuze ubomi bethu bokomoya bube nobutyebi kwaye siya kukhula sibe ngabatsha kwaye siqole imihla ngemihla! Amen. Thandaza ukuba iNkosi uYesu iqhubeke nokukhanyisela amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuba siqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zokomoya kwaye siqonde isiqalo semfundiso ekufuneka simshiye uKristu: Qonda indlela yokushiya umntu omdala, ulahle umntu omdala ngokuziphatha kunye neenkanuko zenyama ;

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

(1) Phila ngoMoya oyiNgcwele kwaye wenze ngoMoya oyiNgcwele

Ukuba sidla ubomi ngokoMoya, masihambe nokuhamba kwangokoMoya . Imbekiselo ( Galati 5:25 )

buza: Buyintoni ubomi ngoMoya oyiNgcwele?
impendulo: " Xhomekeka kwi "Kuthetha ukuthembela, ukuxhomekeka! Sithemba: 1 Uzelwe ngamanzi nanguMoya, 2 Wazalwa ngenyaniso yeendaba ezilungileyo, 3 Uzelwe nguThixo. Bonke ngaMoya mnye, iNkosi enye, noThixo omnye! Luvuko lukaYesu Kristu kwabafileyo olusivuselelayo → siphila ngoMoya oyiNgcwele, ilizwi lenyaniso likaYesu Kristu, kwaye sizelwe nguThixo! Ufanele ungene kwiBandla likaYesu Krestu kwaye wakhe uMzimba kaKristu. Kufuneka umiliselwe kwaye wakhelwe kuKristu nothando lukaThixo, kwaye ukhule ube yindoda ukuzala kukaKristu... Umzimba uphela udityaniswe nguye xa amalungu evisisana, ilungu ngalinye linomsebenzi walo, yaye ilungu ngalinye liyancedana ngokomsebenzi walo, ngokuthe ngcembe umzimba uyakhula uze uzakhe eluthandweni. . Isalathiso ( Efese 4:12-16 ), ngaba oku kucacile kuwe?

buza: Kuthetha ukuthini ukuhamba ngoMoya?

impendulo: " uMoya oyiNgcwele "Yenza ngaphakathi kwethu hlaziya Umsebenzi wakhe kukuhamba ngoMoya → Uyasisindisa kungengamisebenzi yobulungisa esiyenzileyo, kodwa ngokwenceba yakhe, ngokusihlambulula ngokuzalwa ngokutsha nangokuhlaziywa koMoya oyiNgcwele. ( Tito 3:5 ) Apha” ukuzalwa ngokutsha Ubhaptizo lubhaptizo loMoya oyiNgcwele. ileta Phila ngoMoya oyiNgcwele, wenze ngokuthembela kuMoya oyiNgcwele, kwaye uMoya oyiNgcwele wenza umsebenzi wokuhlaziya:

1 Yambathani ubuntu obutsha, ngokuthe ngcembe uhlaziye → Yambathani ubuntu obutsha. Umntu omtsha uyahlaziywa ngolwazi abe ngumfanekiselo woMdali wakhe. Imbekiselo ( Kolose 3:10 )
2 Umzimba wangaphandle womntu omdala uyatshatyalaliswa, kodwa umntu wangaphakathi womntu omtsha uhlaziywa imihla ngemihla "ngoMoya oyiNgcwele" → Ngoko ke, asiphelelwa yintliziyo. Nangona umzimba wangaphandle uya kutshatyalaliswa, kodwa yena wangaphakathi uyahlaziyeka imihla ngemihla. Imbekiselo ( 2 Korinte 4:16 )
3 UThixo wasilungiselela ukwenza imisebenzi emihle → Kuba thina singumsebenzi wakhe, sidalelwe kuKristu Yesu, ukuze senze imisebenzi elungileyo, awayilungisayo ngenxa engaphambili uThixo, ukuba senze imisebenzi elungileyo. ( Efese 2:10 ) UThixo usilungiselele “wonke umsebenzi olungileyo” ebandleni likaYesu Kristu. 1 “Ukuliva ilizwi” kuhlaziywa ngokuthe ngcembe ekwazini, ekuseleni ubisi olungangxengwanga, nasekudleni ukudla kokomoya, ekhulela ebuntwini obukhulu, ekhulela ebukhulwini bukaKristu; 2" "Ziqhelanise" uMoya oyiNgcwele yenze kuthi hlaziya umsebenzi" ebizwa ngokuba yi-xingdao ” Amazwi athi uMoya Oyingcwele uhamba ezintliziyweni zethu, amazwi awahambayo uKristu ezintliziyweni zethu, amazwi athi uBawo uThixo awahambe ezintliziyweni zethu → oku ebizwa ngokuba yi-xingdao ! UMoya oyiNgcwele ushumayela iindaba ezilungileyo kuthi, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso→ ebizwa ngokuba yi-xingdao ! Ukushumayela ivangeli elisindisa abantu kuthetha ukwenza zonke iintlobo zezenzo ezilungileyo, ukuba awuzishumayeli ivangeli, ayisosenzo esihle ukuba unemali yokunikela nokunika amahlwempu, asingomsebenzi olungileyo lowo Ezo zinto azisayi kuzikhumbula izenzo zakho ezilungileyo, uzenzele yona inyama; Kuphela ukuxhasa ivangeli, ukushumayela iindaba ezilungileyo, kunye nokusebenzisa ivangeli zizenzo ezilungileyo . Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Yambathani ubuntu obutsha nimambathe uKristu

manihlaziyeke iingqondo zenu, nambathe ubuntu obutsha, obudalwe ngokomfanekiso kaThixo, ebulungiseni nasebungcweleni benyaniso. ( Efese 4:23-24 )
Ngoko ke nina nonke ningoonyana bakaThixo ngako ukukholwa, nikuKristu Yesu; Nina nonke, nabhaptizelwayo kuKristu, namambatha uKristu. ( Galati 3:26-27 )

Phawula: Nonke ningoonyana bakaThixo ngokukholwa kuKristu Yesu, nabhaptizelwa kuKristu, nambatha ubuntu obutsha, obuthe bazalwa ngokutsha Ukwambatha uKristu kwaye wambatha umzimba kaKristu ovusiweyo. Ngokuhlaziywa "koMoya oyiNgcwele", umntu omtsha uya "kukuguqula" Umntu omtsha "Ingqondo" Guqula Enye entsha→

1 KwakukuAdam" Guqula "KuKristu,

2 Ujika abe ngumoni" Guqula "Yiba lilungisa,

3 Kuyavela ukuba kwisiqalekiso somthetho " Guqula "Ngentsikelelo yobabalo,

4 Ekuqaleni kwiTestamente eNdala " Guqula “KwiTestamente eNtsha,

5 Kwathi kanti abazali bam bazala" Guqula “Ozelwe nguThixo,

6 Kuyavela ukuba phantsi kwamandla obumnyama kaSathana " Guqula “Ebukumkanini bokukhanya kukaThixo,

7 Kwabonakala kumdaka kwaye kungacocekanga” Guqula “Kukho inyaniso ebulungiseni nasebungcweleni, Amen!

"Ingqondo" Guqula Entsha, oko uThixo akufunayo kokwakho” Intliziyo ", wena ileta" isazela "Ngegazi likaYesu" Kanye "Coca, awusayi kuphinda uzive unetyala! Kuyacaca ukuba" umoni “Uphi na mna ozelwe ngokutsha! umntu olilungisa ", ubulungisa nobungcwele benyaniso! Ngaba kunjalo? Ngaba umntu omtsha unesono? Akukho sono; unako ukona? Akanako ukona → Abo bonayo abamazanga, "uKristu", bengazange baluqonde usindiso UKristu inyoka “Abazelwe ngumtyholi, bangoonyana bakaMtyholi. Niyaqonda na ngokucacileyo? Ngaba unokuwuchaza umahluko? ( 1 Yohane 3:6-10 )

(3) Yothula ixhego kwihambo yakho yangaphambili

Xa ufunda ngoKristu, akunjalo. Ukuba nithe naliva ilizwi lakhe, nalwamkela uqeqesho lwakhe, nayifunda inyaniso yakhe, nizilahle kuni izinto ezidala, enibonakalisa ngazo iinkanuko zokulukuhla.

buza: Xa sikholelwa kuYesu, ngaba asizange siyikhulule indoda endala kunye nokuziphatha kwayo? Kutheni isithi apha (yilahleni indlela yakudala yokwenza izinto?) Kolose 3:9
impendulo: Nafunda ngoKristu, naliva ilizwi lakhe, nayamkela imfundiso yakhe, nafunda nenyaniso yakhe → Xa nithe naliva ilizwi lenyaniso, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwenu, nakholwa kuKristu, nalifumana idinga; uMoya oyiNgcwele " luphawu "lokuzalwa ngokutsha", umntu omtsha ozelwe ngokutsha, umntu womoya Oko kukuthi, abantu bokomoya, abantu basezulwini” ayingowakhe "Indoda endala yasemhlabeni kunye nendoda endala" umoni "Izenzo→ Ngoko ke, ekubeni nikholiwe kuYesu Kristu," sele "Lahla umntu omdala kunye nokuziphatha kwakhe kwakudala; yibeke nje →" amava "Lahla ixhego kwindlela oziphatha ngayo ngaphambili (umzekelo, umfazi okhulelweyo, ngaba unobomi obutsha esiswini sakhe - usana? Ngaba umntwana ufanele aphume esizalweni sikanina, abe namava okwahlukana ukusuka esizalweni sikanina, aze azalwe kwaye ukhule?), kufuneka Oku koko kuthetha ukuthini ukulahla ixhego kwihambo yakho yangaphambili.

buza: Zeziphi izimilo elalinazo ixhego kwixesha elidlulileyo?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

1 Iinkanuko zenyama yomntu omdala

Iyabonakala ke yona imisebenzi yenyama: ukukrexeza, ukungcola, uburheletya, unqulo-zithixo, ubugqwirha, intiyo, iinkani, amakhwele, imisindo, amayelenqe, amayelenqe, ukunxila, iindywala, njl. Sendinixelele kade, nangoku, ndithi kuni, Abazenzayo izinto ezinjalo abayi kubudla ilifa ubukumkani bukaThixo. ( Galati 5:19-21 )

2 Ukwanelisa iinkanuko zenyama

enahamba kuzo ngokwenkqubo yeli hlabathi, nimlulamela umphathi wegunya lesibhakabhaka, lomoya lo usebenzayo ngoku kubo abangevayo; Thina sonke sasiphakathi kwabo, siqhuba iinkanuko zenyama, silandela iinkanuko zenyama nezentliziyo; ( Efese 2:2-3 )

buza: Ulibeka njani ixhego kwindlela oziphatha ngayo ngaphambili?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

1 Umntu wethu omdala wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni noKristu, wahlukaniswa nomzimba wokufa

(Kunjengokuba watshoyo uPawulos) Hayi indlela endilusizi ngayo! Ngubani na oya kundihlangula kulo mzimba wokufa? Ndiyambulela uThixo kuba sinako ukusinda ngayo iNkosi yethu uYesu Krestu. Ngokwale mbono ndithobela umthetho kaThixo ngentliziyo, kodwa inyama yam ithobela umthetho wesono. Imbekiselo ( Roma 7:24-25 )

2 Ukukhulula umntu omdala ngokumanyana noKristu ekufeni kwakhe ngokubhaptizwa

Ngoko ke sangcwatywa naye ngokubhaptizelwa ekufeni, ukuze sihambe sinobomi obutsha, njengokuba uKristu wavuswayo kwabafileyo ngalo uzuko loYise. Imbekiselo ( Roma 6:4 )

3 UKristu uyanaluka ngokulahla isimo esonakeleyo

Nathi kuye naluswa nokwaluswa ngolwaluko olungenakwenziwa ngazandla; Nangcwatywa naye elubhaptizweni; enathi nikuye, navuswa nokuvuswa naye, ngokukholwa kwenu kukusebenza kukaThixo, owamvusa kubo abafileyo. ( Kolose 2:11-12 )

Phawula: Ukholo nobhaptizo zimanyanisa kuKristu→ 1 Indlela yokufa imanyene noKristu, 2 ekufeni kukaKristu, 3 Ngcwaba ixhego likhuphe ixhego nezimilo zalo.
Nobabini" ileta "UKrestu" ubhaptiziwe "Yiyani ekufeni, nimanyaniswe kuye ngemfano yokufa, nimiliswe kuye ngemfano yokuvuka kwakhe; enathi ngalo nalùswa ngolwaluko lwenyama enyameni; Oku kuya kuvelisa umphumo olandelayo :

(1) kaYesu fa Yenza kusebenze umntu wethu omdala → "Umzimba wangaphandle wendoda endala uyatshatyalaliswa, inxalenye yangaphandle iyabola, kwaye umntu omdala ngokuthe ngcembe uba mbi ngenxa yenkohliso yeminqweno yokuzingca."
(2) kaYesu wazalwa Sityhilelwa kubuntu bethu obutsha UThixo usezintliziyweni zethu → Umntu omtsha usezintliziyweni zethu ngokuhlaziywa koMoya oyiNgcwele ubisi kwaye utye ukutya kokomoya kwaye ukhule ube yindoda evuthiweyo Umzimba ukhula ngokuthe ngcembe, ugcwele isithomo sikaKristu, uzakha eluthandweni, kwaye unobomi obuninzi ngakumbi!

Ngoko ke, kufuneka siyishiye imfundiso kaKristu → sibuhlube ubuntu obudala, sambathe ubuntu obutsha, sibulahle ubuntu obudala, sizakhe sikhule kuKristu naseluthandweni lwebandla likaYesu Kristu. . Amen!

KULUNGILE! Namhlanje siphononongile, sabelana, kwaye sabelane apha kuhlelo olulandelayo: Ukuqala Kokushiya Imfundiso KaKrestu, Isifundo 6

Ukwabelana ngemibhalo yeVangeli, ephefumlelwe nguMoya kaThixo Abasebenzi bakaYesu Krestu, uMzalwana uWang*Yun, uDade uLiu, uDade uZheng, uMzalwana uCen, kunye nabanye osebenza nabo baxhasa kwaye basebenza kunye kumsebenzi wevangeli weBandla likaYesu Krestu. Bashumayela ivangeli kaYesu Krestu, ivangeli evumela ukuba abantu basindiswe, bazukiswe, kwaye imizimba yabo ikhululwe! Amen, amagama abo abhalwe encwadini yobomi! Ukhunjulwe yiNkosi. Amen!

(1) Ulahlile ixhego

KWABASEKOLOSE 3:9 Musani ukuxokisana, kuba nizihlubile nje umntu omdala, nezenzo zakhe.

buza: besinini" sele “Likhulule ixhego nesimilo salo sakudala?
impendulo: Ukuzalwa ngokutsha! Xa uYesu Krestu wavuswayo kwabafileyo, sazalwa ngokutsha umntu omtsha uye wakhulula umntu omdala kunye nokuziphatha kwakhe - bhekisa ku-1 Petros 1: 3; Ziindaba ezilungileyo ezo, zosindiso lwenu, enakholwa ngalo kuKristu, nalamkela idinga [ uMoya oyiNgcwele 】Kwetywina→UMoya oyiNgcwele ububungqina "bokuzalwa ngokutsha" kunye nobungqina bokufumana ilifa likaBawo waseZulwini. Nizelwe ngoMoya oyiNgcwele, inyaniso yeendaba ezilungileyo, kaThixo! Amen. Ngoko, uyayiqonda? →Nakuba nithe naliva ilizwi lenyaniso, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwenu, nakholwa kuKristu, natywinwa kuye, natywinwa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele wedinga. ( Efese 1:13 )

1 Bazalwa ngamanzi nanguMoya
UYesu wathi: “Inene, inene, ndithi kuwe, Ukuba umntu akathanga azalwe ngamanzi nanguMoya, akanakungena ebukumkanini bukaThixo.
buza: Kuthetha ukuthini ukuzalwa ngamanzi nangoMoya?
impendulo: “Amanzi” ngamanzi aphilileyo, amanzi omthombo wobomi, amanzi aphilileyo asezulwini, imilambo yamanzi aphilileyo, aqukuqela anyukele ebomini obungunaphakade → ukusuka esiswini sikaYesu Krestu – bhekisa ku (Yohane 7:38-39) ISityhilelo 21:6 );
" uMoya oyiNgcwele “UMoya kaYise, uMoya kaYesu, uMoya wenyaniso → Ke xa athe wafika uMthetheleli, endiya kumthuma kuBawo, uMoya wenyaniso ophuma kuBawo, wongqina ngam. kaYohane 15:26), uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

2 Nizelwe inyaniso yeendaba ezilungileyo

Nina ke nifunda ngoKrestu ninoba ngamawaka alishumi abafundisi, kodwa oobawo bambalwa, kuba mna ndinizele ngazo iindaba ezimnandi kuKrestu Yesu. ( 1 Korinte 4:15 )

buza: Ivangeli liyazala thina! Ithetha ntoni le nto?
impendulo: Njengoko uPawulos watshoyo! Ndinizele mna ngazo iindaba ezilungileyo, kuKristu Yesu; IVangeli "Ndakuzala → Yintoni ivangeli?" IVangeli ” Njengoko uPawulos watshoyo: Kuba oko ndikunikeleyo nam kuni: Okokuqala nje, uKristu wazifela izono zethu ngokutsho kweZibhalo, wangcwatywa, nokokuba wavuswa ngomhla wesithathu ngokutsho kweZibhalo (Kol. (Funda eyoku-1 kwabaseKorinte 15:3-4.)
buza: Kuthetha ukuthini ukuba iLizwi lokwenyaniso lisizale?
impendulo: Ngokokuthanda kwakhe, wasizala ngelizwi lenyaniso, ukuze sibe njengentlahlela kuyo yonke indalo yakhe. ( Yakobi 1:18 )
“ULizwi oyinyaniso” → Ekuqaleni ube ekho uLizwi, yaye uLizwi wayenguThixo. UYesu wathi: “Ndim indlela, ndim inyaniso, ndim ubomi.” ( Yohane 14:6 ) UYesu uyinyaniso nendlela yokwenyaniso intando
wazalwa Kuthi, inyaniso yevangeli wazalwa Sifumene! Amen. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

3 Bazalwa nguThixo

Ke bonke abamamkelayo wabanika igunya lokuba babe ngabantwana bakaThixo, abo ke bakholwayo kwigama lakhe. Aba ngabo abangazalwanga ngagazi, kungengankanuko, nangakuthanda kwandoda; bazelwe nguThixo. ( Yohane 1:12-13 )
buza: Indlela yokwamkela uYesu?
impendulo: Lowo uyidlayo eyam inyama, alisele elam igazi, uhleli kum, nam ndihleli kuye. (Yohane 6:56) →Ngaba uYesu unguThixo? Ewe! “UThixo” ungumoya! Ngaba uYesu wazalwa ngoMoya? Ewe! Ngaba uYesu wayengumntu wokomoya? Ewe! Xa sisitya isidlo seNkosi sangokuhlwa, sidla kwaye sisele umzimba weNkosi womoya kunye negazi lomoya → "samkela" uYesu, kwaye singamalungu akhe, akunjalo? Ewe! UThixo unguMoya → Nabani na owamkela uYesu: 1 wazalwa ngamanzi nanguMoya; 2 ozelwe yinyaniso yeendaba ezilungileyo, 3 Uzelwe nguThixo! Amen.
oku" ukuzalwa ngokutsha “Umntu omtsha akenziwanga ngodongwe luka-Adam, ongazalwanga ngegazi labazali bethu, kungekhona ngenkanuko, kungekhona ngokuthanda komntu, kodwa ozelwe nguThixo.” “UThixo” ungumoya → a" umntu womoya ", intsha le mna" umntu womoya "Umzimba womphefumlo →" umoya "NguMoya kaYesu," umphefumlo "Ngumphefumlo kaYesu," umzimba "Ngumzimba kaYesu → uhleli kuKristu, ufihlwe noKristu kuThixo, nasezintliziyweni zethu. Xa uKristu ebonakala, lo mntu mtsha" umntu womoya ” Wabonakala kunye noKristu ebuqaqawulini. Ngaba uyakuqonda oku?

(2) Ukuba uMoya kaThixo uhleli kuni, anisayi kuba ngabenyama

buza: Uthetha ukuthini uMoya kaThixo?
impendulo: UMoya kaThixo nguMoya kaYise, uMoya kaYesu, noMoya oyiNgcwele wenyaniso! Imbekiselo ( Galati 4:6 )
buza: Kuthetha ukuthini ukuba uMoya kaThixo, “uMoya oyiNgcwele,” uhlale ezintliziyweni zethu?
impendulo: UMoya oyiNgcwele "uhlala" ezintliziyweni zethu → oko kukuthi, "sizalwa ngokutsha" 1 wazalwa ngamanzi nanguMoya; 2 ozelwe yinyaniso yeendaba ezilungileyo, 3 Uzelwe nguThixo.
buza: Ngaba uMoya oyiNgcwele “akahlali” enyameni yethu?
impendulo: UMoya Oyingcwele akayi kuhlala enyameni yethu Inyama yethu ivela kuAdam, yenziwe ngothuli, kwaye izalwa ngabazali Iwayini entsha ayinakuqulathwa kuyo.
ngoko" uMoya oyiNgcwele "Ayihlali kwiintsuba zewayini ezindala, kwinyama enokonakala → umzimba wendoda endala "inyama" iyatshatyalaliswa kwaye itshatyalaliswe ngenxa yesono, kodwa umphefumlo "oko kukuthi, uMoya oyiNgcwele ohleli ezintliziyweni zethu" uhlala ugwetyelwe ngokholo → Ukuba uKrestu ezintliziyweni zenu, umzimba wenu ufile ngenxa yesono, kodwa umoya wenu uyaphila ngenxa yobulungisa (KwabaseRoma 8:10). uMoya oyiNgcwele “Akuhlali enyameni yethu ebonakalayo, kodwa uMoya kaThixo uhleli kuni, nina bazelwe ngokutsha” umntu womoya Ingabi yenyama, ingekaMoya. Niyakuqonda na oku?

buza: Ngaba uYesu wayengenawo umzimba wenyama negazi? Ngaba inawo nomzimba wenyama? Kodwa uMoya oyiNgcwele unako ukuhlala kuye!
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi
1 UYesu wazalwa yintombi enyulu uMariya kwaye uyinzala yomfazi;
2 UYesu wehla evela ezulwini waza wazalwa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele.
3 UYesu unguLizwi waba yinyama, uThixo wenziwa inyama, uMoya wenziwa inyama, yaye inyama Yakhe yeyomoya; Okwenyama yinyama; oko kuzelwe ngumoya kungumoya. Imbekiselo ( Yohane 3:6 )
4 Umzimba wenyama kaYesu awukuboni ukonakala okanye ukonakala, kwaye umzimba wakhe wenyama awukuboni kufa.

Xa sisitya iSidlo seNkosi sangokuhlwa, sitya inyama yeNkosi kwaye sisela igazi leNkosi → senziwa ngokutsha ngaphakathi kuthi. umntu womoya ” esokomoya nesasezulwini, ngenxa yokuba sinjalo
amalungu kaKristu→UMoya oyiNgcwele “ Hlala e “KuYesu Kristu, esingamalungu akhe,” uMoya oyiNgcwele "Kwakhona uhlala ekuzalweni kwethu kwakhona" umntu womoya "Emzimbeni. Amen! Moya oyiNgcwele" Andiyi kuhlala "Kumzimba obonakalayo wendoda endala (inyama). Uyayiqonda le nto?

Ngoko ke, njengabantu abatsha abazelwe nguThixo abaphila ngoMoya oyiNgcwele, kufuneka sihambe ngoMoya→ hamba isono, hamba Zisole ngezenzo zakho ezifileyo, hamba Isikolo samabanga aphantsi esinobugwala nesingenamsebenzi, hamba Umthetho obuthathaka, ongenamsebenzi, ongaphumeleliyo; hamba indoda endala; nxiba Abantu abatsha, Phi nxiba uKristu . Ezi ziziqalelo zemfundiso kaKristu. Amen!

KULUNGILE! Namhlanje siphononongile, sabelana, kwaye sabelane apha kuhlelo olulandelayo: Ukuqala Kokushiya Imfundiso KaKrestu, Isifundo sesi-5

Ukwabelana ngombhalo weVangeli, uqhutywa nguMoya kaThixo Abasebenzi bakaYesu Krestu, uMzalwana uWang*Yun, uDade uLiu, uDade uZheng, uMzalwana uCen... kunye nabanye abasebenza kunye baxhasa kwaye basebenza kunye kumsebenzi wevangeli weBandla likaYesu. UKrestu. Shumayela ivangeli kaYesu Krestu, ivangeli evumela abantu ukuba basindiswe, bazukiswe, kwaye nemizimba yabo ikhululwe. Amen! →Njengoko eyabaseFilipi 4:2-3 isitsho, uPawulos, uTimoti, uWodiya, uSintike, uKlemente nabanye ababesebenza noPawulos, amagama abo akwincwadi yobomi obungamileyo. Amen!

Iculo: Ukuqala kweMfundiso yokuMshiya uKrestu

Abazalwana noodade abangakumbi bamkelekile ukusebenzisa ibhrawuza yabo ukukhangela - IBandla kwiNkosi uYesu Krestu - ukuba bazimanye kunye nokusebenza kunye ukushumayela ivangeli kaYesu Krestu.

articles.title: Ukuqala Kokushiya Imfundiso KaKrestu (Isifundo 8)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade kwintsapho kaThixo! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile yethu kuMateyu Isahluko 11 kunye nevesi 12 size sifunde kunye: Kususela kwixesha likaYohane umbhaptizi kude kube ngoku, ubukumkani bamazulu buye bangena ngokubulaleka, yaye abo babulalekayo baya kubuzuza.

Namhlanje siza kuqhubeka sifunda, sinxulumana, kwaye sabelane kunye "Ukuqala kokuyishiya iMfundiso kaKrestu" Hayi. 8 Thetha kwaye uthandaze: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Ibandla “lomfazi onesidima” lithumela abasebenzi – ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo nelithethiweyo ezandleni zabo, eliyigospile yosindiso lwethu, uzuko nentlawulelo yemizimba yethu. Ukutya kuziswa kude esibhakabhakeni, yaye kunikezelwa kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukuze kusenze umntu omtsha, umntu wokomoya, umntu wokomoya! Yiba ngumntu omtsha imihla ngemihla, ukhulela kwisimo esipheleleyo sikaKrestu! Amen. Thandaza ukuba iNkosi uYesu iqhubeke nokukhanyisela amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuba siqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zokomoya kwaye siqonde isiqalo semfundiso ekufuneka simshiye uKristu: Ubukumkani bamazulu bungeniswa ngokusebenza nzima, kwaye abo basebenza nzima baya kubufumana! Sanga singakhulisa ukholo phezu kokholo, ubabalo phezu kobabalo, ukomelela phezu kwamandla, nozuko phezu kozuko. .

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Ngegama leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

buza: Ngaba kufuneka usebenze nzima ukuze ungene eBukumkanini bamazulu?

impendulo: “Sebenza nzima” → Kuba abo basebenza nzima baya kuzuza.

buza:

1 Ubukumkani bamazulu abunakubonwa okanye buchukunyiswe ngeliso lenyama, singathini na ke ukusebenza nzima? Ungena njani?
2 Ngaba sixelelwa ukuba sithobele umthetho size sisebenze nzima ukuze sihlakulele imizimba yethu enesono ukuze sibe ngabangenakufa okanye amaBhuda? Ngaba uzama ukuhlakulela umzimba wakho ube ngumntu womoya?
3 Ngaba ndisebenza nzima ukuze ndenze izinto ezilungileyo ndize ndibe ngumntu olungileyo, ndizinikele ukuze ndisindise abanye, ndize ndisebenze nzima ukuze ndifumane imali yokunceda amahlwempu?
4 Ndiyazamela ukushumayela egameni leNkosi, ukukhupha iindimoni egameni leNkosi, ukuphilisa abagulayo, nokwenza imimangaliso emininzi egameni leNkosi?

impendulo: “Asingabo bonke abathi kum, Nkosi, Nkosi, abaya kungena ebukumkanini bamazulu kuphela ngulowo wenza ukuthanda kukaBawo osemazulwini, oya kungena.

buza: Kuthetha ukuthini ukwenza intando kaBawo oseZulwini? Uyenza njani intando kaBawo oseZulwini? Ngokomzekelo ( INdumiso 143:10 ) Ndifundise ukwenza ukuthanda kwakho, kuba unguThixo wam. Umoya wakho ulungile;
impendulo: Ukwenza intando kaBawo oseZulwini kuthetha: Kholwa kuYesu! Phulaphulani ilizwi leNkosi! → ( Luka 9:35 ) Kwaphuma ilizwi efini, lisithi: “Lo nguNyana wam, oyintanda;

buza: UBawo oseZulwini usixelela ukuba simamele amazwi oNyana wethu oyintanda uYesu! Wathini uYesu kuthi?
impendulo: UYesu wathi: “Lizalisekile ixesha, yaye ubukumkani bukaThixo busondele. Guqukani nikholwe kuzo iindaba ezilungileyo!

buza: " Kholwa yivangeli Ngaba unako ukungena ebukumkanini bamazulu?
impendulo: lento【 IVangeli ] Singamandla kaThixo okusindisa bonke abakholwayo... Kuba ngazo ezi ndaba zilungileyo, ubulungisa ke bubonakalaliswa, buphuma elukholweni buse elukholweni; Njengoko kubhaliwe kwathiwa: "Ilungisa liya kudla ubomi ngokholo." (KwabaseRoma 1:16-17)

Phawula:

1 【 Obu bulungisa busekelwe elukholweni "oku" IVangeli “Ngamandla kaThixo ukusindisa wonke umntu okholwayo →
" Kholwa yivangeli "Wagwetyelwa, efumana ubulungisa bukaThixo ngesisa! Reference (KwabaseRoma 3:24)
" Kholwa yivangeli “Zizuzeni oonyana bakaThixo! (Gal. 4:5)
" Kholwa yivangeli "Ngenani ebukumkanini bamazulu. Amen! Reference (Marko 1:15) → Obu bulungisa busekelwe elukholweni, kuba " ileta “Amalungisa aya kusindiswa ngayo” ileta "Phila → Yiba nobomi obungunaphakade! Amen;

2 【 ukuze ileta 】→Ukusindiswa nokufumana ubomi obungunaphakade kusekelwe elukholweni; Usindiso nobomi obungunaphakade buxhomekeke " ileta "; Ukufumana uzuko, imivuzo, kunye nezithsaba kusaxhomekeke" ileta Amen! Ngoko, uyaqonda na?
Kunjengokuba iNkosi uYesu yathi kuTomas: “Ngenxa yokuba undibonile, ukholiwe, banoyolo abo bangabonanga baza bakholwa.” ( Yoh.

Ngoko, oku【 IVangeli 】Obu bulungisa buphuma elukholweni buse elukholweni. 1 ) ileta phezu kweleta, ( 2 ) Ubabalo phezu kobabalo, ( 3 ) amandla phezu kwamandla, ( 4 ukusuka ebuqaqawulini kuye ebuqaqawulini.

buza: Sizama njani?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

Omnye: Umzamo【 Kholwa yivangeli 】Sindiswa ube nobomi obungunaphakade

buza: Ubulungisa bukaThixo “ngokholo.” Umntu unokusindiswa njani ngokholo?
impendulo: Ilungisa liya kudla ubomi obuphuma elukholweni. Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

( 1 ) Ukholo luyakhulula esonweni
NguKrestu yedwa" ngenxa “Xa bonke besifa, bonke bayafa, baze abafileyo bakhululwe esonweni—bona amaRoma 6:7; ekubeni bonke besifa, bonke bakhululwa esonweni. Bona eyesi-2 kwabaseKorinte 5:14
( 2 ) Ukholo lukhululekile kuwo umthetho
Ke, ekubeni safayo nje kuwo umthetho owawusibophelela, ngoku sikhululekile kuwo umthetho, ukuze siyikhonze iNkosi ngokobutsha bomoya (umoya: okanye ukuguqulelwa njengoMoya oyiNgcwele) kungekhona ngokwendlela yakudala yomoya. isithethe. ( Roma 7:6 )
( 3 ) Ukholo luyasinda kumandla obumnyama nelabafileyo
Wasihlangula egunyeni lobumnyama, wasifudusela ebukumkanini boNyana wakhe oyintanda, esinayo ngaye inkululeko noxolelo lwezono. ( Kolose 1:13-14 )
njengompostile" uPawulosi "Shumayelani iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso kwiiNtlanga → Oko ndakwamkelayo ndaza ndakudlulisela kuni: Okokuqala, ukuba uKristu wafa ngenxa yezono zethu (wasikhulula kuzo) waza wangcwatywa (wazikhulula izono zethu) ngokutsho kweZibhalo indoda endala) ; yaye wavuswa ngomhla wesithathu ngokutsho kweBhayibhile ( Ugwetyelo, uvuko, ukuzalwa ngokutsha, usindiso, ubomi obungunaphakade ), amen! Imbekiselo ( 1 Korinte 15:3-4 )

Zimbini: Sebenza nzima【 Kholwani kuMoya oyiNgcwele 】Umsebenzi wokuhlaziya uzukile

buza: Ukuzukiswa “kukukholwa” → Ungakholwa njani kwaye uzukiswe njani?
impendulo: Ukuba sidla ubomi ngokoMoya, masihambe nokuhamba kwangokoMoya. ( Galati 5:25 ) →“ ileta “UBawo waseZulwini ukum,” ileta "UKristu kum," ileta “Uzuko malube kuMoya oyiNgcwele usenza umsebenzi ohlaziyayo kum! Amen.

buza: Indlela yokuthembela kumsebenzi woMoya oyiNgcwele?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

(1) Kholelwa ukuba ubhaptizo lusekufeni kukaKristu

Anazi na ukuba thina, sabhaptizelwayo kuKristu Yesu, sabhaptizelwa ekufeni kwakhe? Ngoko ke sangcwatywa naye ngokubhaptizelwa ekufeni, ukuze sihambe sinobomi obutsha, njengokuba uKristu wavuswayo kwabafileyo ngalo uzuko loYise. Ukuba similiselwe kuye ngemfano yokufa kwakhe, somiliselwa kuye nangemfano yokuvuka kwakhe ( Roma 6:3-5 )

(2) Ukholo luyalibeka ecaleni ixhego nokuziphatha kwalo

Musani ukuxokisana, kuba nizihlubile nje umntu omdala, nezenzo zakhe, nambatha lowo umtsha. Umntu omtsha uyahlaziywa ngolwazi abe ngumfanekiselo woMdali wakhe. ( Kolose 3:9-10 )

(3) Ukholo lukhululekile kwiinkanuko neminqweno yendoda endala

Ke kaloku abo ke bakaKristu, inyama bayibethelele emnqamlezweni, kunye neminqweno neenkanuko zayo. ( Galati 5:24 )

(4) Ubuncwane bokholo butyhilwa ngesitya sodongwe

Obu butyebi sibuphethe ngezitya zodongwe, ukuze kubonakale ukuba la mandla makhulu, aphuma kuThixo, angaphumi kuthi. Singqongwe ziintshaba macala onke, kodwa asibambi, kodwa asidaniswa, kodwa asishiywanga phantsi; ( 2 Korinte 4:7-9 )

(5) Kholelwa ukuba ukufa kukaYesu kuyasebenza kuthi kwaye kutyhila ubomi bukaYesu

“Ayisendim ke odla ubomi” uhlala ethwele ukufa kukaYesu kuthi, ukuze ubomi bukaYesu bubonakaliswe kuthi. Kuba thina badla ubomi sisoloko sinikelwa ekufeni ngenxa kaYesu, ukuze ubomi bukaYesu bubonakale emizimbeni yethu enokufa. ( 2 Korinte 4:10-11 )

(6) Ukholo sisitya esixabisekileyo, esifanelekele ukusetyenziswa yiNkosi

Ukuba umntu uthe wazihlambulula entweni ebekekileyo, woba sisitya sembeko, singcwalisiwe, sinokusebenziseka eNkosini, silungiselwe wonke umsebenzi olungileyo. ( 2 Timoti 2:21 )

(7) Wuthabathe umnqamlezo wakho, ushumayele iindaba ezilungileyo zobukumkani bamazulu

Wazibizela ngoko uYesu izihlwele nabafundi bakhe, wathi kubo, Ukuba ubani uthanda ukundilandela, makazincame ngokwakhe, awuthwale umnqamlezo wakhe, andilandele; kuba osukuba ethanda ukuwusindisa umphefumlo wakhe; umphefumlo wakhe ngezantsi) uya kulahlekelwa bubomi bakhe;
Thina ke siphila ngoMoya, masihambe ngokunjalo ngaye uMoya → UMoya ungqinelana nomoya wethu, ukuba singabantwana bakaThixo, kwaye ukuba singabantwana, siziindlalifa, iindlalifa zikaThixo, iindlalifa kunye noKristu. Ukuba siva ubunzima kunye naye, sozukiswa nokuzukiswa kunye naye. Ngoko, uyayiqonda? ( Roma 8:16-17 )

Eyesithathu: Sijonge phambili ekubuyeni kukaKristu kunye nokukhululwa kwemizimba yethu

buza: Indlela yokukholelwa kwintlawulelo yemizimba yethu
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

( 1 ) Kholelwa ekubuyeni kukaKristu, jonga phambili ekubuyeni kukaKristu

1 Iingelosi zingqina ukubuya kukaKristu
“Madoda aseGalili, nimeleni na nijonge ezulwini? Lo Yesu, unyusiweyo kuni, wasiwa ezulwini, uya kubuya kwangolo hlobo nimbone esiya ngalo emazulwini.
2 INkosi uYesu ithembisa ukuza kwakamsinya
“Yabonani, ndiyeza kamsinya! Banoyolo abo bazigcinayo iziprofeto zale ncwadi!
3 Uza phezu kwamafu
“Xa idlule imbandezelo yaloo mihla, ilanga liya kwenziwa mnyama, yaye nenyanga ayiyi kukhanyisa ukukhanya kwayo, neenkwenkwezi ziya kuwa ezulwini, athi namandla ezulu azanyazanyiswe Umntu uya kubonakala ezulwini, kwaye zonke iintsapho zomhlaba ziya kulila zonke ziya kumbona uNyana woMntu esiza esemafini ezulu enamandla nobuqaqawuli obukhulu (Mateyu 24:29-30 kunye neSityhilelo 1:7). .

( 2 ) Kufuneka siyibone imo yakhe yokwenyani

Bazalwana abathandekayo, singabantwana bakaThixo ngoku. Ke into esiya kuba yiyo kwixesha elizayo. ( 1 Yohane 3:2 )

( 3 ) Umoya, umphefumlo kunye nomzimba wethu uyalondolozwa

Wanga ke uThixo woxolo anganingcwalisa niphelelisekile; uthi, ugqibelele owenu umoya nomphefumlo nomzimba, ugcinwe ngokungenakusoleka ekufikeni kweNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu. Uthembekile onibizayo, oya kukwenza oko. ( 1 Tesalonika 5:23-24 )

Phawula:

1 Xa uKrestu ebuyile, siya kudibana neNkosi esibhakabhakeni kwaye siphile neNkosi ngonaphakade - isalathiso (1 Tesalonika 4: 13-17);

2 Xa uKrestu ebonakala, sibonakala kunye naye ebuqaqawulini - Isikhombisi (Kolose 3:3-4);

3 Ukuba iNkosi ibonakala, siya kufana nayo, siyibone njengoko injalo - ( 1 Yohane 3:2 );

4 Imizimba yethu ephantsi “eyenziwe ngodongwe” iyaguqulwa ukuze ifane nomzimba wakhe ozukileyo - Imbekiselo ( Filipi 3:20-21 );

5 Umoya wethu, umphefumlo nomzimba wethu uyalondolozwa - Isalathisi ( 1 Tesalonika 5:23-24 ) → Sizalwa ngoMoya namanzi, sizalwa ngokholo lweendaba ezilungileyo, kubomi bukaThixo obufihlwe noKristu kuThixo, noKristu. Ngelo xesha siya kubonakala sisebuqaqawulini, thina [singumzimba ozelwe nguThixo]. Ngelo xesha siya kububona ubume bakhe bokwenyani, kwaye siya kuzibona nathi (indalo eyinyani ezelwe nguThixo), kwaye umoya wethu, umphefumlo, nomzimba wethu ziya kugcinwa, oko kukuthi, umzimba uya kukhululwa. Amen! Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Ngoko ke, iNkosi uYesu yathi: “Kususela kwixesha likaYohane umBhaptizi kude kube ngoku, ubukumkani bamazulu bungene ngokubulaleka, yaye abo babulalekayo baya kubuzuza. . Imbekiselo ( Mateyu 11:12 )

buza: umzamo" ileta "Bafumana ntoni abantu?"
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

1 umzamo" ileta “Ivangeli liya kukhokelela elusindisweni,
2 umzamo" ileta “Ukuhlaziywa koMoya oyiNgcwele kuyazukiswa;
3 umzamo" ileta “UKristu uyabuya, ejonge phambili ekubuyeni kukaKristu nasekukhululweni kwemizimba yethu umzamo ngena ngesango elimxinwa, qhubela phambili uye kwingqibelelo, silibala okungasemva, solukele phambili, silubaleke ugqatso olubekwe phambi kwethu, sikhangele kuYesu iMbangi noMgqibelelisi wokholo lwethu. umnqamlezo ndiphuthume umvuzo wobizo lwaphezulu lukaThixo kuKristu Yesu → Ikhulu Amaxesha, ewe Amashumi amathandathu Amaxesha, ewe Amashumi amathathu amaxesha. zama ukukholwa →Ukholo phezu kokholo, ubabalo phezu kobabalo, ukomelela phezu kokuqina, uzuko phezu kozuko. Amen! Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

KULUNGILE! Kuvavanyo lwanamhlanje kunye nobudlelwane, kufuneka sikushiye isiqalo semfundiso kaKristu kwaye sizame ukuqhubela phambili kwimfezeko! Kwabiwe apha!

Ukwabelana ngemibhalo yeVangeli, ephefumlelwe nguMoya kaThixo Abasebenzi bakaYesu Krestu, uMzalwana uWang*Yun, uDade uLiu, uDade uZheng, uMzalwana uCen, kunye nabanye osebenza nabo baxhasa kwaye basebenza kunye kumsebenzi wevangeli weBandla likaYesu Krestu. Bashumayela ivangeli kaYesu Krestu, ivangeli evumela ukuba abantu basindiswe, bazukiswe, kwaye imizimba yabo ikhululwe! Amen, amagama abo abhalwe encwadini yobomi! Amen. →Njengoko eyabaseFilipi 4:2-3 isitsho, uPawulos, uTimoti, uWodiya, uSintike, uKlemente nabanye ababesebenza noPawulos, amagama abo akwincwadi yobomi obungamileyo. Amen!

Ndinamagama okugqibela: kufuneka " kholwani eNkosini “Yomelelani eNkosini, nasekomeleleni kwayo amandla ayo amakhulu. . . . ngokomoya "Isipili, sokumelana notshaba ngemini yembandezelo, kwaye nifeze yonke into, nisenako ukuma. Ngoko yimani niqinile!"

articles.title: Ukushiya Isiqalo seMfundiso kaKrestu (uMfundiso 7)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade kwintsapho kaThixo! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile kuYohane isahluko 17 indinyana 14 size sifunde kunye: Mna ndibanike ilizwi lakho. Ke ihlabathi libathiyile, ngokuba bengengabo abehlabathi, njengokuba nam ndingenguye owehlabathi .

Namhlanje siza kuqhubeka nokufunda, ubudlelwane kunye nokwabelana " Ukushiya iSiqalo seMfundiso kaKrestu "Hayi. 7 Thetha kwaye uthandaze: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Ibandla “lomfazi onesidima” lithumela abasebenzi – ngelizwi lenyaniso abalibhalayo baze balithethe ezandleni zabo, eliziindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso nozuko lwethu. Ukutya kuziswa kude esibhakabhakeni, yaye kunikezelwa kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukuze kusenze umntu omtsha, umntu wokomoya, umntu wokomoya! Yiba ngumntu omtsha imihla ngemihla, ukhulela kwisimo esipheleleyo sikaKrestu! Amen. Thandaza ukuba iNkosi uYesu iqhubeke nokukhanyisela amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuba siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni. Kufuneka siyishiye isiqalo seemfundiso zikaKristu: siqonde indlela yokulishiya ihlabathi kwaye singene ebuqaqawulini! Siphe ubabalo phezu kobabalo, ukomelela phezu kokuqina, uzuko phezu kozuko .

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Ngegama leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

(1) Ihlabathi ladalwa ngamazwi kaThixo

UThixo, lowo wayethetha nookhokho bethu kudala ngabo abaprofeti izihlandlo ezininzi, nangeendlela ezininzi, uthethe nathi kule mihla yokugqibela ngoNyana, ammise njengendlalifa yezinto zonke, awadala ngaye izulu lonke. ( Hebhere 1:1-2 )
Ngokholo siyaqonda ukuba indalo le yonke yadalwa ngelizwi likaThixo. ( Hebhere 11:3 )

buza: Ngaba ihlabathi ladalwa “ngelizwi likaThixo”?
impendulo: UThixo wadala izulu nomhlaba ngeentsuku ezintandathu waza waphumla ngomhla wesixhenxe! Ngokuba wathi Akubakho, kwathi, ekuyaleleni Kwakhe, kwaqinisekiswa. ( INdumiso 33:9 )

1 Wathi ngomhla wokuqala uThixo, Makubekho ukukhanya. Kwabakho ke ukukhanya. ( Genesis 1:3 )
2 Wathi ngomhla wesibini uThixo, Makubekho isithuba phakathi kwamanzi, ukwahlula ongaphezulu kuphantsi.
3 Wathi uThixo ngomhla wesithathu, Amanzi angaphantsi kwezulu makahlanganiselwe ndaweni-nye, kubonakale okomileyo. Wathi uThixo okomileyo ngumhlaba, wathi intlanganisela yamanzi lulwandle. Wabona uThixo ukuba kulungile. Wathi uThixo, Umhlaba mawuphume uhlaza, nemifuno evelisa imbewu, nemithi eyenza iziqhamo, embewu ikuyo, ngohlobo lwayo. ( Genesis 1:9-11 )
4 Ngosuku lwesine wathi uThixo, Makubekho izikhanyiso esibhakabhakeni, zokucalula imini kubusuku, zibe ngumqondiso wamaxesha, neentsuku, neminyaka; ” Kwaye kwenziwa. Ngoko uThixo wadala izikhanyiso ezikhulu ezibini, esona sikhulu isikhanyiso ukuba silawule imini, nesikhanyiso esincinane ukuba silawule ubusuku (Genesis 1:14-16)
5 Ngosuku lwesihlanu, wathi uThixo, “Amanzi mawabe nezidalwa eziphilileyo, ziphaphazele iintaka emhlabeni nasesibhakabhakeni.
6 Kwathi ngomhla wesithandathu, umhlaba mawuphume imiphefumlo ephilileyo ngohlobo lwayo: izinto ezizitho zine, nezinambuzane, nezinto eziphilileyo ngohlobo lwazo. Wathi uThixo, Masenze umntu ngokomfanekiselo wethu ngokufana nathi, babe nobukhosi ezintlanzini zolwandle, nasezintakeni zezulu, nasezintweni ezizitho zine emhlabeni, naphezu komhlaba wonke, nasehlabathini lonke. yonke izinambuzane ezinambuzelayo emhlabeni ” Wamdala ke uThixo umntu ngokomfanekiselo wakhe; ( Genesis 1:24, 26-27 )
7 Ngosuku lwesixhenxe, yonke into esezulwini nasemhlabeni yagqitywa. Ngosuku lwesixhenxe, umsebenzi kaThixo ekudaleni indalo wagqitywa, ngoko waphumla kuwo wonke umsebenzi Wakhe ngomhla wesixhenxe. ( Genesis 2:1-2 )

(2) Isono sangena ehlabathini ngomntu omnye, uAdam, kwaza ukufa kwaphuma esonweni, ngoko ukufa kwabafikela bonke abantu.

buza: " abantu "Kutheni ufile?
impendulo: " fa ” Ngoko ke kwabakho ukufa kubo bonke

buza: " wonke umntu Isono sivela phi?

impendulo: " ulwaphulo-mthetho “Kuphume umntu omnye ongene ehlabathini, baza bonke bona.

buza: Kwakutheni ukuze uAdam abe netyala?
impendulo: ngokuba" umthetho ", ukwaphula umthetho, ukwaphula umthetho, sisono → Nabani na owaphula umthetho; owaphula umthetho sisono. Imbekiselo (1 Yohane 3:4) → Nabani na owenza isono ngaphandle komthetho naye uya kwaphula umthetho. Umthetho uyatshabalala. Othe wona ephantsi komthetho, uya kugwetywa ngokomthetho (KwabaseRoma 2:12). Phawula: Abo bangenamthetho abasayi kugwetywa ngokomthetho, abo bawaphulayo umthetho baya kugwetywa, bagwetywe, batshatyalaliswe ngokomthetho; Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

buza: Umthetho ka-Adam" umyalelo "Ingaba yin?"
impendulo: Uze ungawudli kumthi wokwazi okulungileyo nokubi → UYehova uThixo wamwisela umthetho, esithi, Kuwo nawuphi na umthi womyezo ungawudla, kodwa wona umthi wokwazi okulungileyo nokubi uze ungawudli. , kuba mhlana uthe wawudla, uya kufa!” ( Genesis 2:16-17 )

buza: Ngubani owahenda uEva noAdam ukuba bone ngokuchasene nomthetho?
impendulo: " inyoka “Umtyholi wahenda—uEva noAdam bona.
Kunjengokuba kanye isono sangena ehlabathini ngomntu omnye, uAdam, ukufa kwaphuma esonweni, ngoko ke ukufa kwabafikela bonke abantu ngenxa yokuba bonke bonayo. ( Roma 5:12 )

Phawula: Wona umntu wamnye, wazisa isono kubo bonke, bonke bona, uAdam waqalekiswa ngumthetho, kwaye bonke baqalekiswa ngomthetho Isono sangena ehlabathini ngomntu omnye, ihlabathi laqalekiswa, umhlaba waqalekiswa UAdam Ngenxa yokuba umhlaba uqalekisiwe, awusayi kuphinda uvelise imithana enameva neenkunzane. "Uluntu luphantsi kwesiqalekiso somthetho" → Uluntu kuya kufuneka lusebenze nzima kwaye lubile emhlabeni ukuze luziphilise de kube sekufeni kwaye lude lubuyele eluthulini. ( Genesis 3:17-19 )

(3) Ihlabathi lonakele phambi koThixo

1 UKayin wambulala umntakwabo uAbheli → UKayin wayethetha nomntakwabo uAbheli; Wesuka uKayin wambetha uAbheli umninawa wakhe, wambulala. ( Genesis 4:8 )

2 Ihlabathi lonakele phambi koThixo;

(1) Izikhukula zalitshabalalisa ihlabathi
Wabona uYehova ukuba ububi bomntu bandile kakhulu ehlabathini, nokuba iingcamango zengcinga zakhe kubububi bodwa imihla yonke...Ihlabathi lalonakele ebusweni bukaThixo, ihlabathi lalizele lugonyamelo. UThixo walikhangela ihlabathi, walibona ukuba lonakele; Wathi uThixo kuNowa: “Isiphelo senyama yonke sifikile phambi kwam; ngokuba ihlabathi lizele lugonyamelo lwabo; ndiya kubatshabalalisa ke, wona umhlaba kunye watshabalalisa umhlaba, watshabalalisa yonke into ekhoyo emhlabeni, enenyama nomoya;
(2) Ekupheleni kwehlabathi, liya kutshiswa, linyibilike
Balibala ngabom ukuba ukususela kumaxesha amandulo, amazulu ayekho ngomyalelo kaThixo, yaye umhlaba wavela waza waboleka amanzi. Ngoko ke, ihlabathi ngelo xesha latshatyalaliswa ngamanzi. Ke lona izulu langoku, nehlabathi langoku, lisemi ngelo xesha, kude kube yimini ekuya kugwetywa ngayo abangahloneli Thixo, batshiswe ngomlilo. …Kodwa imini yeNkosi iya kuza njengesela. Ngaloo mini, amazulu aya kudlula ngengxolo enkulu, yaye zonke izinto ezibonakalayo ziya kutshiswa ngomlilo, nomhlaba nayo yonke into ekuwo itshiswe ngomlilo. (Funda eyesi-2 kaPetros 3:5-7, 10.)

(4) Asingabo abehlabathi

1 Abathe bazalwa ngokutsha ababangabo abehlabathi

Mna ndibanike ilizwi lakho. Ke ihlabathi libathiyile, ngokuba bengengabo abehlabathi, njengokuba nam ndingenguye owehlabathi. ( Yohane 17:14 )
buza: Kuthetha ukuthini ukuba ngowehlabathi?
impendulo: Ihlabathi liphuma ehlabathini, uthuli luphuma ehlabathini. UAdam, obenziwe ngothuli, ngowasehlabathini; ke yona inyama yethu, ezelwe nguAdam, yephuma ehlabathini.

buza: Ngubani na ongenguye owehlabathi?
impendulo: " ukuzalwa ngokutsha "Abantu abangengabo abehlabathi!"

1 Nizelwe ngamanzi nanguMoya;
2 Nizelwe inyaniso yeendaba ezilungileyo ,
3 Nizelwe nguThixo!

Oko kuzelwe nguMoya kungumoya. Imbekiselo ( Yohane 3:6 ) → Umntu Womoya! Ezomoya, zasezulwini, ezingokobuthixo; ukuzalwa ngokutsha “Abo bafileyo àbangabo abehlabathi.
Okuzelwe yinyama kuyinyama. Ngaba abo bazalwe kumzimba wenyama baya kufa? uya kufa. Yonke into ezelwe yinyama, yonke into eyenziwe ngothuli, yonke into esehlabathini iya kutshiswa itshiswe itshabalale;
Kuphela " umoya "krwada" umntu womoya "Anisayi kufa! → Njengoko iNkosi uYesu yathi: "Bonke abadla ubomi bekholwa kum abasayi kufa naphakade. Uyakukholelwa oku? “Imbekiselo ( Yohane 11:26 ), Abo baphila baze bakholelwe kuYesu” umzimba wenyama "Ngaba uya kufa? Uya kufa, akunjalo! UYesu wamvusa uLazaro owayengcwatywe iintsuku ezine engcwabeni. Ngaba umzimba wakhe wenyama uya kufa? Ngaba uya konakala? Uya kubola, afe aze abuyele eluthulini. Kunjalo! → Kuphela Yintoni UThixo uvusile emvusileni ukonakala (Izenzo 13:37). ozelwe nguThixo , xa ingaboni kubola, ngaba ibhekisa kuloo mntu? Kuthetha ukuzalwa kwakhona" umntu womoya Okanye umntu wenyama ngothuli, ozelwe nguThixo? umntu womoya →UYesu wathetha oku ethetha ukuba ukuzalwa ngokutsha ye" umntu womoya Ungaze ufe! Uyayiqonda le nto?

2 UThixo uya kuzidiliza iintente zethu emhlabeni

buza: Kuthetha ukuthini ukudiliza iintente emhlabeni?
impendulo: " intente emhlabeni ” ibhekisela kwinyama eyenziwe ngothuli lwendoda endala → Ukufa kukaYesu kuyasebenza kuthi ukuze kutshatyalaliswe lo mzimba wokufa, umzimba owohlokayo ngokuthe ngcembe, ukuze ubomi bukaYesu bukhule bubonakale kuthi inkqubo yokutshabalalisa inyama ibuhlungu kodwa intliziyo iyavuya Ngoko ke singethi ntliziyo, nakuba ngaphandle sisonakala, kanti ngaphakathi siyahlaziyeka imihla ngemihla lo mhlaba ukuba uyatshatyalaliswa, uya kubuyiselwa Indlu leyo ayenzileyo uThixo, akwenziwanga ngazandla, isemazulwini ngonaphakade; kulo mnquba, kungengakuthanda ukukuhlutha oku, kodwa ukwambatha lowo, ukuze oku kufayo kuginywe bubomi ( 2 Korinte 4:16 . 5:1-4;

3 Ukuphuma ehlabathini kuse ebuqaqawulini

Kuba nafayo, baye ubomi benu bufihlakele ndawonye noKristu kuye uThixo. Xa athe wabonakalaliswa uKristu, obubomi bethu, nani niya kubonakala, ninaye ebuqaqawulini. ( Kolose 3:3-4 )

buza: Ithi apha → Kuba "usele ufile", ngaba sele sifile ngokwenene? Undibona njani ndisaphila?
impendulo: Awusaphili ngoku, ufile! wena" Umntu omtsha “Ubomi bakho bufihliwe noKristu kuye uThixo. bona “Umzimba wesono wafa kunye noKristu, wafa → Kuba amehlo ethu asiwabhekise kwizinto ezibonwayo, sixunela kwezingabonwayo; kuba ezibonwayo zezomzuzwana, ke ezingabonwayo. ngonaphakade.” ( 2 Korinte Isahluko 4, indinyana 18 )

Phawula: Uthini ngoku bona “Umzimba womntu ngowexeshana, lo mzimba unesono uye uwohloka ngokuthe ngcembe uya kubuyela eluthulini yaye ufile emehlweni kaThixo. khangela ndifile, andisekho; Andiboni “Umntu omtsha owenziwe ngokutsha ufihlwe noKristu kuye uThixo. UKrestu ububomi bethu. Xa uKristu ebuya kwakhona, xa ebonakala! (Engabonakali Umntu omtsha Kulapho ke uya kuthi ubone, imbonakalo yokwenene kaKristu iya kuvela, ize imbonakalo yakho yokwenyani ivele) , nani niya kubonakala kunye naye ebuqaqawulini. Amen! Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

KULUNGILE! Namhlanje siphononongile, sabelana, kwaye sabelane apha kuhlelo olulandelayo: Ukuqala Kokushiya Imfundiso KaKrestu, Isifundo 8

Ukwabelana ngemibhalo yeVangeli, ephefumlelwe nguMoya kaThixo Abasebenzi bakaYesu Krestu, uMzalwana uWang*Yun, uDade uLiu, uDade uZheng, uMzalwana uCen, kunye nabanye osebenza nabo baxhasa kwaye basebenza kunye kumsebenzi wevangeli weBandla likaYesu Krestu. Bashumayela ivangeli kaYesu Krestu, ivangeli evumela ukuba abantu basindiswe, bazukiswe, kwaye imizimba yabo ikhululwe! Amen, amagama abo abhalwe encwadini yobomi! Ukhunjulwe yiNkosi. Amen!

articles.title: Ukushiya Isiqalo seMfundiso kaKrestu (uMfundiso 6)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade kwintsapho kaThixo! Amen

Makhe sityhile eBhayibhileni, uYohane Isahluko 1, indinyana 17: Ubabalo nenyaniso wasinika ngoYesu Kristu .

Namhlanje siza kuqhubeka nokufunda, ubudlelwane kunye nokwabelana " Ukushiya iSiqalo seMfundiso kaKrestu "Hayi. 6 Thetha kwaye wenze umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Ibandla “lomfazi onesidima” lithumela abasebenzi – ngelizwi lenyaniso abalibhalayo baze balithethe ezandleni zabo, eliziindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso nozuko lwethu. Ukutya kuziswa kude esibhakabhakeni, yaye kunikezelwa kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukuze kusenze umntu omtsha, umntu wokomoya, umntu wokomoya! Ukuba ngumntu omtsha imihla ngemihla! Amen. Thandaza ukuba iNkosi uYesu iqhubeke nokukhanyisela amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuba siqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zokomoya kwaye siqonde isiqalo semfundiso ekufuneka simshiye uKristu: Ukushiya iTestamente eNdala kunye nokungena kwiTestamente eNtsha ;

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

(1) ITestamente Endala

Ukususela kwiGenesis... uMalaki → ITestamente Endala

1 Umthetho ka-Adam

Umyezo wase-Edeni: Umthetho ka-Adam→Umyalelo othi “Uze ungadli” umnqophiso
UYehova uThixo wamyalela wathi: “Ungatya kuwo nawuphi na umthi womyezo, kodwa uze ungadli kuwo umthi wokwazi okulungileyo nokubi, kuba mhla uthe wadla kuwo uya kufa ngokuqinisekileyo.” 2 Isahluko 16) -17 amaqhina)

2 Umthetho kaMoses

INtaba yeSinayi (iNtaba yeHorebhe) uThixo wenza umnqophiso namaSirayeli
Wawabizela ndawonye uMoses onke amaSirayeli, wathi kuwo, Yiphulaphuleni imimiselo namasiko, maSirayeli, endinimisela wona namhla, ukuba niwafunde, niwenze: uYehova uThixo wethu wenza umnqophiso nathi entabeni yeHorebhe. . Lo mnqophiso awunguye Owasekwa noobawo bethu wasekwa kunye nathi baphilayo apha namhlanje (Duteronomi 5:1-3).

buza: Wawuquka ntoni uMthetho kaMoses?
impendulo: Imiyalelo, imimiselo, imimiselo, imithetho, njl.

1 umyalelo : IMithetho Elishumi—Imbekiselo ( Eksodus 20:1-17 )
2 imithetho : Imimiselo emiselwe ngumthetho, njengemimiselo yamadini anyukayo, neminikelo yokudla, nemibingelelo yoxolo, neyesono, neyetyala, neyomnikelo otshangatshangiswayo ... njl. Jonga iLevitikus neNumeri 31:21
3 Imithetho nemithetho: Ukuphunyezwa nokusetyenziswa kwemithetho nemimiselo, njengemimiselo yokwakha ingcwele, ityeya yomnqophiso, itafile yezonka zokubonisa, izibane, amalengalenga namalengalenga, izibingelelo, izambatho zababingeleli, njl. → ( 1 Kumkani 2:3 ) Qwalasela nomyalelo kaYehova uThixo wakho, uhambe ngendlela yakhe, njengoko kubhaliweyo emyalelweni kaMoses, uyigcine imimiselo yakhe, nemithetho, namasiko, nezingqino zakhe. Ngaloo ndlela, kungakhathaliseki ukuba wenza ntoni na, kungakhathaliseki apho uya khona, uya kuphumelela.

(2) ITestamente Entsha

uMateyu……………Isityhilelo→ITestamente Entsha

umthetho lanikwa ngoMoses; ubabalo nenyaniso Zonke zivela kuYesu Kristu. Imbekiselo ( Yohane 1:17 )

1 ITestamente eNdala: Umthetho wanikelwa ngoMoses
2 ITestamente eNtsha: Zombini ubabalo nenyaniso ziphuma kuYesu Krestu ITestamente eNtsha ishumayela ubabalo nenyaniso kaYesu Krestu, hayi umthetho. Kutheni le nto “iTestamente Entsha” ingashumayeli iMithetho eliShumi, imimiselo, imimiselo nemithetho yeTestamente eNdala? Siza kuthetha ngayo ngezantsi.

buza: Shumayela ubabalo lukaYesu Kristu! Yintoni ubabalo?
impendulo: Abo bakholelwa kuYesu bagwetyelwa ngokukhululekileyo baze bafumane ubomi obungunaphakade simahla → oku kubizwa ngokuba lubabalo! Imbekiselo ( Roma 3:24-26 )
Abo basebenzayo bafumana umvuzo kungekhona njengesipho, kodwa njengomvuzo → Ukuba uwugcina umthetho wedwa, ngaba uyasebenza? Ukuba uyawugcina umthetho, wowufumana mni na umvuzo? Inkululeko kumgwebo nesiqalekiso somthetho → Nabani na osekelwe ekulandeleni umthetho uqalekisiwe. Ukuba uyawugcina umthetho uze uwenze, “ngaba unokuwugcina? Ukuba awunako, wowufumana wuphi umvuzo? → Umvuzo owufumanayo usisiqalekiso.” ( Galati 3:10-11 ) Ngaba uyakuqonda oku? ?
Ke kulowo ungenzi misebenzi, ekholwa kuThixo, umgwebelayo lowo ungahloneli Thixo, ukholo lwakhe luya kubalelwa ebulungiseni. Phawula: " Kuphela "Kuthetha ngokulula, ukuthembela kuphela elukholweni, kholwa kuphela →" Ukugwetyelwa ngokholo → Lo thixo ngamalungisa Isekelwe elukholweni kwaye ikhokelela elukholweni! UThixo umgwebela lowo ungahloneli Thixo, nokholo lwakhe lubalelwa ebulungiseni. Ngoko, uyayiqonda? Imbekiselo ( Roma 4:4-5 ). Ubabalo luphuma elukholweni; Ngoko ke, kungobabalo, akuphumi misebenzini; Imbekiselo ( Roma 11:6 )

buza: Yintoni inyaniso?

impendulo: UYesu uyinyaniso ! " inyaniso ” Ayizukutshintsha, ingunaphakade → uMoya oyiNgcwele yinyaniso, UYesu yinyaniso, uthixo utata Yinyaniso! UYesu wathi: “Ndim indlela, ndim inyaniso, ndim ubomi; akukho namnye uzayo kuBawo, engezi ngam.” ( Yohane 14:6 ) Ngaba uyaqonda?

(3) ITestamente eNdala yasebenzisa iinkomo neegusha Igazi Yenza umnqophiso

Ngoko ke, umnqophiso wokuqala awenziwanga ngaphandle kwegazi, kuba xa uMoses wayebawisele umthetho abantu ngokomthetho, wathabatha ingubo ebomvu, nehisope, wazifefa iincwadi ngegazi lamathole neleebhokhwe, namanzi okufefa kubo bonke abantu, esithi, Eli gazi lisisiqinisekiso somnqophiso kaThixo nani.

(4) ITestamente Entsha isebenzisa kaKristu Igazi Yenza umnqophiso

INkosi uYesu ngobusuku eyanikelwa ngayo yathatha isonka, yaza yakuba ibulele, yasiqhekeza, yathi: “Ngumzimba wam lo, onikelwa ngenxa yenu. Imiqulu: yaphukile), kufuneka wenze oku ukurekhoda Ndikhumbuleni.” Emva kwesidlo, wathabatha nendebe, waza wathi: “Le ndebe ingumnqophiso omtsha osegazini lam, kwenzeleni oku ukundikhumbula.” Ngalo lonke ixesha sisidla eso sonka size siyisele le ndebe , sivakalisa ukufa kweNkosi ide ifike. ( 1 Korinte 11:23-26 )

buza: Umnqophiso omtsha owamiselwa nguYesu ngegazi lakhe! →Ukundikhumbula! Nantsi" khumbula "Ngaba luphawu njengesikhumbuzo? Hayi.
impendulo: " khumbula "Khumbula nje," funda "Khumbulani kwaye nikhumbule! → Nanini na nitya kwaye nisele umzimba negazi leNkosi," khumbula "khumbula, cinga Utsho uYehova. Yathini iNkosi uYesu kuthi? → 1 UYesu sisonka sobomi, 2 Ukutya nokusela inyama negazi leNkosi kuya kukhokelela kubomi obungunaphakade, kwaye siya kuvuswa ngomhla wokugqibela, oko kukuthi, umzimba uya kukhululwa → UYesu wathi: “Inene, inene, ndithi kuni, ukuba anithanga nivuswe ngomhla wokugqibela. Lowo uyidlayo eyam inyama, alisele elam igazi, mna ndiya kumvusa ekufeni ngomhla wokugqibela. Inyama yam ikukudla, inyaniso; negazi lam liselo, lihleli kum, nam ndihleli kuye. Imbekiselo ( Yohane 6:48.53-56 ) kunye neNgcaciso
( Yohane 14:26 ) Kodwa uMthetheleli, uMoya oyiNgcwele, lowo uBawo aya kumthumela egameni lam, yena uya kunifundisa zonke izinto yaye uya kunifundisa zonke izinto. bize wena cinga yonke into endiyithethileyo kuwe . Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

(5) Iinkomo neegusha zeTestamente eNdala Igazi Awunakusisusa isono

buza: Ngaba igazi leenkomo nelegusha lingazisusa izono?
impendulo: Isono asinakuze sishenxiswe, isono asinakuze sishenxiswe.
La madini ke ayesisikhumbuzo sesono minyaka le; … Wonke umbingeleli omi imihla ngemihla ekhonza uThixo, enikela idini elinye ngokuphindaphindiweyo, akanakuze asisuse isono. ( Hebhere 10:3-4, 11 )

(6) likaKristu kwiTestamente eNtsha Igazi Kuphela Kanye Uhlamba izono zabantu kwaye ususa izono zabantu

buza: Ngaba igazi likaYesu Krestu lizisusa izono kube kanye?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

1 UYesu wasebenzisa eyakhe Igazi , Kuphela" Kanye “Ngenani kwiNdawo Engcwele ukuze nicamagushelwe ngonaphakade.”—Hebhere 9:12
2 Ngoba yena kuphela" Kanye “Zinikele, yaye kuya kwenzeka.”— Hebhere 7:27
3 Ngoku kubonakala kwimihla yokugqibela" Kanye “, uzinikele ukuba ube lidini lokucamagushela isono.”— Hebhere 9:26
4 Kuba uKristu" Kanye “Inikelwe ukuba ithwale izono zabaninzi.”— Hebhere 9:28
5 NgoYesu Kristu kuphela" Kanye “Awunikele umzimba wakhe ukuba ungcwaliswe.”—Hebhere 10:10
6 UKrestu wanikela " Kanye “Idini lezono elingunaphakade lihleli ngasekunene kukaThixo wam.”— Hebhere 10:11
7 Ngokuba yena" Kanye “Amadini abenza abo bangcwalisiweyo bagqibelele ngonaphakade.”— Hebhere 10:14

Phawula: Isifundo seBhayibhile ngasentla Sixhengxe umntu ngamnye" Kanye ","" Sixhengxe "Igqibelele okanye akunjalo? Gqibezela! → UYesu wasebenzisa eyakhe Igazi , Kuphela" Kanye Ngenani engcweleni, nibahlambulula abantu ezonweni zabo, nigqibezele ucamagushelo olungunaphakade, nibenza bagqibelele abangcwalisiweyo ngonaphakade.

buza: ngoku u ileta kaYesu Igazi " Kanye "Ukucoca izono zabantu → Kutheni ndisoloko ndiziva ndinetyala? Ndimele ndenze ntoni xa ndonile?"
impendulo: Kutheni uziva unetyala? Kungenxa yokuba abo badala bobuxoki, abefundisi bobuxoki, nabashumayeli bobuxoki abaluqondi usindiso lukaKristu kwaye abaluqondi kakuhle “usindiso” lukaKristu. igazi elixabisekileyo "Njengokuba igazi leenkomo nelegusha kwiTestamente eNdala lihlamba izono, ndinifundisa → igazi leenkomo nelegusha alinakuze lisuse izono, ngoko uhlala uziva unetyala yonke imihla, uvume izono zakho kwaye uguquke yonke imihla, uguquke imisebenzi yakho efileyo, kwaye uthandazela inceba yakhe yonke imihla. Igazi Hlamba izono, ucime izono. Hlamba namhlanje, hlamba ngomso, hlamba usuku olulandelayo → "umnqophiso wokungcwalisa iNkosi uYesu" igazi elinqabileyo “Njengesiqhelo, ngokwenza oku, nidela uMoya oyiNgcwele wobabalo?

Phawula: IBhayibhile ibhala ukuba abo bangcwalisiweyo baya kufezeka ngonaphakade (KumaHebhere 10:14); amaqhinga okuqhatha abantu. ukubhida ngabom Uya kuthatha iNkosi uYesu' igazi elixabisekileyo "Yiphathe njengesiqhelo. Uyeva?"

buza: Ndimele ndenze ntoni xa ndenze ulwaphulo-mthetho?
impendulo: Xa ukholelwa kuYesu, awusekho phantsi komthetho, kodwa uphantsi kobabalo → KuKristu ukhululwe emthethweni, kwaye akusekho mthetho ukugxekayo. Ekubeni kungekho mthetho, isono asibalelwa ekuthini sisono. Kuba, kungekho mthetho, isono sifile, yaye asisisono. Uyaqonda? Isalathiso (Hebhere 10:17-18, Roma 5:13, Roma 7:8)→Imbekiselo” uPawulosi "Indlela yokusifundisa ukujongana nezikreqo zenyama →" Inyama nomoya emfazweni “Ubuthiye ubomi obunesono, ugcine ubomi obutsha, use ebomini obungunaphakade ulwaphulo-mthetho Kwakhona xa khangela yena ngokwakhe fa kuye uThixo ngoKristu Yesu, khangela yena ngokwakhe phila ye. Imbekiselo ( Roma 6:11 ), ngaba uyakuqonda oku?

(7) Umthetho weTestamente eNdala usisithunzi sezinto ezilungileyo ezizayo

1 Umthetho wawusisithunzi nje sezinto ezilungileyo eziza kubakho (KumaHebhere 10:1).
2 Imithetho nemimiselo zisisithunzi sezinto ezizayo (Kolose 2:16-17).
3 UAdam wayengumfuziselo wendoda eyayiza kuza— ( Roma 5:14 )

(8) Umfanekiso wokwenene womthetho weTestamente eNtsha nguKristu

buza: Ukuba ke umthetho usisithunzi nje sento elungileyo, unjani na?
impendulo: " into yokuqala "Kukhangeleka ngokwenene UKrestu ! Oko umzimba Kodwa kunjalo UKrestu , esemthethweni Shwankathela yiyo i UKrestu ! UAdam ngumzekelo, isithunzi, umfanekiso → UKristu ungumfanekiso kanye wobunjani bukaThixo!

1 UAdam ungumzekelo, kwaye uAdam wokugqibela “uYesu” ngumfanekiso wokwenene;
2 Umthetho usisithunzi nje sento elungileyo, enguKristu;
3 Imithetho nemimiselo zisisithunzi nje sezinto ezizayo, imbonakalo ke inguKristu;

Ubulungisa obufunwa ngumthetho luthando! Owona mthetho mkhulu womthetho kukuthanda uThixo nokuthanda ummelwane njengoko uzithanda ngako. UYesu wamthanda uYise, wamthanda uThixo, wamthanda ummelwane wakho njengoko uzithanda ngako Sithande amalungu omzimba wakhe njengoko uzithanda wena. Ngoko ke, isishwankathelo somthetho nguKrestu, kwaye umfanekiso oyinyaniso womthetho nguKrestu! Ngoko, uyayiqonda? Imbekiselo ( Roma 10:4, Mateyu 22:37-40 )

(9) Imithetho yeTestamente eNdala yayibhalwe kumacwecwe amatye

IEKSODUS 24:12 Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Nyuka uze kum entabeni, uhlale apha, ndikunike amacwecwe amatye, umyalelo wam nomthetho wam, endiwubhalileyo, ukuze ubafundise abantu. ."

(10) Imithetho yeTestamente eNtsha ibhalwe kumacwecwe entliziyo

“Nguwo lo umnqophiso endiya kuwenza nabo emva kwaloo mihla, itsho iNkosi: Ndiya kuyibhala imithetho yam ezintliziyweni zabo, ndize ndiyibeke phakathi kwabo” ( Hebhere 10:16 )

buza: “KwiTestamente Entsha” uThixo ubhala “umthetho” ezintliziyweni zethu aze awubeke kuthi → Ngaba oku asikokugcina umthetho?
impendulo: Isishwankathelo somthetho nguKristu, kwaye umfanekiso wenene womthetho nguKristu! UThixo ubhala umthetho ezintliziyweni zethu aze awubeke kuthi → Ubeka [uKristu] kuthi.

(1) UKristu uwuzalisekisile umthetho waza wawugcina umthetho → ndiwufezile umthetho ndaza ndawugcina umthetho ndingawaphulanga namnye.
(2) UKristu akanasono kwaye akanakona → Mna, ozelwe nguThixo, ilizwi likaKristu, uMoya oyiNgcwele namanzi, andinasono kwaye andinakona. Nabani na ozelwe nguThixo soze one (1 Yohane 3:9 kunye 5:18)

1 Ndiva iLizwi, ndiyakholwa, kwaye ndiligcina iLizwi → " indlela “NguThixo. UYesu Kristu nguThixo! Amen
2 ndiyagcina" indlela ", egcinwe ngokuqinileyo nguMoya oyiNgcwele" indlela elungileyo " ,yiyo i Gcina uKristu, gcina uThixo, gcina iLizwi ! Amen
3 Isishwankathelo somthetho nguKristu, kwaye umfanekiso oyinyaniso womthetho nguKristu → kuKristu I gcina uKristu, gcina Tao, kunjalo Gcina ukhuselekile Ndifumene umthetho. Amen! Akukho nalinye inqaku lomthetho elinokupheliswa, kwaye zonke kufuneka zizaliseke → Sisebenzisa " ileta "Indlela yeNkosi, sebenzisa" ileta "Ukugcina umthetho, ungaphuli umgca omnye, yonke into iya kuzaliseka. Amen!

Sisebenzisa" ileta "Umthetho weNkosi, umthetho nemithetho ayinzima ukuyigcina, ayinzima! Akunjalo? → Siyamthanda uThixo xa sigcina imiyalelo yakhe, kwaye imiyalelo yakhe ayinzima ukuyigcina. ( 1 Yohane 5 ) Isahluko 3 . , uyaqonda?
Ukuba uyahamba" gcina "Ibhalwe kwiiTablets" amazwi Ngaba kunzima ukuwugcina Kunzima kakhulu ukuwugcina kuba incwadi ibulala abantu isiqalekiso somthetho, kuba umthetho wobhalo sisithunzi. Isithunzi "Ayinanto, kwaye awukwazi ukuyibamba okanye ukuyibamba. Uyayiqonda?"

(11) Umnqophiso owandulelayo mdala, uyaluphala yaye uwohloka, yaye kungekudala uya kunyamalala.

Ngoku sithetha ngomnqophiso omtsha, umnqophiso wokuqala uya kuba mdala; Imbekiselo ( Hebhere 8:13 )

(12) UKristu wazisebenzisela ukwenza umnqophiso ongunaphakade Igazi Yenza umnqophiso omtsha kunye nathi

Ukuba bekungekho ziphoso kumnqophiso wokuqala, bekungayi kubakho indawo yokujonga umnqophiso wamva. ( Hebhere 8:7 )
Ke kuye uThixo woxolo, owayivusayo kwabafileyo iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, uMalusi omkhulu wezimvu, ngegazi lomnqophiso ongunaphakade (Hebhere 13:20)

buza: Umnqophiso wokuqala ngumnqophiso omdala, ngoko ubizwa ngokuba yiTestamente Endala → Ziziphi iziphene?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

1 Umnqophiso wokuqala usisithunzi, uAdam uyisithunzi, ihlabathi lingumfanekiselo, kwaye zonke izithunzi kufuneka zidlule. Ekuphelisweni kwephakade eli, izinto ziya kwaluphala, zimke.
2 Umthetho wokuqala womnqophiso wawubuthathaka kwaye ungenamsebenzi kwisikolo samabanga aphantsi-- (Galati 4: 9)
3 Imithetho nezimiselo zomnqophiso wokuqala zazingenamandla, zingenamsebenzi, akwazuza nto.”— Hebhere 7:18-19 .
Akazange athi kuphela " ITestamente Entsha 》Ngokubhekisele kumnqophiso omdala, osele umdala nowohlokayo, sele uza kubhangiswa, iTestamente Endala isisithunzi, sisikolo samabanga aphantsi esibuthathaka, esingenamsebenzi, esingaphumeleliyo → UYesu Kristu wangenisa ithemba elilunge ngakumbi → UYesu Kristu. wazisebenzisa ngonaphakade Igazi lomnqophiso limisela umnqophiso omtsha kunye nathi! Amen.

KULUNGILE! Namhlanje siphononongile, sabelana, kwaye sabelane apha kuhlelo olulandelayo: Ukuqala Kokushiya Imfundiso KaKrestu, Isifundo sesi-7

Ukwabelana ngemibhalo yevangeli, ephefumlelwe nguMoya kaThixo, abasebenzi bakaYesu Krestu: UMzalwana uWang*yun, uDade uLiu, uDade uZheng, uMzalwana uCen - kunye nabanye abasebenzi, baxhasa kwaye basebenza kunye kumsebenzi wevangeli weBandla likaYesu Krestu. Bashumayela ivangeli kaYesu Krestu, ivangeli evumela ukuba abantu basindiswe, bazukiswe, kwaye imizimba yabo ikhululwe! Amen, amagama abo abhalwe encwadini yobomi! Ukhunjulwe yiNkosi. Amen!

Iculo: "Ubabalo olumangalisayo" kwiTestamente eNtsha

Abazalwana noodade abangakumbi bamkelekile ukusebenzisa ibhrawuza yabo ukukhangela - IBandla kwiNkosi uYesu Krestu - ukuba bazimanye kunye nokusebenza kunye ukushumayela ivangeli kaYesu Krestu.
