articles.title: Ukuqala kokushiya iMfundiso kaKrestu (uMfundiso 3)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade kwintsapho kaThixo! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile kumaHebhere isahluko 6, indinyana 2, size sifunde kunye: ubhaptizo, ukubekwa kwezandla, ukuvuka kwabafileyo, nomgwebo ongunaphakade .

Namhlanje siza kuqhubeka nokufunda, ubudlelwane kunye nokwabelana " Ukushiya iSiqalo seMfundiso kaKrestu "Hayi. 3 Thetha kwaye wenze umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Ibandla “lomfazi onesidima” lithumela abasebenzi – ngelizwi lenyaniso abalibhalayo baze balithethe ezandleni zabo, eliziindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso nozuko lwethu. Ukutya kuhanjiswa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni kude kwaye kunikezelwa kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo, ukuze ubomi bethu bokomoya bube bubutyebi kwaye buhlaziywe imihla ngemihla! Amen. Thandaza ukuba iNkosi uYesu iqhubeke nokukhanyisela amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuba siyiqonde iBhayibhile, ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni, kwaye siqonde isiqalo semfundiso efanele ukumshiya uKristu. Shiya ileta, ummiselo, isithunzi, umthetho wesigwebo .

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

buza: Kutheni ushiya → iimfundiso zobhaptizo, ukubekwa kwezandla, ukuvuka kwabafileyo, nomgwebo ongunaphakade?
impendulo: 1 “Ubhaptizo” → Sibhaptizelwa ekufeni kukaKristu kube kanye kuphela;

2 Ukubekwa kwezandla, ukuvuka kwabafileyo → Siyafa, singcwatywe, sivuke noKristu kube kanye kuphela;

3 Kwaye imfundiso yomgwebo ongunaphakade kuwo onke amanqanaba → uKristu wagwetywa ngumthetho kube kanye kuphela ngenxa yezono zethu, waza wazalisekisa umthetho kube kanye kuphela → Safa kunye noKristu kwaye sagwetywa kube kanye kuphela, akunakubakho izigwebo ezininzi okanye umgwebo ongunaphakade kwinqanaba ngalinye. isifundo. Ke ezi ziziqalo kwaye zonke kufuneka zihambe → Uyayiqonda le nto?

nomyalelo, ongenamthunzi, nemimiselo, nabhata, namasiko enyama

(1) UYesu wasikhulula phantsi komthetho

Lithe ke lakuzaliseka ixesha, uThixo wamthuma uNyana wakhe, owazalelwa umfazi, ezelwe phantsi komthetho, ukuze abakhulule ngentlawulelo abaphantsi komthetho, ukuze sikuzuze ukwenziwa oonyana. Galati 4:4-5

buza: Ngaba abo baphantsi komthetho banabo na oonyana bakaThixo?
impendulo: Hayi . Umthetho “weencwadi, ummiselo, okanye ummiselo” uyabagweba abantu, yaye iileta ziyababulala abantu → Iileta zomthetho, ngenxa yokuba ndingenako ukuyigcina imimiselo, ziyandigweba, ziyandiqalekisa, yaye ziyandigweba. Ngoko ke, incwadi yomthetho ibangela ukufa, yaye ukuba uphantsi komthetho ungofileyo, awunabo ubuntwana bukaThixo. Uyaqonda?

(2) UYesu wawucima ummiselo, wawususa waza wawubethelela emnqamlezweni

...owanidlisa ubomi ndawonye noKristu, wasicima nombhalo wemimiselo obuchasene nathi, obuchasene nathi; Kolose 2:13-14

buza: Kuthetha ukuthini ukucima ummiselo, ukuwususa nokuwubethelela?
impendulo: Wakudlisa ubomi kunye noKristu → "nizalwe ngokutsha, ningabantwana bakaThixo, abangamalungisa nabasemazulwini, abangengabakhonzi" → Wayicima nemithetho eyimimiselo ebhalwe emthethweni, esihlaselayo "Ubungqina bephepha" eyayisithintela → yayibubungqina, ubungqina obandihlaselayo bandigweba baza bandigweba, basuswa baza babethelelwa emnqamlezweni. Uyaqonda?

Ke ngoko, iincwadi zomthetho zezokufa, kwaye imimiselo yomthetho kunye nemimiselo yenyama → yeyomntu omdala. umkhonzi “Akumiselwanga aboni” umntu olilungisa “Yasekwa nguNyana— bhekisela kweyoku- 1 kuTimoti isahluko 8 indinyana 9 . UKristu uye wayicima imithetho nemimiselo ‘yethu uzelwe ngokutsha nguThixo.’ UYesu wayenoloyiko lokuba siya kufumana iincwadi zomthetho nemimiselo esifanele siyigcine, ngoko wayenoloyiko. Ngoko ke asiyi kuba namithetho okanye imimiselo ngokuchasene nathi → kuba apho kungekho mthetho, akukho mthetho. Kukho izigqitho; ngaphandle komthetho, isono asithathwa njengesono ngaphandle kwemithetho nemimiselo, ngoko ke isono asithathwa njengesono, kuba umntu omtsha ozelwe nguThixo akoni ukuba uhleli kuKristu , kwanaye akoni, akunakuzigweba okanye uzigwebe?

(3) Sikhululekile kuwo umthetho

buza: Kutheni waphula umthetho?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

1 Apho kungekho mthetho, akukho sigqitho - Roma 4:15
2 Ngaphandle komthetho, isono asithathwa njengesono - KwabaseRoma 5:13
3 Kuba kungekho mthetho isono sifile – Roma 7:8

Njengoko uPawulos watshoyo → Ngoko ke, sinokuthini? Umthetho usisono na? Akunjalo! Kodwa ukuba ubungekho umthetho, ngendingazi ukuba yintoni na isono. Ngaphandle kokuba umthetho uthi, “Uze unganyoluki,” bendingazi ukuba kuyintoni na ukubawa. Isono ke sizuze ikhwele kum yonke inkanuko ngomthetho; Mna ke ndingekabikho bomi ngaphandle komthetho. Bhekisela kumaRoma 7:7-9 . Qaphela: Xa umyalelo womthetho ufika, isono siphila kwakhona → ngaphandle komthetho, isono sifile ukuba ufuna umthetho kwaye ugcine umthetho → kufuneka " ulwaphulo-mthetho "zonke phila Ukuba uyafa, uya kufa. Ngaba uyakuqonda oko uThixo akuthethayo ngoPawulos?

buza: Ubaleka njani umthetho?
impendulo: Wakhululwa emthethweni ngomzimba kaKristu obethelelwe emnqamlezweni→uKristu yedwa ngenxa Ukuba bonke bafa, bonke bafile → Ngoko ke, bazalwana bam, nani nifile kuwo umthetho ngawo umzimba kaKristu. umthetho ukuze sikhonze uYehova ( Ngabo bakhululekileyo emthethweni, bengoonyana, abanokukhonza iNkosi ; ukuba anithanga nikhululwe kuwo umthetho, ningamakhoboka esono, aninako ukukhonza iNkosi ngokobutsha bomoya (umoya: okanye ukuguqulelwa njengoMoya oyiNgcwele), kungekuko kwakudala; indlela yesiko. Jonga kwabaseRoma 7:6 , ngaba uyaqonda?

(4) Imithetho nemimiselo zizikolo zamabanga aphantsi ezibuthathaka nezingenamsebenzi

buza: Kutheni isikolo samabanga aphantsi singamagwala nesingenamsebenzi?
impendulo: Ngenxa yokuba kukho imimiselo emthethweni, asinako ukuyigcina ngokuthembela enyameni, yaye umthetho uya kundigweba uze undigwebele ukufa, ngoko sisikolo samabanga aphantsi amagwala nesingenamsebenzi → Ngoku ekubeni umazi uThixo, yaye kunokwenzeka wathi uyaziwa nguThixo, kutheni usakudinga ubuyela kweso sikolo samabanga aphantsi samagwala, uzimisele ukuphinda ube likhoboka lakhe? Jonga kumaGalati isahluko 4 ivesi 9

(5) Umthetho uphumela ekubeni ungafezi nto

buza: Kutheni kusithiwa umthetho awufezanga nto?
impendulo: Ngenxa yokuba singenako ukuyigcina imimiselo yomthetho, asinto yanto, sisikolo samabanga aphantsi esingamagwala, asinto yanto, singenamsebenzi, uYesu “wawucima, wawubhangisa” ngokufa. Ngoko, uyayiqonda? →Ummiselo wangaphambili, ungenamandla, ungenamsebenzi, wabhangiswa (umthetho awufeza nto), kwaza kwangeniswa ithemba elilunge ngakumbi, esinokusondela ngalo kuThixo. Funda kumaHebhere 7:18-19

(6) Umyalelo osisithunzi sezinto ezilungileyo eziza kubakho

Ekubeni ke umthetho usisithunzi nje sodwa sezinto ezilungileyo eziza kubakho, ungenguye umfanekiselo wayo leyo, awunako ukubenza bagqibelele abo basondelayo iminyaka ngeminyaka, ukuba bagqibelele kwelo dini. Hebhere 10:1

buza: Kuthetha ukuthini ukuthi umthetho usisithunzi sezinto ezilungileyo ezizayo?
impendulo: Ngaba “uAdam” okwiGenesis wadalwa ngokomfanekiselo nangokufana ‘noYehova uThixo’? Ewe! Ngoko ngaba “uYesu” unguThixo uSomandla, uBawo ongunaPhakade neNkosana yoXolo? Wathi uYesu kuFilipu! Lowo undibonileyo mna umbonile uBawo - bhekisa kuYohane 14:9-11. “UAdam” ubizwa ngokuba ngumntu ngenxa yokuba wadalwa ngokomfanekiselo nangokufana “noYesu” owayengekabikho enyameni, akunjalo? ngoko" UAdam "Isibonisi sinyani kwaye sisithunzi! Umfanekiso wangempela ngu " UYesu ", ebizwa ngokuba nguAdam wokugqibela! Kunjalo? Ngoko ke umthetho ngummiselo wenyama, omiselwe abantu benyama → Hebhere 7:16 " UYesu “Waba ngumbingeleli, kungekhona ngokwemimiselo yenyama, kodwa ngokwamandla obomi obungenasiphelo (entlandlolo, obungenakonakala). Isithunzi sezinto. UAdam nomthetho bobabini" Isithunzi “Ngokuhamba kwexesha isithunzi siya kushukuma, singabi santo, sibuye singabi nto yanto. UAdam nomthetho, oko kukuthi, iTestamente Endala, ngokuthe ngcembe uya kuguga aze abune angabi nto → Bona amaHebhere 8:13 , ngoko awukwazi ukuwugcina umthetho. , ekuqaleni yayiyi " Isithunzi “Umthetho usisithunzi nje sezinto ezilungileyo eziza kubakho, ungenguye umfanekiselo wayo into leyo. Umzekelo wenyaniso womthetho nguKristu; niyakuqonda na oku?

(7) Isishwankathelo somthetho nguKristu, nomfanekiso wokwenene nguKristu

buza: Ekubeni ke umthetho usisithunzi nje sezinto ezilungileyo eziza kubakho, ngubani na oyena mfanekiselo womthetho?
impendulo: Umfanekiso womthetho nguKristu, kwaye isiphelo somthetho nguKristu → Isiphelo somthetho nguKristu, ukuze bonke abakholwayo kuye bazuze ubulungisa. Bhekisela kumaRoma 10:4 ; imimiselo nemimiselo yomthetho yingcamango yamva nje, kodwa imo ngenene ifana noKristu → Ngoko ke makungabikho mntu unigwebayo ngento edliwayo, nangento eselwayo, nangemithendeleko, nangenyanga yokuthwasa kwenyanga; okanye iiSabatha. Zizizithunzi nje zezinto ezizayo; Funda kwabaseKolose 2:16-17 .

Phawula: Xa uhleli kuKristu, usemfanekisweni wenyaniso, ubukho, kunye nomfanekiso wenyaniso womthetho → UKristu uzalisekisa umthetho, kwaye sizalisekisa umthetho uKristu akanasono, kwaye asinasono. Musani ukwaphula umthetho nesono. Ngokuba awukho “emthunzini” umthetho, awusayi kuwaphula umthetho, ukuba ubukuAdam, ubusemthunzini; inyoka “Ukuhenda uya kwaphula umthetho, ukwaphule umthetho, kwaye ukwaphula umthetho kusisono.

Isibongozo:

Ngoko ke, kufuneka siyishiye isiqalo semfundiso kaKristu→ 1 Suka kwimisebenzi ebuhlungu nefileyo; 2 Shiya isikolo samabanga aphantsi amagwala nesingenamsebenzi, wuyeke umthetho ongafezi nto, baleka uye ngqo elusukeni, uzabalazele ukuqhubela phambili; andifuni Ukuqala kwam amabanga aphantsi, ndandivuma izono zam kwaye ndiguquka yonke imihla kwaye ndizisola ngezenzo zam ezimbi; andifuni Ubuyele kwisikolo samabanga aphantsi esibuthathaka nesingenamsebenzi semithetho nemimiselo, kwaye ukulungele ukuba likhoboka lakhe kwakhona. andifuni Njengenja egabhayo, iyajika iphinde iyidle; Ihagu iyinqambi kuni, kuba iluthe gqiphu uphuphu kubini, kodwa ayiwetyisi. " ihagu ” libhekisela kwabo bangacocekanga nangona bekwazi ukwahlula iTestamente Endala neTestamente Entsha, abawetyi. Akukho lukholo oluvisisana noko ukuvayo , akuncedi nto kubo; bahlala beyinqambi. Bhekisela kwiLevitikus isahluko 11 indinyana 7 nakweyesi-2 kaPetros isahluko 2 indinyana 22. Ngaba uyiqonda kakuhle?

KULUNGILE! Namhlanje silugqibile uviwo lwethu, ubudlelane, kunye nokwabelana apha Masihlanganyele kushicilelo olulandelayo: Ukuqala Kokushiya Imfundiso KaKrestu, Isifundo 4 "Lishiye INdoda Yakudala Yambatha Umntu Omtsha"

Ukwabelana ngombhalo weVangeli, uqhutywa nguMoya kaThixo Abasebenzi bakaYesu Krestu, uMzalwana uWang*Yun, uDade uLiu, uDade uZheng, uMzalwana uCen... kunye nabanye abasebenza kunye baxhasa kwaye basebenza kunye kumsebenzi wevangeli weBandla likaYesu. UKrestu. Shumayela ivangeli kaYesu Krestu, ivangeli evumela abantu ukuba basindiswe, bazukiswe, kwaye nemizimba yabo ikhululwe. Amen! →Njengoko eyabaseFilipi 4:2-3 isitsho, uPawulos, uTimoti, uWodiya, uSintike, uKlemente nabanye ababesebenza noPawulos, amagama abo akwincwadi yobomi obungamileyo. Amen!

articles.title: Ukushiya Isiqalo seMfundiso kaKrestu (uMfundiso 2)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade kwintsapho kaThixo! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile kumaHebhere isahluko 6, indinyana 1, size sifunde kunye: Ngoko ke, sifanele siyishiye isiqalo semfundiso kaKristu size sizabalazele ukuhambela phambili kwimfezeko, ngaphandle kokubeka iziseko ezingakumbi, ezinjengokuguquka kwimisebenzi efileyo nokuthembela kuThixo.

Namhlanje ndizakuqhubeka nokufunda, ubudlelane, kunye nokwabelana " Ukushiya iSiqalo seMfundiso kaKrestu "Hayi. 2 Thetha kwaye uthandaze: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Ibandla “lomfazi onesidima” lithumela abasebenzi – ngelizwi lenyaniso abalibhalayo baze balithethe ezandleni zabo, eliziindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso nozuko lwethu. Ukutya kuhanjiswa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni kude, kwaye kunikezelwa kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo, ukuze ubomi bethu bomoya bube bubutyebi, kwaye buya kuba butsha ngosuku! Amen. Thandaza ukuba iNkosi uYesu iqhubeke nokukhanyisela amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuba siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni. Qonda ukuba kufuneka siyishiye isiqalo seemfundiso zikaKristu, ezinje → ukuguquka kwimisebenzi efileyo nokuthembela kuThixo. .

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

Ukukholwa kwivangeli likaYesu Krestu kuyasikhulula esonweni

---IVangeli kaYesu Kristu---

(1) Ukuqaleka kwayo ivangeli kaYesu Kristu

buza: Kuyintoni na ukuqaleka kwevangeli likaYesu Krestu?
impendulo: Ukuqala kwevangeli kaYesu Krestu, uNyana kaThixo— Marko 1:1 . UYesu unguMsindisi, uMesiya, noKristu, kuba ufuna ukusindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo. Amen! Ngoko uYesu Kristu uyingqalo yevangeli. Jonga kuMateyu 1:21

(2) Ukukholelwa kwivangeli kuyasikhulula esonweni

buza: Yintoni ivangeli?
impendulo: Oko ke mna Pawulos ndakwamkelayo, ndiyakunikela kuni kuqala, okokuba uKristu wazifela izono zethu ngokwezibhalo, nokokuba wangcwatywa, nokokuba wavuswa ngomhla wesithathu, ngokutsho kweZibhalo; Incwadi ye-15 ivesi 3-4. Le yivangeli eyashunyayelwa ngumpostile “uPawulos” kwiiNtlanga “kwibandla laseKorinte” ukuze sisindise abantu kuphela. ileta “Ngale vangeli, uyakusindiswa.

(3) UYesu Kristu wafela bonke abantu

buza: Ngubani owafela izono zethu?
impendulo: Kuyabonakala ukuba uthando lukaKristu luyasikhuthaza; UKrestu "Umntu omnye ngenxa Xa abaninzi besifa, bonke bayafa; bona eyesi- 2 kwabaseKorinte 5:14 . Oku koko uKristu wafela izono zethu ngokutsho kweBhayibhile, akunjalo? →1 Petros 2 Isahluko 24 Yena ngokwakhe wazithwala izono zethu ngomzimba wakhe emthini, ukuze sife ezonweni, siphilele ubulungisa...! UYesu Kristu wabafela bonke, yaye bonke bafa, sonke singabantu, ukuze thina safayo kwisono siphilele ubulungisa. Amen! Kunene? Kukuthabathel’ indawo “thina” “uYesu” olilungisa abangemalungisa → UThixo wamenza lowo ungazani nasono (ongenasono: umbhalo wokuqala kukungasazi isono) ukuba abe sisono ngenxa yethu, ukuze thina sibe bubulungisa besono. UThixo kuYe. Bhekisela kweyesi- 2 kwabaseKorinte 5:21 .

(4) Abafileyo bakhululwe esonweni

buza: Sisibaleka njani isono?
impendulo: ngokuba Abafileyo bakhululwe esonweni . Bhekisela kumaRoma 6:7 → Apha ithi “abafileyo bakhululwe esonweni.” Umzimba wam usaphila! Ngaba kufuneka ndilinde de ndife ukuze ndikhululeke esonweni? Akunjalo, ngokomzekelo, kwakukho ubawo owathi unyana wakhe wona waza wagwetyelwa ukufa ngokomthetho! Uyise wonyana wakhawuleza waya kufuna yonke imimiselo namazwi akhubekisayo emthethweni awayemgweba unyana wakhe, waza wayicima waza wayishenxisa ke uyise wagwetywa ngomthetho ngenxa yonyana wakhe, waba sisono, wafa ngenxa yonyana wakhe . Ukususela ngoko unyana wakhululwa esonweni nasekugwetyweni komthetho. Ngoku unyana uyindoda elilungisa! Hayi aboni, kodwa aboni baphantsi komthetho. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Kukwanjalo nangoYesu Kristu, uNyana kaBawo waseZulwini → uYesu, uNyana okuphela kwamzeleyo noyintanda kaBawo waseZulwini, waba yinyama.” ngenxa “Ngokuba saba sisono, saba ngamalungisa” ngenxa "Kwabangemalungisa, ukuze sibe bubulungisa bukaThixo → Mntu mnye, uKristu." ngenxa "Wonke umntu uyafa, wonke umntu uyafa → Ngaba wonke umntu uquka mna nawe? Iquka, kuquka abantu beTestamente Endala, abantu beTestamente Entsha, abantu abazelwe, abantu abangekazalwa, bonke abo babephuma enyameni ka-Adam, nazo zonke izigqitho. abafileyo → abafileyo bakhululwe esonweni. ileta “UYesu Kristu wafa, yaye ungumntu wam omdala ( ileta ) ufile, ngoku andisaphili! ( ileta ) safa sonke → Lowo uye wafa ukhululwe esonweni, yaye bonke bakhululwe esonweni. Lowo ukholwayo kuye akagwetywa, kodwa lowo ungakholwayo, uselegwetyiwe, ngokuba engakholwanga kwigama loNyana okuphela kwamzeleyo uThixo → Igama lokuphela kwamzeleyo uNyana kaThixo nguYesu, " igama likaYesu “Kuthetha ukusindisa abantu bakho ezonweni zabo. Jonga kuYohane isahluko sesi-3 ivesi 7-18 nakuMateyu isahluko 1 ivesi 21. UYesu Kristu wafa emnqamlezweni ngenxa yezono zethu → ukusindise ezonweni zakho. Musa ukukholelwa "uya kugwetywa ngumthetho, ngoko" ulwaphulo-mthetho "Kugqitywe. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

(5) UKristu usihlangula kuso sonke isono

1 Igazi likaYesu liyasihlambulula kuso sonke isono—Khangela kuYohane 1:7
2 UYesu uyasikhulula kuso sonke isono—Khangela kuTito 2:14
3 UThixo unixolele (thina) zonke izigqitho zethu - jonga kwabaseKolose 2:13

Ezi zilandelayo ziimfundiso eziphosakeleyo zecawa yehlabathi namhlanje

buza: Abadala nabefundisi abaninzi ngoku bafundisa:
1 Igazi likaYesu liyandihlambulula ezonweni zam “zangaphambili”;
2 Andizenzanga izono “emva kokuba ndikholiwe”, andenzanga nezono zanamhlanje, zangomso, okanye zangomso?
3 Nezono zam ezisitheleyo, nezono ezisentliziyweni yam
4 Nanini na ndisona, ndiyahlanjululwa Igazi likaYesu lisebenza ngonaphakade → Uyayikholelwa le nto? Iimfundiso zabo ziphambuka njani kwinyaniso yeBhayibhile ephefumlelwe nguThixo?
impendulo: UThixo wasiphefumlela ngeBhayibhile waza wathi, “Khawucacise ngokweenkcukacha ngezantsi.”
1 Igazi loNyana wakhe “uYesu” lisihlambulula kuso sonke isono - 1 Yohane 1:7
2 UYesu uyasikhulula kuso sonke isono—Khangela kuTito 2:14
3 UThixo unixolele (thina) zonke izigqitho zethu - jonga kwabaseKolose 2:13

Phawula: Ithini inyaniso yeBhayibhile ephefumlelwe nguThixo → 1 Igazi likaYesu uNyana wakhe liyasihlambulula yonke into isono, 2 Uyasihlangula yonke into isono, 3 UThixo uyakuxolela (thina) yonke into Izikreqo → hlambulula kuzo zonke izono, khulula kuzo zonke izono, xolela zonke izikreqo → uYesu’ Igazi " hlamba zonke izono "Ngaba ayizibandakanyi izono zangaphambi kokuba ndikholelwe kuYesu nezono emva kokuba ndikholelwe kuYesu? Ngaba iquka izono ezifihliweyo kunye nezono ezisentliziyweni yam? Ngaba ibandakanya zonke, akunjalo? Umzekelo, kwiGenesis. .. → ukuya kuMalaki Incwadi ethi..."UKristu Wabethelelwa", ingaba izono zabantu kwiTestamente eNdala zihlanjiwe ukusuka kwiVangeli kaMateyu...→ ukuya kwiNcwadi yesiTyhilelo, ingaba izono zabantu ziphakathi ITestamente Entsha yahlanjwa Ewe okanye hayi? Ewe, wavela nini kwiGenesis na? , esisisiphelo sehlabathi, ibe wawungaqukwanga ngelo xesha lembali, akunjalo?

Ngoko uYesu wathi: “Ndingowokuqala nowokugqibela, ndingowokuqala nesiphelo; UThixo ubona iwaka leminyaka njengemini enye, Yena hlamba Akuba ezixolele izono zomntu, wahlala phantsi ngasekunene kobuKhulu ezulwini— bhekisela kumaHebhere 1:3 . Ndahlambulula abantu ezonweni zabo ngaphandle kokubuzana nawe. , kunene? Ngaba ukhe wazihlambulula kwizono ozenzileyo kwikhulu okanye leminyaka yokubonakala kwakho ngokwasemzimbeni kwimbali? Ihlanjiwe yonke, akunjalo? Ngoko ke simele simanyane noKristu → ngokufana nokufa kwakhe, nangokufana nokuvuka kwakhe → ngoko, uYesu wathi! Ubunam kwasekuqalekeni - bona uYohane 15:27.

Ukususela kwindalo ukuya ekupheleni kwehlabathi, uYesu unathi uhlambulula abantu ezonweni zabo → sonke singcwele, singcwalisiwe, yaye sigwetyelwe ngaphambi kokuba singene ebukumkanini bakhe.

Ukuba "uyaguquka, uvume, kwaye uguquke emisebenzini efileyo imihla ngemihla", ndiyakoyika → kuba ngokuqinisekileyo uya kubuza uYesu " Igazi "Hlambulula izono zakho yonke imihla kwaye uya kwamkela uYesu Igazi "njengegazi leenkomo nelezimvu ukuze lihlambe izono kwaye lingcwaliswe umnqophiso kaKristu." Igazi “Njengesiqhelo, nicinga ukuba, ukuhlanjululwa kwezono ngale ndlela, kukuzisela uvuyo nokuhlonela uThixo. Ngokwenza oku, nidela uMoya oyiNgcwele wobabalo. Niyaqonda na?

Ngoko ke, umele uphume kwimpazamo yawo uze ubuyele eBhayibhileni. Uyaqonda? Bona amaHebhere 10:29

(6) Ngokumanywa kwethu noKristu ngemfano yokufa, siya kumanyaniswa naye ngokufana nokuvuka kwakhe.

buza: “Sakholwa” ukuba uKristu wafa, kodwa ngoku sisaphila nje? Ngoko ke siya kuqhubeka sisenza ulwaphulo-mthetho! Ngaba awukakhululi esonweni? Ndimele ndenze ntoni xa ndenze ulwaphulo-mthetho? Ngaba yingxaki leyo?
impendulo: Anazi na ukuba thina, sabhaptizelwayo kuKristu Yesu, sabhaptizelwa ekufeni kwakhe? ... Ukuba similiselwe kuye ngemfano yokufa kwakhe, somiliselwa kuye nangemfano yokuvuka kwakhe; Singo " ubhaptiziwe "Ukufakwa ekufeni kukaKristu sibalwa kunye noKristu" ngokubambisana "Ubethelelwe emnqamlezweni → umanyene naye ngokufana nokufa, usebenzisa" ukuzithemba "Nge" ubhaptiziwe "Umanyene noKristu ngokufana nokufa kwakhe → ukuze wena" ileta “Nani nafile! Umntu omdala ufile, umoni ufile! → Kuba nafa, ibe ubomi benu bufihlwe noKristu kuye uThixo. Bona amaKolose 3:3.

Uyakholwa na ukuba ixhego lifile, nomoni ufile? Ayisendim ke odla ubomi, nguKristu ke oselesidla ubomi kum. uKristu" ngenxa "Safa, savuswa kwabafileyo kwaye" sazaliswa ngokutsha, kwaye " ngenxa "Siphila → Ukuphila akundim, ndiphila ngoAdam, ndiphila aboni; uKristu ngenxa Ndiphila, ndiphila uKristu, ndiphila ngaphandle kozuko lukaThixo uYise! Ngoku ke ndikuKristu, bonke abazelwe nguThixo aboni, abanakona. Amen! Ngoko, uyayiqonda? Njengoko uPawulos watshoyo → Ndibethelelwe emnqamlezweni noKristu; ayisendim ke odla ubomi, nguKristu ke oselesidla ubomi kum; Ndiyazikhanyela. Galati 2:20 .

(7) Khangela isono, ufile;

buza: Emva kokuba sikholelwa kuYesu saza sazalwa ngokutsha, yintoni esimele siyenze ngezikreqo zobuntu bethu obudala?
impendulo: Ukuba ke uhleli kuni uMoya kaThixo, aningabo abenyama, ningaboMoya. Ukuba umntu akanaye uMoya kaKristu, akangokaKristu lowo. KwabaseRoma 8:9 → UMoya kaThixo, uMoya Oyingcwele, uhlala ezintliziyweni zethu, oko kukuthi, sivuswa kunye noKristu kwaye sizalwa ngokutsha sibe ngumntu omtsha. entsha mna “umntu omtsha ozelwe nguThixo” umntu wokomoya "Hayi kwindoda endala yenyama. Ezelwe nguThixo." Andiboni “Umntu omtsha, ungaphakathi kwenu uKristu, ungaphakathi kwenu; ekuwe kuAdam, ozelwe nguyise nonina. ebonakalayo "Umzimba wesono womntu omdala wafa ngenxa yesono, kwaye umzimba wesono watshatyalaliswa → uKristu yedwa" ngenxa "Ukuba bonke bayafa, bonke bayafa → Ukuba uKristu ungaphakathi kuni, umzimba ufile ngenxa yesono, kodwa umoya uyaphila ngenxa yobulungisa. Roma 8:10, UKristu ungaphakathi kwethu uzalwa ngokutsha, kodwa umzimba ufile ngenxa yobulungisa. isono , ngoko uPawulos wathi “ngumzimba wokufa, umzimba wokonakala” yaye asingowomntu omtsha ozelwe nguThixo! umntu womoya Ngoku" entsha mna "Phila ngobulungisa bukaThixo." engabonakaliyo "Ezelwe nguThixo, efihliweyo kuThixo" entsha mna ", ayingowakwa" ebonakalayo ", ukusuka kuAdam ukuya kubazali" mdala mna "Ubomi bolwaphulo-mthetho → Ngoko" ITestamente Entsha 》UThixo wathi anisayi kuphinda nizikhumbule izikreqo zendoda endala. UThixo akayi kukhumbula → Uya kuthi, “Andisayi kuba sazikhumbula izono zabo nezikreqo zabo.” Ekubeni ezi zono zixolelwe, akusekho mfuneko yakuba sinikele idini lezono. Bhekisela kumaHebhere 10: 17-18 → UThixo wenze umnqophiso omtsha nathi ukuba singazikhumbuli izikreqo zenyama yomntu omdala, kwaye asiyi kuzikhumbula. Ukuba uyakhumbula, oko kubonisa ukuba waphule isivumelwano waza wasaphula isithembiso . Uyaqonda?

buza: Kuthekani ngokunxaxha kwenyama yendoda endala?
impendulo: Makhe sijonge kwiimfundiso zikaPawulos eBhayibhileni → “Ungulowo uzelwe ngokutsha nguThixo” → “ekoneni” khangela →Umntu, oko kukuthi, “umntu omdala ozelwe nguAdam” ufile, thina” ileta “UKristu wabafela bonke; Kholelwa ekufeni ", kwinkqubo yamava elandelayo" Bona ukufa ") Ke ubomi obonayo kwindoda endala" khangela "Ifile," khangela “Umntu omdala ufile kwiziphoso zenyama; ke yena uThixo ukuKristu, oko kukuthi, ozelwe nguThixo. entsha mna → Kodwa xa " khangela "Ndiyaphila. Amen! (ngaphambili" ileta "Ukuphila noKristu, kamva" Umntu omtsha "Yiba kuKristu phakathi kwamava" khangela "Yena ngokwakhe uyaphila) → Kuba esazi ukuba ekubeni uKristu wavuswayo kwabafileyo, akayi kuba safa, nokufa akusayi kuba nagunya phezu kwakhe. Xa wafayo, wafa kwaba kanye esonweni; Ngokunjalo zibaleleni ekubeni ningabafileyo okunene kwisono, kodwa ningabadla ubomi kuThixo, nikuKristu Yesu?

(8) Yishiye imisebenzi efileyo ezisolayo uze uthembele kuThixo

buza: Kuyintoni ukuzisola ngemisebenzi efileyo?
impendulo: "Guquka" kuthetha ukuguquka,
UYesu wathi, "Imihla izalisekile, kwaye ubukumkani bukaThixo busondele! articles.title: Ukuqala kokushiya iMfundiso kaKrestu (uMfundiso 1)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade kwintsapho kaThixo! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile yethu kumaHebhere isahluko 6, iivesi 1-2, size sizifunde kunye: Ke ngoko, masiyishiye ingqalo yemfundiso kaKristu, siqhubele phambili kwingqibelelo, singabeki siseko samva, esinjengenguquko emisebenzini efileyo, nokukholosa ngoThixo, nobhaptizo lonke, nokubekwa kwezandla, nokuvuka kwabafileyo; kunye nomgwebo ongunaphakade, njalo njalo isifundo.

Namhlanje siza kufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane nawe "Ukuqala kokuyishiya iMfundiso kaKrestu" Hayi. 1 Thetha kwaye wenze umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Ibandla “lomfazi onesidima” lithumela abasebenzi – ngelizwi lenyaniso abalibhalayo baze balithethe ezandleni zabo, eliziindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso nozuko lwethu. Ukutya kuhanjiswa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni kude kwaye kunikezelwa kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo, ukuze ubomi bethu bokomoya bube bubutyebi kwaye buhlaziywe imihla ngemihla! Amen. Thandaza ukuba iNkosi uYesu iqhubeke nokukhanyisela amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuba siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni. Qonda ukuba kufuneka siyishiye isiqalo semfundiso kaKristu kwaye sizabalazele ukuqhubela phambili kwimfezeko .

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

Ukushiya iSiqalo seMfundiso kaKrestu

buza: Zithini iziqalo zokuphambuka kwimfundiso kaKristu?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

(1) Ukuqala kweHoly Word Primary School - Hebhere 5:12
(2) Xa sasingabantwana, sasilawulwa zizikolo zaseprayimari zehlabathi - Gal 4:3
(3) Kwisikolo samabanga aphantsi sehlabathi - Kolose 2:21
(4) Kutheni ufuna ukubuyela kwisikolo samabanga aphantsi esiligwala nesingenamsebenzi uze ukulungele ukuba likhoboka lakhe kwakhona? —Funda isahluko 4, indinyana yesi-9

Phawula: Iyintoni isiqalo semfundiso kaKristu? Ukususela kwiGenesis "Umthetho ka-Adam, uMthetho kaMoses" ukuya kwiNcwadi kaMalaki, "yiTestamente Endala" → Umthetho wadluliselwa ngoMoses, kwaye yayingengoMoses owashumayela umthetho ngokusuka kwiVangeli kaMateyu kwiNcwadi yeSityhilelo, “yiTestamente Entsha” Ubabalo nenyaniso zombini ziza ngoYesu Kristu - bona uYohane 1:17 . Ngoko yintoni isiqalo semfundiso kaKristu? ITestamente Endala ishumayela umthetho, ngelixa iTestamente Entsha ishumayela uYesu Kristu - ubabalo nenyaniso → Ukuqala kwemfundiso kaKristu → Ukususela 'umnqophiso womthetho' kwiTestamente Entsha ukuya kwiTestamente Entsha 'umnqophiso wobabalo nenyaniso.' Lo kuthiwa nguKristu. Ngaba uyakuqonda ukuqaleka kwayo inyaniso?

(Umzekelo, A…………B……………C)
→Ukusuka kwinqaku A...→Inqaku B “nguMnqophiso woMthetho weTestamente Endala”; Inqaku B liyavela! “Inqaku B sisiqalo → isiqalo semfundiso kaYesu Kristu, ukususela B khomba indlela yonke eya C Yonke into Shumayela ubabalo, inyaniso nosindiso lukaYesu Kristu Ukususela kuA...→B phantsi komthetho "ngumnqophiso omdala, umntu omdala, ikhoboka, ikhoboka lesono", ukusuka kuB...→C phantsi kobabalo "umnqophiso omtsha, umntu omtsha, a indoda elilungisa, unyana”! hamba" B Inqaku elithi "kukuzalwa ngokutsha" Ukushiya "inqaku B" kuthetha umntu omtsha, indoda elilungisa, unyana kaThixo ongcwele "umKrestu" → Ukuba ungumKristu, akufanele ushiye "inqaku B". . → Yiya kwindawo C Qhubeka ubaleka ukuya ekujoliseni, kwaye uya kufumana uzuko, imivuzo, kunye nezithsaba kwixesha elizayo. "→Ekuqaleni kweemfundiso zikaKristu, aba bantu baneengxaki ngokholo lwabo. Ngaphandle kokuqonda usindiso lukaKristu, aba bantu abazange bazalwe ngokutsha okanye bakhule. Bangabantu abadala, amakhoboka namakhoboka esono. Ngomhla wokugqibela baya kugwetywa aba bantu baphantsi komthetho, yaye bonke baya kugwetywa ngokwezenzo zabo “phantsi komthetho. Bona ISityhilelo 20:13 . Ngaba uyayiqonda le nto? )

Ukuqala kokushiya iMfundiso kaKrestu:

1 hamba itestamente endala Ngena ITestamente Entsha
2 hamba umnqophiso womthetho Ngena umnqophiso wobabalo
3 hamba indoda endala Ngena Umntu omtsha (oko kukuthi, nxiba umntu omtsha)
4 hamba umoni Ngena Ilungisa (oko kukuthi, ligwetyelwa ngokholo);
5 hamba UAdam Ngena UKristu (oko kukuthi, kuKristu)
6 hamba Udongwe Ngena Uzelwe ngoMoya oyiNgcwele (o.k.t. ukuzalwa ngokutsha)
7 hamba ihlabathi Ngena Ebuqaqawulini (oko kukuthi ubukumkani bukaThixo)

UYesu wathi: “Mna ndibanikile ilizwi lakho, laza ihlabathi libathiyile, ngokuba bengengabo abehlabathi, njengokuba nam ndingenguye owehlabathi.” ( Yohane 17:14 ;
Kuba nafayo, baye ubomi benu bufihlakele ndawonye noKristu kuye uThixo. Xa athe wabonakalaliswa uKristu, obubomi bethu, nani niya kubonakala, ninaye ebuqaqawulini. Bhekisela kwabaseKolose isahluko 3 indinyana 3-4 .

"Isilumkiso nxamnye nabawexuki":

AmaHebhere 5:11-12 athi, “Ngokusingisele kuMelkitsedeke, sinezinto ezininzi esinokuzithetha, ekunzima ukuziqonda” oko kukuthi, zaziphantsi koMthetho kaMoses le mfundiso.” Indinyana ye-12 ihlabela mgama isithi: “Khangelani ukukhuthala kwenu ukufunda.” Kwakhona ngokufuthi bafundisisa iimfundiso zoMthetho kaMoses oseBhayibhileni. Ngabantu abanjani abafundisi? KwabaseRoma 2:17-20 “Ungumfundisi weziyatha nomfundisi wabantwana ngaba niyabancoma okanye bayaphoxisa? Kuthekani ngenkosi ekhokelayo kwaye ingumntu osisidenge? Bafundisa abanye ukuba bawugcine umthetho, kodwa bengenako ukuwugcina umthetho, wona ngokwawo akawugcini, ngoko ke ufundisa abanye ukuba bawuthobele umthetho, sisono , niya kohlwaywa abo baphantsi kwesiqalekiso somthetho → bakhangele kuMesiya ukuba abahlangule kwisiqalekiso somthetho. umthetho Undoqo "luthando → libhekisela kuKristu, umsindisi! Ukugcina incwadi yomthetho kuya kubabulala abantu, kuba ukuba uyasilela ukugcina incwadi kunye nemimiselo yomthetho, uya kugwetywa kwaye uqalekisiwe; Umoya womthetho uluthando - walatha "kumoya womoya" kaKristu kwaye ubenza baphile abantu . Umthetho awukwazi ukukusindisa, "ngumqeqeshi" nje wokusikhokelela kuKristu, kwaye sigwetyelwe kwaye sisindiswe ngokholo kuKristu → Gal 3: 23-25 Kodwa umgaqo wosindiso ngokholo awukafiki , kwaye sigadwe ngumthetho, siya kujikeleza de indlela yokwenene yekamva ibonakaliswe. Ngoko ke umthetho unguMkhapheli wethu, osikhokelela kuKristu, ukuze sigwetyelwe ngokwaselukholweni. Ngaba uyayiqonda le nto?

Kodwa ngoku ifikile inyaniso yosindiso ngokholo, asisekho phantsi “komfundisi” womthetho → umthetho ngumkhapheli wethu , uyayiqonda?" Ekubeni usindiso lukaYesu Kristu lufikile, asisekho phantsi kwesandla somfundisi "umthetho" → kodwa phantsi kwesandla sosindiso sikaKristu Sikhululwe kwaye sigcinwe kuKristu → ngale ndlela, ngaba sahluliwe okanye sishiywe? Umfundisi "Umthetho, ewe! Uyaqonda?

Okulandelayo, amaHebhere 5:12b →...Ngubani owaziyo, kuya kufuneka umntu akufundise ukuqala kwesikolo samabanga aphantsi selizwi likaThixo, kwaye uya kuba ngabaswele ubisi kwaye bangakwazi ukutya ukutya okuqinileyo.

Phawula:

1 Yayiyintoni isiqalo seHoly Word Elementary School? Njengoko bekutshiwo ngaphambili → Isiqalo sisiqalo se "B point", isiqalo → esibizwa ngokuba yiShengyan Primary School
2 Xa sasingabantwana, sasingahlukanga kumakhoboka, sasiphantsi kolawulo lwesikolo samabanga aphantsi phantsi kwenkosi “yomthetho” negosa elithi “Moses” ( Gal 4:1-3 ).
3 Ukwaphula “imithetho” nemigaqo yehlabathi esisiseko enjengethi, “Uze ungaphathi, uze ungangcamla, uze ungachukumisi.”— Kolose 2:21
4 Kutheni ungafuna ukubuyela kwisikolo samabanga aphantsi esinobugwala nesingenamsebenzi kwaye ukulungele ukuba likhoboka lakhe kwakhona? →"Isikolo samabanga aphantsi esingenamsebenzi" sibhekisa kwimithetho nemimiselo yomthetho → Jonga kuGalati 4:9

Itsho apha" Isikolo samabanga aphantsi esingenamsebenzi nesingenamsebenzi, akunjalo? "→Olokuqala ummiselo, lubuthathaka, lungenasiqhamo, lwabhangiswa (umthetho awufeza nto), kwaza kwaziswa elona themba lilungileyo, esinokuthi ngalo sisondele kuThixo. Hebhere 7:18 -Indinyana 19→ Ungabi nto yanto) Ngaba le nto ithethwa nguThixo eBhayibhileni? Ngaba nizizimvu zeNkosi? Abanye abantu abathandi ukuva amazwi kaThixo, kodwa bayathanda ukuva amazwi abantu, "namazwi kasathana." kholwa ngamazwi omfundisi. Ukuba akukholelwa oko uThixo akutshoyo eBhayibhileni, ngaba uyakholelwa kuYesu?

Ngoko uYesu wathi, “Aba bantu bandinqula ngomlomo, kodwa iintliziyo zabo zikude lee kum; bavuma ukukholwa kuYesu ngemilebe yabo, kodwa iintliziyo zabo zikude neNkosi, uYesu wathi: “Aba bantu banqula mna nje ngokungenamsebenzi." Uyaqonda? →Iicawa ezininzi ehlabathini namhlanje, kuquka iicawa zosapho, iicawe, iiSeventh-day Adventists, iiCharismatics, iiVangeli, iigusha ezilahlekileyo, iicawa zaseKorea, njl.njl., ziya kukufundisa ukuqala kwesikolo samabanga aphantsi selizwi likaThixo ubugwala kwaye engenamsebenzi kwisikolo samabanga" Ukugcina umthetho kaMoses → kukulungela ukuba phantsi komthetho nokuba likhoboka lesono kwakhona. Khangela oko kuthethwa kweyesi-2 kaPetros isahluko 2 indinyana 20-22 → Ukuba babesindiswa kukungcoliswa kwehlabathi ngolwazi lweNkosi noMsindisi uYesu Kristu, baze kamva barhintyelwe baze boyiswe kuko, imeko yabo yokugqibela yayiya kuba mbi ngakumbi. kuneyokuqala . Bayayazi indlela yobulungisa, kodwa bawunikele umva umyalelo ongcwele abawunikiweyo, ngekuba ngcono ukuba bebengawazi. Liyinyaniso iqhalo elithi: into egabha inja, ijike iphinde itye ihagu, ibuye igaqeke eludakeni; Uyaqonda?

KULUNGILE! Namhlanje siphononongile, sanxibelelana, kwaye sabelane ngayo apha Siza kwabelana ngayo kuhlelo olulandelayo: Isifundo sesi-2 sokuQala kokuMshiya uKrestu → Ukushiya "isono", ukuguquka kwimisebenzi efileyo, nokuthembela kuThixo.

Iintshumayelo zokwabelana ngombhalo, ziqhutywa nguMoya kaThixo Abasebenzi bakaYesu Krestu, uMzalwana uWang*Yun, uDade uLiu, uDade uZheng, uMzalwana uCen, kunye nabanye osebenza nabo, baxhasa kwaye basebenza kunye kumsebenzi wevangeli weBandla likaYesu Krestu. . Bashumayela ivangeli kaYesu Krestu, ivangeli evumela ukuba abantu basindiswe, bazukiswe, kwaye imizimba yabo ikhululwe! Amen, amagama abo abhalwe encwadini yobomi. articles.title: Ingcaciso yemibuzo enzima: Ubhaptizo lwenguquko nobhaptizo kuKrestu
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubazalwana noodade bam abathandekayo kwintsapho kaThixo! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile kwiZenzo isahluko 19 ivesi 1-3 Ke kaloku, xa uApolo wayeseKorinte, uPawulos watyhutyha ilizwe lasentla, weza e-Efese; Weva ukuba uMoya oyiNgcwele unikelwe.” UPawulos wabuza wathi: “Nanibhaptizwa ngobhaptizo luni na?” Bathi ke bona: “Lubhaptizo lukaYohane.

Namhlanje siza kufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane nawe "Ubhaptizo lwenguquko kunye nobhaptizo lozuko" Umahluko Umthandazo: Abha othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele usoloko enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! umfazi onesidima [IBandla] lithumela abasebenzi ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhalwe ezandleni zabo nangelizwi lenyaniso, eliyivangeli yosindiso lwenu nelizwi lozuko ixesha lonyaka, ukuze sibe ngabakaThixo, Ubomi boMoya bube bubuninzi ngakumbi. → cacile" ubhaptiziwe "Kumanywe noKristu, ngo" ubhaptizo ekufeni kwakhe, nasekungcwatyweni, nasekuvukeni; Lubhaptizo lozuko ! Hayi uYohane umBhaptizi ubhaptizo lwenguquko .

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen.

Masifunde amaRoma isahluko 6 iivesi 3-5 eBhayibhileni kwaye sizifunde kunye: Anazi na ukuba thina, sabhaptizelwayo kuKristu Yesu wabhaptizelwa ekufeni kwakhe ? Ngoko, thina Wangcwatywa kunye naye ngokubhaptizelwa ekufeni , ukuze konke ukushukuma kwethu sibe nobomi obutsha, njengokuba noKristu wavuswayo kwabafileyo ngalo uzuko loYise. Ukuba similiselwe kuye ngemfano yokufa kwakhe, somiliselwa kuye nasekuvukeni kwakhe okufana nokwakhe;

[Phawula]: " ubhaptiziwe "KuKristu → ekufeni kwakhe; esithi ngayo" ubhaptizo “Hamba uye ekufeni uze ungcwatywe naye → “Mngcwabe ixhego”, “Mka kwindoda endala” → “Ubhaptizo” “ngumngcwabo” → Manyaniswe Naye “kwimo” yokufa, nize nimanyaniswe naye. Ekwimo yovuko Lwakhe . " ubhaptiziwe "Ukuze uzukiswe → ngenxa yokuba ukufa kukaYesu emnqamlezweni kuzukisa uThixo uYise . Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

1. UYohane umBhaptizi ubhaptizo lwenguquko , kukuzalwa ngokutsha phambili yokuhlamba

buza: Kuthekani ngobhaptizo olungenawo "isiphumo"?

impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

1 Umbhaptizi wayengathunywanga nguThixo

Ngokomzekelo, “uYohane uMbhaptizi” wayethunywe nguThixo, yaye uYesu weza evela eGalili waya kumfumana kuMlambo iYordan ukuze amfumane ukuze abhaptizwe; Ukuba ayingo "Mbhaptizi" othunywe nguThixo → ubhaptizo aluyi kuba namphumo.

2 Umbhaptizi akakho egameni likaYesu Kristu

Umzekelo, "uPetros" → wabhaptiza iiNtlanga egameni likaYesu Kristu "uPawulos" → wababhaptiza egameni leNkosi uYesu - bhekisa kwiZenzo 10:48 kunye ne-19:5; Igama likaYesu Kristu , Babhaptize egameni loMoya oyiNgcwele → "Umbhaptizi" akayiqondi into yokuba "uYise, uNyana, noMoya oyiNgcwele". umnxeba →Hayi "igama"→Bona izibiyeli ngokucacileyo (babhaptizeni, nibabhalele kwigama loYise, loNyana, loMoya oyiNgcwele)→"Ababhaptizi" abaliqondi igama likaYesu, kwaye ubhaptizo abakubhaptizayo lulo. "ubhaptizo olungenamsebenzi". Funda kuMateyu 28:19

3 Umbhaptizi wayengumfazi

Njengoko "uPawulos" wathi → andimvumeli umfazi ukuba ashumayele, nokuba abe negunya phezu kwendoda, kodwa ukuba athi cwaka. Kungenxa yokuba kwadalwa uAdam kuqala, kwaza kwadalwa uEva okwesibini, yaye yayingengoAdam owalukuhlwayo, kodwa ngumfazi owalukuhlwayo waza wawela esonweni.

→" umfazi Ukuba umbhaptizi ubeka izandla zakhe phezu kweentloko zabazalwana noodade aze ‘ababhaptize,’ uphanga indoda ukuba ibe yintloko nentloko kaKristu.

4 Buyela kuYohane umBhaptizi ubhaptizo lwenguquko

Wathi kubo uPawulos, Namamkela na uMoya oyiNgcwele, nakholwayo nje? : "Ubhaptizo lukaYohane wathi: ". Into eyenziwa nguYohane yayilubhaptizo lwenguquko , exelela abantu ukuba bakholwe kulowo uya kuza emva kwakhe, uYesu. "

(1) UYesu wabhaptizwa entlango

Ngokwale nto, uYohane uza, ngo → " Ukubhaptiza entlango eshumayela ubhaptizo lwenguquko ukuze kuxolelwe izono ... Ngelo xesha uYesu weza evela eNazarete yelaseGalili, wabhaptizwa nguYohane eYordan eYordan.”— Marko 1:4, 9

Ndiyakholwa ukuba uYesu Krestu nguNyana kaThixo . ’) Ngoko wabayalela ukuba bayeke, yaye uFilipu nethenwa bangena kunye emanzini, waza uFilipu walibhaptiza.”— IZenzo 8, indinyana 26, 35-36, 38 .

(3) UYesu wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni eGolgotha entlango

Bamthabatha ke uYesu. UYesu wawuthwala umnqamlezo wakhe, waphuma waya kwindawo ebizwa ngokuba yiKalvari, ngesiHebhere eGolgotha . Apho bambethelela emnqamlezweni—Yohane 19:17-18

Kwakukho umyezo, apho uYesu wabethelelwa khona emnqamlezweni. Kukho ingcwaba elitsha egadini , akukho mntu wakha wangcwatywa. Ke kaloku, ngenxa yokuba yayiyimini yokulungiselela amaYuda, nangenxa yokuba ingcwaba belikufuphi, bambeka khona uYesu. — Yohane 19:41-42

(5) Simanyene naye ngokufana nokufa “entlango”.

Ukuba sikunye naye bamanywe naye ngemo yokufa , yaye baya kumanyana naye eluvukweni olufana nolo lwakhe— Roma 6:5

Anazi na ukuba thina, sabhaptizelwayo kuKristu Yesu, sabhaptizelwa ekufeni kwakhe? ke, sangcwatywa naye ngokubhaptizelwa ekufeni , ukuze konke ukushukuma kwethu sibe nobomi obutsha, njengokuba noKristu wavuswayo kwabafileyo ngalo uzuko loYise. — Roma 6:3-4

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen.

1 UYesu wenza umnqophiso omtsha kunye nathi

buza: Usebenzisa ntoni uYesu ukumisela umnqophiso omtsha nathi?
impendulo: UYesu wasebenzisa eyakhe Igazi Yenza umnqophiso omtsha kunye nathi! Amen.

1 kwabaseKorinte 11:23-26... yakuba ibulele, yasiqhekeza, yathi, Ngumzimba wam lo, onikelwa ngenxa yenu. Le ndebe niya kuyenza ngalo lonke ixesha enisukuba niyisela umnqophiso omtsha osegazini lam, ukundikhumbula. “Kuba ngamaxesha onke enisukuba nisidla esi sonka, niyisele le ndebe, niyakwazisa ukufa kweNkosi, ide ifike.

2. Indebe nesonka esikelelekileyo

buza: Yintoni indebe nesonka esisikelelwayo?
impendulo: indebe siyithamsanqele incindi yomdiliya Ewe" UmKrestu Igazi ", usikelelwe ngu" ikeyiki " Ngumzimba weNkosi ke lowo ! Amen. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

1 KWABASEKORINTE 10:15-16 Njengoko ndithetha kwabaqiqayo, wacikideni amazwi am. Indebe esiyisikelelayo, ayinasabelo na egazini likaKristu? Isonka esisiqhekezayo, asidleli na somzimba kaKristu? (Qaphela: Indebe nesonka esisisikeleleyo → ligazi likaKristu nomzimba wakhe)

3. UYesu sisonka sobomi

buza: Kuthetha ukuthini ukutya inyama yeNkosi nokusela igazi leNkosi?
impendulo: Ukuba nithi nidle, nisele inyama negazi leNkosi, niya kuba nobomi bukaKristu, ninobomi obungonaphakade. Amen.

UYOHANE 6:27 Musani ukusebenzela ukudla okutshabalalayo; sebenzelani ukudla okuhlala kuse ebomini obungunaphakade, aya kunipha kona uNyana woMntu; kuba uYise uThixo unitywine.

Yohane 6:48 Ndim isonka sobomi. Ivesi 50-51 Siso eso isonka esehla ezulwini, ukuze ukuba nithe nasidla anisayi kufa. Ndim isonka esiphilileyo, esi sehlayo emazulwini; Isonka endiya kumnika sona mna yinyama yam, endiyinikela ubomi behlabathi Ivesi 53-56 UYesu wathi, Inene, inene, ndithi kuni, Ukuba anithanga niyidle inyama yoNyana woMntu, nilisele igazi lakhe. Akukho bomi kuwe Lowo uyidlayo eyam inyama, alisele elam igazi, unobomi obungunaphakade, mna ndiya kumvusa ekufeni ngomhla wokugqibela;

4. Ukumanyana neNkosi kwimo yovuko

KwabaseRoma 6:5 Kuba xa similiselwe kuye ngentsobi yokufa kwakhe, somiliselwa kuye nasekuvukeni kwakhe okufana nokwakhe.

［ ubhaptiziwe ] → Ubhaptizo lwasemanzini lufanele lumanyaniswe Naye ekwimo yokufa, ukubhaptizelwa ekufeni, nokungcwatywa kunye Naye → Indoda yethu endala yangcwatyelwa entlango.

［ isidlo sangokuhlwa ] → Isidlo sangokuhlwa simele simanyaniswe neNkosi kuhlobo lovuko: umntu omtsha ovusiweyo wambatha umzimba kaKristu, ambathe uKristu, aze afumane isonka sobomi esikwimo evela ezulwini.

(1) Siyakholwa ukuba safa, sangcwatywa, savuswa kunye noKrestu Oku kukumanyana kwethu neNkosi. ukuzithemba ) ayinamilo.

(2) Ukholo olumilisiweyo lumanyene Naye →→Indebe kunye nesonka esisikelelekileyo ziyabonakala kwaye zikhona. ukumila “Incindi yomdiliya” ekwindebe yekaYehova Igazi .Ngento ebonakalayo nebambekayo" ikeyiki "Ngumzimba weNkosi, yamkela umzimba weNkosi kwaye Igazi Nantsi lapho" ukumila “Ukholo lumanyene naYe! Amen. Ngoko, uyaqonda?

5. Uphononongo kunye noCalucalulo

buza: Ukwahlula njani phakathi kokutya nokusela igazi leNkosi nomzimba?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

(1) Ukutya komzimba

Ngokuqhelekileyo ukutya okuvela emhlabeni, ukutya okuvela esiswini somzimba.

(2) Musani ukutya emthendelekweni weedemon

Oko kukuthi, musani ukubingelela kwizithixo, okanye utye isonka kwimifanekiso eqingqiweyo njengesidlo seNkosi.

(3) Indebe nesonka esikelelekileyo

→→Ligazi nomzimba kaKristu.

(4) Ukuba umntu uthe wadla isonka seNkosi, wayisela nendebe yeNkosi, engaqiqanga;

→→Kukukhubekisa umzimba negazi leNkosi.

(5) Zihlolisise [ ukuzithemba ] yamkela umzimba weNkosi kwaye Igazi

Eyesi-2 kwabaseKorinte 13:5 “Zivavanyeni” → zivavanyeni ukuba ninokholo okanye akunjalo. Anazi na, ukuba aningabo bangenakucikideka, ninaye uYesu Kristu kuni?

( isilumkiso : “Abadala nabefundisi” abaninzi baxelela abazalwana noodade ukuba bahlole izono zabo, kuba umntu wethu omdala, “umzimba wesono” ubethelelwe emnqamlezweni noKristu waza watshatyalaliswa “ngumzimba wesono” ofakwe ekufeni kukaKristu ngo "bhaptizo" kwaye uye Wangcwatyelwa entlango.
Hayi apha bize wena ulwaphulo-mthetho lokuhlola , ngenxa yokuba umntu ozelwe ngokutsha akanasono, yaye nabani na ozelwe nguThixo akanakuze one ( funda eyoku- 1 kaYohane 3:9 ).

Oku kungenxa yokuba ucikida ukholo lwakho. kholwani “Endebeni enentsikelelo incindi yomdiliya Ewe UmKrestu Igazi , isonka esisikelelweyo saba umzimba kaKristu , yamkela iNkosi Igazi kwaye Umzimba ! Amen. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

→→( kholwani ) ngo" ubhaptizo “Ukholo olufileyo kwisono, lufile kuwo umthetho, lufile kwindoda endala, lufile emandleni obumnyama, lufile elukholweni olufileyo kulo ihlabathi, lufile kubuntu obudala;

→→( kholwani ) Umntu ozelwe ngokutsha hlola Ngoku ayisendim ke odla ubomi, selukholo lukaKristu oselesidla ubomi kum, luyithabathele entliziyweni yam intliziyo kaKristu, ukuze samkele isonka sobomi sasezulwini. 【 isidlo sangokuhlwa 】Ngumntu wokomoya ofumana ukutya kokomoya. umzimba kaKristu kwaye Igazi ", umntu womoya Yitya apho" ukumila “Ukutya kokomoya kobomi basezulwini, oko kukuthi, uvuko” ukumila “Zimanye neNkosi! Uyayiqonda na le nto?

Ukwahlula: Isisu senyama sidla ukutya emhlabeni basele ezabo izono? Ngaba abo badala kunye nabafundisi bayakucela ukuba uvume izono zakho, uguquke, uhlolisise izono zakho, ucime izono zakho, kwaye uzihlambulule? Kucacile ukuba aba bantu abawuqondi umzimba nobomi bukaKristu.

→Awuyazi kengoku? Ukuba ukholelwa ngokwenene ekuvusweni kunye noKrestu, into ehlala ezintliziyweni zakho ngoku bubomi bukaKristu! Isalathiso - kwabaseRoma 8, 9-10 kunye noYohane 1, 3, 24.

Nidla ukutya kweNkosi "isidlo" Kaninzi hlola Ngaba ubomi bukaKristu kuni busono? Ngaba umzimba kaKristu usisono? Ngaba uKristu wayenetyala? Ngaba usafuna ukucima izono zakho kwaye uzihlambe? Ngaba ngokwenene awunalwazi? Ngenxa yokuba inyama yethu endala, kunye neminqweno neenkanuko zayo, yabethelelwa emnqamlezweni kunye noKristu kwaye umzimba wesono watshatyalaliswa. Ungcwatyelwe engcwabeni! Uyayikholelwa? Uyaqonda?

Abo babizwa ngokuba “Abadala, Abefundisi neqela labo abaqondi konke konke” IBhayibhile 》Inyaniso, ukuba abakuqondanga ukuzalwa ngokutsha baza bamkela uMoya oyiNgcwele, abanabo ubomi bukaKristu. Baninzi abazele kukulahlekiswa, belahlekiswa ngumoya wolahlekiso, banigcina ezonweni zenu;

(6) Ukuba aniwuvali umzimba weNkosi, niya kudla niyisele izono zenu

→ “Niya kugwetywa niyohlwaywa yiNkosi” →Baninzi ababuthathaka nabagulayo, yaye abaninzi bafile—Imbekiselo (1 Korinte 11:29-32)

(7) Ixhego liyatya lisele ukutya okusemhlabeni

【 indoda endala ] → 1 Korinte 6:13 Ukutya kokwesisu, nesisu sesokutya;

【 Umntu omtsha 】→ umntu womoya Ngoku" Umntu omtsha "Yambathani uKristu, nambathe ubuntu obutsha → nibe ngcwele, ningabi nasono, ningabi nasiphako, ningabi nakudyobheka, ningonakali → nibe bubomi bukaKristu → nihlale kuKristu, nifihlwe noKristu kuThixo, nidle isonka esivela ezulwini, nisele kwabaphilileyo. Amanzi obomi!

articles.title: Ubhaptizo 3 Ubhaptizo loMlilo
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubazalwana noodade bam abathandekayo kwintsapho kaThixo! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile yethu kuLuka 12 iindinyana 49-50 size sifunde kunye: Ndize kuphosa umlilo emhlabeni; ukuba ubusele uphenjiwe, ubungayi kuba yilento bendiyifunayo na? Ubhaptizo endilufaneleyo alukazaliseki. Ndingxamiseke kangakanani na?

Namhlanje ndiza kufunda, ndidlelane, kwaye sabelane nani nonke "Ubhaptizo loMlilo" Thandaza: U-Abha othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! umfazi onesidima [IBandla] lithumela abasebenzi* ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo nelithethiweyo ezandleni zabo, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwenu ~ ukuba bazise ukutya okuvela endaweni ekude esibhakabhakeni, baze basilungiselele ngexesha elifanelekileyo, ukuze ukuze ubomi bethu bokomoya bube nobutyebi obungcono! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke ikhanyisela amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye siwabone amazwi akho, aziinyaniso zasemoyeni→ Masakhe phezu kolwalwa lokomoya lukaKristu, ukuze ukholo lwethu lukwazi ukusinda kuvavanyo lomlilo yaye luxabiseke ngaphezu kwegolide etshabalalayo. . Amen!

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

1. Ubhaptizo ngomlilo

Masifunde iBhayibhile, uLuka 12, iivesi 49-50, siyityhile kwaye siyifunde kunye: "Ndiyeza umlilo Ukuyijula phantsi, ukuba sele isitsha, asiyiyo le nto ndiyifunayo? Ubhaptizo endilufaneleyo alukaphunyezwa.

buza: Yintoni ukubhaptizwa ngomlilo?

impendulo: INkosi uYesu yathi → ndiyeza " umlilo "Yiphose phantsi →" umlilo "Kuthetha ukuba uThixo uphakama kwindawo apho kukho ukubandezeleka, intshutshiso, inkcaso kunye neentshaba macala onke, kodwa akabanjiswa →" ukuzithemba "hamba kwi" umlilo “Uvavanyo luxabiseke ngaphezu kwegolide eyonakalayo.

Ukuba sele iqalile → "Ewe" umlilo "Uvavanyo lufikile", asiyiyo le nto ndiyifunayo? Ubhaptizo endilufaneleyo alukaphunyezwa.

buza: UYesu ubhaptiziwe nguYohane umbhaptizi → " Hlamba ngamanzi "kwaye" ubhaptizo lomoya oyingcwele "→ Izulu lavulelwa yena," uMoya oyiNgcwele Kwaba ngathi lihobe phezu kwakhe! hlamba "Akukho mpumelelo?
impendulo: " ubhaptizo lomlilo "→ YiNkosi uYesu Kristu" ngenxa "yethu sonke" qhubeka umva “Umnqamlezo ngowethu ulwaphulo-mthetho ( ubunzima )→wafela izono zethu, wangcwatywa, wabuya wavuka ngomhla wesithathu→uKristu wavuka kwabafileyo” ukuzalwa ngokutsha "Wasikhulula → wasikhulula esonweni, emthethweni nakwisiqalekiso somthetho, umntu omdala kunye nezenzo zakhe, kunye namandla obumnyama kaSathana eHadesi → uvuko lukaKristu lwasigwebela! Ukuzalwa kwakhona, uvuko , usindiswe, kwaye ube nobomi obungunaphakade Amen. yena ) Ubomi obungenakonakala, obungapheliyo, obungadyobhekanga, obungunaphakade! Nantsi into eyathethwa nguYesu: “Ubhaptizo endilufaneleyo alukazaliseki. Ndingxamiseke kangakanani na?

2 UYesu wabhaptizwa ngomlilo

→Sihlupheka naye" ubhaptizo lomlilo "
→Sikunye naye ubunzima ,
→naye ndiya kuba naye makazukiswe !

Wathi ke uYesu kubo, Nani indebe niyisela mna, niyisele; Kwangolu bhaptizo wabhaptizwa ngalo, nani niya kubhaptizwa kwangalo ;Imbekiselo-Marko Isahluko 10 ivesi 39

Ukuba ke bangabantwana, baziindlalifa, iindlalifa zikaThixo, iindlalifa ke kunye noKristu. ukuba sinaye ubunzima , zaye ziya kuzukiswa kunye naye . — Roma 8:17

buza: Uzukiswa njani noKristu?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

1 Shiya yonke into ngasemva
2 zincame
3 Landela uYesu ushumayele iindaba ezilungileyo zobukumkani bamazulu
4 Ukuthiya ubomi obudala bomntu
5 Thabatha umnqamlezo wakho
6 Lahla ubomi obudala
7 Buyela kubomi obungunaphakade bukaKristu! Amen

Kunjengokuba iNkosi uYesu yathi: “Waza wasibizela ndawonye isihlwele, kwanabafundi bakhe, wathi kubo, Ukuba ubani uthanda ukundilandela, makazincame, awuthwale umnqamlezo wakhe, andilandele. Kuba othe wathanda ukuwusindisa umphefumlo wakhe, wolahlekelwa nguwo; ke yena othe wawulahla umphefumlo wakhe ngenxa yam, nangenxa yeendaba ezilungileyo ezi, wowusindisa. Amen!
→Ukuba sikunye naye imilo efileyo naye ngokubambisana , nakuye imilo yovuko naye ngokubambisana . Le yinkqubo yokuzukiswa kunye noKristu. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo? Imbekiselo ( Marko 8:34-35 namaRoma 6:5 )

3. Ukuzithemba kukuba " umlilo "Izilingo zixabiseke ngaphezu kwegolide eyonakalayo."

(1) Ukholo luvavanywa ngomlilo

Ukuze ukholo lwenu, lwakuba “lucikidile,” luxabiseke ngakumbi kunegolide “etshabalalayo” nakuba icikidwa “ngomlilo,” ukuze namkele indumiso nozuko nembeko ekubonakaleni kukaYesu Kristu. . Imbekiselo - 1 Petros Isahluko 1 ivesi 7

(2) Yakhiwe ngegolide, isilivere namatye anqabileyo

Ukuba nabani na wakha phezu kwesi siseko ngegolide, isilivere, amatye anqabileyo, iinkuni, iindiza, umsebenzi womntu ngamnye uya kutyhilwa; Ukuba umsebenzi awawakhayo umntu phezu kweso siseko uyahlala, wowamkela umvuzo. Ukuba umsebenzi womntu uthe watshiswa, wolahlekelwa ngumvuzo wakhe; Imbekiselo - eyoku-1 kwabaseKorinte 3:12-15

(3)Bubeke ubuncwane kwisitya sodongwe

Obu “butyebi” bubekwe kwizitya zodongwe ukubonisa ukuba la mandla makhulu avela kuThixo, kungekhona kuthi. Singqongwe ziintshaba macala onke, kodwa asibambi, kodwa asidaniswa, kodwa asishiywanga phantsi; Sisoloko sithwele ukufa kukaYesu ukuze “ubomi bukaYesu butyhileke” kuthi. → Ukuba umntu uthe wazihlambulula entweni ephantsi, woba sisitya sembeko, singcwalisiwe, silungele iNkosi, silungiselwe wonke umsebenzi olungileyo. Amen! Imbekiselo-yesi-2 kuTimoti Isahluko 2 Ivesi 21 neyesi-2 kwabaseKorinte Isahluko 4 Ivesi 7-10

Bashumayela iindaba ezilungileyo zikaYesu Kristu, ongulo Ivangeli evumela abantu ukuba basindiswe, bazukiswe, kwaye imizimba yabo ikhululwe ! Amen

articles.title: Babhaptizwe 2 Babhaptizwe emanzini
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubazalwana noodade bam abathandekayo kwintsapho kaThixo! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile yethu kumaRoma isahluko 6 iindinyana 3-4 size sizifunde kunye: Anazi na ukuba thina, sabhaptizelwayo kuKristu Yesu, sabhaptizelwa ekufeni kwakhe? Ngoko ke sangcwatywa naye ngokubhaptizelwa ekufeni, ukuze sihambe sinobomi obutsha, njengokuba uKristu wavuswayo kwabafileyo ngalo uzuko loYise. .

Namhlanje siyafunda, sinxulumana, kwaye sabelane nawe - bhaptizwa "Babhaptizelwa emanzini" Thandaza: U-Abha othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! umfazi onesidima [IBandla] lithumela abasebenzi** ngamazwi abhaliweyo ezandleni zabo, nangelizwi lenyaniso abalishumayelayo, elishumayela iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwenu ~ukuba bazise ukudla kwakude kwamazulu, basilungiselele ngexesha elililo, ukuze singangoMoya Ubomi buninzi ngakumbi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke ikhanyisela amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye siwabone amazwi akho, aziinyaniso zasemoyeni→ Qonda ukuba xa iiNtlanga “zibhaptizwa emanzini” zibhaptizelwa ekufeni kukaKristu, “zimanyaniswa” noKristu ekufeni, ukungcwatywa nokuvuka, kwaye zibhaptizwa emva kokuzalwa ngokutsha nokusindiswa. Amen Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen.

1. Ubhaptizo lwamaYuda

→→Bhaptizwa ngaphambi kokuba uzalwe kwakhona

1 Ubhaptizo lukaYohane umBhaptizi → lubhaptizo lwenguquko

UMarko 1:1-5...Ngokwala mazwi, uYohane weza ebhaptiza entlango, evakalisa ubhaptizo lwenguquko, ukuze kuxolelwe izono. Aphuma ke onke amaYuda neYerusalem, aya kuYohane, ezixela izono zawo, aza abhaptizwa nguye eYordan eYordan.

2 UYesu wabhaptizwa →wamkela uMoya oyiNgcwele ;

Bonke abantu babhaptizwa → abazange bamkele uMoya oyiNgcwele . Imbekiselo kuLuka 3 ivesi 21-22

3 AmaYuda → emva “kobhaptizo lwenguquko” → akholelwa kuYesu njengoMsindisi, yaye abapostile “babeka izandla zabo” baza bathandaza, emva koko bamkela “uMoya Oyingcwele” ——Funda iZenzo 8:14-17;

4 IiNtlanga →Ukuba uyalwamkela “ubhaptizo lwenguquko” nguYohane umBhaptizi →oko kukuthi, abo “bangazange” bawamkele uMoya oyiNgcwele ngenxa yokuba bengaziqondi iindaba ezilungileyo babhaptizwa egameni leNkosi uYesu nompostile uPawulos “ubeka izandla” phezu kweentloko zabo → ukuze bamkele uMoya Oyingcwele—Bona iZenzo 19:1-7

2. Ubhaptizo lweeNtlanga

---Ubhaptizwe emva kokuzalwa kwakhona---

1 IiNtlanga →“UPetros” washumayela endlwini kaKorneli, baza “beva” ilizwi lenyaniso, eliziindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwenu→batywinwa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele owathenjiswayo→oko kukuthi “babhaptizwa” emva kokuzalwa ngokutsha. →Funda eyabase-Efese 1 Isahluko 13-14 IZenzo 10:44-48 .

2 IiNtlanga “Ithenwa” lamva uFilipu eshumayela ngoYesu→ ubhaptiziwe —Funda iZenzo 8:26-38

articles.title: Ubhaptizo 1 Ubhaptizo loMoya oyiNgcwele
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubazalwana noodade bam abathandekayo kwintsapho kaThixo! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile yethu kwiZenzo isahluko 11, iivesi 15-16 size sifunde kunye: "Wathi umpostile uPetros," → Ke kaloku, xa ndiqala ukuthetha, uMoya oyiNgcwele wabawela, kanye njengoko wehlela phezu kwethu. Ndakhumbula amazwi eNkosi athi: “UYohane wabhaptiza ngamanzi, kodwa nina nimele ukubhaptizwa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele.” '

Namhlanje ndiza kufunda, ndinxulumane nawe, kwaye sabelane nawe - ubhaptizwe "Ubhaptizo loMoya oyiNgcwele" Thandaza: U-Abha othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! umfazi onesidima [IBandla] lithumela ngaphambili abasebenzi,* ivangeli yosindiso lwakho, ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhalwe ezandleni zabo kwaye lithethwe ngabo! Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Yanga iNkosi uYesu ingaqhubeka iwakhanyisela amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuba siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive nokuwabona amazwi akho! Yinyaniso yokomoya → Qonda indlela eyiyo, kholelwa kwivangeli, kwaye ufumane ubhaptizo loMoya oyiNgcwele → ukufumana ukuzalwa kwakhona, uvuko, usindiso, kunye nobomi obungunaphakade . Amen!

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen.

1. Kufuneka ubhaptizwe ngoMoya oyiNgcwele

Masifunde iBhayibhile size sifunde uMarko 1:8 kunye: Mna ndinibhaptiza ngamanzi; ke yena uya kunibhaptiza ngoMoya oyiNgcwele .

UYohane wabhaptiza ngamanzi, kodwa ngeentsuku ezimbalwa, Kufuneka ubhaptizwe ngoMoya oyiNgcwele . ”— IZenzo Isahluko 1 Indinyana 5

Ndithe ke ndakuqala ukuthetha, wesuka wabawela uMoya oyiNgcwele, njengoko wasiwelayo. Ndakhumbula amazwi eNkosi athi: ‘ UYohane wabhaptiza ngamanzi, kodwa nina nimelwe kubhaptizwa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele . ’—IZenzo 11:15-16

[Qaphela] Oku sikubhale ngokuqwalasela ezi zibhalo zingasentla:

→ 1 UYohane umbhaptizi wathi: Mna ndinibhaptiza ngamanzi, kodwa uYesu uya kunibhaptiza ngamanzi. uMoya oyiNgcwele “Ndikubhaptize
→ 2 Wathi ke uYesu, UYohane wabhaptiza ngamanzi, kodwa nina nimelwe kubhaptizwa. uMoya oyiNgcwele " yokuhlamba
→ 3 Uthe ke uPetros, Ndiqala ngokushumayela iindaba ezilungileyo zikaYesu Kristu. uMoya oyiNgcwele ” lwaza lwafikela “abeeNtlanga,” kanye njengokuba lwenzekayo kuthi ekuqaleni, yaye ndakhumbula amazwi eNkosi athi: ‘UYohane wabhaptiza ngamanzi; Kufuneka ubhaptizwe ngoMoya oyiNgcwele . Amen!

buza: Kuba thina "beeNtlanga" → "siva inyaniso kwaye sikholelwe iindaba ezilungileyo" → samkele " ubhaptizo lomoya oyingcwele "! Ke, siwuva njani umyalezo oyinyaniso weendaba ezilungileyo?

impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

2 Yiva indlela yenyaniso kwaye uqonde indlela yenyaniso

impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

(1) Ekuqaleni kwakukho iTao, yaye iTao yayinguThixo

Ekuqaleni kwakukho iTao, kwaye iTao yayikunye noThixo, kwaye iTao yayinguThixo. Lo Lizwi wayekunye noThixo kwasekuqalekeni. — Yohane 1:1-2

(2)ULizwi ke waba yinyama

ULizwi waba yinyama, oko kukuthi “uThixo” waba yinyama!
ULizwi ke waba ngumntu, waza wahlala phakathi kwethu, ezele lubabalo nayinyaniso. Sabubukela ubungangamsha bakhe awabunikwa nguYise, njengoko ekukuphela koNyana wakhe; Imbekiselo ( Yohane 1:14 )

(3) Igama lakhe nguYesu

Wakhawulwa nguMoya oyiNgcwele kwaye wazalwa yiNtombi enyulu uMariya!
Ukuzalwa kukaYesu Kristu kubhaliwe ngolu hlobo: UMariya unina wayesele eganelwe uYosefu, kodwa bengekatshati, uMariya wamitha ngoMoya oyiNgcwele. …Uya kuzala unyana, uze umthiye igama elinguYesu, kuba eya kubasindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo. (Funda uMateyu 1:18, 21.)

(4)UYesu ulukhanyiselo lobomi

15Kuye ubomi obo, baye obo bomi kukukhanya eluntwini.
Emva koko uYesu wathi kwizihlwele: “Ndim ukhanyiselo lwehlabathi; lowo undilandelayo akasayi kuze ahambe ebumnyameni, kodwa uya kuba nalo ukhanyiso lobomi.”

(5)Indlela yobomi

Ngokusingisele kwilizwi lantlandlolo lobomi kwasekuqalekeni, oku koko sikuvileyo, sakubonayo, sakubona ngamehlo ethu, saza sakuchukumisa ngezandla zethu. (Obu bomi butyhilekile, nathi sabubona, yaye ngoku siyangqina ukuba sininika ubomi obungunaphakade obukuye uYise, kwaye babonakaliswa kuthi.) ( 1 Yohane 1:1-2 )

UYesu wathi: “Ndim indlela, ndim inyaniso, ndim ubomi; akukho namnye uzayo kuBawo, engezi ngam.

3. Kholelwa kwivangeli-fumana itywina loMoya oyiNgcwele

Kuba oko ndaninikelayo nam kuni, eyokuqala, yokuba uKristu wazifela izono zethu ngokwezibhalo, nokokuba wangcwatywa, nokokuba wavuswa kwabafileyo ngomhla wesithathu, ngokutsho kweZibhalo (1 Korinte 15 Isahluko 3-4).

Yizani kum nonke nina nibulalekayo, nisindwayo ngumthwalo, ndoninika ukuphumla. Thabathani idyokhwe yam niyithwale, nifunde kum; ngokuba ndinobulali, ndithobekile ngentliziyo, noyifumanela ukuphumla imiphefumlo yenu. Kuba idyokhwe yam imnandi, nomthwalo wam ulula. ”— Mateyu 11 indinyana 28-30

Ukuba simanywe naye ngemfano yokufa kwakhe, siya kumanyaniswa naye ngemfano yokuvuka kwakhe – Roma 6:3-5

(3) Abo bakholiweyo banokungena ekuphumleni

articles.title: ISabatha Iintsuku ezintandathu zomsebenzi kunye nomhla wesixhenxe wokuphumla
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubazalwana noodade bam abathandekayo kwintsapho kaThixo! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibhile kwiGenesis isahluko 2 ivesi 1-2 Zonke izinto ezisezulwini nasemhlabeni zadalwa. Ngosuku lwesixhenxe, umsebenzi kaThixo wokudala wawugqityiwe, ngoko waphumla kuwo wonke umsebenzi wakhe ngomhla wesixhenxe.

Namhlanje sizakufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane kunye "iSabatha" Thandaza: U-Abha othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! umfazi onesidima [IBandla] lithumela ngaphambili abasebenzi ngelizwi lenyaniso, elibhaliweyo laza lathethwa ezandleni zabo, ivangeli yosindiso lwenu. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zomoya → Qonda ukuba uThixo wawugqiba umsebenzi wendalo ngeentsuku ezintandathu waza waphumla ngomhla wesixhenxe → owamiselwa njengosuku olungcwele .

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

(1) UThixo wadala izulu nomhlaba ngeentsuku ezintandathu

Usuku 1: Ekuqaleni uThixo wadala amazulu nehlabathi. Ke umhlaba wawusenyanyeni, kuselubala, kwakumnyama phezu kobuso senzonzobila, kodwa uMoya kaThixo wawuphezu kwamanzi. Wathi uThixo makubekho ukukhanya. Kwabakho ke ukukhanya. Wakubona ke uThixo ukukhanya ukuba kulungile, wahlula phakathi kokukhanya nobumnyama. Wathi uThixo ukukhanya yimini, wathi ubumnyama bubusuku. Kuhlwa, kube kusasa. — Genesis 1:1-5

Usuku 2: Wathi uThixo, Makubekho umoya phakathi kwamanzi, ukwahlula amanzi angaphezulu nangaphezulu. Kwaye kwaba njalo. — Genesis 1:6-7

Usuku 3: Wathi uThixo, Amanzi angaphantsi kwamazulu makahlanganiselwe ndaweni-nye, kubonakale okomileyo. Wathi uThixo okomileyo ngumhlaba, wathi intlanganisela yamanzi lulwandle. Wabona uThixo ukuba kulungile. Wathi uThixo, Umhlaba mawuphume uhlaza, nemifuno evelisa imbewu, nemithi eyenza iziqhamo, embewu ikuyo, ngohlobo lwayo. --Genesis 1 Isahluko 9-11 Imithendeleko

Usuku 4: Wathi uThixo, Makubekho izikhanyiso esibhakabhakeni, zokuhlukanisa imini nobusuku, zibe ngumqondiso wamaxesha, neentsuku, neminyaka; — Genesis 1:14-15

Usuku 5: Wathi uThixo, “Amanzi mawanyakazele imiphefumlo ephilileyo, kuphaphazele iintaka phezu komhlaba nasesibhakabhakeni.”— Genesis 1:20

Usuku 6: Wathi uThixo, Umhlaba mawuphume imiphefumlo ephilileyo ngohlobo lwayo: izinto ezizitho zine, nezinambuzane, namarhamncwa, ngohlobo lwayo. Wathi uThixo, Masenze umntu ngokomfanekiselo wethu ngokufana nathi, babe nobukhosi ezintlanzini zolwandle, nasezintakeni zezulu, nasezintweni ezizitho zine emhlabeni, naphezu komhlaba wonke, nasehlabathini lonke. yonke izinambuzane ezinambuzelayo emhlabeni ” Wamdala ke uThixo umntu ngokomfanekiselo wakhe; — Genesis 1:24, 26-27

(2) Umsebenzi wokudala wagqitywa ngeentsuku ezintandathu waza waphumla ngomhla wesixhenxe

Zonke izinto ezisezulwini nasemhlabeni zadalwa. Ngosuku lwesixhenxe, umsebenzi kaThixo wokudala wawugqityiwe, ngoko waphumla kuwo wonke umsebenzi wakhe ngomhla wesixhenxe. Wawusikelela uThixo umhla wesixhenxe, wawungcwalisa; — Genesis 2:1-3

(3) UMthetho kaMoses → iSabatha

“Khumbula umhla wesabatha, ukuba uwungcwalise imihla emithandathu, uze uwusebenze, uwenze wonke umsebenzi wakho; ke wona umhla wesixhenxe yisabatha kaYehova uThixo wakho , nezicaka zakho nezicakakazi zakho , nemfuyo yakho , nomphambukeli wakho ophambukele esixekweni bangenzi namnye umsebenzi ngawo, kuba ngemihla emithandathu uYehova wenza izulu, nomhlaba, nolwandle, neento zonke ezikwezo zinto, waphumla ngomhla wesixhenxe; Ngoko ke uYehova wawusikelela umhla wesabatha waza wawungcwalisa.— Eksodus Isahluko 20 ivesi 8-11

ukhumbule ukuba ube ulikhoboka ezweni laseYiputa, akukhupha kulo uYehova uThixo wakho ngesandla esithe nkqi, nangengalo eyolukileyo; Ngako oko ukuwisele umthetho uYehova uThixo wakho, ukuba uyigcine isabatha. — Duteronomi 5:15

[Phawula]: UYehova uThixo wawugqiba umsebenzi wendalo ngeentsuku ezintandathu → waphumla kuwo wonke umsebenzi Wakhe wendalo ngomhla wesixhenxe → “waphumla”. UThixo wawusikelela umhla wesixhenxe waza wawumisela njengosuku olungcwele → “iSabatha”.

KwiMithetho Elishumi yoMthetho kaMoses, amaSirayeli ayalelwa ukuba akhumbule “iSabatha” aze ayigcine ngcwele, ayesebenza iintsuku ezintandathu aze aphumle ngomhla wesixhenxe.

buza: Kwakutheni ukuze uThixo axelele amaSirayeli ukuba ‘ayigcine’ iSabatha?

impendulo: Khumbula ukuba babengamakhoboka ezweni laseYiputa, awabakhuphayo uYehova uThixo ngesandla esithe nkqi, nangengalo eyolukileyo. Ngoko ke, uYehova uThixo wayalela amaSirayeli ukuba ‘ayigcine’ iSabatha. “Akukho kuphumla kwamakhoboka, kodwa kukho ukuphumla kwabo bakhululekileyo ebukhobokeni → banandiphe ubabalo lukaThixo. Ngaba uyakuqonda oku ngokucacileyo? Imbekiselo - Duteronomi 5:15

2021.07.07

Namhlanje sizakufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane kunye "yahlukana" Hayi. 3 Thetha kwaye wenze umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, Nkosi yethu uYesu Krestu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! umfazi onesidima [IBandla] lithumela ngaphambili abasebenzi ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo nelithethiweyo ezandleni zabo, eliyivangeli yosindiso nozuko lwenu. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

"Umtsha"

Kuba yena uluxolo lwethu, uye wabenza babini baba banye, waluchitha ke udonga olwahlulayo, wabuphanzisa emzimbeni wakhe ubutshaba, nemimiselo ebhaliweyo emthethweni, ukuze adale umntu omtsha. ngokusebenzisa ezi zimbini, ngaloo ndlela kufikelelwa imvisiswano. — Efese 2:14-15

Ukuba ubani ukuKristu, usisidalwa esitsha; — 2 Korinte 5:17

Ukuba ke uhleli kuni uMoya kaThixo, aningabo abenyama, ningaboMoya. Ukuba umntu akanaye uMoya kaKristu, akangokaKristu lowo. — Roma 8:9

[Phawula]: Ukuba ke uMoya kaThixo uhleli kuni, aningabo abenyama, ningaboMoya.

buza: Umntu omtsha wahlulwa njani kwindoda endala?

impendulo: Umoya kaThixo “nguMoya Oyingcwele” noMoya woNyana Wakhe → “uhlala” ezintliziyweni zenu → oko kukuthi, umntu omtsha “asinguye owendoda endala,” eyinyama ka-Adam, kodwa yeyomntu omtsha. uMoya oyiNgcwele. →Umntu omtsha uphila kuKristu ngenxa yobulungisa; “umntu omdala” uyafa ngenxa yesono. Musani ukuxokisana, kuba nizihlubile nje umntu omdala, nezenzo zakhe.”— Kolose 3:9

Ukuba naliva ilizwi lakhe, nayamkela imfundiso yakhe, nayifunda inyaniso yakhe, nizilahleni ngoko izinto zenu ezidala, zonakalayo ngokulukuhla kwenkanuko.”— Efese 4:21-22

[Phawula]: Uye wawaphulaphula amazwi akhe, wamkela iimfundiso zakhe, waza wafunda inyaniso yakhe → uye weva “ilizwi lenyaniso” Ekubeni ukholiwe kuKristu, ufumene “uMoya Oyingcwele” othenjisiweyo njengetywina → uzalwa ngokutsha! Le ndoda endala iya isiba mbi ngokuthe ngcembe ngenxa yenkohliso yeminqweno yokuzingca →umzimba wangaphandle uyatshatyalaliswa."

Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zomoya → Qonda ukuba iNkosi uYesu yasebenzisa igazi layo ukuseka “uMnqophiso Omtsha” nathi ukuze sigwetyelwe kwaye sifumane iwonga loonyana bakaThixo. .

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

ITestamente eNdala

( 1 ) UMnqophiso woMthetho ka-Adam → uMnqophiso woBomi noKufa

UYehova uThixo wamwisela umthetho uAdam, wathi, Kuwo nawuphi na umthi womyezo ungadla ude utye, kodwa ungatyi kuwo umthi wokwazi okulungileyo nokubi, kuba mhla uthe wadla kuwo uya kufa. — Genesis 2:16-17

( 2 ) Umnqophiso kaNowa woMvula

UThixo wathi: “Kukho umqondiso womnqophiso ongunaphakade phakathi kwam nani nayo yonke imiphefumlo ephilileyo ekuni. Umnyama ndiwubeka efini, yaye uya kuba ngumqondiso womnqophiso ophakathi kwam nomhlaba.”— Genesis IGenesis Isahluko 9 iivesi 12-13 Qaphela: UMnqophiso woMnyama → ngumnqophiso woxolo → “umnqophiso ongunaphakade” → ufanekisela “umnqophiso omtsha” owenziwa nguYesu kunye nathi, ongumnqophiso wanaphakade.

( 3 ) Umnqophiso ka-Abraham woKholo

Wathetha uYehova kuye, wathi, Akayi kuba yindlamafa yakho lo; Wathi yena kuye, Iya kuba njalo imbewu yakho. Wakholwa ke uAbram kuYehova, uYehova wakubalela kuye oko ebulungiseni. — Genesis 15:4-6 . Qaphela: Umnqophiso ka-Abraham → "ukholo" umnqophiso → "idinga" umnqophiso → "ukugwetyelwa" ngokholo".

( 4 ) UMnqophiso woMthetho kaMoses

"Imithetho elishumi, imimiselo, nezigwebo" → Wawabiza uMoses onke amaSirayeli, wathi kuwo, Yiphulaphuleni imimiselo namasiko, maSirayeli, endininika wona namhlanje, ukuba niwafunde, niwenze. UYehova uThixo wethu wenza umnqophiso nathi eNtabeni yeHorebhe, lo “mnqophiso” awenziwanga noobawo bethu, kodwa wawenza nathi baphilayo apha namhlanje— Duteronomi 5:1-3 .

[Phawula]: "ITestamente Endala" →ibandakanya 1 Umnqophiso woMthetho ka-Adam, 2 uMnqophiso kaNowa woXolo wawufuzisela uMnqophiso oMtsha, 3 Ukholo luka-Abraham-uMnqophiso Wesithembiso, 4 UMnqophiso woMthetho kaMoses wenziwa namaSirayeli.

Ngenxa yobuthathaka benyama yethu, asinako ukuzalisekisa “ubulungisa bomthetho” oko kukuthi, “imithetho, nemimiselo, nemimiselo” yomthetho, ukusilela ukwenza oko kukwaphulwa kwesivumelwano.

1 Imimiselo yangaphambili yayibuthathaka kwaye ayinamsebenzi → ngoko ke yabhangiswa

Imimiselo yangaphambili yabhangiswa ngenxa yokuba yayingenamandla yaye ingenamsebenzi - Hebhere 7:18 → Isaya 28:18 “uya kwaphulwa ngokuqinisekileyo umnqophiso wakho neHadesi.

2 Umthetho awuphumeleli nto → kufuneka utshintshwe

(Umthetho awufezanga nto) ngaloo ndlela uzisa elona themba lilunge ngakumbi esinokungena ngalo ebukhweni bukaThixo. KumaHebhere 7:19 → Ke kaloku, ububingeleli baguqulwa nje, umelwe kukutshintshwa nomthetho. — Hebhere 7:12

3 Iziphene kwisivumelwano sangaphambili → Yenza umnqophiso omtsha

Ukuba bekungekho ziphoso kumnqophiso wokuqala, bekungayi kubakho indawo yokujonga umnqophiso wamva. Ngoko ke, uYehova wabakhalimela abantu Bakhe yaza yathi (okanye iguqulelwe: Ngoko iNkosi yalatha kwiintsilelo zomnqophiso wokuqala): “Kuya imihla, endiya kwenza ngayo umnqophiso omtsha nendlu kaSirayeli, nendlu kaYuda; Andizange ndibanqophise ookhokho babo ekuphumeni kwam eJiputa, ndibanqophise, kuba bengawugcinanga umnqophiso wam,” utsho uNdikhoyo.

ITestamente Entsha

( 1 ) UYesu wenza umnqophiso omtsha nathi ngegazi lakhe

INkosi uYesu ngobusuku eyanikelwa ngayo yathatha isonka, yaza yakuba ibulele, yasiqhekeza, yathi: “Ngumzimba wam lo, onikelwa ngenxa yenu. wena.” Oku kwenzeleni ukundikhumbula. Emva kwesidlo sangokuhlwa, wathabatha nendebe, wathi, Le ndebe ingumnqophiso omtsha osegazini lam; mna. ”— 1 Korinte 11:23-25

( 2 ) Isiphelo somthetho nguKristu

“Nguwo lo umnqophiso endiya kuwenza nabo emva kwaloo mihla, itsho iNkosi: Ndiya kuyibhala imithetho yam ezintliziyweni zabo, ndize ndiyibeke ngaphakathi kwabo nokunxaxha kwabo zixolelwe, akusafuneki mbingelelo wezono. -- Hebhere 10:16-18 → Yathi ke iNkosi: “Nguwo lo umnqophiso endiya kuwenza nendlu kaSirayeli emva kwaloo mihla: Ndiya kuyibeka imithetho yam ngaphakathi kwabo, ndiyibhale ezintliziyweni zabo; zabo UThixo uya kuba ngabantu bam; intswela-bulungisa, bangabi sasikhumbula isono sabo.”

Ekubeni sithetha “ngomnqophiso omtsha,” siwugqala “umnqophiso wangaphambili” ‘njengomdala’; — Hebhere 8:10-13

( 3 ) UYesu nguMlamli woMnqophiso Omtsha

Ngenxa yoko waba ngumlamleli womnqophiso omtsha, ekubeni ukufa kwakhe kwacamagushela izono ezenziwa ngabantu ngexesha lomnqophiso wokuqala, wabavulela ithuba abo babiziweyo ukuba bamkele ilifa elingunaphakade. Nabani na owenza umyolelo kufuneka alinde de abhubhe lowo wawushiyayo umyolelo (imibhalo yantlandlolo iyafana nomnqophiso) kuba umyolelo lowo uyasebenza emva kokuba efile isezakuba luncedo? — Hebhere 9:15-17

Bantwanana bam, ndinibhalela ezi zinto, ukuze ningoni. Ukuba kukho othe wona, sinoMthetheleli kuye uYise, uYesu Kristu ilungisa . — 1 Yohane isahluko 2 indinyana 1

kulungile! Namhlanje ndithanda ukwabelana nani nonke ngobudlelane bam. Amen

articles.title: Ukwahlukana Ukukhanya kunye nobumnyama kuyahlukana
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubazalwana noodade bam abathandekayo kwintsapho kaThixo! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile kwiGenesis isahluko 1, iivesi 3-4, size sifunde kunye: Wathi uThixo makubekho ukukhanya. Kwabakho ke ukukhanya. Wakubona ke uThixo ukukhanya ukuba kulungile, wahlula phakathi kokukhanya nobumnyama.

Namhlanje sizakufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane kunye "yahlukana" Hayi. 1 Thetha kwaye wenze umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, Nkosi yethu uYesu Krestu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! umfazi onesidima [IBandla] lithumela ngaphambili abasebenzi ngelizwi lenyaniso, elibhaliweyo laza lathethwa ngezandla zabo, ivangeli yosindiso nozuko lwethu. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zomoya → Qondani ukuba ukukhanya kwahluka ebumnyameni.

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

ukukhanya nobumnyama buhlukene

Masifunde iBhayibhile, iGenesis Isahluko 1, iivesi 1-5, size sizifunde kunye: Ekuqalekeni uThixo wadala izulu nomhlaba. Ke umhlaba wawusenyanyeni, kuselubala, kwakumnyama phezu kobuso senzonzobila, kodwa uMoya kaThixo wawuphezu kwamanzi. Wathi uThixo makubekho ukukhanya. Kwabakho ke ukukhanya. Wakubona ke uThixo ukukhanya ukuba kulungile, wahlula phakathi kokukhanya nobumnyama. Wathi uThixo ukukhanya yimini, wathi ubumnyama bubusuku. Kuhlwa, kube kusasa.

(1) UYesu ulukhanyiso lokwenyaniso, ukukhanya kobomi bomntu

Emva koko uYesu wathi kwizihlwele: “Ndim ukhanyiselo lwehlabathi; lowo undilandelayo akasayi kuze ahambe ebumnyameni, kodwa uya kuba nokhanyiso lobomi

UThixo ukukukhanya, akukho bumnyama kuye nakanye. Nali ke ilizwi esilivileyo kuYehova, salibuyisela kuni; — 1 Yohane 1:5

Kuye kwakukho ubomi, baye obo bomi baba lukhanyiso eluntwini. ...Olo khanyiso lukhanyisela bonke abemi behlabathi. — Yohane 1:4, 9

[Phawula]: Ekuqaleni uThixo wadala izulu nomhlaba. Ke umhlaba wawusenyanyeni, kuselubala, kwakumnyama phezu kobuso senzonzobila, kodwa uMoya kaThixo wawuphezu kwamanzi. UThixo wathi: "Makubekho ukukhanya", kwabakho ukukhanya → "Ukukhanya" kubhekisela ebomini, ukukhanya kobomi → UYesu "ulukhanyiso lokwenyaniso" kunye "nobomi" → Ulukhanyiso lobomi bomntu, kwaye ubomi Kuye, kwaye obu bomi bumntu Ukukhanya kukaYesu → Nabani na olandela uYesu akasayi kuhamba ebumnyameni, kodwa uya kuba nokukhanya kobomi → "ubomi bukaYesu"! Amen. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

Ngoko uThixo wadala amazulu nomhlaba nazo zonke izinto → Wathi uThixo: “Makubekho ukukhanya”, kwabakho ukukhanya. Wakubona ke uThixo ukukhanya ukuba kulungile, wahlula phakathi kokukhanya nobumnyama.

(2) Niyakholwa ukuba uYesu nguNyana woKhanya;

UYOHANE 12:36 kholwani kulo ukhanyiso, nisenalo nje, ukuze nibe ngabantwana bokukhanya. ” Akuba etshilo uYesu, wemka kubo, wazimela.

1 KWABASETESALONIKA 5:5 Nina nonke ningoonyana bokukhanya, nina bantwana bemini. Thina asingabobusuku, asingobumnyama.

Ke nina nisisizukulwana esinyuliweyo, isibingeleli esibukumkani, uhlanga olungcwele, abantu bakaThixo abangcwele, ukuze nivakalise isidima salowo wanibizayo ukuba niphume ebumnyameni, ningene ekukhanyeni kwakhe okungummangaliso; — 1 Petros 2:9

[Qaphela]: UYesu “ukukhanya” → silandela “uYesu” → silandela ukukhanya → siba ngabantwana bokukhanya! Amen. → Ke nina nisisizukulwana esinyuliweyo, isibingeleli esibukumkani, uhlanga olungcwele, abantu bakaThixo, ukuze nivakalise “ivangeli” isidima salowo wanibizayo ukuba niphume ebumnyameni, ningene ekukhanyeni kwakhe okungummangaliso.

→Nkosi uYesu Krestu usindiso. → Kunjengokuba iNkosi uYesu yathi: “Mna, njengokhanyiso, ndifikile ehlabathini, ukuze bonke abakholwayo kum bangahlali ebumnyameni naphakade.”— Yohane 12:46

(3)Ubumnyama

Ukhanyiso ke olo lwabonakala ebumnyameni; — Yohane 1:5

Ukuba ubani uthi usekukhanyeni, abe emthiyile umzalwana wakhe, usebumnyameni. Lowo umthandayo umzalwana wakhe uhleli ekukhanyeni, yaye akukho sikhubekiso kuye. Ke lowo umthiyileyo umzalwana wakhe usebumnyameni, uhamba ebumnyameni. — 1 Yohane 2:9-11

Ukhanyiso ke lweza ehlabathini, baza abantu bathanda ubumnyama endaweni yokukhanya, kuba imisebenzi yabo ingendawo. Bonke abenza okubi, bayaluthiya ukhanyiso, bangezi elukhanyisweni, ukuze imisebenzi yabo ingohlwaywa. — Yohane 3:19-20

[Phawula]: Ukukhanya kukhanya ebumnyameni, kodwa ubumnyama abukufumani ukukhanya → UYesu “ukuKhanya”. Ukungamkeli "uYesu" → kuthetha ukungakwamkeli "ukukhanya". →Ke iNkosi uYesu yathi: "Amehlo akho azizibane zomzimba wakho. Ukuba amehlo akho acwengile → "amehlo akho omoya avuliwe → ubona uYesu", umzimba wakho wonke uya kuqaqamba; ukuba amehlo akho amnyama kwaye wena " Animbonanga uYesu”, umzimba wakho uphela woba mnyama. . Zihlolisise, hleze kubekho ubumnyama kuwe. Ukuba kukho ukukhanya emzimbeni wakho uphela, akukho bumnyama konke konke, uya kuqaqamba njengokukhanya. yesibane.” Ngaba uyakuqonda kakuhle oku? Imbekiselo-Luka 11:34-36

kulungile! Namhlanje ndithanda ukwabelana nani nonke ngobudlelane bam. Amen
