articles.title: Ukucombulula iingxaki: uPawulos, uPetros, uYohane, uYakobi noMthetho
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubazalwana noodade bam abathandekayo kwintsapho kaThixo! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile yethu kumaRoma isahluko 7 indinyana 6 size sifunde kunye: Ke, ekubeni safayo nje kuwo umthetho owawusibophelela, ngoku sikhululekile kuwo umthetho, ukuze siyikhonze iNkosi ngokobutsha bomoya (umoya: okanye ukuguqulelwa njengoMoya oyiNgcwele) kungekhona ngokwendlela yakudala yomoya. isithethe.

Namhlanje sifunda, sinxulumana, kwaye sabelane neeNtlanga "Wushiye uMthetho-okanye ugcine uMthetho" Thandaza: U-Abha othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! umfazi onesidima [ICawa] ithumela abasebenzi ** ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo nelithethiweyo ezandleni zabo, eliyivangeli yosindiso nozuko lwethu. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zomoya → Qondani ukuba iiNtlanga kunye namaJuda zimelwe kukuphuma kuwo umthetho, zife kuwo umthetho;

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

【1】UYakobi noMthetho

1 UYakobi wayewuzondelele umthetho

UYakobi wathi kuPawulos: “Mzalwana, khangela ukuba kukho amawakawaka amaYuda akholiweyo eNkosini, yaye onke “awuzondelele umthetho.” Beva abantu besithi: “Uwafundise onke amaYuda lahlani uMoses, nibafundise, Wathi, Musani ukubalusa abantwana benu, ukuba ningayilandeli imimiselo.

2 UYakobi wanikela imiyalelo emi-4 kwiiNtlanga ngokoluvo lwakhe

Ngoko ke → “Ngokoluvo lwam” musani ukuzikhathaza iintlanga ezimthobelayo uThixo; kodwa zibhaleleni, nibayalela ukuba bazikhwebule → 1 ukungcola kwezithixo, 2 ukukrexeza, 3 izilwanyana ezikrwitshiweyo, negazi. IZenzo 15:19-20

3 UYakobi uxelela uPawulos ukuba athobele umthetho

Yenza nje njengoko sithethayo! Sibane apha, kwaye sonke sineminqweno. Hamba naye, uhlambulule kunye nawo. Ngaloo ndlela ke wonke umntu uya kwazi ukuba izinto azivileyo ngawe zibubuxoki, yaye wena ngokwakho ungumntu onesimilo yaye uwugcina umthetho. — IZenzo 21:23-24

4 Ukuba waphula umthetho omnye, wophula yonke imithetho.

Kuba yena oya kuwugcina umthetho uphela, akhubeke mthethweni mnye, unetyala lokuwaphula wonke. Imbekiselo-Yakobi Isahluko 2 Ivesi 10

buza: Ngubani eyedwa owaseka umthetho?

impendulo: Mnye kuphela ummisi-mthetho nomgwebi, “uThixo olilungisa” onokusindisa aze atshabalalise. Ungubani na wena ukuba ugwebe abanye? Imbekiselo-Yakobi 4:12

buza: Ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ugqiba nathi? Okanye ngaba “uYakobi” wabeka imiyalelo emi-4 kwiiNtlanga ngokusekelwe kuluvo lwakhe?

impendulo: oko kuthethwa ngumoya oyingcwele → Ayingqinelani

UMoya oyiNgcwele uthi ngokucacileyo inxenye iya kumka elukholweni, ngamaxesha asemva, ilandele oomoya abalahlekisayo, neemfundiso zeedemon; Oku kungenxa yohanahaniso lwamaxoki abazazela zabo zitshiswe ngentsimbi eshushu. Bakwalela ukuba batshate, bazikhwebule ekutyeni, athe uThixo wakudalela abakholwayo, bayaziyo inyaniso, ukuba bakwamkele ngombulelo. Yonke into edalwe nguThixo ilungile. Imbekiselo - 1 kuTimoti Isahluko 4 Ivesi 1-5 nakwabaseKolose 2 Ivesi 20-23

→Ngokoluvo lwakhe, uYakobi wamisela “imithetho emi-4” yeeNtlanga → emi-3 kuyo inxulumene nokutya yaye omnye uhlobene nenyama. →Kukho izinto ezingenakwenziwa ngenxa yobuthathaka benyama→uThixo akayi kucela "iiNtlanga" ezingabantwana bakaThixo ukuba "zigcine" imithetho abangenako ukuyigcina. "UYakobi" akazange ayiqonde ngaphambili, kodwa kamva → "Ukubhala Incwadi kaYakobi", waqonda ukuthanda kukaThixo → Kubhaliwe kwathiwa: "Uze umthande ummelwane wakho njengoko uzithanda wena." umthetho we. Ngubani ozalisekise umthetho? Ngubani ogcina umthetho? Asinguye na uKristu, uNyana kaThixo? UKristu uwufezile umthetho, wawugcina umthetho, mna ndihlala ndikuKristu ~ Ndiyakholwa ukuba xa ethe wawuzalisa, sowufeza, nokuba uyawugcina, sowugcina. Amen, icacile na lento kuwe? …Kuba yena oya kuwugcina umthetho uphela, akhubeke kwelinye, unetyala lokwaphula wonke. ——Imbekiselo-Yakobi 2:8, 10

【2】uPetros noMthetho

---Musa ukubeka idyokhwe enganyamezelekiyo ezintanyeni zabafundi bakho---

Kananjalo uThixo uzingqinele, ozaziyo iintliziyo zabantu, wabanika uMoya oyiNgcwele njengoko wasinikayo nathi, wazihlambulula iintliziyo zabo ngokholo, akacalula phakathi kwabo nathi. Kutheni ngoku emlinga uThixo ukuba abeke idyokhwe ezintanyeni zabafundi bakhe esingenako ukuyithwala thina kwanoobawo bethu? Nathi ngokobabalo lweNkosi uYesu Kristu, sisindiswe kwanjengabo. ” Yiba nenxaxheba —IZenzo 15:8-11

buza: Yintoni "idyokhwe enganyamezelekiyo"?

impendulo: Kuphela ngamakholwa ambalwa, awayengamalungu ehlelo labaFarisi, awaphakamayo aza athi: “Nimele naluke → 1 IiNtlanga nize nibayalele → 2 “ukuthobela umthetho kaMoses.”— IZenzo 15:5

【3】UYohane noMthetho

-thobela imiyalelo kaThixo--

Siyazi ukuba siyamazi, ukuba siyigcina imithetho yakhe. Lowo uthi, Ndimazile, abe engayigcini imithetho yakhe, ulixoki, kulowo ayikho inyaniso. Imbekiselo - 1 Yohane Isahluko 2 Ivesi 3-4

Ukuba siyamthanda uThixo kwaye siyigcina imiyalelo yakhe, siya kwazi ngale nto ukuba siyabathanda abantwana bakaThixo. Siyamthanda uThixo ngokugcina imiyalelo Yakhe, kwaye imiyalelo Yakhe ayinzima. Imbekiselo - 1 Yohane 5 ivesi 2-3

[Phawula]: Siyamthanda uThixo xa sigcina imiyalelo yakhe

buza: Yintoni imiyalelo? Ngaba yiMithetho Elishumi kaMoses?

impendulo: 1 Uze umthande uThixo ummelwane wakho njengoko uzithanda ngako → Le mithetho yomibini isishwankathelo sawo wonke umthetho nabaprofeti. "Imbekiselo - kuMateyu Isahluko 22 Indinyana 40 → Isishwankathelo somthetho sithi "uKristu" - Imbekiselo KwabaseRoma Isahluko 10 Indinyana 4 → UKristu “unguThixo” → UThixo ‘unguLizwi’ → Ekuqaleni ‘bekukho “uLizwi” yaye "uLizwi" ngu "Thixo" → uThixo "nguYesu" → "Uthanda ummelwane wakhe njengoko ezithanda" kwaye usinika "indlela" yobomi bakhe Ngale ndlela, isishwankathelo somthetho nguKristu → xa sigcina i umoya womthetho → sigcina "indlela" → Yilandele nje "Imiyalelo" kaThixo → "ukugcina ilizwi" kuthetha "ukugcina imiyalelo." Abantwana bakaThixo abazelwe ngokutsha abahlala kuKristu bagcina ilizwi, kungekhona amazwi abulala abantu / nabani na osekelwe emthethweni bonke baqalekisiwe. Khangela kumaGalati 3:10-11.

【4】Isiqinisekiso IsiLuo kunye noMthetho

1 bafile kuwo umthetho

Ngoko ke, bazalwana bam, nanifa kuwo umthetho ngawo umzimba kaKristu, ukuze nibe ngabanye, kulowo ke wavuswa kwabafileyo, ukuze sixakathe isiqhamo kuThixo thina. — Roma 7:4

2 kufa kuwo umthetho

Ngenxa yomthetho “ndafa kuwo umthetho,” ukuze ubomi ndibudlele kuThixo. — Galati 2:19

Ngoko ke, uYesu Kristu wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni waza wafela izono zethu waza wangcwatywa → Ngale ndlela, siye "sele" ukulahla umntu omdala. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

(2) Yiyeke ihambo yakudala

Impendulo: Iyabonakala ke yona imisebenzi yenyama: ukukrexeza, ukungcola, uburheletya, ukubusa izithixo, ubugqwirha, intiyo, iinkani, amakhwele, imisindo, amayelenqe, amayelenqe, nomona, ukunxila, iindywala, njl. Sendinixelele kade, nangoku, ndithi kuni, Abazenzayo izinto ezinjalo abayi kubudla ilifa ubukumkani bukaThixo. Imbekiselo - KumaGalati Isahluko 5 Ivesi 19-21

Impendulo: Abo ke bakaKristu Yesu bayibethelele emnqamlezweni inyama, kunye neminqweno neenkanuko zayo. →Igama elithi "sele" apha lithetha ukuba kwenzekile uKristu wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni. Ekubeni kwenzekile → ndikholelwa ukuba sabethelelwa emnqamlezweni, safa saza sangcwatywa noKristu → ihambo yethu yendoda endala neyomntu omdala → iminqweno emibi neminqweno yenyama yabethelelwa kunye → “siyihlubile” ihambo yendoda endala nendoda endala. . Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo? Imbekiselo-Galati 5:24

Yambathani ubuntu obutsha nimambathe uKristu

Impendulo: Yambathani “umzimba ongenakonakala nobomi” bukaYesu Kristu

Yambathani umntu omtsha. Umntu omtsha uyahlaziywa ngolwazi abe ngumfanekiselo woMdali wakhe. Imbekiselo - kwabaseKolose isahluko 3 ivesi ye-10

Kwaye siyifake" Umntu omtsha "→ Ewe" phila "KuKristu → Lowo ufihlakeleyo noKristu kuye uThixo, ngaye" uMoya oyiNgcwele "Uhlaziywa imihla ngemihla → Xa uKristu ebonakala, ubomi bethu buya kubonakala kunye noKristu ebuqaqawulini. articles.title: (2) bakhululekile kuwo umthetho, nasesiqalekisweni somthetho
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubazalwana noodade bam abathandekayo kwintsapho kaThixo! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile yethu kumaRoma isahluko 7 kunye nendinyana 6 size sifunde kunye: Ke, ekubeni safayo nje kuwo umthetho owawusibophelela, ngoku sikhululekile kuwo umthetho, ukuze siyikhonze iNkosi ngokobutsha bomoya (umoya: okanye ukuguqulelwa njengoMoya oyiNgcwele) kungekhona ngokwendlela yakudala yomoya. isithethe.

Namhlanje sizakufunda, sinxulumane, kwaye sabelane ngeSahluko esithi "Detachment". 2 Thetha kwaye wenze umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, Nkosi yethu uYesu Krestu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! umfazi onesidima 【Icawe】Thumela abasebenzi Ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo, elathethwayo ngezandla zabo, elivakalisa usindiso nozuko lwethu. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zomoya → 1 ndikhululwe kuwo umthetho, 2 ukhululekile esonweni, 3 eluvimbeni lokufa, 4 Ubalekile kumgwebo wokugqibela. Amen!

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen.

(1) Inkanuko yenyama → izala isono ngomthetho

Masifunde kwabaseRoma 7:5 eBhayibhileni, kuba xa sasisenyameni, iinkanuko ezimbi ezizelwe ngumthetho zazisebenza emalungwini ethu, zivelisa isiqhamo esikukufa.

Xa inkanuko ithe yakhawulwa, izale isono; — Yakobi 1:15

[Phawula]: Xa sisenyameni → "neminqweno" → "iminqweno yenyama" yiminqweno emibi → kuba → "umthetho" uyasebenza kumalungu ethu → "iminqweno iyasebenza" → "ukukhulelwa" kuqalisa, kwaye kamsinya nje iinkanuko bamitha → bazala isono, sakuba sikhulile, sizala ukufa, oko kukuthi, sithwala isiqhamo sokufa. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

Umbuzo: "Isono" sivela phi?

Impendulo: "Isono" → xa sisenyameni → "iinkanuko zenyama" → ngenxa "yomthetho", "iinkanuko eziqhutywayo" kumalungu ethu → "iinkanuko eziqhutywayo" → ziqala "ukukhulelwa" → njengokuba iinkanuko → zizala isono. "Isono" "sizalwa" ngenxa yenkanuko + umthetho →. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo? Apho kungekho mthetho, akukho sigqitho, isono asibalelwa apho; Bona amaRoma isahluko 4 indinyana 15, isahluko 5 indinyana 13 nesahluko 7 indinyana 8 .

(2) Amandla esono ngumthetho, nolwamvila lokufa sisono.

Yifa! Aphi amandla akho okoyisa?

Yifa! Luphi ulwamvila lwakho?

Ulwamvila lokufa sisono, amandla esono ngumthetho. — 1 Korinte 15:55-56 . Qaphela: Ulwamvila lokufa → sisono, umvuzo wesono kukufa, kwaye amandla esono → ngumthetho. Ngaba uyalwazi unxulumano phakathi kwezi zintathu?

Apho kukho "umthetho" kukho → "isono", kwaye xa kukho "isono" kukho → "ukufa". Ngoko iBhayibhile ithi → apho kungekho mthetho, akukho “sigqitho” → “ngaphandle kokunxaxha” → akukho kwaphulwa komthetho → akukho kwaphulwa komthetho → akukho sono, “ngaphandle kwesono” → akukho ulwamvila lokufa “. , Ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

(3) Ukukhululeka emthethweni nakwisiqalekiso somthetho

Kodwa ekubeni safayo kumthetho owawusibophelela, ngoku “sikhululwe kuwo umthetho” ukuze sikwazi ukukhonza iNkosi ngokobutsha bomoya (umoya: okanye uguqulelwe njengoMoya oyiNgcwele) kungekhona ngokwesithethe sakudala. Isampulu. — Roma 7:6

KUMAGALATI 2:19 Kuba ngawo umthetho ndafa kumthetho, ukuze ubomi ndibudlele kuThixo. → Nani nafa nani kuwo umthetho ngawo umzimba kaKristu, ukuba nibe ngabanye, kulowo ke wavuswa kwabafileyo, ukuze sixakathe isiqhamo kuThixo thina. — Roma 7:4

UKristu wasikhulula esiqalekisweni somthetho, ngokuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Uqalekisiwe wonke umntu oxhonywe emthini;

[Phawula]: Umpostile “uPawulos” wathi: “Ndafa kuwo umthetho ngenxa yomthetho → 1 “Ndafa kuwo umthetho” ngomzimba kaKristu → 2 “Ndafa kuwo umthetho” → 3 emthethweni lowo Ndibophe ndifile.

buza: Yintoni "injongo" yokufa emthethweni?

impendulo: Ndikhululekile kuwo umthetho nesiqalekiso sawo.

Umpostile "uPawulos" wathi → ndabethelelwa emnqamlezweni ndaza ndafa noKristu → 1 ukhululekile esonweni, 2 “Nikhululwe kuwo umthetho nayisiqalekiso somthetho, niyaqonda na?

Ngoko kukho kuphela: 1 ndikhululekile kuwo umthetho, ndikhululekile esonweni; 2 Ukukhululeka esonweni → kukhululekile kumandla omthetho; 3 Ukukhululwa emandleni omthetho → ukukhululwa kwisigwebo somthetho; 4 Ukukhululwa kumgwebo womthetho → ukukhululwa eluvimbeni lokufa. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

kulungile! Namhlanje ndithanda ukwabelana nani nonke ngobudlelane bam. Amen

articles.title: Yakhubeka inkomo, waza u-Uza welula isandla sakhe ukuze ayixhase ityeya yomnqophiso
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile yethu kweyoku-1 yeziKronike 139 size sifunde kunye: Bakufika esandeni sikaKeton (eyesi-2 kaSamuweli 6:6) u-Uza wasolula isandla sakhe ukuba abambelele etyeyeni, ngokuba inkomo ibikhubeka.

Namhlanje siyafunda, sinxulumana, kwaye sabelane " Yakhubeka inkomo waza Usa Yi wolula isandla sakhe ukubamba iTyeya yomnqophiso. 》Umthandazo: Bawo wethu oseZulwini othandekayo, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. " Umfazi onesidima “Thumela abasebenzi ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo nelithethiweyo ngezandla zabo, ivangeli losindiso lwakho siziswe sivela ezulwini, sinikelwe ngexesha elililo, ukuze bube bubuninzi ubomi bethu bokomoya. UYesu uhlala ekhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya kwaye avule iingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibhile kwaye asenze sibone nokuva iinyaniso zasemoyeni→ Siqonde isilumkiso sika-Uza owayolula isandla sakhe ukuze ayixhase ityesi yomnqophiso emva kokuba inkunzi yenkomo ikhubeke. .

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi uYesu Krestu! Amen

1 Kronike 13:7, 9-11

Bayithabatha ityeya kaThixo endlwini ka-Abhinadabhi, bayikhwelisa enqwelweni entsha. U-Uza noAhiyo bayiqhuba inqwelo. Bathi bakufika esandeni sikaKeton (esiyiNagon ke leyo kweyesi-2 kaSamuweli 6:6), wasolula u-Uza isandla sakhe ukuba abambelele etyeyeni, ngokuba iinkomo zibe ziyigungqisa. Wavutha umsindo kaYehova kuye, wambetha ngenxa enokuba wasa isandla sakhe etyeyeni, wafa phambi koThixo. UDavide wakhwankqiswa ngenxa yokuba uYehova embulele u-Uza, waza wathi loo ndawo yiPerets-uza unanamhla.

(1) AmaSirayeli ayenoMthetho kaMoses yaye ayesenza ngokuvisisana nemithetho nemimiselo

buza: Inkomo yakhubeka yaza “yatsiba” → Ngaba kwakuphosakele ngo-Uza ukolula isandla sakhe aze ayibambe ityeya yomnqophiso?
impendulo: “U-Uza” akazange ayithobele imimiselo yoMthetho kaMoses → “wayithwala ityeya kaThixo ngezibonda nasemagxeni” yaye “wohlwaywa” → ngenxa yokuba ningazange niyithwale ityeya ngaphambili nibuzise kuYehova uThixo wethu ngokwesiko; ngoko ke Wohlwaya (umbhalo wokuqala kukubulala) thina. Bazingcwalisa ke ababingeleli, abaLevi, ukuba bayinyuse ityeya yomnqophiso kaYehova uThixo kaSirayeli. Bayithwala oonyana bakaLevi ityeya kaThixo emagxeni abo ngezibonda, njengoko wawisa umthetho uYehova ngesandla sikaMoses. Imbekiselo - eyoku-1 yeziKronike 15 Isahluko 13-15

buza: Ngaba u-Uza wayeyinzala kaLevi?
impendulo:" Ityeya kaThixo “yabekwa endlwini ka-Abhinadabhi kwiNtaba yaseKiriyati-yeharim, apho yahlala khona iminyaka engamashumi amabini— funda eyoku-1 kaSamuweli 7:1-2 , yaye yayingumsebenzi wabaLevi ukugada umnquba ‘nomnquba nomnquba. 18 U-Uza unyana ka-Abhinadabhi, yaye indlu ka-Abhinadabhi inoxanduva lokulinda ityeya yomnqophiso.

buza: “ITyeya yoMnqophiso” yabekwa “kwinqwelo entsha yokutsalwa kwenkomo” waza u-Uza wolula isandla sakhe ukuze “abambe” iTyeya → Yiyiphi imimiselo eyaphulwayo?
impendulo: Ke oonyana bakaKehati abanikwanga nqwelo nankomo, ngokuba bebephethe umsebenzi wengcwele, bezithwala izinto ezingcwele ngegxalaba bona. Bona iNumeri isahluko 7 indinyana 9 , xa kwafika ixesha lokunduluka, uAron noonyana bakhe babegqibile ukuyigubungela ingcwele nempahla yayo yonke, beza oonyana bakaKehati ukuba bazithwale; bazichukumise izinto ezingcwele, hleze bafe. Ezo zinto zazisententeni zaziza kuthwalwa ngoonyana bakaKehati. INumeri 4:15→

Qaphela: "Ityeya yoMnqophiso" imele iNgcwele yeeNgcwele kunye netrone kaThixo! Ifanele iphakanyiswe, iphakanyiswe ngezibonda → Yeremiya 17:12 Ingcwele yethu yitrone yobuqaqawuli, ebekwe phezulu kwasentloko. ;Xa "iTyeya yoMnqophiso" ibekwe kwinqwelo entsha, abantu bade kunaloo nqwelo. UThixo walumkisa amaSirayeli kunye noKumkani uDavide “ngokunkwantyisa” kwenkomo “nesohlwayo” sika-Uza Emva kwesiganeko sika-Uza, uKumkani uDavide wathobeka ngakumbi Indinyana 22. Ngoko uThixo wathi, “UDavide yindoda engantliziyo yam—bona IZenzo 13 indinyana 22 . Nathi baphulaphuli sifanele sithobeke yaye asinakuba ngaphezu kwabasebenzi abathunywe nguThixo!

(2) AbeeNtlanga banemithetho yabo, oko kukuthi, imithetho yesazela abafanele bayenze

buza: AmaFilistiya ayikhwelisa ityeya yomnqophiso enqwelweni entsha, ayibuyisela endaweni yayo ngeenkomo; Kunoko, bashiywa yintlekele?
impendulo: AmaFilisti “oko kukuthi abeentlanga” abanawo uMthetho kaMoses yaye akuyomfuneko ukuba benze ngokomthetho kaMoses, kodwa abeeNtlanga “banomthetho wabo,” oko kukuthi, umthetho wesazela , nokwenza izinto zomthetho ngokwendalo yazo - zibhekisela eRoma Yoshuwa 2:14 → Bathi, “Ukuba ufuna ukuzisa uSirayeli Ityeya yomnqophiso kaThixo mayingabuyiswa ilambatha, koko kuya kwenziwa idini lokucamagushela kuye, ukuze uphile, uqonde ukuba kungani na ukuba isandla sakhe singasuki kuwe Ziphi na izipho zokucamagusha, zathi kuye, Amathumba egolide amahlanu, neempuku ezintlanu, ngokwenani lezikhulu zamaFilisti; Kwangokunjalo amadoda nabathetheli benu yenze inqwelo entsha, nibophe iinkomo ezimbini ezingafakwanga enqwelweni, niwabuyisele ekhaya amathole kuYehova, nibeke ityeya yomnqophiso enqwelweni kwibhokisi, uyibeke ecaleni kwetyeya, uze uyindulule ityeya.

(3) Ekubeni umthetho lowo ubuthathaka ngenxa yenyama, kukho izinto ongenako ukuzenza

Ekubeni umthetho wawusebuthathaka ngenxa yenyama, ungabi nako ukwenza nto, uThixo wamthuma owakhe uNyana, efana nenyama enesono, ukuba abe lidini lesono, egweba isono esenyameni, ukuze ubulungisa bomthetho buzaliseke kuthi bona thina aba basenzayo isono. musani ukuphila ngokwenyama, kuphela abo balandela uMoya oyiNgcwele. Roma 8:3-4

Phawula: AmaSirayeli ayenoMthetho kaMoses, kwaye neeNtlanga nazo zazinemithetho yazo → Kodwa wonke umntu ehlabathini wonile waza wasilela eluzukweni lukaThixo ngokwaphula umthetho - bhekisa kumaRoma 3:23. Ngenxa yobuthathaka benyama, umntu akabanga nako ukubuzalisekisa ubulungisa bomthetho uThixo wathumela uNyana wakhe ukuba abe kwimfano yenyama enesono waza waba lidini lesono waza wasigweba isono enyameni ukuze ubulungisa bomthetho zinokuzaliseka kuthi abangalandeliyo inyama, kuphela abo balandela uMoya oyiNgcwele. Amen! Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

KULUNGILE! Namhlanje ndingathanda ukwabelana nani ngobudlelwane bam nonke. Amen

2021.09.30

articles.title: UNadabhi noAbhihu bazisa umlilo ongaqhelekanga
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile kwiLevitikus iSahluko 10, iivesi 1-3, size sifunde kunye: Oonyana baka-Aron ooNadabhi noAbhihu bathabatha elowo ugcedevu lwakhe, baluzalisa ngomlilo, babeka phezu kwawo isiqhumiso, basondeza phambi koYehova umlilo ongesesikweni, abengabawiselanga mthetho ngawo uYehova.

Namhlanje siyafunda, sinxulumana, kwaye sabelane "Umlilo ongaqhelekanga" Thandaza: Bawo wethu oseZulwini othandekayo, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhleli enathi! Amen. Ndiyayibulela iNkosi ngokuthumela abasebenzi ababhala ngezandla zabo kwaye bathethe ilizwi lenyaniso, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwethu. Isonka siziswa sivela ezulwini size sinikwe kwangethuba ukuze ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi. Amen! Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sibone nokuva iinyaniso zasemoyeni→ Ngaba uyakuqonda ukuba kuthetha ukuthini ukuzisa umlilo ongaqhelekanga?

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi uYesu Krestu! Amen

Umlilo oqhelekileyo, Ibizwa ngokuba yi-fán huǒ, ligama lesiTshayina elithetha iminqweno yeemvakalelo yabantu behlabathi.

cacisa : Iminqweno yeemvakalelo yabantu behlabathi.

Umthombo: Isahluko sokuqala seYuan Dynasty Zheng Tingyu's "Nin Zi Ji":"Ukuba umfundi wakho akasebenzisi imali ngenkohlakalo, umlilo oqhelekileyo uya kutshisa esiswini sam. Ndiya kuwufihla kumkhono wam emoyeni njengenkosi yam, kwaye nixelise inkosi yam inyanga eqaqambileyo encamini yentonga yayo.

ILevitikus 10:1-3 Oonyana baka-Aron ooNadabhi noAbhihu bathabatha elowo ugcedevu lwakhe, baluzalisa ngomlilo, babeka phezu kwawo isiqhumiso, basondeza phambi koYehova umlilo ongesesikweni, abengabawiselanga mthetho ngawo uYehova. phuma umlilo ebusweni bukaYehova, ubatshise, bafe phambi koYehova. Wathi uMoses kuAron, Utsho uYehova ukuthi, Ndoba ngcwele kwabasondelayo kum, ndizukiseke emehlweni abantu bonke. Wathi cwaka uAron.

Ingcaciso yeBhayibhile:

buza: Uthetha ukuthini umlilo ongaqhelekanga?

impendulo: Umlilo ongaqhelekanga ubhekisa kumlilo wasemhlabeni, hayi umlilo ongcwaliswe kwisibingelelo somnquba → ubizwa ngokuba "ngumlilo ongaziwayo".

buza: Umela ntoni umlilo ongaqhelekanga?

impendulo: Umlilo ongaqhelekanga ufuzisela iinkanuko neenkanuko zenyama - ezenyama, zehlabathi, ezingcolileyo, ezinesono, ezingangcwaliswanga → “Xa wena noonyana bakho ningena ententeni yokuhlangana, ize ningaseli wayini nasiselo sinxilisayo, hleze nife. ube ngummiselo ongunaphakade ezizukulwaneni zenu, wokuba nibahlule ongcwele kwinto eyinqambi, nohlambulukileyo koyinqambi;

Phawula: Iicawa ezininzi namhlanje azikwahluli phakathi kwezinto ezingcwele neziqhelekileyo, izinto ezicocekileyo nezingahlambulukanga → zonke zinikela “izinto ezinesiphako, ezinegwele nezingahlambulukanga, ngokokuthanda kwazo, akukho mahluko phakathi komnqophiso omdala nomnqophiso omtsha; Akukho mahluko phakathi kokuphantsi komthetho” Akukho mahluko phakathi kobabalo nobabalo, akukho kwahluka phakathi komntu omdala nomntu omtsha, akukho kwahluka phakathi kokuka-Adam nokukaKristu, akukho kwahlulwa. phakathi kokwasenyameni nokwasemoyeni, akukho kwahlulwa phakathi kwaboni namalungisa, akukho kwahlulwa phakathi kokukhanya nobumnyama, akukho kwahlulwa phakathi kwabacocekileyo nabahlambulukileyo Ukungabikho kokwahlula → asikokunikela “aboni” abangcwalisiweyo kuThixo → kanye njengoNadabhi noAbhihu banikela “umlilo ongaqhelekanga” kuThixo, uYehova awabayalelanga ukuba bawunikele “uqeqesho” kuThixo, uNadabhi no UAbhihu ungumzekelo → elindele ngoloyiko kuphela umgwebo nomlilo oqwengayo oya kuqwenga zonke iintshaba.

ngoko" uPawulosi Esithi → Ndenze umkhonzi kaKristu Yesu weentlanga, umbingeleli weendaba ezilungileyo zikaThixo, ukuze umbingelelo wam weentlanga ungcwaliswe ngoMoya oyiNgcwele → "Ubungcwele bungenasono" kwaye bunokwamkeleka → Ukuba " umoni "Ukunikela → kukupha" Umlilo oqhelekileyo Bezahlulele kuThixo, abashumayeli abanjalo ‘nguNadabhi noAbhihu.’ Ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo? Bhekisela kumaRoma 15:16 .

KULUNGILE! Namhlanje ndingathanda ukwabelana nani nonke ngobudlelwane bam. Amen

articles.title: Isigqubuthelo esigqume ubuso bukaMoses
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubantakwethu noodadewethu kusapho lukaThixo! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile size sifunde eyesi-2 kwabaseKorinte 3:16 kunye: Kodwa xa iintliziyo zabo zibuyela eNkosini, isigqubuthelo siyasuswa.

Namhlanje siyafunda, sinxulumana, kwaye sabelane "Isigqubuthelo ebusweni bukaMoses" Thandaza: U-Abha othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. enkosi"" Umfazi onesidima "Ithumela abasebenzi ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo nelithethiweyo ezandleni zabo → esinika ubulumko bemfihlelo kaThixo, eyayifihliwe mandulo, ilizwi uThixo awathi ngenxa engaphambili ngaphambi kwamaxesha onke ukuze usindiso nozuko lwethu! ngoMoya oyiNgcwele Ityhiliwe Amen! Qonda umfuziselo kaMoses egqubuthele ubuso bakhe ngesigqubuthelo .

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

Eksodus 34:29-35

Wehla uMoses entabeni yeSinayi, ephethe amacwecwe omabini omthetho esandleni sakhe; wayengazi ukuba ubuso bakhe bukhazimla, ngokuba uYehova wathetha kuye. UAron noonyana bonke bakaSirayeli babona ukuba ubuso bukaMoses bukhazimle, baza boyika ukusondela kuye. Wababiza ke uMoses, beza kuye uAron nabathetheli bebandla, wathetha nabo uMoses. Asondela onke amaSirayeli, wawawisela umthetho ngawo onke amazwi kaYehova, abewathethile kuye entabeni yaseSinayi. Akugqiba uMoses ukuthetha nabo, wabugquma ubuso bakhe ngesigqubuthelo. Ekungeneni kukaMoses phambi koYehova, esiya kuthetha naye, wasisusa isigqubuthelo, waphuma, wabaxelela oonyana bakaSirayeli oko uYehova abemwisele umthetho ngako. AmaSirayeli abubona ubuso bukaMoses bukhazimla. Wabuya wabugquma ubuso bakhe ngesigqubuthelo, wabuya waya kuthetha noNdikhoyo, wasisusa isigqubuthelo eso.

buza: Kwakutheni ukuze uMoses agqume ubuso bakhe ngesigqubuthelo?
impendulo: Babubona uAron noonyana bonke bakaSirayeli ubuso bukaMoses, boyika ukusondela kuye

buza: Kwakutheni ukuze ubuso bukaMoses bubengezele?
impendulo: Ngokuba uThixo ukukukhanya, uYehova wathetha kuye, wakhanyisa ubuso bakhe → UThixo ukukukhanya, akukho bumnyama kuye. Nali ke ilizwi esilivileyo kuYehova, salibuyisela kuni; eyoku-1 kaYohane 1:5

buza: UMoses owayegqubuthele ubuso bakhe ngesigqubuthelo ufuzisela ntoni?
impendulo: “UMoses wabugqubuthela ubuso bakhe ngesigqubuthelo” kubonisa ukuba uMoses wayeligosa lomthetho elalibhalwe kumacwecwe amatye, kungekhona umfanekiso wokwenyaniso womthetho. Ikwafanekisela ukuba abantu abanako ukuthembela kuMoses baze bawugcine umthetho kaMoses ukuze babone umfanekiso oyinyaniso baze babone uzuko lukaThixo → Umthetho wawushunyayelwa ekuqaleni ngoMoses; Imbekiselo — Yohane 1:17 . “Umthetho” yinkosi yoqeqesho esikhokelela “kubabalo nenyaniso” Kuphela “ngokukholwa” kuYesu Kristu ukuze sigwetyelwe → sinokulubona uzuko lukaThixo! Amen—bona Gal 3:24 .

buza: Ngaba ngokwenene umthetho ukhangeleka njani?
impendulo: Ekubeni ke umthetho usisithunzi nje sodwa sezinto ezilungileyo eziza kubakho, ungenguye umfanekiselo wayo leyo, awunako ukubenza bagqibelele abo basondelayo iminyaka ngeminyaka, ukuba bagqibelele kwelo dini. KumaHebhere Isahluko 10 Indinyana 1 → “Isimo esicacileyo somthetho nguKristu, isishwankathelo somthetho nguKristu.” → Isishwankathelo somthetho nguKristu, ukuze bonke abakholwayo kuye bafumane ubulungisa. Isikhombisi - KwabaseRoma Isahluko 10 Ivesi 4. Ngaba uyayiqonda ngokucacileyo le nto?

Kwabakho ubuqaqawuli kulungiselelo lokufa olubhalwe etyeni, ukuze oonyana bakaSirayeli bangabi nako ukukhangela ebusweni bukaMoses, ngenxa yobuqaqawuli obabusebusweni bakhe, obabusiya bubhanga, 2 Korinte 3:7 .

(1) Ubulungiseleli bomthetho obubhalwe ematyeni → bubulungiseleli bokufa

buza: Kutheni le nto umthetho ubhalwe ematyeni ukuba bubulungiseleli bokufa?
impendulo: Ngenxa yokuba uMoses wawakhupha amaSirayeli kwindlu yobukhoboka eYiputa, amaSirayeli awela entlango Kwanaye akazange akwazi ‘ukungena’ eKanan, ilizwe elaliqukuqela ubisi nobusi elalithenjiswe nguThixo, ngoko umthetho wakrolwa ematyeni. Ulungiselelo lwakhe lulungiselelo lokufa. Ukuba awunakungena eKanan okanye ungene eBukumkanini bamaZulu ngokoMthetho kaMoses, ungangena kuphela ukuba uKalebhi noYoshuwa babakhokela “ngokholo”.

(2) Ubulungiseleli bomthetho obubhalwe ematyeni → bubulungiseleli bokugweba

KWABASEKORINTE II 3:9 Ukuba ulungiselelo olugwebayo lunobuqaqawuli, kokukhona luya kugqithisela ngobuqaqawuli ulungiselelo lobulungisa.

buza: Yini na ukuba ubulungiseleli bomthetho bube bubulungiseleli bomgwebo?
impendulo: Umthetho wenzelwe ukwazisa abantu ngezono zabo Ukuba uyazazi ukuba unetyala, kufuneka ucamagushele izono zakho kwiTestamente Endala, iinkomo neegusha zazixhelwa izihlandlo ezininzi ukuze kucanyagushelwe izono zakho. Umthetho uthethiwe kwabaphantsi komthetho, ukuze uthintelwe bonke abasehlabathini; (Funda kwabaseRoma 3:19-20). Ngoko ke, ubulungiseleli bomthetho bubulungiseleli bomgwebo. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

(3) Ubulungiseleli obubhalwe elucwecweni lwentliziyo bubulungiseleli bogwetyelo

Umbuzo: Ngubani igosa lolungiselelo lokugwetyelwa?
Impendulo: Ubulungiseleli bogwetyelo, “uKristu”, ligosa → Abantu mabasithathe njengabalungiseleli bakaKristu namagosa eemfihlelo zikaThixo. Into efunekayo kwigosa kukuthembeka. Eyoku-1 kwabaseKorinte 4:1-2 “Iicawa ezininzi namhlanje Hayi “Igosa leemfihlelo zikaThixo, Hayi Abalungiseleli bakaKristu→Baya kwenza uMthetho kaMoses~ igosa lomgwebo, ulungiselelo lokufa →Bangenise abantu esonweni, babe ngaboni, abangenako ukusinda entolongweni yesono, bebakhokelela ekufeni abantu phantsi komthetho, kanye njengoko uMoses wabakhuphayo oonyana bakaSirayeli eYiputa, bawa bonke entlango phantsi komthetho; Kamva babizwa ngokuba ngaBaphathi bobulungisa → “Akukho bani unokukhonza iinkosi ezimbini.” Abangabakhonzi abathembekileyo bakaThixo.

4 Xa ithe intliziyo yabuyela eNkosini sosuswa kuphele isigqubuthelo eso

( 2 Korinte 3:12-16 ) Ekubeni ke sinethemba elinjalo, sithetha ngokungafihlisiyo, ngokungafaniyo noMoses, owabeka isigqubuthelo ebusweni bakhe ukuze amaSirayeli angabi nako ukuqwalasela isiphelo saLowo wayeza kutshabalala. Kodwa iintliziyo zabo zaziqaqadekile, kwaye nanamhlanje xa kufundwa iTestamente eNdala, isigqubuthelo asizange sisuswe. Esi sigqubuthelo kuKristu Sele iphelisiwe . Kusuke kwada kwanamhlanje, xa sukuba ileswa incwadi kaMoses, kusuke kwahlala isigqubuthelo ezintliziyweni zabo. Kodwa xa iintliziyo zabo zibuyela eNkosini, isigqubuthelo siyasuswa.

Phawula: Kutheni abantu ehlabathini lonke begquma ubuso babo ngezigqubuthelo namhlanje? Ngaba akufanele uphaphe? Ngenxa yokuba iintliziyo zabo zilukhuni kwaye azifuni ukubuyela kuThixo, balahlekiswa nguSathana kwaye bazimisele ukuhlala kwiTestamente eNdala, phantsi komthetho, phantsi kobulungiseleli bomgwebo, naphantsi kobulungiseleli bokufa inyaniso kwaye uguqukele kumazwi akhohlisayo. Bugqume ubuso bakho ngesigqubuthelo → Ibonisa ukuba abanakuza Ukubona uzuko lukaThixo phambi koThixo , abanakudla kokomoya, abanamanzi aphilileyo okusela → “Kuza imihla,” itsho iNkosi enguMongami uYehova, “endiya kuthi ngayo ndihlise indlala ehlabathini. Baya kunxanwa, kungekhona ngenxa yokuswela amanzi, kodwa ngenxa yokuba bengayi kuliphulaphula ilizwi likaYehova. — Amosi 8:11-12

(5) Ngobuso obuvulekileyo kuKristu, unokububona ubuqaqawuli beNkosi

INkosi ke inguye uMoya; apho akhoyo uMoya weNkosi, kubakho inkululeko. Thina ke sonke, sinobuso obubhebhethiweyo, sibukhangela njengokwasesipilini ubuqaqawuli beNkosi, senziwa similise okwaloo mfanekiselo, sivela ebuqaqawulini sisinge ebuqaqawulini, kwanjengokuvela eNkosini enguMoya. 2 Korinte 3:17-18

KULUNGILE! Kuphelele apho kunxibelelwano lwanamhlanje kunye nokwabelana nawe enkosi Bawo waseZulwini ngokusinika indlela ezukileyo. Amen

2021.10.15

articles.title: (5) Khangela kuKristu ukuze ufumane usindiso;
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubantakwethu noodadewethu kusapho lukaThixo! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile kuIsaya isahluko 45 indinyana 22 size sifunde kunye: bhekani kum, nonke nina ziphelo zehlabathi, yaye niya kusindiswa; ngokuba ndinguThixo, akukho wumbi.

Namhlanje siyafunda, sinxulumana, kwaye sabelane "Usindiso kunye nozuko" Hayi. 5 Thetha kwaye wenze umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, Nkosi yethu uYesu Krestu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Ndiyabulela "kumfazi onesidima" ngokuthumela abasebenzi bona Ilizwi lenyaniso elibhalwe ezandleni kwaye lithethiwe → lisinika ubulumko bemfihlelo kaThixo eyayifihlwe kwixesha elidlulileyo, ilizwi uThixo ayelimisele kwangaphambili ukuba sisindiswe kwaye sizukiswe phambi kwawo onke amaphakade! Sityhilwe kuthi nguMoya oyiNgcwele. Amen! Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sibone kwaye sive inyaniso yokomoya → siqonde ukuba uThixo wasimisela kwangaphambili ukuba sisindiswe kwaye sizukiswe ngaphambi kokudalwa kwehlabathi! Kukukhangela kuKristu ukuze sisindiswe; ! Amen.

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

【1】Jonga kuKristu ukuze ufumane usindiso

UIsaya Chapter 45 Indinyana 22 Bhekani kum, nonke ziphelo zehlabathi, yaye niya kusindiswa; ngokuba ndinguThixo, akukho wumbi.

(1) AmaSirayeli kwiTestamente eNdala akhangela kwinyoka yobhedu ukuze asindiswe

Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Yenza inyoka enobuhlungu, uyixhome esibondeni; ubomi. INumeri Isahluko 21 Ivesi 8-9

buza: Imela ntoni “inyoka yobhedu”?
impendulo: Inyoka yobhedu ifanekisela uKristu owaqalekiswa ngenxa yezono zethu waza waxhonywa emthini ngaboni → Waxhonywa emthini waza wathwala izono zethu ngokobuqu, ukuze ekubeni sifele ezonweni, sifele ebulungiseni. Naphiliswa ngemivumbo yakhe. Imbekiselo--1 kaPetros Isahluko 2 Ivesi 24

(2) Ukukhangela kuKristu ukuze sisindiswe kwiTestamente eNtsha

UYOHANE 3:14-15 Njengokuba ke uMoses wayiphakamisayo inyoka entlango, umelwe kukuphakanyiswa ngokunjalo uNyana woMntu, ukuze bonke abakholwayo kuye babe nobomi obungunaphakade, ukuze bonke abakholwayo kuye babe nobomi obungunaphakade. → UYohane 12 Isahluko 32: Ukuba ndithe ndaphakanyiswa emhlabeni, ndiya kubatsalela bonke abantu kum. ” → UYohane 8:28 Ngoko ke uYesu wathi: “Xa nithe namphakamisa uNyana woMntu, niya kwazi ukuba ndinguye uKristu → Ngoko ke ndithi kuni, niya kufela ezonweni zenu.” Ukuba nithe anakholwa ukuba ndinguKrestu, niya kufela ezonweni zenu. ” Yohane 8:24 .

buza: Uthetha ukuthini uKristu?
impendulo: UKrestu nguMsindisi kuthetha → UYesu nguKrestu, uMesiya, kunye noMsindisi wethu! UYesu Kristu uyasisindisa: 1 ukhululekile esonweni, 2 Ndikhululwe kuwo umthetho nesiqalekiso sawo; 3 Wasinda kumandla kaSathana obumnyama eHadesi, 4 sikhululekile kumgwebo nokufa; 5 Ukuvuka kukaKristu kwabafileyo kuphinde kwasizala, kusinika imeko yabantwana bakaThixo nobomi obungunaphakade! Amen → Kufuneka sijonge kuKristu kwaye sikholwe ukuba uYesu Krestu unguMsindisi noMsindisi wobomi bethu. INkosi uYesu ithi kuthi → Ngoko ke ndithi kuni, niya kufela ezonweni zenu. Ukuba nithe anakholwa ukuba ndinguKrestu, niya kufela ezonweni zenu. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo? Imbekiselo--1 kaPetros Isahluko 1 Ivesi 3-5

【2】Manyaniswe noKrestu kwaye nizukiswe

Ukuba similiselwe kuye ngemfano yokufa kwakhe, somiliselwa kuye nangemfano yokuvuka kwakhe;

(1) Bhaptizelwa kuKristu

buza: Ukumanyaniswa njani noKrestu ngokufana nokufa kwakhe?
impendulo: “Ukubhaptizelwa kuKristu” → Anazi na ukuba thina sabhaptizelwayo kuKristu Yesu, sabhaptizelwa ekufeni kwakhe? Imbekiselo--KwabaseRoma Isahluko 6 Ivesi 3

buza: Yintoni injongo yobhaptizo?
impendulo: 1 ukuze sihambe sinobomi obutsha → Ngoko ke sangcwatywa naye ngokubhaptizelwa ekufeni, ukuze sihambe sinobomi obutsha, njengokuba uKristu wavuswayo kwabafileyo ngalo uzuko loYise. Imbekiselo— Roma 6:4;
2 sibethelelwe emnqamlezweni noKristu, ukuze umzimba wesono uphuthiswe, sikhululeke kuso isono. ukuze umzimba wesono uphuthiswe, singabi saba ngabakhonzi besono; kuba owafayo ukhululwe esonweni. Qaphela: “Ukubhaptizwa” kuthetha ukuba sibethelelwe emnqamlezweni noKristu Ngaba uyayiqonda kakuhle le nto? Imbekiselo— Roma 6:5-7;
3 Yambathani ubuntu obutsha, nambathe uKristu → mahlaziywe ingqondo yenu, nambathe ubuntu obutsha, obudalwe ngokomfanekiso kaThixo, ebulungiseni nasebungcweleni benyaniso. Kwabase-Efese 4:23-24 → Ke ngoko nina nonke ningoonyana bakaThixo ngako ukukholwa, nikuKristu Yesu. Nina nonke, nabhaptizelwayo kuKristu, namambatha uKristu. Galati 3:26-27

(2) Ukumanyana noKristu kwimo yovuko

buza: Ukumanyaniswa njani naye ngokufana novuko?
impendulo: " Yidlani isidlo seNkosi ” → Wathi uYesu, “Inene, inene, ndithi kuni, Ukuba anithanga niyidle inyama yoNyana woMntu, nilisele igazi lakhe, aninabo ubomi kuni. Lowo uyidlayo eyam inyama, alisele elam igazi, unobomi obungunaphakade; ndaye mna ndiya kumvusa ngomhla wokugqibela. Imbekiselo - Yohane 6:53-54 → Oko ndanishumayezayo ngaloo mini ndakwamkela eNkosini uYesu, yathabatha isonka ngobusuku eyanikelwa ngabo, yaza yakuba ibulele, yasiqhekeza, yathi: Lo ngumzimba wam, owaphulelwa nina. Oku kwenzeleni ukundikhumbula.” Emva kokutya, wathabatha nendebe, wathi: “Le ndebe yeyam; Nanini na nisela umnqophiso omtsha osegazini lakhe, “Ngalo lonke ixesha enisukuba nisidla eso sonka, niyisele le ndebe, niya kuvuma ukufa kweNkosi, ide ifike. Imbekiselo--1 kwabaseKorinte 11 ivesi 23-26

(3) Thabatha umnqamlezo wakho, ulandele iNkosi; Shumayela iindaba ezilungileyo zobukumkani makazukiswe

Wasibizela ke kubo indimbane nabafundi bakhe, wathi kubo, Ukuba ubani uthanda ukundilandela, makazincame ngokwakhe, awuthwale umnqamlezo wakhe, andilandele. Mark 8:34

buza: Iyintoni “injongo” yokuthabatha umnqamlezo kabani nokulandela uYesu?
impendulo: dlula Thethani ngomnqamlezo kaKristu, nishumayele iindaba ezilungileyo zobukumkani bamazulu

1 Ndibethelelwe emnqamlezweni noKristu, ayisendim ke odla ubomi, nguKristu ke oselesidla ubomi kum → Ndibethelelwe emnqamlezweni noKristu; ayisendim ke odla ubomi, nguKristu ke oselesidla ubomi kum Ubomi ke endibudlayo ngoku, ndisenyameni, ndibudla ngokukholwa kuNyana kaThixo, owandithandayo, wazinikela ngenxa yam. Imbekiselo--amaGalati isahluko 2 ivesi 20
2 “Ukholo” Umzimba wesono uyatshatyalaliswa, size sikhululwe esonweni → Kuba siyazi ukuba umntu wethu omdala wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni kunye naye, ukuze umzimba wesono uphuthiswe, ukuze singabi sakhonza uYehova. kuba owafayo ugwetyelwe, wakhululwa kuso isono. Roma 6:6-7
3 "Ukholo" luyasikhulula emthethweni nakwisiqalekiso sawo → Kodwa ekubeni safa kuwo umthetho owawusibophelela, ngoku sikhululekile kuwo umthetho, ukuze sikwazi ukukhonza iNkosi ngokomoya (umoya: okanye uguqulelwe njengoNgcwele). Spirit) Indlela entsha, hayi ngokwendlela endala. KwabaseRoma 7:6 → UKristu wasithenga, wasikhulula esiqalekisweni somthetho, ngokwenziwa isiqalekiso ngenxa yethu;
4 “Ukholo” luyalilahla ixhego nokuziphatha kwalo – bhekisa kwabaseKolose 3:9
5 "Ukholo" luyasinda uMtyholi noSathana , umtyholi, abakhulule bonke abo bakoyika ukufa ubomi babo bonke. Hebhere 2:14-15
6 “Ukholo” luyasinda kumandla obumnyama neHadesi → Uyasihlangula kumandla obumnyama aze asifudusele ebukumkanini boNyana wakhe oyintanda;
7 "Ukholo" lusindile emhlabeni → Ndibanike ilizwi lakho. Ke ihlabathi libathiyile, ngokuba bengengabo abehlabathi, njengokuba nam ndingenguye owehlabathi. ... njengokuba wandithuma ehlabathini, nam ndibathume bona ehlabathini. Funda kuYohane 17:14, 18
8 " ileta " Ndafa kunye noKristu kwaye ndiya "kukholwa" ukuba ndivuswe, ndizalwe ngokutsha, ndisindiswe, ndibe nobomi obungunaphakade kunye naye, ndidle ilifa lobukumkani bamazulu! Amen . Bhekisela kumaRoma 6:8 nakweyoku- 1 kaPetros 1:3-5

Yiloo nto iNkosi uYesu yathi → Wathi: "Ixesha lizalisekile, yaye ubukumkani bukaThixo busondele. Guqukani nikholwe kuzo iindaba ezilungileyo "iindaba ezilungileyo zobukumkani bamazulu" → Kuba nabani na ofuna ukusindisa ubomi bakhe! Othe wawulahla umphefumlo wakhe ngenxa yam, nangenxa yeendaba ezilungileyo ezi, wolahlekelwa nguwo. Kumnceda ntoni na umntu ukuba uthe wazuza ihlabathi liphela, waza wonakalelwa ke ubomi bakhe? Yintoni enye anonokuyinikela umntu, ibe sisananelo somphefumlo wakhe? Imbekiselo--Marko Isahluko 8 Ivesi 35-37 neSahluko 1 Indinyana ye-15

Iculo: Wena unguKumkani wozuko

KULUNGILE! Kuphelele apho kunxibelelwano lwanamhlanje kunye nokwabelana nawe enkosi Bawo waseZulwini ngokusinika indlela ezukileyo. Amen

2021.05.05

articles.title: (4) Qondani indlela eyinyaniso nize nisindiswe;
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubantakwethu noodadewethu kusapho lukaThixo! Amen

Masivule iiBhayibhile zethu kweyoku-1 kuTimoti iSahluko 2 kunye nevesi 4 size sifunde kunye: Ufuna bonke abantu basindiswe baze baqonde inyaniso.

Namhlanje siyafunda, sinxulumana, kwaye sabelane "Usindiso kunye nozuko" Hayi. 4 Thetha kwaye wenze umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, Nkosi yethu uYesu Krestu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Siyayibulela iNkosi ngokuthumela abasebenzi ukuze basinike ubulumko bemfihlelo kaThixo eyayifihliwe mandulo ngelizwi lenyaniso elabhalwa kwaye lathethwa ngezandla zabo, elilizwi uThixo awalimiselayo ukuba sisindiswe kwaye sizukiswe phambi kwabantu bonke. ngonaphakade! Sityhilwe kuthi nguMoya oyiNgcwele. Amen! Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sibone kwaye sive inyaniso yokomoya → siqonde ukuba uThixo wasimisela kwangaphambili ukuba sisindiswe kwaye sizukiswe ngaphambi kokudalwa kwehlabathi! Kukuqonda inyaniso nokusindiswa; ukubeka ubutyebi kwisitya sodongwe nokubutyhila nokuzukiswa ! Amen.

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

【1】 Qonda indlela eyiyo kwaye usindiswe

1 kuTimoti 2:4 unqwenela ukuba bonke abantu basindiswe, bafikelele ekuyazini inyaniso.

(1) Qonda indlela yokwenyaniso

buza: Yeyiphi indlela yokwenyani?
impendulo: “Inyaniso” yinyaniso, yaye “uTao” nguThixo → Ekuqaleni kwakukho uTao, uTao wayekunye noThixo, uTao enguThixo. Lo Lizwi wayekunye noThixo kwasekuqalekeni. Izinto zonke zabakho ngaye; Imbekiselo--UYohane Isahluko 1 Ivesi 1-3

(2) ULizwi waba yinyama

ULizwi ke waba ngumntu, waza wahlala phakathi kwethu, ezele lubabalo nayinyaniso. Sabubukela ubungangamsha bakhe awabunikwa nguYise, njengoko ekukuphela koNyana wakhe; … Akukho namnye wakha wambona uThixo; uNyana okuphela kwamzeleyo, lowo usesifubeni sikaYise, nguye omtyhile. Imbekiselo — Yohane 1:14, 18 . Phawula: ULizwi waba yinyama → oko kukuthi, uThixo waba yinyama → wakhawulwa yiNtombi Enyulu uMariya waza wazalwa ngoMoya Oyingcwele → [igama elinguYesu]! Igama likaYesu → lithetha ukusindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo. Amen! Akukho namnye wakha wambona uThixo, kuphela uNyana okuphela kwamzeleyo “uYesu” osesifubeni sikaYise umtyhile → oko kukuthi, ukutyhila uThixo noYise! →Ngoko ke iNkosi uYesu yathi: “Ukuba benindazi mna, niya kumazi noBawo. Ukususela ngoku niyamazi yaye nimbonile.”— Yohane 14:7

(3) Indlela yobomi

Ngokusingisele kwilizwi lantlandlolo lobomi kwasekuqalekeni, oku koko sikuvileyo, sakubonayo, sakubona ngamehlo ethu, saza sakuchukumisa ngezandla zethu. (Obu bomi bubonakalisiwe, nathi sabubona, yaye ngoku siyangqina ukuba sinishumayeza ubomi obungunaphakade, obo wayenaye uYise, kwaye wabonakala nathi.) Ke thina, sinibikela oko sikubonileyo, sikuvileyo, ukuze nina zinobudlelane nathi. Bubudlelwane bethu noBawo kunye noNyana wakhe, uYesu Krestu. eyoku- 1 kaYohane 1:1-3

(4) UYesu nguNyana kaThixo ophilayo

Isithunywa eso sathi kuye: “Musa ukoyika, Mariya, kuba ubabalwe nguThixo. Uya kumitha, uzale unyana, umthiye igama elinguYesu. Yena uya kuba mkhulu, abizwe ngokuba nguNyana weNkosi; INkosi uThixo iya kumenza mkhulu, abe ngukumkani phezu kwendlu kaYakobi kude kube ngunaphakade, nobukumkani bakhe bungabi nasiphelo Amandla Oyena Uphakamileyo aya kukusibekela, yaye lowo uya kuzalwa uya kubizwa ngokuba nguNyana kaThixo (Luka 1:30).
Matthew 16:16 Waphendula uSimon Petros wathi kuye, Wena unguye uKristu, uNyana kaThixo ophilileyo.

(5) UThixo wathumela uNyana wakhe oyintanda ukuba azalwe phantsi komthetho ukuze ahlawulele abo baphantsi komthetho ukuze sibe ngoonyana.

KumaGalati 4:4-7 XHO75 - Lithe ke lakuzaliseka ixesha, uThixo wamkhupha weza uNyana wakhe, othe wazalwa ngumfazi, ezelwe phantsi komthetho, ukuze abakhulule ngentlawulelo abaphantsi komthetho, ukuze samkele igama loonyana. Ekubeni ke ningoonyana, uThixo wamkhupha uMoya woNyana wakhe, weza ezintliziyweni zenu, edanduluka esithi, Abha, Bawo. Ukuba ke ungunyana, uthembela kuThixo, yindlalifa yakhe.

(6) Yamkela uMoya oyiNgcwele othenjisiweyo njengetywina nanjengesiqinisekiso sokungena ebukumkanini bamazulu

KWABASE-EFESE 1:13-14 Natywinwa kuye, natywinwa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele wedinga, ekuye nani nakholwa kuKristu, nakuva ilizwi lenyaniso, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwenu. Lo Moya oyiNgcwele usisibambiso (isicatshulwa sokuqala: ilifa) selifa lethu bade abantu bakaThixo (isicatshulwa sokuqala: ilifa) bakhululwe ukuze kudunyiswe uzuko lwakhe.

(7) Yiqonde indlela yenyaniso kwaye usindiswe

UYohane Isahluko 15 Indinyana 3 “Nihlambulukile nina, ngenxa yelizwi endilithethileyo kuni,” yatsho iNkosi uYesu.

1 Sele icocekile: Iindlela ezicocekileyo Ungcwele, ongenasono →Nathi, nakholwa kuye, nakuye, xa nilivayo ilizwi lenyaniso, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwenu, nakholwa kuye, enathi natywinwa kuye natywinwa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele wedinga →“Njengokuba ke uPawulos atshoyo,” ukuze mna ndibe lidini elingcwele. umkhonzi kaKristu Yesu ngenxa yeentlanga, ukuba abe ngababingeleli beendaba ezilungileyo zikaThixo, ukuze amadini eentlanga amkholise, engcwaliswe nguMoya oyiNgcwele. Imbekiselo — Roma 15:16
2 Sele ihlanjiwe, yangcwaliswa kwaye yalungiswa: Naye ninjalo ke inxenye yenu; kuloko nahlanjululwayo, nangcwaliswa, nagwetyelwayo egameni leNkosi uYesu Kristu, nangoMoya kaThixo wethu. Imbekiselo — 1 Korinte 6:11

(8) UYesu uyindlela, inyaniso, nobomi

UYohane Isahluko 14 Indinyana 6 UYesu wathi: “Ndim indlela, ndim inyaniso, ndim ubomi, akukho bani uzayo kuBawo engezi ngam Indlela yadlula ngaphaya komkhusane, owawungumzimba wakhe.

【2】 Ubuncwane buyatyhilwa kwaye buzukiswe xa bubekwe kwisitya sodongwe

(1) Ubuncwane butyhilwa ngesitya sodongwe

Obu butyebi sibuphethe ngezitya zodongwe, ukubonisa ukuba la mandla makhulu, aphuma kuThixo, angaphumi kuthi. Phawula:" usana "yiyo i umoya wenyaniso , usana yiyo i ILizwi likaThixo , usana yiyo i UYESU khristu ! Amen. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo? 2 Korinte 4:7

(2) Ukufa kukaYesu kuvula ubuntu bethu obudala kwaye kubangela ukuba ubomi bukaYesu bubonakale kubuntu bethu obutsha

Singqongwe ziintshaba macala onke, kodwa asibambi, kodwa asidaniswa, kodwa asishiywanga phantsi; Sihlala sikuthwele kunye nathi ukufa kukaYesu ukuze ubomi bukaYesu bubonakale kuthi. Kuba thina badla ubomi sisoloko sinikelwa ekufeni ngenxa kaYesu, ukuze ubomi bukaYesu bubonakale emizimbeni yethu enokufa. Ngokwale mbono, ukufa kuyasebenza kuthi, kodwa ubomi buyasebenza kuwe. 2 Korinte 4:8-12

(3) Ubuncwane obubonakaliswayo busenza sizuze ubunzima obungenakuthelekiswa nanto bozuko olungunaphakade

Ngoko ke, asityhafi. Nangona umzimba wangaphandle uya kutshatyalaliswa, kodwa umzimba wangaphakathi uyahlaziyeka imihla ngemihla. Iintlungu zethu zomzuzwana nezikhaphukhaphu ziya kusisebenzela ubunzima banaphakade bozuko olungenakuthelekiswa nanto. 2 Korinte 4:16-17

Iculo: Ukuhlaziywa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele

KULUNGILE! Kuphelele apho kunxibelelwano lwanamhlanje kunye nokwabelana nawe enkosi Bawo waseZulwini ngokusinika indlela ezukileyo. Amen

2021.05.04

articles.title: (3) Kholwani kuzo ivangeli nisindiswe;
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubantakwethu noodadewethu kusapho lukaThixo! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile kweyoku-1 kwabaseKorinte 15, indinyana 3-4, size sifunde kunye: Kuba oko ndaninikelayo mna, okokuqala kwiinto zonke, kukuba uKristu wazifela izono zethu, ngokwezibhalo, nokokuba wangcwatywa, nokokuba uvukile ngomhla wesithathu, ngokwezibhalo.

Namhlanje siyafunda, sinxulumana, kwaye sabelane "Usindiso kunye nozuko" Hayi. 3 Thetha kwaye wenze umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, Nkosi yethu uYesu Krestu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Siyayibulela iNkosi ngokuthumela abasebenzi ukuze basinike ubulumko bemfihlelo kaThixo eyayifihliwe mandulo ngelizwi lenyaniso elabhalwa kwaye lathethwa ngezandla zabo, elilizwi uThixo awalimiselayo ukuba sisindiswe kwaye sizukiswe phambi kwabantu bonke. ngonaphakade! Sityhilwe kuthi nguMoya oyiNgcwele. Amen! Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sibone nokuva iinyaniso zokomoya → Qonda ukuba uThixo wasimisela kwangaphambili ukuba sisindiswe kwaye sizukiswe ngaphambi kokudalwa kwehlabathi! Amen.

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

【1】Ivangeli yosindiso

*UYesu wathuma uPawulos ukuba ashumayele iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso kwiiNtlanga*

buza: Yintoni ivangeli yosindiso?
impendulo: UThixo wathumela umpostile uPawulos ukuba ashumayele kwiiNtlanga “iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso ngoYesu Kristu” → Ke kaloku, bazalwana, ndinishumayeza iindaba ezilungileyo, endazishumayezayo ngenxa engaphambili, enazamkelayo nokuzamkela, nimiyo kuzo; anikholwa nize; kodwa, ukuba nithe nazibamba nizishumayeza iindaba ezilungileyo, nosindiswa ngazo ezi ndaba zilungileyo. Nantoni na endayidlulisela kuni yayilolu hlobo: Okokuqala, ukuba uKristu wafela izono zethu ngokutsho kweZibhalo, nokuba wangcwatywa waza wavuswa ngomhla wesithathu ngokweZibhalo— 1 Korinte Book 15 verses 1-4

buza: Yintoni awayicombululayo uKristu xa wafela izono zethu?
impendulo: 1 Kusenza sikhululeke esonweni → Kuyabonakala ukuba uthando lukaKristu luyasikhuthaza; kuba sicinga ukuba ekubeni “uKristu” wafela bonke, bonke bafa— 2 Korinte 5:14 → Kuba abafileyo bakhululwe Isono - Roma 6:7 → “UKristu” wabafela bonke, ngoko ke bonke bafile → “Lowo ufileyo ukhululwe esonweni, yaye bonke bafile” → Bonke bakhululwe esonweni. Amen! , uyakholelwa na? Abo bakholwayo abagwetywa, kodwa abo bangakholwayo sele begwetyiwe ngenxa yokuba bengakholelwa kwigama loNyana okuphela kwamzeleyo "uYesu" ukusindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo → "UKristu" wafela bonke, kwaye bonke bafa. bafa bonke, bakhululwa bonke esonweni.
2 Ukhululwe kumthetho nakwisiqalekiso sawo-bona amaRoma 7:6 kunye namaGalati 3:12. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

buza: Kwaye kungcwatywa, kwasonjululwa ntoni?
impendulo: 3 Khululwa kubuntu obudala nakwiindlela zabo zakudala - Kolose 3:9

buza : UKristu wavuswa kwabafileyo ngomhla wesithathu ngokutsho kweBhayibhile → Yintoni eyaconjululwa?
impendulo: 4 "UYesu Kristu wavuswa kwabafileyo" → wayisombulula ingxaki "yokusigwebela" → UYesu wanikelwa ebantwini ngenxa yezono zethu wavuswa ngenxa yokugwetyelwa kwethu (okanye ukuguqulelwa: UYesu ungenxa yezono zethu wahlangulwa; wavuswa ngenxa yokugwetyelwa kwethu)-- KwabaseRoma 4:25

Phawula: Oku → UYesu Kristu wathumela uPawulos ukuba ashumayele [ivangeli yosindiso] kwiiNtlanga → UKristu wafela izono zethu → 1 Uyisombulule ingxaki yesono, 2 UMthetho osonjululweyo kunye neMiba yesiqalekiso; 3 Ukusombulula ingxaki yendoda endala kunye nokuziphatha kwayo kwavuka ngosuku lwesithathu→ 4 Isombulula "iingxaki zokugwetyelwa, ukuzalwa ngokutsha, uvuko, usindiso, nobomi obungunaphakade kuthi." Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo? Imbekiselo--1 kaPetros Isahluko 1 Ivesi 3-5

【2】Yambathani umntu omtsha, nimhlube umntu omdala, nizuze uzuko

(1) Xa uMoya kaThixo ehlala ezintliziyweni zethu, asisafani

KwabaseRoma 8:9 Ukuba ke uMoya kaThixo uhleli kuni, aningabo abenyama, ningaboMoya. Ukuba umntu akanaye uMoya kaKristu, akangokaKristu lowo.

buza: Kutheni le nto xa uMoya kaThixo ehlala ezintliziyweni zethu, singabi ngabenyama?
impendulo: Kuba “uKristu” wafela bonke, yaye bonke bafa → kuba nafa yaye ubomi benu “ubomi obuphuma kuThixo” bufihlwe noKristu kuye uThixo. Kolose 3:3 → Ngoko ke, ukuba uMoya kaThixo uhleli kuthi, sizalwa ngokutsha sibe ngumntu omtsha, yaye “umntu omtsha” akanguye “omntu omdala wenyama” → Kuba siyazi ukuba umntu wethu omdala. wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni kunye naye, ukuze umzimba wesono uphulwe, singabi sakhonza isono; ngokuba umzimba wesono uyatshabalala; ukufa, umzimba wokonakala (ukonakala). Kanye njengokuba uPawulos watshoyo → Ndilusizi! Ngubani na oya kundihlangula kulo mzimba wokufa? Ndiyambulela uThixo kuba sinako ukusinda ngayo iNkosi yethu uYesu Krestu. Ngokwale mbono ndithobela umthetho kaThixo ngentliziyo, kodwa inyama yam ithobela umthetho wesono. KwabaseRoma 7:24-25, ngaba uyakuqonda ngokucacileyo oku?

(2) Ukulahla ixhego, ukuva ukulahla ixhego

KWABASEKOLOSE 3:9 Musani ukuxokisana, kuba nizihlubile nje umntu omdala, nezenzo zakhe.

buza: “Kuba nimlahlile umntu omdala nezenzo zakhe.” Kutheni kusafuneka sihambe ngenkqubo yokulahla izinto ezindala kunye nokuziphatha?
impendulo: UMoya kaThixo uhleli ezintliziyweni zethu, yaye asisekho enyameni → Oku kuthetha ukuba ukholo “luyihlubile” inyama yomntu omdala → Ubomi bethu “bomntu omtsha” bufihlwe noKristu kuThixo; ” isekhona Yidla, sela uhambe! IBhayibhile ithi njani “ufile” emehlweni kaThixo “indoda endala” yakho ifile → UKristu wafela bonke, yaye bonke bafa → Ngokubonakalayo "indoda endala" iyafa "umntu omtsha" ongabonakaliyo → Ngoko kufuneka sibe namava okulahla "indoda endala ebonakalayo" → Ukuba akukho "bantu abadala nabatsha", indoda yomoya ezelwe nguThixo kunye nomzimba wenyama ozelwe nguThixo. ukusuka kuAdam Umntu omdala akanayo "imfazwe phakathi komoya nenyama" njengoko uPawulos watshoyo Kuphela yinyama yantlandlolo ka-Adam engazange ibe namava okulahla umntu omdala → Ukuba uye waphulaphula amazwi akhe, wafumana imfundiso yakhe , nafunda inyaniso yakhe, Nimele nibulahle ubuntu obudala kwihambo yenu yangaphambili, ethi ngokuthe ngcembe ibe mbi ngenxa yobuqhetseba benkanuko, Ngaba ukuqonde ngokucacileyo oku? Imbekiselo--Efese Isahluko 4 Ivesi 21-22

(3) Ukwambatha umntu omtsha nokuba namava nenjongo yokukhulula umntu omdala ukuze sizukiswe.

KWABASE-EFESE 4:23-24 mahlaziywe ke iingqondo zenu, nambathe ubuntu obutsha, obudalwe ngokomfanekiso kaThixo, ebulungiseni nasebungcweleni benyaniso. →Ngoko ke, asiphelelwa yintliziyo. Nangona umzimba wangaphandle uya kutshatyalaliswa, kodwa umzimba wangaphakathi uyahlaziyeka imihla ngemihla. Iintlungu zethu zomzuzwana nezikhaphukhaphu ziya kusisebenzela ubunzima banaphakade bozuko olungenakuthelekiswa nanto. Ke kaloku, asikukhathalele oko kubonwayo, sinyamekela izinto ezingabonwayo; 2 Korinte 4:16-18

articles.title: (2) Kholwa kwaye ubhaptizwe ngoMoya oyiNgcwele kwaye ubhaptizwe kuKristu kwaye umbathe uKristu ukuze azukiswe
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubantakwethu noodadewethu kusapho lukaThixo! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile yethu kuMarko isahluko 16 indinyana 16 size sifunde kunye: Lowo ukholiweyo wabhaptizwa, wosindiswa; Roma 6:3 Anazi na ukuba thina sabhaptizelwayo kuKristu Yesu, sabhaptizelwa ekufeni kwakhe?

Namhlanje siyafunda, sinxulumana, kwaye sabelane "Usindiso kunye nozuko" Hayi. 2 Thetha kwaye wenze umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, Nkosi yethu uYesu Krestu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Ndiyayibulela iNkosi ngokuthumela abasebenzi ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo nelithethiweyo ezandleni zabo → isinika ubulumko bemfihlelo kaThixo eyayifihliwe mandulo, ilizwi uThixo awalimiselayo ukuba sisindiswe kwaye sizukiswe ngaphambi kwephakade. ! NgoMoya Oyingcwele Ityhiliwe kuthi Amen! Qonda ukuba uThixo wasimisela kwangaphambili ukuba sisindiswe kwaye sizukiswe ngaphambi kokudalwa kwehlabathi! Amen.

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

【1】Lowo ukholiweyo wabhaptizwa, wosindiswa

Mark 16:16 Lowo ukholiweyo wabhaptizwa, wosindiswa;

buza: Nabani na okholwayo aze abhaptizwe uya kusindiswa → Yintoni okholelwa ukuba basindiswe?
impendulo: Kholwa kwivangeli kwaye usindiswe! → Wathi: “Lizalisekile ixesha, yaye ubukumkani bukaThixo busondele. Guqukani nikholwe kuzo iindaba ezilungileyo ezikuMarko 1:15

buza: Yintoni ivangeli?
impendulo: Iindaba ezilungileyo nguThixo wathumela umpostile uPawulos ukuba ashumayele "ivangeli yosindiso" kwiiNtlanga → Oko ndakwamkelayo ndashumayela kuni: Okokuqala, ukuba uKristu wafela izono zethu waza wangcwatywa ngokutsho eBhayibhileni; wavuswa kwabafileyo ngomhla wesithathu. Imbekiselo--1 kwabaseKorinte 15 ivesi 3-4.

Phawula: Logama nje ukholelwa le vangeli, uya kusindiswa. Amen. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

buza: Ubhaptizwe ngokholo→oku” ubhaptiziwe “Ingaba lubhaptizo loMoya oyiNgcwele? Hlamba ngamanzi
impendulo: Lowo ukholwayo aze abhaptizwe uya kusindiswa → Le " ubhaptiziwe "Ewe ubhaptizo lomoya oyingcwele kuba kuphela " Babhaptizwe ngoMoya oyiNgcwele "Ukuze uzalwe ngokutsha, uvuswe, kwaye usindiswe! Amen. Njengoko uYohane uMbhaptizi wathi → ndinibhaptiza ngamanzi, kodwa yena uya kunibhaptiza ngoMoya oyiNgcwele." Amazwi eNkosi athi: "UYohane wabhaptiza ngamanzi, kodwa nina niya kubhaptizwa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele." ’; yaye “ukubhaptizwa emanzini” kuya kufakwa ekufeni kukaKristu. Hlamba ngamanzi “Anikukhathalelanga ukulahla ubunyhukunyhuku benyama— bona eyoku-1 kaPetros 4:21 . babhaptizwe emanzini ” asiyomeko yosindiso, Kuphela " Babhaptizwe ngoMoya oyiNgcwele " Kungoko kuphela onokuthi uzalwe ngokutsha kwaye usindiswe .

buza: Indlela yokufumana ubhaptizo loMoya oyiNgcwele?
impendulo: Kholwa yivangeli, uqonde inyaniso, kwaye utywinwe nguMoya oyiNgcwele othenjisiweyo → Nathi nakholwa kuye, nakuva ilizwi lenyaniso, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwenu, nakholwa kuye, natywinwa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele wedinga. Lo Moya oyiNgcwele usisibambiso (isicatshulwa sokuqala: ilifa) selifa lethu bade abantu bakaThixo (isicatshulwa sokuqala: ilifa) bakhululwe ukuze kudunyiswe uzuko lwakhe. Imbekiselo — Efese 1:13-14 . Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

【2】Bhaptizelwani kuKristu, nambatha uKristu, namkele uzuko

KwabaseRoma 6:5 Ukuba similiselwe kuye ngemfano yokufa kwakhe, somiliselwa kuye nangemfano yokuvuka kwakhe;

(1) Ukuba simanyene naye ngokufana nokufa kwakhe

buza: Simanyene njani noKristu ngokufana nokufa kwakhe?
impendulo:" Bhaptizelwa kuKristu ngamanzi! Oku kukumanyaniswa naye ngemfano yokufa → Anazi na ukuba thina sabhaptizelwayo kuKristu Yesu, sabhaptizelwa ekufeni kwakhe—KwabaseRoma 6:3

buza: Kutheni “ubhaptizo emanzini” luhlobo oluthile lokufa nokumanyana noKristu?
impendulo: Ngenxa yokuba uKristu wabethelelwa ngenxa yezono zethu → Wayenemilo kunye nomzimba kwaye waxhonywa phezu kweenkuni "umzimba wesono" oxhonywe emthini "ngumzimba wethu wesono" → Kuba uKristu wathwala izono zethu waza "wabeka endaweni" imizimba yaxhonywa emthini, waza uThixo wenza abo bangenasono ukuba “bazithabathele indawo” izono zethu ngokuxhonywa emthini → UThixo wenza abangenasono ukuba babe zizono ngenxa yethu, ukuze thina sibe bubulungisa bukaThixo kuye. Imbekiselo — 2 Korinte 5:21
Ngoko “ukubhaptizwa emanzini” ekufeni kukaKristu → ukumanyanisa imizimba yethu emile ngokubhaptizwa kumzimba omile kaKristu ujinga emthini → oku “kukumanyaniswa naye ngokufana nokufa kwakhe”. Xa “ubhaptizwa emanzini” uvakalisa kwaye ungqina kwihlabathi ukuba wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni noKristu! "Idyokhwe" yokubethelelwa kunye noKristu ilula, kwaye "umthwalo" ulula → olu lubabalo lukaThixo! Amen. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo? Yiyo loo nto iNkosi uYesu yathi: “Kuba idyokhwe yam imnandi, nomthwalo wam ulula.”—Mateyu 11:30

(2) Manyaniswe naye ngokufana nokuvuka kwakhe

buza: Ukumanyaniswa njani noKrestu ngokufana nokuvuka kwakhe?
impendulo: “Ukutya nokusela inyama negazi leNkosi” kukumanyana noKristu ngokufana nokuvuka kwakhe → UYesu wathi, “Inene, inene, ndithi kuni, Ukuba anithanga niyidle inyama, nilisele igazi Owudlayo eyam inyama, alisele elam igazi, ndomvusa ngomhla wokugqibela ndikuye, ndibe mna ndikuye.”—Yohane 6:53-56.

(3) Yidla isidlo seNkosi sangokuhlwa

INkosi uYesu ngobusuku eyanikelwa ngayo yathatha isonka, yaza yakuba ibulele, yasiqhekeza, yathi: “Ngumzimba wam lo, onikelwa ngenxa yenu. Oku kwenzeleni ukundikhumbula. Emva kwesidlo sangokuhlwa, wathabatha nendebe, wathi, Le ndebe ingumnqophiso omtsha osegazini lam ngokundikhumbula.” Ngalo lonke ixesha enisukuba nisidla esi sonka, niyisele le ndebe, niyakwazisa ukufa kweNkosi ide ifike. 1 Korinte 11:23-26

【 3】Yambathani uKristu, namkele uzuko

Ngoko ke nina nonke ningoonyana bakaThixo ngako ukukholwa, nikuKristu Yesu; Nina nonke, nabhaptizelwayo kuKristu, namambatha uKristu. Galati 3:26-27

buza: Kuthetha ukuthini ukwambatha uKristu?
impendulo: "Yambathani uKristu" → "Ukwambatha" kuthetha ukusonga okanye ukugquma, "ukunxiba" kuthetha ukwambatha, ukwambatha → Xa sambatha umoya, umphefumlo nomzimba "womntu omtsha" kaKristu, sambethe uKristu. ! Amen. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo? →Yambathani rhoqo iNkosi uYesu Krestu kwaye ningalungiseleli inyama ukuba niyenzele iinkanuko zayo. Imbekiselo - Roma 13:14 . Phawula: UThixo ukukukhanya, yaye kuye akukho bumnyama konke konke. 1 Yohane 1:5 → UYesu wathi kubo bonke abantu kwakhona: “Mna ndilukhanyiselo lwehlabathi. Lowo undilandelayo akasayi kuhamba ebumnyameni naphakade; ukhanyiselo lobomi.”— Yohane 8:12. Ngoko ke, kuphela xa sambatha umntu omtsha saza sambatha uKristu apho siya kuthi sibengezele, sibe nozuko, size simzukise uThixo! Amen. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

Vuyo: Ndim lo

KULUNGILE! Kuphelele apho kunxibelelwano lwanamhlanje kunye nokwabelana nawe enkosi Bawo waseZulwini ngokusinika indlela ezukileyo. Amen

articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubantakwethu noodadewethu kusapho lukaThixo! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile yethu kumaRoma isahluko 1 kunye nevesi 17 size sifunde kunye: Ngokuba ubulungisa bukaThixo bubonakalaliswa ngazo ezi ndaba zilungileyo; njengokuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Olilungisa uya kudla ubomi obuphuma elukholweni.

Namhlanje siyafunda, sinxulumana, kwaye sabelane "Usindiso kunye nozuko" Hayi. 1 Thetha kwaye wenze umthandazo: Bawo waseZulwini Othandekayo, iNkosi yethu uYesu Krestu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Siyayibulela iNkosi ngokuthumela abasebenzi ukuze basinike ubulumko bemfihlelo kaThixo eyayifihliwe mandulo ngelizwi lenyaniso elabhalwa kwaye lathethwa ngezandla zabo, elilizwi uThixo awalimiselayo ukuba sisindiswe kwaye sizukiswe phambi kwabantu bonke. ngonaphakade! Sityhilwe kuthi nguMoya oyiNgcwele. Amen! Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sibone nokuva iinyaniso zokomoya → Qonda ukuba uThixo wasimisela kwangaphambili ukuba sisindiswe kwaye sizukiswe ngaphambi kokusekwa kwehlabathi!

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi uYesu Krestu! Amen

Intshayelelo: Ivangeli yosindiso ithi "" Ngokusekelwe elukholweni ", iindaba ezilungileyo zozuko zisekhona" ileta ” → ukuze ileta . Amen! Usindiso lusisiseko, kwaye uzuko lusekelwe elusindisweni.

Kuba andinazintloni ngazo iindaba ezilungileyo zikaKristu, kuba zingamandla kaThixo okusindisa bonke abakholwayo, umYuda kuqala, kwanomGrike. Ngokuba ubulungisa bukaThixo bubonakalaliswa ngazo ezi ndaba zilungileyo; Njengoko kubhaliwe kwathiwa: “Lowo ulilungisa uya kudla ubomi obuphuma elukholweni.”—KwabaseRoma 1:16-17

【1】Ivangeli yosindiso iphuma elukholweni

buza: Ivangeli yosindiso isekelwe elukholweni. Yeyiphi ivangeli umntu akholelwa kuyo ukuze asindiswe?
impendulo: Ukukholelwa kulowo uThixo amthumileyo ngumsebenzi kaThixo → Yohane 6:28-29 Bambuza bathi: “Simele senze ntoni na, ukuze sigqalwe njengabo benza umsebenzi kaThixo?” NgoThixo kukwenza nje umsebenzi kaThixo.”

buza: Ngubani okholelwa ukuba uthunywe nguThixo?
impendulo: “UMsindisi uYesu Kristu” kuba uya kusindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo → Mateyu 1:20-21
Ecinga ngale nto, kwabonakala kuye isithunywa seNkosi kuye ephupheni, sisithi, Yosefu, nyana kaDavide, musa ukoyika, mthabathe uMariya, abe ngumfazi wakho; kuba oko kukhawulweyo phakathi kwakhe kungoMoya oyiNgcwele. . . . Uya kuzala unyana, umthiye igama elinguYesu, kuba eya kubasindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo.

buza: Nguwuphi umsebenzi asenzele wona uMsindisi uYesu Krestu?
impendulo: UYesu Kristu "usenzela umsebenzi omkhulu" → "ivangeli yosindiso lwethu", kwaye siya kusindiswa ngokukholelwa kule vangeli →
Ke kaloku, bazalwana, ndiyanazisa iindaba ezilungileyo, endazishumayelayo kuni, nazamkelayo nokuzamkela, nimiyo kuzo; Into endayinikelayo kuni yaba yile: Okokuqala, kukuba uKristu wafela izono zethu ngokutsho kweZibhalo, nokokuba wangcwatywa, nokokuba wavuswa ngomhla wesithathu ngokutsho kweZibhalo. Amen! Amen, ngoko, uyaqonda ngokucacileyo? Bhekisela kweyoku- 1 kwabaseKorinte isahluko 15 indinyana 1-3 .

Phawula: Igospile ingamandla kaThixo, kwaye ubulungisa bukaThixo butyhilekile kulevangeli.Obu bulungisa busekelwe elukholweni yosindiso kwabangaphandle→ Okokuqala, uKristu wafela izono zethu ngokutsho kweBhayibhile. 1 Sikhulule esonweni; 2 bakhululwe kuwo umthetho nesiqalekiso sawo” kwaye wangcwatywa “ 3 “Ekuba emkile kwindoda endala neendlela zayo” yaye ngokutsho kweBhayibhile, wavuswa kwabafileyo ngomhla wesithathu “. 4 Ukuze sigwetyelwe, sizalwe ngokutsha, sivuswe, sisindiswe, kwaye sibe nobomi obungunaphakade.” Amen → Ukuba uyakholwa, uya kusindiswa ngokukholelwa kule vangeli! Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

【2】Ivangeli yozuko ikhokelela elukholweni

buza: Ivangeli yozuko ngulowo ukholwayo → Yeyiphi ivangeli akholelwa ukuba izukiswe?
impendulo: 1 Igospile ingamandla kaThixo okusindisa wonke umntu okholwayo kuyo Usindiso kwivangeli lusekelwe elukholweni → Xa ukholelwa kule vangeli, ukholelwa kuYesu Kristu othunyelwe nguThixo, owenze umsebenzi omkhulu wokusikhulula. uluntu. Ukuba uyakholwa, uya kusindiswa ngokukholwa kule vangeli;
2 Ivangeli yozuko isekhona "ukholo" → ukuze ukholo luzukiswe . Yeyiphi ke ivangeli onokuthi ukholelwe kuyo ukuze ufumane uzuko? → Ukukholelwa kuYesu kufuna abo bathunywe nguYise ye" Umthuthuzeli ",yiyo i" umoya wenyaniso "ukwenza kuthi" hlaziya "umsebenzi, ukuze sizukiswe → "Ukuba niyandithanda, noyigcina imithetho yam. Ndiya kumcela kuBawo, aze aninike omnye uMthetheleli (okanye uMthuthuzeli; lo ungezantsi), ukuze abe nani ngonaphakade, lowo ihlabathi lingenako ukumamkela. uMoya wenyaniso; ngokuba awumboni, awumazi, kodwa nina niyamazi, ngokuba uhleli nani, kanjalo uya kuba kuni.

buza: Loluphi uhlobo lomsebenzi wokuhlaziya owenziwa “uMoya oyiNgcwele” ngaphakathi kwethu?
impendulo: UThixo ngobhaptizo lokuzalwa ngokutsha kunye nomsebenzi wokuhlaziya woMoya oyiNgcwele → Usindiso lukaYesu Kristu nothando lukaThixo uYise malugalelwe ngokutyebileyo kuthi nasezintliziyweni zethu →Wasisindisa, kungengamisebenzi yobulungisa esayenzayo thina, kodwa ngokwenceba yakhe, ngentlambululo yokuzalwa ngokutsha, nangokuhlaziya koMoya oyiNgcwele. UMoya oyiNgcwele yiloo nto uThixo wayithulula phezu kwethu ngokutyebileyo ngoYesu Kristu, uMsindisi wethu, ukuze sigwetyelwe ngobabalo lwakhe, sibe ziindlalifa ngethemba lobomi obungunaphakade (okanye ukuguqulelwa: ilifa ubomi obungunaphakade ethembeni). KuTito 3:5-7 → Ithemba alidanisi, ngokuba uthando lukaThixo luthululelwe ezintliziyweni zethu ngoMoya oyiNgcwele, esamnikwayo. Imbekiselo - Roma 5:5.

Phawula: UMoya oyiNgcwele esiwanikwa kuthi uthululela uthando lukaThixo ezintliziyweni zethu, kwaye uthando lukaThixo lungaphakathi kuthi ngokucacileyo Kakade ngenxa kaKristu" njengaye “Xa siwufezile umthetho, “siyakholwa” ukuba uKristu uwuzalisekisile umthetho, oko kukuthi, siwufezile umthetho, ngenxa yokuba uKristu engaphakathi kwethu. ngokucacileyo sihleli kuKristu, Kungoko kuphela esinokuzukiswa . Amen! Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

Ukwabelana ngombhalo weVangeli, uphefumlelwe nguMoya kaThixo, uMzalwana uWang*Yun, umsebenzi kaYesu Krestu , uDade uLiu, uDade uZheng, uMzalwana uCen- kunye nabanye osebenza nabo, baxhasa kwaye basebenza kunye kumsebenzi wevangeli weBandla likaYesu Krestu. Bashumayela ivangeli kaYesu Krestu, ivangeli evumela ukuba abantu basindiswe, bazukiswe, kwaye imizimba yabo ikhululwe! Amen

Imbekiselo - Galati 3:26-27 → Ngoko ke sangcwatywa naye ngokubhaptizelwa ekufeni, ukuze sihambe sinobomi obutsha, njengokuba noKristu wazalwayo kwabafileyo ngalo uzuko loYise nokuvuka. Roma 3:4

(2) Manyaniswe naye ngokufana nokuvuka kwakhe

buza: Bamanyene njani ngokufana novuko lukaKristu?
impendulo: "Yityani nisele isidlo seNkosi" → uYesu wathi: "Inene, inene, ndithi kuni, Ukuba anithanga niyidle inyama yoNyana woMntu, nilisele igazi loNyana woMntu, aninabo ubomi kuni. Oyidlayo eyam inyama, alisele elam igazi, umntu unobomi obungunaphakade, kwaye ngomhla wokugqibela ndiya kubiza Lowo udlayo eyam inyama, alisele negazi lam, uhleli kum, nam ndihleli kuye. 26

【2】Thabatha umnqamlezo wakho ulandele uYesu

UMARKO 8:34-35 Wasibizela ke kubo indimbane nabafundi bakhe, wathi kubo, Ukuba ubani uthanda ukundilandela, makazincame, awuthwale umnqamlezo wakhe, andilandele; kuba osukuba efuna ukuwusindisa umphefumlo wakhe. (okanye ukuguqulelwa: umphefumlo; okufanayo ngezantsi) uya kulahlekelwa bubomi bakhe; kodwa othe wabuncama ubomi bakhe ngenxa yam, nangenxa yeendaba ezilungileyo ezi, wobusindisa.

(1) Othe wawulahla umphefumlo wakhe ngenxa yam, nangenxa yeendaba ezilungileyo ezi, wowusindisa.

buza: Iyintoni “injongo” yokuthabatha umnqamlezo kabani nokulandela uYesu?
impendulo: "Injongo" kukulahlekelwa bubomi "obudala" ukusindisa ubomi "obutsha" → Lowo ubuxabisayo ubomi bakhe uya kulahlekelwa bubo; umntu” uphila ubomi obungunaphakade. Imbekiselo — Yohane 12:25

(2) Yambathani umntu omtsha namava okulahla umntu omdala

buza: Yambathani umntu omtsha; Injongo "Ingaba yin?"
impendulo: " Injongo "yiyo i" Umntu omtsha "Hlaziya ngokuthe ngcembe kwaye ukhule;" indoda endala “Akumka, akulahle ukuwohloka → umntu omtsha wenziwa mtsha ekwazini, emfanekisweni woMdali wakhe. ngenxa yenkohliso yeminqweno yokuzingca bhekisela kuyo - Efese 4:22

buza: Ngaba asizange "sele silahle" indoda endala? Kuthen kusafuneka ulahle ixhego? → Kolose 3:9 9 Musani ukuxokisana, kuba nizihlubile nje umntu omdala, nezenzo zakhe;
impendulo: Sikholelwa ekubethelweni, ukufa, ukungcwatywa nokuvuswa kunye noKristu → " Ukholo lulibekile ixhego ", abantu bethu abadala basekho kwaye banokubonwa → Yisuse nje kwaye "ube namava ngokuyisusa" →Ubutyebi obubekwe kwisitya sodongwe buya kutyhilwa, kwaye “umntu omtsha” uya kuhlaziywa ngokuthe ngcembe aze akhuliswe nguMoya oyiNgcwele ukuze azaliswe bubumo bukaKrestu; mke, wonakaliswa (ukonakala), buyela eluthulini, kwaye ubuyele emampunge. Nangona “umntu omdala” etshabalala ngaphandle, “umntu omtsha kuKristu” wenziwa mtsha imihla ngemihla ngaphakathi. Iintlungu zethu zomzuzwana nezikhaphukhaphu ziya kusisebenzela ubunzima banaphakade bozuko olungenakuthelekiswa nanto. Amen! Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo? Imbekiselo--2 kwabaseKorinte 4 ivesi 16-17

【3】Shumayela iindaba ezilungileyo zobukumkani bamazulu emqolo

(1) Ukuba siva ubunzima kunye naye, zaye ziya kuzukiswa kunye naye

KwabaseRoma 8:17 Ukuba ke bangabantwana, sikwaziindlalifa, iindlalifa zikaThixo, iindlalifa ke kunye noKristu. Ukuba siva ubunzima kunye naye, sozukiswa nokuzukiswa kunye naye.
KWABASEFILIPI 1:29 Kuba nakuphiwa nina ukuba nikholwe kuKristu kuphela, koko nive ubunzima ngenxa yakhe.

(2) Umnqweno wokubandezeleka

1 Petros 4:1-2 Ekubeni uKristu eve ubunzima esenyameni, Kufuneka usebenzise olu hlobo lwamabhongo njengesixhobo , ngokuba lowo uve ubunzima esenyameni, ukhunyulwe ekoneni; Ngentliziyo elolo hlobo ke, ukususela ngoku niya kulidla ixesha eliseleyo kweli hlabathi, kungekhona ngokweenkanuko zabantu, kodwa ngokuthanda kukaThixo.
EyokuQala kaPetros Chapter 5:10] Ke kaloku, emveni kokuba nive ubunzima umzuzwana, uThixo walo lonke ubabalo, owasibizelayo eluzukweni lwakhe olungunaphakade, sikuKristu, wanga uya kuthi ngokwakhe, anilungise nigqibelele, anomeleze, anomeleze.

(3) UThixo wasimisela kwangaphambili ukuba sizukiswe

Siyazi ke ukuba zonke izinto zisebenziselana okulungileyo kwabo bamthandayo uThixo, kwababiziweyo ngokwengqibo yakhe. abo wabazi ngenxa engaphambili Wazimisela kwangaphambili ukuxeliswa nguNyana wakhe~ " Thabatha umnqamlezo wakho, ulandele uYesu, ushumayele iindaba ezilungileyo zobukumkani bamazulu ” waza wamenza unyana wakhe wamazibulo phakathi kwabazalwana abaninzi. kumiselwe kwangaphambili bathe ke abangaphantsi wababiza bona; Abo ke wabagwebelayo, wabuya wabazukisa nokubazukisa bona . Imbekiselo — Roma 8:28-30

Sibabalwe nguThixo, saphuphuma, nakubo bonke ubulumko nokuqonda; ngokokuthanda kwakhe , ukuze siyazi imfihlelo yokuthanda kwakhe, ukuze kuthi, ekuzalisekeni kwexesha, zonke izinto ezisemazulwini nezisemhlabeni zimanyane kuKristu. Sinelifa kuye lowo uzenza zonke izinto ngokokuthanda kwakhe; emiselwe ngokwentando yakhe . Isalathiso-kwabase-Efese 1:8-11→ Le nto sithetha ngayo yile yayifihlwe ngaphambili , ubulumko bukaThixo obungaqondakaliyo, awathi uThixo wabumisela ngenxa engaphambili uzuko lwethu, kwangaphambi kwawo amaphakade. . Amen! Imbekiselo - 1 Korinte 2:7

articles.title: “Ukumiselwa ngenxa engaphambili” UThixo usimisele kwangaphambili ukuba sisindiswe ngoYesu Kristu
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubantakwethu noodadewethu kusapho lukaThixo! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile yethu kweyoku-1 kwabaseTesalonika isahluko 5 indinyana 9 size sifunde kunye: Kuba uThixo akasimiselanga ngqumbo; usimisele usindiso ngayo iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu.

Namhlanje siyafunda, sinxulumana, kwaye sabelane "Bekela" Hayi. 2 Thetha kwaye wenze umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, Nkosi yethu uYesu Krestu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Siyayibulela iNkosi ngokuthumela abasebenzi ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo nelithethwe ngezandla zabo → ukuze isinike ubulumko bemfihlelo kaThixo eyayifihliwe mandulo, ilizwi uThixo awasimisela kwangaphambili ukuba sibe nozuko ngaphambi kwamaxesha onke!

Sityhilwe kuthi nguMoya oyiNgcwele. Amen! Thandazela ukuba iNkosi uYesu iqhubeke ikhanyisela amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sibone nokuva iinyaniso zokomoya → Qonda ukuba uThixo uyasivumela ukuba siyazi imfihlelo yokuthanda kwakhe ngokwenjongo yakhe elungileyo ayimisele kwangaphambili UThixo wasimisela ngenxa engaphambili ukuba sisindiswe ngayo iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu!

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi uYesu Krestu! Amen

【1】Bakholwa bonke ababemiselwe ubomi obungunaphakade

Acts 13:48 Bakuva ke oko abeentlanga, bavuya, balidumisa ilizwi likaThixo;
Umbuzo: Wonke umntu omiselwe ukufumana ubomi obungunaphakade ukholiwe njani ukuba uya kufumana ubomi obungunaphakade?
Impendulo: Kholwani ukuba uYesu unguye uKristu! Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

(1) Kholelwa ukuba uYesu unguNyana kaThixo ophilayo

Isithunywa eso sathi kuye: “Musa ukoyika, Mariya, kuba ubabalwe nguThixo. Uya kumitha, uzale unyana, umthiye igama elinguYesu. Yena uya kuba mkhulu, abizwe ngokuba nguNyana weNkosi; INkosi uThixo iya kumenza mkhulu, abe ngukumkani phezu kwendlu kaYakobi kude kube ngunaphakade, nobukumkani bakhe bungabi nasiphelo Amandla Oyena Uphakamileyo aya kukusibekela, yaye lowo uza kuzalwa uya kuba ngcwele, yaye uya kubizwa ngokuba nguNyana kaThixo Luka 1:30- Indinyana 35 → UYesu wathi: “Nithi ndingubani na? Waphendula uSimon Petros wathi kuye, Wena unguye uKristu, uNyana kaThixo ophilileyo. ” Mateyu 16:15-16

(2) Kholelwa ukuba uYesu uliLizwi elenziwe umntu

Ekuqaleni kwakukho iTao, kwaye iTao yayikunye noThixo, kwaye iTao yayinguThixo. …ULizwi ke waba yinyama (oko kukuthi, uThixo waba yinyama, wakhawulwa yintombi enyulu uMariya, wazalwa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele, wathiywa igama elinguYesu.”—Bona uMateyu 1:21), wahlala phakathi kwethu, ezele lubabalo nayinyaniso. . Sabubukela ubungangamsha bakhe awabunikwa nguYise, njengoko ekukuphela koNyana wakhe; … Akukho namnye wakha wambona uThixo; uNyana okuphela kwamzeleyo, lowo usesifubeni sikaYise, nguye omtyhile. Yohane 1:1, 14, 18

(3) Kholelwa ukuba uThixo wamisela uYesu njengedini lokucamagushela

KwabaseRoma 3:25 UThixo wammisa uYesu ukuba abe sisicamagushelo ngegazi likaYesu nangokholo, ukuze abonakalise ubulungisa bukaThixo, kuba ekunyamezeleni kwakhe uthe waxolela izono zabantu ababefudula benetyala. Asikukuba siyamthanda uThixo, kodwa kukuba uThixo uyasithanda waza wathumela uNyana wakhe ukuba abe sisicamagushelo sezono zethu , olu luthando → “Kuba wenjenje uThixo ukulithanda kwakhe ihlabathi, ude wancama uNyana wakhe okuphela kwamzeleyo, ukuze bonke abakholwayo kuye bangatshabalali, koko babe nobomi obungunaphakade … Lowo ukholwayo kuye, unobomi obungunaphakade; uNyana akayi kuba nobomi obungunaphakade ((isicatshulwa sokuqala: akayi kububona ubomi obungunaphakade), nengqumbo kaThixo ihleli phezu kwakhe.” Yohane 3:16,36.

【2】UThixo usimisele kwangaphambili ukuba sibe ngoonyana

(1) Kukukhulula abo baphantsi komthetho ukuze sibe ngoonyana

Lithe ke lakuzaliseka ixesha, uThixo wamthuma uNyana wakhe, owazalelwa umfazi, ezelwe phantsi komthetho, ukuze abakhulule ngentlawulelo abaphantsi komthetho, ukuze sikuzuze ukwenziwa oonyana. Ekubeni ke ningoonyana, uThixo wamkhupha uMoya woNyana wakhe, weza ezintliziyweni zenu, edanduluka esithi, Abha, Bawo. Ukuba ke ungunyana, uthembela kuThixo, yindlalifa yakhe. Galati 4:4-7 .

buza: Kukho nto na phantsi komthetho? uthixo Ukuba ngoonyana?
impendulo: Hayi. Ngoba? →Ngenxa yokuba amandla esono ngumthetho, nabaphantsi komthetho bangamakhoboka, ikhoboka asingonyana, ngoko ke alinabo oonyana. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo? Bhekisela kweyoku- 1 kwabaseKorinte 15:56

(2) UThixo usimisele kwangaphambili ukuba sifumane oonyana ngoYesu Kristu

Makabongwe uThixo, uYise weNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Wasisikelela ngeentsikelelo zonke zoMoya kwezasezulwini iindawo, sikuKristu; ukwenziwa oonyana ngoYesu Kristu ngokokuthanda kwakhe, Efese 1:3–5

【3】UThixo wasimisela ngenxa engaphambili ukuba sisindiswe ngayo iNkosi uYesu Kristu

(1) Kholelwa kwivangeli yosindiso

Umpostile uPawulos wathi → “Iivangeli” endazishumayelayo kuni, eyokuqala, yokuba uKristu wafela izono zethu, ngokutsho kweZibhalo → (1 ukuze asikhulule esonweni; 2 ukuze asikhulule emthethweni nasemthethweni Isiqalekiso ) - bhekisa kumaRoma 6:7, 7:6 namaGal 3:13, aze angcwatywe (3 ahlulwe kwindoda endala neendlela zakhe zakudala) - bhekisa kwabaseKolose 3:9; avuswe ngomhla wesithathu (4 ukuze sigwetyelwe, sizalwe ngokutsha, sisindiswe, sibe nobomi obungunaphakade! Amen) - bhekisela kumaRoma isahluko 4 indinyana 25 , eyoku- 1 kaPetros isahluko 1 iindinyana 3-4 neyoku- 1 kwabaseKorinte isahluko se-3 . 4 Umthendeleko

(2) UThixo wasimisela ngenxa engaphambili ukuba sisindiswe ngayo iNkosi uYesu Kristu

1 KWABASETESALONIKA 5:9 Kuba uThixo akasimiselanga ngqumbo; usimisele usindiso ngayo iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu.
Ephesians 2:8 Nisindiswe ngokubabalwa nangalo ukholo; nako oko kungaphumi kuni, kusisipho sikaThixo;
KUMAHEBHERE 5:9 waza, egqibelele, waba yimbangi yosindiso olungunaphakade kwabo bamvayo.
