articles.title: “Ukumiselwa kwangaphambili” kukaThixo
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubantakwethu noodadewethu kusapho lukaThixo! Amen

Masivule iiBhayibhile zethu kwabase-Efese 1:8-10 size sizifunde kunye: Sibabalwe nguThixo ngokugqithileyo, kubo bonke ubulumko nokuqonda; Izinto zasezulwini ngokwecebo lakhe, yonke into emhlabeni imanyene kuKristu. Amen

Namhlanje siyafunda, sinxulumana, kwaye sabelane "Bekela" Hayi. 1 Thetha kwaye wenze umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, Nkosi yethu uYesu Krestu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Ndiyayibulela iNkosi ngokuthumela abasebenzi ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo nelithethiweyo ngezandla zayo → ukuze isinike ubulumko bemfihlelo kaThixo eyayifihliwe mandulo, ilizwi uThixo awasimisela kwangaphambili ukuba sizukiswe ngaphambi kwephakade. .
Sityhilwe kuthi nguMoya oyiNgcwele. Amen! Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sibone nokuva iinyaniso zokomoya → Qonda ukuba uThixo uyasivumela ukuba siyazi imfihlelo yokuthanda kwakhe ngokwenjongo yakhe elungileyo ayimisele kwangaphambili.

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi uYesu Krestu! Amen

【1】Ukubhukisha

1 buza: Yintoni ugcino?
impendulo: Yazi kwangaphambili, yenza isigqibo kwangaphambili!

2 buza: Yintoni ukwazi kusengaphambili?
impendulo: Izinto azizange zenzeke, yazi kwangaphambili! →Mateyu 24:25 Yabonani, ndinixelele ngenxa engaphambili.

3 buza: Yintoni isiprofeto?
impendulo: Yazi kwangaphambili ngaphambi kokuba kwenzeke, thetha kwangaphambili!

4 buza: Yintoni uqikelelo?
impendulo: Yazi kwangaphambili kwaye uyixele! "Njengoqikelelo lwemozulu"

5 buza: Yintoni uhlobo?
impendulo: Ukwazi kwangaphambili, ukwenza izinto zibonakale, ukuzityhila!

6 buza: Yintoni uthintelo?
impendulo: Yazi kwangaphambili, thabatha amanyathelo okhuseleko kwangethuba

7 buza: Yintoni isihlabo?
impendulo: Isibikezelo, isibikezelo, isibikezelo, umqondiso obonakala ngaphambi kokuba kwenzeke into! → UMateyu Isahluko 24 Indinyana 3 Ke kaloku, xa uYesu wayehleli eNtabeni yemiNquma, bathi ngasese abafundi bakhe, Sixelele ukuba ziya kubakho nini na ezo zinto; uya kuba yini na umqondiso wokufika kwakho, nowokupheliswa kwephakade eli?

【2】Ukumiselwa kwangaphambili kukaThixo

(1) UThixo wammisela kwangaphambili uAdam ukuba asindiswe

UYehova uThixo wabenzela iingubo zezintsu uAdam nomkakhe, wabambathisa. Genesis 3:21 →---UAdam ufuzisela umntu ozayo. KwabaseRoma Isahluko 5 Indinyana 14 → Kwakhona kubhaliwe eBhayibhileni: “Owokuqala umntu, uAdam, waba ngumphefumlo ophilileyo unomoya (umoya: okanye uguqulelwe njengenyama)”; 1 Korinte 15:45

buza: Zimela ntoni “iingubo zezintsu” zokunxiba?
impendulo: Impahla eyenziwe ngesikhumba sesilwanyana esixheliweyo "imvana" yafakwa phezu kwabo → ifanekisela uKristu njengemvana eyabulawa "uAdam", oko kukuthi, izono zethu wafa emnqamlezweni, wangcwatywa, waza wavuswa ngosuku lwesithathu → UKristu wavuswa kwabafileyo waza wazalwa ngokutsha ukuba ambathe ubuntu obutsha, ukwambatha uKristu. Oko kukuthi, uAdam wangaphambili " Umfanekiso, isithunzi ", uvukile kwabafileyo" UKrestu "Injalo Ukufana kokwenyani kuka-Adam → "" UKrestu "Injalo uAdam wokwenyani , ngoko kuthiwa " uAdam wokugqibela “UNyana kaThixo-bhekisa kumlibo wokuzalwa kukaYesu kuLuka 3:38, Nathi singowokugqibela uAdam , ngokuba singamalungu omzimba kaKrestu. Amen. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

(2) Umtshato kaIsake noRebheka wawumiselwe kwangaphambili nguThixo

Ukuba ithe, Sela, ndazikhelela iinkamela zakho amanzi: mayibe ngumfazi uYehova ammiseleyo unyana wenkosi yam; Ndithe ndingekagqibi ukuthetha oko kusentliziyweni yam, uRebheka waphuma ethwele intsuba egxalabeni, wehla waya kukha amanzi equleni. Ndathi kuye: ‘Khawundiphe amanzi. ’ Wakhawuleza wayithabatha ibhotile egxalabeni lakhe waza wathi, ‘Nceda usele! neenkamela zakho ndoziseza; ’ Ndasela ke neenkamela zam; Genesis 24:44-46

(3) Ulawulo lukaDavide njengokumkani lwalumiselwe kwangaphambili nguThixo

Wathi uYehova kuSamuweli, Uya kumlilela kude kube nini na uSawule, ndimcekisile nje ukuba angabi ngukumkani kumaSirayeli? Zalisa isigodlo sakho ngeoli yokuthambisa, ndikuthumele kuYese waseBhetelehem, ngokuba ndiphakathi kwabantu bakowabo; umisele ukumkani phakathi koonyana bakhe.” 1 Samuweli 16:1 .

(4) Ukuzalwa kukaKristu kwamiselwa kwangaphambili nguThixo

INkosi iya kuthumela uKrestu (uYesu) owamiselwa ukuba eze. Izulu liya kumgcina, ade abuyelwe zonke izinto, awazithethayo uThixo ngomlomo wabaprofeti bakhe abangcwele kususela ekusekweni kwehlabathi. IZenzo 3:20-21

(5) Ukubandezeleka kukaKristu ngenxa yezono zethu kwamiselwa kwangaphambili nguThixo

Nakuba uNyana woMntu eya kufa njengoko amiselwe ngako, yeha ke, abo bamngcatshayo uNyana woMntu! ULuka 22:22 → Izono zethu wazithwala ngomzimba wakhe emthini, ukuze thina, safayo nje kwizono, siphilele ubulungisa, nemivumbo yakhe naphiliswa; nanifudula ninjengemvu elahlekileyo, kodwa ngoku ngoku nibuyele kuMalusi noMveleli wemiphefumlo yenu ( 1 Petros 2:24-25 .

Wamkelekile abazalwana noodade abaninzi ukuba basebenzise ibhrawuza ukukhangela - Nkosi ibandla lika Yesu Krestu -Sijoyine nisebenze kunye ekushumayeleni iindaba ezilungileyo zikaYesu Krestu.

articles.title: Baninzi ababiziweyo, ke bambalwa abanyuliweyo
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubantakwethu noodadewethu kusapho lukaThixo! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibhile kuMateyu isahluko 22 ivesi 14 Kuba baninzi ababiziweyo, ke bambalwa abanyuliweyo.

Namhlanje siyafunda, sinxulumana, kwaye sabelane “Baninzi ababiziweyo, kodwa bambalwa abanyuliweyo” Thandaza: Bawo wethu oseZulwini othandekayo, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhleli enathi! Amen. Siyayibulela iNkosi ngokuthumela abasebenzi ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo nelithethwe ngezandla zabo → ukuze isinike ubulumko bemfihlelo kaThixo eyayifihliwe mandulo, ilizwi uThixo awasimisela kwangaphambili ukuba sibe nozuko ngaphambi kwamaxesha onke! Sityhilwe kuthi nguMoya oyiNgcwele. Amen! Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sibone nokuva iinyaniso zokomoya → Qondani ukuba baninzi ababiziweyo, kodwa bambalwa abanyuliweyo .

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi uYesu Krestu! Amen

【1】Baninzi ababiziweyo

(1) Umzekeliso woMsitho

UYesu wathetha nabo ngemizekeliso, esithi: “Ubukumkani bamazulu bufana nokumkani, owenzela unyana wakhe itheko lomtshato, Mateyu 22:1-2;

buza: Umsitho womtshato wokumkani wonyana wakhe wawufanekisela ntoni?
impendulo: Isidlo somtshato kaKristu iMvana→ Masigcobe simzukise. Kuba umtshato weMvana ufikile, yaye umtshakazi uzilungisile, yaye unikiwe ubabalo ukuba ambathe ilinen ecikizekileyo, eqaqambileyo, emhlophe. (Ilinen ecikizekileyo bubulungisa babangcwele.) Sathi kum isithunywa, Bhala uthi, Banoyolo abo bamenyelwe kwisidlo somtshato weMvana ” ISityhilelo 19:7-9
Wasusa abakhonzi bakhe ukuba baye kubamemela abo bamenyiweyo, beze emsithweni; Mateyu 22:3

buza: Thumela umkhonzi uEfa. Ngubani lo “mkhonzi”?
impendulo: UYesu Krestu, uNyana kaThixo → Umkhonzi wam uya kuhamba ngobulumko kwaye uya kuphakanyiswa abe ngoyena uphakamileyo. UIsaya 52:13 uthi: “Yabonani, umkhonzi wam endimnyulileyo, intánda yam, endiya kuyibeka phezu kwakhe uMoya wam;
Waza ukumkani wesusa abanye abakhonzi, esithi, Yitshoni kwabamenyiweyo ukuthi, Sesenziwe isidlo sam; iinkomo neento ezityetyisiweyo zixheliwe; ’—Mateyu 22:4

buza: Yayingubani “omnye umkhonzi” owathunywa ngukumkani?
impendulo: Abaprofeti abathunywe nguThixo kwiTestamente eNdala, abapostile abathunywe nguYesu, amaKristu, neengelosi, njl.

1 Abo babiziweyo

Abo bantu abazange bamhoye baza bemka omnye waya kwishishini lakhe; Mateyu 22:5 abo bahlwayelwayo emithaneni enameva ngabalivayo ilizwi, kodwa kamva amaxhala eli hlabathi, nobuqhetseba bemali, buliminxe ilizwi, lingabi nakuvelisa siqhamo → oko kukuthi, alinakuvelisa “isiqhamo somoya. Moya.” Aba bantu basindisiwe, kodwa akukho luzuko, akukho mvuzo, akukho sithsaba. Imbekiselo-Mateyu 13 Isahluko 7, ivesi 22

2 Abo bayichasayo inyaniso

Bathi ke abaseleyo bababamba abakhonzi, babatshabhisa, bababulala; Ukumkani wavutha ngumsindo, wakhupha umkhosi, ukuba ubatshabalalise ababulali, usitshise nesixeko sabo. Mateyu 22:6-7

buza: Abanye bambamba umkhonzi ngoobani “abaseleyo”?
impendulo: Abantu bakaSathana nomtyholi Irhamncwa labanjwa, nomprofeti wobuxoki, lowo wayenzayo imiqondiso emehlweni alo, ukuze alahlekise abo balwamkelayo uphawu lwerhamncwa, nabo banqula umfanekiselo walo, wabanjwa kunye nerhamncwa. Ababini kubo baphoswa behleli edikeni lomlilo elivutha isulfure; ISityhilelo 19:19-21

3. Ukunganxibi iimpahla ezisesikweni, mhanahanisi

Wathi ke kubakhonzi bakhe, Umsitho okunene sewulungile wona, kodwa abamenyiweyo abafanelekanga. Nyukani ke ngoko, niye ekudibaneni komendo, nibabize beze emsithweni bonke enithe wabafumana. ’ Ngoko abakhonzi baphuma baya endleleni, bahlanganisa bonke ababafumanayo, abalungileyo nabangendawo; saza isidlo sazala ngabamenyiweyo. Uthe ke ukumkani akungena kukhangela abamenyiweyo, wabona kukho umntu onganxibanga mpahla ilungileyo, wathi kuye: “Mfondini, kutheni ulapha nje unganxibanga? ’ Indoda yaphelelwa ngamazwi. Wathi ke ukumkani kumthunywa wakhe, Mbopheni iinyawo nezandla, nimkhuphele ebumnyameni bangaphandle; — Mateyu 22:8-13

buza: Kuthetha ukuthini ukunganxibi ilokhwe?
impendulo: Hayi “ukuzalwa ngokutsha” ukwambatha umntu omtsha nokwambatha uKristu → Banganxitywa ilinen ecikizekileyo, eqaqambileyo, emhlophe (ilinen ecikizekileyo bubulungisa babangcwele) — ISityhilelo 19:8

buza: Ngoobani abanganxibanga iimpahla ezisesikweni?
impendulo: Kukho “abaFarisi abahanahanisayo, abaprofeti bobuxoki nabazalwana bobuxoki ebandleni, nabantu abangasiqondiyo isigidimi sokwenyaniso seendaba ezilungileyo → Luhlobo lwabantu abachwechwela emakhayeni abantu baze bavalele amabhinqa angazi nto , behendwa ziinkanuko ngeenkanuko, befunda, bengasayi kuze bayiqonde indlela yokwenyaniso.

[2] Bambalwa abantu abakhethiweyo, kukho amaxesha ali-100, amaxesha angama-60, namaxesha angama-30.

(1) Yiva intshumayelo abantu abaqondayo

Kuba baninzi ababiziweyo, ke bambalwa abanyuliweyo. ” Mateyu 22:14

Umbuzo: “Bambalwa abanyulwayo” babhekisa kubani?
Impendulo: Lowo ulivayo ilizwi aliqonde → Ibe ke enye iwela kumhlaba olungileyo, ivelise isiqhamo; Ikhulu Amaxesha, ewe Amashumi amathandathu Amaxesha, ewe Amashumi amathathu amaxesha. Lowo uneendlebe zokuva makeve! ” → Kuhlwayelwe kuwo umhlaba omhle, ngulo ulivayo ilizwi aliqonde, andule ke athwale isiqhamo, aphile. Ikhulu Amaxesha, ewe Amashumi amathandathu Amaxesha, ewe Amashumi amathathu amaxesha. ” Imbekiselo-Mateyu 13:8-9,23

(2) ababiziweyo ngokwengqibo yakhe, ababemiselwe ngenxa engaphambili uzuko

Siyazi ke ukuba zonke izinto zisebenziselana okulungileyo kwabo bamthandayo uThixo, kwababiziweyo ngokwengqibo yakhe. Ngokuba abo wabaziyo ngenxa engaphambili, wabamisela ngenxa engaphambili ukuba bafane nomfanekiselo woNyana wakhe, ukuze abe ngowamazibulo kubazalwana abaninzi. Abo ke wababizayo ngenxa engaphambili, wabagwebela ngokunjalo; Imbekiselo — Roma 8:28-30

KULUNGILE! Kuphelele apho kunxibelelwano lwanamhlanje kunye nokwabelana nani enkosi Bawo waseZulwini ngokusinika indlela ezukileyo. Amen

2021.05.12

articles.title: Umthetho ungowomoya, ke mna ndingowenyama
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubantakwethu noodadewethu kusapho lukaThixo! Amen

Makhe sityhile iBhayibhile yethu kumaRoma isahluko 7 indinyana 14 Siyazi ke ukuba umthetho ungowoMoya; ke mna ndingowenyama; kuthengiswe ngaye isono.

Namhlanje siyafunda, sinxulumana, kwaye sabelane "UMthetho ngowoMoya" Thandaza: Bawo wethu oseZulwini othandekayo, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhleli enathi! Amen. Siyayibulela iNkosi ngokuthumela abasebenzi ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo nelithethwe ngezandla zabo → ukuze isinike ubulumko bemfihlelo kaThixo eyayifihliwe mandulo, ilizwi uThixo awasimisela kwangaphambili ukuba sibe nozuko ngaphambi kwamaxesha onke! Sityhilwe kuthi nguMoya oyiNgcwele. Amen! Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sibone nokuva iinyaniso zokomoya → Yazini ke ukuba umthetho ngowoMoya; ke mna ndingowenyama; kuthengiswe ngaye isono. .

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi uYesu Krestu! Amen

(1) Umthetho ngowomoya

Siyazi ke ukuba umthetho ungowoMoya; ke mna ndingowenyama; kuthengiswe ngaye isono. — Roma 7:14

buza: Kuthetha ukuthini ukuthi umthetho ngowomoya?
impendulo: Umthetho ngowomoya → “ka” kuthetha ukuba ngowomoya, kwaye “umoya” → uThixo ungumoya – bhekisa kuYohane 4:24, othetha ukuba umthetho ngokaThixo.

buza: Kutheni le nto umthetho ungowomoya kwaye ungokobuthixo?
impendulo: Ngenxa yokuba umthetho wasekwa nguThixo → Kukho kuphela umniki-mthetho nomgwebi, lowo unako ukusindisa nokutshabalalisa. Ungubani na wena ukuba ugwebe abanye? Isalathiso - Yakobi 4:12 → UThixo useka imithetho kwaye ugwebe abantu Mnye kuphela uThixo onokusindisa abantu okanye abatshabalalise. Ngoko ke, “umthetho ngowoMoya nokaThixo; Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

buza: Wamiselwa bani umthetho?
impendulo: Umthetho awusenzelwanga yena, kungekhona uNyana, okanye amalungisa, umiselwe "aboni" kunye "namakhoboka esono" abangahloneli Thixo, naboni, abangahloneli Thixo, nabangabehlabathi, abarheletyi, nababulali, abakrexezi, nezigodo, nabaphangi, namaxoki, nabafunga bobuxoki, nayo nayiphi na enye into echasene nobulungisa. Phawula: Ekuqaleni kwakukho iTao, yaye “uTao” nguThixo → Umthetho wamiselwa ‘njengezinto ezinxamnye nendlela elungileyo nezinxamnye noThixo. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo? Imbekiselo - 1 kuTimoti Isahluko 1:9-10 (Ngokungafaniyo nabantu abaziziyatha behlabathi abazibona belumkile, bawumisa ngokwabo umthetho, bandule ke “babeke” idyokhwe enzima yomthetho ezintanyeni zabo. isono → Ukuzigweba, umvuzo wesono kukufa, ukuzibulala)

(2) Ke mna ndingowenyama;

buza: Kodwa kuthetha ukuthini ukuba ndingowenyama?
impendulo: Izidalwa eziphilileyo zomoya zikwaguqulelwa njengezidalwa eziphilileyo zokwenyama neziphilayo zenyama → Kwakhona kubhaliwe eBhayibhileni: “Owokuqala umntu, uAdam, waba ngumphefumlo ophilileyo enomoya (umoya: okanye uguqulelwe njengenyama negazi)”; UAdam waba ngumoya odlisa ubomi. Imbekiselo - 1 Korinte 15:45 kunye neGenesis 2:7 → Ngoko ke “uPawulos” wathi, Mna ke ndingowenyama, into ephilileyo yomoya, into ephilileyo yenyama, yinto ephilileyo yenyama. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

(3) Kuthengiswe esonweni

buza: Yathengiswa nini na inyama yam esonweni?
impendulo: Kuba xa sisenyameni, kungenxa yokuba “ umthetho "kwaye" wazalwa "ye iminqweno emibi "yiyo i iminqweno yokuzingca "Isebenza emalungwini ethu ekuthwaleni isiqhamo sokufa → Xa inkanuko ithe yakhawula, izale isono; sithi ke isono, sakuba sikhule ngokupheleleyo, sizala ukufa. ulwaphulo-mthetho " Ewe Lowo uzelweyo ngumthetho , ke, uyaqonda ngokucacileyo? Imbekiselo - Yakobi isahluko 1 indinyana 15 namaRoma isahluko 7 indinyana 5 → Oku kunjengokuba kanye isono sangena ehlabathini ngamntu mnye, uAdam, kwaza ukufa kwaphuma esonweni, ngoko ukufa kwafikela wonk’ ubani ngenxa yokuba wonk’ ubani wona ulwaphulo-mthetho. KwabaseRoma 5 ivesi 12 . Sonke siyinzala ka-Adam noEva. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

(4) Ubulungisa bomthetho mabuzaliseke kuthi, thina singaphiliyo ngokwenyama, singaboMoya . — Roma 8:4

buza: Kuthetha ukuthini ukugcina ubulungisa bomthetho ekubeni buvisisane nenyama?
impendulo: Umthetho ungcwele, kwaye imiyalelo ingcwele, inobulungisa, kwaye ilungile - bhekisa kumaRoma 7:12 → Ekubeni umthetho ubuthathaka ngenxa yenyama, kukho izinto ongenako ukuzenza → kuba xa sisenyameni, oko " ngokuba umthetho uzala amasiko angendawo, oko kukuthi, inkanuko, xa inkanuko, yamitha, izale izono. Umthetho kukwenza abantu bazi ngezono kwaye bazi okulungileyo nokubi Umvuzo wesono kukufa Yazi okulungileyo nobubi kufuneka bafe → Ngoko ke, ngenxa yobuthathaka benyama yomntu, umthetho wawungakwazi ukwenza "ubungcwele, ubulungisa. , nokulunga” okufunwa ngumthetho → UThixo wathumela owakhe uNyana ukuze abe yimfano yenyama enesono waza waba lidini lesono.” Akuba esigwebele isono esenyameni → wabakhulula abo baphantsi komthetho, ukuze samkele ukwenziwa oonyana. Bhekisela kumaGalati 4:5 ubhekisele kumaRoma 8:3 → ukuze ubulungisa bomthetho buzaliseke kuthi, thina singaphiliyo ngokwenyama, kodwa ngokoMoya. Amen!

buza: Kutheni le nto ubulungisa bomthetho bulandela abo banoMoya bodwa?
impendulo: Umthetho ungcwele, unobulungisa, kwaye ulungile→ ubulungisa obufunwa ngumthetho yiyo i Mthande uThixo kwaye umthande ummelwane wakho njengoko uzithanda ngako! Umntu akanakubuthwala ubulungisa bomthetho ngenxa yobuthathaka benyama, yaye “ubulungisa bomthetho” bunokulandela kuphela abo bazelwe ngoMoya oyiNgcwele → Ngoko ke, iNkosi uYesu yathi kufuneka nizalwe ngokutsha "Ubulungisa bomthetho" bunokulandela abantwana bakaThixo abazelwe nguMoya oyiNgcwele → UKristu ngumntu omnye " ngenxa "Wonke umntu wafa → UThixo wenza abo bangasazi isono, ngenxa Saba sisono ukuze sibe bubulungisa bukaThixo kuye - bhekisa kweyesi-2 kwabaseKorinte 5:21 → "Umthetho ungowomoya kwaye ungokaThixo sisithunzi sezinto ezilungileyo ezizayo kwaye ayingomfanekiso wenyaniso wento → isishwankathelo somthetho nguKristu, kwaye umfanekiso wenyaniso womthetho nguKristu → ukuba ndihlala kuKristu, ndihlala kumfanekiso wenyaniso umthetho ukuba andihlali "" isithunzi somthetho "Ngaphakathi - bhekisa kumaHebhere 10: 1 namaRoma 10: 4 → ndihleli ngokomfanekiselo womthetho: umthetho ungcwele, unobulungisa, ulungile; uKristu ungcwele, ulilungisa, ulungile. Ulungile, ndihlala kuKristu kwaye ndililungu lomzimba wakhe, “ithambo lasemathanjeni akhe nenyama yasenyameni yakhe” nam ndingcwele, ndililungisa yaye ndilungile → ngoko uThixo wenza “ ubulungisa bomthetho ” Oku kufezwa kuthi bangahambiyo ngokwenyama, kodwa ngokoMoya!

Phawula: Intshumayelo eshunyayelwe kweli nqaku ibaluleke kakhulu kwaye inxulumene nokuba ukwinkulungwane yeminyaka okanye awukho." phambili “Uvuko; kusekwiMillennium” ngasemva "Uvuko. Iwaka leminyaka" phambili "Uvuko lunegunya lokugweba → Kutheni unegunya lokugweba? Kuba ungokomfanekiso wokwenyaniso womthetho, kungekhona emthunzini womthetho, ngoko unegunya lokugweba → Uhleli kwitrone enkulu ukugweba "izithunywa zezulu eziwileyo, umgwebo ugwebe zonke iintlanga, abaphilileyo nabafileyo" → Lawula noKristu iminyaka eliwaka - bhekisela kwiSityhilelo Isahluko 20. Abazalwana noodade bafanele babambelele ngokuqinileyo kwizithembiso zikaThixo kwaye bangalahlekelwa bubuzibulo babo njengoEsawu.

KULUNGILE! Kuphelele apho kunxibelelwano lwanamhlanje kunye nokwabelana nani enkosi Bawo waseZulwini ngokusinika indlela ezukileyo. Amen

2021.05.16

articles.title: Umthetho usisithunzi sezinto ezilungileyo eziza kubakho
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubantakwethu noodadewethu kusapho lukaThixo! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile yethu kumaHebhere isahluko 10 indinyana 1 size sifunde kunye: Ekubeni ke umthetho usisithunzi nje sodwa sezinto ezilungileyo eziza kubakho, ungenguye umfanekiselo wayo leyo, awunako ukubenza bagqibelele abo basondelayo ngokusondeza elo dini iminyaka ngeminyaka. .

Namhlanje siyafunda, sinxulumana, kwaye sabelane " Umthetho usisithunzi sezinto ezilungileyo eziza kubakho 》Umthandazo: Bawo wethu oseZulwini othandekayo, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Ndiyayibulela iNkosi ngokuthumela abasebenzi ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo nelithethwa ngezandla zabo → Siphe ubulumko bemfihlelo kaThixo eyayifihliwe mandulo, indlela awathi uThixo wayimisela kwangaphambili ukuba sizukiswe phambi kwawo onke amaphakade! Sityhilwe kuthi nguMoya oyiNgcwele . Amen! Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sibone nokuva iinyaniso zokomoya → Qondani ukuba, ekubeni umthetho usisithunzi sezinto ezilungileyo ezizayo, awungomfanekiso wenene wento eyinene; Amen .

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi uYesu Krestu! Amen

【1】Umthetho usisithunzi sezinto ezilungileyo eziza kubakho

Ekubeni ke umthetho usisithunzi nje sodwa sezinto ezilungileyo eziza kubakho, ungenguye umfanekiselo wayo leyo, awunako ukubenza bagqibelele abo basondelayo iminyaka ngeminyaka, ukuba bagqibelele kwelo dini. Hebhere 10:1

( 1 ) buza: Kutheni kukho umthetho nje?

impendulo: Umthetho wongezwa ngenxa yezikreqo → Ngoko, kutheni kukho umthetho apho? Wongezelelwa kwizigqitho, kulindelwe inzala ekwenziwa kuyo idinga, yaza yasekwa ngumthetheleli ngezithunywa zezulu. Imbekiselo--amaGalati Isahluko 3 Ivesi 19

( 2 ) buza: Umthetho ngowalungisa na? Ngaba kungenxa yaboni?
impendulo: Kuba umthetho ungenzelwanga malungisa, uwiselwe abachasi-mthetho, nabangevayo, abangahloneli Thixo, naboni, abangahloneli Thixo, nabangendawo, nabangendawo, nabangendawo, nababulali, abarheletyi, nabahenyuzayo, nabaphangi, nabangamaxoki, nabafungayo. ngobuxoki, nangayo nantoni na echasene nobulungisa. Imbekiselo--1 kuTimoti Isahluko 1 Ivesi 9-10

( 3 ) buza: Kutheni le nto umthetho ungumfundisi wethu?
impendulo: Kambe ke awukafiki usindiso ngokholo; sigcinwe emthethweni, kude kube sekutyhilekeni kwenyaniso. Ngoko ke umthetho unguMkhapheli wethu, osikhokelela kuKristu, ukuze sigwetyelwe ngokwaselukholweni. Kodwa ngoku ekubeni umgaqo wosindiso ngokholo ufikile, asisekho phantsi kwesandla seNkosi. Imbekiselo - KumaGalati Isahluko 3 Ivesi 23-25. Qaphela: Umthetho ungumfundisi wethu osikhokelela kuKristu ukuze sigwetyelwe ngokholo! Amen. Ngoku ekubeni “indlela yenyaniso” ibonakalisiwe, asisekho phantsi komthetho “wenkosi,” kodwa siphantsi kobabalo lukaKristu. Amen

( 4 ) buza: Yini na ukuba umthetho ube sisithunzi sezinto ezilungileyo eziza kubakho?

impendulo: Isishwankathelo somthetho nguKristu - bhekisa kumaRoma 10: 4 → Isithunzi sezinto ezilungileyo ezizayo sibhekisa kuKristu, " Isithunzi "Akuyena umfanekiso wenyani wento yokuqala." UKrestu ” ngumfanekiso wokwenene → umthetho usisithunzi, okanye imithendeleko, ukuthwasa kwenyanga, neeSabatha zizinto ezizayo. Isithunzi , kodwa olo hlobo nguKristu - bhekisela kumaKolose 2:16-17 → Kanye ‘njengomthi wobomi,’ xa ilanga liqaqamba emthini, kukho isithunzi phantsi ‘komthi’, osisithunzi somthi. umthi Nyana, "isithunzi" akusiyo umfanekiso wokwenene wento yokuqala "umthi wobomi" ngumfanekiso wenyaniso, kwaye uKristu ungumfanekiso oyinyaniso sisithunzi sento entle! Xa ugcina umthetho, ulingana nokugcina "isithunzi" sicinga kwaye singenanto kwaye awukwazi ukuyigcina "isithunzi" siya kutshintsha ngexesha kunye nokunyakaza "Abantwana" baya kuba badala kwaye baguge kwaye ngokukhawuleza banyamalale ukuba uyawugcina umthetho, uya kuphelela "ukusebenzela ilize, uzama ukukha amanzi kwi-bamboo," kwaye awuyi kufumana nto ngelo xesha. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo? Bona amaHebhere 8:13

[2] Kumfanekiso wenyani womthetho, unxulumene newaka leminyaka phambili uvuko

IINDUMISO 1:2 Hayi, uyolo lomntu oyoliswa ngumthetho kaYehova, ocamngca ngawo imini nobusuku.

buza: Uyintoni na umthetho kaYehova?
impendulo: Umthetho kaYehova uthi “ umthetho kaKristu "→"Imiyalelo, nemimiselo, nemimiselo" ekrolwe kumacwecwe amatye oMthetho kaMoses, zonke zizithunzi zezinto ezilungileyo kwixesha elizayo. articles.title: Ukugcina uMnqophiso Ukuthembela kuMoya oyiNgcwele ukugcina uMnqophiso oMtsha ngokuqinileyo
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade! Amen

Masivule iiBhayibhile zethu kweyesi-2 kuTimoti isahluko 1 ivesi 13-14 size sizifunde kunye. Amazwi aphilileyo owawevayo kum, wagcine elukholweni nothando olukuKristu Yesu. Ihambo entle uyiphathiswe nguMoya oyiNgcwele ohleli kuthi.

Namhlanje siyafunda, sinxulumana, kwaye sabelane "Ukugcina isithembiso" Thandaza: Bawo wethu oseZulwini othandekayo, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhleli enathi! Amen. Ndiyayibulela iNkosi ngokuthumela abasebenzi ngelizwi lenyaniso abalibhalayo kwaye balithethe ngezandla zabo, ivangeli losindiso lwethu. Isonka siziswa sivela ezulwini size sinikwe kwangethuba ukuze ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi. Amen! Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sibone nokuva iinyaniso zokomoya → Cela iNkosi ukuba isifundise ukugcina uMnqophiso oMtsha ngokuqinileyo ngokholo nothando, sithembele kuMoya oyiNgcwele ohleli kuthi! Amen.

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi uYesu Krestu! Amen

[1] Iziphene kwiSivumelwano esandulelayo

Ubulungiseleli ngoku obunikwe uYesu bulunge ngakumbi, kanye njengokuba engumlamleli womnqophiso olunge ngakumbi, owamiselwa phezu kwedinga elilunge ngakumbi. Ukuba bekungekho ziphoso kumnqophiso wokuqala, bekungayi kubakho indawo yokujonga umnqophiso wamva. Hebhere 8:6-7

buza: Zeziphi iziphene kwisivumelwano sangaphambili?
impendulo: " ukuqeshwa kwangaphambili “Kukho izinto umthetho ongenakho ukuzenza ngenxa yobuthathaka benyama – bhekisa kumaRoma 8:3→ 1 Ngokomzekelo, umthetho ka-Adam othi: “Uze ungadli kuwo umthi wokulungileyo nokubi; mhlana uthe wadla kuwo, uya kufa ngokuqinisekileyo.”— Genesis 2:17 → Kuba xa sasisenyameni, iminqweno emibi womthetho wawusemalungwini ethu, wenziwa ukuba uthwale isiqhamo sokufa—Khangela kumaRoma 7:5. inkanuko yenyama ngokuba umthetho uya kuzala " ulwaphulo-mthetho "Yizani → inkanuko, yakuba ithabathile, izale isono; isono, xa sithe safezwa, sizala ukufa. Yakobi 1:15 → Ngoko ke inkanuko yenyama iya kuzala isono ngawo umthetho; isono siya kukhulela ebomini nasekufeni. 2 Umthetho kaMoses: Ukuba uthe wayigcina ngenyameko yonke imithetho, wosikelelwa ekuphumeni kwakho, usikelelwe ekungeneni kwakho; uyangena. →Bonke abantu abasehlabathini bonile, basilela eluzukweni lukaThixo; UAdam noEva abazange bawugcine umthetho kuMyezo wase-Eden kwaye baqalekiswa – bhekisa kwiGenesis isahluko sesi-3 iindinyana 16-19; IBhabhiloni - bhekisela kuDaniyeli isahluko 9 ivesi 11 →Umthetho nemithetho ilungile yaye ingcwele. Ilungile kwaye ilungile, lo gama nje abantu beyisebenzisa ngokufanelekileyo, kodwa ingeyiyo yonke eluncedo Imimiselo yangaphambili yayibuthathaka kwaye ingenamsebenzi → umthetho awunakwenziwa ngenxa yobuthathaka benyama yomntu, kwaye abantu abanakukwenza ubulungisa obufunwa ngumthetho. Umthetho Kwavela ukuba akukho nto yafezwayo - bhekisa kumaHebhere 7:18-19, ngoko “ Iziphene kwisivumelwano sangaphambili ", UThixo uzisa ithemba elingcono → " Ukuqeshwa kamva 》Ngale ndlela, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

【2】Umthetho usisithunzi sezinto ezilungileyo eziza kubakho

Ekubeni ke umthetho usisithunzi nje sodwa sezinto ezilungileyo eziza kubakho, ungenguye umfanekiselo wayo leyo, awunako ukubenza bagqibelele abo basondelayo iminyaka ngeminyaka, ukuba bagqibelele kwelo dini. Hebhere 10:1

buza: Kuthetha ukuthini ukuthi umthetho usisithunzi sezinto ezilungileyo ezizayo?
impendulo: Isishwankathelo somthetho nguKristu--Khangela kumaRoma 10:4→ izinto ezintle ezizayo ibhekisele kwi UKrestu Wathi, " UKrestu "Ngumfanekiso oyinyaniso, nomthetho Isithunzi , okanye imithendeleko, ukuthwasa kwenyanga, iiSabatha, njl. Isithunzi ,Lowo umzimba Kodwa kunjalo UKrestu --Bona kwabaseKolose 2:16-17 → Kanye “njengomthi wobomi”, xa ilanga likhanya ngokungafihlisiyo emthini, kukho isithunzi phantsi “somthi”, esisisithunzi somthi, “isithunzi” Ayingomfanekiso wenyani wento yokuqala, ukuba " umthi wobomi "ye umzimba Ngumfanekiso oyinyaniso nomthetho Isithunzi - umzimba Ewe UKrestu , UKrestu Leyo yinkangeleko yokwenyani Kunjalo ke nakuwo “umthetho” ulungile kwaye usisithunzi sezinto ezilungileyo! Ukuba uyawugcina umthetho → uya kuwugcina " Isithunzi "," Isithunzi "Ayinanto, ayinanto. Awukwazi ukuyibamba okanye ukuyigcina. "Isithunzi" siya kutshintsha ngexesha kunye nokuhamba kokukhanya kwelanga, " Isithunzi "Iyaguga, iphele, kwaye iyanyamalala ngokukhawuleza. Ukuba ugcina umthetho, uya kugqiba "ukukha amanzi kwi-bamboo basket ngelize, kungekho mphumo, kunye nokusebenza kanzima ngelize. "Awuyi kufumana nto.

【3】Sebenzisa ukholo nothando ukuze ubambelele ngokuqinileyo kuMnqophiso oMtsha ngokuthembela kuMoya oyiNgcwele ophila ngaphakathi kwethu.

Amazwi aphilileyo owawevayo kum, wagcine elukholweni nothando olukuKristu Yesu. Ihambo entle uyiphathiswe nguMoya oyiNgcwele ohleli kuthi. 2 kuTimoti 1:13-14

buza: Uthetha ukuthini “umlinganiselo wamazwi aphilileyo, indlela elungileyo”?
impendulo: 1 “Umlinganiselo wamazwi aphilileyo” yivangeli yosindiso eyashunyayelwa nguPawulos kwiiNtlanga. -4; 2 “Indlela elungileyo” yindlela yenyaniso! ULizwi unguThixo, yaye uLizwi waba yinyama, oko kukuthi, uThixo waba yinyama *wathiywa nguYesu → UYesu Kristu wanikela ngenyama negazi lakhe kuthi, yaye sinesono. kunye neTao , Ngobomi bukaThixo uYesu Kristu ! Amen. Le yindlela entle ngayo umnqophiso omtsha awawenza nathi uKrestu ngegazi lakhe ileta indlela gcina indlela, gcina " indlela elungileyo ",yiyo i gcina umnqophiso omtsha ! Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

【ITestamente Entsha】

“Nguwo lo umnqophiso endiya kuwenza nabo emva kwaloo mihla, itsho iNkosi: Ndiya kuyibhala imithetho yam ezintliziyweni zabo, ndize ndiyibeke embilinini yabo;

buza: Kuthetha ukuthini ukuthi umthetho ubhalwe ezintliziyweni zabo, ufakwe phakathi kwabo?

impendulo: Kuba umthetho usisithunzi sezinto ezilungileyo ezizayo, ingenguye umfanekiso wokwenene wento → “Isiphelo somthetho nguKristu” → “ UKrestu "Lo ngumfanekiso wenyaniso womthetho, uthixo yiyo i Ukukhanya ! " UKrestu "Kutyhiliwe, oko kukuthi Ngokwenene ngathi Ityhiliwe, Ukukhanya Ityhiliwe→uMthetho wangaphambili weTestamente" Isithunzi "Nyama nje," Isithunzi “Ukwaluphala nokonakala, yaye kamsinyane abhaptizwe lilize.”— Hebhere 8:13 . UThixo ubhala umthetho ezintliziyweni zethu → UKrestu Igama lakhe libhaliwe ezintliziyweni zethu. indlela elungileyo "Yitshise ezintliziyweni zethu; uyibeke kuzo →" uKristu" Yibeke kuthi → Xa sisitya iSidlo seNkosi, “sitye inyama yeNkosi, sisele igazi leNkosi” sinoKristu ngaphakathi kwethu! →Njengoko sinobomi "bukaYesu Kristu" ngaphakathi kwethu, singumntu omtsha ozelwe nguThixo, "umntu omtsha" ozelwe nguThixo. Umntu omtsha "hayi eyenyama" indoda endala “Izinto ezindala zidlule, yaye sisidalwa esitsha!—Khangela kumaRoma 8:9 nakweyesi-2 kwabaseKorinte 5:17→ Wandula ke wathi: “Andisayi kuzikhumbula izono zabo (zabantu abadala) nezono zabo (zomntu omdala). ) izono. “Ekubeni ke ezi zono zixolelwe, akusafuneki mbingelelo ngenxa yezono.” Hebhere 10:17-18 → Wayenjalo ke uThixo ekuKristu, elixolelanisa naye ngokwakhe ihlabathi, engaligxothi; indoda endala ) izikreqo zibalelwa kubo ( Umntu omtsha ) umzimba, yaye uphathiswe kuthi umyalezo woxolelaniso → Shumayela ivangeli likaYesu Krestu! Ivangeli elisindisayo! Amen . Isalathiso-2 kwabaseKorinte 5:19

【Kholwa kwaye ugcine uMnqophiso oMtsha】

(1) Lahlani “isithunzi” somthetho nize nigcine umfanekiso wenyaniso: Ekubeni umthetho usisithunzi nje sezinto ezilungileyo eziza kubakho, awungomfanekiso wenene wento yokwenene - bhekisa kumaHebhere isahluko 10 indinyana 1 → Isishwankathelo somthetho sithi UKrestu , Umfanekiso oyinyaniso womthetho yiyo i UKrestu , xa sukuba sisidla siyisela inyama negazi leNkosi, sinobomi bukaKristu ngaphakathi kwethu; yena Ithambo lamathambo akhe nenyama yenyama yakhe ngamalungu akhe → 1 UKristu wavuswa kwabafileyo, savuswa kunye naYe; 2 UKristu ungcwele, nathi singcwele; 3 UKristu akanasono, ngokunjalo nathi; 4 UKristu wawuzalisekisa umthetho, sibe ke thina siwenza umthetho; 5 Uyangcwalisa kwaye agwebe → nathi siyangcwalisa kwaye sigwebe; 6 Uphila ngonaphakade, kwaye siphila ngonaphakade→ 7 Xa uKristu ebuyile, siya kubonakala kunye naye ebuqaqawulini! Amen.

Lo nguPawulos uxelela uTimoti ukuba agcine umendo wobulungisa → Amazwi aphilileyo owawevayo kum, wagcine elukholweni nothando olukuKristu Yesu. Ihambo entle uyiphathiswe nguMoya oyiNgcwele ohleli kuthi. Funda eyesi-2 kuTimoti 1:13-14

(2) Hlalani kuKristu: Ngoku akukho kugwetywa kwabakuKristu Yesu. Kaloku ngokumanywa kwam noKrestu Yesu, uMoya umniki-bomi undikhulule ekulawulweni sisono nakukufa. KwabaseRoma 8:1-2 → Phawula: Abo bakuKristu abanako “ Ngokuqinisekileyo "Ukuba unetyala, akunakubagweba abanye; ukuba unetyala." Ngokuqinisekileyo Ukuba unetyala, nguwe Hayi apha KuYesu Kristu → Wena ukuAdam, kwaye umthetho kukwenza abantu baqonde isono, phantsi komthetho, ulikhoboka lesono, hayi unyana. Ngoko, ucacile?

(3) Bazelwe nguThixo: Bonke abazelwe nguThixo aboni, ngokuba ilizwi likaThixo lihleli kuye; Kulapho kutyhilwa khona ukuba ngoobani na abangabantwana bakaThixo nabangabantwana bakaMtyholi. Nabani na ongakwenziyo ubulungisa akangokaThixo, nalowo ungamthandiyo umzalwana wakhe. eyoku- 1 kaYohane 3:9-10 neyesi-5:18

kulungile! Namhlanje ndiya kunxibelelana kwaye ndiyabela nani nonke. Amen

articles.title: “Umnqophiso” UYesu wenza umnqophiso omtsha kunye nathi
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubo bonke abazalwana noodade bam abathandekayo! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile [1 kwabaseKorinte 11:23-25] size sifunde kunye: INkosi uYesu ngobusuku eyanikelwa ngayo yathatha isonka, yaza yakuba ibulele, yasiqhekeza, yathi: “Ngumzimba wam lo, onikelwa ngenxa yenu. wena.” Oku kwenzeleni ukundikhumbula. Emva kwesidlo, wathabatha nendebe, wathi, Le ndebe ingumnqophiso omtsha osegazini lam; ” KUMAHEBHERE 9:15 Ngenxa yoko uye waba ngumlamleli womnqophiso omtsha, ukuze abo babiziweyo bamkele idinga lelifa elingunaphakade, efile nje, ukuze bacamagushele izono ezenziwa phantsi komnqophiso wokuqala. Amen

Namhlanje siyafunda, sinxulumana, kwaye sabelane kunye "Umnqophiso" Hayi. 7 Thetha kwaye wenze umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, Nkosi yethu uYesu Krestu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen, enkosi Nkosi! " umfazi onesidima "Thumelani abasebenzi ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo nelithethiweyo ngezandla zabo, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwenu! Silungiselele ukutya kokomoya kwasezulwini ngexesha elifanelekileyo, ukuze ubomi bethu bube nentabalala. Amen! Nceda! INkosi uYesu iyaqhubeka zikhanyisele amehlo ethu omoya, zivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile, zisenze sibone nokuva iinyaniso zasemoyeni, siqonde ukuba iNkosi uYesu imisele umnqophiso omtsha nathi ngegazi layo! Qondani ukuba iNkosi uYesu yabethelelwa emnqamlezweni yaza yabandezeleka ukuze isithenge kumnqophiso wethu wangaphambili, Ukungena kumnqophiso omtsha kwenza abo babiziweyo bazuze ilifa elingunaphakade elithenjisiweyo ! Amen.

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi uYesu Krestu! Amen

【1】Ikhontrakthi

Encyclopedia ingcaciso: Ikhontrakthi ekuqaleni ibhekisela uxwebhu enxulumene intengiso, ukubambisa, izivumelwano, njl ukuba kungenwe isivumelwano phakathi kwamaqela amabini okanye ngaphezulu Inokuqondwa "njengokugcina izithembiso." Kukho izivumelwano zomoya kunye nezivumelwano ezibhaliweyo ngendlela yeekontrakthi Izinto zinokuhluka, kubandakanywa: amaqabane oshishino, abahlobo abasondeleyo, abathandi, ilizwe, ihlabathi, lonke uluntu, kunye nezivumelwano kunye nawe, njl. Ungasebenzisa "ezibhaliweyo. Izivumelwano "ukuvumelana, kwaye ungasebenzisa "ulwimi" ukuvumelana. Ukwenza isivumelwano, kusenokuba sisivumelwano "sokuthula". Kufana ne "contract" isivumelwano esibhaliweyo esisayinwe kuluntu lwanamhlanje.

【2】INkosi uYesu imisela umnqophiso omtsha kunye nathi

(1) Yenza umnqophiso ngesonka nencindi yomdiliya ekomityini
Masifunde iBhayibhile [1 Korinte 11:23-26], siyivule kunye size sifunde: INkosi uYesu ngobusuku eyanikelwa ngayo yathatha isonka, yaza yakuba ibulele, yasiqhekeza, yathi: “Ngumzimba wam lo, onikelwa ngenxa yenu. wena.” Ndikhumbuleni.” Emva kwesidlo, wathabatha nendebe, waza wathi: “Le ndebe ingumnqophiso omtsha osegazini lam, kwenzeleni oku ukundikhumbula.” Ngalo lonke ixesha sisidla eso sonka size siyisele le ndebe , sivakalisa ukufa kweNkosi ide ifike. Nize niguqukele [kuMateyu 26:28 ] kuba ligazi lam eli lomnqophiso, eliphalala ngenxa yabaninzi, ukuze kuxolelwe izono. Buyela kwakhona [kuHebhere 9:15 ] ngenxa yoko uye waba ngumlamleli womnqophiso omtsha, ukuze abo babiziweyo bamkele, ngokufa, ukucamagushela izono zabo, abazenzileyo phantsi komnqophiso welifa elingunaphakade.

(2) ITestamente eNdala ngumnqophiso wokuqala

(Qaphela: Ngokufunda ezi zibhalo zingasentla, iNkosi uYesu yamisela “uMnqophiso Omtsha” nathi. Ekubeni kusithiwa ngumnqophiso omtsha, kuya kubakho “uMnqophiso oMdala” ongumnqophiso wangaphambili. Umnqophiso” obhalwe eBhayibhileni ikakhulu uquka: 1 UThixo wenza umyalelo kuAdam kumyezo wase-Eden, “umnqophiso wokungadli kuwo umthi wokulungileyo nokubi” owawungumnqophiso womthetho “wolwimi”; 2 Umnqophiso woxolo ‘womnyama’ kaNowa emva komkhukula wawufuzisela umnqophiso omtsha; 3 Umnqophiso “wedinga” wokholo luka-Abraham ufuzisela umnqophiso wobabalo lukaThixo; 4 UMnqophiso woMthetho kaMoses wawungumnqophiso womthetho ochazwe ngokucacileyo namaSirayeli. Bhekisela kwiDuteronomi 5 indinyana 1-3 .

(3) Isono sangena ehlabathini kuAdam kuphela

UAdam, ukhokho wokuqala, wawaphula umthetho waza wona waza wadla kuwo umthi wokwazi okulungileyo nokubi! Kanye njengokuba isono sangena ngamntu mnye ehlabathini, kwaza ke ukufa ngaso isono kwabatyhutyha abantu bonke, kuba bonke bonayo. Noko ke, ukususela kuAdam kuye kutsho kuMoses, ukufa kwalawula, yaye nabo bangonanga njengoAdam babephantsi kolawulo lwakhe—“Oko kukuthi, nabo bangonayo njengoAdam bayafana nathi, bafileyo phantsi kwegunya”. Jonga kwabaseRoma 5:12-14 umvuzo wesono kukufa – ulwamvila lokufa sisono, namandla esono ngumthetho – bhekisa ku-1 kwabaseKorinte 15:56; Adam Ukuba umntu waphula isivumelwano kwaye wenza ulwaphulo-mthetho, uba a "Amakhoboka esono", yonke inzala ezelwe kukhokho uAdam ingamakhoboka "esono", kuba amandla esono ngumthetho, inzala ka-Adam iphantsi komthetho "Uze ungadli kuwo umthi wokwazi okulungileyo." nobubi" Ngokulandela umthetho wemithetho. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

(4) Ulwalamano phakathi komthetho, isono nokufa

Kanye njengokuba “isono” silawula, siya kuqalekiswa ngumthetho, okukhokelela ekufeni - bhekisa kumaRoma 5:21 → Ngokunjalo, nobabalo lulawula “ngobulungisa”, lubangela ukuba abantu bafumane usindiso ngayo iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu ubomi obungunaphakade. Amen! Ngale ndlela, siyazi ukuba “ukufa” kuphuma “esonweni”-“isono” kuphuma kumntu omnye, uAdam, owaphula umnqophiso womthetho “sisono”- bhekisa kuYohane 1 iSahluko 3 ivesi 3 . ［ umthetho ]-- - ulwaphulo-mthetho ]-- - fa ] Ezi zintathu ziyazalana Ukuba ufuna ukuphuncuka “ekufeni” kufuneka usinde “esonweni” ukuba ufuna ukusinda “esonweni”, kufuneka usinde emthethweni, nto leyo ethetha ukuba kufuneka usinde kwisiqalekiso Uqalekisiwe umnqophiso wakho womyalelo. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo? Ngoko ke, “umnqophiso wokuqala” ngumthetho womnqophiso ka-Adam “wokungadli kuwo umthi wokulungileyo nokubi” Kufuneka sithembele eNkosini uYesu Kristu ukuba asinde kuwo. “Kuba wenjenje uThixo ukulithanda kwakhe ihlabathi, ude wancama uNyana wakhe okuphela kwamzeleyo, ukuze bonke abakholwayo kuye bangatshabalali, koko babe nobomi obungunaphakade. Kuba uThixo akamthumanga uNyana wakhe ehlabathini, ukuze aligwebe ihlabathi. ukuze ihlabathi lisindiswe ngaye, ukuze bonke abakholwayo kuye bangagwetywa, ngokuba engakholwanga kwigana loNyana okuphela kwamzeleyo uThixo. indinyana 16-18 .

(5) Umnqophiso wokuqala ukhululwa ngokufa okubandezelekileyo kukaKristu

UThixo wathumela uNyana wakhe okuphela kwamzeleyo, uYesu, ukuba abe yinyama aze azalwe phantsi komthetho ukuze ahlawulele abo baphantsi komthetho ukuze sifumane isibizo soonyana bakaThixo! Amen—bona Gal 4:4-7 . Njengoko kubhaliwe kweyoku-1 kwabaseKorinte 15:3-4, ngokutsho kweBhayibhile, uKristu wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni waza wafa emnqamlezweni ngenxa “yezono” zethu, 1 ukuze asikhulule esonweni-. ngenxa Xa bonke besifa, bonke bayafa; kuba abo bafayo bakhululwe esonweni - bona 2 kwabaseKorinte 5:14 nabaseRoma 6:7 2 bakhululwe emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni somthetho - bona kwabaseRoma 7 Isahluko 6 nabaseGalati 3; :13 nokungcwatywa, 3 kusisusa kwindoda endala neendlela zayo zakudala— bona amaKolose 3:9 namaGalati 5:24 . Wavuswa kwabafileyo ngomhla wesithathu, 4 ngenxa yokugwetyelwa kwethu - bhekisa kumaRoma 4:25, ngokwenceba yakhe enkulu, uThixo wasiphinda wasiphinda ngokuvuka kukaYesu Kristu kwabafileyo! Masingene kwiTestamente eNtsha. Amen!

Ngale ndlela siyakhululwa kwizono esaphuma kukhokho wethu uAdam, size sikhululwe kuzo ukuqeshwa kwangaphambili “Umnqophiso wokungadli kuwo umthi wokulungileyo nokubi, oko kukuthi, uYesu wasifela emnqamlezweni Nyusa UMnqophiso oMdala – uMnqophiso wangaphambili woMthetho ka-Adam! Indoda yethu endala yabhaptizelwa ekufeni kukaKristu, yafa, yangcwatywa, yavuka kunye Naye! Umntu omtsha ngoku owenziwe ngokutsha akasekho kubomi buka-Adam obunesono, yaye akasekho “ ukuqeshwa kwangaphambili "KwiTestamente eNdala umthetho uqalekisiwe, kodwa ngobabalo." ITestamente Entsha 》KuKristu! Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

(6) Umntu oshiye umnqophiso kumnqophiso wokuqala uyafa; ITestamente Entsha Thatha isiphumo

AmaSirayeli ayenoMthetho kaMoses, yaye ngokholo kuMsindisi uYesu Kristu, nawo akhululwa esonweni nasesithunzini soMthetho kaMoses aza angena kuMnqophiso Omtsha – bhekisa kwiZenzo 13:39 . Makhe sityhile kumaHebhere isahluko 9 indinyana 15-17. Ngenxa yesi sizathu, “uYesu” uye waba ngumlamleli womnqophiso omtsha Ekubeni wafa waza “wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni ngenxa yezono zethu” ukuze acamagushele izono ezenziwa ngabantu ebudeni ‘bomnqophiso owandulelayo,’ uya kubenza bazuze abo babiziweyo. Isithembiso selifa elingunaphakade. Nawuphi na “umnqophiso omtsha” uYesu awashiya kuwo umnqophiso ufanele ulinde de lowo wawushiyayo umnqophiso (imibhalo yantlandlolo iyafana nomnqophiso) afe, oko kukuthi, uYesu Kristu yedwa. ngenxa “Bafa bonke, bafa bonke”; “Yekisa isivumelwano sangaphambili “Isivumelwano esisemthethweni” kunye netestamente “oko kukuthi, umnqophiso omtsha uYesu awasishiya nathi ngegazi lakhe” ayasebenza ITestamente Entsha Iqala ukusebenza ngokusemthethweni Ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo? ,

Ukuba umntu oshiye ilifa usaphila "Awunaye umntu omdala" Kholelwa ekufeni “Yibani nabafileyo kunye noKristu, oko kukuthi, umntu wenu omdala usaphila, esadla ubomi kuAdam, esadla ubomi phantsi komthetho womnqophiso wokuqala” oko kukuthi, uYesu wathembisa ukuwushiya umnqophiso. ITestamente Entsha "Inantoni yakwenza nawe?" Ngaba unyanisile? Wonke umntu ehlabathini uyabuqonda ubudlelwane phakathi "kwekhontrakthi kunye netestamente", ngaba awuqondi?

(7) UKristu wenza umnqophiso omtsha nathi ngegazi lakhe

Ngoko ngobusuku eyanikelwa ngabo iNkosi uYesu yathabatha isonka, yaza yakuba ibulele, yasiqhekeza, yathi, Lo ngumzimba wam lo, onikelwa ngenxa yenu; oku kwenzeleni ukundikhumbula wathi, Le ndebe ingumnqophiso omtsha osegazini lam. Nanini na nisela kuyo, oku kwenzeleni ukundikhumbula. "Ngalo lonke ixesha enisitya esi sonka, niyisela le ndebe, nivuma ukufa kweNkosi ide ifike. Amen! Ndiyabulela Nkosi Yesu ngokusikhulula kumthetho "wokuqala umnqophiso" ukuze simfumane uNyana kaThixo. Amen, wenze umnqophiso omtsha nathi ngegazi lakhe, ukuze thina ababiziweyo sizuze ilifa elingunaphakade!

kulungile! Namhlanje ndiya kunxibelelana kwaye ndiyabela nani nonke. Amen

articles.title: Umnqophiso iTestamente eNdala kunye neTestamente eNtsha
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubo bonke abazalwana noodade bam abathandekayo! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile [ Hebhere 8:6-7, 13 ] size sifunde kunye: Ubulungiseleli ngoku obunikwe uYesu bulunge ngakumbi, kanye njengokuba engumlamleli womnqophiso olunge ngakumbi, owamiselwa phezu kwedinga elilunge ngakumbi. Ukuba bekungekho ziphoso kumnqophiso wokuqala, bekungayi kubakho indawo yokujonga umnqophiso wamva. …Ngoku sithetha ngomnqophiso omtsha, lowo wokuqala uya kuba mdala;

Namhlanje siyafunda, sinxulumana, kwaye sabelane " Yenza umnqophiso "Hayi. 6 Thetha kwaye wenze umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, Nkosi yethu uYesu Krestu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen, enkosi Nkosi! " umfazi onesidima "Ibandla lithumela abasebenzi ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo lathethwa ngezandla zabo, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwethu! Baya kusinika ukutya kokomoya kwasezulwini ngexesha elifanelekileyo, ukuze ubomi bethu bube buninzi. Amen! INkosi uYesu iyaqhubeka nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuba siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sibone kwaye sive iinyaniso zasemoyeni. Qonda imfihlelo ukusuka kwiTestamente eNdala ukuya kwiTestamente eNtsha, kwaye uqonde intando yaKho . Thandaza egameni leNkosi uYesu Krestu! Amen

【1】Ukususela "kwiTestamente eNdala" ukuya "kwiTestamente eNtsha"

ITestamente eNdala

Masifunde iBhayibhile [amaHebhere 7:11-12] kwaye sifunde kunye: Ngaphambili, abantu babefumana umthetho phantsi kobubingeleli bobuLevi, ukuba babenokufezekiswa ngesi sikhundla, kwakungafuneki kunyuswe omnye ababingeleli , ngokohlobo lukaMelkitsedeke, kungekhona ngokohlobo luka-Aron na? Ekubeni ububingeleli buguqulwe, kufuneka nomthetho uguqulwe. Ivesi 16 waba ngumbingeleli, kungekhona ngokwemimiselo yenyama, kodwa ngokwamandla obomi obungenasiphelo. Indinyana 18 Ummiselo wokuqala wenziwa wabhanga ngenxa yokuba ubuthathaka yaye ungancedi nganto (Indinyana 19) (umthetho awufeza nto) isinika ithemba elilunge ngakumbi esinokusondela ngalo kuThixo.

(Phawula: ITestamente eNdala ngumnqophiso wokuqala, 1 Umnqophiso owawuseMyezweni wase-Eden wokuba uAdam angadli “kuMthi wokuLunga noBubi”; 2 Umnqophiso kaNowa “womnyama” woxolo ufuzisela umnqophiso omtsha; 3 Ukholo luka-Abraham “kumnqophiso wedinga” ngumnqophiso wobabalo; 4 UMnqophiso woMthetho kaMoses. Ngaphambili, abantu ‘babengenakuwufumana umthetho’ ngokugqibeleleyo phantsi ‘kobubingeleli bakwaLevi,’ ngoko uThixo wavelisa omnye umbingeleli [uYesu] ngokohlobo lukaMelkitsedeke! UMelkitsedeke ukwabizwa ngokuba nguKumkani waseSalem, okuthetha ukuthi uKumkani wesisa, uBulungisa noXolo. Akanayise, akananina, akanamlibo wakuzalwa, akanasiqalo, akanasiphelo, ufana noNyana kaThixo.

Ngoko ke, ekubeni ububingeleli buguqulwe, kufuneka nomthetho uguqulwe. UYesu waba ngumbingeleli, kungekhona ngokwemimiselo yenyama, kodwa ngokwamandla obomi obungenasiphelo. Kuyabonakala ukuba ababingeleli abangabaLevi babethintelwe kukufa, yaye babengenako ukuhlala ixesha elide ukuzalisekisa idini “lesono” . Ukususela ngoku, asisayi kuphinda sinikele ngenxa “yezono”? Ukususela ngoku nizalwe ngokholo lweendaba ezilungileyo zikaKrestu, isizukulwana esinyuliweyo kunye nobubingeleli basebukhosini. Amen

【2】---Ngena kwiTestamente eNtsha---

Masiyiphengulule iBhayibhile [Hebhere 8:6-9] kwaye sifunde kunye: Ke kaloku uYesu unolungiselelo olulunge ngakumbi, kwanjengokuba engumlamleli womnqophiso olungileyo ngakumbi, wona usekwe ngamadinga alungileyo. Ukuba bekungekho ziphoso kumnqophiso wokuqala, bekungayi kubakho indawo yokujonga umnqophiso wamva. Ngoko ke, uYehova wabakhalimela abantu Bakhe yaza yathi (okanye iguqulelwe: Ngoko iNkosi yalatha kwiintsilelo zomnqophiso wokuqala): “Kuya imihla, endiya kwenza ngayo umnqophiso omtsha nendlu kaSirayeli, nendlu kaYuda; Hayi, njengoko ndababambayo ngesandla ooyise, ndabakhokela, ndenza umnqophiso nabo ekuphumeni kwam eYiputa, ngenxa enokuba bengawugcinanga umnqophiso wam, andiyi kubabekela ngqalelo; utsho uYehova :16-18 “Emva kwaloo mihla, itsho iNkosi, nguwo lo umnqophiso wabo: Ndiya kuwubhala umyalelo wam ezintliziyweni zabo, ndiwubeke ezintliziyweni zabo.” Wandula ke wathi: “Ndiya kuzikhumbula izono zabo, nezono zabo. ningabi sazenza izigqitho.” Ekubeni ezi zono zixolelwe, akusekho mbingelelo wesono.

(Qaphela: Ndiyabulela ngobabalo lweNkosi! "Umfazi onesiphiwo" uthumele uMzalwana uCen, umsebenzi, ukuba anikhokelele ekuqondeni imfihlelo yeendaba ezilungileyo, nithobele ukuthanda kukaThixo, nisuke “kumnqophiso womthetho” wamandulo. Umnqophiso omtsha kumnqophiso omtsha!

1 ITestamente eNdala nguAdam kuqala; ITestamente Entsha Owokugqibela uAdam nguYesu Kristu
2 Umntu kwiTestamente eNdala wadalwa ngothuli; ITestamente Entsha Abo bazelwe nguThixo
3 Abantu beTestamente eNdala babengabenyama; ITestamente Entsha abantu boMoya oyiNgcwele
4 Abantu boMnqophiso oMdala babephantsi komnqophiso womthetho; ITestamente Entsha umntu ngumnqophiso wobabalo
5 Abantu kwiTestamente eNdala babephantsi komthetho; ITestamente Entsha kwabo bathe bakhululwa kuwo umthetho, ngawo umzimba kaKristu
6 Abantu beTestamente eNdala babesaphula umthetho; ITestamente Entsha kwabo bawufezayo umthetho, ngothando lukaKristu
7 Abantu beTestamente eNdala babengaboni; ITestamente Entsha Umntu ulilungisa
8 Indoda yeTestamente eNdala yayiku-Adam; ITestamente Entsha abantu kuKristu
9 Abantu kwiTestamente eNdala bangabantwana baka-Adam; ITestamente Entsha abantu bangabantwana bakaThixo
10 Abantu kwiTestamente eNdala balele kumandla ongendawo; ITestamente Entsha abantu abasinda kumgibe kaSathana
11 Abantu beTestamente eNdala babephantsi kwamandla obumnyama eHadesi; ITestamente Entsha Abo basencwadini yobomi yoNyana oyintanda kaThixo, ubukumkani bokukhanya
12 Abantu kwiTestamente eNdala babengabomthi wokulungileyo nokubi; ITestamente Entsha Abantu bangabomthi wobomi!

ITestamente eNdala ngumnqophiso womthetho; iTestamente eNtsha ngumnqophiso wobabalo. Amen, uMnqophiso oMtsha wenza uNyana kaThixo abe ngumbingeleli omkhulu. Ekubeni ababingeleli batshintshiwe, kufuneka uguqulwe nomthetho, kuba isishwankathelo somthetho nguKristu, uKristu unguThixo, uThixo uluthando. Umthetho kaKristu uluthando. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo? Bona amaGalati isahluko 6 indinyana 1-2 . Ngoko iNkosi uYesu yathi: “Ndiniwisela umthetho omtsha, Petros, wokuba nithandane, njengoko ndinithandileyo nina, ukuba nani nithandane. Nguwo lo umthetho wokuqala! Yohane 1:2 Isahluko 11

【3】Umnqophiso wokuqala uya kuba mdala, unciphe, kwaye kungekudala uya kubhanga ungabi nto

Ngoku sithetha ngomnqophiso omtsha, umnqophiso wokuqala uya kuba mdala; Ngoko ke, iTestamente eNdala "isithunzi", kwaye ekubeni umthetho "usisithunzi" sezinto ezilungileyo kwaye kungekhona umfanekiso oyinyaniso wento yantlandlolo, uKristu ungumfanekiso wokwenene! Kanye nje ngokuba "isithunzi" phantsi komthi, "isithunzi" phantsi komthi siyanyamalala ngokuthe ngcembe kunye nokuhamba kokukhanya kunye nexesha. Ngoko ke, umnqophiso wokuqala—umnqophiso womthetho uya kuthi shwaka kamsinya. Bona amaHebhere 10:1 nakol. 2:16 . Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo? Ngoku amabandla amaninzi anifundisa ubuxoki, ukuba nibuye, niwugcine umnqophiso omdala, umnqophiso womthetho kaMosis; Kanye njengompostile “uPawulos” kwakungenamsebenzi ukuwugcina umthetho gxeka “Oko wayekugqala njengenzuzo, oko kukuthi, ekumazini uKristu, ukuba niyawugcina umthetho kaMosis, aninako ukuwenza ngenxa yobulwelwe benyama igwetywe ngumthetho, ngoko ke uPawulos wathi yilahleko. , abaFarisi nababhali abanolwazi abanako ukuwugcina umthetho, nani zintlanga ezingenamava, aninako nokuwugcina.

Ngoko uqala " itestamente endala "Ngena" ITestamente Entsha ", ukuqonda ukuthanda kukaThixo, uhlale kuKristu, ebukumkanini obungcwele boNyana wakhe oyintanda! Amen

kulungile! Ndisabelana nani namhlanje. Wanga uThixo angabasikelela bonke abazalwana noodade! Amen

articles.author: admin
articles.content:

Yena uya kusinika ukutya kokomoya kwasezulwini ngexesha, ukuze ubomi bethu bube buninzi. Amen! Nkosi! UYesu uYesu iyaqhubeka ikhanyisela amehlo ethu okomoya, ivula iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile, ize isenze sive size sibone iinyaniso zokomoya. Qondani uthando lwenu olukhulu ngenxa yothando lukaKristu” ngenxa “Siwufezile umthetho, ukuze ubulungisa bawo buzaliseke kuthi, thina singaphiliyo ngokwenyama, siphila ngokoMoya.

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

【 Nye 】 Lowo umthandayo ummelwane wakhe uwufezile umthetho;

Masifunde iBhayibhile [Roma 13:8-10] size siyifunde kunye: Musani ukuba natyala lanto mntwini, lingelilo elokuthandana, kuba lowo umthandayo ummelwane wakhe uwuzalise umthetho. Ngokomzekelo, imiyalelo enjengale: “Uze ungakrexezi, musa ukubulala, musa ukuba, musa ukubawa,” neminye imiyalelo iqukunjelwa kwesi sivakalisi: “Uze umthande ummelwane wakho njengawe siqu. Uthando alusebenzi bubi kwabanye, ngoko ke uthando luthobela umthetho.

【 Mbini 】 Uthando lukaYesu luzalisekisa umthetho wethu

Masifunde iBhayibhile [uMateyu 5:17] size siyivule kunye size siyifunde: (UYesu) “Ningabi ndize kuchitha umthetho, nokuba ngabaprofeti, ndize kuzalisekisa kuni, lide lidlule izulu nehlabathi, akuyi kudlula nalinye iganyana nokuba lisuntswana lomthetho, kude kwenzeke konke.

[UYohane 3:16] “Kuba wenjenje uThixo ukulithanda kwakhe ihlabathi, ude wancama uNyana wakhe okuphela kwamzeleyo, ukuze bonke abakholwayo kuye bangatshabalali, koko babe nobomi obungunaphakade (okanye ukuguqulela: gweba ihlabathi; okufanayo ngezantsi) kukuze ihlabathi lisindiswe ngaye

[KwabaseRoma 8 Isahluko 3-4] Ekubeni ke umthetho wawungenamandla ngayo inyama, ungenako ukwenza nto, uThixo wamthuma owakhe uNyana, efana nenyama enesono, ukuba abe lidini lesono, egweba isono esenyameni, ukuze umthetho Ubulungisa bukaThixo buzalisekile kuthi, thina singahambiyo ngokwenyama, sihamba ngokoMoya.

[ Galati 4:4-7 ] Lithe ke lakuzaliseka ixesha, uThixo wamkhupha weza uNyana wakhe, othe wazalwa ngumfazi, ezelwe ephantsi komthetho, ukuze abakhulule ngokubathenga abaphantsi komthetho, ukuze sibe nako ukuba nako ukuba noonyana babekwe phezu kwabo. Ekubeni ke ningoonyana, uThixo wamkhupha uMoya woNyana wakhe, weza ezintliziyweni zenu, edanduluka esithi, Abha, Bawo. Ukuba ke ungunyana, uthembela kuThixo, yindlalifa yakhe.

( Phawula: Ngokuzihlolisisa ezi zibhalo zingasentla, siyangqina ukuba maningabi natyala lanto mntwini, lingelilo elokuthandana. musa ukukrexeza, musa ukuba, musa ukubawa, yonke loo nto igqunywe kumazwi athi, "Mthande ummelwane wakho njengoko uzithanda ngako". Uthando lwehlabathi lububuxoki, njengokuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Akukho lungisa, akukho nalinye; ngokuba wonke umntu waphule umthetho, ukwaphula umthetho kusisono; bonke abasehlabathini bonile, basilelela kuThixo. uzuko! Ekubeni umthetho ubuthathaka ngenxa yenyama, awunako ukuwenza ubulungisa bawo umthetho. Ke kaloku, ngobabalo lukaThixo, uThixo wamthuma owakhe uNyana, uYesu, ukuba abe yinyama, wazalelwa phantsi komthetho, ethabathe infani yenyama enesono, waba lidini lesono, egweba izono zethu esenyameni, wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni. Wafa ukuze asikhulule esonweni, nasemthethweni, nasesiqalekisweni somthetho. Oko kuhlawulela abo baphantsi komthetho, ukuze samkele igama loonyana bakaThixo nina, nibe ke uThixo uthumela uMoya woNyana wakhe ezintliziyweni zenu; , "ukuzalwa ngokutsha"! Ekubeni nizelwe nguThixo, ningoonyana bakaThixo, njengoKristu Yesu, ningambiza uYise osemazulwini ngokuthi, Abha, Bawo. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

【 Ntathu 】 ukuze ubulungisa bomthetho buzaliseke kuthi, thina singahambiyo ngokwenyama, sihamba ngokoMoya

Ekubeni nikhululwe nje kuwo umthetho, uThixo uye wazalisekisa “ubulungisa” bomthetho kuthi thina bangahambiyo ngokwenyama, kodwa ngokoMoya. Ngamanye amazwi, uthando olukhulu lukaYesu luye lwazalisekisa iimfuno kunye nobulungisa bemithetho, imimiselo, imimiselo kunye nemilinganiselo yokuziphatha ebhalwe encwadini yomthetho ngenxa yethu, ukuze ngoKristu Yesu, singaphindi sigwetywe ngumthetho. Kaloku ngokumanywa kwethu noKrestu Yesu, uMoya umniki-bomi usikhulule ekulawulweni sisono nakukufa. Isiphelo somthetho nguKristu --Khangela kumaRoma 10 Isahluko 4→ SikuKristu, kwaye uKristu uzalisekisa umthetho " ngamalungisa ", Thina sizalisekisa ubulungisa bomthetho! Xa ethe woyisa, woyisile, akakawaphule umthetho, nto leyo ethetha ukuba siwumisele umthetho kwaye asiwaphulanga mthetho! Lowo ugwetyelwe ulilungisa, nathi singamalungisa. Ufana nabazalwana bakhe kuyo yonke into, unjani na! Senjenjalo nathi, kuba uKristu uyintloko yethu, simzimba wakhe. ecaweni “Amalungu omzimba wakhe lithambo lasemathanjeni akhe nenyama yasenyameni yakhe. ! Ukuba uyakholwa kuYesu, ngaba usengumoni? articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Molo bahlobo! Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade! Amen

Savula iBhayibhile [iDuteronomi 5:1-3 ] saza safunda kunye: Wawabizela ndawonye uMoses onke amaSirayeli, wathi kuwo, Yiphulaphuleni imimiselo namasiko, maSirayeli, endinimisela wona namhla, ukuba niwafunde, niwenze: uYehova uThixo wethu wenza umnqophiso nathi entabeni yeHorebhe. . Lo mnqophiso asinguye owasekwayo noobawo bethu, wasekwa kunye nathi baphilayo apha namhlanje. .

Namhlanje siza kufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane " Yenza umnqophiso "Hayi. 4 Thetha wenze umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhleli enathi! Amen, enkosi eNkosini! “Umfazi onesidima” uthumela abasebenzi ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo nelithethiweyo ezandleni zabo, ivangeli yosindiso lwethu! Silungiselele ukutya kokomoya kwasezulwini kwangethuba, ukuze ubomi bethu bube nobutyebi obungakumbi. Amen! Ngamana iNkosi uYesu ingaqhubeka ikhanyisela amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuba siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sibone kwaye sive iinyaniso zasemoyeni. Qonda uMthetho kaMoses, ongumnqophiso obhaliweyo kaThixo namaSirayeli. .

---Umthetho WamaSirayeli---

【Nye】 imiyalelo yomthetho

Makhe sijonge eBhayibhileni [iDuteronomi 5:1-22 ] size siyifunde kunye: Wawabiza uMoses onke amaSirayeli, wathi kuwo, Owu maSirayeli, yiphulaphuleni imimiselo namasiko endinimisela wona namhla; iNkosi yethu. UThixo wenza umnqophiso nathi eNtabeni yeHorebhe; owakukhuphayo ezweni laseYiputa, endlwini yobukhoboka;
1 Uze ungabi nathixo bambi ngaphandle kwam.
2 Uze ungazenzeli umfanekiso oqingqiweyo, nokuba ngowayiphi na into emilise esezulwini phezulu, nesemhlabeni phantsi, nesesemhlabeni, nesemanzini.
3 Uze ungafumane ulibize igama likaYehova uThixo wakho; kuba uYehova akayikumenza omsulwa, ofumana alibize igama lakhe.
4 Uze uwugcine ungcwele umhla wesabatha, njengoko wakuwisela umthetho uYehova uThixo wakho. Wosebenza imihla emithandathu, uwenze wonke umsebenzi wakho; ke wona umhla wesixhenxe uyisabatha kaYehova uThixo wakho. …
5 Beka uyihlo nonyoko, njengoko akuwisele umthetho uYehova uThixo wakho, ukuze kulunge kuwe, yolulwe imihla yakho emhlabeni akunika wona uYehova uThixo wakho.
6 Uze ungabulali;
7 Uze ungakrexezi.
8 Uze ungebi.
9 Uze ungangqini ubungqina obubuxoki ngomntu.
10 Uze ungamnqweneli umfazi wommelwane wakho, nentsimi yakhe, nesicaka sakhe, nesicakakazi sakhe, nenkomo yakhe, ne-esile lakhe, nanye into anayo. Ngawo la ke amazwi, awawathethayo uYehova kuni lonke ibandla, ngezwi elikhulu eliphuma emlilweni, ephuma efini, ebumnyameni, akongezanga kuwo; la mazwi emacwecweni amabini amatye, wandinika wona.

【Mbini】 imimiselo yomthetho

( 1 ) Ummiselo womnikelo otshiswayo

( Levitikus 1:1-17 ) UYehova wambiza uMoses ententeni yokuhlangana, wathi kuye, Thetha koonyana bakaSirayeli, uthi kubo, Xa umntu kuni asondeza kuYehova umsondezo, wosondeza umsondezo wakhe kuYehova. Ukuba ulidini elinyukayo lenkomo, wolisondeza libe lidini lenkomo eligqibeleleyo emnyango wentente yokuhlangana, limkholekise. Wocinezela ngezandla zakhe phezu kwentloko yedini elitshiswayo, yaye liya kwamkeleka idini elinyukayo, libe sisicamagushelo sesono salo. . . . “Xa umntu enikela idini elitshiswayo legusha okanye lebhokhwe, wosondeza inkunzi yegusha egqibeleleyo ... ijuba. Umbingeleli woqhumisela ngezo nto zonke zibe lidini elinyukayo esibingelelweni; kukudla kwasemlilweni, ivumba elithozamisayo kuYehova; —Ibhalwe kwiLevitikus 1:9

( 2 ) Ummiselo wokunikela ngenyama

[ Levitikus 2:1-16 ] Ukuba ubani usondeza umnikelo wokudla okuziinkozo kuYehova, makagalele umgubo ocoliweyo, oneoli, agalele intlaka yokuqhumisa... “Xa uthe wasondeza umnikelo wokudla okuziinkozo ezigcadiweyo, wogalelwa ioli; sebenzisa izonkana ezisicaba ezingenagwele, ezithanjiswe ngeoli, ezithanjiswe ngeoli; kuYehova. Ezo zisondezwe kuYehova zibe ngumsondezo wokuqala, mazinganyuswa zibe livumba elithozamisayo esibingelelweni. Wonke umnikelo wokudla okuziinkozo owusondezayo mawugalelwe ityuwa; Yonke iminikelo mayigalelwe ityuwa. …Umbingeleli woqhumisela ezinkozweni eziziinkozo zibe sisikhumbuzo, nenxalenye yeoli, nentlaka emhlophe yonke, zibe kukudla kwasemlilweni kuYehova. irekhodiwe

( 3 ) Ummiselo wombingelelo woxolo

[ Levitikus Isahluko 3 Indinyana 1-17 ] “Xa athe umntu wasondeza umbingelelo woxolo, ukuba ulisondeze elivela enkomeni, nokuba yeliduna, nokuba yelithokazi, woba lidini eligqibeleleyo phambi koYehova. . . . “Xa kunikelwa idini loxolo kuYehova, nokuba yigusha, nokuba yinkunzi okanye imazi, egqibeleleyo. ... “Ukuba umnikelo womntu yibhokhwe, woyisondeza phambi koYehova.

( 4 ) Ummiselo wombingelelo wesono

[ Levitikus 4 Isahluko 1-35 ] Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Thetha koonyana bakaSirayeli, uthi, Umntu ngomntu, xa athe wona wona, ezwini likaYehova, nokuba nguwuphi na, wento engeyamthetho, nokuba umbingeleli othanjisiweyo uthe wona, wonisa abantu, woba netyala. . ngenxa yesono sokubingelela ngenkunzi yenkomo engenasiphako kuYesu Ukumkani ungumnikelo wesono ... “Ukuba lonke ibandla loonyana bakaSirayeli lenza into engavumelekanga kulo ngokomyalelo kaYehova, lenza isono ngempazamo, kufihliweyo nokungabonakali kwibandla. kamsinya nje lakuba ibandla lisazi isono salo, limele linikele ngethole lenkomo eliyinkunzi yenkomo ententeni yokuhlangana njengomnikelo wesono. ... “Ukuba umlawuli uthe wenza njengoko uYehova akwenzileyo, uya kwenza Ukuba ubani uthe wenza isono esingavunyelwayo nguThixo, esazi isono sakhe, wozisa inkunzi yebhokhwe exhonti, egqibeleleyo, ibe lidini; Ukuba uthe wona ngempazamo, wasazi isono sakho, wozisa ithokazi lebhokhwe elixhonti elingenasiphako, ngenxa yesono sakho one ngaso. “Xa athe umntu wazisa imvana yedini lesono, wozisa ithokazi eligqibeleleyo, abeke izandla zakhe phezu kwentloko yedini lesono, alixhelele idini lesono endaweni enye yedini elinyukayo. Woqhumisela ngezo nto umbingeleli esibingelelweni, ngokwemimiselo yokunikela kwasemlilweni kuYehova, amcamagushele, axolelwe ke.

( 5 ) Ummiselo wombingelelo wetyala

[ Levitikus 5:1-19 ] “Ukuba ubani uthe weva umntu ocela isifungo, elingqina, kodwa akakuxeleli oko akubonileyo okanye akwaziyo, wobuthwala ubugwenxa bakhe + okanye into efileyo, + okanye into efileyo eyinqambi, + okanye impethu efileyo eyinqambi, + kodwa engakwazi oko, yaye ngenxa yoko uyinqambi, + unetyala. Okanye uchukumise ukungcola komnye umntu, kwaye akakwazi oko ukungcola anako, kwaye xa eyazi, unetyala ... "Ukuba ubani uthe wona kwaye wenza into engavumelekanga yiNkosi, nangona engenzi woyithwala ubugwenxa bakhe, uze uzise kumbingeleli inkunzi yemvu egqibeleleyo, ibe lidini letyala, ngokwexabiso lakho. Umbingeleli wolicamagushela ityala lakhe, aze axolelwe ke.

( 6 ) Imigaqo kwiMithetho etshangatshangiswayo kunye neminikelo yokuphakamisa

[ Levitikus 23:20 ] Umbingeleli wowenza umrhumo kwezo zinto, kunye nezonka wentlahlela yengqolowa, azitshangatshangise phambi koYehova, zibe ngumrhumo ongcwele kuYehova. Bhekisela kwiEksodus 29, indinyana 27

【Ntathu】 imigaqo yomthetho

( Eksodus 21:1-6 ) “Nguwo lo ummiselo oya kuwumisela phambi kwabantu: Ukuba uthe wathenga umHebhere, ukuba abe likhoboka, wokukhonza iminyaka emithandathu, ngomnyaka wesixhenxe akhululeke, aphume ekhululekile; Ukuba belinomfazi, umkalo wophuma nalo, ukuba lithe walinika umfazi inkosi yalo, walizalela unyana, nokuba yintombi: umfazi lowo nabantwana boba benkosi yalo, libe lodwa. Ukuba ikhoboka lithe, Ndiyayithanda inkosi yam nomfazi nabantwana bam, yaye andithandi kuphuma ndikhululekile, inkosi yalo yolithabatha limse kumgwebi (okanye uThixo; kwangalaa ndlela ingezantsi) ize imthabathe imke. . Yiya emnyango, usondele kucango, ugqobhoze indlebe ngenyatyhowa, ayikhonze ngonaphakade inkosi yakhe (Qaphela: Imithetho yimithetho esisiseko yokulawula ubomi nokuziphatha kwabantu).

【Ezine】 Ukuba uthobela imiyalelo, imithetho, kunye nemimiselo, uya kusikelelwa

[Duteronomi 28:1-6] “Ukuba uthe waliphulaphula ngenyameko izwi likaYehova uThixo wakho, wayigcina, wayigcina imithetho yakhe endikuwiselayo namhla, akumise phezu kwezizwe zonke zehlabathi; yithobeleni iNkosi Uthi uThixo, ziya kukulandela ezi ntsikelelo, zibe phezu kwakho: Wosikelelwa kulo mzi, usikelelwe esiqhameni sesizalo sakho, esiqhameni selizwe lakho, namatakane eenkomo zakho, nasematholeni akho. usikelelwe ingobozi yakho, nesitya sakho sokuxovulela intlama.

【Ntlanu】 Owaphula umthetho uya kuqalekiswa;

Ivesi 15-19 “Ukuba anithanga nimphulaphule uYehova, Ukuba uthe akwaliphulaphula ilizwi likaThixo, nayenza yonke imithetho yakhe nemimiselo yakhe, endikuwiselayo namhla, zikulandele ezi ziqalekiso, zibe phezu kwakho: Uqalekisiwe phakathi komzi, uqalekisiwe emasimini Mayiqalekiswe ingobozi yakho, nembewu yakho yokuxovulela intlama, uqalekisiwe ukuphuma kwakho Ngoko ke umthetho unguMkhapheli wethu, osikhokelela kuKristu, ukuze sigwetyelwe ngokwaselukholweni.

Phawula: Ngokufunda ezi zibhalo zingasentla, sibhala ukuba imithetho yamaSirayeli yayiquka imiyalelo, imimiselo nemimiselo, engama-613 xa iyonke! Umthetho ungumfundisi wethu, ngaphambi kokuba inyaniso yosindiso ifike ngokholo, sasigcinwa siphantsi komthetho, yada yabonakalaliswa inyaniso ezayo. Ekubeni umgaqo weTestamente eNtsha wosindiso ngokholo ufikile, asisekho phantsi kwenkosi “yomthetho weTestamente eNdala”, kodwa siphantsi kobabalo “lweTestamente Entsha,” oko kukuthi, kuKristu, kuba isiphelo somthetho nguKristu. Amen! Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

2021.01.04

articles.title: “Umnqophiso” Umnqophiso ka-Abraham woKholo neSithembiso
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubo bonke abazalwana noodade bam abathandekayo! Amen

Savula iBhayibhile [ Genesis 15:3-6 ] saza safunda kunye: Wabuya wathi uAbram, Akundinikanga nyana; lowo uzalelwe endlwini yam uya kuba yindlamafa yam ” Waza wamkhuphela phandle, wathi: “Khangela esibhakabhakeni, uzibale iinkwenkwezi ezilapho?” Wathi yena kuye: “Yiloo nto ke eyaba njalo kwinzala yakho bubulungisa bakhe .

Namhlanje siza kufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane " yenza umnqophiso "Hayi. 3 Thetha wenze umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhleli enathi! Amen, enkosi eNkosini! " Umfazi onesidima "Thumela abasebenzi ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo nelithethiweyo ngezandla zabo, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwethu! Siphe ukutya kokomoya kwasezulwini ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukuze ubomi bethu bube nentabalala. Amen! INkosi uYesu Ihlala ewakhanyisela amehlo ethu omoya, zivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibhile, kwaye zisenze sikwazi ukubona nokuva iinyaniso zasemoyeni. Ukuze sikwazi ukuxelisa uAbraham ngokholo size sifumane umnqophiso wesithembiso !

Ndithandaza oku ngasentla egameni leNkosi uYesu Krestu! Amen

【 Nye 】 Umnqophiso ka-Abraham wesithembiso sikaThixo

Masifunde iBhayibhile [Genesis 15:1-6], siyityhile size siyifunde kunye: Emveni koko wathetha uYehova kuAbram ngombono, wathi, Musa ukoyika, Abram; ndiyingweletshetshe yakho; Kuba ndingenanyana nje, nguEliyezere waseDamasko oya kuba lilifa lam. Owam phakathi kwabo uya kuba yindlalifa yam Ungazibala na isibhakabhaka?” Wathi yena kuye: “Yiyo le into eya kuba njalo kwinzala yakho.” UAbram wakholwa kuYehova, waza uYehova wambalela oko njengobulungisa.
Isahluko 22 Indinyana 16-18 “‘Ngenxa yokuba uyenzile le nto, akwanqaba nonyana wakho, ekuphela kwamzeleyo,’ utsho uYehova, ‘ndizifungile + ukuba ndiya kukusikelela kakhulu,’ utsho uYehova ndiya kuyandisa ndiyandise imbewu yakho njengeenkwenkwezi zezulu, nanjengentlabathi eselunxwemeni lolwandle, ibe ngamasango eentshaba zakho, zisikeleleke ngembewu yakho zonke iintlanga zehlabathi, ngokuba uliphulaphule ilizwi lam. ." Phinda utyhile kuGal 3:16 idinga lenziwa kuAbraham nakwinzala yakhe. UThixo akathethi " inzala ", ibhekisa kubantu abaninzi, ithetha " Loo nzala yakho ", Esalatha emntwini, oko kukuthi, uKristu .

( Phawula: Siyazi ukuba iTestamente eNdala ingumfuziselo nesithunzi, kwaye u-Abraham ungumzekelo “kaBawo waseZulwini”, uyise wokholo! UThixo wathembisa ukuba ngabo bazelwe nguAbraham kuphela abaya kuba ziindlalifa zakhe. UThixo akathethi kuthi, “Imbewu yakho yonke,” uthetha ngabaninzi; Sizalwa ngelizwi lokwenyani levangeli likaYesu Krestu, sizalwa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele, kwaye sizalwa nguThixo. Kungale ndlela kuphela apho sinokuthi sibe ngabantwana bakaBawo oseZulwini, iindlalifa zikaThixo, kwaye sizuze ilifa likaBawo oseZulwini. . ! Amen. Ngoko, uyayiqonda? UThixo wathembisa uAbraham ukuba inzala yakhe yayiya kuba ninzi njengeenkwenkwezi ezisesibhakabhakeni nentlabathi eselunxwemeni lolwandle! Amen. UAbraham “wakholwa” nguYehova, waza uYehova wakubalela oko njengobulungisa kuye. Lo ngumnqophiso wedinga uThixo awawenza noAbraham ! Amen)

【 Mbini 】 uphawu lomnqophiso

Masifunde iBhayibhile [iGenesis 17:1-13] Xa uAbram wayeneminyaka engamashumi asithoba anesithoba ubudala, uYehova wabonakala kuye waza wathi kuye: “Mna ndinguThixo uSomandla, yaye ndiya kukwenza ube ngogqibeleleyo wanqophisana nawe ukuba uyandise imbewu yakho, wawa emhlabeni; Kwakhona uThixo wathi kuye: “Ndenze umnqophiso nawe wokuba uya kuba nguyise weentlanga ezininzi. ndikwenze uyise weentlanga ezininzi, ndiwumise umnqophiso wam nawe, nembewu yakho emva kwakho kwizizukulwana zabo, ube ngumnqophiso ongunaphakade phakathi kwakho nembewu yakho emva kwakho; ndiya kulinika lonke ilizwe lakwaKanan, ophambukele kulo, libe lilifa elingunaphakade kuwe, nakwimbewu yakho, ndibe nguThixo wabo.

Wathi uThixo kuAbraham, Wena ke, nembewu yakho, niwugcine umnqophiso wam kwizizukulwana zenu, yaluke yonke into eyindoda kuni; nguwo lo umnqophiso wam ophakathi kwam nani, nembewu yakho; enimele niwugcine; (umbhalo wantlandlolo lulwaluko; kwaendinyana 14, 23, 24, neyama-25); Nguwo lo umqondiso womnqophiso wam phakathi kwenu: Yonke into eyindoda ezelwe endlwini yakho kufuneka yaluswe ngomhla wesibhozo emva kokuzalwa kwayo, nokuba izelwe, nokuba ithengwe ngemali kumntu ongenguye owembewu yakho Yaluswa ke, ukuze umnqophiso wam ube ngumnqophiso ongunaphakade enyameni yenu.

( Phawula: ITestamente eNdala uThixo wathembisa uAbraham nenzala yakhe ukuba babe ziindlalifa, kwaye umqondiso womnqophiso “yalulwaluko”, gama elo elithetha “ulwaluko” , oluphawu olukroliweyo emzimbeni; Ifanekisela abantwana beTestamente eNtsha abazelwe ngelizwi eliyinyani levangeli likaYesu Krestu, abazelwe ngoMoya oyiNgcwele, nabazelwe nguThixo! Isithembiso sokutywinwa [nguMoya oyiNgcwele] , akabhalwanga enyameni, ngenxa yokuba inyama enokonakala ka-Adam asiyoyethu. Ulwaluko lwangaphandle alulolwaluko lokwenyani, lunokwenziwa kuphela ngaphakathi ngaphakathi. umoya "Ngoku uMoya oyiNgcwele ! Kuba kwabakuKristu, akunamandla anto ukwaluka, kwanokungaluki; ukuzithemba "yiyo i kholwani kuYesu Krestu “Iyasebenza. Amen! Ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo? Bhekisela kumaRoma 2: 28-29 namaGal. 5: 6

【Ntathu】 Xelisa ukholo luka-Abraham uze ufumane iintsikelelo ezithenjisiweyo

Siyayiphanda iBhayibhile [ Roma 4:13-17 ] kuba uThixo wathembisa uAbraham nenzala yakhe ukuba baya kulidla ilifa ihlabathi, kungekhona ngomthetho, kodwa ngobulungisa bokholo. Ukuba ngabo basemthethweni kuphela iindlalifa, ukholo loba lilambatha, nedinga liya kuba litshitshiswa. Kuba umthetho umqumbisa; kwaye apho kungekho mthetho, akukho sigqitho. Ngoko ke, ngokwaselukholweni, umntu uba yindlalifa, yaye ngenxa yoko kungenxa yobabalo, ukuze idinga lizaliseke kuyo yonke inzala, kungekuphela nje kwabo basemthethweni, kodwa kwanabo baxelisa ukholo luka-Abraham. UAbraham wakholwa kuThixo ovusa abafileyo, aze enze izinto zibe yinto engento, onguYise wethu phambi kweNkosi. njengokuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Ndikwenze uyise wezizwe ezininzi, naxa kungekho themba, waba nethemba ngalo ukholo, waba nako ukuba nguyise weentlanga ezininzi, njengokuba kwakutshiwo ngaphambili. Iya kuba njalo imbewu yakho.

KwabaseGalati Isahluko 3 Ivesi 7:9.14 Ngoko ke yazini: Abo ke baselukholweni bangoonyana baka-Abraham; . … Kuyacaca ke ukuba abaselukholweni bayasikelelwa ndawonye noAbraham okholwayo. … ukuze intsikelelo ka-Abraham ibe sezintlangeni ngoKristu Yesu, ukuze samkele idinga loMoya oyiNgcwele ngokholo, sibudle ilifa ubukumkani bamazulu. . Amen! Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

articles.title: Umnqophiso uMnqophiso kaNowa weRainbow
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Mawethu, uxolo malube nani nonke bazalwana! Amen

Savula iBhayibhile kwiGenesis isahluko 9 indinyana 12-13 saza safunda kunye: UThixo wathi: “Kukho umqondiso womnqophiso wam ongunaphakade phakathi kwam nani nayo yonke imiphefumlo ephilayo ekunye nani. .

Namhlanje siza kufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane " yenza umnqophiso "Hayi. 2 Thetha wenze umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhleli enathi! Amen, enkosi eNkosini! “Abafazi abanesidima” bathumela abasebenzi ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo nelithethiweyo ezandleni zabo, eliyigospile yosindiso lwethu! Silungiselele ukutya kokomoya kwasezulwini kwangethuba, ukuze ubomi bethu bube nobutyebi obungakumbi. Amen! Yanga iNkosi uYesu ingaqhubeka nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibhile kwaye sibone nokuva iinyaniso zasemoyeni ~ Mqonde uNowa Isivumelwano soXolo lweRainbow "! Amen

【 Nye 】 Dibana nomnyama emva kwemvula

Ixesha alinamkhondo, lihlala lirekhoda iimvakalelo nanini na kwaye naphi na Incwadana yobomi ihlaziywa kwiphepha, irekhoda iinyawo zakho emhlabeni. Ngeentsuku zemvula, thula ngokuthula iimvakalelo emvuleni, ushiye isizungu kwiminyaka, kwaye ushiye ukulula kuwe. Ndijonge kumgama ophakathi kobunzi nemvula, kwavela umnyama phambi kwamehlo am. Inemibala esixhenxe yayo yonke imibala esehlabathini: obomvu belanga, otyheli begolide, oluhlaza okwesibhakabhaka elwandle, amagqabi aluhlaza, i-orenji yokukhanya kwasekuseni, imfusa yobuqaqawuli basekuseni, kunye ne-cyan yokukhanya. ingca. Namhlanje, amakhwenkwe amaninzi, amantombazana kunye nabathandi abancinci baya kwenza ngokungazi umnqweno ezintliziyweni zabo xa bebona umnyama - "uxolo neentsikelelo"! Namhlanje sizakufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane kunye "Umnqophiso" Hayi. 1 Thetha wenze umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhleli enathi! Amen, enkosi eNkosini! " Umfazi onesidima "Ibandla lithumela abasebenzi ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo lathethwa ngezandla zabo, ivangeli losindiso lwethu! Baya kusinika ukutya kokomoya kwasezulwini ekuhambeni kwexesha, ukuze ubomi bethu bube buninzi. Amen! Nkosi! UYesu Yesu iyaqhubeka nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibhile kwaye sibone nokuva iinyaniso zomoya: Qonda umnqophiso kaThixo wobomi nokufa kunye nosindiso kunye noAdam !

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izibongozo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo zenziwa egameni leNkosi uYesu Kristu! Amen

【 Nye 】 Kumyezo wase-Eden uThixo usikelela uluntu

Masiyifundisise iBhayibhile [iGenesis 2 Isahluko 4-7] siyifunde kunye: Imvelaphi yokudalwa kwezulu nehlabathi ngemihla yokudala uYehova uThixo izulu nehlabathi, kwaba njalo Kwakungekakhuli ngca endle, nemifuno yasendle yayingekantshuli; wawunyakamisa umhlaba. UYehova uThixo wambumba umntu ngothuli lwasemhlabeni, waphefumlela emathatheni akhe impefumlo yobomi, waba ngumphefumlo ophilileyo; igama lakhe ke nguAdam. Genesis 1:26-30 Wathi uThixo: “Masenze umntu ngokomfanekiselo wethu ngokufana nathi, babe nobukhosi ezintlanzini zolwandle, nasezintakeni zezulu, nasezintweni ezizitho ziné emhlabeni, nasezintweni zonke. umhlaba nako konke okukuwo: “Wamdala ke uThixo umntu ngokomfanekiselo wakhe; Wabasikelela uThixo, wathi kubo, Qhamani, nande, niwuzalise umhlaba, niweyise, nibe nobukhosi ezintlanzini zolwandle, nasezintakeni zezulu, nasezinambuzaneni zonke ezinambuzelayo emhlabeni. .” Wathi uThixo, Yabonani, ndininikile yonke imifuno evelisa imbewu, ephezu komhlaba, nayo yonke imithi eneziqhamo zembewu, ekuyo ukuba ibe kukudla, kwaneentaka zezulu; nazo zonke izinto ezinambuzelayo emhlabeni ndazinika utyani obuluhlaza.

Genesis 2:18-24 Wathi uYehova uThixo, Akulungile ukuba umntu abe yedwa, ndiya kumenzela umncedi onguwabo uYehova uThixo bazisa endodeni leyo, ukuba ingubani na igama layo. Oko azibize ngako umntu zonke izinto eziphilileyo, lilo elo igama lazo. Wazithiya amagama zonke iinkomo, neentaka zezulu, namarhamncwa, uAdam akafumananga qabane lakumnceda. UYehova uThixo wawisa ubuthongo obukhulu phezu kwakhe, walala. UYehova uThixo wabumba umfazi ubambo abeluthabathe endodeni, wamsa kuAdam. Yathi indoda, Lithambo lasemathanjeni am, yinyama yasenyameni yam. Ungambiza ngokuba ngumfazi; . Esi sibini sasihamba ze ngelo xesha kwaye singenazintloni.

Masifunde iBhayibhile [iGenesis 2:9-17] size siyifunde kunye: UYehova uThixo wantshulisa emhlabeni yonke imithi enqwenelekayo ngokukhangeleka, neziqhamo zayo zilungele ukudliwa. Nasemyezweni apho kwakukho umthi wobomi, nomthi wokwazi okulungileyo nokubi. Phawula: UYehova uThixo wenza umnqophiso noAdam! Ukhululekile ukuba udle kuyo yonke imithi yomyezo wase-Eden , Kodwa uze ungatyi kuwo umthi wokwazi okulungileyo nokubi, kuba mhla uthe wadla kuwo uya kufa ngokuqinisekileyo. ” )

【 Ntathu 】 Ukwaphulwa kwesivumelwano sika-Adam kunye nosindiso lukaThixo

Masifunde iBhayibhile [iGenesis 3:1-7] size siyityhile size sifunde: Inyoka yaye inobuqhophololo ngaphezu kwazo zonke izidalwa zasendle awayezenzile uYehova uThixo. Yathi inyoka kumfazi, Utshilo na okunene uThixo ukuthi, Maningadli kuwo nawuphi na umthi osemyezweni? phakathi emyezweni.” , UThixo uthe, ‘Nize ningadli kuyo, nize ningayichukumisi, hleze nife.’” Yathi inyoka kumfazi, Anisayi kufa, kuba uThixo uyazi. ukuze mhlana nithe nadla kuzo aqabuke amehlo enu, nibe njengoThixo, nazi okulungileyo nokubi. Aqabuka amehlo abo bobabini, baqonda ukuba bahamba ze; bazithukela amagqabi omkhiwane, bazenzela iingubo. Ivesi 20-21 UAdam wamthiya igama umkakhe, wathi nguEfa, kuba kaloku luzalwa nguye lonke uluntu. UYehova uThixo wabenzela iingubo zezintsu uAdam nomkakhe, wabambathisa.

Kuba uThixo akamthumanga uNyana wakhe ehlabathini, ukuze aligwebe ihlabathi. ; (kwalapha ngezantsi), ukuze ihlabathi lisindiswe ngaye, kodwa lowo ungakholwayo uselegwetyiwe, ngokuba engakholwanga kwigana loNyana okuphela kwamzeleyo kaThixo.

“Lowo uvela ezulwini uphezu kweento zonke; lowo ungowasehlabathini ungowasehlabathini, yaye oko akuthethayo kuphuma emhlabeni. Lowo uvela ezulwini ungaphezu kweento zonke. Ungqina ngoko akubonayo nakuvayo; Kodwa akukho bani ubamkelayo ubungqina bakhe; lowo ungakholwayo kuNyana akayi kububona ubomi obungunaphakade, kodwa ingqumbo kaThixo ihleli phezu kwakhe.”— Yohane 3:31-36 .

( 2 ) Ngobomi boNyana kaThixo, kukho ubomi obungunaphakade

Lo nguYesu Kristu oweza ngamanzi negazi, kungekhona ngamanzi odwa, kodwa ngamanzi negazi, engqina ngoMoya oyiNgcwele; Bathathu abo bangqinayo: uMoya oyiNgcwele, namanzi, negazi, aba bathathu bamanyene. Ekubeni sibufumana ubungqina babantu, kufuneka sibamkele ngakumbi ubungqina bukaThixo (kufuneka sibamkele: umbhalo wokuqala mkhulu), kuba ubungqina bukaThixo bungoNyana wakhe. Othe wakholwa kuNyana kaThixo, unabo obu bungqina kuye; Obo bungqina bungobokuba uThixo usinike ubomi obungunaphakade; Ukuba umntu unaye uNyana kaThixo, unobomi; ukuba akanaye uNyana kaThixo, akanabo ubomi. — 1 Yohane 5:6-12

( 3 ) ukuze nazi ukuba ninobomi obungunaphakade

Ndinibhalela ezi zinto, nina nikholwayo kwigama loNyana kaThixo, ukuze nazi ukuba ninobomi obungunaphakade. …Siyazi ke ukuba uNyana kaThixo ufikile wasinika ubulumko, ukuze simazi oyinyaniso, sikuye oyinyaniso, uNyana wakhe uYesu Kristu. Nguye lo uThixo oyinyaniso, nobomi obungunaphakade. — 1 Yohane 5:13, 20
