articles.title: Ubomi obungunaphakade 1 Sindiswa kwaye ube nobomi obungunaphakade
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Mawethu, uxolo malube nani nonke bazalwana! Amen

Makhe sityhile iBhayibhile kuIsaya isahluko 45 ivesi 21-22 Niya kuzixela, niziveze iingcinga zenu, nibavumele bacebisane phakathi kwabo. Ngubani owayixelayo kwamandulo? Ngubani owayixela kwamandulo? Andinguye na uYehova? Akukho Thixo ingendim; bhekani kum, nonke nina ziphelo zehlabathi, yaye niya kusindiswa; ngokuba ndinguThixo, akukho wumbi.

Namhlanje sizakufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane kunye "ubomi obungunaphakade" Hayi. 1 Thetha kwaye wenze umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, Nkosi yethu uYesu Krestu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! umfazi onesidima [IBandla] lithumela ngaphandle abasebenzi ngelizwi lenyaniso, elibhaliweyo laza lathethwa ngezandla zabo, ivangeli yosindiso lwethu. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumlo yethu kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zokomoya → Wonke umntu oseziphelweni zomhlaba kufuneka akhangele kuKristu, kwaye uya kusindiswa kwaye abe nobomi obungunaphakade ! Amen.

Le mithandazo ingasentla, umbulelo, kunye neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

( 1 ) Khangela kuKristu kwaye uya kusindiswa

Ukumkani akanakoyisa ngenxa yobuninzi bomkhosi wakhe; Kulilize ukuthembela ngamahashe ngenxa yosindiso lwawo; — INdumiso 33:16-17
IINDUMISO 32:7 Wena uyindawo yokuzimela kwam; (Selah)
37:39 Ke usindiso lwamalungisa luphuma kuYehova;
IINDUMISO 108:6 Siphendule, usisindise ngesandla sakho sokunene, Basindiswe obathandayo.
UIsaya Isahluko 30 Indinyana 15 Itsho iNkosi uYehova, oyiNgcwele kaSirayeli, ukuthi, Ekubuyeni kwenu nasekuphumleni kwenu, aluseluxolweni nasekuzoleni amandla enu;
UISAYA 45:22 Bhekani kum, nonke ziphelo zehlabathi, ukuze nisindiswe; ngokuba ndinguThixo, akukho wumbi.
KwabaseRoma 10:9 Ukuba uthe wamvuma ngomlomo wakho ukuba uyiNkosi uYesu, wakholwa ngentliziyo yakho ukuba uThixo wamvusa kwabafileyo, wosindiswa.
KwabaseRoma 10:10 Kuba umntu ukholwa ngentliziyo, aze abe lilungisa, avume ke ngomlomo, aze asindiswe.
KwabaseRoma 10:13 “Kuba bonke abasukuba belinqula igama leNkosi bosindiswa.”
KWABASEFILIPI 1:19 Kuba ndiyazi ukuba oku kuya kuphumelela ekusindisweni kwam ngenxa yemithandazo yenu, noncedo loMoya kaYesu Kristu.

[Phawula]: Ngokufundisisa izibhalo ezingasentla, uThixo wathi: “Khangelani kum, nonke nina ziphelo zehlabathi, yaye niya kusindiswa; ngokuba ndinguThixo, akukho wumbi. Amen! → usindiso luya kuba ngoxolo amandla akho "Stable"; Wala “ukuphumla, ukuba noxolo” → ukungena kwisithembiso sakhe sokuphumla → ukubethelelwa, ukungcwatywa nokuvuswa kunye noKristu ukuze ungene ekuphumleni kuYesu Kristu, uyaqonda ngokucacileyo ?

Ukuba uthe wamvuma ngomlomo wakho ukuba uYesu yiNkosi, wakholwa ngentliziyo yakho ukuba uThixo wamvusa kwabafileyo, wosindiswa → kuba umntu unokugwetyelwa ngokukholwa ngentliziyo aze asindiswe ngokuvuma ngomlomo wakhe. “Bothi bonke abasukuba belinqula igama leNkosi bosindiswa. → Kuba ndiyazi ukuba ngemithandazo yenu nangoncedo loMoya kaYesu Kristu, oku kuya kukhokelela ekusindisweni kwam ekugqibeleni. Amen

( 2 ) Isithembiso sikaYehova bubomi obungunaphakade

“Wenjenje uThixo ukulithanda kwakhe ihlabathi, ude wancama uNyana wakhe okuphela kwamzeleyo; ukuze bonke abakholwayo kuye bangatshabalali, koko babe nobomi obungunaphakade . Ngenxa yokuba uThixo wamthumela uNyana wakhe ehlabathini, kungekhona ukuze aligwebe ihlabathi (okanye liguqulelwe ngokuthi: ukuligweba ihlabathi; lona elingaphantsi), kodwa ukuze ihlabathi lisindiswe ngaye. — Yohane 3:16-17

Lowo ukholwayo kuNyana, unobomi obungunaphakade; ; lowo ungakholwayo kuNyana, akayi kububona ubomi obungunaphakade, kodwa ingqumbo kaThixo ihleli phezu kwakhe. ”— Yohane 3:36
UYOHANE 6:40 kuba uBawo uyathanda ukuze wonke umntu ombonayo uNyana akholwe kuye, abe nobomi obungunaphakade , yaye ndiya kumvusa ngomhla wokugqibela. "
UYOHANE 6:47 Ndithi kuni, inyaniso, Lowo ukholwayo unobomi obungunaphakade .
Yohane 6:54 Lowo uyidlayo eyam inyama, alisele elam igazi, unobomi obungunaphakade , mna ndiya kumvusa ngomhla wokugqibela.
Yohane 10:28 mna ndizinika ubomi obungunaphakade Aziyi kutshabalala naphakade, akukho namnye uya kuzihlutha esandleni sam.
UYOHANE 12:25 Lowo uwuthandayo umphefumlo wakhe, wolahlekelwa nguwo;
UYOHANE 17:3 Mazi wena, wena ukuphela koThixo oyinyaniso; Bubo ke obu ubomi obungunaphakade, ukuba nimazi uYesu Kristu owamthumayo nina .

Ungabufumana njani ubomi obungunaphakade→ 1 Bubo ke obu ubomi obungunaphakade, ukuba mabakwazi, wena ukuphela koThixo oyinyaniso, noYesu Kristu omthumileyo → 2 Lowo ukholwayo kuNyana, unobomi obungunaphakade; 3 Abo batya inyama "kaYesu" baze basele igazi "likaYesu" baya kuba nobomi obungunaphakade uYesu uya kusivusa ngomhla wokugqibela 4 Nabani na olahlekelwa bubomi bakhe ngenxa kaYesu kunye neendaba ezilungileyo uya kusindisa ubomi bakhe kwaye azuze ubomi bukaYesu Krestu→ Gcina ubomi kubomi obungunaphakade ! articles.title: Xa sele usindisiwe, ungaze utshabalale, kodwa ube nobomi obungunaphakade
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo, bahlobo abathandekayo, bazalwana noodade! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile kuYohane isahluko 10 ivesi 27-28 Ezam izimvu ziyaliva ilizwi lam, ndibe nam ndizazi, zindilandela; mna ndizinika ubomi obungunaphakade; azisayi kutshabalala naphakade; akukho namnye unako ukuzihlutha esandleni sam.

Namhlanje sizakufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane kunye "Wakuba usindisiwe, ubomi obungunaphakade" Thandaza: U-Abha othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! umfazi onesidima [IBandla] lithumela ngaphandle abasebenzi ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo nelithethwe ngezandla zakhe, eliyivangeli yosindiso lwenu. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni→ Abo baqondayo ukuba uYesu walinikela idini lesono kwaba kanye banokungcwaliswa ngonaphakade, basindiswe ngonaphakade, babe nobomi obungunaphakade.

Le mithandazo ingasentla, umbulelo, kunye neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

( 1 ) Ukucamagushela izono kukaKristu kube kanye kwenza abo bangcwalisiweyo bagqibelele ngonaphakade

KUMAHEBHERE 7:27 Wayengafani nababingeleli abakhulu ababenyuka imihla ngemihla, banyuse amadini ngenxa yezono zabo, andule ukunyusa ngenxa yezono zabantu;
KUMAHEBHERE 10:11-12, 14 Wonke umbingeleli othi imihla ngemihla, ekhonza uThixo, enikela idini elinye ngokuphindaphindiweyo, akanakuze asisuse isono. Kodwa uKrestu yena wenze umnikelo wamnye ongunaphakade ngenxa yezono, waza wahlala phantsi ngasekunene kukaThixo. …Kuba ngadini linye ubenza bagqibelele ngokusephakadeni abo bangcwalisiweyo.

[Qaphela]: Ngokuhlolisisa ezi zibhalo zingasentla, sinokubona ukuba uKristu wenza idini lesono “linye” elingunaphakade, ngaloo ndlela egqibezela “umnikelo wesono” →

buza: Yintoni imfezeko?
impendulo: Ngenxa yokuba uKristu wanikela intlawulelo engunaphakade yezono → umbandela wokucamagushela namadini → "wayeka".
“Iiveki ezimashumi asixhenxe zimiselwe abantu bakowenu nakwisixeko sakowenu esingcwele. ubulungisa obungunaphakade → "ukwazisa ubulungisa bukaKristu obungunaphakade nobomi obungenasono", ukutywina umbono nesiprofeto, nokuthambisa Lowo Ungcwele (okanye: okanye inguqulelo) ngolu hlobo , ngaba uyayiqonda ngokucacileyo iNguqulelo - Daniyeli Isahluko 9 Indinyana 24
→ Ngenxa "kaKristu," idini lakhe elinye lenza abo bangcwalisiweyo bagqibelele ngonaphakade →

buza: Ngubani onokungcwaliswa ngonaphakade?
impendulo: Ukukholelwa ukuba uKristu wanikela idini lesono ngenxa yezono zethu kuya kwenza abo “bangcwalisiweyo” bafezeke ngonaphakade → “Ukugqibelela ngonaphakade” kuthetha ukuba ngcwele ngonaphakade, abangenasono, abangenasono, abangenasiphako, abangadyobhekanga, nabangcwalisiweyo ngonaphakade! →Ngoba? →Kuba umntu wethu omtsha "ulithambo lamathambo nenyama yenyama" kaKristu, amalungu omzimba wakhe, umzimba nobomi bukaYesu Kristu! Ubomi bethu esizelwe nguThixo bufihlwe ndawonye noKrestu kuye uThixo. Amen. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

( 2 ) Umntu omtsha ozelwe nguThixo → asingomntu omdala

Masifunde iBhayibhile kwabaseRoma 8:9 Ukuba ke uMoya kaThixo uhleli kuni, aniseyinyama, koko ningaboMoya. Ukuba umntu akanaye uMoya kaKristu, akangokaKristu lowo.

[Phawula]: Ukuba uMoya kaThixo "uhleli" kuwe, oko kukuthi, "umntu omtsha" uzelwe nguThixo, awusekho enyameni, okuthetha "umntu omdala wenyama." →“Umntu omtsha” ozelwe nguThixo akangowomntu “omtsha” wenyama; Ukuba umntu akanaye uMoya kaKristu, akangokaKristu lowo. buza:" Luthetha ntoni “ukholo”?
impendulo: “Kholwa” lithetha “kholwa kwivangeli, uqonde indlela eyiyo → kholwa kwindlela eyiyo”! Sele ndinxibelelene nani kwaye ndabelana nani malunga nokuba yintoni na ivangeli kunye nokuba yintoni na eyona ndlela yokwenene.

buza: Apha “kholwa ubhaptizwe” kuthetha ubhaptizo lwamanzi? Okanye ubhaptizo loMoya oyiNgcwele?
impendulo: Lubhaptizo “loMoya oyiNgcwele”! Amen

buza: Indlela yokufumana ubhaptizo "loMoya oyiNgcwele"? Okanye “nguMoya oyiNgcwele othenjisiweyo”?
impendulo: 1 Yiqondeni indlela eyinyaniso, kholwani ngayo inyaniso, 2 kholwani kuzo iindaba ezilungileyo ezi, iindaba ezilungileyo ezisindisayo;
Xa uthe waliva ilizwi lenyaniso, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwakho, waza wakholwa kuKristu, watywinwa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele wesithembiso. Lo Moya oyiNgcwele usisibambiso (isicatshulwa sokuqala: ilifa) selifa lethu bade abantu bakaThixo (isicatshulwa sokuqala: ilifa) bakhululwe ukuze kudunyiswe uzuko lwakhe. Isalathiso - Efese 1:13-14 . Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

UMARKO 1:4 Ngokwezi zinto, weza uYohane, ebhaptiza entlango, evakalisa ubhaptizo lwenguquko, ukuze kuxolelwe izono.

Masifunde iBhayibhile kwaye sifunde kunye uLuka 4: 18-19: "UMoya weNkosi uphezu kwam, ngenxa yokuba indithambisele ukushumayela iindaba ezilungileyo kumahlwempu, kwaye undithumele ukuba ndivakalise inkululeko kubathinjwa vula ukubona kwabaziimfama, ukukhulula abacinezelweyo, ukuvakalisa umnyaka owamkelekileyo kaThixo.”

ULuka 24:44-48 Wathi uYesu kubo, Ngawo la amazwi endawathethayo kuni ndisenani, ukuthi, Zimelwe kukuzaliseka zonke izinto ezibhaliweyo emthethweni kaMoses, nasebaprofetini, nasezindumisweni. Waza uYesu wazivula iingqiqo zabo, ukuze baziqonde izibhalo, wathi kubo, Kubhaliwe kwathiwa, UKristu uya kubandezeleka, abuye avuke kwabafileyo ngomhla wesithathu, nokuba abantu baya kumnqula, ogama livakalisa inguquko nenguquko. uxolelo lwezono kuzo zonke iintlanga, luqalele eYerusalem.

Kuyabonakala ukuba uthando lukaKristu luyasikhuthaza; kuba sicinga ukuba ekubeni “uKristu” wafela bonke, bonke bafa → kuba lowo wafayo “ukhululwe” esonweni → “bonke” bafa, “bonke” Bonke bakhululwe kuso. isono. Ke kaloku abo ke bakaKristu, inyama bayibethelele emnqamlezweni, kunye neminqweno neenkanuko zayo. — Galati 5:24
Yaye wavuswa ngomhla wesithathu ngokutsho kweBhayibhile.

articles.title: Usindiso 1 Kholwani kuyo indlela yenyaniso, yiqondeni indlela yenyaniso, nisindiswe
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo, bahlobo abathandekayo, bazalwana noodade! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibhile kweyesi-2 kwabaseTesalonika Isahluko 2 ivesi 13 Simelwe kukuhlala sibulela kuye uThixo ngenxa yenu, bazalwana bathandiweyo yiNkosi, ngokuba waninyulela kwasekuqalekeni, ukuze nisindiswe ngokungcwaliswa koMoya oyiNgcwele ngokholo. EyokuQala kuTimoti Chapter 2:4 onga yena bangasindiswa bonke abantu, bafikelele ekuyazini inyaniso.

Namhlanje siza kufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane " zigcinwe "Hayi. 1 Thetha kwaye wenze umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, Nkosi yethu uYesu Krestu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! umfazi onesidima [IBandla] lithumela ngaphambili abasebenzi ngelizwi lenyaniso, elibhaliweyo laza lathethwa ezandleni zabo, ivangeli yosindiso lwenu. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni→ Qonda indlela eyiyo, kholelwa kuyo indlela eyiyo kwaye usindise! Amen .

Le mithandazo ingasentla, umbulelo, kunye neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

( 1 ) Ukukhangela kwiNyoka yobhedu ukuze usindiswe kwiTestamente eNdala

Masifunde iBhayibhile kwiNumeri 21:8-9 uYehova wathi kuMoses: “Yenza inyoka enobuhlungu, uyixhome esibondeni, ukuba uthe wajonga kuyo inyoka, waphila.” Lowo ulunywe yinyoka uya kuphila xa ekhangele kwinyoka yobhedu.

[Phawula]: Apha sijonga phezulu 'kwinyoka yobhedu' → Ubhedu: ubhedu oluqaqambileyo - bhekisela kwiSityhilelo 1:15 → Nabani na olunywe 'yinyoka enomlilo' aze atyhefwe uya kuphila kamsinya nje akuba ejonge le 'nyoka yobhedu.' . Ifanekisela usindiso lukaKristu → UKristu "wasifela waza waba sisiqalekiso waza waxhonywa esibondeni. → Nabani na ojonga phezulu "kwinyoka yobhedu" ujonge kuMsindisi, kwaye "ubuhlungu benyoka" emizimbeni yabo kuthiwa isiqalekiso "inyoka yobhedu" Uqalekisiwe ngolu hlobo, abantu abalunywe ziinyoka bayakuphila ukuba bajonge le nyoka yobhedu.

( 2 ) ITestamente eNtsha Khangela kuKristu ukuze usindiswe

Masifunde iBhayibhile uIsaya Isahluko 45 Ivesi 22 Mabakhangele kum, zonke iziphelo zehlabathi, basindiswe; ngokuba ndinguThixo, akukho wumbi. EyokuQala kuTimoti Chapter 2:4 onga yena bangasindiswa bonke abantu, bafikelele ekuyazini inyaniso.

[Phawula]: Wonke umntu oseziphelweni zomhlaba ufanele akhangele kuMsindisi aze “ayazi inyaniso” yaye uya kusindiswa. Amen

buza: Yintoni iTao?
impendulo: Ekuqaleni kwakukho iTao, iTao yayikunye noThixo, yaye “iTao” yayinguThixo. Lo Lizwi wayekunye noThixo kwasekuqalekeni.

buza: Sinokuyiqonda njani indlela yokwenene?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi
“ULizwi” waba yinyama, oko kukuthi, “uThixo” waba yinyama → wathiwa nguYesu! Igama elithi “Yesu” lithetha ukusindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo. Kuba ekubeni abantwana babo bengamadlelane naye ngenyama negazi, wathi naye ngokwakhe ngokukwanjalo wabelana nabo ngezo zinto, ukuze ngako ukufa ambhangise lowo unamandla okufa, oko kukuthi, uMtyholi, abakhulule abo babethe bakhonza ubomi babo bonke ebukhobokeni. ngokoyika ukufa. →Nguye "uKristu" owabethelelwa emnqamlezweni waza wafela izono zethu →wasikhulula wasikhulula: 1 ukhululekile esonweni, 2 Ndikhululwe kuwo umthetho nesiqalekiso sawo; 3 Wazilahla ixhego neendlela zakhe zakudala wavuswa ngomhla wesithathu → ukuze asenze amalungisa! Fumani ubuntwana bukaThixo. Amen! →Ngale ndlela, uKristu usebenzisa ngokuthe ngqo ukufa “ukutshabalalisa” umtyholi onamandla okufa, nokukhulula abo bethu bangamakhoboka esono ubomi bethu bonke ngenxa yokoyika ukufa. Amen! Kwixesha elizayo, siya kufumana ilifa likaBawo wethu waseZulwini. Thandaza egameni leNkosi uYesu Krestu! Amen

impendulo: Ngosuku lwesibhozo emva kokuzalwa → Yonke into eyindoda kwizizukulwana zenu kwizizukulwana zenu, enoba izalelwa kwintsapho yakho okanye othengwe ngemali kubantu basemzini abangeyiyo inzala yakho, imele yaluswe ngomhla wesibhozo emva kokuzalwa kwayo. Isonka siphuma kude ezulwini, sinikwa thina ngexesha elifanelekileyo, ukuze ubomi bethu bomoya bube nentabalala! UYohane Chapter 12 verse 25 Lowo uwuthandayo umphefumlo wakhe, wolahlekelwa nguwo;
Eyoku-1 kaPetros Isahluko 1:9 Yamkelani ke imiphumo yokholo lwenu, olu → "usindiso lwemiphefumlo yenu." INdumiso 86:13 Ngokuba inkulu inceba yakho kum;

buza: Ukulahlekelwa bubomi → "ubomi" okanye iguqulelwe ngokuthi "umphefumlo" → ukulahlekelwa "ngumphefumlo"? Akazange na athi ufuna “ukusindisa” imiphefumlo? Indlela → "ukulahlekelwa umphefumlo wakho"?
impendulo: Njengoko iBhayibhile isitsho → “ukuzuza ubomi” kuthetha “ukuzuza umphefumlo” yaye “ukusindisa ubomi” kuthetha “ukusindisa umphefumlo” → Okokuqala simele sifunde iBhayibhile “umphefumlo” ka-Adam Wadala umntu, waphefumlela emathatheni akhe ubomi

Waba ngumntu ophilayo igama elinguAdam. →Umntu ophilayo onomoya (umoya: okanye uguqulelwe njengenyama)”; uAdam ngumntu ophilayo wenyama negazi. Imbekiselo - 1 Korinte 15:45 → Isityhilelo seNkosi ngoSirayeli. Yandisa amazulu nokwakha Iziseko zomhlaba →INkosi “eyadala umoya ongaphakathi womntu” yathi, ibhekisa kuZekariya Isahluko 12 Indinyana 1→Ngoko “umzimba womphefumlo” ka-Adam wadalwa, kwaza kwadalwa “umzimba womphefumlo” ka-Adam eMyezweni ka-Adam. Eden Inyoka "ihlanjelwe → ithengiswe esonweni - Ngaba uyayiqonda le nto ngokucacileyo? Reference - KwabaseRoma 7:14.

buza: INkosi uYesu iyisindisa njani imiphefumlo yethu?
impendulo: "UYesu" → Wasibizela ke kubo isihlwele nabafundi bakhe, wathi kubo, Ukuba ubani uthanda ukundilandela, makazincame, awuthwale umnqamlezo wakhe, andilandele → Ndimanyene noKristu ndabethelelwa emnqamlezweni ":"Ubomi Obulahlekileyo" → oko kukuthi, ubomi bokulahlekelwa "ngumphefumlo nomzimba" wendoda endala ka-Adam nokwenza isono → kuba nabani na ofuna ukusindisa ubomi bakhe (okanye iguqulelwe ngokuthi: umphefumlo; okufanayo ngezantsi) uya kulahlekelwa bubomi bakhe; nabani na olahlekelwa bubomi bakhe ngenxa "mna" kunye "nevangeli" Ukulahlekelwa bubomi →

1 Uya kuba nobomi→

buza: Bubomi bukabani obuya kuzuzwa?

impendulo: Ukufumana ubomi bukaYesu Krestu→ubomi (okanye iguqulelwe ngokuthi: umphefumlo)→ukufumana "umphefumlo kaYesu Krestu". Amen! ;" Hayi kwakhona “Ukubuyisela” umphefumlo wendalo ka-Adam, indalo. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

2 Ukuba uyabusindisa ubomi bakho, wowusindisa umphefumlo wakho→ Ukuba umntu unaye uNyana kaThixo, unabo ubomi; ukuba akanaye uNyana kaThixo, akanabo ubomi. Isalathiso - 1 Yohane 5:12 → Oko kukuthi, ukuba "nobomi bukaYesu" kukuba → "umphefumlo" kaYesu → "unomphefumlo kaYesu Krestu" → ukusindisa umphefumlo wakho! Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

Isilumkiso: Abantu abaninzi abawufuni “umphefumlo kaKristu”; Yehova, uphi na umphefumlo wam? kwenziwe ntoni? Ngaba ucinga ukuba aba bantu baziintombi ezinyulu akulungile na ukuba unomphefumlo kaYesu Kristu? Ngaba umphefumlo owadalwa nguAdam ulungile?

buza: Ndenze ntoni ngomphefumlo wam?

impendulo: INkosi uYesu yathi → "Ilahlekile, ilahliwe, ilahlekile" uThixo uyakunika" umoya omtsha "→uKrestu" umphefumlo ", umzimba omtsha → umzimba kaKristu ! Amen. →Kuba "umphefumlo kaKristu" ngokufa emnqamlezweni → "ngumphefumlo wamalungisa" → Xa uYesu weva (wamkela) iviniga, wathi: " Yenziwe ! "Wathoba intloko wathi," umphefumlo “Yinike uThixo.”— Yohane 19:30

UYesu Kristu uya kwenjenjalo umphefumlo Ukuhanjiswa nguBawo ngu-→ ugqibelele umphefumlo welungisa Ngaba awufuni? Ndixelele enoba “usisidenge okanye akunjalo.” Ngale ndlela, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo? Jonga kumaHebhere 12:23 .

Ngoko ke, iNkosi uYesu yathi: “Lowo uwuthandayo umphefumlo wakhe, wolahlekelwa bubomi bakhe obudala; entsha Ubomi obuse ebomini obungunaphakade Amen

→ Wanga uThixo woxolo anganingcwalisa ngokupheleleyo! Yaye ngamana “umoya, umphefumlo nomzimba” wenu njengomntu ozelwe ngokutsha ungagcinwa ungenasiphako ekufikeni kweNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Reference-1 Tesalonika Isahluko 5 ivesi 23

articles.title: Ingcaciso yobunzima: Ngaba yayiluvuko lomzimba ka-Adam onokufa okanye uvuko lomzimba kaKristu ongafiyo?
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Mawethu, uxolo malube nani nonke bazalwana! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibhile yethu kumaRoma isahluko 8 indinyana 11 size sifunde kunye: Ukuba ke uMoya walowo wamvusayo uYesu kwabafileyo, umi ngaphakathi kwenu, yena owamvusayo uKristu kwabafileyo uya kuyenza iphile nemizimba yenu enokufa ngaye uMoya wakhe, owamvusayo uKristu Yesu kwabafileyo. .

Namhlanje sizakufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane ngemibuzo kunye neempendulo kunye ukuze imizimba yenu efayo iphile 》Umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhleli enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! " umfazi onesidima "Thumelani abasebenzi ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo, elithethiweyo ngezandla zabo, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwenu. Isonka siphuma kude ezulwini, sinikwa thina ngexesha elililo, ukuze buphuphume ubomi bethu boMoya. Amen ! Qonda ukuba “umzimba ofayo wadla ubomi” ngumzimba kaKristu;

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen.

( 1 ) ukuze imizimba yenu efayo iphile

buza: Yintoni umzimba ofayo?
impendulo: Umzimba ofayo → njengoko umpostile "uPawulos" ebiza → "umzimba wenyama negazi, umzimba wesono, umzimba wokufa, umzimba ongcolileyo, umzimba ongcolileyo, umzimba ophantsi kokubola, intshabalalo, kunye nokukhubazeka" → ubizwa ngokuba ngumzimba ofayo. Jonga kwabaseRoma 7:24 nabaseFilipi 3:21+ njl.!

buza: "Umzimba wenyama" unesono, uyafa, kwaye uphantsi kokufa ... Ngaba "umzimba wenyama, umzimba onokufa" ubuyela ebomini kwakhona?
impendulo: UKristu “wathabatha” umzimba ka-Adam ofayo waza wawuguqula wafana nomzimba onesono ukuze usebenze njengedini lesono - bhekisa kumaRoma 8:3 → UThixo wenza umzimba “kaKristu” ongenasono kumzimba onesono “ka-Adam” - bhekisa ku-2 KwabaseKorinte 5:21 noIsaya 53:6, umvuzo wesono kukufa → “ubizwa ngokuba ngumzimba onokufa”, uKristu “waba ngumzimba wesono ngenxa yethu” Kufuneka ufe kube kanye → Ngale ndlela, xa uKristu esiza, Igqityiwe "Umthetho, umvuzo wesono kukufa, kwaye ngomhla othe wadla kuwo uya kufa ngokuqinisekileyo. Jonga kumaRoma 6: 10 kunye neGenesis 2: 17. Ngaba uyakuqonda oku ngokucacileyo? → UAdam noEva "Uze ungadli into eniyidlayo” Isiqhamo somthi wokwazi okulungileyo nokubi. Umfazi uEva lithambo nenyama ka-Adam. Umfazi uEva ufuzisela ibandla. “Ibandla” lafa likwinyama engalukanga. Ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo ukuba uThixo waphefumlela “umoya wobomi” kumzimba ongalukanga ka-Adam—Bona kwabaseKolose 2:13 nakwiGenesis 2:7 .

( 2 ) Ngumzimba womoya ovuswayo

Kwaye "uAdam" ihlwayelwe Ngumzimba wenyama negazi,” uvusiwe "Ewe→" umzimba womoya ". Ukuba kukho umzimba wenyama, kufuneka kwakhona umzimba womoya. Imbekiselo - 1 Korinte 15:44 → "Umzimba kaYesu" liLizwi wenziwe inyama, wakhawulwa waza wazalwa "ngoMoya oyiNgcwele" yintombi enyulu uMariya → Ngoko ke uYesu Kristu wafa ekufeni Umzimba ovusiweyo kuKristu "ngumzimba womoya" nomzimba wethu ovusiweyo kunye noKrestu "ngumzimba womoya".

Ngalo lonke ixesha sisitya isidlo seNkosi, sisitya isonka seNkosi.” Umzimba ", sela eNkosini" Igazi “Ubomi→Ngale ndlela sinomzimba nobomi bukaKristu, I Bangamalungu omzimba wakhe→ Ikwangumzimba ongcwele, ongenasono, ongenasiphako, ongenabala, nongonakali kunye nobomi → obu "bubomi bam obuye wavuka kunye noKristu"! ewe mfazi" ecaweni “Abafile zizono nakukungaluki enyameni; kodwa kuKristu” ecaweni Uyaphila kwakhona. Amen! NgoAdam bonke bafa, kwaye kuKristu bonke bayadliswa ubomi.

Ngoko ke → Lowo wamvusayo uKristu Yesu kwabafileyo naye uya phila "Ezintliziyweni zenu" uMoya oyiNgcwele ", ukuze imizimba yenu efayo iphile → NguMzimba kaKristu ophilayo kwakhona! Amen Awudalwanga ngothuli → "Umzimba ofayo, ofayo, owonakalayo, onesono wenziwa uphile kwakhona.

Ukuba "umzimba odalwe ngothuli ubuyela ebomini" → uya kuqhubeka ubola kwaye ufe → kuphela oko uThixo akuvusileyo akukubonanga ukubola → ngaba oku "akuziphikisa"? Ngaba ucinga njalo? Bhekisela kubapostile 13:37

( 3 ) ukutolika ngendlela engeyiyo →Kwaye nenze imizimba yenu enokufa iphile kwakhona

---Ukuba isiseko sokuvuka kwakho kunye noKristu asilunganga~"uyakuba uphosisile onke amanqanaba endlela"---

Iicawa ezininzi namhlanje "zitolikwa phosakeleyo kwesi sibhalo singcwele" kwaye impembelelo inkulu kakhulu → kuba isiseko sokuvuka kwakho kunye noKristu siphosakele → "isiseko sovuko" siphosakele, kwaye "izenzo" zabadala, abefundisi, kunye Abashumayeli yiloo nto bayithethayo nabayishumayelayo baya kuhlala bengachananga → Ngokomzekelo, “uLizwi waba yinyama”, bathi uYesu waba yinyama → Sinokuba yinyama “enyameni” ngokuthembela “kuMoya Oyingcwele” → “inyama” " "I-Tao". Indlela yokuba yiTao inyama" nokuphila ngoMoya oyiNgcwele. Ukwenziwa ugqibelele yinyama → ukulahla "usindiso lukaKristu, ilizwi likaThixo, inyaniso, nobomi" nokuwa elubabalweni. Ngale ndlela, ngaba uqonda ngokucacileyo → njengoko "uPawulos" watshoyo? →Ukuba uqalisile ngoMoya oyiNgcwele, ngaba usathembele kwimfezeko yenyama - Galati 3:3

Kwiicawa ezininzi namhlanje, kwakhona basukela inzondelelo → "ilizwi likaThixo" kunye "nobomi", kodwa kungekhona ngokolwazi lokwenyaniso → ngenxa yokuba "ababazi" ubulungisa bukaThixo kwaye bafuna ukumisa ubulungisa babo, kodwa ababululameli kubulungisa bukaThixo . Olunjani lona usizi, olunjani lona usizi! Isalathiso-KwabaseRoma 10:3

kulungile! Namhlanje ndithanda ukwabelana nani nonke ngobudlelane bam. Amen

articles.title: “Umnqamlezo” Ukuba sifa kunye noKrestu, siyakholwa ukuba sodla ubomi kunye naye
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Molo bahlobo! Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibhile yethu kumaRoma isahluko 6 kunye nendinyana 8 size sifunde kunye: Ukuba safa kunye noKrestu, kufuneka sikholwe ukuba sodla ubomi kunye naye. KWABASE-EFESE 2:6-7 Wasivusa, wasihlalisa kunye nathi kwezasezulwini iindawo, sikuKristu Yesu, ukuze atyhilele izizukulwana ezizayo ubutyebi obuncamisileyo bobabalo, nobabalo lwakhe kuthi ngoKristu Yesu.

Namhlanje sizakufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane kunye "umnqamlezo" Hayi. 8 Thetha kwaye wenze umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, Nkosi yethu uYesu Krestu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Umfazi onesidima [icawa] ithumela abasebenzi ukuba baye kuthwala ukutya okuvela emazulwini akude ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo nelithethwa ezandleni zabo *, yaye lisasaze ukutya kuthi kwangethuba ukuze senze ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zomoya → Qonda ukuba ukuba safa kunye noKrestu, siya kukholwa ukuba siya kuhlala naye kwaye sihlale naye kwezasezulwini iindawo! Amen.

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen.

Ukuba sifa kunye noKristu, siso Xinbi uhlala naye

( 1 ) Sikholelwa ekufeni, ekungcwatyweni nasekuvukeni kunye noKrestu

buza: Sife njani, singcwatywe, sivuke kwakhona kunye noKrestu?
impendulo: Kuvela ukuba uthando lukaKristu luyasikhuthaza; kuba sicinga ukuba ekubeni omnye wafela bonke, bonke bafa → "uKristu" wafa - "bonke" bafa → oku kubizwa ngokuba lukholo "bafa kunye" kwaye uKristu "wangcwatywa" - " Bonke” bangcwatywa → oku kubizwa ngokuba lukholo “bangcwatywa kunye”; uYesu Kristu “wavuswa kwabafileyo” → “bonke” nabo “bavuswa kwabafileyo” → oku kubizwa ngokuba lukholo “baphila kunye”! Amen. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo? Imbekiselo - 2 Korinte 5:14 → Uvuko kunye noKristu "luvuko kuKristu" kungekhona uvuko luka-Adam. → Kuye uAdam bayafa bonke; Imbekiselo - 1 Korinte 15:22

( 2 ) Imizimba yethu evusiweyo nobomi bethu bufihlwe noKristu kuThixo

buza: Iphi imizimba yethu evusiweyo nobomi bethu ngoku?
impendulo: Siphila kunye noKristu "emzimbeni nasebomini" → "sifihliwe" kuThixo kunye noKristu, kwaye sihleli kunye ezulwini ngasekunene kukaThixo uYise! Amen. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo? → Xa sasifile ziziphoso, wasidlisa ubomi ndawonye noKristu (nisindiswe ngokubabalwa). Wasivusa kananjalo wasihlalisa ndawonye kwezasezulwini iindawo noKristu Yesu - bhekisa ku-Efese 2:5-6

Kuba nafayo, baye ubomi benu bufihlakele ndawonye noKristu kuye uThixo. Xa athe wabonakalaliswa uKristu, obubomi bethu, nani niya kubonakala, ninaye ebuqaqawulini. —Funda eyabaseKolose 3:3-4

( 3 ) Umzimba ka-Adam wavuswa, iimfundiso zobuxoki
KwabaseRoma 8:11 Ukuba ke uMoya walowo wamvusayo uYesu kwabafileyo, umi ngaphakathi kwenu, yena owamvusayo uKristu kwabafileyo uya kuyenza iphile nemizimba yenu enokufa ngaye uMoya wakhe, owamvusayo uKristu kwabafileyo ephila.

[Phawula]: Ukuba “uMoya kaThixo” uhleli kuthi, aningobenyama, kodwa ningaboMoya → oko kukuthi, “ongekho” kwinyama eyaphuma kuAdam, umzimba wakhe wafa ngenxa yesono waza wabuyela eluthulini Genesis 3:19 KwabaseRoma 8:9-10 → “Umoya” “uphila” kum kuba uMoya kaKristu uhleli kuthi! Amen. →Ekubeni “singengabo” kumzimba ka-Adam onesono, asingomzimba ka-Adam oye waphila kwakhona.

buza: Ngaba kwakungathethi ukuba imizimba yenu efayo yayiza kuvuswa?

impendulo: Umpostile “uPawulos” wathi → 1 Ngubani na onokundisindisa kulo mzimba wokufa—Imbekiselo - Roma 7:24, 2 “Yambathani” “ukonakala nokufa” umzimba kaKristu ongenakonakala → "Ukufa kuginywe eloyisweni" kuya kuzaliseka → ukuze oku "kufa" kuginywe bubomi "bokungafi" bukaKristu.

buza: Yintoni ukungafi?
impendulo: Ngumzimba kaKristu → ekwazi kwangaphambili oku, ethetha ngovuko lukaKristu, wathi: “Umphefumlo wakhe awushiywanga kwelabafileyo, nenyama yakhe ingabonanga kubola.” Imbekiselo-IZenzo 2:31
Kuba uThixo wabeka izono zabo "bonke abantu" kuKristu, esenza uYesu ongenasono "abe" "isono" ngenxa yethu, xa ubona "umzimba kaYesu" ujinga emthini → "ngumzimba wakho wesono" → ebizwa ngokuba bafe noKristu ngenxa “yokufayo, enokonakala, enokonakala” nokungcwatywa engcwabeni naseluthulini. → Ke ngoko, umzimba wakho onokufa wenziwa uphile kwakhona → NguKristu owathi “wathabatha” umzimba ka-Adam → Ubizwa ngokuba ngumzimba ofayo, oko kukuthi, wafa kube kanye kuphela ngenxa “yezono zethu”, ibe ngumzimba kaKristu okhoyo. uvusiwe kwaye wavuswa; hayi uthuli lweNdalo ka-Adam olubuya luphila kwakhona. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

→Ukuba sidla kwaye sisele "inyama negazi leNkosi," sinomzimba nobomi bukaKristu ngaphakathi kwethu → uYesu wathi, "Inene, inene, ndithi kuni, Ukuba anithanga niyidle inyama, nisele igazi Lowo uyidlayo eyam inyama, alisele elam igazi, unobomi obungunaphakade; ndaye mna ndiya kumvusa ngomhla wokugqibela.

Isaziso: Iimfundiso zeecawa ezininzi namhlanje → Kholelwa ukuba "uAdam wayenokufa kwaye enesono waza wavuswa" - ukufundisa, le yimfundiso ephosakeleyo kakhulu → Bafuna ukusebenzisa "inyama ukuze babe yiTao" okanye bathembele emthethweni ukuze bahlakulele ihlabathi lehlabathi le "inyama ukuba abe Tao" Neo-Confucianism kunye nemigaqo ikufundisa, ngoko ke iimfundiso zabo ziyafana kanye nezo zisetyenziswa ubuTao ukuba abe ongafiyo nobuBhuda, ezifana ukulinywa Sakyamuni ukuba abe Buddha Ngoko, yenza Uyaqonda ke ngoko kufuneka ulumke kwaye ukwazi ukwahlula, kwaye ungabhidwa ngabo njengabantwana Abanakuphuma.

kulungile! Namhlanje ndithanda ukwabelana nani nonke ngobudlelane bam. Amen

articles.title: Umnqamlezo Injongo yokumanyana noKristu ebethelelwe emnqamlezweni
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo, bahlobo abathandekayo, bazalwana noodade! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibhile yethu kumaRoma isahluko 6 indinyana 8, indinyana 4 Ukuba sifa kunye noKrestu, siyakholwa ukuba sodla ubomi kunye naye. Ngoko ke sangcwatywa naye ngokubhaptizelwa ekufeni, ukuze sihambe sinobomi obutsha, njengokuba uKristu wavuswayo kwabafileyo ngalo uzuko loYise.

Namhlanje siza kufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane " umnqamlezo "Hayi. 7 Thetha kwaye wenze umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, Nkosi yethu uYesu Krestu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Umfazi onesidima [ibandla] uthuma abasebenzi ngezandla zabo, abalibhalayo nabathetha ilizwi lenyaniso, eziziindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwenu! Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zomoya → Umntu wethu omdala wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni, wafa, waza wangcwatywa kunye naye → 1. Esonweni, 2. Kumthetho nakwisiqalekiso somthetho, 3. Kumntu omdala nezenzo zakhe. Amen!

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

( 1 ) Yintoni injongo yokuba ixhego lethu libhubhe lingcwatywe kunye nalo?

Masifunde iBhayibhile:

Roma 6:8, 4 Ukuba ke safa kunye noKristu, siyakholwa ukuba sodla ubomi kunye naye. Ngoko ke sangcwatywa naye ngokubhaptizelwa ekufeni, ukuze sihambe sinobomi obutsha, njengokuba uKristu wavuswayo kwabafileyo ngalo uzuko loYise.
KWABASEKOLOSE 2:12 Nangcwatywa naye elubhaptizweni; enathi nikuye, navuswa nokuvuswa naye, ngokukholwa kwenu kukusebenza kukaThixo, owamvusa kubo abafileyo.

[Phawula]: Ukuba safa kunye noKrestu, simele sikholelwe ukuba sodla ubomi kunye naye

buza: Yini na ukuba ufe noKristu;
impendulo: "Ukufa kunye noKristu, umilise ukufa kwakhe" → kukufumana uzuko, isithsaba, kunye nomvuzo! Amen. Kuba ukufa kukaYesu Kristu emnqamlezweni yayikukufa okwazukisa uThixo uYise. Ngaba uyaqonda?

articles.content:

buza: Umntu wethu omdala wabethelelwa njani emnqamlezweni kunye naye?
impendulo: sebenzisa" Kholwani eNkosini "Indlela → kukusebenzisa" ukuzithemba “Manyanani naye nibethelelwe emnqamlezweni.

Silungiselele ukutya kokomoya kwasezulwini kwangethuba, ukuze ubomi bethu bokomoya bube nobutyebi obungakumbi. Amen! Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sibone nokuva iinyaniso zokomoya → Ukuqonda uKristu nokubethelelwa kwakhe kusikhulula kumandla obumnyama kaSathana eHadesi . Umnqamlezo kaKristu usikhulula kumandla obumnyama eHadesi kaSathana

( 1 ) Ihlabathi liphela lisezandleni zongendawo

Siyazi ukuba singabakaThixo, nokuba ihlabathi liphela lilele kongendawo. eyoku- 1 kaYohane 5:19
Umbuzo: Kutheni ihlabathi lonke lilawulwa bubungendawo?
Impendulo: Abo bonayo ngabakaMtyholi, ngokuba uMtyholi wone kwasekuqalekeni. UNyana kaThixo wabonakalaliswa ukuba ayichithe imisebenzi kaMtyholi. 1 Yohane 3:8 → Kuba bonile bonke, basilela eluzukweni lukaThixo;
→Abo benza ubugwenxa bangabakaMtyholi, yaye wonke umntu osehlabathini ungokaMtyholi, yaye uphantsi kolawulo longendawo, umtyholi.

( 2 ) Ulwamvila lokufa sisono

Yifa! Aphi amandla akho okoyisa? Yifa! Luphi ulwamvila lwakho? Ulwamvila lokufa sisono, amandla esono ngumthetho. Eyoku-1 kwabaseKorinte 15:55-56 → Kanye njengokuba isono sangena ngamntu mnye ehlabathini, kwangena ke ukufa ngaso isono, kwaza ngokunjalo ukufa kwabatyhutyha abantu bonke, ngenxa yokuba bonke bonayo. Ngaphambi komthetho, isono sasikho ehlabathini, kodwa kungekho mthetho, isono asisiso isono. Kodwa ukususela kuAdam kuse kuMoses, ukufa kwalawula, kwanabo bangenzanga isono esifana nesika-Adam. U-Adam wayengumfuziselo wendoda eyayiza kuza. Roma 5:12-14

3 ) Ukufa neHadesi

IINDUMISO 18:5 Izintya zelabafileyo zindijikele, nezirhintyelo zokufa ziphezu kwam.
IINDUMISO 116:3 Izintya zokufa zindithandele;
IINDUMISO 89:48 Ngubani na ongadla ubomi ngonaphakade, Aphephe ukufa, Asindise umphefumlo wakhe emasangweni elabafileyo? (Selah)
IsiTyhilelo 20:13-14 Ngoko ulwandle lwabakhupha abafileyo abalapho, kwathi ukufa neHadesi kwabakhupha abafileyo abakhona, bagwetywa elowo ngokwemisebenzi yakhe. Kwaphoswa ke ukufa nelabafileyo edikeni lomlilo;

( 4 ) Ngokufa, uKristu uyamtshabalalisa umtyholi onamandla okufa

Wathi, Ndiya kukholosa ngaye. Wathi, Yabona, mna nabantwana uThixo undinike mna, njengoko abantwana bangamadlelane ngenyama negazi, ukuze yena athabathe inyama negazi ukufa ukuba atshabalalise lowo unamandla okufa, oko kukuthi, uMtyholi, abakhulule ebukhobokeni ubomi babo bonke ebukhobokeni ngenxa yokoyika ukufa. KumaHebhere 2:13-15 → Ndithe ndakumbona, ndasuka ndawa ezinyaweni zakhe, ndaba njengofileyo. Wasibeka isandla sakhe sokunene phezu kwam, wathi, Musa ukoyika; ndingowokuqala nowokugqibela, odla ubomi; ndandngofileyo ke, yabona, ndingobudlayo ubomi kuse emaphakadeni asemaphakadeni, ndiphethe ukufa ezingalweni zam. . nezitshixo zeHadesi ISityhilelo 1:17-18 .

( 5 ) UYesu Kristu, uNyana kaThixo, wasivusa kwabafileyo waza wasifudusela kubukumkani boNyana wakhe oyintanda.

Wasihlangula egunyeni lobumnyama, wasifudusela ebukumkanini boNyana wakhe oyintanda, esinayo ngaye inkululeko noxolelo lwezono. Kolose 1:13-14
Njengompostile “uPawulos” owayethunywe nguThixo → ndinithuma kubo, ukuze avulwe amehlo abo, babuye ebumnyameni, beze ebumhlotsheni, babuye egunyeni likaSathana, beze kuThixo; baya kufumana uxolelo lwezono, baze bonke abangcwalisiweyo badle ilifa. ’”—IZenzo 26:18

kulungile! Namhlanje ndithanda ukwabelana nani nonke ngobudlelane bam. Amen!

Molo bahlobo! Enkosi ngoMoya kaYesu → Ucofa eli nqaku ukuze ufunde kwaye umamele intshumayelo yevangeli Ukuba uzimisele ukwamkela kwaye "ukholelwe" kuYesu Kristu njengoMsindisi kunye nothando lwakhe olukhulu, ngaba sinokuthandaza kunye?

Othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhleli enathi! Amen. Amen! Wangcwatywa → 4 Ukukhulula umntu omdala kunye nezenzo zakhe wavuswa ngosuku lwesithathu → 5 Sithethelele! Yamkela uMoya oyiNgcwele othenjisiweyo njengetywina, uzalwe ngokutsha, uvuswe, usindiswe, ufumane ubuntwana bukaThixo, ufumane ubomi obungunaphakade! Kwixesha elizayo, siya kufumana ilifa likaBawo wethu waseZulwini. Thandaza egameni leNkosi uYesu Krestu! Amen

KULUNGILE! Namhlanje ndingathanda ukwabelana nani ubudlelane bam nani nonke. Ngamana ubabalo lweNkosi uYesu Kristu, uthando lukaThixo, nempefumlelo yoMoya oyiNgcwele ingahlala ihleli nani nonke! Amen

Silungiselele ukutya kokomoya kwasezulwini kwangethuba, ukuze ubomi bethu bube nobutyebi obungakumbi. Amen! Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke ikhanyisela amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuba siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sibone kwaye sive iinyaniso zomoya kwaye siqonde uKristu nokufa kwakhe emnqamlezweni kaKristu Ufile, ngoku Ukukhululwa emthethweni nakwisiqalekiso somthetho kusenza sizuze iwonga loonyana bakaThixo nobomi obungunaphakade! Amen.

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

Umthetho weTestamente yokuqala weBhayibhile

( 1 ) Kumyezo wase-Eden, uThixo wenza umnqophiso noAdam ukuba angatyi kumthi wokwazi okulungileyo nokubi.

Masifunde iBhayibhile [iGenesis 2:15-17] size siyifunde kunye: UYehova uThixo wamthabatha umntu, wambeka emyezweni we-Eden, ukuba awusebenze, awugcine. UYehova uThixo wamyalela oku: “Ungadla kuwo nawuphi na umthi womyezo, kodwa uze ungadli kuwo umthi wokwazi okulungileyo nokubi, kuba mhla uthe wadla kuwo uya kufa ngokuqinisekileyo.” : Inyoka yamlinga uEva, yaza yona, ngokutya kumthi wokwazi okulungileyo nokubi isono sasisele sisehlabathini; igunya, phantsi kolawulo lwesono, phantsi kolawulo lokufa.” UAdam ungumzekelo wendoda eyayiza kuza, uYesu Kristu.)

( 2 ) uMthetho kaMoses

Masifunde iBhayibhile [iDuteronomi 5:1-3 ] size siyifunde kunye: Wawabiza uMoses onke amaSirayeli, wathi kuwo, nyana bakaSirayeli, yiphulaphuleni imimiselo namasiko endinimisela wona namhlanje; wugcineni, uYehova uThixo wethu wenza umnqophiso nathi eHorebhe;

( Phawula: Umnqophiso phakathi kukaYehova uThixo namaSirayeli uquka: IMithetho Elishumi ekrolwe kumacwecwe amatye, kunye nemimiselo nemimiselo engama-613 iyonke ngumnqophiso owuchaza ngokucacileyo umthetho. Ukuba niyayigcina niyigcina yonke imithetho yomthetho, wosikelelwa ekuphumeni kwenu, nisikelelwe ekungeneni kwakho. —Funda iDuteronomi 28, indinyana 1-6 neye-15-68.
Masifunde iBhayibhile [ Galati 3:10-11 ] size siyifunde kunye: Wonke umntu osemisebenzini yomthetho uphantsi kwesiqalekiso; Uqalekisiwe wonke umntu ozenzayo zonke izinto ezibhaliweyo kuyo.” Kuyabonakala ukuba akukho bani ugwetyelwa nguThixo ngomthetho, kuba *iziBhalo zithi: “Lowo ulilungisa uya kudla ubomi obuphuma elukholweni.”
Buyela kwakhona [kwabaseRoma 5-6] nifunde kunye: Kuba oko besikwinyama, iinkanuko ezibi, ezizelwe ngumthetho, zazisebenza emalungwini ethu, zivelisa isiqhamo esikukufa. Ke, ekubeni safayo nje kuwo umthetho owawusibophelela, ngoku sikhululekile kuwo umthetho, ukuze siyikhonze iNkosi ngokobutsha bomoya (umoya: okanye ukuguqulelwa njengoMoya oyiNgcwele) kungekhona ngokwendlela yakudala yomoya. isithethe.

( Phawula: Ngokuhlolisisa ezi zibhalo zingasentla, sinokubona ukuba esebenzisa umpostile [uPawulos] owayenobuchule obubalaseleyo kumthetho wamaYuda, uThixo watyhila “umoya” wobulungisa, imimiselo, imimiselo nothando olukhulu: Nabani na osekelwe kuqheliselo lomthetho. Kuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Uqalekisiwe lowo ungaqhubekiyo ngokwezinto zonke ezibhaliweyo encwadini yomthetho; Kuba xa sasikwinyama, iminqweno emibi ezelwe ngumthetho, "iminqweno emibi" yinkanuko, xa uthe wakhawula, uzale isono; kuse kuYakobi 1 isahluko se-15 uMthendeleko.

Unokuyibona ngokucacileyo indlela [isono] esizalwa ngayo: “Isono” sibangelwa yinkanuko yenyama, yaye inkanuko yenyama “inkanuko embi ezelwe ngumthetho” iqala emalungwini, ize inkanuko iqale emalungwini. ke, xa uthe wakhawula amalungu, uzale isono; Ngokusuka kule mbono, [isono] sikho ngenxa [yomthetho]. Ngaba uyayiqonda ngokucacileyo le nto?

1 Apho kungekho mthetho, akukho sigqitho-Bona kwabaseRoma 4:15
2 Ngaphandle komthetho, isono akuthathwa njengesono - Bona kwabaseRoma 5:13
3 Ngaphandle komthetho, isono sifile. Ngokuba ukuba abantu abadalwe ngothuli bayawugcina umthetho, baya kuzala isono ngenxa yomthetho, kokukhona uya kuzala isono umthetho. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

( 1 ) Kanye njengo "Adam" kuMyezo wase-Eden ngenxa yomyalelo "wokungadli kwisiqhamo somthi wokwazi okulungileyo nokubi", uEva wahendwa yinyoka e-Eden, kunye neminqweno yenyama kaEva ". ububi obuzelwe ngumthetho" Unqwenela ukusebenza emalungwini abo, ufuna isiqhamo esilungele ukudliwa, amehlo aqaqambileyo, athandeka emehlweni, ukwazi okulungileyo nokubi, izinto ezikholekileyo emehlweni; ezenza abantu balumke. Ngaloo ndlela, bawaphula umthetho kwaye benza isono kwaye baqalekiswa ngumthetho. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

( 2 ) UMthetho kaMoses ngumnqophiso owawuphakathi kukaYehova uThixo namaSirayeli kwiNtaba yeHorebhe, owawuquka imiyalelo elishumi elinesithathu, imimiselo nemimiselo uSirayeli akazange awugcine umthetho, yaye bonke bawaphula umthetho, benza isono kuxhomekeke koko kubhalwe kuMthetho kaMoses, iziqalekiso nezifungo, nazo zonke iintlekele zathululelwa kumaSirayeli - bona uDaniyeli 9:9-13 namaHebhere 10:28 .

( 3 ngawo umzimba kaKristu owafayo ukuze usibophe emthethweni, ngoku sikhululekile kuwo umthetho nesiqalekiso sawo. KwabaseRoma 7: 1-7 Ndithi ngoku kwabo bawaziyo umthetho, anazi na ukuba umthetho "ulawula" umntu ngelixa edla ubomi? Kuba “amandla esono ngumthetho. Lo gama udla ubomi kumzimba ka-Adam, ungumoni. Phantsi komthetho ulawula wena kwaye ubambe wena. Ngaba uyaqonda na?

Umpostile “uPawulos” usebenzisa [ Ubudlelwane phakathi kwesono nomthetho ]isifaniso[ ubudlelwane bomfazi nomyeni ] njengokuba umfazi enendoda, ubotshiwe ngumthetho, lo gama indoda isadla ubomi; Ngoko ke, ukuba ithe indoda yakhe yadla ubomi, waba ngowenye indoda, kothiwa ungumkrexezikazi, ukuba ithe yafa indoda yakhe, ukhululekile emthethweni wayo; Phawula: "Bafazi", oko kukuthi, thina boni, sibotshelelwe "ngumyeni", oko kukuthi, umthetho womtshato, ngelixa indoda yethu isaphila ukuba awukhululekanga emthethweni womtshato womyeni wakho, ukuba utshata omnye umntu , ubizwa ngokuba ungumkrexezi, ubuntu bethu obudala "Umfazi "wafa" kuwo umthetho ngomzimba kaKristu emnqamlezweni, waza wavuswa kwabafileyo ukuze siguqukele kwabanye [uYesu] kwaye sithwale isiqhamo somoya kuKristu UThixo ukuba “awufanga” kuwo umthetho, Nokuba awukhululwanga “kwindoda” yomthetho kwaye utshate noYesu, ukrexezile kwaye ubizwa ngokuba ngumkrexezikazi [umkrexezi wokomoya]. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

Ngoko “uPawulos” wathi: “Ngomthetho ndafa kuwo umthetho, ukuze ndiphilele uThixo.”— Gal 2:19 . Kodwa ekubeni safayo kuwo umthetho owawusibophelele, ngoku sikhululekile kuwo umthetho ‘wendoda yokuqala yomnqophiso,’ ukuze siyikhonze iNkosi ngokobutsha bomoya (umoya: okanye ukuguqulelwa njengoMoya oyiNgcwele). “Oko kukuthi, ozelwe nguThixo.” Umntu omtsha okhonza iNkosi “kungekhona ngokwesiko lakudala” kuthetha ukuba kungekhona ngokwendlela yakudala yaboni enyameni ka-Adam.

Enkosi Nkosi! Namhlanje amehlo akho asikelelwe kwaye iindlebe zakho zisikelelwe uThixo uye wathumela abasebenzi ukuba bakhokele ukuba uqonde inyaniso yeBhayibhile kunye nondoqo womthetho wenkululeko “kubayeni”, njengoko “uPawulos” watshoyo → NgeLizwi elikuKristu kunye neVangeli " wazalwa “ukuninika ndodeni-nye, ukuba ndinimise phambi koKristu niziintombi ezinyulu. Amen!—Funda eyesi- 2 kwabaseKorinte 11:2 .

kulungile! Namhlanje ndiya kunxibelelana kwaye ndinabele nonke apha. Amen

articles.title: Umnqamlezo kaKristu 2: Uyasikhulula esonweni
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Mawethu, uxolo malube nani nonke bazalwana! Amen,

Masivule iBhayibhile [Roma 6:6-11] size sifunde kunye: Kuba siyazi ukuba umntu wethu omdala wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni kunye naye, ukuze umzimba wesono uphuthiswe, ukuze singabi sasikhonza isono;

Namhlanje siyafunda, sinxulumana, kwaye sabelane kunye "Umnqamlezo kaKristu" Hayi. 2 Thetha kwaye wenze umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, Nkosi yethu uYesu Krestu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen, enkosi Nkosi! Wathumela abasebenzi, kwaye ngezandla zabo babhala kwaye bathetha ilizwi lenyaniso, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwethu! Silungiselele ukutya kokomoya kwasezulwini kwangethuba, ukuze ubomi bethu bube nobutyebi obungakumbi. Amen! Ngamana iNkosi uYesu ingaqhubeka ikhanyisela amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuba siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sibone kwaye sive iinyaniso zasemoyeni. Luqonde uthando olukhulu loMsindisi wethu uYesu Kristu, owafela emnqamlezweni ngenxa yezono zethu, wasikhulula ezonweni zethu. . Amen.

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi uYesu Krestu. Amen

Umnqamlezo kaKristu uyasikhulula esonweni

( 1 ) ivangeli kaYesu Krestu

Masifunde iBhayibhile [uMarko 1:1] kwaye siyivule kunye kwaye sifunde: Ukuqala kwevangeli kaYesu Krestu, uNyana kaThixo. UMATEYU 1:21 Uya kuzala unyana ke, umbize ngegama elinguYesu; kuba yena eya kubasindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo. UYohane isahluko 3 ivesi 16-17 “Kuba wenjenje uThixo ukulithanda kwakhe ihlabathi, ude wancama uNyana wakhe okuphela kwamzeleyo, ukuze bonke abakholwayo kuye bangatshabalali, koko babe nobomi obungunaphakade. Ngenxa yokuba uThixo wamthumela uNyana wakhe ehlabathini, kungekhona ukuze aligwebe ihlabathi (okanye liguqulelwe ngokuthi: ukuligweba ihlabathi; lona elingaphantsi), kodwa ukuze ihlabathi lisindiswe ngaye.

Phawula: UNyana kaThixo, uYesu Kristu, sisiqalo seendaba ezilungileyo → UYesu Kristu sisiqalo seendaba ezilungileyo! Igama [likaYesu] lithetha ukusindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo. UnguMsindisi, uMesiya, noKristu! Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo? Umzekelo, igama elithi "UK" libhekiselele kwi-United Kingdom of Great Britain kunye neNorthern Ireland, equka iNgilani, iWales, iSkotlani kunye neNorthern Ireland, ekubhekiselwa kuyo njenge "UK" igama elithi "USA" libhekisa kwi-United States of EMelika, igama elithi "Russia" libhekisa kumanyano lwaseRashiya. Igama elithi "uYesu" lithetha ukusindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo → yile nto igama elithi "Yesu" lithetha. Uyaqonda?

Enkosi Nkosi! UThixo wathumela uNyana wakhe okuphela kwamzeleyo [uYesu], owakhawulwa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele yintombi enyulu uMariya, waba yinyama, waza wazalelwa phantsi komthetho ukuze ahlawulele abo baphantsi komthetho, oko kukuthi, ukusindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo. .Phumani ukuze sikwamkele ukwenziwa oonyana bakaThixo. Amen, ngoko igama [uYesu] linguMsindisi, uMesiya, noKristu, ukuze asindise abantu Bakhe ezonweni zabo. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

( 2 ) Umnqamlezo kaKristu uyasikhulula esonweni

Masifunde amaRoma 6:7 eBhayibhileni size siyifunde kunye: Kuba abo bafayo bakhululwe esonweni → “UKristu” wafela “emnye” wabo bonke, ibe ngoko bonke bafa → Ngokufa kwabo bonke, bonke "bakhululwe" benetyala. Amen! Bhekisela kweyesi-2 kwabaseKorinte 5:14 → UYesu wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni waza wafela izono zethu, wasikhulula ezonweni zethu . Kuba anikholwa kuNyana kaThixo okuphela kwamzeleyo” igama likaYesu "→ Zisindise ezonweni zakho , "Awuyikholelwa"→wena" ulwaphulo-mthetho “Zithabathele uxanduva, yaye uya kugwetywa ngesigwebo somhla wentshabalalo.” Musa ukukholelwa "UKrestu" sele "Khulula esonweni sakho → ukugwebe" isono sokungakholwa "→ Kodwa ke abo baneentloni nabangakholwayo... Ngaba nikuqonda ngokucacileyo oku? Bhekisela kwiSityhilelo Isahluko 21 Indinyana 8 noYohane Isahluko 3 Indinyana 17-18

→Ngenxa yokuba" UAdam “Ukungathobeli komntu omnye kwandisa aboni; ngokunjalo nangesingelelo somnye” UKrestu “Ke kaloku, njengokuba isono saba nokulawula ngokufa, ngokunjalo nobabalo lulawula ngobulungisa, luse ebomini obungunaphakade, ngayo iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu. Ukuqonda kakuhle oku?

Buyela kwakhona [ku-1 Petros Isahluko 2-24] Yena wazithwala izono zethu emthini, ukuze sife ezonweni, siphile ebulungiseni. Naphiliswa ngemivumbo yakhe. Phawula: UKristu wathwala izono zethu waza wabangela ukuba sife ezonweni → kwaye "sikhululwe ezonweni" → Abo bafayo bakhululwe ezonweni, kwaye abo bakhululwe ezonweni → banokuphila ngobulungisa! Ukuba asikhululekanga esonweni, asinakuphila ebulungiseni. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

kulungile! Namhlanje ndiya kunxibelelana kwaye ndinabele nonke apha. Amen

articles.title: Umnqamlezo kaKristu 1: Ukushumayela ngoYesu Krestu kunye naye wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Mawethu, uxolo malube nani nonke bazalwana! Amen,

Masivule iBhayibhile [1 kwabaseKorinte 1:17] size sifunde kunye: UKristu akandithumanga kubhaptiza; wandithuma ukushumayela iindaba ezilungileyo, kungabi ngamazwi obulumko, ukuze umnqamlezo kaKristu ungalambathi. . Eyoku- 1 kwabaseKorinte 2:2 Kuba ndagqiba kwelokuba ndingazi nto phakathi kwenu, ingenguYesu Kristu, naye ke ebethelelwe emnqamlezweni .

Namhlanje siyafunda, sinxulumana, kwaye sabelane kunye "Kushunyayelwa ngoYesu Kristu naYe ebethelelwe emnqamlezweni" Thandaza: U-Abha othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen, enkosi Nkosi! “Umfazi onesidima” uthumela abasebenzi ababhala ngezandla zabo baze bathethe ilizwi lenyaniso, eliziindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwethu! Silungiselele ukutya kokomoya kwasezulwini kwangethuba, ukuze ubomi bethu bube nobutyebi obungakumbi. Amen! Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sibone nokuva iinyaniso zokomoya → Ukushumayela uKrestu nosindiso lwakhe olubethelelweyo kukutyhila indlela yosindiso, inyaniso, nobomi ngothando olukhulu lukaKristu namandla ovuko Xa uKristu ephakanyiselwe phezulu emhlabeni, uya kutsala bonke abantu ukuba beze kuwe. .

Ezi zibongozo zingasentla, izibongozo, izibongozo, iintsikelelo, imibulelo zenziwa egameni elingcwele leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

( 1 ) Inyoka yobhedu ejinga emthini kwiTestamente eNdala ifanekisela usindiso lomnqamlezo kaKristu.

Makhe sijonge iBhayibhile [iNumeri Isahluko 21:4-9] size siyifunde kunye: Bona (oko kukuthi, amaSirayeli) banduluka eNtabeni yeHore basinga kuLwandle Olubomvu ukuze bajikeleze ilizwe lakwaEdom. Bakhwankqiswa kakhulu abantu ngenxa yobunzima bendlela, bakhalaza kuThixo nakuMoses, besithi, Yini na ukuba usikhuphe eJiputa (ezweni lobukhoboka) usibulale (oko kukuthi, sife yindlala) kweli lizwe. (Ngenxa yokuba inkoliso yentlango yosinga-siqithi weSinayi iyintlango), akukho kutya namanzi apha, kwaye iintliziyo zethu zikuthiyile oku kutya kubuthathaka (uYehova ke ngoko UThixo wathumela “imana” evela ezulwini kumaSirayeli ukuba ibe kukutya, kodwa asuka akuthiya oku kutya kubuthathaka.” Ngoko ke uYehova wathumela iinyoka ezinobuhlungu phakathi kwabantu, zaza iinyoka zabaluma. Kwafa abantu abaninzi phakathi kwamaSirayeli. + Ngoko ke uThixo ‘akaba sabakhusela, kwangena iinyoka ezinobuhlungu phakathi kwabantu, zabaluma, zaza zagalelwa bubuhlungu. Kwafa abantu abaninzi phakathi koonyana bakaSirayeli.) Beza abantu kuMoses, bathi, Siyilungisile; Ngokona kuYehova nakuni, khawuthandaze kuYehova ukuba azisuse ezi nyoka kuthi. Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Yenza inyoka enobuhlungu, uyixhome esibondeni; Inyoka yobhedu yaphila.

( Phawula: “Inyoka yomlilo” ibhekisa kwinyoka enobuhlungu; “Ubhedu” lufuzisela ukukhanya nokungabi nasono - bhekisa kwiSityhilelo 2:18 nakwabaseRoma 8:3. UThixo wenza imilo "yenyoka yobhedu" ethetha "engenatyhefu" kwaye ithetha "ingenasono" endaweni "yetyhefu yembewu ithetha isono" amaSirayeli awaxhoma esibondeni ukuze abe lihlazo, isiqalekiso nokufa kwetyhefu yenyoka. ” Lo ngumfuziselo kaKristu esiba sisono sethu umzimba “ofana” njengedini lesono Kamsinya nje bakuba bejonge “inyoka yobhedu” eyayijinga epalini, “ityhefu yenyoka” eyayikuyo yayifuduselwa “kwinyoka yobhedu” yaye nabani na olunywe yinyoka wayephila xa ejonga inyoka yobhedu .Amen, uyaqonda?

( 2 ) Shumayela uYesu Krestu naYe ebethelelwe emnqamlezweni

UYohane Chapter 3 verse 14 Kuba njengokuba uMoses wayiphakamisayo inyoka entlango, uya kuphakanyiswa ngokunjalo uNyana woMntu. Amazwi kaYesu ayebhekisela kwindlela awayeza kufa ngayo.’ ( Yohane 8:28 ) Ngoko uYesu wathi: “Xa nithe namphakamisa uNyana woMntu, niya kwazi ukuba ndinguKristu.

UIsaya 45:21-22 Thethani nize nibonise ukucamanga kwenu, nicebisane omnye komnye. Ngubani owayixelayo kwamandulo? Ngubani owayixela kwamandulo? Andinguye na uYehova? Akukho Thixo ingendim; bhekani kum, nonke nina ziphelo zehlabathi, yaye niya kusindiswa; ngokuba ndinguThixo, akukho wumbi.

Qaphela: INkosi uYesu yathi: “Njengokuba uMoses wayiphakamisayo inyoka entlango, waphakanyiswa ngokunjalo uNyana woMntu, “wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni.” Emva kokuba uphakamise uNyana woMntu, uya kwazi ukuba uYesu unguye uKrestu. uMsindisi, osisindisayo esonweni UThixo okhululekileyo kwisiqalekiso somthetho nokhululekileyo ekufeni → UThixo wathi ngomprofeti: "Abantu abaseziphelweni zehlabathi baya kusindiswa ukuba bakhangele "kuKristu" ." Amen! Ngaba oku kucacile?

( 3 ) Lowo ungenasono wamenza isono ngenxa yethu, ukuze thina sibe bubulungisa bukaThixo kuye

Masiyifundisise iBhayibhile [ 2 Korinte 5:21 ] uThixo wamenza lowo ungazani nasono (ongenasono: umbhalo wokuqala uthetha ukungazi isono) ukuba abe sisono ngenxa yethu, ukuze thina sibe bubulungisa bukaThixo kuye. 1 Petros 2:22-25; akenzanga sono, akwabakho nkohliso emlonyeni wakhe. Xa wayetshabhiswa, akazange aphindezele, xa enziwe ububi, akazange asongele, kodwa wayethembela kulowo ugwebayo ngobulungisa. Waxhonywa emthini waza wazithwala izono zethu, ukuze, safa kwisono, siphile ebulungiseni. Naphiliswa ngemivumbo yakhe. Beninjengezimvu ezilahlekileyo, kodwa ngoku nibuyele kuye uMalusi noMveleli wemiphefumlo yenu. 1 KAYOHANE 3:5 Niyazi ke ukuba iNkosi yabonakalaliswa, ukuba isuse izono ebantwini, abangenasono kubo. 1 KAYOHANE 2:2 Yena usisicamagushelo sezono zethu; engesazethu zodwa, usiso nesehlabathi liphela.

( Phawula: UThixo wenza uYesu ongenasono ukuba abe sisono ngenxa yethu, wazithwala ngokwakhe izono zethu waza waxhonywa emthini, oko kukuthi, “umnqamlezo” njengedini lesono, ukuze ekubeni sifile kwisono, siphilele ubulungisa! Yena usisicamagushelo sezono zethu, hayi ezethu kuphela kodwa nezono zehlabathi liphela. UKristu wawunikela umzimba wakhe kwaba kanye njengedini lesono, ngaloo ndlela ebenza abo bangcwalisiweyo bagqibelele ngonaphakade. Amen! besifudula sinjengezimvu ezilahlekileyo, kodwa ngoku sibuyele kuye uMalusi noMveleli wemiphefumlo yenu. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

Ngoko uPawulos wathi: “UKristu akandithumanga kubhaptiza; wandithuma ukushumayela iindaba ezilungileyo, kungabi ngamazwi obulumko, ukuze umnqamlezo kaKristu ungalanja; kodwa ngenxa yamandla kaThixo, njengoko kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Ndiya kubutshabalalisa ubulumko bezilumko, ndiyitshabalalise ingqondo yezilumko. AmaYuda afuna imimangaliso, amaGrike efuna ubulumko, kodwa thina sishumayela uKristu ebethelelwe emnqamlezweni, nto leyo esisikhubekiso kumaYuda nobubudenge kwiintlanga. . ukuze sibonakalise uthando olukhulu, namandla, nobulumko bukaThixo, osenze ubulumko, nobulungisa, nobungcwele, nentlawulelo, ngokuba mna, Pawulos, ndigqibe kwelokuba ndingazi nto ngaphandle kwenu.

Ndimazi nje uYesu Kristu, naye ebethelelwe emnqamlezweni, amazwi endawathethayo, kwanentshumayelo yam, ebengangamazwi ajikwayo obulumko; ibiyeyokubonakalalisa koMoya oyiNgcwele, nokwamandla, ukuze ukholo lwenu lungabi sebulumkweni babantu, lube sebulumkweni babantu. amandla kaThixo. Bhekisela kweyoku- 1 kwabaseKorinte 1:17–2:1-5 .

articles.title: Umnqamlezo｜Imvelaphi yomnqamlezo
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo, bahlobo abathandekayo, bazalwana noodade! Amen. Namhlanje sizakufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane ngemvelaphi yomnqamlezo

umnqamlezo wamandulo waseRoma

ubethelelo , kuthiwa yenziwa ngu AmaFenike Ukuqanjwa, uBukhosi baseFenike ligama eliqhelekileyo lothotho lwezixeko ezincinci kummandla osemantla wonxweme olusempuma lweMeditera yamandulo. Umnqamlezo wesixhobo sentuthumbo wawudla ngokuba zizikhonkwane ezibini okanye ezithathu zomthi---okanye ezine ukuba yayingumnqamlezo omacala amane, onemilo eyahlukeneyo. Ezinye zimilise okwe-T, ezinye zimilise ngo-X, kwaye ezinye zino-Y. Enye yezinto ezinkulu ezaqanjwa ngamaFenike yayikukubulawa kwabantu ngokubethelelwa emnqamlezweni. Kamva, Le ndlela yadluliselwa kumaFenike ukuya kumaGrike, ama-Asiriya, amaYiputa, amaPersi namaRoma. Ngokukodwa edume kuBukhosi bamaPersi, uBukumkani baseDamasko, kwaYuda UBukumkani, ubukumkani bakwaSirayeli, iCarthage, neRoma yamandulo, zazidla ngokubulala abavukeli, abavukeli, amakhoboka, nabantu abangenabemi. .

Esi sohlwayo sikhohlakeleyo sasivela kwisibonda somthi. Ekuqaleni, ibanjwa lalibotshelelwa kwisibonda somthi laza lafuthaniselwa de lafa, nto leyo eyayilula yaye ikhohlakele. Kamva iifreyimu zomthi zaziswa, kuquka iminqamlezo, iifreyimu ezimilise okwe-T kunye neefreyimu ezimilise okwe-X. Isakhelo esimilise u-X sikwabizwa ngokuba "yiSakhelo seNgcwele uAndrew" kuba ingcwele yafela isakhelo esimilise u-X.

Nangona iinkcukacha zokubulawa zinokwahluka kancinci kwiindawo ngeendawo, imeko jikelele iyafana: ibanjwa liyabethwa kuqala lize linyanzelwe ukuba lithwale isakhelo somthi lisingise kwindawo abulawelwa kuyo. Ngamanye amaxesha isakhelo somthi sinzima kangangokuba kube nzima kumntu omnye ukusihambisa. Ngaphambi kokubulawa, ibanjwa lalikhululwe iimpahla, lishiyeke kuphela iqhiya. Phantsi kweentende neenyawo zebanjwa kukho isiqwenga somthi esimise okwentshinyela ukuze umzimba ungatyibiliki ngenxa yomxhuzulane. Emva koko faka umnqamlezo kwindawo evulekileyo elungisiweyo emhlabeni. Ukukhawulezisa ukufa, amalungu ebanjwa maxa wambi ayeqhawuka. Okukhona unyamezelo lwebanjwa, kokukhona ithuthunjiswa ixesha elide. Ilanga eligqats’ ubhobhoyi lalitshisa ulusu lwabo, iimpukane zabaluma zaza zafunxa ukubila kwawo, yaye uthuli olusemoyeni lwabafunxa.

Iminqamlezo yayidla ngokwenziwa ngokweebhetshi, ngoko ke iminqamlezo emininzi yayidla ngokumiswa kwindawo enye. Emva kokuba ulwaphulo-mthetho lubulewe, waqhubeka exhoma emnqamlezweni ukuze aboniswe esidlangalaleni, kwakuyinto eqhelekileyo ukungcwaba umnqamlezo kunye nolwaphulo-mthetho kunye. Ukubethelelwa kamva kwaba nophuculo oluthile, olufana nokulungisa intloko yebanjwa phantsi kwenqwanqwa leplanga, nto leyo enokwenza ukuba ibanjwa lilahlekelwe zingqondo ngokukhawuleza kwaye ngenene lithobe iintlungu zebanjwa.

Kunzima kubantu banamhlanje ukucinga intlungu yokubethelwa emnqamlezweni, kuba phezu komhlaba, ukubophelela nje umntu esibondeni akubonakali ukuba sisohlwayo esibuhlungu ngokukodwa. Ibanjwa lasemnqamlezweni alizange libulawe yindlala okanye lunxano, yaye alizange life ngenxa yokopha—izikhonkwane zabethelelwa emnqamlezweni, ibanjwa lafa ekugqibeleni ngenxa yokufuthanisela. Indoda eyayibethelelwe emnqamlezweni yayinokuphefumla kuphela ngokolula iingalo zayo. Nangona kunjalo, kwimeko enjalo, kunye neentlungu ezibuhlungu ezibangelwa ukubethelela izikhonkwane, zonke izihlunu ziya kuvelisa ngokukhawuleza amandla okunciphisa umva, ngoko umoya ozaliswe esifubeni awukwazi ukukhutshwa. Ukuze kukhawuleziswe ukufunxa, iintsimbi zidla ngokuxhonywa ezinyaweni zabona bantu omeleleyo, ukuze bangakwazi ukuzolula iingalo zabo ukuze baphefumle. Imvumelwano phakathi kwezazinzulu yeyokuba ukubethelelwa kwakuyeyona ndlela ingaqhelekanga yokubulawa kwabantu ngenxa yokuba yayingcungcuthekisa kancinane umntu de afe kangangeentsuku eziliqela.

Ukubethelelwa kokuqala eRoma kufanele kube ngexesha lolawulo lukaTargan ekupheleni kooKumkani abaSixhenxe. Ekugqibeleni iRoma yazicinezela izihlandlo ezithathu imvukelo yamakhoboka. Kwaye lonke uloyiso lwalukhatshwa kukubulawa kwabantu ngokuphalala kwegazi, kwaye amawaka abantu abethelelwa emnqamlezweni. Ezokuqala ezimbini zaziseSicily, enye ngenkulungwane yokuqala BC kwaye enye ngenkulungwane yokuqala BC. Eyesithathu neyona idumileyo, ngo-73 BC, yayikhokelwa nguSpartacus kwaye abantu abangamawaka amathandathu babethelelwa emnqamlezweni. Iminqamlezo yayakhiwe ukusuka eCabo ukuya eRoma. Ukubulawa ngomnqamlezo okanye ikholomu kwakuthandwa kakhulu ngamaxesha amaRoma, kodwa kwaqala ukunyamalala kancinci kwiinkulungwane emva kokuba uKristu ebethelelwe emnqamlezweni, wavuka kwabafileyo waza wenyuka waya ezulwini. Abo balawulayo babengasayisebenzisi indlela yokubulala “oonyana bakaThixo” ukuze babulale izaphuli-mthetho, yaye ukuxhonywa nezinye izohlwayo zaqalisa ukusetyenziswa ngokubanzi.

umlawuli waseRoma uConstantine zikhona Kwinkulungwane yesi-4 AD "Ukuziphatha kuyabhengezwa" Umyalelo waseMilan " bhangisa Ukubethelwa emnqamlezweni. umnqamlezo Luphawu lobuKristu banamhlanje, obumele uthando olukhulu lukaThixo nentlawulelo yehlabathi. 431 Ukuqala ukubonakala kwibandla lamaKristu ngo-AD 586 Yamiswa encotsheni yecawa ukuqala enyakeni.

KULUNGILE! Namhlanje ndingathanda ukwabelana nani ubudlelane bam nani nonke. Ngamana ubabalo lweNkosi uYesu Kristu, uthando lukaThixo, nempefumlelo yoMoya oyiNgcwele ingahlala ihleli nani nonke! Amen

articles.title: Ukwahlula phakathi kokuzalwa ngokutsha okuyinyani kunye nobuxoki
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo, bahlobo abathandekayo, bazalwana noodade! Amen.

Masivule iiBhayibhile zethu kwabase-Efese isahluko 1 indinyana 13 size sifunde kunye: Xa nalivayo ilizwi lenyaniso, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwakho, nakholwa kuKristu, natywinwa kuye ngoMoya oyiNgcwele wedinga. .

Namhlanje siza kufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane " Indlela yokuxelela umahluko: ukuzalwa kwakhona kwenyani kunye nobuxoki 》Umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu oseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele usoloko enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! [Umfazi onesidima] wathuma abasebenzi ngezandla zabo, ababhaliweyo nabavakaliswayo ngelizwi lenyaniso, eliziindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwenu. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zomoya → Fundisa abantwana bakaThixo indlela yokwahlula ukuzalwa ngokutsha kokwenyani ekuzalweni ngokutsha kobuxoki xa benoMoya oyiNgcwele njengetywina labo. ! Amen.

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen.

【1】AmaKristu azelwe ngokutsha ahlala kuKristu

---Phila ngoMoya oyiNgcwele, uhambe ngoMoya oyiNgcwele---

- --Iimpawu zokuziphatha ngokuzithemba---

Galatians 5:25 Ukuba sidla ubomi ngokoMoya, masihambe nokuhamba kwangokoMoya.

buza: Yintoni ukuphila “ngoMoya Oyingcwele”?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

1 Uzelwe ngamanzi nangoMoya ~ bhekisa kuYohane 3 ivesi 5-7;
2 Uzelwe kwinyaniso yevangeli ~ bhekisa kweyoku-1 kwabaseKorinte 4:15 nakuYakobi 1:18;
3 Uzelwe nguThixo ~ bhekisela kuYohane 1:12-13

buza: “Njani” amaKristu aphila ngoMoya oyiNgcwele? Kwaye "njani" ukuhamba ngoMoya oyiNgcwele?
impendulo: Kholwani kulowo uthunywe nguThixo, lo ngumsebenzi kaThixo UThixo.”—Yohane 6:28-29

【Mbini】 Kholelwa kumsebenzi omkhulu awathi uThixo wathumela uNyana wakhe okuphela kwamzeleyo, uYesu, ukuba awufeze ngenxa yethu

"Pawulos" Ndigqithisela kuni oko nam ndakwamkelayo: Okokuqala, okokuba uKristu wazifela izono zethu ngokwezibhalo, ukuba wangcwatywa, nokokuba uvukile ngomhla wesithathu, ngokwezibhalo! 1 Korinte 15:3-4

(1) sikhululekile esonweni ~Bona amaRoma 6:6-7 namaRoma 8:1-2
(2) Ndikhululekile kuwo umthetho nesiqalekiso sawo ~Bona amaRoma 7:4-6 nakumaGalati 3:12
(3) Lahla ixhego nokuziphatha kwalo kwakudala~ Bona Kol. 3:9 nakwaGal
(4) Ubalekile kumandla ehlabathi elimnyama likaSathana ~ Jonga kwabaseKolose 1:13 owasihlangulayo egunyeni lobumnyama, wasifudusela ebukumkanini boNyana wakhe oyintanda, neZenzo 28:18;
(5) Ngaphandle kwehlabathi ~ Funda kuYohane 17:14-16
(6) uzimele ~Bona amaRoma 6:6 nesesi-7:24-25
(7) Sithethelele ~Funda amaRoma 4:25

【Ntathu】 Kholwa kuYesu kwaye uthandazele uMoya oyiNgcwele othunywe nguBawo ukuba enze umsebenzi omkhulu wokuhlaziya

Tito 3:5 wasisindisa, kungengamisebenzi esebulungiseni esayenzayo thina, kodwa ngokwenceba yakhe, ngentlambululo yokuzalwa ngokutsha, nangokuhlaziya koMoya oyiNgcwele.

Kolose 3:10 Yambathani umntu omtsha. Umntu omtsha uyahlaziywa ngolwazi abe ngumfanekiselo woMdali wakhe.

(1) Ngokuba umthetho woMoya wobomi , wandikhulula emthethweni wesono nokufa ngokumanywa noKrestu Yesu ~ Khangela kwabaseRoma 8:1-2
(2) Fumana ukwamkelwa njengonyana kaThixo kwaye ambathe uKristu ~Bheka kuGal. 4:4-7, amaRoma 8:16, namaGal
(3) Ukugwetyelwa, ukugwetyelwa, ukungcwaliswa, ukungcwaliswa: “Ugwetyelo” lubhekiselele kwabaseRoma 5:18-19... Ngenxa yesenzo esinye sobulungisa “sikaKrestu” bonke abantu bagwetyelwa “nokugwetyelwa” ngenxa yokungathobeli komntu omnye, bonke abantu baba ngaboni; Ukungathobeli komntu omnye, bonke abantu benziwa aboni Ngonaphakade ogqibeleleyo—bona amaHebhere 10:14
(4) Bonke abazelwe nguThixo akoni; Bhekisela kuYohane 1 isahluko 3 indinyana 9 neye-5 indinyana 18
(5) Ulwaluko lokukhulula inyama nenyama: Ukuba ke uMoya kaThixo uhleli kuni, aningabo abenyama, koko ningabeMoya. Ukuba umntu akanaye uMoya kaKristu, akangokaKristu lowo. -Bona kwabaseRoma 8:9 → Kulowo naluswe ngokungenazandla, ngolwaluko lukaKristu, nihluba isimo esonakeleyo. Kolose 2:11
(6) Obu buncwane butyhilwa ngesitya sodongwe : Obu butyebi sibuphethe ngezitya zodongwe ukubonisa ukuba la mandla makhulu avela kuThixo, angaphumi kuthi. Singqongwe ziintshaba macala onke, kodwa asibambi, kodwa asidaniswa, kodwa asishiywanga phantsi; Sisoloko sikuthwele kunye nathi ukufa kukaYesu ukuze ubomi bukaYesu bubonakale kuthi. 2 Korinte 4:7-10
(7) Ukufa kuyasebenza kuthi, ubomi buyasebenza kuwe : Kuba thina badla ubomi sisoloko sinikelwa ekufeni ngenxa kaYesu, ukuze ubomi bukaYesu bubonakale emizimbeni yethu enokufa. Ngaloo ndlela ke ukufa kusebenza kuthi, kodwa kuni kusebenza ubomi.”— 2 Korinte 4:11-12
(8) Yakhani umzimba kaKristu nikhule nibe ngabantu abakhulu ~Bona kwabase-Efese 4:12-13→ Ngoko ke, asityhafi. Nangona umzimba wangaphandle uya kutshatyalaliswa, kodwa yena wangaphakathi uyahlaziyeka imihla ngemihla. Iintlungu zethu zomzuzwana nezikhaphukhaphu ziya kusisebenzela ubunzima banaphakade bozuko olungenakuthelekiswa nanto. Funda eyesi- 2 kwabaseKorinte 4:16-17

【Ezine】 "AmaKristu" azalwe ngokutsha ngobuxoki

--- Inkolelo yokuziphatha kunye neempawu---

(1) Phantsi komthetho: Ngenxa yokuba amandla esono ngumthetho - bhekisela kweyoku-1 kwabaseKorinte 15:56 → Abo baphantsi komthetho bangamakhoboka esono, ngaphandle kokuba bakhululwe “esonweni”, akukho ndlela yakukusinda “ekufeni”; ubunyana bukaThixo phantsi komthetho Akukho Moya oyiNgcwele nokuzalwa ngokutsha → kodwa wena” Ukuba "sikhokelwa nguMoya oyiNgcwele" , akakho phantsi komthetho. Bhekisela kumaGalati isahluko 5 indinyana 18 nakwisahluko 4 indinyana 4-7
(2) Ngokusekelwe ekuthotyelweni komthetho: Wonke umntu osebenza ngokomthetho, uphantsi kwesiqalekiso; ngokuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Uqalekisiwe wonke umntu ongaqhubekiyo ekwenzeni zonke izinto ezibhaliweyo encwadini yomthetho
(3) KuAdam "umoni": Umvuzo wesono kukufa kuAdam, wonke umntu wafa, ngoko kwakungekho Moya oyiNgcwele nokuzalwa ngokutsha. —Funda eyoku-1 kwabaseKorinte 15:22
(4) Kwinyama "yasemhlabeni" yenyama: INkosi ithi, "Ngenxa yokuba umntu eyinyama, uMoya wam akayi kuhlala kuye ngonaphakade; kodwa imihla yakhe iya kuba yiminyaka elikhulu elinamanci mabini." "kwingxowa endala yewayini" → oko kukuthi, "uMoya oyiNgcwele" akayi kuhlala enyameni ngonaphakade.
(5) Abo bazivumayo, bazihlambulule, bazicime izono zenyama yonke imihla →Aba bantu bawaphule “uMnqophiso Omtsha” →KumaHebhere 10:16-18... Emva koko, bathi: “Andiyi kuphinda ndizikhumbule izono zabo nezikreqo zabo.” Babengaphindi “bakholelwe” ukuba ubuntu babo obudala babethelelwa emnqamlezweni kunye noKristu yaye “umzimba wesono” wawutshatyalalisiwe, kodwa “bawukhumbula” yonke imihla → bavuma, bahlanjwa, bazicima izono zabo. lo mzimba wokufa, ngumzimba wesono onokufa. Yaphula nje iTestamente eNtsha
(6) Mbethelele emnqamlezweni uNyana kaThixo kwakhona →Xa beqonda indlela yokwenyaniso kwaye "bakholelwa iindaba ezilungileyo", kufuneka bashiye imfundiso kaKristu abazimisele ukushiya "isiqalo" kwaye babuyele emthethweni kwaye bazimisele ukuba ngamakhoboka esono zilukuhlwa kwaye zibanjiswe nguSathana "ngesono" kwaye azikwazi ukuphuma →Iihagu ziyahlanjwa zize zibuyele ekuqengqelekeni eludakeni. 2 Petros 2:22
(6) Phatha “igazi elinqabileyo” likaKristu njengesiqhelo : Vuma kwaye uguquke yonke imihla, ucime izono, uhlambe izono, kwaye udlulise ezeNkosi " igazi elinqabileyo “Njengesiqhelo, alilunganga njengegazi lenkomo neegusha.
(7) Ukuhlekisa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele wobabalo: Ngenxa ‘kaKristu,’ idini lakhe elinye lenza abo bangcwaliswayo bafezeke ngonaphakade. Hebhere 10:14→ Ngenxa “yokungakholwa” kwabo abantamo zilukhuni. → Kuba xa sithi sone ngabom, emveni kokuba samkele ukwazi inyaniso, akusekho dini ngenxa yezono; sesiwulinda ngokoyikekayo umgwebo nomlilo odlayo, odla zonke iintshaba zethu. Ukuba uthe umntu owaphule umthetho kaMoses, engenzelwanga inceba, aze afe ngenxa yamangqina amabini okanye amathathu, wobeka phi na ke yena ukunyathela uNyana kaThixo, alenze njengenqambi igazi lomnqophiso owamngcwalisayo, edela igazi lomnqophiso. UMoya oyiNgcwele wobabalo? Hebhere 10:26-29

Phawula: Mawethu! Ukuba uneenkolelo eziphosakeleyo ezingentla, nceda uvuke ngokukhawuleza kwaye uyeke ukukhohliswa ngamaqhinga kaSathana kunye nokusebenzisa "isono" ukukufaka entolongweni. isono , andinakuphuma. Kufuneka ufunde kubo U-Liao ongalunganga Phuma elukholweni lwakho → ngena "kwiBandla likaYesu Krestu" kwaye umamele ivangeli eyinyani → yiCawe kaYesu Krestu ekuvumela ukuba usindiswe, uzukiswe, kwaye umzimba wakho ukhululwe → inyaniso! Amen

KULUNGILE! Namhlanje ndingathanda ukwabelana nani ubudlelane bam nani nonke. Ngamana ubabalo lweNkosi uYesu Kristu, uthando lukaThixo, nempefumlelo yoMoya oyiNgcwele ingahlala ihleli nani nonke! Amen
