Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zomoya → Qonda ukuba "uMoya oyiNgcwele" akaphumli kubantu bendalo .

Le mithandazo ingasentla, umbulelo, kunye neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

( 1 ) UMoya kaThixo awuyi kuhlala nabantu bemvelo ngonaphakade


buza: Ngaba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhlala nomntu wenyama "yasemhlabeni" ngonaphakade?
impendulo: Ukuba umntu uyinyama, utsho uYehova, uMoya wam akayi kuhlala kuye ngonaphakade;

Phawula: Ukhokho “uAdam” wadalwa ngothuli—uYehova uThixo wadala umntu ngothuli lwasemhlabeni waza waphefumlela ubomi emathatheni akhe, waba ngumntu ophilayo nowomoya owabizwa ngokuba nguAdam. IGenesis Isahluko 2 Indinyana 7 → “Umntu ophilileyo onomoya” → UAdam “ngumntu ophilayo wenyama negazi” → Kuyafana ke kubhalwe eBhayibhileni: “UAdam, umntu wokuqala, waba ngumoya (umoya: okanye uguqulelwe ngokuthi) inyama negazi) “umntu odla ubomi” uAdam wokugqibela waba ngumoya odlisa ubomi. 1 Korinte 15:45

“Ukuba umntu uyinyama, uMoya wam awuyi kuhlala kuye ngonaphakade,” utsho uYehova

1 Kanye njengo "Kumkani uSawule" kwiTestamente eNdala, umprofeti uSamuweli wamthambisa ngeoli, kwaye wayenoMoya kaThixo! UKumkani uSawule wenyama akazange awuthobele umyalelo kaThixo→uMoya weNkosi” hamba “USawule, umoya ombi ophuma kuYehova, weza kumkhwankqisa.”— 1 Samuweli 16:14 .

2 Kukwakho no “Kumkani uDavide” owayesoyika kakhulu ukuba uThixo angawususa uMoya oyiNgcwele ngenxa yezikreqo zenyama yakhe wazibonela ngawakhe amehlo ukuba uMoya kaThixo wawumkile uKumkani uSawule wathandaza kuThixo kwiNdumiso wathi → Musa ukundilahla ebusweni bakho; INdumiso 51:11

Ngoko kwiTestamente eNdala sibona “abaprofeti nabo bamoyikayo uThixo” UMoya kaThixo uyabaphembelela, kodwa awuyi kuhlala kubo ngonaphakade, kuba abantu benyama “basemhlabeni” baneminqweno yokuzingca, yaye inyama ekhanuka ngokuthe ngcembe iya kuba yingenelo kancinane. sibe mbi , “uMoya kaThixo” awunakuhlala kumzimba owonakalayo. Abantu benyama “yomhlaba” abanakumthwala uMoya oyiNgcwele, njengokuba iwayini entsha ayinakufakwa ezintsubeni ezindala. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

( 2 ) Ayinakuthiwa iwayini entsha ezintsubeni ezindala;

Masifunde uMateyu 9:17: Akukho bani utha iwayini entsha kwiintsuba zewayini ezindala; Kuphela kungokufaka iwayini entsha kwiintsuba ezintsha eziya kugcinwa zizo zombini. "

buza: Ingaba isikweko "sewayini entsha" sibhekisa kwintoni apha?
impendulo: " iwayini entsha "indlela" UMoya kaThixo, uMoya kaKristu, uMoya oyiNgcwele "Ilungile lo nto!

buza: Yintoni isafobe "yengxowa yewayini endala"?
impendulo: "Iintsuba zewayini ezindala" zibhekisa kwindoda endala kuAdam - umntu ophilayo ozelwe kubazali → "umhlaba" wenyama Uthengiswe esonweni, "umoni kunye nomzimba wesono". Ngokuthe ngcembe uwohloka kwaye ekugqibeleni ubuyela eluthulini→ watsho uYesu! Iintsuba zewayini ezindala “azinakuba” iwayini entsha, oko kukuthi, “indoda endala” ayinakuwubamba “uMoya oyiNgcwele”, kuba umntu omdala wonakala kwaye uyavuza, akanako ukumgcina uMoya oyiNgcwele. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

buza: Isikweko esithi "intsuba entsha" sibhekisa kwintoni?
impendulo: Isikweko esithi “iintsuba zewayini ezitsha” sibhekisela kumzimba kaKristu, umzimba weLizwi owenziwe umntu, umzimba womoya osenyameni, umzimba ongenakonakala, nomzimba ongabotshwanga kukufa→” ibhegi entsha yesikhumba "Ewe Ebhekisa kumzimba kaKristu , “iwayini entsha” ipakishwa “kwiintsuba ezintsha zewayini,” oko kukuthi, “uMoya Oyingcwele” “upakishwe” oko kukuthi, uhlala “kumzimba kaKristu” → Yiloo nto esiyithethayo xa sisitya iSidlo seNkosi Sangokuhlwa: umzimba wam "izonka ezingenagwele" ", thina yitya Yiyo leyo fumana Umzimba kaKristu, lo "yincindi yomdiliya" kwindebe yegazi lam, yisele kwaye uya kuba nobomi bukaKristu! Amen.

Umntu wethu omtsha owenziwe ngokutsha ngumzimba nobomi bukaKristu UMoya oyiNgcwele uhlala kuKristu kwaye singamalungu aKhe. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

( 3 ) Ukuba uMoya kaThixo uhleli kuthi, asingabo abenyama

KwabaseRoma 8:9-10 Ukuba ke uMoya kaThixo uhleli kuni, anisengabo abenyama, nisengaboMoya. Ukuba umntu akanaye uMoya kaKristu, akangokaKristu lowo. Roma 8:9 .

Phawula: UMoya kaThixo, uMoya kaYesu, uMoya oyiNgcwele → Ukuba luhlala kuwe, "ubuntu obutsha" bakho abuyi kuba benyama kodwa boMoya oyiNgcwele. Inyama ayingokaMoya oyiNgcwele. Ukuba ungowenyama, awunaye uMoya oyiNgcwele kaKristu, akangokaKristu, → Ukuba ningabenyama “yomhlaba” Umntu wenyama, umfo wenyama, ixhego lika-Adam, umoni ophantsi komthetho, ikhoboka lesono. aningobakaKristu, anizalwanga ngokutsha, ningenaye uMoya oyiNgcwele. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

Molo bahlobo! Enkosi ngoMoya kaYesu → Ucofa eli nqaku ukuze ufunde kwaye umamele intshumayelo yevangeli Ukuba uzimisele ukwamkela kwaye "ukholelwe" kuYesu Kristu njengoMsindisi kunye nothando lwakhe olukhulu, ngaba sinokuthandaza kunye?

Othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhleli enathi! Amen. Enkosi Bawo waseZulwini ngokuthumela uNyana wakho okuphela kwamzeleyo, uYesu, ukuba afe emnqamlezweni “ngenxa yezono zethu” → 1 Sikhulule esonweni; 2 Sikhulule kuwo umthetho nakwisiqalekiso sawo. 3 Ndikhululekile kumandla kaSathana nasebumnyameni beHadesi. Amen! Wangcwatywa → 4 Ukukhulula umntu omdala kunye nezenzo zakhe wavuswa ngosuku lwesithathu → 5 Sithethelele! Yamkela uMoya oyiNgcwele othenjisiweyo njengetywina, uzalwe ngokutsha, uvuswe, usindiswe, ufumane ubuntwana bukaThixo, ufumane ubomi obungunaphakade! Kwixesha elizayo, siya kufumana ilifa likaBawo wethu waseZulwini. Thandaza egameni leNkosi uYesu Krestu! Amen

KULUNGILE! Namhlanje ndingathanda ukwabelana nani ubudlelane bam nani nonke. Ngamana ubabalo lweNkosi uYesu Kristu, uthando lukaThixo, nempefumlelo yoMoya oyiNgcwele ingahlala ihleli nani nonke! Amen

2021.03.05

articles.title: Ingcaciso yale ngxaki: Nabani na ozelwe nguThixo akanakuze one
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubazalwana noodade bam abathandekayo kwintsapho kaThixo! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibhile kweyoku-1 kaYohane isahluko 3 indinyana 9 size sifunde kunye: Bonke abazelwe nguThixo aboni, ngokuba ilizwi likaThixo lihleli kuye;

Namhlanje sizakufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane ngeengcaciso zemibuzo enzima kunye “Nabani na ozelwe nguThixo soze one” Thandaza: U-Abha othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! “Umfazi onesidima” wathuma abasebenzi ngelizwi lenyaniso, elibhaliweyo lathethwa ngezandla zakhe, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwenu. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zomoya → Siyazi ukuba bonke abazelwe nguThixo; , 1 abayi kona , 2 Akukho lwaphulo-mthetho , 3 Awukwazi ukwenza ulwaphulo-mthetho → Ngokuba wazalwa nguThixo → isaphuli-mthetho Andizange ndimbone kwaye abalwazi usindiso lukaYesu Kristu . Amen!

Le mithandazo ingasentla, umbulelo, kunye neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen.

( 1 ) Bonke abazelwe nguThixo abasayi kuze bone;

Masifunde eyoku-1 kaYohane 3:9 kwaye siyifunde kunye: Bonke abazelwe nguThixo aboni, ngokuba ilizwi likaThixo lihleli kuye; Xa sityhila kwiSahluko 5, indinyana 18 , siyazi ukuba bonke abazelwe nguThixo abasayi kuze bone; angabi nako ukumenzakalisa .

[Phawula]: Ngokuphonononga ezi zibhalo zingasentla, sibhala → Nabani na ozelwe nguThixo 1 Soze wone; 2 akukho lwaphulo-mthetho, 3 Awunako ukona → Ikhulu leepesenti, ngokupheleleyo, kwaye ngokuqinisekileyo awusayi kona → Le yekaThixo 【 inyaniso 】 Hayi "umntu" umgaqo . →Yintoni isono? Nabani na owaphula umthetho sisono - bhekisa kuYohane 1 Isahluko 3 Indinyana 4 → Nabani na ozelwe nguThixo akayi kuphula umthetho, kwaye ukuba akawuthobeli umthetho → "akayi kukona". Amen? Ngale ndlela, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

Iicawa ezininzi namhlanje zinjalo ukutolika ngendlela engeyiyo Ezi ndinyana zimbini ziye zalahlekisa abazalwana noodade. NjengeNguqulelo eNtsha kunye nezinye iinguqulelo → kuyaqondwa ukuba amakholwa akayi kona "ngesiqhelo okanye ngokuqhubekayo". Yiqonde nje "inyaniso" kaThixo epheleleyo njengenyaniso elinganiselweyo. Ngenxa yokuba [inyaniso] ayihambelani “nomntu” → ukucinga okunengqiqo, batshintsha “inyaniso epheleleyo” kaThixo ibe “inyaniso ezalanayo” yomntu → kanye “njengenyoka” “ehenda” uEva ukuba atye “okungatyiwayo” kuMyezo Eden Isiqhamo somthi wokulungileyo nokubi siyafana "isizalwane" esinye → "Uyatya Ukuba uyafa, akunakufa." Uyabona, “inyoka” ikwahenda abantu ngolu hlobo, iguqula “inyaniso” kaThixo eseBhayibhileni ibe “yimfundiso yabantu” ukuze ikufundise nokukulukuhla ukuba umke endleleni yokwenyaniso yeendaba ezilungileyo. Uyaqonda?

( 2 ) Kutheni ukuba umntu ozelwe nguThixo angoni?

Nantsi impendulo eneenkcukacha:

1 UYesu wafa emnqamlezweni ngenxa yezono zethu → ukuze asikhulule ezonweni zethu - bhekisa kumaRoma 6:6-7
2 Ukhululwe kumthetho nakwisiqalekiso sawo→Bona amaRoma 7:6 namaGalati 3:13
3 kungekho phantsi komthetho, nalapho kungekho mthetho, akukho sigqitho → Bona amaRoma 6:14 namaRoma 4:15
wangcwatywa
4 Yahlani indoda endala nehambo yayo →Bona amaKolose 3:9 namaEfese 4:22
5 “Umntu omtsha” ozelwe nguThixo akangomntu omdala → bhekisela kumaRoma 8:9-10 . Phawula: “Umntu omtsha” ozelwe nguThixo ufihlwe kuThixo kunye noKristu yaye “asingowakhe” umntu omdala owonayo ngoAdam. ngokwenkcukacha kushicilelo olungaphambili asingomntu omdala.
6 UThixo ubudlulisele ubomi bethu kubukumkani boNyana wakhe oyintanda → Bona amaKolose 1:13 → Abangabo abehlabathi, njengokuba nam ndingenguye owehlabathi—Bona uYohane 17:16 .
Phawula: “Ubomi bethu obutsha” sele busebukumkanini boNyana wakhe oyintanda, yaye abuyonxalenye yemithetho yemithetho yenyama, yaye abuphuli mthetho. Uyaqonda?
7 Sele sikuKristu → Ngoku akukho kugwetywa kwabakuKristu Yesu. Kuba umthetho woMoya wobomi, ndakuba kuKristu Yesu, wandikhulula emthethweni wesono nokufa - Bona amaRoma 8:1-2 → Ngubani na oya kubamangalela abanyulwa bakaThixo, inguThixo nje obagwebelayo? Ngaba uThixo uye wabagwebela (okanye nguThixo obagwebelayo) - Roma 8:33

[Phawula]: Sirekhoda kwezi ngongoma zisi-7 zingentla apha wonke umntu ozelwe nguThixo→ 1 Soze wone; 2 akukho lwaphulo-mthetho, 3 Ke akanakona, ngokuba ilizwi likaThixo lihleli kuye; kanjalo akanakona, ngokuba ezelwe nguThixo. Amen! Enkosi Nkosi! Haleluya! Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

( 3 ) Bonke abonayo abazange bambone okanye abamazi uYesu

Ngaba uyalazi “igama likaYesu”? →"Igama likaYesu" lithetha ukusindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo! Amen.

→ “Wenjenje uThixo ukulithanda kwakhe ihlabathi, ude wancama uNyana wakhe okuphela kwamzeleyo, ukuze bonke abakholwayo kuye bangatshabalali, koko babe nobomi obungunaphakade. Lowo ukholwayo kuye, lowo ungakholwayo, uselegwetyiwe, ngokuba engakholwanga kwigana loNyana okuphela kwamzeleyo : Ukufa kukaYesu emnqamlezweni kukukhulule esonweni → Uyakholwa? Ukuba awukholwa, uya kugwetywa ngokwesono sokungakholwa kwakho. Uyaqonda?

Kungoko kuthiwa apha ngezantsi → Bonke abahleli kuye aboni; Bantwanana bam, musani ukuhendwa. Lowo ubenzayo ubulungisa lilungisa, kanye njengokuba uYehova elilungisa. Lowo wonayo ungokaMtyholi; ngokuba uMtyholi wone kwasekuqalekeni. UNyana kaThixo wabonakalaliswa ukuba ayichithe imisebenzi kaMtyholi. Bonke abazelwe nguThixo aboni, ngokuba ilizwi likaThixo lihleli kuye; Kulapho kutyhilwa khona ukuba ngoobani na abangabantwana bakaThixo nabangabantwana bakaMtyholi. Nabani na ongawenziyo ubulungisa akangokaThixo, nalowo ungamthandiyo umzalwana wakhe. Jonga kuYohane 1 Isahluko 3 Ivesi 6-10 noYohane Isahluko 3 Ivesi 16-18.

KULUNGILE! Namhlanje ndingathanda ukwabelana nani ubudlelane bam nani nonke. Ngamana ubabalo lweNkosi uYesu Kristu, uthando lukaThixo, nempefumlelo yoMoya oyiNgcwele ingahlala ihleli nani nonke! Amen

2021.03.06

articles.title: UMoya oyiNgcwele ungqina ngeentliziyo zethu ukuba singabantwana bakaThixo
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo, bahlobo abathandekayo, bazalwana noodade! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibhile yethu kumaRoma isahluko 8 iindinyana 16-17 size sizifunde kunye: UMoya oyiNgcwele ungqinelana nomoya wethu ukuba singabantwana bakaThixo. Ukuba ke singabantwana, sikwaziindlalifa, iindlalifa zikaThixo, iindlalifa ke kunye noKrestu. Ukuba siva ubunzima kunye naye, sozukiswa nokuzukiswa kunye naye.

Namhlanje sizakufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane kunye "UMoya oyiNgcwele ungqinelana nomoya wethu ukuba singabantwana bakaThixo." Thandaza: U-Abha othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! " umfazi onesidima "Thumelani abasebenzi ngelizwi lenyaniso, elibhaliweyo lathethwa ezandleni zabo, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwakho. Isonka sivela kude ezulwini, kwaye sinikezelwa kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo, ukuze ubomi bethu bomoya bube nentabalala! Amen . UMoya oyiNgcwele ungqinelana nomoya wethu ukuba singabantwana bakaThixo. Amen!

Le mithandazo ingasentla, umbulelo, kunye neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

UMoya oyiNgcwele ungqina ngeentliziyo zethu ukuba singabantwana bakaThixo

( 1 ) Liveni ilizwi lenyaniso

Masifunde iBhayibhile kwaye sifunde kwabase-Efese 1:13-14 kunye: Emva kokuba nivile ilizwi lenyaniso, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwenu, kwaye nikholiwe kuKristu, nafumana nesithembiso soMoya oyiNgcwele. Lo Moya oyiNgcwele usisibambiso (isicatshulwa sokuqala: ilifa) selifa lethu bade abantu bakaThixo (isicatshulwa sokuqala: ilifa) bakhululwe ukuze kudunyiswe uzuko lwakhe.

Phawula]: Ndiye ndabhala ngokuhlolisisa ezi zibhalo zingasentla → Ekubeni niliva ilizwi lenyaniso → Ekuqaleni ube ekho uLizwi, waye uLizwi ekuye uThixo, waye uLizwi enguThixo. Lo Lizwi wayekunye noThixo kwasekuqalekeni. ..."ULizwi waba yinyama" kuthetha ukuba "uThixo" waba yinyama → wazalwa yintombi enyulu uMariya → wabizwa ngokuba [nguYesu] waza wahlala phakathi kwethu, ezele lubabalo nayinyaniso. Sabubukela ubungangamsha bakhe awabunikwa nguYise, njengoko ekukuphela koNyana wakhe; … Akukho namnye wakha wambona uThixo; uNyana okuphela kwamzeleyo, lowo usesifubeni sikaYise, nguye omtyhile. Imbekiselo--Yohane 1 Isahluko 1-2, 14, 18. → Ngokuphathelele ilizwi lantlandlolo lobomi ukususela ekuqaleni, esilivileyo, sabona, sazibona ngamehlo ethu, saza sachukumisa ngezandla zethu → "iNkosi uYesu Kristu" ibhekisela kweyoku-1 kaYohane 1: Isahluko 1. →

【 UYesu ungumfanekiso wokwenene wobuntu bukaThixo 】

UThixo, lowo wayethetha nookhokho bethu kudala ngabo abaprofeti izihlandlo ezininzi, nangeendlela ezininzi, uthethe nathi kule mihla yokugqibela ngoNyana, ammise njengendlalifa yezinto zonke, awadala ngaye izulu lonke. Ulibengezelo lobuqaqawuli bukaThixo → "umfanekiselo kanye wobume bukaThixo", yaye uthwala zonke izinto ngomyalelo wamandla akhe. Akuba ebahlambulule abantu ezonweni, wahlala phantsi ngasekunene kobuKhulu emazulwini. Ekubeni igama abizwa ngalo lizuke ngaphezu kwamagama ezithunywa zezulu, uzigqwesa lee. Imbekiselo — Hebhere 1:1-4 .

【 UYesu uyindlela, inyaniso, nobomi 】

Wathi uTomas kuye, Nkosi, asazi apho uya khona; singathini na ke ukuyazi indlela? Wathi uYesu kuye, Ndim indlela, ndim inyaniso, ndim ubomi; Bawo ngaphandle kwam

( 2 ) iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwakho

EyokuQala kwabaseKorinte ivesi 153-4 “Iivangeli” endazishumayezayo nam, eyokuqala, yokuba uKristu wazifela izono zethu, wangcwatywa ngokwezibhalo; Phawula: UYesu Kristu wafela izono zethu → 1 wakhululwa esonweni, 2 wakhululwa emthethweni nakwisiqalekiso somthetho, waza wangcwatywa → 3 wamkhulula umntu omdala nezenzo zawo → wavuka kwakhona ngomhla wesithathu → 4 Sigwetyelwe kwaye sifumana ukwamkelwa njengoonyana bakaThixo! Amen. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

( 3 ) Yamkela uMoya oyiNgcwele othenjisiweyo njengetywina

Xa nalivayo ilizwi lenyaniso, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwakho, kwaye wakholwa kuKristu, natywinwa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele wesithembiso. Lo Moya oyiNgcwele usisibambiso (isicatshulwa sokuqala: ilifa) selifa lethu bade abantu bakaThixo (isicatshulwa sokuqala: ilifa) bakhululwe ukuze kudunyiswe uzuko lwakhe. Imbekiselo — Efese 1:13-14 .

( 4 ) UMoya oyiNgcwele ungqina ngeentliziyo zethu ukuba singabantwana bakaThixo

Kuba anamkelanga moya wobukhoboka, ukuba nihlale nisoyika, ukuba nimamkele; iindlalifa, iindlalifa zikaThixo, iindlalifa ke kunye noKristu. Ukuba siva ubunzima kunye naye, sozukiswa nokuzukiswa kunye naye. — Roma 8:15-17

KULUNGILE! Namhlanje ndithanda ukwabelana nani nonke ngobudlelwane bam. Amen

2021.03.07

articles.title: Ingcaciso yobunzima: Umntu omtsha ozelwe ngokutsha asingowendoda endala
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo lusapho lwam, mawethu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile yethu kumaRoma isahluko 8 kunye nendinyana 9 size sifunde kunye: Ukuba ke uMoya kaThixo uhleli kuni, aningabo abenyama, koko ningabeMoya. Ukuba umntu akanaye uMoya kaKristu, akangokaKristu lowo.

Namhlanje sizakufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane kunye→Sichaza iingxaki ezinzima "Umntu ozelwe ngokutsha asingowendoda endala" Thandaza: U-Abha othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! “Umfazi onesidima” wathuma abasebenzi ngezandla zabo, ababhaliweyo nabavakaliswayo ngelizwi lenyaniso, eliziindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwenu. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke ikhanyisela amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze siyive kwaye siyibone inyaniso yasemoyeni → siqonde ukuba “umntu omtsha” ozelwe nguThixo akangowomntu “omdala” ka-Adam. Amen.

Le mithandazo ingasentla, umbulelo, kunye neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen.

“Umntu omtsha” ozelwe nguThixo akangomntu omdala ka-Adam

Masifunde iBhayibhile kwabaseRoma 8:9 Ukuba ke uMoya kaThixo uhleli kuni, anisengabo abenyama, koko ningaboMoya. Ukuba umntu akanaye uMoya kaKristu, akangokaKristu lowo.

[Phawula]: UMoya kaThixo unguMoya kaThixo uYise → Umoya Oyingcwele, Umoya kaKristu → Umoya Oyingcwele, Umoya woNyana kaThixo → noMoya Oyingcwele, bonke bangumoya omnye → "UMoya Oyingcwele"! Amen. Ngoko, uyayiqonda? → Ukuba uMoya kaThixo uhleli kuwe → "uzalwa ngokutsha", kwaye "wena" ubhekisela "kumntu omtsha" ozelwe nguThixo → kungekhona ngenyama → oko kukuthi, "kungekhona kwinyama ka-Adam → kodwa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele. Amen! Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?
Ukwahlulwa kwabantu abatsha kwabadala:

( 1 ) yahlulwa ekuzalweni ngokutsha

Abatsha: 1 Abazelwe ngamanzi noMoya, 2 Abazelwe ngeendaba ezilungileyo, inyaniso ekuKristu Yesu, 3 Abazelwe nguThixo → bangabantwana bakaThixo! Amen. Jonga kuYohane 3:5, 1 kwabaseKorinte 4:15, nakuYakobi 1:18.
Indoda endala: 1 Bedalwe ngothuli, abantwana baka-Adam noEva, 2 abazelwe yinyama yooyise, 3 bemvelo, benesono, basemhlabeni, kwaye ekugqibeleni baya kubuyela eluthulini → bangabantwana bomntu. Bona iGenesis 2:7 neyoku- 1 kwabaseKorinte 15:45

( 2 ) ngokwahlukileyo ngokomoya

Abatsha: Abo bangoMoya oyiNgcwele, kaYesu, Krestu, kaYise, kaThixo → bambathiswe umzimba nobomi bukaKristu → bangcwele, abanasono, abanasono, abanasiphako, abadyobhekanga, abanakonakala, abanakona. ukubola, ukugula, ukungabi nakufa. Bubomi obungunaphakade! Amen - bhekisa kuYohane 11:26
Indoda endala: Emhlabeni, ka-Adam, ezelwe yinyama yabazali, ngokwendalo → enesono, ethengiswe esonweni, engcolileyo neyinqambi, enokonakala, enokonakala ngenkanuko, enokufa, yaye ekugqibeleni iya kubuyela eluthulini. Bona iGenesis 3:19

( 3 ) Yahlula phakathi "okubonwayo" kunye "nokungabonwayo"

Abatsha: "Umntu omtsha" kunye noKristu Tibetan KuThixo → Bona kwabaseKolose 3:3 kuba nafa, baye ubomi benu bufihlwe noKristu kuye uThixo. →Ngoku iNkosi uYesu evusiweyo sele isezulwini, ihleli ngasekunene kukaThixo uYise, kwaye “umntu wethu omtsha owenziwe ngokutsha” ufihlwe apho, ngasekunene kukaThixo uYise! Amen! Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo? →Bona kwabase-Efese 2:6 ukuba wasivusa, wasihlalisa ndawonye kwezasezulwini iindawo, noKristu Yesu. →Xa athe wabonakalaliswa uKristu, obubomi bethu, nani niya kubonakala, ninaye ebuqaqawulini. Bhekisela kwabaseKolose isahluko 3 indinyana 4 .

Phawula: uKristu nguye" phila "Entliziyweni" yakho, Hayi ukuphila “Enyameni yendoda endala ka-Adam, “umntu omtsha” ozelwe nguThixo umzimba womphefumlo → Zonke zifihliwe, zifihlwe noKristu kuThixo → Ngaloo mini xa uYesu Kristu efika kwakhona, uya kuzalwa nguThixo. umtsha " umzimba womphefumlo Intando vela Phuma kwaye ube noKristu ebuqaqawulini. Amen! Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

Indoda endala: “Umntu omdala” ngumzimba onesono owaphuma kuAdam, yaye abanye banokuzibona ungumzimba womphefumlo wenyama ophuma kuAdam. Zonke iingcinga, izikreqo kunye neminqweno emibi yenyama iyakubonakaliswa ngalo mzimba wokufa. Kodwa “umphefumlo nomzimba” wale ndoda endala wawusemnqamlezweni noKristu ilahlekile . Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Ngoko "umzimba womphefumlo" wale ndoda endala ayingowakhe →Umzimba "omtsha" womphefumlo ozelwe nguThixo! → ozelwe nguThixo →" umoya "NguMoya oyiNgcwele," umphefumlo "Ngumphefumlo kaKristu," umzimba “Ngumzimba kaKristu lowo; xa sukuba sisidla isidlo seNkosi, sidla, sisela, okweNkosi; umzimba kunye negazi "! Sinayo umzimba kaKristu kwaye umphefumlo wobomi . Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

Iicawa ezininzi namhlanje imfundiso Impazamo ilele koku → Ukungathelekisi umzimba womphefumlo ka-Adam nomzimba womphefumlo kaKristu hlukana , imfundiso yabo →"ukusindisa"→umphefumlo ka-Adam→ukukhulisa umzimba wenyama kwaye ube ngumTao; →“umzimba womphefumlo” kaKristu walahlwa kude .

Makhe sibone → into eyathethwa yiNkosi uYesu: "Nabani na olahlekelwa bubomi bakhe (ubomi okanye umphefumlo) ngenxa yam kunye neendaba ezilungileyo → uya kulahlekelwa "ngumphefumlo" ka-Adam → kwaye "uya kusindisa" ubomi bakhe → → "ukusindisa umphefumlo wakhe"; "yemvelo" - bhekisa kweyoku-1 kwabaseKorinte 15:45 → Ngoko ke, umele amanyaniswe noKristu aze abethelelwe ukuze atshabalalise umzimba wesono aze aphulukane nobomi bakhe → Uvuko kunye nokuzalwa ngokutsha kunye noKristu! Ifunyenwe ngu → "umphefumlo" kaKristu → yi le →" Usindise umphefumlo " ! Amen. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo? Bona uMarko 8:34-35 .

Mawethu! Emyezweni wase-Eden uThixo wadala “umoya” ka-Adam njengomoya wendalo. Ngoku uThixo ukukhokelela kuyo yonke inyaniso ngokuthumela abasebenzi → Qonda ukuba ukuba "ulahlekelwa" umphefumlo ka-Adam → uya kuzuza umphefumlo "kaKristu", oko kukuthi, gcina umphefumlo wakho! Uzenzela olwakho ukhetho → Ngaba uyawufuna umphefumlo ka-Adam? Kuthekani ngomphefumlo kaKristu? Kanye nje → 1 Umthi wokulungileyo nokubi, “umthi ombi” wahlulwa kuwo umthi wobomi, “umthi olungileyo”; 2 UMnqophiso oMdala kunye noMnqophiso oMtsha zahlukene", kanye njengezivumelwano ezimbini"; 3 Umnqophiso womthetho wahlukile kumnqophiso wobabalo;4 Iibhokhwe zahluka ezigusha; 5 Elomhlaba lahluliwe kwelasezulwini; 6 UAdam wahluliwe kuAdam wokugqibela; 7 Indoda endala yahlulwe kumntu omtsha → [Indoda endala] Umzimba ongaphandle ngokuthe ngcembe uwohloka ngenxa yeminqweno yokuzingca yaye ubuyela eluthulini; [Umtsha] Ngokuhlaziywa koMoya Oyingcwele, sikhula sibe ngabantu abadala imihla ngemihla, sizele yinqanaba lokuzala kukaKristu, sizakha kunye noKristu eluthandweni. Amen! Funda kwabase-Efese 4:13-16

Ngoko ke, “umntu omtsha” ozelwe nguThixo → umele aqhawule, ahlube, amshiye “umntu omdala” ka-Adam, kuba “umntu omdala” asingowomntu “omtsha” → izono zika-Adam. inyama yomntu omdala ayisayi kubalelwa ‘kumntu omtsha’ → Imbekiselo 2 kwabaseKorinte 5:19 → Emva kokumisela umnqophiso omtsha, ithi: “Ndingabi sazikhumbula izono zabo, nokunxaxha kwabo. "Khangela kumaHebhere 10:17 → Umele uwugcine "uMnqophiso Omtsha" "Umntu omtsha" uhlala kuKristu → ungcwele, akanasono, akanakona .

Ngale ndlela, "umntu omtsha" ozelwe nguThixo kwaye uphila ngoMoya oyiNgcwele kufuneka enze ngoMoya oyiNgcwele → abulale zonke izenzo ezimbi zomzimba womntu omdala. Ngale ndlela, “awusayi kuphinda” uzivume izono zakho yonke imihla ngenxa yezono zenyama yomntu omdala, uthandazele igazi elixabisekileyo likaYesu ukuba lihlambulule lizicime izono zakho. Emva kokuthetha okuninzi, ndiyazibuza ukuba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo? Ngamana uMoya weNkosi uYesu angakukhuthaza → uvule iingqondo zakho ukuze uqonde iBhayibhile, Qonda ukuba “umntu omtsha” ozelwe nguThixo akangowomntu omdala. . Amen

KULUNGILE! Namhlanje ndingathanda ukwabelana nani ubudlelane bam nani nonke. Ngamana ubabalo lweNkosi uYesu Kristu, uthando lukaThixo, nempefumlelo yoMoya oyiNgcwele ingahlala ihleli nani nonke! Amen

2021.03.08

articles.title: Ukuzalwa ngokutsha (uMfundiso 3)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo, bahlobo abathandekayo, bazalwana noodade! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibhile kuYohane isahluko 1 iindinyana 12-13 size sifunde kunye: Ke bonke abamamkelayo wabanika igunya lokuba babe ngabantwana bakaThixo, abo ke bakholwayo kwigama lakhe. Aba ngabo abangazalwanga ngagazi, kungengankanuko, nangakuthanda kwandoda; bazelwe nguThixo.

Namhlanje sizakufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane kunye "Ukuzalwa kwakhona" Hayi. 3 Thetha kwaye wenze umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, Nkosi yethu uYesu Krestu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Umfazi olungileyo" ecaweni "Sithuma abasebenzi ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo, elithethiweyo ezandleni zabo, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwakho. Isonka siziswa sivela kude ezulwini, sinikezelwa kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo, ukuze ubomi bethu bomoya bube buninzi. Amen! Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumlo yethu kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zokomoya → 1 wazalwa ngamanzi nanguMoya, 2 wazalwa ngeendaba ezilungileyo eziyinyaniso, 3 Abo bazelwe nguThixo →bonke baphuma kumnye, kwaye bonke bangabantwana bakaThixo ! Amen.

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen.

1. Uzelwe nguThixo

Umbuzo: Kuyintoni ukuzalwa kwegazi, ukuzalwa kwenkanuko, kunye nokuzalwa kwentando yomntu?
Impendulo: Umntu wokuqala, uAdam, waba ngumntu ophilayo onomoya (“umoya” okanye “inyama”) - 1 Korinte 15:45 .

UYehova uThixo wambumba umntu ngothuli lwasemhlabeni, waphefumlela emathatheni akhe impefumlo yobomi, waba ngumphefumlo ophilileyo; igama lakhe ke nguAdam. Genesis 2:7

[Phawula:] UAdam, owadalwa ngothuli, waba ngumntu ophilayo onomoya, “oko kukuthi, umntu ophilayo wenyama negazi → unomzimba wenyama negazi, unobubi iminqweno kunye neminqweno, kwaye uThixo ubiza uAdam "umntu" ngoko ke, bonke abantu abavela kuAdam Yonke into ephuma kwiingcambu → izalwa ngegazi, inkanuko, kunye nentando yabantu! Ngaba uyayiqonda le nto?

Umbuzo: Yintoni ezelwe nguThixo?
Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

Ekuqalekeni ube ekho uLizwi, waye uLizwi ekuye uThixo, waye uLizwi enguThixo - Yohane 1:1
“ULizwi” waba yinyama → oko kukuthi, “uThixo” waba yinyama, yaye “uThixo” ungumoya → oko kukuthi, “uMoya” waba yinyama waza wakhawulwa yintombi enyulu ngoMoya Oyingcwele waza wazalwa, wabizwa ngokuba nguYesu. Jonga kuMateyu 1:21, Yohane 1:14, 4:24

UYesu wazalwa nguBawo waseZulwini → Kuzo zonke iingelosi, yiyiphi awakha wathi kuyo uThixo: UnguNyana wam, ndikuzele mna namhla? Wathi nguwuphi na kubo, Mna ndiya kuba nguYise, yena abe ngunyana wam? Hebhere 1:5

Umbuzo: Simamkela njani uYesu?
Impendulo: Siyakholwa ukuba uYesu unguNyana kaThixo, ukuba siwudla umzimba wakhe, sisele negazi leNkosi, siya kuba nabo “ubomi bukaYesu Kristu” ngaphakathi kwethu! Imbekiselo kuYohane 6:53-56

UYise uYehova nguThixo, uNyana uYesu unguThixo, noMoya oyiNgcwele uMthuthuzeli ukwanguThixo! Xa simamkela uYesu, siyamamkela uThixo. Ukwamkela uMoya oyiNgcwele othenjisiweyo kukuba noYesu Ukuba unoNyana "uYesu", unoYise. Amen! Imbekiselo kweyoku-1 kaYohane 2:23

Ngoko ke, wonke umntu owamkela uMoya oyiNgcwele othenjisiweyo, wamkela uYesu, wamkela uBawo Oyingcwele! "Umntu omtsha" uzalwa kwakhona ngaphakathi kuwe → Olu hlobo lomntu aluzalwanga ngegazi "lika-Adam", kungekhona ngenkanuko, okanye ngentando yomntu, kodwa nguThixo.
Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

2. Wazalwa nguThixo (ongengowo) umzimba ka-Adam

Masifunde iBhayibhile kwabaseRoma 8:9 Ukuba uMoya kaThixo uhleli ngaphakathi kwenu, aningabo abenyama, ningaboMoya. Ukuba umntu akanaye uMoya kaKristu, akangokaKristu lowo.

Qaphela: "Umoya kaThixo" → nguMoya kaYehova, uMoya kaYise, uMoya kaKristu, uMoya kaYesu, uMoya oyiNgcwele, noMoya oyiNgcwele wenyaniso! Ikwabizwa ngokuba nguMthuthuzeli kunye neNgcobo.

Ukuba uMoya kaThixo, uMoya kaKristu, uMoya oyiNgcwele uhleli kuwe! “Umntu” uzalwa ngokutsha kuwe – bona amaRoma 7:22. Lo “mntu” ngumzimba kaYesu, igazi likaYesu, ubomi bukaKristu, lo “mntu mtsha” ngumzimba kaKristu! Amen

Wena “mntu omtsha” awungowomzimba wenyama ka-Adam, “umntu omtsha” ongafiyo awungowomzimba “womntu omdala” onokonakala. "Umntu omtsha" wakho owenziwe ngokutsha ngokaMoya oyiNgcwele, uKristu, noThixo uYise! Amen

Ukuba uKristu ukuwe, "umntu omdala" esenyameni uyafa ngenxa yesono → wafa kunye noKristu; kodwa umphefumlo uyagwetyelwa kwaye uphila "ngokholo" → "umntu omtsha" uhlala noKristu! Ngoko, uyayiqonda? Imbekiselo kumaRoma 8:9-10

3 Nabani na ozelwe nguThixo soze one

Masityhile kweyoku-1 kaYohane 3:9 Bonke abazelwe nguThixo aboni, ngokuba ilizwi likaThixo lihleli kuye;

Umbuzo: Kutheni abo bazelwe nguThixo bengoni?
Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

1 Kuba ilizwi likaThixo lihleli entliziyweni – Yohane 3:9
2 Ke uMoya kaThixo uhleli kuni, aningabo abenyama.”— Roma 8:9
3 Umntu omtsha ozelwe nguThixo uhleli kuYesu Kristu - 1 Yohane 3:6
4 Umthetho woMoya wobomi undikhulule emthethweni wesono nokufa – Roma 8:2
5 Apho kungekho mthetho, akukho sigqitho - Roma 4:15
6 Bahlanjululwe, bangcwaliswa, bagwetyelwa ngoMoya kaThixo— 1 Korinte 6:11
7 Izinto ezindala zidlule;

“Indoda endala” yabethelelwa emnqamlezweni noKristu → izinto ezindala zidlule;

"Umntu omtsha" uhlala noKristu, ngoku uhlala kuKristu, uye wahlanjululwa, wangcwaliswa, kwaye wagwetyelwa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele → yonke into iye yaba ntsha (ebizwa ngokuba ngumntu omtsha)!

Umbuzo: Ngaba amaKristu (amatsha) angona?
Impendulo: Bonke abazelwe nguThixo abasayi kona; Imbekiselo kweyoku-1 kaYohane 3:8-10, 5:18

Umbuzo: Abanye abashumayeli bathi amaKristu asaqhubeka esenza izono?
Impendulo: Abantu abathi (abazelwe nguThixo) banako ukona abaluqondi usindiso lukaKrestu Bakhohliswa yimpazamo. Kuba abo bonayo abazalwa ngokutsha; Ke umntu ongenaye uMoya kaKrestu akangokaKrestu.

Ukuba uKristu ungaphakathi kwenu :)

1 Umzimba “omdala” ufile ngenxa yesono → Lowo “ukholwayo” ukuba umntu omdala ufile, ukhululekile esonweni - Roma 6:6-7
2 Ndikhululwe kuwo umthetho → Apho kungekho mthetho, akukho sigqitho - Roma 4:15
3 Yahlukanani nomntu omdala nezenzo zakhe → Ukuba uMoya kaThixo uhleli kuni, anisenyameni (izenzo zakudala) - Roma 8:9, Kol 3:9
4 Ngaphandle komthetho, isono asibalwa → “ITestamente Entsha” UThixo akasayi kuphinda azikhumbule izono zakho nezigqitho zakho zenyama zabethelelwa emnqamlezweni noKristu ngenxa yokuba ufile ( funda kwaKol. 3:3 ) Ngoko ke UThixo akakhumbuli! — Roma 5:13; Hebhere 10:16-18
5 Kuba, kungekho mthetho isono sifile (KwabaseRoma 7:8) → Nina nikhutshiwe kwisono, naphuma emthethweni, nakumntu omdala, nemisebenzi yakhe, ngawo umzimba kaKristu. Nafa – Kol. 3:3 “umntu omtsha” wenu akapheleli kwizenzo nezikreqo zenyama yomntu omdala. Zibaleleni ekubeni ningabafileyo okunene kwisono, niphilele uThixo ngokumanywa noYesu Krestu - Roma 6:11
6 Umzimba ufile ngenxa yesono, kodwa umoya uyaphila ngenxa yobulungisa (KwabaseRoma 8:10).

Umbuzo: Ufa njani umzimba wesono?
Impendulo: Kholelwa ekufeni kunye noKristu → yiva ukufa komntu omdala uze ukukhulule ngokuthe ngcembe → uthabathe umzimba ofileyo, umzimba ofayo, umzimba onokonakala, kwaye umzimba ongaphandle uya kutshabalalisa ngokuthe ngcembe kwaye wonakaliswe (Efese 4:21) -22) Umzimba ka-Adam onesono Uphuma eluthulini yaye uya kubuyela kwaseluthulini. —Funda iGenesis 3:19

Umbuzo: Baphila njani abantu abatsha?
Impendulo: Hlala noKristu → Umntu omtsha (umntu ozelwe ngokutsha womoya) uhleli kuKristu Yesu, kwaye kuwe (umntu omtsha) ukhula imihla ngemihla ebudodeni, ekhulela kwisimo sikaKristu. Ukuba “ubuncwane” bubekwe kwisitya sodongwe, oko kuya kubonisa ukuba la mandla makhulu avela kuThixo Asebenza ukufa kukaYesu yaye abonisa ubomi bukaYesu → ukushumayela iindaba ezilungileyo, ukushumayela inyaniso, nokukhokelela abantu abaninzi. ubulungisa! Amava ovuko kunye noKristu kunye nokukhululwa komzimba. Ubomi bomoya "bomntu omtsha" buya kufumana ubunzima obungenakulinganiswa bozuko lwanaphakade Xa uKristu ebonakala, umzimba wakho uya kubonakala (oko kukuthi, umzimba uhlawulelwe), kwaye uya kuvuswa ngokuhle ngakumbi! Amen. Imbekiselo kweyesi-2 kwabaseKorinte 4:7-18

7 Bonke abazelwe nguThixo aboni, ngokuba ilizwi likaThixo lihleli kuye; eyoku- 1 kaYohane 3:9 , 5:18

Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

KULUNGILE! Namhlanje sabelana ngo "Ukuzalwa kwakhona" apha.
Masithandaze kunye kuThixo: Othandekayo, Bawo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Hlala ukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya kwaye uvule iingqondo zethu ukuze sibone kwaye sive iinyaniso zomoya, ukuqonda iBhayibhile, nokuqonda ukuzalwa ngokutsha, 1 ozelwe ngamanzi nanguMoya, 2 ozelwe ngelizwi eliyinyaniso leendaba ezilungileyo, 3 ozelwe nguThixo! Lowo uhleli kuYesu Kristu ungcwele, akanasono, akoni; Akukho namnye umntu ozelwe nguThixo oya kona, kuba sonke sizelwe nguThixo. Amen
Ngegama leNkosi uYesu Kristu! Amen

IVangeli inikezelwe kumama wam othandekayo!

Umbhalo weVangeli:

Basebenzi bakaYesu Krestu Mzalwana uWang*Yun, uDade uLiu, uDade uZheng, uMzalwana uCen... kunye nabanye abasebenzi baxhasa kwaye bancedise umsebenzi wevangeli kaKrestu kwaye basebenze kunye nabo bakholwayo kule vangeli! Amagama abangcwele abashumayela kunye nababelana ngolu kholo abhalwe kwincwadi yobomi!

Bazalwane noodade Khumbulani ukuqokelela

Umfanekiso ongezantsi: Wazalelwa kuAdam kwaye UAdam wokugqibela ( ezelwe nguThixo )

Molo bahlobo! Enkosi ngoMoya kaYesu → Ucofa eli nqaku ukuze ulifunde kwaye umamele intshumayelo yevangeli ukuba uzimisele ukuyamkela kwaye" kholwani “UYesu Krestu unguMsindisi nothando lwakhe olukhulu, ngaba siya kuthandaza kunye?

articles.title: Inguquko 4 Yabethelelwa emnqamlezweni noKristu, ihambelana nenguquko
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo lusapho lwam, mawethu! Amen.

Masivule iiBhayibhile zethu kuLuka isahluko 23 indinyana 41 size sifunde kunye: Sifanele, kuba isohlwayo sethu sisifanele izenzo zethu, kodwa lo mntu akenzanga nto imbi.

Namhlanje sizakufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane kunye "inguquko" Hayi. Isine Thetha kwaye wenze umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, Nkosi yethu uYesu Krestu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Umfazi onesidima [ibandla] uthuma abasebenzi ngelizwi lenyaniso, elibhaliweyo lathethwa ngesandla sakhe, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwethu. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Yanga iNkosi uYesu ingaqhubeka ikhanyisela amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuba siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni. Qonda ukuba “intliziyo yenguquko” ithetha ukuba ndabethelelwa emnqamlezweni noKristu, kuba oko sibandezelekayo kuyifanele into esiyenzayo! Amen .

Le mithandazo ingasentla, umbulelo, kunye neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

Ebethelelwe emnqamlezweni noKristu, efanele inguquko

(1) Ebethelelwe kunye noYesu, inguquko yesaphuli-mthetho

Masifunde uLuka isahluko 23 iindinyana 39-41 size sizifunde kunye: Omnye wabenzi bobubi ababebethelelwe emnqamlezweni wamhleka waza wathi: “UnguKrestu na wena, zisindise, nathi usikhalimele? . Uthe: " Ekubeni nani nikohlwaywa sinye, animoyiki na uThixo? Kufuneke si, Kuba oko sikufumanayo kukufanele oko sikwenzayo , kodwa lo mntu akazange enze nto imbi. "

Phawula: Izaphuli-mthetho ezibini ezibethelelwe emnqamlezweni kunye noYesu "Amabanjwa" abhekisela kubantu abanokwenza izono Babizwa ngokuba zizaphuli-mthetho okanye "aboni" → kuba umvuzo wesono kukufa, ngoko intliziyo yomenzi-bubi izaliswe kukuzala komlomo waso. Yitsho nje → kufuneka, kuba into esiyithethayo nge ngento yethu Yenza ye" ngokomlinganiselo "→ Yile nto ithetha ukubethelelwa noYesu →" Intliziyo efanele inguquko ".Yi le" inguquko yokwenene ".→ "Kholwani kwiVangeli" kwaye basindiswe →Ibanjwa lathi: "Yesu, xa ubukumkani bakho bufika, ndicela undikhumbule!" Wathi ke uYesu kuye, Inene, ndithi kuwe, Namhlanje uya kuba nam eParadisi . ’—Luka 23 indinyana 42-43.

Omnye umbanjwa wamhleka uYesu, wathi: “Unguye na uKristu? Zisindise, nathi usisindise. Ngoko ke, abo bangakholelwa ukuba uYesu ungumsindisi abanakufumana usindiso lukaThixo → ubukumkani obungunaphakade bukaThixo "yiParadesi" kwaye → abo bangakholelwa ukuba uYesu unguKristu kwaye umsindisi akayi kuba nasabelo ezulwini.

Isilumkiso:

Ekubeni ukholelwa kuYesu njengoKristu noMsindisi, wafa emnqamlezweni ngenxa yezono zethu → 1 Uyakuhlangula esonweni, uyakholwa? 2 Ngaba uyakholwa ukuba ukhululwe kuwo umthetho nakwisiqalekiso somthetho? wangcwatywa, 3 Ngaba uyakholelwa ukuba uwahlubile umntu omdala kunye nesimilo sesono sendoda endala? →Ngenxa yokuba umntu omdala wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni noKristu, umzimba wesono utshatyalalisiwe. 4 Uvuko ngomhla wesithathu ~ sizalwe ngokutsha! Amen! Ngaba uyakholelwa okanye awukholelwa? Ukuba awukholelwa nayiphi na kwezi zingasentla? Nceda ubuze isazela sakho, kutheni ukholelwa kuYesu? →Uyintoni umahluko phakathi koku kunye nomenzi-bubi owayegculela uYesu njengoKristu? Utsho wena! Kunene?

Ke ngoko, intliziyo yenguquko iyalingana, ngokunjalo nokholo. → Kufuneka uthwale isiqhamo ngokuhambelana nenguquko. Sukuthi kufuneka ndikholelwe kuYesu, kodwa ungakholelwa kuye ukuba akusindise. -- 1 ukhululekile esonweni, 2 Ndikhululwe kuwo umthetho nesiqalekiso sawo. 3 Lahlani ixhego neendlela zalo zakudala. Kungenjalo unokuvuswa njani noKristu [ ukuzalwa ngokutsha ]ilaphu loboya? Ngaba sele uyibonile inyanga? Imbekiselo-Mateyu 3 ivesi 8

Kunjengokuba umpostile uPawulos wabhalayo kwincwadi yakhe: “Ukuba similiselwe kuye ngemfano yokufa kwakhe, somiliselwa kuye ngemfano yokuvuka kwakhe, sisazi nje ukuba umntu wethu omdala wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni kunye naye, ukuba umzimba uxhonywa kunye naye. Isono sibe sisibhangiso, ukuze singabi saba ngamakhoboka esono; Ukuba sifa kunye noKrestu, siyakholwa ukuba sodla ubomi kunye naye. → Ndibethelelwe emnqamlezweni noKristu, Ayisendim ke odla ubomi, nguKristu ke oselesidla ubomi kum Ubomi ke endibudlayo ngoku, ndisenyameni, ndibudla ngokukholwa kuNyana kaThixo, owandithandayo, wazinikela ngenxa yam. Imbekiselo-amaGalati 2:20 namaRoma 6:5-8.

KULUNGILE! Namhlanje ndingathanda ukwabelana nani ubudlelane bam nani nonke. Ngamana ubabalo lweNkosi uYesu Kristu, uthando lukaThixo, nempefumlelo yoMoya oyiNgcwele ingahlala ihleli nani nonke! Amen

Qondanisa imimoya

(1) UMoya Oyingcwele wenyaniso

Masifunde iBhayibhile kuYohane 14:15-17 “Ukuba niyandithanda, noyigcina imithetho yam, ndiya kucela kuBawo, aze aninike omnye uMthetheleli (okanye inguqulelo: uMthuthuzeli; kwalowo ungezantsi), ukuze abekho. ukunye nani ngonaphakade, uMoya wenyaniso, lowo lingenako ihlabathi ukumamkela, ngokuba lingamboni, lingamazi nokumazi. Ke nina niyamazi, ngokuba uhleli nani, kanjalo ungaphakathi kwenu.

[Phawula]: INkosi uYesu yathi: “Ukuba niyandithanda, noyigcina imiyalelo yam, yaye ndiya kumcela kuBawo, yaye uya kuninika omnye uMthetheleli wokuba kunye nani ngonaphakade, onguMoya wenyaniso → UMoya wenyaniso ufikile. , Uya kukukhokelela “kuyo yonke inyaniso”!

Ungamfumana njani uMoya oyiNgcwele? → Nathi nakholwa kuye, nakuva ilizwi lenyaniso, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwenu, nakholwa kuye, natywinwa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele wedinga. — Efese 1:13 . Qaphela: Emva kokuba "uvile" ilizwi lenyaniso → waqonda inyaniso, ivangeli yosindiso lwakho → wakholelwa kuKristu waza wafumana isithembiso【 uMoya oyiNgcwele ]! Amen. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

→ Ndiye ndanxibelelana kwaye ndabelana nawe ngaphambili ukuba uMoya oyiNgcwele wenyaniso → UMoya oyiNgcwele uyinyani! → UThixo ungumoya: “Umoya kaThixo, uMoya kaYehova, uMoya kaYesu, uMoya kaKristu, uMoya woNyana kaThixo, uMoya weNkosi, noMoya wenyaniso “zingumoya mnye” → oko kukuthi, uMoya oyiNgcwele wenyaniso! Amen. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

(2) Umoya womntu

IGenesis Chapter 2 Verse 7 UYehova uThixo wambumba umntu ngothuli lwasemhlabeni, waphefumlela emathatheni akhe impefumlo yobomi; waba ngumphefumlo ophilileyo; igama lakhe ke lalinguAdam. → “Umoya” uthetha inyama negazi , “Umoya” ka-Adam, ukhokho woluntu → umoya wendalo . Bona eyoku-1 kwabaseKorinte 15:45 . →[Umoya womntu] wafa ezikreqweni zakhe nakwinyama engalukanga, oko kukuthi, ukhokho wokuqala uAdam wawaphula umthetho waza wona, yaye “umoya womntu” wafa enyameni yakhe engalukanga. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

INTSHUMAYELI 3 Isahluko 21 Ngubani owaziyo ukuba "umoya womntu" uyenyuka → "Umoya" womntu uyenyuka njengomoya okholelwa kwiindaba ezilungileyo kwaye usindiswe; kodwa abo "bangakholelwayo" kwiindaba ezilungileyo, emva kwemizimba yabo babuyela eluthulini, “imimoya” yabo isentolongweni, oko kukuthi, eHadesi→ uKristu ngo umoya ] Shumayelani iindaba ezilungileyo koomoya abasentolongweni, nakuba inyama iyagwetywa, ngokukholwa kuKristu; umoya “Ukuphila ngoThixo, ngenxa yokuba “ivangeli” usindiso lwalungekatyhilwa kumaxesha amandulo.” Ngaba uyakuqonda ngokucacileyo oku?

(3) Umoya wengelosi ewileyo

( Isaya 14:12 ) “Khwezi, Nyana wesifingo, yini na ukuba uwe ezulwini? isithathu sayo sawela emhlabeni.

Phawula: "Inkwenkwezi eqaqambileyo, nyana wokusa" esibhakabhakeni yaza yarhuqa "isinye kwisithathu" sezithunywa zezulu → yawa emhlabeni → yaba "inamba, inyoka, umtyholi, uSathana" kunye nesinye kwisithathu sezithunywa eziwileyo → yaba" Umoya wemposiso , umoya womchasi-Kristu —Funda uYohane 1 Isahluko 4 ivesi 3-6. umoya kasathana , Umoya ongcolileyo womprofeti wobuxoki ’—Funda iSityhilelo 16, indinyana 13-14 . Ukuhenda imimoya emdaka —Funda eyoku-1 kuTimoti isahluko 4 indinyana 1. umoya wobuxoki (Funda eyoku-1 yooKumkani 22:23.) Umoya wemposiso (Funda uIsaya 19:14.) Ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

→ Phi[ umoya ] Vuma ukuba uYesu Kristu weza esenyameni, oko kukuthi, evela kuThixo; Umlandeli" umoya Ukuba uyamkhanyela uYesu, awungokaThixo umoya womchasi-Kristu . Funda eyoku- 1 kaYohane 4:2-3 .

Eyona nto icacileyo kukuba kwiicawa ezininzi namhlanje → "imimoya" yabaprofeti bobuxoki ikufundisa ukuba emva kokuba "ukholelwa" kuYesu kufuneka "uvume izono zakho yonke imihla kwaye ucele igazi lakhe elixabisekileyo ukuba lihlambulule izono zakho → Libale njengenqambi igazi lomnqophiso owamngcwalisayo →Yiyo le Umoya wemposiso . "Amakholwa" anjalo akakayiqondi indlela eyiyo yeendaba ezilungileyo kwaye akhohliswe yimpazamo yawo. Ukuba ngenene banawo “uMoya oyiNgcwele” ngaphakathi kubo, abasayi kuze baligqale “igazi loNyana kaThixo” njengesiqhelo oku, utsho! Kunene? →Ukuba "uzelwe ngokutsha" → awudingi abanye ukuba bakufundise, kuba "ukuthanjiswa" kuya kukufundisa into omawuyenze! Ke ngoko, kufuneka uphume kubo → "ngena" "kwibandla leNkosi uYesu Kristu" elishumayela iindaba ezilungileyo kwaye lithetha inyaniso → ukuze ukwazi: ukuvuswa, ukuzalwa ngokutsha, ukusindiswa, ukufumana ubomi, ukufumana uzuko, ukufumana imivuzo , bafumane izithsaba, yaye kwixesha elizayo Uvuko oluhle ngakumbi! Amen. Uyaqonda? Isalathiso - Hebhere 10:29 noYohane 1:26-27.

(4) Umoya wolungiselelo weengelosi

Hebhere 1:14 Angel Akunjalo bonke Umoya wenkonzo , othunyelwe ukukhonza abo baza kudla ilifa usindiso?

Phawula: UYesu Kristu wazalwa → Iingelosi zazisa iindaba ezilungileyo kuMariya nakubalusi xa uHerode watshutshiswayo, iingelosi zamkhusela uMariya nosapho lwakhe ukuba basabe entlango, yaye uYesu wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni ukuze amsindise; thina, neengelosi zongeza amandla akhe → kuba sikholelwa kwivangeli kwaye siyayiqonda inyaniso → emva kokuzalwa ngokutsha nokusindiswa → ngamalungu omzimba wakhe, “ithambo lamathambo akhe nenyama yasenyameni yakhe”! Amen. Sinomzimba nobomi bukaKristu → "wonke umntu" ugadwe ziingelosi ezilungiselelayo. Amen! Haleluya! Ukuba umntu akanawo umzimba nobomi bukaKristu, akayi kuba nokumgcina zithunywa zezulu. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

Abazalwana noodade bamele ‘baphulaphule ngenyameko, baphulaphule ngokuqonda’—ukuze bawaqonde amazwi kaThixo! kulungile! Namhlanje ndingathanda ukwabelana nani ubudlelane bam nani nonke. Ngamana ubabalo lweNkosi uYesu Kristu, uthando lukaThixo, nempefumlelo yoMoya oyiNgcwele ingahlala ihleli nani nonke! Amen

articles.title: Ingcaciso yemibuzo enzima: UMoya kaThixo, uMoya kaYesu, noMoya oyiNgcwele
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo lusapho lwam, mawethu! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibhile yethu kuMateyu Isahluko 3 kunye nendinyana 16 size sifunde kunye: UYesu wabhaptizwa waza wenyuka kwangoko emanzini. Amazulu avuleka kuye, waza wambona uMoya kaThixo esihla njengehobe, waza wahlala phezu kwakhe. kwabakho nezwi eliphuma ezulwini, lisithi, Wena unguNyana wam oyintanda, endikholisiweyo nguye; . "

Namhlanje sizakufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane kunye "UMoya kaThixo, uMoya kaYesu, uMoya oyiNgcwele" Thandaza: U-Abha othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Umfazi onesidima [icawa] ithumela abasebenzi ukuba baye kuthutha ukutya ukusuka kwiindawo ezikude esibhakabhakeni, kwaye isasaze ukutya kuthi kwangethuba ukuze ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zomoya → UMoya kaThixo, uMoya kaYesu, noMoya oyiNgcwele bonke banguMoya omnye! Sonke sibhaptizwe ngaMoya mnye, sibe ngumzimba mnye, kwaye sisela Moya mnye! Amen .

Le mithandazo ingasentla, umbulelo, kunye neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

UMoya kaThixo, uMoya kaYesu, uMoya oyiNgcwele

(1) Umoya kaThixo

Tyhila kuYohane 4:24 nize nifunde kunye → UThixo ungumoya (okanye kungelizwi), abo ke bamnqulayo bamelwe kukumnqula ngoMoya nangenyaniso. Genesis 1:2 UMoya kaThixo wafukama phezu kwamanzi lawo. UISAYA 11:2 UMoya weNkosi uya kuhlala phezu kwakhe, uMoya wobulumko nowokuqonda, umoya wecebo nowobugorha, umoya wokwazi nowokoyika uYehova. Luke 4:18 UMoya weNkosi uphezu kwam, ethe ngenxa yoko yandithambisela ukushumayela iindaba ezilungileyo kumahlwempu; 2 Korinte 3:17 INkosi inguye uMoya; apho ke akhoyo uMoya weNkosi, kubakho inkululeko. .

[Phawula]: Ngokuhlolisisa ezi zibhalo zingasentla, sibhala ukuba → [uThixo] ungumoya (okanye akanalizwi), oko kukuthi, → uThixo ungumoya → Umoya kaThixo uhamba phezu kwamanzi → umsebenzi wendalo. Khangela le Bhayibhile ingasentla ize ithi "uMoya" → "Umoya kaThixo, uMoya kaYehova, uMoya weNkosi → INkosi inguMoya" → Uluhlobo luni lomoya [uMoya kaThixo]? → Masiphinde sifundisise iBhayibhile, uMateyu 3:16, uYesu wabhaptizwa waza ngoko nangoko waphuma emanzini. Ngequbuliso izulu lavuleka kuye, waza wabona umoya kaThixo Kwaba ngathi ihobe lehla laza lahlala phezu kwakhe. Luka 2:22 uMoya oyiNgcwele Kwehla phezu kwakhe imbonakalo yehobe; kweza nezwi eliphuma ezulwini, lisithi, Wena unguNyana wam oyintanda, endikholisiweyo nguye amanzi, waza wanika uYohane uMbhaptizi isarha → umoya kaThixo “Njengehobe lisihla, lehla phezu koYesu; ubhala uLuka → “Moya oyiNgcwele “Wawa phezu kwakhe emile okwehobe → ngolu hlobo, [ umoya kaThixo → Yiyo loo nto "Umoya Oyingcwele" ! Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

(2) Umoya kaYesu

Masifunde IZenzo 16:7 Bathe bakufika emdeni waseMisiya, bafuna ukuya eBhithiniya. umoya kaYesu “Kodwa babengavunyelwanga ukwenjenjalo.” ( 1 Petros 1:11 ) Uhlolisisa kubo “uMoya kaKristu” lowo ungqina kwangaphambili ixesha leembandezelo nozuko oluya kulandela kuKristu (Gal 4:6). wathumela "yena", uYesu →" umoya wonyana Ngenani ezintliziyweni zenu (ekuqalekeni kwethu) nidanduluke nithi, Abha! utata! "; Roma 8:9 ukuba" Umoya kaThixo" Ukuba ke kuthe kwahlala kuni, anisayi kuba senyameni, ningokaMoya. Nabani na ke ongenguye okaKrestu akangokaKrestu.

[Phawula]: Ndayirekhoda ngokukhangela ezi zibhalo zingasentla → 1 " UMoya kaYesu, uMoya kaKristu, uMoya woNyana kaThixo → Ngena ezintliziyweni zethu , 2 Roma 8:9; umoya kaThixo → hlalani ezintliziyweni zenu, 3 kwabaseKorinte 3:16; Anazi na ukuba niyitempile kaThixo? umoya kaThixo "→ Nihlala kuni na? (1 Korinte 6:19) Anazi na ukuba imizimba yenu iyitempile yoMoya oyiNgcwele? uMoya oyiNgcwele ] uvela kuThixo → kwaye uhlala kuwe → ngoko, “UMoya kaThixo, uMoya kaYesu, uMoya kaKristu, uMoya woNyana kaThixo,” → oko kukuthi uMoya oyiNgcwele ! Amen. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

(3) Mnye uMoya oyiNgcwele

Masifunde Ibhayibhile kuYohane 15:26 Kodwa xa athe wafika uMthetheleli, endiya kumthuma kuBawo, uMoya wenyaniso ophuma kuBawo, wongqina ngam. Isahluko 16 Ivesi 13 Xa ke athe wafika “uMoya wenyaniso, uya kunikhokelela kuyo yonke inyaniso; KWABASE-EFESE 4:4 Mnye umzimba, mnye noMoya, njengokuba nabizelwa thembeni linye. Eyoku-1 kwabaseKorinte 11:13 bonke babhaptizwa ‘kuMoya omnye Oyingcwele’ baze babe ngumzimba omnye, besela ‘kuMoya oyiNgcwele omnye’ → Inye iNkosi, lunye ukholo, lunye ubhaptizo, mnye uThixo, uYise wabo bonke, ongaphezu kwabo bonke, ophuphumayo. wonke umntu kwaye uhlala kuwo wonke umntu. → eyoku-1 kwabaseKorinte 6:17 Ke onamathele eNkosini, umoya mnye nayo iNkosi .

[Phawula]: Ngokuhlolisisa ezi zibhalo zingasentla, sibhala ukuba → uThixo ungumoya → “UMoya kaThixo, uMoya kaYehova, uMoya weNkosi, uMoya kaYesu, uMoya kaKristu, uMoya woNyana kaThixo, uMoya wenyaniso.” → Yiyo leyo” uMoya oyiNgcwele ". umoya oyingcwele mnye , sonke sazalwa ngokutsha saza sabhaptizwa "kuMoya oyiNgcwele omnye", saba ngumzimba omnye, umzimba kaKristu, saza sasela kuMoya oyiNgcwele omnye → ukutya nokusela ukutya kokomoya okufanayo kunye namanzi okomoya! → Inye iNkosi, lunye ukholo, lunye ubhaptizo, mnye uThixo, uYise wabo bonke, ophezu kwabo bonke, ngabo bonke, nakubo bonke. Oko kusimanyanisa neNkosi kukuba nomoya omnye neNkosi → "Umoya Oyingcwele" ! Amen. → ngoko" 1 UMoya kaThixo nguMoya oyiNgcwele, 2 Umoya kaYesu nguMoya oyiNgcwele, 3 Umoya osezintliziyweni zethu ukwanguMoya oyiNgcwele” . Amen!

Qaphela ukuba [asikuko] ukuba “umoya wenyama” ka-Adam umnye noMoya oyiNgcwele, ingekuko ukuba umoya womntu umnye noMoya oyiNgcwele.

Abazalwana noodade bamele ‘baphulaphule ngenyameko, baphulaphule ngokuqonda’—ukuze bawaqonde amazwi kaThixo! kulungile! Namhlanje ndingathanda ukwabelana nani ubudlelane bam nani nonke. Ngamana ubabalo lweNkosi uYesu Kristu, uthando lukaThixo, nempefumlelo yoMoya oyiNgcwele ingahlala ihleli nani nonke! Amen

articles.title: Ingcaciso yemibuzo enzima: Ekuqaleni, kwakukho iTao
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo lusapho lwam, mawethu! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibhile kuYohane isahluko 1 iindinyana 1-2 size sifunde kunye: Ekuqaleni kwakukho iTao, kwaye iTao yayikunye noThixo, kwaye iTao yayinguThixo. Lo Lizwi wayekunye noThixo kwasekuqalekeni. Amen

Namhlanje siza kufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane " Yintoni iTao 》Umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhleli enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Abafazi abanesidima [iicawa] bathumela abasebenzi - Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zomoya → Ekuqaleni kwakukho iTao, yaye iTao yayikunye noThixo, yaye iTao →inguThixo. ULizwi waba yinyama → ogama linguYesu, abathi abapostile bamva, bambona, bazibonela ngawabo amehlo, baza bazichukumisa ngezandla zabo → ekuqaleni lalikho ilizwi lobomi, yaye obu bomi batyhilwa “ngoYesu”! Amen .

Le mithandazo ingasentla, umbulelo, kunye neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

Ekuqaleni kwakukho iTao.

(1) UTao nguThixo

Makhe sihlolisise uYohane 1:1-2 size siyifunde kunye: Ekuqalekeni ube ekho uLizwi, waye uLizwi ekuye uThixo, waye uLizwi enguThixo. Lo Lizwi wayekunye noThixo kwasekuqalekeni. Qaphela: "I-Taichu" → yakudala, yakudala, isiqalo, i-self-ekhoyo Ukuba akukho gama lokuvakalisa "ngokungaphezulu", sebenzisa "i-Taichu" ekuqaleni, kwakukho iTao, kwaye iTao yayinoThixo " ngu → 【 uThixo]! Ngamanye amazwi, wayekho uThixo "ekuqaleni"! Amen. Lo "Lizwi" wayekunye noThixo kwasekuqalekeni→ "Ekuqalekeni kwendalo, ngaphambi kokudalwa kwezinto zonke, ndandikho mna. . Kwasephakadeni, kwasentloko, Kwasemaphakadeni, Ndasekwa. Imbekiselo — IMizekeliso 8:22-23 . Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

(2) ULizwi waba yinyama

UYOHANE 1:14 ULizwi ke waba ngumntu, waza wahlala phakathi kwethu, ezele lubabalo nayinyaniso. Sabubukela ubungangamsha bakhe awabunikwa nguYise, njengoko ekukuphela koNyana wakhe;

(3) ULizwi waba yinyama waza wathiywa igama elinguYesu.

Mateyu 1:20-21...kuba oko kukhawulweyo phakathi kwakhe kungoMoya oyiNgcwele. Uya kuzala unyana, umthiye igama elinguYesu, kuba eya kubasindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo. "

(4) Akukho namnye wakha wambona uThixo uYise wamtyhilayo uThixo ngoNyana wakhe okuphela kwamzeleyo.

UYOHANE 1:18 Akukho namnye wakha wambona uThixo; uNyana okuphela kwamzeleyo, lowo usesifubeni sikaYise, nguye omtyhile.

(5) Ngamana kungakho indlela yobomi

Eyoku-1 kaYohane 1:1-2 ithetha ngelizwi lantlandlolo lobomi ukususela ekuqaleni, esalivayo, salibona, sabona ngamehlo ethu, saza salichukumisa ngezandla zethu → Obu “bomi” buye kwaba ngoNyana okuphela kwamzeleyo [uYesu]. ] babonakala, abapostile bakubona oko, kwaye ngoku bayangqina, ngokunika kuni ubomi obungunaphakade obunaye uYise, kwaye babonakala nathi! Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

(6) Kuba kuye ubomi, baye obo bomi bulukhanyiso eluntwini

UYohane 1 4 Kuye kwakukho ubomi, baye ubomi obo bulukhanyiselo lwabantu. Ivesi 9 Ukhanyiso lwenene olukhanyisela wonke umntu omiyo phezu komhlaba → Wathi uYesu kubo bonke, Ndim ukhanyiselo lwehlabathi; lowo undilandelayo akasayi kuhamba ebumnyameni, kodwa woba nalo ukhanyiso lobomi. ’—UYohane isahluko 8 ivesi 12.

(7) UYesu ungumfanekiso wokwenene kaThixo

Ulubengezelo lobuqaqawuli bukaThixo, “umfanekiso wokwenyaniso kaThixo,” yaye uthwala zonke izinto ngomyalelo wakhe onamandla. Akuba ebahlambulule abantu ezonweni, wahlala phantsi ngasekunene kobuKhulu emazulwini. Imbekiselo - kumaHebhere 1 ivesi 3.

[Phawula]: Ngokuhlolisisa ezi ngxelo zezibhalo zingasentla → 1 Ekuqaleni kwakukho iTao, iTao yayikunye noThixo, neTao [ uthixo ] → 2 "ULizwi" waba yinyama, oko kukuthi, "uThixo" waba yinyama → 3 Wakhawulwa yiNtombi Enyulu uMariya ngoMoya oyiNgcwele waza wazalwa: wabizwa ngokuba nguYesu! 【 UYesu 】 Igama lakhe lithetha ukusindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo. . Amen! → Ke bonke awabamkelayo wabanika igunya lokuba babe ngabantwana bakaThixo, abo ke bakholwayo kwigama lakhe; "Ulwamkelo" → "uLizwi" UYesu waba yinyama! INkosi uYesu yathi: “Ukuba anithanga niyidle niyisele inyama negazi loNyana woMntu, aninabo ubomi kuni. Lowo uyidlayo eyam inyama, alisele elam igazi, unobomi obungunaphakade; ndaye ndiya kumvusa ngomhla wokugqibela. → Ukuba siyadla size sisele” iNkosi “inyama” “negazi leNkosi”, sinalo “ilizwi” likaYesu laza laba ngumzimba nobomi bukaKristu → Sambatha umzimba nobomi bukaKristu → Aba bantu abazalwanga ngagazi, nangakuthanda kwandoda; Lowo uzelwe nguThixo “uzelwe ngokutsha” Kuphela ngulo mzimba “ungafiyo” onokudla ilifa ubomi obungunaphakade kunye nelifa likaBawo oseZulwini Ngaba uyiqonda ngokucacileyo iNguqulelo kaYohane 1 ivesi 12-13 nezahluko ze-6 . Umthendeleko.

Isilumkiso: " Ukukhanya enyameni "→ imfundiso yobuxoki , iimfundiso ezininzi zecawa namhlanje zisekelwe kwisibakala sokuba umzimba ka-Adam wadalwa ngothuli, Ukholose ngomthetho ukuze uhlakulele inyama, inyama mayibe yiTao ize ibe ngumoya . Oku koko "izigebenga zokomoya" zesizukulwana sangaphambili zakufundisa. →Ukuba oku kunjalo, yintoni umahluko phakathi koku kunye noSakyamuni oye wafumana ubunzima waza wahlakulela umzimba wakhe ukuba abe nguBuddha? Utsho wena! Kunene? Ngokucacileyo le yimfundiso yobuxoki. → Yiva ke ngoko "ilizwi lenyaniso - kwaye uqonde ilizwi lenyaniso, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwakho! Yamkela idinga [ uMoya oyiNgcwele ]. Amen! articles.title: Uthando lukaYesu: thanda ummelwane wakho njengoko uzithanda ngako
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo lusapho lwam, mawethu! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibhile kuMarko 12:29-31 uYesu waphendula: “Kuqala uthi: ‘Yiva, Sirayeli; Inye iNkosi uThixo wethu. Uze uyithande iNkosi uThixo wakho ngentliziyo yakho iphela, nangomphefumlo wakho, nangengqondo yakho iphela, nangamandla akho ephela. ’ Into yesibini yile: ‘Uze umthande ummelwane wakho njengawe siqu. ’ Akukho myalelo mkhulu kunale mibini. . "

Namhlanje siza kufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane " uYesu uthando "Hayi. Sibhozo Thetha kwaye wenze umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, Nkosi yethu uYesu Krestu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Umfazi onesidima [icawa] ithumela abasebenzi ukuba baye kuthutha ukutya ukusuka kwiindawo ezikude esibhakabhakeni, kwaye basinike ngexesha elifanelekileyo, ukuze ubomi bethu bomoya bube nobutyebi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zomoya → Uthando lukaYesu! Luthando oluthanda ummelwane kabani njengoko ezithanda → ngenxa yokuba ethobela imiyalelo kaYise osemazulwini → yaye usinika umzimba wakhe ongenakonakala nobomi bakhe ukuze sibe ngamalungu omzimba wakhe → “ithambo lamathambo akhe nenyama yenyama yakhe” → ubona “Umntu omtsha” esizelwe nguThixo → ngumzimba Wakhe! Ke uthando lukaYesu → "thanda ummelwane wakho njengawe siqu" . Amen!

Le mithandazo ingasentla, umbulelo, kunye neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

Uthando lukaYesu kukuthanda ummelwane wakho njengoko uzithanda ngako

“Uze umthande ummelwane wakho njengawe siqu” kuthetha ukuthanda abanye njengoko uzithanda wena. Ngaphambi kokuba uthande abanye, kufuneka ufunde ukuzithanda wena kuqala. Okanye phatha abanye ngendlela oziphatha ngayo, kwaye ubathande abanye ngendlela ozithanda ngayo. Umgaqo othi “umthande ummelwane wakho njengawe siqu” uthetha ukuba akufanele uthiye abanye, kodwa usoloko ubakhathalele abanye. UConfucius wakha wathi: "Musa ukwenza kwabanye into ongafuni ukuba abanye bayenze kuwe." Ngokwembono engalunganga, uConfucius wayekholelwa ukuba into ongayithandiyo ngokuqinisekileyo iya kuthandwa ngabanye, ngoko awuyi kunyanzeliswa kwabanye. Oku kufuna ukuba abantu bathabathe inyathelo lokuqala lokuphatha abanye kakuhle, ukukhathalela abanye, nokubathanda abanye kungakhathaliseki ukuba benza ntoni na.

UYesu wathi" Mthande ummelwane wakho njengoko uzithanda ngako "Inyaniso → uYesu wathobela ukuthanda komyalelo kaYise waza wanikela "ngokwakhe" "umzimba" ongcwele, ongenasono, ongenasiphako, ongenakonakala nongonakaliyo kunye "nobomi" kuthi → ngale ndlela, thina Ngomzimba kunye nobomi UYesu, uyindawo yokuhlala yoMoya oyiNgcwele, itempile yoMoya oyiNgcwele → UBawo ukuYesu, noBawo ukum → UBawo ukubo bonke abantu kwaye uhlala kubo bonke abantu → UYesu “uyawubona” uMzimba wethu kwaye ubomi "bubona" umzimba womntu kunye nobomi bakhe → ithambo emathanjeni akhe nenyama yenyama yakhe! "?

(1) UBawo uyandithanda, ndiyamthanda uBawo

Masifunde iBhayibhile uYohane 10:17 UBawo uyandithanda, ngokuba mna ndibuncama ubomi bam, ukuze ndibuye ndibuthabathe. UYOHANE 17:23 mna ndikubo, wena ukum, ukuze babe ngabazalisekileyo ntweni-nye; ukuze liqonde ihlabathi ukuba wena undithumile, nokuba ubathandile njengokuba wandithandayo nam. 26 Ndilibonakalisile kubo igama lakho, ndandiya kubatyhilela lona, ukuze uthando ondithande ngalo lube kubo, nam ndibe kubo.

[Phawula]: INkosi uYesu yathi: “UBawo uyandithanda, kuba mna ndibuncama ubomi bam, ukuze ndibuye ndibuthabathe Ndinegunya lokuphinda ndiwuthabathe. Ngumyalelo endiwufumene ku "Bawo wam" Jonga kuYohane Isahluko 10:18 " kuthi okanye ibe yeyabo ngoKristu. Inyaniso yevangeli "izelwe ngokutsha" kwaye inobomi benyama bukaYesu → Kungoko uYesu wathandaza kuYise: "mna ndikubo, wena ukum, ukuze babe nokugqibelela; mnye, ukuze liqonde ihlabathi ukuba wena undithumile, Yiza kum, wazi ukuba ubathanda njengokuba wandithandayo nam. Ndilibonakalisile kubo igama lakho, kwaye ndiya kubatyhilela lona, ukuze uthando ondithande ngalo lube kubo, nam ndibe kubo. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

(2) Mthande ummelwane wakho njengoko uzithanda ngako

Masifunde iBhayibhile kuMateyu 22:37-40 size siyifunde kunye: UYesu wathi kuye: “Uze uyithande iNkosi uThixo wakho ngentliziyo yakho iphela, nangomphefumlo wakho uphela, nangengqondo yakho iphela Owesibini umthetho uyafana nothi, Uze umthande ummelwane wakho njengoko uzithanda ngako. Le mithetho yomibini isisiseko sawo wonke umthetho nabaprofeti ummelwane njengoko uzithanda wena.” ILEVITIKUS 19:18 Uze ungaphindezeli; uze ungabakrokreli abantu bakowenu; uze umthande ummelwane wakho ngoko uzithanda ngako. NdinguYehova.

[Phawula] : Ngokufundisisa ezi zibhalo zingasentla, iNkosi uYesu yathi: “Uze uyithande iNkosi uThixo wakho ngentliziyo yakho iphela, nangomphefumlo wakho uphela, nangengqondo yakho iphela. , "Uze umthande ummelwane wakho" "Njengoko uzithanda wena". umthetho wokuqala omthandayo uYehova uThixo wakho; umthetho wesibini Kuthetha ukuthanda ummelwane wakho njengoko uzithanda ngako! Amen. UBawo waseZulwini uyamthanda uYesu, kwaye noYesu uyamthanda uBawo → Kuba uYesu ethobela intando kaBawo oseZulwini kwaye unikela ngomzimba wakhe “ongcwele, ongenasono, nongenakonakala”! Wazinikela ukuba “anikwe” kuthi, ukuze thina “bakholwayo” kuye, oko kukuthi, abo “benzayo” ukuthanda kwakhe, bamkele baze bamkele umzimba nobomi bukaKristu, oko kukuthi, sambathe entsha. umntu kwaye ambathe uKristu. Jonga kuYohane 1:12-13 nakuGal 3:26-27 → “Umntu omtsha” wethu wambatha umzimba nobomi bukaKristu. →Le yitempile yoMoya oyiNgcwele kunye nendawo yokuhlala yoMoya oyiNgcwele! Amen. UMoya Oyingcwele "awuyi" ukuhlala emzimbeni ka-Adam - ibhotile endala yewayini. Funda ngakumbi nceda Ndibuyela kwinto ebendiyithethile ngaphambili [iwayini entsha ifakwa ezintsubeni ezintsha]

→ Kanye njengokuba iNkosi uYesu yathi kuTomas: “Lowo undibonileyo mna umbonile uBawo; mna ndikuye uBawo, uBawo ukum, → Ngokuba uThixo uYise unenceba nothando! Ngelizwi lokwenyaniso leendaba ezilungileyo. kaYesu Kristu—“ukuzalwa ngokutsha” kwethu, ukuze sibe nomzimba nobomi bukaKristu. UBawo ukuYesu nakuthi → "UThixo wethu nguye kuphela uThixo oyinyaniso." Jonga kwabase-Efese 4:6 . →Xa uYesu "ebona" imizimba yethu kwaye ephila, "ubona" umzimba kunye nobomi bakhe! Kuba singamalungu omzimba wayo → ithambo emathanjeni akhe nenyama yasenyameni yakhe! UKristu uyasithanda njengoko ezithanda yena! Amen → oku Oku kuyinyaniso koko kwathethwa nguYesu: “Uze umthande ummelwane wakho njengawe siqu. Ngoko, uyayiqonda? Jonga kwabase-Efese 5:30 .

Kulumkele “ukuthanda ummelwane wakho njengoko uzithanda ngako” NguYesu kuphela onokulutyhila uthando lukaYise Ngoku abaninzi abadala, abefundisi, nabashumayeli “abenza” oko bakuthethayo ngokuthanda ummelwane wakho njengoko uzithanda ngako bethetha ngako enyameni. UAdam, efundisa abazalwana noodade indlela yokusebenzisa inyama endala yomntu ukuze-Uthande ummelwane wakho njengoko uzithanda ngako, kungekhona ngokukaKristu, njengoko ufundiswa ngeemfundiso nobuxoki obungento yanto → Lumka, ungafundiswa ngeemfundiso neenkohliso ezilambathayo, hleze ufundiswe ngeemfundiso neenkohliso ezilambathayo. nizifundise ngeemfundiso neemfundiso zobuxoki, ezingezizo ngokukaKristu, niziphathe ngokwezithethe zabantu, nangokwezithethe zehlabathi. Bafumana ke bendihlonela, Befundisa abantu iimfundiso eziyimithetho yabo. ’” Bhekisela kuMateyu 15:9 nakwabaseKolose 2:8.

INkosi uYesu isinika umyalelo omtsha [ thandanani ] UYohane 13 Isahluko 34-35 Ndiniwisela umthetho omtsha, wokuba nithandane, njengoko ndinithandileyo nina; Ngayo le nto baya kwazi bonke, ukuba ningabafundi bam, ukuba nithe nathandana. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

kulungile! Namhlanje ndingathanda ukwabelana nani ubudlelane bam nani nonke. Ngamana ubabalo lweNkosi uYesu Kristu, uthando lukaThixo, nempefumlelo yoMoya oyiNgcwele ingahlala ihleli nani nonke! Amen

Umfazi onesidima [icawa] uthumela abasebenzi ukuba baye kuthutha ukutya okuvela kwiindawo ezikude esibhakabhakeni, aze asasaze ukutya kuthi kwangethuba ukuze ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke ikhanyisela amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni! Uthando lukaYesu alufuni kutshabalale mntu, Ngoko Kwanga bonke abantu bangasindiswa

(1) Uthando lukaYesu alufuni kutshabalale nabani na

Masifunde iBhayibhile size sifunde eyesi-2 kaPetros 3:8-10 kunye → Bazalwana abathandekayo, kukho into enye eningamele niyilibale: eNkosini imini enye injengeminyaka eliwaka, neminyaka eliwaka injengemini enye. INkosi ayikasizalisekisi isithembiso sayo, kwaye abanye bacinga ukuba iyalibazisa, kanti eneneni ayilibazisi, kodwa inomonde kuni, inganqweneli ukuba kutshabalale nabani na, kodwa ukuba bonke beze enguqukweni. Ke yona imini yeNkosi iya kufika njengesela. Ngaloo mini, amazulu aya kudlula ngesandi esikhulu, yaye zonke izinto eziphathekayo ziya kutshiswa ngomlilo, nomhlaba nayo yonke into ekuwo itshiswe ngomlilo.

[Phawula]: Ngokufunda ezi zibhalo zingasentla, umpostile “uPetros” umzalwana wathi: “Bazalwana abathandekayo, musani ukulibala nto-nye: eNkosini imini enye injengeminyaka eliwaka, neminyaka eliwaka injengemini enye → sibonile ukuba ebukumkanini bukaThixo, ubomi obungunaphakade Akusayi kubakho lusizi, akusayi kubakho kulila, kungabi sabakho kugula, kungabikho ntlungu kwakhona Abanye abantu bacinga ukuba kukulibaziseka, kodwa akuko kulibaziseka, kodwa ngumnqweno wonke umntu Kungale ndlela kuphela eninokuthi nibudle ilifa ubukumkani bukaThixo nize nibudle ilifa uBawo osemazulwini! kwiTestamente eNdala.” "→Ngaloo mini izulu liya kudlula ngesandi esikhulu, yaye zonke izinto ziya kutshatyalaliswa ngomlilo, nomhlaba nazo zonke izinto ezikuwo ziya kutshiswa. Ukukhangela phambili kwizulu elitsha nomhlaba omtsha, ukungena kubukumkani obungunaphakade obuthenjiswe yiNkosi → apho ubulungisa buya kuhlala khona.

(2) Ngamana bonke abantu bangasindiswa baze baqonde indlela yenyaniso

Masifunde eyoku-1 kuTimoti isahluko 2 iindinyana 1-6 eBhayibhileni kwaye sizifunde kunye: Ndiyanibongoza, okokuqala, ukuba nenze izikhungo, imithandazo, izibongozo kunye nemibulelo ngenxa yabantu bonke, ngenxa yookumkani nabo bonke abasemagunyeni, ukuze siphile ubomi bokuhlonela uThixo, obuthe tye, obunoxolo. Oku kuhle, kwamkelekile emehlweni oMsindisi wethu uThixo. Ufuna bonke abantu basindiswe kwaye baqonde indlela yenyaniso . Kuba mnye uThixo; mnye nomlamli phakathi koThixo nabantu, umntu uKristu Yesu, lowo wazinikelayo ukuba abe yintlawulelo yokukhulula abantu bonke; UYohane 3:16-17 “Kuba wenjenje uThixo ukulithanda kwakhe ihlabathi, ude wancama uNyana wakhe okuphela kwamzeleyo, ukuze bonke abakholwayo kuye bangatshabalali, koko babe nobomi obungunaphakade (okanye ukuguqulela: gweba ihlabathi; okufanayo ngezantsi) kukuze ihlabathi lisindiswe ngaye.

[Phawula]: Ngokufunda ezi zibhalo zingasentla, umpostile “uPawulos” wabongoza uMzalwan’ uTimoti → Ndiyakubongoza ukuba kuqala ukhunge, uthandaze, ubongoze yaye ubulele ngenxa yabantu bonke! Ngokunjalo nangookumkani nabo bonke abasekongameni, ukuze thina, bantwana bakaThixo, sihlale ngoxolo nangokuhlonela uThixo. Oku kuhle, kwamkelekile kuThixo. →UThixo wethu ufuna wonke umntu aguquke →akholwe yivangeli kwaye aqonde inyaniso→Ufuna ukuba wonke umntu asindiswe. Amen! Kuba iindaba ezilungileyo zingamandla kaThixo kwaye zifuna wonke umntu okholwayo! Amen. →UThixo walithanda kakhulu ihlabathi kangangokuba wanikela ngoNyana wakhe okuphela kwamzeleyo “uYesu” ukuze bonke abakholwayo kuye bangatshabalali koko babe nobomi obungunaphakade. Ngenxa yokuba uThixo wamthumela uNyana wakhe “uYesu” ehlabathini ukuze angaligwebi ihlabathi (okanye eliguqulelwe ngokuthi: ukugweba ihlabathi; lona elingezantsi), kodwa ukuze ihlabathi lisindiswe ngaye. →Bonke guquka Amen! Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo? Funda eyesi- 2 kwabaseTes 2:13 .

kulungile! Namhlanje ndingathanda ukwabelana nani ubudlelane bam nani nonke. Ngamana ubabalo lweNkosi uYesu Kristu, uthando lukaThixo, nempefumlelo yoMoya oyiNgcwele ingahlala ihleli nani nonke! Amen

articles.title: Uthando lukaYesu: Usana lutyhila ubunyani bevangeli
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
