Namhlanje siza kufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane " uYesu uthando "Hayi. Ntandathu Thetha kwaye wenze umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, Nkosi yethu uYesu Krestu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Umfazi onesidima [icawa] ithumela abasebenzi ukuba bayokuthutha ukutya ukusuka kude ukuya ezulwini, kwaye basasaze ukutya kuthi ngexesha ukuze senze ubomi bethu bomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Thandaza ukuba iNkosi uYesu iqhubeke nokukhanyisela amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuba siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni. Kuyacaca ukuba uthando lukaKristu luyasikhuthaza! Ngenxa yokuba sicinga - njengobutyebi obubekwe kwisitya sodongwe, "ubutyebi" buya kutyhila indlela eyiyo yeendaba ezilungileyo, kwaye ngamana bonke abantu basindiswe. ! Amen!

Le mithandazo ingasentla, umbulelo, kunye neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

kaYesu njengaye uchulumanco Thina, "Baby" sityhila ubunyani bevangeli

Masifunde eyesi-2 kwabaseKorinte 5:14-15 eBhayibhileni size siyifunde kunye: Kuba lusifingile nje uthando lukaKristu, kuba sigqiba kwelithi, ekubeni ufele bonke emnye, bafile bonke abo bangabaphileyo, baphilela yena owafayo, wabuya wavuka ngenxa yabo. Eyesi-2 kwabaseKorinte 4:7-10 obu butyebi sibuphethe ngezitya zodongwe, ukubonakalisa ukuba la mandla makhulu, aphuma kuThixo, angaphumi kuthi. Singqongwe ziintshaba macala onke, kodwa asibambi, kodwa asidaniswa, kodwa asishiywanga phantsi; Sihlala sikuthwele kunye nathi ukufa kukaYesu ukuze ubomi bukaYesu bubonakale kuthi.

[Phawula]: Ngokufunda ezi zibhalo zingasentla, sifumanisa ukuba uthando lukaKristu luyasikhuthaza; Amen. Sinabo obu “butyebi” bubekwe kwizitya zodongwe ukuze sibonise ukuba la mandla makhulu avela kuThixo, akaphumi kuthi, sihlaselwa macala onke, kodwa asibanjisweli, kodwa asidaniswa; . Sisoloko sikuthwele kunye nathi ukufa kukaYesu ukuze ubomi bukaYesu bubonakale kuthi. Amen!

(1) Usana lutyhila ivangeli

Yintoni ivangeli? Masifunde Ibhayibhile ULuka 24: 44-48 Wathi uYesu kubo, Ngawo la amazwi endawathethayo kuni oko bendinani, kubhaliwe kwathiwa, emthethweni kaMoses, nasebaprofetini, nasezindumisweni. ” Waza uYesu wazivula iingqondo zabo ukuze baziqonde iziBhalo, wathi kubo: “Kubhaliwe kwathiwa, UKristu weva ubunzima, wavuka kwabafileyo ngomhla wesithathu; Ndashumayela iindaba ezilungileyo egameni lakhe kuzo zonke iintlanga, ngokuba ningamangqina ezi zinto; yaye wavuswa kwabafileyo ngomhla wesithathu ngokutsho kweBhayibhile.

[Phawula]: Ngokuhlolisisa ezi zibhalo zingasentla, sibhala ukuba “iNkosi uYesu” ngokwayo yathi: “Zonke izinto ezibhaliweyo ngam emthethweni kaMoses, nasebaProfetini, nasezindumisweni mazizaliseke, ngokoko kubhaliweyo eZibhalweni, uKristu Yena uya kuva ubunzima, avuke kwabafileyo ngomhla wesithathu, yaye kuya kuvakaliswa inguquko noxolelo lwezono egameni lakhe kuzo zonke iintlanga, kuqalelwa eYerusalem. Nina ke ningamangqina ezi zinto. Amen.

nompostile “uPawulos” owayeshumayela iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso kwiiNtlanga → Oko nam ndandinishumayeza kona kwakukokuba: okokuqala, uKristu wazifela izono zethu, ngokutsho kweZibhalo, → 1 ukuze sikhululwe esonweni, 2. umthetho nesiqalekiso somthetho--bhekisa kumaRoma 6:6-7 nakwabaseRoma 7:6. Waza wangcwatywa → 3 Ukukhulula umntu omdala nezenzo zakhe - bhekisela kumaKolose 3:9 waza wavuswa ngomhla wesithathu ngokutsho kweBhayibhile. → Uvuko lukaKristu luyasithethelela! Amen. Bona amaRoma 4:25 . Njengoko iBhayibhile isitsho kweyoku-1 kaPetros iSahluko 1:3-5 – “ngovuko lukaYesu Kristu kwabafileyo”, sizalwa ngokutsha → “thina”, Amen! ukuze sibe nethemba eliphilileyo, ukuze sibe nelifa elingenakonakala, elingenakudyobheka, elingenakumbanya, eligcinelwe nina emazulwini. Nina ke nigcinwe ngamandla kaThixo ngokholo, niya kulufumana usindiso olulungiselwe ukutyhilwa ngexesha lokugqibela. Le yivangeli eyashunyayelwa yiNkosi uYesu → umpostile uPawulos, uPetros nabanye abapostile. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

(2) Indlela yokwenyaniso yobuncwane iyatyhilwa

Masifunde iBhayibhile uYohane Isahluko 1:1-2 Ekuqalekeni ube ekho uLizwi, waye uLizwi ekuye uThixo, waye uLizwi enguThixo. Lo Lizwi wayekunye noThixo kwasekuqalekeni. Ivesi 14 ULizwi waba yinyama, wahlala phakathi kwethu, ezele lubabalo nayinyaniso. Sabubukela ubungangamsha bakhe awabunikwa nguYise, njengoko ekukuphela koNyana wakhe; 18 Akukho namnye wakha wambona uThixo, ngaphandle koNyana okuphela kwamzeleyo, lowo usesifubeni sikaYise. 1 KAYOHANE 1:1-2 Ngokuphathelele ilizwi lobomi elalikho kwasekuqalekeni, esalivayo, sayibona, sayibona ngamehlo ethu, sayichukumisa ngezandla zethu. (Obu bomi bubonakalisiwe, nathi sabubona, yaye ngoku siyangqina ukuba sinishumayeza ubomi obungunaphakade, obo bebukuye uYise, kwaye wabonakala nathi.) NgokoMoya wobungcwele, ngokuvuka kwabafileyo. Watyhilwa ukuba unguNyana kaThixo ngamandla amakhulu. Bona amaRoma 1:4 .

[Phawula]: Ekuqaleni kwakukho iTao, kwaye iTao yayikunye noThixo, kwaye iTao yayinguThixo. Lo Lizwi wayekunye noThixo ekuqaleni → waba yinyama, wakhawulwa yiNtombi Enyulu uMariya waza wazalwa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele, wathiywa igama elinguYesu! Amen. Wathi umpostile uYohane! Ngokuphathelele indlela yokuphila yantlandlolo ukususela ekuqaleni, siye seva, sabona, sabona ngamehlo ethu, saza sazichukumisa ngezandla zethu. (Obu bomi bubonakalisiwe, sabubona, ngoku ke ndiyangqina, ukuba ndibunika ubomi obungunaphakade, obo bebukuye uBawo, babonakala kuthi). Sakuba sivusiwe kunye noKristu → sifumene umzimba kunye nobomi bukaYesu Kristu, uNyana kaThixo oyintanda …Sihlala sikuthwele ngaphakathi kwethu ukufa kukaYesu, ukuze nobomi bukaYesu bubonakalaliselwe kuthi. Amen! Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo? Funda eyesi-2 kwabaseKorinte 4:7, 10 .

KULUNGILE! Apha kulapho ndabelana khona nawe ngobudlelwane bam namhlanje Kufuneka umamele ngakumbi kwilizwi eliyinyani kwaye wabelane ngakumbi! Ewe, kufuneka uvume ngomoya wakho, udumise ngomoya wakho, unikele idini elivumba limnandi kuThixo. Ngamana ubabalo lweNkosi uYesu Kristu, nothando lukaThixo uYise, nempefumlelo yoMoya oyiNgcwele, maluhlale nani nonke! Amen

articles.title: Uthando lukaKristu: esenza iindlalifa kuBawo wethu waseZulwini
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo lusapho lwam, mawethu! Amen. Makhe sityhile iBhayibhile yethu kumaHebhere isahluko 9 indinyana 15 Ngenxa yoko waba ngumlamleli womnqophiso omtsha, ekubeni ukufa kwakhe kwacamagushela izono ezenziwa ngabantu ngexesha lomnqophiso wokuqala, wabavulela ithuba abo babiziweyo ukuba bamkele ilifa elingunaphakade.

Namhlanje sizakufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane kunye "Uthando lukaYesu" Hayi. Ntlanu Masithandaze: Abha othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! umfazi onesidima [ICawa] ithumela abasebenzi ukuba bazokuzisa ukutya okuvela kwiindawo ezikude kwaye basinike ngexesha, ukuze ubomi bethu basemoyeni butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Yanga iNkosi uYesu ingaqhubeka ikhanyisela amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuba siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni. UKristu uye waba ngumlamleli womnqophiso omtsha, ekubeni wafa ukuze ahlawulele abo bakumnqophiso wokuqala waza wangena kumnqophiso omtsha, ubenze ababiziweyo ukuba balidle ilifa elingunaphakade elithenjiswe nguAbha, uBawo waseZulwini. . Amen! Le mithandazo ingasentla, umbulelo, kunye neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

Uthando lukaYesu lusenza iindlalifa kwilifa elingunaphakade likaBawo

(1) Ilifa loonyana;

Tyhila uze ufunde iGenesis 21:9-10 → Wandula ke uSara wabona uHagare umYiputa ehlekisa ngonyana ka-Abraham, waza wathi kuAbraham: “Sigxothe esi sicakazana nonyana waso! uIsake.” Ngoku tyhila kumaGalati isahluko 4 indinyana 30. Kodwa ithini iBhayibhile? Lithi, Likhuphele phandle ikhobokazana nonyana walo; kuba unyana wekhobokazana akasayi kuba ndlalifa kunye nonyana wokhululekileyo.

Phawula: Ngokuhlolisisa ezi zibhalo zingasentla, sibhala ukuba unyana owazalwa ‘ngumkhonzazana’ uHagare wazalwa ‘ngegazi’; Aba “ngabafazi” ababini abayiminqophiso emibini → iTestamente Endala neTestamente Entsha. itestamente endala →Abantwana abazelwe “ngegazi”, yaye phantsi komthetho, “bangamakhoboka, amakhoboka esono” yaye “abanako” ilifa, ngoko ke abantwana benyama bamele bakhutshelwe ngaphandle;

ITestamente Entsha →Abantwana abazelwe "ngomfazi okhululekileyo" bazalwa "ngedinga" okanye "abazelwe nguMoya oyiNgcwele". Abo bazalwa ngokwenyama → "Inyama yethu endala yenyama" baya kubatshutshisa abo bazelwe ngomoya → "abo bazelwe nguThixo", ngoko simele sibagxothe abo bazelwe yinyama kwaye mabavumele abo "bazelwe ngumfazi okhululekileyo" oko kukuthi, The → "umntu omtsha" woMoya oyiNgcwele ilifa likaYise. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo? Andiyiqondi. Amen.

Inyama yethu endala yobuntu izalwe ngabazali bethu, idalwe ngothuli njengo “Adam”, ezelwe ngokwenyama → ezelwe esonweni, ezelwe phantsi komthetho, singamakhoboka esono, yaye asinakukwazi ukubudla ilifa ubukumkani bamazulu. . →Bona iNdumiso 51:5 Ndazalelwa esonweni, umama esonweni kwasekukhawulweni kwam. → Ke ngoko, umntu wethu omdala kufuneka abhaptizwe kuKristu kwaye abethelelwe kunye naye ukuze atshabalalise umzimba wesono kwaye abaleke kulo mzimba wokufa. Mabathi abo bazelwe “ngumfazi okhululekileyo” → 1 bazalwe ngamanzi noMoya oyiNgcwele, 2 bazalwe ngevangeli likaYesu Krestu, 3 babe “ngumntu omtsha” ozelwe nguThixo, bazuze ilifa likaBawo Osemazulwini. . Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

(2) Ngokusekelwe emthethweni kungekhona kwisithembiso

Masifunde iBhayibhile kumaGalati 3:18 Kuba ilifa elo, ukuba liphuma emthethweni, loba liphumi edingeni; kwabaseRoma 4:14 Ukuba ke ngabo basemthethweni kuphela iindlalifa, ukholo loba luyinto engeyanto, nedinga lingaba liphuthisiwe.

Qaphela: Ngokomthetho hayi ngokwesithembiso, ndiye ndabelana nabantakwethu kushicilelo oludlulileyo ndicela nibuyele umva nimamele kakuhle. Namhlanje eyona nto iphambili kukuvumela abazalwana noodade baqonde indlela yokufumana ilifa likaBawo oseZulwini. Ngenxa yokuba umthetho uxhokonxa ingqumbo kaThixo, abo bazelwe ngokwenyama bangamakhoboka esono yaye abanakulidla ilifa ilifa likaYise kuphela → “abazelwe ngokwedinga” okanye “abazelwe ngoNgcwele UMoya" ngabantwana bakaThixo Kuphela kwaye ngabantwana bakaThixo abanokuzuza ilifa likaBawo wabo waseZulwini. Abo bangomthetho bangamakhoboka esono kwaye abanako ukulidla ilifa → bangomthetho hayi isithembiso → abo basemthethweni bahlulwe kuKristu kwaye bawa elubabalweni → baye bazibhangisa iintsikelelo ezithenjiswe nguThixo. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

(3) Thina sililifa likaBawo wethu waseZulwini

IDUTERONOMI 4:20 wanikhupha uYehova eYiputa, ezikweni lesinyithi, ukuba anenze abantu abalilifa lenu, njengoko ninjalo namhla. Isahluko 9 29 Ke ngabantu bakho nelifa lakho, obakhuphileyo ngamandla akho, nangengalo yakho eyolukileyo. Tyhila kwabase-Efese 1:14 kwakhona loMoya oyiNgcwele isibambiso (isicatshulwa sokuqala: ilifa) selifa lethu bade abantu bakaThixo (isicatshulwa sokuqala: ilifa) bakhululwe ukuze kudunyiswe uzuko lwakhe. KUMAHEBHERE 9:15 Ngenxa yoko uye waba ngumlamleli womnqophiso omtsha, ukuze abo babiziweyo bamkele idinga lelifa elingunaphakade, efile nje, ukuze bacamagushele izono ezenziwa phantsi komnqophiso wokuqala.

Phawula: KwiTestamente Endala → UYehova uThixo wawakhupha amaSirayeli eYiputa nakwiziko lentsimbi, amakhoboka esono phantsi komthetho → ukuze abe ngabantu abakhethekileyo ababeza kufumana ilifa likaThixo, nangona amaSirayeli amaninzi “ayengakholwa” kuThixo. bonke abangakholwayo babeyintlango yokonakala → isebenza njengesilumkiso kwabo bakwimihla yokugqibela. Abantwana esibazalayo ngedinga “lokholo” → “uMoya Oyingcwele” bubungqina belifa lethu de abantu bakaThixo → Ilifa likaThixo lihlawulelwe ukuze kudunyiswe uzuko lwakhe. Amen! Ngenxa yokuba uYesu ungumlamleli womnqophiso omtsha, wafa emnqamlezweni ngenxa yezono zethu → intlawulelo yezono zethu. ukuqeshwa kwangaphambili "Oko kukuthi, umnqophiso womthetho, abathi abo baphantsi komthetho bakhululwa → esonweni nasemthethweni → nabo babiziweyo bavunyelwa ukuba bangene." ITestamente Entsha Yamkela ilifa elingunaphakade elithenjisiweyo . Amen! Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

kulungile! Namhlanje ndingathanda ukwabelana nani ubudlelane bam nani nonke. Ngamana ubabalo lweNkosi uYesu Kristu, uthando lukaThixo, nempefumlelo yoMoya oyiNgcwele ingahlala ihleli nani nonke! Amen

articles.title: Uthando lukaYesu: ukusinika ubuntwana
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo lusapho lwam, mawethu! Amen.

Masivule iiBhayibhile zethu kumaEfese 1:3-5 size sizifunde kunye: Makabongwe uThixo, uYise weNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Wasisikelela ngeentsikelelo zonke zoMoya kwezasezulwini iindawo, sikuKristu; ukuze senziwe oonyana ngoYesu Kristu, ngokokuthanda kwakhe. . Amen

Namhlanje siza kufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane " uYesu uthando "Hayi. 4 Masithandaze: Abha othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Umfazi onesidima [ibandla] uthumela abasebenzi ukuba bathwale ukutya okuvela kwiindawo ezikude esibhakabhakeni, baze basinike ukutya ngexesha elifanelekileyo, ukuze ubomi bethu bokomoya bube nobutyebi ngakumbi! Amen. Yanga iNkosi uYesu ingaqhubeka ikhanyisela amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuba siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni. Qondani ukuba uThixo wasinyula kuKrestu kwangaphambi kokusekwa kwehlabathi. . Amen!

Le mithandazo ingasentla, umbulelo, kunye neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

(1) Sikufumana njani ukuba ngoonyana bakaThixo?

Masifunde iBhayibhile kumaGalati Chapter 4:1-7 Ndathi abo badla ilifa “ubukumkani bamazulu” nangona bengabaphathi belifa lilonke, “xa babengabantwana” kubhekiselwa kwixesha laxa bathe “bangabantwana”. babephantsi komthetho yaye bengamakhoboka esono→- -Ubugwala kwaye ungenamsebenzi wesikolo samabanga aphantsi, ngaba ukulungele ukuba likhoboka lakhe kwakhona Bhekisela kuGal. 4:9 21 Kodwa akukho kwahluka phakathi kwaso nekhoboka; kodwa inkosi ingumthetho, negosa lalo lilindile, wada wafika uyise ngexesha elimisiweyo. Kukwanjalo naxa sasingabantwana "sabantwana" kwaye silawulwa sisikolo samabanga aphantsi → "umthetho". Xa inzaliseko yexesha ifikile, uThixo wathumela uNyana wakhe, ozelwe ngumfazi ogama linguMariya oyiNtombi Enyulu, owazalelwa phantsi komthetho → Ekubeni umthetho wawubuthathaka ngenyama yaye wawungenakwenza nto, uThixo wamthumela uNyana wakhe waba Ukufana nomzimba wesono owasebenza njengomnikelo wesono waza wagwetywa isono esenyameni - bhekisa kumaRoma 8:3.

(2) Sizalelwa phantsi komthetho, sikhulula abo baphantsi komthetho ukuze sibe ngoonyana

Nangona “uYesu” wazalelwa phantsi komthetho, ngenxa yokuba engenasono yaye engcwele, akanguye owasemthethweni. Ngoko, uyayiqonda? →UThixo wamenza “uYesu” ongenasono ukuba abe sisono ngenxa yethu →ukukhulula abo baphantsi komthetho ukuze sizuze ukwenziwa oonyana. →“Phawula:Ukwenziwa oonyana 1 kukukhululwa kuwo umthetho, 2 ukukhululwa esonweni, 3 nokulahla umntu omdala → Ekubeni ningoonyana, uThixo uthume uMoya woNyana wakhe;"UMoya Oyingcwele" ungene kuwe (umbhalo wokuqala uthi) Intliziyo iyadanduluka isithi: “Abha Bawo!” → Oko kukuthi, ngokuvuka kukaYesu Kristu kwabafileyo, “sizalwa ngokutsha” → kwaye samkela ukuba ngoonyana bakhe! Thixo! Amen. Ngoko, uyayiqonda? —Funda eyoku-1 kaPetros isahluko 1 indinyana 3 . →Kunokubonwa ukuba ukususela ngoku kuse phambili, awusengumkhonzi, oko kukuthi, “ikhoboka lesono,” kodwa ungunyana, yaye ekubeni ungunyana, uyindlalifa kaThixo. "Khangela" ukuba awukholwa "uYesu ukuhlawule "emthethweni, esonweni, nakumntu omdala." Ngaloo ndlela, "ukholo" lwakho alunabo ubuntwana bakho bukaThixo. Uyayiqonda?

(3) UThixo wasimisela kwangaphambili ukuba samkeleke oonyana ngoYesu Kristu ngaphambi kokusekwa kwehlabathi.

Masifunde iBhayibhile Kwabase-Efese 1:3-9 Makabongwe uThixo noYise weNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Wasisikelela ngeentsikelelo zonke zoMoya kwezasezulwini iindawo, sikuKristu; owamiselwa ngenxa engaphambili ukuba asenziwe oonyana ngoYesu Kristu, ngokokuthanda kwakhe, ukuze kudunyiswe ubabalo lwakhe oluzukileyo, awasibabala ngalo ngoNyana wakhe oyintanda, uYesu Kristu. Sinentlawulelo ngegazi lalo Nyana oyintanda, uxolelo lwezono zethu, ngokobutyebi bobabalo lwakhe. Sibabalwe nguThixo ngokugqithileyo, kubo bonke ubulumko nokuqonda kwakhe; —Funda eyabase-Efese 1:3-9 . Esi sibhalo singcwele sikucacisile, yaye wonke umntu ufanele asiqonde.

kulungile! Namhlanje ndithanda ukwabelana nani nonke ngobudlelwane bam. Amen

articles.title: Uthando lukaKristu: lusenza ubulungisa bukaThixo
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo lusapho lwam, mawethu! Amen.

Masivule iiBhayibhile zethu kweyesi-2 kwabaseKorinte 5 nakwindinyana 21 size sifunde kunye: Lowo ungazani nasono, wamenza isono ngenxa yethu, ukuze thina sibe bubulungisa bukaThixo kuye. Amen

Namhlanje siza kufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane " uYesu uthando "Hayi. 3 Masithandaze: Abha othandekayo, Bawo wethu waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele ehlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Abafazi abalungileyo [iicawa] bathumela abasebenzi! Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Yanga iNkosi uYesu ingaqhubeka ikhanyisela amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuba siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni. Lowo ungazani nasono, wamenza isono ngenxa yethu, ukuze thina sibe bubulungisa bukaThixo ngoYesu Kristu ! Amen.

Le mithandazo ingasentla, umbulelo, kunye neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

Uthando lukaYesu lwaba sisono ngenxa yethu ukuze sibe bubulungisa bukaThixo kuye

(1) UThixo wenza abangenasono

Makhe sijonge eyoku-1 kaYohane 3:5 kwaye siyifunde kunye → Niyazi ukuba uYehova wabonakala ukuze asuse isono somntu, apho kungekho sono. Imbekiselo - 1 Yohane 3:5 → Akenzanga sono, kungekho nkohliso emlonyeni wakhe. EyokuQala kaPetros Isahluko 2 Indinyana 22 → Ekubeni sinombingeleli omkhulu nje, lowo unyuke waya emazulwini, UYesu ke, uNyana kaThixo, masilubambe uvumo lwethu. Ngokuba akanakuvelana nobuthathaka bethu; Wahendwa kuzo zonke iindawo njengathi, kodwa engenasono. Imbekiselo - Hebhere 4 ivesi 14-15. Qaphela: Intsingiselo yantlandlolo yegama elithi “ongenasono” nguThixo “kukungasazi isono” kanye njengomntwana ongakwaziyo okulungileyo nokubi. UYesu liLizwi elenziwe umntu → ungcwele, akanasono, akanasiphako, kwaye akanabala! Akukho mthetho wokulungileyo nokubi → Apho kungekho mthetho, akukho lukreqo! Ngoko akazange one, kuba iLizwi likaThixo lalisentliziyweni yakhe, yaye wayengenasono! Hayi indlela yeNkosi! Amen. Andazi noba uyaqonda?

(2) Yiba sisono ngenxa yethu

Masifunde iBhayibhile kwaye sifunde uIsaya 53:6 kunye → Sonke sinjengezimvu silahlekile; → Wazithwala izono zethu ngokobuqu emthini ukuze, safa kwisono, siphile ebulungiseni. Naphiliswa ngemivumbo yakhe. Imbekiselo - Eyoku-1 kaPetros 2:24 → Lowo ungazani nasono (ongasazi isono) wamenza isono ngenxa yethu, ukuze thina sibe bubulungisa bukaThixo kuye. Imbekiselo— 2 Korinte 5:21 . Qaphela: UThixo wazibeka izono zethu sonke kuYesu “ongenasono”, waba sisono ngenxa yethu, wathwala izono zethu. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

(3) Ukuze sibe bubulungisa bukaThixo kuye

Masifunde iBhayibhile, kwabaseRoma 3:25-26 uThixo wamisela uYesu njengocamagushelo ngegazi likaYesu nangokholo lomntu ukuze abonakalise ubulungisa bukaThixo; abonakalalise ubulungisa bakhe ngeli xesha, ukuze abonakale ukuba ulilungisa, kwanomgwebeli wabo bakholwayo kuYesu. →Isahluko 5 Indinyana 18-19 Ngoko, njengokuba kwathi ngasiphoso sinye bagwetywa bonke, ngokunjalo bonke bayagwetyelwa, baba nobomi, ngesenzo esinye sobulungisa. Njengokuba kwathi, ngokungeva komntu omnye lowo, abaninzi benziwa aboni, ngokunjalo kwathi, nangokuva komnye lo, abaninzi benziwa amalungisa. → Naye ninjalo ke inxenye yenu; kuloko nahlanjululwayo, nangcwaliswa, nagwetyelwayo egameni leNkosi uYesu Kristu, nangoMoya kaThixo wethu. Imbekiselo— 1 Korinte 6:11 .

Phawula: UThixo wammisela uYesu ukuba abe sisicamagushelo sokukuhlambulula kuzo zonke izono “ngegazi” likaYesu, Ngokholo lomntu uya kubonakalisa ubulungisa bukaThixo, ukuze abantu bazi ukuba yena ulilungisa, yaye uya kubagwebela abo bamenzakalisayo. kholwani kuYesu. Ngenxa yokungeva kuka-Adam omnye, bonke benziwa isono; Ngoko uYehova wavelisa usindiso lwakhe → UThixo wenza uNyana wakhe okuphela kwamzeleyo, uYesu, “ongenasono” ukuba abe sisono ngenxa yethu → ukuze asindise abantu bakhe esonweni aze abakhulule kwisiqalekiso somthetho → 1 ekhululwe esonweni, 2 Akuba ekhululwe 3 nizihlubile ixhego lika-Adam. ukuze sikuzuze ukwenziwa oonyana bakaThixo, ukuze sibe bubulungisa bukaThixo ngoYesu Kristu. Amen! Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

kulungile! Namhlanje ndingathanda ukwabelana nani ubudlelane bam nani nonke. Ngamana ubabalo lweNkosi uYesu Kristu, uthando lukaThixo, nempefumlelo yoMoya oyiNgcwele ingahlala ihleli nani nonke! Amen

articles.title: Uthando lukaYesu: ukuzaliseka komthetho
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo lusapho lwam, mawethu! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibhile yethu kuMateyu 5:17-18 size sifunde kunye: Ningabi ndize kuchitha umthetho, nokuba ngabaprofeti; andize kuchitha umthetho, ndize kuzalisekisa. Inene ndithi kuni, Lide lidlule izulu nehlabathi, akuyi kudlula nalinye igatya nalinye. Kumelwe kukuzaliseka konke .

Masifunde iBhayibhile kwiSityhilelo 17:1-6, enye yeengelosi ezisixhenxe ezineengqayi ezisixhenxe yeza kum yaza yathi: “Yiza apha, ndikubonise isohlwayo sehenyukazi elikhulu elihleli phezu kwamanzi ookumkani bomhlaba bakrexeze nayo, nabo bemiyo phezu komhlaba banxiliswe yiwayini yobuhenyu bayo.” . . . emhlabeni.” “Unina wamasikizi.” Ndaza ndabona umfazi enxile ligazi labangcwele negazi lamangqina kaYesu. Ndathi ndakumbona ndothuka kakhulu. Qaphela: Icawe apho ukumkani womhlaba kunye nebandla badityaniswe khona → "yimfihlelo"! Ngaphandle "yiCawa yamaKristu", kwaye awukwazi ukuthetha inyaniso kobuxoki Ibizwa ngokuba "yimfihlelo" → Kodwa ngaphakathi, ookumkani bomhlaba bakrexeza kunye "naye", icawa, isebenzisana nayo. omnye komnye, esebenzisa imigaqo yehlabathi nentanda-bulumko yabantu, engazilandeli zona iimfundiso zikaKristu, nizifundiswa ngokwezithethe zabantu.

Uhlobo lwesibini lwehenyukazi

EKAYAKOBI 4:4 Bakrexezikazindini, anazi na ukuba ubuhlobo balo ihlabathi bubutshaba kuye uThixo? Ngoko ke, nabani na ofuna ukuba ngumhlobo wehlabathi ulutshaba lukaThixo.

Kwinkoliso yeecawa zehlabathi, abantu abaninzi banxiliswe yiwayini yobuhenyu bayo, obububuConfucius behlabathi nobuxoki obulahlekisayo, oku kuthetha ukuba icawa iye yadibanisa iintanda-bulumko zehlabathi, iNeo-Confucianism, enjengobuTao, ubuConfucius. , ubuBhuda nezinye iingcamango neemfundiso ezinyulu nezingaxutywanga zingeniswa ecaweni. Ngoko ke, ukuba uthe waba kuyimbi indoda, isaphila indoda yakhe, kothiwa ungumkrexezi;

Namhlanje siza kufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane " Ulwalamano oluphakathi kwesono nomthetho lufaniswa nolwalamano oluphakathi komfazi nendoda yakhe 》Umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhleli enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Umfazi onesidima【 ecaweni 】Thumelani abasebenzi-ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo nelithethiweyo ezandleni zabo, elilivangeli losindiso lwenu. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Yanga iNkosi uYesu ingaqhubeka ikhanyisela amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuba siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni. Ukwazi ukuba “umthetho” ulawula abantu ngoxa sisaphila, siyafa kuwo umthetho ngomzimba kaKristu, usivumela ukuba sibuyele kwiNkosi uYesu evusiweyo! Ukuba “umoni” akafanga “emthethweni”—uyawaphula umthetho aze aguqukele komnye umntu, ubizwa ngokuba ngumkrexezi—umkrexezikazi wokomoya. .

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

(1) Umthetho ulawula abantu → ngelixa usaphila "njengomoni"

Masifunde amaRoma 7:1-3 eBhayibhileni siwafunde kunye: Mawethu, ndithi kuni, nina bawuqondayo umthetho, anazi na ukuba umntu ulawulwa ngumthetho xa edla ubomi? njengokuba umfazi enendoda, ubotshiwe ngumthetho, lo gama indoda isadla ubomi; kodwa ukuba ithe yafa indoda, ukhululekile emthethweni wendoda leyo. Ngoko ke, ukuba ithe indoda yakhe yadla ubomi, waba ngowenye indoda, kothiwa ungumkrexezikazi, ukuba ithe yafa indoda yakhe, ukhululekile emthethweni wayo;

[Phawula]: Ngokufunda ezi zibhalo zingasentla, umpostile “uPawulos” wathi: “Bazalwana, ngoku ndithi kwabawaziyo umthetho → oko kukuthi, kwabo bawuqondayo “umnqophiso wokuqala,” oko kukuthi, umthetho weTestamente Endala, Anazi na ukuba umthetho ulawula abantu, nokuba ngaba udla ubomi umoni, abo baphantsi komthetho bangabakhonzi besono, ngokuba amandla esono ngumthetho? KwabaseKorinte 15:56 → Ngalo lonke ixesha sisaphila, sibotshiwe ngumthetho, kuba siphantsi komthetho. Ulawulo lomthetho yiyo i" ulwaphulo-mthetho ". Ke, uyayiqonda?

(2) Ulwalamano oluphakathi kwesono nomthetho lufaniswa nolwalamano lomfazi nomyeni wakhe

Apha umpostile “uPawulos” uthelekisa “ubudlelwane phakathi kwesono nomthetho” “nolwalamano phakathi komfazi nendoda yakhe” →_ Kanye njengokuba “umfazi” efaniswa “nomoni” “onendoda” efaniswa. Ngokunjalo nendoda ifaniswa nomthetho ngalo lonke ixesha isadla ubomi, umfazi ubotshiwe ngumthetho womtshato, ukuba indoda yakhe ithe yafa, ukhululekile emthethweni wendoda yakhe. Ngoko ke, ukuba indoda yakhe idla ubomi, woba ngowenye into (oko kukuthi, “umfazi” akakakhululwa emthethweni “womtshato”) ukuba uthe waba ngumkrexezikazi, wothiwa ungumkrexezi Ukuba ithe yafa indoda, ukhululekile emthethweni wendoda yakhe, ukuba uthe waba ngumkrexezikazi.

Ngoko ke unxulumano phakathi “kwaboni nomthetho” luyafana → KwabaseRoma 7:4 , :19 "UPawulos" wathi → Ndafa "emthethweni" ngenxa yomthetho! ukuze nisiswe kwabanye, kulowo wavuswayo kwabafileyo → [iNkosi uYesu Kristu], ukuze sithwale isiqhamo “somoya” kuThixo.

(3) Ukuba umfazi uyaphila ‘njengomoni’ yaye uza kuKristu, ungumkrexezi

Ukuba nina “boni” niphila “ningafanga kuwo umthetho, ningakhange nibalekele ebukhobokeni bawo umthetho, niguqukele kuKristu, nithi, “lihenyukazi” [ihenyukazi lokomoya] . Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

Abantu abaninzi bafana “neehagu” eziye zahlanjululwa zabuyela ekuzigaqeni edakeni; ukuqeshwa kwangaphambili Husband" date. Oko kuthetha ukuba unayo Amadoda "amabini" → indoda enye "yeTestamente Entsha", wena "umkrexezikazi okhulileyo ngokomoya" ". Galati 4: 5 UThixo wathumela uNyana wakhe okuphela kwamzeleyo ukuze akhulule abo baphantsi "komthetho" ukuze ufikelele eNkosini uYesu Kristu; kodwa abaninzi "babuya" kwaye bafuna ukuba ngamakhoboka phantsi komthetho. Ukuba ngaboni. Aba bantu “bayakrexeza” yaye “bakrexeza ngokwasemoyeni” yaye babizwa ngokuba ngabakrexezi ngokomoya. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

ULUKA 6:46 Yathi ke iNkosi, Yini na ukuba nindibize ngokuthi, Nkosi, Nkosi, nibe ningawathobeli amazwi am? umthetho ngoku "ukhululekile" emthethweni, usivumela ukuba sikhonze iNkosi "Aboni abangakhululekanga emthethweni abanako ukuyikhonza iNkosi."

Ngokobutsha bomoya (umoya: okanye uguqulelwe njengoMoya Oyingcwele), kungekhona ngokwendlela yakudala yesithethe. → Ke ukuba nikhokelwa nguMoya oyiNgcwele, anikho phantsi komthetho. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo? Bhekisela kumaGalati isahluko 5 indinyana 18

kulungile! Namhlanje ndithanda ukwabelana nani nonke ngobudlelane bam. Amen

articles.title: Apho kungekho mthetho, akukho sigqitho
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubazalwana noodade bam abathandekayo kwintsapho kaThixo! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibhile kumaRoma isahluko 4 kunye nevesi 15 size sifunde kunye: Kuba umthetho umqumbisa; kwaye apho kungekho mthetho, akukho sigqitho. .

Namhlanje siza kufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane " Apho kungekho mthetho, akukho sigqitho 》Umthandazo: Abha othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele usoloko enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Umfazi onesidima [ibandla] uthumela abasebenzi – ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo nelithethiweyo ezandleni zabo, eliyivangeli yosindiso lwethu → esizisa isonka esivela kude ezulwini, ukuze silungiselele ukutya ngexesha elifanelekileyo, ukuze thina ubomi buninzi ngakumbi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke ikhanyisela amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye siwabone amazwi akho, aziinyaniso zasemoyeni→ Yazini ukuba apho kungekho mthetho, akukho sigqitho; .

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

(1) Ulwalamano phakathi komthetho nesono

Umbuzo: Ngaba kukho umthetho "kuqala"? Okanye ngaba "kuqala" unetyala?
Impendulo: Kuqala kukho umthetho, kwandule ke kubekho isono. →Ke apho kungekho mthetho, akukho sikreqo; Amen! →"Ngenxa yokuba amandla esono angumthetho" →Ulawulo lwamandla omthetho [kukulawula izigqitho, izono, naboni] Ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo? —Funda eyoku-1 kwabaseKorinte 15:56 namaRoma 4:15 .

Umbuzo: Yintoni isono?
Impendulo: Ukwaphula umthetho kusisono → Othe wona waphula umthetho, usisono; Bhekisela kweyoku- 1 kaYohane 3:4

Umbuzo: Siyintoni isizathu "sesono"?
Impendulo: Xa sasisenyameni, isono "sazalwa" ngenxa "yomthetho" →Kuba oko besikwinyama, iinkanuko ezimbi ezizelwe ngumthetho zakusebenza emalungwini ethu, zithwala isiqhamo sokufa. Bhekisela kumaRoma 7:5

→ "Iinkanuko zenyama, zisebenza emalungwini" → Xa iinkanuko zikhawulwe, zizala isono; Bhekisela kuYakobi 1:15

Umbuzo: Uvela phi umzimba wethu wesono?
Impendulo: Umzimba wethu onesono wazalwa ngukhokho wethu [uAdam]. → Oku kufana kanye njengokuba isono sangena ehlabathini ngamntu mnye, uAdam, ukufa kwaphuma esonweni, ngoko ukufa kweza wonke umntu ngenxa yokuba wonke umntu wona. …Kodwa ukususela kuAdam kuye kuMoses, ukufa kwalawula, kwanabo bangonanga njengoAdam. U-Adam wayengumfuziselo wendoda eyayiza kuza. Funda kwabaseRoma 5:12, 14

(2) Ulwalamano phakathi komthetho, isono nokufa

Umbuzo: Ekubeni “ukufa” kuvela “esonweni” singakusinda njani ekufeni?
Impendulo: Ukuba ufuna ukusinda ekufeni, kufuneka usinde esonweni → Ukuba ufuna ukusinda esonweni, kufuneka usinde emthethweni.

Umbuzo: Usibalekela njani isono?
Impendulo: "Kholwani" ukuba umntu omnye kuKristu "wabafela" bonke, kwaye bonke bafa. →“Lowo ufileyo ukhululwe esonweni.”—Funda amaRoma 6:7

→ "Kholwani" kwaye bonke bafa, "Kholwani" kwaye bonke basindiswa esonweni. Amen!

Asihambi ngokubona, kodwa ngokholo → Ngokubona inyama yam iphilile, nangokholo umntu wam omdala wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni wafa noKristu. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo? Bona eyesi- 2 kwabaseKorinte 5:14 .

Umbuzo: Ubaleka njani umthetho?
Impendulo: Safa kuwo umthetho, endikhonkxiwe ngawo umzimba kaKristu, yaye ngoku sikhululekile kuwo umthetho → Ngoko ke, bazalwana bam, nani nafa kuwo umthetho ngawo umzimba kaKristu Ngokomthetho osibopheyo, ngoku sikhululekile kuwo umthetho, ukuze siyikhonze iNkosi ngokobutsha bomoya (umoya: okanye ukuguqulelwa njengoMoya oyiNgcwele) kungekhona ngokwendlela yakudala. Bhekisela kumaRoma 7:4, 6

(3) Apho kungekho mthetho, akukho sigqitho

1 Apho kungekho mthetho, akukho sigqitho : Ngokuba umthetho umqumbisa; KwabaseRoma 4 Isiqendu 15
2 kuba, kungekho mthetho, isono sifile — Roma 7:8
3 Ke, kungekho mthetho, isono asisosono; : Ngaphambi komthetho isono sasisele sikho ehlabathini; Roma 5:13
4 Ukuba ninomthetho, niya kugwetywa ngokomthetho; : Bonke abonileyo ngaphandle komthetho, baya kutshabalala ngokunjalo bengenamthetho; Roma 2:12

[Qaphela]: Abantwana abazelwe nguThixo "banomthetho kaKristu", kwaye isishwankathelo somthetho nguKristu - bhekisa kumaRoma 10:4 → Umthetho kaKristu nguKristu. "njenga" ! Mthande ummelwane wakho njengoko uzithanda ngako ! Amen. Kuba ngaphandle komthetho "wokugwetyelwa", bekungayi kubakho sono nalwaphulo-mthetho . Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo? ngoko ILizwi likaThixo liyimfihlelo Ityhilwa kuphela kubantwana bakaThixo! Ke bona abo “bangaphandle” ukuba bayeva, bayeva, kodwa abaqondi; Bona eyoku- 1 kaYohane 3:9 nese-5:18 .

KULUNGILE! Namhlanje ndithanda ukwabelana nani nonke ngobudlelane bam. Amen

articles.title: Ubulungisa bukaThixo bubonakalisiwe ngaphandle komthetho
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo lusapho lwam, mawethu! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibhile yethu kumaRoma isahluko 3 iindinyana 21-22 size sizifunde kunye: Ngoku ke kutyhiliwe ubulungisa bukaThixo, kungekho mthetho, bungqinelwa ngumthetho nabaprofeti: ubulungisa ke bukaThixo, obungokukholwa kuYesu Kristu, buphezu kwabo bonke abakholwayo, kungabi kucalulwa; .

Namhlanje siza kufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane " Ubulungisa bukaThixo bubonakalisiwe ngaphandle komthetho 》Umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhleli enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Umfazi onesidima [ibandla] wathuma ngezandla zabo abasebenzi ababhalayo, beshumayela ilizwi lenyaniso, eziziindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwenu! Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Yanga iNkosi uYesu ingaqhubeka ikhanyisela amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuba siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni. Qonda ukuba “ubulungisa” bukaThixo butyhilwe ngaphandle komthetho . Lo mthandazo ungasentla,

Thandaza, bongoza, bulela, kwaye usikelele! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

(1) Ubulungisa bukaThixo

Umbuzo: Butyhilwa phi ubulungisa bukaThixo?
Impendulo: Ngoku ubulungisa bukaThixo butyhiliwe ngaphandle komthetho.

Makhe sijonge kwabaseRoma 3:21-22 siwafunde kunye: Kungoku ke kutyhiliwe ubulungisa bukaThixo, kungekho mthetho, bunobungqina bomthetho nabaprofeti; bubulungisa bukaThixo obunikelwa kuzo zonke izinto. Ngokukholwa kuYesu Krestu akukho kwahluka kwabakholwayo. Tyhila kwakhona kumaRoma 10:3 kuba abo bangabaziyo ubulungisa bukaThixo baze bafune ukumisa obabo ubulungisa abaluthobeli ubulungisa bukaThixo.

[Phawula]: Ngokuhlolisisa ezi zibhalo zingasentla, sibhala ukuba ngoku “ubulungisa” bukaThixo butyhiliwe “ngaphandle komthetho”, njengoko kungqinwa ngumthetho nabaprofeti → uYesu wathi kubo: “Ndandisenza oku oko bendinani Ndithi kuni, zimelwe kukuzaliseka zonke izinto ezibhaliweyo ngam emthethweni kaMoses, nasebaProfetini, nasezindumisweni.”— Luka 24:44 .

Lithe ke lakuzaliseka ixesha, uThixo wamthuma uNyana wakhe, owazalelwa umfazi, ezelwe phantsi komthetho, ukuze abakhulule ngentlawulelo abaphantsi komthetho, ukuze sikuzuze ukwenziwa oonyana. Isingqinisiso – Plus isahluko 4 iivesi 4-5. →“Ubulungisa” bukaThixo bungqinwa koko kubhalwe eMthethweni, kubaProfeti nakwiiNdumiso, oko kukuthi, uThixo wathumela uNyana wakhe okuphela kwamzeleyo uYesu, uLizwi waba yinyama, wakhawulwa yiNtombi Enyulu uMariya waza wazalwa nguNyana kaThixo. uMoya oyiNgcwele, waza wazalelwa phantsi komthetho, ukuze akhulule abo baphantsi komthetho→ 1 bakhululekile kuwo umthetho , 2 Ukhululekile esonweni, khulula umntu omdala . Ngokuvuswa kukaYesu Krestu kwabafileyo, sizalwa ngokutsha → ukuze sifumane oonyana bakaThixo ! Amen. ke, Ukwamkela "unyana kaThixo" kukuba ngaphandle komthetho, ukukhululeka esonweni nokulahla umntu omdala→ Kungale ndlela kuphela apho umntu anokufumana “igama lonyana kaThixo” ";

ngokuba amandla esono Kungumthetho - bhekisa kweyoku-1 kwabaseKorinte 15:56 → Emthethweni " ngaphakathi "Yintoni ebonakalayo 〔ulwaphulo-mthetho〕 , as long use" ubugebenga" -Umthetho unako ngokucacileyo phuma. Yini na ukuba uwe phantsi komthetho? , ngokuba wena umoni , esemthethweni amandla kunye nobubanzi Yinyamekele nje ulwaphulo-mthetho 〕. Ngaphakathi komthetho kukho aboni bodwa. Akukho nyana kaThixo-akukho bulungisa bukaThixo . Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

(2) Ubulungisa bukaThixo busekelwe elukholweni, ngoko ukholo

Ngokuba ubulungisa bukaThixo bubonakalaliswa ngazo ezi ndaba zilungileyo; Njengoko kubhaliwe kwathiwa: “Ilungisa liya kudla ubomi ngokholo.”—Roma 1:17. →Kule meko, singathini? IiNtlanga ezazingabusukeli ubulungisa ngokwenene zafumana ubulungisa, “obubulungisa” obuphuma “elukholweni”. Kodwa amaSirayeli ayesukela ubulungisa bomthetho, kodwa asilela ukufumana ubulungisa bomthetho. Siyintoni isizathu soku? Kungenxa yokuba abaceli ngokholo, kodwa “ngemisebenzi” kuphela bawela kweso sikhubekiso. — Roma 9:30-32 .

(3) engabazi ubulungisa bukaThixo phantsi komthetho

Ekubeni amaSirayeli ayengabazi ubulungisa bukaThixo yaye efuna ukumisela obawo ubulungisa, amaSirayeli ayecinga ukuba ngokugcina umthetho nangokukholosa ngenyama ukuze alungise nokuphucula ihambo yawo, ayenokuthetheleleka. Oku kungenxa yokuba bacela ngemisebenzi kungekhona ngokholo, ngoko bawela kweso sikhubekiso. Bathembela kwimisebenzi yomthetho baza abathobela ubulungisa bukaThixo. Ireferensi - KwabaseRoma 10 ivesi 3.

Kodwa kufuneka uqaphele ukuba → nina "bathobela umthetho" abafuna ukugwetyelwa ngumthetho → nahlukanisiwe kuKristu kwaye niwile elubabalweni. NgoMoya oyiNgcwele, ngokholo, silindele ithemba lobulungisa. Reference - Plus isahluko 5 iivesi 4-5. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

kulungile! Namhlanje ndingathanda ukwabelana nani ubudlelane bam nani nonke. Ngamana ubabalo lweNkosi uYesu Kristu, uthando lukaThixo, nempefumlelo yoMoya oyiNgcwele ingahlala ihleli nani nonke! Amen

articles.title: Ukuba kungomthetho, kungekhona idinga
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo lusapho lwam, mawethu! Amen.

Masivule iiBhayibhile zethu kumaGalati isahluko 3 indinyana 18 size sifunde kunye: Kuba ilifa elo, ukuba liphuma emthethweni, aliphumi edingeni; .

Namhlanje sizakufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane kunye Ukuba kungomthetho, akuphumi ngedinga; Thandaza: U-Abha othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! Umfazi onesidima [icawa] uthumela abasebenzi ukuba baye kuthutha ukutya okuvela kwiindawo ezikude esibhakabhakeni, aze asasaze ukutya kuthi kwangethuba ukuze ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Thandaza ukuba iNkosi uYesu iqhubeke ikhanyisela amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zomoya kwaye siqonde iintsikelelo ezithenjiswa nguThixo eBhayibhileni→ Ukuba kungomthetho, akuphumi edingeni; Ngokuthi “ngokholo” sifumana uMoya oyiNgcwele othenjisiweyo njengetywina, obubungqina bokuzuza ilifa likaYise. Amen!

Le mithandazo ingasentla, umbulelo, kunye neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

Ukuba kungomthetho, kungekhona idinga

(1) UThixo wathembisa inzala ka-Abraham ukuba yayiza kufumana ilifa

Masifunde amaGalati isahluko 3 iindinyana 15-18 eBhayibhileni size sizifunde kunye: Madoda, bazalwana, mandiyithethe ngokwentetho eqhelekileyo yabantu: nangona ingumnqophiso ophakathi kwabantu, ukuba uthe wamiselwa, → usekwe phakathi koThixo nomntu” “Umnqophiso woncwadi olungileyo” awunakuyekwa okanye wongezwe kuwo. Idinga lenziwa kuAbraham nakwinzala yakhe. →Kuba uThixo wathembisa ukuba uAbraham nembewu yakhe baya kulidla ilifa ihlabathi, kungengamthetho, kodwa ngobulungisa bokholo. ——Bona amaRoma 4:13 → UThixo akathi “yonke inzala yakho,” ebhekisela kuninzi lwabantu, kodwa uthi “imbewu yakho enye,” ebhekisela “kumntu omnye,” onguKristu.

(2) Nabani na osekelwe elukholweni uya kufumana ilifa likaBawo oseZulwini

Umbuzo: Yintoni esekwe elukholweni
Impendulo: Nabani na okholelwa "kwinyaniso yeendaba ezilungileyo" "ngokholo", ethembele kuphela elukholweni kungekhona kwimisebenzi yendoda endala → ukukholelwa "kwivangeli likaYesu Kristu" 1 ozelwe elukholweni lweendaba ezilungileyo. , 2 abazelwe ngamanzi nanguMoya oyiNgcwele, 3 bazelwe nguThixo! Kungoko kuphela apho sinokuthi sibudle ilifa ubukumkani bukaThixo, sibudle ilifa ubomi obungunaphakade, kwaye sizuze ilifa likaBawo wethu waseZulwini. Ngoko ke, yazini ukuba abo basekelwe “elukholweni” bayinzala ka-Abraham. --Khangela kumaGalati isahluko 3 ivesi 7. Le nto ndiyithethayo kukuba umnqophiso kaThixo kwangaphambili ubhekisa kwidinga likaThixo lokuba uAbraham nenzala yakhe baya kubudla ilifa “ubukumkani bukaThixo” ehlabathini. —Funda iGenesis 22:16-18 namaRoma 4:13

(3) Amadinga kaThixo akanakutshitshiswa ngumthetho

Akunakupheliswa ngumthetho emva kweminyaka engama-430 →_→ ibhekisa "kumthetho kaMoses" ngokomthetho, akukho namnye ogcina umthetho owaphule umthetho. Ngokuba bonile bonke, basilela eluzukweni lukaThixo – bhekisa kwisahluko sesi-3 indinyana yama-23 . Ngokomthetho →_→ wonke umntu emhlabeni wenze "isono", kwaye umsebenzi "wesono" "kukufa". Oko kukuthi, xa abantu besifa baze babuyele eluthulini, ngaba iintsikelelo ezithenjiswe nguThixo kwangaphambili aziyi kuba lilize?

Ngoko ke, umnqophiso, owamiselwa ngenxa engaphambili nguThixo, awunako ukubhangiswa ngumthetho emva kweminyaka engamakhulu omane anamanci mathathu, litshitshise idinga elo. Kuba ilifa elo, ukuba liphuma emthethweni, aliphumi edingeni; →_→Ukuba kuphela abo basemthethweni baziindlalifa, "ukholo" luya kuba lilize kwaye "isithembiso" siya kubhangiswa.

(4) Umthetho uxhokonxa umsindo uze wohlwaye abantu

Kuba umthetho umxhokonxa ingqumbo, kungekho mthetho; →_→ kuthetha ukuba sikhululwe ngoYesu Kristu, osenza sibe → 1 sikhululekile esonweni → 2 sikhululekile emthethweni → 3 sikhululekile kuAdam omdala → 4 wasifudusela “kumntu omtsha” ozelwe nguThixo wasisa ebukumkanini yoNyana oyintanda. Ngaloo ndlela ke, anisekho phantsi komthetho, anisayi kuwaphula umthetho nesono, yaye anisayi kuqalekiswa ngomthetho womgwebo. Ngoko, uyayiqonda? .

(5) besiwa elubabalweni ngenxa yomthetho

Umbuzo: Uyintoni na uMthetho?
Impendulo: Ngabo bagwetyelwa ngokwasemisebenzini yomthetho.
Ngoko ke, “ngokholo” umntu uya kuba yindlalifa, yaye ngenxa yoko lubabalo, ukuze idinga lingenzeki kubo bonke abaphantsi komthetho kuphela, kodwa kwanabo baxelisa ukholo UAbraham. —Funda amaRoma 4:14-16 . Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

Isilumkiso: Nabani na osemisebenzini yomthetho, uqalekisiwe, ngokuba akukho namnye unokugwetyelwa nguThixo ngokwasemisebenzini yomthetho, kungengankonzo yomthetho. Abantu abasekelwe emthethweni bahlukanisiwe kuKristu kwaye bawile elubabalweni. Iintsikelelo ezazithenjiswe nguThixo zapheliswa ngabo. Ngoko ke, iintsikelelo ezithenjiswe nguThixo zisekelwe “elukholweni” olungasekelwanga “kumthetho”! Amen. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

kulungile! Namhlanje ndingathanda ukwabelana nani ubudlelane bam nani nonke. Ngamana ubabalo lweNkosi uYesu Kristu, uthando lukaThixo, nempefumlelo yoMoya oyiNgcwele ingahlala ihleli nani nonke! Amen

articles.title: Izifundo ZeBhayibhile: Indlela Yokungoni
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubo bonke abazalwana noodade bam abathandekayo! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibhile yethu kumaRoma isahluko 4 indinyana 15 size sifunde kunye: Kuba umthetho umqumbisa; kwaye apho kungekho mthetho, akukho sigqitho. Phinda uvule eyoku-1 kaYohane 3:9 Bonke abazelwe nguThixo aboni, ngokuba ilizwi likaThixo lihleli kuye; .

Namhlanje siza kufunda, sinxulumane, size sabelane ngeemfundiso zeBhayibhile kunye "Ungakwenzi njani ulwaphulo-mthetho" Thandaza: U-Abha othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! “Umfazi onesidima” uthumela abasebenzi ababhala ngezandla zabo baze bathethe ilizwi lenyaniso, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwethu. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka kude, ukutya kunikelwa kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo, yaye izinto zokomoya zithethwa kubantu bokomoya ukuze ubomi bethu butyebe ngakumbi. Amen! Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni. Ukuba uyaqonda ukuba ukhululekile kuwo umthetho nasonweni, awusayi kuwaphula umthetho nesono; ! Amen.

Le mithandazo ingasentla, umbulelo, kunye neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

buza: IBhayibhile isifundisa → Ngaba ikho indlela yokungoni?
impendulo: Masifunde kumaGalati isahluko 5 ivesi 18 eBhayibhileni kwaye siyifunde kunye: Dan Ukuba ke nikhokelwa nguMoya, anikho phantsi komthetho . Amen! Phawula: Ukuba ukhokelwa nguMoya oyiNgcwele, awukho phantsi komthetho → "Ukuba awukho phantsi komthetho" awuyi kona. . Ngaba uyayiqonda le nto?

buza: Zeziphi ezinye iindlela zokungawenzi ulwaphulo-mthetho?
impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha ngezantsi

【1】Baleka emthethweni

1 Amandla esono ngumthetho :Ifa! Aphi amandla akho okoyisa? Yifa! Luphi ulwamvila lwakho? Ulwamvila lokufa sisono, amandla esono ngumthetho. Bhekisela kweyoku- 1 kwabaseKorinte 15:55-56
2 Ukwaphula umthetho kusisono; Othe wona waphula umthetho, usisono; Jonga kuYohane 1 Isahluko 3 ivesi 4
Waphendula uYesu wathi, Inene, inene, ndithi kuni, Wonke umntu owenza isono ungamakhoboka esono.
3 Umvuzo wesono kukufa; Kuba umvuzo wesono kukufa; ke sona isipho sikaThixo bubomi obungunaphakade, kuKristu Yesu iNkosi yethu. Bona amaRoma 6:23
4 Iminqweno emibi ivela emthethweni: Kuba oko besikwinyama, ukuthabatheka okuzelwe ngumthetho kwakusebenza emalungwini ethu, kuxakatha isiqhamo esikukufa. Bhekisela kumaRoma 7:5
Xa inkanuko ithe yakhawulwa, izale isono; Bhekisela kuYakobi 1:15
5 Akukho mthetho ungagwetyelwanga ngokomthetho; Kuba uThixo akamkhethi wabuso bamntu. Bonke abonileyo benomthetho, baya kugwetywa ngokomthetho; Funda kwabaseRoma 2:11-12

6 Ngaphandle komthetho, isono sifile —Funda amaRoma 7:7-13
7 Apho kungekho mthetho, akukho sigqitho; Kuba umthetho umqumbisa; kwaye apho kungekho mthetho, akukho sigqitho. Bhekisela kumaRoma 4:15

8 Ke, kungekho mthetho, isono asikho isono; Ngaphambi kokuba ubekho umthetho, isono besisele sikho ehlabathini; Bona amaRoma 5:13
9 Ukufa kwisono kukukhululwa esonweni. Kuba siyazi ukuba umntu wethu omdala wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni kunye naye, ukuze umzimba wesono uphuthiswe, ukuze singabi sasikhonza isono; …Wafa kwisono kwaba kanye; Ngokunjalo nani zibaleleni ekubeni ningabafileyo okunene kwisono; kodwa ningabadla ubomi kuThixo, nikuKristu Yesu. Bhekisela kumaRoma 6, indinyana 6-7, 10-11
10 ukufa kuwo umthetho kukukhululwa kuwo umthetho; Kodwa ekubeni safayo kuwo umthetho owawusibophelela, ngoku sikhululekile kuwo umthetho – bona kwabaseRoma 7:6.

Mna Pawulos ndafa kuwo umthetho, ukuze ndiphilele uThixo. —Funda amaGalati isahluko 2 indinyana 19

【2】Uzalwe nguThixo

Ke bonke abamamkelayo wabanika igunya lokuba babe ngabantwana bakaThixo, abo ke bakholwayo kwigama lakhe. Aba ngabo abangazalwanga ngagazi, kungengankanuko, nangakuthanda kwandoda; bazelwe nguThixo. Funda kuYohane 1:12-13
Bonke abazelwe nguThixo aboni, ngokuba ilizwi likaThixo lihleli kuye; Kulapho kutyhilwa khona ukuba ngoobani na abangabantwana bakaThixo nabangabantwana bakaMtyholi. Nabani na ongakwenziyo ubulungisa akangokaThixo, nalowo ungamthandiyo umzalwana wakhe. eyoku- 1 kaYohane 3:9-10

Siyazi ukuba bonke abazelwe nguThixo abasayi kuze bone; bonke abazelwe nguThixo baya kuzigcina; Jonga kuYohane 1 Isahluko 5 ivesi 18

【3】KuKristu

Bonke abahlala kuye aboni; Bantwanana bam, musani ukuhendwa. Lowo ubenzayo ubulungisa lilungisa, kanye njengokuba uYehova elilungisa. Funda eyoku- 1 kaYohane 3:6-7
Lowo wonayo ungokaMtyholi; ngokuba uMtyholi wone kwasekuqalekeni. UNyana kaThixo wabonakalaliswa ukuba ayichithe imisebenzi kaMtyholi. Jonga kuYohane 1 Isahluko 3 ivesi 8

Ngoku akukho kugwetywa kwabakuKristu Yesu. Kaloku ngokumanywa kwam noKrestu Yesu, uMoya umniki-bomi undikhulule ekulawulweni sisono nakukufa. —Funda amaRoma 8 indinyana 1-2

Kuba nafayo, baye ubomi benu bufihlakele ndawonye noKristu kuye uThixo. Xa athe wabonakalaliswa uKristu, obubomi bethu, nani niya kubonakala, ninaye ebuqaqawulini. Amen! Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo? Bhekisela kwabaseKolose isahluko 3 indinyana 3-4 .

[Phawula]: Ngokuphonononga iirekhodi zezibhalo ezingasentla, thina IBhayibhile isifundisa indlela yokungawaphuli umthetho okanye ukona : 1 Ukholo lumanyene noKristu, wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni, wafa, wangcwatywa, wavuswa—wakhululwa esonweni, wakhululwa kuwo umthetho, wakhululwa kumntu omdala; 2 bazelwe nguThixo; 3 Hlala kuKristu. Amen! La mazwi angasentla ngawo onke amazwi kaThixo aseBhayibhileni Ngaba uyawakholelwa? Banoyolo abo bakholwayo, kuba ubukumkani bamazulu bobabo bonke; Haleluya! Amen

Shumayela ivangeli kaYesu Krestu, ivangeli evumela abantu ukuba basindiswe, bazukiswe, kwaye nemizimba yabo ikhululwe! Amen

articles.title: Ubudlelwane phakathi komthetho nesono
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubo bonke abazalwana noodade bam abathandekayo! Amen

Savula iBhayibhile [ Roma 7:7 ] saza safunda kunye: Ngoko ke, sinokuthini? Umthetho usisono na? Akunjalo! Kodwa ukuba ubungekho umthetho, ngendingazi ukuba yintoni na isono. Ngaphandle kokuba umthetho uthi "Musa ukubawa", andiyazi into yokubawa .

Namhlanje siza kufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane " Ubudlelwane phakathi komthetho nesono 》Umthandazo: Abha othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele usoloko enathi! Amen, enkosi eNkosini! “Umfazi onesidima” uthumela abasebenzi – ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhalwe ezandleni zabo, elithethwe ngabo, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwethu! Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka kude ukuya ezulwini, yaye ukutya kokomoya kwasezulwini kuhanjiswa kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo, kusenza ubomi bethu bube nentsingiselo. Amen! Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sibone nokuva inyaniso yasemoyeni → siqonde ubudlelwane phakathi komthetho nesono.

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi uYesu Krestu! Amen

(1) Mnye kuphela umniki-mthetho nomgwebi

Makhe sijonge iBhayibhile [Yakobi 4:12] size siyifunde kunye: Mnye ummisi-mthetho nomgwebi, lowo unako ukusindisa nokutshabalalisa. Ungubani na wena ukuba ugwebe abanye?

1 Emyezweni wase-Eden, uThixo wenza umnqophiso womthetho noAdam ukuba angawutyi kumthi wokulungileyo nokubi. UYehova uThixo wamwisela umthetho, wathi, Ungadla kuwo nawuphi na umthi womyezo, kodwa ungadli kuwo umthi wokwazi okulungileyo nokubi; kuba mhla uthe wadla kuwo, uya kufa ngenene Isahluko 15- Ivesi ye-17 irekhodi.

2 UMthetho kaMoses wamaYuda—UYehova uThixo wanika umthetho “iMithetho Elishumi” kwiNtaba yeSinayi, oko kukuthi, iNtaba yeHorebhe. IEksodus 20 kunye neLevitikus. Wawabizela ndawonye uMoses onke amaSirayeli, wathi kuwo, Yiphulaphuleni imimiselo namasiko, maSirayeli, endinimisela wona namhla, ukuba niwafunde, niwenze: uYehova uThixo wethu wenza umnqophiso nathi entabeni yeHorebhe. Lo mnqophiso awungowokuqala ookhokho bethu wasekwa kunye nathi baphilayo apha namhlanje - Duteronomi 5:1-3.

(2) Umthetho lo ubungamiselwanga ilungisa;

Siyazi ke ukuba umthetho mhle, ukuba uthe wasetyenziswa ngokufanelekileyo; amanyala, nabaphanga umphefumlo wabo, nabathetha ubuxoki, nabafunga izifungo zobuxoki, nokuba yintoni na echasene nobulungisa. --Ibhalwe kweyoku-1 kuTimoti isahluko 1:8-10

(3) Umthetho wongezwa ngenxa yezigqitho

Ngale ndlela, kutheni kukho umthetho nje? Wongezelelwa kwizigqitho, kulindelwe inzala ekwenziwa kuyo idinga, yaza yasekwa ngumthetheleli ngezithunywa zezulu. — Galati 3:19

(4) Umthetho wongezwa ngaphandle ukuze kwandiswe izigqitho

Umthetho wongezelelwa ukuze izigqitho zande; ke apho sandayo isono, lwaphuphuma ngakumbi ubabalo. —Kubhalwe kwabaseRoma 5:20 . Qaphela: Umthetho ufana "nokukhanya nesipili" esityhila "isono" esisebantwini Ngaba uyasiqonda?

(5) Umthetho uyabazisa abantu ngezono zabo

Ngoko ke, akukho nyama iya kugwetyelwa nguThixo ngokwasemisebenzini yomthetho, kuba umthetho ubagwebela isono. —Kubhalwe kwabaseRoma 3:20

(6) Umthetho uvala yonke imilomo

Siyazi ke ukuba yonke into esemthethweni ibhekiswe kwabo baphantsi komthetho, ukuze imilomo yonke ivingcwe, nehlabathi lonke libe netyala kuThixo. —Ibhalwe kwabaseRoma 3:19 . Kuba kaloku uThixo ubavalele entolongweni bonke abantu ekungathobelini kwakhe, ukuze abenzele inceba abantu bonke. —Kubhalwe kwabaseRoma 11:32

(7) Umthetho ungumfundisi wethu woqeqesho

Kambe ke awukafiki usindiso ngokholo; sigcinwe emthethweni, kude kube sekutyhilekeni kwenyaniso. Ngoko ke umthetho unguMhlohli wethu, usikhokelela kuKristu, ukuze sigwetyelwe ngokwaselukholweni. —Kubhalwe kumaGalati 3:23-24

Ubudlelwane phakathi komthetho nesono

( 1 ) Ukwaphula umthetho kusisono Ukuba uthe wona waphula umthetho, usisono; —Ibhalwe kweyoku-1 kaYohane 3:4 . Kuba umvuzo wesono kukufa; ke sona isipho sikaThixo bubomi obungunaphakade, kuKristu Yesu iNkosi yethu. — Roma 6:23 . UYesu waphendula wathi: “Inene, inene, ndithi kuni, Wonke umntu owenza isono ungamakhoboka esono.”— Yohane 8:34

( 2 ) Inyama yazala isono ngawo umthetho Kuba oko besikwinyama, ukuthabatheka okuzelwe ngumthetho kwakusebenza emalungwini ethu, zithwala isiqhamo sokufa. —Kubhalwe kwabaseRoma 7:5 . Elowo ke uhendwa akutsalwa, abanjiswe, yeyakhe inkanuko. Xa inkanuko ithe yakhawulwa, izale isono; —Ngokutsho kukaYakobi 1:14-15

( 3 ) Ngaphandle komthetho, isono sifile -- Ke, sithini? Umthetho usisono na? Akunjalo! Kodwa ukuba ubungekho umthetho, ngendingazi ukuba yintoni na isono. Ngaphandle kokuba umthetho uthi, “Uze unganyoluki,” bendingazi ukuba kuyintoni na ukubawa. Isono ke sizuze ikhwele kum yonke inkanuko ngomthetho; Bendingekabi dla ubomi, ungekho umthetho; uthe ke wakufika umthetho, sabuya saphila isono, ndafa ke mna. Kubhalwe kwabaseRoma 7:7-9 .

( 4 ) Akukho mthetho isono asiso. Njengokuba isono sangena ngamntu mnye ehlabathini, kwangena ke ukufa ngaso isono kubo bonke, ngenxa yokuba bonke bonayo. Ngaphambi komthetho, isono besikho ehlabathini, kodwa kungekho mthetho, isono asisiso isono. Kubhalwe kwabaseRoma 5:12-13

( 5 ) Apho kungekho mthetho, akukho sigqitho kuba umthetho umqumbisa; kwaye apho kungekho mthetho, akukho sigqitho. Kubhalwe kwabaseRoma 4:15 .

( 6 ) Lowo wonayo ephantsi komthetho, uya kugwetywa ngokomthetho; Bonke abonileyo bephantsi komthetho, baya kugwetywa ngokukwasemthethweni; Kubhalwe kwabaseRoma 2:12 .

( 7 ) Sihlangulwe esonweni nakumthetho nakwisiqalekiso somthetho ngokukholwa kwiNkosi uYesu Krestu.

( Phawula: Ngokuhlolisisa ezi zibhalo zingasentla, sinokubona ukuba yintoni isono? Kukwaphula umthetho kusisono; Amandla esono ngumthetho --Khangela ku-1 kwabaseKorinte 15:56; isono sazala ukufa, sona ke, sakuba sikhulile, sizala ukufa. Oko kukuthi, inkanuko enyameni yethu iya kuqhutywa kumalungu ngenxa "yomthetho" - inkanuko yenyama iya kuqaliswa kumalungu "ngomthetho" kwaye iqalise ukukhawulwa - kwaye ngokukhawuleza. njengokuba iinkanuko zikhawulwe, ziya kuzala “isono”! Ngoko “isono” sikho ngenxa yomthetho. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

ngoko" uPawulosi "isishwankathelo kwabaseRoma" umthetho nesono "Ubudlelwane:

1 Ngaphandle komthetho isono sifile;

2 Ukuba akukho mthetho, isono asikho isono;

3 Apho kungekho mthetho, akukho sikreqo!

Ngokomzekelo, “uEva” wahendwa yinyoka kumyezo wase-Eden ukuba adle kumthi wokwazi okulungileyo nokubi. oqabuka amehlo enu, nibe njengoThixo, nazi okulungileyo nokubi. Amazwi akhohlisayo "wenyoka" angena entliziyweni ka "Eva", kwaye ngenxa yobuthathaka benyama yakhe, inkanuko engaphakathi kuye yaqala kumalungu enyama ningatyi” emthethweni, yaza inkanuko yamitha.” Emva kokukhawula, isono siyazalwa! Ngoko uEva wasolula isandla sakhe waza wakha isiqhamo kumthi wokwazi okulungileyo nokubi waza wadla kunye nomyeni wakhe "uAdam". Ke, ngaba nonke niyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

thanda" uPawulosi "KwabaseRoma 7: Ngaphandle kokuba umthetho uthi, musa ukukhanka, andazi ukuba yintoni na inkanuko? Niyazi "inkanuko" - ngokuba niwazi umthetho - umthetho uthi "ukubawa", ngoko "uPawulos" wathi. : “Ngaphandle komthetho isono sifile, kodwa wona umthetho womthetho isono siphila, nam ndifile. ngoko! Uyaqonda?

UThixo uyalithanda ihlabathi! Wathumela uNyana wakhe okuphela kwamzeleyo, uYesu, ukuba abe sisicamagushelo sethu ngenxa yokholo, sabethelelwa emnqamlezweni noKristu ngayo inyama, neenkanuko neminqweno emibi, sazaliswa ngokutsha, ngentlawulelo kaKristu, wasikhulula esonweni Kwaye isiqalekiso somthetho, fumana ubunyana bukaThixo, ufumane ubomi obungunaphakade, kwaye uzuze ilifa lobukumkani bezulu! Amen

kulungile! Kulapho ndingathanda ukwabelana nani ngobudlelwane bam namhlanje. Ngamana ubabalo lweNkosi uYesu Krestu, uthando lukaThixo, kunye nempefumlelo yoMoya oyiNgcwele ingahlala inani nonke! Amen

articles.title: ubabalo nomthetho
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubo bonke abazalwana noodade bam abathandekayo! Amen,

Savula iBhayibhile [ Yohane 1:17 ] saza safunda kunye: Ubabalo nenyaniso wasinika ngoYesu Kristu. Amen

Namhlanje sizakufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane kunye "Ubabalo kunye noMthetho" Umthandazo: Othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen, enkosi eNkosini! “Umfazi onesidima” uthumela abasebenzi – ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhalwe ezandleni zabo, elithethwe ngabo, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwethu! Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka kude yaye ukutya kokomoya kwasezulwini kunikezelwa kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukuze ubomi bethu bube nentsingiselo engakumbi. Amen! Ngamana iNkosi uYesu ingaqhubeka iwakhanyisela amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuba siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sibone kwaye sive iinyaniso zasemoyeni kwaye siqonde ukuba umthetho wawiswa ngoMoses. Ubabalo nenyaniso zivela kuYesu Kristu ! Amen.

Le mithandazo, imithandazo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

(1) Ubabalo aluyikhathalelanga imisebenzi

Masiyiphengulule iBhayibhile [KwabaseRoma 11:6] sifunde kunye: Ukuba kungobabalo, akuphumi misebenzini; Ke kulowo ungenzi misebenzi, ekholwa kuThixo, lowo umgwebelayo umntu ongahloneli Thixo, ukholo lwakhe lubalelwa ebulungiseni. Kanye njengokuba uDavide ebabiza abo bagwetyelwa nguThixo ngaphandle kwemisebenzi yabo, ukuba banoyolo. KWABASEROMA 9:11 Kuba amawele ebengekazalwa, kungekabikho kulunga nabubi, kube kukuze ibonakalaliswe injongo kaThixo ngonyulo, kungengamisebenzi, kube ngenxa yalowo uwabizayo. )

(2) Ubabalo lunikwa ngesisa

[ Mateyu 5:45 ] Ngokunjalo niya kuba ngabantwana boYihlo osemazulwini, ngokuba yena elenza ilanga lakhe liphume phezu kwabalungileyo nabangendawo, nemvula eyinisa phezu kwabalungisayo nabangalungisiyo. INdumiso 65:11 Uyithe jize ngenceba iminyaka yakho; zonke iindlela zakho zithontsiza ukutyeba.

(3) Usindiso lukaKristu luxhomekeke elukholweni;

Masiyiphengulule iBhayibhile [KwabaseRoma 3:21-28] sifunde kunye: Kungoku ke kutyhiliwe ubulungisa bukaThixo, kungekho mthetho, bunobungqina bomthetho nabaprofeti: ubulungisa ke bukaThixo obungokukholwa kuYesu. UKrestu kubo bonke abakholwayo, ngaphandle kokucalula. Kuba bonile bonke, basilela eluzukweni lukaThixo; UThixo wammisela uYesu njengocamagushelo ngegazi likaYesu nangokholo lomntu ukuze abonise ubulungisa bukaThixo; eyaziwa ngokuba ngamalungisa, kwanokuba abagwebele abo bakholwayo kuYesu. Ukuba kunjalo, ungaqhayisa ngantoni? Akukho nto inokuqhayisa ngayo. Sinokuyisebenzisa njani into engekhoyo? Ngaba yindlela ephumelelayo? Hayi, yindlela yokukholelwa eNkosini. Ke (kukho imisongo yakudala: kuba) siqinisekile: Umntu ugwetyelwa ngokwaselukholweni, kungabi ngokuthobela umthetho .

( Phawula: Omabini amaYuda awayephantsi komthetho kaMoses kunye nabeeNtlanga ababengenawo umthetho ngoku bagwetyelwe ngobabalo lukaThixo yaye bagwetyelwa ngokukhululekileyo ngokholo kusindiso lukaYesu Kristu! Amen, ayisiyondlela yenkonzo encomekayo, kodwa yindlela yokukholelwa eNkosini. Ngoko ke sigqibe kwelithi, umntu ugwetyelwa ngokholo, kungekho kuthobela umthetho; )

Umthetho woonyana bakaSirayeli wawiswa ngoMoses:

(1) Imithetho eqingqwe ematyeni amabini

[ Eksodus 20:2-17 ] “NdinguYehova, uThixo wakho, owakukhuphayo ezweni laseYiputa, endlwini yobukhoboka, Uze ungabi nathixo bambi ngaphandle kwam Uze ungazenzeli umfanekiso oqingqiweyo, nokuba ngowayiphi na into emilise esezulwini phezulu, nesemhlabeni phantsi, nesemanzini. Uze ungafumane ulibize igama likaYehova uThixo wakho; kuba uYehova akayi kumenza omsulwa, ofumana alibize igama lakhe, khumbula umhla wesabatha, ukuba uwungcwalise...” , ukuze yolulwe imihla yakho emhlabeni lowo akunikayo uYehova uThixo wakho.” “Uze ungakrexezi.” “Uze ungangqini ubungqina obubuxoki ngommelwane wakho.” “Uze ungayinqweneli indlu yommelwane wakho; uze ungamnqweneli umfazi wommelwane wakho, nesicaka sakhe, nesicakakazi sakhe, nenkomo yakhe, ne-esile lakhe, nanye into anayo.

(2) Ukuthobela imiyalelo kuya kuphumela kwiintsikelelo

[Duteronomi 28:1-6] “Ukuba uthe waliphulaphula ngenyameko izwi likaYehova uThixo wakho, wayigcina, wayigcina imithetho yakhe endikuwiselayo namhla, akumise phezu kwezizwe zonke zehlabathi; uliphulaphule ilizwi likaYehova uThixo wakho, zikulandele ezi ntsikelelo, zibe phezu kwakho: wosikelelwa esixekweni, usikelelwe esiqhameni sesizalo sakho, esiqhameni somhlaba wakho, nasesiqhameni somhlaba wakho. Usikelelwe ingobozi yakho, nesitya sakho sokuxovulela intlama, usikelelwe ekungeneni kwenu.

(3) Ukwaphula imithetho nokuqalekiswa

Ivesi 15-19 “Ukuba uthe akwaliphulaphula izwi likaYehova uThixo wakho, ukuba uyigcine yonke imithetho yakhe, nemimiselo yakhe, endikuwiselayo namhla, zikulandele ezi ziqalekiso, zibe phezu kwakho: uqalekisiwe ezweni. Ingobozi yakho iqalekisiwe, nesitya sokuxovulela intlama; uqalekisiwe xa uphumayo; kuba iziBhalo zithi: “Lowo ulilungisa uya kuphila ngokholo. "

(4) Umthetho uxhomekeke kwindlela yokuziphatha

[ Roma 2:12-13 ] Kuba uThixo akamkhethi wabuso bamntu. Bonke abonileyo benomthetho, baya kugwetywa ngokomthetho; (Kuba asingabanela ukuba ngabaphulaphuli bawo umthetho, abangamalungisa phambi koThixo, ngabenzi bawo umthetho.

KumaGalati Chapter 3 verse 12 Kuba umthetho awubanga ngokholo; ubesithi, Lowo uzenzayo ezi zinto uya kudla ubomi ngazo.

( Phawula: Ngokuphonononga ezi zibhalo zingasentla, sibhala ukuba umthetho wawiswa ngoMoses, njengoko uYesu wawakhalimelayo amaYuda - UYohane 7:19 Umthetho aniwunikelwanga na nguMoses? Kodwa akukho namnye kuni uwugcinayo umthetho; AmaYuda anjengathi “uPawulos” ayewugcina umthetho njengoko ayenjalo ngaphambili uPawulos wafundiswa ngokungqongqo ngumthetho owawuphantsi kukaGamaliyeli. Kwakutheni ukuze uYesu athi akukho namnye kubo ogcina umthetho? Oku kungenxa yokuba bawugcinayo umthetho, kodwa akukho bani wawugcinayo umthetho. Yiloo nto uYesu wawakhalimela amaYuda ngokungawugcini uMthetho kaMoses. UPawulos wathi ngaphambili ukugcina umthetho kwakuyingenelo, kodwa ekubeni ngoku elwazi usindiso lukaKristu, ukugcina umthetho kuyingozi. —Funda eyabaseFilipi 3:6-8 .

Emva kokuba uPawulos eluqonda usindiso lobabalo lukaThixo ngoKristu, kwakhona wawakhalimela amaYuda alukileyo ngokungawugcini umthetho kwanokwawo— Galati 6:13 . Ngaba uyayiqonda ngokucacileyo le nto?

Ekubeni wonke umntu esehlabathini waphule umthetho, ukwaphula umthetho kusisono, yaye bonke abantu abasehlabathini bonile baza basilela eluzukweni lukaThixo. UThixo uyalithanda ihlabathi! Ngoko ke, Wathumela uNyana wakhe okuphela kwamzeleyo, uYesu, ukuba eze phakathi kwethu ukuze atyhile inyaniso. —Funda amaRoma 10:4 .

Uthando lukaKristu luzalisekisa umthetho → oko kukuthi, lutshintsha ubukhoboka bomthetho kubabalo lukaThixo kunye nesiqalekiso somthetho kwintsikelelo kaThixo! Ubabalo lukaThixo, inyaniso, nothando olukhulu lubonakaliswa ngoYesu okuphela kwamzeleyo ! Amen, ke, ngaba nonke niyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

kulungile! Kulapho ndingathanda ukwabelana nani ngobudlelwane bam namhlanje. Ngamana ubabalo lweNkosi uYesu Krestu, uthando lukaThixo, kunye nempefumlelo yoMoya oyiNgcwele ingahlala inani nonke! Amen

articles.title: Ubudlelwane phakathi koMthetho, Isono, kunye nokufa
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubo bonke abazalwana noodade bam abathandekayo! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibhile yethu kweyoku-1 kwabaseKorinte 15:55-56 size siyifunde kunye: Yifa! Aphi amandla akho okoyisa? Yifa! Luphi ulwamvila lwakho? Ulwamvila lokufa sisono, amandla esono ngumthetho .

Namhlanje siza kufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane " Unxulumano phakathi komthetho, isono nokufa 》Umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu oseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele usoloko enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! "Umfazi onesidima" uthumela abasebenzi → ngezandla zabo babhala kwaye bathethe ilizwi lenyaniso, leendaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwakho. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Yanga iNkosi uYesu ingaqhubeka iwakhanyisela amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni kwaye siyiqonde iBhayibhile. Qonda ukuba “ukufa” kuphuma esonweni, kwaye “isono” sibangelwa yiminqweno emibi ephuma emthethweni esenyameni. Kunokubonwa ukuba ufuna ukusinda "ekufeni" → kufuneka ubaleke "esonweni" ukuba ufuna ukusinda "esonweni" → kufuneka ubaleke "emthethweni". Ngawo umzimba weNkosi uYesu Kristu nathi safa kuwo umthetho → sikhululwe ekufeni, esonweni, emthethweni, nasesiqalekisweni somthetho. . Amen!

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile yethu kumaRoma 5:12, siyityhile size siyifunde kunye:
Kanye njengokuba isono sangena ngamntu mnye ehlabathini, kwaza kwangena ukufa ngaso isono, ngokunjalo ukufa kwabafikela bonke abantu ngenxa yokuba bonke bonayo.

1. Ukufa

Umbuzo: Kutheni abantu besifa?
Impendulo: Abantu bafa ngenxa (yesono).
Kuba umvuzo wesono kukufa; ke sona isipho sikaThixo bubomi obungunaphakade, kuKristu Yesu iNkosi yethu. Roma 6:23
→→Kanye njengokuba isono sangena ngamntu mnye ehlabathini (uAdam), nokufa kwaphuma esonweni, ngokunjalo ukufa kwabatyhutyha abantu bonke ngenxa yokuba bonke abantu bonayo. Roma 5:12

2. Isono

Umbuzo: Yintoni isono?
Impendulo: Ukwaphula umthetho → kusisono.
Othe wona waphula umthetho, usisono; eyoku-1 kaYohane 3:4

3. Umthetho

Umbuzo: Yeyiphi imithetho?
Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

(1) UMthetho ka-Adam

Kodwa uze ungatyi kuwo umthi wokwazi okulungileyo nokubi, kuba mhla uthe wadla kuwo uya kufa ngokuqinisekileyo. ” Genesis 2:17
(Phawula: UAdam wawaphula umnqophiso waza wona - Hoseya 6:7 → “Isono” sangena ehlabathini ngomntu omnye (uAdam), kwaza ukufa kwaphuma esonweni, ngoko ukufa kwabafikela bonke abantu ngenxa yokuba bonke abantu bonile → Ukwaphula umthetho Ngoko ke bonke bagwetywa bafa phantsi komthetho ka-Adam→bonke bafa kuAdam (bona eyoku-1 kwabaseKorinte 15:22).

(2) UMthetho kaMoses

Umbuzo: Uyintoni uMthetho kaMoses?
Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

Eyoku-1 yeMithetho eliShumi-Funda iEksodus 20:1-17
2 Imimiselo, nemithetho, namasiko, nemiyalelo, ebhaliweyo encwadini yomyalelo;
→Itotali: 613 izinto

[Imithetho Nemimiselo] UMoses wawabizela ndawonye onke amaSirayeli, wathi kuwo, Owu maSirayeli, yiphulaphuleni imimiselo namasiko endininika wona namhla, ukuba niwafunde, niwenze; Duteronomi 5:1
Kubhaliwe eNcwadini yomthetho] Onke amaSirayeli awugqithile umyalelo wakho, akreqa; akaliphulaphula izwi lakho, akaliphulaphulanga izwi lakho; phezu kwethu, ngokuba sonile kuThixo. Daniyeli 9:11

4. Ulwalamano phakathi komthetho, isono nokufa

Yifa! Aphi amandla akho okoyisa?
Yifa! Luphi ulwamvila lwakho?
Ulwamvila lokufa sisono, amandla esono ngumthetho. ( 1 Korinte 15:55-56 )

(Qaphela: Ukuba ufuna ukukhululeka "kukufa" → → kufuneka ukhululeke "esonweni"; ukuba ufuna ukukhululeka "esonweni" → → kufuneka ukhululeke kumandla kunye nesiqalekiso "somthetho")

Umbuzo: Ungawubaleka njani umthetho nesiqalekiso?
Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

→→... ngomzimba kaKristu nathi safa kuwo umthetho... Ke, ekubeni safayo kuwo umthetho osibophayo, sikhululekile ngoku kuwo umthetho... Bona amaRoma 7:4, 6 namaGalati. 3:13

Umbuzo: Usibalekela njani isono?
Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

→→UYehova ubeke phezu kwakhe (uYesu) isono sabo bonke abantu——Khangela kuIsaya 53:6 .
→→ (uYesu) Kuba ekubeni omnye wafela bonke, bonke bafa – bhekisela kweyesi- 2 kwabaseKorinte 5:14
→→Kuba abo bafileyo bakhululwe esonweni—Bona amaRoma 6:7 →Kuba nafa—Bona amaKolose 3:3
→→Wonke umntu uyafa, kwaye wonke umntu uyakhululwa esonweni. Amen! Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Umbuzo: Ukuphepha njani ukufa?
Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

(1) Kholelwa kuYesu

“Kuba wenjenje uThixo ukulithanda kwakhe ihlabathi, ude wancama uNyana wakhe okuphela kwamzeleyo, ukuze bonke abakholwayo kuye bangatshabalali, koko babe nobomi obungunaphakade ubomi obungunaphakade (isicatshulwa sokuqala sithetha ukuba akayi kububona ubomi obungunaphakade) , ingqumbo kaThixo ihleli phezu kwakhe.”

(2) Kholelwa kwivangeli→usindiso lukaYesu Kristu

→→(uYesu) wathi: “Lizalisekile ixesha, yaye ubukumkani bukaThixo busondele

→→Kwaye niya kusindiswa ngazo ezi ndaba zilungileyo, ukuba anithanga nifumane nelize, koko nikubambezelayo oko ndinishumayeza kona. Into endayinikelayo kuni yaba yile: Okokuqala, uKristu wazifela izono zethu ngokutsho kweZibhalo, wangcwatywa waza wavuswa ngomhla wesithathu, ngokutsho kweZibhalo, 1 Korinte 15:2-4

→→ andinazintloni ngazo iindaba ezilungileyo zikaKristu; kuba zingamandla kaThixo okusindisa bonke abakholwayo, umYuda kuqala, kwanomGrike. Kuba ubulungisa bukaThixo bubonakalaliswa ngazo ezi ndaba zilungileyo; Njengoko kubhaliwe kwathiwa: “Lowo ulilungisa uya kudla ubomi obuphuma elukholweni.”—KwabaseRoma 1:16-17

(3)Kufuneka uzalwe ngokutsha

UYesu wathi: “Inene, inene, ndithi kuwe, Ukuba umntu akathanga azalwe ngamanzi nanguMoya, akanakungena ebukumkanini bukaThixo. Oko kuzelwe yinyama kuyinyama, oko kuzelwe nguMoya kungumoya; . Ndithi, ‘Nimele nizalwe ngokutsha’ Musani ukumangaliswa
Makabongwe uThixo, uYise weNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Ngokobukhulu benceba yakhe usinike ubomi obutsha ukuba sibe nethemba eliphilileyo ngokuvuka kukaYesu Kristu kwabafileyo, 1 Petros 1:3

(4) Bonke abadla ubomi bekholwa kuye, abasayi kufa naphakade;

UYesu wathi kuye: “Ndim uvuko, ndim ubomi; lowo ukholwayo kum, nokuba ubethe wafa, wodla ubomi; bonke abadla ubomi bekholwa kum, abasayi kufa naphakade
(Ndiyazibuza ukuba uyaqonda na: Ithetha ukuthini iNkosi uYesu ngala mazwi? Ukuba akunjalo, ngoko kufuneka uthobeke kwaye umamele ngakumbi iindaba ezilungileyo eziyinyaniso ezishunyayelwa ngabasebenzi bakaThixo.)
4 Imithetho yakhe ayinzima ukuyigcina

Siyamthanda uThixo ngokugcina imiyalelo Yakhe, kwaye imiyalelo Yakhe ayinzima. eyoku-1 kaYohane 5:3

Umbuzo: Ngaba uMthetho kaMoses → kunzima ukuwugcina?
Impendulo: Kunzima ukukhusela.

Umbuzo: Kutheni kunzima nje ukukhusela?
Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

→→Kuba yena oya kuwugcina umthetho uphela, aze akhubeke kwelinye, unetyala lokuwaphula wonke. Yakobi 2:10

→→Wonke umntu ogcina umthetho njengesiseko sakhe, uphantsi kwesiqalekiso; umthetho (oko kukuthi, ngokugcina umthetho), kuba iBhayibhile ithi: “Lowo ulilungisa uya kudla ubomi ngokokholo.” ( Galati 3:10-11;

Umbuzo: Uwugcina njani umthetho?
Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

(1) Uthando lukaYesu luzalisekisa umthetho

Ningabi ndize kuchitha umthetho, nokuba ngabaprofeti; andize kuchitha umthetho, ndize kuzalisekisa. Inene ndithi kuni, Lide lidlule izulu nehlabathi, akuyi kudlula nalinye igatya nalinye. uya kudlula kuwo wonke uMthetho.

Umbuzo: UYesu wawuzalisekisa njani umthetho?
Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

→→...UYEHOVA ubeke phezu (kuYesu) isono sethu sonke— Isaya 53:6

→→ Kuba uthando lukaKristu luyasinyanzela;

→→... ngomzimba kaKristu nathi safa kuwo umthetho... Ke, ekubeni safayo kuwo umthetho osibophayo, sikhululekile ngoku kuwo umthetho... Bona amaRoma 7:4, 6 namaGalati. 3:13

→→Musani ukuba natyala lanto mntwini, lingelilo elokuthandana, kuba lowo umthandayo ummelwane wakhe uwuzalise umthetho. Ngokomzekelo, imiyalelo enjengale: “Uze ungakrexezi, musa ukubulala, musa ukuba, musa ukubawa,” neminye imiyalelo iqukunjelwa kwesi sivakalisi: “Uze umthande ummelwane wakho njengawe siqu. Uthando alusebenzi bubi kwabanye, ngoko ke uthando luthobela umthetho. Roma 13:8-10

(2) Kufuneka azalwe ngokutsha

1 Uzelwe ngamanzi nanguMoya—Yohane 3:6-7

2 IVangeli eliyinyaniso liyazala— 1 Korinte 4:15, Yakobi 1:18

3 Bazalwa nguThixo — Yohane 1:12-13

Bonke abazelwe nguThixo aboni, ngokuba ilizwi likaThixo lihleli kuye; eyoku-1 kaYohane 3:9

(3) Phila kuKristu

Ngoku akukho kugwetywa kwabakuKristu Yesu. Kaloku ngokumanywa kwam noKrestu Yesu, uMoya umniki-bomi undikhulule ekulawulweni sisono nakukufa. Roma 8:1-2
Bonke abahlala kuye aboni; eyoku- 1 kaYohane 3:6

(4)Akunzima ukuyigcina imiyalelo yakhe

Umbuzo: Kutheni le nto imithetho ingekho nzima ukuyigcina?
Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

→→ Ngokuba (umntu omtsha owenziwe ngokutsha) uhleli kuKrestu--Khangela kumaRoma 8:1
→→ (Ukuzalwa ngokutsha komntu omtsha) Kufihlwe kuThixo—Funda kwabaseKolose 3:3
→→ UKristu uyavela (Umntu omtsha) uyavela - bhekisa kwabaseKolose 3:4
→ UYesu wawuzalisekisa umthetho → oko kukuthi, (umntu omtsha) wawuzalisekisa umthetho;
→→ UYesu wavuka kwabafileyo → (umntu omtsha) wavuka naye;
→→ UYesu wakoyisa ukufa→oko kukuthi, (umntu omtsha) wakoyisa ukufa;
→→ UYesu akanasono kwaye akanakona → oko kukuthi, (umntu omtsha) akanasono;
→→ UYesu uyiNkosi Engcwele → Abantwana bakaThixo bangcwele!

Thina (umntu omtsha owenziwe ngokutsha) singamalungu omzimba wakhe, sifihlwe noKristu kuye uThixo! "ITestamente Entsha" Umthetho ubekwe kumntu omtsha - Hebhere 10:16 → Isishwankathelo somthetho nguKristu - Roma 10:4 → UKristu unguThixo → UThixo uluthando - 1 Yohane 4:16 (Umntu omtsha ozelwe ngokutsha ) ukhululwe emthethweni “isithunzi” somthetho - Hebhere 10:1 → Apho kungekho mthetho, akukho sigqitho - KwabaseRoma 4:15. Lowo (umntu omtsha) uhlala emfanekisweni wenyaniso kaKristu, ufihlwe noKristu kuThixo, kwaye uhlala eluthandweni lukaThixo. Ngoko ke, (umntu omtsha) akazange aphule mthetho omnye kwaye ugcine yonke imithetho kwaye akazange aphule nawuphi na umthetho kwaye wone. Amen!

→→ Bonke abazelwe nguThixo aboni, ngokuba ilizwi likaThixo lihleli kuye; 1 Yohane 3:9 (Ngaphezu kwe-90% yamakholwa ayasilela kolu vavanyo aze awele kumongo wokholo nemfundiso) - bhekisa kumaRoma 6:17-23

Andazi, uyaqonda?

Lowo ulivayo ilizwi lobukumkani bamazulu, engaliqondi, uyafika ongendawo, akuthabathe okuhlwayelwe entliziyweni yakhe; . Mateyu 13:19

Ngoko uYohane wathi → Siyamthanda uThixo ukuba siyayigcina imiyalelo Yakhe (uthando olo), kwaye ayinzima imiyalelo yakhe. Ngokuba bonke abazelwe nguThixo bayaleyisa ihlabathi; Ngubani na lowo uleyisayo ihlabathi? Asinguye na okholwayo ukuba uYesu unguye uNyana kaThixo? eyoku- 1 kaYohane 5:3-5

Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Umbhalo weVangeli:
Basebenzi bakaYesu Krestu UMzalwana uWang*Yun, uDade uLiu, uDade uZheng, uMzalwana uCen... kunye nabanye ogxa baxhasa, baxhasa ngemali kwaye basebenze kunye kumsebenzi wevangeli kaKristu, kwaye basebenze kunye nabo bakholelwa kule vangeli kwaye bashumayele ivangeli kunye nokushumayela iindaba ezilungileyo. Le ndlela yokwenene, amagama abo abhalwe encwadini yobomi
Imbekiselo kwabaseFilipi 4:1-3
