articles.title: Ingcaciso yemibuzo enzima: Umfazi onesidima
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubo bonke abazalwana noodade bam abathandekayo! Amen

Masivule iBhayibhile [ IMizekeliso 31:10 ] size sifunde kunye: Umfazi onesidima ngubani na ongamfumanayo? Uxabiseke ngaphezu kweeperile.

Namhlanje siza kufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane " umfazi onesidima 》Umthandazo: Abha othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele usoloko enathi! Amen, enkosi eNkosini!

umfazi onesidima IBandla leNkosi uYesu Krestu lithumela abasebenzi - ngelizwi elibhaliweyo nelithethiweyo lenyaniso ezandleni zabo, ivangeli yosindiso lwethu! Silungiselele ukutya kokomoya kwasezulwini kwangethuba, ukuze ubomi bethu bube nobutyebi obungakumbi. Amen!

Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zomoya → Qonda ukuba "umfazi onesidima" ubhekisa kwibandla leNkosi uYesu Kristu → Ngubani onokuyifumana? Uxabiseke ngaphezu kweeperile . Amen!

Ezi zibongozo zingasentla, izibongozo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo zenziwe ngegama leNkosi yethu uYesu! Amen

【1】KuMfazi Olungileyo

-----Umfazi onesidima-----

Ndayiphanda iBhayibhile [ IMizekeliso 31:10-15 ], ndayityhila kunye ndaza ndafunda: Umfazi onesidima ngubani na ongamfumanayo? Uxabiseke ngaphezu kweeperile . Indoda yakhe ayiyi kuswela nto ukuba ikholose ngaye, ayisayi kumenzakalisa ubomi bayo bonke. Wafuna ikheshmere kunye nelinen kwaye wayekulungele ukusebenza ngezandla zakhe. Ufana nenqanawa yabarhwebi ezisa ukutya evela kude, ivuka kwangentseni, ibele abantu bendlu yayo, ize yabele izicakakazi zayo.

(1) Ibhinqa

[ Genesis 2:22-24 ] UYehova uThixo wabumba umfazi ubambo abeluthabathe endodeni, wamzisa endodeni. Yathi indoda, Lithambo lasemathanjeni am, yinyama yasenyameni yam. Ungambiza ngokuba ngumfazi; .

( 2 ) inzala yomfazi — Genesis 3:15 noMateyu 1:23 : “Intombi enyulu iya kumitha, izale unyana, bambize ngegama elinguImanuweli ( uEmanuweli uguqulelwa ngokuthi “uThixo noThixo.” ) Sikunye koku .")

( 3 ) Ibandla ngumzimba wakhe -- Ephesians 1:23 Ibandla lingumzimba wakhe, lizaliswe nguLowo Uzalisa zonke izinto kubo bonke. Isahluko 5 Indinyana 28-32 Ngokukwanjalo ke, amadoda amelwe kukubathanda abawo abafazi, njengokuba beyimizimba yawo. Akukho namnye wakha wayithiya eyakhe inyama; usuka ayondle, ayiphathe ngononophelo, njengokuba noKristu esenjenjalo ibandla, kuba singamalungu omzimba wakhe (ezinye izibhalo zongezelela: Inyama namathambo akhe). Ngenxa yoko ke, indoda yomshiya uyise nonina, inamathele kumkayo, baze abo babini babe nyama-nye. Loo mfihlelo inkulu, ke mna ndithetha ndisingisele kuKristu, ndisingisele kulo ibandla.

( Phawula: Ngokuphonononga ezi zibhalo zingasentla, sibhala ukuba uAdam ungumzekelo kwaye uYesu Krestu ngumfanekiso wokwenyani; umfazi "NguEva ifanekisela ibandla , ibandla lithambo lamathambo nenyama yenyama kaKristu. UYesu wazalwa yintombi uMariya, uyimbewu yomfazi, thina sizelwe nguThixo – ngoKristu Yesu iNkosi Phila ngendlela yenyaniso Kuba thina, siyawudla kwaye siwusele umzimba negazi likaKristu, sizuza umzimba kunye nobomi bakhe singamalungu akhe - ithambo lethambo nenyama yenyama! Ngoko ke, nathi siyinzala yabafazi; Enkosi Nkosi! )

【2】 Ngubani na ongafumana umfazi onesidima?

---- Inkonzo yamaKrestu-----

Ndayiphanda iBhayibhile [ IMizekeliso 31:10-29 ]
10 Umfazi onesidima ngubani na ongamfumanayo? Uxabiseke ngaphezu kweeperile .

Qaphela: "Umfazi onesidima ubhekisa ebandleni. Ibandla lomoya"

11Indoda yakhe ayiyi kuswela nto, ukuba ikholose ngaye;
12 Akayenzanga nto imbi indoda yakhe.
13 Ukhangela ishera neflakisi, Asebenze ngezandla zakhe ngokuqhutywa yintliziyo.
14 Unjengenqanawa yabarhwebi, ithwele ingqolowa yakude;
15 Uvuka kusasa, abele abantu bendlu yakhe ukudla, awabele abakhonzazana bakhe umsebenzi.

Phawula: "yena" ubhekisa ku ecaweni Ukutya kokomoya kuhanjiswa ukusuka “kude” ukuya esibhakabhakeni Ngaphambi kokuba kuthi qheke ukusa, icawa ilungiselela ukutya okuvela ezulwini kwangethuba, inika abazalwana noodade ukutya “imana yobomi,” oko kukuthi, ukutya kokomoya. , yaye yabela umsebenzi omele wenziwe “kwizicakakazi” ezibhekisela kwabo bathunywe nguThixo ngabakhonzi okanye abasebenzi abashumayela ilizwi lenyaniso yeendaba ezilungileyo! Ngaba uyayiqonda le nto?

16 Wathi enqwenela intsimi, wayithenga, ngengeniso yezandla zakhe, watyala isidiliya.
Qaphela: "intsimi" ibhekisa kuyo ihlabathi , bonke bahlawulelwa nguye, waza watyala isidiliya, “uMthi woBomi kuMyezo wase-Eden” ngomsebenzi wezandla zakhe.

17Ngobuchule bakhe, Amandla Omoya Oyingcwele ) bhinqa esinqeni sakho ukuze iingalo zakho zomelele.
18 Ucinga ukuba ishishini lakhe linenzuzo; isibane sakhe asicimi ebusuku.
19 Uphethe intonga esandleni sakhe, kunye nevili lokusonta esandleni sakhe.
20 Isandla sakhe usivulela osizanayo, Asolulele isandla sakhe kumahlwempu. Qaphela: Abasebenzi beCawe bashumayela ivangeli kubantu abahluphekayo, bebavumela ukuba bazuze ubomi kuphela, kodwa batya kwaye basele amanzi okomoya kunye nokutya kokomoya ukuze babe nobomi obuyintabalala. Amen!
21 Akazange abe naxhala ngentsapho yakhe ngenxa yekhephu, kuba usapho lonke lwaluthiwe wambu ngeengubo ezibomvu. →Luhlobo "lokwambatha ubuntu obutsha nokwambatha uKristu".
Qaphela: Xa indlala nenkathazo zifika ngomhla "wekhephu", ibandla aliyi kuba naxhala ngamalungu osapho kuba bonke banophawu lukaYesu kubo. Amen
22 Wazenzela iingubo ezimfakamfele, ngelinen ecikizekileyo nemfusa;
23 Indoda yakhe ibihleli ngasesangweni lomzi ndawonye namadoda amakhulu elizwe;
24 Wenza iingubo zelinen entle, wathengisa ngazo, wayethengisa ngemibhinqo yakhe kubarhwebi.
25 Ubungangamsha nobungangamsha yimpahla yakhe;
26 Uvula umlomo wakhe ngobulumko;
27 Uyawugcina umsebenzi wendlu, angakudli ukudla okuphuthileyo. Bayasuka oonyana bakhe, bathi unoyolo;
28 Yamdumisa indoda yakhe;
29 wathi: Baninzi abafazi abanesiphiwo nesidima, kodwa nguwe wedwa obadlula bonke. ! "

( Phawula: 【KuMfazi olungileyo】 umfazi onesidima :umyeni" UKrestu "Mncome umfazi wakho" ecaweni "Ngumfazi onesidima, uwuvula ngobulumko umlomo wakhe, uyancuma xa ecinga ngekamva, kuba abantwana bakhe bomoya bayayiva inyaniso bagoduke, njengokuba uSara wahlekayo ekuzalweni kukaIsake! Akatyi engenzi nto. ukutya - kwaye Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukondla intsapho yakhe yonke imihla, kwaye abantwana bakhe "bakhomba kuthi" baphakama baze bathi unoyolo! nguwe kuphela odlula bonke!" Amen. ISityhilelo 19 8-9 UKrestu tshata ［ ecaweni ]Lifikile ixesha. Ke, ngaba nonke niyaqonda ngokucacileyo? Enkosi Nkosi! Haleluya!

Oku kukuphela kobudlelane bam kunye nokwabelana nani namhlanje. Ngamana ubabalo lweNkosi uYesu Kristu, uthando lukaThixo, kunye nempefumlelo yoMoya oyiNgcwele ibe nani nonke! Amen

Hlala ubukele kwixesha elizayo:

Imibhalo-ngqangi yeVangeli

Ivela: Mawethu ebandleni leNkosi uYesu Krestu

articles.title: IBhayibhile: Sisiphi isono? Sisono esingasingisi kufeni na?
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibhile kweyoku-1 kaYohane isahluko 5 indinyana 17 size sifunde kunye: Yonke intswela-bulungisa sisono, yaye kukho izono ezingasingisi kufeni. .

Namhlanje siza kufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane " Siyintoni na isono esingasingisi kufeni? 》Umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu oseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele usoloko enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! “Umfazi onesidima” wathuma abasebenzi ngezandla zabo, ababhaliweyo nabavakaliswayo ngelizwi lenyaniso, eliziindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwenu. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zomoya → Siyintoni na isono esingasingisi kufeni? Ke ngoko ukwayama kuMoya oyiNgcwele, sibulale zonke izenzo ezingendawo zomzimba, similisele iingcambu elukholweni, similiselwe kwaye sakhelwe kuYesu Kristu endaweni yokuba sakhelwe kuAdam. . Amen!

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

Umbuzo: Bubuphi ulwaphulo-mthetho? Sisono esingasingisi kufeni na?

Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

【1】Izono ezingaphandle komthetho womnqophiso phakathi koThixo nomntu

Njengokuba kwakunjalo kumaxesha amandulo xa kwakungekho mthetho womtshato, kwakungesosono ukuba umntakwabo athabathe udade wabo umntakwabo ngonina waza kamva waba ngumfazi wam. Kukho neengxelo kwiGenesis 38 malunga noYuda noTamare, oko kukuthi, isono sohenyuzo kunye nombulo phakathi kukayisezala noTamare.

KuYohane 2, kukho nehenyukazi leeNtlanga eligama linguRahabhi, naye owenza isono sokuxoka, kodwa abeeNtlanga babengenawo uMthetho kaMoses, ngoko kwakungajongwa njengesono. Ezi zizono ezingaphandle komnqophiso osemthethweni, ngoko ke azibalelwa njengezono. Ngenxa yokuba umthetho umqumbisa (okanye ukuguqulelwa: kubangela ukuba abantu bafumane isohlwayo) “apho kungekho mthetho,” akukho sigqitho; —Funda amaRoma 4:15 . Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

[2] Izono ezenziwa yinyama

Masifunde amaRoma 8: 9 eBhayibhileni kwaye siyifunde kunye: Ukuba uMoya kaThixo uhleli kuni, anisengabokwenyama, kodwa ningaboMoya. Ukuba umntu akanaye uMoya kaKristu, akangokaKristu lowo.

Phawula: Ukuba uMoya kaThixo, oko kukuthi, uMoya oyiNgcwele “uhleli” ezintliziyweni zenu, aningowenyama → oko kukuthi, “niyeva” nize niqonde indlela yokwenyaniso nize nikholelwe iindaba ezilungileyo zikaKristu → ubhaptizwe nguMoya oyiNgcwele → oko kukuthi, "umntu omtsha" ophinda azalwe aze asindiswe asingowomzimba "umntu omdala". Naba abantu ababini → omnye uzelwe ngoMoya kaThixo; Iziphoso ezibonakalayo ‘zomntu omdala’ osenyameni aziyi kubalelwa ‘kumntu omtsha’ ofihlwe noKristu kuThixo. Kunjengokuba iNkosi isithi:“Musani ukuzibamba izigqitho zabo ‘zomntu omdala’ kubo “umntu omtsha.” Amen— bhekisa kweyesi- 2 kwabaseKorinte 5:19 .

Umpostile “uPawulos” walikhalimela ibandla laseKorinte wathi: “Kuvakala ukuba kuyenzeka umbulo phakathi kwenu. Ukukrexeza kohlwaywa, Mkhupheni onjalo phakathi kwenu, nimnikele kuSathana, ukuba ayonakalisa inyama yakhe, ukuze umphefumlo wakhe usindiswe, ngemini yeNkosi uYesu;"Umntu omdala" kwaye ufuna ukutshabalalisa itempile kaThixo, iNkosi iya kumohlwaya kwaye iwutshabalalise umzimba wayo ukuze usindiswe umphefumlo wayo. iinkanuko ezimbi, iminqweno emibi, nokubawa (ukubawa kuyafana nokunqula izithixo). Ubomi bukaYesu mabutyhileke kuthi → NguThixo okunika uzuko, umvuzo, kunye nesithsaba.

Ukuba ubani ukuKristu, usisidalwa esitsha; …Kwanjengoko ke uThixo waye ekuKristu elixolelanisa naye ngokwakhe ihlabathi, engazibaleli kubo iziphoso zabo, esinika lo myalezo woxolelaniso. —Funda eyesi-2 kwabaseKorinte 5:17, 19 .

( Roma 7:14-24 ) Kanye njengokuba umpostile “uPawulos” wazalwa ngokutsha yaye inyama yayisilwa nomoya, ngoko ndiyazi ukuba akukho nto ilungileyo kum, oko kukuthi, enyameni yam. Kuba kuxhomekeke kum ukwenza isigqibo sokwenza okulungileyo, kodwa asikokwam ukwenza oko. Ngoko ke, okulungileyo endikuthandayo, andikwenzi; Ukuba ndenza into endingayifuniyo, ayisendim oyenzayo, seyisisono esi simiyo ngaphakathi kwam. inyama endala yabethelelwa emnqamlezweni, yafa noKristu, ayisendim ke odla ubomi, nguKristu ke oselesidla ubomi ngenxa yam. Njengoko umpostile “uPawulos” watshoyo! Ndizigqala njengofileyo “esonweni” yaye ndifile kuwo umthetho ngenxa “yomthetho” - bhekisela kumaRoma 6:6-11 nakwaGal 2:19-20. Icacisa ukuba "umntu omtsha" emva kokuzalwa ngokutsha nokusindiswa akakho kwizono zenyama "yendoda endala". Itsho iNkosi! Musani ukukhumbula kwakhona, kwaye musa ukubalela izono zenyama yomntu omdala "kumntu omtsha." Amen! Waza wathi, Andisayi kuba sazikhumbula izono zabo, nezikreqo zabo; Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo? —Funda amaHebhere 10:17-18

( Isilumkiso: NoKumkani uDavide wakrexeza nokubulala enyameni, yaye intsapho yakhe yafikelwa yintlekele yekrele esenyameni.” KwiNdumiso wathi abo babalelwa njengamalungisa nguThixo “ngaphandle kwemisebenzi” basikelelwe. “Ubulungisa” bukaThixo Obutyhilwe “ngaphandle komthetho” - bhekisela kumaRoma 3:21 Ngokufanayo, “uKumkani uSawule nomngcatshi uYudas” nabo bazisola ngezenzo zabo baza bazivuma izono zabo ngenxa yokuba ‘babengakholwa’ yaye abazange bamisele imimiselo [ngokholo. ]. UThixo akazixolelanga izono zabo? (Bona eyesi-2 kuTimoti 1:4.)

【3】Isono esenziwe ngaphandle komthetho

1 Ukuba ubani wona ungekho umthetho, uya kutshabalala ngaphandle komthetho; — Roma 2:12 .

2 Apho kungekho mthetho, akukho sigqitho → kuba umthetho uxhokonxa ingqumbo (okanye inguqulelo: ukohlwaya); — Roma 4:15

3 Ke wona umthetho, kungekho mthetho, isono sifile; — Roma 7:8

4 Ngaphandle komthetho, isono asithathwa njengesono → Ngaphambi kokuba kubekho umthetho, isono sasisele sikho ehlabathini; — Roma 5:13

( Roma 10:9-10 ) IiNtlanga azinamthetho—zinokugwetyelwa zize zibe nobomi obungunaphakade ngokukholelwa kuYesu Kristu kuphela. .Bamele bakholelwe kuYesu baze babhaptizwe nguMoya oyiNgcwele ukuze basindiswe kwaye babe nobomi.

Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

KULUNGILE! Namhlanje ndingathanda ukwabelana nani ubudlelane bam nani nonke. Ngamana ubabalo lweNkosi uYesu Kristu, uthando lukaThixo, nempefumlelo yoMoya oyiNgcwele ingahlala ihleli nani nonke! Amen

2021.06.05

Umbuzo: Siyintoni isono esikhokelela ekufeni?
Impendulo: Makhe sijonge eyoku-1 kaYohane 5:16 eBhayibhileni size siyifunde kunye: Ukuba umntu uthe wambona umzalwana wakhe esenza isono esingasingisi kufeni, makamthandazele, yaye uThixo uya kumnika ubomi; isono esisingisa ekufeni, mna Akuthiwa umntu makasithandazele esi sono.

Umbuzo: Ziziphi izono ezikhokelela ekufeni?
Impendulo: Inkcazo eneenkcukacha apha ngezantsi

【1】Isono sika-Adam sokwaphulwa kwesivumelwano

IGenesis Chapter 2 verse 17 Ke wona umthi wokwazi okulungileyo nokubi uze ungawudli; kuba mhla uthe wadla kuwo, uya kufa.

Roma 5:12, 14 Kanye njengokuba isono sangena ngamntu mnye ehlabathini, kwaza kwangena ke ukufa ngaso isono kubo bonke, ngenxa yokuba bonke bonayo. …Kodwa ukususela kuAdam kuye kuMoses, ukufa kwalawula, kwanabo bangonanga njengoAdam. U-Adam wayengumfuziselo wendoda eyayiza kuza.

1 KwabaseKorinte 15:21-22 Kuba ekubeni kaloku kungomntu mnye ukufa, kukwanjalo novuko lwabafileyo. Njengokuba kuye uAdam bafa bonke, ngokunjalo nakuye uKristu baya kudliswa ubomi bonke.

KUMAHEBHERE 9:27 Abantu bamiselwe ukuba bafe kube kanye, ize ke emveni koko ibe ngumgwebo.

(Phawula: Ngokuhlolisisa ezi zibhalo zingasentla, sibhala ukuba “isono sika-Adam sokuwaphula umnqophiso” sisono esikhokelela ekufeni; uYesu Kristu, unyana kaThixo, wazihlambulula izono zabantu “ngegazi” lakhe. [abakholwayo] kuye abayi kugwetywa → ubomi obungunaphakade abo bangakholwayo sele begwetyiwe—“igazi” likaYesu lizihlambile izono zabantu, yaye nina [abangakholwayo] → niya kugwetywa, ibe kuya kubakho umgwebo; emva kokufa → "Ngokutsho kwakho, uphantsi komthetho "Uya kugwetywa ngokokwenzayo." Ngaba uyakuqonda ngokucacileyo oku?)

【2】Isono esisekelwe ekusebenzeni komthetho

KumaGalati 3 Chapter 10 10 Uphantsi kwesiqalekiso wonke umntu owenza imisebenzi yomthetho; kuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Ongazenziyo izinto ezibhaliweyo encwadini yomthetho, uphantsi kwesiqalekiso.

( Phawula: Ngokuzifunda ezi zibhalo zingasentla, siyangqina ukuba nabani na othi uziphathe ngokwasemthethweni, lowo uziqhayisayo egwetyelwe egcina imimiselo yomthetho, lowo uyigcinayo imimiselo yomthetho njengomqondiso wokuthobeka. ogcina umthetho njengobomi bakhe, kwaye “ohamba ngomthetho” Abo bangaphiliyo “ubulungisa bomthetho” baya kuqalekiswa ngumthetho abo bangayihoyiyo inceba kaThixo nemivuzo yabo ubabalo luqalekisiwe. Ngoko, uyayiqonda?

Ke sona isiphiwo eso asiyiyo into yokuba sigwetywe ngenxa yesono samntu mnye. Ke, ukuba ukufa kwalawula ngalo mntu mnye ukufa kwalawula ngalowo mnye, kobeka phi na ke ukugqithisela bona, bakuba bababalwe ngokugqithileyo, kwanesipho sobulungisa, babe nokulawula ebomini ngamntu mnye, uYesu Kristu? …Umthetho wongezwa ngaphandle, ukuze isigqitho sande; ke apho kwasanda isono, lwaphuphuma ngakumbi ubabalo; Njengokuba isono saba nokulawula ngokufa, ngokunjalo nobabalo lulawula ngobulungisa, luse ebomini obungunaphakade, ngaye uYesu Kristu, iNkosi yethu. —Funda amaRoma 5 indinyana 16-17, 20-21 . Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

Njengoko umpostile “uPawulos” watshoyo! Ke ekubeni safayo nje kuwo umthetho owawusibophelela, ngoku sikhululekile kuwo umthetho..—Bona kwabaseRoma 7:6.

Kuba ngenxa yomthetho ndafa kuwo umthetho, ukuze ubomi ndibudlele kuThixo. —Funda eyabaseGalati 2:19. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo? )

【3】 Isono sokubhangisa umnqophiso omtsha osekwe ngegazi likaYesu

KUMAHEBHERE 9:15 Ngoko ke ungumlamleli womnqophiso omtsha, ukuze abo babiziweyo bamkele idinga lelifa elingunaphakade, becamagushele izono zomnqophiso wokuqala ngokufa. Amen!

(I)Wonke umntu ehlabathini wenza ubugebenga kunye nokwaphulwa kwesivumelwano sengqesho

Ngenxa yokuba bonke bonile ... Roma 6:23 Umvuzo wesono kukufa. UYesu, uNyana kaThixo, wafela izono zethu ukuze acamagushele izono ezenziwe ngumntu “kumnqophiso owandulelayo”, ezizezi “zono zika-Adam ezaphula umnqophiso” nezono ezenziwa ngamaYuda ngokutyeshela “umthetho ka-Adam”. uMoses". UYesu Kristu wasikhulula esiqalekisweni somthetho, esikhulula emthethweni nakwisiqalekiso sawo.

(II) Abo bangawugciniyo uMnqophiso oMtsha kodwa bawugcine uMnqophiso oNdala

KumaHebhere 10:16-18 “Nguwo lo umnqophiso endiya kuwenza nabo emva kwaloo mihla, itsho iNkosi: Ndiya kuyibhala imithetho yam ezintliziyweni zabo, ndize ndiyibeke phakathi kwabo; abasayi kuba sazikhumbula izono zabo, nezikreqo zabo.” Ekubeni ezi zono zixolelwe, akusafuneki mbingelelo wezono. (Kodwa abantu basoloko benemvukelo yaye beneenkani, besoloko befuna iindlela zokukhumbula izikreqo zenyama yabo. Abakukholelwa oko uYehova akuthethayo! UYehova wathi abayi kuzikhumbula izikreqo zenyama. Wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni kunye noKrestu. Ngaba ukholelwa kwiimvakalelo zakho okanye kumazwi omnqophiso owenziwe ngegazi leNkosi? uyaqonda?

Amazwi aphilileyo owawevayo kum, wagcine elukholweni nothando olukuKristu Yesu. Kufuneka uyigcine “indlela elungileyo” oyiphathisiweyo ngokukholosa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele ohleli kuthi. Umlinganiselo wamagama asulungekileyo → Ulivile ilizwi lenyaniso, elililizwi elilungileyo, ivangeli yosindiso lwakho! Uze uthembele kuMoya oyiNgcwele; Uyaqonda? —Funda eyesi-2 kuTimoti 1:13-14

(III) Abo babuyelayo ukugcina umnqophiso wabo wangaphambili

KUMAGALATI 3:2-3 Ndifuna ukunibuza le nto: Ngaba uMoya oyiNgcwele namamkela ngemisebenzi yomthetho na? Ngaba kungenxa yokuva ivangeli? Ekubeni navuswe nguMoya oyiNgcwele, ngaba usathembele kwingqibelelo yenyama? Ngaba awunalwazi?
UKrestu uyasikhulula. Ngoko yima uqinile kwaye ungazivumeli ukuba ubanjwe yidyokhwe yobukhoboka kwakhona. --Jonga kwisahluko sesi-5, indinyana 1.

( Phawula: UYesu Krestu wasikhulula kumnqophiso omdala kwaye wasikhulula ukuba simise umnqophiso omtsha kunye nathi. Ukuba sibuyela emva ukuze sithobele imithetho “yomnqophiso wokuqala,” ngaba oku bekungayi kuthetha ukuba siwushiyile umnqophiso omtsha awawenza nathi uNyana kaThixo ngegazi lakhe? Ngaba awunalwazi? Ikwangumfuziselo kuthi bantu banamhlanje, ngaba kulungile ukuthobela imithetho yamandulo yeQing Dynasty, uMing Dynasty, Tang Dynasty okanye Han Dynasty? Ukuba niyigcina ngolu hlobo imithetho yamandulo, anizazi na ukuba niyayigqitha le mithetho yangoku?

Gal 6:7 Musani ukulahlekiswa, uThixo akayi kwenziwa intlekisa. Loo nto athe wahlwayela yona umntu, wovuna kwayona; Musa ukubanjwa kwakhona yidyokhwe yamakhoboka esono. Uyaqonda? )

【4】Isono sokungakholelwa kuYesu

UYohane 3:16-19 Wenjenje uThixo ukulithanda kwakhe ihlabathi ude wancama uNyana wakhe okuphela kwamzeleyo, ukuze bonke abakholwayo kuye bangatshabalali, koko babe nobomi obungunaphakade. Ngenxa yokuba uThixo wamthumela uNyana wakhe ehlabathini, kungekhona ukuze aligwebe ihlabathi (okanye liguqulelwe ngokuthi: ukuligweba ihlabathi; lona elingaphantsi), kodwa ukuze ihlabathi lisindiswe ngaye. Lowo ukholwayo kuye, akagwetywa; ke lowo ungakholwayo, uselegwetyiwe, ngokuba engakholwanga kwigana loNyana okuphela kwamzeleyo uThixo. Ukhanyiso ke lweza ehlabathini, baza abantu bathanda ubumnyama endaweni yokukhanya, kuba imisebenzi yabo ingendawo.

( Phawula: Igama loNyana kaThixo okuphela kwamzeleyo nguYesu. Uya kuzala unyana, umthiye igama elinguYesu, kuba yena eya kubasindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo. NguYesu Krestu oya kukhulula abo baphantsi komthetho, asisindise kwizono zendoda endala u-Adam ukwaphulwa kwesivumelwano, aze asincede sifumane ukuba ngoonyana bakaThixo! Amen. Abo bakholwayo kuye abayi kugwetywa → kwaye bafumane ubomi obungunaphakade! Abo bangakholwayo sele begwetyiwe. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo? )

2021.06.04

articles.title: Isono ｜Indalo ka-Adam kwaye iwele kuMyezo wase-Edeni
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade! Amen.

Sityhila iBhayibhile kwiGenesis Isahluko 3 17, yaye indinyana 19 ithi kuAdam: “ Ngokuba umphulaphule umkakho, wadla kuwo umthi, endakuwisela umthetho ngawo, ukuba ungadli kuwo, uqalekisiwe umhlaba ngenxa yakho; ... uya kudla ukudla kokubila kobuso bakho, ude ubuyele emhlabeni owazalwa kuwo. Uluthuli, uya kubuyela kwaseluthulini. "

Namhlanje siza kufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane " Indalo ka-Adam kunye nokuwa kuMyezo wase-Edeni 》Umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu oseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele usoloko enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! "Umfazi onesidima" uthumela abasebenzi - ngelizwi lenyaniso, elibhaliweyo lathethwa ezandleni zabo, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwakho. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uYesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zomoya → Siyaqonda ukuba uAdam odaliweyo “ubuthathaka” kwaye unokuwa ngokulula uThixo usixelela ukuba singahlali kuAdam “odaliweyo” ukuze siphile kuYesu Kristu, lowo uzelwe nguThixo. . Amen!

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

Indalo UAdam wawela emhlabeni kuMyezo wase-Eden

(1) UAdam wadalwa ngothuli lomhlaba

UYehova uThixo wambumba umntu ngothuli lwasemhlabeni, waphefumlela emathatheni akhe impefumlo yobomi, waba ngumphefumlo ophilileyo; igama lakhe ke nguAdam. —Funda iGenesis 2:7
Wathi uThixo, Masenze umntu ngokomfanekiselo wethu ngokufana nathi. izinambuzane ezinambuzelayo emhlabeni.” UThixo wathi wamdala umntu ngokomfanekiselo wakhe, wadala indoda nenkazana. Wabasikelela uThixo, wathi kubo, Qhamani, nande, niwuzalise umhlaba, niweyise, nibe nobukhosi ezintlanzini zolwandle, nasezintakeni zezulu, nasezinambuzaneni zonke ezinambuzelayo emhlabeni. .”—Imbekiselo yeGenesis isahluko 1 indinyana 26-28

(2) UAdam wadalwa ngothuli waza wawa

IBhayibhile ikwabhala oku: “Owokuqala umntu, uAdam, waba ngumphefumlo odla ubomi, unomoya (umoya: okanye uguqulelwe njengenyama)”; —Funda eyoku-1 kwabaseKorinte 15:45

UYehova uThixo wambeka umntu emyezweni we-Eden, ukuba awusebenze, awugcine. UYehova uThixo wamyalela wathi: “Ungatya kuwo nawuphi na umthi womyezo, kodwa uze ungadli kuwo umthi wokwazi okulungileyo nokubi, kuba mhla uthe wadla kuwo uya kufa ngokuqinisekileyo.”— Genesis 2 15 - Icandelo le-17.

Inyoka yaye inobuqhophololo ngaphezu kwazo zonke izinto eziphilileyo zasendle, abezenzile uYehova uThixo. Yathi inyoka kumfazi, Utshilo na okunene uThixo ukuthi, Maningadli kuwo nawuphi na umthi osemyezweni?...Yathi inyoka kumfazi, Anisayi kufa; ngokuba uyazi uThixo mhlana nithe nadla kuwo, aya kuvuleka amehlo enu, njengokuba uThixo ekwazi okulungileyo nokubi.”— Genesis 3:1, 4-5 .

Wabona umfazi ukuba isiqhamo saloo mthi silungele ukudliwa, nokuba siyanqweneleka emehlweni, nokuba siyalumkisa abantu, wathabatha esiqhameni sawo, wadla, wanika nendoda yakhe, yasidla nayo indoda. — Genesis 3:6

(3) UAdam wophula umthetho waza waqalekiswa ngumthetho

Wathi uYehova uThixo kwinyoka, Ngokuba uyenzile le nto, uqalekisiwe wena ngaphezu kwezinto zonke ezizitho zine namarhamncwa;
Wathi kumfazi, Ndiya kukwandisa ukubulaleka kwakho ekumitheni, ube ninzi ukubulaleka kwakho ekuzaleni kwakho, inkanuko yakho ibe sendodeni yakho, ikulawule indoda yakho.”— Genesis 3 isahluko 16
Wathi kuAdam, Ngokuba umphulaphule umkakho, wadla kuwo umthi endakuwisela umthetho ngawo, ndathi, Ungadli kuwo, uqalekisiwe umhlaba ngenxa yakho; uya kusebenza nzima yonke imihla yobomi bakho, udle kuwo. Uya kukuntshulela ameva neenkunzane; uya kudla umfuno wasendle, udle isonka sakho ngokubila kobuso bakho, ude ubuyele eluthulini; ngokuba wazalwa eluthulini, uya kubuya ube ngothuli. .”— Genesis 3:17-19

(4) Isono sangena ehlabathini kuAdam kuphela

Kanye njengokuba isono sangena ngamntu mnye ehlabathini, kwaza kwangena ukufa ngaso isono, ngokunjalo ukufa kwabafikela bonke abantu ngenxa yokuba bonke bonayo. — Roma 5:12
Kuba umvuzo wesono kukufa; ke sona isipho sikaThixo bubomi obungunaphakade, kuKristu Yesu iNkosi yethu. — KwabaseRoma 6 Isahluko 23
Ekubeni ukufa kweza ngamntu mnye, ngokunjalo novuko lwabafileyo lweza ngamntu mnye. Njengokuba kuye uAdam bafa bonke, ngokunjalo nakuye uKristu baya kudliswa ubomi bonke. — 1 Korinte 15:21-22
Ngokwesiphelo, wonke umntu umiselwe ukuba afe kube kanye, kwaye emva kokufa kuya kubakho umgwebo. — Hebhere 9:27

( Phawula: Kwinkupho yokugqibela, ndabelana nawe ukuba kuMyezo wase-Eden esibhakabhakeni, uLusifa, “ikhwezi eliqaqambileyo, unyana wokusa” owadalwa nguThixo, wayenekratshi entliziyweni ngenxa yobuhle bakhe, waza wonakalisa ubulumko bakhe ngenxa yobulumko bakhe. ubuhle bakhe, waza wadlwengulwa ngenxa yorhwebo lwakhe olugqithisileyo ngenkanuko. Ngenxa yobubi bakhe, ukubawa, ulunya, umona, ukubulala, inkohliso, intiyo kaThixo, ukwaphula iminqophiso, njl. njl., intliziyo yakhe enentloni yatshintsha isimo sayo saba yinamba enkulu ebomvu elihlazo kunye nenyoka yakudala enamazinyo arhwexayo neenzipho. Ilungiselelwe ukuqhatha abantu ukuba baphule iminqophiso baze bone, besenza ukuba baphambuke kuThixo kuMyezo wase-Eden wasemhlabeni, uAdam noEva, ababedalwe ngothuli, bahendwa ‘yinyoka’ ngenxa yobuthathaka babo. ngoko “bawaphula umnqophiso” baza bona baza bawa.

Kodwa uThixo uyasithanda sonke waza wasinika uNyana wakhe okuphela kwamzeleyo, uYesu, kanye njengoYohane 3:16 , “Kuba wenjenje uThixo ukulithanda kwakhe ihlabathi, ude wancama uNyana wakhe okuphela kwamzeleyo, ukuze bonke abakholwayo kuye bangatshabalali, koko babe nobomi obungunaphakade. ” INkosi uYesu nayo yathi, Nimelwe kukuthi nizalwe ngokutsha, nizelwe ngoMoya oyiNgcwele, nizelwe nguThixo, ngokwabantwana bakaThixo, ukuze ningoni— bhekisa kuYohane 1:3:9 . (isicatshulwa sokuqala yimbewu) uhleli kuye; naye ke asinakona, ngokuba yena wazalwa nguThixo;

UAdam, owadalwa eluthulini, wayeya kuwaphula ngokulula umthetho esonweni aze awe ngenxa yenyama yakhe ebuthathaka Kuphela ngabo bazalwe nguThixo abasayi kuwa, kuba bangoonyana bakaThixo abahlala ekhaya ngonaphakade, yaye amakhoboka awukwazi ukuhlala ekhaya ngonaphakade. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo? )

2021.06.03

articles.title: Isono ｜Inkwenkwezi eqaqambileyo eyadalwa yawa ezulwini kuMyezo wase-Eden
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibhile kuIsaya isahluko 14 indinyana 12 size sifunde kunye: “Khwezi, nyana wesifingo, yini na ukuba uwe ezulwini, wena mnqobi weentlanga?

Namhlanje siza kufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane " Inkwenkwezi eqaqambileyo yendalo yawa ezulwini kuMyezo wase-Eden 》Umthandazo: Abha othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele usoloko enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! “Umfazi onesidima” uthumela abasebenzi – ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhalwe ezandleni zabo, elithethwe ngabo, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwethu. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Thandazela ukuba iNkosi uYesu iqhubeke ikhanyisela amehlo ethu okomoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive size sibone iinyaniso zokomoya -eyesithathu iinkwenkwezi esibhakabhakeni, yawa e-Eden esibhakabhakeni, yaphoswa emhlabeni; Khuphelani eNkosini uYesu, ukuba abantwana bakhe banxibe sonke isikrweqe sikaThixo, bhinqani inyaniso esinqeni senu, ninxibe isigcina-sifuba sobulungisa, bhinqani iimbadada zenu iindaba ezilungileyo, uthabathe iingweletshetshe zokholo, unxibe isigcina-ntloko sobulungisa. usindiso, thabatha ikrele loMoya oyiNgcwele, eliliLizwi likaThixo! Ngokuthandaza nokucela ngamaxesha onke, unokuwoyisa kwaye uwaxhathise amaqhinga kasathana. Amen!

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

Inkwenkwezi eqaqambileyo yadalwa

(1) Inkwenkwezi eqaqambileyo yendalo-lucifer

Masifunde uIsaya isahluko 14 indinyana 12 eBhayibhileni size siyifunde kunye: Yini na ukuba uwe ezulwini, khwezi liqaqambileyo, nyana wesifingo? Ugalelwe emhlabeni, wena mnqobi wezizwe? ( Hezekile 28:11-15 ) Laza ilizwi likaYehova lafika kum, lisithi: “Nyana womntu, menzela isijwili ukumkani waseTire, uthi, Itsho iNkosi uYehova ukuthi, Uxhobele yonke into, ulumkile; Umhle phakathi kweento zonke. Umyezo wase-Eden uhonjiswe ngamatye anqabileyo... kwaye unawe amabamba amahle neembande, ezalungiswayo ngomhla wokudalwa kwakho Uhamba phakathi kwelitye eliqaqambileyo, elikhazimlayo njengomlilo, kususela kwimini yokudalwa kwakho;

[Phawula]: Ngokuphonononga ezi zibhalo zingasentla, sibhala ukuba "Inkwenkwezi Eqaqambileyo-uNyana weNtambama" ilungiselelwe yonke into, izele bubulumko, kwaye intle ngokupheleleyo Uyingelosi enkulu yokudumisa, kwaye yalungiselelwa ngokupheleleyo nguThixo indalo. Yayiziikerubhi ezithanjisiweyo ezazigqume ityeya yomnqophiso, awathi uThixo wayibeka phezu kwentaba engcwele kaThixo, kumyezo wase-Eden wasezulwini. Unokuhamba phakathi “kwelitye elinqabileyo” elibengezela njengomlilo, yaye kamva uya kukwazi ukubona ukungabikho kokusesikweni. " gwenxa " → Yonke intswela-bulungisa sisono .. --Khangela kuYohane 1:17 nakumaRoma 1:29-31 . Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

(2) Inkwenkwezi eqaqambileyo yendalo yawa

UIsaya 14:13-15 uthe entliziyweni yakho, Ndiya kunyukela emazulwini, ndiyinyuse itrone yam ibe ngaphezu kweenkwenkwezi zikaThixo; Ndiya kunyuka ndiye ezindaweni eziphakamileyo zamafu, ndilingane nOsenyangweni; ’ Noko ke, uya kuwela eHadesi nasenzonzobileni yomhadi. — Isaya 14:13-15

(Qaphela: Xa usithi “ndifuna” entliziyweni yakho, oku kukuqala kokuwa, kanye njengengelosi enkulu eyayinqulwa yaze yadunyiswa njenge “Khwezi Eliqaqambileyo-uNyana woKusa”, ngenxa yekratshi elalisentliziyweni yaso. , wathi, Ndiyafuna, izihlandlo ezi-5 zilandelelana; ndikutshabalalise ngenxa yobuhle bakho, ngenxa yobuqaqawuli bakho, ubonakalise ubulumko bakho. ngenxa yoko ndiya kukhupha umlilo phakathi kwakho, ukudle, ube luthuthu emhlabeni, emehlweni abo bonke abakubonayo, ube ngummangaliso kuzo zonke iintlanga abantu baya kunkwantya, bangabi sabakho ehlabathini ngonaphakade.” Bona uHezekile 28:15-19 kunye neSityhilelo 20, 21 ukuze ufumane umgwebo wokugqibela.

(3) ukubizwa ngokuba nguyise kaMtyholi, uyise weenkanuko, noyise wawo

UYOHANE 8:44 Nina ningaboyihlo uMtyholi, neenkanuko zoyihlo niyathanda ukuzenza. Yena waye esisibulala-mntu kwasekuqaleni, akemi enyanisweni, ngokuba inyaniso ayikho kuye. Uxoka ngokwakhe, ngokuba ulixoki, noyise wawo.

IGenesis 3:1-4 Inyoka yaye inobuqhophololo ngaphezu kwazo zonke izidalwa zasendle uYehova uThixo awayezenzile. Yathi inyoka kumfazi, Utshilo na okunene uThixo ukuthi, Maningadli kuwo nawuphi na umthi osemyezweni? phakathi emyezweni.” UYehova uthe, ‘Nize ningadli kuyo, nize ningayichukumisi, ukuze ningafi.’” Yathi inyoka kumfazi, Anisayi kufa;

IGENESIS 2:17 Kodwa uze ungawudli umthi wokwazi okulungileyo nokubi; kuba mhla uthe wadla kuwo, uya kufa ngenene. "

(Qaphela: Inyoka yinyoka yakudala, ekwabizwa ngokuba inamba, umtyholi, noSathana - bhekisa kwisiTyhilelo 20:2, uBhelezebhubhe, ukumkani weedemon - bhekisa kuMateyu 12: 24. Ongendawo, Umchasi-Kristu, omkhulu umoni, umkhohlisi, "Inyoka" inezihloko ezininzi ezifana nomhendi → UEva noAdam bawaphula umthetho kwaye baba likhoboka lesono kwaye baqalekiswa ngumthetho.

(4) Umtyholi wenza ubugwenxa kwaye wabulala abantu kwasekuqaleni

Lowo wonayo ungokaMtyholi, ngokuba uMtyholi wone kwasekuqalekeni.

Nina ningaboyihlo uMtyholi, neenkanuko zoyihlo niyathanda ukuzenza. Yena waye esisibulala-mntu kwasekuqaleni, akemi enyanisweni, ngokuba inyaniso ayikho kuye. Uxoka ngokwakhe, ngokuba ulixoki, noyise wawo. —Funda uYohane 8:44

Yiyo na le indoda eyenza ukuba ibe yintlango elimiweyo, iwawise imizi, ingabandululi abathinjwa baye ezindlwini zabo? ’—Funda uIsaya 14, indinyana 17

Noko ke, uya kuwela eHadesi nasenzonzobileni yomhadi. ——Bona iSahluko 14, indinyana 15 kaIsaya

articles.title: Yintoni isono? Ukwaphula umthetho kusisono
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo malube kubo bonke abazalwana noodade! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibhile kweyoku-1 kaYohane isahluko 3 indinyana 4 size sifunde kunye: Othe wona waphula umthetho, usisono; Uze utyhile kuYohane 8:34 Waphendula uYesu wathi, Inene, inene, ndithi kuni, Wonke umntu owenza isono ungamakhoboka esono.

Namhlanje siza kufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane " yintoni isono 》Umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo wethu oseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele usoloko enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! "Umfazi onesidima" uthumela abasebenzi - ngezandla zabo babhala kwaye bathethe ilizwi lenyaniso, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwakho. Ukutya kuhanjiswa ukusuka “ezulwini” kude, yaye ukutya kokomoya kuhanjiswa kwangethuba, ukuze ubomi bethu bokomoya bube nobutyebi ngakumbi! Amen. Thandaza ukuba iNkosi uYesu iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuba siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni kwaye siqonde ukuba ziyintoni na izono? Ukwaphula umthetho kusisono.

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

Umbuzo: Yintoni isono?

Impendulo: Ukwaphula umthetho kusisono.

Masifunde eyoku-1 kaYohane 3:4 eBhayibhileni kwaye siyifunde kunye: Othe wona waphula umthetho, wasisono;

[Phawula]: Ngokuhlolisisa ezi zibhalo zingasentla, yintoni “isono”? Ukwaphula umthetho kusisono. Umthetho ubandakanya: imiyalelo, imimiselo, imimiselo, kunye neminye imimiselo yemigaqo nemimiselo eyahlukeneyo "umnqophiso", lo ngumthetho. Xa uthe waphula umthetho, waphula umthetho, kusisono. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

(1) Umthetho ka-Adam:

"Uze ungadli" ngumyalelo! Emyezweni wase-Eden, “uThixo wenza umnqophiso nomntu, wenza umyalelo kukhokho uAdam → UYehova uThixo wambeka umntu emyezweni we-Eden ukuba awulime, awugcine. *UNdikhoyo uThixo wamyalela wathi: “Ungatya nakuwuphi na umthi womyezo, kodwa ungatyi kuwo umthi wokwazi okulungileyo nokubi, kuba mhla uthe wadla kuwo uya kufa Genesis 2 Isahluko 15-17 amaqhina.

Ukhokho wokuqala [uAdam] waphula umthetho waza wadla kuwo umthi wokwazi okulungileyo nokubi Oku kanye njengokuba “isono” sangena ehlabathini ngomntu omnye, uAdam, nokufa kwaphuma esonweni, “kuba umvuzo wesono kukufa” ngoko ukufa kufikela kumntu wonke ngenxa yokuba wonke umntu wona ngaphandle komthetho sele sisehlabathini; kodwa ngaphandle komthetho, isono asithathwa njengesono, Ngamanye amazwi, ukuba akukho myalelo usemthethweni othi “ungatyi”, bekungayi kuthathwa njengokungathi ukhokho uAdam “wadla isonka somlibo”. isiqhamo somthi.” Isono, kuba uAdam akazange awaphule umthetho. Ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo? Jonga kwabaseRoma 5:12-13 nakwabaseRoma 6:23 .

(2) Ubudlelwane phakathi komthetho nesono:

1 Apho kungekho mthetho, isono asibalelwa esonweni—Funda kwabaseRoma 5:13
2 Apho kungekho mthetho, akukho sigqitho—Funda kwabaseRoma 4:15
3 Ngaphandle komthetho, isono sifile— bona amaRoma 7:8 . Olu lunxulumano phakathi komthetho nesono! Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?
4 Ngomthetho—ukuba nisona siphantsi komthetho, niya kugwetywa ngokomthetho—KwabaseRoma 2:12

(3) Owenyama uzala isono ngawo umthetho;

Kaloku xa ‘sasisenyameni,’ iminqweno emibi ezelwe “ngumthetho” yayiyiminqweno emibi neminqweno yenyama, “Yiza, isono, sakuba sikhule ngokupheleleyo, sivelisa ukufa,” oko kukuthi. uthwala isiqhamo sawo sokufa. Bhekisela kumaRoma 7:5 nakuYakobi 1:15 .

Kunjengokuba umpostile uPawulos wathi: “Bendifudula ndidla ubomi, ungekho umthetho, uthe ke wakufika umthetho, sabuya sadla ubomi isono, ndafa ke; Wandilukuhla ngomthetho, ungcwele, nomthetho ungcwele, ulungile, ulungile lowo undibulalayo; Isono sibonakaliswa sisono ngalowo ulungileyo, kwaye isono sibonakaliswa sibi ngokugqithisileyo ngenxa yomthetho ivesi 9-13 “UPawulosi” ongoyena unobuchule kumthetho wamaJuda “uPawulos” usikhokelela ekubeni sifumane “isono” ngokucacileyo ngoMoya kaThixo “ubudlelwane nomthetho.” Amen!

(4) Iindlela zokusombulula isono: Ngoku ekubeni imvelaphi ‘yesono’ ‘nomthetho’ ifunyenwe, [isono] sinokuconjululwa ngokulula. Amen! Makhe sibone oko umpostile uPawulos asifundisa kona

[Sikhululekile emthethweni] → 1 Ke ekubeni safayo kuwo umthetho osibophayo, “umntu wethu omdala wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni, safa ke ngokumanyene neNkosi ngawo umzimba kaKristu,” sikhululekile ngoku kuwo umthetho.... .. Roma 7:6; Gal 2:19 Kuba ngomthetho ndafa kuwo umthetho.
[Sikhululwe esonweni] → 2 Kuba siyazi ukuba umntu wethu omdala wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni kunye naye, ukuze umzimba wesono uphuthiswe, ukuze singabi sasikhonza isono; Amen! Bona amaRoma 6:6-7 . Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

articles.title: umthetho kaKristu
articles.author: admin
articles.content:

Masivule iBhayibhile yethu kumaGalati isahluko 6 indinyana 2 size sifunde kunye: Thwalisanani ubunzima; xa nenjenjalo ke nithobela umyalelo kaKrestu.

Namhlanje siza kufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane " umthetho kaKristu 》Umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhleli enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! "Umfazi onesidima" uthumela abasebenzi - ababhala ngezandla zabo kwaye bathethe ilizwi, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwakho. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Yanga iNkosi uYesu ingaqhubeka ikhanyisela amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuba siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni. Qonda ukuba umthetho kaKristu "ngumthetho wothando, ukuthanda uThixo, ukuthanda ummelwane wakho njengoko uzithanda ngako" ! Amen.

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

【Umthetho kaKristu uluthando】

(1)Uthando luzalisekisa umthetho

Bazalwana, ukuba ubani uthe waqutyulwa sisiphoso, nina bangaboMoya, mlulekeni ninobulali; Thwalisanani ubunzima; xa nenjenjalo ke nithobela umyalelo kaKrestu. --Isahluko 6 esongezelelweyo ivesi 1-2
UYOHANE 13:34 Ndiniwisela umthetho omtsha, wokuba nithandane, njengoko ndinithandileyo nina;
1 Yohane 3:23 Umthetho kaThixo ngowokuba sikholwe ligama loNyana wakhe, uYesu Kristu, sithandane njengoko wasiyalelayo. Isahluko 3 ivesi 11 Nowokuqala wawuva umthetho.
Kuba umthetho uphela uhlanganiswe kwesi sivakalisi sithi, Uze umthande ummelwane wakho ngoko uzithanda ngako. --Isahluko 5 esongezelelweyo ivesi 14
Musani ukuba natyala lanto mntwini, lingelilo elokuthandana; kuba lowo umthandayo ummelwane wakhe uwufezile umthetho. Ngokomzekelo, imiyalelo enjengale: “Uze ungakrexezi, musa ukubulala, musa ukuba, musa ukubawa,” neminye imiyalelo iqukunjelwa kwesi sivakalisi: “Uze umthande ummelwane wakho njengawe siqu. — Roma 13:8-9
Uthando luzeka kade umsindo, alunamona, alunakratshi, alukhukhumali; aluvuyeli kungalungisi, kodwa luthanda inyaniso; Uthando alunasiphelo. --1 Korinte 13:4-8-Yeyona ndlela ilungileyo!

(2)Uthando lukaKristu lude, lubanzi, luphakame kwaye lunzulu

Ngenxa yoko ndiguqa ngamadolo phambi koBawo (ekuthiywa ngaye yonke imizalwane esemazulwini nesemhlabeni), ndimcela, ngokobutyebi bozuko lwakhe, ukuba aniphe ukomelezwa ngamandla ngaye uMoya wakhe, ezintliziyweni zenu. , ukuze uKristu akhanyisele ngani ezintliziyweni zenu, ukuze nimiliselwe nisekelwe eluthandweni, nibe nako ukukuqonda, kunye nabo bonke abangcwele, ukuba lungakanani na ubude, nobubanzi, nokuphakama, nobunzulu, uthando lukaKristu; nokwazi ukuba olu thando lungaphezu kokwazi. Unako ke uThixo ukwenza okungaphezu kweento zonke ngokugqithiseleyo, ngaphezu kwesikucelayo nesinokukuqiqa, ngokwamandla asebenzayo ngaphakathi kwethu. — Efese 3:14-20

Asikukuphela ke oko; sizingca nangeembandezelo ezi, sisazi ukuba imbandezelo ivelisa unyamezelo; unyamezelo ke lusebenza ukucikideka; ke ukucikideka kuvelisa ithemba; ithemba ke alidanisi; ngokuba uthando lukaThixo luthululelwe ezintliziyweni zethu. uMoya oyiNgcwele esamnikwayo. — Roma 5, isahluko 3-5 .

EyokuQala kaYohane 3 11 Masithandane. Nguwo lo umthetho enawuvayo kwasekuqalekeni.

Ke intsingiselo yoyalo iluthando; — 1 Timoti 1 indinyana 5

[Ukubethelelwa kukaKristu kubonisa uthando olukhulu lukaThixo]

(1) Igazi lakhe elixabisekileyo lihlambulula iintliziyo zenu nazo zonke izono zenu

wangena kwaba kanye kweyona ngcwele, kungengagazi leebhokhwe nelamathole, kungegazi elilelakhe, efumene ucamagushelo olungunaphakade. ... lobeka phi na ukugqithisela lona igazi likaKristu, owazisondeza ngoMoya ongunaphakade, engenasiphako, kuye uThixo, ukuzihlambulula iintliziyo zenu emisebenzini efileyo, ukuze nikhonze uThixo ophilileyo? — Hebhere 9:12, 14

Ukuba sihamba ekukhanyeni, njengokuba uThixo esekukhanyeni, soba sinobudlelane omnye nomnye, lithi negazi likaYesu Kristu, uNyana wakhe, lisihlambulule kuso sonke isono. — 1 Yohane 1:7

Ubabalo noxolo kuwe, Yesu Kristu, ingqina elithembekileyo, wena owavuka kuqala kwabafileyo, intloko yookumkani bomhlaba! Uyasithanda kwaye usebenzisa igazi lakhe ukuze ahlambe (ahlambe) izono zethu - ISityhilelo 1:5

Naye ninjalo ke inxenye yenu; kuloko nahlanjululwayo, nangcwaliswa, nagwetyelwayo egameni leNkosi uYesu Kristu, nangoMoya kaThixo wethu. — 1 Korinte 6:9-11

Ulibengezelo lobuqaqawuli bukaThixo, umfanekiselo wakhe kanye; Akuba ebahlambulule abantu ezonweni, wahlala phantsi ngasekunene kobuKhulu emazulwini. — Hebhere 1:3

Ukuba akunjalo, ngaba imibingelelo yayingayi kuyeka kudala? Kungenxa yokuba izazela zabanquli ziye zahlanjululwa yaye abaziva benetyala. — Hebhere 10:2

(Iiveki ezimashumi asixhenxe zimiselwe abantu bakowenu, nomzi wakowenu ongcwele, ukuba kupheliswe isikreqo, kupheliswe isono, kucanyagushelwe ubugwenxa, kuziswe ubulungisa obungunaphakade, ukuba kutywinwe umbono nesiprofeto, kumthambise oyiNgcwele. ( Daniyeli 9:24 )

(2) Wasebenzisa umzimba wakhe ukutshabalalisa ubutshaba—imithetho ebhalwe emthethweni
Kubandakanya umthetho ka-Adam, umthetho wesazela, nomthetho kaMoses, yonke imithetho eyayisigweba yachithwa, yacinywa, yashenxiswa, yabhangiswa, yabethelelwa emnqamlezweni.

【1】 ukudilizwa
Nina, enibe nifudula nikude, ngoku nithe naba ngoYesu Kristu ngegazi lakhe. Kuba yena uluxolo lwethu, owenza abo babini babe banye, waluchitha ke udonga lokwahlukanisa;
【2】 Lahla inzondo
Wawusebenzisa umzimba wakhe ukuze abubhangise ubutshaba, oko kukuthi, ummiselo obhaliweyo emthethweni, ukuze abo babini benziwe babe ngumntu omnye omtsha, ngaye ngokwakhe, ukuze bazuze uxolo. — Efese 2:15
【3】 thambisa
【4】 susa
【5】 wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni
Nani nafile ziziphoso nakukungaluki kwenyama yenu, unidlise ubomi ndawonye noKristu, enixolele zonke iziphoso. wababethelela emnqamlezweni. — Kolose 2:13-14
【6】 UYesu wayitshabalalisa, yaye ukuba uphinda ayakhe uya kuba ngumoni
Ukuba into endiyichithayo, into endiyichithayo, endibuya ndakhe yona, ibonisa ukuba ndingumoni. --Isahluko 2 esongezelelweyo ivesi 18

( isilumkiso : UYesu wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni waza wafela izono zethu, esebenzisa umzimba wakhe ukuze atshabalalise ingqumbo, oko kukuthi, ukutshitshisa imimiselo yomthetho nokuze acime konke okubhaliweyo emyalelweni (oko kukuthi, yonke imithetho nemimiselo eyayisigweba. ), Yisuse imibhalo esihlaselayo nesithintelayo (oko kukuthi, ubungqina bomtyholi osimangalelayo) uze uyibethelele emnqamlezweni ukuba ubani “ufundisa abadala, abalungiseleli, okanye abashumayeli ngoko bakwenzayo,” abazalwana kwaye oodade baya kubuyela kwiTestamente eNdala baze bavalelwe bangabomtyholi neqela likaSathana kwaye abanayo imfuyo. [UYesu wanikela ngobomi bakhe ukuze akukhulule phantsi komthetho na; Imithetho kunye nokuzivalela kwakho phantsi komthetho kungqina ukuba ungumoni, aba bantu abakaluqondi usindiso lukaKristu, iindaba ezilungileyo, abakazalwa ngokutsha, abakamfumani uMoya oyiNgcwele, kwaye bakhohliswe yimpazamo. )

【Seka umnqophiso omtsha】

Imimiselo eyandulelayo ithe, ibuthathaka, ingento yanto, yabhanga (umthetho awufeza nto), kwaza kwangeniswa elona themba lilungileyo, esinokusondela ngalo kuThixo. — Hebhere 7:18-19

Umthetho umenza umbingeleli omkhulu oswele amandla; — Hebhere 7:28

Waba ngumbingeleli, kungekhona ngokwemimiselo yenyama, kodwa ngokwamandla obomi obungenasiphelo (intlandlolo, obungenakonakala). — Hebhere 7:16

Ubulungiseleli ngoku obunikwe uYesu bulunge ngakumbi, kanye njengokuba engumlamleli womnqophiso olunge ngakumbi, owamiselwa phezu kwedinga elilunge ngakumbi. Ukuba bekungekho ziphoso kumnqophiso wokuqala, bekungayi kubakho themba lomnqophiso olandelayo. — Hebhere 8:6-7

“Nguwo lo umnqophiso endiya kuwenza nabo emva kwaloo mihla, itsho iNkosi: Ndiya kuyibhala imithetho yam ezintliziyweni zabo, ndize ndibabeke embilinini yabo nokunxaxha kwabo zixolelwe, akusafuneki mbingelelo wezono. — Hebhere 10:16-18 .

Usenza sikwazi ukukhonza njengabalungiseleli balo mnqophiso mtsha, kungekhona ngombhalo kodwa ngomoya; — 2 Korinte 3:6

(Qaphela: Imibhalo ayinabomi kwaye ibangela ukufa. Abantu abangenawo uMoya oyiNgcwele abayi kuyiqonda kwaphela iBhayibhile; umoya unobomi obuphilayo. Abantu abanoMoya oyiNgcwele batolika izinto zomoya. Umoya womthetho kaKristu yintsingiselo. luthando, kwaye uthando lukaKristu luguqula ilizwi elibhaliweyo libe bubomi kwaye liguqule abafileyo kwizinto eziphilayo.

Isikhundla sobubingeleli sitshintshiwe, Umthetho nawo kufuneka utshintshe. — Hebhere 7:12

【Umthetho ka-Adam, umthetho ongowakhe, umthetho kaMoses】 Tshintshela ku 【Umthetho Wothando LukaKrestu】

Amakhoboka ali-10 utshintsho unyana 22 oonyana neentombi utshintsho abantwana bakaThixo

【UYesu usivulele indlela entsha nephilileyo】

UYesu wathi: “Ndim indlela, ndim inyaniso, ndim ubomi, akukho namnye uzayo kuBawo, engezi ngam;

Bazalwana, njengoko sinentembelo yokungena kweNgcwele ngegazi likaYesu, kungendlela entsha ephilileyo evulelwe thina, ephuma ekhuselo, elingumzimba wakhe. — Hebhere 10:19-22

[Ukusebenza komthetho owakhe]

(1) Qwalasela okulungileyo nokubi entliziyweni yakho;

Ngenxa yokuba isono sahlula abantu kuThixo, wonke umntu osehlabathini wenza ngokwezazela zakhe aze alandele ukuthanda kuka-Adam ukuze ahlule phakathi kokulungileyo nokubi.

(2) Yenza ngokwesazela:

Abantu badla ngokuthi, isazela sakho siphi na? Ayinantliziyo nyani. Andenzanga nto imbi, andinasono, kwaye andizisoli.

(3) Isityholo sesazela:

Ukuba wenza into echasene nesazela sakho, isazela sakho siya kutyhola isazela sakho.

(4) Ukuphulukana nesazela:

Intliziyo yomntu inenkohliso ngaphezu kweento zonke; —Funda uYeremiya 17:9
Ekubeni isazela singasekho, ubani uzifica ekukhanukeni aze enze zonke iintlobo zokungcola. — Efese 4:19
Kulowo ungcolileyo, nongakholwayo, akukho nto ihlambulukileyo, kwanentliziyo yakhe, kwanesazela sakhe.— Tito 1:15

[Umthetho wesazela somntu utyhila isono somntu]

Kuyabonakala ukuba ingqumbo kaThixo ivela emazulwini, ichase bonke abantu abangahloneli Thixo nabangengomalungisa, abo banxaxhayo nabathintela inyaniso. Oko kunokwaziwa ngoThixo kusezintliziyweni zabo, ngokuba uThixo ukutyhile kubo... 29 kuzele yiyo yonke intswela-bulungisa, okungendawo, ukubawa, ulunya, neyelenqe; umhlebi, umthiyileyo uThixo, abanekratshi, abanekratshi, abaqhayisi, umcebi wezinto ezimbi, abangabathobeliyo abazali, abangenakwazi, abaphula iminqophiso, abangenalusapho, abangenaluvelwano. Nangona besazi ukuba uThixo ubagwebele ukuba abo bazenzayo izinto ezinjalo bafanelwe kukufa, abapheleli nje ekuzenzeni ngokwabo, kodwa bayabakhuthaza nabanye ukuba bazenze. — Roma 1:1-32

[UThixo ugweba izono zomntu ngokweendaba ezilungileyo]

Oku kubonisa ukuba umsebenzi womthetho ukroliwe ezintliziyweni zabo, iingqondo zabo zingqinelane okulungileyo nokubi, yaye iingcamango zabo ziyakhuphisana, enoba kokulungileyo nokubi. ) Ngaloo mini uThixo aya kugweba iimfihlelo zomntu ngoYesu Kristu, ngokweendaba zam ezilungileyo → Uya kubagweba abangakholwayo ngomhla wokugqibela “ngendlela yokwenyaniso” kaYesu Kristu. —Funda amaRoma 2:15-16 nakuMnqophiso 12:48

"Unokucinga ukuba umthi ulungile ( Ibhekisa kumthi wobomi ), isiqhamo sihle; Umthi wokulungileyo nokubi ), nesiqhamo eso sibi; Iindidi zeenyoka ezinobuhlungu! Ningathini na ukuba nako ukuthetha okulungileyo, ningabantu abakhohlakeleyo? Kuba umlomo uthetha ngokuphuphuma kwentliziyo. Umntu olungileyo ukhupha izinto ezilungileyo ebuncwaneni obulungileyo obusentliziyweni yakhe; Ndithi ke kuni, Onke amazwi angewani awathetha umntu, wophendula ngawo ngomhla womgwebo; kuba ngawo amazwi akho uya kugwetyelwa, nangawo amazwi akho uya kugwetywa. ”— Mateyu 12:33-37

( umthi ombi Kubhekiselwa kumthi wokulungileyo nokubi, bonke abazelwe bephuma ezingcanjini zika-Adam, bangabantu abangendawo, nokuba uyigcina njani na okanye uyiphucule njani na, nenza okubi nizenza umhanahanisi, ngokuba iingcambu zoonyana baka-Adam. umthi ungcoliswe ziinyoka ezinobuhlungu njengeentsholongwane, ngoko ke abo bazelweyo banokwenza ububi kuphela baze bathwale isiqhamo esibi, isiqhamo sokufa;

umthi olungileyo Ibhekisa kumthi wobomi, okuthetha ukuba iingcambu zomthi kaKristu zilungile, kwaye isiqhamo esisithwalayo bubomi noxolo. Ngoko ke, ingcambu yomntu olungileyo bubomi bukaKristu, kwaye umntu olungileyo, oko kukuthi, umntu olilungisa, uya kuthwala kuphela isiqhamo soMoya oyiNgcwele. Amen! Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo? )

articles.title: uMthetho kaMoses
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubazalwana noodade bam abathandekayo kwintsapho kaThixo! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibhile Funda iEksodus 34:27 kunye: “Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Wabhale la mazwi; thina baphilayo apha namhlanje . — Duteronomi 5 indinyana 3

Namhlanje siza kufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane " uMthetho kaMoses 》Umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhleli enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! "Umfazi onesidima" uthumela abasebenzi - ngezandla zabo babhala kwaye bathethe ilizwi lenyaniso, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwakho. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Thandaza ukuba iNkosi uYesu iqhubeke nokukhanyisela amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuba siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni. Yazini ukuba umthetho kaMoses usisithunzi sezinto ezilungileyo eziza kubakho; ungumfundisi osikhokelela kuKristu, ukuze sigwetyelwe ngokukholwa kuYesu Kristu. . Amen!

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

[UMthetho kaMoses] - ngumthetho ochazwe ngokucacileyo

KwiNtaba yeSinayi, uThixo wanika uhlanga lwakwaSirayeli umthetho, umthetho wemithetho yenyama emhlabeni, okwabizwa ngokuba nguMthetho kaMoses.

【UThixo wenza umnqophiso namaSirayeli】

Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Wabhale la mazwi; kuba ngawo ndingumnqophiso wam nawe noonyana bakaSirayeli.
UMoses wahlala noYehova iimini ezimashumi mane nobusuku obumashumi mane, engadli, engaseli. UYehova wawabhala amazwi omnqophiso, iMithetho Elishumi, emacwecweni amabini. — Eksodus 34:27-28
UYehova uThixo wethu wenza umnqophiso nathi eHorebhe. — Duteronomi 5:2
Lo mnqophiso awenzelwanga noobawo, wenziwa nathi sikhoyo namhlanje. — Duteronomi 5 indinyana 3

[UMthetho kaMoses ubandakanya:]

(1) IMithetho Elishumi- Eksodus 20:1-17
(2) Imithetho— Levitikus 18:4
(3) Ummiselo- Levitikus 18:5
(4) Inkqubo yomnquba-Eksodus 33-40
(5) Imimiselo Yemibingelelo— Levitikus 1:1-7
(6) Umnyhadala - inzuzo 23
(7)Yuesu-Min 10:10
(8)NgeSabatha-Eksodus 35
(9)Unyaka-Inzuzo 25
(10)Ummiselo woKutya-Levi 11
· · · njl. Kukho ama-613 amangenelo ewonke!

【Gcina imithetho kwaye wosikelelwa】

“Ukuba uthe waliphulaphula izwi likaYehova uThixo wakho, wagcina ukwenza yonke imithetho yakhe endikuwiselayo namhla, akumise phezu kwezizwe zonke zehlabathi, ukuba uthe waliphulaphula ilizwi likaYehova uThixo wakho ziya kukulandela, zibe phezu kwakho iintsikelelo; wosikelelwa phakathi komzi, usikelelwe esiqhameni sesizalo sakho, esiqhameni selizwe lakho; ngenzala yeenkomo zenu, nangamathole enu, nangamatakane enu, sisikelelwe ekuphumeni kwenu, nisikelelwe ekungeneni kwenu. 6.

【Ukwaphula isivumelwano kuya kubangela isiqalekiso】

Ukuba uthe akwaliphulaphula izwi likaYehova uThixo wakho, akwaliphulaphula ngenyameko izwi likaYehova uThixo wakho, ukuba uthe wayigcina imithetho yakhe nemimiselo yakhe, endikuwiselayo namhla, zikulandele zonke ezo ziqalekiso, zibe phezu kwakho...nawe woba phantsi kwesiqalekiso. Uqalekisiwe, nawe uqalekisiwe. — Duteronomi 28:15-19

Nabani na ongawathobeliyo amazwi alo mthetho woqalekiswa! ’ Bonke abantu baya kuthi, ‘Amen! ’”—Dut. 27:26

1 UYehova wokuzisela iziqalekiso, nobubi, nesijeziso emsebenzini wonke wezandla zakho, ngenxa yezenzo zakho ezimbi enizishiyileyo, ude utshabalale, utshabalale kuphele. —Duteronomi 28:20
2 UYehova woyinamathelisa kuwe indyikitya yokufa, ade akutshabalalise, ungabikho phezu komhlaba lowo waya kuwo ukuba uwume. —Duteronomi 28:21
3 UYehova woyijika imvula ezweni lakho, ibe luthuli nothuli, ihle ezulwini phezu kwakho ude utshabalale. — Duteronomi 28:24
4 UYehova wokuhlasela ngesifo sephepha, nangecesina, nangomlilo, nangesifo seengcongconi, ngekrele, nangembalela, nangexoshomba. Zonke ezo zinto ziya kukusukela ude utshabalale. — Duteronomi 28:22
5 Zokulandela ke ezo ziqalekiso zonke, zikufumane ude utshabalale.— Duteronomi 28:45
6 Wokhonza iintshaba zakho, ezo azithumele kuwe uYehova, ulambile, unxaniwe, ngumbethe, uswele. Wokubeka idyokhwe yentsimbi entanyeni yakho ade akugqibe. —Duteronomi 28:48
7 Bodla isiqhamo senkomo yakho, nesiqhamo somhlaba wakho, ude ubhubhe. Ingqolowa yenu, newayini yenu entsha, neoli yenu, namathole enu, namatakane enu, ayiyi kuthintelwa kuni ude utshabalale. —Duteronomi 28:51
8 Kwaye zonke iintlobo zezifo nezibetho ezingabhaliweyo kule ncwadi yomthetho ziya kuziswa phezu kwakho ude utshabalale. —Duteronomi 28:61
9 Yaye uya kwahlulwa kuzo zonke izizwe zakwaSirayeli ngokweziqalekiso zonke ezibhalwe encwadini yomyalelo nakumnqophiso, yaye uya kubethwa. —Duteronomi 29:21
10 Ndingqinisisa amazulu nehlabathi namhla ngani; ndibeke phambi kwenu ubomi nokufa, iintsikelelo namashwa, nyula ke ubomi, ukuze uphile, wena nembewu yakho;

Isilumkiso: Ngoko ke, bazalwana, nikwazi oku, ukuba ngaye lowo kuxelwa kuni uxolelo lwezono. Niya kugwetyelwa kuye lo mntu ngomthetho kaMoses, enithi nikholwe ngawo ezintweni zonke eningagwetyelwanga zona. Lumkani ngoko, hleze kunifikele oko kubhaliweyo ebaprofetini. —Funda iZenzo 13:38-40

Iculo: Eksodus

articles.title: Umthetho ka-Adam
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubazalwana noodade bam abathandekayo kwintsapho kaThixo! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibhile yethu kwiGenesis iSahluko 2, iivesi 16-17, sifunde kunye: *UNdikhoyo uThixo wathi kuye: “Ungatya nakuwuphi na umthi womyezo, kodwa ungatyi kuwo umthi wokwazi okulungileyo nokubi, kuba mhla uthe wadla kuwo uya kufa ngokuqinisekileyo.”

Namhlanje siza kufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane " Umthetho ka-Adam 》Umthandazo: Abha Othandekayo, Bawo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhleli enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! "Umfazi onesidima" uthumela abasebenzi - ngezandla zabo babhala kwaye bathethe ilizwi lenyaniso, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwakho! Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Thandaza ukuba iNkosi uYesu iqhubeke ikhanyisela amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zokomoya kwaye siqonde ukuba “umthetho ka-Adam” wawuyintoni kumyezo wase-Eden. uthixo kwaye umntu Umthetho womnqophiso.

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

Umthetho ka-Adam kuMyezo wase-Eden

~~【Ayityiwa】~~

UYehova uThixo wamyalela wathi: “Ungatya kuwo nawuphi na umthi womyezo, kodwa uze ungadli kuwo umthi wokwazi okulungileyo nokubi, kuba mhla uthe wadla kuwo uya kufa ngokuqinisekileyo.”— Genesis 2 16 - Icandelo le-17

【Iliso lokulungileyo nokubi livuliwe】

Yathi inyoka kumfazi, Anisayi kufa; kuba esazi uThixo ukuba, mhlana nithe nadla kuzo, oqabuka amehlo enu, nibe njengoothixo, nazi okulungileyo nokubi Isiqhamo saloo mthi sasilungele ukudliwa, sithandeka ebantwini, amehlo ethandeka, elumkile; Aqabuka amehlo abo bobabini, baqonda ukuba bahamba ze; bazithukela amagqabi omkhiwane, bazenzela iingubo. — Genesis 3: Isahluko 4-7

( Phawula: Amehlo oluntu okulungileyo nokubi avulwa abone ihlazo lawo kwaye abone ukuba abanye balihlazo nelingafezekanga aliyi kusalatha nje iintsilelo zabanye, batyhole abanye ngezenzo zesono nezingalunganga. kodwa kwakhona udale intiyo kubudlelwane phakathi kwabantu, kwaye isazela siya Kuzityhola ngesono kwakhona siya kubagweba abanye. Lo ngumsebenzi wabantu abafuna ukwazi imithetho yokulungileyo nokubi ebhalwe ezintliziyweni zabo. )

[Ityala lika-Adam lokophula isivumelwano]

Kanye njengokuba isono sangena ngamntu mnye ehlabathini, kwaza kwangena ukufa ngaso isono, ngokunjalo ukufa kwabafikela bonke abantu ngenxa yokuba bonke bonayo. Ngaphambi komthetho, isono sasikho ehlabathini, kodwa kungekho mthetho, isono asisiso isono. Kodwa ukususela kuAdam kuse kuMoses, ukufa kwalawula, kwanabo bangenzanga isono esifana nesika-Adam. U-Adam wayengumfuziselo wendoda eyayiza kuza. — Roma 5: Isahluko 12-14

Hoseya 6:7 “Kodwa bafana UAdam wawaphula umnqophiso , wandiqhatha kuloo mmandla.

[Ityala kukugwetywa ngumntu omnye]

Isipho asisihle njengesiphoso ukuba sigwetywe ngenxa yesono somntu omnye. -- Roma 5:16 (othetha ukuba bonke abazelwe yingcambu ka-Adam bagwetyiwe, kwanabo bangenzanga isono esifana nesika-Adam baphantsi kwamandla okufa)

【Wonke umntu wonile】

Ngokuba bonile bonke, basilela eluzukweni lukaThixo;
Ndazalelwa esonweni, esonweni kwasekukhawulweni kwam. — INdumiso 51:5

【Umvuzo wesono kukufa】

Kuba umvuzo wesono kukufa; ke sona isipho sikaThixo bubomi obungunaphakade, kuKristu Yesu iNkosi yethu. — Roma 6:23

【Amandla esono ngumthetho】

Yifa! Aphi amandla akho okoyisa? Yifa! Luphi ulwamvila lwakho? Ulwamvila lokufa sisono, amandla esono ngumthetho. — 1 Korinte 15:55-56

[Kwaye kuya kubakho umgwebo emva kokufa]

Ekubeni ukufa kweza ngamntu mnye...kuAdam bonke bafa – 1 Korinte 15:21-22

Ngokwesiphelo, wonke umntu umiselwe ukuba afe kube kanye, kwaye emva kokufa kuya kubakho umgwebo. — Hebhere 9:27

(Isilumkiso: Umthetho ka-Adam wazisa isono esikhokelela ekufeni kwabo bonke abantu, kodwa amabandla amaninzi awawuhoyi, kodwa afundisa abazalwana noodade ukuba bawugcine umthetho kaMoses, kuba belahlekiswa nguMtyholi. .Ukuba uAdam wawaphula lo mthetho, oko kuya kukhokelela ekufeni. yaye ngokuqinisekileyo niya kuwela kumgwebo omkhulu womhla wokugqibela.” Isiqalekiso ‘kukufa phezu kokufa’— bona uYuda 1:12 .

Ubaleka njani umgwebo wexesha elizayo...?

INkosi uYesu yathi: “Ukuba nabani na uyaweva amazwi am aze angawagcini, andisayi kumgweba. Andizanga kuligweba ihlabathi, kodwa ndize kulisindisa ihlabathi. Lowo undigibayo aze angawamkeli amazwi am, ndim. lowo uya kumgweba.” Intshumayelo awayishumayelayo iya kumgweba ngomhla wokugqibela, Yohane 12:47–48.

Iculo: Ekuseni

articles.title: Imithetho Emine Engundoqo YeBhayibhile
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubo bonke abazalwana noodade bam abathandekayo kwintsapho kaThixo! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibhile kuYakobi 4:12 size sifunde kunye: Mnye ummisi-mthetho nomgwebi, lowo unako ukusindisa nokutshabalalisa. Ungubani na wena ukuba ugwebe abanye?

Namhlanje siza kufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane " Imithetho Emine Engundoqo YeBhayibhile 》Umthandazo: Abha othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele usoloko enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! "Umfazi onesidima" → wathumela abasebenzi ngezandla zabo, zombini ezibhaliweyo kwaye zishunyayelwe, ngelizwi lenyaniso, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwakho. Ukutya kuthuthwa ukusuka esibhakabhakeni ukusuka kude kuze kunikwe kuthi ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bokomoya butyebe ngakumbi! Amen. Yanga iNkosi uYesu ingaqhubeka ikhanyisela amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuba siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni. Qonda imisebenzi kunye neenjongo zemithetho emine ephambili eBhayibhileni . Amen!

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

Kukho imithetho emine ephambili eBhayibhileni:

【Umthetho ka-Adam】-Uze ungadli

UYehova uThixo wamwisela umthetho, wathi, Kuwo nawuphi na umthi womyezo ungawudla, kodwa uze ungawudli umthi wokwazi okulungileyo nokubi, kuba mhla uthe wadla kuwo uya kufa. Genesis 2 16- Icandelo 17

[UMthetho kaMoses] - Imithetho echaza ngokucacileyo ukuba amaYuda afanele aphile ngayo

UThixo wawisa umthetho kwiNtaba yeSinayi waza wawunika uhlanga lwakwaSirayeli Umthetho wasemhlabeni ukwabizwa ngokuba nguMthetho kaMoses. Kubandakanya iMithetho eliShumi, imithetho, imimiselo, inkqubo yomnquba, imimiselo yamadini, imithendeleko, imifanekiso eqingqiweyo yenyanga, iiSabatha, iminyaka... njalo njalo. Kukho ama-613 amangenelo ewonke! —Funda iEksodus 20:1-17, iLevitikus, iDuteronomi.

【Owam umthetho】-Umthetho weentlanga

Ukuba ke abeentlanga abangenawo umthetho, benza ngokwemvelo yabo, bengenawo umthetho; Ungumthetho wakho . Oku kubonisa ukuba umsebenzi womthetho ukroliwe ezintliziyweni zabo, yaye ukuqonda kwabo okulungileyo nokubi kungqina. , yaye iingcamango zabo ziyakhuphisana, enoba zilungile okanye ziphosakele. 13 Kuya kuba njalo mhlenikweni uThixo aya kuzigweba izinto ezifihlakeleyo zabantu, ngokweendaba zam ezilungileyo ngoYesu Kristu. — Roma 2:14-16 . (Kunokubonwa ukuba iingcamango zokulungileyo nokubi zikroliwe ezingqondweni zabeeNtlanga, oko kukuthi, umthetho ka-Adam ugqalwa njengolungileyo okanye ongalunganga. Isazela sityhola wonk’ ubani ngokulungileyo nokubi, okulungileyo nokubi, okuthe tye okanye kokubi. zikrolwe kwizazela zabeeNtlanga.

【Umthetho kaKristu】Umthetho kaKristu uluthando?

Thwalisanani ubunzima; xa nenjenjalo ke nithobela umyalelo kaKrestu. --Isahluko 6 esongezelelweyo ivesi 2
Kuba umthetho uphela uhlanganiswe kwesi sivakalisi sithi, Uze umthande ummelwane wakho ngoko uzithanda ngako. --Isahluko 5 esongezelelweyo ivesi 14
UThixo uyasithanda, kwaye siyayazi kwaye siyayikholelwa. UThixo uluthando; lowo uhleli eluthandweni uhleli kuThixo, noThixo uhleli kuye. — 1 Yohane 4:16

(Phawula: Umthetho ka-Adam - umthetho kaMoses - umthetho wesazela, oko kukuthi, umthetho weentlanga, ngumthetho wemimiselo yasenyameni emhlabeni, kanti umthetho kaKristu ungumthetho wezulu, nowomoya umthetho kaKristu uluthando! Ukuthanda ummelwane wakho njengoko uzithanda ngako ukodlula yonke imithetho yehlabathi. )

[Injongo yokuseka imithetho] ?-Tyhila ubungcwele bukaThixo, ubulungisa, uthando, inceba nobabalo!

【Ukusebenza koMthetho】

(1) Bagwebe abantu ngesono

Ngoko ke, akukho nyama iya kugwetyelwa nguThixo ngokwasemisebenzini yomthetho, kuba umthetho ubagwebela isono. — Roma 3:20

(2) Yandisa izikreqo

Umthetho wongezelelwa ukuze izigqitho zande; ke apho sandayo isono, lwaphuphuma ngakumbi ubabalo. — Roma 5:20

(3) evalela wonke umntu esonweni, ebagcina

Kodwa iBhayibhile ibavalele entolongweni bonke abantu esonweni... Ngaphambi kokuba imfundiso yosindiso ngokholo ifike, sasigcinwe phantsi komthetho de kutyhilwe ukholo kwixesha elizayo. --Isahluko 3 esongezelelweyo ivesi 22-23

(4) misa umlomo wonke umntu

Siyazi ke ukuba yonke into esemthethweni ibhekiswe kwabo baphantsi komthetho, ukuze imilomo yonke ivingcwe, nehlabathi lonke libe netyala kuThixo. — Roma 3:19

(5) Gcina wonke umntu ekungathobelini

Nanikhe ningamthobeli uThixo, kodwa ngoku nenzelwe inceba ngenxa yokungathobeli kwabo. . . . Kuba uThixo ubavasile phantsi bonke abantu ekungenweni kwabo, ukuze abenzele inceba bonke. — Roma 11:30, 32

(6) Umthetho ungumfundisi wethu

Ngoko ke umthetho unguMkhapheli wethu, osikhokelela kuKristu, ukuze sigwetyelwe ngokwaselukholweni. Kodwa ngoku ekubeni umgaqo wosindiso ngokholo ufikile, asisekho phantsi kwesandla seNkosi. --Isahluko 3 esongezelelweyo ivesi 24-25

(7) ukuze iintsikelelo zinikwe abakholwayo

Kodwa iBhayibhile ivalela bonke abantu esonweni, ukuze iintsikelelo ezithenjisiweyo ngokukholwa kuYesu Kristu zinikwe abo bakholwayo. — kuGalati isahluko 3 indinyana 22

Natywinwa kuye, natywinwa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele wedinga, ekusekweni kwenu, nakholwayo nakuye, nakuva ilizwi lenyaniso, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwenu. Lo Moya oyiNgcwele usisibambiso (isicatshulwa sokuqala: ilifa) selifa lethu bade abantu bakaThixo (isicatshulwa sokuqala: ilifa) bakhululwe ukuze kudunyiswe uzuko lwakhe. —Funda eyabase-Efese 1:13-14 nakuYohane 3:16 .

Iculo: Umculo woloyiso

kulungile! Namhlanje ndingathanda ukwabelana nani ngobudlelwane apha. Ubabalo lweNkosi uYesu Kristu, nothando lukaThixo, nokuphefumlelwa kukaMoya oyiNgcwele, maluhlale kuni nonke! Amen

articles.title: Umfazi u-Eva ufuzisela ibandla
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo lusapho lwam, mawethu! Amen.

Masivule iiBhayibhile zethu kumaEfese 5:30-32 size sizifunde kunye: Kuba singamalungu omzimba wayo (kweminye imisongo yamandulo yongezelela: amathambo akhe nenyama yakhe).

Ngenxa yoko ke, indoda yomshiya uyise nonina, inamathele kumkayo, baze abo babini babe nyama-nye. Loo mfihlelo inkulu, ke mna ndithetha ndisingisele kuKristu, ndisingisele kulo ibandla .

Namhlanje siza kufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane " Umfazi u-Eva ufuzisela ibandla 》Umthandazo: Abha othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele usoloko enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! " umfazi onesidima "Icawe ithumela abasebenzi → ngelizwi lenyaniso elibhaliweyo nelithethiweyo ngezandla zabo, iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwethu. Amen! Isonka siziswa sivela kude ezulwini ukuze sisinike ixesha elifanelekileyo lobomi bethu bokomoya. Amen.

Thandaza ukuba iNkosi uYesu iqhubeke nokukhanyisela amehlo ethu omoya kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuba siyiqonde iBhayibhile ukuze sive kwaye sibone iinyaniso zasemoyeni. Qonda ukuba umfazi u-Eva ufuzisela ibandla .

Le mithandazo ingasentla, izikhungo, izibongozo, imibulelo, neentsikelelo! Oku ndikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen.

【1】UAdam ufuzisela uKristu

Masiyifunde iBhayibhile iGenesis 2:4-8 size siyifunde kunye → Imvelaphi yokudalwa kwezulu nomhlaba ngomhla wokudalwa kwezulu nomhlaba kwabe kungekho ngca ingca yasendle yayingekantshuli, ngokuba iNkosi uYehova yayingekantshuli imvula emhlabeni, kungasalinywanga mntu, kusuke inkungu isuke emhlabeni, iwunyakamise. UYehova uThixo wambumba umntu ngothuli lwasemhlabeni, waphefumlela emathatheni akhe impefumlo yobomi, waba ngumphefumlo ophilileyo; igama lakhe ke nguAdam. UYehova uThixo wenza umyezo e-Eden ngasempumalanga, wambeka khona umntu abemdalayo.

[Phawula]: Imvelaphi yokudala kukaYehova uThixo izulu nomhlaba Ngosuku lwesithandathu lokudalwa kukaYesu, uThixo wadala umntu ngokomfanekiselo wakhe, indoda nebhinqa. Bona iGenesis 1:27 . UYehova uThixo wambumba umntu ngothuli lwasemhlabeni, waphefumlela emathatheni akhe impefumlo yobomi, waba ngumphefumlo ophilileyo; igama lakhe ke nguAdam. (Apha "umoya" unokuba "yinyama")
UAdam ukhona umfanekiso →Ifuzisela uKristu, kwaye uAdam wokugqibela ngu Ngokwenene ngathi →Ibhekisa kuKristu! Amen. Bhekisela kumaRoma 5:14 nakweyoku- 1 kwabaseKorinte 15:44-45 .

【2】Umfazi onguEva ufuzisela ibandla

IGenesis 2 Chapter 18-24 Wathi uYehova uThixo, Akulungile ukuba umntu abe yedwa, ndiya kumenzela umncedi, uYehova wawisa ubuthongo obukhulu phezu kwakhe, walala. ukulala “Emehlweni abantu, lithetha “ukufa”; emehlweni kaThixo lithetha ukulala!” Ngokomzekelo, uYesu kwiTestamente eNtsha wathi: “ULazaro wam walala, nto leyo ethetha ukuba uLazaro wafa.” UYehova wabangela ukuba uAdam alale. "ebuthongweni", walala ubuthongo obukhulu. ukulala Ifanekisela uAdam wokugqibela weTestamente eNtsha, “uYesu,” owabethelelwa emnqamlezweni waza wafa ngenxa yezono zethu, “walala” waza wangcwatywa engcwabeni, emva koko olunye lweembambo zakhe lwakhutshwa yaza inyama yavalwa. INkosi uThixo isebenzise loo mntu" UAdam "Iimbambo ezithathwe emzimbeni zenza enye" umfazi "," umfazi "" ngumzekelo "womtshakazi", oko kukuthi, iBandla likaYesu Kristu - "umtshakazi" kwiSityhilelo isahluko 19, indinyana 7. "Ubambo uYehova uThixo waluthabatha kuAdam ukuze adale" "umfazi" uhlobo lweTestamente eNtsha uYesu ngaYe Umzimba "ubangela" " Umntu omtsha “Libandla, ibandla lomoya. Amen! Niyaqonda na ngokucacileyo? Jonga kwabase-Efese 2 Isahluko 15 noYohane isahluko 2 ivesi 19-21 “uYesu wawenza umzimba wakhe waba yitempile.

IGenesis 2:23-24 Wathi uAdam, Lo ke lithambo lasemathanjeni am, yinyama yasenyameni yam “Umntu omtsha” ngumzimba kaKristu, yaye ngamnye kuthi ulithambo likaKrestu nenyama yakhe , indinyana 27 .

Ngako oko indoda yomshiya uyise nonina, inamathele emfazini wayo, baze abo babini babe nyama-nye. Ifanekisela into yokuba “umntu omtsha” ozelwe nguThixo uya kulishiya ixhego lika-Adam owazalwa ngenyama yabazali bakhe, aze amanyaniswe nomfazi wakhe, okanye “umtshakazi, umtshakazi, ibandla” likaKristu. umzimba kaYesu Krestu Wena noKrestu niya kuba ngumzimba mnye umamkeli ibandla likaYesu Krestu Amen! Ngoko, uyayiqonda? Funda kwabase-Efese 5:30-32 . Ngoko ke, “umfazi onguEva” kwiTestamente eNdala ufuzisela “iBandla lamaKristu” kwiTestamente eNtsha! Amen.

articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uxolo kubo bonke abazalwana noodade bam abathandekayo! Amen.

Masivule [iBhayibhile] kumaEfese 1:23, siyityhile size siyifunde kunye: IBandla lingumzimba wakhe, lizaliswe nguLowo uzalise konke kuko konke.

KwabaseKolose 1:18 naye uyintloko yomzimba webandla; Uyingqalo, owaqalayo ukuvuka kwabafileyo, ukuze abe ngomkhulu ezintweni zonke .

Namhlanje siza kufunda, sidlelane, kwaye sabelane "ngeNkosi" ibandla lika Yesu Krestu 》Umthandazo: Abha othandekayo, Bawo Oyingcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, enkosi ngokuba uMoya oyiNgcwele usoloko enathi! Amen. Enkosi Nkosi! “Umfazi onesidima” eNkosini uYesu ecaweni Thumela abasebenzi, ababhala ngezandla zabo kwaye bathethe ilizwi lenyaniso, ivangeli yosindiso lwethu. Ukutya sikunikwa ngexesha elifanelekileyo ukwenza ubomi bethu bube nentsingiselo. Amen! Ngamana iNkosi uYesu ingaqhubeka nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumlo yethu kwaye ivule iingqondo zethu ukuze sibone kwaye sive iinyaniso zomoya kwaye siqonde amazwi omoya [iBhayibhile]! Qonda ukuba “umfazi, umtshakazi, umfazi, umtshakazi, umfazi onesidima” bafanekisela [ibandla] ibandla leNkosi uYesu Kristu! Amen . [IBandla] ngumzimba kaYesu Krestu, kwaye singamalungu akhe. Amen! Imithandazo, umbulelo, kunye neentsikelelo malunga noku kungasentla! Ngegama leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu! Amen

【1】IBandla leNkosi uYesu Krestu

IBandla leNkosi uYesu Krestu:

Isenokuthiwa kwakhona njenge « ibandla likaYesu Krestu »

IBandla likaYesu Krestu:

UYesu Krestu lilitye lembombo, elakha phezu kwesiseko sabapostile nabaprofeti. Amen!

ibhekisele ku: 1 KWABASETESALONIKA 1:1 UPawulos noSilas noTimoti babhalela ibandla laseTesalonika elikuThixo uYise neNkosi uYesu Krestu. Ubabalo noxolo malube kuni! nakwabase-Efese 2:19-22

Ibandla ngumzimba wakhe

Masifunde iBhayibhile kwaye sifunde kwabase-Efese 1:23 kunye: Ibandla ngumzimba wakhe, ukuzala ke oko kozalise konke kuko konke.

KWABASEKOLOSE 1:18 Yena ke uyintloko yomzimba webandla. Uyingqalo, owaqalayo ukuvuka kwabafileyo, ukuze abe ngomkhulu ezintweni zonke.

[Phawula:] Ngokuhlolisisa ezi ngxelo zezibhalo zingasentla, sinokufumanisa oku: ecaweni ] ngumzimba kaYesu Kristu, ozaliswe nguLowo Uzalisayo konke kuko konke. Amen! UliLizwi, iSiqalo, kunye noVuko kwabafileyo kuwo wonke umzimba weBandla. Ngokwamandla amakhulu awawasebenzisayo kumzimba kaKristu, wamvusa kwabafileyo waza wamenza ngokutsha.” Umntu omtsha ’—Funda eyabase-Efese 2:15 . Umntu omtsha "Nokuvuka kwabafileyo, ukuzalwa ngokutsha" thina "-Funda eyoku-1 kaPetros 1:3. KuKristu" wonke umntu “Bonke baya kuvuswa kwakhona – bona eyoku-1 kwabaseKorinte 15:22. Abatsha, thina, wonke umntu "Bonke bakhomba [ ecaweni ] Umzimba kaYesu Kristu wakutsho, ngenxa yokuba singamalungu omzimba! Amen. Ngoko, uyaqonda!

[2] Ibandla lakhelwe phezu kolwalwa lomoya likaKristu

Masifunde iBhayibhile uMateyu 16: 18 kwaye ndithi kuwe, UnguPetros, kwaye phezu kolu lwalwa ndiya kulakhela ibandla lam; Kwakhona wasela amanzi okomoya afanayo nalawo akweyoku- 1 kwabaseKorinte 10:4 . Into abayiselayo ivela kwizinto ezibalandelayo Iliwa lomoya nguKristu .

[Phawula:] Ngokufundisisa ezi zibhalo zingasentla, sibhala ukuba iNkosi uYesu yathi kuPetros: “Mna ndiya kuthabatha eyam [ ecaweni ] yakhelwe phezu kolu lwalwa, oku" iliwa "ibhekisele kwi [ iliwa lomoya ], Lonto" iliwa "NguKristu lowo." iliwa Kukwangumzekeliso othi: “Amatye aphilileyo neziseko zembombo.” UYehova lilitye eliphilileyo, liliwa ngabantu, linyuliwe, linqweneleka kuThixo. Njengamatye aphilileyo, indlu yokomoya ikhonza njengombingeleli ongcwele, enikela imibingelelo yoMoya eyamkelekileyo kuThixo ngoYesu Kristu.

【3】Singamalungu ecawe

Masifunde eyabase-Efese 5:30-32 eBhayibhileni. Ngokuba singamalungu omzimba wayo (Eminye imisongo yakudala yongeza: Nje Ngamathambo akhe nenyama yakhe ). Ngenxa yoko ke, indoda yomshiya uyise nonina, inamathele kumkayo, baze abo babini babe nyama-nye. Loo mfihlelo inkulu, ke mna ndithetha ndisingisele kuKristu, ndisingisele kulo ibandla. Kodwa ke, ngamnye wenu makamthande umfazi wakhe njengoko azithanda ngako. Umfazi ufanele ayihlonele nendoda yakhe.

［ Phawula: 】Ndizifundile ezi zibhalo zingasentla ukuze ndibhale ukuba sifumana inceba nothando olukhulu lukaThixo uBawo! Nizalwe ngokutsha ngokuvuka kukaYesu Kristu kwabafileyo” thina "ibhekisele kwi [icawa] , ecaweni Ewe Umzimba kaKristu, singamalungu akhe ! Kunjengokuba iNkosi uYesu yathi: “Inene, inene, ndithi kuni, Ukuba anithanga niyidle inyama yoNyana woMntu, nilisele igazi loNyana woMntu, aninabo ubomi kuni. Nabani na oyidlayo eyam inyama, ayisele mna ndiya kumvusa ngomhla wokugqibela. Inyama yam ikukudla, negazi lam liselo. Lowo uyidlayo eyam inyama, alisele elam igazi, uhleli kum, nam ndihleli kuye UYohane 6. Isahluko 53-56. Xa sukuba sisitya size sisele inyama negazi leNkosi, sinomzimba nobomi bukaYesu Kristu ngaphakathi kwethu, ngoko singamalungu omzimba wayo. Ithambo lamathambo akhe nenyama yenyama yakhe. Amen.

Ngenxa yoko ke, umntu makabashiye abazali bakhe; hamba “Okuzelwe ngabazali—ubomi besono obuphuma kumzimba ka-Adam; umfazi "Ukumanyana kukuba kunye [ ecaweni ] bamanyaniswa, baba banye abo babini. Ngumntu wethu omtsha owenziwe ngokutsha odityaniswe nomzimba kaKristu ukuba ube ngumzimba omnye! Ngumzimba kaYesu Kristu, owenziwe waba ngumoya omnye! NguMoya ka-Abha, uBawo waseZulwini, uMoya weNkosi uYesu, uMoya oyiNgcwele! Hayi “umoya wemvelo” ka-Adam. Ngoko, ngaba uyaqonda ngokucacileyo?

Thina sizelwe nguThixo" Umntu omtsha “Ngamalungu omzimba wakhe asebenza kunye ekwakhiweni komzimba kaKristu, side sonke sifikelele kubunye bokholo nasekumazini uNyana kaThixo, sigqibelele ebudodeni, sizalisekisa ubungangamsha bukaKristu. Inyaniso eluthandweni Ilizwi eli, ezintweni zonke, likhulela kuye oyiNtloko, uKristu, ekuthe ngaye umzimba uphela, udityaniswe ndawonye, umanyaniswa ndawonye, ukuze onke amalungu anyamekelane, ngokusebenza kwelungu ngalinye, uvuselela umzimba ukuba ukhule uze uzakhe eluthandweni.” “Ibhotwe lomoya” “itempile” “indawo yokuhlala yoMoya oyiNgcwele”! Amen.” Ngoko uyaqonda na? Jonga kwabase-Efese 4:12-16. UKristu uyalithanda ibandla !Singu “mtshakazi, umfazi, umtshakazi” kaKristu, Kanye njengokuba indoda ithanda umfazi wayo, iliphatha ngononophelo ithambo lamathambo ayo nenyama yenyama yayo.
